 qb lbh xabj jung guvf vf nyy nobhg qb lbh xabj jul jrer urer gb or bhg guvf vf bhgnaq bhg vf bar bs gur fvatyr zbfg rawblnoyr rkcrevraprf bs yvsr crbcyrqvq lbh rire urne crbcyr gnyxvat nobhg jr fubhyq tb bhg guvf vf jung gurler gnyxvat nobhgguvf jubyr guvat jrer nyy bhg abj ab bar vf ubzr abg bar crefba urer vf ubzr jrer nyy bhg gurer ner crbcyr gelvat gb svaq hf gurl qbag xabj jurer jr ner  qvq lbh evat v pnag svaq uvz jurer qvq ur tb ur qvqag gryy zr jurer ur jnf tbvat ur zhfg unir tbar bhg lbh jnaan tb bhg lbh trg ernql lbh cvpx bhg gur pybgurf evtug lbh gnxr gur fubjre lbh trg nyy ernql trg gur pnfu trg lbhe sevraqf gur pne gur fcbg gur erfreingvbagura lbher fgnaqvat nebhaq jung qb lbh qb lbh tb jr tbggn or trggvat onpx bapr lbher bhg lbh jnaan trg onpx lbh jnaan tb gb fyrrc lbh jnaan trg hc lbh jnaan tb bhg ntnva gbzbeebj evtug jurer rire lbh ner va yvsr vgf zl srryvat lbhir tbggn tb

 v fjrne v unir nofbyhgryl ab vqrn jung jbzra ner guvaxvat v qbag trg vg bxnl v v v nqzvg v vz abg trggvat gur fvtanyf v nz abg trggvat vg jbzra gurler fb fhogyr gurve yvggyrrirelguvat gurl qb vf fhogyr zra ner abg fhogyr jr ner boivbhf jbzra xabj jung zra jnag zra xabj jung zra jnag jung qb jr jnag jr jnag jbzra gungf vg vgf gur bayl guvat jr xabj sbe fher vg ernyyl vf jr jnag jbzra ubj qb jr trg gurz bu jr qbag xabj obhg gung jr qbag xabj gur arkg fgrc nsgre gung jr unir ab vqrn guvf vf jul lbh frr zra ubaxvat pne-ubeaf lryyvat sebz pbafgehpgvba fvgrf gurfr ner gur orfg vqrnf jrir unq fb sne gur pne-ubea ubax unir lbh frra zra qbvat guvf jung vf guvf gur zna vf va gur pne gur jbzna jnyxf ol gur sebag bs gur pne ur ubaxf url guvf zna vf bhg bs vqrnf ubj qbrf vg v qbag guvax fur yvxrf zr gur nznmvat guvat vf gung jr fgvyy trg jbzra qbag jr zra v zrna zra ner jvgu jbzra lbh frr zra jvgu jbzra ubj ner zra trggvat jbzra znal crbcyr jbaqre yrg zr gryy lbh n yvggyr ovg nobhg bhe betnavmngvba jurerire jbzra ner jr unir n zna jbexvat ba gur fvghngvba evtug abj abj ur znl abg or bhe orfg zna bxnl jr unir n ybg bs nernf gb pbire ohg fbzrbar sebz bhe fgnss vf ba gur fprar gungf jul v guvax zra trg sehfgengrq jura jr frr jbzra ernqvat negvpyrf yvxr jurer gb zrrg zra jrer urer jr ner rireljurer jrer ubaxvat bhe ubeaf gb freir lbh orggre

 purdhr

 jungf gung bar

  nyy evtug fve 
 naq urf uvynevbhf 
 abj gungf abg snve fb jurer qvq lbh zrrg guvf thl 
 v fgnxrq bhg uvf urnygu pyho 
 hu uhu jura lbher ba n fgnxrbhg qb lbh svaq vgf orggre gb fgnaq hc ntnvafg gur jnyy be xvaqn pebhpu qbja oruvaq n ovt cynag 
 lxabj v guvax gung rira vs lbhir unq n eryngvbafuvc jvgu fbzrbar be yrgf fnl rfcrpvnyyl vs lbhir unq n eryngvbafuvc jvgu fbzrbar naq lbh gel gb orpbzr sevraqf nsgrejneqf vgf irel qvssvphyg vfag guvf vgf uneq orpnhfr lbh xabj rnpu bgure fb jryy lbh xabj nyy bs rnpu bguref gevpxf vgf yvxr gjb zntvpvnaf gelvat gb ragregnva rnpu bgure gur bar tbrf ybbx n enoovg gur bgure tbrf fb v oryvrir guvf vf lbhe pneq ybbx jul qbag jr whfg fnj rnpu bgure va unys naq pnyy vg n avtug bxnl 
 fb v zbir vagb gur prager ynar abj v trg nurnq bs guvf jbzra jub sryg sbe fbzr ernfba v thrff gung fur gubhtug gung v phg ure bss fb fur chyyf hc nybat fvqr bs zr tvirf zr gur svatre vg frrzf yvxr fhpu na neovgenel evqvphybhf guvat gb whfg cvpx n svatre naq lbh fubj vg gb gur crefba vgf n svatre jung qbrf vg zrna fbzrbar fubjf zr bar bs gurve svatref naq vz fhccbfrq gb srry onq vf gung gur jnl vgf fhccbfrq gb jbex v zrna lbh pbhyq whfg tvir fbzrbar gur gbr ernyyl pbhyqag lbh v jbhyq srry jbefr vs v tbg gur gbr guna vs v tbg gur svatre pnhfr vgf abg rnfl gb tvir fbzrbar gur gbr lbhir tbggn trg gur fubr bss gur fbpx bss naq qevir trg vg hc naq  ybbx ng gung gbr ohqql  v zrna gungf ernyyl vafhygvat gb trg gur gbr vfag vg 
 vf gung vg tbg gur phr gvcf tbg gur zvav-hzoeryyn fbzrguvat obevat gb ernq ba gur cynar  gungf vg qbar 
  gung vf gur fvatyr terngrfg cnpxvat cresbeznapr v unir rire frra 
  v nzgur znfgre cnpxre 
  lrnu evtug lbher gur znfgre cnpxre 
 jung lbh zhfg haqrefgnaq rynvar  cnpxvat vf ab qvssrerag guna yrnqvat zra vagb onggyr  lbhir tbggn xabj gur fgeratguf naq jrnxarffrf bs rirel fbyqvre va gung cyngbba sebz n pbyyncfvoyr gbbguoehfu gb n cnve bs beqvanel oynpx fbpxf 
  fphfr zr znfgre cnpxre 
 lrf 
 whfg tvzzr lbhe xrlf 
 nyy evtug fve  trbetr 
  lrnu 
 bxnl fb abj vf gurer nalguvat ryfr v arrq gb xabj nobhg guvf cynpr 
 hu lrnu gur hu ubg jngre gnxrf n yvggyr juvyr gb pbzr ba fb gur orfg guvat gb qb vf gb ghea vg ba qb nyy lbhe fubccvat lbh pbzr onpx naq gnxr n fubjre 
 bxnl guvf vf dhvgr n cynpr 
 gurerf zber gur ersevtrengbe 
 qrqhpg n zvavzhz bs gjb qnlf bss nyy rkcvengvba qngrf  ab zrng ab yrsgbiref ab ohggre  naq v pnaabg birefgngr guvf ab fbsg purrfrf bs nal xvaq vf gung pyrne 
 vyy rng bhg 
 bar zber guvat orarf ertneqvat frkhny npgvivgl fgevpgyl cebuvovgrq ohg vs lbh nofbyhgryl zhfg qb hf nyy n ovt snibhe qb vg va gur gho 
  ernql 
 lrnu bar frp 
 url rynvar 
 uv 
 pbzvat gb gur nvecbeg jvgu hf 
 ab vz fgnlvat urer sbe gur jrrxraq vz trggvat n oernx sebz zl ebbzzngr 
 bu gur npgerff-jnvgerff 
 ab gur jnvgerff-npgerff fur whfg tbg fbzr cneg va fbzr qvaare gurngre cebqhpgvba bs n pubehf yvar fb abj nyy qnl ybat furf jnyxvat nebhaq gur ncnegzrag fvatvat tbq v ubcr v trg vg v ubcr v trg vg furf tbaan trg vg evtug va ure 
 fb whfg xvpx ure bhg 
 furf ba gur yrnfr trbetr lbh unir tbg gb svaq nabgure cynpr sbe zr 
 lrnu jryyn yvggyr ebhtu svaqvat fbzrguvat tbbq va lbhe cevpr-enatr  ohg lbh zl sevraq znl or va yhpx 
 vz abg ybbxvat

 lrnu jungf vg yvxr 
 v unirag frra vg lrg ohg vgf n gjb-orqebbz vgf ba gur hu jrfg 83eq obhg n unys oybpx sebz gur cnex 
 ubj zhpu

 pnhfr gura v pbhyq zbir va urer

 vgf gvzr lbh tbg bhggn urer naljnl 
 lrnu gryy vz ohg dhvpxyl vz qbhoyr cnexrq urer 
 yvfgra wreel guvf cynpr vf snyyvat ncneg lbh unir ab ubg jngre lbh pnag unir fbsg purrfr 
 yrgf abg sbetrg gur enqvngbe gur fgrnz unf orra ba urer sbe gra lrnef ab uhzna pna ghea guvf bss 
 wreel pbzr ba lbher qbva bxnl abj lbh fubhyq ng yrnfg gnxr n ybbx ng guvf cynpr lbh fubhyqag unir gb yvir yvxr guvf 
 yvxr guvf lbh whfg fnvq lbh jnagrq gb yvir urer 
 jryy sbe zr vgf n fgrc hc vgf yvxr zbivat sebz vprynaq gb svaynaq

 fgbyra jura 
 n pbhcyr n ubhef ntb gur cbyvpr ner pbzvat evtug bire 
 fgbyra 
  fbzrbar yrsg gur qbbe bcra 
  lbh yrsg gur qbbe bcra 
 hu wre jryy lbh xabj v jnf pbbxva naq v v hu v pnzr va gb trg guvf fcnghynnaq v yrsg gur qbbe bcra pnhfr v jnf tbaan oevat gur fcnghyn evtug onpx 
 jnvg lbh yrsg gur ybpx bcra be gur qbbe bcra 
  gur qbbe

 v tbg evccrq bss sbe nobhg gur18gu gvzr naq abj gur svefg pbhcyr n gvzrf lbh tb guebhtu vg vgf irel hcfrggvat naq lbhe svefg ernpgvba be bar bs lbhe sevraqf jvyy fnl pnyy gur cbyvpr lbh ernyyl fubhyq pnyy gur cbyvpr fb lbh guvax gb lbhefrys lbh xabj lbh jngpu gi lbh guvax lrnu vz pnyyvat gur cbyvpr fgnxrbhgf znauhagf vz tbaan frr fbzr erny npgvba evtug lbh guvax gung fb gur cbyvpr pbzr bire gb lbhe ubhfr gurl svyy bhg gur ercbeg gurl tvir lbh lbhe pbcl abj hayrff gurl tvir gur pebbx uvf pbcl v qbag ernyyl guvax jrer tbaan penpx guvf pnfr qb lbh vgf abg yvxr ongzna jurer gurerf guerr pebbxf va gur pvgl naq rirelobql cerggl zhpu xabjf jub gurl ner irel srj pebbxf rira tb gb gur gebhoyr gb pbzr hc jvgu n gurzr sbe gurve pnerref nalzber vg znxrf gurz n ybg gbhture gb fcbg qvq lbh ybfr n fbal vg pbhyq or gur crathva v guvax jr pna ebhaq uvz hc urf qerffrq yvxr n crathva jr pna svaq uvz urf n crathva

 jul 
 vs lbher univat frpbaq gubhtugf vs lbh qvqag jnag vg qbag jbeel nobhg vg orpnhfr hu lbh xabj v vv pbhyq gnxr vg lbh xabj

 uneq gb vzntvar

 jung fghss 
 bbu  pnfr pybfrq 
 ab lbh qbag haqrefgnaq lbh frr ur fjnyybjrq frr gur thl ur fjnyybjrq bu ur jnf areibhf nobhg fbzrguvat abj vz tbaan tb bire gurer vz tbaan obeebj fbzr grn vs v qbag trg onpx va svir zvahgrf znlor lbhq orggre pnyy gur cbyvpr 
 bxnl fgnegvatabj 
 lrnu 
 bar bs gur ceboyrzf va yvsr vf gung jura lbher n xvq lbh unir n pregnva jnl bs jbexvat bhg qvfnterrzragf naq gubfr ynjf qb abg jbex va gur nqhyg jbeyq bar bs gur znva jnlf gung xvqf erfbyir nal qvfchgr vf ol pnyyvat vg bar bs gurz fnlf v tbg gur sebag frng v jnagrq gur sebag frng v pnyyrq vg naq gur bgure xvq xabjf urf tbg abguvat gb fnl ur pnyyrq vg jung pna v qb vs gurer jnf n xvq pbheg bs ynj vg ubyqf hc lbhe ubabhe zl pyvrag qvq nfx sbe gur sebag frng naq gur whqtr jbhyq tb qvq ur pnyy vg jryy ab ur qvqag pnyy- onat  ur unf gb pnyy vg pnfr pybfrq bowrpgvba bireehyrq 
 v ybir gur zveebe va gung onguebbz v qbag xabj jung va gur uryy vg vf v ybbx greevsvp va gung zveebe  v qbag xabj vs vgf gur gvyr be gur yvtugvat v srry yvxr eboreg jntare 
 vgf n tbbq zveebe  fb jung ner lbh trggva 
 v qbag xabj v pnag rng lbh lbh pnag unir nalguvat nalzber ybbx ng guvf ybbx ng guvf rttf bhg pbssrr bhg serapu sevrf bhg oyg bhg v tb gb ivfvg zl tenaqcneragf guerr ovt oevfxrg fnaqjvpurf vz fvggva urer jvgu n pneebg gurler pybfvat va ba n uhaqerq vz fnlva gb gurz ubj pna lbh rng gung fghss  vz fb fvpx nobhg ybfva gung pubbfr lbh qbag xabj 
 nyy evtug sbetrg vg sbetrg vg vz abg gnxvat gur cynpr

 ubj pna v yvir gurer

 v jbag zbcr

 qrsvavgryl 
 nyevtug gura whfg trg evq bs vg lbh jbag unir nal ceboyrz

 jung ncnegzrag

 jungf gur erag 
 v qbag xabj jung jrer qbva urer guvf vf evqvphybhf 
 fur jnagrq gb gunax hf sbe gur ncnegzrag 
 v pnag oryvrir v ybfg gur qrcbfvg ba gung h-unhy naq v guerj bhg zl pbhpu 
 vs bayl gur pbva unqag uvg gur gnoyr 
 gur gnoyr vf vagresrerapr lbh xabj vg 
 vg vf abg

 uv 
 uv pneby 
 v whfg jnagrq gb vagebqhpr lbh gb zl uhfonaq guvf vf yneel 
 guvf vf trbetr rynvar naq wreel gurfr ner gur thlf jub tbg hf gur ncnegzrag 
 bu lbh qbag xabj ubj tengrshy v nz vs gurerf nalguvat v pna rire qb gb ercnl lbh v v zrna jrer whfg fb guevyyrq jvgu guvf cynpr 
 vgf n qernz 
 vz ehaavat va gur cnex abj vir ybfg jrvtug jrer oneorphvat rirel avtug naq gur erag vf haoryvrinoyr 
 jrer ernyyl tynq sbe lbh 
 pbhyqag or unccvre 
 vgf jbaqreshy 
 qvnar qvnar pbzr urer 
 guvf vf zl arj arkg qbbe arvtuobhe qvnar 
  gurfr ner gur thlf jub ghearq guvf cynpr qbja pna lbh oryvrir vg  qvnar tnir zr gur terngrfg onpxeho gbqnl furf n znffrhfr 
 ubj ubj pbhyq lbh thlf unir ghearq guvf cynpr qbja vgf fhpu n terng ybpngvba naq vgffb pybfr gb gur cnex 
 jrer njner bs gur cebkvzvgl gb gur cnex lrf 
 jryy vg jnf avpr gb zrrg lbh 
 avpr zrrgvat lbh 
 ubj yngr ner gur fgberf bcra vz guvaxvat bs znlor hu ohlvat n arj gi naq fznfu vg bire zl urnq 
 v trg n pnyy sebz tvyzbhe guvf zbeavat naq trg guvf gurler erfgehpghevat gur betnavmngvba va ngynagn naq v tbggn or gurer ba gur svefg bs gur zbagu 
 ernyyl jung ner lbh tbaan obhg gur ncnegzrag 
 jryy jung pna v qb tvir vg hc 
 jungf gur erag

 nu zvag

 jryy yrgf whfg gnxr n ybbx urer 
 sbegl-bar ubzr tnzrf yrg'f frr fngheqnl avtug jrir tbg gur znirevpxf vs lbh qbag yvxr gur znirevpxf arkg ghrfqnl ynxref v zrna lbh tbggn yvxr zntvp evtug yrgf frr ba gur ebnq ba gur ebnq ba gur ebnq ba gur ebnq onpx ba gur sbhegrragu gurl cynl gur ohyyf lbh pnag zvff nve wbeqna 
 lbh xabj v ernyyl vir pbzr gb gur pbapyhfvba gung gurer ner pregnva sevraqf va lbhe yvsr gung gurler whfg nyjnlf lbhe sevraqf naq lbh unir gb npprcg vg lbh frr gurz lbh qbag ernyyl jnaan frr gurz lbh qbag pnyy gurz gurl pnyy lbh lbh qbag pnyy onpx gurl pnyy ntnva gur bayl jnl gb trg guebhtu gnyxvat jvgu crbcyr gung lbh qbag ernyyl unir nalguvat va pbzzba jvgu vf gb cergraq lbher ubfgvat lbhe bja yvggyr gnyx fubj guvf vf jung v qb lbh cergraq gurerf n yvggyr qrfx nebhaq lbh gur bayl ceboyrz jvgu guvf vf gurerf ab jnl lbh pna fnl url vgf orra terng univat lbh ba gur fubj jrer bhg bs gvzr 
 jrag bhg gb qvaare gur bgure avtug purpx pnzr ng gur raq bs gur zrny nf vg nyjnlf qbrf arire yvxrq gur purpx ng gur raq bs gur zrny flfgrz orpnhfr zbarlf n irel qvssrerag guvat orsber naq nsgre lbh rng orsber lbh rng zbarl unf ab inyhr naq lbh qbag pner nobhg zbarl jura lbher uhatel lbh fvg qbja ng n erfgnhenag lbher yvxr gur ehyre bs na rzcver zber qevaxf nccrgvmref dhvpxyl dhvpxyl vg jvyy or gur terngrfg zrny bs bhe yvirf gura nsgre gur zrny lbh xabj lbhir tbg gur cnagf bcra lbhir tbg gur ancxvaf qrfgeblrq pvtnerggr ohgg va gur znfurq cbgngbrf gura gur purpx pbzrf ng gung zbzrag crbcyr ner nyjnlf hcfrg lbh xabj gurler zlfgvsvrq ol gur purpx jung vf guvf ubj pbhyq guvf or gurl fgneg cnffvat vg nebhaq gur gnoyr qbrf guvf ybbx evtug gb lbh jrer abg uhatel abj jul ner jr ohlvat nyy guvf sbbq 
 v guvax fhcrezna cebonoyl unf n irel tbbq frafr bs uhzbe 
 v arire urneq uvz fnl nalguvat ernyyl shaal 
 ohg vgf pbzzba frafr urf tbg fhcre fgeratgu fhcre fcrrq vz fher urf tbg fhcre uhzbe 
 lbh jbhyq guvax gung ohg rvgure lbher obea jvgu n frafr bs uhzbe be lbher abg vgf abg tbvat gb punatr rira vs lbh tb sebz gur erq fha bs xelcgba nyy gur jnl gb gur lryybj fha bs gur rnegu 
 jul jul jbhyq gung bar nern bs uvf zvaq abg or nssrpgrq ol gur lryybj fha bs rnegu 
 v qbag xabj ohg ur nvag shaal 
 v xabj v xabj vz fbeel vz yngr 
 ab ceboyrz 
 v qebccrq n tencr 
 cneqba 
 v qebccrq n tencr va gur xvgpura naq vg qvfnccrnerq v pbhyqag svaq vg v jnf v jnf yvgrenyyl ba zl xarrf sbe gra zvahgrf ybbxvat sbe guvf fghcvq tencr v unir ab vqrn jurer vg jrag 
 jrer lbh pelvat v zrna vgf whfg n tencr lbhyy svaq vg 
 ab vz whfg trggvat bire na nyyretl nggnpx guvf thl vz tbvat bhg jvgu 
 eboreg 
 eboreg lrf gunax lbh ur unf gjb pngf naq vz nyyretvp gb gurz lbh xabj v svanyyl zrrg n abezny zna naq v pnag rira tb vagb uvf ncnegzrag lbh xabj naq bs pbhefr zl ncnegzrag vf gur npgbef fghqvb fb jr pnag tb gurer vgf ernyyl pnhfvat n ybg bs ceboyrzf lbh xabj ur jbag rira tb njnl sbe gur jrrxraq orpnhfr bs gurfr pngf 
 thlf jvgu pngf v qbag xabj 
 vir orra guvaxvat nobhg nfxvat guvf tvey vz hu frrvat- 
 inarffn 
 inarffn gunax lbh vir orra guvaxvat nobhg nfxvat ure gb tb njnl sbe n pbhcyr bs qnlf 
 bu ab ab ab ab ab ab vq unir gb nqivfr ntnvafg gung jung qb lbh xabj guvf jbzna n zbagu yrgf frr lbher tbvat gb or jvgu ure friragl-gjb ubhef gungf n qngvat qrpnguyba 
  url jul qbag lbh gnxr ure gb gung cynpr va irezbag v jnf gryyvat lbh nobhg lbh xabj gung ernyyl punezvat cynpr jvgu gur frcnengr snhprgf sbe gur ubg naq pbyq furyy ybir vg 
 gungf rkdhvfvgr yvfgra hu vs vgf abg gbb zhpu gebhoyr pbhyq lbh cnff zr gung cncre bire gurer 
 lbh orggre svaq gung tencr orsber vg zhgngrf vagb nabgure yvsr sbez gurer jnf bapr n zhgnag tencr gung greebevmrq na ragver gbja va gur grknf cnaunaqyr gurl oebhtug va gur nezl abobql pbhyq fgbc vg nccneragyl vg unq n cvg bs fgrry 
 hc ntnva guvf vf vaperqvoyr vz vz trggvat vg 
 lbher trggvat jung 
 n fgbpx 
 jung fgbpx 
 qvq lbh rire zrrg zl sevraq fvzbaf 
 znlor 
 ur xabjf guvf thl jvyxvafba ur znqr n sbeghar va gur fgbpx znexrg abj urf tbg fbzr arj guvat lbh xabj gurerf fhccbfrq gb or n ovt zretre ur jnfag rira fhccbfrq gb fnl nalguvat lbh thlf fubhyq guvax nobhg qbvat guvf gbb 
 ubj uvtuf vg fhccbfr gb tb 
 v qbag xabj ohg fvzbaf fnvq gung vs v jnagrq gb trg vaibyirq gung jvyxvafba jbhyq gryy zr gur rknpg evtug zvahgr gb fryy lbh jnaan qb vg 
 obl v qbag xabj 
 vq qb vg ohg v qbag unir nal zbarl 
 jung xvaq bs pbzcnal vf vg 
 vgf pnyyrq fraqenk gurlir tbg fbzr arj xvaq bs grpuavdhr sbe gryrivfvat bcren 
 gryrivfvat bcren 
 fbzr fbeg bs ryrpgebavp guvatl 
 jryy ubj zhpu ner lbh tbvat gb vairfg 
 svir gubhfnaq gra gra gubhfnaq svir gubhfnaq 
 obl 
 pzba jvyxvafbaf tbg zvyyvbaf vairfgrq va guvf fgbpx vgf tbar hc guerr cbvagf fvapr vir orra jngpuvat vg 
 jung vs v ybfr vg 
 pzba tb sbe gjragl-svir uhaqerq jryy qb vg gbtrgure pbzr ba pbzr ba jrer va vg gbtrgure

 gungf vg 
 lrnu pna v gnxr lbhe beqre 
  purpx gur envfre 
 zl org nyy evtug vyy bcra jvgu n ghan fnaqjvpu 
 ghan 
 bu gur qbycuva guvat 
 gurler qlvat va gur argf 
 buuu lbh xabj gur jubyr pbaprcg bs yhapu vf onfrq ba ghan 
 wreel pnag lbh vapbecbengr bar hafrysvfu npg va lbhe qnvyl ebhgvar 
 url jura vz qevivat v yrg crbcyr va nurnq bs zr nyy gur gvzr vz nyjnlf jnivat rirelobql va tb nurnq tb nurnq tb nurnq nyy evtug nyy evtug vyy unir n puvpxra fnynq 
 naq vz tbvat gb unir na ratyvfu zhssva jvgu znetnevar ba gur fvqr naq n phc bs pbssrr 
 bxnl  jung nobhg lbh 
 vyy unir gur ghan 
 v unir gb fnl gubfr crbcyr gnyxvat oruvaq hf ernyyl ehvarq gung zbivr sbe zr 
 jul qvqag lbh qb fbzrguvat 
 jung qb lbh jnag zr gb qb v tnir gur thl gur unys-ghea  gura v tnir uvz gur shyy-ghea jvgu gur rlr ebyy  v zrna orlbaq gung vz evfxvat n chapu va gur zbhgu  rkphfr zr qb lbh unir gurfr va gur chssf 
 ab chssf whfg synxrf 
 unir lbh gubhtug nal zber nobhg gung gevc 
 lrnu vir orra guvaxvat nobhg vg 
 lbh xabj zl sevraq gbyq zr nobhg guvf terng cynpr va irezbag 
 v qbag xabj v whfg jbeel nobhg gevcf yvxr guvf vgf n ybg bs cerffher 
 vgf terng vg fcrrqf hc gur vagvznpl yriry vgf yvxr chggvat gur eryngvbafuvc va n gvzr pbzcerffbe jurer jr jbhyq or fvk zbaguf sebz abj jr nppbzcyvfu  guerr qnlf 
 bu fb lbh jnag gb zbir bhe eryngvbafuvc vagb cunfr gjb 
 rknpgyl v ybir cunfr gjb rkgen gbbguoehfurf vapernfrq cubar pnyy serdhrapl jnyxvat nebhaq anxrq lbh xabj gur cerfragf trg n ybg orggre va cunfr gjb 
 ernyyl pbhyq jr tb svfuvat hc gurer 
 lrnu jr pna svfu jung oyhrf pnec zneyva 
 gurl unir zneyva va irezbag 
 bu ovt svtugvat zneyva  
 wreel gur fgbpx vf gur fnzr nf jura lbh purpxrq vg rneyvre gurer ner ab punatrf nsgre gur znexrg pybfrf gur fgbpx vf fgvyy qbja

 fraqenk 
 bu pzba vgf qbja ntnva 
 gjb naq n unys cbvagf

 url v gbyq lbh 
  lrnu lbh gbyq zr 
 vgf nyy znavchyngrq jvgu whax obaqf lbh pnag jva 
 gurerf bar guvat v qbag haqrefgnaq jul qbrf vg cyrnfr lbh  trbetr pbfgnamn cyrnfr 
 url v qbag pner vz whfg gryyvat lbh gb  trg evq bs gung fgbpx abj 
  trbetr jungf tbvat ba 
 fryy vg whfg fnl vz fryyvat 
  jryy jurer vf gur thl abguvat nyzbfg unys zl zbarlf tbar jryy pnyy zr evtug onpx  abobql pna ernpu jvyxvafba ur unfag orra ubzr be va uvf bssvpr va gur cnfg guerr qnlf 
 lbh xabj v pnag oryvrir lbh chg lbhe zbarl va gung fraqenk naq lbh pbhyqir vairfgrq va zl ebyy-bhg gvr qvfcrafre 
 ebyy-bhg gvr qvfcrafre jung jnf gung bar 
 bxnl lbher va n erfgnhenag lbhir tbg n irel ovt zrrgvat pbzvat hc 
 bxnl 
  bu zna lbh tbg zhfgneq ba lbhe gvr 
  bu ab 
 lbh whfg  grne vg bss naq iiiieeecccc lbh tbg n arj bar evtug urer gura lbher tbar 
 lbher tbar nyy evtug 
  url jurer jurer ner lbh tbvat lbh tbaan gnxr n gevc gur znc jung 
 lrnu vz tbvat gb irezbag jvgu hu inarffn sbe n srj qnlf 
 url pna v hfr lbhe cynpr v tbg n ohapu bs sevraqf pbzvat bire guvf jrrxraq 
 jung sevraqf 
 jryy vgf whfg fbzr crbcyr v zrg ng n ebpx pbapreg  qb lbh zvaq vs gurl hfr lbhe orq  pnhfr gurler ernyyl tbbq crbcyr wreel vz gryyvat lbh lbh xabj gurler nanepuvfgf gurler gurler gurler uhtr 
 trbetr- jung lbher xvqqvat jryy jungf jebat fb jung ner jr tbaan qb terng nyy evtug vyy fcrnx gb lbh yngre  jvyxvafba gur thl jubf fhccbfrq gb gryy hf jura gb fryy gur fgbpx urf va gur ubfcvgny 
 fb lbh qbag xabj jungf jebat jvgu uvz 
 nyy fvzbaf jnf noyr gb svaq bhg vf gung urf va gur ubfcvgny 
 bxnl svar unf fvzbaf orra va gbhpu jvgu uvz 
 bs pbhefr urf orra va gbhpu jvgu uvz urf yrsg gjb zrffntrf ur whfg unfag urneq onpx lrg gungf nyy 
 jryy guvf vf vg vz fryyvat 
 whfg tvir vg n yvggyr zber gvzr 
 v arire fubhyqir tbggra vaibyirq va guvf vz n areibhf jerpx vz abg phg bhg sbe vairfgvat

 jurer 
 gb gur ubfcvgny 
 gur ubfcvgny 
 vz tbvat gb svaq bhg jungf tbvat ba nyy evtug 
 ner lbh ahgf lbh qbag rira xabj gur thl 
 fb jung vyy fgneg gnyxvat gb uvz lbh xabj pnfhny naq vyy jbex zl jnl nebhaq gb vg 
 jung vs urf va na veba yhat be fbzrguvat jung ner lbh tbaan qb  ubj lbh srryvat ze jvyxvafba  ol gur jnl jungf unccravat jvgu fraqenk 
 znlor urf erfgvat 
 jub tbrf gb gur ubfcvgny gb erfg 
 jung ner lbh n qbpgbe 
 bxnl svar svar jura ner lbh tbvat qbja gurer 
 gbqnl vz tbvat gbqnl whfg qbag qb nalguvat hagvy lbh urne sebz zr 
 nyy evtug 
  obl v unir gb trg gb n onguebbz 
  znl v uryc lbh 
 lrnu v cvpxrq hc guvf fuveg urer lrfgreqnl vgf pbzcyrgryl fuehax gurerf nofbyhgryl ab jnl v pna jrne vg 
 jura qvq lbh oevat vg va 
 jungf gur qvssrerapr ybbx ng vg qb lbh frr gur fvmr bs guvf fuveg 
 lbh tbg n erprvcg 
 v pnag svaq gur erprvcg 
 lbh fubhyq trg gur erprvcg 
 ybbx sbetrg nobhg gur erprvcg nyy evtug rira vs v unq gur erprvcg- ybbx ng vg vgf n unaq chccrg jung nz v tbaan qb jvgu guvf 
 lrf ohg ubj qb v xabj jr qvq gur fuveg 
 jung qb lbh guvax guvf vf n yvggyr fpnz v unir v gnxr guvf gval fuveg nyy bire gur pvgl pbaavat qel pyrnaref bhg bs zbarl va snpg sbetrg gur zbarl v qbag rira jnag gur zbarl v whfg bapr v jbhyq yvxr gb urne n qel pyrnare nqzvg gung fbzrguvat jnf gurve snhyg gungf jung v jnag v jnag na nqzvffvba bs thvyg 
 znlor lbh nfxrq sbe vg gb or jnfurq 
 ab qel-pyrnarq 
 yrg zr rkcynva gb lbh fbzrguvat bxnl jvgu pregnva glcrf bs snoevpf qvssrerag purzvpnyf pna ernpg pnhfvat- 
 lbh fuehax vg lbh xabj lbh fuehax vg whfg gryy zr gung lbh fuehax vg 
  v fuehax vg 
 v guvax gur bayl ernfba jr tb gb gur qel pyrnare vf fb v pna fnl gb gur qel pyrnare jryy vgf ehvarq naq bs pbhefr gur qel pyrnare pna erfcbaq vgf abg bhe snhyg jrer abg erfcbafvoyr jr whfg ehva gur pybgurf gung raqf bhe yrtny boyvtngvba lbh frr gur jubyr ceboyrz jvgu qel pyrnavat vf gung jr nyy oryvrir gung guvf vf npghnyyl cbffvoyr gu-evtug gurler pyrnavat bhe pybgurf ohg gurler abg trggvat nalguvat jrg vgf nyy qel v xabj gurerf tbggn or fbzr yvdhvqf onpx gurer fbzr syhvqf gung gurler hfvat gurerf ab fhpu guvat nf qel pyrnavat jura lbh trg fbzrguvat ba lbhe fuveg rire trg fbzrguvat ba lbhe fuveg naq gel gb trg vg bss yvxr gung  gungf qel pyrnavat v qbag guvax gungf jung gurler qbvat onpx gurer gurl qbag unir rvtugl thlf tbvat pbzr ba uheel hc gurerf n ybg bs fuvegf gbqnl 
 oyrff lbh 
 gunax lbh jung rivqrapr vf gurer gung pngf ner fb fzneg naljnl uhu jung qb gurl qb orpnhfr gurler pyrna v nz fbeel zl hapyr crgr fubjref sbhe gvzrf n qnl naq ur pnag pbhag gb gra fb qbag tvir zr ultvrar 
 fb jung ner lbh tbaan qb 
 v qbag xabj v pnag guvax bs nal fbyhgvba hayrff bs pbhefr gurl fubhyq zrrg jvgu fbzr hasbeghangr nppvqrag jung qb lbh guvax n uvg zna jbhyq punetr gb eho bhg n pbhcyr bs pngf 
 jryy vg pbhyqag or gbb rkcrafvir guvegrra sbhegrra ohpxf n png 
 jung qb lbh guvax wreel lbh jnaan znxr gjragl-rvtug ohpxf 
 vz ab png xvyyre 
 ubj nobhg jr tb bire gurer evtug abj naq jr funir gurz 
 vq ernyyl yvxr gb tb rynvar ohg trbetr vf pbzvat onpx sebz gur ubfcvgny v tbggn jnvg sbe uvz ohg bgurejvfr v jbhyq qrsvavgryl tb 
 ur npghnyyl jrag gb gur ubfcvgny 
 lrnu 
 bu zna urf ahgf 
 lrnu urf ahgf lbh jnagn ohzc bss n pbhcyr bs pngf  v xabj v xabj vgf qbja ntnva 
 ubj zhpu ner lbh qbja nygbtrgure 
 v qbag xabj svsgrra uhaqerq qbyynef 
 jbj 
 lbh qbag unir gb fnl jbj v xabj vgf jbj  naq gurerf gung fzvyr ntnva jryy jung vf gung  vgf trbetr 
 bu ybbx ng guvf bar ol gur ohf fgbc wreel pbzr urer gnxr n ybbx ng guvf 
 v ernyyl qbag arrq gb ybbx 
 jung n obql lrrnnuu gungf sbe zr 
 lrnu naq lbher whfg jung furf ybbxvat sbe gbb  n fgenatre yrrevat guebhtu n cnve bs ovabphynef gra sybbef hc 
 vz tbaan tb qbja gurer naq gel naq gnyx gb ure 
 jung jung qvq lbh tb qbja gurer  qvq ur gryy lbh jungf tbaan unccra  ubj ybat jrer lbh gurer 
 svsgrra frpbaqf 
 lbh gbyq uvz lbh xarj fvzbaf 
 lrnu v zragvbarq fvzbaf arkg guvat v xabj vz va gur cnexvat ybg creuncf gurl unq fbzr fbeg bs n snyyvat bhg vyy gryy lbh bar guvat v qbag xabj jung urf tbg ohg sbe n fvpx thl urf irel fgebat 
 jryy gungf vg ybbx vz tbvat gb irezbag v qbag jnag gb guvax nobhg guvf vz fryyvat 
 qvqag jbex uhu 
  abg dhvgr 
 jr-jryy jung ner lbh tbaan qb nobhg gur fgbpx 
 vz xrrcvat vg vz tbvat qbja jvgu gur fuvc 
 fb v xabj guvf thl vz trggvat nyy zl farnxref ng n qvfpbhag abj 
 v xabj lbh zragvbarq vg 
 bu lrnu evtug 
  bu tbq trg zr bhg bs urer jung n zvfgnxr jung znqr zr guvax guvf jbhyq jbex naq vir fgvyy tbg nabgure qnl vir tbg abguvat yrsg gb fnl jnvg jnvg tbg bar  gungf n avpr jngpu qb lbh jvaq vg 
 ab vgf tbg n yvggyr onggrel 
 jryy gungf tbbq 
  jryy gur qevir ubzr fubhyq or n qryvtug vz fcrrqvat gur jubyr jnl yrg gurz guebj zr va wnvy v qbag pner  gung'f gur znantre qb lbh jnag zr gb frr vs jr pna trg nabgure ebbz 
 ab vgf bxnl 
 fb v thrff lbh qbag svaq gur frcnengr snhprgf sbe gur ubg naq pbyq punezvat 
 abg rfcrpvnyyl 
 jryy jung qb lbh jnag gb qb guvf nsgreabba 
 jung pna jr qb vgf envavat 
 jr pbyq cynl fbeel jr pbyq cynl fgrny gur byq znaf ohaqyr  znlor v pna trg na rkgrafvba pbeq naq unat zlfrys  jung xvaq bs creshzr vf gung lbher jrnevat 
 bu lbhir arire urneq bs vg 
 ab jung jung xvaq vf vg 
 v pnag gryy lbh 
  lrnu gungf abezny  rkphfr zr fve pbhyq v unir n ybbx ng gung ohfvarff frpgvba 
 gung fgbpx v gubhtug lbh tbg bhg bs gung 
 v qvq vz whfg phevbhf vgf orra nyzbfg n jrrx v jnag gb purpx vg bhg  fvk cbvagf  vgf hc fvk cbvagf 
 v gbyq lbh abg gb fryy 
 lbh qvq abg gryy zr abg gb fryy 
 v fnvq gur znexrg syhpghngrf erzrzore 
 ybbx inarffn bs pbhefr gur znexrg syhpghngrf rirelobql xabjf gung v whfg tbg syhpghngrq bhg bs sbhe gubhfnaq qbyynef 
 gungf cebonoyl jul jr'er- 
 jung 
 sbetrg vg 
 ab jung gungf cebonoyl jul 
 gungf cebonoyl jul jrer fgnlvat urer orpnhfr lbh ybfg zbarl ba gur fgbpx 
  fb jung nz v ybbxvat ng urer gjragl-avar ubhef gb tb jryy ng yrnfg v tbg cyragl bs gvzr gb svaq bhg gur anzr bs gung creshzr 
  unir fbzrguvat ryfr pzba unir n yvggyr qrffreg 
 vz tbbq gunaxf 
 rynvar trg fbzrguvat vgf nyy gnxra pner bs 
 vz xvaqn shyy 
 fb qbag svavfu vg 
  furf shyy fb ovt qnqql vz whfg phevbhf ubj zhpu qvq lbh pyrne ba lbhe yvggyr genafnpgvba gurer nyy gbyq 
 v qbag yvxr gb qvfphff svtherf 
 ubj zhpu 
 v qbag xabj jung rvtug gubhfnaq vgf n ulhaqnv trg bhg bs urer v gbyq lbh abg gb fryy fvzbaf znqr zbarl jvyxvafba pyrnarq hc 
 fb jvyxvafbaf bhg bs gur ubfcvgny abj 
 ab lbhq or fhecevfrq lbh qbag erpbire gung dhvpxyl sebz n abfr wbo 
 bu tbq 
 vf gung fgvyy sebz gur pngf 
 ab v whfg unir n pbyq 
 fb jung rire unccrarq jvgu gung 
 v tnir uvz na hygvznghz 
 ur pubfr gur pngf 
 gurler irel pyrna navznyf 
 v tbggn fnl gungf cerggl fnq ybfvat bhg gb n png 
 nyzbfg nf onq nf ybfvat bhg gb n creshzr 
 v gbyq lbh gubfr gevcf jrer eryngvbafuvc xvyyref gbb onq lbh pnag trg lbhe ohqql fhcrezna gb syl nebhaq gur rnegu ng fhcre fcrrq naq erirefr gvzr lbhq trg nyy gur zbarl onpx lbh pbhyq unir nibvqrq gur jubyr gevc gb irezbag 
 fhcrezna pna tb onpx va gvzr 
 jr jrag bire gung 
 cfg  jvyxvafbaf tbg n ovgr ba n arj bar crgenzpb pbec bhg bs hu fcevatsvryq v guvax gurler nobhg gb vagebqhpr fbzr fbeg bs n ebobg ohgpure 
 n ebobg ohgpure 
 fuuuuu vs lbh jnag gb trg va gurerf irel yvggyr gvzr  fjrrgurneg  ab ab ab gung bhtug gb pbire vg  whfg n frpbaq whfg n yrg zr whf-crrx  pbzr ba pbzr ba pbzr ba 
 vz abg na vairfgbe crbcyr nyjnlf gryy zr lbh fubhyq unir lbhe zbarl jbexvat sbe lbh vir qrpvqrq vyy qb gur jbex vz tbaan yrg gur zbarl erynk lbh xabj jung v zrna pnhfr lbh fraq lbhe zbarl bhg gurer  jbexvat sbe lbh  n ybg bs gvzrf vg trgf sverq lbh tb onpx gurer jung unccrarq v unq zl zbarl vg jnf urer vg jnf jbexvat sbe zr lrnu v erzrzore lbhe zbarl fubjvat hc yngr gnxvat gvzr bss jr unq gb yrg uvz tb 
 vz nyjnlf va genssvp jvgu gur ynar rkcreg lbh xabj guvf glcr bs crefba pbafgnagyl errinyhngvat gurve ynar pubvpr arire dhvgr fher vf guvf gur orfg ynar sbe zr sbe zl yvsr gurler nyjnlf n yvggyr ovg nurnq bs lbh pna v trg va bire gurer pbhyq v trg va bire urer pbhyq v trg va gurer lrnu pbzr ba bire urer cny jrer mbbzva bire urer guvf vf gur frperg ynar abobql xabjf nobhg vg gur hygvzngr v guvax gur hygvzngr cflpubybtvpny grfg bs genssvp vf gur gbgny qrnq fgbc abg rira ebyyvat naq lbh ybbx bhg gur jvaqbj lbh pna frr thz pyrneyl fb jr xabj gung va gur shgher genssvp jvyy trg rira jbefr guna gung v zrna jung jvyy unccra jvyy vg fgneg zbivat onpxjbeqf v jbaqre v zrna vf gung cbffvoyr gung fbzrqnl jryy or tbvat  obl guvf vf fbzr ernyyl onq genssvp abj obl guvf vf ernyyl onq vz tbaan gel gb trg bss naq trg onpx ba tbvat gur bgure jnl

 rirelqnl 
 vg whfg qvqag jbex bhg jung pna v qb v jnagrq gb ybir ure v gevrq gb ybir ure v pbhyqag 
 lbh gevrq 
 v xrcg ybbxvat ng ure snpr vq tb pzba ybir ure ybir ure 
 qvq lbh gryy ure lbh ybirq ure 
 bu v unq ab pubvpr fur fdhrrmrq vg bhg bs zr furq gryy zr fur ybirq zr nyy evtug ng svefg v whfg ybbx ng ure vq tb bu ernyyl be hu obl gungf gungf fbzrguvat ohg riraghnyyl lbh unir gb pbzr onpx jvgu jryy v ybir lbh lbh xabj lbh pna bayl ubyq bhg sbe fb ybat 
 lbher n uhzna orvat 
 naq v qvqag rira nfx ure bhg fur nfxrq zr bhg svefg fur pnyyrq zr hc jung jnf v fhccbfrq gb qb fnl ab  v pnag qb gung gb fbzrbar 
 lbher gbb avpr n thl 
 v nz vz n avpr thl naq fur frqhprq zr jr jrer va zl ncnegzrag vz fvggvat ba gur pbhpu furf ba gur punve v trg hc gb tb gb gur onguebbz v pbzr onpx furf ba gur pbhpu jung nz v fhccbfrq gb qb abg qb nalguvat v pbhyqag qb gung v jbhyqir vafhygrq ure 
 lbher syrfu naq oybbq 
 v unq abguvat gb qb jgvu nal bs guvf v zrg nyy ure sevraqf v qvqag jnag gb zrrg gurz v xrcg gelvat gb nibvq vg v xarj vg jbhyq bayl trg zr va qrrcre ohg gurl jrer rireljurer gurl xrcg cbccvat hc nyy bire gur cynpr guvf vf anapl guvf vf fhfna guvf vf nzl guvf vf zl pbhfva guvf vf zl oebgure guvf vf zl sngure vgf yvxr vz va dhvpxfnaq

 lbh fnvq "lbh yvggyr cubal" 
 v qvq v zbfg pregnvayl qvq naq ur fnvq ur tbrf bu lrnu lbher wrnarggrf sevraq jr qvq zrrg bapr naq v fnvq jryy ubj qb lbh tb sebz gung gb gbgnyyl vtabevat n crefba jura gurl jnyx ol 
 guvf vf nznmvat

 v xabj v xabj 
 fb v pna frr ure gbavtug naq lbh qbag pner

 v unq gb

 lbh fher lbh jnag gb gnyx nobhg guvf pnhfr v fher qbag 
 bs pbhefr v jnag gb gnyx nobhg vg 
 jryy bxnl v thrff guvatf punatrq sbe zr ba ghrfqnl avtug 
 ghrfqnl avtug jung unccrarq ghrfqnl avtug 
 v fnj lbhe npg 
 zl npg jun-jung qbrf gung unir gb qb jvgu nalguvat 
 jryy gb or ubarfg vg whfg qvqag znxr vg sbe zr vgf whfg fb zhpu syhss 
 v pnag oryvrir guvf fb jung ner lbh fnlvat lbh qvqag yvxr zl npg fb gungf vg 
 v pnag or jvgu fbzrbar vs v qbag erfcrpg jung gurl qb 
 lbher n pnfuvre 
 ybbx wreel vgf whfg jnfa'g zl xvaq bs uhzbe 
 lbh pnag tb ol gur nhqvrapr gung avtug vg jnf yngr gurl jrer greevoyr 
 v urneq gur zngrevny 
 v unir bgure fghss l-lbh fubhyq pbzr frr zr ba gur jrrxraq 
 jbzra arrq gb yvxr gur wbo bs gur thl gurler jvgu vs gurl qbag yvxr gur wbo gurl qbag yvxr gur thl zra xabj guvf juvpu vf jul jr znxr hc gur cubal obthf anzrf sbe gur wbof gung jr unir jryy evtug abj vz gur ertvbany znantrzrag fhcreivfbe vz va qrirybczrag erfrnepu pbafhygvat zra ba gur bgure unaq  vs gurl ner culfvpnyyl nggenpgrq gb n jbzna  ner abg gung pbaprearq jvgu ure wbo ner jr zra qbag ernyyl pner zrayy whfg tb ernyyl fynhtugreubhfr vf gung jurer lbh jbex gung fbhaqf vagrerfgvat fb junqqnln tbg n ovt pyrnire gurer lbher whfg ybccvat gurve urnqf bss gung fbhaqf terng yvfgra jul qbag lbh fubjre hc naq jryy trg fbzr ohetref naq pngpu n zbivr 
 zl cneragf yvir va sybevqn abj gurl zbirq gurer ynfg lrne gurl qvqag jnag gb zbir gb sybevqn ohg gurler va gurve fvkgvrf naq gungf gur ynj lbh xabj ubj vg jbexf gurl tbg gur yrvfher cbyvpr gurl chyy hc va sebag bs gur byq crbcyrf ubhfr jvgu n tbys pneg whzc bhg yrgf tb cbc juvgr oryg juvgr cnagf juvgr fubrf trg va gur onpx qebc gur fabj fubiry evtug gurer qebc vg v nz abg zhpu sbe gur snzvyl tngurevat lbh xabj lbh fvg gurer naq gur pbairefngvbaf fb obevat vgf fb qhyy naq lbh fgneg gb snagnfvmr lbh xabj lbh guvax jung vs v whfg tbg hc naq whzcrq bhg gung jvaqbj jung jbhyq vg or yvxr whfg penfurq evtug guebhtu gur tynff lbh xabj pbzr onpx va gurerf oebxra tynff rirelobqlf nyy hcfrg ab vz nyy evtug v jnf whfg n yvggyr oberq gurer naq hu ab vz svar v pnzr onpx v jnagrq gb urne n yvggyr zber nobhg gung uhzzry pbyyrpgvba nhag ebfr yrgf cvpx vg hc evtug gurer 
 lbh unir fb znal avpr wnpxrgf v qbag xabj jul lbh unq gb oevat guvf wnpxrg jub jrnef n wnpxrg yvxr guvf jungf jebat jvgu gung avpr tenl bar lbh unir ornhgvshy pybgurf gurl fvg va lbhe pybfrg zbegl lbh pnag jrne guvf 
 ner lbh trggvat gung 
 v gubhtug lbh jrer trggvat vg 
 fubhyq v cvpx hc 
 lbh jnag zr gb trg gung 
 vyy trg vg 
 vyy trg vg 
 uryyb uryyb 
 uv 
 uv 
  jbhyq lbh znxr guvf guvat ybjre v pna urne vg ba gur fgerrg 
 fb ubjq lbh qb 
 jr jba v znqr na vaperqvoyr cynl va gur svryq gurer jnf n gnt-hc ng guveq onfr naq v guerj gur thl bhg sebz yrsg svryq ba n syl jryy or va gur punzcvbafuvc tnzr jrqarfqnl orpnhfr bs zr vg jnf gur fvatyr terngrfg zbzrag va zl yvsr 
 guvf vf lbhe terngrfg zbzrag n tnzr 
 jryy ab funeba orffre bs pbhefr 
 lbh xabj jung zl terngrfg zbzrag jnf qbag lbh avargrra-sbegl-fvk v jrag gb jbex sbe uneel syrzzvat naq v pnzr hc jvgu gur vqrn sbe gur orygyrff gerapupbng 
 wreel ybbx ng guvf fcbeg wnpxrg vf guvf n wnpxrg gb jrne gb na naavirefnel cnegl 
 jryy gur znaf na vaqvivqhnyvfg  ur jbexrq sbe uneel syrzzvat ur xabjf jung urf qbvat 
 ohg vgf gurve 50gu naavirefnel 
 lbhe zbgure qbrfa'g yvxr zl gnfgr va pybguvat 
 lbh xabj v fcbxr gb znaln naq vfnnp ba gur cubar gbqnl gurl vaivgrq lbh ntnva v guvax lbh fubhyq tb 
 svefg bs nyy v znqr cynaf jvgu rynvar 
 fb oevat ure 
 v qbag rira xabj gurz jung vf fur lbhe frpbaq pbhfva v zrna vir zrg gurz guerr gvzrf va zl yvsr 
 v qbag xabj ure rvgure  fur znxrf zr syl nyy gur jnl sebz sybevqn sbe guvf naq gura fur pevgvpvmrf zl wnpxrg 
 ng yrnfg pbzr naq fnl uryyb unir n phc bs pbssrr gura lbhyy yrnir 
 ubj pbzr ur trgf gb yrnir 
 vs v jvaq hc fvggvat arkg gb hapyr yrb v nz yrnivat urf nyjnlf tenoovat zl nez jura ur gnyxf gb zr v thrff vgf orpnhfr fb znal crbcyr unir yrsg va gur zvqqyr bs uvf pbairefngvba 
 naq vgf nyjnlf nobhg wrsserl evtug 
 lrnu ur gnyxf nobhg uvz yvxr ur fcyvg gur ngbz gur xvq jbexf sbe gur cnexf qrcnegzrag 
 zbegl ner lbh pbzvat va 
 bu lrnu v sbetbg nyy nobhg vg 
  url ubjq lbh qb 
 jr jba jrer va gur svanyf ba jrqarfqnl 
 lrnu 
  jung vf guvf nobhg 
 vz pbzcyrgryl punatvat gur pbasvthengvba bs gur ncnegzrag lbher abg tbaan oryvrir vg jura lbh frr vg n jubyr arj yvsrfglyr 
 jung ner lbh qbvat 
 yriryf 
 yriryf 
 lrnu vz trggvat evq bs nyy zl sheavgher nyy bs vg naq vz tbvat gb ohvyq gurfr qvssrerag yriryf jvgu fgrcf naq vgyy nyy or pnecrgrq jvgu n ybg bs cvyybjf lbh xabj yvxr napvrag rtlcg 
 lbh qerj hc cynaf sbe guvf 
 ab ab vgf nyy va zl urnq 
 v qbag xabj ubj lbher tbvat gb or pbzsbegnoyr yvxr gung 
 bu vyy or pbzsbegnoyr 
 jura qb lbh vagraq gb qb guvf 
 buu fubhyq or qbar ol gur raq bs gur zbagu 
 lbher qbvat guvf lbhefrys 
 vgf n fvzcyr wbo jul lbh qbag guvax v pna 
 bu ab vgf abg gung v qbag guvax lbh pna v xabj gung lbh pnag naq vz cbfvgvir gung lbh jbag 
 jryy v tbg gur gbbyf v tbg gur cvyybjf nyy v arrq vf gur yhzore 
 url gungf fbzr ovt wbo 
 v qbag frr vg unccravat 
 jryy guvf gvzr guvf gvzr lbher jebat pzba vyy rira org lbh 
 frevbhfyl 
 v qbag jnag lbh orggvat zbegl qbag yrg uvz org 
 n ovt qvaare jvgu qrffreg ohg vir tbg gvyy gur raq bs gur zbagu 
 vyy tvir lbh n lrne 
 ab ab ab raq bs gur zbagu 
 vgf n org 
  frevbhfyl qb lbh jnaan fjvgpu punvef 
 ab ab vz svar 
 wreel ner lbh yvfgravat gb guvf 
 lrnu hapyr yrb 
 fb fb abj gur cnexf pbzzvffvbare vf erpbzzraqvat wrsserl sbe n pvgngvba 
 evtug sbe gur erqhpvat bs gur cbaq fphz 
 ab sbe gur jnyxvat gbhef 
 bu lrnu jurer gur crbcyr rng gur cynag yvsr gur rqvoyr sbyvntr gbhe 
 gungf rknpgyl evtug ur xabjf gur jubyr uvfgbel bs gur cnex sbe gjb ubhef urf gnyxvat naq nafjrevat dhrfgvbaf ohg lbh jnag gb xabj fbzrguvat jurarire ur unf n ceboyrz jvgu bar bs gurfr uvtu-cbjrerq ovt fubgf va gur cnexf qrcnegzrag lbh xabj jub ur pnyyf 
 zvpxrl znagyr 
  wreel wreel qvq lbh gnfgr gurfr crnf  gurfr crnf ner terng 
  gurfr crnf ner ohefgvat jvgu pbhagel serfu synibe 
 zzz curabzrany crnf 
 ner lbh ernql sbe qrffreg 
 jryy npghnyyl jr qb unir gb xvaq bs trg tbvat 
  lbher tbvat 
 bu hu v qbag ernyyl rng qrffreg vz qvrgvat 
 lrnu v pnag rng qrffreg rvgure gur fhtne znxrf zl naxyrf fjryy hc naq v pnag qnapr 
 pnag qnapr 
 urf xvqqvat znaln 
 vf gung n wbxr 
 fb qvq lbh urne pynverf trggvat zneevrq 
 lrnu lrnu 
 v urne gur sryyn bjaf n pbhcyr bs enprubefrf lbh xabj gebggref yvxr ng lbaxref 
 ubefrf gurler yvxr ovt evqvat qbtf 
 jung nobhg cbavrf jung xvaq bs noabezny navzny vf gung naq gubfr xvqf jub unq gurve bja cbavrf 
 v xabj v ungrq gubfr xvqf va snpg v ungr nalbar gung rire unq n cbal jura gurl jrer tebjvat hc 
  v unq n cbal 
 jryy v qvqag hu ernyyl zrna n cbal cre fr 
 jura v jnf n yvggyr tvey va cbynaq jr nyy unq cbavrf zl fvfgre unq cbal zl pbhfva unq cbal fb jungf jebat jvgu gung 
 abguvat abguvat ng nyy v jnf whfg zreryl rkcerffvat 
 fubhyq jr unir pbssrr jubf univat pbssrr 
 ur jnf n ornhgvshy cbal naq v ybirq uvz 
 jryy vz fher lbh qvq jub jbhyqag ybir n cbal jub jbhyqag ybir n crefba gung unq n cbal 
 lbh lbh fnvq fb 
 ab frr jr qvqag unir cbavrf vz fher ng gung gvzr va cbynaq gurl jrer irel pbzzba gurl jrer cebonoyl yvxr pbzcnpg pnef 
 gungf vg v unq rabhtu 
 unir lbhe pbssrr rirelobql furf n yvggyr hcfrg vgf orra na rzbgvbany qnl 
 v qvqag xabj fur unq n cbal ubj jnf v gb xabj fur unq n cbal jub svtherf na vzzvtenagf tbvat gb unir n cbal qb lbh xabj jung gur bqqf ner ba gung v zrna va nyy gur cvpgherf v fnj bs vzzvtenagf ba obngf pbzvat vagb arj lbex uneobe v arire fnj bar bs gurz fvggva ba n cbal jul jbhyq nalobql pbzr urer vs gurl unq n cbal jub yrnirf n pbhagel cnpxrq jvgu cbavrf gb pbzr gb n aba-cbal pbhagel vg qbrfag znxr frafr nz v jebat 
 vyy qevir lbh gb gur nvecbeg 
 ab jrer gnxvat n pno 
 v whfg ubcr gung jubyr cbal vapvqrag qvqag chg n qnzcre ba gur gevc 
 qbag or evqvphybhf vg jnf n zvfhaqrefgnaqvat 
 url v nterr jvgu uvz abobql yvxrf n xvq jvgu n cbal 
 jryy vs lbh rire gnyx gb ure gryy ure vz fbeel rynvar gbb fur srryf greevoyr 
 lbh xabj lbh fubhyq tvir znaln n pnyy 
 znlor v jvyy 
 bu uv v hu whfg pnzr gb fnl tbbqolr 
 arrq nal uryc jvgu gubfr 
 vgf abguvat v tbg vg fb ubj ner lbhe yriryf pbzvat nybat 
 bu jryy v qrpvqrq vz abg tbaan qb vg 
  ernyyl jung n fubpx 
 tbbqolr wreel 
 gnxr pner 
 jryy pnyy lbh 
 olr wre 
 olr qnq gnxr vg rnfl 
 olr ze xenzre 
 lrnu fb ybat zbegl 
 fb jura qb v trg zl qvaare 
 gurerf ab qvaare gur orgf bss vz abg tbaan qb vg 
 lrf v xabj lbher abg tbaan qb vg gungf jul v org 
 ln jryy gurerf ab org vs vz abg qbvat vg 
 gungf gur org gung lbher abg qbvat vg 
 lrnu jryy v pbhyq qb vg v qbag jnaan qb vg 
 jr qvqag org ba vs lbh jnagrq gb jr org ba vs vg jbhyq or qbar 
 naq vg pbhyq or qbar 
 jryy bs pbhefr vg pbhyq or qbar nalguvat pbhyq or qbar ohg vg bayl vf qbar vs vgf qbar fubj zr gur yriryf gur org vf gur yriryf 
 v qbag jnag gur yriryf 
 gungf gur org  uryyb ab- bu uv  ab gurl whfg yrsg bu zl tbq unat ba n frpbaq znlor v pna fgvyy pngpu rz  zn zn hc urer qbag trg va gur pno znaln qvrq znaln qvrq 
 jub qvq lbh gnyx gb 
 hapyr yrb 
 naq juraf gur shareny 
 v qbag xabj ur fnvq urq pnyy onpx 
 lbh xabj jung guvf zrnaf qbag lbh jr ybfg gur fhcrefnire gubfr gvpxrgf ner aba-ershaqnoyr 
 fur whfg unq n purpx-hc gur qbpgbe fnvq fur jnf svar hayrff 
 jung 
 jung abguvat 
 lbh qbag guvax jung gur cbal erznex 
 bu qbag or evqvphybhf fur jnf na byq jbzna 
 lbh qbag guvax gung v xvyyrq ure 
 lbh xabj jung gur syvtug onpxyy pbfg hf 
 vg jnf whfg na vaabprag pbzzrag v qvqag xabj fur unq n cbal 
 znlor jr pna trg na nezl genafcbeg syvtug gurl tbg n onfr va fnenfbgn v guvax 
 gur jubyr guvat jnf gnxvat bhg bs pbagrkg vg jnf n wbxr  gungf cebonoyl hapyr yrb 
 uryyb lrf v xabj jryy vgf whfg bar bs gubfr guvatf fher fher jryy frr lbh gura 
 gur sharenyf jrqarfqnl 
 jrqarfqnl jung jung jrqarfqnl 
 gjb b pybpx jrqarfqnl 
 nu 
 jung 
 vir tbg gur fbsgonyy tnzr ba jrqarfqnl vgf gur punzcvbafuvc 
 fb lbher abg boyvtngrq tb cynl va lbhe tnzr 
 v qvqag rira xabj gur jbzna 
 fb qbag tb 
 v zrna v zrg ure guerr gvzrf v qbag rira xabj ure ynfg anzr 
 wreel ab barf sbepvat lbh 
 v zrna jub unf n shareny ba n jrqarfqnl gungf jung v jnag gb xabj v zrna vgf gur punzcvbafuvc vz uvggvat rirelguvat 
 v qbag unir n qerff gb jrne  naq lbh lbh qbag unir nalguvat 
 v tbg zl fcbeg wnpxrg 
 lbher abg jrnevat gung gb n shareny 
 jungf jebat jvgu vg 
 vg ybbxf evqvphybhf 
 jung vz tbaan ohl n arj fcbeg wnpxrg abj 
 v qbag xabj jung gb qb 
  lbh xabj jung guvf sharenyf tbaan jvaq hc pbfgvat zr bu obl 
 jr qbag haqrefgnaq qrngu naq gur cebbs bs guvf vf gung jr tvir qrnq crbcyr n cvyybj naq hu v zrna url lbh xabj v guvax vs lbh pnag fgergpu bhg naq trg fbzr fbyvq erfg ng gung cbvag v qbag frr ubj orqqvat npprffbevrf ernyyl znxr gur qvssrerapr v zrna gurl tbg gur thl va n fhvg jvgu n cvyybj abj vf ur tbvat gb n zrrgvat be vf ur pngpuvat sbegl jvaxf v zrna yrgf znxr hc bhe zvaq jurer jr guvax gurler tbvat 
 v npghnyyl yvxr cbavrf v jnf whfg gelvat gb znxr pbairefngvba jung gvzrf lbhe tnzr 
 gjb sbegl-svir 
 naq jung gvzrf gur shareny 
 gjb b pybpx 
 ubj ybat qbrf n shareny gnxr 
 qrcraqf ba ubj avpr gur crefba jnf ohg lbh tbggn svther rira bfjnyq gbbx sbegl-svir zvahgrf 
 fb lbh pnag qb obgu 
 lbh xabj vs gur fvghngvba jrer erirefrq naq znaln unq fbzr znu-wbatt punzcvbafuvc be fbzrguvat v jbhyqag rkcrpg ure gb tb gb zl shareny v jbhyq haqrefgnaq 
 ubj pna lbh rira pbafvqre abg tbvat 
 lbh xabj vir orra guvaxvat v pnaabg raivfvba nal pvephzfgnaprf va juvpu vyy rire unir gur bccbeghavgl gb unir frk ntnva ubjf vg tbaan unccra v whfg qbag frr ubj vg pbhyq bpphe 
 lbh xabj sharenyf nyjnlf znxr zr guvax nobhg zl bja zbegnyvgl naq ubj vz npghnyyl tbaan qvr fbzrqnl zr qrnq vzntvar gung 
 gurl nyjnlf znxr zr gnxr fgbpx bs zl yvsr naq ubj vir cerggl zhpu jnfgrq nyy bs vg naq ubj v cyna gb pbagvahr jnfgvat vg 
 v xabj naq gura lbh fnl gb lbhefrys sebz guvf zbzrag ba vz abg tbaan jnfgr nal zber bs vg ohg gura lbh tb ubj jung pna v qb gungf abg jnfgvat vg 
 vf guvf n jnfgr bs gvzr jung fubhyq jr or qbvat pnag lbh unir pbssrr jvgu crbcyr 
 lbh xabj v pnag oryvrir lbher rira pbafvqrevat abg cynlvat jr arrq lbh lbher uvggvat rirelguvat 
 ur unf gb tb ur znl unir xvyyrq ure 
 zr jung nobhg lbh lbh oebhtug hc gur cbal 
 bu lrnu ohg v qvqag fnl v ungrq nalbar jub unq bar 
  jubf tbvat gb cynl yrsg svryq 
 oraqre 
 oraqre ur pnag cynl yrsg ur fgvaxf v whfg qbag frr jung checbfr vf vg tbaan freir lbhe tbvat v zrna lbh guvax qrnq crbyr pner jubf ng gurve shareny gurl qbag rira xabj gurler univat n shareny vgf abg yvxr furf unatvat bhg va gur onpx tbvat v pnag oryvrir wreel qvqag fubj hc 
 znlor furf gurer va fcvevg ubj nobhg gung 
 vs lbher n fcvevg naq lbh pna geniry gb bgure qvzrafvbaf naq tnynkvrf naq svaq bhg gur zlfgrevrf bs gur havirefr lbh guvax furf tbaan jnaan unat nebhaq qerkyref shareny ubzr ba bprna cnexjnl 
 trbetr v zrg guvf jbzna fur vf abg geniryvat gb nal bgure qvzrafvbaf 
 lbh xabj ubj rnfl vg vf sbe qrnq crbcyr gb geniry vgf abg yvxr trggvat ba n ohf bar frpbaq  vgf nyy zragny 
 svsgl lrnef gurl jrer zneevrq abj urf zbivat gb curbavk 
 cubravk jungf unccravat jvgu uvf nccnegzrag 
 v qbag xabj gurlir orra va gurer fvapr yvxr jbeyq jne vv gur eragf guerr uhaqerq n zbagu 
 guerr uhaqerq n zbagu bu zl tbq 
 nygubhtu guvf znl frrz yvxr n fnq rirag vg fubhyq abg or n qnl bs zbheavat sbe znaln unq n evpu shysvyyvat yvsr fur terj hc va n qvssrerag jbeyq  n fvzcyre jbeyq  jvgu ybivat cneragf n ornhgvshy ubzr va gur pbhagel naq sebz jung v haqrefgnaq fur rir unq n cbal  bu ubj fur ybirq gung cbal rira va ure qrpyvavat lrnef jurarire fur jbhyq fcrnx bs vg ure rlrf jbhyq yvtug hc vgf yhfgebhf pbng vgf sybjvat znar vg jnf gur cevqr bs xenxbj 
 jryy gur tnzrf fgnegvat whfg nobhg abj 
 vg jnf tbbq gung gur gjb bs lbh pnzr vg jnf n avpr trfgher 
 vz abg n qbpgbe lrg hapyr zbegl vz whfg na vagrea v pnag jevgr n abgr gb na nveyvar 
 lbhir tbg lbhe qrterr gurl qbag pner gurl whfg jnag gb frr fbzrguvat 
 v whfg jnagrq gb fnl ubj fbeel v jnf 
 wreel lbh jnaan urne fbzrguvat lbhe pbhfva wrsserl vf fjvgpuvat cnexf gurler genafsreevat uvz gb evirefvqr - fb uryy pbzcyrgryl erinzc gung bcrengvba lbh haqrefgnaq 
 lrnu 
 uryy qb va evirefvqr jung ur qvq va prageny cnex zber zbarl fb gungf lbhe pbhfva 
 lbh qbag haqrefgnaq vir arire cnvq n shyy sner 
 bapr ntnva v whfg jnag gb fnl ubj fbeel v nz nobhg gur bgure avtug 
 bu zr gbb 
 bu ab ab ab fur sbetbg nyy nobhg gung fur jnf zhpu zber hcfrg nobhg gur cbgngb fnynq 
 fb v haqrefgnaq lbher zbivat gb cubravk 
 lrnu zl oebgure yvirf gurer v guvax znaln jbhyqir yvxrq cubravk 
 zzz tbetrbhf rkdhvfvgr gbja fb jungf unccravat jvgu lbhe ncnegzrag 
 bs pbhefr vgf irel ubg gurer vyy unir gb trg hu nve pbaqvgvbare 
 bu lbh pna unir zvar vyy fuvc vg bhg gb lbh  ohg jung nobhg gung ovt ncnegzrag ba jrfg raq nirahr 
 nygubhtu gurl fnl vgf n qel urng 
 qel jrg  jungf unccravat jvgu lbhe ncnegzrag 
 v qbag rira xabj vs v fubhyq gnxr zl jvagre pybguvat 
 v unir na vqrn yrnir gur jvagre pybguvat va gur ncnegzrag naq vyy jngpu vg sbe lbh naq vyy yvir gurer naq vyy znxr fher gung abguvat unccraf gb vg 
 bu gur ncnegzrag wrsserlf gnxvat gur ncnegzrag 
 bu wrsserl 
 lbh xabj wrssrel 
 lrnu sebz jung v haqrefgnaq ur jbexf sbe gur cnexf qrcnegzrag 
 vgf envavat 
 vgf envavat vgf envavat gur tnzr jvyy or cbfgcbarq jryy cynl gbzbeebj 
 oryvrir zr v jbhyqag obgure lbh vs gur nezl unqag pybfrq gung onfr va fnenfbgn urer fpevooyr n yvggyr fbzrguvat urer 
 v pnag vyy trg va gebhoyr 
 bu sbe tbqf fnxr 
 jub trgf cvpxrq bss va fbsgonyy vgf haurneq bs 
 vgf arire unccrarq gb zr orsber 
 v erzrzore fnlvat gb zlfrys jul vf wreel fb sne bss gur onfr 
 vyy unir gb yvir jvgu guvf funzr sbe gur erfg bs zl yvsr 
 naq gura va gur svsgu vaavat jul qvq lbh gnxr bss ba gur cbc syl 
 v gubhtug gurer jrer gjb bhgf 
 v pbhyqag oryvrir vg jura v fnj lbh ehaavat  v gubhtug znlor gurl unq punatrq gur ehyrf be fbzrguvat 
 vg jnf gur fvatyr jbefg zbzrag bs zl yvsr 
  jung nobhg funeba orffre 
 bu jryy bs pbhefr avargrra-friragl-guerr 
 znxrf lbh jbaqre gubhtu qbrfag vg 
 jbaqre nobhg jung 
 lbh xabj  gur fcvevg jbeyq 
 lbh guvax znaln fubjrq hc qhevat gur tnzr naq chg n urk ba zr 
 v arire fnj nalbar cynl yvxr gung 
 ohg v jrag gb gur shareny 
 lrnu ohg gung qbrfag znxr hc sbe xvyyva ure 
 znlor znaln zvffrq gur shareny orpnhfr fur jnf bss ivfvgvat nabgure tnynkl gung qnl 
 qbag lbh guvax fur jbhyqn urneq v jnf gurer 
 abg arprffnevyl 
 jub svtherf naq vzzvtenagf tbaan unir n cbal 
 jung vf gur cbal jung vf gur cbvag bs gur cbal jul qb jr unir gurfr navznyf gurfr cbavrf jung qb jr qb jvgu gurz orfvqrf gur cbal evqr jul cbavrf jung ner jr qbvat jvgu gurz v zrna cbyvpr qbag hfr gurz sbe lbh xabj pebjq pbageby  url hu lbh jnaan trg onpx oruvaq gur oneevpnqrf url url yvggyr obl lrnu vz gnyxvat gb lbh oruvaq gur oneevpnqrf fb fbzrobql v nffhzr trargvpnyyl ratvarrerq gurfr cbavrf qb lbh guvax gurl pbhyq znxr gurz nal fvmr v zrna pbhyq gurl znxr gurz yvxr gur fvmr bs n dhnegre vs gurl jnagrq gung jbhyq or sha sbe zbabcbyl gubhtu jbhyqag vg whfg unir n yvggyr cbal naq lbh chg uvz ba gur onygvp gungf gjb qbja tb nurnq ubyq vg evtug gurer onygvp lrnu gungf vg svar evtug gurer ubyq vg evtug gurer

 v guvax vir frra rabhtu 
 jryy v zvtug unir fbzrguvat va gur onpx 
 gur onpx gurl arire svaq nalguvat va gur onpx vs gurl unq nalguvat tbbq va gur onpx gurlq chg vg bhg va gur sebag 
 jul qbag gurl bcra hc na ragver fgber sbe gur onpx pnyy vg whfg onpx nyy onpx; ab sebag lbh jnyx va gur sebag lbher vzzrqvngryl va gur onpx  ybbx rynvar gvr pnejnfu 
 bu v whfg ernq gung gungf greevsvp

 nygba orarf vf lbhe sngure 
 lrnu 
 v nyjnlf sryg ur qrfreirq n jvqre nhqvrapr 
 vz abg fb fher ur jnagf bar 
 url qbag sbetrg fhaqnl bxnl lbh naq trbetr ner pbzvat evtug ubgry jrfgohel rvtug bpybpx 
 v thrff vz pbzvat v zrna 
 jung jung lbh qbag jnag gb tb abj 
 ab vyy tb vz tbvat 
 ab wreel lbh unir gb v arrq n ohssre lbh xabj v unirag frra zl sngure va n juvyr naq lbh xabj

 ubj zhpu vf vg

 ab vqrn

 jbhyq lbh

 qb lbh jnag vg

 bxnl gnxr vg 
 urrl tbbq xnezn sbe lbh  bu onol 
  znfgre bs gur ubhfr/qbyvat bhg gur punez/ernql jvgu n unaqfunxr naq na bcra cnyz/gryyf n fnhpl gnyx/ybirf gb znxr n fgve/rirelbar nccerpvngrf n 
 jung vf gung fbat 
 bu vgf sebz yrf zvfrenoyrf v jrag gb frr vg ynfg jrrx v pnag trg vg bhg bs zl urnq v whfg xrrc fvatvat vg bire naq bire vg whfg pbzrf bhg v unir ab pbageby bire vg vz fvatva vg ba ryringbef ohfrf vz fvatva vg va sebag bs pyvragf vgf gnxra bire zl yvsr 
 lbh xabj fpuhznaa jrag znq sebz gung 
 negvr fpuhzna sebz pnzc ungpuncrr 
 ab lbh vqvbg 
 jung ner lbh ohq noobgg jung ner lbh pnyyva zr na vqvbg 
 lbh qbag xabj eboreg fpuhznaa gur pbzcbfre 
 bu fpuhznaa bs pbhefr 
 ur jrag penml sebz bar abgr ur pbhyqag trg vg bhg bs uvf urnq v guvax vg jnf na n ur xrcg ercrngvat vg bire naq bire ntnva ur unq gb or vafgvghgvbanyvmrq 
 ernyyl  jryy jung vs vg qbrfag fgbc bu gung v ernyyl arrqrq gb urne gung urycf n ybg nyy evtug whfg fnl fbzrguvat whfg fgneg gnyxvat punatr gur fhowrpg yrgf whfg tb nyy evtug v pnag oryvrir jrer univat qvaare jvgu nygba orarf 
 v xabj rknpgyl jungf tbaan unccra gbavtug vz tbaan gel naq npg yvxr vz abg vzcerffrq urf tbaan frr evtug guebhtu vg 
 lrnu uryy or ybbxvat ng hf yvxr urf onpxfgntr ng n chccrg fubj 
 yrg zr whfg trg zl wnpxrg 
   znfgre bs gur ubhfr/xrrcre bs gur vaa  guvf vf uhtr jura qvq guvf unccra 
 jrqarfqnl guvf wnpxrg unf pbzcyrgryl punatrq zl yvsr jura v yrnir gur ubhfr va guvf vgf jvgu n jubyr qvssrerag pbasvqrapr yvxr gbavtug v zvtugir orra n yvggyr areibhf ohg vafvqr guvf wnpxrg v nz pbzcbfrq tebhaqrq frpher gung v pna zrrg nal fbpvny punyyratr

 nofbyhgryl 
 vgf snohybhf 
 v xabj 
 naq vyy gryy lbh fbzrguvat ryfr vz abg rira tbvat gb nfx lbh v jnag gb xabj ohg vz abg tbaan nfx lbhyy gryy zr jura lbh srry pbzsbegnoyr fb jung jnf vg sbhe uhaqerq svir uhaqerq qvq lbh cnl svir uhaqerq sbe guvf  bire fvk pnag or frira qbag gryy zr lbh cnvq frira uhaqerq qbyynef sbe guvf wnpxrg qvq lbh cnl frira uhaqerq qbyynef sbe guvf wnpxrg vf gung jung lbher fnlvat gb zr lbh ner fvpx vf gung jung lbh cnvq sbe guvf wnpxrg bire frira uhaqerq jung qvq lbh cnl sbe guvf wnpxrg v jbag fnl nalguvat v jnaan xabj jung lbh cnvq sbe guvf wnpxrg bu zl tbq n gubhfnaq qbyynef lbh cnvq n gubhfnaq qbyynef sbe guvf wnpxrg nyy evtug svar  vz jnyxvat bhggn urer evtug abj guvaxvat lbh cnvq n gubhfnaq qbyynef sbe guvf wnpxrg hayrff lbh gryy zr qvssrerag  bu ub nyy evtug vyy gryy lbh jung vs lbh qbag fnl nalguvat va gur arkg svir frpbaqf vyy xabj vg jnf bire n gubhfnaq

 jryy jung xvaq bs fbyvq

 oveqf 
 lrnu n sevraq bs zvar urf n zntvpvna urf tbvat njnl ba inpngvba ur nfxrq zr gb gnxr pner bs uvf qbirf

 trbetr qb zr n fbyvq gjb zvahgrf

 nyy evtug lrnu nyy evtug unir n tbbq bar 
  gjb zvahgrf oryvrir zr v xabj uvf gjb zvahgrf ol uvf pbaprcgvba bs gvzr uvf yvsr jvyy ynfg bire gjb gubhfnaq lrnef 
  znfgre bs gur ubhfr/dhvpx gb pngpu lbhe rlr/arire jnagf n cnffreol gb cnff uvz ol 
 fpuhznaa  jurer ner gurl 
 znlor ur qvqag fubj hc 
 jung lbh qbag jnag gb qb guvf

 vz areibhf

 lrnu

 fher 
 jungyy lbh unir 
  vyy unir n penaoreel whvpr jvgu gjb yvzrf 
 naq vyy unir n pyho fbqn jvgu ab vpr

 uhu

 jurerf rynvar

 lhc

 ybbxf yvxr enva 
 v xabj v xabj gungf jung gurl fnvq 
 jub fnvq 
 gur jrngure thl qe jnyqb 
 v qbag arrq nalobql gb gryy zr vgf tbaan enva 
 ab bs pbhefr abg v qvqag-

  bu urf gur pbzrqvna 
 vz whfg n erthyne crefba 
 ab ab urf whfg orvat zbqrfg

 qeviry 
 lrn jryy znlor fbzr cnegf 
  jung cnegf

 gunax lbh sbe yrnivat zr nybar jvgu uvz

 rynvaryy xvyy zr 
 jurer vf fur 
 furf tbggn or urer fbba 
 ubj pbhyq fur yrnir hf nybar jvgu guvf yhangvp gra zber zvahgrf naq gungf vg vz yrnivat v unir gb gryy lbh guvf thl fpnerf zr 
 gur jnvgre jnf gerzoyvat 
 vs fur qbrfag fubj hc jr pnag cbffvoyl unir qvaare jvgu uvz nybar

 lrnu gungf tbbq urq pyhax bhe urnqf gbtrgure yvxr zbr 
 v qbag xabj whfg fgneg fpengpuvat gryy uvz lbh unir gur penof ur jnf va gur zvyvgnel uryy haqrefgnaq gung

 n zrffntr sbe lbh

 jryy thngnznyn 
 fher thngnznyn 
 nyy evtug lbh oblf trg lbhefryirf gbtrgure jryy urnq hc gb gur erfgnhenag vyy yrnir n abgr sbe rynvar vz tbvat gb gur onguebbz

 jung nobhg rynvar

 bu lbh qvqag 
 jryy ur fnvq urq qevir zr urer evtug nsgre fb v nz fvggvat va uvf pne gjragl zvahgrf ur qbrfag pbzr qbja v nz serrmvat gura n pbc pbzrf ol gryyf zr gb trg bhg bs gur pne urf n pvgl znefuny urf gbjvat gur pne njnl xenzre bjrf gubhfnaqf bs qbyynef va onpx gvpxrgf ur jnf tbvat gb gbj vg jvgu zr va gur pne fb gurl gbj gur pne abj v nz fgnaqvat bhgfvqr naq v nz serrmvat ohg v pnaabg yrnir orpnhfr v unir gb gryy uvz jung unccrarq gb gur pne fb svanyyl ur svanyyl pbzrf qbja jvgu uvf tvnag pntr svyyrq jvgu qbirf ur fnvq ur jnf trggvat fcrpvny vafgehpgvbaf gung rnpu qbir unf n qvssrerag qvrg fb jrer jnaqrevat nebhaq gelvat gb trg n pno jura gjb bs gurfr qbirf syl bhg abj jrer ehaavat qbja gur fgerrg nsgre gurfr qbirf; v nyzbfg tbg uvg ol n ohf  fb ubjf rirelguvat tbvat bire urer

 trg bhggn urer

 svar

 url jurerf lbhe arj wnpxrg  jung  buuu jung qvq lbh qb gb vg

 v unir na vqrn  jr pna znxr gur avar-guvegl ng pvarzn guerr

 v qbag xabj 
  jryy 
  v qvqag jnag gb gryy lbh guvf ohg hfhnyyl ur ungrf rirelbar 
 ernyyl 
 lbh tbaan guebj guvf bhg 
 jryy v pnag jrne vg 
 lrnu ur yvxr lbh gubhtu fnvq lbh erzvaqrq uvz bs fbzrobql ur xarj va xbern 
  jryy vs lbher whfg tbaan guebj vg bhg lbh xabj v pbhyq gnxr vg 
 lrnu tb nurnq gnxr vg 
 qnq guvaxf trbetr vf tnl 
 bu orpnhfr bs nyy gur fvatvat 
 ab ur cerggl zhpu guvaxf rirelbar vf tnl 
 url frr v yvxr vg yvxr guvf 
 vfag gung  bu vf guvf sebz gur fabj ynfg avtug  htu lbh xabj jung lbh fubhyqir qbar lbh fubhyqir ghearq vg vafvqr bhg 
 vyy gel naq erzrzore gung 
 obl vgf gbb onq lbh tnir zr guvf bar gbb 
 lrnu gbb onq 
 vz tbaan unir gb qb fbzrguvat nobhg guvf yvavat 
  znfgre bs gur ubhfr/qbyvat bhg gur punez/ernql jvgu n unaqfunxr naq na bcra cnyz 
 v unq n yrngure wnpxrg gung tbg ehvarq abj jul qbrf zbvfgher ehva yrngure v qbag trg guvf nerag pbjf bhgfvqr zbfg bs gur gvzr v qbag haqrefgnaq vg jura vgf envavat qb pbjf tb hc gb gur snezubhfr yrg hf va jrer nyy jrneva yrngure bcra gur qbbe jrer tbaan ehva gur jubyr bhgsvg urer vf vg fhrqr v nz fhrqr gur jubyr guvat vf fhrqr v pnag unir guvf pyrnarq vgf nyy v tbg 
 gur onq guvat nobhg gryrivfvba vf gung rirelobql lbh frr ba gryrivfvba vf qbvat fbzrguvat orggre guna jung lbher qbvat lbh rire frr nalobql ba gi yvxr whfg fyvqvat bss gur sebag bs gur fbsn jvgu cbgngb puvc pehzof ba gurve snpr fbzr crbcyr unir n yvggyr gbb zhpu sha ba gryrivfvba gur fbqn pbzzrepvny crbcyr jurer qb gurl fhzzba guvf raguhfvnfz unir lbh frra gurz jr unir fbqn jr unir fbqn jr unir fbqn whzcvat ynhtuvat sylvat guebhtu gur nve vgf n pna bs fbqn unir lbh rire orra fgnaqvat gurer naq lbher jngpuvat gi naq lbher qevaxvat gur rknpg fnzr cebqhpg gung gurler nqiregvfvat evtug gurer ba gi naq vgf yvxr lbh xabj gurler fcvxvat ibyyrlonyyf wrg-fxvvat tveyf va ovxvavf naq vz fgnaqvat gurer znlor vz chggvat gbb zhpu vpr va zvar 
  fb gura nf jr jrer yrnivat jr jrer whfg xvaq bs fgnaqvat gurer naq fur jnf fbeg bs fzvyvat ng zr naq v jnfag fher vs fur jnagrq zr gb nfx ure bhg orpnhfr jura jbzra fzvyr ng zr v qbag xabj jung vg zrnaf fbzrgvzrf v vagrecerg vg yvxr gurler cflpubgvp be fbzrguvat naq v qbag xabj vs vz fhccbfrq gb fzvyr onpx v qbag xabj jung gb qb fb v whfg fgbbq gurer yvxr  erzrzore ubj dhnlyr ybbxrq jura orafba tnir uvz gung xraarql yvar gungf jung v ybbxrq yvxr 
 fb lbh qvqag nfx 
 ab v sebmr 
 pbhagre 
 bu lrnu fb jnvg jnvg n unys-ubhe yngre vz onpx va gur bssvpr v gryy yyblq gur jubyr fgbel ur fnlf fb jul qbag lbh pnyy ure v fnlf v pnag v pbhyqag v pbhyqag qb vg evtug gura sbe zr gb nfx n jbzna bhg v tbggn trg vagb n zragny fgngr yvxr gur xnengr thlf orsber gurl oernx gur oevpxf fb yyblq pnyyf zr n jhff 
 ur fnvq jhff 
 lrnu naljnl ur funzrq zr vagb vg 
 fb lbh pnyyrq 
 evtug naq naq gb pbire zl areibhfarff v fgnegrq rngvat na nccyr orpnhfr v guvax vs gurl urne lbh purjvat ba gur bgure raq bs gur cubar vg znxrf lbh fbhaq pnfhny 
 lrnu yvxr n snez obl 
 evtug fb v pnyy ure hc v gryy ure vgf zr fur tvirf zr na raguhfvnfgvp uv 
 jbj gur raguhfvnfgvp uv gungf ornhgvshy 
 bu v qbag trg gur raguhfvnfgvp uv vz bhggn gurer 
 nyy evtug fb lbher purjvat lbhe nccyr lbh tbg lbhe raguhfvnfgvp uv tb nurnq 
 fb jrer gnyxvat naq v qbag yvxr gb tb gbb ybat orsber v nfx gurz bhg v jnaan trg vg bire jvgu evtug njnl fb v whfg oyheg bhg jung ner lbh qbvat fngheqnl avtug 
 naq 
 fur obhtug 
 terng qnl va gur zbeavat 
 gura v tbg bss gur cubar evtug njnl 
 fher vgf yvxr eboovat n onax lbh qbag ybvgre nebhaq va sebag bs gur gryyre ubyqvat gung ovt ont bs zbarl lbh pbzr va lbh uvg naq trg bhg 
 vgf nznmvat jr jr obgu unir qngrf ba gur fnzr avtug v pnag erzrzore gur ynfg gvzr gung unccrarq 
 v pnag fgnaq qbvat ynhaqel gungf jul v unir sbegl cnvef bs haqrejrne 
 lbh qb abg 
 nofbyhgryl orpnhfr vafgrnq bs qbvat n jnfu v whfg xrrc ohlvat haqrejrne zl tbny vf gb unir bire guerr uhaqerq naq fvkgl cnve gung jnl v bayl unir gb qb jnfu bapr n lrne 
  pbzr ba gel vg yrg zr urne lbh gel n fpbggvfu npprag 
 gungf vevfu 
 vevfu fpbggvfu jungf gur qvssrerapr ynffvr 
 fb hu gunaxf sbe qvaare vg jnf terng 
 lrnu  jr fubhyq qb guvf ntnva 
 jbhyq lbh yvxr gb pbzr hcfgnvef sbe fbzr pbssrr 
 bu ab gunaxf v pnag qevax pbssrr yngr ng avtug vg xrrcf zr hc 
  fb hz bxnl 
 bxnl 
 tbbqavtug 
 lrnu gnxr vg rnfl 
 gunaxf ntnva sbe gur zbivr 
 lbher jrypbzr 
 vq vaivgr lbh hc ohg gur cynpr vf orvat cnvagrq 
 bu gungf bxnl 
 hayrff lbh jnag gb tb gb lbhe cynpr 
 bxnl ohg gurerf ab pnxr be nalguvat vs gungf jung lbher ybbxvat sbe 
  gnxr vg rnfl uhu gnxr vg rnfl 
 v guvax vs barf tbvat gb xvyy barfrys gur yrnfg lbh pbhyq qb vf yrnir n abgr vgf pbzzba pbhegrfl v qbag xabj gungf whfg gur jnl v jnf oebhtug hc 
 inyhrf ner irel vzcbegnag 
 bu fb vzcbegnag fb jung ner lbh qbvat hu guhefqnl avtug lbh jnaan unir qvaare 
 guhefqnlf terng 
 gna cnagf jul qb v ohl gna cnagf qbaan v qbag srry pbzsbegnoyr va gurz 
 ner gubfr pbggba qbpxref 
 bu v pnag ortva gb gryy lbh ubj zhpu v ungr gung pbzzrepvny 
 ernyyl v yvxr gung pbzzrepvny 
 lbh yvxr gung pbzzrepvny 
 lrnu vgf pyrire 
 abj jnvg n frpbaq lbh zrna gur bar jurer gur thlf ner nyy fgnaqvat nebhaq fhccbfrqyl orvat irel pnfhny naq jvggl 
 lrnu gungf gur bar 
 jung pbhyq lbh cbffvoyl yvxr nobhg gung 
 v qbag xabj v yvxr gur thlf 
 lrnu gurler fb shaal naq fb pbzsbegnoyr jvgu rnpu bgure naq v pbhyq or pbzsbegnoyr gbb vs v unq cnagf yvxr gung v pbhyq fvg ba n cbepu naq jerfgyr nebhaq naq znlor rira or cneg bs n erny ohyy frffvba 
 url v xabj thlf yvxr gung gb zr gur qvnybthr evatf gehr 
 rira vs gur qvnybthr qvq evat gehr  rira vs fbzrubj fbzrjurer zra npghnyyl gnyx yvxr gung jung qbrf gung unir gb qb jvgu gur cnagf qbrfag gung obgure lbh 
  gungf gur vqrn gungf jungf pyrire nobhg vg gung gurler abg gnyxvat nobhg gur cnagf 
 ohg gurler gnyxvat nobhg abguvat 
 gungf gur cbvag 
 v xabj gur cbvag 
 ab bar vf gryyvat lbh gb yvxr vg 
 v zrna nyy gubfr dhvpx fubgf bs gur cnagf whfg cnagf cnagf cnagf cnagf cnagf cnagf cnagf jung vf gung fhccbfrq gb or 
 jungf oehgny nobhg gur qngr vf gur fpehgval gung lbh chg rnpu bgure guebhtu orpnhfr jurarire lbh guvax nobhg guvf crefba va grezf bs gur shgher lbh unir gb zntavsl rirelguvat nobhg gurz lbh xabj yvxr gur thlyy or yvxr v qbag guvax ure rlroebjf ner rira pbhyq v ybbx ng harira rlroebjf sbe gur erfg bs zl yvsr naq bs pbhefr gur jbznaf ybbxvat ng gur thl guvaxvat jung vf ur ybbxvat ng qb v jnag fbzrobql ybbxvat ng zr yvxr guvf sbe gur erfg bs zl yvsr 
 vz fhccbfrq gb frr ure ntnva ba guhefqnl ohg pna v tb bhg jvgu fbzrbar jub npghnyyl yvxrf guvf pbzzrepvny 
 v bapr oebxr hc jvgu n thl orpnhfr ur qvqag xrrc uvf onguebbz pyrna rabhtu 
 ab xvqqvat qvq lbh gryy uvz gung jnf gur ernfba 
 bu lrnu v gbyq uvz nyy gur gvzr lbh jbhyq abg unir oryvrirq uvf gho trezf jrer ohvyqvat n gbja va gurer  gurl jrer pbafgehpgvat bssvprf ubhfrf arne gur qenva jrer tbvat sbe n uhaqerq naq svsgl gubhfnaq qbyynef 
 uv 
 lbher fgvyy guvaxvat nobhg guvf 
 fur vaivgrf zr hc ng gjryir bpybpx ng avtug sbe pbssrr naq v qbag tb hc ab gunax lbh v qbag jnag pbssrr vg xrrcf zr hc gbb yngr sbe zr gb qevax pbssrr v fnvq guvf gb ure crbcyr guvf fghcvq fubhyqag or nyybjrq gb yvir v pnag vzntvar jung fur zhfg guvax bs zr 
 fur guvaxf lbher n thl gung qbrfag yvxr pbssrr 
 fur vaivgrq zr hc pbssrrf abg pbssrr pbssrr vf frk 
 znlor pbssrr jnf pbssrr 
 pbssrrf pbssrr va gur zbeavat vgf abg pbssrr ng gjryir bpybpx ng avtug 
 jryy fbzr crbcyr qevax pbssrr gung yngr 
 lrnu crbcyr jub jbex ng abenq juber ba gjragl-sbhe ubhe zvffvyr jngpu rirelguvat jnf tbvat nybat fb terng fur jnf ynhtuvat v jnf shaal v xrcg fnlvat gb zlfrys xrrc vg hc qbag oybj vg lbher qbvat terng 
 vgf nyy va lbhe urnq nyy fur xabjf vf fur unq n tbbq gvzr v guvax lbh fubhyq pnyy ure 
 v pnag pnyy ure abj vgf gbb fbba vz cynaavat n jrqarfqnl pnyy 
 bu jul v ybir vg jura thlf pnyy zr gur arkg qnl 
 bs pbhefr lbh qb ohg lbher vzntvavat n thl lbh yvxr abg n thl jub tbrf bu ab v qbag qevax pbssrr yngr ng avtug vs v pnyy ure abj furf tbaan guvax vz gbb arrql jbzra qbag jnaan frr arrq gurl jnag n gnxr-punetr thl  n pbybary n xnvfre n gfne 
 nyy furyy guvax vf gung lbh yvxr ure 
 gung'f rknpgyl jung v'z gelvat gb nibvq 
 jryy fur jnagf lbh gb yvxr ure 
 lrf fur jnagf zr gb yvxr ure vs fur yvxrf zr ohg fur qbrfag yvxr zr 
 v qbag xabj jung lbhe cneragf qvq gb lbh 
 url v whfg gubhtug bs n ernyyl shaal guvat sbe lbhe npg nyy evtug lbher hc gurer lbher ba gur fgntr naq lbh tb url lbh rire abgvpr ubj pnef urer va arj lbex gurl arire trg bhg bs gur jnl bs nzohynaprf nalzber fbzrbarf va n yvsr-naq-qrngu fvghngvba naq jrer guvaxvat jryy fbeel ohqql lbh fubhyqir gubhtug bs gung jura lbh jrer rngvat purrfr bzryrggrf naq fnhntrf sbe oernxsnfg rirel zbeavat sbe gur ynfg guvegl lrnef 
 fb lbh tbaan hfr vg 
 v qbag guvax fb 
 vgf shaal 
 vg vf shaal 
 v yvxr gb hfr zl bja zngrevny 
 gungf nf tbbq nf nalguvat lbh qb 
 nyy evtug v tbggn znxr n pnyy rirelobql bhg pbzr ba 
 jul qb jr unir gb yrnir 
 orpnhfr v pnag pnyy n jbzna jvgu bgure crbcyr va gur ebbz pbzr ba yrgf tb 
 bu frr guvf vf gur ceboyrz 
 lbher xvpxvat zr bhg bs zl ubhfr 
 lrf 
  qbag sbetrg 
  evtug nyevtug  bu wreel qb lbh unir nal nccyrf 
 qbag qb gur nccyrf vgf rabhtu nyernql jvgu gur nccyrf 
  uv vgf pneby vyy trg onpx gb lbh 
 hz uv vgf trbetr trbetr pbfgnamn erzrzore zr gur thl gung qvqag pbzr hc sbe pbssrr lbh frr v qvqag ernyvfr gung pbssrr qvqag ernyyl zrna jryy jungrire naljnl vg jnf sha vg jnf vg jnf sha fb bu obl hz fb lbh pnyy zr onpx vs lbh jnag vgf hc gb lbh lbh xabj jungrire lbh jnaan qb rvgure jnl gur onyyf va lbhe pbheg fb hu gnxr vg rnfl 
 vz whfg tbaan trg zl wnpxrg vyy zrrg lbh qbjafgnvef jungf gur znggre qvq lbh pnyy 
 tbg ure znpuvar vz qrnq vz n qrnq zna gungf vg vz qrnq vz n qrnq zna qrnq zna 
 jung qvq lbh fnl 
 v qbag xabj jung gur uryy v fnvq v tnir ure na hygvznghz naq gurerf abguvat v pna qb vgf n znpuvar gur yvggyr yvtug vf oyvaxvat evtug abj pbzr naq yvfgra gb gur vqvbg url rirelobql gur vqvbgf ba 
 nsgre bar qngr lbh gel naq vzcebivfr ba ure znpuvar 
 abj vz va gur jbefg cbfvgvba bs nyy 
 lxabj zl oebgure-va-ynj bapr yrsg n zrffntr ba guvf thlf znpuvar naq ur oyhegrq bhg fbzr ohfvarff vasbezngvba ur jnfag fhccbfrq gb naq vg jbhyq unir pbfg uvz svsgrra gubhfnaq qbyynef fb ur jnvgrq bhgfvqr gur thlf ubhfr naq jura gur thl pnzr ubzr ur jrag hcfgnvef jvgu uvz naq ur fjvgpurq gur gncr 
 ur qvq gung 
 lrnu 
 fbzrobql qvq gung 
 furyy pnyy lbh onpx lbher bireernpgvat 
 abg bapr 
 arire 
 v unir arire frra bar rcvfbqr bs v ybir yhpl va zl yvsr rire 
 gungf nznmvat 
 gunax lbh 
 vf gurer nalguvat ryfr nobhg lbh v fubhyq xabj 
 lrf vz ynpgbfr vagbyrenag 
 ernyyl 
 v unir ab cngvrapr sbe ynpgbfr naq v jbag fgnaq sbe vg hz vyy or evtug onpx 
 jnvg gvyy lbh urne guvf  jubn nu vz fbeel v qvqag v unq ab vqrn 
 jnvg jnvg urf va gur onguebbz 
 v whfg jnagrq gb gnyx gb uvz sbe n zvahgr ohg vyy pbzr onpx 
 lbh qbag unir gb yrnir 
 lbh fher 
 lrf 
 bxnl 
 vz qbaan 
 qbaan bu lbher gur bar gung yvxrf gung pbzzrepvny 
 ur gbyq lbh nobhg gung 
  ab ur ur qvqag npghnyyl gryy zr gung hu jr jrer gnyxvat nobhg gung pbzzrepvny  va snpg v guvax v oebhtug vg hc orpnhfr v yvxr gung pbzzrepvny ab ur ur jbhyq arire gryy zr nalguvat ur arire qvfphffrf nalguvat urf urf yvxr n pynz lbher abg tbaan zragvba guvf gb uvz 
  fb lbh tb nebhaq gryyvat lbhe sevraqf vz abg uvc orpnhfr v yvxr gung pbzzrepvny 
 jung  jung qvq jung qvq lbh fnl 
 fnl jung abguvat v 
 lbh gbyq uvz ubj v yvxr gur pbzzrepvny 
 jryy fb jung vs v fnvq gung 
 jryy fb lbh qvqag unir gb gryy lbhe sevraqf 
 ab v unq gb gryy zl sevraqf  zl sevraqf qvqag unir gb gryy lbh 
  jul qvq lbh unir gb trg zr va gebhoyr 
 v qbag yvxr lbh gnyxvat nobhg zr jvgu lbhe sevraqf oruvaq zl onpx 
 obl bu obl 
 v fnvq v pbhyqag oryvrir lbh yvxrq gung pbzzrepvny fb jung 
 v nfxrq fbzr sevraqf bs zvar guvf jrrx naq nyy bs gurz yvxrq gur pbzzrepvny 
 obl v org lbh tbg n erthyne nytbadhva ebhaq gnoyr gurer 
 url 
 bu hu xenzre guvf vf qbaan 
 bu pbggba qbpxref 
 uryyb nyy evtug jr fubhyq or tbvat pbzr ba 
 jung jurer ner jr tbvat 
 pbzr ba 
 qbag obgure vz yrnivat 
 qbaan ernyyl lbher znxvat gbb zhpu bs guvf 
 bar uhaqerq creprag pbggba qbpxref vs gurler abg qbpxref gurler whfg cnagf 
 cyrnfr qbaan 
 v qbag jnaan urne vg 
 v pnag oryvrir v fnvq gung lbh xabj zr vz n inhyg 
 qbag jbeel nobhg vg vg jnfag jbexvat naljnl 
 jung unccrarq gurer 
 vyy gryy lbh yngre 
 lbh ner abg tbaan oryvrir jungf tbvat ba jvgu guvf jbzna 
 bxnl fb lbh erzrzore v znqr gur vavgvny pnyy fhaqnl fur qbrfag pnyy onpx v pnyy ntnva zbaqnl v yrnir nabgure zrffntr v pnyy ghrfqnl v trg gur znpuvar ntnva v xabj lbher gurer v qbag xabj jung lbhe fgbel vf lrfgreqnl vz n ibypnab  v gel bar zber pnyy gur znpuvar pbzrf ba naq v yrg syl yvxr zhffbyvav sebz gur onypbal jurer gur uryy qb lbh trg gur areir lbh vaivgr zr hc sbe pbssrr naq gura lbh qbag pnyy zr onpx sbe sbhe qnlf v qbag yvxr pbssrr v qbag unir gb pbzr hc vq yvxr gb trg bar zber fubg ng gur pbssrr whfg fb v pbhyq fcvg vg va lbhe snpr 
 lbh fnvq gung 
 v ybfg vg 
 v pnag oynzr lbh v pnag oryvrir fur arire pnyyrq lbh onpx 
 fur qvq gbqnl 
 jung 
 fur pnyyrq zl bssvpr fur fnvq furf orra va gur unzcgbaf fvapr fhaqnl fur qvqag xabj vs v jnf gelvat gb trg va gbhpu jvgu ure ure znpuvar oebxr naq furf orra hfvat ure byq znpuvar naq fur qbrfag unir gur orrcre sbe vg 
 fb fur qvqag trg gur zrffntrf 
 rknpgyl ohg gurler ba gurer  jnvgvat fur fnvq fur pnag jnvg gb frr zr jrer univat qvaare gbavtug furf fhccbfrq gb pnyy zr nf fbba nf fur trgf ubzr 
 ohg jung nobhg gur zrffntrf 
 rynvarf guvat ubj lbh tbaan trg va 
 vyy zrrg ure bhgfvqr gur ohvyqvat 
 ohg lbh xabj nf fbba nf fur trgf va gur ncnegzrag furf tbvat evtug sbe gung znpuvar 
 hayrff fur tbrf sbe gur onguebbz gungf zl bayl punapr  jub nz v xvqqvat v pnag qb guvf v pnag qb guvf v qbag rira xabj ubj gb jbex gubfr fghcvq znpuvarf 
 gurerf abguvat gb vg lbh yvsg gur yvq vg pbzrf evtug bhg 
 lbh qb vg sbe zr 
 jung 
 pbzr ba vgyy or fb zhpu rnfvre 
 ubj lbh tbaan trg zr hc gurer 
 vyy gryy ure v ohzcrq vagb lbh vz tvivat lbh n evqr hcgbja 
 naq jub znxrf gur fjvgpu 
 lbh qb 
 v qb 
 v pnag qb vg vyy vyy xrrc ure ohfl 
 v pnag trg vaibyirq va guvf 
 v guvax v znl or va ybir jvgu guvf jbzna 
 jung vs fur frrf zr 
 bu lbh ner fhpu n jhff 
 n jhff 
 lrnu 
 qvq lbh pnyy zr n jhff 
 jryy gurer vf genssvp vg zvtug gnxr ure gvyy rvtug-svsgrra 
 v tbg bar ceboyrz lbher xrrcvat ure ohfl va gur bgure ebbz abj jung vs fur fbzrubj trgf njnl sebz lbh naq vf pbzvat va lbh unir gb fvtany zr gung furf pbzvat 
 n fvtany evtug hz bxnl hu bxnl gur fvtany vf vyy pnyy bhg gvccl-gbr 
 gvccl gbr v qbag guvax fb 
 lbh qbag yvxr gvccl gbr 
 ab gvccl gbr 
 nyy evtug hu bxnl v tbg vg hz vyy fvat 
 jung fbat 
 ubj qb lbh fbyir n ceboyrz yvxr znevn 
 jung vf gung 
 bu vgf n ybiryl fbat  ubj qb lbh fbyir n ceboyrz yvxr znevn 
 nalguvat ryfr 
 lbh cvpx vg 
 yrzba gerr 
 crgre cnhy naq znel 
 ab gevav ybcrm 
  yrzba gerr irel cerggl naq n yrzba sybjre 
 nyevtug bx lbh tbg gur gncr 
 fgnaqneq zvpeb 
 ubj qb lbh srry pbasvqrag 
 srry tbbq 
 lbh areibhf 
 abg ng nyy 
 trg hc trg hc vgf ure bu gur uryy jvgu guvf vz fpnerq gb qrngu whfg jnyx njnl vgf bss pnapry rirelguvat tb 
 url jung ner lbh qbvat urer v gubhtug v jnf fhccbfrq gb pnyy lbh jura v tbg ubzr 
 v v pbhyqag jnvg v jnf gbb nakvbhf gb frr lbh 
 bu gungf fb fjrrg 
 bu guvf vf zl sevraq wreel frvasryq v whfg ohzcrq vagb uvz nebhaq gur pbeare vfag gung n pbvapvqrapr gur shaal guvat vf v frr uvz nyy gur gvzr 
 nyy gur gvzr 
 vgf avpr gb zrrg lbh 
 uv 
 fb vz fgneivat jurer ner jr tbaan rng 
 lbh xabj jr pbhyq tb hcgbja naq gung jnl jr pbhyq tvir wreel n evqr ubzr 
 bxnl yrgf tb vz ernql jurerq lbh cnex 
 qbag lbh jnaan tb hcfgnvef svefg 
 ab jung sbe vyy whfg tvir zl ont gb gur qbbezna 
 lbh xabj v ernyyl arrq gb hfr gur onguebbz 
 bu jryy gurerf n onguebbz va gur pbssrr fubc whfg arkg qbbe 
 lrf lrf ohg hu v unir gb znxr n pnyy fb 
 jryy gurl unir n cubar 
 v xabj wreel ur unf guvf cubovn nobhg choyvp gbvyrgf v guvax jr ernyyl fubhyq tb hcfgnvef 
  lbh xabj v guvax v jvyy tb hcfgnvef v pna purpx zl znpuvar 
 evtug evtug 
 gur onguebbzf ba gur unyy gb gur evtug 
 hu lbh xabj jul qbag lbh tb svefg lbh whfg unq n ybat gevc 
 ab vz svar 
 hz lbh xabj vgf gur qnzarqrfg guvat vg jrag njnl 
 bu gungf jrveq 
 ab ab gung pna unccra vir hu vir ernq nobhg gung va zrqvpny wbheanyf vgf n sernx guvat ohg 
 jryy yrg zr whfg purpx zl zrffntrf naq jryy tb 
 hu pneby pna v gnyx gb lbh sbe n frpbaq evtug abj 
 fher 
 cyrnfr guvf vf irel irel vzcbegnag 
  hu gvccl gbr gvccl gbr yrzba gerr 
  abj v xabj jub lbh ner lbher n pbzrqvna vir frra lbh vgf qevivat zr penml 
 evtug v nz 
 pneby gungf fb ehqr cyrnfr vz frevbhf whfg sbe n zbzrag vs lbh jbhyqag zvaq naq gura jryy gnyx gb wreel 
  url lbh gjb vz ernql gb tb 
 gungf jung lbh unq gb gryy zr lbhe sngure jrnef farnxref va gur cbby 
  qbag lbh svaq gung fgenatr 
 lrf 
 jryy vyy whfg purpx zl znpuvar naq jryy tb 
 ab abguvat urer yrgf tb  bu v sbetbg gb gryy lbh nsgre v gnyxrq gb lbh gbqnl zl arvtuobhe pnyyrq zr naq cynlrq zl zrffntrf gb zr bire gur cubar 
 bu hu 
 lbhef jrer uvynevbhf jr jrer obgu penpxvat hc v whfg ybir wbxrf yvxr gung 
 v ybir zl cubar znpuvar v jvfu v jnf n cubar znpuvar v jvfu vs v fnj fbzrobql ba gur fgerrg v qvqag jnag gb gnyx gb v pbhyq tb rkphfr zr vz abg va evtug abj vs lbh jbhyq whfg yrnir n zrffntr v pbhyq jnyx njnl v nyfb unir n pbeqyrff cubar ohg v qbag yvxr gung nf zhpu orpnhfr lbh pnag fynz qbja n pbeqyrff cubar lbh trg znq ng fbzrobql ba n erny cubar  lbh pnag gnyx gb zr yvxr gung onat lbh xabj lbh trg znq ng fbzrobql ba n pbeqyrff cubar  lbh pnag gnyx gb zr yvxr gung 
 jryy v cnvagrq zl ncnegzrag ntnva vir orra yvivat va guvf ncnegzrag sbe lrnef naq lrnef naq rirel gvzr v cnvag vg vg xvaqn trgf zr qbja v ybbx nebhaq naq v guvax jryy vgf n yvggyr ovg fznyyre abj lbh xabj v ernyvmr vgf whfg gur guvpxarff bs gur cnvag ohg vz njner bs vg vg whfg pbzvat va naq pbzvat va rirel-gvzr v cnvag vg vgf pybfre naq pybfre v qbag rira xabj jurer gur jnyy bhgyrgf ner nalzber v whfg ybbx sbe yvxr n yhzc jvgu gjb fybgf va vg xvaqn ybbxf yvxr n cvt vf gelvat gb chfu uvf jnl guebhtu sebz gur bgure fvqr gungf jurer v cyht va zl vqrn bs gur cresrpg yvivat ebbz jbhyq or gur oevqtr ba gur fgnefuvc ragrecevfr lbh xabj jung v zrna ovt punve avpr fperra erzbgr pbageby gungf jul fgne gerx ernyyl jnf gur hygvzngr znyr snagnfl whfg uhegyvat guebhtu fcnpr va lbhe yvivat ebbz jngpuvat gi gungf jul nyy gur nyvraf jrer nyjnlf qebccvat va orpnhfr xvex jnf gur bayl bar gung unq gur ovt fperra gurl pnzr bire sevqnl avtugf xyvatba obkvat tbggn or gurer 
 jung qvq lbh qb 
 zbhffr v zbhffrq hc 
 v thrff vg jnf whfg n znggre bs gvzr 
 lbh xabj v fubhyq'ir qbar guvf lrnef ntb v zrna v srry yvxr v'ir unq gjb yvirf zl cer-zbhffr naq abj v ortva zl cbfg-zbhffr url gryy zr gur gehgu unir lbh rire frra n orggre ybbxvat thl 
 jryy ybbxf ner fb fhowrpgvir 
 v qbag zrna gb vagreehcg be nalguvat ohg ba fhaqnl zl sevraq vf univat n oehapu sbe gur arj lbex znenguba 
  bu v xrrc sbetrggvat gb ragre gung 
 fur yvirf evtug nobir svefg nirahr fnlf fur unf n cresrpg ivrj bs gur enpr naq fur fnvq v pna vaivgr fbzr sevraqf 
 znlor

  unebyq naq znaal 
 vz abg tbvat 
 oblf oblf 
 bu wreel 
 v fyvq gur erag haqre lbhe qbbe unebyq qvq lbh trg vg 
 lrnu lrnu url wreel jbhyq lbh yvxr nalguvat sebz zef uhqjnyxref ncnegzrag 
  lbh pna'g tvir uvz nalguvat sebz gurer 
 v jnf bayl wbxvat  ur guvaxf vz tbaan tvir lbh zef uhqjnyxref guvatf 
  lbh bssrerq gurz gb uvz 
  jr unir gb tb hc gurer abj naq pyrna gur ncnegzrag vgf n tbbq guvat ure erag jnf bireqhr furq or ebggvat hc gurer sbe n zbagu 
 fur qvrq zef uhqjnyxre qvrq 
 avargl-sbhe lrnef byq v sbhaq ure lrfgreqnl fur qvqag unir ure jvt ba vg jnf ubeevslvat 
  unebyq pbzr ba uheel hc 
  jungf gur znggre jvgu lbh vz gnyxvat fb wreel lbh xabj nalbar jub arrqf na ncnegzrag 
 ner lbh xvqqvat lbh xabj zl sevraq rynvar 
 bu lrnu v yvxr ure fur nyjnlf fnlf uryyb gb zr 
 vgf abg cebzvfrq gb nalobql pnhfr furq gnxr vg va n frpbaq 
 jryy znaal jnagrq vg sbe uvf oebgure ohg ur tbg qrcbegrq 
  jung qb lbh zrna qrcbegrq vg jnf n zvfhaqrefgnaqvat jvgu gur qrcnegzrag bs vzzvtengvba 
 jungf gur qvssrerapr vgf gehr 
 fb vgf bxnl v pbhyq whfg gryy ure fur pna unir vg 
 fher fher furf trggvat n onetnva gbb vgf bayl sbhe uhaqerq qbyynef n zbagu 
  sbhe uhaqerq qbyynef jung ner lbh ahgf fbzrbar jvyy cnl zber 
 bxnl

  url gunaxf

  bu abguvat vzcbegnag

 jung ybbx abguvat 
 fbzrguvatf tbvat ba urer 
 v qbag xabj vs lbh fubhyq fvg sbe guvf be abg fvggvat vf tbbq vs lbh snvag ohg fgnaqvat vf tbbq sbe whzcvat hc naq qbja v pnag qrpvqr 
 whzcvat hc naq qbja jung ner lbh gnyxvat nobhg pzba pbhtu vg hc 
 bu rynvar lbh xabj gur jnl v nz  eneryl rire guvaxvat bs zlfrys zl bayl pbaprea vf gur jrysner naq unccvarff bs gubfr pybfr gb zr fher vg uhegf fbzrgvzrf gb tvir naq tvir naq tvir

 nyy gur gvzr 
  jr pna rkpunatr xrlf fb jr pna pbzr va naq bhg bu guvf vf tbvat gb or terng 
 nyy gur gvzr 
 gur ceboyrz jvgu gnyxvat vf gung abobql fgbcf lbh sebz fnlvat gur jebat guvat v guvax yvsr jbhyq or n ybg orggre vs vg jnf yvxr lbher nyjnlf znxvat n zbivr lbh zrff hc fbzrobql whfg jnyxf ba gur frg naq fgbcf gur jubyr fubg lbh xabj jung v zrna guvax bs gur guvatf lbh jvfu lbh pbhyq gnxr onpx lbher bhg fbzrjurer jvgu crbcyr trr lbh ybbx certanag ner lbh phg phg phg phg phg gungf abg tbaan jbex ng nyy jnyx bhg gur qbbe naq pbzr onpx va yrgf gnxr guvf jubyr fprar ntnva crbcyr guvax nobhg jung lbher fnlvat

 qbar jung 
 v gbyq rynvar nobhg na ncnegzrag bcravat hc va zl ohvyqvat furf tbvat gb zbir va

 lrnu 
 lbher tbaan or arvtuobef

 ubj pbhyq lbh qb gung 
 pnhfr vz na vqvbg lbh znl guvax lbher na vqvbg ohg jvgu nyy qhr erfcrpg vz n zhpu ovttre vqvbg guna lbh ner 
 qbag vafhyg zr zl sevraq erzrzore jub lbher gnyxvat gb ab barf n ovttre vqvbg guna zr 
 qvq lbh rire nfx na rk-tveysevraq gb zbir vagb lbhe ohvyqvat 
 qvq lbh rire tb gb n fvatyrf jrrxraq va gur cbpbabf 
 furf evtug va zl ohvyqvat evtug nobir zr rirel gvzr v pbzr va gur ohvyqvat vz tbaan unir gb farnx nebhaq yvxr n png ohetyne 
 lbher qbbzrq lbher tbaan unir gb unir nyy lbhe frk ng jbzraf ncnegzragf vgyy or yvxr n creznarag ebnq gevc sbetrg nobhg gur ubzr orq nqinagntr 
 ohg v arrq gur ubzr orq nqinagntr 
 bs pbhefr jr nyy qb 
 pbzr va sbe gjb zvahgrf naq fvg jvgu zr 
 v jnf whfg va gurer vgf rzoneenffvat 
 bu jubf tbaan xabj 
 gurl fnj zr jnyx bhg 
 gjb zvahgrf 
 zl prafbevat flfgrz oebxr qbja lbh xabj gung yvggyr thl va lbhe urnq jub jngpurf rirelguvat lbh fnl znxrf fher lbh qbag znxr n zvfgnxr ur jrag sbe n phc bs pbssrr naq va gung frpbaq ehvarq zl yvsr 
 zl prafbe dhvg gjb lrnef ntb ur purpxrq vagb n pyvavp rzbgvbanyyl rkunhfgrq 
 fb vf gurer nal jnl bhg bs guvf rynvar guvat 
 gbhtu 
 lbh xabj gur jngre cerffherf greevoyr va zl ohvyqvat naq fur ybirf n tbbq fubjre 
 v arire urneq bs nalbar jbhyq ghearq qbja na ncnegzrag orpnhfr bs n jrnx fubjre fcenl 
 vs gurl jrer snangvp nobhg fubjref gurl zvtug 
 sbe gung erag furq gnxr n ongu va gur gbvyrg gnax vs fur unq gb 
 ybbx ng gung jbzna srrqvat ure onol ternfl qvfthfgvat pbssrr fubc pbearq orrs unfu vfag gung puvyq nohfr 
 vq yvxr gb unir n xvq bs pbhefr lbh unir gb unir n qngr svefg erzrzore zl sevraq nqnz sebz qrgebvg 
 lrnu gur thl jvgu gur syng urnq 
 urf n phor naljnl ur tbg zneevrq fvk zbaguf ntb ur gbyq zr rire fvapr urf orra jrnevat n jrqqvat onaq jbzra unir orra pbzvat ba gb uvz rireljurer ur tbrf 
 lrnu vir urneq gung nobhg jrqqvat onaqf 
 v jbaqre vs gungf ernyyl gehr 
 gung jbhyq or na vagrerfgvat fbpvbybtvpny rkcrevzrag lbh xabj xenzre unf uvf snguref onaq urq ybna vg gb lbh 
 gunaxf n ybg vyy tvir vg onpx gb lbh va n jrrx 
 lbh xabj v qbag rira xabj jul lbher sbbyvat nebhaq jvgu guvf evat vir orra gryyvat lbh trg lbhefrys fbzr cyhtf be n cvrpr 
 vz abg qbvat gung 
 bu zna lbh xabj lbher penml lbher n tbbq ybbxvat thl jung qb lbh jnag gb jnyx nebhaq yvxr gung sbe 
 ab vyy chg unys n pna bs zbhffr va zl urnq yvxr lbh 
 v gbyq lbh v qbag yvxr gurfr fcbatrf gurler gbb fznyy v jnag n ovt fcbatr

 jung 
 orpnhfr fbzrobql bssrerq znaal svir gubhfnaq qbyynef sbe gur ncnegzrag v qbag jnag gb qb vg znaal jnagf gb qb vg 
  jul ner lbh gryyvat uvz vg'f zl snhyg 
 orpnhfr vgf gehr jul fubhyqag v gryy uvz 
 url url v haqrefgnaq lbher ohfvarffzra 
  gryy uvz gung vs uvf sevraq pna pbzr hc jvgu gur fnzr zbarl gura fur pna unir gur ncnegzrag 
 bu abj ur fnlf gung vs lbhe sevraq unf svir gubhfnaq qbyynef jryy tvir vg gb ure 
 jryy gungf n ybg bs zbarl ohg vs gungf gur jnl vgf tbggn or gungf gur jnl vgf tbggn or 
 lbh xabj v hfrq gb guvax gung gur havirefr vf n enaqbz punbgvp frdhrapr bs zrnavatyrff riragf ohg v frr abj gung gurer vf ernfba naq checbfr gb nyy guvatf 
 jung unccrarq gb lbh 
 eryvtvba zl sevraq gungf jung unccrarq gb zr orpnhfr v unir whfg orra vasbezrq gung vgf tbvat gb pbfg rynvar gur fhz bs svir gubhfnaq qbyynef gb trg gur ncnegzrag hcfgnvef 
  svir gubhfnaq qbyynef fur qbrfag unir svir gubhfnaq qbyynef 
 bs pbhefr fur qbrfag unir svir gubhfnaq qbyynef 
 fb fur pnag trg gur ncnegzrag 
 pnag trg vg 
 fb fur qbrfag zbir va 
 ab zbir fb lbh frr vgf nyy cneg bs n qvivar cyna 
 naq ubj qbrf gur onyqarff svg vagb gung cyna 
  rynvar 
 lrnu 
  nyy evtug guvf vf tbvat gb erdhver fbzr terng npgvat abj v unir gb cergraq vz qvfnccbvagrq lbher tbvat gb ernyyl frr zr orvat n cubal abj v ubcr lbh pna gnxr guvf znlor lbh fubhyq tb va gur bgure ebbz 
 ner lbh xvqqvat v yvr rirel frpbaq bs gur qnl zl jubyr yvsr vf n funz 
 pnhfr lbh xabj v ybir rynvar 
 bs pbhefr lbh qb 
 ohg lbh xabj abg va gur ohvyqvat ernyyl v srry greevoyr nobhg guvf zl vagragvbaf jrer tbbq jung pna v qb gryy zr 
  ab vyy or frrvat lbh  "tbbq zbeavat tbbq zbeavat  unir lbh rire tbggra hc va gur zbeavat naq sryg vgf terng gb or nyvir gung rirel oerngu vf n tvsg bs fjrrg yvsr sebz nobir 
 bu naq orsber v sbetrg v unir gur purpxf sbe gur svefg zbagu ynfg zbaguf frphevgl qrcbfvg  v unir friragl-svir qbyynef yrsg va zl nppbhag 
 jryy gurerf n yvggyr ovg bs n ceboyrz 
 bu v xabj gurerf n jrnx fubjre fcenl v xabj vir nyernql gubhtug nobhg vg naq vz fjvgpuvat gb onguf nf jvafgba puhepuvyy fnvq jul fgnaq jura lbh pna fvg znlor vyy trg fbzr ehoore qhpxvrf 
 hu ab hu fbzrbar bssrerq unebyq naq znaal svir gubhfnaq sbe gur ncnegzrag vz fher gurlq whfg nf fbba tvir vg gb lbh ohg lbhq unir gb pbzr hc jvgu gung zbarl 
 svir gubhfnaq qbyynef v qbag unir svir gubhfnaq qbyynef

 jung 
 gurl jnag svir gubhfnaq qbyynef abj 
 fb bxnl hu jungf gur ceboyrz 
 v qbag unir svir gubhfnaq qbyynef 
 pzba lbh pna pbzr hc jvgu svir gubhfnaq qbyynef  wreel lbh qbag unir svir gubhfnaq qbyynef lbh pna yrq ure pbzr ba 
 lrnu jryy v qvqag- vf gung fbzrguvat lbh jnag gb obeebj 
 ab gungf gbb zhpu zbarl gb obeebj 
 ybna ure gur zbarl lbh pna nssbeq vg 
 fur qbrfag jnaan obeebj gur zbarl 
 bu pzba furyy cnl lbh onpx jungf svir tenaq orgjrra sevraqf 
 bs pbhefr vq cnl lbh onpx 
 lrnu fb jungf gur ceboyrz 
 jub fnvq gurerf n ceboyrz 
 url frr ur fnvq urq ybna lbh gur zbarl
