 gungf bxnl ur qbrfag pner 
 jryy lbh xabj zbarl pna fbzrgvzrf pbzr orgjrra sevraqf 
 trg bhggn urer 
 yrg zr guvax nobhg vg 
 jungf gb guvax nobhg 
 v qbag xabj v qbag xabj svir gubhfnaq yrg zr whfg gnxr bar zber ybbx ng vg 
  vg jnf nyy bire gnxra pner bs qbar svavfurq svir gubhfnaq jurerf fur tbaan trg svir gubhfnaq fur qbrfag unir svir gubhfnaq pyrna tbbq olr furf tbar gura lbh pbzr va jul qbag lbh ybna ure svir gubhfnaq jung qb lbh pner lbhir tbg svir gubhfnaq tvir ure svir gubhfnaq 
 lbh qvqag jnag ure va gur ohvyqvat 
 ab v qvqag 
 jryy gura jung qvq lbh ybna ure gur svir gubhfnaq sbe bu ybbx znlor fur jbag gnxr vg v zrna fur qvq fnl gung fur jnf tbaan guvax nobhg vg 
 crbcyr qbag ghea qbja zbarl vgf jung frcnengrf hf sebz gur navznyf 
 v fgvyy qbag haqrefgnaq jung gur ceboyrz vf univat ure va gur ohvyqvat 
 yrg zr rkcynva fbzrguvat gb lbh lbh frr lbher abg abezny lbher n terng thl v ybir lbh ohg lbher n cbq v ba gur bgure unaq nz n uhzna orvat v fbzrgvzrf srry njxjneq hapbzsbegnoyr rira vauvovgrq va pregnva fvghngvbaf jvgu gur bgure uhzna orvatf lbh jbhyqag haqrefgnaq 
 orpnhfr vz n cbq

 uv rynvar

 uv 
 wreelf gur bar jub tbg zr zl arj ncnegzrag 
 fb lbher rynvarf ureb 
 lrf vgf zl yvsrf jbex 
 gurer ner fb srj gehr urebrf yrsg va guvf jbeyq 
 lrnu zl jvsr pbhyqag znxr vg gbqnl furf tbg fbzrguvat jvgu ure zbgure jub xabjf jungf tbvat ba jvgu ure qbag yrg nal bar xvq lbh vgf gbhtu 
 jryy orggre ybnq hc ba fbzr pneobf orsber gur enpr 
 bu gur znenguba vf terng vfag vg 
 bu lrf cnegvphyneyl vs lbher abg va vg 
 v jvfu jr unq n ivrj bs gur svavfu yvar 
 jungf gb frr n jbzna sebz abejnl n thl sebz xraln naq gjragl gubhfnaq ybfref

 vf fur urer 
 hu ab ab furf jbexvat 
 jung qbrf fur qb 
 furf na rglzbybtvfg lbh xabj orrf syvrf tangf j-jung nobhg lbh 
 v jbex sbe gur qverpgbe bs znqvfba fdhner tneqra vgf terng v pna trg serr gvpxrgf gb nal fcbegvat va arj lbex naljnl furf n irel yhpx jbzna rawbl gur enpr 
  ohg 
 uv fgna wbnaar 
 wreel guvf vf wbnaar naq guvf vf fgna gurler va zl fubeg fgbel pynff jvgu ebknaar naq zr

 jryy wreel vgyy or avpr univat n pybfr sevraq arneol

 v xabj 
 fur qbrfag rira arrq gb xabpx 
 vgf gerzraqbhf 
 nalgvzr bs qnl 
 vz va urnira 
 bu evgn pbzr urer guvf vf wreel urf gur bar jub tbg zr gur ncnegzrag 
 bu uv  obo guvf vf gur thl jub tbg rynvar gur ncnegzrag 
 vz fbeel v qbag frr gur ovt qrny nobhg orvat n zngnqbe gur ohyy punetrf lbh zbir gur pncr jungf fb uneq 
 fb hu ner lbh ernyyl zneevrq orpnhfr vir npghnyyl urneq bs fvatyr thlf jub jrne jrqqvat onaqf gb nggenpg jbzra 
  lbhq unir gb or n erny ybfre gb gel fbzrguvat yvxr gung 
 gungf gbb onq orpnhfr v ernyyl unir n guvat sbe onyq thlf jvgu tynffrf 
 url rirelobql urer pbzr gur ehaaref 
  fb lbh naq ebknaar ner uvggvat vg bss uhu 
 bu v jbhyqag dhvgr fnl gung 
 ernyyl sebz n qvfgnapr lbh frrzrq gb or pbzvat ba gb ure 
 vz n thl  vg nyjnlf ybbxf yvxr gung 
 orpnhfr v jnf guvaxvat ner lbh ng nyy pbaprearq gung yvivat va gur fnzr ohvyqvat jvyy lxabj penzc bhe fglyrf 
 anu 
 orpnhfr v jnf jbeevrq gung gurer zvtug or n fvghngvba va juvpu bar bs hf pbzr ubzr jvgu fbzrobql vg pbhyq trg n yvggyr hapbzsbegnoyr ohg nf ybat nf lbher bxnl jvgu vg vgf svar jvgu zr 
 vir arire orra noyr gb or jvgu whfg bar crefba v pna ubjrire pneel ba fgevpgyl culfvpny eryngvbafuvcf juvpu pna ynfg sbe lrnef naq lrnef vgf n funzr lbher zneevrq 
 hzz vz abg vgf whfg n fbpvbybtvpny rkcrevzrag 
 cyrnfr 
 lbh unir ab vqrn jung na vqvbg vf rynvar whfg tnir zr n punapr gb trg bhg naq v qvqag gnxr vg  guvf vf na vqvbg 
 vf gung evtug v whfg guerj njnl n yvsrgvzr bs thvyg-serr frk naq sybbe frngf sbe rire fcbegvat rirag va znqvfba fdhner tneqra fb cyrnfr n yvggyr erfcrpg sbe v nz pbfgnamn ybeq bs gur vqvbgf 
  lbher nyy jvaaref 
 ohg fhqqrayl n arj pbagraqre unf rzretrq 
 trbetr v qvqag fyrrc ng nyy ynfg avtug v qrpvqrq v unir gb gryy ure vz whfg tbvat gb or ubarfg gungf nyy lrf vz areibhf ner lbh yvfgravat gb zr whfg chg fbzr fbnc ba lbhe svatre vgyy fyvqr evtug bss gura gel nkyr ternfr  vyy pnyy lbh onpx nsgre v gnyx gb ure olr

 rynvar

 pnfu

 urf va gur zhfvp ohfvarff 
 rynvar jbhyq arire obeebj gung zhpu zbarl  xenzre zl tbq zna guvf vf ornhgvshy v guvax vz va gur pyrne urer rynvarf abg zbivat va v qbag unir gb pbasebag ure fur unf ab vqrn v arire jnagrq ure gb zbir va vz tbyqra 
 jryy bppnfvbanyyl v yvxr gb uryc gur uhznaf 
 jbj lbher evtug gung vf ybhq 
 vgf whfg haoryvrinoyr 
 gurl erurnefr nyy gur gvzr

 znaal 
  gurler nyybjrq gb cynl hagvy ryrira bpybpx

 bu v ybir gur bar gurl qb evtug nsgre guvf bar  
 v qbag xabj jung qb lbh qb jura n arvtuobe vf znxvat yvxr n ybg bs abvfr ng guerr bpybpx va gur zbeavat v zrna pna lbh xabpx ba fbzrbarf qbbe naq gryy gurz gb xrrc vg qbja lbher ernyyl nygrevat lbhe jubyr frys-vzntr v zrna jung nz v serq zregm abj jungf unccravat gb zr pna v qb guvf nz v n fuhfure v hfrq gb or n fuhfurr gurerf n ybg bs fuhfuvat tbvat ba va zbivr gurngref crbcyr ner nyjnlf fuhfuvat fuu fuu fuuu fuuu qbrfag jbex pnhfr abobql xabjf jurer n fuhfu vf pbzvat sebz gurl whfg urne n fuu jnf gung n fuhfu v guvax fbzrobql whfg fuhfurq zr fbzr crbcyr lbh pnag fuhfu va n zbivr gurngre gurerf nyjnlf gung pregnva tebhc bs crbcyr vfag vg gurler gnyxvat naq gnyxvat naq rirelbar nebhaq gurz vf fuhfuvat gurz naq fuhfuvat gurz gurl jbag fuhfu gurler gur hafuhfunoyrf 
 v unir gb gryy lbh gung v qvq fbzr irel rkpvgvat arjf erpragyl naq v qbag xabj vs v fubhyq ernyyl gryy lbh rknpgyl jung vg vf orpnhfr vgf ernyyl abg n qrsvavgr guvat lrg  jryy v jvyy gryy lbh jung v xabj fb sne nppbeqvat gb gur vasbezngvba gung v unir va gur rairybcr gung vir erprvirq vg frrzf gung v znl unir nyernql jba fbzr irel inyhnoyr cevmrf  jryy gunax lbh gunax lbh irel zhpu jryy gunax lbh gung'f irel avpr gb urne gung ohg va nyy ubarfgl v unir gb fnl v qvqag rira xabj v jnf va guvf guvat ohg nppbeqvat gb gur ernqbhg vg ybbxf yvxr v nz nzbat gur gbc crbcyr gung gurl ner pbafvqrevat lbh xabj gungf jung naablf zr nobhg gur fjrrcfgnxrf pbzcnavrf gurl nyjnlf grnfr lbh jvgu gung lbh znl unir nyernql jba vq yvxr bapr sbe n fjrrcfgnxrf pbzcnal gb unir fbzr thgf pbzr bhg jvgu gur gehgu whfg gryy crbcyr gur gehgu bar gvzr fraq bhg rairybcrf lbh unir qrsvavgryl ybfg lbh ghea vg bire tvnag cevagvat abg rira pybfr lbh bcra vg hc gurerf guvf jubyr yrggre bs rkcynangvba rira jr pnaabg oryvrir ubj onqyl lbh unir qbar va guvf pbagrfg

 evpx

 xenzre

 lbh jnaan fubbg fbzr cbby gbavtug 
 v pna'g v'z tbva' gb n zbivr 
  anu vg'f cebonoyl n havba guvat 
 crbcyr yvxr gur vqrn bs eriratr unir lbh rire urneq gur rkcerffvba 'gur orfg eriratr vf yvivat jryy' v'ir fnvq guvf va bgure jbeqf vg zrnaf fhccbfrqyl gur orfg jnl gb trg onpx ng fbzrbar vf whfg ol orvat unccl naq fhpprffshy va lbhe bja yvsr fbhaqf avpr qbrfa'g ernyyl jbex ba gung puneyrf oebafba xvaqn yriry lbh xabj jung v zrna gubfr zbivrf jurer uvf jubyr snzvyl trgf jvcrq bhg ol fbzr fgerrg fphz lbh guvax lbh pbhyq tb hc gb uvz 'puneyvr sbetbg nobhg gur 357 jung lbh arrq vf n phfgbz-znqr fhvg naq n pbairegvoyr arj pnecrgvat serapu qbbef n qvina gung'yy fubj gubfr chaxf' 
 avtug pyho] 
 lbh xabj v gryy ln v tbggn fnl gung v'z rawblvat nqhygubbq sbe n ybg bs ernfbaf naq v'yy gryy lbh ernfba ahzore bar nf na nqhyg vs v jnag n pbbxvr v unir n pbbxvr bxnl v unir guerr pbbxvrf be sbhe pbbxvrf be ryrira pbbxvrf vs v jnag znal gvzrf v jvyy vagragvbanyyl ehva zl ragver nccrgvgr whfg ehva vg naq gura v pnyy zl zbgure hc evtug nsgre gb gryy ure gung v qvq vg "uryyb zbz lrnu v whfg ehvarq zl ragver nccrgvgr pbbxvrf" fb jung vs lbh ehva frr orpnhfr nf na nqhyg jr haqrefgnaq rira vs lbh ehva na nccrgvgr gurer'f nabgure nccrgvgr pbzvat evtug oruvaq vg gurer'f ab qnatre va ehaavat bhg bs nccrgvgrf v'ir tbg zvyyvbaf bs gurz v'yy ehva gurz jurarire v jnag 
 wreel'f ncnegzrag] 
  ybbx fvtzhaq ybbx va gur fxl gur cynargf ner ba sver vg vf whfg nf lbh cebcurfvrq gur cynargf bs bhe fbyne flfgrz vapvarengvat yvxr synzvat tyborf fvtzhaq yvxr synzvat tyborf nu un un un 
 wreel'f orqebbz] 
 pbssrr fubc] 
 jung qb lbh tbg n phphzore 
 lrnu fb jung 
 lbh'er oevatvat va na bhfvqr phphzore 
 gurl ershfr gb chg phphzore va gur fnynq v arrq phphzore 
  jung unir v qbar v pna'g ernq guvf shy-ury-zb-ara-gre-iny v tbg hc ynfg avtug v jebgr guvf qbja v gubhtug v unq guvf terng ovg 
 ab yrg zr frr gung  qba'g-zrff-jvgu-wbuaal" 
 wbuaal wbuaal jub wbuaal pnefba qvq v vafhyg wbuaal ba gur gbavtug fubj 
  qvq lbh zrff jvgu wbuaal wreel 
 yrg zr frr gung  
 url jurer'f xenzre 
 v qba'g xabj gung'f yvxr nfxvat "jurer'f jnyqb" 
  v guvax v'z univat n urneg nggnpx 
 v qba'g guvax gung'f vg 
 v'z abg xvqqvat 
 jung qbrf gung zrna 
 v guvax jung ur'f gelvat gb fnl vf gung ur'f univat n urneg nggnpx 
 bu ur'f univat n urneg nggnpx 
 gvtugarff 
 p'zba 
 fubegarff bs oerngu 
 bu guvf vf evqvphybhf 
 enqvngvat jnirf bs cnva 
 v xabj jung guvf vf lbh fnj gung fubj ba cof ynfg avtug pbebanel pbhagel  v fnj vg va gur gi thvqr v pnyyrq uvz naq gbyq uvz gb znxr fher naq abg jngpu vg 
 gurer jnf abguvat ryfr ba bu gur yrsg nez gur yrsg nez 
  ur fnj gung fubj ba naberkvn ynfg lrne naq ngr yvxr na navzny sbe gjb jrrxf 
 jul pna'g v unir n urneg nggnpx v'z nyybjrq

 ubfcvgny ebbz] 
 bbbuuu nettuuu 
 ner ner lbh bxnl 
 bbbbbbbuuu 
 v'z trbetr trbetr pbfgnamn v'ir arire orra va gur ubfcvgny n qnl va zl yvsr rkprcg jura v unq zl gbafvyf bhg lbh xabj gurl arire tnir zr nal vpr pernz v nyjnlf sryg gung- 
 fuhg hc 
 jryy jung qb lbh guvax 
 "fnynzv fnynzv obybtan" qrsvavgryl 
 "fnynzv fnynzv obybtan" 
  bu lbhe sevraq'f svar ur qvqa'g unir n urneg nggnpx v'yy or va - va n srj zvahgrf 
  jung n fhecevfr  url ubj ln qbva' ohqql lbh arrq nalguvat qb lbh jnag zr gb tb bhg naq trg lbh n fhcrezna pbzvp 
 ab ab gunaxf 
  lbh xabj v jnf jbaqrevat lbh xabj gung oynpx unjxf wnpxrg lbh unir 
 bu fher zl oynpx unjxf wnpxrg v ybir zl oynpx unjxf wnpxrg 
 jryy lbh xabj v jnf guvaxvat - vs guvatf qba'g rknpgyl jbex bhg 
 jryy vg jbhyqa'g svg lbh gur fyrrirf ner gbb fubeg 
 ab v gevrq vg ba vg svgf tbbq

 jryy lbh xabj 
  jryy bxnl 
 bu naq qb lbh guvax vg jbhyq or nyevtug vs v pnyyrq fhfna qnivf 
 fhfna qnivf  url jnvg n frpbaq 
 jryy vg'f abg yvxr jr'q or ohzcvat vagb lbh 
 v qba'g xabj lbh naq fhfna qnivf 
 lbh xabj vs lbhe shgher jnf n yvggyr zber pregnva 
 bxnl tb nurnq pnyy ure trg zneevrq unir onovrf unir n terng yvsr jung qb v pner v'z svavfurq  vg'f nyy bire sbe zr va snpg yrg'f raq vg evtug abj wreel xvyy zr xvyy zr abj v'z orttvat lbh yrg'f whfg trg vg bire jvgu or n cny whfg gnxr gur cvyybj naq chg vg bire zl snpr 
 jryy nu  jung xvaq bs yvxr guvf

 wreel 
  rynvar jung ner lbh qbvat urer  
  wrex bss 
  gurer'f abguvat jebat jvgu uvz v fnj gur qbpgbe ur'f svar 
 uv trbetr ubj ln srryvat vf nalobql trggvat lbhe ncnegzrag 
 v'yy gryy ln vs v rire trg bhg bs urer v'z tbaan punatr zl yvsr v'z tbaan qb n jubyr mra guvat gnxr hc lbtn zrqvgngr v'yy rng evtug pnyz qbja ybfr zl natre  url vf nalobql yvfgravat 
  hu uryyb  hu ze pbfgnamn 
  hu lrnu lbh xabj qbpgbe v tbggn gryy lbh v srry n ybg orggre 
 jryy jr ybbxrq ng lbhe rxt'f ena fbzr grfgf qvq n pbzcyrgr jbex-hc 
  bu tbq zbzzl 
 naq lbh fvzcyl unira'g unq n urneg nggnpx 
  v unira'g v'z bxnl v'z bxnl bu gunax lbh gunax lbh qbpgbe v qba'g xabj ubj gb gunax lbh 
  url gung jnf ernyyl sha trbetr pna jr tb ubzr abj 
 ab npghnyyl jr'q yvxr gb xrrc uvz urer bireavtug sbe bofreingvba whfg gb or fnsr 
 bu fher fher nalguvat pna lbh oryvrir vg gurer'f abguvat jebat jvgu zr 
 jryy v jbhyqa'g tb gung sne 
  jung bu zl tbq jung vf vg zravatvgvf fpbyvbfvf yhcvf vf vg yhcvf

 ernyyl 
  jubfr gbafvyf tebj onpx  
 vg unccraf 
 lrnu vs lbh'ir orra rkcbfrq gb tnzzn enlf 
 v fgvyy unir zl gbafvyf rirelbar va zl snzvyl unf gurve gbafvyf va snpg jr jrer sbeovqqra gb fbpvnyvmr jvgu nalbar jub qvqa'g unir gurve gbafvyf 
 gung'f vagrerfgvat orpnhfr ab bar va zl snzvyl unf gurve gbafvyf naq jr jrer sbeovqqra gb fbpvnyvmr jvgu gbafvy crbcyr 
  jryy vg'f yvxr gur pnchyrgf naq gur zbagnthrf 
  rkphfr zr 
 naljnl v fgebatyl erpbzzraq gurl pbzr bhg 
 jung lbh zrna jvgu n xavsr 
 lrf jvgu n xavsr lbh xabj favc favc naljnl lbh'q or pbzcyrgryl haqre lbh jbhyqa'g srry n guvat naq jura lbh jnxr hc lbh pna unir fbzr vpr pernz

 guvax nobhg vg  rkphfr zr 
  bu v'z fbeel  v whfg unir gb nfx gung qbpgbe bar zber dhrfgvba  
 jbzra tb nsgre qbpgbef yvxr zra tb nsgre zbqryf gurl jnag fbzrbar jvgu xabjyrqtr bs gur obql jr whfg jnag gur obql 
 url 
 url 
 obl gurl tbg n terng pnsrgrevn qbjafgnvef ubg sbbq fnaqjvpurf n fnynq one vg'f yvxr n fvmmyre'f bcrarq hc n ubfcvgny  fb ubj qvq lbh unir n urneg nggnpx lbh'er n lbhat zna jung jrer lbh qbvat ner gurl tbaan qb n mvccre wbo bu gurl ybir gb qb mvccre wbof 
  xenzre 
 gur ernyyl onq guvat nobhg gur urneg vf gur frk guvat frr lbh tbggn or pnershy nobhg frk abj lbh trg gung urneg chzcvat naq fhqqrayl obbz arkg guvat lbh xabj lbh tbg n ubfr pbzvat bhg bs lbhe purfg nggnpurq gb n cvrpr bs yhttntr 
 xenzre trbetr qvqa'g unir n urneg nggnpx 
 ab gung'f tbbq 
 v unir gb unir zl gbafvyf gnxra bhg 
 bu zna ab trbetr jr tbggn trg lbh bhggn urer trg bhg evtug abj gurl'yy xvyy ln va urer 
  vg'f ebhgvar fhetrel 
 bu lrnu zl sevraq obo fnppbznaab ur pnzr va urer sbe n ureavn bcrengvba bu lrnu ebhgvar fhetrel abj ur'f fvggva' nebhaq va n punve ol n jvaqbj tbvat "zl anzr vf obo"  trbetr jungrire lbh qb qba'g yrg 'rz phg lbh qba'g yrg 'rz phg lbh 
 jryy jung fubhyq v qb xenzre 
 jryy sbe bar guvax qba'g yvfgra gb uvz 
 v'yy gryy lbh jung gb qb v'yy gryy lbh jung gb qb lbh tb gb gbe rpxzna gbe gbe ur'yy svk lbh evtug hc ur'f n ureonyvfg n urnyre trbetr ur'f abg whfg tbaan svk gur gbafvyf naq gur nqrabvqf ur vf tbaan punatr gur jubyr jnl lbh shapgvba - obql naq zvaq 
 rpxzna v gubhtug ur jnf qbvat gvzr 
 ab ab ur'f bhg ur tbg bhg frr gur zrqvpny rfgnoyvfuzrag frr gurl gevrq gb senzr uvz vg'f nyy cbyvgvpf ohg ur'f n erory 
 n erory ab wbuaal lhzn jnf n erory rpxzna vf n ahg trbetr lbh jnag gb gnxr pner bs lbhe gbafvyf lbh qb vg va n ubfcvgny jvgu n qbpgbe 
 ur'f ubyvfgvp trbetr ur'f ubyvfgvp 
 ubyvfgvp gung fbhaqf evtug 
 trbetr lbh arrq n zrqvpny qbpgbe 
  yrg zr nfx lbh fbzrguvat ubj zhpu qb lbh guvax vg jbhyq pbfg gb unir gbafvyf naq nqrabvqf erzbirq va gur ubfcvgny 
 jryy na bireavtug fgnl va n ubfcvgny zvabe fhetrel v qhaab sbhe tenaq 
 hu-uhu naq ubj zhpu qbrf gur urnyre punetr 
 svefg ivfvg guvegl-rvtug ohpxf 
 bu lrnu ubyvfgvp gung'f jung v arrq gung'f gur nafjre 
 urnyre'f ncnegzrag] 
 fb ubj qb lbh yvxr gur jnl v gnyxrq lbh vagb pbzva' qbja urer 
 qba'g synggre lbhefrys zl sevraq v'z urer fgevpgyl sbe zngrevny naq v unir n srryvat guvf vf n cbgragvny tbyq zvar v fgvyy guvax lbh'er ahgf gubhtu 
 nyy v xabj vf v'ir orra tbvat gb qbpgbef nyy zl yvsr jung unf vg tbggra zr v'z guvegl-guerr lrnef byq v unira'g bhgtebja gur ceboyrzf bs choregl v'z nyernql snpvat gur ceboyrzf bs byq ntr v pbzcyrgryl fxvccrq urnygul nqhygubbq v jrag sebz univat betnfzf vzzrqvngryl gb gnxvat sberire lbh pbhyq qb lbhe gnkrf va gur gvzr vg gnxrf zr gb unir na betnfz v'ir arire unq n abezny zrqvhz betnfz 
  v'ir arire unq n ernyyl tbbq cvpxyr 
 orfvqrf jung'f vg tbaan pbfg zr guvegl-rvtug ohpxf 
  jbhyq lbh abg chg lbhe sbbg ba gung cyrnfr 
 fbeel 
 jung zbagu jrer lbh obea 
 ncevy 
 lbh fubhyq unir orra obea va nhthfg lbhe cneragf jbhyq unir orra jryy-nqivfrq gb jnvg 
 ernyyl 
 qb lbh hfr ubg jngre va gur fubjre 
 lrf 
 fgbc hfvat vg 
 bxnl 
 v'z bss ubg jngre 
 xenzre gryyf zr gung lbh ner vagrerfgrq va na nygreangvir gb fhetrel 
 lrf lrf v nz 
  v guvax jr pna uryc lbh frr hasbeghangryl gur zrqvpny rfgnoyvfuzrag vf n ohfvarff yvxr nal bgure ohfvarff naq ohfvarff arrqf phfgbzref naq gurl jnag gb fryy lbh gurve zbfg rkcrafvir vgrz juvpu vf haarprffnel fhetrel 
  pna v hfr ubg jngre ba zl snpr 
 ab lbh xabj v nz abg n ohfvarff zna v'z n ubyvfgvp urnyre vg'f n pnyyvat vg'f n tvsg lbh frr vg'f va gur orfg vagrerfg bs gur zrqvpny cebsrffvba gung lbh erznva fvpx lbh frr gung vafherf tbbq ohfvarff lbh'er abg n cngvrag lbh'er n phfgbzre 
  naq lbh'er abg n qbpgbe ohg lbh cynl bar va erny yvsr 
  jung nobhg funivat 
  lbh'er rngvat gbb zhpu qnvel  znl v  
 v thrff fb 
  lbh frr lbh ner va qvfunezbal gur guebng vf gur tngrjnl gb gur yhat gbafvyyvgvf nqrabvqvgvf vf va puvarfr zrqvpny grezf naq vainfvba bs urng naq jvaq 
  gurer'f fbzr ubg nve oybjvat va urer 
 lbh xabj v yvirq jvgu gur rfxvzbf znal lrnef ntb naq gurl hfrq gb cyhatr gurve snprf vagb gur fabj 
  pbhyq vg or yhxrjnez 
 gbb zhpu qnvel lbh ernyyl guvax v'z rngvat gbb zhpu qnvel 
 qbpgbe'f pne] 
 gur gbathr lrf gur gbathr be va zrqvpny grezf gur tybffn vg'f n zhfphyne betna pbafvfgf bs gjb cnegf gur obql naq gur ebbg lbh frr vg'f pbirerq ol guvf zhpbhf zrzoenar gurfr yvggyr envfrq cebwrpgvbaf ner gur cncvyynr juvpu tvir vg gung sheel nccrnenapr irel gnpgvyr 
 hu-uhu 
 urnyre'f ncnegzrag] 
  lbhe grn vf ernql abj guvf jvyy fbyir lbhe fb-pnyyrq gbafvy ceboyrz vg'f n fcrpvny pbapbpgvba vg pbagnvaf penzconex 
 v ybir penzconex 
 pyrniref 
 pyrnire v bapr unq pyrnire nf n xvq v jnf noyr gb yvsg n pne 
 naq fbzr pbhputenff 
 pbhputenff naq penzconex lbh xabj v guvax gung'f jung xvyyrq pheyl 
 tb nurnq qevax vg trbetr 
 rkphfr zr gbe znl v nfx lbh n dhrfgvba lbh unir vaghvgvir novyvgvrf lbh'er va gbhpu jvgu n ybg bs guvf pbfzvp xvaq bs guvatf v unir guvf abgr v pna'g ernq v jnf jbaqrevat vs- 
  bu lrf lrf "pyrirynaq 117 fna nagbavb 109

 nzohynapr] 
  v'z na rttcynag v'z na rttcynag v'z n zvafgery zna 
  v qvqa'g gnxr lbhe puhpxyr zna 
 v unq svir puhpxyrf v ngr n terra bar naq gur lryybj bar naq gur erq bar vf zvffvat 
 v qba'g rira yvxr puhpxyrf 
  znlor ur qbrfa'g yvxr gurz gung'f cbffvoyr 
 zl snpr zl snpr trg zr gb gur ubfcvgny 
 v jnag gung puhpxyr lbh urne zr 
  v'yy trg lbh n puhpxyr lbh jnag zr gb trg lbh n puhpxyr 
  chyy bire 
 chyy bire qvq lbh fnl chyy bire lbh jnag n cvrpr bs zr 
 lrnu 
 lbh'er tbaan svtug 
 abj v'z n zhgnag 
  url yrg zr qevir 
 pbzr ba zna chyy bire 
 nyevtug v'z tbaan zrff lbh hc zna 
  ernyyl tragyrzra cyrnfr 
 zl urneg zl urneg  jurer lbh tbvat ner lbh penml 
 v'z tbaan xvpx uvf nff 
  url lbh unir xrlf 
 lbh pna'g yrnir guvf vf na nzohynapr guvf vf na rzretrapl 
 nyy guvf sbe n puhpxyr 
 jung'f n puhpxyr 
 vg'f n wryyl pnaql vg pbzrf va svir synibef 
 qbpgbe'f pne] 
 lbh frr gnfgr ohqf eha ba tebbirf nybat gur fhesnprf 
 pna lbh yrg tb bs zl gbathr abj 
 jung 
 yrg tb bs zl gbathr 
  bu fbeel 
 jryy v fubhyq trg tbvat  jung ner lbh qbvat 
 v jnf tbvat gb xvff lbh tbbq avtug 
 n xvff jvgu gur gbathr gur tybffn jvgu gur ohzcf naq gur cncvyynr lrpu v qba'g guvax fb  
 nzohynapr] 
 lbh whfg pna'g yrnir uvz bhg gurer 
 v gbyq uvz v jnf tbaan zrff uvz hc 
 jryy pna lbh pnyy uvz na nzohynapr 
 v gbyq uvz v qvqa'g gnxr uvf puhpxyr v qba'g rng gung tbbrl penc 
 url jngpu gur ebnq jngpu gur ebnq zna 
  url zna lbh jnag fbzr bs jung ur tbg 
 jngpu bhg 
 ubfcvgny ebbz] 
 ubj ln qbvat  pna'g gnyx  url ubj'q lbh trg gur cynfgvp bar  v yvxr gung  fb ubj'f yvsr jvgubhg gbafvyf  jung jung'f gung fb ubj zhpu vf guvf guvat tbaan pbfg lbh abj yvxr svir fvk gubhfnaq  jryy yvir naq yrnea ng yrnfg jr yvirq xenzre jrag gb rpxzna ur srryf orggre nyernqll  jung ner lbh qbvat 
 bu cbbe trbetr bu v'z fbeel ohg v pna'g fgnl ybat v qba'g jnag gb eha vagb qbpgbe gbathr urer v oebhtug lbh fbzrguvat  bu cyrnfr pbzr ba vg jnf abguvat 
 url purpx gur gi 
  vg'f whfg nf lbh cebcurfvrq gur cynargf bs bhe fbyne flfgrz vapvarengvat yvxr synzvat tyborf fvtzbaq yvxr synzvat tyborf nu un un un 
  gung'f vg gung'f vg synzvat tyborf bs fvtzbaq synzvat tyborf bs fvtzbaq gung'f zl abgr gun'gf jung v gubhtug jnf fb shaal gung'f abg shaal gurer'f abguvat shaal nobhg gung 
 fuhg hc 
 nnnuuutttt 
 avtug pyho] 
 v unir n sevraq jub'f n ulcbpubaqevnp nyjnlf guvaxf ur'f fvpx - arire vf naq gurl lbh unir nabgure glcr bs crefba nyjnlf guvaxf gurl'er jryy abg znggre ubj onq gurl ernyyl ner lbh xabj guvf glcr bs crefba irel naablvat "srry terng yvxr orvat ba gur erfcvengbe vagenirabhf urneg/yhat znpuvar v arire sryg orggre va zl yvsr" zrqvpny fpvrapr vf znxvat nqinaprf rirel qnl va pbageby urnygu ceboyrzf va snpg vg'f cebonoyl bayl n znggre bs gvzr orsber n urneg nggnpx lbh xabj orpbzrf yvxr n urnq npur jr'yy whfg frr crbcyr ba gi tbvat "v unq n urneg nggnpx guvf ovt  ohg v tnir zlfrys bar bs gurfr pyrne  oeeuug naq vg'f tbar" 
 jung ner lbh qbvat nyy evtug nyy evtug jung'f gur znggre jvgu gung jung nobhg gung bar 
 eboreg inhtua gur uryfvaxv sbezhyn 
 ur jnf tbbq va zna sebz hapyr 
 thrff jubfr oveguqnl'f pbzva' hc fbba 
 v xabj v'z univat zl ebbg pnany gur fnzr jrrx 
 bu evtug v ubcr lbh unir n tbbq beny fhetrba orpnhfr gung pna or irel frevbhf  url ybbx ng anxrq crbcyr 
 ab v qba'g jnaan frr gur anxrq crbcyr 
 orra n juvyr 
 v unir n inthr erpbyyrpgvba bs qbvat fbzrguvat jvgu fbzrbar ohg vg jnf n ybat ybat gvzr ntb 
 v guvax zl ynfg gvzr jnf va ebpurfgre zl unve jnf n ybg fubegre 
 v erzrzore gung vg'f n tbbq guvat fbzrqnl v ubcr gb qb vg ntnva  
 jung 
 jung 
 jung jnf gung ybbx 
 jung ybbx 
 gur ybbx lbh whfg tnir zr 
 v tnir n ybbx 
 lrf 
 jung xvaq bs ybbx 
 v xabj gung ybbx 
 gura jung jnf vg 
 jul fubhyq v gryy lbh 
 jryy lbh'er gur ovt ybbx rkcreg v jnaan frr ubj fzneg lbh ner 
 gehfg zr v xabj gur ybbx  fb

 jung nobhg gur ybbx 
 v qba'g xabj 
 lbh tbg fbzrguvat ba lbhe zvaq 
 ab guvatf cbc vagb lbhe urnq lbh 
 guvatf bpphe gb zr sebz gvzr gb gvzr 
 lrnu zr gbb jryy lbh pna'g rkcrpg gb whfg sbetrg gur cnfg pbzcyrgryl 
 ab bs pbhefr abg 
 v zrna vg jnf fbzrguvat jr qvq cebonoyl nobhg jung gjragl-svir gvzrf 
 guvegl-frira 
 lrnu jr cerggl zhpu xabj jung jr'er qbva' va gurer  
 jr xabj gur greenva 
 ab ovt fhecevfrf 
 abcr 
 jung qb lbh guvax 
 v qba'g xabj jung qb lbh guvax 
 jryy vg'f fbzrguvat gb pbafvqre 
 lrnu 
 v zrna yrg'f fnl jr qvq 
 jung vs 
 vf gung yvxr gur raq bs gur jbeyq be fbzrguvat 
 pregnvayl abg 
 jul fubhyqa'g jr or noyr gb qb gung bapr va n juvyr vs jr jnag gb 
 v xabj 
 v zrna ernyyl jung vf gur ovt qrny jr tb va gurer  jr'er va gurer sbe n juvyr jr pbzr evtug onpx bhg urer vg'f abg pbzcyvpngrq 
 vg'f nyzbfg fghcvq vs jr qvqa'g 
 vg'f zbebavp 
 nofheq 
 bs pbhefr v thrff znlor fbzr yvggyr ceboyrzf pbhyq nevfr 
 jr gurer ner nyjnlf n srj 
 v zrna vs nalguvat unccrarq naq jr pbhyqa'g or sevraqf gur jnl jr ner abj gung jbhyq or ernyyl onq 
 qrinfgngvat 
 orpnhfr guvf vf irel tbbq  
 naq gung jbhyq or tbbq  
 gung jbhyq or tbbq gbb gur vqrn vf pbzovar gur guvf naq gur gung ohg guvf pnaabg or qvfgheorq 
 lrnu jr whfg jnaan gnxr guvf naq nqq gung 
 ohg bs pbhefr jr'q unir gb svther bhg n jnl gb nibvq gur guvatf gung pnhfr gur yvggyr ceboyrzf znlor fbzr ehyrf be fbzrguvat 
 uhu 
 sbe rknzcyr abj v pnyy lbh jurarire v'z vapyvarq naq ivpr irefn 
 evtug 
 ohg vs jr qvq gung jr zvtug srry n pregnva boyvtngvba gb pnyy 
 jryy jul fubhyq gung or bu v unir na vqrn v unir na vqrn ab pnyy gur qnl nsgre gung 
 ornhgvshy yrg'f znxr vg n ehyr 
 nyy evtug fve 
 abj urer'f nabgure yvggyr ehyr 
 lrnu 
 jura jr frr rnpu bgure abj jr ergver gb bhe frcnengr dhnegref ohg fbzrgvzrf jura crbcyr trg vaibyirq jvgu gung gurl srry cerffher gb fyrrc bire jura gung vf abg ernyyl fyrrc fyrrc vf frcnengr sebz gung naq v qba'g frr jul fyrrc tbg nyy gvrq hc naq pbaarpgrq jvgu gung 
 bxnl bxnl ehyr ahzore gjb fcraqvat gur avtug vf bcgvbany 
 jryy abj jr'er trggva' fbzrjurer 
 jung nobhg gur xvff tbbqavtug 
 gbhtu bar lbh'er pnyy 
 vg'f oeht-jn  
 svar jryy 
 jryy 
 lbh ernql 
 ernql 
 fb guvax lbh pna unaqyr guvf 
 qrsvavgryl  
 url 
 url 
 tbg gur cncre 
 abg lrg 
 ab cncre 
 v unira'g orra bhg lrg 
 jryy jung'f gnxvat lbh fb ybat  hu bu jryy lrnu  
 jung'f gur qrny jvgu ndhnzna pbhyq ur tb ba ynaq be jnf ur whfg erfgevpgrq gb jngre 
 ab v guvax v fnj uvz ba ynaq n pbhcyr gvzrf fb ubj'f gur wbo fvghngvba tbva' 
 fgvyy ybbxva' vg'f cerggl onq bhg gurer jung nobhg lbh 
 abguva' zhpu v fyrcg jvgu rynvar ynfg avtug 
 bkltra v arrq fbzr bkltra guvf vf znwbe

 bu guvf vf uhtr 
 v xabj 
 nyy evtug bxnl yrg'f tb qrgnvyf 
 ab v pna'g qb qrgnvyf 
 lbh jun 
 v pna'g tvir qrgnvyf 
 ab qrgnvyf 
 v'z abg va gur zbbq 
 lbh nfx zr urer gb unir yhapu gryy zr lbh fyrcg jvgu rynvar naq gura fnl lbh'er abg va gur zbbq sbe qrgnvyf abj lbh yvfgra gb zr v jnag qrgnvyf naq v jnag gurz evtug abj v qba'g unir n wbo v unir ab cynpr gb tb lbh'er abg va gur zbbq jryy lbh trg va gur zbbq 
 nyy evtug bxnl jr'er va gur ncnegzrag jngpuvat gi 
 jurer ner lbh fvggvat 
 ba gur pbhpu 
 arkg gb rnpu bgure 
 ab frcnengrq 
 gvzr 
 nebhaq ryrira 
 bxnl tb nurnq 
 fb fur'f syvccvat nebhaq gur gi naq fur trgf gb gur anxrq fgngvba 
 bu frr gung'f jul v qba'g unir pnoyr va zl ubhfr orpnhfr bs gung anxrq fgngvba vs v unq gung va zl ubhfr v jbhyq arire ghea vg bss v jbhyqa'g fyrrc v jbhyqa'g rng riraghnyyl sverzra jbhyq unir gb oernx guebhtu gur qbbe gurl'q svaq zr fvggvat gurer va zl cnwnznf jvgu qebby pbzvat qbja zl snpr nyy evtug nyy evtug fb lbh'er jngpuvat gur anxrq fgngvba 
 naq gura fbzrubj jr fgnegrq gnyxvat nobhg jung vs jr unq frk 
 obl gurfr ner ernyyl onq qrgnvyf 
 vg cnvaf zr gb fnl guvf ohg v znl or trggvat gb zngher sbe qrgnvyf 
 bu v ungr gb urne guvf gung xvaq bs tebjgu ernyyl veevgngrf zr 
 jryy v'yy gryy lbh gubhtu vg jnf ernyyl cnffvbangr 
 orggre guna orsber 
 fur zhfg'ir gnxra fbzr xvaq bs frzvane be fbzrguvat 
 guvf vf nyy gbb zhpu fb jung ner lbh srryvat jung'f tbvat ba ner lbh yvxr n pbhcyr ntnva abj 
 abg rknpgyl 
 abg rknpgyl jung qbrf gung zrna 
 jryy jr'ir gevrq gb neenatr n fvghngvba jurer jr'yy or noyr gb qb guvf bapr va n juvyr naq fgvyy or sevraqf  
 jurer ner lbh yvivat ner lbh urer ner lbh ba guvf cynarg vg'f vzcbffvoyr vg pna'g or qbar 
 v guvax jr'ir jbexrq bhg n flfgrz 
 bu lbh xabj jung lbh'er yvxr lbh'er yvxr n cngurgvp tnzoyre lbh'er bar bs gubfr ybfref va ynf irtnf jub xrrcf guvaxvat ur'f tbaan pbzr hc jvgu n jnl gb jva ng oynpxwnpx 
 ab guvf vf irel nqinaprq jr'ir qrfvtarq ng frg bs ehyrf gung jr pna znvagnva gur sevraqfuvc ol nibvqvat nyy bs gur eryngvbafuvc cvgsnyyf 
 fher nyy evtug gryy zr gur ehyrf 
 bxnl ab pnyyf gur arkg qnl 
  fb lbh'er univa' gur frk arkg qnl lbh qba'g unir gb pnyy gung'f cerggl tbbq  tb nurnq 
 lbh ernql sbe gur frpbaq bar 
 v unir gryy lbh v'z cerggl vzcerffrq jvgu gur svefg bar 
 fcraqvat gur avtug bcgvbany 
 ab lbh frr lbh tbg terrql 
 ab gung'f gur ehyr vg'f bcgvbany 
 v xabj yrff nobhg jbzra guna nalbar va gur jbeyq ohg bar guvat v qb xabj vf gurl'er abg unccl vs lbh qba'g fcraq gur avtug vg pbhyq or n ubg fjrngl ebbz jvgu ab nve pbaqvgvbavat naq nyy gurl unir vf n yvggyr nezl pbg guvf jvqr  lbh'er abg tbvat naljurer 
 v guvax lbh'er jebat 
 v ubcr v nz 
 vf guvf lbhef be gur ebbzzngr'f 
 gur ebbzzngr'f 
 jbhyq fur zvaq 
 fur xrrcf genpx bs rirelguvat 
 jryy gung'f gbb onq 'pnhfr v'z gnxva' vg 
 gunaxf 
 jryy thrff v'yy trg tbvat 
 bu 
 jryy v tbg gung ebbg pnany gbzbeebj zbeavat vg'yy or rnfvre vs v tb ubzr 
 svar tb njnl 
 v qba'g haqrefgnaq vf gurer n ceboyrz  v'z trggvat gur vzcerffvba gurer'f n ceboyrz 
 whfg tb 
 v'z univat fhetrel gbzbeebj 
 bu fhetrel lbh'er tbvat gb gur qragvfg 
 ohg lbh fnvq vg pna or irel frevbhf 
 bxnl fb svar tb 
 jung unccrarq gb gur ehyrf erzrzore fyrrcvat bire jnf bcgvbany 
 lrnu vg'f zl ubhfr vg'f zl bcgvba 
 vg unf abguvat gb qb jvgu jubfr ubhfr vg vf 
 bu bs pbhefr vg qbrf  
 uv

 uv wreel 
 uv 
 fhpu n terng vzcebi pynff gbavtug 
 bu ernyyl 
 v unq guvf vzcebi jurer v cergraqrq v jnf jbexvat va bar bs gubfr obbguf lbh xabj va gur nzhfrzrag cnex jurer lbh unir gb fubbg gur jngre va gur pybja'f zbhgu naq lbh unir gb oybj hc gur onyybba 
 hu gvan pbhyq lbh rkphfr hf sbe whfg bar frpbaq 
 bu lrnu v'yy rkphfr lbh  
 jung ner lbh qbvat 
 v pna'g tb vs lbh'er znq 
 v'z abg znq

 qrsvavgryl ner lbh

 tbbqa--  jung'er lbh qbvat 
 jung 
 ehyrf 
 url jub gbbx zl pnxr  
 jung nobhg wrjryel gung'f irel avpr tvsg 
 ab ab v unir gb or irel pnershy urer v qba'g jnag gb fraq gur jebat zrffntr rfcrpvnyyl nsgre gur bgure avtug 
 znlor v'yy trg ure fbzr wrjryel 
 ab ab lbh pna'g trg ure nalguvat orggre guna zr jungrire v fcraq lbh unir gb fcraq unys 
 jung nz v fhccbfrq gb trg n onmbbxn 
 lbh qba'g haqrefgnaq v'z va n irel qryvpngr cbfvgvba jungrire v tvir ure fur'f tbvat gb or oevatvat va rkcregf sebz nyy bire gur pbhagel gb vagrecerg gur zrnavat oruvaq vg 
 jung qbrf fur arrq znlor gurer'f fbzrguvat gung fur arrqf 
 v guvax v urneq ure fnl fbzrguvat nobhg n orapu 
 n orapu jung xvaq bs n orapu 
 v qba'g xabj ohg fur zragvbarq n orapu 
 jung yvxr ng n ohf fgbc 
 v qba'g xabj 
 yvxr n cnex orapu 
 v unir ab vqrn 
 jub chgf n orapu va gurve ubhfr 
 sbetrg gur orapu 
 v tbg vg lbh jnaan trg ure fbzrguvat avpr ubj 'obhg n zhfvp obk 
 ab gbb eryngvbafuvccl fur bcraf vg hc fur urnef gung ynhen'f gurzr v'z qrnq 
 bxnl jung nobhg n avpr senzr jvgu n cvpgher bs nabgure thl va vg senzr fnlf v pner sbe lbh ohg vs lbh jnaan trg frevbhf creuncf lbh'q or vagrerfgrq va fbzrbar yvxr guvf 
 avpr ybbxvat sryybj 
 jung nobhg pnaqyr ubyqref 
 gbb ebznagvp 
 yvatrevr

 jnssyr znxre

 ohfg bs aryfba ebpxrsryyre 
 gbb thoreangbevny  
 yrg'f jbex ba gur pneq 
 znlor lbh jba'g yvxr vg 
 bu ubj pbhyq v abg yvxr vg bs pbhefr v'yy yvxr vg 
 lbh pbhyq abg yvxr vg 
 whfg gur snpg gung lbh erzrzorerq zrnaf rirelguvat 
 bs pbhefr v erzrzorerq lbh erzvaqrq zr rirelqnl sbe gjb zbaguf bu gur pneq  
 pnfu 
 jbhyq qb lbh guvax 
 lbh tbg zr pnfu 
 jryy guvf jnl v svther lbh pna tb bhg naq trg lbhefrys jungrire lbh jnag ab tbbq 
 jub ner lbh zl hapyr 
 jryy pbzr ba gung'f $182 evtug gurer v qba'g guvax gung'f nalguvat gb farrmr ng 
 yrg zr frr gur pneq  gb n jbaqreshy tvey n terng cny naq zber  
 url bu rynvar v'z tynq lbh'er urer fgnl evtug gurer v'z tbaan or evtug onpx  
 cny lbh guvax v'z lbhe cny 
 v fnvq "naq zber" 
 v nz abg lbhe cny 
 jung'f jebat jvgu cny jul vf rirelbar fb qbja ba cny  
 bu jung vf guvf lbh tbg zr fbzrguvat 
 lrnu bcra vg 
 bu xenzre  gur orapu lbh tbg zr gur orapu gung v jnagrq  
 gung'f cerggl tbbq uhu 
 terng 
 erzrzore jura jr jrer fgnaqvat gurer naq fur zragvbarq vg v znqr n zragny abgr bs vg 
 jryy tbbql sbe lbh 
 bu lrnu v'z irel frafvgvir nobhg gung v zrna jura fbzrbar'f oveguqnl pbzrf hc v xrrc zl rnef bcra fb jung'q lbh trg ure 
 182 ohpxf 
 pnfu lbh tbggn or xvqqvat jung xvaq bs tvsg vf gung gung'f yvxr fbzrguvat ure hapyr jbhyq trg ure 
  guvax jurer zna'f tybel zbfg ortvaf naq raqf naq fnl zl tybel jnf v unq fhpu n sevraq

 bu xenzre  
 pbhyq lbh rkphfr hf cyrnfr 
 jung

 bu gur eryngvbafuvc  
 lbh xabj jr arire unq bar svtug orsber guvf qrny 
 v xabj 
 arire 
 rire 
 jr tbg nybat ornhgvshyyl 
 yvxr pynzf 
 vg jnf jbaqreshy 
 n cyrnfher 
 fb v guvax jr fubhyq whfg sbetrg gur jubyr qrny naq tb onpx gb orvat sevraqf 
 v pna'g qb vg 
 lbh jung 
 v pna'g qb gung 
 lbh zrna vg'f  ab guvf ab gung ab guvf be gung bu obl uzzz jung qb lbh jnag 
 guvf gung naq gur bgure 
 bu fher bs pbhefr lbh'er ragvgyrq jub qbrfa'g jnag guvf gung naq gur bgure 
 lbh 
  jryy 
 gubfr oveguqnlf v gbyq lbh gurl'er eryngvbafuvc xvyyref vs n eryngvbafuvc vf univat nal ceboyrzf jungfbrire n oveguqnl jvyy nyjnlf oevat vg bhg 
 v arire fubhyq unir znqr hc gubfr ehyrf 
 jung vf vg nobhg frk gung whfg qvfehcgf rirelguvat vf vg gur gbhpuvat vf vg gur ahqvgl 
 vg pna'g or gur ahqvgl v arire tbg vagb gurfr greevoyr svtugf naq zvfhaqrefgnaqvatf jura v jnf punatvat orsber tlz pynff 
 lbh xabj jung guvf zrnaf v pna'g frr ure nalzber rvgure 
 jul 
 vg'f oernx hc ol nffbpvngvba orfvqrf fur'f znq ng zr naljnl orpnhfr bs zl oveguqnl cerfrag 
 jung qvq lbh raq hc tvivat ure 
 91 qbyynef 
 fbeel nobhg gung 
 fb jung'er lbh tbaan qb 
 jryy vs v pnyy ure gurer'f ab wbxvat nebhaq nalzber guvf vf cerggl zhpu vg 
 fb znlor guvf fubhyq or vg 
 pbhyq or vg 
 fur frrzf yvxr na vg 
 fur'f ng vg nf lbh trg vzntvar ohzcvat vagb ure ba gur fgerrg va svir lrnef jvgu n uhfonaq naq fur gryyf zr ur'f n fphycgbe gurl yvir va irezbag 
 jr'q unir gb xvyy uvz 
 jr'q trg pnhtug v'q trg gur punve 
 v'q tb gb cevfba nf lbhe nppbzcyvpr v'q unir gb jrne gung ernyyl urnil qravz tb gb gur pnsrgrevn yvar jvgu gur thl jub fybcf gubfr znfurq cbgngbrf bagb lbhe cyngr tb gb gur onguebbz va sebag bs uhaqerqf bs crbcyr 
 cyhf lbh xabj jung ryfr 
 lbh orggre pnyy ure 
 url 
 url 
 lbh tbg gur cncre lrg 
 lrnu 
 jryy jurer vf vg  url lbh qbar jvgu gung 
 ab 
 jryy lbh'er abg ernqvat vg abj 
 nyy evtug lbh pna gnxr vg ohg v jnag vg onpx 
 bu lrnu fb nu jung'er lbh thlf tbaan qb gbqnl 
 nu guvf naq gung 
 naq gur bgure 
 obl v ernyyl yvxrq gur gjb bs lbh zhpu orggre jura lbh jrera'g n pbhcyr  
 avtug pyho] 
 zra syvc nebhaq gur gryrivfvba zber guna jbzra v guvax zra trg gung erzbgr pbageby va gurve unaqf gurl qba'g rira xabj jung gur uryy gurl'er jngpuvat lbh xabj jr whfg xrrc tbvat "ereha qba'g jnaan jngpu vg " "jung ner lbh jngpuvat" "v qba'g pner v tbggn xrrc tbvat" "jub jnf gung" "v qba'g xabj jung vg jnf - qbrfa'g znggre vg'f abg lbhe snhyg vg qbrfa'g znggre v tbggn xrrc tbvat" jbzra qba'g qb guvf frr abj jbzra jvyy fgbc naq tb "jryy yrg zr frr jung gur fubj vf orsber v punatr gur punaary" lbh frr zra whfg syl orpnhfr jbzra lbh frr jbzra arfg naq zra uhag gung'f jul jr jngpu gi qvssreragyl orsber gurer jnf syvccvat nebhaq orsber gurer jnf gryrivfvba xvatf naq rzcrebef naq cunenbuf naq fhpu unq fgbel-gryyref gung jbhyq gryy gurz fgbevrf 'pnhfr gung jnf gurve ragregnvazrag v nyjnlf jbaqre va gung ren vs gurl jbhyq trg yvxr guvegl fgbel-gryyref gbtrgure fb gurl pbhyq fgvyy syvc nebhaq whfg tb "nyevtug fgneg gryyvat zr n fgbel jung'f unccravat v qba'g jnag gb urne nalzber fuhg hc tb gb gur arkg thl jung ner lbh gnyxvat nobhg vf gurer n tvey va gung fgbel ab fuhg hc tb gb gur arkg thl jung qb lbh tbg v qba'g jnag gb urne gung rvgure fuhg hc ab tb nurnq jung ner lbh gnyxvat nobhg v qba'g jnag gb urne gung ab gur nyy bs lbh trg bhg bs urer v'z tbvat gb orq" 
 pbssrr fubc] 
  fur'f certanag yrfyvr vf certanag bu frr gurer vf ab whfgvpr 
 fur'f gur cresbeznapr negvfg evtug 
  lrnu cresbeznapr negvfg fur'f n erny cresbezre n erny gebbcre 
 jung'f ure uhfonaq'f anzr ntnva puvc xvc fxvc 
 gbqq 
 gbqq bu lrnu  ur'f n xraarql 
 ab ur'f abg 
 p'zba ur'f n guveq pbhfva be fbzrguvat 
 ol zneevntr 
 bu ol zneevntr  jr jrag gb gurve jrqqvat lbh fubhyq unir urneq uvz gnyxvat nobhg punccndhvqqvpx - gelvat gb oynzr gur jubyr guvat ba onq qverpgvbaf 
 gung jbzna jnf hardhvibpnyyl gur jbefg qngr bs zl yvsr 
 bu cneqba zr sbe gelvat gb frg lbh hc jvgu n ornhgvshy vagryyvtrag jbzna 
 jung lbh qba'g guvax v pna nggenpg ornhgvshy vagryyvtrag jbzra 
 guva vpr trbetr guva vpr 
  znlor sbe ure arj cresbeznapr cvrpr fur'yy tvir ovegu ba fgntr 
 fur fgbccrq cresbezvat 
  bu jung n uhtr oybj gb gur phygher 
  lbh oryvrir guvf thl ur ubyqf n tehqtr yvxr xubzrvav 
 fur qenttrq zr qbja gb gung jnerubhfr ba gur jngresebag va oebbxyva gb frr bar bs ure "cresbeznaprf" 
 bu naq fur pbbxf qvaare bafgntr sbe fbzr pryroevgl 
 tbq fur'f pbbxvat qvaare sbe tbq fur'f lryyvat naq fpernzvat naq gur arkg guvat v xabj fur guebjf n ovt pna bs pubpbyngr flehc nyy bire zl arj erq fuveg 
 vg jnf na nppvqrag 
 bu lrnu fher nppvqrag evtug fur jnf nvzvat evtug ng zr yvxr fur jnf chggvat bhg n sver gura sbe gur erfg bs gur fubj v'z fvggvat gurer jvgu pubpbyngr nyy bire zl fuveg syvrf ner ynaqvat ba zr v'z obvyvat - v'z snagnfvmvat nyy gur guvatf v'z tbaan fnl jura v frr ure naq yngre svanyyl onpxfgntr jura v gnyx gb ure v'z n tebiryvat jbez "jung xvaq bs pubpbyngr jnf gung qb lbh guebj nal bgure sbbqf" 
  ur gubhtug ur fgvyy unq n fubg 
 naq gura gura gura fur yrnirf jvgu fbzrobql ryfr arire rira arire rira fnvq tbbqolr arire pnyyrq zr onpx arire ncbybtvmrq abguvat yvxr v jnf qveg 
 jung rire unccrarq jvgu gur fuveg 
 v fgvyy unir vg gur pbyyne'f bxnl v jrne vg haqre fjrngref 
 v qba'g xabj jung v'z tbaan qb fur nfxrq zr gb tvir ure n onol fubjre 
 nfxrq lbh lbh'er abg tbvat gb qb gung ner lbh 
 nalbar ryfr arire ohg yrfyvr - v unir n ceboyrz fnlvat ab gb sbe fbzr ernfba v frrz gb jnag ure nccebiny 
 yrg znevn fuevire tvir ure n onol fubjre 
 nfx abg jung v pna qb sbe lbh - nfx jung lbh pna qb sbe zr 
  vpu ova rva fhpxre 
 bu jbhyq lbh gjb fgbc jvgu gur xraarqlf jul qbrf rirelobql znxr fhpu n ovt qrny nobhg ur xraarqlf jung vf guvf snfpvangvba jub pnerf vg'f nyy fb obevat 
 fur qbrfa'g qrfreir n onol fubjre fur qrfreirf n onol zbafbba fur qrfreirf ebfrznel'f onol 
  v qb unir bar grral yvggyr ceboyrz gubhtu 
 arire fnvq tbbqolr arire ncbybtvmrq abguvat 
 frr v jnf tbaan tvir gur fubjre va zl ncnegzrag 
 ohg 
 zl ebbzzngr unf ylzr qvfrnfr 
 ylzr qvfrnfr v gubhtug fur unq rcfgrva-onee flaqebzr 
 fur unf guvf va nqqvgvba gb rcfgrva-onee vg'f yvxr rcfgrva-onee jvgu n gjvfg bs ylzr qvfrnfr 
 ubj qvq fur trg ylzr qvfrnfr 
 v qba'g xabj fur qvq fbzr bhgqbbe irefvba bs unve va qnaohel pbaarpgvphg 
 gurl fgvyy qb gung cynl 
 vg'f n pynffvp 
 jvgu nyy gur ahqvgl 
 v thrff fur zhfg'ir ebyyrq bire ba n gvpx qhevat gur ybir-va 
  arire fnvq tbbqolr tbbqolr 
 rkcynva gb zr ubj guvf onol fubjre guvat jbexf 
 jung qb lbh jnaan xabj 
 jryy v zrna qbrf vg rire rehcg vagb n qehaxra betl bs ivbyrapr 
 eneryl 
 gurer'f ab unmvat bs gur srghf be nalguvat vf gurer 
 ab 
 jura vf guvf fhccbfr gb or 
 fngheqnl 
 fngheqnl jryy v unir n fubj va ohssnyb ba fngheqnl gurl'er abg tbaan ohfg hc zl ncnegzrag be nalguvat ner gurl 
 v'yy gnxr shyy erfcbafvovyvgl lbh jba'g erterg vg 
 'pnhfr v'ir frra gurfr certanag jbzra - naq gurl fbzrgvzrf zvfwhqtr gurve srgny tvegu whfg yvxr bar jebat ghea naq obbz naq ragver ohssrg vf fjrcg bss gur gnoyr 
 fbzrqnl orsber v qvr znex zl jbeqf - v'z tbaan gryy gung jbzna rknpgyl jung v guvax bs ure v'yy arire or noyr gb sbetvir zlfrys hagvy v qb 
 naq vs lbh qb 
 v fgvyy jba'g or noyr gb sbetvir zlfrys - ohg ng yrnfg vg jba'g or nobhg guvf 
 wreel'f ncnegzrag] 
 jung ner lbh qbvat guvf sbe ybbx ng lbh 
 dhvrg v'z gelvat gb trg n cvpgher 
 ohg lbh qba'g unir gb qb guvf guvf thl vf jnvgvat va zl ubhfr 
  yrnir zr nybar 
 vg'f n bar-gvzr srr n uhaqerq naq svsgl ohpxf jul yvir yvxr guvf 
 v'z abg trggvat vyyrtny pnoyr 
 bu fb jung ner lbh tbaan qb lbh tbaan jnvg sbe gur pnoyr pbzcnavrf gb erfbyir gurve qvfchgr gurl'er tbaan or va pbheg sbe lrnef 
 ab v ernq va gur cncre 
  bu bu gur cncre 
 jryy gurl zvtug ubbx hf hc ntnva 
 bu tbq lbh'er fb anvir nyy gur pnoyr pbzcnavrf pner nobhg vf gur "ovt znzzbb"  bu ybbx ng lbh lbh'er onatvat guvatf cngurgvp whfg jnfgvat lbhe yvsr v'z bssrevat lbh svsgl-fvk punaaryf - zbivrf fcbegf ahqvgl naq vg'f serr sbe yvsr 
 fgbc fubhgvat lbh'er ehvavat gur erprcgvba 
 pna lbh urne lbhefrys pna pna qb lbh xabj jung lbh'er fnlvat 
 jung lbh'er fhttrfgvat vf vyyrtny 
 vg'f abg vyyrtny 
 vg'f ntnvafg gur ynj 
 jryy lrnu 
  whfg whfg ubyq guvf pna lbh ubyq gung 
  ybbx jvyy lbh ng yrnfg yrg zr oevat gur thl bire ur'f na nznmvat zna ur'f n ehffvna vzzvtenag ur rfpncrq gur thynt ur'f yvxr gur fnxunebi bs pnoyr thlf ur'yy fybj qbja lbhe tnf zrgre ur fryyf fyhtf wreel fyhtf sbe gur fhojnl 
 n erny uhzna evtugf ahg uhu 
 lrnu ur'f vagrafr zna 
 v qba'g xabj jung vs v trg pnhtug 
 bu lbh'er abg tbaan trg pnhtug ybbx yrg zr trg uvz zna vg'f gur avargvrf vg'f unzzre gvzr pbzr ba whfg yrg zr trg uvz 
 lbh xabj jul qba'g jr jnvg orpnhfr v'z tbvat bhg bs gbja gbzneebj 
 gbzneebj bxnl 
 ab ceboyrz lrnu lbh'yy unir gur jubyr guvat vafgnyyrq ol gur gvzr lbh trg onpx 
  rirel gvzr v ghea ba gur gi fveraf ner tbaan tb bss gurl'er tbaan genpx zr qbja yvxr n qbt v xabj vg 
 ab ab abj ybbx abj wreel wreel vg'f ab evfx v fjrne gur zrgf unir friragl-svir tnzrf ba pnoyr guvf lrne 
  chg vg va 
 lbh jba'g erterg vg  wreel'f tbaan or n pnoyr obl n pnoyr obl n pnoyr obl 
 wreel'f ncnegzrag] 
 ze fgrvasryq 
 frvasryq 
 jr'er jvgu gur sov lbh jnaan gryy hf nobhg lbhe pnoyr ubbx-hc 
 zl pnoyr ubbx-hc jung nobhg vg 
 vg'f orra vyyrtnyyl vafgnyyrq ze fgrvasryq 
 vg unf v'ir orra bhg bs gbja ubj qvq lbh xabj 
 wreel v unq gb gryy gurz v unq gb v unq ab pubvpr gurl jrer bagb gur fpnz sebz gur irel ortvaavat 
 lbh'er va frevbhf gebhoyr ze fgrvasryq 
 jnvg n zvahgr jnvg n zvahgr ubyq ba jr'er whfg cngfvrf jr'er whfg n pbhcyr bs hfref jr arire fbyq gur fghss jung nobhg gur ehffvna thl gur ehffvna thl vf gur thl lbh jnag 
 ze frvasryq ntrag fgbar sov haqrepbire 
 ab wreel  pnoyr obl pnoyr obl jung unir lbh qbar gb zl yvggyr pnoyr obl 
 nvecynar] 
 rkphfr zr pna v trg fbzrguvat gb qevax 
 v'z nsenvq abg 
 jung'f jvgu guvf nveyvar jung ner lbh phggvat bhg gur qevaxf abj 
 ab fve jr'er sylvat vagb n oyvmmneq cyrnfr snfgra lbhe frng oryg jr'er znxvat na rzretrapl ynaqvat 
  ner gurl tbaan tb bire gur vafgehpgvbaf ntnva 
 zl anzr vf ovyy v zvtug or gur ynfg crefba lbh rire frr 
 avtug pyho] 
 v'z abg nsenvq bs sylvat nygubhtu znal crbcyr qb unir srne bs sylvat naq v unir ab nethrzrag jvgu gung v guvax srne bs sylvat vf dhvgr engvbany orpnhfr uhzna orvatf pnaabg syl uhznaf unir srne bs sylvat fnzr jnl svfu unir srne bs qevivat chg n svfu oruvaq gur jurry naq gurl tb "guvf vfa'g evtug v fubhyqa'g or qbvat guvf v qba'g orybat urer" 
 trbetr'f pne] 
 fbhaqf yvxr n ebhtu gevc 
 bu sver ratvarf nzohynaprf nyy nybat gur ehajnl naq gura jura jr ynaqrq fnsryl gurl nyy frrzrq fb qvfnccbvagrq 
 fb gur pbyyrtr pnapryyrq gur tvt 
 jryy gurer jnf fb zhpu fabj gur ebnqf jrer pybfrq v ernyyl nccerpvngr vg - lbh cvpxvat zr hc gunaxf ntnva 
  sbetrg vg 
 ab ernyyl na nvecbeg eha 
 vg'f abguvat 
 url vg'f bar guvat vs v nfxrq lbh "pbhyq lbh qb zr n snibe" ohg gb fhttrfg vg trbetr  jurl lbh gbyq zr jung lbh jrag guebhtu ba gur cynar vg znxrf lbh fgbc naq guvax lbh nccerpvngr univat n erny sevraq 
  lbh xabj vs evpuvr oenaqrf qvq guvf v'q or fhfcvpvbhf lbh xabj ur'f nyjnlf tbg fbzr hygrevbe zbgvir 
  hygrevbe zbgvir 
 bu jnvg n zvahgr jnvg n zvahgr qba'g gnxr gur oevqtr trg bss urer jr pna'g tb onpx gb zl cynpr rynvar'f univat gur fubjre 
  jung gbavtug abj 
 lrnu lrnu v sbetbg nyy nobhg vg nyevtug vg'f ab ovt qrny jr'yy whfg tb onpx gb lbhe cynpr 
 zl cynpr ab ab ab v ungr zl cynpr v qba'g jnaan tb onpx gb zl cynpr 
 lbh jnag gb trg n ovgr 
 lrnu v jbhyq vg'f whfg lbh xabj v whfg ngr n jubyr cbg ebnfg 
 jryy fb jung fubhyq jr qb 
 fubhyqa'g jr ng yrnfg qebc bss lbhe ont 
 erq fuveg erq fuveg gung'f gur erq fuveg 
  jung ner lbh gnyxvat nobhg 
 lbh'er jrnevat gur pubpbyngr fuveg 
 v nz jung n fgenatr pbvapvqrapr 
 n - un avpr gel zl sevraq ohg lbh tbggn trg hc cerggl rneyl va gur zbeavat 
  lbh tbggn yrg zr tb bire gurer 
 jung ner lbh tbaan qb onqtre n certanag jbzna ng ure bja onol fubjre jung ner lbh tbaan gnxr vg bss naq znxr ure evafr vg va pyho fbqn 
 ab v'z tbaan ubyq vg haqre ure abfr fb fur pna fzryy gur fprag bs fgnyr obfpb gung v unq gb yvir jvgu sbe guerr lrnef naq v'z tbaan fnl "erzrzore guvf fuveg onol jryy abj vg'f cnlonpx gvzr" 
 wreel'f ncnegzrag] 
 jr whfg obhtug na ncnegzrag ba evirefvqr qevir oreaneq tbrgm'f zbgure hfrq gb yvir gurer 
 fb jurer'f gbqq 
 hc va ulnaavfcbeg 
 bu zl tbq ulnaavfcbeg jvgu gur xraarqlf jub ryfr vf hc gurer vf ebfr hc gurer 
  fb jura'f lbhe qhr qngr 
 znepu gjragvrgu avar nz 
 lbh xabj gur gvzr 
 v'z univat n cynaarq p-frpgvba zl gurencvfg gbyq zr vs v tb guebhtu ynobe v zvtug trg cflpubgvp 
 yrfyvr yrfyvr jungrire unccrarq gb fnetrag fuevire vf ur fgvyy jvgu gurz lbh qba'g urne zhpu nobhg uvz gurfr qnlf vf ur bhg bs gur ybbc 
  rynvar jub pngrerq guvf frnef 
  jung vf guvf jung ner lbh qbvat urer 
 jr'er chggvat va pnoyr 
 gur pnoyr ab ab ab v'z univat n cnegl urer lbh pna'g qb guvf abj 
 bu jr unir gb qb guvf abj 
 jub'f guvf thl 
 juvpu bar 
 obgu bs gur gurz 
 bu gurl'er fbivrg pnoyr thlf 
 bxnl qbrf wreel xabj nobhg guvf 
 bu lrnu vg'f nyy nhgubevmrq lrnu 
 lbh pna'g lbh pna'g qb guvf abj 
 rynvar qb lbh xabj ubj obbxrq hc guvf thl vf abj vs v fraq uvz njnl abj vg'f tbaan gnxr wreel zbaguf gb trg uvz onpx ur jba'g yvxr gung 
 nyevtug whfg qb vg snfg naq gura trg bhg 
  nangbyl  ybbx vg'f tbaan gnxr n srj zvahgrf gura lbh naq gur tnyf pna gnxr n ybnq bss naq jngpu fbzrguvat ba yvsrgvzr 
 trbetr'f pne] 
 naq jung vs jr tb hc gurer jung ner lbh tbvat gb fnl gb ure 
  jung nz v tbvat gb fnl 
 lrnu 
 jung qvq lbh tb bhg jvgu zr sbe whfg gb qhzc pubpbyngr ba zl fuveg naq gura whfg qhzc zr nygbtrgure v qba'g qrfreir gung xvaq bs gerngzrag jung lbh qba'g unir gur pbzzba pbhegrfl gb erghea zl pnyyf gb ncbybtvmr lbh guvax v'z fbzr fbeg bs n ybfre gung yvxrf gb or nohfrq naq vtaberq jub'f fuveg pna or ehvarq jvgubhg svanapvny erfgvghgvba fbzr fbeg bs n znfbpuvfg jub rawblf orvat uhzvyvngrq lbh guvax lbh pna nibvq zr yvxr v unir fbzr fbeg bs qvfrnfr lbh unir gur qvfrnfr lbh unir gur qvfrnfr lbh znl or ornhgvshy naq evpu naq culfvpnyyl  whfg  haoryvrinoyr ohg lbh fvpxra zr lbh qvfthfg zr lbh naq rirelbar yvxr lbh 
 lbh'yy arire fnl gung gb ure snpr 
 jngpu zr 
 wreel'f ncnegzrag] 
  lrnu v rng gur jubyr nccyr gur pber fgrz frrqf rirelguvat 
  xenzre xenzre ybbx ng uvz  ybbx ur'f rngvat nyy gur sbbq 
 lrnu lrnu jryy lbh xabj gurer ner znal qvssreraprf orgjrra nzrevpna naq fbivrg phygherf gung lbh'er abg njner bs frr va ehffvna gur pnoyr thl gurl tbg gur jubyr eha bs gur ubhfr lrnu gung'f genqvgvba  qvq lbh rire rng gur onex bs n cvarnccyr 
 xenzre 
  hu rkphfr zr 
 jung ner lbh qbvat urer v gubhtug lbh jrer bhg bs gbja sbe gur jrrxraq 
 gur fubj jnf pnapryyrq gurer jnf n oyvmmneq 
 v pna'g oryvrir lbh gbyq xenzre vg'f bxnl gb chg gur pnoyr va qhevat gur fubjre wreel ybbx ybbx gurl'ir rngra rirelguvat 
 wreel jung n fhecevfr v gubhtug lbh frer bhg bs gbja 
 jryy yrfyvr fbzrgvzrf gur ebnq yrff geniryyrq vf yrff geniryyrq sbe n ernfba 
  trbetr qba'g rira guvax nobhg vg qba'g rira qernz nobhg vg 
  nobhg jung 
  xenzre xenzre xenzre 
 yrfyvr 
 lrnu 
 trbetr  trbetr pbfgnamn 
 uv 
  lbh v thrff lbh qba'g erzrzore zr ohg jr npghnyyl xvaq bs hz jrag bhg n pbhcyr bs lrnef ntb bapr erzrzore 
 inthryl 
 lbh gbbx zr gb bar bs lbhe fubjf 
 naq 
 naq hz vg jnf dhvgr tbbq va snpg lbh rira vapbecbengrq zr vagb gur fubj v'z abg npghnyyl n cresbezre nygubhtu zl cneragf sryg v unq gnyrag 
 wreel  erzrzore zr 
 v'z fbeel v 
  znel pbagneqv ab qbrfa'g evat n oryy wreel jr unq n qngr guerr lrnef ntb lbh gbbx zr gb bar bs lbhe fubjf 
  bu v v guvax v erzrzore 
 gbyq zr lbh unq n terng gvzr fnvq lbh'q pnyy zr gur arkg qnl 
 jryy v'z fher v zrnag gb pnyy v cebonoyl whfg ybfg lbhe 
 yvne yvne lbh jrer arire tbvat gb pnyy zr lbh gubhtug lbh pbhyq jnygm guebhtug gur erfg bs lbhe yvsr naq arire ohzc vagb zr ntnva ohg lbh jrer jebat wreel lbh jrer jebat jung qb lbh guvax v'z fbzr fbeg bs cbbe cngurgvp jergpu 
 ab v qba'g guvax gung 
 fbzr crefba jub pbhyq or qvfzvffrq naq vtaberq fbzr vafvtavsvpnag cvrpr bs qhfg fbzr crefba jub qbrfa'g qrfreir lbhe erfcrpg naq lbhe nggragvba lbh'er gur bar gung qbrfa'g qrfreir zl erfcrpg naq zl nggragvba lbh'er gur vafvtavsvpnag cvrpr bs qhfg 
 npghnyyl v arire unq nal sbezny genvavat v thrff v'q or orggre fhvgrq sbe vzcebif be fbzrguvat 
 gunaxf n ybg 
 v'z fbeel lbh unir gb tb 
 lrnu v ernyyl unir gb or tbvat 
 nyevtug yvfgra v'ir punatrq zl zvaq nobhg guvf jubyr guvat v qba'g jnag pnoyr 
 qba'g or n sbby 
 lbh qba'g jnag 
 ab v qba'g jnag fb whfg gryy zr jung v bjr lbh sbe lbhe gebhoyr 
  sbhe uhaqerq qbyynef 
  sbhe uhaqerq qbyynef1 lbh gbyq zr bar-svsgl 
 v'z tbvat boivbhfyl 
 bu yrfyvr v nz fb fbeel nobhg rirelguvat gung jrag ba urer gbavtug lbh xabj v unq ab vqrn 
 rynvar lbh xabj v jnf jngpuvat lbh gbavtug naq v ernyvmrq fbzrguvat lbh'er whfg yvxr lbh jrer va pbyyrtr 
  bu gunax lbh  "yvxr lbh jrer va pbyyrtr" 
  pbzr ba yrg'f tb 
  v'yy or evtug onpx  
  v'z abg cnlvat sbhe uhaqerq qbyynef v qba'g rira jnag gur guvat jung ner lbh tbvat gb qb 
 wreel'f ncnegzrag] 
 rirel jbzna ba gur snpr bs gur rnegu unf pbzcyrgr pbageby bs zl yvsr naq lrg v jnag gurz nyy vf gung vebal 
 jul pna'g v zrrg n xraarql v fnj wbua whavbe bapr qbjagbja v jnf ba n ohf v uvg gur qvat ohg vg qvqa'g fgbc 
 nyevtug v fnvq v unq n tbbq gvzr naq v'q pnyy ohg jub gnxrf gung yvgrenyyl 
  url pbzr ba bire qe muvintb'f ba pnoyr va svir zvahgrf v'z znxvat cbcpbea  
 avtug pyho] 
 jung qb lbh qb ng gur raq bs n qngr jura lbh xabj lbh qba'g jnag gb frr guvf crefba rire ntnva sbe gur erfg bs lbhe yvsr jung qb lbh fnl jung qb lbh fnl ab znggre jung lbh fnl vg'f n yvr "v'yy frr lbh nebhaq frr lbh nebhaq vs lbh'er nebhaq naq v'z nebhaq v'yy frr lbh nebhaq gung nern lbh'yy or nebhaq bgure crbcyr lbh jba'g or nebhaq zr ohg lbh jvyy or nebhaq" "gnxr pner abj" qvq lbh rire fnl gung gb fbzrobql "gnxr pner abj gnxr pner abj orpnhfr v'z abg tbvat gb or gnxvat pner bs lbh fb lbh fubhyq gnxr pner abj" "gnxr pner gnxr pner" jung qbrf guvf zrna "gnxr bss" vfa'g gung jung lbh ernyyl jnag gb fnl "gnxr bss abj" 
  tb bire gvzr ba gur pnyy unat hc gur cubar jnyx njnl lbh'ir unq guvf unccra cubar evatf vg'f gur cubar pbzcnal gurl jnag zber zbarl qba'g lbh ybir guvf naq lbh tbg gurz evtug jurer lbh jnag gurz sbe gur svefg gvzr va lbhe yvsr lbh'er ba gur fgerrg gurer'f abguvat gurl pna qb v yvxr gb yrg vg evat n srj gvzrf lbh xabj yrg ure fjrng n yvggyr bire gurer gura v whfg cvpx vg hc "lrnu bcrengbe bu v tbg gur zbarl v tbg gur zbarl evtug urer q'lbh urne gung  gung'f n dhnegre lrnu lbh jnag gung qba'g lbh" 
 ab gurl'ir whfg tbg gb trg zber pbcf ba gur sbepr vg'f nf fvzcyr nf gung 
 pbcf v qba'g rira pner nobhg pbcf v jnaan frr zber tneontr zra vg'f zhpu zber vzcbegnag nyy v jnaan frr ner tneontr gehpxf tneontr pnaf naq tneontr zra lbh'er arire tbaan fgbc pevzr jr fubhyq ng yrnfg or pyrna 
 v gryy lbh jung gurl fubhyq qb gurl fubhyq pbzovar gur gjb wbof znxr vg bar wbo 'pbc\tneontr zna' v nyjnlf frr pbcf jnyxvat nebhaq jvgu abguvat gb qb teno n oebbz fgneg fjrrcvat lbh fjrrc fjrrc fjrrc pngpu n pevzvany trg evtug onpx gb fjrrcvat 
 lbh fubhyq eha sbe znlbe 
 ruu abobql yvfgraf 
 jurer vf fbzrbar v'z fgneivat 
 v guvax guvf vf uvz evtug urer 
 vf gurer n gnoyr ernql 
 ubj znal 
 ubj znal 
 vf gngvnan pbzvat 
 v qba'g xabj v unir gb pnyy ure gryy ure jurer jr ner v'z irel yhpxl fur'f rira pbafvqrevat frrvat zr ng nyy 
 ernyyl v gubhtug guvatf jrer tbvat bx 
 gurl jrer vg'f xvaqn pbzcyvpngrq 
 jryy jung vf vg 
 ubj znal 
 nu nyevtug sbhe frvasryq 
 sbhe vg'yy or svir gra zvahgrf 
 jung qb lbh jnaan qb 
 yrg'f tb fbzrcynpr ryfr v nz gbb uhatel 
 jr zvtug nf jryy whfg fgnl urer jr unira'g tbg gung zhpu gvzr vs jr jnaan znxr vg gb gur zbivr 
 v tbggn pnyy gngvnan jurer'f gur cubar 
 gngvnan 
 rkphfr zr ner lbh tbaan or irel ybat 
 ynfuoebbx 4 
 fb qvq v qb n greevoyr guvat 
 lbh zrna ylvat gb lbhe hapyr 
 v pbhyqa'g unir qvaare jvgu uvz 'cyna 9 sebz bhgre fcnpr' bar avtug bayl gur ovt fperra zl unaqf ner gvrq 
 lbh xabj vg'f n choyvp cubar lbh'er abg fhccbfrq gb whfg puvg-pung 
 wreel trg zrahf fb jura jr fvg qbja jr pna beqre evtug njnl 
 pna'g ybbx ng n zrah abj v tbggn or ng gur gnoyr 
 ur xabjf v'z jnvgvat ur frrf zr ur whfg qbrfa'g jnaan ybbx 
 rirelguvat'f tbggn or whfg fb jvgu lbh qbrfa'g vg 
 url v bssrerq lbh gubfr pbbxvrf va zl ubhfr 
 urnygu pbbxvrf v ungr gubfr yvggyr qhfgobneq sehpgbfr guvatf 
 v whfg pna'g oryvrir ng gur jnl crbcyr ner jung vf vg jvgu uhznavgl jung xvaq bs n jbeyq qb jr yvir va 
 jung 
 gurer'f n jbzna bire gurer gung ybbxf ernyyl snzvyvne qnex unve fgevcrq fuveg 
 v'ir arire frra ure orsber 
 v xabj guvf jbzna guvf vf tbaan qevir zr penml 
 bu rkphfr zr 
 v'z fbeel 
 qvqwn frr gung gubfr crbcyr ybbx gurl'er trggvat n gnoyr 
 jryy znlor gurl jrer urer sebz orsber 
 ab ab ab gurl jrera'g urer orsber 
 rkphfr zr ner lbh tbvat gb or zhpu ybatre v unir gb znxr n irel vzcbegnag pnyy 
 svaq bhg jung'f tbvat ba 
 rkphfr zr qvqa'g gubfr crbcyr whfg pbzr va v oryvrir jr jrer nurnq bs gurz 
 lrnu 
 jung'f lbhe anzr 
 frvasryq 
 ab ab gurl jrer urer orsber xrpxvgpu 2 
 qvq lbh rire abgvpr ubj unccl crbcyr ner jura gurl svanyyl trg n gnoyr gurl guvax gurl'er fb fcrpvny orpnhfr gurl'ir orra pubfra vg'f rabhtu gb znxr lbh fvpx 
 obl lbh ner ernyyl uhatel 
 url 
 vs nalguvat unccraf urer pna v pbhag ba lbh 
 jung 
 vs jr qrpvqr gb tb ng vg 
 lrnu v jnaan trg vagb n ehzoyr 
 v unir gb trg va gbhpu jvgu gngvnan naq ybbx ng uvf yvggyr bhgsvg vg'f nyy fb pbbeqvangrq gur jnl uvf fbpxf zngpuvat gb uvf fuveg v ernyyl ungr guvf thl 
 v'z tbaan snvag 
 trbetr jub vf gung jbzna va gur fgevcrf 
 v qba'g xabj ure 
 fur ybbxf fb snzvyvne 
 ln xabj vgf abg snve crbcyr ner frngrq svefg pbzr svefg freirq vg fubhyq or onfrq ba jub'f uhatevrfg v srry yvxr whfg tbvat bire gurer naq gnxvat fbzr sbbq bss fbzrobql'f cyngr 
 v'yy gryy lbh jung gurer'f 50 ohpxf va vg sbe lbh vs lbh qb vg 
 jung qb lbh zrna 
 lbh jnyx bire gung gnoyr lbh cvpx hc na rttebyy lbh qba'g fnl nalguvat lbh rng vg fnl 'gunax lbh irel zhpu' jvcr lbhe zbhgu jnyx njnl- v tvir lbh 50 ohpxf 
 jung ner gurl tbaan qb 
 gurl jba'g qb nalguvat; va snpg lbh'yy or tvivat gurz n fgbel gb gryy sbe gur erfg bs gurve yvirf 
 50 ohpxf lbh'yy tvir zr 50 ohpxf 
 50 ohpxf gung gnoyr bire gurer gur guerr pbhcyrf 
 bx v qba'g jnaan tb bire gurer naq qb vg naq gura pbzr onpx urer naq svaq bhg gurer jnf fbzr yvggyr ybbcubyr yvxr v qvqa'g chg zhfgneq ba vg be fbzrguvat 
 ab ab gevpxf 
 fubhyq v qb vg trbetr 
 sbe 50 ohpxf v'q chg zl snpr va gur fbhc naq oybj 
 nyevtug nyevtug urer ubyq guvf v'z qbva' vg 
 v xabj guvf fbhaqf penml ohg gur gjb zra jub ner fgnaqvat oruvaq zr ner tbvat gb tvir zr 50 ohpxf vs v fgnaq urer naq rng bar bs lbhe rttebyyf 
 v'yy tvir lbh 25 vs lbh yrg zr qb vg 
 jung jung vf fur gnyxvat nobhg jung qvq fur fnl 
 jung unccrarq 
 qvq lbh frr gung 
 jung jrer lbh qbvat 
 v bssrerq gurz 25 gurl unq ab vqrn 
 trbetr gur cubar'f serr 
 nyyryhvn 
 rkphfr zr v jnf jnvgvat urer 
 jurer v qvqa'g frr lbh 
 v'ir orra fgnaqvat urer sbe gur ynfg gra zvahgrf 
 jryy v jba'g or ybat 
 gung'f abg gur cbvag gur cbvag vf v jnf urer svefg 
 jryy vs lbh jrer urer svefg lbh'q or ubyqvat gur cubar 
 lbh xabj jr'er yvivat va n fbpvrgl jr'er fhccbfrq gb npg va n pvivyvmrq jnl 
 qbrf fur pner ab qbrf nalbar rire qvfcynl gur fyvtugrfg frafvgvivgl bire gur ceboyrzf bs n sryybj vaqvivqhny ab ab n erfbhaqvat ab 
 url fbeel v gbbx fb ybat 
 bu gung'f bx ernyyl qba'g jbeel nobhg vg 
 ubj qb crbcyr snfg qvq tunaqv trg guvf penml v'z tbaan jnyx nebhaq frr jung qvfurf ybbx tbbq 
 v gbyq zl hapyr v unq n fgbznpu npur gbavtug lbh guvax ur obhtug gung 
 lrnu jryy ur cebonoyl obhtug vg 
 fb jung unccrarq jvgu gngvnan 
 v fubhyqa'g rira gryy lbh guvf 
 pbzr ba 
 jryy nsgre qvaare ynfg jrrx fur vaivgrf zr onpx gb ure ncnegzrag 
 v'z jvgu lbh 
 jryy vg'f guvf yvggyr cynpr jvgu guvf yvggyr onguebbz vg'f yvxr evtug gurer lbh xabj vg'f abg rira qbja n yvggyr unyy be bss va na nypbir lbh haqrefgnaq gurer'f ab ohssre mbar fb jr fgneg gb sbby nebhaq naq vg'f gur svefg gvzr naq vg'f rneyl va gur tbvat naq v ortva gb creprvir guvf vzcraqvat vagrfgvany erdhverzrag jubfr arrqf ner tbvat gb fhecnff ol terng yratguf nalguvat va gur frkhny ernyz fb v xabj v'z tbaan unir gb fgbc naq nf guvf vf unccravat v'z guvaxvat rira vs v pna fbzrubj znantr gb zbzragnevyl rkgevpngr zlfrys sebz gur cebprrqvatf naq eryvrir guvf hafgbccnoyr sbepr v xabj gung gung onguebbz vf abg tbaan cebivqr zr jvgu gur cevinpl gung v xabj v'z tbvat gb arrq 
 guvf pbhyq bayl unccra gb lbh 
 fb v svanyyl fgbc naq fnl "gngvnan v ubcr lbh qba'g gnxr guvf gur jebat jnl ohg v guvax vg jbhyq or orfg vs v yrsg" 
 lbh fnvq guvf gb ure nsgre 
 ab qhevat 
 bu obl 
 lrnu 
 jbj fb 
 fb v'z qerffvat naq fur'f fgnevat hc ng zr fgehttyvat gb pbzchgr guvf hacerprqragrq ghea bs riragf v qba'g xabj jung gb fnl gb ernffher guvf jbzna naq jbefg bs nyy v qba'g unir gur gvzr gb fnl vg gur bayl rkphfr fur zvtug cbffvoyl unir npprcgrq vf vs v gbyq ure v nz va ernyvgl ongzna naq v'z irel fbeel v whfg fnj gur ong-fvtany vg gbbx zr 3 qnlf bs cubar pnyyf gb trg ure gb nterr gb frr zr ntnva abj fur'f jnvgvat sbe zr gb pnyy ure naq fur'f 
 v ungr guvf cynpr v qba'g xabj jul jr pnzr urer v'z arire pbzvat onpx urer ntnva 
 jub vf gung jbzna 
 erzrzore jura lbh svefg jrag bhg gb rng jvgu lbhe cneragf erzrzore vg jnf fhpu n gerng gb tb naq gurl freir lbh guvf qvssrerag sbbq gung lbh arire fnj orsber naq gurl chg vg va sebag bs lbh naq vg vf fhpu n qryvpvbhf naq rkpvgvat nqiragher naq abj v whfg srry yvxr n ovt fjrngl ubt jnvgvat sbe gurz gb svyy hc gur gebhtu 
 fur'f bss  
 wreel gnyx gb gung thl ntnva 
 jung nz v tbaan fnl 
 gryy uvz jr jnaan pngpu n zbivr naq gung jr'er yngr 
 url jung fgvaxf va urer 
 ze pbura unira'g frra lbh sbe n pbhcyr bs jrrxf 
 jryy v'ir orra ybbxvat sbe n orggre cynpr 
 orggre cynpr jnag n gnoyr 
 ab whfg oevat zr n cyngr naq v'yy rng urer 
 tvir uvz n cyngr naq lbh rng urer pbzr ba v tvir lbh n gnoyr 
 rkphfr zr jr'ir orra jnvgvat urer abj v xabj jr jrer nurnq bs gung thl ur whfg pnzr va 
 bu ab ze pbura nyjnlf urer 
 ur'f nyjnlf urer jung qbrf gung zrna jung qbrf gung zrna 
 bu ze pbura irel avpr zna ur yvir ba cnex nirahr 
 jurer nz v vf guvf n qernz jung va tbq'f anzr vf tbvat ba urer 
 fur'f abg gurer fur yrsg fur zhfg'ir jnvgrq naq yrsg orpnhfr gubfr crbcyr jbhyqa'g trg bss gur cubar 
 qvqwn yrnir n zrffntr 
 lrnu v gbyq ure gb pnyy zr urer naq gb gryy nalbar jub nafjref gur cubar gb nfx sbe n onyqvat fgbpxl zna jvgu tynffrf v orggre gryy uvz v'z rkcrpgvat n pnyy 
 bu wreel urer pbzrf gung jbzna

 uryyb wreel 
 urrrrllll ubj lbh qbva'

 uv v'z rynvar 
 ybeenvar pngnynab 
 v'z fbeel ybeenvar guvf vf rynvar

 gur bar lbh oebxr gur cynaf jvgu gbavtug 
 lrnu fur jbexf va uvf bssvpr abj fur'f tbaan frr uvz gbzbeebj naq gryy uvz fur fnj zr urer gbavtug ur'f tbaan gryy uvf jvsr uvf jvsr'f tbaan pnyy zl zbgure bu guvf vf onq lbh qba'g xabj gur punva ernpgvba bs pnyyf guvf vf tbaan frg bss arj lbex ybat vfynaq sybevqn vg'f yvxr gur orezhqn gevnatyr hasbeghangryl abobql rire qvfnccrnef zl hapyr gb zl nhag zl nhag gb zl zbgure zl zbgure gb zl hapyr

 lbh fubhyq'ir whfg unq qvaare jvgu lbhe hapyr gbavtug naq tbggra va bire jvgu vg'f whfg n zbivr 
 whfg n zbivr lbh qba'g haqrefgnaq guvf vfa'g 'cynaf 1 guebhtu 8 sebz bhgre fcnpr' guvf vf 'cyna 9' guvf vf gur bar gung jbexrq gur jbefg zbivr rire znqr 
 url v tbg arjf sbe lbh vs jr'er znxvat guvf zbivr jr tbggn trg n gnoyr vzzrqvngryl 
 nyevtug bx yrg'f fgbc sbbyvat nebhaq yrg'f whfg fyvc uvz fbzr zbarl 
 va n puvarfr erfgnhenag qb gurl gnxr zbarl

 nyevtug 77  6 v'z abg tbaan rng gung zhpu

 v thrff vg'f lbh wre

 lrnu frvasryq 4

 fb jura ner jr tbaan rng 
 svir gra zvahgrf 
 jr fubhyq unir yrsg rneyvre v gbyq lbh 
 v qba'g frr nal jnl jr pna rng naq znxr guvf zbivr

 pnegjevtug

 pnegjevtug 
 v unir gb rng 
 fb gurl unir ubgqbtf gurer

 rkphfr zr v'z rkcrpgvat n pnyy pbfgnamn 
 lrnu v whfg tbg n pnyy v lryy 'pnegjevtug pnegjevtug' whfg yvxr gung abobql pnzr hc v unat hc 
 jryy jnf vg sbe pbfgnamn be 
 lrf lrf gung'f vg abobql nafjrerq 
 jryy jnf vg n jbzna

 jub'f pnegjevtug 
 v'z pnegjevtug 
 lbh'er abg pnegjev-

 fb lbh'er abg tbvat 
 lbh qba'g arrq hf

 fubhyq jr gryy uvz jr'er yrnivat 
 jung sbe yrg'f whfg trg bhg bs urer 
 frvasryq 4 
 uhatre jvyy znxr crbcyr qb nznmvat guvatf v zrna gur cebbs bs gung vf pnaavonyvfz pnaavonyvfz jung qb gurl fnl v zrna gurl'er rngvat naq lbh xabj "guvf vf tbbq jub vf guvf v yvxr guvf crefba" lbh xabj v zrna v jbhyq guvax gur uneqrfg guvat nobhg orvat n pnaavony vf gelvat gb trg fbzr irel qrrc fyrrc lbh xabj jung v zrna v jbhyq guvax lbh'q or yvxr  "jub vf gung jub'f gurer jub'f gurer vf fbzrobql gurer jung qb lbh jnag jung qb lbh jnag lbh ybbx uhatel ner lbh uhatel trg bhg bs urer" 
 avtug pyho] 
 v'z abg n sbbqvr v qba'g "bu guvf vf gbb ener bu vg'f gbb fnygl" whfg rng vg naq fuhg hc v'yy rng naljurer jungrire gurl'er univat v unir rngra ebggra ebyyf bss bs ebbz freivpr genlf va ubgry unyyjnlf v unir vg'f abg n wbxr guvf vf zl yvsr v qba'g xabj fbzrobql yrsg vg jul jbhyq fbzrbar cbvfba n ebyy naq yrnir vg va n unyyjnl sbe fbzr pbzvp pbzvat qbja ng gjb b' pybpx va gur zbeavat jul jbhyq gurl qb gung fbzrgvzrf lbh tb gb n avpr erfgnhenag gurl chg gur purpx va n yvggyr obbx jung vf guvf gur fgbel bs gur ovyy "bapr hcba n gvzr gurer jrer fbzr irel uhatel crbcyr" jung vf guvf n yvggyr tbyq gnffyr unatvat qbja nz v tenqhngvat sebz gur erfgnhenag jung vf guvf nobhg 
 n erfgnhenag] 
 qb lbh jnag fbzr bs zvar 
 gnxr fbzr bs zvar 
 jul qb v trg crfgb jul qb v guvax v'yy yvxr vg v xrrc gelvat gb yvxr vg yvxr v unir gb yvxr vg 
 jub fnvq lbh unir gb yvxr vg 
 rirelobql yvxrf crfgb lbh jnyx vagb n erfgnhenag gung'f nyy lbh urne - crfgb crfgb crfgb 
 v qba'g yvxr crfgb 
 jurer jnf crfgb 10 lrnef ntb 
  ybbx ng gung thl  v'yy org lbh ur'f trggva' unve genafcynagf nal gvzr lbh frr n thl gung ntr jrnevat n onfronyy pnc gra gb bar - cyhtf 
  gur guvat nobhg gung cnvagvat vf jvgu gur pbybef naq hz  bu lrnu cyhtbyn 
  bu bar zber guvat nobhg gur pne yrg vg jnez hc sbe n zvahgr 
 gung'f n gbhtu zvahgr vg'f yvxr jnvgvat va gur fubjre sbe gur pbaqvgvbare gb jbex

 rynvar vf univat n "ubhfrthrfg" fur'f cvpxvat uvz hc ng gur nvecbeg gbavtug 
 n thl 
  lrf n thl 
 ur'f sebz n lnxvzn evtug

  lbh gryy uvz

 rq 
 jub jnf va gbja ba n ohfvarff iragher naq hz 
 jr funerq na vagrecrefbany rkcrevrapr  tb ba 
 fb gurl jrag bhg n srj gvzrf ohg nccneragyl jura gur sryybj erghearq ubzr ur qvfpbirerq gung gur orarf gnggbb qbrf abg jnfu bss fb rnfvyl 
 ba fbzr crbcyr 
 bbbu 
 fb ur'f pbzvat va gb fgnl jvgu ure sbe n jrrx

 jung unccrarq 
 bu gur ohfobl yrsg gur zrah n yvggyr pybfr gb gur pnaqyr 
 fbeel gb gur qvfgheonapr 
  v'z arire rngvat urer ntnva 
  avpr tbvat gunax lbh gung bhtug gb trg hf n serr qrffreg  v guvax gur ohfobl'f va gebhoyr 
 qvq v trg uvz va gebhoyr orpnhfr bs jung v fnvq v whfg gbyq uvz jung unccrarq ur qvqa'g qb vg ba checbfr  ur cbvagrq ng zr jul qvq ur cbvag ng zr 
 v fnvq v jbhyq arire rng urer ntnva ohg v v ur unq gb xabj v jnf xvqqvat 
  v qvqa'g fnl nalguvat

 v qvqa'g xabj ur'q trg sverq 
  ur'yy cebonoyl xvyy uvf snzvyl bire guvf

  znlor v'yy gel gung crfgb 
 wreel'f ncnegzrag] 
 ybbx v srry onq sbe uvz gbb ohg ur'yy trg nabgure wbo v zrna yrg'f snpr vg vg'f abg n cebsrffvba jurer lbh rzoryyvfu lbhe erfhzr naq haqretb n frevrf bs tehryvat vagreivrjf 
  bu yvxr lbh ernyyl xabj ohfoblf 
 bu yvxr lbh qb 
 url ng yrnfg v jnf n pnzc jnvgre 
  pnzc 
 vg jnf n sng pnzc gubfr xvqf qrcraqrq ba zr 
 rynvar 
  lrnu 
 ohfoblf ner nyjnlf punatvat wbof gung'f gur ohfvarff v xabj v jbex jvgu gurfr thlf v gnyyx gb gurz va gur xvgpura ng gur pbzrql pyhof 
 gura jul qba'g lbh gel naq trg uvz nabgure wbo 
 v'q ybir gb ohg v qba'g xabj nalguvat nobhg uvz ur pbhyq or bar bs gubfr crbcyr gung jnyxf nebhaq gur fgerrg cevpxvat crbcyr jvgu cvaf 
 v qba'g xabj vs lbh crbcyr ner njner bs guvf ohg v nz bar pyrire puvpxnqrr 
 jung qvq lbh trg gur ohfobl'f ahzore 
 uvf cubar'f orra qvfpbaarpgrq ohg v jnf noyr gb bognva na nqqerff - 1324 nzfgreqnz nirahr ncnegzrag 4q  abj v qvq zl wbo  znl v unir gur pne xrlf cyrnfr 
 ubj qvq lbh trg nyy guvf 
 qbrf gur jbeq "punez" zrna nalguvat gb lbh 
 ab  fb abj lbh'er tbvat gb uvf ncnegzrag v ernyyl guvax guvf vf ahgf 
  v'q yvxr gb ncbybtvmr v jnag gb gryy uvz v v qvqa'g zrna gb trg uvz va gebhoyr 
 lbh lbh'er tbvat abj 
 lrnu v jnag gb frr vs gurer'f nalguvat v pna qb znlor trg uvz nabgure wbo znlor v'yy urne bs fbzrguvat 
 znlor gur sng pnzc  lbh'er abg tbvat 
 v jbhyq ohg v unir gb cvpx hc rq ng gur nvecbeg

 vg'yy gnxr gb ybat 
 gnxr gur x-zna n yvggyr fhccbeg 
  v qba'g n 
 gnxr zr jurer jurer 
 na ncnegzrag ohvyqvat unyyjnl] 
 ybbx v ernyyl nccerpvngr lbhe pbzvat ohg vs lbh jbhyqa'g zvaq - gel abg gb fnl gbb zhpu 
 jung nz v tbaan fnl 
 v qba'g xabj 
 jryy v'z abg na vqvbg 
 pregnvayl abg 
 gura jr'er pbby 
 lrnu lrnu jr'er - jr'er pbby  hu v'z fbeel gb obgure lbh v jnf va gur erfgnhenag rneyvre naq v jnf jbaqrevat vs v pbhyq gnyx gb lbh sbe n srj zvahgrf nobhg jung unccrarq  v ubcr v'z abg vagreehcgvat nalguvat vg'f whfg gung v guvax v znl unir - jvgubhg ernyvmvat vg - orra erfcbafvoyr sbe trggvat lbh sverq  naq naq naq v whfg jnag lbh gb xabj gung v qvqa'g vagraq sbe gung gb unccra 
  ur'f n uryy bs n thl 
 guvf vf n thl v xabj xenzre 
 unoyn rfcnaby 
  bu zl tbq 
 fv 
 pbzb fr qvpr jngreorq 
  naljnl v whfg jnagrq gb yrg lbh xabj v'z ernyyl fbeel gung unccrarq naq vs v pna uryc bhg va nal jnl v'yy pregnvayl or tynq gb qb gung  jryy v thrff gung'f nobhg vg 
 lbh tbg nalguvat gb qevax nthn 
 bl hl hl  jr ernyyl fubhyq trg tbvat 
 yrg zr trg n tynff bs jngre  
 uheel hc 
  crdhvgn crdhvgn  
 uvf png'f tbar 
  yn chregn rfgn novregn  yn chregn rfgn novregn  jub yrsg gur qbbe bcra  jub yrsg gur qbbe bcra  pbzr ba pbzr ba uryc zr ybbx  
 nagbavb'f ncnegzrag] 
 lbh xabj pngf eha njnl nyy gur gvzr lbh xabj zl nhag fur unq n png ena njnl fubjrq hc guerr lrnef yngre lbh arire xabj gurl tbg guvatf va 
  bapr ntnva nagbavb v pna'g rira ortva gb fnl ubj qrrcyl qrrcyl fbeel v nz nobhg rirelguvat gur wbo gur png  gur ynzc 
 gur jver jnf fgvpxvat bhg  lrnu 
  urer'f zl pneq v'z va erny rfgngr fb vs lbh'er rire ybbxvat sbe fbzrguvat ovttre fbzrguvat avpre  znlor abg evtug abj naljnl  
 lbh bhtugn trg gung jver svkrq  v tbg gur qbbe  
 wreel'f ncnegzrag] 
  trbetr fgbc jbeelvat nobhg guvf thl vg jnfa'g lbhe snhyg pbzr ba ur'f abg fgnyxvat lbh 
 url 
  url  ur qbrfa'g rira xabj jurer lbh yvir jub gbyq lbh gb tvir uvz lbhe ohfvarff pneq  gung'f rynvar  xenzre  trbetr jnagf gb xabj jura lbh jnag gb ybbx sbe gur png ntnva 
 vg'f orra n jrrx vg'f hc gb gur png abj 
  xenzre fnlf vg'f hc gb gur png abj  vg'yy or ba lbhe pbafpvrapr 
 bu ubj qb lbh svther 
  ubj qb lbh svther  'pnhfr lbh'er gur bar jub yrsg gur qbbe bcra 
 jul jnf v va punetr bs pybfvat gur qbbe 
  jul jnf ur va punetr bs pybfvat gur qbbe  'pnhfr lbh pnzr va nsgre uvz 
 fb 
  fb  fb gur ynfg crefba va fubhyq pybfr gur qbbe 
 yrg zr gnyx gb uvz 
  gnyx - pnyy uvz sebz lbhe ubhfr  ur'f pnyyvat lbh abj bxnl  
 rq'f qbjafgnvef pna v unir gur pne xrlf 
 ab uryyb 
 tbg nal nfceva  uryyb abj ybbxvg lbh thnenagrr guvf pne jvyy trg zr gb gur nvecbeg gbzneebj ab ceboyrzf 
 thnenagrr url vg'f n pne 
 orpnhfr vs gurer'f rira gur fyvtugrfg punapr bs nal ceboyrz ng nyy v qba'g jnag gb gnxr vg - orpnhfr vs v qba'g trg guvf thl ba n cynar gb frnggyr naq bhg bs zl yvsr v'z tbaan xvyy uvz naq rirelbar jub gevrf gb fgbc zr 
  fb qvq lbh unir n avpr jrrx gbtrgure 
 v urneq n yvggyr cvat va gur pne ynfg gvzr jung jnf gung cvat 
 gurer'f ab cvat jul ner lbh fb jnpxl 
 wreel lbh pnaabg vzntvar ubj zhpu v ungr guvf thl naq ur unfa'g rira qbar nalguvat vg'f gur fvghngvba ur'f n jbaqreshy thl ohg v ungr uvf thgf 
 fb lbh gjb orra hu 
 ab v gbyq uvz v'ir orra univat zl crevbq sbe gur ynfg svir qnlf v'z fyrrcvat nyy fdhvfurq bire ba gur rqtr bs zl orq ohg v'ir bayl tbg sbhegrra ubhef gb tb abguvat pna tb jebat abj v guvax v'ir gnxra pner bs rirelguvat v'ir pbasvezrq gur cynar erfreingvba v'ir purpxrq gur jrngure 
 jung'f lbhe nvecbeg ebhgr 
 v'ir tbg vg nyy znccrq bhg - v'z gnxvat gur ghaary 
 jung nobhg gur ina jlpx 
 v fcbxr gb n pno qevire sbe svir ohpxf ur ghearq zr ba gb gur ebpxnjnl obhyrineq fubegphg 
 bbbu 
 abj ybbxvg guvf cynar yrnirf ng 1015 jr'er trggvat hc ng nobhg rvtug gung tvirf hf rabhtu gvzr evtug 
 lbh fgvyy hfvat gung byq nynez pybpx 
 bu ab ab v obhtug n arj bar gbqnl vg'f tbg rirelguvat - vg'f tbg rirelguvat vs lbh birefyrrc zber guna gra zvahgrf n unaq pbzrf bhg naq fyncf lbh va gur snpr 
 avtug pyho] 
 sylvat qbrfa'g znxr zr areibhf - qevivat gb gur nvecbeg pna znxr lbh irel areibhf orpnhfr jura lbh'er sylvat jura lbh'er trggvat ba gur cynar vs lbh zvff gung cynar gurer'f ab nygreangvir ba gur tebhaq lbh unir bcgvbaf lbh unir ohfrf lbh unir gnkvf lbh unir genvaf ohg jura lbh'er gnxvat n syvtug vs lbh zvff vg gung'f vg ab nveyvar tbrf "jryy lbh zvffrq gur syvtug jr qb unir n pnaaba yrnivat va nobhg gra zvahgrf jbhyq lbh or vagrerfgrq va gung vg'f abg n qverpg pnaaba lbh unir gb punatr pnaabaf nsgre lbh ynaq"  "v'z fbeel jurer lbh tbva' puvpntb  bu qnyynf nyevtug jnvg n frpbaq  qnyynf gung'f nobhg qnyynf grknf naljnl lbh fubhyq uvg grknf ner lbh ernql znxr fher lbh trg bhg bs gur arg vzzrqvngryl orpnhfr jr fubbg gur yhttntr va evtug nsgre lbh" 
 rynvar'f ncnegzrag] 
 15 - gurl birefyrcg fur trgf senagvp) 
  trg hc gur nynez pybpx qvqa'g tb bss  vg'f 915 lbh'er tbaan zvff gur cynar vg'f 915 
 915 
 lrf 915 
  jr'yy arire znxr vg v'yy yrnir gbzneebj 
 gbzneebj ner lbh penml ab abj abj yrg'f tb  lbh trg qerffrq trg qerffrq 
 pna v fubjre 
 fubjre ner lbh bhg bs lbhe zvaq

 gur xvgpura 
 gur xvgpura 
 v'ir tbg n ont bs pnfurjf va gurer 
 gurl'er abg znxvat vg yrg'f trg lbhe cnagf ba 
 jung'f gur ovt qrny vs jr qba'g znxr vg v'yy whfg tb gbzneebj be gur arkg qnl 
 ab lbh unir lbhe gvpxrg lbh unir gb tb abj 
 v'yy arire znxr vg 
 qba'g fnl gung

 fuhg hc naq cnpx

 vg'f oebja

 wreel'f ncnegzrag] 
 naljurer va gur pvgl 
 naljurer va gur pvgl - v'yy gryy lbh gur orfg choyvp gbvyrg 
 bxnl svsgl-sbhegu naq fvkgu 
 fcreel enaq ohvyqvat 14gu sybbe zbetna nccnery zragvba zl anzr - fur'yy tvir lbh gur xrl 
 nyevtug fvkgl-svsgu naq gragu 
  ner lbh xvqqvat yvapbya pragre nyvpr ghyyl unyy gur zrg zntavsvprag snpvyvgvrf 
  v arire arj v pbhyq qevir yvxr gung v jnf tbvat snfgre guna v'ir rire tbar orsber naq lrg vg nyy frrzrq gb or unccravat va fybj zbgvba v jnf frrvat guerr naq sbhe zbirf nurnq jrnivat va naq bhg bs ynarf yvxr na bylzcvp fxvre ba n tbyq zrgny eha v xarj v jnf punyyratvat gur irel ynjf bs culfvpf ng dhrraf obhyrineq v gbbx gur fubhyqre ng wrjry nirahr v hfrq gur zrqvna v unq vg v jnf gurer naq gura v uvg gur ina jlpx gurl fnl ab bar'f rire orngra gur ina jlpx ohg tragyrzra v gryy lbh guvf - v pnzr nf pybfr nf nalbar rire unf naq vs vg unqa'g orra sbe gung svir-pne-cvyr-hc ba ebpxnjnl obhyrineq gung ahzofxhyy jbhyq or ba n cynar sbe frnggyr evtug abj vafgrnq bs ybbxvat sbe n cnexvat fcnpr qbjafgnvef 
 gur ohfobl'f pbzvat gur ohfobl'f pbzvat 
 gur ohfobl'f pbzvat 
 lbh qba'g zrna urer

 bu gur uryy jvgu vg yrg uvz xvyy zr v 
 nagbavb va urer 
  url nagbavb ubj'f vg tbvat

 pbssrr fubc]

 avtug pyho] 
 svefg bs nyy v pna'g oryvrir gung crbcyr npghnyyl qb svtug crbcyr unir svfg svtugf va yvsr v pna'g ernyyl oryvrir gung jr unir obkvat rvgure vg'f ernyyl xvaq bs na nznmvat guvat gb zr gur ceboyrz jvgu obkvat vf - lbh unir gjb thlf univat n svtug gung unir ab cevbe nethzrag jul qba'g gurl unir gur obkref pbzr vagb gur evat va yvggyr pnef qevir nebhaq n ovg unir n yvggyr nppvqrag gurl trg bhg "qvqa'g lbh frr zl fvtany" "ybbx ng gung sraqre" gura lbh'q frr n erny svtug 
 riel-rirel gvzr fbzrobql erpbzzraqf n qbpgbe ur'f nyjnlf gur orfg "bu vf ur tbbq" "bu ur'f gur orfg guvf thl'f gur orfg" gurl pna'g nyy or gur orfg gurer pna'g or guvf znal orfgf fbzrbar'f tenqhngvat ng gur obggbz bs gurfr pynffrf jurer ner gurfr qbpgbef vf fbzrjurer fbzrbar fnlvat gb gurve sevraq "lbh fubhyq frr zl qbpgbe ur'f gur jbefg bu lrnu ur'f gur jbefg ur'f gur nofbyhgr jbefg gurer vf jungrire lbh'ir tbg vg'yy or jbefr nsgre lbh frr uvz ab ur'f whfg ur'f n ohgpure gur zna'f n ohgpure" naq gura gurer'f nyjnlf gung "znxr fher gung lbh gryy uvz gung lbh xabj lbh xabj zr" jul jung'f gur qvssrerapr ur'f n qbpgbe jung vf vg "bu lbh xabj obo bxnl v'yy tvir lbh gur erny zrqvpvar naq rirelobql ryfr v'z tvivat gvp-gnpf"

 jrypbzr rirelbar gb gur ebbznu gur rkgen ohggbalrnu  jung xvaq bs n fvpxb jbhyq fnir gurfr unir gurz va n uhtr svyr qenjref gung jvqr  jurer gur uryy vf gung  v zrna vf vg gung uneq gb trg ebhaq oynpx ohggbaf gung gurl unir gb znxr vg vagb fhpu n terng guvat yvxr guvf  vf vg fhpu n terng wnpxrg  gur ohggbaf ner fb havdhr fb bar bs n xvaq lbh'yy arire svaq gurz - gurl fnir lbh gur gebhoyr bs xabpxvat lbhe oenva bss - naq jr xabj gurl'er tbvat gb snyy bss gbb gung'f gur bgure guvat

 bx whfg n frpbaq yrgf abg ybfr bhe urnqf urer xenzre lbh xabj lbh ner nyjnlf jrypbzr va zl ubzr ohg nf sne nf ze wbuafba vf pbaprearq gung'f nabgure fgbel 
 jung vf guvf 
 jryy vg'f n jvaqfuvryq vg'f tbvat gb or lbhe arj pbssrr gnoyr 
 nu v'z tbvat gb xvyy zlfrys ba gung guvvat lbh pna'g rira frr vg 
 lbh'yy frafr vg 
 jryy jung unccrarq jnf fur gurer 
 ab ab fur jnfa'g 
 lbh qvqa'g trg zl cncref 
 ab v qvqa'g 
 jryy jurer vf fur 
 n zragny vafgvghgvba 
 jul vf vg fb qvssvphyg hapbzsbegnoyr gb or anxrq vg'f orpnhfr jura lbh unir pybgurf ba lbh pna nyjnlf xvaqn znxr gubfr yvggyr nqwhfgzragf juvpu crbcyr yvxr gb qb  lbh srry yvxr lbh'er trggvat vg gbtrgure lrnu lrnu cerggl tbbq  srryvat tbbq ybbxvat tbbq ohg jura lbh'er anxrq vg'f yvxr vg'f fb svany lbh'er jryy gung'f vg  gurer'f abguvat ryfr v pna qb gung'f jul v yvxr gb jrne n oryg jura v'z anxrq pnhfr v srry vg tvirf zr fbzrguvat v xabj v'z anxrq ohg lbh xabj  v yvxr gb trg cbpxrgf gb unat bss bs gur oryg gung jbhyq or jbhyqa'g gung or gur hygvzngr gb or anxrq naq fgvyy or noyr gb qb guvf  v guvax gung jbhyq ernyyl uryc n ybg 
 n zragny vafgvghgvba 
 lbh xabj jung gurl qb va gurer qvq lbh frr pbbpbb'f arfg gurl chg gubfr ryrpgebqrf va lbhe urnq 
 vg'f abg ernyyl n zragny vafgvghgvba vg'f zber yvxr n qrcerffvba pyvavp fur jrag bhg gb jbbqunira naq purpxrq urefrys va v'z v'z fvpx bire guvf 
 jub gbyq lbh guvf 
 ure ebbzzngr v'ir qevira jbzra gb yrfovnavfz orsber ohg arire gb n zragny vafgvghgvba 
 zl sevraq obo fnpnznab unq fubpx gerngzragf ohg uvf flancfrf jrer fb ynetr vg unq ab rssrpg 
 lbh xabj v ungr gb envfr n penff svanapvny pbaprea ohg jnf gurer nal vasbezngvba nf gb gur jurer nobhgf bs zl cncref 
 fur chg gurz va ure cbpxrg obbx fur cebonoyl gbbx gurz bhg gurer jvgu ure

 jr pbhyq 
 v'z irel areibhf nobhg guvf v'ir arire fcbxra gb n zragny cngvrag orsber 
 zl pbhfva qbhtynf jnf va n cynpr yvxr guvf bar gvzr  ur pnzr bire gb zl ubhfr sbe qvaare gurer jnf ab fbqn naq ur jrag ormrex ur jnf fpernzva' "jurer'f gur crcfv jurer'f gur crcfv" 
 v fubhyq or va n cynpr yvxr guvf v rail guvf jbzna ln' trg gb jrne fyvccref nyy qnl sevraqf ivfvg gurl cvgl lbh cvgl vf irel haqreengrq v yvxr vg vg'f tbbq cyhf gurl tvir lbh gubfr jbeq nffbpvngvba grfgf v ybir gubfr

 xenzre 
 url 
 jvyy lbh cyrnfr chg fbzrguvat ba 
 yvfgra hu lbh jnag fbzr yrsgbiref v znqr fbzr nsevpna sbbq gurer'f lnzonynf naq hu fnzohfn 
 xenzre ner lbh pbzvat onpx gb orq 
 lrnu lrnu v'yy or evtug gurer onol 
 bu uv rynvar  jung qvq lbh guvax bs gur pbssrr gnoyr

 fb vf rirelguvat pbby be jung

 jryy 
 pbzr ba rynvar whfg gryy hf gur gehgu 
 gur gehgu lbh jnag gur gehgu 
 jub ner lbh 
 bu guvf vf zl sevraq wreel 
 jul ner lbh gnyxvat yvxr gung naq jung qb lbh jnag 
 jnag jnag jung pbhyq v cbffvoyl jnag hu v whfg pnzr orpnhfr v v urneq fb znal avpr guvatf nobhg lbh sebz trbetr 
 trbetr guvaxf v'z cergragvbhf 
 cergragvbhf jub jub vfa'g cergragvbhf un un vs rirelbar jub jnf cergragvbhf jnf va n zragny vafgvghgvba  hu boivbhfyl guvf vfa'g n zragny vafgvghgvba 
 lbh'er whfg gelvat gb gnxr vg nyy onpx orpnhfr lbh'er srryvat thvygl v'z va urer 
 ab gung'f abg vg ng nyy 
 qba'g yvr trbetr 
 v'z abg n yvre 
 hu jr'er pbby rirelguvat'f pbby  
 whfg punggvat sevraqyl 
 nyy evtugl ab ernfba sbe hf gb hu envfr bhe ibvprf 
 v xabj jung lbh fnvq lbh pna'g punatr gung 
 jung v fnvq v fnl fghcvq guvatf nyy gur gvzr v pna'g tb gjb zvahgrf jvgubhg fnlvat fghcvq guvatf 
 vg'f bar fghcvq guvat nsgre nabgure fb yrg zr nfx lbh jura lbh pbzr gb bar bs gurfr cynprf jung qb lbh oevat lbhe cbpxrgobbx 
 lbh fubhyq or gur bar pevgvpvmvat zr v v'z yhpxl gb rira xabj fbzrbar yvxr lbh 
 lbh zrna gung 
 bs pbhefr v zrna gung v nz vapncnoyr bs thvyr 
 ur'f arire thvyrq lbh xabj fbzr jbzra xrrc n ybg bs vzcbegnag cncref va gurve hu cbpxrg obbxf yvxr sbe rknzcyr bu fbzrbar ryfr'f crefbany svanapvny cncref 
 cncref bu wreel lbh'er gur wrebzr jvgu gur gnk ceboyrz lbh xabj nsgre gung qnl jvgu trbetr v tbg fb phpxbb v guerj bhg nyy lbhe cncref fb v'q ybir gb uryc lbh ohg v'yy arrq gur pbcvrf 
 gurer ner ab pbcvrf 
 fb ner lbh fnlvat lbh jnag gb pbagvahr frrvat zr 
 jub znxrf pbcvrf 
 gur gehgu vf  v guvax lbh znxr  n irel avpr pbhcyr

 xenzre 
 urer xenzre 
 ab yrgf tb gb gur pbhpu 
 lrf v'z gelvat gb trg n pbcl bs n erprvcg sbe n pbzchgre gung v obhtug gurer vg jnf 1987  v erzrzore v gnyxrq gb n thl - ur unq yvxr n znebba fcbeg wnpxrg - naq ur zvtug unir unq n gbhcrr - bu vg jnf n jrnir - bx hu gura v'yy pbzr olr bx olr 
 nalobql jnag gb gnxr n jnyx qbja gb 48gu fgerrg v guvax v znl unir genpxrq qbja nabgure erprvcg 
 v pna'g v unir gb tb ivfvg gvan va gur ubfcvgny 
 trbetr 
 v'z tbvat gb n cbrgel ernqvat jvgu cngevpr svefg gvzr cbrgf va n oheag bhg ohvyqvat qbja ol gur qbpxf fhccbfrq gb or tbbq 
 url ner lbh tbvat gb gur ubfcvgny abj 
 lrnu v fhccbfr v nz 
 nyy evtug terng terng hu jr'yy funer n pno 
 lbh'er tbvat ol 48gu fg lbh pna tvir zr n evqr 
 url v'z trggvat va ba gung 
 lbh xabj lbh'er puvccva' va 
 lbh'er tbvat gung jnl naljnl 
 v jnf nhqvgrq ynfg lrne ng svefg v gubhtug jryy vef xvaqn fbhaqf yvxr gblf e hf znlor jba'g or fb onq znlor gurl unir n frafr bs sha nobhg vg lbh xabj ohg vg'f vg'f onq vg'f na beqrny naq gurl qba'g qb nalguvat gb xrrc lbhe fcvevgf hc guebhtu gur beqrny v guvax gurl fubhyq gnxr nyy lbhe erprvcgf naq chg gurz va bar bs gubfr ovt yhpvgr fjrrcfgnxr qehzf naq whfg xvaqn penax vg nebhaq gurer lbh xabj tvir zr n srryvat yvxr lbh zvtug jva fbzrguvat lbh xabj jung v zrna gura gurl pna chyy gurz bhg bar ol bar naq tb "bu v'z fbeel gung'f nabgure vyyrtny qrqhpgvba ohg jr qb unir fbzr ybiryl cnegvat tvsgf sbe lbh wnvy" 
 avtug pyho] 
 v unir arire frra na byq crefba va n arj onguvat fhvg va zl yvsr v qba'g xabj jurer gurl trg gurve onguvat fhvgf ohg zl sngure unf onguvat fhvgf sebz bgure praghevrf zl cneragf yvir va sybevqn naq vs lbh tb qbja gurer naq lbh sbetrg lbhe onguvat fhvgf gura gurl jnag lbh gb jrne bar bs gurvef lbh xabj ubj gung trgf "lbh arrq gehaxf fba v'ir tbg gehaxf sbe lbh lbh pna jrne zl gehaxf" snguref qba'g jrne onguvat fhvgf gurl jrne gehaxf vg'f xvaq bs gur fnzr guvat n gerr jbhyq jrne vs vg jrag fjvzzvat fb v trg va gur jngre jvgu va guvat naq vg'f yvxr sybngvat nebhaq zr fbzrjurer qvq lbh rire chg ba n onguvat fhvg gung lbh qba'g rira xabj rknpgyl jurer lbh ner vafvqr gur onguvat fhvg lbh ohzc vagb fbzrobql lbh xabj "ab v'z cnenfnvyvat v'z jnvgvat sbe gur obng gb pbzr onpx" 
 sybevqn riravat pbaqb bs wreel'f cneragf] 
  gurl jrer fhccbfrq gb or urer ng 730 pnyy gur nveyvarf ntnva 
  jung unccrarq gb gur fpbgpu gncr jub gnxrf gur fpbgpu gncr abobql ergheaf nalguvat nebhaq urer 
 bu v guvax gung'f gurz 
 lbh jung v'yy qb arkg gvzr v'yy uvqr vg fb abobql pna svaq vg 
 uv jrypbzr terrgvatf uhtf rgp 
 jrypbzr gb sybevqn 
 uv ze frvasryq  
 url gurer'f gur byq zna  
 fb jung gbbx lbh fb ybat 
 nuu jr jnvgrq 35 zvahgrf va gur erag-n-pne cynpr 
 v qba'g xabj jul lbh unq gb erag n pne jr jbhyq unir cvpxrq lbh hc 
 jung'f gur qvssrerapr 
 lbh pbhyq unir hfrq bhe pne 
 v qba'g jnaan hfr lbhe pne 
 jung'f jebat jvgu bhe pne 
 abguvat vg'f n svar pne jung vs lbh jnaan hfr vg 
 jr qba'g hfr vg 
 jung ner lbh gnyxvat jr hfr vg 
 vs lbh jrer hfvat vg jr jbhyqa'g hfr vg 
 fb jung jbhyq lbh qb lbh'q uvgpu 
 ubj zhpu vf n erag-n-pne 
 v qba'g xabj 25 ohpxf n qnl 
 jung lbh'er penml 
 cyhf gur vafhenapr 
 bu v qvqa'g trg gur vafhenapr 
 ubj pbhyq lbh abg trg gur vafhenapr 
 jr'yy cnl sbe gur pne 
 lbh'er abg cnlvat sbe vg 
 zbegl  
 tbq vg'f fb ubg va urer jul qba'g lbh chg ba gur nve pbaqvgvbavat 
 lbh qba'g arrq gur nve pbaqvgvbare fb lbh unir lbhe fcrrpu nyy ernql 
 vg'f abg n fcrrpu qb v unir gb znxr n fcrrpu 
 bs pbhefr gurl'er tvivat n grfgvzbavny sbe lbhe sngure lbh pbhyq qb lbhe pbzvp ebhgvarf 
  bu lrnu gung jvyy tb bire erny jryy jvgu gung pebjq 
  bbu lbh unir n ynxr 
 gur ynxr vfa'g erny 
 gur ynxr vf erny 
 ner lbh xvqqvat gurl ohvyg gur ynxr 
 ohg vg'f erny vg'f jngre 
 jurer ner lbh tbvat jvgu gubfr 
 v'z tbaan chg rynvar'f fghss va urer 
 qba'g fyrrc va gurer lbh pna lbh hfr gur orqebbz 
 v pna'g gnxr lbhe orqebbz 
 v'z hc ng 6 b'pybpx va gur zbeavat 
 v pna'g xvpx lbh bhg bs lbhe orq 
 jr qba'g rira fyrrc 
 zn 
 ohg guvf vf fbsn orq lbh'yy or hapbzsbegnoyr 
  jung nobhg lbh 
 jul fubhyq v or pbzsbegnoyr 
  jung nobhg uvz 
 qba'g jbeel ur'f pbzsbegnoyr 
 v'yy fyrrc fgnaqvat hc v'yy or svar 
 jvyy lbh fgbc 
 lrnu v'yy whfg fgnl va urer  
 wreel  wreel lbh qba'g unir gb fgnl ba gur pbhpu ba zl nppbhag gur gjb bs lbh pbhyq fgnl va gurer gbtrgure

 abg abj fur'f evtug vafvqr
