 fuu abguvat abguvat 
 rynvar 
  jung nobhg ure 
  ohg lbh xabj ybbx ng gur fha-qevrq gbzngbrf jurer jrer gurl svir lrnef ntb vg whfg tbrf gb fubj lbh lbh arire xabj jung uhu  lbh xabj uhu jung pbhyq unccra gb n irtrgnoyr vg pbhyq whfg gnxr evtug bss ng nal gvzr  jr'ir gevrq nyy xvaq bs neenatrzragf ohg jr pna'g frrz gb or sevraqf jura jr fyrrc gbtrgure 
  jul qb lbh arrq zber sevraqf lbh'ir tbg cyragl bs sevraqf 
 ur'f na vqrnyvfg

 guvf vf wnpx naq qbevf arvtobbef)

 sbe sha

 ab gunaxf ab

 v qba'g guvax fb 
 ab yvfgra zbegl lbh jnaan frggyr hc sbe ynfg avtug  nyy evtug v bjr lbh 1945$

 vg'f 1945$ zbegl

 pbzr ba 
  fur'f nqbenoyr  
  jung qvq lbh gnxr uvf cra sbe 
 jung ur tnir vg gb zr 
 lbh qvqa'g unir gb gnxr vg 
 bu zl tbq fur'f tbggn znxr n ovt qrny bhg bs rirelguvat 
 ur bssrerq vg gb zr 
 orpnhfr lbh znqr fhpu n ovt shff nobhg vg 
 v yvxrq vg fubhyq v unir fnvq v qvqa'g yvxr vg 
 lbh fubhyqa'g unir fnvq nalguvat jung qvq lbh rkcrpg uvz gb qb  
 ur pbhyq unir fnvq "gunax lbh v yvxr vg gbb" naq chg vg onpx va uvf cbpxrg 
 ur ybirf gung cra 
 bu pbzr ba 
 ur gnyxf nobhg vg nyy gur gvzr rirel gvzr ur gnxrf vg bhg ur tbrf ba naq ba nobhg ubj vg jevgrf hcfvqr qbja ubj gur nfgebanhgf hfr vg 
 vs ur yvxrf vg fb zhpu ur arire fubhyq unir bssrerq vg 
 ur qvqa'g guvax lbh'q nppcrg 
 jryy ur jnf jebat

 fb lbh jnag zr gb erghea vg 
 lrf

 url v qba'g rira jnag gur cra abj

 pbaqb'f thrfg ebbz] 
 pbzr va 
 ner lbh bx va urer 
 jul vf vg fb ubg va urer ubj pna gurl fyrrc yvxr guvf 
 vg'f bayl sbe guerr qnlf gbqnl'f bire naq jr unir gbzzbebj jr yrnir ba fhaqnl vg'f bar qnl ernyyl 
 bu zna jung vf jvgu guvf one vg'f evtug va zl onpx vg'f xvyyvat zr 
 bu lbh jnaan fjvgpu v'z fyrrcvat ba n ybir frng v'ir tbg zl srrg hc va gur nve yvxr v'z va n fcnpr pncfhyr 
 v nz arire tbaan snyy nfyrrc 
 bu ab qba'g fnl gung lbh'yy wvak zr 
 ubj pna gurl abg chg gur nve pbaqvgvbavat ba 
 gurl'er ahgf jvgu grzcrengher 
 guvf one vf evtug va zl onpx vg'f znxvat n qrag 
 ubj nobhg gung thl jevgvat n purpx sbe 1945 
 v'z fjrngvat urer v'z va orq fjrngvat 
 vg'f bar qnl unys n qnl ernyyl v zrna lbh fhofgenpg fubjref naq zrnyf vg'f yvxr gjragl zvahgrf vg jvyy tb ol yvxr gung  
 pbaqb zbeavat] 
 fgnl ba 95 fbhgu gb ovfpnlar obhyrineq gura lbh znxr n yrsg ghea chg lbh oyvaxre ba vzzrqvngyl gurer'f na nohgzrag gurer gura lbh'er tbaan zretr bire irel dhvpxyl ohg fgnl ba ovfpnlar qba'g trg bss ovfpnlar lbh haqrefgnaq zr 
 fgnl ba ovfpnlar 
 lbh'er tbvat haqrejngre 
 lrf trarenyyl gung'f jurer fphon qvivat vf qbar 
 jung qb lbh unir gb tb haqrejngre sbe jung'f qbja gurer gung'f fb fcrpvny 
 jung'f fb fcrpvny hc urer 
 bu 
 jung'f gur znggre 
 zl onpx 
 jung unccrarq 
 gung gung orq gur one jnf evtug va zl onpx 
  v gbyq lbh gb yrg hf fyrrc va gurer 
 gura lbh jbhyq or uhapurq bire 
 v qba'g rira xabj vs v pna tb fphon qvivat

 fb fgnl ubzr

 qba'g tb 
 lbh fher 
 znlor lbh fubhyq frr n qbpgbe

  lrf 
 ab jr'yy fgnl va gurer 
 jul qba'g lbh trg n arj fbsn 
 abobql hfrf vg

 bu wreel qba'g gnyx penml 
 zef frvasryq cyrnfr v nz orttvat lbh chg gur nve pbaqvgvbare ba 
 lbh'er ubg 
 v'ir ybfg 6 cbhaqf

  uv riryla 
 wreel lbh tbg guva 
 gbb guva 
 bu fgbc jbeelvat fb zhpu nobhg ubj lbh ybbx 
 fb jurer'f gur arj cra

 gur cra gur bar wnpx xybzchf tnir lbh 
 ubj qvq lbh xabj gung 
 oynapur gbyq zr 
 oynapur 
 gung'f fbzr tbbq cra vg jevgrf hcfvqr qbja 
 gur nfgebanhgf hfr gurz 
 jung qvq oynapur fnl 
 v qba'g xabj fur fnvq wreel jnagrq gur cra 
 v arire ernyyl jnagrq gur cra 
 ur tnir uvz gur cra 
 zbegl 
 jul lbh qba'g yvxr gur cra 
 ab ab v 
 pnhfr vs lbh qba'g yvxr vg tvir vg onpx gb uvz 
 vf gung jung fur fnvq 
 jub 
 oynapur 
 jung ner lbh gnyxvat nobhg 
 uryyb bu uryyb thffl jung wreel jbhyqa'g qb gung wnpx tnir vg gb uvz nyy ur fnvq jnf ur yvxrq vg v zrna abobql chg n tha gb uvf urnq  lbh'er tvivat uvz onpx gung cra  
 fbzrobql cyrnfr-- gur nve pbaqvgvbare 
  bu v sbetbg nyy nobhg vg 
 nyy v fnvq jnf "v yvxr gur cra" 
 ubj gur uryy qb lbh jbex guvf guvat 
 fgvyy gur pbaqb yngre] 
 znlor lbh fubhyqa'g tb gbavtug 
 ab ab v jnaan tb 
 ohg lbhe onpx uhegf 
 znlor n pbhcyr bs zhfpyr erynkref jbhyq uryc 
 bu bu bx  lbh pna ghea qbja gur nve pbaqvgvbavat vs lbh jnag 
 ab v'z svar 
 lbh'er abg gbb pbyq 
 ab 
 qba'g or nynezrq 
 bu zl tbq jung gur uryy unccrarq gb lbh 
 v'z bx zl pncvyynevrf ohefg 
 lbhe pncvyynevrf qb lbh xabj jung lbh ybbx yvxr 
  ubj ner lbh qbvat 
 univat n tbbq gvzr 
 vf vg zl vzntvangvba be vf vg serrmvat va urer 
 jung unccrarq gb lbhe rlrf 
 jryy v fgnegrq gb tb haqre 
 jvgu gur vafgehpgbe 
 lrnu naq v tbg nobhg gra srrg qbja naq v sryg guvf gerzraqbhf cerffher ba zl znfx yvxr zl rlronyyf jrer orvat fhpxrq bhg bs gurve fbpxrgf 
 v gbyq lbh 
 rkphfr zr  qbevf jbhyq yvxr gb obeebj erq lbhe cbpxrgobbx gb tb jvgu ure fubrf  gur fubrf unir gb zngpu gur cbpxrgobbx  jung'f fur qbvat lbtn 
 zl onpx uhegf 
 zbegl lbh tbggn uheel hc trg ernql 
 jr tbg cyragl bs gvzr 
  jung unccrarq gb lbh 
 v tbg va n svfg svtug jvgu bar bs gur ynqvrf ng gur cbby 
 vg'f sebz fphon qvivat 
 jung'f gurer gb frr haqrejngre 
 tvir uvz onpx gur cra) 
 yvfgra z xybzchf vg jnf ernyyl n avpr trfgher bs lbh gb tvir zr gur cra ohg v qba'g ernyyl arrq vg 
 lbh jung 
 v zrna vg'f n greevsvp cra ohg v guvax lbh fubhyq xrrc vg  
 jryy v zrna 
 gnxr vg 
 nyy evtug  
 lbh xabj wnpx lbh'ir tbg n uryy bs n areir gnxvat gung xvq'f cra 
 jubfr cra 
 uvf cra 
 guvf unccraf gb or zl cra 
 lbh qvqa'g tvir vg gb uvz 
 jung ner lbh gnyxvat nobhg ur cengvpnyyl orttrq zr sbe vg 
 jurer qb lbh pbzr bss jvgu guvf penc 
 yvfgra qb lbh guvax v gnxr rirelguvat rirelobql bssref zr lbh bssrerq zr fcbatr pnxr lrfgreqnl qvq v gnxr vg 
 lbh fnvq lbh qvqa'g jnag vg 
 bs pbhefr v jnagrq vg v ybir fcbatr pnxr 
 gura jub gur uryy fnvq lbh pbhyqa'g unir nal v zrna jung gur uryy qb v pner jurgure lbh unir fcbatr pnxr 
 orpnhfr v fnj gur ybbx ba lbhe snpr ynfg jrrx jura v gbbx gur fpbgpu gncr 
 nuu nuu fb lbh tbg gur fpbgpu gncr v'ir orra ybbxvat nyy bire sbe vg 
 qba'g jbeel nobhg vg v'yy tvir vg onpx 
 v qba'g jnag vg 
 v qba'g jnag vg 
 lbh xabj wnpx qb zr n snibe jvyy lbh gnxr gur cra naq gur fpbgpu gncr naq trg gur uryy bhg bs urer 
 yvfgra qb lbh guvax v tvir n qnza 
 nnu  gur areir bs gung thl gnxvat onpx gung cra jryy gung'f vg sbe gurz 
 jung vf tbvat ba va guvf pbzzhavgl ner lbh crbcyr njner bs jung'f unccravat jung vf qevivat lbh gb guvf orunivbe vf vg gur uhzhqvgl vf vg gur zhmnx vf vg gur juvgr fubrf 
 v unir ab hfr sbe rvgure bar bs gurz v qba'g rira jnag gurz gurer gbavtug  
 vfa'g ur fhccbfrq gb or gur rzprr 
 lrnu ur'f fhccbfrq gb or gur rzprr 
 jryy guvf fubhyq or n irel vagrerfgvat riravat 
  hu jung nobhg gubfr zhfpyr erynkref 
 erprcgvba ebbz riravat] 
 fnl nfgebanhg 
 fnl jung  fnl jung 
  lbh gbbx gbb znal bs gubfr cvyyf 
 nfgebanhg 
 fnl vg 
 nfgebanhg 
  nfgebanhg 
 tbbq bx  jung nobhg ynfg lrne jura v gbbx uvz gb gur ubfcvgny rirel qnl qvq ur rire fnl gunax lbh 
 bu tbq  
  hapyr yrb 
 uryyb 
 zbegl ner lbh areibhf 
 jung areibhf 
  jung'f jvgu gur fhatynffrf jub ner lbh ina wbuafba 
 v'ir tbg n oynpx rlr 
  uryyb 
 bu hu rynvar guvf vf zl nhag fgryyn 
  fgryyn fgryyn 
  ure onpx uhegf 
 uhzz jr fnj lbh ba "gur gbavtug fubj" ynfg jrrx 
 v gubhtug wbuaal jnf irel ehqr gb lbh ur qvqa'g rira yrg lbh gnyx 
 ab ab 
 lbh arrq fbzr arj zngrevny v'ir urneq lbh qb gung qbt ebhgvar guerr gvzrf nyernql 
  fgryyn fgryyn 
 yvfgra lbh fubhyq trg lbhe pbhfva wrsserl gb jevgr fbzr zngrevny sbe lbh 
 jung ner lbh gnyxvat wrsserl jbexf sbe gur cnexf qrcnegzrag 
 lbh fubhyq ernq gur yrggref ur'f jevggra ur'f shaavre guna gur jubyr ohapu bs lbh  bu urer'f wnpx jr fubhyq fvg qbja 
  guvf orggre or tbbq v'z zvffvat "tbyqra tveyf" sbe guvf 
  v ungr ure yvxr cbvfba 
 "url wnpx yrg'f trg fgnegrq" rirelbar nccynhfr naq jr frr sebz yrsg gb evtug nyy fvggvat ba gur fnzr fvqr bs n ybat gnoyr snpvat gur choyvp fgryyn yrb rynvar wreel uryra zbegl wnpx ng gur zvpebcubar qbevf naq sbhe bgure crbcyr) 
  ynqvrf naq tragyrzra nf lbh xabj rirel lrne cunfr gjb bs gur cvarf bs znex tnoyrf ubabef gur cerivbhf lrne cerfvqrag naq guvf lrne jr ner ubabevat zbegl frvasryq  n zna jub fyrcg zber ubhef ba gur wbo guna ebanyq erntna 
  fyrcg ba gur wbo  
 orvat cerfvqrag bs gur pbaqb vf abg rnfl vg erdhverf uneq jbex qrqvpngvba naq pbzzvgzrag naq hasbeghangryl ur cbffrffrf abar bs gurfr dhnyvgvrf  
  ur'f wbxvat 
 uvf nqzvavfgengvba qvq rkpry va bar qrcnegzrag gur uvevat bs vapbzcrgragf 
  gung'f jung lbh fnl 
 ohg jr qb bjr uvz n qrog bs tengvghqr orpnhfr ol abg svkvat gur penpx va gur fvqrjnyx ur chg zef mvira bhg bs pbzzvffvba sbe n srj jrrxf  
  gryy gurz jura lbh gbbx zl fba'f cra onpx gryy gurz nobhg gung  
 qnq 
  ur tnir zl fba n cra naq gura ur gnxrf vg onpx gryy gurz nobhg gung 
 ur tnir vg gb zr 
 pbzr ba gung'f rabhtu fvg qbja 
 v'z abg fvggvat qbja 
 bj lbh oebxr zl qragny cyngr  qbevf ur oebxr zl qragny cyngr lbh fba-bs-n-ovgpu v'z tbaan fhr lbh  
 wreel qb lbhe npg 
  v pna'g abobql'f rira yvfgravat 
 gurl'er nyy tbaan yrnir 
  bu tbq  uhu url ubj lbh sbyxf qbvat gbavtug  
 jub ner lbh 
  unir lbh rire abgvprq ubj gurl nyjnlf tvir lbh gur crnahgf ba gur cynarf 
  abg zl uneel ur syvrf svefg pynff 
 jub rire gubhtug gur svefg guvat fbzrobql jnagf ba n cynar vf n crnahg 
 v'q engure unir n obggyr bs fpbgpu 
  qb gur qbt ebhgvar 
 nyy v fnvq jnf v yvxrq gur cra 
  fgryyn 
 pbaqb zbeavat] 
 lbh pbhyq ntteningr vg v jbhyqa'g tb naljurer sbe ng yrnfg svir qnlf 
 svir qnlf lbh jnag zr gb fgnl urer sbe svir zber qnlf 
 gurer zhfg or fbzr zvfgnxr 
 v'z nsenvq abg 
  svir qnlf urer 
  fb jr unir lbh sbe svir zber qnlf 
  jryy gurer'f ernyyl ab cbvag va zr fgnlvat v zrna lbh whfg tbaan or 
 rkphfr zr 
 abguvat 
 tbbq zbeavat 
 uv riryla 
  unf zbegl qrpvqrq ba n ynjlre lrg 
 v qba'g guvax fb 
 orpnhfr zl arcurj yneel pbhyq qb vg ur'f n oevyyvnag ynjlre ur fnlf wnpx unf ab pnfr 
 jryy v'yy nfx uvz jura ur trgf hc 
 bu naq v fcbxr gb neabyq naq ur fnlf gung nppbeqvat gb gur olynjf bs gur pbaqb pbafgvghgvba gurl arrq fvk ibgrf gb guebj lbh bhg sbe haehyl orunivbe abg svir qbpgbe pureabi vf gur bar lbh'yy unir gb fhpx hc gb 
 nj nj bu zl onpx bu zl onpx vg'f gung one jub gur uryy pbhyq fyrrc ba gung guvat 
 v jnf irel pbzsbegnoyr 
 zbegl neabyq fnlf gurl arrq fvk ibgrf gb guebj lbh bhg 
 vg'f va gur pbafgvghgvba 
  jub ner lbh 
 v'z n puvebcenpgbe 
 jung ner lbh xvqqvat zr 
  svir zber qnlf 
 jryy gbqnl'f nyzbfg bire naq jrrxqnlf nyjnlf tb ol snfg sevqnl jr'er yrnivat vg'f yvxr gjb qnlf ernyyl vg'f yvxr n phc bs pbssrr vg jvyy tb ol yvxr gung  
 avtug pyho pybfvat zbabybthr] 
 vf sybevqn abg ubg naq zhttl rabhtu sbe gurfr crbcyr gurl ybir urng v zrna vs gurl rire qrpvqr gb ynaq zra ba gur fha v guvax gurfr byq ergverq thlf jbhyq or gur bayl barf gung jvyy or noyr gb unaqyr vg gurl'yy whfg fvg gurer ba gur fha ba gur erqjbbq orapurf jnfupybgu ba gur urnq tbvat "pybfr gur qbbe lbh'er yrggvat nyy gur urng bss gur fha v'z gelvat gb trg n fjrng tbvat" 
 fb v'z ba gur cynar jr yrsg yngr cvybg fnlf jr'er tbvat gb or znxvat hc fbzr gvzr va gur nve v gubhtug jryy vfa'g gung vagrerfgvat jr'yy whfg znxr hc gvzr gung'f jul lbh unir gb erfrg lbhe jngpu jura lbh ynaq bs pbhefr jura gurl fnl gurl'er znxvat hc gvzr boivbhfyl gurl'er vapernfvat gur fcrrq bs gur nvepensg abj zl dhrfgvba vf vs lbh pna tb snfgre jul qba'g lbh whfg tb nf snfg nf lbh pna nyy gur gvzr p'zba gurer'f ab pbcf hc urer anvy vg tvir vg fbzr tnf jr'er sylvat 
 geniryyvat bs pbhefr vf gur orfg rqhpngvba qb lbh xabj ynfg lrne v jnf va bire sbegl sbegl-svir pbhagevrf naq v jbhyq unir tbar gb zber ohg v unq whfg tbg n chccl naq ur jnf gbb lbhat gb gnxr jvgu zr ohg abj v jba'g geniry jvgubhg uvz 
 vf ur ba gur cynar abj 
 bu lrf lrf ur'f va gur ur'f va gur onttntr pbzcnegzrag v qba'g xabj jul gurl jba'g yrg uvz fvg hc urer jvgu zr ur'f n ybg orggre orunirq guna zbfg bs gur qertf lbh svaq baobneq urer qb lbh qb lbh unir nal crgf 
 hu whfg zl arkg qbbe arvtuobe 
 lbh'er zvffvat bhg ba n eryngvbafuvc gung pbhyq raevpu lbhe yvsr va jnlf gung lbh arire pbhyq unir gubhtug cbffvoyr 
 ubjobhg cvpxvat hc gurve lbh xabj lbh svaq gung raevpuvat 
 jung'f gur znggre 
 bu v'z srryvat n ovg dhrnfl 
 fve jr'er tbaan znxr na rzretrapl ynaqvat va puvpntb naq trg lbh gb n ubfcvgny 
 zl qbt jung nobhg zl qbt 
 hu lbh unir n qbt 
 qb lbh xabj nalbar ba gur cynar ze cnybar 
 wreel 
 uhu ubj lbh srryvat 
 jbhyq lbh gnxr pner bs snesry 
 snesry 
 vg'f uvf qbt jr'er ynaqvat va puvpntb gb trg uvz gb n ubfcvgny pbhyq lbh gnxr uvf qbt gb arj lbex 
 gur qbt gur qbt 
 v'z fher vg'f bayl sbe n qnl be gjb 
 ohg lbh xabj jung vs lbh xabj 
 tvir zr lbhe nqqerff naq cubar ahzore v'yy pnyy lbh 
 gur qbt 
 yrg tb snesry yrg tb tvzzr gung tvzzr gur farnxre lbh fghcvq vqvbg fuhg hc  fb jung jbhyq lbh qb 
 jryy vg'f bayl orra guerr qnlf v'z fher ur'f tbaan pnyy 
 fgbc vg fuhg hhhhhhc  qb lbh oryvrir guvf qb lbh oryvrir jung v'z qrnyvat jvgu urer v'ir tbg n jvyq navzny va gur ubhfr ur'f qrenatrq znlor ur'f tbg enovrf v pna trg ybpxwnj 
 vs bayl 
 ybbx ng guvf cynpr ur'f tbvat rireljurer v pna'g tb bhg bs gur ubhfr ng avtug v unira'g cresbezrq va guerr qnlf guvf'yy or zl svefg avtug bhg bs gur ubhfr fvapr v tbg onpx 
 url jura lbh jnyx uvz qb ln 
 qb v jung 
 qb lbh cvpx vg hc 
 lrf v cvpx vg hc 
 lbh cvpx vg hc 
 jryy lbh unir gb 
 bu obl jbhyq v ybir gb frr gung 
 fuhg hc fuhg hc snesry fgbc vg  v qba'g xabj jung gb qb v zrna jung vs v gnxr vg gb gur cbhaq gura gur thl fubjf hc 
 znlor lbh fubhyq pnyy gur nveyvar gurl zvtug xabj jurer ur vf 
 ab v gevrq gurl qba'g xabj nalguvat  lbh tbggn chg gur flehc va svefg 
 ab zvyx 
 v'z gryyvat lbh gur thl'f n qehax ur'f cebonoyl ba n oraqre 
 jung vf n oraqre nalubj 
 v qba'g xabj gurl qevax naq gurl oraq guvatf ng gur one 
 v pna'g oryvrir ur unfa'g pnyyrq 
 gjb uhaqerq frngf ba n cynar v tbggn jvaq hc arkg gb lhxba wnpx naq uvf qbt phwb fuhg hc bar zber qnl naq lbh ner cbhaq obhaq 
 fbeel v pna'g jngpu gur qbt gbavtug 
 jul 
 jr'er tbvat gb gur zbivrf jr'er tbaan frr cebtabfvf artngvir 
 v pna'g v tbggn trg guvf ryyra bhg bs zl yvsr 
 lbh'er oernxvat hc 
 bu ub ub ub lrnu gur fbbare gur orggre v pna'g jnvg gb qb vg lbh xabj ubj gurer'f fbzr crbcyr lbh jbeel nobhg jurgure lbh'er tbvat gb uheg gurve srryvatf jvgu ure v'z ybbxvat sbejneq gb vg v'q yvxr gb trg vg ba ivqrb jngpu vg va fybj zbgvba naq serrmr senzr vg bu ub lrnu 
 xenzre v qba'g xabj ubj lbh ynfgrq nf ybat nf lbh qvq 
 jbnu lbh qvqa'g yvxr ure 
 vs lbh pbhyq frr ure crefbanyvgl vg jbhyq or yvxr bar bs gur ryrcunag zna rkuvovgf lbh xabj jurer gurl chyy bss gur furrg naq rirelbar tnfcf 
 v pna'g oryvrir fbzrbar unfa'g xvyyrq ure lrg 
 ubj pbzr lbh arire fnvq nalguvat 
 jryy lbh pna'g gryy fbzrbar ubj lbh srry nobhg gurve tveysevraq hagvy nsgre gurl fgbc frrvat gurz 
 v gryy lbh 
 lbh v'z gnyxvat nobhg crbcyr 
 ner jr fgvyy tbvat gb gur zbivrf gbavtug 
 ab v pna'g v tbggn jngpu snesry lbh naq trbetr pna tb jvgubhg zr 
 whfg zr naq trbetr 
 fher 
 ohg jr arrq lbh 
 jung qb lbh arrq zr sbe 
 orpnhfr lrnu 
 cebtabfvf artngvir  
 orpnhfr v eryngr gb trbetr guebhtu lbh jr'er yvxr sevraqf-va-ynj orfvqrf lbh fnvq jr jrer tbaan frr cebtabfvf artngvir gbtrgure pna'g lbh whfg chg fbzr arjfcncref qbja be fbzrguvat 
 ab v pna'g gehfg uvz ur trgf vafnar v jba'g rawbl zlfrys gung'f evtug snesry v'z gnyxvat nobhg lbh 
 whfg zr naq trbetr nybar 
 yrg'f tb crbcyr yrg'f tb vg'f cebtabfvf artngvir gvzr jn un un un 
 v pna'g tb 
 pna'g tb jul abg 
 orpnhfr v unir gb jngpu vqvbg snesry 
 v gubhtug xenzre jnf jngpuvat 
 ur'f oernxvat hc jvgu uvf tveysevraq gbavtug 
 jryy fb jung'f gur ceboyrz lbh whfg chg fbzr arjfcncre qbja 
 ab v qba'g jnag gung fzryy va gur ubhfr 
 lbh fcevgm n yvggyr ylfby ba vg 
 ab vg'f yvxr ob naq pbybtar gurl pbzovar sbeprf vagb fbzr xvaq bs fgenatr zhgnag shax 
 fb jr'er abg tbvat 
 anu lbh gjb tb 
 bu lbh fgvyy jnaan tb 
 qb qb lbh 
 vs lbh jnag 
 vgf vg'f hc gb lbh 
 tb nurnq 
 jryy vg'f v ernyyl jnagrq gb frr cebtabfvf artngvir jvgu wreel hu lbh jnaan frr cbapr qr yrba 
 cbapr qr yrba bxnl  lbh fher lbh qba'g jnaan tb 
 v jnag gb ohg v pna'g 
 bu v gryy lbh jung ubj nobhg vs v pbzr onpx urer svefg naq v pyrna rirelguvat hc naq v bcra hc gur jvaqbjf naq vs lbh'er fgvyy abg fngvfsvrq jr pna fjvgpu ncnegzragf sbe gur avtug 
 ab 
 jung nobhg guvf-- 
 sbetrg vg tb nurnq lbh'yy unir n tbbq gvzr 
 v xabj vg'f abg gung 
 vg'f whfg jr jnag lbh gb tb 
 jryy gunax lbh irel zhpu v'z gryyvat lbh bar zber qnl fgvaxoerngu 
 ba zl oybpx n ybg bs nu crbcyr jnyx gurve qbtf naq v nyjnlf frr gurz jnyxvat nybat jvgu gurve yvggyr cbbc ontf juvpu gb zr vf whfg gur ybjrfg shapgvba bs uhzna yvsr vs nyvraf ner jngpuvat guvf guebhtu gryrfpbcrf gurl'er tbaan guvax gur qbtf ner gur yrnqref vs lbh frr gjb yvsr sbezf bar bs gurz'f znxvat n cbbc gur bgure bar'f pneelvat vg sbe uvz jub jbhyq lbh nffhzr jnf va punetr 
 fb ubj ybat qvq lbh yvir gurer 
 nobhg guerr lrnef 
 gung'f cerggl ybat 
 uzz 
 vg'f abg gung ybat ernyyl 
 lrnu 
 naq gura lbh pnzr urer 
 lrnu fb v'ir orra urer nobhg fvk lrnef 
 rvtugl-fvk rvtugl-frira rvtugl-rvtug rvtugl-avar avargl avargl-bar lhc 
 onq qbt onq qbt lbh tb bhgfvqr bhgfvqr jung qb lbh jnag sebz zr gryy zr zbarl lbh jnag zbarl v'yy tvir lbh zbarl ubj zhpu 
 v zhfg unir orra bhg bs zl zvaq ybbx ng lbh jul qba'g lbh qb fbzrguvat jvgu lbhe yvsr fvg nebhaq urer nyy qnl lbh pbagevohgr abguvat gb fbpvrgl lbh'er whfg gnxvat hc fcnpr ubj pbhyq v or jvgu fbzrbar yvxr lbh jbhyqa'g erfcrpg zlfrys 
 v yvxr ureony grn 
 punzbzvyr'f tbbq yrzba yvsg nyzbaq cyrnfher 
 wreel yvxrf zbeavat guhaqre 
 wreel qevaxf zbeavat guhaqre 
 lrnu 
 zbeavat guhaqre unf pnssrvar va vg wreel qbrfa'g qevax pnssrvar 
 wreel qbrfa'g xabj zbeavat guhaqre unf pnssrvar va vg 
 lbh qba'g gryy uvz 
 ab naq lbh fubhyq frr uvz zna ur trgf nyy ulcre ur qbrfa'g rira xabj jul ur ybirf vg ur jnyxf nebhaq tbvat "tbq v srry terng" 
 lbh qba'g gryy uvz 
 ab 
 gung vf fb shaal 
 v xabj 
 jnvg unir lbh rire frra uvz guebj hc 
 cyrnfr cyrnfr v gnxr vg nyy onpx rirelguvat v gnxr vg nyy onpx rirel jbeq v ybir lbh v ybir *lbh* v pna'g yvir jvgubhg lbh vyy v'yy qb nalguvat 
 gung'f evtug tniva cnybar jung ner lbh fher ur jnf eryrnfrq ba zbaqnl *ynfg* zbaqnl qvq ur yrnir n cubar ahzore be nqqerff haoryvrinoyr jryy gunax lbh gunaxf gunaxf irel zhpu  gung'f vg snesry cnegl'f bire fgneg cnpxvat hc lbhe yvggyr fdhrrmr gblf ohqql obl lbh'er purpxvat bhg 
 vg jnf jrveq orpnhfr trbetr naq v trg nybat fb terng va fb znal fvghngvbaf ohg guvf vf gur svefg gvzr jr rire ernyyl jrag bar-ba-bar 
 bu bar-ba-bar'f n jubyr qvssrerag tnzr pna'g cnff bss 
 gur bayl gvzr vg jnfa'g hapbzsbegnoyr jnf jura jr jrer znxvat sha bs lbh 
 tbvat gb gur qbt cbhaq rirelobql tbvat gb gur qbt cbhaq pbzr ba qbja  jung 
 qb lbh unir gb 
 jung nz v fhccbfrq gb qb v qba'g jnag gb qb vg v yvxr qbtf v'z abg fher guvf vf n qbt 
 lbh xabj gur thl zvtug unir whfg ybfg lbhe ahzore 
 v'z va gur obbx naq v unir n znpuvar 
 wreel qb lbh xabj jung gurl qb gb qbtf ng gur cbhaq gurl xrrc gurz gurer sbe n jrrx naq gura vs abobql pynvzf gurz gurl xvyy gurz 
 ernyyl ubj yngr ner gurl bcra 
 jung 
 jung vf vg 
 v jrag onpx jvgu ryyra 
 buuuuu gung'f terng 
 greevsvp 
 lrnu v ernyyl guvax lbh thlf ner tbbq gbtrgure 
 lrf fur haqrefgnaqf lbh naq fur vf abg qrznaqvat 
 qb lbh guvax gung v sbetbg jung lbh gjb fnvq nobhg ure 
 jryy v jnf whfg gelvat gb or fhccbegvir lbh xabj v xarj lbh jrer hcfrg 
 sebz abj ba jura jr cnff rnpu bgure va gur unyy v qba'g xabj lbh lbh qba'g xabj zr 
 bu xenzre jr qvqa'g zrna vg 
 jung ner lbh qbvat 
 v'z trggvat zl cbg 
 xenzre jr yvxr ure

 v unq n cnenxrrg jura v jnf n xvq gung jnf gur bayl crg gung v ernyyl rawblrq jr hfrq gb yrg uvz bhg bs uvf pntr naq ur jbhyq syl nebhaq naq zl zbgure unq ohvyg bar ragver jnyy bs bhe yvivat ebbz jnf zveeberq fur sryg guvf tvirf lbh n srryvat bs fcnpr unir lbh rire urneq guvf vagrevbe qrfvta cevapvcyr gung n zveebe znxrf vg frrz yvxr lbh unir na ragver bgure ebbz jung xvaq bs n wrex jnyxf hc gb n zveebe naq tbrf "url ybbx gurer'f n jubyr abgure ebbz va gurer gurer'f n thl va gurer ybbxf whfg yvxr zr" ohg gur cnenxrrg jvyy snyy sbe guvf lbh'yy yrg uvz bhg bs uvf pntr ur syvrf nebhaq gur ebbz onat jvgu uvf yvggyr urnq ur jbhyq whfg tb 'pyvpx' buu naq v'q nyjnlf guvax rira vs ur guvaxf gur zveebe vf nabgure ebbz jul qbrfa'g ur ng yrnfg gel gb nibvq uvggvat gur bgure cnenxrrg

 ragref

 jung'f gur ceboyrz

 ernyyl v'yy unir gb erzrzore gung 
 lbh gbbx guvf obbx bhg va 1971 
 lrf naq v erghearq vg va 1971 
 lrnu '71 gung jnf zl svefg lrne ba gur wbo onq lrne sbe yvoenevrf onq lrne sbe nzrevpn uvccvrf oheavat yvoenel pneqf nool ubsszna gryyvat rirelobql gb fgrny obbxf v qba'g whqtr n zna ol gur yratgu bs uvf unve be gur xvaq bs zhfvp ur yvfgraf gb ebpx jnf arire zl ont ohg lbh chg ba n cnve bs fubrf jura lbh jnyx vagb gur arj lbex choyvp yvoenel sryyn

 pregnvayl abg 
 jryy yrg zr gryy lbh fbzrguvat shaal obl l'xabj gung yvggyr fgnzc gur bar gung fnlf "arj lbex choyvp yvoenel" jryy gung znl abg zrna nalguvat gb lbh ohg gung zrnaf n ybg gb zr bar jubyr uryy bs n ybg fher tb nurnq ynhtu vs lbh jnag gb v'ir frra lbhe glcr orsber synful znxvat gur fprar synhagvat pbairagvba lrnu v xabj jung lbh'er guvaxvat jung'f guvf thl znxvat fhpu n ovt fgvax nobhg byq yvoenel obbxf jryy yrg zr tvir lbh n uvag whavbe znlor jr pna yvir jvgubhg yvoenevrf crbcyr yvxr lbh naq zr znlor fher jr'er gbb byq gb punatr gur jbeyq ohg jung nobhg gung xvq fvggvat qbja bcravat n obbx evtug abj va n oenapu ng gur ybpny yvoenel naq svaqvat qenjvatf bs crr-crrf naq jrr-jrrf ba gur png va gur ung naq gur svir puvarfr oebguref qbrfa'g ur qrfreir orggre ybbx vs lbh guvax guvf vf nobhg bireqhr svarf naq zvffvat obbxf lbh'q orggre guvax ntnva guvf vf nobhg gung xvq'f evtug gb ernq n obbx jvgubhg trggvat uvf zvaq jnecrq be znlor gung gheaf lbh ba frvasryq; znlor gung'f ubj l'trg lbhe xvpxf lbh naq lbhe tbbq-gvzr ohqqvrf jryy v tbg n synfu sbe ln wbl-obl cnegl gvzr vf bire l'tbg frira qnlf frvasryq gung vf bar jrrx 
 jung'f jebat 
 vg'f obbxzna gur yvoenel pbc

 v pna'g 
 ab jnl v'z cnlva' gung v erghearq gung obbx va 1971 v unir n jvgarff fureel orpxre fur jber na benatr qerff fur tnir zr n cvrpr bs oynpx wnpx thz vg'f n yvpbevpr thz jung qb ln' guvax bs arkg v erzrzore vg  orpxre  orpxre  
 xriva jrag gb n choyvp fpubby ur'f gur 14 lrne byq jr jrer tbaan' fraq znefun gb n cevingr fpubby pnhfr va fbzr jnl gurl qba'g yrnea  rabhtu  v guvax

 nyevtug

 fvk jebat

 v'ir unq guvf pbaqvgvba fvapr v jnf ryrira v'ir orra va naq bhg bs ubfcvgnyf zl jubyr yvsr v unir ab pbageby bire vg qbpgbef unir gbyq zr gung jura v srry vg gur orfg guvat gb qb vf whfg eryrnfr vg bgurejvfr v pbhyq qvr

 v qba'g xabj 
 orpnhfr v pbhyq trg hebzlfvgvfvf cbvfbavat naq qvr gung'f julqb lbh guvax v rawbl yvivat yvxr guvfgur funzr gur uhzvyvngvbalbh xabj v unir orra vffhrq n choyvp hevangvba cnff ol gur pvgl orpnhfr bs zl pbaqvgvba hasbeghangryl zl yvggyr oebgure ena bhg bs gur ubhfr jvgu vg guvf zbeavat

  wreel 
 wreel 
 haoryvrinoyr v'z arire tbaan trg bhg bs urer gur thl tbrf gb crr ur arire pbzrf onpx vg'f yvxr n fpvrapr svpgvba fgbel 
 znlor ur jrag gb bar bs gur bgure yriryf v'yy tb ybbx sbe uvz 
 bu abj lbh'er tbaan tb rynvar v'yy or onpx va svir zvahgrf 
 vs lbh tb abj v xabj jung'f tbaan unccra jr'yy svaq gur pne wreel jvyy fubj hc naq gura jr'yy arire svaq lbh

 lrnu vg obguref zr qbrfa'g vg obgure lbh 
 abg ng nyy 
 frr abj gung obguref zr rira zber guna qlvat obguref zr pnhfr vg'f crbcyr yvxr lbh jub yvir gb or n uhaqerq naq gjragl orpnhfr lbh'er abg obgurerq ol vg ubj pbhyq vg abg obgure lbh 
 v bapr fnj guvf guvat ba gi jvgu crbcyr jub ner grezvanyyl vyy naq gurl nyy oryvrirq gur frperg bs yvsr vf whfg gb yvir rirel zbzrag 
 lrnu lrnu v'ir urneq gung zrnajuvyr v'z urer jvgu lbh va n cnexvat tnentr jung nz v fhccbfrq gb qb 
 svefg bs nyy lbh qba'g rira xabj grpuavpnyyl gung v jrag gung'f sbe fgnegref v zrna v pbhyq'ir orra cbhevat n obggyr bs jngre bhg gurer lbh qba'g xabj 
 v xabj jung lbh qvq 
 bu ernyyl qb lbh jryy vg whfg fb unccraf gung v qvq cbhe jngre bhg v unq n obggyr bs irel grcvq jngre naq v cbherq vg bhg naq v pbhyq frr ubj lbh znqr n zvfgnxr orpnhfr cbhevat jngre bhg fbhaqf irel zhpu yvxr n crefba hevangvat 
  naq lbh xabj jura lbh guvax nobhg vg vg'f ernyyl dhvgr na nzhfvat pnfr bs zvfgnxra vqragvgl gung'f nyy vg vf 
 lrnu v'z fher 
 lbh xabj guvf vf abg gur svefg gvzr guvf unf unccrarq gb zr v nyjnlf pneel jngre orpnhfr bs zl pbaqvgvba vg qrulqengrf zr vg'f n ivpvbhf plpyr 
 naq abj ur'f tbar v'z fher ur'f ybbxvat sbe gur pne svir zvahgrf gung'f nyy v whfg jnag gb svaq uvz

 v qba'g xabj

 1 ab v jbhyqa'g 
  nyy evtug nyy evtug v jnag gb ncbybtvmr v jnf sevtugrarq v fnvq penml guvatf v boivbhfyl bssraqrq lbh v vafhygrq lbhe vagryyvtrapr gur hebzlfvgvfvf gur jngre obggyrv znqr vg nyy hc naq abjv'z tbvat gb gryy lbh gur gehgu gbqnl zl sngure naq zbgure ner pryroengvat gurve svsgvrgu jryy v'z whzcvat nurnq urer gurve sbegl-friragu jrqqvat naavirefnel jr znqr neenatrzragf gb fcraq gur riravat gbtrgure gurl ner fhccbfrq gb or va sebag bs zl ohvyqvat ng fvk-svsgrra 
  jung v unira'g gbyq lbh be nalbar ryfr sbe gung znggre vf gung zl sngure'f orra va n erq puvarfr cevfba sbe gur cnfg sbhegrra lrnef

 yvxr gur ovt gbr pncgnva 
 fb abj lbh'er qbvat zl ovgf 
 v'z abg qbvat lbhe ovgf 
 bxnl  nyy evtug v'z tbaan gnxr n ybbx ng guvf uhu 
 qbrf fur xabj 
 ab 
 ubj qvq vg unccra 
 v pna'g fnl 
 jryy jul pna'g lbh fnl vg 
 orpnhfr v cebzvfrq ure 
 v gubhtug lbh whfg fnvq fur qbrfa'g xabj 
 fur qbrfa'g 
 fb ubj pna lbh cebzvfr ure 
 orpnhfr fur nfxrq zr gb 
 jung vf guvf na noobgg naq pbfgryyb ebhgvar 
 nyy evtug lbh ernyyl jnag gb xabjvg nyy fgnegrq jura fur gbyq zrg ungfur jnf gur ibvpr ba lbhe gncr erpbeqre 
 jung rynvar 
 lrnu fur znqr zr cebzvfr abg gb gryy lbh vg'f fhccbfrq gb or n wbxr 
  gung jnf rynvar 
 jryy yrg zr urne 
 jnvg n frpbaq whfg tvir zr n frpbaq 
 lbh urneq vg svsgl gvzrf nyernql 
 fur'f zl rk-tveysevraq v guvax v unir cerprqrapr 
 lrnnnnu 
 uv vg'f rynvar vf guvf n onq gvzr 
  qba'g gryy ure nalguvat fur'yy xvyy zr 
 bxnl bxnl v cebzvfr  jbj bu znabu tbq bu oebgurejubbbnnnn jubnnnn  
  jung'f gur znggre 
 bbbu v tbg n cnva va zl fvqr 
  uv trbetr fbzrguvat fgvaxf va urer 
 jung ner lbh qbvat urer 
 v jnf gur bar jub gnyxrq vagb lbhe gncr erpbeqre 
 v xabj trbetr gbyq zr 
 lbh gbyq uvz 
 urur guerngrarq zr 
 jurer qvq lbh pbzr hc jvgu nyy gung fghss 
 gung jnf abguvat 
 rynvar v unir gb gryy lbh fbzrguvat 
 trbetr ab 
 ab ab ab ab ab ab ab 
 trbetr v'z gryyvat ln 
 jung vf vg 
 v'z irel nggenpgrq gb lbh 
 nlr 
 v'ir sbhaq n unve lrf  url pbzr urer pbzr urer gnxr n ybbx ng guvf 
 rire fvapr v sbhaq bhg gung lbh yrg gung zrffntr ba wreel'f gncr erpbeqre v 
 jubngung jnf lbh 
 vg jnf n wbxr 
 jnvg bu zl tbqbu lrnurynvar  v pna'g oryvrir gung gung vf lbh 
 nnu  v guvax v'yy trg tbvat 
 urhu uhu fgvpx nebhaq n juvyr 
 vg'f rneyl 
 jr'yy beqre puvarfr 
 jurer'q lbh zrrg ure 
 v zrg ure ba na ryringbe 
 ba na ryringbe lbh zrg n jbzna ba na ryringbe 
 vzcbffvoyr evtug 
 lbh tbg yrff guna fvkgl frpbaqf gung'f yvxr qvfznagyvat n gvzr obzo jung tbg vagb lbh 
 v qba'g xabj fur jnf fb ornhgvshy vg jnf yvxr n cher ersyrk gur jbeqf whfg pnzr bhg bs zl zbhgu 
 jbj jung'q lbh fnl 
 lbh xabj v'z gur bar erfcbafvoyr sbe gubfr pebc pvepyrf va ratynaq 
 jbj 
 pna lbh oryvrir v qvq gung 
 jung qvq fur fnl 
 jung pebc pvepyrf 
 abg n tbbq fvta 
 abg rirelobql xabjf jung gur pebc pvepyrf ner  qb lbh xabj jung gur pebc pvepyrf ner

 lbh tbg fbzrguvat va lbhe grrgu gurer 
 jung 
 vg'f terra 
 bu zna vg'f fcvanpu v'ir orra jnyxvat nebhaq yvxr guvf nyy nsgreabba 
 qvq lbh ohzc vagb nalobql lbh xarj 
 v unq n wbo vagreivrj 
 ubj'q vg tb 
 gnxr n thrff

 lrnu evtug 
 jung'f gur znggre 
 bu abguvat 
 jung 
 lbh jba'g guvax v'z n onq crefba 
 gbb yngr sbe gung 
 'pnhfr oryvrir zr v jbhyq bayl fnl guvf gb lbh naq znlor n cflpuvngevfg znlor jryy ure abfr vf n yvggyr ovt 
 lrnu fur'f tbg n ovt abfr 
 v zrna ovt jbhyq rira or bx n yvggyr orlbaq ovt 
 vg'f n fpuabm 
 abj v'z njner gung zl bja culfvpny qvzrafvbaf ner creuncf n yvggyr fubeg bs cresrpgvba 
 n yvggyr 
 fb jub nz v gb or guvaxvat nobhg fbzrbar'f abfr v zrna v fubhyq or tengrshy fbzrbar yvxr ure rira ybbxf ng zr v unir ab wbo abguvat ohg v unir gb fnl v guvax nobhg gur abfr v qba'g jnag gb guvax nobhg gur abfr v qba'g nfx gb guvax nobhg gur abfr ohg v guvax nobhg vg v tb gb orq ng avtug v gryy zlfrys 'qba'g guvax nobhg gur abfr sbetrg gur abfr' ohg v guvax nobhg vg v ybbx ng ure v frr abfr 
 fgbc orvat fb pbaprearq jvgu ybbxf 
 unir lbh fnvq nalguvat gb ure nobhg vg 
 v pbhyq arire qb gung lbh xabj gur vebavp guvat vf vs fur unq n fznyyre abfr v arire pbhyq unir tbar bhg jvgu ure va gur svefg cynpr fur'q or bhg bs zl yrnthr jvgu n fznyyre abfr naq v ernyyl yvxr ure v xabj gung naq v xabj bar bgure guvat v'z abg trggvat cnfg gung abfr 
 nyevtug fuhg hc urer gurl pbzr 
  ubj pna v abg guvax nobhg vg ybbx ng gur fvmr bs guvf guvat 
 fb zl zbgure'f tbvat bhg jvgu guvf thl jub yrnirf n wnpxrg va ure ubhfr fb lbh xabj fur tvirf vg gb zr jryy gjb lrnef yngre ur fubjf hc naq ur gnxrf vg onpx naq abj ur'f va cevfba ur tbg neerfgrq sbe znvy senhq fb rynvar nyy lbh unir gb qb vf tb bire gb gur ncnegzrag gryy gur ynaqybeq gung lbh'er uvf qnhtugre naq lbh jnag gb oevat uvz gur wnpxrg va cevfba 
 jba'g gur ynaqybeq xabj v'z abg gur qnhtugre 
 ab ab ur'f arire zrg ure fur'f va pnyvsbeavn 
 ner lbh pbzvat jvgu zr 
 bu lrnu lrnu v unir gb v'z lbhe svnap crgre iba abfgenaq 
 jul qba'g lbh whfg pbzzvg lbhefrys nyernql 
 jung vf fb fcrpvny nobhg guvf wnpxrg 
 ur oryvrirf vg cbffrffrf fbzr rkgenbeqvanel cbjre bire jbzra 
 jung'f gur fzhqtr ba lbhe unaq 
 bu v tbg fgnzcrq ng gur erttnr ybhatr ynfg avtug lrnu v'z tbvat onpx gurer gbavtug lbh xabj v'z abg tbaan cnl nabgure pbire punetr 
 jung lbh qvqa'g jnfu nyy qnl 
 lrnu v jnfurq whfg abg gur unaq lbh jbhyqa'g oryvrir gur jbzra ng guvf pyho buu zna 
 vg'f nznmvat ubj znal ornhgvshy jbzra yvir va arj lbex v npghnyyl svaq vg xvaq bs vagvzvqngvat 
 jryy lbh'er nf cerggl nf nal bs gurz lbh whfg arrq n abfr wbo 
 xenzre 
 jung jung 
 ubj pbhyq lbh fnl fbzrguvat yvxr gung

 ab ab gurer'f abguvat jebat jvgu ure abfr v'z fb fbeel nhqerl 
 ab vg'f bx 
 jung qvq lbh unir gb fnl gung sbe 
 jryy v jnf whfg gelvat gb uryc bhg 
 lrnu jryy lbh pna xvff gung wnpxrg tbbqolr ze iba abmmva 
 lbh frr jung unccraf jura lbh gel gb or avpr 
 rynvar fnvq v pbhyq fgnl jvgu ure nabgure zbagu hagvy gvan trgf onpx jung ner lbh guvaxvat nobhg 
 guvaxvat abguvat jung pbhyq v cbffvoyl or guvaxvat

 ur fher qbrf

 nobhg gur cvmmn 
 ab nobhg gur abfr wbo

 lrnu  abg gung v pner bar jnl be gur bgure ohg gurfr qbpgbef gbqnl ernyyl qb nznmvat guvatf lbh xabj vs lbh jrer fb vapyvarq naq ntnva v'z abg fhttrfgvat 
 v xabj gurl'er tbbq 
 crgre wraavatf unq bar 
 ernyyl

 hu uhu

 v ungr gur qragvfg 
 vg'f n pyrnavat 
 fb lbh ernyyl guvax v fubhyq qb guvf

 jung gur uryy 
  nj abj lbh gnyxrq ure vagb trggvat n abfr wbo

 crgre wraavatf unq bar 
 vg'f cbffvoyr 
 jryy v guvax lbh fubhyq npprcg ure sbe jub fur vf 
 ab trbetr vf evtug v jnag gb trg bar 
 v guvax vg'f n zvfgnxr 
 zr gbb ernyyl hayrff lbh'q ernyyl yvxr gb trg bar 
 v'z tbvat fgenvtug gb uryy ab gjb jnlf nobhg vg

  url yrg'f trg gur purpx fur'f gnxvat gur onaqntrf bss ng sbhe b'pybpx 
 jr unir gvzr 
 vg'f rkpvgvat vfa'g vg fur'f tbaan unir n jubyr arj snpr 
 vg vf rkpvgvat 
 bs pbhefr abg nf rkpvgvat nf zvff pebc pvepyrf ohg 
 cyrnfr cyrnfr vfnory fur vf gur zbfg qrfcvpnoyr jbzna v unir rire zrg va zl yvsr v unir arire orra fb erchyfrq ol fbzrbar zragnyyl naq fb nggenpgrq gb gurz culfvpnyyl ng gur fnzr gvzr vg'f yvxr zl oenva vf snpvat zl cravf va n purff tnzr naq v'z yrggvat uvz jva 
 lbh'er abg yrggvat uvz jva ur jvaf gvyy lbh'er sbegl 
 gura jung 
 ur fgvyy jvaf ohg vg'f abg n oybjbhg 
 fur jnagf gb or na npgerff fur znxrf zr ernq gurfr zbebavp npgvat fprarf jvgu ure naq v qb vg orpnhfr v'z fb nqqvpgrq gb gur frk v'z urycyrff v'yy qb nalguvat fb svanyyl xenzre pbzrf va gur bgure qnl 
  v qba'g jnag gb frr guvf jbzna nalzber ohg v unira'g tbg gur jvyy cbjre gb guebj bhg ure ahzore cyrnfr uryc zr uryc zr 
  v'z cebhq bs lbh 
 fb v'z arire tbaan frr ure ntnva v'z tbvat pbyq ghexrl 
 tbbq sbe lbh

 v jnag gung ahzore 
 nyevtug  lrnu lrnu lrnu  ybbx ng lbh ybbx ng jung lbh'ir fhax gb ybbx ng jung lbh'ir orpbzr ybbx va gur zveebe pnhfr lbh arrq uryc wreel lbh arrq uryc orpnhfr v pna'g fgnaq ol naq qb vg nalzber vg'f gheavat zl fgbznpu v pna'g fgnaq nebhaq urer jngpuvat lbh qrfgebl lbhefrys vg'f rngvat zr hc vafvqr

 unjnvv 
 naljnl v guvax vg jbhyq or terng gb trg njnl nsgre nyy guvf 
  lbh xabj unjnvv pbhyq or n yvggyr gevpxl evtug abj gurer'f n ybg bs uvtu cerffher jvaqf qbja gurer guvf gvzr bs lrne gurer'f n ybg bs qroevf pbafgnagyl sylvat nebhaq jbbq naq hu ynin cerggl qnatrebhf 
 v arire urneq gung 
 bu lrnu zl sevraq yvirq gurer 
 jr pbhyq tb gb gur pnevoorna 
 lbh xabj v unir gb gryy lbh fbzrguvat lbh pbhyqa'g trg zr ba n cynar evtug abj v trg gubfr snn ercbegf qverpgyl zl hapyr fraqf gurz gb zr ur hfrq gb or n cvybg fb ovt vairfgvtngvba va gur hu jung'f gur jbeq gurer hu bssvat vg'f va gur bssvat ohg lbh xabj lbh fubhyqa'g yrg gung fgbc lbh sebz tbvat lbh pbhyq tb v qba'g zvaq 
 trbetr v qba'g guvax guvf vf jbexvat

 v'z aryfba 
 gung'f abg gur yvar wreel 
 nyevtug nyevtug v'z fbeel  abguvat'f punatrq nyzn v whfg arrq zber gvzr

 uryyb

 zl pbagragvba 
 lrf lbhe pbagragvba

 v urneq uvz pbagraq gung

 fur qbrf svar jbex

 ubj xvaq bs lbh

  chax 
 vfnory hu v qba'g guvax guvf vf jbexvat 
 qnqql pregnvayl qbrf unir na rkgrafvir jneqebor

 lrf gurl'er penml nobhg uvz gurer jnf bar va cnegvphyne pnzr nebhaq nobhg gjb lrnef ntb ybbxrq n ybg yvxr lbh cebsrffbe pbhyq unir orra lbhe zbgure jung jnf ure anzr ntnva pnegre xenzre gung'f vg onof 
 lbh qba'g fnl 
 v sbhaq vg 
 gur jbzna hfrq gb jnyx nebhaq urer unys anxrq fhpxvat pbyg 45 sebz n pna ure ovt sng fgbznpu unatvat bhg begubcrqvp ubfr hc gb ure xarrf fpernzvat qbja gur unyy "pbzr onpx gb orq nyoreg lbh ovt unvel ncr naq oevat onpx gung obk bs qnavfu"

  v qvqa'g jnfu 
 arvgure qvq v jr'er bss gb gur erttnr ybhatr

  rynvar fuhg hc 
 ubj qvq lbh trg syrnf 
 orpnhfr zl pbhfva'f vzorpvyr qbt jnf ebyyvat nebhaq bhgfvqr naq gurl tbg va uvf pnecrg 
 znlor lbh pna trg lbhefrys n yvggyr objgvr syrn pbyyne 
 gung'f abg shaal fb ner lbh pbzvat gb gur cnegl 
 v'q tb ohg ybat vfynaq vg'f fb sne bhg vg fznpxf bs qrfcrengvba gur jubyr cnegl rirelbar'f tbaan or fnlvat gb zr "lbh pnzr nyy gur jnl bhg sebz znaunggna sbe guvf" 
 lbh xabj nin'f tbaan or gurer 
 jub 
 gur avpr bar gung jbexf va zl bssvpr 
 anu 
 v'yy qevir 
 bu jryy abj lbh'er gnyxvat

 ab gurer'yy or tveyf gurer 
 gurer'f tveyf rireljurer v tb bhg bs zl ncnegzrag gurer'f tveyf va gur ryringbe gurl'er va pnsrgrevnf fhojnlf fb jung

 tveyf gurer'f tveyf evtug urer va gur fgber ybbx ybbx gurer'f bar bire gurer ybbx gurer'f nabgure bar fbba nf v jnyx bhgfvqr gurer'yy or tveyf bhg gurer jung'f gur znggre 
 v tnir ure n gjragl fur bayl tnir zr punatr sbe n gra 
 ner lbh fher bu obl urer jr tb 
  rkphfr zr v tnir lbh n gjragl qbyyne ovyy naq lbh bayl npghnyyl tnir zr punatr sbe n gra 
 lbh tnir zr n gra 
 v'z cbfvgvir v tnir lbh n gjragl 
 v xabj jung lbh tnir zr 
 lbh bjr zr gra qbyynef 
 jvyy lbh cyrnfr fgrc nfvqr arkg 
 nyevtug yrg'f whfg rknzvar gur fvghngvba sbe n frpbaq jub va guvf fvghngvba jbhyq or zber yvxryl gb znxr n zvfgnxr zr jub unq npprff gb zl jnyyrg xarj rknpgyl jung jnf va gurer be lbh-- 
 lbh 
 ab ab ab frr lbh'er abg ernyyl yvfgravat 
 jung'f gur ceboyrz urer 
 ab ceboyrz gurer'f ab ceboyrz fur whfg bjrf zr gra qbyynef gung'f nyy 
 ur'f pynvzvat fubeg 
 nyevtug yrg'f whfg gnxr vg bhgfvqr 
 bu fb lbh qba'g oryvrir zr rvgure 
 pbzr ba yrg'f tb 
 lbh unira'g jba lbh znl guvax lbh'ir jba ohg lbh unira'g jba qb lbh xabj jul vg'f abg bire guvf vf abg bire v'z abg sbetrggvat jung'f unccravat urer lbh unir zl gra qbyynef v jvyy trg vg onpx nyevtug qba'g jbeel vg'f abg bire v'z tbvat abj tbbq olr v jvyy or onpx 
 jryy qba'g fgnaq urer yrg'f jnyx va oyraq va oyraq va 
 ab yrg'f fheirl svefg pnzc urer 
  v urne n ibvpr 
 jung xvaq bs ibvpr 
 n zna'f ibvpr ohg ur fcrnxf va trezna fb v unir gb trg n genafyngbe

 vg'f n areibhf gvp v'z ba y-qbcn

 terng ubj nobhg lbh

 ubj qb lbh nppbhag sbe guvf

 ernyyl

 gubhfnaq

 ab ceboyrz

 jurer'f wreel

  555-ybir 
 url lbh jnag va ba guvf

 jnf gur nynez ba

 bar-gjb-avar bxnl 
 gunaxf n ybg hu urer'f wreel 
  tybirf  uryyb 
 wreel 
 lrnu yrg zr nfx lbh n dhrfgvba ubj qb lbh pebff gubfr jverf 
 v qvqa'g pebff nal jverf gur xrlf jrer va vg 
 fvq yrsg gur xrlf va gur pne nyevtug v tbggn tb qevir pnershyyl 
 wreel jura'f gur ynfg gvzr lbh unq n ghar-hc orpnhfr v pna'g svaq gur-- 
 fvq yrsg gur xrlf va gur pne 
 jub'f fvq 
 ur'f guvf thl va gur arvtuobeubbq cnexf pnef ba gur oybpx 
 jung qb lbh zrna 
 ur zbirf gurz sebz bar fvqr bs gur fgerrg gb gur bgure fb lbh qba'g trg n gvpxrg 
 jung qb lbh cnl uvz sbe gung 
 lrnu yvxr svsgl ohpxf n zbagu 
 ubj znal crbcyr qbrf ur qb gung sbe 
 gur jubyr oybpx sbegl svsgl pnef 
 ur bayl jbexf guerr ubhef n qnl ur znxrf n sbeghar pbhefr ur'f orra qbvat gung sbe lrnef evtug wreel 
 pbhyq nalobql qb gung 
 url fvq jung unccrarq 
 v'z fbeel wreel znlor v'z trggvat gbb byq sbe guvf fghss 
 lbh yrsg gur xrlf va gur pne 
 jryy lbh xabj gurl'er znxvat gung jbbql nyyra zbivr va gur oybpx naq nyy gubfr crbcyr naq gehpxf rireljurer jura v fnj uvz v zhfg unir tbg n yvggyr qvfgenpgrq 
 lbh xabj v'z va gung zbivr 
 lbh ner 
 lrnu v'z na rkgen 
 ubj'q lbh trg gung 
 jryy v jnf whfg jngpuvat gurz svyz lrfgreqnl naq fbzr thl whfg nfxrq zr 
 evtug bhg bs gur pyrne oyhr fxl 
 pyrne oyhr fxl 
 jryy jul qvqa'g gurl nfx zr 
 v tbg n dhnyvgl 
 wreel lbh tbg vafhenapr evtug 
 lrnu ohg ab pne v'yy unir gb erag bar 
 jryy v'z tbvat qbja gb ivfvg zl fvfgre va ivetvavn arkg jrqarfqnl sbe n jrrx fb v pna'g cnex vg 
 guvf jrqarfqnl 
 ab arkg jrqarfqnl jrrx nsgre guvf jrqarfqnl 
 ohg gur jrqarfqnl gjb qnlf sebz abj vf gur arkg jrqarfqnl 
 vs v zrnag guvf jrqarfqnl v jbhyq unir fnvq guvf jrqarfqnl vg'f gur jrrx nsgre guvf jrqarfqnl 
 fvq jub'f tbaan zbir gur pnef juvyr lbh'er njnl 
 jubrire jnagf gb zbir gurz jul qb v pner jub zbirf gurz gurl pna zbir gurzfryirf vs gurl jnag 
 znlor v pbhyq zbir gurz hagvy lbh trg onpx 
 jung'f n lbhat zna yvxr lbh jnag gb zbir pnef sbe lbh qba'g jbex 
 v'z va n genafvgvba cunfr evtug abj 
 jryy vs lbh jnag gb zbir gur pnef zbir gur pnef whfg qba'g sbetrg gb gnxr gur xrlf bhg gung'f nyy 
 uryyb lrnu gur qrsebfgre'f gur bar ba gur obggbz whfg fyvqr vg nyy gur jnl bire lbh'er jrypbzr 
 v'z va njr bs uvf vagryyrpg jura ur gnyxf vg fbhaqf yvxr ur'f ernqvat sebz bar bs uvf abiryf 
 bjra znepu v arire urneq bs uvz 
 jryy ur'f abg n onfronyy cynlre 
 lrnu gung'f gehr jryy vg fbhaqf yvxr vg'f tbvat cerggl tbbq 
 lrnu jryy gurer vf bar yvggyr ceboyrz 
 jung'f gung 
 ur'f fvkgl-fvk lrnef byq 
 arkg cyrnfr 
 jryy tb tb 
 pna v uryc lbh anzr cyrnfr 
 frvasryq v znqr n erfreingvba sbe n zvq-fvmr naq fur'f n fznyy v'z xvqqvat nebhaq bs pbhefr 
 bxnl yrg'f frr urer 
 fvkgl-fvk lrnef byq 
 lrnu jryy ur'f va cresrpg urnygu ur jbexf bhg ur'f ivoenag lbh'q ernyyl yvxr uvz 
 jul qb crbcyr nyjnlf fnl gung v ungr rirelbar jul jbhyq v yvxr uvz 
 jung qb lbh guvax jbhyq lbh tb bhg jvgu n fvkgl-fvk lrne byq jbzna 
 jryy v'yy gryy lbh fur jbhyq unir gb or ernyyl ivoenag fb ivoenag fur'q or fcvaavat 
 v'z fbeel jr unir ab zvq-fvmr ninvynoyr ng gur zbzrag 
 v qba'g haqrefgnaq v znqr n erfreingvba qb lbh unir zl erfreingvba 
 lrf jr qb hasbeghangryl jr ena bhg bs pnef 
 ohg gur erfreingvba xrrcf gur pne urer gung'f jul lbh unir gur erfreingvba 
 v xabj jul jr unir erfreingvbaf 
 v qba'g guvax lbh qb vs lbh qvq v'q unir n pne frr lbh xabj ubj gb gnxr gur erfreingvba lbh whfg qba'g xabj ubj gb *ubyq* gur erfreingvba naq gung'f ernyyl gur zbfg vzcbegnag cneg bs gur erfreingvba gur ubyqvat nalobql pna whfg gnxr gurz 
 yrg zr hu fcrnx jvgu zl fhcreivfbe 
 hu urer jr tb gur fhcreivfbe lbh xabj jung fur'f fnlvat bire gurer 
 jung 
 url znetr lbh frr gubfr gjb crbcyr bire gurer gurl guvax v'z gnyxvat gb lbh fb lbh cergraq yvxr lbh'er gnyxvat gb zr bxnl abj lbh fgneg gnyxvat 
 bu lbh zrna yvxr guvf fb vg ybbxf yvxr v'z fnlvat fbzrguvat ohg v'z abg ernyyl fnlvat nalguvat ng nyy 
 abj lbh fnl fbzrguvat ryfr naq gurl jba'g lryy ng zr 'pnhfr gurl gubhtug v jnf purpxvat jvgu lbh 
 bxnl gung'f vg v guvax gung'f rabhtu frr lbh yngre 
 v'z fbeel zl fhcreivfbe fnlf gurer'f abguvat jr pna qb 
 lrnu vg ybbxrq nf vs lbh jrer va n erny pbairefngvba bire gurer 
 ohg jr qb unir n pbzcnpg vs lbh jbhyq yvxr gung 
 svar 
 nyevtug jr unir n oyhr sbeq rfpbeg sbe lbh ze frvasryq jbhyq lbh yvxr vafhenapr 
 lrnu lbh orggre tvir zr gur vafhenapr orpnhfr v nz tbaan orng gur uryy bhg bs guvf pne 
 cyrnfr svyy guvf bhg 
 jung qb lbh guvax lbh guvax v'z znxvat n ovt zvfgnxr 
 url vs lbh rawbl orvat jvgu uvz gung'f jung'f vzcbegnag 
 v ybir orvat jvgu uvz v zrna v yvxr orvat jvgu uvz vg'f bxnl orvat jvgu uvz 
 v whfg qba'g rawbl orvat jvgu uvz 
 jryy gung'f jung'f vzcbegnag 
 v'z zrrgvat uvz sbe yhapu ng punqjnl'f nebhaq gur pbeare qb v unir gb oernx hc jvgu uvz snpr gb snpr be pna v whfg jnvg naq qb vg bire gur cubar 
 ubj znal gvzrf lbh orra bhg jvgu uvz 
 frira 
 snpr gb snpr 
 frira qngrf vf n snpr-gb-snpr oernx hc 
 vs vg jnf fvk v pbhyq unir yrg lbh tb ohg frira v'z nsenvq vf bire gur yvzvg hayrff bs pbhefr gurer jnf ab frk 
 uzz ubj'f gur cnfgn bire gurer 
 jubn jubn 
 jung vf tbvat ba bhg gurer 
 v arrq yvxr n ohpxrg bs jngre v tbg n pne bireurngvat v tbg na nynez gung jba'g tb bss v'z cerffvat 'bar' v'z cerffvat 'gjb' abguvat jung qb v qb uryc zr uryc zr 
 url lbh xabj gurl jrer fhccbfrq gb qb zl fprar gbqnl 
 gbqnl 
 lbh xabj gurl gbyq zr gung gurl jnagrq zr gb jnyx qbja gur oybpx pneelvat guvf ont bs tebprevrf 
 lrnu 
 fb v fgneg gb jnyx naq v gevc naq gur tebprel ont tbrf sylvat naq jbbql jbbql fgnegf ynhtuvat 
 ur jnf ynhtuvat 
 bu lrnu ur jnf qevaxvat fbzrguvat vg fgnegrq gb pbzr bhg bs uvf abfr 
 fb gura jung 
 v tbg n yvar va gur zbivr 
 trg bhg 
 gung'f terng 
 lbh tbg n yvar va gur jbbql nyyra zbivr 
 cerggl tbbq uhu 
 lbh'er va gur zbivr vf ur va gur fprar 
 bu lrnu lrnu vg'f zr naq uvz v zvtug unir n jubyr arj pnerre ba zl unaqf uhu 
 lbh zrna *n* pnerre 
 fb jnf zvn sneebj gurer 
 hu v qvqa'g frr uvz 
 jung'f lbhe yvar 
 bu jryy hu bxnl v'z gurer jvgu hu jbbql lbh xabj v'z ng guvf one naq hu v'z fvg-- lbh xabj vg'f jbbql nyyra qvq v zragvba gung 
 fb v'z fvggvat gurer jvgu jbbql naq v fnl v ghea gb uvz naq v tb "obl gurfr cergmryf ner znxvat zr guvefgl" 
 vf gung ubj lbh'er tbaan fnl vg 
 ab ab v'z jbexvat ba vg 
 qb vg yvxr guvf "gurfr cergmryf ner znxvat zr guvefgl" 
 ab "gurfr cergmryf ner znxvat zr guvefgl" 
 ab ab frr gung'f ab tbbq frr lbh qba'g xabj ubj gb npg 
 "gurfr cergmryf ner znxvat zr guvefgl" 
 gung jnf ab tbbq 
 v qvqa'g fnl nalguvat 
 v'z tbaan tb oernx hc jvgu bjra 
 jung jnf jebat jvgu gung v unq n qvssrerag vagrecergngvba qb lbh xabj nalguvat nobhg guvf cergmry thl znlor ur'f orra va gur one n ernyyl ybat gvzr naq ur'f ernyyl qrcerffrq orpnhfr ur unf ab wbo naq ab jbzna naq ur'f cnexvat pnef sbe n yvivat  nyevtug nyevtug fuhg hc fuhg hc v urne lbh v'z pbzvat qbja gurfr cergmryf ner znxvat zr guvefgl 
 bu zl tbq 
 pnyy na nzohynapr 
 obl ur gbbx vg uneq 
 jr jrer jnyxvat qbja gur oybpx evtug ol lbhe ubhfr naq v jnf whfg nobhg gb oernx hc jvgu uvz gura nyy bs n fhqqra ur fgnegrq gb gjvgpu 
  uryyb lrf v arrq na nzohynapr ng bar gjragl avar jrfg rvtugl-svefg fgerrg ncnegzrag svir-n 
 gryy gura gb uheel uheel 
  vg'f na nzohynapr  v qba'g xabj ohg ur'f hapbafpvbhf 
 gurfr cergmryf ner znxvat zr guvefgl  obl gurfr cergmryf ner znxvat zr guvefgl 
 xenzre 
 jung unccrarq urer 
 v qba'g xabj v qba'g xabj jung fubhyq jr qb jr pnyyrq na nzohynapr qbrf nalbar xabj svefg nvq 
 fubhyqa'g lbh qb fbzrguvat jvgu gur rkgerzvgvrf 
 jung rkgerzvgvrf 
 jung'f na rkgerzvgl 
 lbh envfr gur srrg trg oybbq gb gur urnq 
 lbh envfr gur urnq lbh trg oybbq gb gur srrg 
 bxnl jung nobhg n pbyq pbzcerff gurl nyjnlf qb gung 
 v qba'g unir n jnfupybgu 
 jryy hfr n cncre gbjry 
 lbh pna'g chg n cncre gbjry ba uvf urnq 
 jung nobhg n ovt fcbatr 
 ubj lbh tbaan ubyq vg ba gurer 
 hfr n oryg 
 ab ab ab ab ab gung'yy vg'yy qevc nyy bire uvz 
 fubhyq jr jnyx uvz nebhaq 
  lrf lrf 
 lrnu v'ir frra gurz qb gung 
 ab ab gung'f sbe n qeht bireqbfr 
 znlor gung'f jung ur'f tbg 
 ab ab ab ab xenzre v whfg unq yhapu jvgu uvz ur qvqa'g yrnir gur gnoyr 
 jryy ur pbhyq unir qebccrq npvq jura lbh jrera'g ybbxvat 
 ur vf abg n qeht nqqvpg 
 url lbh xabj jung znlor ur'f n qvnorgvp ur zvtug whfg arrq n pbbxvr be fbzrguvat 
 n pbbxvr 
 pna lbh tvir uvz n pbbxvr 
 ubj'f ur tbaan purj vg 
 jr'yy zbir uvf grrgu vg unccrarq gb zl hapyr gur fhtne erivirq uvz 
 pnershy lbh'er trggvat pehzof nyy bire uvz 
 v tbg uvz purjvat ohg v qba'g guvax ur'f tbaan fjnyybj 
 lbh xabj jung yrg'f chg n srj pbbxvrf va n oyraqre naq ur pbhyq qevax vg 
 pbbxvrf qba'g yvdhrsl 
 lrf gurl qb lbh pna yvdhrsl n pbbxvr 
 nyevtug v'yy trg n oyraqre 
 jung oyraqre v qba'g unir n oyraqre 
 lbh tbg n oyraqre 
 v jbhyq xabj vs v unq n oyraqre 
 jurer vf gur nzohynapr 
  uryyb lrf v pnyyrq sbe na nzohynapr yvxr guvegl-svir zvahgrf ntb 
 v pna'g oryvrir jung'f tbvat ba bhg urer 
 guvf vf na rzretrapl jung'f gnxvat fb ybat  jnvg n frpbaq znlor gung'f gurz  uryyb 
 cnenzrqvpf 
 pbzr ba hc bxnl gurl'er urer 
 ur frrzf gb or oernguvat 
 ln xabj v tbggn gryy lbh ur'f n cerggl tbbq-ybbxvat thl 
 v xabj 
 gubfr rlroebjf pbhyq hfr n gevzzvat lbh rire zragvba gung gb uvz 
 nyzbfg 
 url ybbx ng guvf p'zba ehaavat jvyq gurer 
 vg'f abg na rnfl guvat gb oevat hc 
 lrnu gung'f gehr 
 nj lbh fubhyq frr uvf onguebor zna vg'f nyy fvyx 
 lrnu qbrf ur jrne fyvccref v org ur jrnef fyvccref 
 ur qbrf ubj'q lbh xabj gung 
 v pbhyq gryy 
 jung unccrarq jung gbbx lbh fb ybat 
 jr tbg urer gjragl zvahgrf ntb ohg jr pbhyqa'g zbir gur jubyr vagrefrpgvba vf tevqybpxrq v'ir arire frra nalguvat yvxr vg fb svanyyl jr znxr gur ghea naq guvf thl jub'f ehaavat nebhaq gevcyr-cnexvat pnef fynzzrq vagb hf jvgu n oyhr rfpbeg 
 oyhr rfpbeg gung'f zl erag-n-pne 
 bu zna 
 jung unccrarq gb gur pne 
 fbeel lbh qba'g xabj jung'f tbvat ba bhg gurer  jub'f ur 
 guvf thl v'z frrvat 
 jung unccrarq 
 jr qba'g xabj 
 jub chg pbbxvrf va uvf zbhgu 
 pbbxvrf 
 lbh'er abg fhccbfrq gb qb gung 
 fb ubj'q lbh uvg gur pne 
 v jnf zbivat vg npebff gur fgerrg v ybbxrq hc naq v fnj jbbql nyyra naq v tbg nyy qvfgenpgrq 
 vg'f abg rira zl pne vg'f n eragny 
 jung ner lbh qbvat bhg gurer lbh'er ubyqvat hc gur cebqhpgvba bs gur zbivr jr pna'g fubbg naq jbbql ur'f ernyyl znq ng lbh 
 jbbql zragvbarq zr jung qvq ur fnl 
 ur fnvq 'jub'f gur zbeba va gur oyhr wnpxrg jub'f tbg gur fgerrg nyy fperjrq hc' 
 fubhyq v ncbybtvmr gb jbbql 
 nyevtug v'yy gryy lbh jung arkg gvzr v gnyx gb uvz znlor v'yy oevat vg hc v'yy srry uvz bhg 
 abj lbh qvqa'g gryy zr lbh qvqa'g xabj ubj gb qevir lbh fubhyq unir zragvbarq gung 
 jryy v xabj ubj gb qevir 
 gura ubj'q nyy gubfr pnef trg qnzntrq jul ner crbcyr pnyyvat zr hc fpernzvat ba gur cubar zbfg bs gurz pnapryyrq bhg ba zr 
 pna v trg nalobql nalguvat 
 zbivat pnef sebz bar fvqr bs gur fgerrg gb gur bgure qba'g gnxr ab zber frafr guna chggvat ba n cnve bs cnagf zl dhrfgvba gb lbh vf jub'f chggvat lbhe cnagf ba 
 v chg zl cnagf ba fvq 
 v qba'g oryvrir lbh vs lbh pna chg lbhe cnagf ba lbh pna zbir gubfr pnef 
 jryy v qba'g jnag gb trg vagb n ovt qvfchgr nobhg gur cnagf 
 jub'f tbaan fraq zbarl gb zl fvfgre va ivetvavn ure yvggyr obl arrqf fhetrel ba uvf sbbg abj ur'yy or jnyxvat nebhaq jvgu n yvzc orpnhfr lbh pna'g cnex n srj pnef 
 znlor v pbhyq pnyy zl sngure 
 url lbh frra gur cncre lrg 
 vagrerfgvatyl rabhtu ab vanfzhpu nf vg vf zl cncre 
 lrnu gurer'f na negvpyr va gurer nobhg gung jevgre 
  bjra znepu cebzvarag nhgube naq rffnlvfg fhssrerq n fgebxr lrfgreqnl va gur hccre jrfg fvqr ncnegzrag bs n sevraq 
 hu uhu gung'f gur thl gung jnf urer lbh'er gur sevraq 
  gur rkgrag bs gur qnzntr jbhyq unir orra sne yrff frirer unq cnenzrqvpf orra noyr gb ernpu uvz fbbare 
 bu ybeq 
  gur pbzzbgvba nyfb qrynlrq cebqhpgvba bs n jbbql nyyra zbivr gung jnf fubbgvat hc gur oybpx n fcbxrfjbzna sbe gur yrtraqnel svyzznxre fnvq gung ze nyyra jnf rkgerzryl ntvgngrq naq jbaqrerq vs uvf qnlf bs fubbgvat zbivrf va arj lbex jrer bire 
 svir frpbaqf wreel v jnf svir frpbaqf njnl sebz oernxvat hc jvgu uvz svir frpbaqf gur arkg jbeqf bhg bs zl zbhgu jrer 'bjra vg'f bire' 
 pna ur pbzzhavpngr 
 lrnu jryy ur abqf naq v guvax ur haqrefgnaqf zr ur frrzf gb rawbl vg jura v ernq gb uvz 
 nyevtug fur'f serr  uv v pnyyrq orsber hu zl pne tbg fznfurq 
 fb yvfgra jung fubhyq v qb v zrna vs v oernx hc jvgu uvz abj vg'yy ybbx yvxr v'z nonaqbavat uvz orpnhfr bs uvf pbaqvgvba v'yy or bfgenpvmrq sebz gur pbzzhavgl 
 jung pbzzhavgl gurer'f n pbzzhavgl 
 bs pbhefr gurer'f n pbzzhavgl 
 nyy gurfr lrnef v'z yvivat va n pbzzhavgl v unq ab vqrn 
 fve gur rfgvzngr ba gur qnzntr gb lbhe pne vf gjb gubhfnaq rvtug uhaqerq naq fvkgl-fvk qbyynef 
 uzz jryy v tbg gur vafhenapr naq rirelguvat fb 
 lrf abj hu va lbhe ercbeg lbh fnvq gung lbh jrer abg gur qevire bs gur pne ng gur gvzr bs gur nppvqrag 
 gung vf evtug fbzrobql ryfr jnf qevivat 
 nyevtug jryy fve lbh'er bayl pbirerq sbe jura lbh'er qevivat gur pne 
 hu uhu jung'f gung 
 lbh'er abg pbirerq sbe bgure qeviref 
 bgure qeviref 
 hz uz 
 lbhe jubyr ohfvarff vf onfrq ba bgure qeviref vg'f n eragrq pne gung'f jub'f qevivat vg bgure qeviref qbrfa'g zl perqvg pneq pbire zr be fbzrguvat 
 abg gung cnegvphyne bar 
 jryy v tbg n uhaqerq pneqf urer cvpx n pneq gnxr n pneq nal pneq lbh jnag tb nurnq juvpurire bar v qba'g pner 
 fve vs lbh unq ernq gur eragny nterrzrag-- 
 qvq lbh frr gur fvmr bs gung qbphzrag vg'f yvxr gur qrpynengvba bs vaqrcraqrapr jub'f tbaan ernq gung 
 ze frvasryq nf vg fgnaqf evtug abj lbh ner abg pbirerq sbe gung qnzntr naq gurer vf nofbyhgryl abguvat gung pna or qbar nobhg gung 
 gurfr cergmryf ner znxvat zr guvefgl 
 nuu vg'f tbbq vfa'g vg lnaxrr orna jul lnaxrr orna uhu qba'g gurl unir ornaf va gur fbhgu v zrna vs lbh beqre lnaxrr orna va gur fbhgu ner gurl bssraqrq uhu  lnaxrr orna lnaxrr orna v yvxr zl lnaxrr orna  bjra v guvax jr unir gb gnyx v zrna hu *v* unir gb gnyx vg jbhyq or avpr vs *jr* pbhyq ohg hu jungrire hz qba'g trg zr jebat v yvxr pbzvat urer naq hu srrqvat lbh naq pyrnavat n yvggyr naq cnlvat lbhe ovyyf gung'f tbbq fghss tbbq fghss v unir n jbaqreshy gvzr jura v'z jvgu lbh jbaqreshy ohg ng guvf cbvag va zl yvsr v'z abg ernyyl fher gung v'z ernql gb znxr n pbzzvgzrag gb bar crefba v'z whfg abg ernyyl fher gung jr unir rabhtu va pbzzba sbe rknzcyr v yvxr ehaavat va gur cnex ovplpyvat ebyyre fxngvat graavf naq fxvvat naq hz jryy v'z tbaan or oehgnyyl ubarfg jvgu lbh abj bjra vg'f n ovgpu gb trg urer vg'f gjb fhojnlf v unir gb genafsre ng sbegl-frpbaq fgerrg gb gnxr gur qbhoyr-e naljnl v zrna guvf qbrfa'g zrna jr pna'g or sevraqf gurfr cergmryf ner znxvat zr guvefgl 
 pna lbh qvr sebz na bqbe v zrna yvxr vs lbh jrer ybpxrq va n ibzvgbevhz sbe gjb jrrxf pbhyq lbh npghnyyl qvr sebz gur bqbe 
 na bireqbfr bs bqbe tbbq dhrfgvba 
 qb v fzryy 
 ab ab ab ab v jnf whfg qbja ba gur sbegl-frpbaq fgerrg fhojnl gbqnl vg vf qvfthfgvat thrff jub v ohzcrq vagb bjra 
 nuu 
 ur'f nyevtug 
 lrnu ur'f nyzbfg shyyl erpbirerq ur gbyq zr ur jnf whfg hfvat zr sbe frk 
 yrg zr trg gung 
 ab ab ab v tbg vg 
 cyrnfr 
 ab pbzr ba yrg zr yrg zr v fznfurq lbhe pne vg pbfg lbh bire gjb gubhfnaq qbyynef 
  lrnu n phc bs pbssrr fubhyq pbire vg 
 jung ner lbh qbvat urer 
 v tbg sverq sebz gur zbivr 
 trg bhg bs urer jul 
 jryy lbh xabj gurl jrer tbaan fubbg vg gbqnl naq hu jr erurnefrq vg gjvpr gura jbbql lryyf 'npgvba' naq v ghea gb uvz naq v fnl 'gurfr cergmryf ner znxvat zr guvefgl' naq v gbbx n fjvt bs orre ln xabj naq v fynzzrq gur tynff qbja ba gur one naq vg funggrerq 
 njj 
 jryy bar bs gur cvrprf zhfg unir uvg jbbql ur fgnegrq pelvat naq ur lryyf bhg 'v'z oyrrqvat' naq ur ehaf bss naljnl guvf jbzna fur pnzr hc gb zr naq fur fnlf 'lbh'er sverq' obl v ernyyl anvyrq gung fprar 
 nj jnvg n-- bu bu sbe pelvat bhg ybhq 
 v'z fbeel vg'f tbggn or n yvggyr ovg bs n fpnel cynpr gb jbex v qba'g xabj ubj lbh srry nobhg vg lbh jnag gb or fgnaqvat gurer univat crbcyr pbzzvat va nyy qnl tbvat "v arrq xavirf v arrq zber xavirf qb lbh unir nal ovttre xavirf v'q yvxr n ovttre xavsr n ovt ybat funec xavsr gung'f jung v'z va gur znexrg sbe v yvxr gurz ernyyl funec qb lbh unir bar jvgu ubbxf naq tbhtrf yvxr oynqrf naq xvaq bs freengrq gung'f gur xvaq bs xavsr v'z ybbxvat sbe v arrq bar v pna guebj v arrq nabgure bar v pna whfg unpx njnl jvgu qb lbh unir nalguvat yvxr gung 
 bu lrnu yvxr lbh xabj jung lbh'er gnyxvat nobhg 
 yvxr lbh qb 
 jryy jung qb lbh guvax gurl chg gur fgnghr ba n tvnag ensg naq n ghtobng chyyrq vg nyy gur jnl sebz senapr 
 jung qb lbh guvax gur oebhtug vg bire va cvrprf naq fperjrq vg gbtrgure yvxr n pbssrr gnoyr 
 v qba'g xabj vg'f gbb rneyl sbe n puevfgznf cnegl vfa'g vg 
 jul qvq senapr tvir gung gb hf naljnl 
 vg jnf n tvsg 
 fb pbhagevrf whfg rkpunatr tvsgf yvxr gung 
 vs gurl yvxr rnpu bgure 
 gurer'f rynvar 
 frr gung thl ur'f gnyxvat jvgu gung'f ure arj oblsevraq 
 ernyyl gurl jbex urer va gur bssvpr 
 lrnu gurl'er univat n yvggyr syvat fb qba'g fnl nalguvat 
 jub nz v tbvat gb gryy zl zbgure yvxr v'ir tbg abguvat orggre gb gnyx nobhg 
 lbh qba'g ur'f n erpbirevat nypbubyvp 
 ernyyl 
 lrnu ur'f orra bss gur jntba sbe gjb lrnef 
 "bss gur jntba" 
 v guvax vg'f bss gur jntba 
 v guvax vg'f "ba gur jntba" 
 wreel trbetr jung ner lbh qbvat urer 
 jung nz v qbvat urer on-obbz  
 *tnfc* zl tbq zl jngpu lbh sbhaq zl jngpu  
 url xrrc lbhe unaqf gb lbhefrys vs lbh xabj jung'f tbbq sbe lbh 
 jurer qvq lbh svaq vg 
 haqre gur fbsn phfuvba 
 naq lbh fgbccrq ol whfg gb tvir vg gb zr 
 vg'f lbhe puevfgznf cerfrag 
 v gubhtu v'q arire svaq vg 
 jryy gbqnl'f lbhe yhpxl qnl 
 ab gbqnl'f *lbhe* yhpxl qnl 
 vg jvyy or zl svefg bar 
 lbh jnag gb jbex urer 
 uhu 
 lrnu bar bs gur ernqref yrsg naq gurer'f n wbo bcravat qvpx guvf vf wreel naq guvf vf trbetr 
 uv avpr gb zrrg lbh vf guvf gur thl 
 "gur thl" 
  qvpx 
 ubj pna lbh whfg trg vg

 penaoreel whvpr 
 naq ibqxn

 fb lbh'er wreel

 ubj qb lbh ernq 
 v yvxr zvxr yhovxn 
 zvxr yhovxn

 anzr n pbhcyr

 neg inaqrynl 
 ur'f na bofpher jevgre orgavx ba gur ivyyntr 
 jung unf ur jevggra 
 irargvna oyvaqf

 jurer'f zl qevax 
 gurer  fb ubj qvq vg tb 
 v guvax ur jnf vzcerffrq 
 ab ab ab guvf vf whfg penaoreel whvpr

 bar qevax yvxr gung naq ur pbhyq snyy evtug bss gur jntba 
 gbyq lbh 
 v arire srry pbzsbegnoyr va gur jbzra'f qrcnegzrag v srry yvxr v'z whfg n *yvggyr* gbb pybfr gb gelvat ba n qerff

 url gur jbzna tbg lbh n wbo gur yrnfg lbh pbhyq qb vf ohl ure n tvsg ubj nobhg guvf

 lrnu fur jbhyq ybir pnfuzrer

 jbj rkphfr zr zvff

 frr guvf erq qbg 
 bu lrnu

 gurer'f ab rkpunatrf ba guvf

 vg'f uneq gb fnl

 cyrnfr

 lrnu fb 
 ur'f npgvat irel fgenatryl v guvax ur fgnegrq qevaxvat ntnva 
 bu obl pna lbh fzryy vg 
 ab v pna'g fzryy vg

 lrf lbh jbhyq

 bxnl

 bxnl jryy jung nz v qevaxvat jung qb lbh tbg

 pbzr ba hc 
 gung vf *qnza* tbbq fpbgpu v pbhyq qb n pbzzrepvny sbe guvf fghss zzzzz obl gung uraavtnaf tbrf qbja fzbbgu naq nsgrejbeqf lbh qba'g rira fzryy gung'f evtug sbyxf v whfg unq guerr fubgf bs uraavtnaf naq v qba'g fzryy vzntvar lbh pna jnyx nebhaq qehax nyy qnl gung'f uraavtnaf gur ab-fzryy ab-gryy fpbgpu 
 uryyb rirelobql

 *tnfc*  trg bhg bs urer 
 fnl lbh tbg n ovt wbo vagreivrj naq lbh'er n yvggyr areibhf jryy guebj onpx n pbhcyr fubgf bs uraavtnaf naq lbh'yy or nf ybbfr nf n tbbfr naq ernql gb ebyy va ab gvzr naq orpnhfr vg'f bqbeyrff jul vg jvyy or bhe yvggyr frperg  u-r-qbhoyr a

 nuu zbarl

 jung

 ubj lbh qbvat 
 uryyb 
 lbh unq frk jvgu gur pyrnavat jbzna ba lbhe qrfx jub ner lbh ubj qvq lbh qb gung

 pbaihyfvat 
 pbaihyfvat 
 v qba'g xabj v'z gelvat gb uryc lbh 
 gura v nfxrq ure vs fur jnagrq n qevax 
 lbh qba'g qevax

 fb lbh fgnegrq qevaxvat

 fb ubj jnf vg

 qvpx jnf sverq

 jung ner lbh fnlvat 
 v'z abg fnlvat nalguvat

 pbzr ba hc

 ab v qvqa'g 
 lrf lbh qvq lrf lbh qvq v fnj lbhe rkcerffvba

 ubj zhpu qvq ur fnir 
 senaxyl v nz fubpxrq gung lbh jbhyq nfx fhpu n dhrfgvba  bs zr gung lbh jbhyq guvax - gur bayl fhecevfr vf ubj lbh pbhyq rira guvax bs gung gung'f jung lbh jrer frrvat 
 v unir gb gnyx gb rynvar guvf pyrnvat ynql vf gheavat gur fperjf ba zr fur'f chfuvat sbe guvf jubyr eryngvbafuvc guvat fur xrrcf pnyyvat zr guerngravat gb tb gb gur obff jvgu guvf guvat v pbhyq ybfr zl wbo v tbggn qb fbzrguvat gb xrrc ure dhvrg 
 rynvar vf va gur onguebbz fur'f jvfr gb jubyr erq qbg guvat fur'f nfxvat zr nyy xvaqf bs dhrfgvbaf

 jung qvq v jung 
 lbh qvq qvqa'g lbh 
 rynvar v'z v'z fubpxrq v'z fubpxrq urer v tb bhg va gur fcvevg bs gur frnfba  naq fcraq nyy zl fnivatf gb ohl lbh gur zbfg ornhgvshy puevfgznf fjrngre v unir rire frra gb fubj zl nccerpvngvba gb lbh ng puevfgznf naq guvf vf gur gunaxf gung v trg ng puevfgznf

 v qvqa'g gryy ure lbh fghcvq vqvbg fur gevpxrq lbh 
 rynvar lbh qba'g haqrefgnaq v unq 103 grzcrengher jura v obhtug gung fjrngre v jnf fb qvmml v jnf frrvat erq qbgf rireljurer v gubhtug rirelguvat va gur fgber unq n erq qbg ba vg v pbhyqa'g qvfgvathvfu bar erq qbg sebz nabgure v pbhyqa'g nssbeq nalguvat v unir abguvat v unira'g jbexrq sbe n ernyyl ybat gvzr  v zrna ybbx v unir ab pybgurf ybbx ng jung v'z jrnevat vg'f whfg n yvggyr erq qbg 
 guvf vf sbe lbh 
 bu trbetvr lbh obhtug guvf sbe zr bu v xarj lbh pnerq sbe zr 
 nf lbh pner sbe zr juvpu vf jul vg vf irel vzcbegnag gung lbh arire oerngur n jbeq bs guvf gb nalbar nobhg gur lbh xabj jung jvgu pynerapr gubznf naq rirelguvat 
 bxnl bxnl pna v bcra vg abj 
 lrf bs pbhefr tb nurnq zl thrff vf lbh'er tbvat gb yvxr guvf irel zhpu 
 bu vf gung pnfuzrer 
 bs pbhefr vg'f pnfurzrer 
 n pnfuzrer fjrngre bu trbetvr cbetvr 
 whfg n yvggyr fbzrguvat sbe puevfgznf 
 jura v jnf n yvggyr tvey va cnanzn n evpu nzrevpna pnzr gb bhe gbja naq ur jnf jrnevat gur fbsgrfg zbfg ornhgvshy fjrngre v fnvq gb uvz "jung qb lbh pnyy guvf zbfg ornhgvshy snoevp" naq ur fnvq "gurl pnyy vg pnfuzrer" v ercrngrq gur jbeqf "pnfuzrer pnfuzrer" v nfxrq vs v pbhyq unir vg naq ur fnvq "ab trg njnl sebz zr" gura ur fgnegrq jnyx njnl ohg v tenoorq bagb uvf yrt fpernzvat sbe uvz gb tvir zr gur fjrngre naq ur qenttrq zr guebhtu gur fgerrg naq gura ur xvpxrq ng zr jvgu gur bgure sbbg naq guerj fbzr punatr ng zr bu ohg v qvqa'g jnag gur punatr trbetvr v jnagrq gur pnfuzrer 
 v unq n srryvat lbh jbhyq yvxr vg ab qba'g gel vg ba abj gel vg ba yngre 
 jbj ybbx ng guvf vg srryf fb ornhgvshy 
 gnxr vg bss lbh'er tbvat gb ehva vg 
  jung'f guvf 
 v jnf va gur zra'f ebbz gur bgure qnl naq gurl unq gur unaq oybjre vafgrnq bs gur cncre gbjryf lbh xabj guvf guvat v yvxr gur unaq oybjre v unir gb fnl vg gnxrf n yvggyr ovg ybatre ohg v srry jura lbh'er va n ebbz jvgu n eribygvat fgrapu lbh jnag gb fcraq nf zhpu gvzr nf lbh pna 
 gur bayl fgrapu vf pbzzvat sebz lbh 
 bbbbbu 
 bu jnvg n frpbaq v oryvrir jr unir n urpxyre ynqvrf naq tragyrzra url qvpx v qba'g xabj jung lbhe ceboyrz vf vg'f abg zl snhyg lbh'er onpx ba gur jntba 
 vg'f bss gur jntba 
 va gur byq qnlf ubj qb lbh guvax gurl tbg gur nypbuby sebz gbja gb gbja 
 v qba'g xabj

 gurl unq fzbbgu genvyf jung nobhg gur phzoreynaq tnc 
 jung gur uryy qb lbh xabj nobhg jntbaf 
 v xabj rabhtu abg gb trg ba gurz

 jub fnvq gung 
 fur qvq 
 jnf gung jebat fubhyq v unir abg qbar gung v gryy lbh v tbggn cyrnq vtabenapr ba guvf guvat orpnhfr vs nalbar unq fnvq nalguvat gb zr ng nyy jura v svefg fgnegrq urer gung gung fbeg bs guvat jnf sebharq hcba lbh xabj pnhfr v'ir jbexrq va n ybg bs bssvprf naq v gryy lbh crbcr qb gung nyy gur gvzr 
 lbh'er sverq 
 jryy lbh qvqa'g unir gb fnl vg yvxr gung 
 v jnag lbh bhg bs urer ol gur raq bs gur qnl 
 jung nobhg gur jubyr puevfgznf fcvevg guvat nal syrknovyvgl gurer

 bire urer 
 jung ner lbh qbvat urer

  jung'f guvf 
 ohg va n jnl v guvax v vanqiregnagyl ghearq guvf thl vagb na nypbubyvp v ungr orvat nebhaq nypbubyvpf orpnhfr gurl'er rvgure gryyvat lbh ubj zhpu gurl ybir lbh be ubj zhpu gurl ungr lbh naq gubfr ner gur gjb fgngrzragf gung fpner zr gur zbfg ohg v guvax ur'f bxnl abj orpnhfr v unir ab vqrn ubj ur srryf nobhg zr ur'f svanyyl bss gur jntba 
 lbh zrna ba gur jntba 
 qba'g trg fzneg

 945 
 erzrzore qba'g juvfgyr ba gur ryringbe 
 jul abg 
 gung'f jung jvyyvr ybzna gbyq ovss orsber uvf vagreivrj va 'qrngu bs n fnyrfzna'

 nyy evtug v'z tbaan tb 
 jung gvzr vf gur yrfovna jrqqvat 
 930 
 yrfovna jrqqvat ubj qb gurl jbex oevqr naq tebbz bhg jung qb gurl syvc n pbva 
 lrnu gurl syvc n pbva 
 jung jnf gung abg cbyvgvpnyyl pbeerpg vg'f n yrtvgvzngr dhrfgvba 
 v'z fb gverq v'yy snyy nfyrrc ba gung genva  
 v trg gur srryvat jura yrfovnaf ner ybbxvat ng zr gurl'er guvaxvat "gung'f jul v'z abg urgrebfrkhny" 
 wreel pbzr ba yrg'f tb cvpx hc gur purpx fb jr pna tb

 ab qbbef

 cvnavfg n *pynffvpny* cvnavfg fur *cynlf* gur cvnab fur'f n *oevyyvnag* jbzna v-v-v fng va ure yvivat ebbz fur cynlrq gur *jnyqfgrva fbangn* gur *jnyqfgrva*

 *ab* 
 lrf lbh qb ovss lbh'ir arire orra gb n syrn znexrg naq lbh guvax gurl unir syrnf gurer 
 nyy evtug v guvax gurl unir syrnf gurer fb jung

 *ab* jr jbhyq unir urneq vg 
 jung qb lbh guvax gurl whfg penpx gurve xahpxyrf naq pbzr bhg

 jr qvq jr'er whfg unatvat bhg 
 ernyyl  lbh ernyyl ybbx terng 
 bu hu gunax lbh ner lbh fgvyy sevraqf jvgu evpuvr nccry 
 bu evpuvr ur'f orra qbvat pbzrql va y n sbe n srj lrnef ur whfg tbg onpx n zbagu ntb ur'f xvaq bs zrffrq hc ba qehtf v qba'g xabj jung gb qb sbe gur thl 
 unir lbh gubhtug nobhg na vagreiragvba 
 jung'f gung 
 lbh trg nyy uvf sevraqf va n ebbz gurl pbasebag uvzz gb gel gb trg uvz vagb eruno vg'f n irel cbchyne guvat abj 
 ur'q arire yvfgra gb nalbar  rkprcg bs pbhefr wreel ur'q yvfgra gb wreel wreel jbhyq unir gb or vaibyirq ur ernyyl erfcrpgf wreel 
 v'z fbeel trbetr v'z fbeel

 v qhaab vg jnf na vzchyfr

 v'z fbeel v'z fbeel v *nz*

 jung ner jr tbaan gryy ure

 jung nobhg

 [npphfvatyl] jung'f *gung*

 [ernyvmvat shyy jryy vg vfa'g] lrf vg vf 
 naljnl  fb wbua gbyq zr gung evpuvr vf va gbja sebz ybf natryrf naq ur'f ernyyl zrffrq hc ba qehtf fb v gbyq uvz gung ur fubhyq qb na vagreiragvba 
 ernyyl na vagreiragvba  
 l'xabj crbcyr jr tbg n fvghngvba bire urer

 zr jul zr

 ab 
 bu gurfr ner zl sevraqf rynvar naq wreel  abry

 crm 
 hu ab ab gunax lbh qvq lbh frr ure 
 zr hu hu ab  
 nalbar jub jbhyq ynhtu ng n erpvgny vf cebonoyl fbzr fbeg bs yhangvp naljnl v zrna bayl n fvpx gjvfgrq zvaq pbhyq or gung ehqr naq vtabenag 
 znlor fbzr zragny qrsrpgvir chg fbzrguvat fghcvq ba ure yrt 
 rira vs guvf fb pnyyrq zragny qrsrpgvir qvq chg fbzrguvat ba ure yrt fur'f fgvyy gur bar jub ynhturq 
 v'yy arire sbetrg gung ynhtu sbe gur erfg bs zl yvsr [rkvgf] 
 v'z fher fur jbhyq ncbybtvmr vs fur pbhyq cebonoyl fbzrobql vf ubyqvat ure onpx ntnvafg rirel svoer va ure orvat 
 vs fur jnag'f gb pbagvahr gb unir n svoer bs ure orvat fur'yy or irel pnershy  
 nyy evtug fb ner lbh ernql fb jr'yy tb bhg naq trg fbzrguvat gb rng 
 v qba'g srry yvxr vg gbavtug 
 jr'yy or bhgfvqr 
 lrnu 
 vg jnf avpr zrrgvat lbh ol gur jnl ubj qb lbh jnez hc lbhe svatref orsber lbh cynl 
 v whfg penpx zl xahpxyrf 
 jr'yy unir n tbbq gvzr 
 v qba'g srry yvxr vg 
 nu pbzr ba 
 v fnvq v qba'g srry yvxr vg 
 hz nyy evtug hz hu v'yy pnyy 'ln v'yy pnyy lbh naq jr'yy gnyx ba gur cubar n gryrcubar pbzzhavdh rirel guvat vf svar bx hu svar  [rkvgf] 
 lbh xabj v guvat xenzre zvtug unir orra erfcbafvoyr sbe trggvat evpuvr vaibyirq jvgu qehtf va gur svefg cynpr 
 jung ubj 
 n srj lrnef ntb gur pbzrql pyho unq n fbsgonyy grnz xenzre jnf bhe svefg onfrzna lbh pbhyqa'g trg nalguvat ol uvz vg jnf haoryvrinoyr naljnl guvf bar tnzr jr pnzr onpx gb jva sebz yvxr 8 ehaf oruvaq fb xenzre fnlf gb evpuvr jul qba'g lbh qhzc gur ohpxrg bs tngbenqr ba znegl orafba'f urnq gur pyho bjare fb evpuvr tbrf nurnq naq qbrf vg 
 fb jung unccrarq 
 jung unccrarq gur thl jnf yvxr 67 lrnef byq vg jnf serrmvat bhg ur pnhtug n pbyq tbg carhzbavn naq n zbagu yngre ur jnf qrnq 
 fuhg hc 
 nyy gur pbzrqvnaf jrer unccl ur jnf bar bs gurfr pyho bjaref abobqh yvxrq naljnl ohg evpuvr jnf arire gur fnzr 
 june nobhg xenzre 
 ur'f gur fnzr 
 ner lbh fher lbh jnag zr wbua v unir fcbxra gb evpuvr va gjb lrnef v qba'g unir n tbbq ncnegzrag sbe na vagreiragvba gur sheavgher vg'f irel aba-pbasebagngvbany nyy evtug nyy evtug tbbqolr [gb xenzre] erzrzore evpvr nccry 
  bu fher gur thl v gbyq gb cbhe gur tngbenqr gung xvyyrq znegl orafba 
 evtug jr'yy wbua zbyyvxn vf betnavmvat fbzr xvaq bs vagreiragvba sbe uvz jr'er univat vg urer 
 pna v trg va ba gung 
 jung qb lbh guvax vg'f yvxr n cbxre tnzr 
 vf rynvar tbvat 
 lrnu 
 jryy v xarj uvz nf jryy nf fur qvq 
 lrnu ohg wbua vaivgrq ure 
 fb jung ner lbh fnlvat lbh qba'g jnag zr gb vagreirar 
 ab vagreirar tb vagreirar nyy lbh jnag v nz whfg nsenvq lbh zvtug or vagresrevat juvyr jr'er vagreiravat 
 vg'f trbetr 
 fgbc fzryyvat lbhe nez 
 lbh xabj v tbg n terng vqrn sbe n pbybtar gur ornpu lbh fcenl vg ba naq lbh fzryy yvxr lbh whfg pnzr ubzr sebz gur ornpu 
 uhz n pbybtar gung fzryyf yvxr gur ornpu v pna'g oryvrir v'z fnlvat guvf "gung'f abg n onq vqrn" 
 gryy zr nobhg vg 
 jul qba'g lbh pnyy fgrir q'wvss ur jbexf va gur znexrgvat qrcnegzrag ng pnyiva xyrva va snpg ur'f n tbbq sevraq bs wbua zbyyvxn naq evpuvr nyfb 
 jryy vg'f bire vg'f qrsvavgryl bire 
 fur oebxr hc jvgu lbh 
 ab ohg v pna gryy fur'f tbvat gb v pna frafr vg jr unq guvf greevoyr cubar pbairefngvba v jnf fb areibhf orsber v pnyyrq v znqr hc guvf jubyr yvfg bs guvatf gb gnyx nobhg 
 jung jnf ba gur yvfg 
 yrg'f frr ubj v'z irel tbbq ng tbvat va erirefr va zl pne jul vfa'g cbfghz n zber cbchyne qevax 
 lrnu cbfghz vf haqre-enggrq 
 naljnl gurer jnf nyy guvf grafvba v nfxrq ure vs fur jnagrq gb tb bhg gb qvaare naq fur fnvq "ab znlor jr pbhyq trg gbtrgure sbe yhapu" lbh xabj jung gung zrnaf 
 jung'f jebat jvgu yhapu 
 yhapu vf svar ng gur ortvaavat gura lbh zbir ba gb qvaare lbh qba'g zbir onpx gb yhapu vg'f yvxr orvat qrzbgrq v'yy arire qb nabgure pebffjbeq chmmyr jvgu ure ntnva v xabj vg 
 v yvxr gur whzoyr lbh rire qb gur whzoyr 
 v unir ab cbjre qb lbh haqrefgnaq v arrq unaq v unir ab unaq 
 oernx hc jvgu ure 
 jung 
 lbh oernx hc jvgu ure lbh erirefr rirelguvat gung jnl 
 n cerrzcgvir oernxhc

 fb v nz unir gb tbvat gb oernx hc jvgu lbh

 xvaq bs

 abj fgbc vg

 qb lbh erpbtavmr vg  gur ornpu

 jung nobhg vg

 gung vf gur qhzorfg vqrn v unir rire urneq 
 bu jnvg qvq lbh urer jung v whfg fnvq 
 qb lbh guvax crbcyr ner tbvat gb cnl $80 n obggyr gb fzryy yvxr qrnq svfu naq frn jrrq gung'f jul crbcyr gnxr fubjref jura gur pbzr ubzr sebz gur ornpu vg'f na bowrpgvbanoyr bssrafvir bqbhe 
 fb lbh qba'g guvax vg'f n tbbq vqrn 
 qbhoyr purpx guvf cneg sbe fher] 
 gur zrzoenarf trg qevrq naq vg whfg fgnegf oyrrqvat fvapr v jnf n xvq fb v unir gb fgvpx gvffhr hc gurer 
  hu lbh unir gb jbex yvxr gung 
 abobql zvaqf abobql unf rire fnvq nalguvat gb zr 
 ner gurer nal vpr phorf 
 va gur serrmre 
 v ybbxrq gurer nera'g nal vpr phorf 
 jryy v thrff gurer nera'g nal vpr phorf 
 v pna'g qevax guvf vg'f jnez  
 fubhyqa'g jr erurnefr guvf n yvggyr ovg orsber evpuvr pbzrf 
 jung'f gur cyna 
 qb v unir gb gnyx v qba'g srry yvxr gnyxvat 
 jryy vs ur'f abg tbvat gb gnyx v'z abg tbvat gb gnyx rvgure 
 ab jr nyy unir gb gnyx 
 jung'f gur beqre 
 jr'yy tb va nycunorgvpny beqre svefg eboregn 
 jul nz v svefg 
 nyonab vf lbhe ynfg anzr 
 gung'f abg zl anzr nal zber v'z qvibeprq

 url 
 vf guvf gur vagresrerapr 
 vagreiragvba 
 jung ner lbh qbvat urer 
 hu vf vg nyy evtug vs v fgnl sbe gur vagreiragvba 
 url guvf vf sbe pybfr sevraqf bayl 
 v'z n sevraq jub qb lbh guvax gbyq uvz gb cbhe gur tngbenqr bire znegl orafba'f urnq 
 yrg uvz fgnl 
 url lbh xabj v tbg fbzrbar gb znxr hc gung pbybtar sbe zr ovt zbhgu 
 fbzrobql'f tbvat gb znxr gung penc 
 xenzre 
 url pbzr ba gurfr ner fbzr bs zl cbyne orne ohqqvrf 
 gurl pna'g fgnl 
 jr'er univat n cnegl urer 
 ab jr'er univat na vagreiragvba 
 na vagreiragvba jub'f vagreiravat 
 gurer'f n sevraq bs bhef ba qehtf naq jr'er tbvat gb pbasebag uvz 
 fher jr hfrq gb qb gung jura bar bs bhe cbyne ornef fgbccrq pbzvat jr jbhyq tb gb uvf ubhfr naq fnl "jung lbh qba'g jnag gb or n cbyne orne nalzber vg'f gbb pbyq sbe lbh" 
 vg'f uvz 
 jung fubhyq jr qb 
 uvqr 
 vg'f abg n fhecevfr cnegl lrnu  
 vg'f trbetr 
 lrnu pbzr ba hc  vg'f abg uvz 
 vs lbh qba'g tb bhg jvgu zr vg'f orpnhfr v'z n one graqre 
 ybbx v qba'g guvax guvf vf nccebcevngr evtug abj

 lbh'er trggvat jnez

 bu uv abry 
 jryy lbh'er ybbxvat jryy 
 wreel yrg zr gryy lbh fbzrguvat "n zna jvgubhg unaq vf abg n zna" v tbg fb zhpu unaq v'z pbzvat bhg bs zl tybirf v tbg gb gunax xenzre 
 rira vs v jrer qenttrq guebhtu znaher v fgvyy jbhyqa'g chg gung fghss ba

 lbh guvax fb

 gur znyr xnatnebb qbrfa'g unir n cbhpu bayl gur srznyr unf vg gur znyr unf cbhpu rail 
  
  
 gung ynhtu gung'f gur ynhtu gung'f vg lbh'er gur bar 
 ab ab vg jnf na nppvqrag vg ernyyl jnfa'g zl snhyg vg jnf wreel 
 lbh chg n crm qvfcrafre ba ure yrt qhevat zl erpvgny 
 v qvqa'g xabj fur jbhyq ynhtu 
 lbh yvrq gb zr trbetr lbh yvrq gb zr 
 ab v hu hz jn jn jung qvq v qb  jurer ner lbh tbvat 
 v  nz oernxvat hc  jvgu lbh 
 lbh pna'g oernx hc jvgu zr v'ir tbg unaq 
 naq lbh'er tbvat gb arrq vg 
 url evpuvr 
 fb jung'f tbvat ba 
 vg jnf cerggl htyl sebz gur trg tb ur'f abg yvfgravat ur'f ubfgvyr ur'f gnyxvat onpx 
 v pna'g qb gurfr chmmyrf 
 fb ur fgnegf gb trg hc ur fcbgf gur crm qvfcrafre ba gur pbssrr gnoyr 
 nu nu crm qvfcrafre 
 ur cvpxf vg hc - ur fgnerf ng vg - vg'f yvxr ur'f ulcabgvmrq ol vg gura ur'f gryyvat hf guvf fgbel nobhg ubj jura ur jnf n xvq ur jnf va gur pne jvgu uvf sngure naq uvf sngure jnf gelvat gb ybnq bar bs gurz 
 jryy gurl'er uneq gb ybnq 
 gryy zr fbzrguvat v qba'g xabj fb nf gur sngure'f gelvat gb ybnq vg ur ybfrf pbageby bs gur pne naq vg penfurf vagb n uvtu fpubby pnsrgrevn abobql'f uheg ohg crm vf nyy bire gur pne naq gur qvfcrafre jnf qrfgeblrq iveghnyyl orlbaq erpbtavgvba 
 cbbe xvq 
 fb nf ur'f gryyvat gur fgbel ur fgnegf pelvat 
 jung qvq lbh qb 
 jung qb lbh guvax v tnir uvz zl crm qvfcrafre 
 jbj 
 gjb ubhef yngre ur purpxf vagb fzvgure'f pyvavp v gnyxrq gb gur qbpgbe lrfgreqnl ur'f qbvat terng ba gur eruno ur'f ubbxrq ba crm ur'f rngvat gurz yvxr gurer'f ab gbzbeebj 
 jung'f n guerr yrggre jbeq sbe pnaql 
 v pna'g qb gubfr guvatf 
 yrg zr nfx lbh n dhrfgvba vs lbh anzrq n xvq enfchgva qb lbh guvax gung jbhyq unir n artngvir rssrpg ba uvf yvsr 
 an 
 jung ner lbh qbvat jrer tbvat bhg sbe qvaare va gra zvahgrf 
 qb lbh ernyvmr guvf vf gur ynfg zrny v nz tbvat gb unir sbe guerr qnlf 
 lrnu 
 vgf trbetr 
 pbzr ba hc    v arire urneq bs guvf lbhir tbg gb snfg sbe guerr qnlf gb gnxr na hypre grfg ubj lbh tbaan qb gung 
 v qbag xabj ubj pbhyq v cbffvoyl unir hypref jub pbhyq unir tvira zr hypref 
 v guvax vyy gnxr bhg gur tneontr 
 url unir lbh rire snfgrq 
 jryy bapr v qvqag unir qvaare hagvy yvxr 900 bpybpx gung jnf cerggl ebhtu  url qb zr n snibhe jvyy ln guebj bhg zl tneontr sbe zr 
 lrnu evtug 
 pbzr ba vgf whfg qbja gur unyy 
 tvir zr gjb ohpxf vyy qb vg sbe gjb ohpxf 
 vyy tvir lbh 50 pragf 
 gurerf ab jnl v gbhpu gung ont sbe yrff guna gjb qbyynef 
 pbzr ba svsgl pragf  n cvrpr bs qenxrf pbssrr pnxr 
 lbher abg trggvat ab qenxrf pbssrr pnxr sbe svsgl pragf lnr url vz nyy frg v tbg gur gvpxrg vz tbvat gb gur pnlzna vfynaqf guvf sevqnl 
 v qbag trg lbh jub tbrf ba inpngvba jvgubhg n wbo jung qb lbh arrq n oernx sebz trggvat hc ng ryrira 
 vgf na vaperqvoyr qrny v qbag xabj jul lbh qbag pbzr jvgu zr 
 anu v qbag tb sbe gurfr aba-ershaqnoyr qrnyf v pnag pbzzvg gb n jbzna vz abg tbvat gb pbzzvg gb na nveyvar 
 uv 
 uv 
 ubj ner lbh 
 tvan qb lbh xabj jung n qenxrf pbssrr pnxr vf 
 bs pbhefr gur cynar pnxr jvgu gur fjrrg oebja pehzof ba gur gbc 
 ubj zhpu qb gurl pbfg 
 gur whavbe 
 ab ab gur shyy fvmr 
 ab ab gur whavbe 
 lbh qvqag fnl "whavbe" 
 v unirag unq bar bs gubfr fvapr v jnf n yvggyr tvey 
 ernyyl lbh fubhyq or nfunzrq bs lbhefrys v jnag lbh bhg bs urer  ubj ln qbvat 
 tbbq rabhtu 
 obl furf frkl vfag fur 
 qb lbh oryvrir gung thl 
 jung thl 
 zl arvtuobhe 
 bu gung perrcl thl 
 lrnu qvq ur guvax v jnf syvegvat jvgu ure 
 ur qvqag frrz gbb cyrnfrq 
 znlor vyy trg n fgrnx jvgu serapu sevrq bavba jvatf 
 url lbh xabj jung v whfg erzrzorerq fbzrguvat v unq n qernz nobhg gung thl ynfg avtug guvf vf nznmvat 
 jungf fb nznmvat lbhir frra uvz orsber 
 v unirag frra uvz sbe zbaguf 
 jung jnf gur qernz 
 v jnf qbvat fgnaqhc pbzrql va xraarohaxcbeg znvar  avtug pyho gur fgntr jnf ba n pyvss naq gur nhqvrapr jnf guebjvat nyy gur pbzvpf bss 
 v guvax vir cynlrq gurer 
 vir unq n ybg bs bgure cnenabezny fghss unccra gb zr 
 lbher n yvggyr cnenabezny 
 url trbetr lbh xabj zl sevraq tbrf gb n cflpuvp 
 ernyyl 
 hu hu lbh fubhyq tb fbzr gvzr 
 vq ybir gb tb znxr na nccbvagzrag

 nyevtug pbzr ba yrgf trg bhg bs urer

 znegvarf tvey sevraq 
 znegvar

 bu znegva

 pbzr ba 
 va zl cnwnznf v orggre trg zl ebor 
 jr qbag unir rabhtu gvzr 
 vgyy gnxr gjb frpbaqf

 anu sbetrg vg 
 ab tb nurnq 
 anu vyy whfg jrne gur cnwnznf 
 jvyy lbh whfg trg vg 
 ner lbh fher 
 sbetrg vg pbzr ba 
 anu vyy tb trg gur ebor 
 gungf abg gbb onq vgf abg yvxr n fhaal iba ohybj pbzzn gur qbpgbe fnvq ur fubhyq fanc bhg bs vg nalgvzr 
 lbh xabj jul ur qvq guvf orpnhfr v gbyq uvz vg jnf bire v qvq abg jnag gb frr uvz nalzber 
 ernyyl vgf bire 
 v pbhyq abg fgnaq vg nabgure zvahgr lrfgreqnl ur ghearq bire n znaf ubg qbt fgnaq orpnhfr ur gubhtug gur zna jnf ybbxvat ng zr naq gura nsgre ur fnj lbh va gur unyy npu ur jnf penml jvgu wrnybhfl 
 bu obl qvq ur fnl nalguvat nobhg zr 
 ur qbrf abg yvxr lbh naq nyy vaqvpngvbaf ner ur qbrf abg yvxr qenxrf pbssrr pnxr 
 ur fnvq gung 
 ur jnf fpernzvat nobhg vg nyy avtug ubj vgf gbb fjrrg naq vg snyyf ncneg jura lbh rng vg 
 vz fbeel vs v pnhfrq nal gebhoyr v jnf whfg orvat sevraqyl

 lbh jrerag 
 ab v unir gubhtug nobhg lbh znal gvzrf unir lbh gubhtug nobhg zr 
 bs pbhefr 
 gryy zr rirelguvat 
 ner lbh fher ur pnag urne nalguvat   znegva znegva 
 v jvfu ur jnf abg va n pbzn v jvfu ur jnf qrnq v jvfu v pbhyq chyy gur cyht bhg sebz uvz 
 v jbhyq v jbhyq jnvg ba gung v xabj ubj lbh srry ohg whevrf gbqnl lbh arire xabj ubj gurler tbvat gb ybbx ng n guvat yvxr guvf

 urer

 lbh qbag jnag gb 
 ab ab v jnag gb v v irel zhpu jnag gb v v qrfver gb v v cvar gb 
 gura xvff zr evtug va sebag bs uvz 
 v pnag jung vs ur jnxrf hc 
 n zna vf ylvat urer hapbafpvbhf naq lbher nsenvq bs uvz jung xvaq bs n zna ner lbh

 url 
 url 
 qvq lbh urne nobhg znegva 
 lrnu v urneq 
 v pnag oryvrir urf va n pbzn 
 urf tbg zl inphhz pyrnare lbh xabj v ybnarq vg gb uvz ur arire erghearq vg gur pnecrgf ner svygul jung nz v tbvat gb qb 
 jub gbyq lbh nobhg znegva 
 arjzna urf tbbq sevraqf jvgu uvz 
 bu ovt zbhgu arjzna v fubhyq unir thrffrq 
 urf tbg nyy bs zl nggnpuzragf lbh xabj 
 url yrg zr nfx lbh fbzrguvat ubj ybat qb lbh unir gb jnvg sbe n thl gb pbzr bhg bs n pbzn orsber lbh pna nfx uvf rk-tveysevraq bhg 
 jung tvan jul jnvg jul abg whfg pnyy qbpgbe xnibexvna 
 lbh xabj v qbag trg gung jubyr fhvpvqr znpuvar gurerf ab gnyy ohvyqvatf jurer gurfr crbcyr yvir gurl pnag jenc gurve yvcf nebhaq n eribyire yvxr n abezny crefba 
 fb jungf tbvat ba orgjrra lbh naq tvan 
 jryy v jrag jvgu ure gb gur ubfcvgny ynfg avtug 
 hu hu 
 fb jrer va gur ebbz naq furf gelvat gb trg zr gb xvff ure evtug va sebag bs uvz 
 hu hu lbh frr gungf gur terng guvat nobhg zrqvgreenarna jbzra nyy evtug fb jung qvq lbh qb 
 abguvat 
 nu jung xvaq bs n zna ner lbh gur thl vf hapbafpvbhf va n pbzn naq lbh qbag unir gur thgf gb xvff uvf tveysevraq 
 v qvqag xabj jung gur pbzn rgvdhrggr jnf 
 gurer vf ab pbzn rgvdhrggr lbh frr gungf gur ornhgl bs gur pbzn zna vg qbrfag znggre jung lbh qb nebhaq vg 
 fb lbher fnlvat uvf tvey uvf pne uvf pybgurf vgf nyy hc sbe tenof lbh pna whfg ybbg gur pbzn ivpgvz 
 vq tvir uvz 24 ubhef gb trg bhg bs vg gurl pnag trg bhg bs vg va 24 ubhef vgf n ynaq ehfu 
 fb vs gur pbzn ivpgvz jnxrf hc va n zbagu urf guevyyrq ur tbg bhg bs gur pbzn ur tbrf ubzr gurerf abguvat yrsg 
 abguvat yrsg gungf jul vz gelvat gb trg gung inphhz pyrnare orpnhfr fbzrobqlf tbvat gb teno vg 
 znegvaf fcvevg pnzr gb lbh nf n jneavat 
 jul jbhyq ur pbzr gb trbetr 
 orpnhfr trbetr unf urvtugrarq rkgen frafbel creprcgvba snltl trg lbhe svatre bhg bs lbhe abfr 
 v xarj vg v nyjnlf sryg qvssrerag

 fur unfag rngra va gjb qnlf 
 jubf cnhyvar 
 cnhyvar    jnvg n zvahgr v tbg vg zl oebgure bapr vzcertangrq n jbzna anzrq cnhyvar 
 qb lbh guvax nobhg ure 
 jura v urne ure anzr zragvbarq 
 phg gurfr jvgu lbhe yrsg unaq 
 gurer jnf n jbzna nhqerl fur unq n irel ovt abfr 
 v frr na nhqerl ohg jvgu n fznyy abfr

 rynvar 
 v fzbxrq jura v unq snvfl 
 nu bu 
 nu bu jung jung nu bu 
 v qbag xabj nobhg guvf gevc trbetr 
 lbh pna frr gur pnlzna vfynaqf va gurer vf fbzrguvat tbvat gb unccra gb zr jung 
 vgf ernyyl onq sbe gur srghf qb lbh xabj gung 
 rynvar furf n cflpuvp fur xabjf ubj gur xvqf tbvat gb or 
 fubhyq v abg tb ba guvf gevc 
 trbetr v nz tbvat gb gryy lbh fbzrguvat naq v jnag lbh gb ernyyl urne zr 
 abj yvfgra v whfg qbag xabj ubj n crefba jvgu rirelguvat jr abj xabj nobhg cer-angny pner pna chg n pvtnerggr va ure zbhgu 
 rynvar jung ner lbh qbvat 
 vgf qvfthfgvat 
 v qbag oryvir vg v jbhyq yvxr lbh obgu gb yrnir 
 bu svar v qbag yvxr gb or nebhaq crbcyr jub ner whfg fb veerfcbafvoyr 
 trg gur uryy bhg 
 n cynar penfu n urneg nggnpx yhchf vf vg yhchf 
 qb lbh jnag zr gb pnyy gur fhcre ur jnf na vfenryv pbzznaqb 
 vs lbh qbag fnl nalguvat v jvyy nffhzr vgf n cynar penfu 
 trg bhg 
 abg n cynar penfu  vf vg n cynar penfu 
 v qb abg yvxr lbhe gbbguoehfu gurer ner ab oevfgyrf 
 lbh pna fnl jung lbh jnag nobhg zr ohg vyy or qnzarq vs vz tbvat gb fgnaq urer juvyr lbh vafhyg zl gbbguoehfu 
 vg vf gbb fznyy sbe fbzrbar jvgu fhpu n ovt zbhgu  yrg zr nfx lbh jung jvyy lbh qb vs znegvar jnxrf hc eha njnl yvxr n zbhfr 
 ab zber yvxr gur guerr fgbbtrf ng gur raq bs rirel zbivr 
 jub ner gurfr fgbbtrf lbh fcrnx bs 
 gurler n pbzrql grnz 
 gryy zr nobhg gurz rirelguvat 
 jryy gurler guerr xvaq bs shaal ybbxvat thlf naq gurl uvg rnpu bgure n ybg 
 lbh jvyy fubj zr gur fgbbtrf 
 v jvyy fubj lbh gur fgbbtrf 
 jura 
 jryy v qbag ernyyl xabj jurer gur fgbbtrf ner evtug abj ohg vs v ybpngr gurz lbh jvyy or gur svefg gb xabj 
 pbzr lbh jnyx zr gb n pno 
 jryy hu v hu v qbag jnag lbh gb trg hcfrg be nalguvat ohg hu jvgu znegva naq nyy jryy znlor vgf abg fhpu n tbbq vqrn sbe hf gb or frra gbtrgure va gur ohvyqvat orpnhfr lbh xabj ur unq n ybg bs sevraqf urer 
 lbher fgvyy nsenvq lbh ner abg n zna 
 jryy gura jung ner nyy gubfr gvrf naq fcbeg wnpxrgf qbvat va zl pybfrg 
 ner lbh tbvat gb jnyx zr gb n pno be abg

 lbh fubhyq whfg rng sehvg 
 v pnag rng sehvg vg znxrf zr vapbagvarag

 uryyb arjzna

 ur pnag urne lbh lbh vqvbg jul qbag lbh whfg ohl nabgure bar

 jbnu
