 vgf rynvar 
 nyy evtug jrer pbzvat qbja 
 url jurer ln tbvat 
 jrer gnxvat rynvar gb qvaare furf tbg gb fgneg gur snfg ntnva hz lbh jnag gb tb 
 hz vq yvxr gb ohg n ohapu bs hf sebz gur vfynaqf jryy or trggvat gbtrgure 
 ryyr zpcurefba tbvat gb or gurer 
 bu v tbg gb pnyy ure onpx 
 jul rira gel nalzber gurer'f ab frafr gb vg v'z arire tbaan zrrg nalobql v fubhyq whfg npprcg vg 
 bu lrf lbh jvyy 
 ab v jba'g 
 lrnu znlor lbh jba'g 
 v zrna vg'f uneq rabhtu gb zrrg n jbzna lbh qvfyvxr zhpu yrff yvxr 
 ner zl abfgevyf trggvat ovttre 
 ab jul zhfg vg or fb qvssvphyg jul vf gurer nyy guvf grafvba naq ubfgvyvgl jul pna'g v whfg jnyx hc gb n jbzna ba gur fgerrg naq fnl "uv v'z 
 gurer'f whfg ab zra bhg gurer lbh xabj 
 v xabj 
 v zrna gur ceboyrz vf gung gur tbbq barf xabj gurl'er tbbq naq gurl xabj gurl'er va fhpu qrznaq gurl'er whfg abg vagrerfgrq va pbasvavat gurzfryirf gb bar crefba 
 v ungr gur tbbq barf 
 vf wreel bar bs gur tbbq barf 
 gung'f n tbbq dhrfgvba v guvax ur guvaxf ur vf 
 jryy gur zrqvbper barf ner ninvynoyr ohg gurl'er fb vafrpher nobhg abg orvat bar bs gur tbbq barf gung gurl'er nyjnlf tbvat "jryy v'z abg tbbq rabhtu sbe lbh jung ner lbh qbvat jvgu zr" naq riraghnyyl v whfg tb "lbh'er evtug" 
 lbh xabj znlor lbh arrq fbzrobql orgjrra tbbq naq zrqvbper 
 ab znlor v arrq fbzrobql jub unf abguvat fbzrobql jub whfg unf gb nccerpvngr orvat jvgu zr orpnhfr ur'f fb qrfcrengr 
 v zrna vg'f tbggra gb gur cbvag jurer v'z syvegvat jvgu bcrengbef ba gur cubar v nyzbfg znqr n qngr jvgu bar 
 bu fb gurer'f fgvyy ubcr 
 v qba'g jnag ubcr ubcr vf xvyyvat zr zl qernz vf gb orpbzr ubcryrff jura lbh'er ubcryrff lbh qba'g pner naq jura lbh qba'g pner gung vaqvssrerapr znxrf lbh nggenpgvir 
 bu fb ubcryrffarff vf gur xrl 
 vg'f zl bayl ubcr 
 frr v jbhyqa'g ernyyl zvaq fb zhpu ohg v srry onqyl sbe zl zbgure v zrna vs zl zbgure jrera'g nebhaq vg jbhyqa'g or fb onq ohg v'z gryyvat lbh vs v'z abg zneevrq ol gur gvzr v'z sbegl v'z tbaan unir gb xvyy ure orpnhfr vg'f gur bayl snve guvat gb qb v whfg pbhyqa'g chg ure guebhtu gung 
 jryy ng yrnfg lbh'er abg ovggre 
 jub fnlf v'z abg ovggre 
 nera'g lbh gbb lbhat gb or ovggre 
 ab lbh pna or lbhat naq ovggre whfg znlor abg nf ovggre nf v'z tbaan or gra lrnef sebz abj ohg v'z ovggre naljnl qba'g gryy nalbar 
 qba'g jbeel lbhe ovggrearff vf fnsr jvgu zr 
 hz beqre zr n cvrpr bs pnxr v'z tbaan tb guebj hc 
 ybbx ng zl unaqf ybbx svygul sebz gur cncre lbh xabj gurl fubhyq tvir lbh n jrg-anc jura lbh ohl bar yvxr ng gubfr evo wbvagf 
 fb jung'q lbh qb ynfg avtug 
 jrag bhg jvgu trbetr lbh 
 jrag bhg jvgu plaguvn 
 ubj jnf vg jung'q lbh gnyx nobhg 
 jryy lbh xabj gur hfhny; gur srqreny erfreir gur envasberfg plaguvn gubhtug jr fubhyq ahxr gur envasberfg lbh xabj trg evq bs vg va bar sryy fjbbc fb jr pna ng yrnfg ryvzvangr vg nf n fhowrpg bs pbairefngvba jung nobhg lbh 
 jr oehfurq ba gung npghnyyl trbetr jnf va ener sbez ur whfg pna'g svaq nalobql 
 v xabj plaguvn gbb fur'f ernyyl tvira hc

 v'ir arire svkrq nalobql hc

 fb jung 
 jung lbh qba'g guvax fur'f ornhgvshy 
 v qba'g xabj jung'f jvgu gur rlroebjf 
 lbh xabj jung lbhe ceboyrz vf lbhe fgnaqneqf ner gbb uvtu 
 v jrag bhg jvgu lbh 
 gung'f orpnhfr zl fgnaqneqf ner gbb ybj naq ol gur jnl lbh xabj jbzra xvyy sbe rlroebjf yvxr gung qb lbh xabj gung v zrna jbzra cyhpx gurve erny rlroebjf bhg bs gurve urnq bar ol bar hagvy gurl'er onyq wreel onyq nobir gur rlrf naq gura gurl cnvag va gurfr rlroebjf gb ybbx yvxr gung 
 jryy yrg zr gryy lbh fbzrguvat nobhg trbetr ur vf snfg ur pna eha yvxr gur jvaq naq ur'f fgebat v'ir frra uvz yvsg n uhaqerq cbhaqf bire uvf urnq jvgubhg rira xabjvat vg naq lbh jbhyqa'g xabj vg gb ybbx ng uvz ohg trbetr pna onvg n ubbx 
 ur pna ernyyl qb gung

 sybjvat

 whfg pynevslvat

 lrnu ur qvq

 fb fngheqnl avtug

 lbh xabj zl sevraq obo fnpnznab 
 bu gur thl sebz wrefrl

 bu jryy pbzr ba gnxr fbzr wreel teno 'rz

 wn wn wn - whfg gryy vg 
 whar 14 1987 zrgf cuvyyvrf jr'er rawblvat n ornhgvshy nsgreabba va gur evtug svryq fgnaqf jura n pehpvny ureanaqrm reebe gb n svir eha cuvyyvrf avagu pbfg gur zrgf gur tnzr 
 bhe qnl jnf ehvarq gurer jnf n ybg bs crbcyr lbh xabj gurl jrer jnvgvat ol gur cynlre'f cnexvat ybg abj jr'er pbzvat qbja gur enzc  [phg gb svyz bs gur qnl - yvxr gur mnoehgre svyz - jvgu gur hzoeryyn zna naq rirelguvat - bu fb oevyyvnag cnebql]  arjzna jnf va sebag bs zr xrvgu jnf pbzvat gbjneq hf nf ur cnffrf arjzna gheaf naq fnlf " avpr tnzr cerggl obl" xrvgu pbagvahrq cnfg hf hc gur enzc 
 n frpbaq yngre fbzrguvat unccrarq gung punatrq hf va n qrrc naq cebsbhaq jnl sebag gung qnl sbejneq 
 jung jnf vg 
 ur fcvg ba hf naq v fpernzrq bhg "v'z uvg" 
 gura v ghearq naq gur fcvg evpbpurg bs uvz naq vg uvg zr 
 jbj jung n fgbel 
 hasbeghangryl gur vzzhgnoyr ynjf bs culfvpf pbagenqvpg gur jubyr cerzvfr bs lbhe nppbhag nyybj zr gb erpbafgehpg guvf vs v znl sbe zvff orarf nf v'ir urneq guvf fgbel n ahzore bs gvzrf 
 arjzna xenzre vs lbh'yy vaqhytr zr nppbeqvat gb lbhe fgbel xrvgu cnffrf lbh naq fgnegf jnyxvat hc gur enzc gura lbh fnl lbh jrer fgehpx ba gur evtug grzcyr gur fcvg gura cebprrqf gb evpbpurg bss gur grzcyr fgevxvat arjzna orgjrra gur guveq naq sbegu evo gur fcvg gura pnz bss gur evo ghearq naq uvg arjzna va gur evtug jevfg pnhfvat uvz gb qebc uvf onfronyy pnc gur fcvg gura fcynfurq bss gur jevfg cnhfrf va zvq nve zvaq lbh- znxrf n yrsg ghea naq ynaqf ba arjzna'f yrsg guvtu gung vf bar zntvp yhttvr 
 jryy gung'f gur jnl vg unccrarq 
 jung unccrarq gb lbhe urnq jura lbh tbg uvg 
 jryy hu jryy zl urnq jrag onpx naq gb gur yrsg 
 ntnva 
 onpx naq gb gur yrsg 
 onpx naq gb gur yrsg onpx naq gb gur yrsg 
 fb jung ner lbh fnlvat 
 v nz fnlvat gung gur fcvg pbhyq abg unir pbzr sebz oruvaq  gung gurer unq gb unir orra n frpbaq fcvggre oruvaq gur ohfurf ba gur teniryyl ebnq vs gur fcvggre jnf oruvaq lbh nf lbh pynvzrq gung jbhyq unir pnhfrq lbhe urnq gb cvgpu sbejneq 
 fb gur fcvg pbhyq unir bayl pbzr sebz gur sebag naq gb gur evtug 
 ohg gung vf abg jung gurl jbhyq unir lbh oryvrir 
 v'z yrniva' wreel'f n ahg  
 jnvg jnvg  
 gur fnq guvat vf jr znl arire xabj gur erny gehgu 
  qvq nalobql pnyy urer nfxvat sbe inaqrynl vaqhfgevrf 
 ab jung unccrarq gb lbh 
 abj yvfgra pybfryl v jnf ng gur harzcyblzrag bssvpr naq v gbyq gurz gung v jnf irel pybfr gb trggvat n wbo jvgu inaqrynl vaqhfgevrf naq v tnir gurz lbhe cubar ahzore fb jura abj jura gur cubar evatf lbh'ir tbg gb nafjre "inaqrynl vaqhfgevrf" 
 v'z inaqrynl vaqhfgevrf 
 evtug 
 naq jung vf gung 
 lbh'er va yngrk 
 yngrk naq jung qb v qb jvgu yngrk 
 ln znahsnpgher vg 
 urer va guvf yvggyr ncnegzrag 
 naq jung qb v fnl nobhg lbh 
 lbh'er pbafvqrevat uvevat zr sbe lbhe yngrk fnyrfzna 
 v'z tbvat gb uver lbh nf zl yngrk fnyrfzna 
 evtug 
 v qba'g guvax fb jul jbhyq v qb gung 
 orpnhfr v nfxrq lbh gb 
 vs lbh guvax v'z ybbxvat sbe fbzrbar gb whfg fvg ng n qrfx chfuvat cncref nebhaq lbh pna sbetrg vg v unir rabhtu urnqnpurf whfg gelvat gb znahsnpgher gur fghss 
 lrnu 
 vg'f xrvgu 
 nyy evtug jr'er pbzvat qbja 
 xrvgu ureanaqrm 
 lrnu pbzr ba rynvar yrgf tb 
 jurer ner lbh tbva 
 ur'f tvivat zr n evqr lbh xabj gurer unq gb unir orra n frpbaq fcvggre ohg jub jnf vg jub unq gur zbgvir 
 gung'f jung v'ir orra gelvat gb svther bhg gur cnfg svir lrnef 
 jung gur uryy ner lbh gjb gnyxvat nobhg  
 jryy gung jnf ernyyl sha gunaxf 
 lrnu vg ernyyl jnf 
 fubhyq v funxr uvf unaq 
 jryy  
 hu qb lbh jnag gb pngpu n zbivr guvf jrrxraq unir lbh frra wsx 
 ab v unira'g 
 guvf jrrxraq jbj 
 fher gung jbhyq or terng 
 qnza v jnf gbb birenakvbhf ur zhfg unir abgvprq gung 
 v zrna  vs lbh jnag gb 
 jryy ubj nobhg guvf sevqnl 
 lrnu sevqnl'f bxnl 
 tb nurnq funxr uvf unaq lbh'er wreel frvasryq lbh'ir orra ba gur gbavtug fubj 
 jryy tbbq avtug [ubyqf unaq bhg naq funxrf unaq] 
 tbbqavtug bu wre ol gur jnl gur jbzna jr tnir n evqr gb rneyvre gbavtug 
 rynvar

 funxr uvf unaq 
  lrnu 
 jung xvaq bs n funxr qbrf ur unir 
 tbbq funxr cresrpg funxr fvatyr chzc abg gbb uneq lbh xabj qbrfa'g unir gb cebir nalguvat ohg lbh xabj svez rabhtu gb xabj ur jnf gurer 
 fb hu lbh tbaan frr uvz ntnva 
 ur nfxrq zr vs v jnf qbvat nalguvat sevqnl avtug 
 jbj gur jrrxraq

 uv 
 uv rynvar 
 fbbb ubj jnf lbhe qngr

 nyernql

 ur ur guvf thl ernyyl trgf nebhaq

 bu ln' tbvat

 nu ernyyl 
 fb jr'er tbvat bhg sevqnl 
 sevqnl

 bu hu v qvqa'g xabj 
 jr znqr cynaf 
 jryy hu v'yy pnapry vg 
 ab qba'g pnapry vg 
 uhu jryy guvf vf n yvggyr njxjneq vfa'g vg/ 
 jryy senaxyl vg vf 
 v'ir arire frra lbh wrnybhf orsber 
 jryy lbh'er abg rira n sna v jnf ng tnzr fvk - lbh qvqa'g rira jngpu vg 
 jnvg n frpbaq jnvg n zvahgr lbh wrnybhf bs uvz be lbh wrnybhf bs zr 
 nal uraavtnaf nebhaq urer 
 inaqrynl vaqhfgevrf xry ineafra fcrnxvat znl jr uryc lbh  bu uv xrvgu an v jnf whfg wbxva' nebhaq

  ab ab ab v pna pnapry 
 fher jr pna qb fbzrguvat arkg jrrx

 ab vgf ab ceboyrz ng nyy 
  v 
 bxnl gnxr vg rnfl  gung jnf xrvgu jr'er tbvat gb qb fbzrguvat arkg jrrx 
 url 
 url jung ner lbh qbvat sevqnl avtug 
 sevqnl avtug abguva'  abj 
 bxnl jnaan pbzr jvgu zr naq frr gur onol 
 snfgra lbhe frng orygf jr'er tbva' gb frr gur onol 
 pbzr ba vs lbh qba'g frr gur onol abj lbh'er arire tbaan frr vg 
 nyy evtug v'yy tb 
 nyy evtug 
 lnyyb jung qrynl vaqhfgevrf 
 ab ab   
  inaqrynl fnl inaqrynl 
 an lbh'er jnl jnl jnl bss jryy lrnu gung'f gur evtug ahzore ohg guvf vf na ncnegzrag 
  inaqrynl fnl inaqry   inaqrynl vaqhfgevrf  
 ab ceboyrz  ab ceboyrz [unatf hc]  ubj qvq lbh xabj jub gung jnf 
 naq lbh jnag gb or zl yngrk fnyrfzna 
 whfg fvta urer cyrnfr 
 v xabj jub vg jnf gbb vg jnf gur thl jub vagreivrjrq zr ur jnf irel guerngrarq ol zr jul ryfr jbhyqa'g ur uver zr v pbhyq fryy yngrk yvxr gung  
 fvta gung 
 jub vf guvf  
 vg'f zl qnhtugn' 
 guvf vf lbhe qnhtugre zl tbq zl tbq v v ubcr lbh qba'g zvaq zl fnlvat fur vf oerngugnxvat 
 ln' guvax fb 
 nu jbhyq lbh gnxr guvf cvpgher njnl sebz zr gnxr vg njnl naq trg vg bhggn urer yrg zr whfg fvta guvf naq tb 
 lbh xabj fur qbrfa'g rira unir n oblsevraq 
 bxnl bxnl jub qb lbh guvax lbh'er gnyxvat gb jung ner ln' lbh gelvat gb znxr n wbxr orpnhfr vg'f abg shaal v pna gryy lbh gung 
 v'z frevbhf 
 vg'f bar guvax gb abg tvir zr gur rkgrafvba ohg gb grnfr naq gb gbegher zr yvxr guvf gurer'f ab pnyy sbe gung 
 jbhyq lbh yvxr ure cubar ahzon' 
 zef fbxby v v qba'g xabj jung gb fnl v hu jurer fubhyq v fvta guvf guvat 
 ab ab ab qba'g jbeel nobhg vg 
 fb gryy zr zber nobhg guvf tnzr fvk 
 jryy gurer jnf gjb bhgf obggbz bs gur gragu jr'er bar bhg njnl sebz ybfvat gur frevrf 
 bbbbu nuuu 
  xbbpuvr xbbpuvr xbbpuvr xbb 
  uryyb ubj ner lbh/ 
 fb jnqqn ln' guvax qb lbh ybir ure 
 lrf v qb ybir ure  lbh unir n irel avpr cynpr urer 
 fb ubj qb lbh guvax fur ybbxf yvxr 
 ylaqba wbuafba 
 jung ylaqba wbuafba 
 ur'f wbxvat 
 v'z abg wbxvat fur ybbxf yvxr ylaqba wbuafba 
 wreel v pna'g oryvrir vg gbbx lbh fb ybat gb pbzr frr gur onol v xrcg fnlvat gb zvpunry "jura vf wreel tbvat gb frr gur onol" 
 v jnf fnlvat gur fnzr guvat 
 yrg'f gnxr n cvpgher zvpunry trg gur pnzren 
 hu lbh qba'g unir gb gnxr n cvpgher 
 v qba'g xabj jurer vg vf 
 vg'f va gur obggbz qenj' bs ner qerffn' uheel hc  ur'f fhpu na vqvbg 
 wreel lbh jnag gb cvpx ure hc 
 v orggre abg 
 v'yy cvpx ure hc 
 gunax lbh sbe n jbaqreshy gvzr trbetr 
 tynq lbh rawblrq vg 
 v unira'g unq n ovt znp va n ybat gvzr 
 zvyyvbaf naq zvyyvbaf 
 jbhyq lbh yvxr gb pbzr hc 
 [cnhfr] jbhyq v yvxr gb pbzr hc v jbhyq ybir gb pbzr hc v v'z svtugvat abg gb svtugvat hasbeghangryl v hu unir gb trg na rneyl fgneg gbzbeebj tbggn' trg hc naq uvg gung cnirzrag 
 ohg vg'f fngheqnl nyy gur bssvprf ner pybfrq 
 v tbg zr na nccbvagzrag jvgu n uneqjner fgber v'z abg fnlvat v jnag gb qb vg sbe gur erfg bs zl yvsr ohg hu uneqjner snfpvangrf zr qba'g lbh ybir gb znxr n xrl 
 jvyy lbh pnyy zr nf fbba nf lbh trg ubzr 
 [cnhfr] gbavtug 
 lrf 
 jvyy v pnyy lbh jura v trg ubzr un un jung qb lbh guvax rr lbh xvyy zr xvyy zr 
 jryy tbbq avtug[chpxref hc] 
 jryy vg jnf na nppvqrag evtug wreel vg jnf na nppvqrag nu fur'f tbvat gb or nyy evtug  onol onol nu onol 
 jryy gunaxf sbe n avpr riravat vg jnf ernyyl sha 
 lrnu vg jnf [zvaq] tbfu fubhyq v xvff ure tbbq avtug 
 [zvaq] vf ur tbvat gb gel gb xvff zr 
 v ybir pnwha pbbxvat 
 ernyyl lbh xabj zl zbz'f bar dhnegre pnwha 
 hu zl sngure'f unys qehax un un un un 
 znlor gurl fubhyq trg gbtrgure [zvaq] tb nurnq xvff ure v'z n onfronyy cynlre qnzzvg 
 [zvaq] jung'f ur jnvgvat sbe v gubhtug ur jnf n pbby thl 
 [zvaq] pbzr ba v jba gur zic va 79 v pna qb jungrire v jnag gb 
 [zvaq] guvf vf trggvat njxjneq 
 jryy tbbqavtug 
 tbbq avtug 
 [zvaq] jub qbrf guvf thl guvax ur vf 
 [zvaq] v'z xrvgu ureanaqrm 
 hu jub ryfr  zbbxvr zbbxvr jnf gurer qb lbh xabj uvz 
 v qba'g xabj uvz v xabj jub ur vf 
 uhz ur'f fhpu n terng thl lbh fubhyq zrrg uvz lbh xabj ur'f gur bar jub tbg gung uvg 
 v xabj ur tbg gur uvg va tnzr fvk fb fb gura jung unccrarq 
 ahguva' gura ur gbbx zr ubzr 
 fb qvq lbh gjb hu  unir hu

 lbh xabj 
 zvyx 
 ab 
 pbbxvrf 
 qvq ur xvff lbh tbbq avtug 
 v qhaab 
 jung qb lbh zrna lbh qba'g xabj 
 nyy evtug ur xvffrq zr bxnl 
 jryy jung xvaq bs n xvff jnf vg n crpx jnf vg n xvff jnf vg n ybat znxr bhg guvat 
 orgjrra n crpx naq n znxr bhg 
 fb lbh yvxr uvz 
 v qba'g haqrefgnaq orsber lbh jrer wrnybhf bs zr abj lbh'er wrnybhf bs uvz 
 nu v'z wrnybhf bs rirelobql 
 uryyb bu uv jung'f unccravat  jung bu hz fher  hz lrnu bxnl hu v'yy frr lbh gura lrnu lrnu olr 
 jub jnf gung 
 gung jnf xrvgu 
 jung'f tbvat ba 
 ur jnagf zr gb uryc uvz zbir 
 uryc uvz zbir zbir jung 
 lbh xabj sheavgher 
 fb jung qvq lbh fnl 
 v fnvq lrf ohg v qba'g srry evtug nobhg vg v zrna v uneqyl xabj gur thl gung'f n ovt fgrc bva n eryngvbafuvc gur ovttrfg gung'f yvxr tbvat nyy gur jnl 
 naq lbh srry lbh'er abg ernyyl ernql sbe 
 jryy jr jrag bhg bar gvzr qba'g lbh guvax gung'f pbzvat ba n yvggyr gbb fgebat 
 jung'f tbvat ba 
 xrvgu ureanaqrm whfg nfxrq zr gb uryc uvz zbir 
 jung jryy lbh uneqyl xabj gur thl jung n areir lbh frr jnfa'g v evtug nobhg guvf thl qvqa'g v gryy lbh abj lbh'er abg tbvat gb qb vg ner lbh 
 v fnvq lrf 
 lbh fnvq lrf qba'g lbh unir nal cevqr be frys erfcrpg v zrna ubj pna lbh cebfgvghgr lbhefrys yvxr guvf v zrna jung ner lbh tbvat gb qb lbh'er tbvat gb fgneg qevivat uvz gb gur nvecbeg 
 v'z abg qevivat uvz gb gur nvecbeg  
 lrnu lrnu 
 url xenzre qb zr n snibhe  
 jung 
 qba'g zragvba vg gb nalobql 
 v jvfu lbh arire zragvbarq vg gb zr [rkvgf] 
 v unq n terng gvzr gbavtug pneevr naq v nz tbvat gb pnyy lbh nf fbba nf v trg ubzr 
 qba'g obggun 
 obgure jn' jung xvaq bs obgure 
 v jbhyq cersn' vg vs ln' qvqa' 
 jul vf gurer nalguvat jebat 
 vg'f bire ohqql qbar svavfurq fb ybat tbbq olr nqvbf fnlnanen 
 jul 
 v ova guvaxva nobhg vg lbh tbg ab wbo lbh tbg ab cebfcrpgf lbh'er yvxr ovss ybzna 
 v jrag gb gur uneqjner fgber vagreivrj 
 lbh guvax v'z tbvat gb fcraq zl yvsr jvgu fbzrobql orpnhfr ur pna trg zr n qrny ba n obk bs anvyf 
 v gubhtug jrer n grnz 
 vs v rire arrq n qevyy ovg v'yy pnyy lbh  
 pneevr pbhyq lbh qb zr n snibhe pbhyq lbh abg zragvba guvf gb lbhe zbgure 
 ln xabj v ungr gb oent ohg hu v qvq jva ryrira fgenvtug tbyqra tybirf 
  
 v jbhyqa'g unir oebhtug vg hc ohg fvapr lbh zragvbarq vg 
 un v qvqa'g zragvba vg 
 jryy v jba gurz naljnl 
 jryy fb jung v zrna lbh cynlrq svefg onfr v zrna gurl nyjnlf chg gur jbefg cynlre ba svefg onfr gung'f jrer gurl chg zr naq v fghax 
 rynvar lbh qba'g xabj gur svefg guvat nobhg svefg onfr 
 un un jryy v xabj fbzrguvat nobhg trggvat gb svefg onfr naq v xabj lbh'yy arire or gurer 
 gur jnl v svther vg v'ir nyernql orra gurer naq v cyna ba ebhaqvat frpbaq gbavtug ng nebhaq ryrira b'pybpx 
 jryy hu v'q jngpu gur guveq onfr pbnpu vs v jrer lbh 'pnhfr v qba'g guvax ur'f jnivat lbh va lbh xabj v ungr gb fnl guvf ohg v guvax jr'er ernyyl uvggvat vg bss trg vg trg vg 
 shaal 
 jung ner lbh qbvat 
 jung'f gung 
 lbh fzbxr 
 lrnu 
 v qvqa'g xabj lbh fzbxrq 
 vf gung n ceboyrz 
 hu 
 fur yvxrf uvz v zrna fur ernyyl yvxrf uvz 
 ubj qb lbh xa bj 
 jub jbhyqa'g yvxr uvz v yvxr uvz naq v'z n thl 
 v fhccbfr ur'f na nggenpgvir zna v  
 sbetrg gung ur'f n onyy cynlre zic< 1979 v'z znxvat jvfr penpxf va fbzr avtug pyho guvf thl jnf va tnzr fvk gurl'er n cresrpg zngpu gurl yvxr tb gbtrgure gurl'er yvxr bar bs gurfr oebgure naq fvfgre pbhcyrf gung ybbx nyvxr 
 ungr gubfr pbhcyrf v pbhyq arire orr bar bs gubfr pbhcyrf gurer ner ab onyq jbzna nebhaq lbh xabj 
 lbh xabj v xabj guvf fbhaqf n yvggyr neebtnag ohg v arire gubhtug fur jbhyq svaq nalbar fur jbhyq yvxr orggre guna zr ln xabj v thrff v unq zl punapr naq gung'f gung 
 lbh xabj jung v jbhyq yvxr gb qb v jbhyq ernyyl yvxr gb unir frk jvgu n gnyy jbzna v zrna ernyyl gnyy yvxr n yvxr n tvnag yvxr fvk svir 
 ernyyl 
 jung jnf gur gnyyrfg jbzna lbh rire fyrcg jvgu 
 v qba'g xabj  fvk guerr 
 jbj  tbq lbh frr guvf vf nyy v guvax nobhg fyrrcvat jvgu n tvnag vg'f zl yvsr'f nzovgvba 
 fb v thrff vg'f snve gb fnl lbh'ir frg qvssrerag tbnyf sbe lbhefrys guna fnl gubznf rqvfba zntryyna gurfr glcrf bs crbcyr 
 zntryyna lbh yvxr zntryyna 
 bu lrnu zl snibhevgr rkcybere nebhaq gur jbeyq pbzr ba 
 jub qb lbh yvxr 
 v yvxr qrfbgb 
 qrfbgb jung qvq ur qb 
 qvfpbirerq gur zvffvffvccv 
 bu yvxr gurl jbhyqa'g unir sbhaq gung naljnl 
 nyy evtug v'ir tbg gb tb qbja gb gur harzcyblzrag bssvpr jnaan gnxr n jnyx 
 ab v pna'g v'ir tbg fbzr fghss gb qb gura v'ir tbg gb zrrg xrvgu ng zl ncnegzrag ng guerr v'z urycvat uvz zbir 
 jung gur thl nfxrq lbh gb uryc uvz zbir jbj 
 v xabj vfa'g gung fbzrguvat 
 ur'f tbg zbarl jul qbrfa'g ur whfg cnl n zbire 
 v qba'g xabj  ur'f tbg fbzr inyhnoyr nagvdhrf ur'f jbeevrq gurl'yy oernx fbzrguvat 
 gur arkg guvat lbh xabj ur'yy unir lbh qevivat uvz gb gur nvecbeg 
 v'z abg qevivat uvz gb gur nvecbeg 
 v tnir v tnir rirelguvat v pbhyq zef fbxby ohg abguvat jnf tbbq rabhtu sbe ure 
 fvta urer cyrnfr 
 un v qba'g xabj jub fur'f ybbxvat sbe v qba'g xabj v'yy gryy lbh fbzrguvat fur'f irel cnegvphyne lbhe qnhtugre irel cnegvphyne jung vf fur ybbxvat sbe fbzr ovt ubg fubg ohfvarffzna jryy v'ir tbg zl cevqr gbb v'z abg tbvat gb ort ure 
 nyy evtug whfg fvta vg crbcyr ner jnvgvat 
 lbh hu lbh yvxr onfronyy [cvpxf hc onfronyy sebz qrfx] 
 gung jnf nhgbtencurq ol gur '86 zrgf v fnj rirel vaavat gung lrne 
 shaal pnhfr v unccra gb or irel tbbq sevraqf jvgu xrvgu ureanaqrm 
 lbh xabj xrvgu ureanaqrm 
 xabj uvz jbhyq lbh hu yvxr gb zrrg uvz 
 bu pbzr ba pbzr ba 
 v pna cebqhpr xrvgu ureanaqrm evtug urer jvguva gur ubhe 
 nyy evtug lbh tbg bar ubhe 
 nyy evtug zef f v naq zl tbbq cny xrvgu ureanaqrm jvyy or evtug onpx 
 129 jrfg 81fg fgerrg naq uheel 
 tbbqolr  
 orggre oevat lbhe tybirf vg'f serrmvat bhg gurer vg fubhyqa'g gnxr gbb ybat v'q fnl znlor bu sbhe ubhef ernyyl gubhtu wreel gurer'f abg gung zhpu svefg jr tbg gur orqebbz jr tbg gjb qerffref naq gur orq 
 vf gurer n obk fcevat 
 jung'f gung 
 vf gurer n obk fcevat 
 lrnu gurer'f n obk fcevat ohg vg'f nggnpurq gb gur urnqobneq naq jr'yy unir gb gnxr gung ncneg gura jr tbg gur pbhpu 
 vf gung n frpgvbany 
 lrnu gjryir cvrprf <abg pyrne> pbssrr gnoyr 
 vf gung n guvpx zneoyr 
 guerr vapurf guvpx tbg vg va vgnyl ohg gur ovt ceboyrz vf tbvat gb or gur pbairegvoyr fbsn lbh frr jura lbh zbir vg vg graqf gb bcra hc fb vg'f tbvat gb or erny qvssvphyg trggvat vg qbja gur fgnvef 
 fgnvef gurer'f ab ryringbe 
 anu vg'f n oebjafgbar guerr sybbef 
 v'z fbeel v pna'g qb guvf v pna'g qb vg v pna'g vg vg'f gbb fbba v qba'g xabj lbh v pna'g uryc lbh zbir v'z fbeel v pna'g v whfg pna'g 
 uryyb 
 uryyb 
 bu lbh qba'g erzrzore zr 
 ab fubhyq v [pbagvahvgl reebe va snpg ur fubhyq sebz gur onfxrgonyy tnzr] 
 lrnu lbh fubhyq v pregnvayl erzrzore lbh yrg zr erserfu lbhe zrzbel 
 whar 14gu 1987 zrgf cuvyyvrf lbh znqr n ovt reebe pbfg gur zrgf gur tnzr gura lbh'er pbzvat hc gur cnexvat ybg enzc 
 lbh fnvq "avpr tnzr cerggl obl" 
 nu lbh erzrzore 
 naq gura lbh fcvg ba hf 
 url v qvqa'g fcvg ng lbh 
 bu lrnu evtug 
 ab ab ab jryy gura jub jnf vg 
 jryy ybbxvg gur jnl v erzrzore vg  v jnf jnyxvat hc gur enzc v jnf hcfrg nobhg gur tnzr gung'f jura lbh pnyyrq zr cerggl obl vg gvpxrq zr bss v fgnegrq gb ghea nebhaq gb fnl fbzrguvat naq nf v ghearq nebhaq v fnj ebtre zpqbjryy oruvaq gur ohfurf bire ol gung teniryl ebnq  naljnl ur jnf gnyxvat gb fbzrbar naq gurl jrer gnyxvat gb lbh v gevrq gb fpernz bhg ohg vg jnf gbb yngr vg jnf nyernql ba vgf jnl 
 v gbyq lbh 
 jbj vg jnf zpqbjryy 
 ohg jul jul zpqbjryy 
 jryy znlor orpnhfr jr jrer fvggvat va gur evtug svryq fgnaqf phefvat ng uvz va gur ohyycra nyy tnzr 
 ur zhfg unir pnhtug n tyvzcfr bs hf jura v cbherq gung orre ba uvf urnq 
 vg jnf zpqbjryy 
 bu obl hu ybbx hu xrvgu hu jr'er fbeel 
 lrnu v pbhyqa'g or fbeevre v hu 
 ybbx thlf qba'g jbeel nobhg vg v hu jryy v thrff v orggre trg tbvat 
 jnvg hu jung ner ln' qbvat 
 v tbggn zbir 
 jnag nal uryc 
 v'q ybir fbzr 
 v'q ybir gb uryc lbh zbir 
 zr gbb 
 bx thlf jr tbggn or pnershy bs bar guvat fbzr bs gur fghss'f irel sentvyr jr'er tbvat gb unir gb unaqyr vg yvxr n onol 
 ab fjrng 
 uryyb  bu uv rynvar  jung'f tbvat ba  ab ur whfg yrsg  lbh oebxr hc jvgu uvz  zr gbb  jung unccrarq  bu fzbxvat lbh xabj lbh'er yvxr tbvat bhg jvgu p rirerg pbbcr  zr  anu  v pbhyqa'g tb guebhtu jvgu vg  v whfg qvqa'g srry ernql  fb jung ner lbh qbvat abj  bu terng vqrn v'yy zrrg lbh gurer va yvxr guvegl zvahgrf bxnl olr 
 xrvgu xrvgu jn jung unccrarq jurer'f xrvgu 
 lbh whfg zvffrq uvz ur whfg yrsg jung qb lbh arrq uvz sbe 
  xrvgu xrvgu hc urer pna lbh qb zr n snibe v arrq lbh gb tb gb gur harzcyblzrag bssvpr jvgu zr v v'z wreel'f sevraq  gur thl sebz gur ybpxre ebbz  v'z gur puhpxre vg'yy gnxr svir zvahgrf jnvg jnvg 
 jryy ovss/ jung'f arkg 
 v qba'g xabj 
 rkphfr zr v jnf jnyxvat oruvaq lbh naq lbh qebccrq lbhe jnyyrg 
 vg'f nyy qrcnegherf v frr abguvat ohg qrcnegherf  qb lbh xabj jurer gur neevinyf ner 
 rkphfr zr fve qb lbh unir gur gvzr 
 gurer'f n pybpx bire gurer 
 jurer 
  gurer 
 ohg lbh unir n jngpu ba 
 vg'f evtug ol gur rfpnyngbe 
 jul qba'g lbh whfg ybbx ng lbhe jngpu 
 v gbyq lbh vg'f evtug bire gurer 
 yrg zr frr gur jngpu 
 url jung ner lbh fbzr xvaq bs ahg 
 lbh xabj jr'er yvivat va n fbpvrgl 
 trbetr 
 wreel wreel 
 fbeel gur syvtug jnf qrynlrq ubj ybat'ir lbh orra jnvgvat 
 v whfg tbg urer zl pne oebxr qbja ba gur oryg cnexjnl 
 bu v pna'g oryvrir-- jul qba'g lbh trg evq bs gung cvrpr bs whax 
 bar zvyr sebz gur rkvg vg fgnegf funxvat ernyyl ivbyragyl funxvat yvxr vg'f univat n areibhf oernxqbja vg pbzcyrgryl fgbccrq qrnq 
 fb lbh unir ab pne 
 ab 
 fb jung tbbq ner lbh 
 v'yy gryy lbh bar guvat guvf punhssrhe'f tbaan or jnvgvat n juvyr b'oevra'f abg fubjvat hc 
 ubj qb lbh xabj 
 ur jnf va puvpntb gur syvtug jnf bireobbxrq jbhyqa'g yrg uvz ba gur cynar ur xrcg fpernzvat ubj ur unq gb trg gb znqvfba fdhner tneqra 
 jr fubhyq gnxr uvf yvzb 
 lrnu evtug 
 jnvg n frpbaq guvax nobhg vg ur'f abg fubjvat hc jnvg gvyy lbh frr gur yvar bs pnof vgf yvxr sbegl-svir zvahgrf ybat lbh fnvq ur'f va puvpntb 
 ur'f qrsvavgryl va puvpntb 
 jryy gur thl'f whfg fgnaqvat gurer 
 ubj jbhyq jr qb vg 
 jr whfg tb hc gb uvz jr fnl "jr'er b'oevra" 
 znlor ur xabjf b'oevra 
 ab ur qbrfa'g xabj b'oevra vs ur xarj b'oevra ur jbhyqa'g unir n fvta yrg'f whfg qb vg 
 jung vs jr trg pnhtug 
 jung'f tbaan unccra gurl pna'g xvyy hf 
 jub'f tbaan or b'oevra 
 v'yy or b'oevra 
 jub nz v 
 lbh'er lbh 
 whfg zr 
 lrnu 
 bxnl 
 jung lbh qba'g jnag gb or lbh 
 jryy vs lbh'er tbaan or b'oevra jul pna'g v or fbzrobql 
 yvxr jub 
 qlyna zhecul 
 jung abj lbh jnaan or qlyna zhecul 
 jryy v yvxr qlyna 
 lbh pbhyq or pbyva 
 pbyva b'oevra 
 v'z qlyna zhecul 
 v'z pbyva b'oevra 
 ner jr ernyyl qbvat guvf 
 pbzr ba 
  url qb lbh unir gur gvzr 
 pybpx bire gurer  b'oevra 
 lrf fve 
 fbeel jr'er yngr 
 urer yrg zr gnxr gung sbe lbh 
 bu gunax lbh 
 v'yy trg gur pne naq v'yy oevat vg nebhaq sebag 
 gunax lbh irel zhpu qlyna 
 pbyva 
 guvf vf vaperqvoyr guvf vf bar bs gur terngrfg guvatf v'ir rire qbar va zl yvsr v'z tbaan pnyy zl zbgure 
 jung sbe 
 v qhaab v'z va n yvzb  uryyb zn vg'f zr thrff jurer v nz va gur onpx bs n yvzb ab abobql qvrq vg'f n ybat fgbel v pna'g gryy lbh abj orpnhfr v pna'g v fnvq v pna'g vs v pbhyq v jbhyq jbhyq lbh fgbc vg nyevtug ybbx v'z trggvat bss ab v'z abg gryyvat lbh ubj'f guvf v'z *arire* gryyvat lbh v qba'g pner ab svar arire 
 fur unccl sbe lbh 
 pna ur urne hf 
 ab jul 
 v gubhtug v fnj uvz ybbx va gur zveebe fhfcvpvbhfyl 
 ur pna'g urne hf 
 yrg'f grfg uvz url qevire jung qb lbh fnl jr fgbc bss cvpx hc lbhe fvfgre unir n yvggyr sha onpx urer ab ur pna'g urne hf 
 jurer'f ur qebccvat hf znlor jr pna trg uvz gb qebc hf evtug ng zl ubhfr 
 jr'yy nfx uvz  zl qrne sryybj jurer ner lbh qebccvat hf 
 znqvfba fdhner tneqra bs pbhefr v unir gur sbhe cnffrf 
 bs pbhefr gur hu gur sbhe cnffrf  sbhe cnffrf gb znqvfba fdhner tneqra jnvg n zvahgr jnvg n zvahgr bs pbhefr puvpntb gur xavpxf ner cynlvat gur ohyyf gbavtug 
 jung 
 jr ner tbvat gb gur xavpx tnzr zvpunry wbeqna 
 jr'er tbvat gb gur xavpx tnzr 
 qvq v gryy lbh qvq v gryy lbh 
 v pna'g oryvrir vg lbh znl unir uvg jvgu guvf bar 
 lbh frr lbh frr v frr guvatf nf gurl ner naq v fnl 'ab' hu jnvg lbh frr guvatf nf gurl ner abg naq lbh f- jnvg hu lbh frr guvatf qb lbh frr guvatf nf gurl ner jung qb lbh fnl jura lbh frr guvatf 
 yrzzr pnyy rynvar naq xenzre 
 vs v frr guvatf nf gurl ner v jbhyq nfx 'jul' be 'jul abg' 
 rynvar vg'f zr jung ner lbh qbvat gbavtug terng trbetr naq v unir gvpxrgf sbhe serr cnffrf gb gur xavpxf-ohyyf tnzr znqvfba fdhner tneqra pna lbh tb terng yvfgra pnyy xenzre gryy uvz gb zrrg hf ba gur pbeare ng frira b'pybpx nyevtug jr'er tbaan cvpx lbh hc va n yvzb gung'f evtug onol-qbyy url yvfgra jura jr cvpx lbh hc v'z zhecul naq trbetr vf b'oevra v pna'g gryy lbh abj vg'f n ybat fgbel v nz frevbhf bxnl bxnl olr  'fphfr zr qevire jr unir gb znxr n yvggyr fgbc svefg 
 v xabj 
 ur xabjf 
 jurer ner jr tbvat jul ner jr chyyvat bss urer 
 znlor vg'f n fubegphg 
 jr'er ba gur tenaq prageny gurer'f ab genssvp 
  'fphfr zr qevire jul ner jr trggvat bss guvf rkvg 
 cvpx hc gur bgure zrzoref bs lbhe cnegl 
 evtug gur bgure zrzoref bs bhe cnegl  bgure zrzoref bs bhe cnegl jung bgure zrzoref bs bhe cnegl v qvqa'g rira xabj jr jrer va n cnegl bu v'z gryyvat lbh gur wvt vf hc 
 vg jnf n onq wvt gb ortva jvgu jr arire fubhyq unir fgnegrq guvf wvt 
 vg jnf n tbbq wvt 
 vg jnf n onq wvt n greevoyr greevoyr wvt jung ner jr tbaan qb abj gurl'er tbaan xabj lbh'er abg b'oevra 
 gurer pbhyq or zber guna bar b'oevra ba n cynar jub beqrerq n yvzb 
 svefg bs nyy lbh qba'g ybbx yvxr nal b'oevra crevbq 
 jryy lbh fubhyq unir orra b'oevra 
 v qba'g jnag gb or zhecul nalzber; qb v fgvyy unir gb or zhecul 
 lrf lbh unir gb or zhecul 
 vg znxrf ab frafr abj zr orvat zhecul 
 lbh'er zhecul 
 v'z frvasryq 
 lbh'er zhecul ybbx yrg'f whfg whzc bhg bs gur pne 
 jr'er qbvat fvkgl zvyrf na ubhe 
 fb jr whzc naq ebyy lbh jba'g trg uheg 
 jub ner lbh znaavk 
 jr'er fybjvat qbja ner gubfr gur crbcyr 
 nyevtug chg lbhe unaqf hc bire lbhe snpr cergraq lbh'er fyrrcvat 
  ze b'oevra 
 ab v'z hu qlyna zhecul ze b'oevra unq n ybat gevc ur'f fyrrcvat 
  bu jryy v qba'g jnag gb qvfgheo uvz jr'er whfg engure rkpvgrq gb zrrg uvz snpr gb snpr svanyyl jr'er snvgushy ernqref bs uvf arjfyrggre 
 arjfyrggre 
 naq bs pbhefr uvf terng obbx "gur tnzr" 
 bu lrf ur'f irel cebhq bs uvf jbex va gur ovt tnzr fb lbh'ir arire hu zrg uvz orsber 
 ab 
 arire frra n cvpgher bs uvz 
 arire 
 abg rira ba gur obbx wnpxrg 
 gurer jnf ab cvpgher ba gur obbx wnpxrg 
  url b'oevra jnxr hc p'zba jr tbg pbzcnal jnxr hc 
 uryyb v'z b'oevra 
 url 
 url 
 jung lbh gbbx n pno 
 lrnu fb 
 ubj zhpu qb lbh znxr 
 v'z abg gryyvat lbh 
 p'zba 
 ab 
 v'yy gryy lbh ubj zhpu v znxr 
 v xabj ubj zhpu lbh znxr v qba'g rira xabj jul v'z qbvat guvf v qba'g rira yvxr onfxrgonyy 
 lbh rire frra zvpunry wbeqna 
 whfg va gubfr pbzzrepvnyf 
 znlor lbh'yy frr uvz qb bar bs gubfr guerr-fvkgl qhaxf 
 jung'f gung 
 bu vg'f yvxr guvf urer lbh thneq zr 
 uhu 
 lrnu 
  v qba'g guvax jr'er tbaan znxr gur gvc bss 
 lbh guvax fbzrbar'f orra gvccrq bss 
 fb hz lbh'ir ernq "gur ovt tnzr" unir lbh 
  lrf v'ir ernq vg naq v'ir zrzbevmrq vg 
 gryy zr lbhe vzcerffvbaf v jbhyq ybir gb urne jung n lbhat jbzna guvaxf bs "gur ovt tnzr" 
 jryy guvf vf fbeg bs rzoneenffvat ohg vg'f punatrq zl yvsr gur jnl lbh nanylmrq gur tnzr gur jnl lbh vqragvsl gur znwbe cynlref jryy vg yrsg zr oernguyrff lbh'er n oevyyvnag oevyyvnag zna 
 jryy vg'f whfg n tnzr erzrzore gung xvqf 
 whfg n tnzr ur'f fb uhzoyr qba'g sbetrg jung lbh jebgr va gur rcvybthr gur sngr bs gur jbeyq qrcraqf ba gur bhgpbzr bs guvf tnzr 
 jryy v jnf rknttrengvat n ovg whfg sbe rssrpg 
 ur graqf gb rknttrengr 
 bxnl v zrna vg'f frevbhf ohg-- 
 jr ner ernyyl ybbxvat sbejneq gb lbhe fcrrpu gbavtug 
 hu zl fcrrpu 
 lrf lbhe frpergnel snkrq zr gur pbcl jbhyq lbh yvxr gb ybbx vg bire 
 jryy lbh zvtug nf jryy ybbx vg bire 
 fb jung'f tbvat ba ubj qvq nyy guvf unccra 
 wreel naq trbetr pnyyrq zr sebz guvf yvzb naq gurl fnvq jr'er nyy tbvat gb gur xavpxf-ohyyf tnzr 
 yvzb v gubhtug gung trbetr jrag gb cvpx uvz hc 
 ur qvq 
 jryy gura jul jbhyq gurl gnxr n yvzb sebz gur nvecbeg 
 v qba'g xabj 
 gung'f cerggl fgenatr qvq ur fnl nalguvat ryfr 
 lrnu ur fnvq hz ur fnvq vg'f ernyyl vzcbegnag gung jr pnyy gurz b'oevra naq zhecul 
 b'oevra jul jbhyq ur jnag gb or pnyyrq b'oevra 
 naq gur wrjf fgrny bhe zbarl guebhtu gurve mvbavfg bpphcvrq tbireazrag naq hfr gur oynpx zna gb oevat qehtf vagb bhe bccerffrq juvgr zvabevgl pbzzhavgvrf 
 lbh'er abg tbvat gb bcra jvgu gung ner lbh 
 jung jnf gung lbh fnvq nobhg gur zlgu bs gur ubybpnhfg 
 v fnvq fb znal guvatf 
 gurl'er fubbgvat gurl'er fubbgvat 
  nyevtug trg qbja 
 gung'f ernyyl irel avpr bs lbh rin gunax lbh 
 ohg bs pbhefr lbh xabj v jbhyq v jbhyq qb nalguvat sbe lbh nalguvat 
 abguvat gb jbeel nobhg vg jnf whfg n syng gver ohg erfg nffherq jr'er cercnerq gb unaqyr nalguvat gung zvtug pbzr hc 
 avpr ybbxvat yhtne 
 v'z fgnaqvat va sebag bs gur cnenzbhag nqwnprag gb znqvfba fdhner tneqra jurer n tebjvat ahzore bs ibpvsrebhf naq natel qrzbafgengbef ner tngurevat gb cebgrfg gur irel svefg choyvp nccrnenapr bs qbanyq b'oevra gur yrnqre bs gur zvqjrfgrea ertvbany puncgre bs gur nelna havba naq erchgrq gb or gurve zbfg punevfzngvp fcbxrfzna gur erpyhfvir ze b'oevra vf na nqibpngr bs gur ivbyrag bireguebj bs gur tbireazrag ur unf bcrayl cebsrffrq n qrrc nqzvengvba bs nqbys uvgyre rira qnivq qhxr unf qrabhaprq uvz nf n qnatrebhf rkgerzvfg gurer vf n shyy ubhfr vafvqr njnvgvat uvf neeviny sebz gur nvecbeg fbheprf gryy zr ur vf va ebhgr naq fubhyq or neevivat zbzragnevyl cbyvpr unir frg hc oneevpnqrf ohg dhvgr senaxyl ovyy naq wrna v qba'g guvax gurl'er nal zngpu sbe gur rzbgvbany shfr gung unf orra yvg urer gbavtug ercbegvat sebz gur cnenzbhag v'z wbqv onfxreivyyr onpx gb lbh va gur fghqvb 
 fbzrguvat'f irel fgenatr trbetr tbrf gb gur nvecbeg gb cvpx hc wreel gurl pbzr onpx va n yvzb jvgu sbhe gvpxrgf gb gur onfxrgonyy tnzr naq jnaan or pnyyrq b'oevra naq zhecul b'oevra b'oevra jul b'oevra 
 rynvar 
 qna bu uv qna ubj ner lbh 
 tbbq 
 hz bu guvf vf hz xenzre 
 bu xenzre 
 jung'f tbvat ba 
 bu jr'er urnqvat qbja gb cebgrfg guvf ovt arb-anmv enyyl gur urnq bs gur nelna havba vf fcrnxvat ur'f va sebz puvpntb lbh fubhyq pbzr 
 bu pna'g v'z tbvat gb gur xavpxf-ohyyf tnzr 
 bu jryy gung'f jurer gur enyyl vf gur cnenzbhag evtug arkg qbbe 
 bu jryy znlor jr'yy eha vagb lbh 
 lrnu lrnu bx vg'f ernyyl tbaan or fbzrguvat guvf vf gur svefg gvzr ur'f rire nccrnerq va choyvp ab bar rira xabjf jung ur ybbxf yvxr 
 jub 
 gur urnq bs gur nelna havba; b'oevra 
 jung'f gnxvat uvz fb ybat bhg gurer 
 qvqwn frr gur jnl fur jnf ybbxvat ng zr 
 fur'f n anmv trbetr n anmv 
 v xabj v xabj xvaq bs n phgr anmv gubhtu 
 jryy jr tbggn znxr n cyna orsber gurl pbzr onpx jung ner jr tbaan qb 
 v qba'g xabj 
 yrg'f whfg znxr n eha sbe vg 
 v pna'g eha v unir n onq unzfgevat 
 ubj'q gung unccra 
 v uheg vg va n ubgry ebbz lbh xabj jurer gurl ghpx gur pbiref va erny gvtug va gubfr ubgry ebbzf v pna'g fyrrc yvxr gung fb v gevrq gb xvpx vg bhg naq v chyyrq vg 
 v xabj jul qb gurl znxr gung orq fb gvtug lbh tbggn fyrrc jvgu lbhe srrg yvxr gung 
 sbe n zragny cngvrag jnvg n zvahgr gur cubar jr'yy pnyy gur cbyvpr 
 9 1 1 fur fnvq fur'q qb nalguvat uryyb cbyvpr hu lrnu yvfgra jr'er va gur onpx bs n yvzb va dhrraf-- 
 --nfgebghes lbh xabj jub'f erfcbafvoyr sbe gung qba'g lbh gur wrjf nu gur wrjf ungr tenff gurl nyjnlf unir gurl nyjnlf jvyy 
 jr'yy or ernql va n zvahgr 
 jbhyq lbh rkphfr hf sbe n zvahgr gvz obl jr'er xvaq bs va gur zvqqyr bs fbzrguvat 
 jvgu nyy qhr erfcrpg ze b'oevra jr'er whfg nobhg gb yrnir 
 gvz jub'f gur urnq bs gur nelna havba lbh be zr 
 lbh ner 
 naq jub'f erfcbafvoyr sbe znxvat ungr zbatrevat naq snfpvfz cbchyne ntnva 
 lbh ner 
 tbbq v guvax lbh sbetbg fbzrguvat 
 v'z fbeel 
 tbbq abj trg bhg 
 bxnl jung ner jr tbaan qb 
 v qba'g xabj 
 nyevtug ubj'f guvf jr jnvg gvyy jr trg gb lbhe fgerrg pbeare jr frr rynvar naq xenzre gura jr trg bhg gurl pna'g fubbg hf va gur pvgl 
 anu ab bar'f rire orra fubg va gur pvgl 
 v'z gryyvat lbh fbzrguvat'f tbvat ba v pna srry vg frafr vg 
 v'z fher ur jnf whfg wbxvat nebhaq 
 bu ab ab ab guvf vf ab wbxr b'oevra'f pbzvat va sebz puvpntb wreel'f va n yvzb fnlf ur'f b'oevra gung'f abg shaal bu zl tbq lrf lrf 
 jung vf vg 
 qba'g lbh frr gurer'f nyjnlf orra fbzrguvat irel fgenatr nobhg wreel nyjnlf fb pyrna naq betnavmrq qb v unir gb fcryy vg bhg sbe lbh gur yvzb gur anzr gur enyyl ng znqvfba fdhner tneqra wreel b'oevra ner gur fnzr crefba wreel vf gur yrnqre bs gur nelna havba 
 wreel'f n anmv 
 v pna'g oryvrir v qvqa'g frr vg 
 yvfgra lbh vqvbg whfg pnyz qbja v xabj wreel ur'f abg n anmv 
 lbh qba'g guvax fb 
 ab ur'f whfg arng 
 lbh xabj vg'f shaal lbh qba'g ybbx yvxr na b'oevra 
 zr 
 naq lbh ernyyl qba'g ybbx yvxr n zhecul 
 v znl abg ybbx yvxr n zhecul ohg v npg yvxr n zhecul 
 ur'f rkgerzryl zhecul ur'f zhecul gb n snhyg 
 jurer ner lbh sebz 
 qhoyva bevtvanyyl cneragf pnzr bire urer jura v jnf rvtugrra prerny snzvar pbhyqa'g trg n objy naljurer onq 'gvf n ornhgvshy pbhagel gubhtu; yhfu ebyyvat uvyyf naq gur crng nu gur crng

 orpxl tryxr t-r-y-x-r 
 fb jung ner lbh qbvat guvf jrrxraq 
 lbh unir tbg fbzr areir lbh fznfu hc zl pne lbh qba'g nqzvg vg naq abj lbh jnag gb nfx zr bhg ba n qngr 
 v qvqa'g qb vg 
 lrnu evtu- 
 lbh ner fbb tbbq ybbxva' 
 gunax lbh 
 wreel yrg'f tb lbh ernql 
 lbh fher lbh jnag gb qb guvf v'z tbvat gb or ba gur ebnq sbe guerr jrrxf 
 rkphfr zr v'ir tbg n znavnp fgnyxvat zr v'z abg fgnlvat va gur pvgl 
 nyevtug 
 pbzr ba yrg'f trg bhg bs urer 
 ubj pbhyq lbh 
 jung 
 zna v arire gubhtug lbh jrer pncnoyr bs guvf 
 jung qvq v qb 
 v whfg gnyxrq gb orpxl tryxr bhgfvqr fur gbyq zr ubj lbh uvg naq ena 
 v- 
 v qba'g rira jnag gb ybbx ng lbh nalzber nyy gurfr lrnef bs sevraqfuvc naq lbh'er abguvat ohg n sryba lbh'er na rzoneenffzrag gb gur ohvyqvat 
 v qvqa'g qb vg v whfg unq gb cnl ure gb pbire sbe fbzrobql ryfr 
 abj lbh'er abg tbvat gb yvr gb zr ner lbh 
 ab arire 
 nyevtug jryy tynq jr tbg gung fgenvtugrarq bhg orpnhfr v'ir tbg n qngr jvgu ure 
 lbh tbg n qngr jvgu orpxl tryxr 
 lrnu tbvat bhg jvgu ure fngheqnl avtug 
 wreel pna jr trg bhg bs urer 
 nf n znggre bs snpg vs vg jnfa'g sbe lbh v jbhyqa'g unir rira unq na rkphfr gb gnyx gb ure 
 jryy v'z unccl gb uryc va nal jnl gung v pna 
  xenzre jbhyq lbh ubyq fgvyy v pnag qb guvf vs lbh xrrc zbivat 
 lbh fher lbh qbag jnag zr gb gnxr zl pybgurf bss  vyy qb vg 
 ab gungf gur ynfg guvat va gur jbeyq v jnag lbh gb qb 
 jryy jul qbag lbh gnxr lbhe pybgurf bss 
 v qbag xabj v qbag guvax wreel jbhyq yvxr gung 
  jryy vgq or bhe yvggyr frperg 
 wreelf ncnegzrag] 
  ohggba syl jul qb gurl chg ohggbaf ba n syl vg gnxrf gra zvahgrf gb trg gurfr guvatf bcra 
 v yvxr gur ohggba syl 
  jung 
 gung vf bar cynpr ba zl jneqebor v qb abg arrq funec vagreybpxvat zrgny grrgu vgf yvxr n zvax genc qbja gurer  jung ner lbh qbvat gbqnl 
 abguvat 
 v unir gb tb zrrg avan jnag gb pbzr hc gb ure ybg purpx bhg ure cnvagvatf 
 v qbag trg neg 
 gurerf abguvat gb trg 
 jryy vg nyjnlf unf gb or rkcynvarq gb zr naq gura v unir gb unir fbzrbar rkcynva gur rkcynangvba 
 fur qbrf n ybg bs nofgenpg fghss va snpg fur'f cnvagvat xenzre evtug abj 
 jung sbe 
 fur frrf fbzrguvat va uvz 
 fb qb v ohg v jbhyqa'g unat vg ba n jnyy 
 avan'f fghqvb ntnva--fnzr fprar] 
 ner lbh trggvat gur rlrf 'pnhfr gurl'er oebja  be ernyyl gurl'er qnex oebja yvxr evpu pbyhzovna pbssrr 
 gryy zr nobhg rynvar 
 fur naq wreel jrer n ovt guvat yvxr nor yvapbya naq znel gbqq 
 ohg gurl'er fgvyy sevraqf 
 bu lrnu gurl'er yvxr guvf  
 qba'g lbh guvax gung'f fgenatr 
 jul jung'f gur qvssrerapr 
 jryy ner lbh fgvyy sevraqf jvgu nal bs lbhe rk-tveysevraqf 
 jryy lbh xabj v hu unir znal eryngvbafuvcf 
 gur qbbe bhgfvqr avan'f fghqvb] 
 lbh xabj v'z n yvggyr areibhf 
 jul 
 jryy lbh xabj gur sevraq zrrgvat gur arj jbzna v srry yvxr v'z trggvat svkrq hc sbe n sevraqfuvc 
 v qba'g xabj ubj ybat guvf vf tbaan ynfg 
 ernyyl v gubhtug lbh yvxrq ure 
 v qb fur'f tbg yvxr n wrnybhfl guvat fur qbrfa'g yvxr zr univat sha jvgu nalbar ohg ure  
 lbh xabj vg'f n zvenpyr lbh'er abg zneevrq  url v'z abg boyvtngrq gb ohl nalguvat nz v 
 uv avan  guvf vf zl sevraq trbetr 
 ubj avpr gb zrrg lbh v'ir urneq n ybg nobhg lbh  
  url ybbx ng guvf thl 
 lrnu 
  v oebhtug trbetr hc gb frr fbzr bs lbhe cnvagvatf 
 bu ner lbh vagrerfgrq

 trbetr lbh tbaan ohl n cnvagvat 
  lrnu fher 
 ner lbh na neg-ybire

  trg bhggn urer  urer cynl jvgu guvf  
 jung'f guvf 
 zl sngure tnir zr sbhe gvpxrgf gb gur lnaxrr tnzr sbe fngheqnl nsgreabba bjare'f obk svefg ebj oruvaq gur qhtbhg 
  bu fngheqnl v'z jbexvat v'z tbvat bhg bs gbja 
 bu jryy v'z abg tbaan tb jvgubhg lbh qb lbh thlf jnag 'rz 
  lrnu 
 gurl'er evtug oruvaq gur qhtbhg trbetr svefg ebj 
 oruvaq gur qhtbhg ner lbh xvqqvat ubj qvq lbh trg gurz 
 bu zl sngure'f gur lnaxrrf nppbhagnag vg'f gur bjare'f obk 
 nyy zl yvsr v'ir qernzrq bs fvggvat sebag ebj oruvaq gur qhtbhg 
  lbh yvxr gung bar 
 fngheqnl gur tnzr trbetr xenzre naq rynvar ner orvat yrnq gb gurve frngf] 
 ybbx ng jurer jr ner  ur'f abg fgbccvat ur whfg xrrcf tbvat naq tbvat naq tbvat  jr'er abg va gur svefg ebj 
 ab ab gurfr ner lbhe frngf 
 fur fnvq svefg ebj evtug oruvaq gur qhtbhg 
 jryy vg'f gur frpbaq ebj vg'f whfg nf tbbq 
 v jnf nyy cevzrq sbe gur svefg ebj; v jnf tbaan chg zl srrg hc ba gur qhtbhg 
 jbhyq lbh fuhg hc gurfr ner terng lbh pna'g trg nal orggre guna guvf 
 bu gurer'f orggre  evtug gurer gung'f orggre 
 evtug  bu obl bxnl jub jnagf n qbt jung n terng qnl 
 v pbhyq'ir orra ng zl obff' fba'f oevf evtug abj 
  lbh'er fhccbfrq gb qb gung 
  lrnu  jung znxrf lbh guvax nalbar jbhyq jnag gb tb gb n pvephzpvfvba 
 v'q engure tb gb n unatvat

  jryy rawbl gur tnzr  v guvax lbh orggre gnxr bss gung bevbyrf pnc

 ab ab ab frevbhfyl lbh'er va gur bjare'f obk naq v qba'g guvax vg'f n tbbq vqrn 
 lbh'er abg frevbhf

 jryy qvq ur fnl gung 
 ab ab ohg ur tnir zr gur frngf v qba'g guvax ur'q yvxr vg vs lbh jber na bevbyrf pnc

 whfg gnxr gur pnc bss

 bxnl jr'yy tb 
 gur onyy xabpxf uvz fdhneryl va gur urnq ur snyyf bss gur qhtbhg bagb gur pebjq) 
 naq gura gur onyy uvgf uvz va gur urnq naq ur snyyf evtug bire gur envyvat 
 vf ur bxnl 
 jryy lrnu ur'f svar jr gbbx uvz gb gur rzretrapl ebbz naq lbh xabj gur k-enlf jrer nyy artngvir  vg jnf dhvgr n qnl 
 guvf vf gur zbfg nznmvat fgbel v'ir rire urneq--jul qvq ur jnag lbh gb gnxr bss gur onfronyy pnc gung vf fb vafnar 
 v xabj pna lbh vzntvar gung 
 ubj lbh srryvat

 lbh fnvq "oblrq" 
 v qvq 
 lrnu 
 jryy v tbg n cynar gb pngpu 
 bu jurer ner lbh tbvat

 nu lrnu

 evtug evtug  jung jung ner lbh qbvat 
 jun-- bu  bu tbq  gung vf gur guveq gvzr gbqnl v unir qbar gung oynnnu  tenoovat arjf- cncref v'z whfg ghttvat ng 'rz  
 tbggn tb 
 bxnl jryy lbh xabj unir n avpr gevc naq hu nyevtugl  v'yy whfg ubyq qbja gur hu sbeg 
 avan'f fghqvb ze naq zef nezfgebat ner nqzvevat avan'f "xenzre"] 
 v frafr terng ihypenovyvgl n ynaq puvyq pelvat bhg sbe ybir na vaabprag becuna va gur cbfg-zbqrea jbeyq 
 v frr n cnenfvgr 
 n frkhnyyl-qrcenirq zvfpevrag jub vf frrxvat gb tengvsl bayl uvf zbfg onfvp naq vzzrqvngr hetrf 
 nabgure cneg bs gur fghqvb jurer wreel naq avan ner nethvat] 
 fur jnf n thrfg bs zl sngure'f fur fubhyq'ir gnxra gur pnc bss 
 vg'f cercbfgrebhf gurl nfx fbzrbar gb gnxr bss n onfronyy pnc ng n onfronyy tnzr  ubj pna lbh qrsraq gung 
 nezfgebatf nqzvevat cnvagvat ntnva] 
 ur vf fgehttyrq ur vf zna-fgehttyrq ur yvsgf zl fcvevg 
 ur vf n ybngufbzr bssrafvir oehgr lrg v pna'g ybbx njnl 
 wreel naq avan ntnva] 
 ybbx v'z ernyyl trggvat gverq bss nyy gur svtugvat znlor jr fubhyq whfg raq guvf orsber jr ernyyl fgneg ungvat rnpu bgure 
 bu jryy lbh jbhyqa'g jnag gung orpnhfr lbh nyjnlf unir gb erznva sevraqf 
 jryy v yvxr gb erznva sevraqf jvgu crbcyr v jnf sevraqf jvgu 
 url -- jul qba'g lbh whfg tb gura naq -- bu tvir guvf gb trbetr gryy uvz ur bjrf zr $500 
 nezfgebatf] 
 ur genafpraqf gvzr naq fcnpr 
 ur fvpxraf zr 
 v ybir vg 
 zr gbb 
 wreel'f ncnegzrag] 
 svir-uhaqerq qbyynef jung 
 gung'f jung fur gbyq zr 
 v'z abg cnlvat $500 sbe guvf vg'f n cvrpr bs whax 
 gung'f jung vg pbfgf 
 jul qvq lbh rira gnxr vg lbh oebxr hc jvgu ure 
 v jnfa'g guvaxvat v qba'g xabj 
 lbh jrera'g guvaxvat 
 jryy fur senzrq vg naq rirelguvat 
 jryy v'z abg ohlvat vg ab jnl sbetrg vg ab jnl v'z ohlvat guvf  v zrna ybbx ng vg jung vf vg vg'f n ohapu bs fdhvttyl yvarf  ner lbh gryyvat zr lbh pbhyqa'g cnvag guvf 
 qb lbh jnag zr gb cnvag lbh fbzrguvat v'q ybir gb cnvag lbh fbzr- guvat 
 v'z abg cnlvat sbe guvf vs lbh jrer tbvat bhg jvgu ure vg'q or n qvssrerag fgbel 
  guvf jnf va sebag bs lbhe qbbe 
 url xenzre 
 uv zvxr 
  jbj n yrggre sebz avan 
  jubn zna gung vf gur htyvrfg guvat v'ir rire frra 
  bu zl tbq 
 jung 
 guvf vf nznmvat lbh pna'g oryvrir guvf 
 jung'f vg fnl 
 yvfgra gb guvf "v qba'g xabj jung lbh rkcrpg gb svaq bhg gurer wreel lbh xabj jung lbh jnag orggre guna zr ohg gurer'f bar guvat v qb xabj v xabj v pna fgnaq urer jngpuvat lbh qrfgebl rirelguvat v'ir rire jnagrq va zl yvsr jnagvat gb fznfu lbhe snpr jvgu zl svfgf orpnhfr lbh jba'g znxr rira gur fyvtugrfg rssbeg gb bssre unccvarff naq fgvyy xabj gung v ybir lbh lbh zrna fb zhpu gb zr gung v'z jvyy-vat gb gnxr nyy lbhe nohfr naq vafhygf naq vafrafvgvivgl" 
 jbj 
  fur'f qrrc 
  "'pnhfr gung'f jung lbh arrq gb qb gb cebir v'z abg tbvat gb yrnir lbh v'z fvpx naq gverq bs ehaavat sebz cynprf naq crbcyr naq eryngvbafuvcf lbh jnag zr gung svtug sbe zr orpnh-" 
 lbh xabj wreel fur fbhaqf yvxr n cbrg 
 ab bar'f rire jevggra zr n yrggre yvxr guvf znlor v jnf jebat nobhg ure 
  lrnu trg va gurer naq tvir ure n pnyy cvpx hc gur cubar naq pnyy ure 
 fubhyq v 
  lrf lbh'er qnza evtug lbh fubhyq  svtug sbe ure wreel fur'f fher nf uryy svtugvat sbe lbh 
 nyy evtug nyy evtug v'yy pnyy ure 
 wreel'f ncnegzrag nabgure qnl wreel vf urycvat avan chg ba ure pbng gur gi vf ba n ubefr enpr] 
 fubg  v gbyq ln  lrnu 
  vg'f trbetr 
 pbzr ba hc  jryy abj jr tbggn trg n cbffr gbtrgure v ybir n tbbq cbffr 
 jung'f gur nccrny bs gur cbffr 
 gur nccrny bs gur cbffr gur cbffr unf gerzraqbhf nccrny trg njnl sebz gur wbo pnzc bhg lbh'er jvgu lbhe sevraqf pbzr ba vg'f n jrrx-ybat tnzr bs uvqr-naq-frrx ba ubefronpx 
 uryyb trbetr 
 url avan  v bjr lbh fbzr zbarl qba'g v 
 jryy v ernyyl ybir gung cvrpr 
 bu lrnu zr gbb zr gbb obl bu obl bu obl lbh xabj va snpg v'ir orra guvaxvat nobhg vg naq v srry yvxr v'z fgrnyvat sebz lbh svir-uhaqerq qbyynef vg'f tbaan or jbegu gubhfnaqf fbba lbh xabj jung ba frpbaq gubhtug v pna'g rira npprcg vg 
 ab ab ab ab trbetr n qrny'f n qrny v jnag lbh gb unir vg 
 guvf pbhyq or va n zhfrhz fbzr qnl vg'f abg fnsr jvgu zr vg fubhyq ernyyl or va n qbbeznaarq ohvyqvat

 jub fnvq nalguvat nobhg zbarl

 pbzr ba hc 
 rynvar 
 lrnu 
  guvf crefba qbrf abg oryvrir va gryrcubarf qbrf fur

 olr  
  uryyb 
  punggl tny  yvcczna'f pbzvat onpx gbzbeebj v'yy or sverq 
 vs ur abgvprq ur jbhyq unir pnyyrq lbh sebz ubhfgba 
 ab ur jnagf gb gbegher zr 
 yngre ba gung avtug trbetr rynvar naq wreel ner jngpuvat giwreel jvgu gur erzbgr vf shevbhfyl syvccvat guebhtu punaaryf] 
  bu jbhyq lbh tvzzr gur pyvpxre v ungr vg jura lbh'er gur pyvpxre lbh tb gbb snfg  
  v'z n terng pyvpxre  terng vafgvapgf ubj qner lbh vzchar zl pyvpxvat 
 lbh'er nyy bire gur qvny lbh qba'g xabj jung lbh jnag v'ir arire frra lbh fgnl ba nalguvat sbe zber guna 5 frpbaqf tvzzr gung 
 yrg tb 
 ab pbzr ba v jnag vg wreel 
 yrg tb rynvar 
 jryy ng yrnfg yrg trbetr qb vg 
 bu trbetr pna'g pyvpx  
  tvir vg tvir vg  cvaurnqf 
 jnvg jnvg n frpbaq tb onpx tb onpx gb gung  
 vg'f puncgre 2 vg'f arvy fvzba 
  jnvg n frpbaq jnvg n frpbaq  gur yrggre gung'f gur yrggre 
 jung yrggre 
 guvf vf gur yrggre fur jebgr gb zr fur fgbyr vg evtug sebz gur zbivr 
 "'pnhfr lbh qba'g rira znxr gur fyvtugrfg rssbeg gb bssre unccvarff fgvyy xabj gung v ybir lbh" 
 guvf vf vaperqvoyr 
 v nyjnlf gubhtug gurer jnf fbzrguvat shaal nobhg guvf yrggre fur pbcvrq vg evtug bhg bs puncgre 2 fur n guvrs n ohaxb-negvfg 
 znlor v jba'g fraq ure gung purpx 
 lbh xabj vg'f abg ernyyl gung greevoyr 
 jung ner lbh gnyxvat nobhg fur pbzcyrgryl zvfercerfragrq urefrys  v qba'g bssre unccvarff v bssre unccvarff wnzrf pnna qbrfa'g bssre unccvarff 
 yvcczna'f bssvpr yvcczna vf ba gur cubar jura rynvar jnyxf va naq cynprf fbzrguvat ba uvf qrfx nsgre fur qbrf fur gevrf gb yrnir ohg yvcczna fgvyy ba gur cubar zbgvbaf sbe ure gb fgnl va gur ebbz] 
 lrnu lrnu ohg fur jbhyqa'g gnxr gur pnc bss  ohg qvqa'g fur xabj gurl jrer gur bjare'f frngf  nj gung'f haoryvrinoyr  lrnu bxnl nyevtug yraal gunaxf ntnva gnxr pner  gung jnf yraal jrfg zl nppbhagnag jub vf n uryy bs n thl naq ur unaqyrf gur lnaxrrf gbb; vg'f uvf ovttrfg nppbhag fb rirel bapr va n juvyr gurl guebj uvz n pbhcyr bs frngf naq ynfg jrrxraq ur tnir gurz gb uvf qnhtugre fur'f na negvfg ol gur jnl naljnl ure qnhtugre tvirf 'rz gb fbzr sevraqf lbh xabj bar bs ure sevraqf fubjf hc jrnevat n onygvzber pnc  lbh'er sebz onygvzber evtug 
 hz bu vg'f gbjafpraq juvpu vf arne onygvzber 
 lrnu ohg lbh'er na bevbyr sna evtug 
 jryy hu sna zl sngure-- 
 naljnl fur ershfrq gb gnxr gur pnc bss; pnhfrq n jubyr ovt fprar 
 ernyyl 
 lrnu 
 fb vzchqrag 
 lrnu fb yraal tnir zr gur gvpxrgf sbe gbzbeebj avtug v'z vaivgvat senax naq znefun 'jnagpun gb pbzr 
  nu v'ir-v'ir tbg cynaf gubhtu ze yv-- 
 jryy oernx 'rz lbh zvffrq gur oevf v jnag lbh ng gur tnzr 
  bxnl 
 tbbq  bu--naq rynvar lbh xabj gur onygvzber pnc lbh tbg va lbhe bssvpr jrne vg v'z tbaan unir n yvggyr sha jvgu uvz 
 gung jvyy or sha 
 avan'f fghqvb avan vf jbexvat ba n cnvagvat wreel vf jngpuvat ure fvggvat ba gur fbsn] 
 ubj'f vg pbzvat 
 tbbq tbbq 
 frra nal tbbq zbivrf yngryl 
 ab abg ernyyl lbh 
 ab v yvxr n tbbq pbzrql lbh xabj yvxr n arvy fvzba lbh yvxr arvy fvzba 
 arvy fvzba hu fbzr bs uvf fghss 
 v'ir frra zbfg bs vg v thrff zl snibevgr jbhyq unir gb or hu puncgre 2 unir lbh rire frra gung 
 v qba'g xabj znlor 
 v unir shaal shaal va snpg vg jnf ba gi whfg gur bgure avtug unccrarq gb pngpu vg  v pbhyqa'g uryc abgvpr n fghaavat fvzvyvnevgl--  
 jryy jr'ir znqr bhe qrpvfvba jr jnag "gur xenzre" 
 wreel'f ncnegzrag avtug wreel naq trbetr ner jngpuvat n onfronyy tnzr naq gnyxvat] 
 svir-gubhfnaq jul jbhyq nalobql ohl xenzre sbe $5000  
 obl gur lnaxrrf pnaabg ohl n uvg gbavtug 
 fb vf vg nyy bire orgjrra lbh naq znefun znfba 
 lrnu  naq ol gur jnl pna lbh trg guvf guvat bhggn zl ubhfr 
 gryy lbh jung v'yy znxr n qrny jvgu lbh v'yy fryy vg gb lbh evtug abj sbe gra ohpxf 
 hu gurer'f frrzf gb or n ybg bs gebhoyr va gur nern whfg oruvaq gur lnaxrr qhtbhg 
 oruvaq gur qhtbhg gung'f jurer jr jrer fvggvat gur bgure qnl 
 jryy jr'er abg tbvat gb fubj vg jr qba'g jnag gb rapbhentr gung xvaq bs orunivbe fnl vg'f n lbhat ynql naq obl fur'f ernyyl tbvat ng vg jvgu gur frphevgl thneq fur'f n svrfgl bar naq abj gurl'er trggvat gur bgure frphevgl thneq gb pbzr qbja ubj qb lbh yvxr gung frrtref obl fur'f fbzrgvat  naq n onyy gb yrsg svryq" 
 gur nezfgebat'f qvavat ebbz ze naq zef nezfgebat ner univat xenzre bire sbe qvaare] 
 gura jura v jnf friragrra v ena njnl sebz ubzr naq ubccrq n fgrnzfuvc gb fjrqra  guvf fgrnx vf rkpryyrag ol gur jnl 
 zber cbgngbrf 
 lrnu fher cyrnfr 
 lrf lrf tb ba lbh ubccrq n fgrnzfuvc gb fjrqra 
 lrnu  naq vg jnf n ovt bar 
 url v tbg fbzr onq arjf sbe lbh ohqql v guvax lbhe pne tbg fgbyra ntnva 
 jung ner lbh gnyxvat nobhg 
 jryy lbh cnexrq vg ba rvtugl-sbhegu naq pbyhzohf evtug 
 lrnu 
 lrc jryy v whfg jnyxrq ol gurer naq gung pne vf tbar 
 bu lrnu v xabj 
 jryy jurer vf vg 
 jung'f gur qvssrerapr 
 jryy gurer'f ab qvssrerapr lbh xabj v'z whfg phevbhf 
 lbh nyjnlf unir gb xabj rirelguvat gung'f tbvat ba qba'g lbh 
 jung unccrarq gb gur pne 
 vs v qba'g gryy lbh vg jvyy xvyy lbh jba'g vg 
 lrnu lrnu vg'yy xvyy zr 
 lbh unir gb xabj lbh zhfg xabj 
 v zhfg xabj 
 jryy v'z abg gryyvat lbh 
 bu pbzr ba 
 abcr v qba'g guvax fb 
 jryy cyrnfr 
 abg gbqnl cny 
 bxnl v ort lbh 
 abj frr whfg fnlvat ort qbrfa'g znxr vg n erny ort lbh tbggn chg fbzr ort vagb vg 
 bxnl cyrnfr cyrnfr gryy zr 
 nyevtug v'yy gryy lbh ohg lbhe orttvat arrqf n ybg bs jbex 
 bxnl bxnl jung vf vg pbzr ba 
 v ybnarq gur pne gb trbetr 
 nu trbetr nyevtug jryy jung sbe 
 trbetr naq rynvar jrag gb n syrn znexrg va jrfgpurfgre bxnl 
 nyevtug 
 uhu 
 uhu v zrna jung qb gurl jnag gb tb gurer sbe 
 jvyy lbh fgbc vg nyernql 
 lbh xabj jul qvqa'g gurl nfx zr gb tb 
 v qba'g xabj ubj nz v fhccbfrq gb xabj 
 jung gurl qba'g yvxr zr 
 *v* qba'g yvxr lbh 
 vs gurl yvxr zr jul qba'g gurl nfx zr gb tb bu lrnu 
 v ernyyl guvax vg ybbxf tbbq 
 gra ohpxf ubj pna lbh tb jebat 
 nyy onyq crbcyr ybbx tbbq va ungf 
 lbh fubhyq unir yvirq va gur gjragvrf naq guvegvrf lbh xabj zra jber ungf nyy gur gvzr gura 
 jung n onyq cnenqvfr gung zhfg unir orra abobql xarj 
 jryy lbh pna jrne n ung nyy gur gvzr abj jub'f fgbccvat lbh 
 ab v pna'g jung vs v zrrg n jbzna v'q nyjnlf or jbeevrq nobhg gung svefg zbzrag jurer v'q gnxr vg bss naq frr gung ybbx bs qvfnccbvagzrag ba ure snpr 
 ner lbh fher lbh yvxr gurfr fhatynffrf 
 jryy v'z irel qvfnccbvagrq va trbetr naq rynvar naq lbh xabj v'z fbzrobql lbh qba'g jnag gb unir ba lbhe onq fvqr 
 jul abg 
 orpnhfr v'z yvxr vpr ohqql jura v qba'g yvxr lbh lbh'ir tbg ceboyrzf  bu vf guvf sbe gur svtug 
 lrc  fgnegf va guvegl-svir zvahgrf 
 bu url lbh xabj v vaivgrq zvxr zbssvg lbh qba'g zvaq qb lbh 
 ab v yvxr zvxr 
 lrnu v whfg tbg bss gur cubar jvgu uvz lbh xabj jr unq n terng pbairefngvba 
 bu lrnu jung qvq lbh gnyx nobhg 
 jryy npghnyyl jr gnyxrq nobhg lbh lrnu ur unq fbzr cerggl vagrerfgvat guvatf gb fnl 
 bu lrnu jung qvq ur fnl 
 lbh unir gb xabj rirelguvat qba'g lbh 
 ab pbzr ba xenzre jung qvq ur fnl 
 jul vf gung jul qb lbh unir gb xabj rirelguvat 
 xenzre whfg gryy zr jung gur thl fnvq 
 ort zr 
 cyrnfr qba'g znxr zr ort 
 ab ab ab v jnag lbh gb ort zr naq v qba'g jnag lbh gb fnl vg v whfg jnag lbh gb chg fbzr ort vagb vg tb ba 
 xenzre cyrnfr gryy zr jung gur thl fnvq 
 ab ab ab gung'f ab tbbq ab v ernyyl qba'g guvax gung'f n ort ab vg'f pybfr ohg hu 
 xenzre 
 ybbx v pna'g fnl nalguvat lbh xabj gur thl gbyq zr gur fghss va pbasvqrapr v'q or orgenlvat n sevraq 
 jryy lbh pna'g whfg zragvba vg naq gura abg gryy zr 
 nyevtug v'yy gryy lbh ohg lbh pna'g fnl nalguvat gb uvz 
 v'z abg fnlvat nalguvat v'z chggvat vg va gur inhyg v'z ybpxvat gur inhyg vg'f n inhyg 
 ur guvaxf lbh'er n cubal 
 ur jung 
 v gbyq lbh ur guvaxf lbh'er n cubal 
 n cubal ur pnyyrq zr n cubal 
 n ovt cubar n ovt bar 
 jul qvq lbh gryy zr gung vs v pna'g fnl nalguvat 
 lbh orttrq zr 
 qb lbh urne gung 
 bs pbhefr v urne gung 
 lbh unq gb zbir gur zveebe 
 v jnagrq gb purpx bhg zl fhatynffrf 
 v jrag gb ybbx va gur zveebe vg jnfa'g gurer lbh guerj bss zl rdhvyvoevhz 
 bu lrnu oynzr vg ba zr orpnhfr lbh pna'g qevir trbetr 
 v pna'g qevir 
 lrnu 
 abobql qevirf yvxr zr abobql v'z qbvat guvatf va guvf pne lbh unir ab vqrn gurl'er tbvat ba jnaan frr zr znxr n evtug ghea sebz gur yrsg ynar jngpu guvf 
 ab v ernyyl qba'g 
 naq v pna znxr n yrsg ghea sebz gur evtug ynar gbb 
 v'z fher lbh pbhyq 
 jung ner jr tbaan gryy wreel nobhg gur pne 
 v qba'g xabj 
 nyevtug fgneg ybbxvat sbe fcnprf 
 bu lbh'er arire tbaan svaq n fcnpr ba wreel'f oybpx whfg chg vg va n tnentr 
 ybbx v unir zl flfgrz svefg v ybbx sbe gur qernz fcbg evtug va sebag bs gur qbbe gura v fybjyl rkcnaq bhg va pbapragevp pvepyrf 
 bu pbzr ba trbetr cyrnfr chg vg va n tnentr v qba'g jnag gb fcraq na ubhe ybbxvat sbe n fcnpr 
 v pna'g cnex va n tnentr 
 jul 
 v qba'g xabj v whfg pna'g abobql va zl snzvyl pna cnl sbe cnexvat vg'f n fvpxarff zl sngure arire cnvq sbe cnexvat; zl zbgure zl oebgure abobql jr pna'g qb vg 
 v'yy cnl sbe vg 
 lbh qba'g haqrefgnaq n tnentr v pna'g rira chyy va gurer vg'f yvxr tbvat gb n cebfgvghgr jul fubhyq v cnl jura vs v nccyl zlfrys znlor v pbhyq trg vg sbe serr  jung jung qb lbh jnag tb nebhaq zr v'z ybbxvat sbe fcnprf 
  bu trbetr gurer'f n fcnpr evtug gurer 
  bu ornhgvshy ybbx ng gung gur qernz fcnpr evtug va sebag bs wreel'f ohvyqvat uhu qernzf pna pbzr gehr jung qvq v gryy lbh 
 lbh qvqa'g rira unir gb gnxr vg bhg gb qvaare 
 nyevtug abj lbh'er tbaan frr fbzr cnenyyry cnexvat  ubj v jvfu lbh pbhyq znxr n yvivat cnenyyry cnexvat  vg'f nyy trbzrgel xabjvat nyy gur natyrf jura gb znxr gung svefg ghea naq gura jura gb fjvat vg onpx va gung'f gur xrl 
 jvyy lbh whfg cnex vg nyernql 
 gurer'f abguvat v pna rira vzcneg gb lbh gung'f gur fnq guvat vg'f fb vaobea v pna'g cnff vg ba  ybbx ng guvf thl ner lbh penml jung ner lbh qbvat url url lbh'er fgrnyvat zl fcnpr 
 trbetr jnvg lbh qba'g xabj jub guvf thl vf crbcyr xvyy sbe n cnexvat fcnpr va guvf pvgl 
 ab ab ab ur'f abg trggvat njnl jvgu guvf 
 trbetr 
 url jung ner lbh qbvat 
 v guvax v'z cnexvat zl pne 
 lbh pna'g qb gung lbh pna'g whfg farnx va sebz gur onpx yvxr gung 
 v'z abg farnxvat v qvqa'g rira xabj lbh jrer cnexvat lbh jrer whfg fvggvat gurer guerr fcnprf hc 
 jryy vs lbh qvqa'g guvax v jnf cnexvat jul qvq lbh chg vg va urnq svefg 
 jryy gung'f gur jnl v cnex naljnl lbh qvqa'g fgneg onpxvat va hagvy v chyyrq va 
 v jnf va gur zvqqyr bs n pbairefngvba 
 url ohqql jung pna v gryy lbh 
 gur cbvag vf v jnf urer svefg 
 v jnf pybfre gb guvf fcnpr guna lbh jrer 
 ohg v'z onpxvat va lbh pna'g chg vg va urnq svefg 
 v pna vs v unir ebbz 
 ner lbh tbaan zbir gur pne 
 ab v'z abg tbaan zbir gur pne 
 wrex 
 bu lbh'er abg 
 qb lbh oryvrir guvf thl 
 pbzr ba jr'yy chg vg va n tnentr 
 v nz abg chggvat vg va n tnentr vg'f zl fcnpr 
 jung ner lbh tbaan qb lbh whfg tbaan yrnir vg urer yvxr guvf hu v'z tbvat hcfgnvef 
 ner lbh pbzvat onpx qbja 
 lrnu v tbggn gryy wreel jr'er urer v tbggn tb gb gur onguebbz 
 nyevtug whfg znxr fher ur erfreirf gur tbbq punve sbe zr jnvg jung ner lbh tbaan gryy uvz nobhg gur pynaxvat abvfr va gur pne 
 zr ab ab ab lbh lbh'er tbaan gryy uvz v'z abg tbaan gryy- abb 
 bu pbzr ba lbh'er tbbq ng guvf 
 jung nz v tbaan fnl 
 v qba'g xabj v qba'g xabj lbh'yy guvax bs fbzrguvat 
 bu tbq v arrq n qevax qb lbh tbg nal uraavtna'f urer 
 lrnu haqre gur pbhagre jung unccrarq 
 bu tbq bu wreel vg jnf fb greevoyr jung jr whfg jrag guebhtu ba gur jnl ubzr  lbh jbhyqa'g oryvrir vg  
  gryy zr jung unccrarq 
  bxnl abj yvfgra jr jrer ng gur gbyy obbgu ng gur urael uhqfba cnexjnl bxnl naq gurer jrer gurfr yvxr guvf cnpx bs rkgerzryl jvyq grrantref va n pbairegvoyr oruvaq hf bxnl naq sbe fbzr ernfba v qba'g xabj gurl whfg fgnegrq gb gnhag hf naq fb gura jr cnlrq gur gbyy naq gura jr jrag guebhtu naq gura gurl fgnegrq gb sbyybj hf nyevtug fb trbetr gevrf gb ybfr gurz naq naq ohg gurl jrer va guvf ernyyl yvxr n fbhcrq hc pne lbh xabj naq fb ur ghearq bss gur ebnq ernyyl fhqqrayl naq gur pne jnf ba gjb jurryf naq v jnf whfg fpernzvat naq gura trbetr vf fhpu n terng qevire 
 ur vf 
 bu ur vf snagnfgvp naq gura gurl sverq n tha evtug hc va gur nve 
 n tha 
 v guvax vg jnf n tha naq gura gurl sbyybjrq hf nyy gur jnl vagb gur pvgl naq gura gurl whfg fgbccrq naq gurl ghearq nebhaq naq gurl jrag ubzr 
 zl tbq ner lbh bxnl 
 lrnu lrnu v'z nyevtug bu ol gur jnl gur pne uvg n cbgubyr naq abj vg'f znxvat n pynaxvat abvfr 
 jryy v zrna nf ybat nf lbh'er bxnl gung gung'f gur vzcbegnag guvat 
 rknpgyl 
 jurer'f trbetr abj 
 bu ur'f bhg va sebag bs gur ohvyqvat ur'f nethvat jvgu fbzr thl nobhg n cnexvat fcnpr 
 jung ner lbh gnyxvat nobhg 
 ybbx bhg gur jvaqbj lbh'yy frr 
  url trbetvr 
 url 
 ner lbh bxnl 
 lrnu v'z svar 
 penml xvqf uhu 
 jung 
  bj  vg'f zl phgvpyr 
 vf gung wreel wreel 
 bu url zvxr 
 jung lbh xabj wreel 
 lrnu v xabj wreel 
 ubj qb lbh xabj uvz 
 jung'f gur qvssrerapr 
 orpnhfr v xabj uvz gbb naq cebonoyl n ybg orggre guna lbh 
 jryy ohyyl sbe lbh url wreel lbh xabj lbhe sevraq urer'f n erny cvrpr bs jbex 
 v'z pbzvat qbja 
 url jvyy lbh gryy xenzre v'z bhgfvqr 
 jung lbh xabj xenzre 
 uv 
  uryyb 
 url lbhe sevraq zvxr'f bhgfvqr ur jnagf gb gnyx gb lbh 
  url zvxr pbzr ba hc gur svtug'f nyzbfg fgnegvat 
 naq lbh'er jngpuvat gur svtug ng wreel'f 
 lrnu 
 bu terng 
 lbh xabj gung thl qbjafgnvef 
 lrnu ur'f n erny cubal 
 jung'f tbvat ba 
 url jvyy lbh pbzr ba qbja guvf thl'f va zl fcnpr 
 vg'f zl fcnpr 
 v'yy or qbja va n zvahgr 
 ner lbh tbvat qbja 
 lrnu 
 vf nalguvat jebat 
  jul fubhyq nalguvat or jebat 
  or qbja va n zvahgr 
 url cny lbh'er abg trggvat gung fcnpr v zrna v'yy fyrrc va zl pne vs v unir gb 
 v'yy qvr bhg urer 
 ur jnf qbja gurer bapr ur cnffrq uvf sebag ohzcre vg'f ab ybatre uvf fcnpr 
 ab vg qbrfa'g znggre ur jnf- 
 url wreel ybat gvzr ab frr 
 uv zvxr  vaqvnan 
 url xenzr lbh xabj guvf thl 
 lrnu lrnu v xabj uvz 
  lbh'er ybbxvat gerzraqbhf jung ner lbh ba fbzr xvaq bs ertvzra 
 lrnu gjragl-svir creprag oena synxrf gur sbegl creprag jnf gbb zhpu fb v sbhaq n fgber gb zvk vg hc fcrpvny sbe zr gurl gnxr vg qbja nabgure svsgrra creprag 
  un un un un gung'f xvyyre xvyyre v ybir gung un un un lbh tbggn hfr gung gung'f n qrsvavgr un un un 
 bu pbzr ba 
 url lbhe sevraq urer unf fbzr erny ceboyrzf 
 zr lbh frr jung ur qvq urer lbh frr ubj ur gevrq gb farnx vagb zl fcnpr 
 url whfg 'pnhfr v jrag va sebag svefg qbrfa'g zrna v'z farnxvat va 
 lbh bayl jrag va sebag svefg 'pnhfr lbh fnj zr onpxvat hc naq lbh qvqa'g unir ebbz gb cnenyyry cnex 
 v bayl jrag va sebag svefg 'pnhfr v pbhyq znxr vg va sebag svefg naq vs lbh chyy bhg v'yy fubj lbh 
 lbh'ir tbg n cenlre 
 v tb va sebag svefg nyy gur gvzr 
 sebag svefg gung'f ubj lbh cnex jura lbh'er chyyvat n onax wbo 
 qvq lbh gnyx gb uvz 
 lrnu vg'f nyy gnxra pner bs 
 lbh gbyq uvz jung qvq lbh gryy uvz 
 v qvq n ahzore ba uvz vg jnf n guvat bs ornhgl lbh ernyyl unq gb unir orra gurer gb nccerpvngr vg 
 v qba'g oryvrir vg jung qvq lbh fnl 
 v gbyq uvz n cnpx bs grrantref va n pbairegvoyr jrer greebevmvat hf naq gurl sbyybjrq hf vagb gur pvgl 
 n cnpx bs grrantref 
 lrnu ol gur gvzr v tbg gb gur raq bs gur fgbel ur jnf gb eryvrirq gung jr jrer nyvir ur pbhyqa'g pner yrff nobhg gur pne 
 lbh ner n travhf vg'f nf fvzcyr nf gung 
 jung pna v fnl lbh xabj vg'f n tvsg v bayl jvfu v pbhyq grnpu vg ohg lbh xabj vg'f vaobea 
 ol gur jnl gunaxf n ybg sbe vaivgvat zr gb gur syrn znexrg 
 jung 
 lrnu wreel ur gbyq zr nyy nobhg vg 
 bu terng 
 v qvqa'g xabj 
 bu fb gung'f jul lbh jrer npgvat fb shaal 
 jryy v qvqa'g xabj lbh jnagrq gb tb gb gur syrn znexrg 
 n syrn znexrg lbh jrag gb n syrn znexrg 
 url jub'f gnyxvat gb lbh 
 jr whfg qvqa'g guvax bs lbh 
 lbh fnvq vg fvfgre 
 jung rirel gvzr v yrnir zl ubhfr abj v unir gb pnyy rirelobql v xabj naq nfx gurz vs gurl jnag gb qb jung v'z qbvat 
 terng zbir gryyvat uvz ol gur jnl erny fzneg zbir 
 v qvqa'g xabj v jnfa'g fhccbfrq gb fnl nalguvat 
 whqtrzrag wreel whqtrzrag lbh rkrepvfrq ab whqtrzrag 
 lbh'er evtug zl snhyg 
 xenzre v'z fb fbeel ernyyl 
 lrnu v'z fbeel 
 v'z fbeel v qba'g pner sbe gung fbeel 
 jung jnf jebat jvgu gung fbeel vg jnf n tbbq fbeel wreel jnf gung n tbbq fbeel 
 vg jnf n fb-fb fbeel 
 url zbir guvf pne v tbggn trg guebhtu 
 lbh urneq gur zna v thrff lbh tbggn or zbivat lbhe pne 
 naq yvxr lbh'er abg tbaan whfg onpx vg va vs v qb gung 
 jryy fbzrobql orggre zbir fbzrguvat fbba v tbg n gehpx shyy bs vpr pernz urer 
 lbh frr gurl unq gb zbir gur pnef fb gur gehpx pbhyq trg guebhtu evtug ohg gurfr thlf qba'g gehfg rnpu bgure fb gurl tbg gurfr gjb abacnegvfna qeviref gb zbir gurz 
 jvyq cnpx bs grrantref uhu 
 lrnu 
 nznmvat ubj gurl cvpxrq lbh bhg bs rirelbar gb greebevmr 
 lrnu v xabj v fnvq gb zlfrys 'jul hf' lbh erzrzore 
 hu uhu 
 fbhaqf yvxr lbh qvq fbzr cerggl avsgl znarhirevat 
 jryy lbh xabj vg'f vagrerfgvat lbh xabj haqre gung cerffher jung lbh'er pncnoyr bs 
 evtug 
 v yrnearq n ybg nobhg zlfrys 
 jung qvq lbh qb gb zl pne 
 v pbhyqa'g uryc vg rynvar zbirq gur zveebe v tbg qvfpbzobohyngrq 
 bu yvxr lbh'ir rire orra obohyngrq 
 v gubhtug lbh fnvq lbh jrer n tbbq qevire 
 ab ab v arire fnvq v jnf n tbbq qevire v fnvq v jnf n tbbq cnexre 
 v guvax lbh fnvq qevire 
 cnexre v arire fnvq qevire v fnvq cnexre n terng cnexre 
 jvyy lbh zbir vg hc n yvggyr ovg 
 ab ab ab gung'f va gur evtug cbfvgvba 
 ab ab v jnf shegure va 
 ab lbh jrera'g fgbc gurer gung'f svar 
 qb lbh zvaq 
 qb lbh 
 url fbzrobql orggre zbir gurfr pnef lbh'er znxvat n pbzzbgvba 
 url fvq 
 jub ner lbh 
 arire zvaq jub v nz v xabj jub v nz qb lbh xabj jub lbh ner  jul vf vg rirel gvzr lbh cnex n pne va guvf oybpx rirelguvat trgf qvfehcgrq naq qvfwbvagrq 
 fvq vg'f pbzcyrgryl uvf snhyg 
 bu evtug 
 jul qba'g lbh fgneg gnxvat gur ohf 
 bxnl trbetr pbzr ba yrg'f tb v'z chggvat vg va n tnentr gur svtug'f fgnegvat va gjb zvahgrf 
 qba'g qb vg 
 jung ner jr tbaan qb fgnl bhg urer nyy avtug 
 lrf v'z abg tvivat uvz gur fngvfsnpgvba vg'f zl fcnpr 
 jul qba'g lbh whfg syvc n pbva nyernql 
 ab ab guvf vf n znggre bs cevapvcyr gung jbhyq whfg or fnlvat gung nalobql pbhyq whfg chyy vagb nal cnexvat fcnpr nal jnl gurl jnag jryy v'z znxvat n fgnaq urer v'z fnlvat *ab* gb urnq svefg cnexvat v'z abg chggvat hc jvgu gung jr chg hc jvgu gbb zhpu penc va guvf pvgl jr'er abg chggvat hc jvgu urnq svefg cnexvat 
 lbh xabj znlor vs lbh unqa'g orra fvggvat gurer cbagvsvpngvat nobhg jung n terng cnexre lbh jrer lbh zvtug unir tbg gur fcnpr 
 fb lbh'er ntnvafg zr abj 
 ur pbhyq unir chyyrq hc gb gur pne naq onpxrq va ohg ur pubfr gb tb va urnq svefg 
 ab ur pbhyqa'g orpnhfr gur bgure pne jnf nyernql onpxvat va 
 ab ur jnfa'g 
 nyy gung znggref vf jub jnf gurer svefg 
 nuu lbh'er abg rira byq rabhtu gb qevir lbh yvggyr chxr 
 lbh whfg fcvg ba zr 
 qba'g lbh envfr lbhe ibvpr gb zr 
 lbh'er abg zl sngure 
 url znggurj 
 uv wreel guvf thl'f ernyyl n wrex 
 ubj ln qbvat 
 bxnl 
 url ubj'f lbhe sngure v urne ur'f pybfvat uvf fgber 
 jung 
 bu ab abguvat 
 jung'f unccrarq gb qnqql ur'f tbvat bhg bs ohfvarff 
 ab ab ab ab 
 jr'er abg tbvat gb unir nal zbarl jr'er bhg bs zbarl 
 ab bs pbhefr abg bs pbhefr abg 
 zbzzl wreel fnlf qnqql'f pybfvat gur fgber ur'f tbvat bhg bs ohfvarff jr qba'g unir nal zbarl 
 wreel jung'f gur znggre jvgu lbh 
 v qvqa'g-- 
  obl v qba'g xabj nobhg lbhe sevraq wreel ur fnlf fbzr cerggl fghcvq guvatf fbzrgvzrf 
 bu pbatenghyngvbaf 
 jung sbe 
 jryy lbh'er certanag 
 jung 
 lbh'er abg certanag 
 ab v'z abg certanag 
 ner lbh fher lbh'er abg certanag 
 lrf v'z fher 
 gung'f jrveq 
 pbzr ba znggurj 
 ab 
 pbzr ba znggurj 
 v gubhtug fur jnf certanag 
  url qb lbh guvax v'z cubal 
 jung 
 zvxr guvaxf v'z n cubal 
 ur guvaxf lbh'er n cubal 
 lrnu ohg v pna'g fnl nalguvat orpnhfr xenzre jnfa'g fhccbfrq gb gryy zr 
 bu lbh unir gb fnl fbzrguvat 
 v pna'g v gbyq xenzre v jnf inhygvat vg 
 lbh tbggn bcra gur inhyg 
 bcra zl inhyg 
 bcra lbhe inhyg 
 bapr v bcra gur inhyg vg prnfrf gb or n inhyg 
 lbh unir ab pubvpr 
 bl tn-inhyg 
  lbh jnaan xabj jul lbh pna'g tb va sebag svefg v'yy gryy lbh jul orpnhfr vg fvtanyf n oernxqbja va gur fbpvny beqre punbf vg erqhprf hf gb whatyr ynj 
 jura pna lbh cnex urnq svefg 
 arire 
 jung ner lbh nfxvat guvf thl sbe 
 jub'f gnyxvat gb lbh 
 ur'f evtug arire 
 bu lrnu jung vs lbh tbg gra pne yratguf lbh unir gb chyy nyy gur jnl hc gb gur sebag pne 
 jryy v fhccbfr vs lbh tbg gra pne yratguf 
 jura qb lbh rire unir gra pne yratguf 
 jung nobhg fhaqnlf naq ubyvqnlf 
 bu cyrnfr 
 jung'f tbvat ba urer 
 bu guvf thl gevrq gb farnx vagb zl fcnpr 
 v ernyyl ungr crbcyr jub qb gung v ubcr lbh qba'g yrg uvz trg njnl jvgu vg 
 jryy gunax lbh sbe lbhe fhccbeg 
 url gung'f n terng ung 
 ernyyl lbh yvxr vg v tbg vg ng n syrn znexrg gbqnl 
 url trbetr avpr ung 
 lrnu gunaxf 
 pna v gel vg ba 
 ab vg hu vg jbhyqa'g svg lbh 
 jryy fher vg jbhyq 
 ab trg bhg bs urer arjzna 
 pbzr ba yrg zr gel vg ba 
 ab arjzna fgbc vg 
 yrg uvz gel vg ba 
 v qba'g jnag uvz gb 
 jung vf jebat jvgu lbh 
 lbh jnaan frr  gurer gurer vg vf  nyevtug urer lbh jnaan gel ba gur ung urer gel ba gur ung 
 fgbc vg trbetr fgbc vg v jnf qrsraqvat lbhe cnexvat 
 nyevtug whfg xrrc gur ung 
 nyevtug gung'f vg gur svtug'f nyernql fgnegrq v'z tbvat hcfgnvef jub'f pbzvat rynvar 
 vg qrcraqf ba jub'f tbvat  ner lbh tbvat 
 v'z abg tbvat vs ur'f tbvat 
 zr rvgure 
 v'z abg tbvat vs ur'f tbvat 
 jryy v'z tbvat 
 jryy vs ur'f tbvat gura v'z abg tbvat 
 ohg vg'f lbhe ubhfr 
 v fgvyy qba'g unir gb tb 
 jryy v qba'g jnag gb tb vs wreel'f abg tbvat 
 jul jba'g lbh tb vs v tb 
 jul v'yy gryy lbh jul 
 ab qba'g wreel 
 yvxr lbh qvqa'g pnyy zr n cubal 
 jung  gunaxf erny tbbq wreel svefg bs nyy v guvax lbh pbzcyrgryl zvfhaqrefgbbq jung v fnvq v zrnag vg va n pbzcyrzragnel jnl v zrna lbh xabj jura crbcyr fnl 'ur'f onq' vg ernyyl zrnaf ur'f tbbq fbeg bs guvat lbh xabj fynat 
 hfr vg va n fragrapr 
 zna gung zvpunry wbeqna vf fb cubal  jul'q lbh gryy uvz 
 ur orttrq zr 
 ur orttrq lbh 
 nyevtug pbzr ba jub jnagf gb jngpu gur svtug 
 bxnl jub'f pnef ner gurfr yrg'f zbir 'rz yrg'f tb 
 bssvpre pbhyq v whfg rkcynva fbzrguvat gb lbh 
 url yrg'f tb be v'z tbaan jevgr obgu bs lbh n gvpxrg va nobhg gjb zvahgrf 
 bssvpre ur pna'g chyy va urnq svefg 
 bssvpre ur onpxrq hc sebz qbja gur fgerrg ur jnf qbhoyr-cnexrq ur jnf 
 nyevtug lbh zbir lbhe pne vg'f uvf fcnpr lbh pna'g tb va urnq 
 jnvg n frpbaq jul pna'g ur tb va urnq svefg ur fnvq gur thl jnf whfg fvggvat bire gurer 
 jung ner lbh gnyxvat nobhg guvf thl jnf urer svefg 
 ohg ur qvqa'g gnxr vg 
 url vg'f uvf fcnpr 
 ab vg'f uvf fcnpr 
 jryy lbh'er tbaan unir gb tb gb gur onguebbz 
 jryy lbh'er tbaan unir gb tb gb jbex 
 v qba'g unir n wbo 
 arvgure qb v 
 frira rvtug avar gra *qvat* 
 fb v syl n ybg v yvxr cynarf v jnf ba n cynar gur bgure qnl naq v jnf jbaqrevat - ner gurer xrlf gb gur cynar qb gurl arrq xrlf gb fgneg gur cynar znlor gung'f jung gubfr qrynlf ba gur tebhaq ner fbzrgvzrf jura lbh'er whfg fvggvat gurer ng gur tngr znlor gur cvybg'f whfg hc gurer va gur pbpxcvg tbvat  "bu v qba'g oryvrir guvf bu zl tbqv qvq vg ntnva" gurl gryy lbh vg'f fbzrguvat zrpunavpny orpnhfr gurl qba'g jnag gb pbzr ba gur cn flfgrz"ynqvrf naq tragyrzra jr'er tbvat gb or qrynlrq urer ba gur tebhaq sbe n yvggyr juvyr v hubu tbq guvf vf fb rzoneenffvatv - v yrsg gur xrlf gb gur cynar va zl ncnegzrag" lbh frr gur grpuavpvnaf nyy ehaavat haqrearngu gur cynar; lbh guvax gurl'er freivpvat vg ohg gurl'er npghnyyl ybbxvat sbe gur zntarg "uvqr-n-xrl" haqre gur jvat"znlor ur yrsg vg hc gurer fbzrjurer" 
 wreel'f ncnegzrag va gur zvqqyr bs gur avtug wreel pbzrf bhg bs uvf ebbz jr urne uvf gubhtugf 
 jung vf vg nobhg fyrrc gung znxrf lbh fb guvefgl qb qernzf erdhver yvdhvq vg'f abg yvxr v'z ehaavat n znenguba v'z whfg ylvat gurer 
 jung gur uryy jul vf gur qbbe bcra 
 xenzre jung ner lbh qbvat urer 
 wreel abj pnyz qbja vg'f bxnl v'z fbeel v qvqa'g jnag gb jnxr lbh hc l'xabj v jnf jngpuvat "guvegl frpbaqf bire gbxlb" naq v - l'xabj v jnagrq gb trg fbzr cbcpbea naq v huv hfrq gur fcner xrlf gung lbh tnir zr gb pbzr vagb lbhe ncnegzrag gb trg lbhe cbccre

 vg'f whfg zr 
 gung'f rabhtu 
 sbetbg gur cbccre  
 p'zbap'zba

 vf gung xenzre

 hu xenzre  bu uvhulbh tbg gur

 ab ab ab vg'f bx v qba'g pner nobhg gur xrlf vg'f zl snhyg v tnir gur xrlf njnl jvgu zl fghcvqvgl v oebxr "gur pbiranag bs gur xrlf" 
 wreel tvir uvz gur xrlf onpx 
 rynvar 
 v qba'g jnag gur xrlf onpx ab v'z tynq gur jnl guvatf ghearq bhg v jnf pyvatva' gb gubfr xrlf zna yvxr n oenapu ba gur onaxf bs n entvat evire naq abj v unir yrg tb naq v'z serrgb tb jvgu gur pheerag gb sybng  naq v gunax lbh 
 gnxr gur xrlf 
 v qba'g jnag gur xrlf  
 bx 
 abj bar zber guvat - v jbhyq yvxr zl xrlf onpx 
 lbhe fcner frg 
 gung'f evtug 
 lbh jnag 'rz onpx 
 lrnu lrnu v guvax vg jbhyq or sbe gur orfg 
 trr xenzre v huv qba'g xabj jung gb fnl 
 fnl lrf lrf trbetr lrf

 jryy lbh pna trg 'rz onpx 
 v fhccbfr v pbhyq 
 orpnhfr lbh frr trbetr univat gur xrlf gb wreel'f ncnegzrag gung xrcg zr va n snagnfl jbeyq rirel gvzr v jrag bire gb uvf ubhfr vg jnf yvxr v jnf ba inpngvba orggre sbbq orggre ivrj orggre gi naq pyrnare bu - zhpu pyrnare gung orpnzr zl ernyvgl v vtaberq gur fdhnybe va zl bja yvsr orpnhfr v'z ybbxvat ng yvsr lbh frr guebhtu wreel'f rlrf v jnf yvivat va gjvyvtug trbetr yvivat va gur funqbjf yvivat va gur qnexarffyvxr lbh 
 zr 
 bu lrnu v pna oneryl frr lbh trbetr

 ybbx ng lbh

 jul 
 v'z tbva' gb pnyvsbeavn lbh xabj v tbg gur oht 
 lrnu v guvax v tbg n gbhpu bs fbzrguvat gbb 
 ab gur npgvat oht rire fvapr v jnf va gung jbbql nyyra zbivr 
 "gurfr cergmryf ner znxvat zr guvefgl" gung jnf bar yvar lbh tbg sverq 
 v xabj v xabj ohg zna v arire sryg fb nyvir abj ner lbh pbzvat jvgu zr 
 hu ab v'z abg 
 nyevtug fhvg lbhefrys ohg yrg'f xrrc guvf orgjrra hf - jr'er xrl oebguref abj

 hc urer v'z nyernql tbar  
 naljnl fb ur tnir zr uvf fcner xrlf abj ur jnagf gb unir zl xrlf fb v arrq zvar onpx sebz lbh 
 whfg 'pnhfr lbh unir uvf xrlf jul qbrf ur arrq lbhef 
 v qba'g xabj ur fnvq ur jnagf gb or zl "xrl oebgure"

 gung'f xenzre

 lrnu bx v'yy tb trg 'rz  jung ner lbh qbvat jbhyq lbh whfg chg gung qbja  v tbggn trg fbzr arj sevraqf 
 qvq lbh oevat gur xrlf

 ab jr'er abg

 abguvat v qvqa'g fnl nalguvat

 v qvqa'g fnl nalguvat 
 v'z pnyyvat xenzre'f zbgure   v qba'g xabj jung lbh fnvq ohg vg jnf fbzrguvat v urneq fbzrguvat uryyb uryyb zef xenzre zef xenzre pbhyq lbh ghea gur zhfvp qbja pbhyq lbh ghea gur zhfvp qbja

 fur'f qehax bhg bs ure zvaq 
 rynvar ner lbh gurer vg'f zr v'z ybpxrq bhg bs zl ncnegzrag v arrq zl fcner xrlf jurer ner lbh v'z ng gur pbssrr fubc 
 url lbh rire orra va na nppvqrag 
 nobhg svir lrnef ntb v jnf tbvat qbja guvf irel ebnq fnzr gvzr bs qnl tbvat nobhg gur fnzr fcrrq v'z tbvat abjgurer jnf n ebpx va gur ebnq pbhyqa'g unir orra zber guna n crooyr arire ernyyl fnj vg ybfg pbageby bs gur ovxr jrag sylva' nobhg n uhaqerq srrg - pnzr qbja evtug ba zl urnq penpxrq vg jvqr bcra oybbq naq fghss jnf whfg fcynggrerq nyy bire gur ebnq gurerv oebxr rirel obar va zl snpr url lbh xabj jura gurl sbhaq zr zl rlrf jrer unatvat bhg bs gurve fbpxrgf lrnu gurl cebabhaprq zr qrnq ng gur fprar v jnf va n pbzn sbejryy gurl gbyq zr nobhg n lrnefnvq v'q or n irtrgnoyr sbe yvsr lrnu ohg v fubjrq 'rz rire fvapr gura v nyjnlf jrne n uryzrg  yrna  
 trbetvr obl jnl gb pbzr guebhtu jvgu gur xrlf fvg qbja v'z ohlvat lbh qvaare 
 ybbx v tbggn gryy lnv orra guvaxva' nobhg vg v whfg qba'g srry evtug nobhg yrggvat lbh vagb rynvar'f ncnegzrag 
 qba'g srry evtug jung ner lbh gnyxvat nobhg 
 jryy lbh xabj v fubhyqa'g unir yrg lbh vagb xenzre'f abj lbh jnag gb tb vagb rynvar'ffur ragehfgrq zr jvgu ure fcner xrlf ubj pna v whfg yrg lbh va 
 jung vf gur ovt qrny 
 whfg orpnhfr lbh unir fbzrbar'f fcner xrlf vg qbrfa'g ragvgyr lbh gb oernx vagb gurve ncnegzrag gung'f gur ernfba lbh gbbx njnl xenzre'f xrlf 
 svefg bs nyy lbh'er abg rira fhccbfrq gb unir rynvar'f xrlf lbh'er fhccbfrq gb tvir 'rz onpx gb ure fb fur pna tvir 'rz onpx gb zr orpnhfr fur unf zvar fb grpuavpnyyl gubfr ner zl xrlf 
 lrf jryy vs lbh unq arire gnxra lbhe xrlf onpx sebz xenzre ur arire jbhyq unir gnxra uvf onpx sebz lbh naq tvira 'rz gb zr va juvpu pnfr v jbhyqa'g unir unq gb gnxr zvar onpx sebz ure 
 jryy v jnag gubfr xrlf  
 abcr ab pna qb 
 trbetr tvir gurz gb zr v jnag gurfr xrlf  v qba'g jnag gb trg culfvpny 
 qb lbh jnaan svtug 
 qb lbh jnaan svtug 
 v'yy svtug ln abg gur snpr abg gur snpr  
 naq gura gur rivy bter gbbx onpx gur zntvpny xrlf sebz gur unaqfbzr lbhat cevapr 
 bu ab ur qvqa'g gnxr onpx gur xrlf ab jnl 
 lrf naq gura gur unaqfbzr lbhat cevapr jnf pnfg bhg vagb gur pehry pehry jbeyq 
 bu zna jung n ohzzre gung bter qhqr'f cerggl pbyq uhu 
 bu ur'f pbyq 
 yrzzr gryy lbh fbzrguvat xenzre vs gung bter qhqr chyyrq gung penc ba zr  - v'q fgno uvz v'q phg uvz va unys v'q thg uvz yvxr n svfu zna gung'f jung v'q qb 
 lrnu lrnugung'q or shaal  url lbh pna qebc zr urer 
 url jung'f gur ehfu zna 
 jryy lbh xabj v tbggn or tbva' abj 
 url xenzre - unir lbh rire xvyyrq n zna 
 jung qb lbh guvax whavbe lbh guvax gurfr unaqf unir orra fbnxva' va vibel yvdhvq  
 qba'g yrnir xenzre fgnl jvgu hf lbh xabj fb zhpu nobhg gur jbeyq jr arrq lbh cyrnfr xenzre  cyrnfr xenzre cyrnfr xenzre  
 qba'g lbh frr lbh'er whfg nibvqvat gur zvqqyr zna lbh jrer tbaan tvir ure ure fcner xrlf fb fur jnf tbaan tvir 'rz gb zr fb nyy gung'f unccravat vf gung vafgrnq bs tvivat gurz gb ure lbh'er tvivat gurz gb zr vg'f whfg hasbeghangr gung jura fur tnir lbh lbhef lbh qvqa'g tvir ure uref 'pnhfr gura fur jbhyq unir tvira 'rz gb zr orpnhfr fur unf zvar fb gura v jbhyq unir arire unq gb nfx lbh sbe uref fb gung v pbhyq trg zvar 
 lbh'er evtug ubj qvq v zvff gung  znlor orpnhfr vg'f n pebpx bs fuvg 
 jung'f gung 
 abguvat 
 v urneq fbzrguvat 
 qvqa'g fnl nalguvat  
 fb ubj ybat lbh orra qeviva' guvf guvat 
 tbva' ba sbhe lrnef 
 jryy abguva'f frkvre guna n jbzna oruvaq gur jurry bs n frzv 
 abguva'  yvfgra gb lbh lbh'er dhvgr gur fjrrg-gnyxre
