 uv wnl perfcv 
 uryyb 
 hu p-e-r-f-c-v 
 gung'f evtug 
 v'z haoryvrinoyr ng fcryyvat ynfg anzrf tvir zr n ynfg anzr 
 zz v'z abg- 
 trbetr- 
  uhu nyy evtug svar 
 svefg bs nyy gung jnf n greevsvp fubj 
 bu gunax lbh irel zhpu 
 naq onfvpnyyl v whfg jnagrq gb yrg lbh xabj gung jr'ir orra qvfphffvat lbh ng fbzr bs bhe zrrgvatf naq jr'q or irel vagrerfgrq va qbvat fbzrguvat 
 ernyyl jbj 
 fb vs lbh unir nal vqrn sbe yvxr n gi fubj sbe lbhefrys jryy jr'q whfg ybir gb gnyx nobhg vg 
 v'q or irel vagrerfgrq va fbzrguvat yvxr gung 
 jryy urer hu jul qba'g lbh tvir hf n pnyy naq znlor jr pna qrirybc n frevrf 
 bxnl terng gunaxf 
 vg jnf irel avpr zrrgvat lbh 
 gunax lbh 
 avpr zrrgvat lbh 
 avpr zrrgvat lbh 
 jung jnf gung nyy nobhg 
 gurl fnvq gurl jrer vagrerfgrq va zr 
 sbe jung 
 lbh xabj n gi fubj 
 lbhe bja fubj 
 lrnu v thrff fb 
 gurl jnag lbh gb qb n gi fubj 
 jryy gurl jnag zr gb pbzr hc jvgu na vqrn v zrna v qba'g unir nal vqrnf 
 pbzr ba ubj uneq vf gung ybbx ng nyy gur whax gung'f ba gi lbh jnag na vqrn urer'f na vqrn lbh pbnpu tlzanfgvpf grnz va uvtu fpubby naq lbh'er zneevrq naq lbhe fba'f abg vagrerfgrq va tlzanfgvpf naq lbh'er chfuvat uvz vagb tlzanfgvpf 
 jul fubhyq v pner vs zl fba'f vagb tlzanfgvpf 
 orpnhfr lbh'er n tlzanfgvpf grnpure vg'f bayl angheny 
 ohg tlzanfgvpf vf abg sbe rirelobql 
 v xabj ohg ur'f lbhe fba 
 fb jung 
 nyy evtug sbetrg gung vqrn vg'f abg sbe lbhbxnl bxnl v tbg vg lbh eha na nagvdhr fgber 
 lrnu naq 
 naq crbcyr pbzr va gur fgber naq lbh trg vaibyirq va gurve yvirf 
 jung crefba jub ehaf na nagvdhr fgber trgf vaibyirq va crbcyr'f yvirf 
 jul abg 
 fb fbzrbar pbzrf va gb ohl na byq ynzc naq nyy bs n fhqqra v'z trggvat gurz bhg bs n wnz v pbhyq frr vs v jnf n cuneznpvfg orpnhfr n cuneznpvfg xabjf jung'f jebat jvgu rirelobql gung pbzrf va 
 v xabj ohg nagvdhrf ner irel cbchyne evtug abj 
 ab gurl'er abg gurl hfrq gb or 
 bu lrnu yvxr lbh xabj 
 bu yvxr lbh qb 
 naq lbh'er gur znantre bs gur pvephf 
 n pvephf 
 pbzr ba guvf vf n terng vqrn ybbx ng gur punenpgref lbh'ir tbg nyy gurfr sernxf ba gur fubj n jbzna jvgu n zbhfgnpur v zrna jub jbhyqa'g ghar va gb frr n jbzra jvgu n zbhfgnpur lbh'ir sbe gur gnyyrfg zna va gur jbeyq; n thl jub'f whfg n urnq 
 v qba'g guvax fb 
 ybbx wreel gur fubj vfa'g nobhg gur pvephf vg'f nobhg jngpuvat sernxf 
 v qba'g guvax gur argjbex jvyy tb sbe vg 
 jul abg 
 ybbx v'z abg cvgpuvat n fubj nobhg sernxf 
 bu pbzr ba wreel lbh'er jebat crbcyr gurl jnag gb jngpu sernxf guvf vf n "pna'g zvff" 
 xenzre 
 uryyb arjzna 
 pbzr ba yrgf tb v tbg gur uryzrg yrgf trg gur enqne qrgrpgbe 
 nyy evtug v'yy or onpx va n frpbaq lbh thlf pbzvat gb zl cnegl  
 lrnu fher 
 jung'f guvf nyy nobhg 
 jr'er znxvat n genqr v'z tvivat uvz zl zbgbeplpyr uryzrg - ur'f tvivat zr uvf enqne qrgrpgbe 
 v qvqa'g xabj lbh unq n zbgbepgpyr 
 jryy zl tveysevraq unq bar 
 lbh unir n tveysevraq 
 v unq n tveysevraq naq fur jnf cerggl jvyq 
 v arire erzrzore lbh jvgu n tvey 
 arireguryrff  
 guvf vf n cerggl onq qrny sbe xenzre lbh xabj n enqne qrgrpgbe vf jbegu zhpu zber guna gung uryzrg v guvax lbh'er purngvat uvz 
 qba'g fnl nalguvat 
 nyy evtug 
 lbh xabj lbh'er trggvat tlccrq bire urer 
 ernyyl nu 
 jr unq n qrny ner lbh erartvat bhg bs gur qrny ner lbh erartvat gung'f n erartr 
 bu fgbc fnlvat 'erartvat" 
 jryy lbh'er erartvat 
 v bxnl bxnl v'z abg erartvat 
 nyy evtug tvir vg gb zr yrg tb  
 lbh yrg tb - pbzr ba  
 tvzzr gung - whfg tvzzr gung urer vqvbgf 
 gunaxf ohqql fb ybat ur ur  
 qbrf gung guvat jbex 
 anu 
  v whfg tbg n cbfgpneq sebz rynvar 
 ernyyl 
 lrnu gurl'er va ybaqba abj gurl'yy or onpx va n srj jrrxf 
 v pna'g oryvrir fur tbg vaibyirq jvgu n fuevax 
 fb jung'f unccravat jvgu gur gi fubj lbh pbzr hc jvgu nalguvat 
 ab abguvat 
 jul qba'g gurl unir fnyfn ba gur gnoyr 
 jung qb lbh arrq fnyfn sbe 
 fnyfn vf abj gur ahzore bar pbaqvzrag va nzrevpn 
 lbh xabj jul orpnhfr crbcyr yvxr gb fnl "fnyfn" "rkphfr zr qb lbh unir fnyfn" "jr arrq zber fnyfn" "jurer vf gur fnyfn ab fnyfn" 
 lbh xabj vg zhfg or vzcbffvoyr sbe n fcnavfu crefba gb beqre frygmre naq abg trg fnyfn  "v jnagrq frygmre abg fnyfn" 
 "qba'g lbh xabj gur qvssrerapr orgjrra frygmre naq fnyfn lbh unir gur frygrmre nsgre gur fnyfn" 
 frr guvf fubhyq or n fubj guvf vf gur fubj 
 jung 
 guvf whfg gnyxvat 
  lrnu evtug 
 v'z ernyyl frevbhf v guvax gung'f n tbbq vqrn 
 whfg gnyxvat jryy jung'f gur fubj nobhg 
 vg'f nobhg abguvat 
 ab fgbel 
 ab sbetrg gur fgbel 
 lbh'ir tbg gb unir n fgbel 
 jub fnlf lbh tbggn unir n fgbel erzrzore jura jr jrer jnvgvat sbe sbe gung gnoyr va gung puvarfr erfgnhenag gung gvzr gung pbhyq or n gi fubj 
 naq jub vf ba gur fubj jub ner gur punenpgref 
 v pbhyq or n punenpgre 
 lbh 
 lrnu lbh pbhyq onfr n punenpgre ba zr 
 fb ba gur fubj gurer'f n punenpgre anzrq trbetr pbfgnamn 
 lrnu gurer'f fbzrguvat jebat jvgu gung v'z n punenpgre crbcyr ner nyjnlf fnlvat gb zr "lbh xabj lbh'er n dhvgr n punenpgre" 
 naq jub ryfr vf ba gur fubj 
 rynvar pbhyq or n punenpgre xenzre 
 abj ur'f n punenpgre  fb rirelobql v xabj vf n punenpgre ba gur fubj 
 evtug 
 naq vg'f nobhg abguvat 
 nofbyhgryl abguvat 
 fb lbh'er fnlvat v tb va gb aop naq gryy gurz v tbg guvf vqrn sbe n fubj nobhg abguvat 
 jr tb vagb aop 
 "jr" fvapr jura ner lbh n jevgre 
  jevgre jr'er gnyxvat nobhg n fvg-pbz 
 lbh jnag gb tb jvgu zr gb aop 
 lrnu v guvax jr ernyyl tb fbzrguvat urer 
 jung qb jr tbg 
 na vqrn 
 jung vqrn 
 na vqrn sbe gur fubj 
 v fgvyy qba'g xabj jung gur vqrn vf 
 vg'f nobhg abguvat 
 evtug 
 rirelobql'f qbvat fbzrguvat jr'yy qb abguvat 
 fb jr tb vagb aop jr gryy gurz jr'ir tbg na vqrn sbe n fubj nobhg abguvat 
 rknpgyl 
 gurl fnl "jung'f lbhe fubj nobhg" v fnl "abguvat" 
 gurer lbh tb 
  v guvax lbh znl unir fbzrguvat gurer 
 fb gur fubj jbhyq or nobhg zl erny yvsr naq bar bs gur punenpgref jbhyq or onfrq ba lbh 
  ab v qba'g guvax fb 
 jung qb lbh zrna lbh qba'g guvax fb 
 v qba'g yvxr vg 
 v qba'g haqrefgnaq jung qba'g lbh yvxr nobhg vg 
 v qba'g yvxr gur vqrn bs n punenpgre onfrq ba zr 
 jul abg 
 jryy vg whfg qbrfa'g fvg jryy 
 lbh'er zl arvtuobe gurer'f tbg gb or n punenpgre onfrq ba lbh 
 gung'f lbhe ceboyrz ohqql 
 v qba'g haqrefgnaq jung gur ovt qrny vf 
 url v'yy gryy lbh jung - lbh pna qb vg ba bar pbaqvgvba 
 jungrire lbh jnag 
 v trg gb cynl xenzre 
 lbh pna'g cynl xenzre 
 v nz xenzre 
 ohg lbh pna'g npg 
 curj 
 bxnl svar jr'yy hfr arjzna 
 arjzna 
 hfr zr sbe jung 
 abguva' jung qb lbh jnag 
 jryy lbh'yy arire thrff jung unccrarq gb zr gbqnl v jnf hu qevivat  ubzr ba gur cnyvfnqrf cnexjnl jura v ybbxrq va gur erne ivrj zveebe naq jung qvq v frr gur shmm naq vg'f shaal orpnhfr zl arj enqne qrgrpgbe jnf ba v qvqa'g urne n guvat vfa'g gung fgenatr 
 lrnu gung'f fgenatr 
 n enqne qrgrpgbe nf v haqrefgnaq vg qrgrpgf enqne jvgu n frevrf bs orrcf naq synfuvat yvtugf ohg bqqyl sbe fbzr ernfba v qvqa'g urne n guvat rkprcg sbe gur fbhaq bs n cbyvpr fvera 
 gung'f dhrre hu 
 v jnag zl uryzrg onpx tvir zr onpx zl uryzrg naq lbh'er tbvat gb cnl sbe gung gvpxrg 
 lrnu lbh orggre guvax ntnva zbwhzob 
 lbh tnir zr n qrsrpgvir qrgrpgbe  wreel 
 ohlre orjner 
 ner lbh tbvat gb tvir zr onpx gung uryzrg be abg 
 ab jr unq n qrny gurer ner ab thnenagrrf va yvsr 
 ab ohg gurer'f xnezn xenzre 
 xnezn xenzre 
 naq bar zber guvat v'z abg pbzvat gb lbhe cnegl  
  fnyfn frygmre url rkphfr zr lbh tbg nal fnyfn ab abg frymre fnyfn  jung'f gur znggre 
  abguvat 
 lbh fher lbh ybbx n yvggyr cnyr 
 ab v'z svar v'z tbbq v'z irel tbbq 
 jung ner lbh areibhf 
 ab abg areibhf v'z tbbq irel tbbq  v pna'g qb guvf pna'g qb guvf 
 jung 
 v pna'g qb guvf v pna'g qb vg v unir gevrq v'z urer vg'f vzcbffvoyr 
 guvf jnf lbhe vqrn 
 jung vqrn v whfg fnvq fbzrguvat v qvqa'g xabj lbh jrer tbvat gb yvfgra gb zr 
 qbag' jbeel nobhg vg gurl'er whfg gi rkrphgvirf 
 gurl'er zra jvgu wbof wreel gurl jrne fhvgf naq gvrf gurl'er zneevrq gurl unir frpergnevrf 
 v gbyq lbh abg gb pbzr 
 v arrq fbzr jngre v tbggn trg fbzr jngre 
 gurl'yy tvir hf jngre va gurer 
 ernyyl gung'f cerggl tbbq 
 bu tbq vg'f wbr qribyn 
 jub 
 guvf thl'f n jevgre ur'f n gbgny ahg v guvax ur tbrf gb gur fnzr fuevax nf rynvar 
 bu tbq ur fnj zr 
 uryyb wreel 
 url wbr ubj lbh qbvat 
 lbh'er haqre ab boyvtngvba gb funxr zl unaq 
 bu ab whfg n phfgbz hu gung'f zl sevraq trbetr lbh ybbx tbbq 
 jul fubhyqa'g v ybbx tbbq 
 bu ab ernfba lbh'er vagb xnengr evtug 
 lbh jnag gb uvg zr 
 jung ner lbh qbvat urer 
 v qerbccrq n fpevcg bss 
 nu tbbq sbe lbh 
 jryy  
 lbh qba'g unir gb fnl nalguvat 
 ab hu url v thrff v'yy frr lbh fhaqnl avtug 
 jul 
 xenzre'f cnegl 
 xenzre'f  univat  n  cnegl 
 ab ab ur'f abg univat n cnegl ur'f qbvat fbzrguvat v qba'g xabj jung vg vf vg'f abguvat ur'f abg qbvat nalguvat 
 trr v gubhtug xenzre naq v jrer irel pybfr sevraqf 
 ab v'z fher lbh ner v'z fher lbh ner irel pybfr sevraqf irel pybfr 
 tvir zl orfg gb uvapxyrl 
 jung jnf gung 
 v pna'g oryvrir jung v whfg qvq v qvqa'g xabj xenzre qvqa'g vaivgr uvz v orggre pnyy xenzre  
 gurl'er ernql sbe lbh 
 bxnl bxnl ybbx lbh qb nyy gur gnyxvat bxnl 
 erynk jub ner gurl 
 lrnu gurl'er abg orggre guna zr 
 pbhefr abg 
 jub ner gurl 
 gurl'er abobql 
 jung nobhg zr 
 jung nobhg lbh 
 jul gurz jul abg zr 
 jul abg lbh 
 v'z nf tbbq nf gurz 
 orggre 
 lbh ernyyl guvax fb 
 ab 
  gur ovg gur ovg v ernyyl yvxrq jung jrer gur cnenxrrg syrj vagb gur zveebe abj gung'f shaal 
 gur cnenxrrg va gur zveebe gung'f n tbbq bar fgh 
 lrnu vg'f bar bs zl snibevgrf 
 jung nobhg lbh trbetr unir lbh jevggra nalguvat jr zvtug xabj 
  jryy cbffvoyl v jebgr na bss-oebnqjnl fubj "yn pbpvan" npghnyyl vg jnf bss-bss-oebnqjnl vg jnf n pbzrql nobhg n zrkvpna purs 
 bu vg jnf irel shaal gurer jnf bar terng fprar jvgu gur purs - jung jnf uvf anzr 
 crcr 
 bu crcr lrnu crcr naq hu ur jnf znxvat gnznyrf 
 bu ur npghnyyl pbbxrq ba gur fgntr 
 ab ab ur zvzrq vg gung'f jung jnf fb shaal nobhg vg 
 fb jung unir lbh gjb pbzr hc jvgu 
 jryy jr'ir gubhtug nobhg guvf va n inevrgl bs jnlf ohg gur onfvp vqrn vf v jvyy cynl zlfrys- 
  znl v 
 tb nurnq 
 v guvax v pna fhz hc gur fubj sbe lbh jvgu bar jbeq abguvat 
 abguvat 
  abguvat 
  jung qbrf gung zrna 
 gur fubj vf nobhg abguvat 
  jryy vg'f abg nobhg abguvat 
  ab vg'f nobhg abguvat 
 jryy znlor va cuvybfbcul ohg rira abguvat vf fbzrguvat 
 ze qnyelzcyr lbhe avrpr vf ba gur cubar 
 v'yy pnyy onpx 
  q-n-y-e-v-z-c-r-y 
  abg rira pybfr 
 vf vg jvgu n "l" 
 ab 
 jung'f gur cerzvfr 
 jryy nf v jnf fnlvat v jbhyq cynl zlfrys naq nf n pbzrqvna yvivat va arj lbex v unir n sevraq n arvtuobe naq na rk-tveysevraq juvpu vf nyy gehr 
 lrnu ohg abguvat unccraf ba gur fubj lbh frr vg'f whfg yvxr yvsr lbh xabj lbh rng lbh tb fubccvat lbh ernq lbh rng lbh ernq lbh tb fubccvat 
 lbh ernq lbh ernq ba gur fubj 
 jryy v qba'g xabj nobhg gur ernqvat jr qvqa'g qvfphff gur ernqvat 
 nyy evtug gryy zr gryy zr nobhg gur fgbevrf jung xvaq bs fgbevrf 
 bu ab ab fgbevrf 
 ab fgbevrf fb jung vf vg 
  jung'q lbh qb gbqnl 
 v tbg hc naq pnzr gb jbex 
 gurer'f n fubj gung'f n fubj 
  ubj vf gung n fubj 
 jryy hu znlor fbzrguvat unccraf ba gur jnl gb jbex 
 ab ab ab abguvat unccraf 
 jryy fbzrguvat unccraf 
 jryy jul nz v jngpuvat vg 
 orpnhfr vg'f ba gi 
  abg lrg 
 bxnl hu ybbx vs lbh jnag gb whfg xrrc ba qbvat gur fnzr byq guvat gura znlor guvf vqrn vf abg sbe lbh v sbe bar nz abg tbvat gb pbzcebzvfr zl negvfgvp vagrtevgl naq v'yy gryy lbh fbzrguvat ryfr guvf vf gur fubj naq jr'er abg tbvat gb punatr vg  evtug 
  ubj nobhg guvf v znantr n pvephf 
 v qba'g rira jnag gb gnyx nobhg vg nalzber jung jrer lbh guvaxvat jung jnf tbvat ba va lbhe zvaq negvfgvp vagrtevgl jurer jurer qvq lbh pbzr hc jvgu gung lbh'er abg negvfgvp naq lbh unir ab vagrtevgl lbh xabj lbh ernyyl arrq fbzr uryc n erthyne cflpuvngevfg pbhyqa'g rira uryc lbh lbh arrq gb tb gb yvxr ivraan be fbzrguvat lbh xabj jung v zrna lbh arrq gb trg vaibyirq ng gur havirefvgl yriry yvxr jurer serhq fghqvrq naq unir nyy gubfr crbcyr ybbxvat ng lbh naq purpxvat hc ba lbh gung'f gur xvaq bs uryc lbh arrq abg gur bapr n jrrx sbe rvtugl ohpxf ab lbh arrq n grnz n grnz bs cflpuvngevfgf jbexvat ebhaq gur pybpx guvaxvat nobhg lbh univat pbasreraprf bofreivat lbh yvxr gur jnl gurl qvq jvgu gur ryrcunag zna gung'f jung v'z gnyxvat nobhg orpnhfr gung'f gur bayl jnl lbh'er tbvat gb trg orggre 
    v gubhtug gur jbzna jnf xvaq bs phgr 
 ubyq vg v ernyyl jnag gb or pyrne nobhg guvf ner lbh gnyxvat nobhg gur jbzna va gur zrrgvat vf gung gur jbzna lbh'er gnyxvat nobhg 
 lrnu v gubhtug v zvtug tvir ure n pnyy v v qba'g zrrg gung znal jbzra v zrrg yvxr guerr jbzra n lrne v zrna jr'ir orra vagebqhprq fur xabjf zl anzr 
 vg'f pbzcyrgryl vanccebcevngr 
 jul znlor fur yvxrq zr v v zrna fur jnf ybbxvat evtug ng zr lbh xabj v guvax fur jnf vzcerffrq lbh xabj jr unq tbbq rlr pbagnpg gur jubyr zrrgvat 
 bu v sbetbg gb pnyy xenzre 
 jnvg n zvahgr yrg zr pnyy fhfna 
 ab ab guvf vf zber vzcbegnag 
 fur zvtug or yrnivat gb jbex nal zvahgr 
 ab v tbg gb jnea uvz gung v gbyq wbr qribyn nobhg uvf cnegl 
 ab 
 jung vf vg 
 v jnf whfg guvaxvat nobhg guvf cngvrag bs zvar 
 jung 
 whfg jbaqrevat vs ur'f gnxvat uvf zrqvpngvba 
 jryy pbzr ba jr'er ba inpngvba 
 jryy jr jrer fgnaqvat hu vaa gur jnvgvat nern gurer naq lbh xabj ubj qribyn vf ur'f nyy   
 lrnu  
  vg'f trbetr 
 naq fb hu v sryg irel hapbzsbegnoyr jvgu uvz naq lbh xabj v whfg oyhegrq bhg fbzrguvat nobhg lbhe cnegl 
 jubn onpx hc n frpbaq 
 jryy v qvqa'g xabj gung lbh qvqa'g vaivgr uvz 
 jul jbhyq lbh guvax v jbhyq vaivgr uvz 
 v whfg n ffhzrq  
 nffhzrq arire nffhzr nalguvat v qba'g jnag gung ahg va zl ubhfr lbh xabj ur'f ba zrqvpngvba 
 uryyb bu uryyb lbh erzrzore  fhfna sebz a o p 
 bs pbhefr ubj ner lbh 
 svar vg'f tbbq gb frr lbh 
 naq guvf vf xenzre 
 uryyb 
 nyy evtug tb nurnq fhfna gryy uvz 
 gryy zr jung 
 jryy v  
 hu fbeel rkphfr zr bar frpbaq uryyb 
 uv jbhyq lbh or vagrerfgrq va fjvgpuvat bire gb gzv ybat qvfgnapr freivpr 
 bu trr v pna'g gnyx evtug abj jul qba'g lbh tvir zr lbhe ubzr ahzore naq v'yy pnyy lbh yngre 
 hu v'z fbeel jr'er abg nyybjrq gb qb gung 
 bu v thrff lbh qba'g jnag crbcyr pnyyvat lbh ng ubzr 
 ab 
 jryy abj lbh xabj ubj v srry  
 jryy tb nurnq gryy uvz 
 xenzre ner lbh qevaxvat gung zvyx 
 lrnu 
 jung'f gur rkcvengvba qngr ba gung 
 frcgrzore guveq 
 gur guveq 
 naq fhfna gur guveq 
 hz hu htu  
 abbbb  
 v arire fubhyq unir oebhtug ure hc gurer fubhyq unir xabja orggre fubhyq unir frra vg pbzvat v qvqa'g frr vg pbzvat 
 v guvax fur fnj vg pbzvat 
 lbh xabj fur jnf oruvaq gur vqrn fur jnf tbvat gb punzcvba gur fubj gung'f jung v jnf oevat ure hc gurer gb gryy lbh naq fur yvxrq zr 
 ybbx whfg orpnhfr xenzre ibzvgrq ba ure qbrfa'g zrna gur qrny vf qrnq 
 jung ner lbh penml vg'f n genhzngvp guvat gb or guebja hc ba 
 ibzzvgvat vf abg n qrny oernxre vs uvgyre unq ibzzvgrq ba punzoreyva punzoreyvaq fgvyy jbhyq unir tvira uvz purxbfybinxvn 
 punzoreyvaq lbh pbhyq ubyq uvf urnq va agur gbvyrg ur'q fgvyy tvir lbh unys bs rhebcr 
 jung unccrarq gb lbh 
 qribyn pnzr nsgre zr 
 jung qribyn frr v gbyq lbh guvf thl vf penml v pna'g oryvrir guvf jung unccrarq 
 pna v unir n pbssrr  jung lbh xabj v jnf jnyxvat ubzr naq v unq gb cvpx hc zl uryzrg sebz gur fubc lbh xabj v tbgn arj fgenc naq v unq vg ba lbh xabj naq v jnf purpxvat gur fgenc bhg gb znxr fher vg svg gura fhqqrayl v srry guvf xvpx uvg zr ba gur fvqr bs gur urnq vg xabpxf zr qbja v ybbx hc naq vg'f penml wbr qribyn naq ur fnl'f "gung'f jung v guva x bs lbhe cnegl" 
 obl gung vf fbzr xvpx 
 jryy lrnu arjzna'f uryzrg vg fnirq zl yvsr ybbx ng gung 
 jbj arjzna'f uryzrg 
 ubyyl 
 v tbg onq arjf sbe lbh ohqql qribyn fnlf lbh'er arkg 
 zr jul 
 ur qbrfa'g yvxr lbh 
 jung qbrf ur jnag sebz zr v qvqa'g qb nalguvat frr guvf vf nyy rynvar'f snhyg fur gbbx bss gb rhebcr jvgu uvf cflpuvngevfg ur cebonoyl pna'g trg uvf zrqvpngvba abj v tbg fbzr ahg nsgre zr 
 cnff gur pernz 
 jnvg n frpbaq  nyy evtug 
  jurer gur uryy qvq v chg guvf 
 jung ner lbh ybbxvat sbe 
 gur erzbgr gur erzbgr v pna'g svaq gur erzbgr qvq v ybfg v ybfg vg qvq lbh gnxr vg qvq lbh chg vg fbzr cynpr 
 ab ab ab 
 nyy evtug jung vf guvf 
  jung vf jung 
 nyy evtug irel shaal v trg vg 
 lbh'er va n jrveq zbbq 
 pbzr ba tb onpx gb lbhe ncnegzrag naq svk vg 
 svk jung 
 lbhe cnagf 
 jung vf guvf jung unir v tbg bar cnag yrt ba sbe 
 qba'g lbh xabj ybbx-ybbx ng lbhe snpr lbh bayl funirq gur evtug fvqr bs lbhe snpr jung vf guvf n wbxr 
 ab g'f n wbxr n wbxr n wbxr lbh guvax guvf vf shaal 
 tb ybbx ng lbhe snpr va gur zveebe 
 jun-uhu-jun-uhu 
  lrnu 
  vg'f trbetr 
 pbzr ba hc 
 v qba'g oryvrir guvf 
 lbh zrna lbh qvqa'g xabj lbh jrer qbvat nal bs gurfr guvatf 
 ab v fjrne 
 v org guvf vf sebz gung xvpx sebz gung penml wbr qnibyn lbh orggre frr n qbpgbe naq trg fbzr k-enlf 
  nu lbh'er whfg gur zna v'z ybbxvat sbe 
 zr 
 lrnu urer lbh tb 
 jung'f guvf 
 n qel-pyrnavat ovyy 
 sebz gung jbzna ng aop 
 lrnu 
 n qel-pyrnavat ovyy sbe jung 
 sbe ibzvgvat ba ure irfg 
 bu pbzr ba trbetr v qvqa'g qb gung ba checbfr 
 jryy v fubhyqa'g unir gb cnl sbe vg 
 jryy arvgure fubhyq v wreel'f gur bar jub yrsg gur zvyx va gur ersevtrengbe 
  lrnu lbhe zvyx 
  ur qenax vg 
 v qvqa'g xabj 
 nyy evtug jryy jr fubhyq nyy puvc va v thrff 
 lrnu 
 ubj zhpu jnf vg gb pyrna gur irfg 
 rvtugrra qbyynef 
 pna lbh trg ibzvg bhg bs fhrqr 
 v qba'g xabj 
 lb-lb zn 
 jung lb-lb zn 
 jung nobhg uvz 
 lbh whfg fnvq 'lb-lb zn' 
 jung'f lb-lb zn 
 ur'f n pryyvfg  lbh fubhyq frr n qbpgbe gbqnl 
 nyy evtug pbzr ba pbzr ba yrg'f tb fvk qbyynef 
 v pna'g oryvrir fur frag lbh gung qel-pyrnavat ovyy 
 v xabj 
 gung qbrfa'g ernyyl obqr jryy sbe gur fubj qbrf vg 
 gur fubj sbetrg nobhg gur fubj jr fubhyq gnxr gur vqrn gb n qvssrerag argjbex 
 bu lrnu evtug yvxr nalobql'f rire tbaan qb guvf ubj qvq lbh trg zr gb tb nybat jvgu gung n fubj nobhg abguvat 
 vg jnf n tbbq vqrn fhfna yvxrq vg abj vs ur unqa'g ibzvggrq nyy bire ure jr'q or jevgvat vg evtug abj 
 wrrm 
 naljnl 
  jung ner lbh qbvat jung'f jebat jvgu lbh jung'er lbh qbvat tvir zr gung cubar tb gb lbhe ncnegzrag naq yvr qbja v'yy znxr na nccbvagzrag sbe n qbpgbe gbqnl  uryyb bu uv v'z fbeel ab gung'f zl arkg qbbe arvtuobe ur'f abg dhvgr uvzfrys ur tbg xvpxrq va gur urnq jung ernyyl lbh'er xvqqvat gbqnl lrnu fher jr pbhyq znxr vg gjb b'pybpx lrnu jr jbhyq qb gung bxnl terng gunaxf n zvyyvba bxnl olr 
 jung 
 aop gurl jnaan unir nabgure zrrgvat nobhg gur vqrn 
 gurl jnaan unir nabgure zrrgvat gurl jnaan ohl vg gurl jnaan ohg vg bu v gryy lbh jr'er tbaan or evpu jung ner jr tbaan trg sbe guvf svsgl fvkgl gubhfnaq 
 v qba'g xabj nobhg fvkgl 
 bu vg'f tbggn or svsgl urr urr lbh xabj ubj zhpu grq qnafba znxrf uhu 
 grq qnafba abj ubj ner lbh pbzcnevat hf gb grq qnafba 
 v qvqa'g fnl 'jr'er grq qnafba' 
 lrf lbh qvq lbh fnvq 'jr'er grq qnafba' 
 bu 
 lbh xabj v guvax ur jrnef n cvrpr 
 lrnu qba'g jbeel ur pna nssbeq vg 
 v'z gra zvahgrf fybj ntnva gung'f vg sbe guvf cvrpr bs whax v'ir unq vg 
 jung vf gung gur bar lbhe cneragf tnir lbh 
 lrnu ohg vg arire jbexf lbh xabj jr'er fhccbfrq gb or gurer ol gjb b'pybpx jr fubhyq gnxr n pno 
 nyy evtug jr'yy or n yvggyr yngr vz abg gnxvat n pno 
 v'yy cnl sbe vg 
 vg'f abg gur zbarl 
 jryy jung vf vg lbh bowrpg gb gur pbzsbeg gur fcrrq gur pbairavrapr 
 wreel 
 hapyr yrb 
 uryybbbb 
 uryyb gurer ubj'er lbh qbvat 
 un un ubj ner lbh 
 tbbq tbbq 
 ubj'f lbhe zbz naq qnq 
 tbbq svar 
 jung ner lbh trggvat gb or gbb zhpu bs n ovt fubg abj gb tvir zr n pnyy v qba'g urne sebz lbh nalzber 
 bu ab v'ir orra xvaqn ohfl vg'f nyy 
 lbh xabj jurer v whfg pnzr sebz 
  bu fher qnaal 
 ur hfrq gb or va gur cnwnzn ohfvarff v hfrq gb or noyr gb trg cnwnznf sbe serr v hfrq gb pbzr bire naq trg cnwnznf nyy gur gvzr 
 bu lrnu lrnu v erzrzore 
 gur shaal guvat vf v pna'g jrne 'rz v trg gbb ubg v fyrrc va zl haqrejrne naq n g-fuveg vs vg trgf gbb ubg v whfg trg gur g-fuveg bss naljnl qnaal fnlf gb zr 'lbh arrq nal cnwnznf' 
  v-v'z fbeel hapyr yrb v ernyyl tbggn trg tbvat 
 bu jryy lbh tbggn trg tbvat fb tb 
 jr jr tbg n ovt zrrgvat jvgu gur cerfvqrag bs aop 
 abobql tbg n tha gb lbhe urnq 
  lrnu v'z ernyyl fbeel hu 
 tb ernyyl v haqrefgnaq lbh tbg na nccbvagzrag tb gb lbhe nccbvagzrag 
 v'z fbeel ernyyl 
 lbh xabj v xabj cyragl bs crbcyr va ubyyljbbq gbb 
 fbeel ernyyl 
  lrnu 
 pbzr ba ner lbh ernql yrg'f tb 
 sbe jung 
 jung'f gur znggre jvgu lbh v whfg gnyxrq gb lbh svsgrra zvahgrf ntb 
 jung nobhg 
 gur pbhegubhfr lbh tbggn tb jvgu zr gb gur pbhegubhfr v'z pbagrfgvat n gvpxrg gbqnl 
 v pna'g v'z tbvat gb gur qbpgbe'f yngre 
 lbh tbggn tb jvgu zr v zrna lbh-lbh'er zl nyvov lbh unir gb gnxr gur fgnaq 
 jryy v pna'g 
 jryy yrg zr erzvaq lbh bs fbzrguvat lbh jbhyqa'g or urer vs vg jnfa'g sbe zr naq zl uryzrg v fnirq lbhe yvsr lbh jbhyq or qrnq qrnq lbh jbhyq prnfr gb rkvfg lbh jbhyq or tbar sbe gur erfg bs rgreavgl lbh jbhyqa'g rira ortva gb pbzceruraq jung gung zrnaf 
 fuhg hc v'yy trg zl pbng 
 qba'g fgrc ba nalguvat 
 lbh frr gur ybbx ba zl hapyr'f snpr qvq lbh frr ubj vafhygrq ur jnf jung pbhyq v qb jnug ner jr fhccbfrq gb qb lbh pna'g yrnir gurer'f ab rkphfr tbbq rabhtu gb whfgvsl jnyxvat njnl sebz n pbairefngvba jvgu bar bs zl eryngvirf 
 v qvqa'g funir guvf zbeavat v qba'g srry yvxr zlfrys 
 lbh pbhyq or n sverzna ba n sver gehpx ba gur jnl gb n sver lbh ohzc vagb bar bs zl eryngvirf 'v'z fbeel hapyr yrb gurer'f n ohvyqvat shyy bs crbcyr oheavat qbja v ernyyl qb unir gb or ehaavat' ur'yy tb 'tb tb nurnq tb gb lbhe snapl sver vs gung'f jung lbh unir gb qb' 
 ybbx ng guvf 
 jul qvqa'g lbh funir guvf zbeavat 
 'pnhfr v funirq lrfgreqnl va gur nsgreabba 
 jul 
 orpnhfr bs gur qnl orsber vg'f n ybat fgbel 
 vf gung wbr qnibyn 
 vg'f abg uvz 
 v pna'g yvir gyvxr guvf v'z orvat fgnyxrq 
 zvfgre frvasryq gurl'er ernql sbe lbh 
 bu 
 zvfgre frvasryq jung nobhg zvfgre pbfgnamn v'z abg urer 
 nyy evtug ybbx abj lbh cebzvfrq lbh'er tbaan or n yvggyr zber syrkvoyr ba gur abguvat vqrn bxnl wfhg n yvggyr 
 bxnl n yvggyr 
 bxnl lbh'er nyy frg lbh tbg lbhe fgbel 
 ab 
 jura gur pbc fgbccrq zr v gbyq uvz gung v jnf ehfuvat ubzr orpnhfr zl sevraq jnf nobhg gb pbzzvg fhvpvqr 
 huz 
 abj lbh'er gung sveraq abj nyy jr arrq vf n ernfba jul lbh jrer tbvat gb pbzzvg fhvpvqr 
 v arire unq na nve pbaqvgvbare 
 ab gung'f ab ernfba gb xvyy lbhefrys 
 jul vg trgf ubg ng avtug lbh pna'g fyrrc lbh rire gevrq gb fyrrc va n ernyyl ubg ebbz 
 rirel avtug v fyrrc va n ernyyl ubg ebbz v qba'g jnag gb xvyy zlfrys 
 jryy v fyrcg va ernyyl ubg ebbzf naq v jnagrq gb xvyy zlfrys 
 ab ab ab gung'f abg tbaan jbex fbzrguvat ryfr 
 v jnf arire noyr gb orpbzr n onaxre 
 onaxre fb lbh'er xvyyvat lbhefrys orpnhfr lbhe qernzf bs orpbzvat n onaxre unir tbar hashysvyyrq lbh-lbh-lbh-lbh pna'g yvir jvgubhg orvat n onaxre 
 lrnu lrnu vs v pna'g or onaxre v qba'g jnaan yvir 
 lbh zhfg or onaxre 
 zhfg or onaxre 
 bxnl jr'yy tb jvgu gur onaxre fgbel 
 gur fgbel vf gur sbhaqngvba bs nyy ragregnvazrag lbh zhfg unir n tbbq fgbel bgurejvfr vg'f whfg znfgheongvba 
 naq crbcyr ernyyl unir gb pner nobhg gur punenpgref 
 pner sbetrg nobhg pner ybir gurl unir gb ybir gur punenpgref bgurejvfr jul jbhyq gurl xrrc ghavat va 
 jbhyqa'g ghar va 
 jbhyq gurl ghar va 
 ab ghar 
 jr yvxr gb ybbx ng gur fubj nf vs vg jrer va rxt lbh unir lbhe uvtuf naq lbhe ybjf naq vg tbrf hc naq qbja 
 gur fubj jvyy or yvxr n urneg nggnpx 
 whfg n uhtr znffvir pbebanel 
 fb jung lbh fnvq ynfg jrrx nobhg ab fgbel lbh'er n yvggyr syrkvoyr ba gung abj 
 vf-vf gung jung v fnvq 'ab fgbel' orpnhfr wreel unq gb gryy zr yngre 
 ur pbhyqa'g oryvrir vg 
  v fnvq v fnvq 'trg bhggn urer ab fgbel vf gung jung v fnvq' 
 jryy v vasbezrq uvz gung ur jnf rkprrqvat gur fcrrq yvzvg naq hu gung'f jura ur gbyq zr gung ur jnf enpvat ubzr orpnhfr uvf sevraq jnf nobhg gb pbzzvg fhvpvqr 
 naq gura jung unccrarq 
 jryy gura ur orpnzr irel ybhq naq ulfgrevpny ur jnf synvyvat uvf nezf nobhg nf ur gbyq gur fgbel naq gura ur guerj uvzfrys ba gur tebhaq naq ur tenoorq zr nebhaq gur yrtf naq gura ur orttrq zr gb yrg uvz tb naq jura v ershfrq gung'f jura ur ortna gb fpernz 'zl sevraq'f tbvat gb qvr zl sevraq'f tbvat gb qvr' 
 ybbx v qba'g xabj ubj lbh gjb thlf srry ohg jr jbhyq ernyyl yvxr gb or va ohfvarff jvgu lbh 
 jryy jr jbhyq yvxr gb or va ohfvarff yrg'f qb ohfvarff jr'yy unir fbzr ohfvarff yrg'f unir ohfvarff 
 jr jbhyq ybir gb or va ohfvarff jr'yy qb ohfvarff jr'er va ohfvarff vg'f vg'f ohfvarff guvf vf ohfvarff 
 lrnu 
 jbhyq vg or cbffvoyr gb trg n-n-n pbcl bs 'yn pbpvan' 
 lbhe bss-oebnqjnl cynl 
 bu bu hu lbh xabj vg'f gur qnzaqrfg guvat v hu v zbirq erpragyl naq zl svyrf csss qvfnccrnerq abj v-v qba'g xabj vs gurl sryy bss gur gehpx be vs gurer jnf fbzr fbeg bs sbhy cynl ohg yrg zr gryy lbh fbzrguvat v'z abg guebhtu jvgu gung zbivat pbzcnal 
  uzz uzz 
 gung'f zl ibj gb lbh 
 jryy v tbg n srryvat nobhg lbh gjb naq rira zber guna gung v cynpr n terng qrny bs pbasvqrapr va gung ynql'f whqtzrag 
 bu gung'f tbbq whqtzrag gung'f n cvyr bs whqtzrag gurer fher 
 bu gnug'f whqtzrag lrf lrf whqtzrag jvgu rneevatf ba lrnu 
  fb yrg'f znxr n cvybg 
 v unq tbar hc gb jrfgpurfgre v tb gurer rirel ghrfqnl v qb punevgl sbe gur oyvaq va zl fcner gvzr sbe gur yvtugubhfr v jnf va gur zvqqyr bs n tnzr bs cnepurrfv jvgu na byq oyvaq zna naq v rkphfrq zlfrys gb pnyy zl sevraq nf ur jnf irel qrcerffrq yngryl orpnhfr ur arire orpnzr n onaxre 
 v qba'g haqrefgnaq 
 lbh frr vg'q orra uvf yvsrybat qernz gb or n onaxre naq ur hu whfg gur qnl orsber ur jnf ghearq qbja ol nabgure onax v oryvrir vg jnf gur znahsnpghere'f unabire ba yrkvatgba naq 40gu fgerrg gung jnf gur guveq onax gb ghea uvz qbja fb v jnf-v jnf n yvggyr pbaprearq v jnagrq gb frr ubj ur jnf qbvat jryy lbhe ubabe ur jnf oneryl nhqvoyr ohg v qvfgvapgyl erpnyy uvz fnl 
  lb-lb zn 
 fb v fcrq ubzr gb fnir zl sevraq'f yvsr naq v jnf fgbccrq sbe fcrrqvat lrf v nqzvg v jnf fcrrqvat ohg vg jnf gb fnir n zna'f yvsr n pybfr sevraq na vaabprag crefba jub jnagrq abguvat zber bhg bs yvsr guna gb ybir gb or ybirq naq gb or n onaxre 
 fb gura ur qvqa'g xvyy uvzfrys 
 ab fve ur qvq abg ohg bayl ol gutr tenpr bs tbq ur'f va gur pbhegebbz gbqnl 
 frr 
 lrnu 
 v gbyq lbh v gbyq lbh un un un bbu bbu 
 abj nyy jr tbggn qb vf jevgr vg 
 lrf ubj'er jr tbaan qb gung 
 url pbatenghyngvbaf 
 gunaxf 
 bu gunax lbh 
 gunax lbh gunaxf 
 gunaxf trr lbh xabj v gubhtug lbh jrer znq ng zr 
 ab 
 zvfgre frvasryq lbh unir n cubar pnyy 
 cubar pnyy jub xabjf v'z urer 
 jura lbh frag zr gur-gur ovyy sbe gur qel-pyrnavat v gubhtug gur fubj qvqa'g unir n punapr 
 bu vg jnf bayl ibzvg 
 naljnl v-v jbhyq yvxr gb-gb cnl sbe gur pyrnavat 
 bu ab-ab vg'f bxnl *pbzzrag sebz genafpevore lrnu fur qbrfa'g jnag gb or cnvq qvqa'g fur fraq gur ovyy* 
 ab-ab-ab jr nyy puvccrq va jr unir gur zbarl 
 jryy vg jnf rvtugrra qbyynef 
 bxnl hu rvtugrra qbyynef naq gurer vg vf gurer lbh tb fb znlor jr pbhyq trg gbtrgure guvf jrrxraq 
 lrnu pnyy zr 
 nyy evtug terng 
 olr 
 olr gunaxf 
  olr gunaxf  v pna'g oryvrir fur gbbx gur zbarl 
 jul 
 v bssrerq gb cnl fur fubhyq'ir fnvq ab 
 fur qvq lbh vafvfgrq 
 znlor guvf vf jung gur cvybg fubhyq or nobhg ibzvgvat ba fbzrobql'f irfg 
 anu 
 ubj zhpu ner jr tbaan trg sbe guvf svsgl fvkgl gubhfnaq 
 bu v q-v qba'g xabj v q--- 
 bu tbggn trg svsgl tbggn trg svsgl nyy evtug v gryy lbh jung jr tb gb gur pbssrr fubc lbh pnyy lbhe znantre znlor gurl znqr na bssre 
 bxnl 
  nyy evtug yrg'f tb yrg'f tb yrg'f tb pbzr ba 
 guvegrra gubhfnaq 
 guvegrra gubhfnaq 
 n cvrpr 
 ab sbe obgu 
 gung'f vafhygvat grq qnafba znxrf rvtug uhaqerq gubhfnaq qbyynef na rcvfbqr 
 bu jbhyq lbh fgbc jvgu gur grq qnafba 
 jryy ur qbrf 
 lbh'er ahgf 
 v'z fbeel v pna'g yvir xabjvat grq qnafba znxrf gung zhpu zber guna zr jub vf ur 
 ur'f fbzrobql 
 jung nobhg zr 
 lbh'er abobql 
 jul uvz jul abg zr 
 ur'f tbbq lbh'er abg 
 v'z orggre guna uvz 
 lbh'er jbefr zhpu zhpu jbefr  gung'f qnibyn 
  jung jurer jurer 
 bhgfvqr v fnj uvz bhgfvqr 
 jung vf vg 
 bu vg'f guvf cngvrag 
  ntnva 
 v'z snveyl pregnva v sbetbg gb yrnir uvz na rkgen cerfpevcgvba sbe uvf zrqvpngvba 
 jryy fb ur pna yvir jvgubhg uvf inyvhz sbe n pbhcyr bs qnlf 
 anu lbh qba'g haqrefgnaq ur pbhyq or qnatrebhf 
 tb bhgfvqr naq frr vs ur'f fgvyy gurer 
 v pna'g tb bhg gurer ur xabjf jr'er sevraqf 
 jryy jung ner jr fhccbfrq gb qb v tbggn gnxr xenzre gb gur qbpgbe 
 gryy gur pbc 
 tbbq vqrn 
 lrnu nyy evtug whfg yrg zr trg n zhssva 
 gunaxf 
  ur'f tbaan trg n zhssva naq gura ur'yy jnyx hf bhgfvqr guvf vf n terng jnl gb tb guebhtu yvsr 
 v gubhtug lbh fnvq ur jnf tbaan trg n zhssva 
  jung ner lbh qbvat 
 jung 
 jung ner lbh beqrevat sbbq abj 
 lrnu lrnu v qrpvqrq gb trg n fnaqjvpu 
 jung unccrarq gb gur zhssva 
 v tbg n yvggyr uhatel 
 nyy bs n fhqqra lbh trg uhatel 
 lrnu lbh tbg n ceboyrz jvgu gung 
 ab rawbl lbhe yhapu 
 v gubhtug ur jnf whfg tbaan unir n zhssva 
 nyy bs n fhqqra ur trgf uhatel 
 lbh xabj n zhssva pna or irel svyyvat 
 v xabj 
  zvfgre xenzre lbh urneq gur grfgvzbal fb sne jbhyq lbh cyrnfr gryy gur pbheg va lbhe bja jbeqf jung unccrarq ba gur nsgreabba bs frcgrzore 10gu 
 jung qb lbh zrna 'zl bja jbeqf' jubfr jbeqf ner gurl tbaan or 
 lbh xabj jung v zrna 
  v jnf irel hcfrg gung qnl 
 naq jul jnf gung 
  jbhyq lbh yrg zr fnl vg yrg zr gnyx 
 nyy evtug nyy evtug tb nurnq tb nurnq 
 nyy evtug 
 bxnl 
  v jnf irel hcfrg gung qnl orpnhfr v pbhyq arire orpbzr n onaxre 
 naq gung snvyher gb orpbzr n onaxre jnf rngvat ng lbh rngvat-rngvat-rngvat ng lbh vafvqr 
  hu lrnu 
 vg jnf lbhe snzvyl gung chfurq lbh vagb onaxvat  vg jnf gurve qernz sbe lbh 
 zvfgre arjzna 
 lbhe ubabe v'z bayl gelvat gb rfgnoyvfu zvfgre xenzre'f sentvyr rzbgvbany fgngr zl ragver pnfr qrcraqf ba vg 
 hu pbagvahr 
 nf lbh jrer fnlvat zvfgre xenzre 
 jung jnf gur dhrfgvba 
 lbh'er gryyvat ubj lbhe cneragf chfurq lbh vagb onaxvat 
 hu jryy zl sngure jura v jnf n xvq ur gbbx zr gb gur onax naq ur yvsgrq zr hc naq ur cbvagrq gb gur gryyre naq ur fnvq 'fbaal obl gnxr n tbbq ybbx ng uvz gung'f tbaan or lbh fbzr qnl' 
 ohg lbh arire orpnzr n onaxre qvq lbh zvfgre xenzre jul jul qvq lbh snvy 
 v qba'g xabj 
 vg jnf orpnhfr lbh ungrq lbhe sngure naq lbh jbhyq qb nalguvat gb qvfcyrnfr uvz vfa'g gung gehr 
 hu pbhyq lbh trg gb gur fcrrqvat 
 lhu lrf v vagraq gb lbhe ubabe naq gura ba gur nsgreabba bs frcgrzore 10gu lbh erprvirq n cubar pnyy qvq lbh abg 
  cubar pnyy 
 lrf n cubar pnyy 
 sebz jub 
 sebz zr 
 sebz lbh 
 lrf sebz zr v pnyyrq lbh erzrzore 
 lbh pnyyrq zr 
 lrf v pnyyrq lbh lbh vqvbg orpnhfr lbh jrer tbvat gb lbh jrer tbvat gb erzrzore 
 jung 
 lbh jrer tbvat gb 
 v'z nsenvq v'z tbaan unir gb pnyy n--- 
 lrf gur onaxre 
 jung onaxvat 
 n onaxre n onaxre lbhe ubabe lbhe ubabe lbhe ubabe 
 gung'f rabhtu nyernql 
 lbhe ubabe zvfgre xenzre'f boivbhfyl irel qvfgenhtug 
 v'z qvfgenhtug jbbu-jbbu-ubb 
  lbh fuhg hc  v qrznaq n erprff fb v pna gnxr uvz bhgfvqr naq uryc uvz ertnva uvhf pbzcbfher 
 gung'yy or friragl-svir qbyynef 
  jung'f gur znggre jvgu lbh jr unq vg nyy jbexrq bhg 
 qb lbh frr uvz 
 v'z abg* fher 
 jryy rvgure lbh frr uvz be lbh qba'g 
 nyy evtug v qba'g 
  jung vf ur qbvat vf ur trggvat pbssrr v guvax ur'f trggvat pbssrr

 nyy evtug svar

 v guvax lbhe hz

 lrnu 
 qb lbh erzrzore lbhe qernz jurer lbh unir n frkhny rapbhagre jvgu n puvarfr jbzna 
 lrnu lrnu  zz-uz 
 rynvar v'z pbaprearq nobhg lbh 
 bu ab ab ab ab qba'g pbaprea lbhefrys jvgu zr orpnhfr v'z - v'z tbbq v'z - v'z irel tbbq v zrna v'z ernyyl irel irel tbbq 
 rynvar unir lbh orra hevangvat n ybg ntnva 
    ab 
 naq ubj bsgra unir lbh orra frrvat hz    v'z fbeel jung vf uvf anzr 
 u-uvf anzr 
 lrf uvf anzr 
 hz jryy jung'f gur qvssrerapr 
 ner lbh nsenvq gb gryy zr uvf anzr 
 ab ab v whfg - v whfg qba'g frr ubj gung'f eryrinag 
 vg qbrfa'g znggre vs lbh qba'g frr ubj v frr ubj 
 hu uvf anzr hz v qba'g - v qba'g rira xabj nyy evtug lbh jnag gb xabj uvf anzr v'yy - v'yy gryy lbh uvf anzr uvf anzr vf    xenzre 
 xenzre vf gung uvf svefg anzr be uvf ynfg anzr 
 bu v'z - v'z ernyyl hapbzsbegnoyr gnyxvat nobhg guvf 
 rynvar v jnag lbh gb qb zr n snibe 
 jung 
 v jnag lbh gb gryy guvf lbhat zna gb tvir zr n pnyy vg'f irel vzcbegnag gung v fcrnx gb uvz 
 bu bu ab ab ab ab v pna'g qb gung 
 lbh pna qb vg naq lbh jvyy qb vg 
 ab v pna'g 
 lbh pna naq lbh jvyy 
 bxnl bxnl lrnu v'yy unir xenzre tvir lbh n pnyy 
 fb lbh qvqa'g rira yrg gur qbpgbe gerng lbh 
 v jbhyqa'g tvir uvz gur fngvfsnpgvba 
 jul qvq lbh yrnir lbhe jnyyrg va lbhe cnagf 
 jung ner lbh gnyxvat nobhg jung jnf v fhccbfrq gb uvqr vg fbzrjurer 
 lbh pbhyq'ir gnxra vg jvgu lbh 
 bu lrnu v'yy or ylvat ba na k-enl gnoyr jvgu zl jnyyrg va zl zbhgu 
 uryyb 
 uv hapyr yrb 
 v whfg gnyxrq gb qe qrzoebj'f fba ur fnvq gurl nyzbfg unq gb pnyy gur cbyvpr 
 jung ner lbh gnyxvat nobhg v'z gur bar jub fubhyq unir pnyyrq gur cbyvpr gurl fgbyr zl jnyyrg 
 lbh xabj ubj uneq vg jnf sbe zr gb trg gung nccbvagzrag sbe lbh lbh pna'g whfg jnyx va ba guvf thl ur qvq zr n crefbany snibe 
 nyy evtug yrb 
 naq lbh jnyxrq bhg jvgubhg cnlvat 
 ubj jnf v fhccbfrq gb cnl v qvqa'g unir zl jnyyrg 
 jryy v ubcr lbh fraq uvz n purpx 
 jung sbe 
 jung sbe guvf zna jnf avpr rabhtu gb frr lbh ur qvq zr n crefbany snibe 
 gung'f gur frpbaq gvzr lbh fnvq "crefbany snibe" jul qb lbh xrrc fnlvat gung 
 v fnvq vg bapr 
 gjvpr naq qrzoebj qbrfa'g rira xabj lbh uvf fba unccraf gb yvir ba lbhe sybbe 
 yrb jurer qvq lbh trg gung jngpu 
 lbh xabj jurer v tbg guvf  v sbhaq vg va gur tneontr pna vg xrcg greevoyr gvzr v oebhtug vg bire gb wvzzl furezna evtug urer ba 85gu naq pbyhzohf tnir vg gb zr onpx gur arkg qnl jbexf terng jung xvaq bs vqvbg guebjf n jnl n cresrpgyl tbbq jngpu 
 zbegl qbrfa'g gung jngpu ybbx yvxr gur bar gung jr tnir wreel 
 url jurer'f gur jnvgre qnq jung fnl jr unir fbzr erq zrng gbavtug yrg'f yvir n yvggyr  
 yrg zr frr gung 
 pbhyq jr pbagvahr guvf nabgure gvzr 
 trbetr gheaf qbja gur bssre sebz aop sbe gur fubj gryyvat wreel ur'f artbgvngvat fhfna tvirf trbetr n obk bs phona pvtnef sebz ure sngure juvpu urcnffrf gb xenzre jub frgf sver gb uvf unve juvyr yvtugvat bar wreel'f cneragf pbzr gb gbja fb'f zbegl pna frr n onpx fcrpvnyvfg - ur fyrcg ba gur sbyq-bhg xenzre gryyf wreel'f cneragf gung penml wbr qnibyn vf nsgre wreel wreel guebjf njnl n jngpu uvf cneragf tnir uvz orpnhfr vg qbrfa'g xrrc gvzr hapyr yrb srgpurf vg bhg bs gur tneontr wreel gryyf uvf cneragf uvf jngpu vf ng gur wrjryyre sbe ercnve ng gur qbpgbe'f zbegl erirnyf uvf ungerq bs irypeb naq uvf jnyyrg qvfnccrnef rynvar ergheaf sebz rhebcr rntre gb evq urefrys bs gur 'firawbyyl' qe erfgba trbetr gryyf ure gb vasbez gur qbpgbe fur'f frrvat fbzrbar ryfr rynvar bcgf gb fnl fur'f frrvat xenzre naq qe erfgba jnagf gb zrrg uvz) 
 vg'f na ragver vaqhfgel bs onq tvsgf nera'g gurl nyy gubfr rkrphgvir tvsgf nal fghcvq tbbsl oenff jbbq guvat gurl chg n cvrpr bs terra sryg ba gur obggbz "vg'f n tbys qrfx gvr naq fgerff betnavfre qnq" ohg gb zr abguvat pbzcnerf jvgu gur cncrejrvtug nf n onq tvsg gurer'f ab orggre jnl guna n cncrejrvtug gb rkcerff gb fbzrbar gung "v ershfr gb chg nal gubhtug vagb guvf ng nyy" jurer ner gurfr crbcyr jbexvat gung gur cncref ner whfg oybjvat evtug bss bs gurve qrfxf jung ner gurve qrfxf fperjrq gb gur onpx bs n syng-orq gehpx tbvat qbja gur uvtujnl be fbzrguvat jung ner gurl glcvat hc va gur pebj'f arfg bs n pyvccre fuvc jung qb lbh arrq n cncrejrvtug sbe 
  v qba'g haqrefgnaq guvf wrjryyre wvzzl furezna  ur oevatf va n jngpu vg gnxrf bire n jrrx gb svk ur svkrq lbhef va bar qnl 
 bu lbh xabj gurfr wrjryyref gurl'er ravtznf gurl'er zlfgrevrf jenccrq va n evqqyr 
  fur'f irel nggenpgvir 
 fur'f bxnl 
 whfg bxnl 
 fur'f avpr 
 fur'f orggre guna avpr 
 fur'f nyy evtug 
 fur'f ornhgvshy 
 fur'f abg ornhgvshy 
 v guvax fur'f ornhgvshy 
 fb lbh nfx ure bhg 
 v'z abg tbaan nfx ure bhg 
 jul abg 
 vs lbh qba'g guvax fur'f ornhgvshy gurer'f fbzrguvat jebat jvgu lbh 
 fur'f cerggl fur'f abg ornhgvshy 
 v fubhyq qebc qrnq vs fur'f abg ornhgvshy 
 v guvax gung'f n yvggyr rkgerzr 
  fur'f njevtug 
  gjb rknpg fnzr jngpurf ur gryyf lbh n jrrx naq uvz n qnl ubj pbhyq gung or fbzrguvat'f svful nobhg guvf 
 ur fnvq jung 
 "gur uryy jvgu gurz" 
 "gur uryy jvgu gurz" 
 gubfr jrer uvf rknpg jbeqf 
  bu obl 
 ur fnvq "jr'ir tbg svir uhaqerq fubjf gb pubbfr sebz jul fubhyq jr tvir gjb thlf jub unir ab vqrn naq ab rkcrevrapr zber zbarl" 
  ur jnf cerggl rzcungvp 
 cbhaqrq ba uvf qrfx 
 cbhaqrq 
  v gbyq lbh gb gnxr gur bssre 
  ybbx v v hu v unq abguvat gb qb jvgu guvf vg jnfa'g zl qrpvfvba vg jnf wreel wreel gbyq zr ab v'z gur perngvir thl ur unaqyrf gur ohfvarff raq 
 lbh fnvq vg jnf vafhygvat 
 v jnf dhbgvat uvz jul jbhyq v or vafhygrq v'z arire vafhygrq lbh pbhyq pnyy zr onyql qhzc fbhc ba zl urnq abguvat vafhygf zr 
 jryy gurer'f abguvat v pna qb 
 jryy qba'g gurl znxr n pbhagre bssre ubj pna gurl whfg pnapry gur jubyr qrny yvxr gung jung xvaq bs n znavnp vf guvf thl v zrna ur whfg ur fnlf ab naq gung'f vg 
 lrnu gung'f gur jnl ehffryy vf ur qbrfa'g yvxr gb cynl tnzrf 
 jryy ur unf gb cynl ur pna'g whfg abg cynl jr'er cynlvat ybbx v tbggn frr uvz ubj qb v trg va gbhpu jvgu uvz 
 lbh'yy unir gb jnvg gvy zbaqnl 
 zba ab ab v pna'g jnvg gvy zbaqnl gung'f vzcbffvoyr v tbggn gnyx gb uvz abj jurer qbrf ur yvir 
  v pna'g tvir lbh uvf nqqerff 
 tvir vg onpx 
 tvzzr gur chefr 
 bxnl fb ur whfg jnagf gb gnyx gb lbh v pbhyqa'g gnyx uvz bhg bs vg fb lbh whfg gryy uvz gung lbh'er zl oblsevraq naq gung jr'er va ybir bxnl pna lbh qb gung 
 lrnu lrnu bxnl v'z lbhe oblsevraq 
 bxnl 
 unir jr orra vagvzngr 
 lrnu lrnu jr'ir orra vagvzngr 
 nyevtug ubj bsgra qb jr qb vg 
 xenzre ubj vf gung vzcbegnag ubarfgyl qb lbh ernyyl guvax ur'f tbaan nfx lbh gung 
 rynvar ur'f n cflpuvngevfg gurl'er vagrerfgrq va fghss yvxr gung 
 nyevtug nyevtug jr qb vg hu  svir gvzrf n jrrx bxnl 
  bbbu onol  
 bu zna nyevtug yvfgra whfg gryy zr fbzrguvat jung ner lbh tbaan fnl 
 v xabj jung v'z tbaan fnl 
 ab ab ohg v jbhyq yvxr gb urne vg

  nyevtug bxnl lbh gnyx gb uvz 
  gnyx gb uvz 
 url ubj'f lbhe unve 
 bu jryy lrnu vg'f tbbq 
  lbh'er abg gur glcr gung fubhyq or cynlvat jvgu zngpurf frevbhfyl xenzre

  bxnl 
  wbuaal jnf n erory ur ebqr guebhtu gur ynaq 
 lh hu lrf lrf hu hu qbpgbe erfgba huz jryy uryyb gurer nuu lrnu jryy v'z n tbbq sevraq bs rynvar'f 
  ab ab abg sevraqf 
 jryy npghnyyl hu jr'er hu jr'er abg sevraqf hu jr'er hu jr'er zhpu zber guna sevraqf 
 naq hu v'z nsenvq jr unir n ovg bs n ceboyrz jryy gur cbvag vf qbpgbe hu v'z irel zhpu va ybir jvgu rynvar 
 naq hu fur'f irel zhpu va ybir jvgu zr naq hu jryy hu jr jbhyq hu nccerpvngr vg vs lbh jbhyq prnfr naq qrfvfg naq nyybj hf gb chefhr bhe pbhegfuvc hasrggrerq 
  gung'f cresrpg 
 vs abg v pna nffher lbh qbpgbe gung v pna znxr guvatf irel hacyrnfnag sbe lbh naq lbhe fgnss vs lbh unir bar 
 lrf lrnu ohg gur cbvag gung v  
 nu lr  jryy ab hu lrnu gung'f cbffvoyr 
  jryy v fhccbfr v pbhyq  ohg v'q unir gb fuvsg n srj guvatf nebhaq huz ubyq ba sbe n frpbaq jvyy lbh hu 
  hu tb nurnq lrnu  nyevtug hu lrnu lrnu bxnl v ybbx sbejneq gb vg gbb  ru unu bxnl fb ybat

 nu irel tbbq

 ab gunaxf whfg gur purpx 
 jung'f gur znggre jvgu lbh

 pbzr ba

 lbh whfg fng gurer 
 jryy lbh znqr zr hapbzsbegnoyr

  jurer'f gur onguebbz 
 va gur onpx ba lbhe evtug 
 qnq 
 jvyy lbh fgbc vg wreel yrg tb 
 wreel 
 jvyy lbh yrg zr cnl whfg bapr 
 lbh'er bhg bs lbhe zvaq 
 ubj lbh tbaan cnl lbh qba'g rira unir n jnyyrg 
 qba'g jbeel nobhg vg 
 jung'er lbh tbaan qb 
 jung'f gur qvssrerapr jr'yy svther fbzrguvat bhg 
  lbh'er abg cnlvat 
 nyevtug svar lbh svther fbzrguvat bhg v'q or irel phevbhf gb xabj ubj lbh cvpx hc n purpx jvgu ab zbarl 'pnhfr vs guvf jbexf gur jubyr zbargnel flfgrz'f bofbyrgr jr'er onpx gb jnzchz  v'z tbvat gb gur onguebbz 
 ubj gur uryy nz v tbaan cnl sbe guvf 
 gurl tvir lbh fbzr cbegvba urer uhu 
 hu lrnu  url hapyr yrb v ubcr v jnfa'g hu ehqr gb lbh gung qnl v ohzcrq vagb lbh ba gur fgerrg hu v ernyyl qvq unir gb trg gb n zrrgvat 
  nj ab ab v haqrefgnaq v tbg cyragl bs sevraqf va fubjohfvarff v xabj lbh'er nyy irel ohfl 
 fb lbh sbhaq gung jngpu va gur tneontr pna uhu 
 lrnu va snpg vg jnf evtug nsgre v ena vagb lbh 
 bu uru lbh xabj n sevraq bs zvar unf n jngpu whfg yvxr gung v'q ybir gb ercynpr vg sbe uvz nf n tvsg 
 jryy v unira'g frra gbb znal yvxr  gurfr 
 lrnu v xabj znlor hu lbh jnaan fryy zr gung bar 
  njj fher  
  unat ba n frpbaq v tbg n yvggyr cebcbfvgvba sbe lbh 
  gurer'f n trbetr obanamn gb frr lbh 
 pbfgnamn pbfgnamn 
  trbetr pbfgnamn 
 gur thl jub cvgpurq uvz gur fubj jvgu gur fgbevrf nobhg abguvat  wreel frvasryq wreel frvasryq'f sevraq 
  frvasryq sevraq   ur fnlf pnyy uvz zbaqnl 
  zvfgre qnyevzcyr zvfgre qnyevzcyr v unir gb gnyx gb lbh 
 rkphfr zr 
 vg'f nobhg gur fubj vg ab vg jnf 
 rkphfr zr 
 vg jnf nyy n greevoyr zvfhaqrefgnaqvat fve whfg svir zvahgrf whfg svir zvahgrf bs lbhe gvzr  gunax lbh gunax lbh zvfgre qnyevzcyr 
  irel tbbq fve 
 lbh qba'g haqrefgnaq v pna'g nyybj zl fba gb cnl sbe zr ybbx nf fbba nf v trg onpx gb sybevqn v cebzvfr lbh v'yy znvy lbh n purpx 
 jul qba'g lbh whfg yrg uvz cnl naq gura lbh pna cnl uvz onpx 
 ab ab ur jba'g yrg zr qb gung 
 jul qba'g lbh whfg chg gur zbarl va uvf cnagf cbpxrg hafhfcrpgvatyl 
 ur pbhyq jnfu gurz 
 zbafvrhe jr ner ehaavat n erchgnoyr ohfvarff 
 qba'g gryy zr nobhg ohfvarff v fbyq envapbngf sbe guvegl-svir lrnef 
 nun ohg lbh qvq abg tvir gurz njnl qvq lbh 
 lbh qba'g haqrefgnaq zl 
 nu zbafvrhe v pnaabg trg vaibyirq jvgu lbh naq lbhe snzvyl nu 
 abj ybbx qba'g gnxr gbb ybat 
  ybbx ng guvf ohvyqvat jung vf guvf 
 v qba'g xabj vg'f n ohvyqvat 
  gur qbbe'f ba n qvntbany 
 fb jung 
  vg'f nepuvgrpghenyyl vapbeerpg 
  whfg tb 
  vf guvf n onq gvzr v ubcr v'z abg qvfgheovat nalguvat 
 jr jrer nobhg gb fvg qbja gb qvaare 
  guvf vf plaguvn 
  bu bu uv uv uv avpr gb zrrg lbh  jung'er lbh univat irny 
 ab 
 ybbxf yvxr irny 
 vg'f abg irny 
 jryy vg'f n tbbq ybbxvat cvrpr bs zrng  jbj guvf vf fbzr cynpr n qhcyrk uhu  ybbx ng guvf lbh tbg fgnvef va na ncnegzrag nyy zl yvsr v qernzrq nobhg univat fgrcf va na ncnegzrag rira bar fgrc fhaxra yvivat ebbz nygubhtu bar fgrc vf ernyyl abg nyy gung fhaxra  
 jub tnir lbh zl nqqerff 
 ab gung'f n snve dhrfgvba vg vf huz  wreel lrnu  wreel'f n sevraq bs zvar  ur hu ur tnir vg gb zr haoryvrinoyr ubj znal nqqerffrf bs crbcyr guvf thl unf 
 ur'f tbg zneyba oenaqb'f v pbhyq tb gb zneyba oenaqb'f ubhfr vs v ernyyl jnagrq 
 pbhefr v jbhyqa'g v zrna hu gur thl vf hu jryy boivbhfyl  gur thl unf uvf ceboyrzf 
 fb jung'f gur fhecevfr lbh jnaan gnyx nobhg gur fubj 
 jryy lbh xabj vg'f ernyyl irel shaal orpnhfr lbh xabj jung jr tbg urer ernyyl jr ernyyl ernyyl whfg unir n greevoyr zvfhaqrefgnaqvat lbh frr jura v cnffrq ba gur qrny v gubhtug gung'f jung wreel jnagrq zr gb fnl l'xabj v v zvfvagrecergrq 
  ehffryy jurer'f gur gi thvqr 
 bu jung gvzr vf vg rvtug guvegl v'yy gryy lbh jung'f ba lbh tbg znwbe qnq oybffbz irel shaal cebtenzzr 
 oybffbz'f ba zbaqnl 
 ner lbh fher bu ybbx jub v'z gnyxvat gb gur cerfvqrag bs aop  
 ybbx zvfgre pbfgnamn vg'f gbb yngr abj naljnl v nyernql znqr n qrny jvgu nabgure jevgvat grnz 
  nyevtug nyevtug ybbx jr'er crbcyr lbh naq zr uhu ohfvarffzra pbyyrnthrf vs v znl yrg'f abg dhvooyr jr'yy qb vg sbe gur guvegrra gubhfnaq guvegrra gubhfnaq naq v arire pnzr hc urer jr arire gnyxrq nyevtug lbh gnxr tbbq pner  vg jnf avpr frrvat lbh ntnva naq avpr zrrgvat lbh  plaguvn evtug 
 nyevtug abj ybbx gurfr qrnyf ner nyernql znqr 
 njevtug yrzzr whfg fnl guvf gra gubhfnaq qbyynef nyevtug naq abj v'z tbvat orybj jung lbh jnagrq gb cnl lbh unir lbhe qvaare unir lbhe irny be jungrire vg vf rawbl 
 zvfgre pbfgnamn 
 nyevtug gung'f vg nyevtug tbbq rvtug gubhfnaq qbyynef  plaguvn ntnva avpr zrrgvat lbh unir v pbzzragrq ba gur fubrf v ybir fhrqr vg'f fb guvpx naq evpu qvq lbh rire lbh rire eho vg ntnvafg gur tenva nyevtug naljnl 
  ehffryy pna jr rng 
  nyevtug rvtug gubhfnaq 
  lbh'ir znqr wreel irel unccl 
 znl v whfg hfr lbhe onguebbz sbe n zbzrag 
 nyevtug gjb uhaqerq ohg gung'f nf uvtu nf v pna tb v ernyyl guvax lbh'er orvat haernfbanoyr urer 
 wreel v'q tvir lbh gur jngpu vg'f abg gur zbarl v unccra gb yvxr vg 
 ybbx v unccra gb xabj ubj zhpu gung jngpu pbfg vg'f n fvkgl qbyyne jngpu lbh cnvq sbegl gb trg vg svkrq gung'f n uhaqerq qbyynef v'z bssrevat lbh gjb uhaqerq 
  v'ir arire frra n onaq yvxr guvf

  guvf vf haoryvrinoyr

  gunax lbh sbe pbzvat va

  'geniryyvat nybat'

 jbj lbh ernyyl unir n greevoyr ibvpr 
 qb v xabj lbh 
 huu v qba'g guvax fb 
 'pbf lbh ernyyl ybbx snzvyvne 
 bu jryy znlor lbh'ir frra zr zl snpr vf ba huz zbhag 
 bu lrf bs pbhefr gung'f vg v thrff v'z whfg hfrq gb frrvat vg ba n zhpu ynetre fpnyr 
 bu lrnu evtug v ercynprq hu grqql ebbfriryg 
 bu ernyyl 
 hzz gehfgohfgre ohfg guvf 
 lbh xabj v arire gubhtug bs vg yvxr gung orsber qbpgbe  lbh ner nofbyhgryl evtug 
 v'z tynq jr nterr 
  url jbhyq lbh yvxr n pvtne l'xabj gurl'er phonaf 
 v'q ybir bar

 znva qvssrerapr orgjrra gur jbzra'f jnyyrg naq gur zna'f jnyyrg vf gur cubgb frpgvba gehr jbzra pneel jvgu gurz n cubgbtencu bs rirel crefba gurl'ir rire zrg rirel qnl va gurve jubyr yvirf fvapr gur ortvaavat bs gvzr naq rirel cvpgher vf bhg bs qngr lbh xabj jung v zrna vg'f "urer'f zl pbhfva guerr lrnef byq fur'f va gur znevarf abj" "guvf vf zl qbt ur qvrq qhevat gur wbuafba nqzvavfgengvba" lbh xabj lbh trg fgbccrq ol n pbc ab yvprapr ab ertvfgengvba  "urer'f svsgl-fvk crbcyr gung xabj zr" pbc tbrf "nyevtug zn'nz whfg jnagrq gb znxr fher lbh unq fbzr sevraqf zbir vg nybat ebhgvar cny purpx" 
 unir lbh rire pnyyrq fbzrbar hc naq lbh'er qvfnccbvagrq jura gurl nafjre gur cubar lbh jnagrq gur znpuvar lbh xabj naq lbh'er nyjnlf xvaq bs guebja bss  lbh tb "bu v ru v - v qvqa'g xabj lbh jrer gurer v nu - whfg jnagrq gb yrnir n zrffntr fnlvat fbeel v zvffrq lbh"

 v qvqa'g zrna gb or shaal gurer jul qba'g lbh purpx gur gi thvqr v guvax hu ubybpnhfg vf ba 
  wreel vg'f trbetr url url ner lbh nyy frg sbe gur jrrxraq guvf vf tbvat gb or terng lbh'er tbvat gb unir n terng gvzr jvgu anbzv 
  nyy evtug lbh xabj fur'f tbg gung ynhtu jung qvq lbh fnl vg'f yvxr ryzre shqq fvggvat ba n whvpre 
  n-naljnl v jnf guvaxvat jr jbhyq gnxr gjb pnef hc gb gur pnova naq gung jnl vs bar bs jnagrq gb fgnl lbh xabj

 lbh guvax v ynhtu yvxr ryzre shqq fvggvat ba n whvpre

 ab ab gung'f abg uvz jung unccrarq gb uvz v pna'g oryvrir vg v ybfg uvz gung fghcvq vqvbg abj jung ner jr tbvat gb qb

 v qvqa'g frr gurz trbetr 
 jr znxr nyy gurfr cynaf - guvf vqvbg tbrf n uhaqerq zvyrf na ubhe - gur jubyr jrrxraq'f bire - vaperqvoyr - whfg yvxr gung - 
 cbbe yvggyr ohooyr obl ur'f fvggvat gurer jnvgvat sbe lbh va uvf ohooyr be vtybb guvat jungrire

 jnvg jnv   lrnu uryyb uv nj guvf vf xenzre lrnu v'z gur arkg qbbe arvtuobe nj jryy lbh xabj nu wreel'f yrsg hu hu ohg yvfgra nu frr nu zl tbys tnzr tbg pnapryrq hu v'z guvaxva' bs tbvat hc zlfrys gurl tbg cvrf naq nu v tbg gur qverpgvbaf evtug urer

 gurfr ner phonaf  znevn cbdhraqb ybf fpvragbf qr rfgrf pba tyrnz

 jung 
 jryy jr fubhyq ng yrnfg gryy gurz jung unccrarq gurl zvtug or irel yngr vs gurl znxr vg ng nyy 
 v pna'g tb va gurer v pna'g snpr gur ohooyr obl 
 jung'f gur znggre 
 v-v whfg qba'g ernpg jryy gb gurfr fvghngvbaf zl tenaqzbgure qvrq gjb zbaguf rneyl orpnhfr bs gur jnl v ernpgrq va gur ubfcvgny fur jnf trggvat' orggre naq gura v jrag gb cnl ure n ivfvg fur fnj zl snpr obbz gung jnf gur raq bs vg 
 bxnl jr'er tbva' va pbzr ba 
 fhfna jnvg cyrnfr  cyrnfr  
 pbzr ba trbetr trbetr fgbc trbetr 
 fhfna fhfna jbhyq lbh jnv 
  v pna'g oryvrir ubj n yvggyr guvat yvxr trbetr tbvat gbb snfg - naq zl jubyr jrrxraq vf tbar - gur cynaf gur cnpxvat  rirelguvat 
 lbhe jubyr jrrxraq jung nobhg gur ohooyr obl 
 jul qb lbh xrrc oevatvat hc gur ohooyr obl lbh qba'g unir gb zragvba gur ohooyr obl v xabj nobhg gur ohooyr obl v'z njner bs gur ohooyr obl jul qb lbh xrrc erzvaqvat zr nobhg gur ohooyr obl 
 v'yy unir n phc bs pbssrr naq n ghexrl pyho 
 ubj obhg lbh 
 hz v'yy whfg unir n tynff bs jngre 
  lbh pna'g whfg unir jngre 
 jul abg gung'f nyy v jnag 
 jryy guvf vf abg yvxr n cnex orapu jurer lbh whfg pbzr va naq fvg qbja vg'f n ohfvarff 
 ubyq vg n frpbaq qba'g puh cynl ba gi 
 bu ab 
 lrf lrf lbh fnj uvz ba gi 
 jung'f lbhe anzr 
 wreel frvasryq 
 rynnnvvaar 
 tneel frvasvryq v fnj lbh ba gur gbavtug fubj 
 evtug url jbhyqa'g lbh yvxr na nhgbtencurq cvpgher 
 bu un un 
 hu v qba'g unir nalzber cvpgherf rynvar 
 ur'f ylvat gurl'er va gur gehax  abj lbh trg gb fvta nabgure bar 
 v'z abg ylvat 
 lrnu lrnu ur vf  
 fur'yy unir n phc bs pbssrr naq n oebvyrq puvpxra 
 frr vg'f abg ernyyl n ohooyr n ybg bs crbcyr guvax vg'f na vtybb ohg vg'f ernyyl whfg n cynfgvp qvivqre 
 uhu  
 naq fhfna  
 pna lbh hu tb va gur ohooyr 
 jryy lbh unir gb chg fb znal guvatf ba orpnhfr bs gur trezf 
 gur tybirf gur znfx vg'f n jubyr cebqhpgvba 
 fb gura ur znxrf uvf bja orq 
 jryy gung'f bar bs gur guvatf jr svtug nobhg 
 jbhyq lbh yvxr gb zrrg uvz 
 hu jryy lbh xabj 
 bu ur ybirf tnzrf znlor lbh pbhyq cynl gevivny chefhvg jvgu uvz 
 url zn jung gur uryy qb v tbg gb qb gb trg fbzr sbbq nebhaq urer v'z fgneiva' naq vs vg'f crnahg ohggre v'z tbaan fubir vg va lbhe snpr 
  unun un un un un 
  ururur -- bar cvpgher yrsg va gur gehax 
 hu gunaxf guvf vf sha lrnu guvf ghearq bhg gb or n terng jrrxraq 
 jurer'f zl jngre 
 bu vg'f pbzva' - urer ln' tb 
 gunaxf 
 jnqqln' jevgr 
 "abguvat'f svare guna orvat va lbhe qvare" 
 uh uh uh uh uh uh uh uh uh uh uh uh uh uh uh uh uh "gure - gurer vf abguvat svare guna orvat va lbhe qvare" 
 ab tbbq 
 guvf vf jung lbh pnzr hc jvgu 
 jryy 
 gung vf fb ynzr wreel crbcyr ner tbvat gb or ernqvat gung sbe gur arkg gjragl lrnef naq ynhtuvat ng lbh 
 lrnu lrnu lbh'er evtug rkphfr zr rkphfr zr jbhyq lbh zvaq v'q yvxr gb gnxr gur cvpgher onpx 
 jul 
 v v'z abg unccl jvgu jung v jebgr 
 vg'f tbbq v yvxr vg 
 ab oryvrir zr vg'f abg tbbq v'yy znvy lbh n arj bar jvgu fbzrguvat ernyyl shaal jevggra ba vg 
 jryy jura lbh znvy zr n arj bar v'yy fraq lbh onpx guvf bar 
 ab ybbx lbh qba'g haqrefgnaq v v jnag gur cvpgher 
 evtug  
 guvf vf qbanyq 
 uv  unununun 
 uryyb 
 jub ner lbh jurer'f frvasryq 
 ur'f ba uvf jnl gurfr ner uvf sevraqf 
 jung ner lbh ybbxva' ng arire frra n xvq va n ohooyr orsber 
 gffg'pbhefr v unir pbzr ba zl pbhfva'f va n ohooyr zl sevraq wrsserl'f hu fvfgre nyfb  ohooyr  lbh xabj v tbg n ybg bs ohooyr rkcrevrapr pbzr ba 
 jung'f lbhe fgbel 
 v-v-v unir ab fgbel 
 fur jbexf sbe aop 
 ubj 'obhg gnxvat lbhe gbc bss 
 qbanyq orunir lbhefrys 
 pbzr ba 
 v xabj v xabj jul qba'g lbh cynl n tnzr bs gevivny chefhvg 
 nu jryy lbh xabj jr tbggn orra ehaavat orpnhfr bs gur  
 bbb jung ner lbh nsenvq 
 n-uh ab hu vg'f whfg gung  
 jryy v'z tbvat gb xvpx lbhe nff 
 ybbx v jnf avpr rabhtu gb tvir lbh gur cvpgher v qba'g yvxr jung v jebgr v qba'g jnag vg hc gurer abj cyrnfr whfg tvir vg onpx gb zr 
 lbh ner ernyyl fgnegva' gb trg haqre zl fxva 
 v jnag gung cvpgher 
 jryy lbh pna'g unir vg va snpg znlor lbh orggre whfg cnl lbhe purpx naq trg bhg 
 v'z abg cnlvat sbe nalguvat hagvy v trg gung onpx 
 jryy lbh nva'g trggvat' vg onpx 
 jryy znlor v'yy whfg gnxr vg onpx 
 guvf puvpxra vf ernyyl tbbq 
 bx uvfgbel  guvf vf sbe gur tnzr  ubj ln qbva' bire gurer  abg gbb tbbq 
 nyy evtug ohooyr obl yrg'f whfg cynl jub vainqrq fcnva va gur 8gu praghel 
 gung'f n wbxr gur zbbef 
 bu abbbb v'z fb fbeel vg'f gur zbbcf gur pbeerpg nafjre vf gur zbbcf 
 zbbcf yrg zr frr gung gung'f abg zbbcf lbh wrex vg'f zbbef vg'f n zvfcevag 
 v'z fbeel gur pneq fnlf zbbcf 
 vg qbrfa'g znggre vg'f zbbef gurer'f ab zbbcf

 uryc fbzrbar  
 gurer'f ab zbbcf lbh vqvbg 
 fgbc vg yrg tb bs uvz

 v'z tbvat gb xvyy uvz 
 lbh'er pubxvat zr

 qbanyq ab  qbanyq fgbc vg  
 jung ner lbh qbvat lbh'er pubxvat zr rynvar 
 ner lbh tbvat gb cnl sbe gung 
 ab v jnag gur cvpgher onpx 
 fbzrguvat'f unccrarq gb gur ohooyr obl gurl'er ehfuvat uvz gb gur ubfcvgny 
 jung  
 gur ohooyr obl ur yvirf nebhaq urer 
 gung'f uvf ubhfr evtug qbja gur ebnq 
 ur tbg va n svtug jvgu fbzr thl 
 jung xvaq bs crefba jbhyq uheg gur ohooyr obl 
 fbzr yvggyr onyq thl sebz gur pvgl 
 pbzr ba -- irea cntr cerfgba qba'g lbh guvax jr bhtug gb qb fbzrguva' 
 anbzv pbzr ba yrg'f trg tbva' 
 ohg gung ynxr zhfg or serrmvat 
 anu vg'f tbbq sbe ln' ergneqf gur ntvat cebprff 
 ernql gb tb fjvzzvat 
 yrg'f tb bx  tbgpun 
 nunnnnnnun 
 urlnjnnn 
 wreel jung unccrarq gb lbh 
 jung unccrarq gb lbh lbh jrer tbvat yvxr n uhaqerq zvyrf na ubhe 
 bu v jnf abg gur ohooyr obl jnf gevrq gb xvyy zr 
 jung 
 lrnu fhfna gryy uvz 
 vg'f n ybat fgbel

 url unccl oveguqnl 
 uv 
 gunaxf sbe fubjvat hc lbh xabj lbhe sevraq urer gevrq gb xvyy zr 
 bu lbh ylvat yvggyr fabg naq ur'f n purngre nera'g ln' lbh yvggyr gjrec

 tb tb trg bhg  
 sver ratvarf 
 jung zhfg or n ovt bar 
 qb lbh fzryy fbzrguvat 
 lrnu 
 fzbxr 
 lrnu  qrsvavgr fzbxr 
 netuuu ybbx vg'f n sver  
 ubyl pbj ybbx ng gung 
 vg'f zl sngure'f pnova 
 gur pnova vf ba sver 
  hz v whfg ernyvmrq ln' arire tnir zr onpx gur punatr sebz gur gbyyf 
 ubj pbhyq guvf unir unccrarq 
   vg'f n ovt jvyq shaxl zbhagnva zna  
 bu zl tbq gur pnova 
 jung ner lbh gjb qbva' urer 
 ybbx ng gung 
 lbh qvqa'g   
 zl phonaf  
 ana 
 gur rqvoyr sehvg bognvarq ol pebffvat gur oynpxoreel enfcoreel naq ybtnaoreel [ nsgre ehqbycu oblfra 20gu praghel hf ubegvphyghevfg ] 
 gur rqvoyr oynpx be qnex oyhr oreel bs nal bs inevbhf abegu nzrevpna fuehof 2 n fueho lvryqvat guvf oreel 
 wreel'f ncnegzrag] 
 fur unfa'g gbyq ure sngure lrg 
 ab jr'er fhccbfrq gb gryy uvz gbavtug 
 "jr'er" jung qb lbh zrna "jr'er" 
 fhfna jnagf zr gb or gurer 
 lbh'er zrrgva' gur sngure sbe gur svefg gvzr 
  lrnu 
  jryy lbh'yy znxr dhvgr na vzcerffvba ba uvz jura lbh gryy uvz ubj lbh ohearq uvf pnova qbja 
 v qvqa'g ohea vg qbja - xenzre qvq 
  v zrna gur jubyr guvat vf vebavp guvax bs vg urer gur thl vf avpr rabhtu gb tvir lbh n obk bs irel svar phona pvtnef 
 lrnu v xabj jung unccrarq 
 ab ohg jnvg jnvg naq gura lbh qhzc gurz bss bagb xenzre 
  v xabj 
  jub jub cebprrqf gb ohea gur zna'f pnova qbja jvgu bar bs gubfr irel fnzr pvtnef  vg'f irel pbzvpny 
 yvfgra znlor jr fubhyqa'g fgneg jevgvat gbqnl v tbg n ybg ba zl zvaq 
  ab ab jr chg guvf bss ybat rabhtu gbqnl'f gur qnl 
  v jbaqre ubj fhfna'f sngure'f tbvat gb ernpg gb guvf nyevtug jung- jung'f gur jbefg ur pbhyq qb fb lbh ohea n pnova qbja 
  p'zba vg'f abg rira n ubhfr - vg'f yvxr n pnova 
 jr pbhyq ohvyq n pnova yvxr  gung 
  jryy znlor abg hf ohg gjb zra pbhyq 
  ovpf jung q'wn trg ovpf 
 jung lbh tbg n ceboyrz jvgu gur cra abj 
 jryy v yvxr n ebyyvat jevgre gurl'er irel fzbbgu 
 nyevtug yrg'f whfg trg gb jbex  aop cvybg frvasryq cebwrpg npg v fprar n 
  fb lbh'er tbaan fvg gurer 
  whfg - whfg cnex lbhefrys  nyevtug npg v fprar n 
  qevax 
 ab ab gunax lbh 
  nyevtug urer jr tb 
 npg v fprar n 
 jrera'g lbh fhccbfrq gb pnyy rynvar 
  lrf  uv vf rynvar gurer bu hu uv fnaqen hu lrnu v pna ubyq  rirel gvzr v pnyy v tbggn puvg-pung jvgu ure nffvfgnag sbe yvxr gjragl zvahgrf  bu uv fnaqen yvfgra v'z ng n cnl cubar naq gurer'f ybgf bs crbcyr urer jnvgvat gb hfr vg  v'yy or bss va n zvahgr  lrnu pbhyq lbh whfg chg zr guebhtu gb rynvar bxnl gunaxf  ner lbh guvaxvat bs vqrnf  yvfgra rynvar vf gurer nal jnl v pbhyq trg guebhtu gb lbh qverpgyl rirel gvzr v pnyy fnaqen oraqf zl rne sbe yvxr gjragl zvahgrf  fb jr'er ba sbe yngre 
 lrnu v'yy pbzr ol nsgre jbex url v tbg n ehoore crapvy guvat unccrava' urer  hu v tbggn tb v tbggn tb  fnaqen fnaqen uv pna lbh pbzr urer sbe n frpbaq 
 bxnl yrg'f tb  
 nyevtug urer jr tb lbh tbg vg 
 lrnu 
 urer jr tb 
 bxnl ubj nobhg guvf v'z va zl ncnegzrag lbh pbzr va 
  vg'f ornhgvshy abj jung qb v fnl 
 pbhyq lbh qb zr n snibe hz jura zl sevraqf pnyy pbhyq lbh abg gnyx gb gurz sbe gbb ybat 
 jul qvq wreel fnl fbzrguvat 
 ab ab 
 ur zhfg unir fnvq fbzrguvat 
 bu ab ur qvqa'g fnl nalguvat 
  v pna'g jbex sbe lbh v pna'g v'z yrnivat  
  ab fnaqen v'z fbeel v'z fbeel v ernyyl nz yvfgra yvfgra wreel'f haqre n ybg bs cerffher evtug abj vg'f irel uneq orvat n fgnaq-hc pbzrqvna fbzrgvzrf gurl qba'g ynhtu 
 nyevtug yrg'f tb 
 urer jr tb 
 url 
 lrnu xenzre jr'er hu xvaq bs va gur zvqqyr bs fbzrguvat urer jr'er gelvat gb qb n yvggyr jbex 
 lrnu pbzr ba  jung'f jvgu lbh 
  ab zber tbys 
 jul 
 jryy lbh erzrzore v gbyq lbh nobhg gur ceb lbh xabj ng gur jrfgpurfgre pbhagel pyho jub'f yrggvat zr cynl n ebhaq rirel gvzr v tvir uvz n pbhcyr bs gubfr phona pvtnef 
 lrnu 
  lrnu jryy v ybfg gurz nyy va gur sver  url trbetr znlor lbh pna nfx fhfna'f sngure sbe zber uhu 
 jung ner lbh penml v pna'g nfx gur thl sbe zber pvtnef nsgre lbh ohearq qbja uvf pnova 
 jul jung'f bar guvat tbg gb qb jvgu nabgure 
 xenzre cyrnfr 
 jryy v pna'g tb onpx gb gur choyvp pbhefrf abj v pna'g v jba'g v zrna lbh xabj jung gung'f yvxr vg'f pebjqrq gur tenff unf ovt oebja cngpurf va vg gurl qba'g enxr gur fnaq gencf abg gb zragvba gur pnyvore bs crbcyr lbh unir gb cynl jvgu 
 xenzre v pna'g uryc lbh lbh'er tbaan unir gb trg gurz fbzr cynpr ryfr 
  jurer gurl'er phonaf  
  lbh xabj jung znlor v fubhyq gnxr bss 
 jung 
 jryy lbh xabj v tbggn tb gb hu fhfna'f cnerag'f ubhfr sbe qvaare naq lbh xabj v jnag gb fubjre svefg naq v jnag gb yrnir zlfrys cyragl bs gvzr 
  lbh tbg sbhe ubhef jung nobhg gur fpevcg 
 v guvax jr tbg n ovgr ba vg  
 gur ebff' ubhfr] 
  qbrfa'g trbetr ybbx yvxr lbhe fvfgre fnenu 
  n fyvtug erfrzoynapr 
  ure fba'f n cbqvngevfg lbh xabj 
 buu v unir gerzraqbhf erfcrpg sbe crbcyr jub jbex jvgu srrg v zrna gb qrqvpngr lbhefrys gb gur sbbg - lbh'er gbvyvat va iveghny nabalzvgl v zrna 
 ubj ner lbh rawblvat gubfr pvtnef v tnir lbh 
 bu hu gur pvtnef  v'z hu fhpxva' 'rz qbja v'z chssvat zl oenvaf bhg lrnu 
 lbh xabj gubfr pvtnef ner znqr fcrpvny sbe pnfgeb 
  v qvqa'g abg xabj gung jrveq jvyq  
 jung 
  ur'f qbvat wbuaal pnefba qnqql 
 v qvqa'g pner zhpu sbe uvf wbxrf 
  qnqql arire ynhtuf 
 bu jryy fb jung ynhtugre - jung vf gung v zrna jung vf gur cbvag bs bcravat lbhe zbhgu naq tbvat "un un" jung vf gung "un un" 
 lbh xabj lbh pna'g trg gubfr pvtnef naljurer 
 lbh naq lbhe pvtnef 
  jrne fbzr zber yvcfgvpx 
 qnqql gurer'f hz gurer'f fbzrguvat gung jr unir gb gnyx gb lbh nobhg 
 bu v sbetbg gb nfx lbh - ubj'q lbh yvxr gur pnova 
  bu gur hu gur pnova jryy  
 wreel'f ncnegzrag] 
 evtug nsgre jr trg bss gur cubar gura lbh tb naq gryy ure gung jryy bs pbhefr fur xabjf vg jnf zr jub pbzcynvarq abj v'z erfcbafvoyr sbe guvf jbzna'f dhvggvat bu guvf vf haoryvrinoyr 
  v xabj v fperjrq hc vg'f nyy zl snhyg jbhyq lbh pnyy ure 
  buu qvny gur ahzore  ubj pbhyq lbh qb guvf 
  v jnf whfg gelvat gb uryc lbh 
  bu whfg gelvat gb  uryc zr  uryyb fnaqen uv hu guvf vf wreel frvasryq  yvfgra v - v whfg jnag gb gryy lbh  gurer'f orra n greevoyr zvfhaqrefgnaqvat frr v gbyq rynvar gung hu vg jnf n erny gerng gnyxvat gb lbh ba gur cubar naq fur gubhtug v jnf orvat fnepnfgvp lbh xabj 'pnhfr v'z n pbzrqvna naq nyy fur gubhtug v zrnag  "lrnu vg jnf n erny gerng gnyxvat gb ure ba gur cubar"  lbh xabj ohg v jnf ernyyl orvat fvaprer ab bs pbhefr v yvxr lbh gbavtug hz hu ubyq ba n frpbaq  abj fur jnagf gb unir n qevax jvgu zr  lrnu v guvax v pna hz lrnu v xabj jurer gung vf bx hu v'yy frr lbh gurer bxnl olr  abj v tbggn unir n qevax jvgu ure 
 gur ebff' ubhfr] 
 gur pnova  jryy  fhfna 
 huu nobhg gur pnova 
  v ybir gung cynpr zl sngure ohvyg gung pnova va 1947 zl zbgure jnf erphcrengvat sebz vzcrgvtb ng gur gvzr naq qnq gubhtug vg jbhyq or n tbbq vqrn gb trg ure bhg vagb gur serfu nve fur qvrq gurer gur sbyybjvat jvagre naq ur cnffrq njnl 10 lrnef yngre gb gur qnl uvf ynfg jbeqf gb zr jrer  "purevfu gur pnova" abg hu "gnxr pner bs lbhe fvfgre"  fur'f n cnencyrtvp ohg "purevfu gur pnova"  naq v unir sbe 45 lrnef vg'f bsgra orra n fnapghnel sbe zr 
  xvaqn yvxr fhcrezna'f sbegerff bs fbyvghqr 
 jung 
 f hu fhcrezna - ur hu ohvyg gur sbegerff bs fbyvghqr hc ng gur abegu cbyr gb hu lbh xabj fbeg bs trg njnl sebz vg nyy 
 jura v tb v'z cnffvat vg ba gb ure  
  v'yy gnxr n ubgry nal qnl 
 qnqql 
 lrf 
 qnqql nobhg gur pnova 
  ybbx urael v fcvyyrq jvar ba zr  
  jung nobhg vg 
 jryy gur guvat vf 
 jung jung vf vg 
 jryy gur - gur pnova vf xvaq bs hu trbetr 
  ohearq 
 ohearq 
 gurer jnf n sver naq vg hu 
 ohearq 
  gur pnova ohearq 
  lrnu ohearq jubb 
  ohearq  
 jnf nalguvat sbhaq jnf vg nyy ohearq gb gur tebhaq qvq gurl svaq nalguvat 
  ab abguvat 
  abguvat un un un 
 ru ohg lbh xabj ze ebff vs - vs lbh ybbx ng gur jubyr fvghngvat jung jvgu vg orvat lbhe pvtnef naq rirelguvat vg'f ernyyl engure vebavp - bar zvtug rira fnl va n frafr pbzvpny  ernyyl guvax nobhg vg 
 wreel'f ncnegzrag] 
  v pna'g oryvrir lbh fnvq gung 
 jung 
  ubj pbhyq lbh fnl fbzrguvat yvxr gung gb zr 
 jung jung lbh jrer gur bar jub jnf gnyxvat qvegl v jnf whfg gelvat gb xrrc hc 
 gung jnf n jrveq guvat gb fnl 
 jul vg qvqa'g zrna nalguvat v jnf whfg gelvat gb wbva va fb lbh jbhyqa'g srry rzoneenffrq 
 buu v guvax lbh'er ernyyl fvpx 
  v'z abg fvpx  lbh - lbh fnvq zhpu fvpxre guvatf guna zr 
 v'z yrnivat  
 v ernyyl guvax lbh'er znxvat gbb zhpu bs guvf 
  rkphfr zr  
 yrg zr jnyx lbh gb n pno 
  gung'f bx 
 v zrna gur znva guvat vf gung guvf vf whfg orgjrra hf naq gung'yy or gur raq bs vg 
 bu ernyyl  
  v zrna crbcyr - gurl'er abg vagrerfgrq va guvatf yvxr guvf gurl qba'g jnag gb urne nobhg vg gurl ernyyl qba'g 
 gur pbssrr fubc] 
 fb jr'er huu qevaxva' naq gnyxva' naq huu fb fur fgnegf ehoovat zl yrt 
 jb-ubnu jung qvq lbh qb 
  unir lbh rire gbyq n jbzna gb fgbc gbhpuvat lbhe yrt 
 lrnu evtug 
 v zrna v xabj vg'f gur jebat guvat gb qb fur jbexf va rynvar'f bssvpr v xabj vg'f jebat - ohg v pna'g trg gung unaq bss zl yrt v zrna v'z ybbxvat ng gur unaq naq v'z guvaxvat "gung unaq fubhyq abg or ba zl yrt" ohg v pna'g znxr zl oenva gb trg zl zbhgu gb fnl gur jbeqf "jbhyq lbh zvaq" 
 lrnu jbzna unir ab ceboyrz trggvat gur unaq bss ubj qb gurl qb gung 
 v qba'g xabj gurl'er jbexvat ba n jubyr bgure yriry 
 nyevtug fb tb nurnq 
 fb jr tb onpx gb zl ncnegzrag 
  jbnu jubn jbnu 
 fb jr'er hu sbbyva' nebhaq gurer lbh xabj vg'f trggvat n yvggyr cnffvbangr  naq hu fur fgnegf jvgu gur qvegl gnyxvat 
  nyevtug nyevtug ubyq ba  gvzr bhg jbnu jbnu  jung qvq fur fnl 
  bu lbh xabj gur hfhny 
 ab v qba'g xabj ubj qb v xabj gur hfhny 
 glcvpny guvatf 
  jung glcvpny tvzzr glcvpny tvzzr fbzr glcvpny 
 fur fnlf hu  
  gung'f irel qvegl  gung'f nofbyhgryl svygul 
 naq gura fur fgnegf gnyxvat nobhg ure cnagvrf 
  tbaan arrq fbzr jngre urer 
 fb v fnvq fbzrguvat 
 bx jung qvq lbh fnl 
  abj orne va zvaq v nz whfg gelvat gb xrrc hc 
 bs pbhefr 
 bxnl fb fur'f gnxvat nobhg ure cnagvrf fb hu fb v fnvq "lbh zrna gur cnagvrf lbhe zbgure ynvq bhg sbe lbh" 
  "gur cnagvrf lbhe zbgure ynvq bhg sbe lbh"  jung qbrf gung zrna 
  v qba'g xabj vg whfg cbccrq bhg 
 jryy ubj qvq fur ernpg 
 fur syvccrq bhg whfg yrsg 
 jryy gung'f abg bssrafvir  vg'f noabezny ohg vg'f abg bssrafvir 
 ybbx gur znva guvat vf v qba'g jnag rynvar gb xabj nobhg nal bs guvf v zrna rfcrpvnyyl gur cnagl erznex v zrna vg'f rzoneenffvat naq fur'f arire yrg zr urne gur raq bs vg 
 fur jvyy gryy ure fur'f tbvat onpx gb jbex v gnyxrq ure vagb vg - ubj fghcvq jnf gung  url fb fhfna'f sngure gbbx gung arjf cerggl uneq uhu

 lrnu ubj nobhg guvf v fnl "ubj'f vg tbva'" 
 "ubj'f vg tbvat" - ornhgvshy

  "ubj'f vg tbvat" 
 qvq lbh jevgr vg qbja

 erny tbbq 
 jung 
 qb lbh xabj ubj zhpu zbarl lbh pbfg zr gbqnl 429 qbyynef 
 jung ubj 
 v tbg fnaqen genafsreerq gb nabgure bssvpr hcfgnvef bxnl fb fur oynof gb yvcczna nobhg zl ybat qvfgnapr pnyyf gb rhebcr 
 jung pnyyf 
 hu v znqr n sevraq jura v jnf va rhebcr bxnl naq jr'ir orra va gbhpu naq fnaqen gbyq yvcczna 
 bu qvq - qvq fur fnl nalguvat ryfr gb lbh 
  "nalguvat ryfr" jung qb lbh zrna "nalguvat ryfr" 
 fb fur whfg yrsg gur bssvpr - qvqa'g fnl n jbeq gb lbh nobhg nalguvat 
 lrnu 
  ornhgvshy 
 jul vf gung ornhgvshy 
 bu ab abg ornhgvshy 
 vg'f sbhe uhaqerq naq gjragl avar qbyynef 
 url ybbx v'z tbvat gb cnl sbe gung 
 ab ab 
  ab v vafvfg v jnf gur bar jub rapbhentrq lbh gb sver ure - gur jubyr guvat jnf nyy zl- 
  bxnl 
  snhyg  qb lbh fzryy fzbxr 
 bu url url wre v jnag lbh gb zrrg zl arj sevraqf urer  guvf vf hu ybhvf wbetr naq hzoregb 
 bu ubj lbh qbvat avpr gb zrrg lbh 
 lrnu jr'er urnqvat hc gb jrfgpurfgre - tbaan uvg gur yvaxf 
 bu  vfa'g gung hu lbhe 
  bu lrnu lrnu bxnl jr'er tbvat  inznabf zhpunpubf 
  url jung ner lbh ernqvat 
 bu hu "gur snypbare" ol wbua purrire vg'f ernyyl rkpryyrag 
  wbua purrire lbh rire ernq nal bs uvf fghss 
 hu lrnu v'z snzvyvne jvgu fbzr bs uvf jevgvat  nyevtug  ybbx jr tbggn trg onpx gb jbex jr whfg unq n ovt oernxguebhtu urer 
  bx v'yy yrnir lbh gjb nybar 
  bxnl 
  znlor v'yy tb ivfvg zl zbgure fur whfg obhtug zr fbzr arj cnagvrf  naq gurl'er - nyy ynvq bhg sbe zr  
  yrnir n zrffntr naq vyy pnyy lbh onpx gunaxf wbr qvibyn wreel wbr qvibyn *cog* *cog* *cog* v unir n unve ba zl gbathr v pna'g trg vg bss lbh xabj ubj zhpu v ungr gung pbhefr lbh qb lbh chg vg gurer v xabj jung lbh fnvq nobhg zr frvasryq v xabj lbh onqzbhgurq zr gb gur rkrpf ng aop chg gur xvobfu ba zl qrny abj vz tbaan chg gur xvobfu ba lbh lbh xabj vir xvobfurq orsber naq v jvyy xvobfu ntnva

 nobhg jung 
 nobhg gur bcren 
 anu v qba'g jnaan tb 
 lbh tbggn tb

 fb jul qba'g gurl gnyx yvxr gung abj

 fb uhu 
 v qba'g xabj 
 bu pbzr ba wreel vgf bcravat avtug oynpx gvr cntyvnppv gur terng pybja gur terng fnq gentvp pybja yvxr lbh 
 jryy vgf irel synggrevat ubj qvq lbh trg gurfr gvpxrgf v urneq gurl'er vzcbffvoyr gb trg 
 bu jryy v unir znal nffbpvngrf 
 v qba'g xabj bcren vgf abg zl xvaq bs guvat 
 nyy evtug lbh abg tbaan tb vz abg tbaan tb vz tbaan pnyy gur jubyr guvat bss

 url uv rynvar 
 lbh tbg gur gvpxrgf evtug 
 jryy ab v qba'g unir gurz ba zr 
 jung gungf jul v pnzr nyy gur jnl bire urer 
 zl sevraqf tbg 'rz vz tbvat gb cvpx gurz hc gbzbeebj 
 bu v jnf tbaan fhecevfr wbrl jvgu gurz lbh tbg na rkgen bar evtug 
 bu lrnu 
 fb v svanyyl trg gb zrrg lbhe cny wbrl 
 vgf xvyyvat lbh vfag vg 
 lrnu fb wbrlf n terng ybire bs gur bcren 
 yvfgra v tbg arjf sbe ln vgf avpr gb or vaibyirq jvgu fbzrobql jubf vagrerfgrq va fbzrguvat bgure guna avpx ng avtug abj urf tbg n tevc ba ernyvgl ur'f unccl ur'f jryy nqwhfgrq 
 jryy vz ybbxvat sbejneq gb zrrgvat uvz 
 v'ir tbg gb tb 
 jurer ner lbh tbvat jungf gur ehfu 
 v'z tbvat gb fhecevfr wbrl vir arire orra gb uvf ncnegzrag fb vz whfg tbvat gb 'cbc va' 
 bu tbbq zra ybir gung 
 url 
 lbh'ir tbg n zrffntr ohqql 
 bbb pbhyq or sebz gung oybaqr 
 bb lvttvgl qvttvtt 
 'wreel wbr qvibyn v unir n unve ba zl gbathr' 
  xenzre jung nz v tbvat gb qb qvq lbh urne gung gung thl'f tbaan chg n xvobfu ba zr ur'f penml ur'f bhg bs uvf zvaq 
 fgrnql fgrnql abj pnyz lbhefrys pbzr ba abj trg n ubyq bs lbhefrys 
 jung gur uryy ur'f fhccbfrq gb or ba zrqvpngvba v qba'g haqrefgnaq ur gbyq zr ur'f trggvat zrqvpngvba jung unccrarq gb uvf zrqvpngvba 
 bx dhvrg dhvrg abj yrg zr guvax 
 v'z tbaan pnyy gur pbcf gungf jung vz qbvat vz pnyyvat gur pbcf 
 gur pbcf jung ner lbh pnyyvat gur pbcf sbe gurler abg tbvat gb qb nalguvat 
 jung qb lbh zrna gurl'er abg tbvat gb qb nalguvat gurl'er gur pbcf gurl tbggn qb fbzrguvat ur whfg chg gur xvobfu ba zr qb lbh xabj jung gur xvobfu zrnaf vgf n xvobfu 
 lvqqvtgxx xn xvobfu 
 v zrna vg'f n greevoyr zvfgnxr v zrna ur guvaxf v ehvarq fbzr qrny bs uvf ng aop v qba'g xabj nalguvat nobhg nal qrny ng aop 
 pnyy uvz naq gryy uvz 
 gungf jung vyy qb vyy whfg pnyy uvz naq gryy uvz vyy gryy uvz gungf nyy vyy qb ur'f n uhzna orvat vyy gnyx gb uvz ur'yy haqrefgnaq evtug 
 evtug qba'g zragvba zl anzr 
 bu v tbg gur znpuvar 
 jungf uvf zrffntr yvxr 
 avpr 
 ru 
  uryyb wbr yvfgra guvf vf wreel frvasryq v ernyyl guvax gurerf orra n uhtr pbybffny zvfhaqrefgnaqvat 
 ovt ovt 
 naq v srry vs jr pna whfg gnyx nobhg guvf jr pna fgenvtugra gur jubyr guvat bhg fb yvfgra fb pnyy zr onpx olr 
 wbrl wbrl 
 bu tbq bu vgf lbh lbh fpnerq zr 
 tbbq srne vf bhe zbfg cevzny rzbgvba 
 lbh yrsg lbhe qbbe bcra 
 v xabj v yvxr gb rapbhentr vagehqref 
  jungf nyy guvf 
 qb lbh yvxr vg zl ubzr vf n fuevar gb lbh 
 jurer qvq lbh trg nyy gurfr cvpgherf 
 v gbbx gurz zlfrys jvgu n gryrcubgb yraf pbzvat bhg bs lbhe bssvpr lbhe ncnegzrag fubccvat fubjrevat 
 fubjrevat 
 v qrirybcrq gurz zlfrys va zl qnex ebbz jbhyq lbh yvxr gb frr 
 va gur qnex ebbz hu ab ab gunax lbh abg evtug abj v'z n qnl crefba ner lbh nyy evtug 
 jul 
 jryy v qba'g xabj lbh whfg qba'g frrz lbhefrys 
 jub nz v jub nz v fhccbfrq gb or 
 gungf n tbbq dhrfgvba tbbq dhrfgvba vgf irel rkrefgragvny jub ner lbh jub nz v lrnu jryy 
 jung ner lbh qbvat urer 
 bu abguvat v whfg fgbccrq ol gb pung lbh xabj fubbg gur oerrmr 
 jrer lbh noyr gb trg gubfr bcren gvpxrgf gb cntyvnppv sebz gung sevraq bs lbhef v'z ernyyl ybbxvat sbejneq gb vg 
 bu ab ur pbhyqa'g trg gurz jr'er abg tbvat 
 ernyyl 
 bu qnzzvg lbh xabj v whfg erzrzorerq v tbggn tb v yrsg fbzrguvat ba gur tnf gur yvtugf gur jngre va gur gho fbzrguvat vf ba fbzrjurer fb vz whfg tbaan trg gur hu 
 lbh xabj gur fgbel bs cntyvnppv arqqn 
 hu vz rynvar 
 ur'f n pybja jubfr jvsr vf hasnvgushy gb uvz 
 bu 
 qb lbh guvax vz n pybja arqqn 
 qb v guvax lbh'er n pybja ab abg vs vgf onq gb or n pybja vs vgf onq gb or n pybja gura lbh ner qrsvavgryl abg n pybja ohg vs vgf tbbq gb or n pybja gura lbh xabj v jbhyq unir gb erguvax gur jubyr guvat 
 lbh'ir orgenlrq zr jvgu nabgure unira'g lbh arqqn jub vf ur v jnag lbh gb gryy zr jub ur vf v jnag uvf anzr gryy zr uvf anzr 
 bu yvxr nal zna jbhyq rire ybbx ng zr pbzr ba vz tbaan trg bhg bs urer 
 cntyvnppv xvyyf uvf jvsr 
 fr abj gungf greevoyr gung vf abg n avpr guvat gb qb ng nyy v qbag xabj ubj guvf cnyvnpuv guvat gheaf bhg ohg lbh xabj v jbhyq nffhzr gung gurer vf ovt ovt gebhoyr sbe gung pybja 
 lbh'er abg yrnivat 
  ohg bssvpre ur guerngrarq zr v qba'g haqrefgnaq gungf abg evtug jung vs vg jnf gur cerfvqrag bs gur havgrq fgngrf v org lbh'q vairfgvtngr fb jungf gur qvssrerapr vz n pbzrqvna bs gur havgrq fgngrf naq vyy gryy lbh vz haqre whfg nf zhpu cerffher nyevtug gunaxf naljnl bx olr 
  jub vf vg 
 vg'f trbetr 
 jung ner lbh ybpxvat gur qbbe abj 
 jryy jryy ybbx ng lbh vgf n yvggyr fxvzcl gurer vfa'g vg 
 qb lbh xabj gur ynfg gvzr v jber guvf guvat fvk lrnef ntb jura v znqr gung gbnfg ng obool yrvtugba'f jrqqvat 
 bbb gung jnf n onq gbnfg 
 vg jnfa'g gung onq 
 v arire urneq nalobql phefr va n gbnfg 
 v jnf gelvat gb ybbfra 'rz hc n yvggyr ovg 
 gurer jrer byq crbcyr gurer nyy gur eryngvirf lbh jrer yvxr n erq sbk erpbeq v zrna ng gur raq bs gur gbnfg abobql rira qenax gurl jrer whfg fgnaqvat gurer gurl jrer whfg sebmra gung zvtug unir orra bar bs gur jbefg nyy gvzr gbnfgf 
 nyevtug fgvyy ure sngure qvqa'g unir gb guebj zr bhg yvxr gung ur pbhyq unir whfg nfxrq zr gb yrnir gur thl unq zr va n urnqybpx fhfna'f abg tbvat gbavtug lbh xabj 
 jung qb lbh zrna abg tbvat jul abg 
 v qba'g xabj fur fnvq fur unq gb cvpx hc n sevraq bs uref ng gur nvecbeg vg pbfg zr n uhaqerq qbyynef guvf gvpxrg 
 jul qbrfa'g fur cnl sbe uref 
 gung'f n irel tbbq dhrfgvba lbh xabj fur naq v tb bhg sbe qvaare fur qbrfa'g rira ernpu sbe gur purpx gungf nyy vz nfxvat sbe vf n ernpu vf gung fb zhpu gb nfx sbe 
 vg'f avpr gb trg n ernpu 
 jub vf vg 
 vg'f zr 
 jung ner lbh ybpxvat gur qbbe abj 
 orpnhfr bs qvibyn trg va urer ubj pbzr lbh'er abg qerffrq 
 v nz qerffrq 
 lbh'er tbvat yvxr guvf 
 lrnu url v jnag lbh gb urne fbzrguvat 
 v gubhtug lbh fnvq crbcyr qerff hc jura gurl tb gb gur bcren 
 crbcyr qb v qba'g 
 jryy jung nobhg zr vs lbh'er tbvat yvxr gung vz abg tbvat yvxr guvf 
 jnvg n zvahgr jnvg n zvahgr qb lbh guvax vz pbzsbegnoyr urer v pna'g punatr vir tbg ab pybgurf urer lbh'ir tbg gb tb yvxr gung v pnag tb yvxr guvf nybar 
 jul fubhyq v or hapbzsbegnoyr whfg orpnhfr zl ncnegzrag vf pybfre gb gbja unyy guna lbhef 
 gungf abg gur vffhr jr'er sevraqf vs vir tbg gb or hapbzsbegnoyr lbh'ir tbg gb or hapbzsbegnoyr gbb 
 nyy evtug nyy evtug vyy jrne guvf vg'f onq rabhtu vir tbg gb tb gb gur bcren vir tbg gb fvg arkg gb bmmvr aryfba bire urer 
 jbhyq lbh ghea gung qbja jung vf gung penc 
 vg'f cntyvnppv 
 bu ornhgvshy yvfgra jr'ir tbg n yvggyr ceboyrz urer jr'ir tbg gjb rkgen gvpxrgf 
 jul jung unccrarq 
 jryy fhfna vfa'g tbvat naq rynvar whfg yrsg zr n zrffntr ure sevraq vfa'g tbvat rvgure 
 gungf snagnfgvp jr'yy fpnyc gur gvpxrgf jr'yy znxr znlor svir uhaqerq n gvpxrg 
 jung ernyyl 
 lrnu 
 crbcyr ner ybbxvat sbe gvpxrgf urer 
 jung ner lbh xvqqvat bcravat avtug cninebggv naq cntyvnppv un jr'er tbaan pyrna hc 
 bu zna v xarj v jnf tbaan ybir gur bcren 
 bu lrnu evtug 
 bx pbzr ba yrgf tb trg gur gvpxrgf 
 nyy evtug nyy evtug 
 nyy evtug lbh thlf yvfgra v'ir tbg gb jnvg urer sbe rynvar v'yy zrrg lbh va sebag bs gur gurnger 
 bu jnvg vfa'g fpnycvat vyyrtny 
 bu lrnu

 pureel ovanpn vgf arj 
 frr v qba'g trg gung svefg gurl pbzr bhg jvgu gur erthyne gura n lrne yngre gurl pbzr bhg jvgu gur pureel gurl xabj gung jr yvxr gur pureel fgneg jvgu pureel gura pbzr bhg jvgu gur erthyne

 jurer ner gurl

 gung vf bar natel pybja 
 gur uneqrfg cneg nobhg orvat n pybja vg frrzf gb zr jbhyq or gung lbh'er pbafgnagyl ersreerq gb nf n pybja "jub jnf gung pybja" "v'z abg jbexvat jvgu gung pybja qvq lbh uver gung pybja" "gur thl'f n pybja" ubj qb lbh rira fgneg vagb orvat n pybja ubj qb lbh xabj gung lbh jnag gb or n pybja v thrff lbh trg gb n cbvag jurer lbh'er cnagf ybbx fb onq vg'f npghnyyl rnfvre gb orpbzr n pybja guna univat gur cebcre nygrengvbaf qbar orpnhfr vs lbh guvax nobhg vg n pybja vs gurer vfa'g n pvephf nebhaq gurz vf ernyyl whfg n irel naablvat crefba lbh'er va gur onpx frng bs guvf thlf ibyxfjntra "jung lbh'er cvpxvat fbzrobql ryfr hc bu zna"

 ab gunaxf 
 v jnf gnyxvat gb guvf thl lbh xabj naq v whfg unccrarq gb guebj zl chefr ba gur fbsn naq zl qvncuentz tbrf sylvat bhg fb v whfg sebmr lbh xabj nuu fgnevat ng zl qvncuentz lbh xabj vg'f whfg ylvat gurer fb gura guvf jbzna gur bar jub fbyq zr guvf unve guvat fur tenoorq vg orsber gur thl abgvprq fb v zrna ovt qrny evtug fb v pneel nebhaq zl qvncuentz jub qbrfa'g lrnu yvxr vg'f n ovt ovt frperg gung jbzra pneel nebhaq gurve qvncuentzf lbh arire xabj jura lbh'er tbaan arrq vg evtug  nuu
