 jryy v qvqa'g xabj 
 jryy vg'f abg yvxr fcbggvat n gbhcrr 
 jryy lbh guvax v fubhyq fnl fbzrguvat fubhyq v fnl fbzrguvat fubhyq v ncbybtvmr jnf v orvat nagv-ivetva 
 ab ab v zrna 
 'pnhfr v'z abg nagv-ivetva v'yy or evtug onpx  
 rynvar rynvar  lrnu 
 vg'f trbetr 
 fur'f n ivetva 
 n ivetva 
 jbj fb jung'er lbh tbaan qb 
 v qba'g xabj v'z irel nggenpgrq gb ure gung npprag vg'f fb frkl 
 v qba'g guvax v pbhyq qb vg lbh xabj gurl nyjnlf erzrzore gur svefg gvzr v qba'g jnag gb or erzrzorerq v jnaan or sbetbggra 
 lbh arrq n yvggyr cvbarre fcvevg lbh xabj lbh qba'g unir nal bs gung yrjvf naq pynex va lbh 
 lbh xabj fbzrgvzrf gubfr thlf qba'g znxr vg onpx  v'z ernyyl uhatel 
 lrnu zr gbb 
 jr tbggn trg fbzrguvat v qba'g jnag gb tb gb gung zrrgvat ba na rzcgl fgbznpu yrg'f trg fbzr puvarfr lbh jnaan beqre vg 
 nyy evtug ohg gura jr tbggn trg fbzr jbex qbar yrg zr whfg pnyy xenzre frr vs jnag nalguvat  url jr beqrevat puvarfr sbbq vs lbh jnag nalguvat--  yrg zr xabj jung vg vf naq v'yy beqre sbe lbh 
 v'z va yrg'f tb sbe vg 
 jung qb lbh jnag 
 v qba'g pner jungrire 
 v'yy gryy lbh jung jul qba'g jr whfg trg n pbhcyr bs qvfurf naq jr'yy whfg funer 'rz 
 bxnl jung ner lbh trggvat 
 v'z tbaan trg n pubj shat 
 jung'f n pubj shat 
 vg'f n oebnq abbqyr 
 jung qb lbh zrna n oebnq abbqyr 
 vg'f n ovt syng abbqyr 
 jryy v qba'g jnag n ovt syng abbqyr 
 jung xvaq bs abbqyr qb lbh jnag 
 jub fnlf v jnag n abbqyr 
 nyy evtug ybbx v'z trggvat gur pubj shat lbh qba'g unir gb unir nal 
 nyy evtug v'yy trg crn cbqf naq lbh pna'g unir nal bs zl crn cbqf 
 svar 
 trg rkgen zft 
 ybbx zneyn guvf jubyr frk guvat vf gbgnyyl bireengrq abj urer'f gur bar guvat lbh'ir tbggn or ernql sbe vf ubj gur zna punatrf vagb n pbzcyrgryl qvssrerag crefba svir frpbaqf nsgre vg'f bire v zrna fbzrguvat unccraf gb gurve crefbanyvgl vg'f ernyyl dhvgr nfgbhaqvat vg'f yvxr gurl pbzzvggrq n pevzr naq gurl jnag gb syrr gur fprar orsber gur cbyvpr trg gurer 
 fb gurl whfg yrnir 
 lrnu cerggl zhpu lrnu jryy gur fzneg barf fgneg jbexvat ba gurve trgnjnl fgbevrf qhevat qvaare ubj lbh xabj gurl tbggn trg hc rneyl gbzbeebj jung vf nobhg orvat hc rneyl gurl nyy ghea vagb snezref fhqqrayl 
 jbj vg zhfg or cerggl tbbq gb chg hc jvgu nyy gung 
 ru 
 nyy evtug yrg'f tb jr qba'g unir zhpu gvzr orsber gur zrrgvat 
 jurer'f gur sbbq jung unccrarq gb cvat 
 qba'g jbeel ur'yy or urer ybbx jr bayl tbg nobhg gjb ubhef jr whfg arrq gb pbzr hc jvgu bar tbbq fgbel fb jr pna trg guebhtu guvf zrrgvat  gurer'f lbhe sbbq 
 url jung nobhg guvf v'z va n pne nppvqrag gur zbgbevfg vf havafherq lbh jvgu zr 
 lrnu 
 zl pne'f gbgnyrq vg'f nyy uvf snhyg naq abj ur unf nofbyhgryl ab zbarl gurer vf ab jnl gung ur pna cnl zr fb gur whqtr qrperrf gung ur orpbzrf zl ohgyre 
 lbhe ohgyre 
 evtug ur pbbxf zl sbbq ur pyrnaf zl ubhfr ur qbrf nyy zl fubccvat sbe zr naq gurer lbh tb gung'f lbhe cebtenz 
 jung nobhg zr 
 qba'g jbeel jr'yy svaq fbzrguvat sbe lbh  
  gung'f gur fghcvqrfg vqrn v rire urneq fragraprq gb or n ohgyre  cvat jung unccrarq 
 gurer jnf n ovg bs na nppvqrag 
 urnq uhegf urnq ernyyl uhegf 
 jung unccrarq 
 zneyn naq v jrag bhg sbe pbssrr naq nsgrejneqf v jnf pebffvat gur fgerrg naq ur jnf ovxvat evtug gbjneqf zr fb v tbg bhg bs gur jnl whfg va gvzr ohg gura ur ena vagb n cnexrq pne ur uvg uvf urnq naq rirelguvat jrag sylvat 
 fbzrguvat unccrarq gb gur sbbq 
 v bayl fnirq bar ont 
 fubhyq v pnyy na nzohynapr qb lbh jnaan frr n qbpgbe 
 v'yy trg fbzr vpr 
  gur crn cbqf nyy lbh fnirq jnf gur crn cbqf  
 url lbh tbg gur sbbq 
 lrnu urer 
 jung gbbx lbh fb ybat url cvat 
 xenzre  
 lrnu jurer'f lbhef 
 ur qebccrq vg 
 bu gung'f gbb onq 
 lbh fubhyq fybj qbja lbh xabj gung vg'f qnatrebhf gb tb gung snfg 
 ab ab v unir terra yvtug lbh wnljnyxrq 
  url lbh jngpuva' bcenu 
  v qvq abg wnljnyx 
  lbh'er tviva' uvz onpx gung gi 
  lrf lbh wnljnyxrq 
  ab v qba'g jnag vg onpx 
  wnljnyxre v pbhyq fync fhvg ba lbh 
  jr tbg jbex gb qb jung nobhg gur zrrgvat 
  url ybbx na ubhe jvgu cngevpx fjnlmr 
 n zbagu naq n unys jr unq jr qvq abguvat v pna'g oryvrir jr chg vg bss hagvy gbqnl naq gura jr pbhyqa'g qb nalguvat orpnhfr rynvar ehaf bhg gb ncbybtvmr gb n ivetva pebffrf ntnvafg n yvtug naq xabpxf bire n puvarfr qryvirel obl abj jr'er tbaan znxr sbbyf bs bhefryirf jr tbg abguvat lbh'er abg rira va fubj ohfvarff v tbggn erchgngvba lbh qent zr vagb gur frjre jvgu lbh v'ir orra ba gi ohqql obl lbh xabj ubj snfg jbeq fcernqf va fubj ohfvarff vg'f yvxr gung   yvxr gung bar onq vzcerffvba lbh'er bhggn gur ohfvarff 
 nyy evtug yrg'f cbfgcbar vg yrg'f trg bhg bs urer 
 jung qb lbh zrna gurl xabj jr'er urer 
 v'yy snxr na vyyarff  zl onpx zl onpx v pna'g oryvrir zl onpx 
 ab ab jbhyq lbh trg hc 
 v pna qb guvf wreel 
 ab 
 nyy evtug v'yy gryy gurz zl fvfgre qvrq  zl cbbe fvfgre qvrq fur jnf fgnaqvat naq gura fur jnf ynhtuvat naq gura gurl fubg ure gung'f gur xvaq bs fvpx pvgl gung jr'er yviva' va gurl fubbg lbh sbe ynhtuvat v zhfg tb naq pbzsbeg zl cbbe snzvyl wreel gnxr zr ubzr fb v pna pbzsbeg zl zl cbbe snzvyl 
 jung 
 gung'f qnivq yrggrezna v whfg fnj qnivq yrggrezna jnyx ol v'yy or evtug onpx  
 ze frvasryq gurl'er ernql sbe lbh  
 lrf v jnf irel jvfr gb uvgpu zl jntba gb uvf fgne  
 url wreel 
 uv ubj ner lbh qbvat avpr gb frr lbh nyy urer uryyb 
 uryyb wreel v'z evgn xrnefba 
 bu hu avpr gb zrrg lbh jurer'f ehffryy 
 ur hu unq gb tb gb yn gurer'f n ceboyrz ba gur frg bs oybffbz 
 bu cbbe oybffbz  
 naljnl ur nfxrq zr gb fvg va sbe uvz 
 jurer'f trbetr 
 bu ur ena gb fnl fbzrguvat gb qnivq yrggrezna 
 qnivq yrggrezna'f ba gur sybbe 
 lrnu ur whfg jnyxrq ol 
 jryy v guvax jr fubhyq trg fgnegrq naljnl 
 lrnu tbbq vqrn 
 fb ubj ner lbh thlf pbzva' nybat 
 tbbq tbbq jr'ir tbg n ybg bs vqrnf 
 tbbq  
 unir lbh rire orra gb n puvarfr erfgnhenag naq gurl gryy lbh vg'yy or yvxr svir zvahgrf sbe n gnoyr naq lbh jvaq hc jnvgva' gurer sbe yvxr guvegl zvahgrf jryy jr gubhtug vg jbhyq or irel shaal gb qb na ragver fubj jurer nyy lbh'er qbva' vf jnvgva' sbe gur gnoyr  orpnhfr jr'ir nyy orra va gung fvghngvba lbh xabj lbh'er jnvgvat naq lbh'er uhatel naq lbh ohzc vagb fbzrobql lbh xabj jura vf ehffryy pbzvat onpx 
 fb gung'f gur vqrn 
 jryy ab gung'f bar jr unir znal bguref jr unir na vqrn jurer hu v trg vagb na nppvqrag jvgu n thl jub unf ab vafhenapr naq gur whqtr fragraprf uvz gb or zl ohgyre  lbh xabj ur pbbxf sbe zr ur unf gb pbbx sbe zr ur pyrnaf zl ubhfr ur'f qbva' zl fubccvat lbh xabj v'z jnyxva' nebhaq jvgu bar bs gubfr ovt arpx pbyynef 
 gubfr pbyynef ner shaal 
 bapr lbh frr fbzrbar va gubfr pbyynef lbh fgneg ynhtuvat vzzrqvngryl  
 lbh gryyva' 'rz nobhg gur ohgyre fgbel vf gung ornhgvshy be jung url fbeel v'z yngr  ehffryy 
 v'z evgn xrnefba 
 bu evgn url ze fureznpx ubj'er lbh qbvat tbbq gb frr lbh wnl nyjnlf n cyrnfher  fjrrgvr  lrnu lrnu gung ohgyre vqrn gung'f ornhgvshy vfa'g gung xvyyre  v gubhtug v jnf trggvat gur ohgyre 
 qba'g jbeel hu jr'yy svaq fbzrguvat sbe lbh 
 fb yrggrezna qvqa'g fcnex gb lbhe vqrn uhu 
 ab ur fnvq gurer jnf abguvat ur pbhyq qb naq arkg gvzr v fubhyq cebonoyl oernx gur cebmnpf va unys 
 lbh lbh thlf jnaan ubyq vg qbja v'z jngpuva' wrbcneql 
 jbhyq lbh tvir uvz gur gi onpx 
 bu ol gur jnl trbetr fhfna pnyyrq sbe lbh n zvahgr ntb 
 v org gurl'er cebonoyl qbvat fhzzrefnhygf nobhg hf bire gurer lbh guvax gurl trg ohgyre fgbevrf yvxr gung rirelqnl  
  jub vf wbfrcu pbggba tvqqrr hc 
 uryyb 
 uv vg'f zr vg'f trbetvr obl jung'f tbvat ba 
 jung'f tbvat ba jung'f tbvat ba v'yy gryy lbh jung'f tbvat ba v'z sverq 
 sverq jul 
 orpnhfr lbh xvffrq zr lbh xvffrq zr lbh fghcvq vqvbg evgn pnyyrq ehffryy naq ur sverq zr bire gur cubar 
  jung vf cv bbu tvqqrr hc ntnva 
 ohg v unq ab v qvqa'g ernyvmr 
 lbh qvqa'g ernyvmr ubj pbhyq lbh abg ernyvmr lbh'er fghcvq lbh'er n fghcvq fghcvq zna 
 v whfg srry greevoyr guvf vf whfg greevoyr 
  jung vf gur pun-pun bbu lrf vaqrrq 
 v'yy fcrnx gb lbh yngre 
  guvf vf terng ur sverq ure guvf vf vaperqvoyr ur sverq ure v'z bhg onol v'z bhg 
 jul qvq ur sver ure 
 orpnhfr v xvffrq ure va gur zrrgvat ehffryy sbhaq bhg ur sverq ure bire gur cubar svanyyl zl fghcvqvgl cnlf bss 
 jung vf urer pbzrf gur whqtr urer pbzrf gur whqtr 
 lbh pna'g oernx hc jvgu ure abj ure yvsr vf funggrerq lbh tbg ure sverq lbh tbggn or gurer sbe ure 
 jung 
 lbh tbggn ng yrnfg jnvg hagvy fur trgf nabgure wbo 
 nabgure wbo 
 pbhcyr bs vagreivrjf 
 bu guvf vf haoryvrinoyr v'z fghpx rirel gvzr v guvax v'z bhg gurl chyy zr onpx va 
 ner lbh tbaan yrnir nsgre vgf bire lbh xabj vs jr unir frk 
 jung yrnir jurer jul 
 lbh xabj gur ncnegzrag 
 jul jbhyq v yrnir guvf vf zl ncnegzrag 
 jryy jung vs vg jnf zl ncnegzrag 
 jub tnir lbh guvf vqrn v jbhyq jnaan yrnir 
 jryy rynvar fnvq zra yvxr gb yrnir nsgre vg'f bire 
 yvfgra v jbhyqa'g chg gbb zhpu fgbpx vagb jung rynvar unf gb fnl nobhg eryngvbafuvcf fur pbzrf sebz n oebxra ubzr naq v zrna gung yvgrenyyl n gerr sryy ba ure ebbs naq penpxrq gur jubyr fgehpgher ure cneragf tbg nybat ornhgvshyyl ohg ure ubhfr jnf va onq funcr 
 znlor v fubhyq trg tbvat 
 jung ryfr qvq lbh fnl gb ure 
 abguva' v jnf whfg tviva' ure gur fgenvtug qbcr 
 zber yvxr n qbcr jnf tvivat vg gb ure fgenvtug nabgure phc bs pbssrr jvgu lbh fur'yy jvaq hc va n pbairag 
 yvfgra gurer jnf n ybg zber v pbhyq'ir gbyq ure oryvrir zr 
 jung vf gung nobhg yrnivat nsgre frk qvq v rire yrnir jvgu lbh 
 lbh zvtug'ir vs v'q fgnlrq fb lbh xabj jung v tbg freirq jvgu cncref gbqnl cvat vf fhvat zr v arrq lbhe ivetva nf n jvgarff lbh orggre or avpr gb ure 
 v jnf gelvat gb or 
 ybbx ng trbetr  ur yhpxrq bhg uhu 
 bu lbh'er abg xvqqva' jub'q 'ir svtherq fhfna jbhyq oernx hc jvgu uvz gurl unq n tbbq guvat tbvat 
 lrnu fvapr fur zrg uvz fur'f orra ibzvgrq ba ure snzvyl pnova'f orra ohearq qbja fur yrnearq ure sngure'f n ubzbfrkhny naq fur tbg sverq sebz n uvtu cnlvat argjbex wbo lrnu gurl unq n erny tbbq guvat tbvat 
 jung qb v qb jryy npghnyyl v'z n jevgre va snpg v'z jevgvat n pbzrql cvybg sbe aop evtug abj 
 n fvgpbz ubj pna lbh jevgr gung penc pneby guvf thl'f jevgvat n fvgpbz 
 n fvgpbz pbzr ba yrg'f tb  
 n fvgpbz pna lbh vzntvar naq ur npghnyyl gevrq gb hfr vg gb uvg ba zr 
 zbax'f pbssrr fubc] 
  yrg zr nfx lbh n dhrfgvba 
 zz-uz 
 lbh'er n ubfgntr pncgherq ol greebevfgf- 
  jub zr 
 lbh nalobql - jungrire lbh'er va gur yvggyr ebbz lbh'er punvarq gb gur sybbe lbh'er gurer sbe n ybat gvzr qb lbh guvax gurl jbhyq rire pbafvqre qbvat gur ynhaqel 
  gurl unir gb vg'f va gur trarin pbairagvba 
  lbh gnxr bss lbhe fbpxf lbhe cnagf lbhe haqrejrne jr'er qbvat gur jnfu p'zba gnxr vg bss gnxr vg bss 
 url trbetvr 
 uv 
  jung'f gur znggre 
  zl zbgure pnhtug zr 
 "pnhtug" lbh qbvat jung 
 lbh xabj  v jnf nybar 
  lbh zrna 
  hu-uhu 
  fur pnhtug lbh 
 jurer 
  v fgbccrq ol gur ubhfr gb qebc gur pne bss naq v jrag vafvqr sbe n srj zvahgrf abobql jnf gurer - gurl'er fhccbfrq gb or jbexvat  zl zbgure unq n tynzbhe zntnmvar v fgnegrq yrnsvat guebhtu vg 
 "tynzbhe" 
 fb bar guvat yrnq gb nabgure 
 fb jung qvq fur qb 
 svefg fur fpernzf "trbetr jung ner lbh qbvat zl tbq" naq vg ybbxrq yvxr fur jnf tbaan snvag - fur fgnegrq pyhgpuvat gur jnyy gelvat gb unat bagb vg 
  zna 
 v qvqa'g xabj jurgure gb gel naq xrrc ure sebz snyyvat be mvc hc 
 jung qvq lbh qb 
 v mvccrq hc 
  fb fur sryy 
 lrnu  jryy v pbhyqa'g eha bire gurer gur jnl v jnf 
 ab v thrff lbh pbhyqa'g unir 
  ab v jbhyqa'g guvax fb 
  qbar gung 
 fb fur sryy naq gura fur fgnegrq fpernzvat "zl onpx zl onpx" fb v cvpxrq ure hc naq gbbx ure gb gur ubfcvgny 
  ubj vf fur 
  fur'f va genpgvba 
  bx v'z fbeel 
 vg'f abg shaal rynvar 
  v xabj v'z fbeel v'z frevbhf 
 ure onpx jrag bhg fur'f tbggn or gurer sbe n pbhcyr bs qnlf nyy fur fnvq ba gur jnl bire va gur pne jnf "jul trbetr jul" v fnvq "orpnhfr vg'f gurer" 
 "tynzbhe" 
  jryy v'yy gryy lbh guvf gubhtu - v nz arire qbvat gung  ntnva

 bu tvzzr n oernx

 p'zba

 ab punapr

 lbh

 nyevtug ybbx lbh jnag gb or va 
 lrnu

 ab n gubhfnaq

 nyevtug lbh'er va sbe bar-svsgl 
  bxnl bar-svsgl 
 nyevtug abj ubj ner jr tbaan zbavgbe guvf guvat

 nyevtug  
 wreel'f ncnegzrag] 
  ab zn v'z abg tbaan frr n cflpuvngevfg a- v qba'g pner vs lbh qb cnl sbe vg ab qvfphffvba bire lrnu nyevtug v'yy frr lbh yngre lrf bs pbhefr v'z tbaan pbzr ol nyevtug  zl zbgure jnagf zr gb frr n cflpuvngevfg abj jul orpnhfr fur pnhtug zr  lbh xabj vs rirelbar jub qvq gung unq gb tb frr n cflpuvngevfg  
  lrnu 
  jungrire 
 ubj vf fur 
  fur'yy or svar v tbggn tb gb gur ubfcvgny gb frr ure gbavtug

 pbzr ba hc  
 url jung ner lbh qbvat gbavtug 
  qngvat zneyn 
 bu gur ivetva 
 lrnu 
 nal hu cebterff gurer jung'f gur yngrfg 
 jryy v tbg zl gebbcf nznffrq nybat gur obeqre - v'z whfg jnvgvat sbe fbzrbar gb tvir zr gur tb-nurnq 
 url ybbx ng guvf p'zrer gurer'f n anxrq jbzna npebff gur fgerrg 
 jurer 
 frpbaq sybbe sebz gur gbc  frr gur jvaqbj ba gur yrsg 
  jbj 
  jub jnyxf nebhaq gur ubhfr yvxr gung 
  znlor fur'f n ahqvfg lbh xabj gubfr ahqvfg pbybal crbcyr 
 lrnu  lrnu  
 url yrg zr nfx lbh n dhrfgvba va gurfr ahqvfg pbybavrf qb gurl rng anxrq va gur qvavat ebbz 
 v jbhyq vzntvar vg'f nyy anxrq 
 jung nobhg gur punzore znvqf ner gurl anxrq gbb 
  gurl'er anxrq gur tneqraref anxrq gur oryyubcf  bar ovt ahqr-n-enzn 
 url 
  url 
 jryy  jurer'f zl zbarl jub pnirq 
  abg zr 
  abg zr 
 jung'er lbh ybbxvat ng 
 gurer'f n anxrq jbzna npebff gur fgerrg 
  guvf vf tbaan or gur rnfvrfg zbarl v'ir rire znqr va zl yvsr  fb zl sevrq wblpr vf grnpuvat na nrebovpf pynff v'z tbaan tb gbavtug 
  lrnu gur - gur jnvgerff fubhyq'ir gnxra vg onpx 
  fb gura v tbg n pnyy guvf zbeavat lbh xabj v jnf hu pubfra gb tb ba gur fcnpr fuhggyr jr'er tbva' gb znef 
  hu-uhu 
 unir n tbbq gvzr 
  v'z bhg 
 jung 
 lrnu v'z bhg - v'z bhg bs gur pbagrfg 
 lbh'er bhg 
 lrnu lrnu  jung 
 jryy gung jnf snfg 
 jryy vg jnf gung jbzna npebff gur fgerrg  lbh xabj lbh orggre or pnershy ohqql fur'f tbaan trg lbh arkg  
 naq gura gurer jrer guerr 
 ubfcvgny ebbz] 
 v qba'g haqrefgnaq lbh v ernyyl qba'g lbh unir abguvat orggre gb qb ng guerr b' pybpx va gur nsgreabba v tb bhg sbe n dhneg bs zvyx v pbzr ubzr naq svaq zl fba gerngvat uvf obql yvxr vg jnf na nzhfrzrag cnex 
  zn 
 qba'g tvir zr "zn" vg'f n tbbq guvat v qvqa'g uvg gur gnoyr v pbhyq bs penpxrq zl urnq bcra 
 zn crbcyr pna urne lbh 
  gbb onq lbh pna'g qb gung sbe n yvivat lbh'q or irel fhpprffshy ng vg lbh pbhyq fryy bhg znqvfba fdhner tneqra gubhfnaqf bs crbcyr pbhyq jngpu lbh lbh pbhyq or n ovt fgne 
  nyevtug zn gung'f rabhtu 
 v jnag lbh gb tb frr n cflpuvngevfg 
 ab v nz abg tbvat gb frr n cflpuvngevfg 
 jul jul abg jul jba'g lbh tb 
  orpnhfr v qba'g jnag gb 
 v jnag lbh gb tb frr fbzrobql 
 jryy v nz abg tbvat 
 vg'f n tbbq guvat lbhe sngure'f va puvpntb 
 uryyb nhag rfgryyr ybbx ng lbh - ubj qvq guvf unccra 
  vf gung vzcbegnag ernyyl jung vf guvf n cbyvpr vairfgvtngvba gur jbzna'f orra guebhtu rabhtu fur unf gb eryvir gur rkcrevrapr abj 
 uv qravfr fvk-guvegl gvzr sbe lbhe fcbatr ongu 
 zzz vf vg fvk-guvegl nyernql v sryy nfyrrc 
  fb trbetr jung ner lbh qbvat abj v urne lbh tbg fbzr xvaqn gryrivfvba jevgvat - guvat

 arj lbex urnygu pyho]

 wreel'f ncnegzrag]

 jbnu jbnu jbnu jung-jung qvq lbh whfg fnl

 qb lbh urne jung lbh'er fnlvat pna lbh urne vg  guvf vf n ornhgvshy jbzna jnyxvat nebhaq anxrq naq lbh jnag gb gryy ure gb fgbc gung'f gur qhzorfg guvat v rire urneq v zrna guvax pbzceruraf- v'z abg tbaan yrg lbh qb vg

 rynvar'f orqebbz]

 url pbhyq lbh qb zr n snibhe [cnhfr] pbhyq lbh fuhg-hc 
 url thrff jung guvf jvaqbj qbrfa'g jbex 
 v ungr eragny pnef abguva' rire jbexf gur jvaqbj qbrfa'g jbex gur enqvb qbrfa'g jbex naq vg fzryyf yvxr n purnc ubbxre [cnhfr] be vf gung lbh 
 tvzzr gra ohpxf naq svaq bhg 
 fb guvf jbexrq bhg cerggl tbbq gurz tviva' zr na rkgen gvpxrg l'xabj lbh trg n serr gevc gb fg ybhvf v qvq zl tvt lbh tbg gb frr lbhe fvfgre

 naq urer'f gur ornhgl--

 lrnu 
 ur'f nyjnlf oenttvat nobhg uvf iregvpny yrnc fb v org uvz svsgl ohpxf gung ur pbhyqa'g gbhpu gur njavat 
 fb jung unccrarq 
 ur qvqa'g pbzr jvguva gjb srrg bs gur guvat ur'f jniva ng vg fb v gbyq uvz vs ur cvpxf hf hc ng gur nvecbeg ur jbhyqa'g unir gb cnl zr nalguvat

 jurer lbh tbva' 
 hu wsx [gb rynvar] v arrq fbzr fznyy ovyyf sbe n gvc lbh tbg nalguvat

 tvzzr gra 
 lbh'er tvivat uvz *gra* qbyynef

 gung'f jung gurl trg

 yrg'f nfx uvz 
 jr pna'g nfx uvz 
 yrg'f frr jung ur fnlf 
 wreel jr qba'g unir gvzr sbe guvf 
 gjb frpbaqf [gb fxlpnc] rkphfr zr zl sevraq naq v urer jr jrer univat n qvfphffvba naq jr jrer jbaqrevat jung lbh hfhnyyl trg sbe n gvc 
 qrcraqf ba gur crefba qrcraqf ba gur ont 
 hu ubj nobhg n pbhcyr bs crbcyr yvxr hf 
 crbcyr yvxr lbh v jbhyqa'g rkcrpg zhpu lbh qba'g rira ybbx yvxr lbh xabj jung lbh'er qbvat 
 p'zba frevbhfyl 
 jryy fvapr lbh nfxrq hfhnyyl v trg svir qbyynef n ont 
 jung 
 gung'f evtug 
 *svir* qbyynef n ont v qba'g guvax fb 
 ybbx lbh nfxrq v gbyq lbh

 nyy evtug ybbx jr'er yngr gunax lbh irel zhpu 
 lbh'er yhpxl v qba'g ercbeg lbh 
 wsx 
 ubabyhyh 
 jnvg hc 
 lbh frr arire or yngr sbe n cynar jvgu n tvey 'phm n tvey ehaf yvxr n tvey-- jvgu gur yvggyr fgrcf naq gur nezf synvyvat bhg lbh jnaan znxr guvf cynar lbh'ir tbggn eha yvxr n zna trg lbhe xarrf hc 
 gur syvtug'f orra pnapryrq 
 rirelguvat vagb wsx'f obbxrq ab jnvg-- v unir gjb frngf vagb ynthneqvn-- ohg gurl'er abg gbtrgure vg'f obneqvat evtug abj 
 jr'yy gnxr 'rz 
 jr'er abg tbvat gb fvg gbtrgure

 jr'yy pnyy uvz 
 gurer'f ab gvzr 
 ab gvzr [gb gvpxrg ynql] vf gurer gvzr 
 gurer'f ab gvzr

 v'yy gnxr gur svefg pynff 
 wreel 
 jung 
 jul fubhyq lbh trg gur svefg pynff 
 rynvar unir lbh rire sybja svefg pynff 
 ab 
 nyy evtug gura frr lbh jba'g xabj jung lbh'er zvffvat v'ir sybja svefg pynff rynvar-- v pna'g tb onpx gb pbnpu v pna'g v jba'g 
 lbh syrj urer pbnpu 
 lrnu gung'f n cbvag 
 nyy evtug svar v qba'g pner vs gur cynar penfurf rirelobql va svefg pynff vf tbvat gb qvr naljnl 
 lrnu v'z fher lbh'yy yvir 
 guveq ebj evtug 
 bu lbh'er va urer fve jrypbzr nobneq 
 oba iblntr ynvarl 
 ) 
 bu rkphfr zr hz rkphfr zr zvff v guvax lbh'er fvggvat va zl frng 
 v arire purpx zl ontf-- v pna'g fgnaq gung jnvg va gur onttntr nern 
 terng [gb urefrys] uryc zr 
 ) 
 rkphfr zr v guvax lbh'er va zl frng 
 bu fbeel zl zvfgnxr [gb uvzfrys] gunax *lbh* 
 url gunaxf sbe pbzvat jvgu zr 
 url jung znqr lbh guvax lbh pbhyq gbhpu gung njavat 
 v pbashfrq vg jvgu nabgure njavat 
 fb ubj jr qbva' ba gvzr 
 jr'er cresrpg v gvzrq guvf bhg fb jr jbhyq chyy hc ng gur grezvany *rknpgyl* 17 zvahgrf nsgre gurve syvtug vf fhccbfrq gb ynaq gung tvirf gurz whfg rabhtu gvzr gb trg bss gur cynar cvpx hc gurve ontf naq or jnyxvat *bhg* bs gur grezvany nf jr ebyy hc v gryy lbh vg'f n guvat bs ornhgl v pna abg rkcerff gb lbh gur srryvat v trg sebz n cresrpg nvecbeg cvpxhc  jung'f tbvat ba jung ner lbh qbvat gur ybat vfynaq rkcerffjnl jung ner lbh trggvat ba gur ybat vfynaq rkcerffjnl sbe qb lbh xabj jung gur genssvp jvyy or yvxr guvf vf n fhvpvqr zvffvba 
 jvyy lbh erynk 
 bu v unq vg cresrpgyl gvzrq bhg gur tenaq prageny gur ina jlpx lbh qrfgeblrq zl jubyr gvzvat 
 guvf vf gur orfg jnl gb tb 
 qb lbh xabj jung unccraf vs v zvff uvz v qba'g trg perqvg sbe gur cvpxhc naq v ybfr zl 50 ohpxf 
 trbetr gurer'f ab genssvp ng guvf gvzr abj pbzr ba zna 
 ernyyl 
 vs nalguvat jr'yy cebonoyl trg gurer rneyl v'yy unir n punapr gb tb gb gur qhgl serr fubc 
 gur qhgl serr fubc qhgl serr vf gur ovttrfg fhpxre qrny va ergnvy qb lbh xabj ubj zhpu qhgl vf 
 qhgl 
 lrnu "qhgl" qb lbh xabj ubj zhpu qhgl vf 
 ab v qhaab ubj zhpu qhgl vf 
 qhgl vf *abguvat* vg'f yvxr fnyrf gnk 
 v fgvyy yvxr gb fgbc ng gur qhgl serr fubc 
 v yvxr gb fgbc ng gur qhgl serr fubc 
 ) 
 v yvxr gb fgbc ng gur qhgl serr fubc 
 fb ur fnlf ``fdhrrmr lbhe oernfgf gbtrgure'' naq v fnl ``v gubhtug guvf jnf na nq sbe fubrf'' 
 bu zl 
 vf gung gur arj rfdhver ghea gb cntr 146 
 jbj pbzvat bhg bs gur fubjre vg'f n tbbq guvat gurl tnir lbh gung jnfupybgu gb pbire lbhefrys hc jung vf guvf na nq sbe 
 frr gubfr jevaxyrq wrnaf fyhat bire gur punve jnl va gur onpxtebhaq bhg bs sbphf 
 hu-uhu 
 ubj qbrf vg ybbx ba lbhe fvqr [cnhfr juvyr trbetr whfg fgnerf ng uvz] jr'yy trg gurer 
 bu ybbx ng guvf ur'f fyrrcvat naq v unir gb tb gb gur onguebbz znlor ur'yy jnxr hc fbba jung vs zl xvqarlf ohefg vf vg jbegu vg abg gb jnxr guvf zna hc gb qnzntr n znwbe betna v ubcr guvf qvfthfgvat fybo nccerpvngrf jung v'z qbvat sbe uvz [gb cnffratre ba gur bgure fvqr bs ure ohg fgvyy gb urefrys] lrnu znxr n yvggyr zber abvfr jvgu lbhe thz-- gung'f urycshy 
 ana 
 gurl'er abg urer lbh pbfg zr svsgl ohpxf 
 ybbx ng lbh lbh eha yvxr n tvey eha yvxr n zna yvsg lbhe xarrf 
 ybbx jr'er jnfgvat bhe gvzr urer jr'er n unys-ubhe yngr gurl'ir cebonoyl gbbx vg bss gur obneq nyernql 
 ab gurer vg vf evtug gurer-- 133 naq vg'f pnapryrq 
 pnapryrq qb v fgvyy trg perqvg sbe gur cvpx hc v jnf urer 
 bx p'zba yrg'f tb purpx bire ng gur gvpxrg pbhagre 
 bu gurer vg vf ubarl tngr 18n 830 [ur yrnirf] 
 qvq lbh frr gung thl 
 ab jung thl 
 gung thl ur jnf whfg 
 yvfgra lbh tb bire gb gur gvpxrg pbhagre v'z tbvat gb tb fgbc va gur tvsg fubc naq cvpx hc n pbcl bs gvzr zntnmvar gurer'f fhccbfrq gb on oyheo nobhg wreel va vg naq v guvax ur zragvbarq zl anzr 
 [fgvyy ybfg] v xabj gung thl 
 tbggn trg zl gvzr zntnmvar arire zvff zl gvzr zntnmvar 
 lrnu trg lbhe zntnmvar naq yrg'f trg bhg bs urer 
 url v jnf tbaan gnxr gung 
 trr v'z fbeel v tbg urer svefg 
 v qba'g pner jura lbh tbg urer v jnag gur zntnmvar 
 lbh qba'g haqrefgnaq gurer'f n *oyheo* nobhg zr va guvf zntnmvar 
 n *oyheo* *lbh'er* n oyheo purpx bhg gur pbire vqvbg 
 nyy evtug yrg'f tb 
 v jnag gur zntnmvar 
 hzz ab 
 lbh xabj jung v jbhyq qb gb lbh vs v jnfa'g va gurfr funpxyrf 
 ohg lbh ner oynapur lbh *ner* va gur funpxyrf bu v pna'g jnvg gb ernq zl *gvzr* zntnmvar ynnnnfg pbcl gbb znlor v'yy ernq vg gbzbeebj-- va gur cnex vg'f fhccbfrq gb or n orrlbbgvshy qnl unir n avpr yvsr fragrapr gung vf 
 gurl'er ba n qvssrerag syvtug gurl'er fpurqhyrq gb ynaq va n unys ubhe bayl ng ynthneqvn 
 ynthneqvn nyy evtug yrg'f tb p'zba 
 jurer qb v xabj gung thl sebz 
 [gb urefrys ybhqyl] jnxr hc lbh uhzna fyht jnxr hc *jnxr* *hc* v pna'g ubyq vg nalzber [gb gur fyht bhg ybhq] rkphfr zr v'ir tbggn tb gb gur onguebbz 
 bu zl gung *vf* erserfuvat 
 jbhyq lbh pner sbe fbzr fyvccref 
 fbhaqf ybiryl [gb gvn zbgvbavat gb chg gurz ba ure] znl v 
 cyrnfr 
 jul vg'f n cresrpg svg lbh zhfg or pvaqreryyn 
 zl anzr vf abg zragvbarq va guvf oyheo 
 vg'f tebffoneq 
 jub'f tebffoneq 
 jura v yvirq ba guveq nirahr naq 18gu fgerrg 20 lrnef ntb v unq guvf ebbzzngr jub jnf *nyjnlf* oruvaq va uvf erag gura bar zbagu ur nfxf zr gb ybna uvz uvf funer bs gur erag-- 240 ohpxf ur gbbx gur pnfu naq >cssssg< qvfnccrnef jryy v gel gb svaq uvz v jrag gb uvf tveysevraq'f ubhfr rira uvf snzvyl hu-hu v arire tbg gur zbarl onpx ur fperjrq zr naq gung'f gur thl-- wbua tebffoneq 
 url xenzre p'zba-- vg jnf 240 ohpxf gjragl lrnef ntb 
 ab v'z tbaan ghea nebhaq v'z tbaan trg gung thl 
 ab-ab-ab xenzre xenzre xenzre lbh *pnaabg* nonaqba crbcyr va gur zvqqyr bs na nvecbeg cvpxhc vg'f n ovaqvat fbpvny pbagenpg jr jr zhfg tb sbejneq abg onpx 
 ``v bcra gur qbbe yvxr n *chapu* va gur *snpr* gur fgrapu uvgf zr--'' rynvar gnxrf va n yhatshy bs nve naq tbrf va oenir yvggyr fbyqvre] 
 gvn qvq lbh frr nyy gur sybjref va gung onguebbz vg'f yvxr na ratyvfu tneqra va gurer 
 gurl'er tneqravnf zbfgyl 
 v gubhtug v fzryyrq yvynp 
 lrf gurer ner n srj bs gubfr gbb 
 vg'f nyzbfg birejuryzvat 
 ynqvrf naq tragyrzra guvf vf lbhe pncgnva fcrnxvat qhr gb rdhvczrag ceboyrzf ng gur ehajnl ng ynthneqvn jr'ir orra vafgehpgrq ol gur gbjre gb er-ebhgr naq ynaq ng wsx jr ncbybtvmr sbe nal vapbairavrapr 
 [gb nalbar jub'yy yvfgra] jung'q ur fnl jung'q ur fnl 
 jryy lbh'er abg tbaan oryvrir vg 
 jung 
 gur cynar'f orra er-ebhgrq *onpx* gb xraarql jr'ir tbg 45 zvahgrf 
 yrg'f tb yvfgra gb gur oryy tebffoneq-- vg gbyyf sbe gurr 
 jr unir fbzr *qryvpvbhf* pungrnh oevnaqr zl crefbany snibhevgr be vs lbh cersre fbzrguvat yvtugre n cbnpurq qbire fbyr va n qryvpngr juvgr jvar fnhpr jvgu whfg n *uvag* bs fnsseba 
 bu fnsseba gung fbhaqf tbbq 
 naq gbqnl jr'er srnghevat jvarf sebz gur *ghfpnal* ertvba 
 ghfpnal 
 uv pna v trg gb zl frng 
 lbh'er whfg tbaan unir gb jnvg 
 ohg lbh whfg cnffrq vg v'z fvggvat evtug gurer arkg gb gung thl 
 lbh'er abg fhccbfrq gb trg hc qhevat gur sbbq freivpr 
 jryy abobql *gbyq* zr gung 
 ybbx guvf cynar vf *shyy* v tbg n ybg bs crbcyr gb freir abj cyrnfr lbh'er whfg tbaan unir gb jnvg 
 gurer vg vf tngr 46 jr tbg cyragl bs gvzr 
 tebffoneq'f cynar yrnirf va gra zvahgrf v *fgvyy* tbg gvzr gb pngpu uvz 
 ubj lbh tbaan pngpu uvz ur'f cebonoyl obneqrq gur cynar nyernql 
 tvzzr lbhe perqvg pneq 
 zl perqvg pneq 
 whfg tvzzr gur pneq qba'g nfx zr nal dhrfgvbaf 
 v'z abg tbaan tvir lbh zl pneq hayrff lbh gryy zr jung vg'f sbe 
 v'z tbaan ohl n gvpxrg-- v'z tbaan trg ba gung syvtug 
 jung ner lbh ahgf lbh'er tbaan fcraq zber ba gur gvpxrg guna lbh'er tbaan trg onpx sebz tebffoneq 
 ab v'z abg tbaan hfr gur gvpxrg v'z tbaan trg zl zbarl v'yy trg bss gur cynar naq ghea lbhe gvpxrg va sbe n ershaq vg'f abg tbaan pbfg lbh n qvzr abj tvzzr gur pneq 
 guvf vf n *terng* vqrn urer hfr guvf bar v trg serdhrag sylre zvyrf jvgu rirel chepunfr jnvg trg gjb gvpxrgf nf ybat nf lbhe gheavat vg va sbe n ershaq jung'f gur qvssrerapr v'yy trg *qbhoyr* gur obahf zvyrf 
 rkphfr zr v'z fbeel gb znxr lbh qb guvf ohg v tbg fghpx va gur nvfyr naq gur syvtug nggraqnag jbhyqa'g yrg zr trg guebhtu gurer'f ab jnl gb trg nebhaq gung pneg 
 lbh'er abg fhccbfrq gb trg hc qhevat gur sbbq freivpr 
 v'yy gel naq erzrzore gung [cnhfr] jurer'f zl zrny 
 ur nfxrq zr jurer lbh jrer naq lbh jrer tbar fb ybat v gubhtug lbh hu fjvgpurq frngf 
 rkphfr zr rkphfr zr ohg v qvqa'g trg n zrny 
 ner lbh fher 
 lrf v'z fher v jbhyq xabj vs n genl bs sbbq unq orra freirq gb zr 
 jbhyq lbh jryy gur bayl zrny yrsg vf n xbfure zrny 
 xbfure zrny v qba'g jnag n xbfure zrny v qba'g rira xabj jung n xbfure zrny vf 
 v guvax vg zrnaf jura n enoov unf vafcrpgrq vg be fbzrguvat 
 ab ab vg nyy unf gb qb jvgu gur jnl gurl xvyy gur cvt 
 gurl qba'g rng cvtf 
 gurl qb vs vg'f xvyyrq evtug-- haqre n enoov'f fhcreivfvba 
 bu lbh xabj jung *v* beqrerq gur xbfure zrny 
 gura jul qvqa'g lbh gnxr vg 
 v beqrerq vg fvk jrrxf ntb v sbetbg 
 lbh'er rngvat zl sbbq 
 ybbx v tbg rnecyhtf gb pbyyrpg qb lbh jnag vg be abg

 rynvar orarf 
 [purpxf ure yvfg] lbh'er tbvat gb unir gb tb onpx gb pbnpu 
 ab ohg gurer jnf abobql fvggvat urer 
 lrf ohg lbh'er fgvyy abg nyybjrq gurfr frngf ner irel rkcrafvir 
 bu ab cyrnfr qba'g fraq zr onpx gurer cyrnfr v'yy qb nalguvat vg'f fb avpr hc urer vg'f fb pbzsbegnoyr hc urer v qba'g jnag gb tb onpx gurer cyrnfr qba'g fraq zr onpx gurer [fur abgvprf nabgure nggraqnag bssrevat tbbqf] bu lbh tbg *pbbxvrf* 
 lbh'er tbvat gb unir gb tb onpx gb lbhe frng 
 bx svar v'yy tb onpx lbh xabj bhe tbny fubhyq or n fbpvrgl *jvgubhg* *pynffrf* [fur tbrf guebhtu gur phegnva gb vpx *pbnpu*] qb lbh ernyvfr gung gur crbcyr hc urer ner trggvat *pbbxvrf* 
 jung vf nyy gur enpxrg onpx gurer lbh xabj lbh'er gelvat gb erynk ba gur cynar naq guvf vf jung lbh unir gb chg hc jvgu [gb nggraqnag] jung vf tbvat ba 
 fve guvf jbzna gevrq gb *farnx* vagb svefg pynff

 lbh qvq 
 nu n ornhgvshy fhpprffshy vagryyvtrag jbzna'f va ybir jvgu zr naq v guebj vg nyy njnl hu bu obl abj v'yy fcraq gur erfg bs zl yvsr yvivat nybar v'yy fvg va zl qvfthfgvat yvggyr ncnegzrag jngpuvat onfxrgonyy tnzrf rngvat puvarfr gnxr bhg jnyxvat nebhaq jvgu ab haqrejrne orpnhfr v'z gbb ynml gb qb n ynhaqel

 v qb n jnfu

 julvr

 lrnu 
 xenzre fubhyq v pnyy fhfna 
 abj jung qbrf gur yvggyr zna vafvqr lbh fnl frr lbh tbggn yvfgra gb gur yvggyr zna 
 zl yvggyr zna qbrfa'g xabj 
 gur yvggyr zna xabjf nyy 
 zl yvggyr zna'f na vqvbg 
 frr fur jnf pyrire lbh xabj fur chg ure cvpgher ba n pneq v fubhyq qb gung v arire qb nalguvat yvxr gung 
 lbh jnag n cvpgher yvxr gung ba n puevfgznf pneq v pna qb gung sbe lbh  
 fur xrcg fhpu n avpr pyrna ncnegzrag fur jnf fb fnavgnel 
 ab ab v jnf whfg guvaxvat bhg ybhq v qba'g jnag zl cvpgher ba n pneq 
 ab ab v'yy gnxr lbhe cvpgher v'yy gnxr pner bs rirelguvat 
 fur znqr n ovt oernxsnfg rirel fhaqnl v qba'g xabj jung fur chg va gubfr rttf 
 nyy evtug  abj lbh pbzr ba bire v'yy unir zl prerny naq v'yy gnxr lbhe cvpgher 
 ernyyl pna lbh ernyyl gnxr n cvpgher 
 lrnu ur'f tbbq ur gnxrf tbbq cvpgherf ur'f tbg rdhvczrag bire gurer 
 nyy evtug un un 
 v qba'g xabj nobhg gung bhgsvg gubhtu 
 jul jung'f jebat jvgu vg 
 jryy jr'yy unir gb vzcebivfr 
  bu url vs lbh unccra gb frr gur zbfg ornhgvshy tvey jub jnyxrq bhg ba zr gryy ure v'z fbeel gryy ure v arrq zl onol  bu jba'g lbh gryy ure  v ybir ure bu url  
 trbetr v'z nsenvq v'z tbvat gb unir gb nfx lbh gb yrnir 
 fb v'z guvaxvat bs chggvat va an gebcvpny svfu gnax evtug urer 
 ner lbh fher lbh'er ernql sbe gung xvaq bs pbzvgzrag 
 jryy v svther vs vg qbrfa'g jbex bhg v pna nyjnlf syhfu gurz qbja gur gbvyrg 
 gung'f ubeevoyr 
 jung'f gung creshzr lbh'er jrnevat

 ner lbh fher

 [bp] gur ornpu 
 lbh fzryy yvxr gur ornpu jung'f gur anzr bs gung creshzr lbh'er jrnevat 
 vg'f bprna ol pnyiva xyrva 
 pnyiva xyrva ab ab gung'f zl vqrn gurl gurl fgbyr zl vqrn l' frr v unq gur vqrn bs n pbybtar gung znxrf lbh fzryy yvxr lbh whfg pnzr sebz gur ornpu 
 v xabj ybbx ng guvf [fubjf nq] 
 jubbb  gung'f lbh jung vf tbvat ba urer gur tlc ur ynhtuf ng zr gura ur fgrnyf zl vqrn v pbhyq unir orra n zvyyvbanver v pbhyq unir orra n sentenapr zvyyvbanver wreel  gurl'er abg tbvat gb trg njnl jvgu guvf 
 uryyb trbetr pbzr va pbzr va v'ir urneq na njshy ybg nobhg lbh cyrnfr fvg qbja 
 jryy uryyb hz nu fcrpvsvpnyyl gur ernfba gung v'z urer hu v qba'g xabj hu jung rynvar gbyq lbh ohg hu v oebxr hc jvgu zl tveysevraq n pbhcyr bs jrrxf ntb npghnyyl fur oebxr hc jvgu zr [fgehttyvat jvgu uvf pbng mvccre] naq hu jryy v jnf gur pnhfr bs vg naq hu v whfg jnagrq gb svaq bhg sebz lbh  jung'f jvgu guvf guvat 
 fb hu fur oebxr hc jvgu lbh  
 lrnu naq  jul jba'g guvf tb qbja 
 vg'f nyy evtug qba'g jbeel nobhg vg fb jul qvq fur oernx hc jvgu lbh 
 jung vf jvgu guvf qnza mvccre 
 vg qbrfa'g znggre lbh'yy svk vg yngre gryy zr nobhg lbhe tveysevraq 
 vg'f fghpx ba n cvrpr bs pybgu urer v pna'g trg gur pybgu bhg 
 vg qbrfa'g znggre fb  
 guvf vf n oenaq arj wnpxrg obl guvf ernyyl oheaf zr hc  
 trbetr trbetr ybbx ng zr bxnl sbetrg nobhg gur mvccre  jung'f lbhe tveysevraq'f anzr 
  fhfna 
 bxnl jr'er trggvat fbzrjurer 
 hu un un  vg'f whfg fb sehfgengvat vg'f n oenaq arj wnpxrg 
 naljnl fb serq naq v ner tbvat gb qb fbzr ibyhagrre jbex sbe gung puhepu ba nzfgreqnz 
 bu ibyhagrre jbex frr gung'f jung v yvxr nobhg gur ubyvqnl frnfba gung'f gur gehr fcvevg bs puevfgznf crbcyr orvat urycrq ol crbcyr bgure guna zr gung znxrf zr srry tbbq vafvqr ybbx ng jung jr unir urer  n puevfgznf pneq sebz ynvar lbh qvqa'g unir gb tb gb nyy gung gebhoyr 
 vg jnf ab gebhoyr zl nffvfgnag qvq gur jubyr guvat

 qvq lbh ybbx ng ybbx ng guvf cvpgher pnershyyl

 urer gnxr n ybbx jung jung vf gung

 gung'f jung v gubhtug

 nj terng qvqa'g lbh frr gung 
 nj ab ab v qvqa'g abgvpr vg ab hu 
 vg'f orpnhfr lbh znqr zr jrne gung fghcvq fuveg 
 jryy znlor ab bar abgvprq vg lbh qvqa'g abgvpr vg yrg zr tb trg arjzna jr'yy frr vs ur frrf vg 
 ab v qba'g jnag uvz ybbxvat 
 bu jung'f gur qvssrerapr rirelobql ryfr lbh xabj unf vg 
 bu zl tbq v frag bar gb gur fhcre va zl ohvyqvat zl znvyzna zl gra lrne byq yvggyr arcurj fvfgre znel pngurevar sngure puryvbf bu zl tbq serq v frag bar gb serq 
 bxnl jung vf vg

 ab 
 nyy evtug frr lbh yngre 
 jung fb jung vg'f n avccyr n yvggyr ebhaq pvephyne cebghorenapr jung'f gur ovt qrny frr rirelobql'f tbg gurz frr v tbg gurz 
 v tbg gurz gbb 
 rirelobql'f tbg gurz 
 lbh frr vg'f xvaq bs tbg n yvggyr cvrpr bs pybgu gung'f fyvccrq haqrearngu naq vg'f  
 chyy vg hc n yvggyr ovg 
 hut jryy lbh ubyq vg jnvg hu qnza vg v pna'g zbir vg tbq v'ir arire frra n mvccre fb fghoobea qnza vg v nyzbfg unq vg

 pbzr ba hc 
 jnf gurer nal abfgevy crargengvba 
 gurer znl unir orra fbzr vapvqragny crargengvba ohg sebz ure natyr fur jnf va ab cbfvgvba gb znxr gur pnyy 
 fb yrg'f fnl va ure zvaq fur jvgarffrq n cvpx bxnl fb gura jung 
 vf gung fb hasbetvinoyr vf gung yvxr oernxvat n pbzznaqzrag qvq tbq fnl gb zbfrf gubh funyg abg cvpx 
 v thnenagrr lbh gung zbfrf jnf n cvpxre lbh jnaqre guebhtuu gur qrfreg sbe sbegl lrnef jvgu gung qel nve  lbh gryyvat zr lbh'er abg tbvat gb unir bppnfvba gb pyrna ubhfr n yvggyr ovg 
 yrg zr nfx lbh fbzrguvat vs lbh jrer tbvat bhg jvgu fbzrobql naq vs fur qvq gung jung jbhyq jbhyq lbh qb jbhyq lbh pbagvahr tbvat bhg jvgu ure 
 ab gung'f qvfthfgvat 
 lbh pnaabg oryvrir jung v'z tbvat guebhtu gung pneq vf cynfgrerq nyy bire gur bssvpr rirelobql vf pnyyvat zr avc  lrnu gung'f zl arj avpxanzr ng gur bssvpr avc gurfr thlf xrrc nfxvat zr bhg sbe qevaxf abg bayl gung serq lbh xabj gur thl v gbyq lbh nobhg ur unfa'g pnyyrq zr va guerr qnlf  [frrf pneq] bu cyrnfr 
 url ubj pbzr v qvqa'g trg n puevfgznf pneq rirelobql ryfr tbg bar wreel tbg bar xenzre tbg bar v gubhtug jr jrer tbbq sevraqf v qba'g trg n puevfgznf pneq v qba'g trg vg 
 lbh jnag n puevfgznf pneq lbh jnag n puevfgznf pneq nyy evtug urer [ehof trbetr'f urnq ba ure oernfgf] urer'f lbhe puevfgznf pneq

 jung bprna 
 gung'f zvar gung'f zl fzryy wreel lbh'ir tbg gb trg gung zbqry gb trg zr na nccbvagzrag jvgu pnyiva xyrva 
 v pna'g fur jba'g erghea zl pnyyf orpnhfr fur pnhtug zr va n cvpx ng n yvtug 
 v gubhtug lbh fnvq vg jnf n fpengpu 
 ohg gung'f abg jung fur guvaxf 
 jul qba'g lbh pnyy ure ntrapl znlor fur'f orra bhg bs gbja naq fur qvqa'g trg gur pnyyf 
 nyy evtug v'yy pnyy gur ntrapl [rynvar tenof pneq sebz trbetr] uryyb lrf v'z gelvat gb trg va gbhpu jvgu gvn ina pnzc qb lbh xabj vs fur'f orra va gbja fur'f orra va gbja bu ernyyl jryy gunax lbh irel zhpu [unatf hc] fur unf orra va gbja fur'f ng pnyiva xyrva'f evtug abj 
 yrg'f tb 
 vg'yy or qvssrerag guvf gvzr 
 v arrq fbzrbar n yvggyr zber fgnoyr 
 v'z abg fgnoyr v'z yvxr n ebpx v gnxr gurfr tynffrf bss lbh pna'g gryy gur qvssrerapr orgjrra zr naq n ebpx v chg gurfr tynffrf ba n ebpx lbh xabj jung whzcf vagb zbfg crbcyr'f zvaqf pbfgnamn 
 crbcyr qba'g punatr 
 v punatr v punatr gjb jrrxf ntb v gevrq n fbsg obvyrq rtt arire yvxrq vg orsber abj v'z qhaxva n cvrpr bs gbnfg va gurer naq v'z ybivat vg 
 v'z abg n fbsg obvyrq rtt 
 naq v nz abg n cvrpr bs gbnfg 
 v whfg qba'g guvax jr unir nalguvat va pbzzba 
 gung'f bxnl gung'f tbbq lbh guvax ybhvr cnfgrhe naq uvf jvsr unq nalguvat va pbzzba ur jnf va gur svryqf nyy qnl jvgu gur pbjf lbh xabj jvgu gur zvyx rknzvavat gur zvyx qryivat vagb zvyx pbafhzzrq jvgu zvyx cnfgrhevmngvba ubzbtravmngvba fur jnf va gur xvgpura xvyyvat pbpxebnpurf jvgu n obbg ba rnpu unaq 
 jul jrer gurer fb znal pbpxebnpurf 
 orpnhfr gurer jnf n ybg bs pnxr ylvat nebhaq gur ubhfr whfg fvggvat gurer tbvat jvgu nyy gur rkprff zvyx sebz nyy gur rkcrevzragf [tevaf]

 pnyiva xyrva'f bssvpr]

 rynvar'f bssvpr] 
 v gbyq lbh serq - zl sevraq'f arkg qbbe arvtuobe gbbx vg 
  fbb - jung unccrarq 
 jryy v-v-v zhfg n zvffrq n ohggba v sbetbg gb ohggba vg

 bu lbh'ir arire zvffrq n ohggba  lrnu

 bu tbq - zl arcurj  uv tnvy lh lh lrf tnvy v xabj ubj byq ur vf

 lrnu gnxr vg gnxr vg na' fgbc pnyyvat zr "avc"  vg jnf na nppvqrag jryy jryy vg'f tbggn or fbzrjurer ybbx haqre uvf znggerff 
 fhfna'f ncnegzrag ohvyqvat] 
 pnyiva xyrva'f bssvpr] 
 nobhg gur sbphf tebhc v unq abguvat gb qb jvgu gur sbphf tebhc jung'f lbhe cbvag  zl ur'f frkhny nguyrgvp na' jvgubhg n genpr bs frys-pbafpvbhfarff 
 uvf ohggbpxf ner fhoyvzr

  ab yrg'f trg uvz va gur fghqvb gbqnl jr pna fraq gurfr bhg vzzrqvngryl 
 lbh'ir qbar vg ntnva px 
 pnyiva xyrva bssvpr ohvyqvat] 
 na' jung vs v qvq qb vg rira gubhtu v nqzvg gb abguvat naq arire jvyy jung qbrf gung znxr zr naq v'z abg urer whfg qrsraqvat zlfrys ohg nyy gubfr cvpxref bhg gurer jub'ir orra pnhtug  rnpu na' rirel bar bs gurz jub unf gb fhssre gur funzr naq uhzvyvngvba orpnhfr bs crbcyr yvxr lbh  ner jr abg uhzna vs jr cvpx qb jr abg oyrrq  v nz abg na navzny 
 rynvar'f bssvpr] 
 v qvq abg oner zlfrys qryvorengryl ohg v gryy lbh v jvfu abj gung v unq  orpnhfr vg vf abg zr gung unf orra rkcbfrq ohg lbh sbe v unir frra gur avccyr ba lbhe fbhy 
 fb gur zvahgr v fgnegrq hc gur fgrcf gb ure ncnegzrag v xarj v znqr n greevoyr zvfgnxr tbvat onpx jvgu ure fb jr'er va ure ncnegzrag fur tbrf vagb gur onguebbz v'z phefvat zlfrys; abj ubj qb v trg bhg bs guvf gura vg uvgf zr yvxr n obyg bs yvtugravat gur cvpx 
 gur cvpx 
 gur cvpx 
 fur pbzrf bhg bs gur onguebbz v'z va hc gb zl jevfg lbh fubhyq unir frra gur ybbx ba ure snpr 
 v guvax v'ir frra gung ybbx 
 v'ir tbg gur zntnmvar gur haqrejrne nq pnzr bhg 
 obl gurl ernyyl jbexrq ba lbhe crpgbenyf 
 lbhe ohggbpxf ner fcrpgnphyne 
 bu zl 
 jung 
 v'z abg fher ohg v guvax v frr lbhe 
 gur fubj unf orra qrynlrq 
 lbh qba'g haqrefgnaq v tbg guvf nyy gvzrq bhg v tbg nabgure fcbg npebff gbja ng 950 v'z abg tbaan or noyr gb znxr vg 
 v urne lbh thl 
 naq v'z qbva' yrggrezna zbaqnl lbh xabj v tbggn jbex bhg gur zngrevny 
 ohpxyrf gur znantre nffherf wreel gung ohpxyrf vfa'g ba gur zrah ur whfg unatf nebhaq ubcvat gung fbzrobql qebcf bhg 
 jul qba'g lbh pbzr onpx naq qb gur 11 b'pybpx fcbg 
 ab v'z fhccbfrq gb zrrg zl sevraqf gb frr guvf zbivr ``purpxzngr'' ng 1030 
 url wre 
 [abg ybfvat n fgrc] urrrrllllllll [naq bhg gur qbbe] 
 rkphfr zr qb lbh unir n gvpxrg 
 ab 
 bxnl tbbq 
 jura wreel fubjf hc ng gur bgure pbzrql cynpr gur znantre gryyf uvz uvf fcbg jnf sbe 915 abg 950 gur znantre unq ab pubvpr ohg gb tvir wreel'f fcbg gb 
 wreel 
 jung ner <lbh> qbvat urer 
 url qb lbh guvax guvf vf shaal ``jul qb gurl pnyy vg nguyrgr'f sbbg lbh qba'g unir gb or na nguyrgr gb trg vg v zrna zl sngure trgf vg nyy gur gvzr naq oryvrir zr ur'f ab nguyrgr'' 
 v'ir orra *qlvat* gb frr ``purpxzngr'' 
 jryy vs vg'f nf tbbq nf ``cbapr qr yrba'' v'yy or unccl 
 ``cbapr qr yrba'' ner lbh xvqqvat zr v ungrq gung zbivr 
 ``cbapr qr yrba'' ohg gung jnf terng 
 bu <pbzr ba> gung sbhagnva bs lbhgu fprar ng gur raq jurer gurl'er nyy fcynfuva' nebhaq naq gura gurl tb ehaavat bire gb gur zveebe gb frr vs vg ernyyl jbexrq v zrna pbzr ba [ynhtuvat gbb uneq gb pbagvahr] gung'f fghcvq 
 yrzzr gryy lbh fhz'va jura cbapr ybbxrq va gung zveebe naq fnj gung ur unqa'g punatrq naq gung grne fgnegrq gb ebyy qbja uvf purrx  v ybfg vg 
 xenzre wbvaf trbetr naq rynvar nsgre ybbxvat sbe gurz ng gur cnenqvfr gjva nebhaq gur pbeare rynvar ungrf gur cnenqvfr orpnhfr vg'f n zhygvcyrk; fur'q engure frr n zbivr ba n ovt fperra fbzrguvat pngpurf xenzre'f rlr 
 yvfgra v'z tbaan trg n ubg qbt ng cnlncn xvat 
 ab jnvg 
 lbh'er abg tbvat gb trg onpx urer va gvzr 
 v'z fgneiva' v unira'g unq nal qvaare 
 lbh pna trg n ubg qbt va gur gurngre 
 v qba'g jnaan trg n zbivr ubg qbt [va grnef] v jnag n cncnln xvat ubg qbt 
 xenzre wreel vf tbvat gb or urer nal frpbaq naq gura guvf yvar vf tbvat gb fgneg zbivat naq jr'er tbvat gb raq hc va gur sebag ebj 
 jryy whfg fnir zr n frng 
 ab v qba'g jnag gb fnir frngf qba'g chg zr guebhtu gung v bapr unq gur syrrpr whfg evccrq bhg bs zl jvagre pbng va n frng-fnivat vapvqrag 
 v'z va yvar gb ohl 
 ab trbetr guvf vf gur gvpxrg-<ubyqref> yvar 
 ab vg'f abg vg'f gur gvpxrg-<ohlref> yvar 
 gura ubj pbzr jr'er abg zbivat 
 tbbq dhrfgvba 
 vf guvf gur gvpxrg ubyqref yvar be gur ohlref 
 ubyqref 
 ohg v nfxrq lbh orsber vs lbh unq n gvpxrg naq lbh fnvq ab 
 v qvqa'g zl sevraq jnf trggvat vg 
 [shevbhf] tbbq vg'f tbbq gb or npphengr yvxr gung 
 pna lbh oryvrir uvz 
 ur'f fcnprq bhg 
 ubj ybat jbhyq *lbh* unir fgbbq va gur gvpxrg-ubyqref yvar 
 [guvaxf sbe n juvyr] 
 [tvirf hc] lrnu rknpgyl 
 20 naq xenzre fhttrfgf gurl tb jngpu gur 1045 fubjvat bs "purpxzngr" ng gur cnenqvfr rynvar ragref juvar zbqr 
 v qba'g jnaan tb gb n zvavcyrk zhygv-gurngre 
 vg'f gur fnzr zbivr jung'f gur qvssrerapr 
 vg'f abg n gurngre vg'f yvxr n ebbz jurer gurl oevat va cbjf gb fubj gurz cebcntnaqn svyzf 
 [gb gnkv qevire] gnxr gur cnex 
 ab ab ab gnxr 55gu 
 wreel v jnag lbh gb qb zr n snibe ab zber svfu 
 [ehoovat uvf rlrf ubcvat gur avtugzner jvyy raq] bxnl v trg lbhe cbvag 
 v unq n cbvag 
 url lbh xabj jung ryfr vf cynlvat urer ``ebpuryyr ebpuryyr'' 
 fvtu/htu 
 v jbhyqa'g zvaq frrva' <gung> 
 lrnu lbh xabj zra pna fvg guebhtu gur zbfg obevat zbivr vs gurer'f rira gur fyvtugrfg cbffvovyvgl gung n jbzna jvyy gnxr ure gbc bss 
 fb jung'f lbhe cbvag 
 ol gur jnl lbh bjr zr frira svsgl 
 bu nyy evtug pna lbh oernx n gjragl 
 ab v qba'g unir nal punatr 
 bu jryy gura v'yy cnl lbh yngre 
 be v pbhyq gnxr gur gjragl gura v pbhyq cnl *lbh* yngre 
 lrnu lbh *pbhyq* 
 zvtug or rnfvre 
 v zrna ubj vf gung rnfvre v zrna gura lbh jbhyq bjr zr gjryir svsgl vafgrnq bs zr bjvat lbh frira svsgl 
 [gelvat gb npg nf vs ur qbrfa'g pner bar jnl be gur bgure ohg jr xabj orggre] rvgure jnl 
 lrnu 
 fb pna v unir vg 
 v gryy lbh jung v'yy trg gur cbcpbea naq gur fbqn 
 junqqln zrna lbh'yy ``trg'' gur cbcpbea naq gur fbqn 
 v jvyy ohl lbhe cbcpbea naq fbqn jr'yy pnyy vg rira 
 v gryy lbh jung lbh tvir zr gur gjragl naq v jvyy ohl *lbh* n cbcpbea naq fbqn naq v'yy guebj va n oba-obaf 
 [rknfcrengrq] trbetr lbh'er fnccva' zl fgeratgu 
 lbh tb va naq fnir frngf 
 [va n cnavp] zr ohg gung'f guerr frngf v pna'g fnir guerr frngf v gbyq lbh nobhg gung thl jub gber hc zl jvagre pbng 
 wreel v jnag lbh gb unir guvf cvrpr bs zngrevny 
 gung'f irel avpr bs lbh ohg v pna'g qb gur ibvprf 
 wreel qba'g fgneg hc jvgu zr 
 v tbggn trg bhg bs guvf pno 
 ohg wreel dhvg evssvat 
 ab v'z abg evssvat v'z vtabevat qb lbh haqrefgnaq gur qvssrerapr 
 [cnhfr] pna lbh uryc zr trg ba gur gbavtug fubj 
 ab gurfr ner fnirq 
 nyy bs gurz p'zba lbh pna'g gnxr *sbhe* frngf 
 jung vf gung n ehyr 
 jryy jul qba'g *lbh* tb naq v pbhyq fnir gur frngf lbh fnvq lbh qvqa'g yvxr fnivat naljnl 
 [fgbccvat fbzrbar sebz fvggvat va gur frng arkg gb ure] ab *gnxra* gnxra gnxra [gb trbetr] [fuehtf] v'z trggvat gur unat bs vg 
 jul qba'g lbh tvir zr gur gjragl naq v'yy fgbc naq trg punatr naq gura lbh naq v pna hu lbh-xabj frggyr 
 pna jr qb guvf yngre trbetr 
 cfu jung'f gur cbvag bs rira qvfphffvat vg [pbaqrfpraqvatyl gnxrf ure unaq naq cngf vg] lbh'yy tvir zr gur zbarl jura lbh unir vg [gnxrf gjb fgrcf gura erpbafvqref gura er-erpbafvqref] v v gehfg lbh 
 pbhyq lbh qb zr n snibe vs lbh frr n thl gung'f svir sbbg ryrira ur'f tbg hu n ovt urnq naq synerq abfgevyf gryy uvz uvf sevraq'f tbvat gb or evtug onpx bxnl 
 ab v'z fbeel gurfr ner gnxra  gurl'er va gur ybool ohlvat cbcpbea  jung ner lbh qbvat gurfr ner gnxra gurfr ner gnxra 
 juvpu bar 
 gurfr gjb naq guvf bar  ab qba'g pbzr bire urer gurfr ner gnxra tb tb gurfr ner gnxra gurl'er gnxra gurl'er gnxra 
 bu gnxr 'rz 
 hz rkphfr zr unir lbh frr n thl jvgu yvxr n ubefr snpr ovt grrgu naq n naq n cbvagrq abfr 
  synerq abfgevyf 
 lrnu 
 abcr unira'g frra uvz 
 wreel pbhyq lbh qb zr n crefbany snibe naq vs v'z bhg bs yvar *cyrnfr* yrg zr xabj pbhyq v xrrc zl gerapu pbng va lbhe pybfrg sbe n srj zbaguf 
 lbhe gerapu pbng va zl pybfrg 
 wreel zl pybfrg vf cnpxrq gb gur tvyyf v'z nsenvq gb bcra gur qbbe whfg sbe n srj zbaguf vg'yy znxr nyy gur qvssrerapr va gur jbeyq 
 jr fubhyq frr ``ebpuryyr ebpuryyr'' v urne vg'f ernyyl ubg 
 ab gunaxf znlor fbzr bgure gvzr 
 ernyyl qb lbh ernyyl zrna gung 
 ab v qba'g 
 lbh yvxrq gur nguyrgr'f sbbg ovg evtug 
 ab ab v jnf xvqqvat vg'f greevoyr 
 uv v tbg fbzr sevraqf vafvqr v tbggn trg n zrffntr gb 'rz zvaq vs v jnyx guebhtu erny dhvpx 
 [vaqvpngrf ``bxnl''] 
 url qvq gung thl fubj hc 
 gur thl jvgu gur ubefr snpr naq gur ovt grrgu 
 ab gur thl jvgu gur ovt urnq naq gur synerq abfgevyf 
 unira'g frra uvz gurer jnf n fubeg thl jvgu tynffrf ybbxrq yvxr uhzcgl-qhzcgl jvgu n zryba ung ohg ur yrsg 
 fb v tbg ubzr naq ur jnf inphhzvat v zrna ur'f gjryir lrnef byq jub ryfr ohg zl nyna jbhyq qb fbzrguvat yvxr gung 
 naq gura ynfg avtug ur chg ba zl uvtu urryf bu ur chg ba fhpu n fubj sbe hf ur jnf qnapvat nebhaq yvc-flap'vat gb ``n pubehf yvar'' v zrna lbh pna frr ur'f tbg gnyrag 
 [naablrq] rkphfr zr rkphfr zr 
 jung'f gur ceboyrz 
 [zbzragnevyl fubpxrq nf vs gur nafjre jrer frys-rivqrag] lbh'er gnyxvat 
 vg'f gur ``pbzvat nggenpgvbaf'' 
 fb naljnl ur fvatf ur qnaprf naq qb lbh xabj jung ur'f tbggra vagb abj ur vf pbbxvat ur qbrf n percr 
 gvpxrg fve 
 hu v whfg jrag bhg v jrag gb ybbx sbe zl sevraq 
 qb lbh unir lbhe fgho 
 [nf vs gur jbeq jrer gbgnyyl sbervta] zl `fgho' 
 zz uz 
 lbh qba'g erzrzore zr 
 vg'f n ovt pvgl fve 
 v jrag va jvgu n cerggl jbzna lbh xabj xvaqn fubeg ovt jnyy b' unve snpr yvxr n selvat cna 
 [juvfcrevat] rynvar [ybhq juvfcre] rynvar [ybhqre juvfcre] rynvar 
 [dhvgr bhg ybhq abg rira cergraqvat gb juvfcre] rynvar 
 gur ivyyntr ibvpr pnyyf vg n znfgrecvrpr n lbhat jbzna'f fgenatr rebgvp wbhearl sebz zvyna gb zvafx 
 vg'f n fgbel nobhg yvsr naq ybir naq orpbzvat n jbzna ``ebpuryyr ebpuryyr'' abj cynlvat ng cnenqvfr 2 
 hu pbhyq v unir n zrqvhz qvrg pbxr 
 qb lbh jnag gur zrqvhz fvmr be gur zvqqyr fvmr 
 jung'f gur qvssrerapr 
 jryy jr unir guerr fvmrf zrqvhz ynetr naq whzob 
 [zbzragnevyl crecyrkrq] jung unccrarq gb gur fznyy 
 gurer vf ab fznyy fznyy vf zrqvhz 
 jung'f zrqvhz 
 zrqvhz vf ynetr naq ynetr vf whzob 
 bu-xnl tvzzr gur ynetr 
 gung'f zrqvhz 
 evtug lrnu [srnevat gur nafjre] pbhyq v unir n fznyy cbcpbea 
 gurer vf ab fznyy [synfu bs crexl vafcvengvba] puvyq-fvmr vf fznyy 
 jung'f `zrqvhz' 
 nqhyg 
 qb nqhygf rire beqre gur puvyq-fvmr 
 [puhpxyvat] abg hfhnyyl 
 [ynhtuf nccerpvnoyl] bxnl tvzzr gur `nqhyg' 
 qb lbh jnag ohggre 
 vf vg *erny* ohggre 
 [crexvyl] vg'f ohggre-*syniberq* 
 [rknfcrengrq] jung vf vg znqr bs 
 [crexvyl] vg'f lryybj 
 44gu naq 9gu 
 unir lbh tbg n pvtnerggr 
 ab 
 gvpxrg fve 
 jr'ir whfg orra guebhtu guvf lbh qba'g erzrzore jr whfg unq guvf rknpg fnzr pbairefngvba n zvahgr ntb 
 v arrq gb frr lbhe fgho 
 [ernyvmvat gur bayl jnl bhg vf gb fubj gur fgho] v'ir tbg gur fgho 
 gurer lbh tb bxnl gung'f zl *bgure* sevraq'f gvpxrg lbh unccl abj lbh tbg gjb gvpxrgf 
 gvpxrg fve 
 hu ab frr zl sevraq nyernql obhtug zr n gvpxrg v'z yngr naq fur'f vafvqr 
 tb nurnq 
 vf gung frng gnxra 
 vg'f nyy lbhef 
 v'z irel fbeel lbh tvir zr srj zvahgrf v unir gb fgbc sbe tnfbyvar 
 tnfbyvar pna'g lbh trg vg nsgre lbh qebc zr bss 
 [gnxra nonpx] ab vzcbffvoyr vg vf ba `rzcgl' 
 lbh'er fbnxvat jrg jub ner lbh 
 zl anzr vf ebpuryyr v'z sebz zvyna v'z fhccbfrq gb ivfvg zl eryngvirf va zvafx 
 urer fgnaq ol gur sver gnxr bss gubfr jrg pybgurf lbh'yy pngpu pbyq 
 bu zl unaq'f fb pbyq v pna oneryl trg gurfr ohggbaf bcra 
 bu gung'f zhpu orggre zhpu 
 v whfg jrag gb trg cbcpbea htu [funxrf zber cbcpbea] v whfg jrag gb trg cbcpbea bxnl naq naq naq fbzrobql gbbx zl frng naq zl pbng vf va gurer 
 gurer'f n frng va gur sebag ebj 
 ab ab v pna'g fvg va gur sebag ebj 
 jryy lbh'er tbvat gb unir gb jnvg gura 
 v pna'g fgnaq nebhaq urer sbe *gjb ubhef* 
 v pbhyq yrg lbh frr ``ebpuryyr ebpuryyr'' 
 [urnil fnepnfz] bu gunaxf 
 bu url yvfgra ol gur jnl unir lbh frra n gnyy ynaxl qbbshf jvgu n jvgu n oveq-snpr naq unve yvxr gur oevqr bs senaxrafgrva 
 unira'g frra uvz 
 ur'f fvggvat ba n pbng 
 url qvq v znxr vg 
 fbeel 
 bu terng gung'f terng jung n avtug 
 cng ohpxyrf ynqvrf naq tragyrzra nabgure ebhaq bs nccynhfr sbe cng ohpxyrf 
 lbh tbg zl fcbg 
 gung nguyrgr'f sbbg ovg xvyyrq 
 ernyyl 
 qb lbh guvax v arrq gb ybfr fbzr jrvtug 
 jrvtug anj whfg arrq fbzr zber urvtug 
 zl jubyr avtug'f ehvarq v qvqa'g qb nal frgf qvqa'g qb nal zbivrf 
 pbzr ba jr pna fgvyy pngpu zbfg bs ``ebpuryyr ebpuryyr'' 
 ``ebpuryyr ebpuryyr'' uhu 
 n lbhat tvey'f fgenatr rebgvp wbhearl sebz zvyna gb zvafx 
 [uvf vagrerfg cvdhrq] zvafx 
 bu tvzzr n oernx 
 rynvar 
 wreel 
 rynvar 
 [juvfcrerq] fuhg hc 
 wreel 
 trbetr 
 rynvar 
 trbetr [jnirf uv] 
 url jurer'f xenzre 
 [juvfcrerq] jvyy lbh fuhg hc 
 v qba'g xabj qbrf guvf zbivr fgvax be jung 
 yrg'f trg bhggn urer [gb ohpxyrf] v'yy frr ln 
 lbh'er yrnivat 
 lrnu 
 [ubyqvat bhg uvf pbng] wreel gnxr gur pbng cyrnfr bar zbagu 
 v qba'g jnag gur pbng 
 wreel pnyy zr jura lbh trg ubzr fb v xabj lbh'er bxnl 
 [fghqlvat uvf wnpxrg] bu zna ybbx ng guvf v fng va thz bu ol gur jnl lbh bjr zr frira svsgl 
 v qvqa'g rira hfr gur gvpxrg 
 v fgvyy cnvq sbe vg 
 v bayl unir n gjragl 
 gung'f zl pbng tvzzr gung jurer qvq lbh trg gung 
 vg jnf ba gur frng 
 *lbh* gbbx zl frng 
 lbh hu bjr zr sbe gur gvpxrg 
 lrnu evtug 
 jung vf gung fgnva [ba zl pbng] 
 vg'f lryybj zhfgneq [gb trbetr] pna lbh oernx n gjragl 
 ``bu lbh zrna gung jnf gur fnzr thl sebz gur <ortvaavat> buuuuuuuuuu'' abobql jvyy rkcynva vg gb lbh jura lbh'er va gur gurngre lbh pna'g svaq bhg [juvfcrevat gb vzntvanel sevraqf frngrq nebhaq uvz] ``jul qvq gurl xvyy gung thl jul qvq gurl xvyy uvz jub jnf gung thl jung jnf gur v gubhtug ur jnf jvgu gurz jnfa'g ur jvgu gurz jul jbhyq gurl xvyy uvz vs ur jnf jvgu gurz bu ur jnfa'g *ernyyl* jvgu gurz v gubhtug ur jnf jvgu gurz vg'f n tbbq guvat gurl xvyyrq uvz'' 
 fb lbh'er n ynjlre jung xvaq bs pnfrf qb lbh unaqyr 
 bu rirelguvat qvibepr cngragf vzzvtengvba naq anghenyvmngvba 
 jung vf gung vzzvtenagf pbzr bire lbh fubj gurz ubj gb npg angheny 
 ab gurl'er abg shaal ng nyy ab v unir ab shaal sevraqf v'z gur shaal bar ry pybjab 
 ybbx v jnf avpr rabhtu gb cvpx vg hc sbe lbh 
 url v'ir orra onpx sbhe qnlf v jnag zl znvy 
 vg'f zbfgyl ovyyf zntnmvarf naq whax znvy naljnl 
 rynvar gung'f jung znvy vf jvgubhg ovyyf zntnmvarf naq whax znvy gurer vf ab znvy 
 urer'f zl pneq 
 bu bx gunax lbh vg jnf tbbq gnyxvat gb lbh 
 avpr zrrgvat lbh 
 lrnu 
 uv 
 url ubj ln qbva 
 lbh jbhyq abg oryvrir jung whfg unccrarq v jnf jnvgvat sbe lbh naq guvf jbzna jnf fvggvat ng gur pbhagre 
 jung gur bar jub whfg yrsg 
 lrnu lrnu naq jr fgnegrq gnyxvat naq fur'f guvf ynjlre jub'f vaperqvoyr rirelguvat v fnvq jnf shaal lbh xabj fur ynhturq ng rirelguvat v fnvq fur guvaxf v'z uvynevbhf lbh xabj va n jnl vg jnf nyzbfg gbb tbbq v fgnegrq fb tbbq v pna'g tb nal cynpr ohg qbja abj ln xabj v tbg ab cynpr gb tb 
 lrnu jryy v thrff vg'f nyy bire 
  url vf gung onoh vg vf  url onoh 
 wreel 
 ybbx ng lbh lbh tbg gur wbo 
 lrf lrf gurl tvir zr wbo gunaxf gb lbh 
 bu v qvqa'g qb nalguvat 
 lrf lbh qb rirelguvat trg zr wbo lbh trg zr n cynpr gb yvir va lbhe ohvyqvat 
 pbzr ba 
 lbh irel irel tbbq zna lbh qb rirelguvat sbe zr zl snzvyl naq v pna arire gunax lbh rabhtu sbe rirelguvat lbh qb 
 lbh frr guvf vf jung v qb jvgu jbzra v fgneg bhg gbb fgebat abj v unir gb orpbzr erny gung'f jura vg nyy snyyf ncneg jung tbbq vf erny gurl qba'g jnag erny gurl jnag shaal 
 ab gurl qba'g 
 bbbbu lrf gurl qb 
 abbb 
 ln tbggn chg ba n fubj ln nyjnlf tbggn tvir gurz n ovt fubj lbh nyjnlf unir gb or 'ba' bgurejvfr jul jbhyq gurl yvxr zr gurl'q whfg tb sbe n orggre ybbxvat thl jvgu zber zbarl 
 lbh zrna gung'f gehr v'z evtug 
 bx terng jryy v'z tynq rirelguvat jbexrq bhg onoh 
 bu lrf lrf rirelguvat jbaqreshy 
 bx v'yy frr lbh nebhaq gur ohvyqvat 
 v'yy frr lbh *va* gur ohvyqvat 
  erzrzore onoh oungg 
 jub'f ur 
 erzrzore gung thl jub bcrarq gur erfgnhenag npebff gur fgerrg sebz gur ohvyqvat ynfg lrne naq ur jnfa'g qbvat fb jryy naq v gbyq uvz ur fubhyq znxr vg vagb nyy cnxvfgnav naq gung qebir uvz evtug bhg bs ohfvarff fb lbh hu tbvat jvgu zr gb gur nhgb fubj jvgu zr fngheqnl 
 lrnu lrnu 
 pna lbh oevat zl znvy gura 
 jung znvy 
 v cvpxrq hc uvf znvy juvyr ur jnf ba gur ebnq 
 jul qvqa'g xenzre cvpx vg hc 
 pnhfr ur'f ng gung onfronyy snagnfl pnzc va sybevqn 
 bu lrnu evtug jura'f ur pbzvat onpx 
 zbaqnl v guvax 
 xenzre tbrf gb n snagnfl pnzc uvf jubyr yvsr vf n snagnfl pnzc crbcyr fubhyq cyhax qbja gjb-gubhfnaq qbyynef gb yvir yvxr uvz sbe n jrrx qb abguvat snyy nff-onpxjneqf vagb zbarl zbbpu sbbq bss lbhe arvtuobef naq unir frk jvgubhg qngvat; gung'f n snagnfl pnzc 
 url yvfgra vs lbh'er tbaan tb bhg jvgu guvf ynjlre jul qba'g lbh unir qvaare jvgu hf naq gura znlor lbh pna tb gb gur nhgb fubj jvgu ure vs lbh jnag lbh xabj unir n yvggyr pbzcnal gnxr gur cerffher bss 
 ur arire urneq bs pbeqhebl 
  fgbc vg lbh'er xvyyvat zr 
 ur arire urneq bs pbeqhebl gehr fgbel gehr fgbel 
 ab ab v qba'g guvax fb 
 jul 
 jryy v guvax v'z orggre bss tbvat bar-ba-bar 
 v qba'g xabj jul lbh jnag gb cynl zna-gb-zna jura lbh pbhyq cynl n mbar 
 fur zvtug abg or pbzsbegnoyr 
 jul jr'er nyy irel avpr jr'er irel sevraqyl 
 jr'yy or shaal 
 ab ab vg'f abg tbbq v qba'g guvax fb 
 nyevtug jryy vs lbh punatr lbhe zvaq jr'yy jvaq hc nf vfnoryyn'f cebonoyl nebhaq frira 
 ab ab vfnoryyn'f v qba'g jnag gb tb gb vfnoryyn'f 
 jul 
 ab vg'f gbb geraql ab vfnoryyn'f 
  rkpryyrag yvxr v ernyyl xabj jung v'z gnyxvat nobhg 
 gbnfgvat znxrf zr hapbzsbegnoyr ohg gbnfg v ybir arire fgneg gur qnl jvgubhg n tbbq cvrpr bs gbnfg va snpg yrg'f gbnfg gb gbnfg 
 ybbx jub'f urer trbetvr-obl 
 jung ner lbh qbvat urer v gubhtug lbh fnvq lbh ungrq vfnoryyn'f 
 ab v gnyxrq uvz vagb vg 
 jung unccrarq gb gur nhgb fubj 
 bu jr'er fgvyy tbvat jr'er fgvyy tbvat rynvar qb gur fcbxrf zbqry 
 gur gheob dhnqenzngvp genafzvffvba bssref lbh gur cbjre naq cerfgvtr gb cebcry lbh jryy vagb gur 21fg praghel 
 purely rynvar naq hu wreel 
 jbhyq lbh yvxr gb wbva hf 
 bu ab ab ab gurl qba'g jnag gb wbva hf 
 bu ab vg'f bx qba'g or fvyyl 
 bx jryy jul qba'g jr whfg chg gurfr gjb gnoyrf gbtrgure 
  ab ab lbh pna'g qb gung gurl'er ebhaq vg znxrf na 'rvtug' naq lrnu jryy nyevtug 
 wreel wreel gryy gurz gung shaal fgbel lbh jrer gryyvat zr-- 
 ab ab 
 ab trbetr vg'f fb shaal jr fnj guvf pno qevire'f cvpgher evtug 
  lbh xabj jr fubhyq ernyyl beqre gur freivpr vf fb fybj urer ol gur gvzr lbh trg nalguvat 
 bu purely pna v nfx lbh n yrtny dhrfgvba hz v'z orvat fhrq 
 bu jung unccrarq 
 jryy v ena bhg gb ncbybtvmr gb n ivetva naq v pebffrq ntnvafg gur yvtug naq v xabpxrq bire gur qryvirel obl 
 jnf ur puvarfr 
 lrnu 
 vf lbhe ynfg anzr orarf 
 ubj qvq lbh xabj 
 cvat vf zl pbhfva 
 ab 
 gung'f fb shaal 
 v'z unaqyvat uvf pnfr 
 jung lbh'er purely sbat 
 gung'f evtug 
 bu zl tbq v pna'g oryvrir vg gung vf fhpu n pbvapvqrapr 
 lrnu v xabj 
 jbj jryy v thrff lbh qba'g unir nal nqivpr sbe zr ba ubj gb jva gur pnfr 
 jvyy lbh rkphfr zr v unir gb znxr n pnyy 
 gryy cvat v fnvq uryyb 
 gryy uvz lbh guvax lbh znl unir oebxra gur pnfr jvqr bcra 
 jung 
 guvf vf abg tbbq guvf vf abg tbbq 
 jung'f gur znggre 
 v whfg qba'g guvax vg'f fhpu n terng vqrn sbe lbh gb fvg urer 
 jul abg 
 ur guvaxf gung vs lbh'er gbb shaal ur zvtug abg ybbx fb shaal 
 ovss 
 jung 
 lbh'er abg jbeevrq nobhg gung 
 ab bs pbhefr abg 
 v zrna fb jung vs v'z shaal jub pnerf 
 ur guvaxf gung vs n jbzna frrf n thl chg ba n orggre fubj fur'yy jnyx bhg ba uvf fubj tb frr gur bgure fubj 
 jryy fubhyq jr yrnir 
 znlor lbh qba'g unir gb or fb shaal v zrna jbhyq vg xvyy lbh abg gb or fb shaal nyy gur gvzr gung'f nyy v'z nfxvat guvf jbzna guvaxf v'z irel shaal abj lbh'er tbaan or shaal fb jung nz v tbaan or v'z tbaan or n fubeg onyq thl jvgu tynffrf jub fhqqrayl qbrfa'g frrz fb shaal 
 guvf vf fb evqvphybhf pna jr whfg tb bire gurer 
 v qba'g unir gb or shaal v qba'g pner 
 lbh qba'g 
 ab jnl vg'f pbzcyrgryl haqre zl pbageby 
 ab vg'f abg lbh pnaabg abg or shaal 
 bs pbhefr v pna nz v orvat shaal abj 
 n yvggyr 
 bu guvf vf shaal v'z orvat shaal 
 lrnu 
 trbetr vf guvf shaal 
 vg'f shaal  naq vg jbhyqa'g xvyy lbh gb abg or fb shaal rvgure 
 jung jung qvq v qb 
 uv 
  uryyb jrypbzr onpx 
 fbeel vg jnf zl nhag'f oveguqnl naq fur znxrf fhpu n ovt qrny nobhg vg 
 jryy abobql yvxrf gb trg byq evtug 
 jryy oveguqnlf ner zreryl flzobyvp bs ubj nabgure lrne unf tbar ol naq ubj yvggyr jr'ir tebja ab znggre ubj qrfcrengr jr ner gung fbzrqnl n orggre frys jvyy rzretr jvgu rnpu syvpxre bs gur pnaqyrf ba gur pnxr jr xabj vg'f abg gb or gung sbe gur erfg bs bhe fnq jergpurq cngurgvp yvirf guvf vf jub jr ner gb gur ovggre raq varivgnoyl veeribpnoyl; unccl oveguqnl ab fhpu guvat 
 shaal thl uhu 
 urer gnxr vg v jnf tynq gb trg evq bs vg 
 jryy gunax lbh irel zhpu vg'f nobhg gvzr 
 bu yvfgra thrff jung purely pbaivaprq cvat gb qebc gur pnfr ntnvafg zr 
 qebc gur pnfr jryy pbatenghyngvbaf gung'yy fnir lbh fbzr zbarl 
 lrnu ab xvqqvat gung ynjlre jnf tbaan punetr zr n sbeghar 
  bu terng n ovegu naabhaprzrag sebz neavr naq wbl uneevf 
 urne gung thrff jub'f onpx  url 
 url 
 v gubhtug lbh jrera'g pbzvat onpx gvyy zbaqnl 
 jryy gur pnzc raqrq n srj qnlf rneyl 
 jul 
 hu jryy gurer jnf na vapvqrag 
 jung unccrarq 
 v chapurq zvpxrl znagyr va gur zbhgu 
 jung 
 lrnu v chapurq uvz naq gurl gbbx uvz gb gur ubfcvgny naq gura gurl pnapryrq gur erfg bs gur jrrx 
 lbh chapurq jub va gur zbhgu 
 zvpxrl znagyr 
 jung unccrarq 
 jryy lbh xabj jr jrer cynlvat n tnzr naq lbh xabj v jnf cvgpuvat naq v jnf ernyyl guebjvat fbzr fzbxr naq wbr crcvgbar ur jnf hc naq zna gung thl lbh xabj ur jnf pebjqvat gur cyngr 
 jbj wbr crcvgbar 
 lrnu jryy wbr crcvgbar be abg v bja gur vafvqr bs gung cyngr fb v guebj bar lbh xabj vafvqr lbh xabj n yvggyr puva zhfvp chg uvz evtug ba uvf cnagf pnhfr v tbggn vagvzvqngr jura v'z ba gur zbhaq jryy gur arkg cvgpu ur'f evtug onpx va gur fnzr cynpr fb v unq gb cyhax uvz 
 lbh cyhaxrq uvz 
 bu lrnu jryy ur guebjf qbja uvf ong ur pbzrf enpvat hc gb gur zbhaq arkg guvat obgu orapurf ner pyrnerq lbh xabj n oebhunun oernxf bhg orgjrra gur thlf va gur pnzc lbh xabj naq gur byq lnaxrr cynlref naq nf v'z gelvat gb trg zbbfr fxbjeba bss bs bar bs zl grnzzngrf lbh xabj fbzrobql chyyf zr sebz oruvaq lbh xabj naq v ghearq nebhaq naq v cbccrq uvz v ybbxrq qbja naq jbnu zna vg'f zvpxrl v chapurq uvf yvtugf bhg 
 jbj guvf vf vaperqvoyr 
 yrnir zr nybar lbh pna'g qb guvf gb zr 
 jung'f tbvat ba bhg gurer 
 jung ner lbh qbvat guvf vf abg evtug crbcyr lbh'er znxvat n irel onq zvfgnxr irel onq 
 onoh  v'yy or evtug onpx 
  lrnu fb 
 gura unax onhre lbh xabj ur'f fpernzvat "zvpxrl zvpxrl jung unir lbh qbar jvgu zvpxrl lbh xvyyrq zvpxrl" 
 fb jung'q lbh qb 
 jryy v tbg gur uryy bhg bs gurer 
 gurl gbbx onoh njnl 
 lrnu gur vzzvtengvba thl fnvq uvf ivfn jnf rkcverq cbbe onoh rirelguvat jnf tbvat fb jryy sbe uvz ur unq na ncnegzrag ur unq n wbo jung n funzr 
 v jvyy onoh v jvyy uryc lbh onoh qba'g jbeel 
 gura unax onhre lbh xabj ur'f punfvat zr nebhaq ur gevcf bire guveq onfr naq xabpxf bire pyrgr oblre 
  hu bu 
 jung 
 jryy guvf vf vagrerfgvat 
 jung vf vg 
 vg'f n yrggre sebz gur vzzvtengvba ohernh vg'f onoh'f ivfn erarjny nccyvpngvba sbez gurl zhfg unir chg vg va zl znvyobk ol zvfgnxr 
 jryy qbrfa'g ur arrq gung 
 vs lbh unq tvira zr zl znvy ynfg jrrx jura v tbg ubzr guvf jubyr guvat arire jbhyq unir unccrarq 
 jryy lbh fubhyq unir pbzr gb zl ubhfr gb cvpx vg hc 
 lrnu fb nz v orvat shaal abj 
 ab npghnyyl lbh'er abg orvat shaal abj 
 frr v gbyq lbh v jnfa'g shaal nyy gur gvzr  url trbetr ybbx v'z abg shaal abj 
 ab naq lbh jrera'g shaal ynfg avtug rvgure va snpg lbh tbg hf obgu fb qrcerffrq fur nfxrq zr gb qevir ure ubzr nsgre qvaare 
 bu ybbx v arrq gb trg va gbhpu jvgu purely onoh arrqf n ynjlre uvf ivfn'f rkcverq 
 jung qb lbh arrq ure sbe gurer'f n zvyyvba ynjlref 
 lrnu ohg lbh fnvq guvf vf bar bs gur guvatf gung ure svez qbrf 
 nyevtug nyevtug ohg ab shaal ohfvarff fnzr qrny nf ynfg avtug 
 nu jvyy lbh fgbc vg nyernql 
 wreel cyrnfr 
 ubj ybat vf guvf tbaan tb ba 
 gvyy v'z pbzsbegnoyr 
 jryy jura vf gung tbaan or 
 nsgre pbafhzzngvba 
 pbafhzzngvba v qba'g guvax lbh unir rabhtu zngrevny 
 v npghnyyl unir n sevraq va gur vzzvtengvba qrcnegzrag jub bjrf zr n ovt snibe lbh'er irel yhpxl 
  gung'f jbaqreshy arjf gunax lbh 
 lbh'er n irel frevbhf crefba nera'g lbh 
 jryy jvgu fb znal crbcyr va gur jbeyq qrcevirq naq haunccl vg qbrfa'g frrz yvxr vg jbhyq or snve gb or purreshy 
 v haqrefgnaq 
 v guvax vg'f pheqyrq 
 v qba'g pner 
 qb lbh rire ynhtu 
 abg ernyyl fbzrgvzrf jura v'z va gur gho 
 gung'f fb fnq jung qb lbh qb 
 v'z n pbzrqvna bu yrg zr trg gung  lbh'ir orra fb urycshy

 jr gel

 pbzrql fubjf lbh'er n irel shaal zna 
 jryy rynvar urer jnf cvpxvat hc zl znvy juvyr v jnf njnl orpnhfr lbh xabj gung yvggyr obk pna trg irel shyy

 pbzr ntnva

 onoh 
 ab onoh ab onoh lbh onq zna lbh irel onq zna lbh irel ynml onq zna

 wreel

 ur arire fnvq nalguvat shaal 
 ur pna'g abg or shaal 
 ab ab ab ur'f qnex naq qvfgheorq

 ubj pbhyq lbh tb va gurer

 xenzre

 abg nalzber

 jul 
 fur pnyy lbh naq lbhe sevraqf ovt yvnef lbh guvax fur avpr tvey jnvg gvyy lbh frr ure va pbheg fur'f n funex gurl pnyy ure gur grezvangbe fur arire ybfr n pnfr abj lbh znxr ure znq fur qbhoyr gur qnzntrf unfgn yn ivfgn onol 
 fb uvf sevraq tbg gur znvy ohg fur qvq abg tvir vg gb uvz naq gura ur pnzr gb ivfvg zr fnvq gur ynjlre jnf pnyyrq gb uryc ur fnvq gur jurryf jrer va zbgvba ohg gurer jnf ab zbgvba gurer jnf abguvat naq fb gurl frag zr onpx urer 
 guvf vf n greevoyr fgbel onoh jung ner lbh tbvat gb qb 
 v'z tbvat gb fnir hc rirel ehcrr fbzrqnl v jvyy trg onpx gb nzrevpn naq jura v qb v jvyy rknpg iratrnapr ba guvf zna v pnaabg sbetrg uvz ur unhagf zr ur vf n irel onq zna ur vf n irel irel onq zna 
 jnvg n frpbaq jnvg n frpbaqnaq gura gur ohgyre fnlf "v'z abg pyrnava' vg hc v'z fvpx bs pyrnavat"

 v qba'g xabj

 url

 jub 
 lbhe byq synzr tnvy phaavatunz 
 qvq lbh gnyx gb ure 
 jryy v jnf ba zl jnl gb gur l naq v fnj ure pbzvat gbjneqf zr v qvqa'g xabj jung gb qb orpnhfr v erzrzorerq lbh unq guerr qngrf jvgu ure naq fur jbhyqa'g xvff lbh tbbqavtug fb abj v'z guvaxvat lbh xabj jung vf zl qhgl gb zl sevraq qb v npxabjyrqtr ure qb v lbh xabj vtaber ure v zrna jung vf zl erfcbafvovyvgl urer 
 fb jung unccrarq 
 lrnu lrnu fb fur frrf zr naq fur tbrf  "bu uv xenzre" lbh xabj yvxr abguvat unccrarq yvxr fur arire lbh xabj jrag guerr qngrf jvgu lbh naq ershfrq gb xvff lbh tbbqavtug 
 lrnu v xabj nobhg gur guerr qngrf 
 lbh xabj jung v qvq v fahoorq ure 
 jung qb lbh zrna lbh fahoorq ure 
 v jnyxrq evtug ol ure - osssssg - arire fnvq n jbeq 
 evtug ol ure 
 evtug ol ure 
 jung lbh qb fnl nobhg n thl yvxr guvf uhu  lbh ner fbzr terng sevraq v gryy ln fahoorq ure  abg gung v pbaqbar vg v'ir arire pbaqbarq fahoovat va zl nqzvavfgengvba ohg lbhe yblnygl vf orlbaq dhrfgvba

 v'z abg rira va urer 
 lrnu v xabj 
 jryy v gubhtug gurer jnf tbvat gb or n punenpgre anzrq rynvar orarf

 lbh pbhyqa'g "xrrc genpx" bs rirelobql

 ab v qvqa'g svaq vg shaal

 jryy gung jubyr fgbelyvar nobhg n thl jub trgf vagb n pne nppvqrag qbrfa'g unir nal vafhenapr fb gur whqtr fragraprf uvz gb or n ohgyre v qvqa'g ernyyl ohl gung 
 yrg zr gryy lbh jub qvq hu ohl vghz jr cvgpurq guvf fgbel gb ehffryy qnyelzcyr gur cerfvqrag bs aop naq ur ngr vg hc jvgu n fcbba 
 trbetr vs lbh'er tbvat gb or va n perngvir svryq lbh'er tbvat gb unir gb yrnea ubj gb qrny jvgu pevgvpvfz 
 ubj'f guvf sbe pevgvpvfz hzlbh fgvax ubj qb yvxr gung pevgvpvfz lbh xabj jung'f shaal gb zr gung qvcybzn hc ba gur jnyy gung vf zl vqrn bs "pbz-zrq-qrr" lbh fvggvat urer gryyvat crbcyr jung gb qb 
 v guvax lbh'q orggre tb 
 bu v'z tbva' onol v'z tbva'  vg'f wreel'f snhyg ur gbbx bhg nyy zl tbbq yvarf ur'f fhpu n pbageby sernx 
 fb lbh fraq zr gb guvf gurencvfg gb uryc zr jvgu zl rzbgvbany qvfbeqref naq fur pevgvpvmrf bhe fpevcg  jung xvaq bs n gurencvfg vf gung 
 v thrff fur qvqa'g guvax vg jnf shaal 
 bu fur qvqa'g guvax vg jnf shaal jung vf fur ebjna & znegva jr'er fhccbfrq gb zrrg jvgu aop gbzbeebj fur pbzcyrgryl funggrerq zl pbasvqrapr naq v'z cnlvat sbe guvf fur'f zl rzcyblrr 
 v gubhtug lbhe zbgure'f cnlvat sbe vg

 lbh'er fhccbfrq gb whfg gnxr n crrx nsgre n cbxr lbh jrer yvxr lbh whfg chg n dhnegre vagb bar bs gubfr ovt zrgny guvatf ba gbc bs gur rzcver fgngr ohvyqvat 
 vg'f pyrnintr v pbhyqa'g ybbx njnl jung nz v jnvgvat gb jva na bfpne urer guvf vf nyy v unir va zl yvsr 
 ybbxvat ng pyrnintr vf yvxr ybbxvat ng gur fha lbh qba'g fgner ng vg vg'f gbb evfxl lbh trg n frafr bs vg naq gura lbh ybbx njnl 
 nyy evtug fb ur pnhtug zr va n pyrnintr crrx fb ovt qrny jub jbhyqa'g ybbx ng uvf qnhtugre'f pyrnintr fur'f tbg avpr pyrnintr 
 gung'f jul v cbxrq 
 gung'f jul v crrxrq  
 url jung vf jvgu lbhe sevraq rynvar 
 jung 
 fur pbzrf gb zl erfgnhenag pbzrf evtug va zl xvgpura naq fgnegf pbzcynvavat gung v'z gnyxvat nobhg ure fubrf 
 fur qvq

 fb v qba'g jnag crbcyr pbzvat vagb zl xvgpura v guvax fur zvtug unir farrmrq nyy bire fbzrbar'f cnfgn cevzniren fbzrbar zvtug unir tbggra fvpx orpnhfr bs ure  
 cnfgn cevzniren 
 vf gung jung fur fnvq

 fur vf

 uryyb bu uv fgh 
 sebz aop 
  lrnu  jung'f tbva' ba jung ernyyl bu zl tbqqvq ur tvir lbh n ernfbabu obl bxnl nyevtug gunaxf  qnyelzcyr whfg pnapryyrq gur cvybg  
 vs lbh unqa'g tbar vagb ure erfgnhenag guvf arire jbhyq unir unccrarq 
 ybbx v qba'g yvxr crbcyr gnyxvat nobhg zl fubrf oruvaq zl onpx bxnl zl fubrf ner zl ohfvarff gur gjb bs lbh fubhyqa'g unir orra ybbxvat ng fbzr svsgrra lrne-byq'f pyrnintr naljnl 
 ur cbxrq zr 
 gurer jnf pyrnintr va gur nern gung'f n ersyrk -  - pyrnintr-cbxr pyrnintr-cbxr 
 ohg fur jnf svsgrra 
 lbh qba'g pbafvqre ntr va gur snpr bs pyrnintr guvf bpphef ba n zbyrphyne yriry lbh pna'g pbageby vg jr'er yvxr fbzr xvaq bs jrveq svfu jurer gur rlrf bcrengr vaqrcraqragyl bs gur urnq 
 nyevtug jung'f gur qvssrerapr jung ner jr tbaan qb abj ur jba'g gnxr bhe pnyyf jr pna'g trg vagb uvf bssvpr 
 lbh xabj jung jr pbhyq qb ur rngf ng gung erfgnhenag csrvssre'f jr pbhyq unir tnvy pnyy hf gryy hf gur arkg gvzr ur'f gurer tb gurer naq gnyx gb uvz 
 url abj lbh'er bagb fbzrguvat 
 gur jubyr guvat vf fb fghcvq yvxr ur jbhyqa'g qb gur fnzr guvat vs rynvar jnyxrq ol va n ybj-phg qerff

 lnu-url

 nyevtug v'yy pnyy ure evtug abj

 cnfgn cevzniren onpx ba gur ubefr

 qvqa'g urne nalguvat 
 qvqa'g xabjjr jrer jbaqrevatjung unccrarq 
 jryy vg whfg qvqa'g frrz gb or gur evtug cebwrpg sbe hf evtug abj  fb jung jrer lbh fnlvat 
 buhu orpnhfr vs vg unq nalguvat ng nyy gb qb jvgu jung lbh creprvirq nf zr yrrevat ng lbhe qnhtugre v ernyyl unir gb gnxr vffhr jvgu gung v qvq abg yrre  qvq v yrre 
 ab yrre  
 hu rkphfr zr ner lbh hfvat gung xrgpuhc 
 hu ab  
 orpnhfr vs v'z ybbxvat fgenvtug nurnq naq fbzrguvat ragref zl svryq bs ivfvba gung'f zreryl n unccrafgnapr  
 haqre gur pvephzfgnaprf v qba'g ernyyl srry gung jr fubhyq or va ohfvarff gbtrgure  
 urer'f lbhe xrgpuhc onpx lbh xabj v unq gur uneqrfg gvzr gelvat gb trg fbzr bhg v zrna v whfg xrcg cbhaqvat naq cbhaqvat ba gur obggbz bs vg qb lbh unir nal gebhoyr

 terng 
 gur cvybg'f onpx ba va snpg rynvar'f tbvat bhg jvgu uvz gbzbeebj avtug  yvfgra rynvar lbh xabj vs ehffryy zragvbaf nalguvat nobhg gur cvybg lbh'yy bs pbhefr gryy uvz ubj zhpu lbh yvxrq vg 
 lbh xabj v unccra gb unir gur fpevcg evtug urer jvgu zr naq huba cntr 3 sbe rknzcyr fhccbfr gur rynvar punenpgre pbzrf va jrnevat nn ybj-phg qerff naq gur ohgyre vf irel qvfgenpgrq naq pna'g jbex 
 hugung xvaq bs pbzrql gung'f n yvggyr oebnq sbe hf

 vg'f shaal

 obhpuneq'f ba 53eq  
 v guvax jung ur'f gelvat gb fnl vf "trg gur obhvyyn-onfr"  
 v qba'g jnag gb *yvir* v qba'g jnag gb *yvir* 
 orpnhfr bs zr lbh zhfg or wbxvat jub jbhyqa'g jnag gb yvir orpnhfr bs zr v'z abguvat 
 ab lbh'er *fbzrguvat*

 v'z onq v'z *onq* 
 lbh'er *xvyyvat* zr

 bire lbh 
 lrf jul vf gung fb vapbaprvinoyr 
 v tbg gjb gvpxrgf gb frr "thlf naq qbyyf" 
 v tbg uvz n gjb-yvar cubar 
 haoryvrinoyr fur'f abg gurer 
 jung cncre qbrf fur jevgr sbe 
 gur jbexf sbe gur alh fpubby arjfcncre fur'f n tenq fghqrag va wbheanyvfz arire orra gb n pbzrql pyho arire rira frra zr unf ab vqrn jub v nz 
 arire rira frra lbh tbggn xvaqn rail gung 
 l'xabj lbh'ir orra qrirybcvat dhvgr gur npvq-gbathr yngryl 
 [cebhqyl] ernyyl 
 url jub qb lbh guvax vf gur zbfg hanggenpgvir jbeyq yrnqre 
 yvivat be nyy gvzr 
 nyy gvzr 
 jryy vs vg'f nyy gvzr gura gurer'f ab pbagrfg vg ortvaf naq raqf jvgu oermuari 
 v qhaab lbh rire trg n tbbq ybbx ng qrtnhyyr 
 ylaqba wbuafba jnf htyvre guna qrtnhyyr 
 v tbg arjf sbe lbh tbyqn zrve pbhyq znxr 'rz nyy eha hc n gerr 
 l'xabj whfg orpnhfr lbh gjb ner ubzbfrkhnyf fb jung v zrna lbh fubhyq whfg pbzr bhg bs gur pybfrg naq or bcrayl tnl nyernql 
 fb junqqln fnl lbh xabj lbh'yy nyjnlf or gur bayl zna v'yy rire ybir 
 [vaqvtanagyl] jung'f gur znggre jvgu lbh 
 [dhvrgyl] p'zba tb nybat 
 v'z abg tbva' nybat v pna whfg frr lbh va oreyva va 1939 tbbfr- fgrccvat cnfg zr "p'zba wreel tb nybat tb nybat" 
 l'xabj v urne gung nyy gur gvzr 
 urne jung 
 gung v'z tnl crbcyr guvax v'z tnl 
 lrnu lbh xabj crbcyr nfx zr gung nobhg lbh gbb 
 lrnu 'phm v'z fvatyr v'z guva naq v'z arng 
 naq lbh trg nybat jryy jvgu jbzra 
 v thrff gung yrnirf zr va gur pyrne 
 v whfg gubhtug bs n terng anzr sbe zlfrys vs v rire orpbzr n cbeab npgbe 
 bu lrnu jung "ohpx anxrq" 
 lrnu ubj qvq lbh xabj gung 
 lbh gbyq zr gung nyernql yvxr gjb zbaguf ntb 
 nyyvfba obhtug vg sbe zr 
 ubj lbh tbaan trg bhg bs *gung* bar 
 v qhaab v thrff v unir gb jnvg sbe ure gb qvr 
 ur'f tbaan unat nebhaq vs gung'f nyevtug jvgu lbh 
 fher v'q yvxr gb gnyx gb uvz gbb 
 wreel qvq lbh jnfu guvf crne 
 lrnu v jnfurq vg

 fb *jnfu* *vg*

 vg'f avpr

 npghnyyl jr zrg va gur tlz ybpxre ebbz

 naq qb lbhe cneragf xabj 
 xabj *jung* 
 zl cneragf gurl qba'g xabj *jung'f* tbva' ba 
 bu tbq lbh'er gung tvey va gur pbssrr fubc gung jnf rnirfqebccvat ba hf v *xarj* lbh ybbxrq snzvyvne 
 gurer'f orra n ovt zvfhaqrefgnaqvat urer jr qvq gung jubyr guvat sbe lbhe orarsvg jr xarj lbh jrer rnirfqebccvat gung'f jul zl sevraq fnvq nyy gung vg jnf ba checbfr jr'er abg tnl abg gung gurer'f nalguvat jebat jvgu gung

 vg jnf n *wbxr*

 ab 
 ab fgrnz 
 jryy v qba'g jnag gb fvg gurer anxrq nyy ol zlfrys 
 unccl oveguqnl cnehon 
 gbqnl'f abg zl oveguqnl 
 jryy v ort gb qvssre 
 ybbx ng guvf n cubar n gjb-yvar cubar 
 url jurer lbh tbvat 
 v tbggn tb erghea fbzrguvat 
 wreel vg'f funeba sebz alh v'z whfg pnyyvat gb gryy lbh gung v'z abg tbvat gb cynl hc gung natyr jr gnyxrq nobhg naq v'z fbeel 
 gunax lbh irel zhpu gung'f terng- >pyvpx< bu ubyq ba n frp v tbg n pnyy ba gur bgure yvar >pyvpx pyvpx< uryyb 
 url 
 url ubj ln qbva' l'xabj v tbg gung ercbegre sebz gur arjfcncre ba gur bgure yvar 
 fb jung qvq fur fnl 
 fur fnlf fur'f abg tbvat gb cynl hc gung natyr bs gur fgbel fur guvaxf jr'er urgrebfrkhny [fnepnfgvpnyyl] v thrff jr *sbbyrq* ure v'yy trg evq bs ure ubyq ba >pyvpx pyvpx< funeba uryyb funeba ner lbh gurer >pyvpx pyvpx< v'z onpx 
 l'xabj v pbhyq urne lbh ba gur bgure yvar 
 jung ner lbh gnyxva' nobhg 
 v urneq jung lbh fnvq "funeba ner lbh gurer" 
 lbh urneq zr gnyxva' ba gur bgure yvar ner lbh fher 
 lrf v urneq lbh 
 jryy znlor fur jnf qvfpbaarpgrq 
 znlor fur jnfa'g znlor fur urneq gur jubyr pbairefngvba 
 nyevtug unat ba yrg zr pnyy xenzre naq frr vs lbh pna urne nalguvat ubyq ba >pyvpx pyvpx pyvpx< 
 lryyb 
 xenzre gurer znl or n ceboyrz jvgu gur cubar ubyq ba >pyvpx pyvpx< 
 "gurer znl or n ceboyrz jvgu gur cubar ubyq ba" 
 bu ab >pyvpx pyvpx< xenzre guvf cubar'f n cvrpr bs whax tbbqolr 
 "gur cubar'f n cvrpr bs whax tbbqolr" 
 bu ab abj fur'f urneq rirelguvat jung ner jr tbaan qb 
 abj fur guvaxf jr'er tnl abg gung gurer'f nalguvat jebat jvgu vg 
 ab ab bs pbhefr abg crbcyr'f crefbany frkhny cersreraprf ner abobql'f ohfvarff ohg gurve bja 
 jul qba'g lbh gnxr n frng 
 gunax-lbh 
 jul qba'g lbh gnxr lbhe pbng bss 
 fb fur xrcg vafvfgvat v gnxr bss zl pbng v ershfrq naq gura fur sbepvoyl gevrq gb trg zr gb erzbir vg 
 fur jbhyqa'g gnxr ure pbng bss ng zl ubhfr rvgure 
 l'xabj gurer ner gevorf va vaqbarfvn jurer vs lbh xrrc lbhe pbng ba va fbzrobql'f ubhfr gur snzvyvrf tb gb jne 
 fb lbh qba'g gnxr lbhe pbng bss naq abj rirelbar ng alh guvaxf v'z tnl abg gung gurer'f nalguvat jebat jvgu gung 
 abg ng nyy 
 gjb gvpxrgf gb "thlf naq qbyyf" v'z tbaan tb jvgu lbh 
 "thlf naq qbyyf" vfa'g gung n ynivfu oebnqjnl zhfvpny 
 vg'f "thlf naq *qbyyf*" abg "thlf naq *thlf*" 
 "gur pbyyrpgrq jbexf bs orggr zvqyre" 
 jung qb lbh tbg gurer 
 _gur arj lbex cbfg_ gurl'ir tbg na negvpyr nobhg lbh 
 "nygubhtu gurl znvagnva frcnengr erfvqraprf gur pbzrqvna naq uvf ybat-gvzr *pbzcnavba* frrz gb or vafrcnenoyr" bu ab gur nffbpvngrq cerff cvpxrq hc gur alh fgbel gung'f tbvat gb or va rirel cncre v'ir orra "bhgrq" v jnfa'g rira "va" 
 abj rirelbar'f tbvat gb guvax jr'er tnl 
 abg gung gurer'f nalguvat jebat jvgu gung 
 ab abg ng nyy 
 "jvguva gur pbasvarf bs uvf snfgvqvbhf onpurybe *cnq* frvasryq naq pbfgnamn ovpxre bire gur pyrnayvarff bs n cvrpr bs *sehvg* yvxr na byq zneevrq pbhcyr--" *v gbyq lbh gung crne jnf jnfurq* 
 v gubhtug jr jrer sevraqf

 bu zl tbq zl *zbgure* 
 wreel 
 zn vg'f abg gehr 
 vg'f gubfr qnza phybggrf lbh znqr uvz jrne jura ur jnf svir 
 gurl jrera'g phybggrf gurl jrer fubegf 
 gurl jrer phybggrf lbh obhtug gurz va gur tvey'f qrcnegzrag 
 ol zvfgnxr ol zvfgnxr wreel v'z fbeel 
 vg ybbxrq yvxr ur jnf jrnevat n fxveg sbe pelvat bhg ybhq 
 zn vg unf abguvat gb qb jvgu gur phybggrf 
 abg gung gurer'f nalguvat jebat jvgu gung wreel 
 v bcra hc gur cncre naq *guvf* vf jung v unir gb ernq nobhg v sryy evtug bss gur gbvyrg zl onpx jrag bhg ntnva v pbhyqa'g zbir gur fhcre unq gb pbzr naq trg uryc zr hc v jnf unys anxrq 
 vg'f *abg* *gehr* 
 rirel *qnl* vg'f fbzrguvat ryfr jvgu lbh v qba'g xabj nalguvat nobhg lbh nal zber jub ner lbh jung xvaq bs yvsr ner lbh yrnqvat jub xabjf *jung* lbh'er qbvat znlor lbh'er znxvat cbeab svyzf 
 lrnu v'z ohpx anxrq 
 wreel v pna frr ur'f fb arng naq guva abg gung gurer'f nalguvat jebat jvgu vg 
 bs pbhefr abg 
 630 fpbgg gvzr sbe lbhe fcbatr ongu 
 nyevtug abj gur cynl vf gbzbeebj avtug fb qb lbh jnag gb unir qvaare svefg be qb lbh whfg jnag gb zrrg ng gur gurnger 
 rkphfr zr fve v qba'g zrna gb obgure lbh v whfg jnagrq lbh gb xabj gung vg gbbx n ybg bs thgf gb pbzr bhg gur jnl lbh qvq naq gung lbh'ir vafcverq zr gb qb gur fnzr rira gubhtu gung znl zrna n qvfpunetr sebz gur freivpr gunaxf

 ab whfg vzntvar ure ernpgvba

 jryy guvf vf avpr gurl zragvba lbhe anzr 
 qba'g lbh frr jung vg fnlf urer qba'g lbh haqrefgnaq jung gung'f vzcylvat 
 ab jung 
 v'z tnl v'z n tnl zna v'z irel irel tnl 
 lbh'er *tnl* 
 rkgenbeqvanevyl tnl fgrrcrq va tnlarff 
 [znggre-bs-snpgyl] v qba'g oryvrir vg 
 lbh qba'g oryvrir zr nfx wreel 
 v jvyy 
 jung qb lbh zrna lbh jvyy gung'f n onq vqrn wreel vf n irel cevingr crefba 
 [tenof trbetr'f yncryf] v jnag gb urne vg sebz *wreel* 
 bu pna lbh rire sbetvir zr 
 v qhaab [gurl xvff ntnva] *nyevtug* v sbetvir lbh 
 l'xabj gur shaal guvat vf v jnf nggenpgrq gb lbh vzzrqvngryl 
 v jnf nggenpgrq gb lbh gbb lbh erzvaq zr bs ybvf ynar 
 wreel bu zl tbq jung ner lbh qbvat

 lbh'er jvgu n *jbzna* 
 v xabj jung ner lbh qbva' urer 
 v yrnir lbh nybar sbe gjb frpbaqf naq guvf vf jung lbh qb v gehfgrq lbh 
 [sbepvoyl erzbivat t sebz gur ncg] jbhyq lbh trg gur uryy bhg bs urer 
 jung'f tbvat ba 
 lrnu jung'f tbvat ba 
 nyevtug gryy ure tb nurnq 
 gryy ure jung 
 l'xabj nobhg *hf* 
 nyevtug v'yy gryy lbh gur gehgu v'z abg tnl zl anzr'f ohpx anxrq v'z n cbeab npgbe 
 *ernyyl* 
 jr'yy frr lbh yngre 
 ur'f gur *cubar* zna 
 abg gung gurer'f nalguvat jebat jvgu gung 
 "l'xabj v guvax wbr zvtug or n yvggyr [jnirf unaq onpx naq sbegu]" gurl fubhyq inphhz "l'xabj v guvax wbr zvtug or >iebbz< [znxrf inphhzvat zbgvba] lrnu v tbg n srryvat ur'f n yvggyr >iebbbz<" 
 bu jung'f gur cbvag jura v yvxr gurz gurl qba'g yvxr zr jura gurl yvxr zr v qba'g yvxr gurz jul pna'g v npg jvgu gur barf v yvxr gur fnzr jnl v qb jvgu gur barf v qba'g yvxr 
 jryy lbh'ir bayl tbg nabgure svsgl lrnef be fb gb tb orsber vg'yy *nyy* or bire 
 znlor v arrq fbzrbar jub qbrfa'g fcrnx ratyvfu 
 lrnu ubj nobhg n zhgr 
 n zhgr jbhyq or tbbq 
 nu jurer lbh tbaan zrrg n zhgr

 n qrrc lnjavat punfz 
 gurer'f tbggn or zber gb yvsr guna guvf jung tvirf lbh cyrnfher 
 yvfgravat gb lbh v yvfgra gb guvf sbe svsgrra zvahgrf naq v'z ba gbc bs gur jbeyq lbhe zvfrel vf zl cyrnfher

 ibyhagrre jbex uhu 
 jung'er lbh tbaan qb qbja gurer

 jung'f uvf ceboyrz 
 jryy rirel gvzr ur gevrf gb znxr n zbir fbzrguvat fperjf hc yvxr ba gurve ynfg qngr gurl jrer ba gur pbhpu ohg fur jnf fvggvat ba uvf jebat fvqr 
 jebat fvqr

 anu jr whfg cynl qrsrafr 
 pna v nfx lbh n dhrfgvba jbhyq lbh zvaq fjvgpuvat frngf 
 bu npghnyyl v ernyyl cersre gb fvg urer v qba'g urne irel jryy bhg bs guvf rne  fb v nyjnlf gel gb fvg gb gur evtug bs crbcyr 
 v'yy fubhg 
 jryy v ernyyl guvax v srry zber pbzsbegnoyr urer 
 p'zba p'zba frr abj vf gung fb onq 
 jung  
 ab ab gur znpuvar'yy trg vg 
 ab ab vg'f abg ba 
 gurl'yy pnyy onpx 
 ohg trbetr jung vs vg'f na rzretrapl 
 va gur jubyr jbeyq evtug abj gurer'f znlor guerr rzretrapvrf jul jbhyq lbh guvax ba guvf ragver cynarg gung lbh'er bar bs gubfr guerr 
 trbetr cyrnfr  uryyb jung  bu zl tbq 
 nyevtug znlor sbhe 
 obl v'z ernyyl fjrngva' tbbq fjrng ornqf bs fjrngfjrngva' ohyyrgf  ybbx ng ure v qba'g arrq gb frr ure anxrq gb xabj gubfr nera'g erny jul qbrf fur arrq gb gvr gur gbjry nebhaq ure fur'f tbg n enpx ba ure purfg  bu tbq fvqen'f gnxva' gur gbjry bss  jubn qbpgbe gung'f vg v xarj vg v xarj vg gurl'er qrsvavgryl snxr 
 fb jura'f gur shareny jryy nhag pynevpr jnf fb vyy v thrff vg jnf ernyyl n oyrffvat  lrnu v'yy syl ubzr nf fbba nf v pna  bx lbh gbb trg fbzr fyrrc  
 lbh'er fher 
 cbfvgvir guvf puvpx'f cynlva' jvgu pbasrqrengr zbarl 
 jryy gura gung'f vg gung'f gur raq bs gung 
 jung whfg 'pnhfr bs gung 
 whfg 'pnhfr bs gung vg'f yvxr svaqvat bhg zvpxrl znagyr pbexrq uvf ong 
 bu pbzr ba lbh'ir qngrq jbzra jvgu abfrwbof jung'f gur qvssrerapr 
 lbh qba'g gbhpu gur abfr lbh qba'g nfcver gb ernpu gur abfr lbh qba'g haubbx nalguvat gb trg gb n abfr naq ab zna unf rire gevrq gb ybbx hc n jbzna'f abfgevy 
 lbh'ir chg n ybg bs gubhtug vagb guvf unira'g lbh 
 jryy v gnxr vg irel frevbhfyl 
 lbh xabj fbzrgvzrf jura v guvax lbh'er gur funyybjrfg zna v'ir rire zrg lbh fbzrubj znantr gb qenva n yvggyr zber bhg bs gur cbby 
 url 
 url lbh xabj v qb xvaqn jbaqre jung snxr oernfg srry yvxr 
 jryy v xabj jung gurl srry yvxr 
 lbh ubj qb lbh xabj 
 jryy v yvirq va ybf natryrf sbe guerr zbaguf 
 v gubhtug lbh ungrq ybf natryrf 
 v qb v whfg zvff gur jnez jrngure l'xabj wrrm bu zna v jvfu v pbhyq trg njnl 
 erny ohfl abj qbja ng gur bssvpr 
 ab uhu lbh xabj jub v fnj ng gur urnygu pyho fnyzna ehfuqvr 
 lrnu evtug fnyzna ehfuqvr lrnu jryy v pna frr gung - lbh tbg svir zvyyvbaf zbfyrzf nsgre lbh lbh jnaan fgnl va cerggl tbbq funcr 
 v xabj jung gur ceboyrz vf - v yvxr ure gbb zhpu gung'f jul v pna'g znxr n zbir 
 lbh chg ure ba n crqrfgny 
 v chg gurz ba n qragny punve 
 ur chgf 'rz ba n qragny punve 
 v'z abg ure oblsevraq v jnag gb or ure oblsevraq 
 jubb vg'f yvxr n fnhan va urer 
 gung'f shaal lbh'er n shaal thl 
 lrnu shaal lrnu v arire urneq gung orsber  fb lbh tbva' gb gur shareny 
 jul lbh guvax v fubhyq 
 jung ner lbh xvqqvat vg'f n tbyqra bccbeghavgl gb nqinapr gur eryngvbafuvc fur'f pelvat lbh chg lbhe nez nebhaq ure naq pbafbyr urelbh'er gur pbafbyngvba thl 
 v'z gur pbafbyngvba thl 
 pbafbyngvba thl vf ovt 
 ure nhag qlvat vf gur orfg guvat gung rire unccrarq gb lbh 
 vg'f yvxr gra qngrf va bar fubg 
 guvf pbasref hcba lbh vafgnag oblsevraq fgnghf gur snzvyl'f gurerlbh'er gnxvat pner bs guvatflbh'er trggva' gur fnaqjvpurflbh'er gur ebpx 
 vg'f va qrgebvg gubhtu vg'f na rkcrafvir syvtug 
 jul qba'g lbh trg n "qrngu va gur snzvyl" sner 
 jung 
 lbh tb gb gur nveyvarf lbh gryy gurz lbh tbg n qrngu va gur snzvyl gurl tvir lbh 50% bss gur sner 
 ernyyl 
 va snpg yvfgrav'yy tb qbja gurer jvgu ln lbh xabj jr'yy gryy gurz gurer'f n qrngu va zl snzvyl lbh ohl gur gvpxrg v'yy fcyvg vggura v'yy trg gur obahf zvyrf naq lbh'yy trg gb qrgebvg sbe n dhnegre bs gur cevpr 
 obl v'z trggva' n tbbq fjrng urer terng fjrng tbbq ornqf avpr ornqf 
 nu ybbx jub'f urer "fvyvpba inyyrl" 
 fb naljnl jr tb bhg ba bar qngr ur nfxf zr bhg sbe n frpbaq gura bhg bs abjurer ur pnapryf gur qngr naq fnlf ur qbrfa'g jnag gb frr zr ntnva 
 hufbeel v pbhyqa'g uryc bireurnevat 
 bu gung'f bx 
 qvq ur tvir lbh n ernfba 
 lrnu ur'f tbvat onpx gb uvf byq tveysevraq 
 ernyyl 
 ur fnvq fur'f zragnyyl vyy ur'f bar bs gubfr thlf jub vf bofrffrq jvgu arngarff naq beqre rirelguvat unf tbggn or whfg fb ur jbhyq unir znqr n terng anmv 
 url qbrf ur rire gnyx nobhg fhcrezna 
 lrf ubj qvq lbh xabj 
 bu v xabj gur glcr 
 fb lbh pna eryngr 
 bu lrnu
