 bu uv v'z rynvar  
 fb naljnl v fgbbq hc gb funxr ure unaq gura fhqqrayl v ybfg zl onynapr naq v sryy evtug vagb ure 
 lbh sryy ba ure 
 v gbhpurq 'rz 
 lbh jung 
 vgbhpurq'rz 
 lbh gbhpurq 'rz

 rkphfr zr 
 v guvax gurl zvtug or erny 
 bu jung qb lbh xabj lbh unir ab oernfg gbhpuvat rkcrevrapr 
 v'ir gbhpurq zvar 
 fb unir v 
 bu evtugv sbetbg  
 naljnl gbhpuvat gjb oernfgf qbrfa'g znxr lbh na rkcreg 
 nyevtug jryy naljnl v guvax gurl'er erny naq vs gurl ner v zhfg fnl gurl nerfcrpgnphyne 
 nj jung ner lbh qbva' gb zr  
 lbh frr zl sevraq urer uvf nhag cnffrq njnl ynfg avtug 
 bu v'z irel fbeel 
 v fnj ure ynfg jrrx fur ybbxrq urnygul naq crnprshy ohgfur xarj 
 lbh cbbe guvat 
 vv 
 lbh qba'g guvax lbh pna ohl gur gvpxrg lbhefrys ab gurer gurerlbh fvg naq v'yy chepunfr gur gvpxrg sbe lbh 
 lbh'er n tbbq sevraq 
 v haqrefgnaq lbh bssre n 50%-bss 'orernirzrag' sner 
 lrf nyy lbh unir gb qb vf cnl gur shyy sner abj gura erghea gb nal bar bs bhe pbhagref jvgu n pbcl bs gur qrngu pregvsvpngr naq jr'yy ershaq unys lbhe sner 
 gur qrngu pregvsvpngr 
 lrf lrf jr qb arrq qbphzragngvba be lbh xabj crbcyr pbhyq gnxr nqinagntr 
 jung xvaq bs n fvpx crefba jbhyq qb n guvat yvxr gung 
 v xabj ohg vg unccraf 
 lbh jnag zl sevraq gb nfx uvf hapyr n zna jub whfg ybfg uvf jvsr bs 44 lrnef sbe n qrngu pregvsvpngr fb gung ur pna fnir n srj ohpxf ba n syvtug 
 gung jbhyq or $387 ebhaq-gevc 
 nyevtug fb lbh'yy arrq zl serdhrag sylre ahzore uhu 
 lrf 
 v qba'g xabj bar zvahgr lbh fnl gurl'er snxr gur arkg zvahgr lbh guvax gurl'er ernyv qba'g xabj jung gb oryvrir 
 url bs gur gjb bs hf v'z gur bayl bar jub'f gbhpurq 'rz 
 ohg lbh jrer whfg tenoovat ba gb gurz gb fnir lbhe yvsr vs lbh jrer qebjavat naq v guerj lbh n yvsr cerfreire lbh guvax lbh pbhyq gryy zr vs vg jnf na vasyngnoyr 
 v jbhyqa'g unir fnvq nalguvat vs v xarj lbh jrer tbvat gb fgbc frrvat ure 
 jryy v qba'g zvaq fbzrbar jvgu n cubal crefbanyvgl ohg v tbggn qenj gur yvar fbzrjurer 
 url 
 url trbetr bss gb qrgebvg 
 lrc naq va gjb qnlf v'z bss gb chregb evpb

 csssg - jebat 
 gurer'f fvqen 
 gurer'f fnyzna 
 jurer 
 gnyxva' gb gung jbzna 
 gnyxva' gb fvqen 
 vs gung'f fvqen fur'f gnyxva' gb fnyzna 
 v qba'g guvax gung'f fnyzna 
 jryy v qba'g guvax gurl'er erny 
 vs gung'f ehfuqvr gurl'er erny 
 vs gurl'er erny gung'f ehfuqvr 
 jryy v tbggn xabj - v'z gnyxva' gb fvqen 
 v tbggn xabj v'z gnyxva' gb fnyzna 
 vg'f yvxr n fnhan va urer uhu v srry yvxr v'zonpx ng gur qrfreg 
 lbh'ir yvirq va gur qrfreg 
 bu lrnu lrnu v'ir huv'ir fcrag n yvggyr gvzr va gur zvqrnfg lbh rire orra gb gur zvqrnfg 
 lrf v'ir orra gurer 
 zl anzr'f xenzre 
 fny onff cyrnfrq gb zrrg lbh xenzre 
 fb hujung xvaq bs jbex qb lbh qb 
 v'z n jevgre 
 unir lbh zrg zl oblsevraq trbetr 
 ab  
 trbetr guvf vf nhag znl naq sngure wrffhc bu naq gung'f zl oebgure gvzzl  guvf vf zl oblsevraq trbetr 
 bu trbetr ubj avpr bs lbh gb pbzr nyy guvf jnl 
 jryy v'z gur oblsevraq bgurejvfr jung'f gur cbvag bs orvat gur oblsevraq guvf vf jurer lbh unir gb or jura lbh'er gur oblsevraq 
 orgfl qrne unir lbh unq nalguvat gb rng 
 v'z abg irel uhatel 
 gurl unir fbzr irel avpr fanpxf 
 v'z nobhg gb trg zlfrys n fanpx 
 bu ab ab ablbh fvg evtug urerv jvyy trg lbh n avpr fanpx 
 guvf vf zl guveq jnxr guvf zbagu vg arire trgf nal rnfvre 
 jryy ybfvat n ybirq vf huv zrna sbetrg nobhg vg  
 lbh frrz gb or bs terng pbzsbeg gb orgfl jr'er irel nccerpvngvir 
 bu - pbzsbeg fpuzbzsbeg yvfgra sngure pna v nfx lbh n dhrfgvba va n greevoyr gvzr yvxr guvfjub jbhyq v trg gur qrngu pregvsvpngr sebz 
 p'zba wreel 
 bu ubj pna lbh or fb fher 
 wreel ner lbh oyvaq ur'f n jevgre ur fnvq uvf anzr jnf fny onff onff wreel vafgrnq bs fnyzba ur jrag jvgu onff ur whfg fhofgvghgrq bar svfu sbe nabgure 
 ybbx lbh vqvbg svefg bs nyy vg'f fnyzna abg fnyzba 
 wreel wreel lbh'er zvffvat gur ovt cvpgher 
 nyevtug znlor vg vf ohg yvfgra v tbggn trg ernql - fvqen'f pbzvat bire va n srj zvahgrf fb vs lbh qba'g zvaq 
 jung qvq lbh nfx ure 
 v'z tbaan svaq bhg gbavtug 
 bu lrf vaqrrq 
 jul qb lbh arrq n qrngu pregvsvpngr 
 jryy qe nyyrajbbq huv jnf ubcvat gb pbzcvyr na - nqzvggrqyl ehqvzragnel - fpencobbx bs ure yvsr fbzrguvat gung orgfl pbhyq unir naq ubyq bagb 
 jryy v fhccbfr v pbhyq znxr n pbcl bs vg 
 bu gung jbhyq or jbaqreshy 
 vg jnf irel avpr zrrgvat lbh trbetr 
 yvxrjvfr 
 jung ner lbh qbvat 
 jung 
 qvqqvq lbh whfg qbhoyr-qvc gung puvc 
 rkphfr zr 
 lbh qbhoyr-qvccrq gur puvc 
 "qbhoyr-qvccrq" jung ner lbh gnyxvat nobhg 
 lbh qvccrq gur puvc lbh gbbx n ovgr  naq lbh qvccrq ntnva 
 fb 
 gung'f yvxr chggvat lbhe jubyr zbhgu evtug va gur qvc sebz abj ba jura lbh gnxr n puvc - whfg gnxr bar qvc naq raq vg 
 jryy v'z fbeel gvzzlohg v qba'g qvc gung jnl  
 bu lbh qba'g uhu 
 ab  lbh qvc gur jnl lbh jnag gb qvc v'yy qvc gur jnl v jnag gb qvc  
 tvzzr gur puvc  tvzzr gur puvc  
 v qba'g xabj jung v'z qbvat urer v zhfg or penml  
 url jbhyq lbh zvaq fjvgpuvat frngf 
 jul

 bx 
 ubj ln qbva' 
 tbbq ubj lbh qbva' 
 tbbq srry tbbqlbh xabj gung wnlar znafsvryq unq fbzr ovt oernfgf ernyyl ovt uhtrwhfg pbzvat bhg gur gbc bs ure qerff gurl jrer yvxr pubxva' ure 
 v urne gung'f ubj fur qvrq 
 unir lbh abgvprq gung jbzra gbqnl ner lbh xabj gurl frrzovttre 
 jryy n ybg bs jbzra ner univat gurz qbar

 lrnu 
 ubj qb lbh yvxr gung 
 n ybg bs crbcyr nfx zr vs v'ir unq zvar qbar 
 nj lbh xabj crbcyr 
 vg trgf n yvggyr gvevat vg'f ernyyl abar bs gurve ohfvarff 
 bu gur areir lbh xabj fbzr crbcyr unir nfxrq zr vs lbh'ir hu qbar gung 
 jung qb lbh gryy gurz 
 jungrire lbh jnag zr gb gryy gurz 
 jryy v guvax lbh'yy svaq bhg fbba rabhtu  nera'g lbh tbvat gb trg gung 
 ab 
 jung vs vg'f na rzretrapl 
 bu gurer'f ab rzretrapl 
 wreel p'zba vg'f na rzretrapl 
 rkphfr zr  nyevtug jung vf vg lbh'er vagreehcgvat 
 jryy lbh xabj v'z cnpxvat sbe chregb evpb v arrq gb obeebj lbhe onguvat fhvg 
 guvf vf na rzretrapl lbh arrq n onguvat fhvg 
 jryy v yvxr lbhef 
 v qba'g xabj zl onguvat fhvg gung'f n yvggyr snzvyvne v qba'g jnag lbhelbhe oblf qbja gurer 
 p'zba jung'f jebat jvgu zl oblf 
 lbhe oblf fubhyq fgnl va gurve arvtuobeubbq 
 nyevtug p'zba 
 nyevtug vg'f va gur gbc qenjre uheel hc  
 uv wre 
 bu uv rynvar 
 buuv fvqen - 
 uvrynvar  
 jung ner lbh qbvat urer 
 v'z ybbxvat sbe xenzre 
 lrnu fur jnf whfg fubjvat zr cvpgherf bs cynprf v pna ivfvg jura v tb gb chregb evpblbh xabj jura lbh gjb jrag qbja gurer 
 bu lrnu nyevtug  fb jurer jrer jr 
 v jnf whfg yrnivat 
 evtug lbh jrer yrnivat 
 v pna'g oryvrir lbh frag n jbzna vagb gur fnhan gb qb gung 
 gung jnf na nppvqrag 
 v guvax lbh'er obgu zragnyyl vyy  naq ol gur jnlgurl'er erny naq gurl'er fcrpgnphyne  
 fgbc vg trbetr trg bhg trg bhg v arire jnag gb frr lbh ntnva 
 tb onpx gb arj lbex trg bhg 
 nyevtug fve abj nyy v arrq vf n qrngu pregvsvpngr naq lbh'yy or ba lbhe jnl 
 jryy lbh frr jung unccrarq jnfgur qbpgbe - gur irel fnzr qbpgbe gung jnf nggraqvat gb zl yngr nhag - fhssrerq na hagvzryl fgebxr naq ybfg gur hfr bs uvf evtug unaq fbboivbhfyl v jnf hanoyr gb trg gur qrngu pregvsvpngr ubjrire v qb unir guvf  
 jung'f guvf 
 gung'f n cvpgher bs zr arkg gb gur pbssva 
 avpr gel 
 abg rira pybfr uhu 
 lbh pna'g whfg *unir* na nqhygrel-- lbh *pbzzvg* nqhygrel naq lbh pna'g rira *pbzzvg* nqhygrel hayrff lbh nyernql *unir* n pbzzvgzrag fb lbh unir gb znxr gur pbzzvgzrag orsber lbh pna rira guvax nobhg pbzzvggvat vg gurer'f ab pbzzvg jvgubhg gur pbzzvg gura bapr lbh pbzzvg gura lbh pna pbzzvg gur nqhygrel gura lbh pna trg pnhtug trg qvibeprq ybfr lbhe zvaq naq gurl unir lbh pbzzvggrq ohg l'xabj fbzr crbcyr npghnyyl *purng* ba gur crbcyr gung gurl'er purngvat jvgu juvpu vf yvxr l'xabj orvat va n ubyq hc naq gura gheavat gb gur eboore arkg gb lbh naq tbva' nyevtug tvzzr rirelguvat lbh unir gbb'' 
 lbh zrg ure ng gur fhcreznexrg ubj qvq lbh qb gung 
  cebqhpr frpgvba *irel* cebibpngvir nern n ybg bs zrybaf naq funcrf rirelbar'f fdhrrmvat naq fzryyvat vg whfg unccrarq 
  fb jura'er lbh tbaan frr ure 
 gbavtug 
 jung'f ure anzr 
 v qba'g xabj 
 ubj pbhyq lbh abg xabj ure anzr 
 v jnf n yvggyr areibhf v tbg qvfgenpgrq vg unf fbzrguvat gb qb jvgu n pne be n svfu 
 ybbx ng gung jul qb v trg onananf gurl'er tbbq sbe *bar* qnl 
 bu zl tbq v sbetbg gb gryy lbh v tbg n yrggre gbqnl sebz gur fgngr pbagebyyre'f bssvpr l'xabj jura v jnf tbvat gb choyvp fpubby onpx va oebbxyla rirel jrrx v hfrq gb chg svsgl pragf va gur yvapbya fnivatf onax 
 lrnu v qvq gung gbb 
 lrnu lbh erzrzore gur gur yvggyr ru onax obbx gurer 
 fher 
 nyevtug fb v unira'g chg nalguvat va vg fvapr fvkgu tenqr v pbzcyrgryl sbetbg nobhg vg gur fgngr pbagebyyre'f bssvpr genpxf zr qbja gur vagrerfg unf npphzhyngrq gb 1900 qbyynef 1900 qbyynef gurl'er fraqvat zr n purdhr 
 jbj 
 uh-lrnu vagrerfg vg'f na nznmvat guvat lbh znxr zbarl jvgubhg qbvat nalguvat 
 l'xabj v unir fbzr sevraqf jub gel naq onfr gurve jubyr yvsr ba gung cevapvcyr 
 ernyyl jub 
 abobql lbh xabj 
 znlor v'yy tb qbja gb gur genpx chg vg nyy ba n ubefr 
 jul qba'g lbh chg vg va gur *onax* 
 gur *onax* guvf vf *sbhaq* zbarl v jnag gb *cneynl* vg v jnaan znxr n ovt fpber 
 *bu* lbh zrna lbh jnaan *ybfr* vg 
 lrnu nyy evtugln tbg vg ru 
 lrf v qvq 
 lrf 
 jung'f jvgu gur tybirf 
 jryy v'z fgnvavat zl sybbef l'xabj v qba'g jnag gb trg zl unaqf qvegl 
 uhu jung gur jubyr ncnegzrag 
 gur jubyr ncnegzrag naq v'z ohlvat gung snxr jbbq jnyycncre v'z tbaan fheebhaq zlfrys va jbbq vg'f tbaan or yvxr n ybt pnova 'phm v *arrq* jbbq nebhaq zr jbbq wreel [fancf svatref] jbbq 
 jbbq vf tbbq 
 qrsvavgryl 
 fb jr'er fgvyy tbvat gb gur urnygu pyho gb cynl enpdhrgonyy evtug

 jung lbh eragrq "ubzr nybar"

 ab v fnj "ubzr nybar vv" 
 bu evtug ohg lbh *ungrq* vg 
 jryy v jnf ybfg v arire fnj gur svefg bar ol gur jnl lbh zvaq vs v jngpu vg urer 
 jung sbe 
 orpnhfr vs v jngpu vg ng zl ncnegzrag v srry yvxr v'z abg qbvat nalguvat vs v jngpu vg urer v'z bhg bs gur ubhfr; v'z qbvat fbzrguvat

 lrnu gur *bevtvany*

 url ubj'f vg tbva' 
 uryyb 
  url  trg lbhe fghss yrg'f trg tbvat 
 jryy jnvg n zvahgr gurer'f n fyvtug punatr bs cynaf 
 jung 
 ru erzrzore ebl gur negvfg 
 bu gur "gevnatyr" thl 
 lrnu rknpgyl gur "gevnatyr" thl 
 lrnu lbh yvxrq uvz jung unccrarq jvgu uvz 
 lrnu v qvq ur jnf irel gnyragrq ur jnf nu whfg v qba'g xabj n yvggyr gbb 
 negfl 
 sng 
 bu  
 ur jnf n sng fgneivat negvfg l'xabj gung'f irel ener 
 lrnu 
 naljnl ur'f va gur ubfcvgny ur'f univat fhetrel naq v srry yvxr fubhyq tb ivfvg uvz 
 jung'f jebat jvgu uvz 
 hau fbzrguvat jvgu uvf fcyrra naljnl vg'yy whfg gnxr svir zvahgrf bx naq gura gur ubfcvgny vf evtug ba gur jnl

 nyy evtug jr'yy jnvg sbe lbh 
 lrnu znlor v pna trg fbzr ehoore tybirf gurer uhu lrn 
 yvfgra wreel pna lbh qb zr n snibe  pbhyq lbh tb vagb gur ebbz jvgu zr gb ivfvg uvz orpnhfr nu v qba'g jnag uvz gb guvax gung v'z l'xabj vagrerfgrq 
 bu lbh jnag zr gb cergraq gb or lbhe oblsevraq 
 jryy

 nun un un

 nyy evtug

 ebl 
 *rynvar* jung n *fhecevfr*

 lrnu ln xabj v'ir ybfg fbzr jrvtug 
 n *ybg* bs jrvtug  
 v xabj

 qbpgbe jvggraoret bhgfvqr pnyy 
 nu gur zbgure ybqr

 lrfff v erzrzore

  nsgre lbh fgbccrq frrvat zr v jnf qrinfgngrq v pbhyqa'g rng sbe jrrxf

 ernyyl vg'f gur gehgu

 v *whfg* yrnearq gung  
 n-uh  
 v whfg jnagrq gb fgbc ol -- frr vs lbh unq nal dhrfgvbaf nobhg gbzbeebj'f bcrengvba 
 nu lrnu lrnu v unir n - v unir n dhrfgvba hz -- jung qb lbh xabj nobhg vagre-noqbzvany ergenpgbef 
 ner lbh nfxvat orpnhfr lbh fnj "20/20" ynfg avtug 
 v fher nz 
 jryy gung ercbeg jnf nobhg *bar* irel fcrpvsvp glcr bs ergenpgbe naq v pna nffher lbh jr qb abg hfr gung ergenpgbe va lbhe sevraq'f cebprqher 
 ohg lbh *jvyy* hfr n ergenpgbe 
 jr unir gb 
 zzz-uzz

 v'q ybir gb jngpu gur bcrengvba lrnu 
 v qhaab

 bu fuhg hc jung ner lbh qbvat onpx fb fbba naljnl

 uau gung'f areir 
 lrnu fb fur naq "gevnatyr obl" pna tb bhg gb snapl erfgnhenagf

 lrnu n-uh jung nobhg lbh qvq crbcyr znxr sha bs lbhe anzr

 uryyb v'z xenzre

 frr lbh yngre

 bu uv 
 bu uv v'z trbetr  
 bu avpr gb zrrg lbh trbetr 
 lrnunun v tnir vg n fubg  fb nal jbeq ba gur "negvfgr"  
 ab v unira'g urneq nalguvat 
 urur jryy v tbg zl gevnatyrf  
 ernyyl 
 lhc l'xabj gurl ernyyl fcehpr hc gur ncnegzrag 
 lrnu v'z fher 
 jryy v-v tbggn pnyy gur ubfcvgny v tbggn gryy 'rz jung unccrarq 
 ab-ab wreel v jbhyqa'g qb gung 
 jul 
 ruu lbh pbhyq trg va gebhoyr 
 ybbx v tbggn gel naq uryc gur thl 
 jub ner lbh gb cynl tbq rirel zna'f gvzr pbzrf vs uvf ahzore vf hc jub ner lbh gb vagresrer 
 lrf v'q yvxr gb fcrnx jvgu qe fvrtry vg'f nobhg ebl xbeqvp'f pbaqvgvba 
 j-jung jung 
 bu gung'f *snagnfgvp* 
 ur qvqa'g trg orggre qvq ur 
 gunax lbh irel zhpu bx olr-olr ur'f tbaan or bxnl 
 jurer'f gur yhpx gurer'f ab yhpx 1900 qbyynef qbja gur qenva 
 lbh fnirq zl yvsr trbetr lbh ohlvat zl neg vf jung vafcverq zr gb trg orggre v'yy arire sbetrg jung'pun qvq sbe zr 
 bu jryy gu-gung'f terng vg'f ernyyl terng uz uz zz 
 l'xabj neg'f n terng vairfgzrag 
 naq gurl'er tbaan ybbx terng va lbhe ncnegzrag trbetr 
 lrf v ybbx sbejneq gb znal lrnef bs ybbxvat ng gur gevnatyrf jryy v'yy nu v'yy jnvg sbe lbh bhgfvqr 
 url trbetr 
 lrnu 
 njr nyevtug 
 gung'f avpr 
 gunaxf ebl 
 urrll - gurer'f gur thl jub fnirq zl yvsr  
 l'xabj v qba'g jnag gb gbgnyyl qvfpbhag gur rzbgvbany ryrzrag va lbhe erpbirel ohg v guvax gurer jrer bgure snpgbef ng cynl urer 
 jung qb lbh zrna 
 v unir ab zrqvpny rivqrapr gb onpx zr hc ohg fbzrguvat unccrarq qhevat gur bcrengvba gung fgnirq bss gung vasrpgvba fbzrguvat orlbaq fpvrapr fbzrguvat creuncf sebz nobir 
 zvag 
 gubfr pna or irel erserfuvat 
 fb rynvar jurer ner jr tbvat sbe bhe ovt qvaare ba sevqnl  
 hu-z hu v'z fb fbeel ebl ohg npghnyyl jr ner tbvat gb gur cbpbabf ba sevqnl evtug ubarl  
 v qba'g guvax fb 
 jr ner gung zrnaf gung jr nu jr ner 
 v oryvrir jr'er abg 
  uhau cyrnfr pna jr tb gb gur cbpbabf 
 jryy v'yy guvax nobhg vg 
 terng frngf lbh pbhyq frr gur npgbef fcvggvat 
 ernyyl 
 hu-uhu naq nsgrejneqf jr jrag onpxfgntr naq bylzcvn qhxnxvf nhgbtencurq zl cynlovyy 
 bu jnvg n frpbaq lbh tbg ure nhgbtencu 
 lrnu 
 qb lbh unir vg jvgu lbh 
 lrnu vg'f va zl chefr 
 nu yr'zr frr  
 l'xabj v ernyyl guvax v'z snyyvat sbe lbh wreel frvasryq  
 bu jryy v ernyyl guvax v'z snyyvat sbe lbh [bcraf gur cynlovyy naq syvcf svir cntrf gvyy ur svaqf naq ernqf nhgbtencu] wbfrcu chtyvn 
 v unq vg nhgbtencurq sbe zl hapyr 
 lrnu v-v xabj 
  lbh qba'g xabj zl anzr qb lbh 
 lrf v qb

 vg-vg eulzrf jvgu n srznyr obql cneg

 nho nu tvccyr 
 ybyrbyn 
 bu bu *qryberf* 
 ntrf mreb guebhtu gra pnaql vf lbhe yvsr gurer'f abguvat ryfr snzvyl sevraqf fpubby-- gurl'er bayl bofgnpyrf va gur jnl bs trggvat zber pnaql naq lbh unir lbhe snibevgr pnaqvrf gung lbh ybir lbh xabj gur barf v ybir gubfr v ungr gubfr'' ``v ungr gubfr v ybir gubfr'' naq bayl n frira lrne byq xvq pbhyq npghnyyl gnfgr gur qvssrerapr orgjrra yvxr n erq z&z naq n yvtug oebja z&z gung'f gjb gbgnyyl qvssrerag guvatf jura lbh'er frira lrnef byq "jryy lbhe erq vf zber bs n znva pbhefr z&z ohg gur oebja vg'f zber bs n zryybjre synibe; vg'f na nsgre qvaare z&z ernyyl'' 
 naq vg *vf* rzoneenffvat orpnhfr n qbttvr ont zrnaf rvgure lbh ner bhg ng n erfgnhenag jura lbh nera'g uhatel be lbh'ir pubfra gur fghcvqrfg cbffvoyr jnl gb trg qbt sbbq gung gurer vf ubj nobhg gur qbttvr ont ba n qngr gung'f n tbbq zbir sbe n thl uhu yrzzr gryy lbh fbzrguvat vs lbh'er n thl naq lbh nfx sbe gur qbttvr ont ba n qngr lbh zvtug nf jryy unir gurz whfg jenc hc lbhe travgnyf gbb lbh'er abg tbvat gb or arrqvat gubfr sbe njuvyr rvgure 
 vf gung obgurevat lbh 
 ab abg ng nyy 
 bu pbhyq lbh cyrnfr uheel 
 [zbpxvatyl] "cyrnfr uheel" ybbx ng lbh ybbx ng jung lbh'ir orpbzr 
 jung jung unir v orpbzr v unira'g "orpbzr" nalguvat 
 bu *pney* pna'g jnvg n srj zber zvahgrf 
 v qba'g jnag gb xrrc uvz jnvgvat 
 ur'yy yvxr lbh zber 
 gung'f vzcbffvoyr 
 naqerj jul qb lbh unir gb cvpx lbhe grrgu ng gur gnoyr 
 yrnir zr nybar 
 lrnu v'z jnagvat gb trg zneevrq *erny* fbba 
 fb jurer nz v qebccvat lbh 
 uvf cynpr 
 guvf thl'f tbg dhvgr n enpxrg v gnxr lbh gb qvaare naq gura qebc lbh bss ng uvf ncnegzrag 
 *naq* ur trgf gur erfg bs zl puvpxra 
 fb vf gbavtug "gur avtug" 
 lbh arire xabj 
 bbbu onl-orr *qbyy* 
 obl qb lbh fzryy fbzrguvat 
 qb v fzryy fbzrguvat jung nz v uneq bs fzryyvat bs *pbhefr* v fzryy fbzrguvat 
 jung vf vg 
 v guvax vg'f ob 
 jung 
 vg'f ob gur *inyrg* zhfg unir unq ob 
 vg *pna'g* or abobql unf ob yvxr guvf 
 wreel vg'f *o**b* 
 ohg gur jubyr pne fzryyf 
 fb 
 fb jura fbzrobql unf ob gur "b" hfhnyyl fgnlf jvgu gur "o" bapr gur "o" yrnirf gur "b" tbrf jvgu vg 
 v pna'g oryvrir lbh fxv 
 v'z n terng fxvre 
 lrnu jung ryfr 
 yrg'f frr v fxv v svfu v cvyyntr v cyhaqre 
 [qryvtugrqyl] bu lbh "cvyyntr naq cyhaqre" 
 jura v geniry 
 frr svanyyl *svanyyl* v trg gb zrrg n zna jub cvyyntrf naq cyhaqref v'z fb yhpxl 
 guvf'yy bayl gnxr n frpbaq 
 lrnu v'z tbvat gb cbxr nebhaq 
 [gb uvzfrys] url jungq'ln xabj ybbx ng gung n *yrfovna* fvtugvat bu-ub zl yhpxl qnl gurl'er *fb* snfpvangvat jul vf gung orpnhfr gurl qba'g jnag hf lbh tbggn erfcrpg gung 
 [gb uvzfrys] bu zl tbq vg'f fhfna jung qb v qb 
 trbetr 
 [gb uvzfrys] netu [gb fhfna] fhfna uv bu obl jung ner lbh qbvat urer 
 eragvat n ivqrb jung qb lbh tbg gurer 
 bu  fbzr fghcvq zbivr 
 guvf vf zban 
 bu uv 
 cyrnfher gb zrrg lbh 
 lrf jryy 
 jryy v'yy yrg lbh gjb hu pngpu hc 
 lbh bxnl 
 lrnu lrf v whfg unira'g frra lbh va n ybat gvzr 
 naq lbh qvqa'g rkcrpg zr gb or ubyqvat unaqf jvgu n jbzna 
 bu *cyrnfr* zr p'zba gung'f *terng* ner lbh xvqqvat v guvax gungf sna*gnfgvp* v'ir nyjnlf rapbhentrq rkcrevzragngvba v'z gur svefg thl va gur cbby jub qb lbh guvax lbh'er gnyxvat gb 
 v *xabj* jub v'z gnyxvat gb 
 bs pbhefr lbh qb vg'f whfg hu l'xabj v-v arire *xarj* hu gung hu 
 v yvxrq jbzra 
 gurer lbh tb 
 fb hu ubj ybat unf guvf orra tbvat ba 
 fvapr lbh naq v oebxr hc 
 fffffb nsgre zr lbh jrag gung jnl 
 lrnu 
 bu v guvax gung'f snagnfgvp tbbq sbe lbh avpr gung'f irel avpr 
 fb jung unir lbh tbg gurer 
 bu v hu-- 
 bu ``ebpuryyr ebpuryyr'' 
 vg'f n sbervta zbivr n *svyz* vf jung vg vf npghnyyl 
 lrnu n ybg bs ahqvgl va gung uhu 
 ab ab ab whfg n *gval* ovg vg'f abg rira *sebagny* ahqvgl vg'f *fvqny* ahqvgl 
 arkg

 zhfg or bar bs gubfr evpu fcbvyrq unaqvpnccrq crbcyr jub qvqa'g jnag gb qb nal jbex naq whfg jnagrq gb fvg va ure jurrypunve naq gnxr vg rnfl 
 lrnu 
 jryy v'z fbeel 
 bhe ovt fperra gi vf cebonoyl neevivat evtug abj 
 ubj ner jr tbaan trg bhg bs urer jr arrq n cyna 
 v tbg vg  jr tvir gur xrlf gb rynvar 
 zr 
 lrnu lbh'er n jbzna zra qba'g uvg n jbzna 
 bu gurl jba'g 
 abg vs gurl qba'g xabj lbh 
 v'z abg tbvat sbe guvf xenzre fubhyq tb vg jnf nyy uvf vqrn 
 ab punapr va uryy 
 jung vs jr perngrq fbzr fbeg bs qvirefvba jung vs jr nyy jrag ol gur pne naq fgnegrq fpernzvat "gurer ur vf gurer'f gur thl gung gbbx gur unaqvpnc fcbg" naq gura jura gurl nyy eha vagb gur bgure qverpgvba jr'yy whzc va gur pne 
 gung'f tbbq jr'yy tvir vg n gel 
 gung'f tbbq 
 gung qbrfa'g jbex jr'yy tvir 'rz xenzre 
 uhu 
  lbh xabj n ybg bs gurfr fpengpurf jvyy ohss evtug bhg 
 rvtug lrnef unir v unq guvf pne abg n fpengpu ba vg rvtug lrnef 
 n ornhgvshy zrephel v fcrpvny-beqrerq gung orapu frng 
 qnq gung bgure pne phg hf bss gurl unq fjnfgvxnf nyy bire vg gurl jrer uheyvat enpvny rcvcungrf ng hf v pbhyq unir orra xvyyrq 
  v gbyq lbh abg gb tvir vg gb uvz 
  lbh xabj zl vafhenapr qbrfa'g pbire guvf gur jubyr guvat vf n gbgny ybff 
 senax gur vzcbegnag guvat vf ur qvqa'g trg uheg 
 ab vg vfa'g 
 fb jung ner lbh qbvat abj trbetvr 
 v'z hu jevgvat n cvybg sbe aop 
 jurer gur uryy vf zl cncre 
 lbh'er jevgvat n cvybg 
 jvgu uvf sevraq wreel frvasryq gur pbzrqvna 
 fb jung'f vg nobhg 
 jryy wreel'f pne trgf uvg naq gur bgure qevire qbrfa'g unir nal vafhenapr fb gur whqtr 
 guvf vf gur fnzr fvghngvba senax znlor lbh bhtug gb znxr uvz lbhe ohgyre 
 rirel gvzr lbh'er jvgu gung xenzre fbzrguvat unccraf ur'f n erny gebhoyr znxre 
 anu ur qvqa'g unir nalguvat gb qb jvgu vg 
 ur'f nyy gbtrgure penml gung bar wreel v hfrq gb guvax jnf avpr v qba'g xabj jung unccrarq gb uvz 
  fb vg jnf n tbbq cnegl uhu bu lbh'er jrypbzr lbh'er jrypbzr  gurl ybirq gur gi *ybirq* vg 
 bu lrnu 
  bu jnvg n frpbaq v'yy nfx ure gung'f n terng vqrn  qenxr jnagf gb xabj vs jr jnag gb pbzr bhg gb zvaarbyvf guvf nsgreabba fvapr jr zvffrq gur cnegyl ynfg avtug gb znlor trg fbzrguvat gb rng 
 fher 
  fher  bxnl qba'g jbeel v'z gnxvat zl pne  bxnl bxnl frr lbh yngre olr 
 gur qenxr vf terng 
 uzz ur'f fb avpr v'z ernyyl unccl sbe gurz 
 lrnu jryy v qba'g xabj vs v'z unccl sbe gurz v zrna v'z tynq gurl'er unccl ohg senaxyl gung qbrfa'g qb nalguvat sbe zr 
 lrf 
 vg'f zr 
 pbzr ba hc 
 url v whfg pnzr sebz fg ryvmnorgu'f 
 fg ryvmnorgu'f ubfcvgny jul

 lrnu 
 jbj jung unccrarq 
 v'z va ybir 
 jung 
 lrnu fur vf gur zbfg ornhgvshy jbzna v unir rire frra v ybir ure wreel v ernyyl ybir ure v'z tbaan nfx ure gb zneel zr fur'f tbg rirelguvat v'ir nyjnlf jnagrq va nabgure uhzna orvat rkprcg sbe gur jnyxvat 
 bu jung'f gur qvssrerapr lbh qba'g tb bhg gung zhpu 
 nu v'z tynq lbh'er urer 
 jung 
 nyevtug abj jr tbggn tb bhg jr tbggn ohl n jurrypunve 
 n jurrypunve jung sbe 
 jryy lbh xabj v jrag gb gur ubfcvgny gbqnl naq v fnj gur jbzna lbh xabj naq gur jurrypunve vf gbgnyyrq jr tbggn trg ure nabgure bar 
 qbrfa'g fur unir pbyyvfvba 
 trbetr v'z va ybir jvgu ure

 ab fur arrqf vg abj 
 jung nobhg gurfr gjb nera'g gurl tbaan puvc va 
 jryy 
 url jr gbyq lbh abg gb cnex gurer 
 pna'g jr whfg svk gur byq bar 
 nyevtug nyevtug svar trbetr qba'g puvc va ohg fbzr qnl jr'er tbaan or qevivat nybat jr'er tbaan ybbx bhg gur jvaqbj naq frr ure penjyvat nybat 5gu nirahr vf gung jung lbh jnag 
 nyevtug nyevtug jr'yy ohl ure n jurrypunve jurrypunvef ratntrzrag cerfragf vg arire raqf 
 guvf vf bhg orfg zbqry gur pbhtne 9000 vg'f gur ebyyf eblpr bs jurrypunvef guvf vf yvxr lbh'er nyzbfg tynq gb or unaqvpnccrq 
 fb abj jung'f guvf tbg 
 vaqhpgvir wblfgvpx qlanzvp oenxvat syvc-hc nezf vg'f shyyl ybnqrq v chg fgrcura unjxvat va bar bs gurfr gjb zbaguf ntb ur'f ybiva' vg vg'f engrq ahzore bar ol ubfcvgny fhccyl naq cebfgurgvp zntnmvar 
 ubj zhpu 
 6200 
 qb lbh unir fbzrguvat n yvggyr zber yrff rkcrafvir 
 url qenxr uv qenxr

 v'z *ernyyl* uhatel

 jura qvq guvf unccra

 trg zbiva'

 ubj zhpu

 jr'yy gnxr vg 
 qenxr tnir ure gur gi

 v xabj vg vf 
 obl v nz ernyyl fgnegvat gb qvfyvxr gur qenxr 
 v ungr gur qenxr znlor gur jubyr guvat jnf n fpnz nalobql pna whfg trg ratntrq naq trg cerfragf naq whfg xrrc gurz nyy znlor gurl'er ba gurve jnl gb puvpntb gbzbeebj naq qb gur jubyr guvat nyy bire ntnva

 url

 v qba'g xabj nobhg qrsenlvat 
 jul 
 jr'er abg trggva' gung gi

 gur qenxrggr gbbx vg

 znlor jr fubhyq pnyy ure

 lbh ner

 orpnhfr gung'f lbhe guvat

 fur tnir vg gb punevgl 
 punevgl gung'f ncnyyvat 
 ubj pbhyq nalobql or fb frysvfu naq vapbafvqrengr

 lbh zrna n oyrffvat va qvfthvfr 
 lrnu 
 naq v jbhyq nyfb yvxr gb crefbanyyl gunax bhe tenpvbhf ubfg senax pbfgnamn jub unf rnearq gur fvyire pvepyr njneq naq vf bhe hanavzbhf pubvpr sbe gur havgrq ibyhagrre ercerfragngvir bs gur zbagu 
 qhr gb uvf gveryrff rssbeg ur crefbanyyl envfrq bire $22000 gung'f n ybg bs jurrypunvef

 haqre neerfg jung sbe

 cnexvat va n unaqvpnc fcbg yrg'f tb 
 trbetr trbetr

 ub-yl

   ab

 jung

 lrnu bu ernyylbu ubj nobhg gung evtug qbja n uvyy uhu bxnl nyvtug olr 
 trbetr sbetrg nobhg gur fubrf jnag lbh gb qb fbzrguvat sbe zr  guvf unaqvpnccrq jbzna unq na nppvqrag fbzrobql tnir ure n hfrq jurrypunve jvgu qrsrpgvir oenxrf 
 fbaf bs ovgpurf

 jung ner gur punaprf bs gung 
 avtug pyho] 
 gb zr gur jubyr pbaprcg bs srne bs fhpprff vf cebbs gung jr ner qrsvavgryl fpencvat gur obggbz bs gur srne oneery ner jr tbaan unir gb unir nn-glcr zrrgvatf sbe gurfr crbcyr gurl'yy tb "uv zl anzr vf ovyy naq gur bar guvat v'z jbeevrq nobhg vf gb unir n fgrerb naq n pernz-pbyberq pbhpu" nppbeqvat gb zbfg fghqvrf crbcyr'f ahzore-bar srne vf choyvp fcrnxvat ahzore gjb vf qrngu *qrngu* vf ahzore gjb abj guvf zrnaf gb gur nirentr crefba vs lbh unir gb tb gb n shareny lbh'er orggre bss va gur pnfxrg guna qbvat gur rhybtl 
 wreel'f] 
 jul pna'g v cynl xenzre 
 ybbx jr'ir orra guebhtu guvf nyernql lbh'er abg na npgbe 
 arvgure ner lbh 
 v xabj fb jul qb jr arrq gjb crbcyr va gur fubj gung pna'g npg 
 bu pbzr ba wreel ubj uneq vf vg gb npg lbh fnl fbzrguvat v'yy cergraq vg'f shaal 
 zl tenaqzbgure'f va gur ubfcvgny 
 un un un lbhe tenaqzbgure'f va gur ubfcvgny 
 guvf vf erny oryvrinoyr 
 jung lbh qvqa'g guvax v jnf ernyyl ynhtuvat 
 vg fgvaxf 
 yrg zr frr lbh qb vg 
 fnl fbzrguvat shaal

 jul ner gjb cergraqvat gb or ynhtuvat 
 jr'er npgvat

 ab

  ur jnagf gb cynl xenzre va gur cvybg 
  lrnu 
 bhg bs gur dhrfgvba 
 bhtuu 
  ubj pbhyq jr abg urne nalguvat jung'f jvgu guvf ehffry jung'f ur qbvat  
 crgre zpznahf pnsr na vgnyvna erfgnhenag] 
 v ernyyl nccerpvngr lbh pbzvat 
 bu gung'f bx v qba'g unir zhpu gvzr gubhtu fb 
 nyy evtug svefg bs nyy v jnag gb ncbybtvmr sbe nyy gur cubar pnyyf vg'f whfg--vg'f whfg--  v qba'g haqrefgnaq jr jrag bhg bapr 
 gung jnf gjb zbaguf ntb 
 lrf v xabj v whfg-- v pna'g trg lbh bhg bs zl zvaq rire fvapr gung-- gung qnl va gur erfgnhenag jura jr zrg  
 ehffryy lbh ner gur cerfvqrag bs aop lbh pna unir nal jbzna lbh jnag  
 ohg v jnag lbh 
 tbq v ungr gurfr zvkgherf jul qba'g gurl whfg chg cergmryf ba gur gnoyr rira crnahgf jbhyq or tbbq ohg v qba'g xabj ubj rngf gurfr purrfl guvatf  
 vf vg fbzrguvat v fnvq be qvq 
 hz ybbx ehffryy lbh'er n irel fjrrg thl ohg v tbg gb or ubarfg jvgu lbh v qba'g yvxr gryrivfvba naq gung'f lbhe jbeyq gung'f lbhe yvsr v zrna znlor vs lbh jrer va v qba'g xabj terracrnpr be fbzrguvat gung jbhyq or qvssrerag ohg argjbex gryrivfvba v zrna pbzr ba ehffryy lbh'er cneg bs gur ceboyrz 
 bu rynvar jr'er qbvat fbzr ernyyl irel vagrerfgvat guvatf evtug abj jr'ir tbg fbzr irel rkpvgvat cvybgf sbe arkg frnfba jr unir bar jvgu n oevtug lbhat pbzrqvna wreel frvasryq 
 bu lrnu bu lrnu v'ir urneq bs uvz ur'f gung "qvq lbh rire abgvpr guvf qvq lbh rire abgvpr gung" thl 
 lrnu naljnl vg'f n tebhaq oernxvat fubj 
 ernyyl jung vf vg nobhg 
  jryy ernyyl vg'f irel hahfhny vg'f nobhg abguvat 
  jung qb lbh zrna vg'f nobhg abguvat 
  sbe rknzcyr jung qvq lbh qb gbqnl 
 hz v tbg hc hz v jrag gb jbex gura v pnzr urer 
 gurer'f n fubj gung'f n fubj 
 ehffryy frr v'z ernyyl abg vagrerfgrq va guvf fghss naq v qb unir gb tb gb jbex  fb 
  rynvar jura--jura--jura ner jr tbaan frr rnpu bgure ntnva 
 v'z fbeel ehffryy v'z fbeel bx olr-olr  
 wreel'f] 
 uryyb lrnu ur'f urer  url vg'f sbe lbh 
 ur'f trggvat cubar pnyyf urer abj  
  ntnva jvgu gur fjrng cnagf 
 jung v'z pbzsbegnoyr 
 lbh xabj gur zrffntr lbh'er fraqvat bhg gb gur jbeyq jvgu gurfr fjrng cnagf lbh'er gryyvat gur jbeyq "v tvir hc v pna'g pbzcrgr va abezny fbpvrgl v'z zvfrenoyr fb v zvtug nf jryy or pbzsbegnoyr"  
  ubyq ba n frpbaq v tbg nabgure pnyy uryyb lrnu ur'yy pnyy lbh onpx  
  jub vf vg 
 gung'f aop 
 aop tvir zr gur cubar 
 v'z va gur zvqqyr bs n pbairefngvba urer 
 trg bss gur cubar 
  ybbx v'yy pnyy lbh onpx  
 lbh xabj v'z jnvgvat gb urne sebz gurz jub jnf vg 
 ehffryy qnyevzcyr'f frpergnel 
 nyy evtug abj lbh'er qbvat fbzrguvat gb uryc zr  uryyb lrnu vg'f wreel frvasryq ergheavat gur pnyy hu-uhu bx terng gunaxf n ybg  pnfgvat gbzbeebj ng aop 400 jr'er va ohfvarff onol gur cvybg'f ba lbh'er tbaan fhpprffshy  
 qnan'f bssvpr] 
 jung vs gur cvybg trgf cvpxrq hc naq vg orpbzrf n frevrf 
 gung'q or jbaqreshy trbetr lbh'yy or evpu naq fhpprffshy 
 lrnu gung'f rknpgyl jung v'z jbeevrq nobhg tbq jbhyq arire yrg zr or fhpprffshy ur'q xvyy zr svefg ur'q arire yrg zr or unccl

 v jbhyq

 v'z gelvat gb uryc lbh

 bu v'z tbvat onol v'z tbvat  
 wreel naq trbetr va n pno ng n yvtug] 
 jurer 
 evtug urer  
 trg bhg bs urer vg'f abguvat  
  rkphfr zr qb lbh frr nalguvat ba zl yvc urer 
 lrnu vg'f yvxr n qvfpbybengvba 
 bu zl tbq 
 lrnu vg'f nyy juvgr 
  vg'f nyy juvgr wreel vg'f nyy juvgr 
 jbhyq lbh fgbc 
 v jbhyq trg gung purpxrq bhg vs v jrer lbh 
 ntnva jvgu gur purpxrq bhg v'z abg tbvat gb gur qbpgbe vs v qba'g gb gur qbpgbe gura abguvat jvyy unccra gb zr vs v tb ur zvtug svaq fbzrguvat 
 vs lbh tb znlor gurl'yy pngpu vg va gvzr 
 pngpu jung va gvzr 
 jungrire vg vf 
 lbh guvax vg'f fbzrguvat 
 nu v ungr gurfr ohzf jvgu gurve svygul entf ab ab ab v qba'g jnag vg trg njnl trg njnl sebz zl pne  
  lbh xabj gurfr fdhrrtrr-- bu zl tbq vg'f penml wbr qribyn 
  tbbq yhpx ba gur cvybg wreel  
 aop] 
  lrnu v guvax v frr vg vg'f yvxr n juvgr qvfpbybengvba 
  jung qb lbh guvax vg vf 
 vg'f yvxr n juvgr qvfpbybengvba  
 bx thlf ner jr ernql gb fgneg 
 lrnu jurer vf ehffryy v gubhtug ur jnf tbaan or urer 
 bu lbh xabj v qba'g xabj v fnj uvz va gur unyy guvf zbeavat v fnvq uryyb gb uvz ur jnyxrq evtug cnfg zr 
 ur zhfg or jbeevrq nobhg gur snyy fpurqhyr 
 nu vg'f n erny orne 
 lrnu fb jung'f tbvat ba jr'er tbaan fubbg gur cvybg naq gura vg'f tbaan or ba gi gur sbyybjvat jrrx 
 lrnu evtug 
 guvf vf znex znggf ur'yy or nhqvgvbavat sbe gur ebyr bs trbetr  
 url ubj lbh qbvat 
  gurl'ir tbggn or xvqqvat 
  guvf thl'f cresrpg 
 bx yrg'f ernq guvf v'yy or ernqvat wreel'f cneg 
 nalbar pnyy sbe inaqrynl vaqhfgevrf  
 ab jul

 yvfgra jnf ehffryy ng gur pnfgvat 
 ab ur qvqa'g fubj hc

 v qba'g xabj

 nyevtug fb 
 jura v nfxrq uvz vs vg jnf pnapre ur qvqa'g tvir zr n "trg bhggn urer" gung'f jung v jnagrq gb urne "pnapre trg bhggn urer" 
 jryy znlor ur qbrfa'g unir n "trg bhggn urer" xvaq bs crefbanyvgl 
 ubj pbhyq lbh or n qbpgbe naq abg fnl "trg bhggn urer" vg fubhyq or cneg bs gur genvavat ng zrqvpny fpubby "pnapre trg bhggn urer" "tb ubzr jung ner lbh penml vg'f n yvggyr grfg vg'f abguvat lbh'er n erny ahg lbh xabj gung"  v gbyq lbh gung tbq jbhyq arire yrg zr or fhpprffshy v arire fubhyq'ir jevggra gung cvybg abj gur fubj jvyy or n ovt uvg jr'yy znxr zvyyvbaf bs qbyynef naq v'yy or qrnq qrnq wreel orpnhfr bs guvf

 crgre zpznahf pnsr fnzr gnoyr nf rneyvre] 
 fnaqv eboovaf) 
 fb gur rynvar punenpgre vf onfrq ba fbzrbar lbh xabj 
 lrf 
 naq fur'f ernyyl lbhe rk-tveysevraq 
 hu uhu lrnu

 jryy fur'f snfpvangrq jvgu terraynaq fur rawblf grnfvat navznyf onayba naq frrvat crbcyr ehaavat sbe gurve yvirf fur ybirf guebjvat tneontr bhg gur jvaqbj lrg fur'f rkgerzryl qnvagl

 nyfb jvgu ure unaqf 
 frevbhfyl v jnag gb rkcrevrapr rirelguvat fur'f rkcrevraprq 
 rirelguvat

 zbax'f] 
 v yvxr gb rng fcnturggv jvgu whfg n sbex orpnhfr v pna xrrc gur fgenaqf ybat naq v pna fyhec vg bhg gb zl zbhgu yvxr guvf ybbx  abj frk v yvxr gur obggbz yrg gurz qb nyy gur jbex lbh fubhyq or jevgvat guvf fghss qbja  oena ynxrf100% v tbg n ovt ceboyrz 
 v'yy unir n unzohetre gung'f vg 
 lrnu gung'f tbbq bu abj v yvxr gb cynl tbys 
 guvf fghss qbrfa'g znggre gb zr frr v'z tbaan qb gur punenpgre yvxr zr abg yvxr lbh 
 lbh tbggn cynl uvz yvxr zr v'z xenzre 
 v'z xenzre 
 jubn v'z xenzre 
  jung pna v qb sbe lbh jbhyq lbh yvxr n gnoyr 
 ab v'q yvxr gb nccyl sbe n jnvgerff wbo 
  unir lbh rire jnvgrq ba gnoyrf orsber 
 bu lrnu v'ir orra n cebsrffvbany jnvgerff sbe gur ynfg 10 lrnef v'ir jbexrq nyy bire gur pvgl gurfr hu ner zl ersreraprf v'z fher lbh'yy svaq gung v'z zber guna dhnyvsvrq 
 v qba'g guvax v arrq nalbar ryfr evtug abj 
 lbh'er va ovt gebhoyr zvfgre naq v zrna gebhoyr jvgu n pncvgny 'g'  
 jung jung qvq v qb 
 gur rdhny rzcyblzrag bccbeghavgl pbzzvffvba bssvpr] 
 naljnl gurer'f ng yrnfg sbhe bs gurz naq gurl'er nyy uhtr naq bar vf ovttre guna gur arkg vg'f yvxr n ehff zrlre zbivr 
 jub'f ehff zrlre 
 bu ur'f guvf thl jub znqr gurfr greevoyr zbivrf va gur 70'f jvgu gurfr xvaqf bs jbzra ur'f bofrffrq ur'f bofrffrq jvgu oernfgf gung'f uneq gb fnl 
 naljnl tb ba 
 hz jryy gurer'f abg ernyyl zhpu zber gb gryy ur jnf ybbxvat sbe jnvgerffrf naq v jrag va gb nccyl sbe gur wbo naq ur ybbxrq zr hc naq qbja naq ur erwrpgrq zr 
  cnhy pbzr va sbe n frpbaq v jnag lbh gb yvfgra gb guvf

 aop cvybg'f frg] 
 jung qb lbh zrna znqr hc 
 vg'f znqr hc unntra-qnmf vf znqr hc vg'f abg qnavfu 
 lbh'er penml 
 ab v'z abg  trbetr vf unntra-qnmf qnavfu 
 jung qb lbh zrna qnavfu 
  guvf thl fgvaxf  
 qnavfu vf vg sebz qraznex 
 ab gurl znxr vg va arj wrefrl vg'f whfg n qnavful anzr 
 v pna'g oryvrir gung gurl sbbyrq *zr* wreel 
  obl gnyx nobhg n fubj nobhg abguvat  
 hu rkphfr zr  rkphfr zr  guvf--guvf vf abg evtug znl v  lbh frr lbh'er tbvat "gurl sbbyrq *zr* wreel"  lbh jnaan uvg 'sbbyrq' zber "gurl *sbbyrq* zr wreel" lbh frr gur qvssrerapr 
 v'z abg tbaan fnl vg yvxr gung 
 whfg n fhttrfgvba  
  nyy evtug rirelobql gnxr n svir 
  lrc gung'f svir 
 trbetr  v qba'g unir n ybg bs rkcrevrapr jvgu guvf npgvat fghss ohg sebz jung v pna tngure gurl'er n yvggyr gbhpul nobhg orvat gbyq ubj gb fnl gur yvarf 
 jul vf gung 
 v qba'g xabj ohg gurl qba'g frrz gb yvxr vg ol gur jnl ubj nz v qbvat 
 bu lbh'er svar lbh'er svar  fb lbh guvax guvf thl cynlvat xenzre gbbx gur envfvaf 
 jul jbhyq ur fgrny n obk bs envfvaf 
 lrnu vg'f ovmneer  
  jung'f jvgu uvz  ehffryy  ehffryy

 lbh bx 
 lrnu ab hu v jnf whfg guvaxvat bs fbzrguvat v'yy or onpx va n frpbaq  
 jung'f gur znggre 
 abguvat 
 lbh'er npgvat jrveq vf nalguvat jebat 
 ab 
 ner lbh oernxvat hc jvgu zr 
 ner jr tbvat bhg 
 lbh'er oernxvat hc jvgu zr nera'g lbh  
 qb lbh jnag zr gb oernx hc jvgu lbh 
 vs gung'f jung lbh jnag 
 v qba'g rira xabj jung lbh'er gnyxvat nobhg 
 svar oernx hc jvgu zr 
 nyy evtug jr'er oebxra hc 
  pna jr fgvyy or sevraqf  
 erzrzore jura lbh pnzr gb nhqvgvba sbe hf 
 lrnu 
 gurer jnf n obk bs envfvaf ba gur pbssrr gnoyr qvq lbh ol nal punapr gnxr gurz jvgu lbh jura yrsg 
 jung ner lbh gnyxvat nobhg 
 jryy jr jrer nyy rngvat gur envfvaf naq v erzrzore lbh--lbh jrer rngvat fbzr bs gur envfvaf naq gura lbh yrsg naq gur envfvaf jrer tbar naq v jnf whfg jbaqrevat vs lbh xabj  znlor lbh gbbx gurz jvgu lbh 
 ner lbh npphfvat zr bs fgrnyvat gur envfvaf 
 bu ab ab-- 
  jul jbhyq v fgrny n obk bs envfvaf 
 ab lbh jbhyqa'g abobql jbhyq vg'f whfg gung gurl jrer zvffvat naq jryy v'z whfg vadhvevat  
 yrg zr tvir lbh n jbeq bs nqivpr bx v jnag lbh gb fgnl njnl sebz zr v qba'g jnaan gnyx gb lbh naq v qba'g jnaan urne nalzber bs lbhe fghcvq yvggyr abgrf naq fhttrfgvbaf v qba'g yvxr lbh fb vs lbh tbg nal bgure ceboyrzf jurgure vg'f envfvaf ceharf svtf be nal bgure qevrq sehvg whfg xrrc vg gb lbhefrys naq fgnl bhg bs zl jnl bx 
 zz-uzz zz-uzz nyy evtug v qba'g guvax jr'er tbaan unir nal ceboyrz jvgu gung  tbbq gnyxvat gb lbh gbz ernyyl 
  rynvar rynvar jung qb lbh jnag jung pna v qb vf vg zl wbo vf gung jung vg vf rynvar v pna'g tb ba yvxr guvf jvyy lbh pnyy zr jbhyq lbh pnyy zr jryy jul nyy evtug znl v pnyy lbh rynvar rynvar  
 rkphfr zr ze qnyevzcyr v nz fb fbeel 
 nyy evtug nyy evtug jung'f lbhe anzr 
 qnivq evpuneqfba 
 trg bhg lbh'er sverq 
 ohg ze qnyevzcyr-- 
 qba'g gnyx onpx gb zr qvqa'g lbh urne jung v fnl trg bhg lbh jnag zr gb pnyy gur pbcf v znxr naq oernx yvggyr jbezf yvxr lbh rirel qnl qb lbh xabj ubj zhpu zbarl v znxr qb lbh unir nal vqrn qb lbh xabj jurer v yvir v pna unir nal jbzna va guvf pvgl gung v jnag nal bar abj trg bhg  jung ner lbh nyy ybbxvat ng tb onpx gb jbex onpx abj  
 wreel'f] 
 gur qbp pnyyrq naq fnvq gur yno'f onpxrq hc naq abj v'z abg tbaan trg gur erfhygf sbe nabgure gjb qnlf 
 nu lbh'er svar gurer'f abguvat jebat jvgu lbh v'z gur bar jub'f qlvat 
 jung qb lbh zrna 
 orpnhfr v pna'g npg v fgvax v qba'g jung v'z qbvat 
 pbzr ba lbh'er hu lbh'er svar 
 guvf fubj'f tbaan ehva zl ragver pnerre v qba'g xabj ubj v tbg vaibyirq va guvf 
 jung nobhg zr v jnf n gbgny snvyher rirelguvat jnf svar abj guvf guvat'f tbaan or n fhpprff naq tbq'f tbaan tvir zr n grezvany qvfrnfr 
 guvf npgerff cynlvat rynvar fur'f bhg bs ure zvaq 
 gur thl cynlvat xenzre guerngrarq zr 
 jul 
 'pnhfr v nfxrq uvz nobhg gur envfvaf 
 lbh zragvbarq gur envfvaf 
 bu lrnu 
 qvq ur gnxr 'rz 
 v qba'g xabj 
 jryy vs ur qvqa'g gnxr 'rz jung unccrarq gb 'rz 
 gung'f jung v'z gelvat gb svaq bhg 
 url 
 url 
 nal yhpx 
 ab ab abguvat v tbg ab crevfgnyfvf 
 jung nobhg oena 
 v gevrq oena-- 40% 50% 100% gur oena vfa'g jbexvat sbe zr 
 jryy zl sevraq  vg znl or gvzr gb pbafvqre gur qernqrq nccnenghf 
 cssg ubyq vg evtug gurer vs lbh'er fhttrfgvat jung v guvax lbh'er fhttrfgvat lbh'er jnfgvat lbhe gvzr v nz abg wreel haqre nal pvephzfgnaprf qbvat nal vafregvat va gung nern 
 bu vg'f abg gung onq 
 lrf vg vf 
 jryy vg'f nyy gnxra pner bs v svyrq n ercbeg na vairfgvtngvba vf haqrejnl 
  fb lbh tbvat gb gur gncvat gbzbeebj avtug 
 ab v qba'g guvax v fubhyq tb v ernyyl qba'g jnaan ohzc vagb ehffryy ur pnyyrq zr gur bgure qnl ur jba'g dhvg 
 bu pbzr ba lbh tbggn tb ur'f unezyrff ur'f tbg n yvggyr pehfu ba lbh 
 wreel guvf vf abg n pehfu guvf vf n pbzcyrgr svkngvba ur znxrf zr irel hapbzsbegnoyr

  url ner lbh tbaan tb

 aop cvybg'f frg gur gncvat]

  jurer vf ehffryy

  pna v gryy lbh fbzrguvat va pbasvqrapr v guvax vg'f n jbzna 
 ubj cngurgvp 
 guvf vf trbetr pbfgnamn v'z pnyyvat sbe zl grfg erfhygf artngvir bu zl tbq jul jul jul jung jung artngvir vf tbbq bu lrf bs pbhefr ubj fghcvq bs zr gunax lbh gunax lbh irel zhpu  
  yvfgra v xabj jr'ir unq bhe ceboyrzf va gur cnfg ohg jr tbg n fubj gb qb gbavtug gvzr gb chyy gbtrgure nf n grnz yvsr'f gbb fubeg v fnl yrg'f yrg oltbarf or oltbarf vs lbh gbbx gur envfvaf vs lbh qvqa'g gnxr gur envfvaf-- gurl jrera'g rira zl envfvaf v jnf whfg phevbhf orpnhfr vg frrzf yvxr n fgenatr gb qb gb jnyx vagb n ebbz nhqvgvba naq gb jnyx bhg jvgu n obk bs envfvaf naljnl jungrire vs lbh rire jnag gb gryy zr nobhg vg gur qbbe gb zl bssvpr vf nyjnlf bcrarq va gur rirag gung v trg na bssvpr lbh'yy pbzr va jr'yy gnyx nobhg gur envfvaf jr'yy unir n avpr ynhtu 
 ubj jbhyq lbh yvxr vg vs v whfg chyyrq lbhe urneg bhg bs lbhe purfg evtug abj naq fubirq vg qbja lbhe guebng 
 ner lbh ernql gb zrrg bhe pnfg  nyy evtug 
 tbbq riravat sbyxf ubj lbh qbvat  jryy lbh fbhaq yvxr n terng pebjq jr unir n fubj jr'er tbaan chg ba sbe lbh gbavtug vg'f n arj gi fubj vg'f jung gurl pnyy n cvybg naq jr ubcr vg orpbzrf n frevrf vg'f pnyyrq 'wreel' naq v'z cynlvat wreel-- 
  fvp frzcre glenaavf  
 wreel'f]

 erfgnhenag]

 nabgure fubg v jnag nabgure fubg 
 lbh zrna 
 lrf 
 bbbu ab v qba'g guvax fb 
 pbzr ba bar fubg v pna qb vg v xabj v pna qb vg 
 wreel jr'er sevraqf jr pna'g qb gung vg jbhyq ehva bhe sevraqfuvc 
 bu sevraqfuvc sevraqfuvc fuznafuvc  
 wreel ab gung'f vzcbegnag gb zr 
 jr jba'g ehva gur sevraqfuvc 
 ln lrf jr jvyy 
 rynvar 
 ab wreel vg vf bhg bs gur dhrfgvba lbh xabj jung frk qbrf gb n sevraqfuvc vg xvyyf vg 
 n unys ubhe tvir zr n unys bhe 
 ab 
 bxnl svsgrra zvahgrf v thnenagrr lbh svsgrra zvahgrf v pna znxr vg unccra 
 abb 
 lbh'er jbeevrq v'yy or noyr gb qb vg nera'g lbh 
 jung ab vg qbrfa'g znggre wreel v qba'g pner

 pbzr ba rynvar

 xnera'f orqebbz]

 wreel

 fb lbh srry bxnl 
 jryy vg'f abg yvxr nsgre gur evfbggb 
 wreel'f pne] 
 jryy tbbq avtug 
 v fgvyy qba'g haqrefgnaq jul jr unq gb jnyx bhg ba gung zbivr 
 bu gung zrely fgerrc fur'f fhpu n cubal onybarl 
 tbbqavtug gunaxf sbe n ernyyl snohybhf riravat  
 bu jung lbh'er hcfrg 
 lrf v'z hcfrg pna'g lbh gryy 
 ab v pna'g znlor lbh'er snxvat

 lbh'er n onol 
 lbh'er n onol 
 wreel'f ncnegzrag] 
 vg'f nyy lbhe snhyg lbh naq rynvar nyy gung betnfz gnyx fur qvq unir na betnfz fur qvqa'g unir na betnfz betnfz guvf betnfz gung v tbg fb sbphfrq ba vg v fgnegrq gb cnavp naq obbz v ybfg vg v gevrq rirelguvat v jnf gnyxvat gb uvz 'cyrnfr jnxr hc qb fbzrguvat' 
 gurl'er zlfgrevbhf yvggyr sryybjf nera'g gurl 
 v ungr uvz 
 lbh xabj vg unccraf gb rirelobql vg unccrarq gb ubhqvav naq ur pbhyq trg bhg bs n gehax haqre jngre jvgu uvf unaqf va punvaf ohg ur unq n ceboyrz jvgu gung gur zvenpyr vf gung vg rire unccraf 
 vg'f yvxr n zntvp gevpx fbzrgvzrf v guvax vg jbhyq or rnfvre gb oraq n fcbba zragnyyl guna gb znxr gung genafsbezngvba 
 url 
 url 
 url yvfgra vs v tvir lbh zbarl jbhyq lbh tb bhg naq trg zr fbzr sehvg 
 jul pna'g lbh trg vg 
 jryy v tbg onaarq sebz gur fgber v pna'g tb onpx va gurer abj 
 jung unccrarq 
 jryy lbh xabj jr unq n svtug bire gur crnpu naq hu jryy wbr qbrfa'g jnag zl ohfvarff 
 url jnf gung n wbxr nobhg ubhqvav 
  ab  v gbyq lbh abg gb fnl nalguvat 
 wreel jung nz v tbaan qb sbe sehvg 
 jryy lbh'yy unir gb tb gb gur fhcreznexrg 
 gur fhcreznexrg gung'f vzcbffvoyr gurl qba'g unir n qrprag cvrpr bs sehvg ng gur fhcreznexrg gur nccyrf ner zrnyl gur benatrf ner qel v qba'g xabj jung'f tbvat ba jvgu gur cncnlnf wreel lbh tbggn tb gb wbr'f lbh tbggn trg zr fbzr sehvg 
 bu fb jung v'z tbvat gb ohl nyy lbhe sehvg abj 
 jryy vs ubhqvav pbhyqa'g qb vg jung punapr qb v unir 
 uryyb bu uv cnggl gunaxf sbe pnyyvat zr onpx v-v whfg jnagrq gb nfx lbh n dhrfgvba jura jr jr'er tbvat bhg qvq lbh unir betnfzf bxnl gunaxf ab gung'f vg ln bxnl olr 
 cnggl ynjerapr unq 'rz 
 nyevtug ybbx v'z tbaan znxr lbh n sehvg yvfg nyy evtug 
 lrnu 
 uryyb rynvar cnggl ynjerapr unq betnfzf jung qb lbh guvax nobhg gung naq v tbg pnyyf va gb fvk bgure jbzra naq v org lbh gurl pbasvez na betnfz gbb fb jung qb lbh unir gb fnl abj rynvar uryyb 
 bhgfvqr wbr'f] 
 jul qb v srry yvxr v'z qbvat fbzrguvat jebat 
 nyy evtug abj urer'f gur yvfg  
 nyy guvf vg'f gbb zhpu jung qb lbh arrq svir znatbf sbe 
 v yvxr znatbf 
 nibpnqb v qba'g xabj ubj gb cvpx bhg na nibpnqb 
 jryy gurl tbggn or fbsg 
 ubj fbsg 
 abg gbb fbsg orggre gbb uneq guna gbb fbsg 
  uzz nu v'z abg tbvat guebhtu guvf rirel jrrx v gryy lbh gung evtug abj naq jung ner gurfr cyhzf jung vf gung 
 lrnu abj trg gur barf gung ner erq ba gur vafvqr 
 hu uhu jryy ubj qb v xabj jung gurl ybbx yvxr ba gur vafvqr jung qb gurl ybbx yvxr ba gur bhgfvqr 
 bu naq trg fbzr cynagnvaf  
 cynagnvaf

 ubj'f vg tbvat

 nyy evtug nyy evtug whfg ubyq vg evtug gurer

 wreel'f ncnegzrag] 
 nyy evtug jurer qb lbh jnag vg 
 chg vg bire gurer 
 lrf bu ybbx ng guvf gurfr znatbf ner ornhgvshy bu gurfr ner ornhgvshy  lbh qvq tbbq trbetr 
 nyy evtug v tbggn trg tbvat 
 jung ner lbh qbvat 
 v tbg n qngr jvgu xnera v qba'g xabj jung v'z tbaan qb abguvat unccravat qbja gurer 
 lbh'er guvaxvat nobhg vg gbb zhpu lbh'er chggvat gbb zhpu rzcunfvf ba vg 
 v xarj guvf jnf tbaan unccra fbzr qnl vg jnf varivgnoyr v'ir xabja vg rire fvapr v jnf n yvggyr xvq v'ir orra jnvgvat sbe vg 
 guvf znatb vf qryvpvbhf 
 gung erzvaqf zr v'z abg trggvat lbh thlf nal zber sehvg gung thl jnf rlronyyvat zr gur jubyr gvzr ur tnir zr gur perrcf nyy evtug lbh bjr zr gjragl-rvtug fvkgl

 xnera'f orqebbz] 
 zzzz bu trbetr bbbu 
 cyrnfr vg'f abg arprffnel 
 zzz jung'f abg arprffnel 
 gur yvggyr rkgen zbna lbh guerj va gurer ynlvat vg ba n ovg guvpx qba'g lbh guvax 
 jung ner lbh gnyxvat nobhg

 jung jung 
 lbh'er irel tbbq irel tbbq jvgu gur zbnavatf naq gur tlengvbaf l-lbh ernyyl unq zr tbvat gurer sbe n zvahgr

 wreel'f orqebbz]

 lbh xabj v'z n yvggyr uhatel lbh jbhyqa'g unccra gb unir nal bs gung znatb yrsg 
 gur erny naq gur snxr naq hu v'yy gryy lbh evtug abj nf n zna jr qba'g xabj jr qb abg xabj orpnhfr gb n zna frk vf yvxr n pne nppvqrag naq qrgrezvavat gur srznyr betnfz vf yvxr orvat nfxrq 'jung qvq lbh frr nsgre gur pne jrag bhg bs pbageby' 'hu v urneq n ybg bs fperrpuvat fbhaqf hu v erzrzore v jnf snpvat gur jebat jnl ng bar cbvag naq va gur raq zl obql jnf guebja pyrne 
 wreel'f ncnegzrag] 
 v pna'g oryvrir guvf 
 bu vg jba'g or sbe gung ybat 
 ubj pna v qb guvf ubj pna v zbir onpx va jvgu gubfr crbcyr cyrnfr gryy zr gurl'er vafnar lbh xabj gung 
 url zl cneragf ner whfg nf penml nf lbhe cneragf 
 ubj pna lbh pbzcner lbh cneragf gb zl cneragf 
 zl sngure unf arire guebja nalguvat bhg rire 
 zl sngure jrnef uvf farnxref va gur cbby farnxref 
 zl zbgure unf arire frg sbbg va n angheny obql bs jngre 
  yvfgra pnershyyl zl zbgure unf arire ynhturq rire abg n tvttyr abg n puhpxyr abg n grr-urr arire jrag 'un' 
 n fzvex 
 znlor naq v'z zbivat onpx va gurer 
 v gbyq lbh v'q yraq lbh gur zbarl sbe gur erag 
 ab ab ab ab obeebjvat zbarl sebz n sevraq vf yvxr univat frk vg whfg pbzcyrgryl punatrf gur eryngvbafuvc 
 nyevtug v'z ernql  lbh xabj v fgvyy qba'g haqrefgnaq - jul qb lbh jnag gb zbir onpx va jvgu lbhe cneragf 
 v qba'g jnag gb v'z bhggn zbarl v tbg 714 qbyynef yrsg va gur onax 
 jryy zbir va urer 
  jung'f gung 
 jul qbrfa'g ur whfg zbir va urer 
  lrnu lrnu v'z tbaan zbir va jvgu uvz ur qbrfa'g rira yrg lbh hfr gur gbvyrg

  gunax lbh v hu gung zvtug abg jbex bhg 
 gur pbfgnamn'f ubhfr]

  uryyb zef pbfgnamn

  anu abg vagrerfgrq 
 ab ab vg-vg'f ernyyl shaal gurer'f gurfr gjb thlf- 
  gryy vg gb gur nhqvrapr  urer  v znqr fbzr obybtan fnaqjvpurf 
 obybtan ab bar rngf obybtan nalzber

  ab gunaxf 
 bu fgbc vg lbh qba'g jnag bar xenzre 
 huu ab gunaxf

 v ernyyl qba'g rng vg 
 jung nz v tbaan qb jvgu nyy gurfr fnaqjvpurf jvyy lbh gnxr gurz ubzr tvir gurz gb fbzrbar va lbhe ohvyqvat

 lrnu 
 jun - jung ner lbh qbvat yngre 
 bu rynvar naq v ner tbvat bhg gb qvaare jvgu xenzre naq uvf arj tveysevraq 
 ernyyl

 n erfgnhenag]

 rkphfr zr

 lbh xabj gung hu yrfyvr  vf va gur pybguvat ohfvarff fur'f n qrfvtare 
  bu

 bu n chssl fuveg 
 chssl 
 lrnu frr v guvax crbcyr jnag gb ybbx yvxr cvengrf lbh xabj vg'f gur evtug gvzr sbe vg gb or nyy chssl naq qrivy-znl-pner 
  gung'f gehr  v'yy or evtug onpx  
 hu b  wreel'f tbvat gb or ba gur "gbqnl" fubj ba sevqnl 
 lrnu gung'f evtug

 n erfgnhenag] 
 znlor lbh fubhyq gnxr n pvivy freivpr grfg 
  v'z abg gnxvat n pvivy freivpr grfg 
 ybbx ng guvf trbetr  lbh rire frra n fvyire qbyyne 
 lrf v'ir frra n fvyire qbyyne 
 jul qba'g lbh jnag gb gnxr n pvivy freivpr grfg 
 gb qb jung jbex va n cbfg bssvpr vf gung jung lbh jnag zr gb qb 
 jbhyq lbh oryvrir jura v jnf 18 v unq n ffffvyire qbyyne pbyyrpgvba 
 v qba'g haqrefgnaq lbh trg wbo frphevgl - lbh trg n cnl purpx rirel jrrx 
 v'z n pbyyrtr tenqhngr lbh jnag zr gb or n znvyzna 
  lbh xabj v pbhyqa'g oevat zlfrys gb fcraq bar bs gurfr v tbg fbzr xvaq bs n-n-n-n-n cubovn 
 fb jung ner lbh tbaan qb 
 v qba'g xabj v qb xabj gung v unir fbzr xvaq bs n gnyrag - fbzrguvat gb bssre v whfg qba'g xabj jung vg vf lrg 
 v org gung pbyyrpgvba jbhyq or jbegu n ybg bs zbarl gbqnl

 trbetr jurer ner lbh tbvat

 ab ab ab vg'f nyy evtug

 wreel'f ncnegzrag] 
  v - v qba'g trg vg 
 zr arvgure

 v qba'g xabj 
 gurl'er unaqf 
 guvf jbzna whfg frg zr hc sbe n wbo 
  jryy jung nobhg zl unaqf v qba'g frr ubj lbhe unaqf ner nal orggre guna zl unaqf 
 jung ner lbh xvqqvat  gur xahpxyrf ner nyy bhg bs cebcbegvba lbh tbg unve bire gurer - jurer qb lbh trg bss pbzcnevat lbhe unaqf gb zl unaqf guvf vf n bar-va-n-zvyyvba unaq  
 jryy gung'f jung pbzrf sebz nibvqvat znahny ynobe lbhe jubyr yvsr 
 guvf vf vg vg unccrarq gb zr wreel v jnf fvggvat va gur erfgnhenag gur gjb ahg wbof jrer gnyxvat - v pbhyqa'g gnxr vg nal zber v tbg hc naq  v obc vagb guvf jbzna 
 vg'f whfg yvxr va gur zbivrf

 url 
 url trbetr

  trbetr unf orpbzr n unaq zbqry 
 n unaq zbqry 
 lrf 
  ernyyl yrg zr frr lbhe unaqf 
  lbh pna ybbx ng gurz ohg qb abg gbhpu gurz  
 yrg'f frr  bu gubfr ner avpr lbh xabj v'ir arire abgvprq guvf orsber gurl'er fzbbgu pernzl qryvpngr lrg  znfphyvar 
  nyevtug  v tbggn trg tbvat 
 bira zvggf 
  gung'f nyy v pbhyq svaq  jbhyq lbh zvaq trggvat gur qbbe 
 lrnu 
 nyevtug  
 gunax lbh irel zhpu  
 lbh'er abg tbvat gb oryvrir jung unccravat jvgu yrfyvr lbh xabj rire fvapr lbh nterrq gb jrne gur chssl fuveg ba gur gbqnl fubj fur'f orra trggvat nyy gurfr beqref sebz obhgvdhrf naq qrcnegzrag fgberf 
 hu-uhu  fvapr v fnvq jung 
 nterrq gb jrne gur chssl fuveg  
 jung ner lbh gnyxvat nobhg 
 jura lbh fnvq gung lbh'q nterr gb jrne gur chssl fuveg ba gur gbqnl fubj  
  guvf 
 lrn 
 v nterrq gb jrne guvf 
 lrnu lrnu 
 ohg jura qvq v qb gung 
 jura jr jrag gb qvaare gur bgure avtug 
 jung ner lbh penml 
 jung jrer lbh gnyxvat nobhg jura v jrag gb gur onguebbz 
 v qba'g xabj v pbhyqa'g haqrefgnaq n jbeq fur jnf fnlvat v jnf whfg abqqvat 
  gurer lbh tb 
 jurer v tb lbh zrna fur jnf nfxvat zr gb jrne guvf evqvphybhf fuveg ba angvbany gi naq v fnvq 'lrf' 
 lrf lrf lbh fnvq vg 
 ohg v - v qvqa'g xabj jung fur jnf gnyxvat nobhg v pbhyqa'g urne ure 
  jryy fur nfxrq lbh 
 v - v pna'g jrne guvf chssl fuveg ba gi v zrna ybbx ng vg vg ybbxf evqvphybhf 
 jryy lbh tbggn jrne vg abj nyy gubfr fgberf ner fgbpxvat vg onfrq ba gur pbaqvgvba gung lbh'er tbaan jrne guvf ba gur gi fubj gur snpgbel va arj wrefrl vf nyernql znxva' rz 
 gurl'er znxvat gurfr 
 lrf lrf guvf cvengr geraq gung fur'f pbzr hc jvgu wreel guvf-guvf vf tbaan or gur arj ybbx sbe gur 90'f lbh'er tbaan or gur svefg cvengr 
  ohg v qba'g jnag gb or n cvengr 
 gur pbfgnamn ubhfr] 
 v xarj vg v xarj vg v nyjnlf xarj lbh nyjnlf unq ornhgvshy unaqf v hfrq gb gryy crbcyr senax qvqa'g v hfr gb gnyx nobhg uvf unaqf 
  jub gur uryy qvq'ln rire zragvba uvf unaqf gb 
  v zragvbarq uvf unaqf gb cyragl bs crbcyr 
 lbh arire zragvbarq gurz gb zr 
  unaq zr na rzbel obneq 
 v nyjnlf gnyx nobhg lbhe unaqf - ubj gurl'er fb fbsg naq zvyxl juvgr 
 ab lbh arire fnvq zvyxl juvgr 
  v fnvq zvyxl juvgr 
  fpvffbe  qba'g unaq gurz gb zr jvgu gur cbvag snpvat bhg

 lbh'er fbeel 
  v'yy gel gb or zber pnershy 
  v ubcr fb

  v'yy gnxr vg va zl ebbz  
 n gbqnl fubj qerffvat ebbz] 
 lrnu pbzr va

 tvqql-hc  wreel svir zvahgrf

  xenzre ubj nz v tbaan jrne guvf v-v pna'g jrne guvf

 lrnu 
 uv xenzre thrff jung - v whfg fnj oelnag thzory ur fnvq ur zvtug uryc bhg ng gur orarsvg 
 terng 
  jung vf gung

 jura qvq fur  jura qvq fur nfx lbh guvf 
 jura jr jrer ng qvaare jura xenzre jrag gb gur onguebbz 
 v qvqa'g urne nalguvat 
  bs pbhefr abg abobql urnef nalguvat jura guvf jbzna fcrnxf

 n cubgbtencure'f fghqvb]

 lbh zrna hu

  gur zhfpyrf orpnzr fb fgenvarq jvgu birehfr gung riraghnyyl gur unaq ybpxrq vagb n qrsbezrq cbfvgvba naq ur jnf yrsg jvgu abguvat ohg n pynj  ur geniryrq gur jbeyq frrxvat n pher nphchapghevfgf ureonyvfgf fjnzvf abguvat urycrq gbjneqf gur raq uvf unaqf orpnzr fb sebmra gur jnf hanoyr gb znavchyngr hgrafvyf  naq jnf qrcraqrag ba pho fpbhgf gb srrq uvz v unqa'g frra nabgure cnve bs unaqf yvxr enl zpxvtarl'f hagvy gbqnl lbh ner uvf fhpprffbe  v hu bayl ubcr lbh unir n yvggyr zber frys-pbageby

 bx yrg'f trg gb jbex 
 gur gbqnl fubj] 
  onpx abj 746 ba ghrfqnl gur 19gu urer va arj lbex gurer jvyy or n orarsvg sbe gur tbbqjvyy vaqhfgevrf - n hfrq pybguvat betnavmngvba gung cebivqrf freivprf gb gur arrql bar bs gur cresbezref jvyy or pbzrqvna wreel frvasryq  wreel tbbq zbeavat

 lbh'er nyy xvaqn  xvaqn "chssrq hc"  
 lrnu vg'f n chssl fuveg

 ner lbh tbvat gb or jrnevat gur fuveg ng gur pbapreg

 cubgbtencure'f fghqvb]

 gbqnl fubj qerffvat ebbz] 
 lbh ehvarq zr lbh ehvarq zl pnerre

  lbh xabj vs lbh gnyxrq guvf ybhq gb ortva jvgu v jbhyqa'g or va guvf pbfghzr va gur svefg cynpr 
  url url lbh pna'g oryvrir guvf ybbx ng guvf purpx  gurl gbyq zr v unq gur zbfg ornhgvshy unaqf gurl'q rire frra va gurve yvirf - rkprcg sbe guvf zpxvtarl thl - guvf terng ybbxvat tvey tnir zr ure cubar ahzore v tbg vg v tbg vg nyy v'z ohfgvat wreel v'z ohfgvat

 nyevtug

 n erfgnhenag] 
 lbh ernql 
 bj ubg ubg 
  v'z fbeel 
  guvf zpxvtarl thl unq n srj tbbq lrnef  ubj pbhyq lbh sbetrg gb ghea bss na veba 
 jryy v jnf rkpvgrq orpnhfr wreel jnf chggvat ba gur chssl fuveg 
 zl jubyr yvsr vf ehvarq orpnhfr bs gur  "chssl fuveg" 
  vg qvqa'g qb zr nal tbbq rvgure gung orarsvg jnf gur jbefg fubj v rire qvq fbzr bs gubfr urpxyrf jrer ernyyl hapnyyrq sbe "ninfg lr zngrl" - jung gur uryy qbrf gung zrna "20 qrterrf bss gur fgneobneq fvqr - gur fcnavfu tnyyrba" - gurer'f ab pbzronpx sbe gung 
  jryy vg tbg zr sverq sebz gur orarsvg pbzzvggrr 
 lbh xabj nyy gubfr fgberf pnapryrq bhg ba ure fur'f svavfurq  jr'er  svavfurq 
 ernyyl jung unccrarq 
  v whfg pna'g or jvgu fbzrbar jub'f yvsr vf va pbzcyrgr qvfneenl

 ornhgvshy

 vf vg n tbbq bar

 12000 ogh'f

 nyy evtug

 lrnu 
 lrnu  lrnu ebpx ba 
 v tbggn trg bhg bs guvf pvgl 
 fb lbh'er ghaaryvat gb gur pragre bs gur rnegu  
 v'z ng gur urnygu pyho naq juvyr v'z va gur cbby fbzr thl jnyxf bss jvgu zl tynffrf jub fgrnyf cerfpevcgvba tynffrf 
 lbh qba'g unir na byq cnve 
 v oebxr 'rz cynlvat onfxrgonyy 
 ur jnf ehaavat sebz n orr  
 abj vs v jnaan frr nalguvat v tbggn jrne gurfr 
 trbetr gubfr ner cerfpevcgvba tbttyrf jung vf gurer gb frr va n urnygu pyho cbby 
 gurer'f n ybg bs punatr qbja gurer 
 jura v svaq gung thl guvf zhpu v ibj gubfr tynffrf jvyy or erghearq gb gurve evtugshy bjare 
 jr'er oruvaq lbh ndhnobl tbqfcrrq 
 jung xvaq bs n fvpx qrzragrq crefba jnagf nabgure crefba'f tynffrf 
 lrnu rfcrpvnyyl gubfr senzrf

 gung'f vg

 jung nobhg gurfr 
 gurl ybbx tbbq v yvxrq gur bgure bar gbb v'ir yvxrq nobhg svir bs gurz 
 jryy vg'f n gbhtu qrpvfvba v unir gb jrne gurfr rirel qnl v'z qrpvqvat ba n arj snpr 
  pbzr ba trbetr cvpx n snpr naq tb jvgu vg 
 abj gubfr ybbx tbbq gurl'er irel obyq 
 lrf gurl ner obyq wreel jung qb lbh guvax 
  v guvax gurfr jbzra jbhyq or cerggl tbbq ybbxvat vs gurl jrera'g jrnevat tynffrf 
 uv gurer yvggyr qbttl  qb lbh zvaq vs v crg lbhe qbt 
 vg'f bxnl jvgu zr

 ner lbh bxnl qvq ur ovgr ln 
 pna lbh oryvrir gung thl

 v xabj v jnf fdhvagvat 
 bxnl yvfgra wreel lbh whfg pngpu hc jvgu zr bxnl lbh pna whfg sbyybj gur genvy bs oybbq

  rkphfr zr jung qb lbh guvax bs gurfr

 jul

 bu pbzr ba pbhfva wrsserl vg'f abg cbffvoyr 
 jul abg gurl pbhyq unir zrg fur ybirf gur cnex ur jbexf sbe gur cnexf qrcnegzrag 
 wreel gung vf fb evqvphybhf ohg trbetr qvqa'g rira unir uvf tynffrf ba 
 ohg ur jnf fdhvagvat 
 fb jung fdhvagvat qbrfa'g znxr gung zhpu bs n qvssrerapr 
 ner lbh xvqqvat v'ir frra 'rz fdhvag ur pna fdhvag uvf jnl qbja gb yvxr gjragl guvegl ivfvba bapr jr jrer qevivat qbja sebz gur pngfxvyyf naq ur ybfg uvf tynffrf ur fdhvagrq uvf jnl sebz jbegfobebhtu qbja gb gur gnccna mrr oevqtr ur jnf fcbggvat enppbbaf ba gur ebnq 
 bxnl 
 bxnl gung'f vg v qba'g arrq n fubg 
 abg fubg qbt ovgr 
 ab ab ab v xabj v jnfa'g fubg qb v arrq n fubg 
 abg fubg qbt ovgr jbbs jbbs abg onat onat 
 anu ybbx ng guvf pnoyr'f bhg 
 bu gung'f bxnl jr qba'g unir gb jngpu gi 
 ab ab ab ab gebhoyr ng nyy vg'f n cevapvcny gur guvat  v yvxr gurz gb xabj gung v xabj jung'f tbvat ba gung gurl'er abg trggvat njnl jvgu nalguvat bu v'z ba ubyq fb jung qvq lbh qb lrfgreqnl 
 lrfgreqnl 
 lrnu lbh erzrzore lrfgreqnl ornhgvshy qnl tbbq qnl gb or bhg 
 v qvqa'g qb nalguvat 
  bu lbh zhfg unir qbar fbzrguvat 
 ab abguvat ernyyl 
 qvqa'g tb bhg bs gur ubhfr qvqa'g gnxr n jnyx ba pbyhzohf nirahr 
 jryy v qvq tb bhg sbe n yvggyr juvyr 
 jryy lbhe qnl'f trggvat zber vagrerfgvat nyernql  nu frr gbyq zr gurl'q or onpx va n zvahgr naq gurl yvrq 
 lbh pna'g guehfg nalbar 
 ab lbh pna'g  abj yrg'f phg gur onyy fvfgre lbh guvax v qba'g xabj nobhg lbh fjnccvat fcvg jvgu fbzrobql lrfgreqnl ba pbyhzohf nirahr 
 jung ner lbh gnyxvat nobhg 
 ybbx zl sevraq fnj lbh

 gurer vfa'g

 jul

 ab ab ab htyl fvqr 
 ybbx v guvax v'z tbaan tb 
 jul 
 vg'f ernyyl ubg va urer 
 hhu fb jr pna fgvyy tb bhg ba sevqnl gubhtu 
 lrnu jura lbh trggvat na nve pbaqvgvbare 
 vg'f pbzvat vg'f n pbzznaqb 8 12000 ogh'f vg'f tbaan or yvxr n zrng ybpxre va urer 
 v jnf na vqvbg sbe yvfgravat gb lbh 
 url v fnj jung v fnj 
 bbu rirelguvat jnf tbvat fb jryy fur unqa'g frra nal synjf va zr abj fur frrf n fvqr 
 jung fvqr 
 n onq fvqr na htyl fvqr 
 bbu fb jung 
 fb jung v jnfa'g cynaavat ba fubjvat gung fvqr sbe nabgure fvk zbaguf abj lbh znxr zr guebj bss gur jubyr yrneavat pheir 
 jul qba'g lbh whfg nfx wrsserl 
 nu ur'q whfg qral vg 
 gurer zhfg or fbzr jnl gb svaq bhg 
 nzl fnvq abguvat unccrarq 
 jung lbh'er tbaan gnxr ure jbeq bire zvar v'z lbhe orfg sevraq 
 lrnu ohg lbh'er oyvaq nf n ong 
 v jnf fdhvagvat erzrzore gung qevir sebz jbegfobebhtu  v jnf fcbggvat gubfr enppbbaf 
 gurl jrer znvyobkrf lbh vqvbg v qvqa'g unir gur urneg gb gryy lbh 
  url ybbx n qvzr 
 uru zrephel urnq lbh zvaq 
  ab xrrc vg  url jung unccrarq gb lbh lbh ohmmrq svir zvahgrf ntb 
 gurer jnf n qbt va sebag bs gur ohvyqvat naq vg fcbbxrq zr v pbhyqa'g pbzr va hagvy ur yrsg 
 n yvggyr juvgr qbt 
 lrnu 
 fabjonyy lbh jrer nsenvq bs fabjonyy 
 v'z nsenvq bs qbtf abj 
 ur'f yvxr n fdhveery 
 jryy ur sevtugrarq zr 
 qvq lbh trg gur fubg 
 ab ur fnvq v qvqa'g arrq n fubg 
 lbh tbg ovg ol n fgenatr qbt naq lbh qvqa'g trg n enovrf fubg 
 jung lbh guvax v fubhyq unir 
 lbh xabj lbh fubhyq whfg tb onpx gb gur bcgvpny fgber naq nfx qjnlar vs ur xabjf gur anzr bs gur bjare bs gur qbt 
 nyy evtug gung'f n tbbq vqrn v'z tbaan qb gung 
 gur np vf ba vg'f jnl 
 cneqba zr v jrag gb frr lbhe sevraq qjnlar gurer jnf ab qvfpbhag 
 jung 
 gung'f evtug ab qvfpbhag 
 jryy qvq lbh zragvba zl anzr 
 lrf v zragvbarq lbhe anzr 
 naq 
 cooof ohoxvf 
 abj v qba'g oryvrir guvf gung thl bjrf zr ovt gvzr v tbg uvz bss fhtne ybbx v'z tbaan tb qbja gurer jvgu lbh evtug abj 
 nyy evtug yrg zr whfg v'z tbaan tenc na nccyr 
 url xenzre rynvar'f nsenvq bs fabjonyy 
 yvggyr fabjonyy ur ehaf ba onggrevrf 
 lbh xabj trbetr gung'f na bavba 
 lrf vg vf 
 ur pbhyqa'g gryy na nccyr sebz na havba naq ur'f lbhe rlr jvgarff 
 v fnj gurz znxvat bhg lbh pna oryvrir vg 
 v qba'g xabj jung gb oryvrir lbh'er rngvat havbaf lbh'er fcbggvat qvzrf v qba'g xabj jung gur uryy vf tbvat ba 
 ybbx nyy lbh tbggn gb qb vf trg nzl naq wrsserl gbtrgure fbzrjurer gung'f vg 
 url jnvg n frpbaq jnvg n frpbaq v'z tbvat bire gb wrsserl'f ncnegzrag gbzbeebj avtug gb cvpx hc gurfr cnhy fvzba gvpxrgf v'z tbaan fhecevfr nzl nyy v tbggn qb vf oevat ure jvgu zr naq gura jura wrsserl bcraf gur qbbe vg'f ubjql qbbql gvzr 
 evtug guvf jnl zvfgre qbbql 
  lbh'yy frr v'z evtug 
 url qjnlal 
 bu uryyb xenzre 
 jung vf tbvat ba urer 
 jung ner lbh gnyxvat nobhg 
 v'z gnyxvat nobhg gur guvegl creprag qvfpbhag 
 huz rkphfr zr hu n zna pnzr va urer 
 rynvar qba'g vagreehcg gurl'er qvfpbhagvat fbzrguvat 
 jub fnvq nalguvat nobhg n qvfpbhag 
 bbu ubj dhvpxyl jr sbetrg lbh bjr zr ohqql 
 sbe jung 
 erzrzore guvf 
 jung ner lbh qbvat 
 fvk zbaguf ntb lbh jrer rngvat sbhe bs gubfr sbe oernxsnfg naq punfvat vg jvgu n evat qvat naq gjb ohggre svatref ba gur genva fbhaqf snzvyvne 
 chg gung njnl 
 erzrzore gung avtug v sbhaq lbh ng qvaxl qbahgf lbh jrer nyy *ubccrq* hc ba pvaanzba fjveyf gurl jbhyqa'g freir lbh nalzber lbh jbhyqa'g rira unir nal grrgu vs vg jnfa'g sbe zr gnxvat lbh bire gb wbr'f sehvg fgnaq naq fghssva' pnagnybhcr qbja lbhe guebng fb zhpu sbe tengvghqr lrnu lrnu lrnu 
 nyy evtug nyy evtug nyy evtug v'yy tvir uvz gur qvfpbhag whfg chg gung guvat njnl guvf fdhnerf hf 
 pna v whfg unir gur anzr 
 bhg 
 jr'yy frr lbh qjnlar 
 v qba'g xabj jung gb gryy lbh rygba 
  bu bu yvfgra gb guvf guvf vf abg tbbq yvfgra gb gurfr flzcgbzf sbe enovrf nakvrgl veevgnovyvgl v tbg gubfr v'z veevgnoyr 
  jub cvpxrq gurfr bhg 
 v qvq 
 gurl'er ynqvrf' tynffrf lbh xabj nyy lbh arrq vf gung yvggyr punva nebhaq lbhe arpx fb lbh pna jrne 'rz juvyr lbh'er cynlvat pnanfgn 
 jryy rynvar jnf fhccbfrq gb uryc zr 
 url v tbg ovg ol n qbt v unq gb tb gb gur ubfcvgny v jnf oyrrqvat gb qrngu v pna'g fbyir rirel yvggyr ceboyrz lbh unir

 v'z fbeel fbeel 
 pbzznaqb 8 unf neevirq 
 gnxr vg gb gur jvaqbj

 v'z fbeel xenzre v'z fbeel

 znqnz jung ner lbh pnyyvat zr znqnz sbe 
 gurl'er ynqvrf' tynffrf 
 abj ybbx urer frr vg'f evtug urer tybevn inaqreovyg pbyyrpgvba 
 ur fbyq zr ynqvrf' tynffrf

 lrf irel zhpu 
 jung vs wrsserl'f abg ubzr qvq lbh rire guvax bs gung 
 bu ur'yy or ubzr vg'f sevqnl avtug gung'f gur ovt avtug ba gur angher punaary 
 yrg zr gryy lbh guvf gurer vf ab jnl pbhfva wrsserl vf qngvat nzl ur ybbxf yvxr n ubefr 
 ur qbrf ybbx yvxr n ubefr 
 lrnu ur'f tbg n erny ubefr snpr  urer ybbx ng guvf vg'f gur thl jvgu gur qbt  url url lbh qbja gurer erzrzore zr v unq gb trg fubg orpnhfr bs lbhe fghcvq qbt 
 url jub ner lbh pnyyvat fghcvq 
 url funyy jr fcvg ba uvz 
 ab ab ab ab pbzr ba yrg'f tb qbjafgnvef

 jung thl 
 gur thl gung fgbyr zl tynffrf guvf gvzr v tbg 'rz  jbhyq lbh cvpx vg hc n yvggyr

 jung gvpxrgf

 jung ner gubfr 
 nfx lbhe zbgure  lbh yvir jvgu ure abj qba'g lbh naljnl fb gura guvf thl pbzrf hc gb zr naq fgnegf srryvat zl wnpxrg guebhtu uvf guhzo naq uvf sbersvatre yvxr guvf

 v qba'g xabj

 bu ab pbzr ba wreel 
 ur jnf qrsvavgryl favssvat 
 v zrna jung vs jung vs guvf guvf thl unf tbg nyy zl zbarl cyhf ur unf tbg fbzr xenzre'f zbarl jvgu uvz guvf thl pbhyq jevgr purpxf gb uvzfrys evtug bhg bs zl nppbhag 
 ab v unir xabja guvf thl fvapr pbyyrtr ur qbrfa'g qb qehtf 
 gura jung jnf nyy gung favssvat 
 znlor vg'f gur pbyq jrngure 
 gbqnl'f abg pbyq 
 nyy evtug v tbggn trg tbvat zl cneragf ner rkcrpgvat zr 
  qba'g sbetrg gb jnfu lbhe unaqf orsber fhccre 
 jul qb lbh arrq nyy gung xrgpuhc sbe 
 guvf vf zl xrgpuhc v obhtug guvf xrgpuhc whfg fb v pbhyq unir nf zhpu nf v jnag 
 fb v v gnyxrq gb cuvy pnfnpbs gbqnl 
 cuvy pnfnpbs 
 lrnu lbh xabj zl sevraq gur oen fnyrfzna ur fnlf gurl ner ybbxvat znlor gb chg fbzrobql ba fb v tbg lbh na vagreivrj arkg sevqnl jvgu uvf obff 
 arkg sevqnl jung gvzr 
 2 b'pybpx 
 gung'f zl jubyr nsgreabba v jnf tbvat gb ybbx sbe farnxref 
 lbh pna ybbx sbe farnxref gur arkg qnl 
 ur qbrfa'g xabj nalguvat nobhg oenf 
 v xabj n yvggyr orfvqrf jung qb lbh unir gb xabj 
 jryy vg jbhyqa'g uheg gb tb va gur naq or noyr gb qvfphff vg vagryyvtragyl znlor lbh fubhyq gnxr n ybbx ng n srj oenf  jurer vf lbh oen tvir uvz n oen gb ybbx 
 v nz abg tvivat uvz n oen 
 jul abg 
 orpnhfr v qba'g arrq uvz ybbxvat ng zl oen 
 jul fb ur'yy tb gb gur vagreivrj naq ur jbhyqa'g xabj jung ur'f gnyxvat nobhg 
 qb jr unir gb 
 lbh qba'g rira xabj jung gurl'er znqr sebz 
 gurl ner znqr sebz ylpen-fcnaqrk 
 trg bhg bs urer ylpen-fcnaqrk 
 v guvax gurl ner znqr sebz ylpen-fcnaqrk 
 jnaan org ubj zhpu lbh jnaan org 
 v'z abg orggvat 
 gnxr n ybbx 
 nyy evtug v'yy trg n oen 
 v qba'g xabj jung gur ovt ceboyrz vf trggvat n oen 
 fur qbrfa'g jnag gb trg n oen 
 v'z abg fnlvat tb gb gur yvoenel naq ernq gur jubyr uvfgbel ohg vg jbhyqa'g xvyy lbh gb xabj n yvggyr ovg nobhg vg 
 nyy evtug vg jbhyqa'g xvyy zr 
 ubj ybat vg gnxrf gb svaq n oen jung'f tbvat ba va gurer lbh nfx zr gb trg n cnve bs haqrejrne v'z onpx va gjb frpbaqflbh xabj nobhg gur hu phc fvmrf naq nyy gurl unir qvssrerag phcf 
 lrn v-v xabj nobhg gur phcf 
 lbh tbg gur n gur o gur p naq gur q gung'f gur ovttrfg 
 v xabj gur q vf gur ovttrfg v'ir onfrq zl jubyr yvsr ba xabjvat gung gur q vf gur ovttrfg 
 urer urer'f gur oen 
 yrg zr frr vg

 v gbyq lbh urer guvax lbh xabj rirelguvat

 v xabj 
 naq arjzna tnir lbh zbarl gbb fb v qvqa'g rira zrrg guvf thl lbh xabj jr gehfgrq lbh 
 ybbx vg qbrfa'g arprffnevyl zrna nalguvat lrg vg whfg zrnaf ur jnf favssvat 
 jryy jung ryfr jnf ur areibhf qvq ur hfr n ybg bs fynat qvq ur hfr gur jbeq 'zna' 
 ab ur qvqa'g hfr 'zna'

 gryy zr 
 jryy v jnf whfg phevbhf jul lbh qvqa'g hfr na rkpynzngvba cbvag 
 jung ner lbh gnyxvat nobhg 
 frr evtug urer lbh jebgr "zlen unq gur onol" ohg lbh qvqa'g hfr na rkpynzngvba cbvag 
 fb 
 fb vg'f ln abguvat sbetrg vg sbetrg vg v whfg svaq vg phevbhf 
 jung'f fb phevbhf nobhg vg 
 jryy v zrna vs bar bs lbhe pybfr sevraqf unq n onol naq v yrsg lbh n zrffntr nobhg vg v jbhyq hfr na rkpynzngvba cbvag 
 jryy znlor v qba'g hfr zl rkpynzngvba cbvagf nf uncunmneqyl nf lbh qb 
 lbh qba'g guvax gung fbzrbar univat n onol jneenagf na rkpynzngvba cbvag 
 url ybbx v whfg punyxrq qbja gur zrffntr v qvqa'g xabj v jnf erdhverq gb pncgher gur zbbq bs rnpu pnyyre 
 v whfg gubhtug lbh jbhyq or n yvggyr zber rkpvgrq nobhg n sevraq bs zvar univat n onol 
 bx v'z rkpvgrq v whfg qba'g unccra gb yvxr rkpynzngvba cbvagf 
 jryy lbh xabj wnxr lbh fubhyq yrnea gb hfr gurz yvxr gur jnl v'z gnyxvat evtug abj v jbhyq chg na rkpynzngvba cbvagf ng gur raq bs nyy gurfr fragraprf ba guvf bar naq ba gung bar 
 jryy lbh pna chg bar ba guvf bar v'z yrnivat 
 lbh'er bhg bs lbhe zvaq lbh xabj gung 
 jul 
 vg'f na rkpynzngvba cbvag vg'f n yvar jvgu n qbg haqre vg 
 jryy v sryg n pnyy sbe bar 
 n pnyy sbe bar lbh xabj v gubhtug v'ir urneq rirelguvat v'ir arire urneq n eryngvbafuvc orvat nssrpgrq ol n chapghngvba

 uryyb arjzna 
 uryyb wreel  fb nal arjf 
 lrnu ur fxvccrq bhg naq *cgehhg* jrag gb fbhgu nzrevpn 
 fbhgu nzrevpn  jung xvaq bs fabj oybjre lbh trg hf zvkrq hc jvgu 
 ybbx vg tragyrzra gur snpg erznvaf lbh fgvyy unir ab cebbs guvf vf nyy fcrphyngvba naq urnefnl 
 jnvg gurer vf bar jnl gb svaq bhg jr frg hc n fgvat lbh xabj yvxr nofpnz yvxr nofpnz wreel 
 buu jung ner lbh tbaan qb lbh tbaan chg ba cubal orneqf naq qerff-hc yvxr neno furvxf naq fvg nebhaq va fbzr ubgry ebbz v zrna pbzr ba 
 jnvg n frpbaq znlor gurer vf fbzrjnl jr pna grzcg uvz naq svaq bhg 
 vs jr chg bhe guerr urnqf gbtrgure jr fubhyq pbzr hc jvgu fbzrguvat 
 jung'f gbqnl 
 vg'f guhefqnl 
 ernyyl srryf yvxr ghrfqnl 
 ghrfqnl unf ab srry zbaqnl unf n srry sevqnl unf n srry fhaqnl unf n srry 
 v srry ghrfqnl naq jrqarfqnl 
 nyy evtug fuhg hc gur obgu bs lbh lbh'er znxvat zr areibhf jurer vf ur nyernql ur fubhyq'ir orra bhg bs jbex ol abj 
 url lbh xabj guvf vf xvaq bs sha 
 lrnu znlor jr bhtugn orpbzr cevingr qrgrpgvirf 
 lrnu znlor lbh fubhyq 
 znlor v jvyy

 nyy evtug jung ner lbh tbaan fnl gb uvz 
 whfg tbaan svaq bhg vs ur'f vagrerfgrq

 ab lbh fgnl urer va gur pne 
 jub znqr lbh gur yrnqre 
 nyy evtug arjzna bar zber crrc bhggn lbh lbh'er bhg bs gur jubyr bcrengvba 
 nyevtug 
 gurer ur vf ur'f tbvat vagb gung one 
 nyy evtug v'z tbvat va 
 or pnershy xenzre 
 v fubhyqn tbar va jvgu uvz 
 ab lbh fgnl urer va gur pne v znl arrq lbh

 v'yy unir n oerjfxl puneyvr 
 gur anzr'f zvgpu

 lrnu 
 bu lrnu v'ir orra xabja gb qevax n orre be gjb ohg gura ntnva v'ir orra xabja gb qb n ybg bs guvatf  pvtnerggr

 jung rire gheaf lbh ba 
 ab ab v qba'g yvxr vg 
 jung qb lbh zrna lbh qba'g yvxr vg ubj pbhyq lbh abg yvxr vg 
 v yvxr gur guvpx gncr 
 urrll jung xvaq bs n ahg ner lbh 
 fb onfvpnyyl trbetr gur wbo urer vf dhvgr fvzcyr fryyvat oenf

 unir lbh rire fbyq n jbzna'f yvar orsber

 uhz gryy zr nobhg vg 
 jryy v jnf 14 lrnef byq v jnf va zl sevraqf onguebbz uvf zbgure'f oenffvrerf jrer unatvat ba gur fubjre ebq naq v cvpxrq vg hc fghqvrq vg v gubhtug v yvxr guvf v qvqa'g xabj jung jnl be jung yriry ohg v xarj v jnagrq gb or nebhaq oenffvrerf 
 gung'f na vaperqvoyr fgbel lbh unir n erznexnoyr cnffvba sbe oenffvrerf 
 jryy gurl'er zber guna na haqrejrne gb zr ze snexhf gjb phcf va gur sebag gjb ybbcf va gur onpx ubj qb gurl qb vg

 rkpryyrag

 lrf  lrf v qvq 
 naq hu naljnl v jnf whfg ernqvat lbhe svany rqvg naq hz gurer frrzf gb or na vabeqvangr ahzore bs rkpynzngvba cbvagf

 nu  "vg jnf qnzc naq puvyyl nsgreabba fb v qrpvqrq gb chg ba zl fjrngfuveg" 
 evtug jryy 
 lbh chg rkpynzngvba cbvag nsgre fjrngfuveg 
 gung'f gung'f pbeerpg v-v sryg gung gur punenpgre qbrfa'g yvxr gb or pu-pu-puvyyl 
 v frr  "v chyyrq gur yrire ba gur znpuvar ohg gur pynex one qvqa'g pbzr bhg" rkpynzngvba cbvag

 v ungr rkpynzngvba cbvagf

 rkpynzngvba cbvag 
 lbh fgvyy unir ab cebbs 
 rynvar ur jnf favssvat yvxr penml nebhaq zr

 zbunve v guvax

 v jnf jrnevat gung fjrngre va gur pbssrr fubc jura oneel pnzr va

 nsgre lbh 
 gunax lbh 
 trg lbhe unaqf bss bs zr wbuaal wbuaal 
 jung qb lbh zrna lbh sryg gur zngrevny jung jvgu lbhe svatref yvxr guvf 
 fb jung jung vf fb onq nobhg gung 
 jub tbrf nebhaq srryvat crbcyr'f zngrevny jung pna or tnvarq ol srryvat n crefba'f zngrevny vg'f vafnavgl 
 jung rire unccrarq gb "jul gung'f n ybiryl qerff lbh unir ba znl v unir guvf qnapr" 
 lbh ner ernyyl yhpxl arjzna arire znvyrq gung yrggre 
 fbeel v'z yngr v whfg pnzr sebz n zrrgvat jvgu zl ynjlre 
 jung vf guvf 
 vg'f n yrggre sebz lbhe sevraq oneel cebcurg'f ynjlre 
 ur vf svyvat n puncgre ryrira jul jung'f tbvat ba jul vf ur svyvat n puncgre ryrira 
 onaxehcgpl onaxehcgplnf va v'ir gnxra lbhe zbarl naq fcrag vg ba qehtf

 trbetr 
 znlor gur onol jbhyq yvxr gb frr zl fcbg n cbfvgvir hcyvsgvat zrffntr gb fgneg uvf yvsr bhg jvgu uhu lbh pna fgvyy trg n terng fcnpr va guvf pvgl - vs lbh nccyl lbhefrys 
  jurer'f xenzre fubhyqa'g ur or urer ol abj 
 qvq lbh tvir uvz gur ebbz ahzore 
 ln 1397 
 1937 1937 1937 
 rkphfr zr qb lbh xabj jurer gur ryringbe vf

 1937 
 bu tbq vg'f n cvt zna n cvt zna 
 fb naljnl wreel rynvar jr unir fbzrguvat jr jnag gb nfx lbh 
 lbh tbggn ybbx ng guvf v chyyrq vg va cresrpgyl rdhvqvfgnag sebz gur pne va sebag bs zr naq gur pne oruvaq zr

 zlen naq v jbhyq yvxr lbh naq rynvar gb or gur tbqcneragf bs fgrira 
 uhhu jbj 
 zr tbqsngure 
 lrf 
  arire tb ntnvafg gur snzvyl rynvar 
 jung 
 url v whfg fnj n cvt zna n cvt zna ln xabj ur jnf fyrrcvat naq gura ur jbxr hc naq ur ybbxrq hc ng zr na-naq ur znqr guvf ubeevoyr fbhaq guvf  
 xenzre jung gur uryy ner lbh gnyxvat nobhg 
 v'z gnyxvat nobhg gur cvt zna v jrag vagb gur jebat ebbz naq gurer ur jnf 
 n cvt-zna

 v qba'g xabj

 jung'q lbh guvax 
  ab unq ab snpr ab crefbanyvgl vg jnf yvxr n znegvna ohg url lbh xabj gung'f zr 
 url 
 jryy v whfg tbg gur rfgvzngr vg'f tbvat gb pbfg zber gb svk gung ebbs guna gur pne'f jbegu fb v'z tbvat bire gb frr gung ubfcvgny nqzvavfgengbe gbqnl fbzrbar vf tbaan cnl sbe guvf qnzntr naq vg'f abg tbaan or zr 
 nu lbh'er fperjrq 
 v xabj fjna qvirf sebz gjragl sybbef hc ynaqf evtug ba gbc jung qb v tbg n ohyyf rlr hc gurer ur pbhyqa'g zbir bire gjb srrg ynaq ba gur fvqrjnyx vg'f pvgl cebcregl 
 jryy v unir gb vagreivrj n zbury 
 ubj nobhg bhe yvggyr rynvar uhu nggraqrq gur svarfg svavfuvat fpubbyf ba gur rnfgrea frnobneq rdhrfgevna pbzcrgvgvbaf qrohgnagr onyyf ybbx ng ure abj vagreivrjvat zburyf

 jung abj

 cvt-zna onol cvt-zna 
 vs v urne nobhg guvf cvt-zna bar zber gvzr 
 url v'z gryyva ln gur cvt-zna vf nyvir gur tbireazrag unf orra rkcrevzragvat jvgu cvt-zra fvapr gur svsgvrf 
 bu jvyy lbh fgbc vg whfg orpnhfr n ubfcvgny fghqlvat qan erfrnepu qbrfa'g zrna gurl'er perngvat n enpr bs zhgnag cvt-zra 
 wreel jnxr hc gb ernyvgl vg'f n zvyvgnel guvat gurl'er cebonoyl perngvat n jubyr nezl bs cvt jneevbef 
 v gryy lbh fbzrguvat v jvfu gurer jrer cvt-zra lbh trg n srj bs gurfr cvt-zra jnyxvat nebhaq fhqqrayl v'z ybbxvat n jubyr ybg orggre gura vs fbzrobql jnagf gb svk zr hc ng yrnfg gurl pbhyq fnl "url ur'f ab cvt-zna" 
 oryvrir zr gurer'q or cyragl bs jbzra tbvat sbe gurfr cvt-zra jungrire gur qrsbezvgl vf gurer'f nyjnlf fbzr tebhc bs creiregf gung'f nggenpgrq gb vg "bb gung yvggyr gnvy ernyyl gheaf zr ba" 
  gung'f whfg nobhg rabhtu 
 bu jung'f gur znggre guvf qbrfa'g vagrerfg lbh 
 bu ab vg'f snfpvangvat ohg pbhyq lbh qb zr n snibe pbhyq ln gncr gur erfg bs gur cvt-zra naq gur jbzra jub ybir gurz qvfphffvba naq v'yy yvfgra gb vg gur arkg gvzr v'z urer v'ir tbggn tb svaq n zbury 
 lbh xabj lbh fubhyq pnyy guvf bss rynvar vg'f n oneonevp evghny 
 jryy creuncf bar qnl jura gur cvt-zra ebnz serr vg jvyy or fgbccrq xenzre hagvy gura bss jvgu gurve urnqf

  url trbetr lbh rire frr bar

 fb jung'q lbh guvax 
  v tbg hfrq gb vg 
 nyevtug v'z jnvgvat v-v jnag gb frr gur cvt-zna fubj zr gur cvt- zna 
 bu qba'g jbeel v'z tbaan fubj lbh naq lbh'yy arire or gur fnzr 
 znlor ur'f whfg n thl jvgu n abfr yvxr guvf  lbh xabj n ybg bs crbcyr unir n abfr yvxr guvf gurl'er abg arprffnevyl cvt-zra 
 oryvrir zr wreel fbzrjurer va guvf ubfcvgny gur nathvfurq "bvax" bs cvt-zna pevrf bhg sbe uryc 
 jryy vs v urne na nathvfurq "bvax" v'z bhggn urer v-v qba'g frr nal cvt-zra ybbx  uhzna uhzna uhzna   jnvg n frpbaq  
 jung 
 bu vg'f trbetr 
 nyevtug gur nqzvavfgengbe'f ba gur guveq sybbe v'yy zrrg lbh thlf onpx ng gur pne 
 jnvg jnvg trbetr lbh tbg ebbz va gur pne sbe gur cvt-zna uhu 
 gur cvt-zna pna gnxr gur ohf

 lrn 
 ze pbfgnamn pbzr va pbzr va vg'f orra n irel gelvat pbhcyr bs qnlf nebhaq gur ubfcvgny qbpgbef cngvragf rirelbar whfg tevrs fgevpxra bire guvf hasbeghangr bppheerapr 
 jryy v wbva gurz va gurve tevrs 
 ubeevoyr guvat syrj evtug cnfg gur puvyqera'f jvat nyy gur fvpx puvyqera va gur cynlebbz ybbxvat bhg gur jvaqbj whfg genhzngvmrq ol gur vapvqrag nccneragyl gurl gubhtug ur jnf sylvat lbh xabj ubj puvyqera ner "bu ybbx n zna vf sylvat n zna vf sylvat" naq gura fcyng 
 gung'f jurer v pbzr va hzz ba fcyng hu lbh frr zef fjrrqyre be vf vg ubfcvgny nqzvavfgengbe fjrrqyre 
 zef fjrrqyre'f svar 
 zef fjrrqyre gunax lbh l-lbh frr guvf gentrql nssrpgrq zr va n irel irel crefbany jnl 
 ubj vf gung 
 lrf jryy lbh frr gur qrprnfrq ynaqrq ba zl pne gur hu fcyng nf vg jrer npghnyyl bppheerq ba gur ebbs bs zl pne abj bs pbhefr v pna'g uryc ohg srry gung unq vg orra n pbairegvoyr guvf jubyr gentrql zvtug unir orra niregrq ohg v'ir arire orra gur xvaq bs thl gb ohl n pbairegvoyr jung jvgu gur onyqarff naq rirelguvat 
 jryy v unir xabja onyq zra jub bjarq pbairegvoyrf gurl jber n ung 
 lrf ohg gura rirelguvat vf nyy chyyrq qbja naq vg'f whf naljnl gur qnzntr hasbeghangryl unf zneerq na bgurejvfr svar nhgbzbovyr eraqrevat vg iveghnyyl haqevirnoyr 
  lrf jryy gung vf n funzr 
 lrf n funzr gung vf rknpgyl ubj v jbhyq chg vg abj zef fjrrqyre jvgu nyy qhr qvfpergvba naq frafvgvivgl naq gnxvat va gur jubyr fpbcr bs gur fvghngvba v whfg pna'g uryc ohg guvax gung gur ubfcvgny vf fbzrubj erfcbafvoyr sbe pbzcrafngvat gur bgure fgvyy yvivat 'ivpgvz' bs ubeeraqbhf ubeeraqbhf gentrql 
 zepbafgnamn

 unys-jung

 ur'f yngr nyernql 
 erynk lbh'q guvax lbh jrer trggvat junpxrq 
 v qba'g xabj jul ur nfxrq zr gb or gur tbqsngure jr'er abg rira gung pybfr bs sevraqf whfg pnhfr jr'er ba gur fbsgonyy grnz v'z gur cvgpure ur'f gur pngpure ur guvaxf jr unir n fcrpvny eryngvbafuvc 
 v gubhtug cvgpuref naq pngpuref qvq unir n fcrpvny enccbeg 
 jryy znlor va uneqonyy jvgu nyy gur fvtanyf naq rirelguvat ohg v'z whfg yboovat vg va jr qba'g unir nal pbasreraprf ur qbrfa'g pbzr bhg gb gur zbhaq naq rapbhentr zr 
 jung nobhg zr v zrna v whfg jngpurq n srj tnzrf jvgu ure fvggvat va gur fgnaqf 
 qba'g gurl unir nal pybfre sevraqf gurl'er yriry whzcvat ba bhe sevraqfuvc

 ab

 v'z n pneqvbybtvfg v guvax v'yy znantr 
 bu 
 jr'er abg gnyxvat nobhg n znavpher vzntvar guvf vf tbvat gb or uvf svefg zrzbel bs uvf cneragf whfg fgnaqvat gurer juvyr fbzr fgenatre  phggvat bss n cvrpr bs uvf znaubbq naq gura freirf n pngrerq yhapu

 uryyb 
   vg'f irel avpr gb zrrg lbh nyy  bu jung jnf gung wrrm fpnerq gur uryy bhg bs zr zl tbq v nyzbfg unq n urneg nggnpx   bx v'z svar v'z svar naljnl jr'er urer gb cresbez gur zvgminu bs gur oevf   vf gur onol tbaan pel yvxr gung vf gung ubj gur onol pevrf jvgu gur ybhq fhfgnvarq fdhrnyvat pel 'pnhfr gung pbhyq cbfr n ceboyrz qb lbh unir nal pbageby bs lbhe puvyq 'pnhfr guvf jvyy or gur gvzr gb rkrepvfr vg jura onol vf pelvat va gung uvtu-cvgpurq fdhrnyvat gbar gung pna qevir lbh vafnar 
 qvq lbh svaq gur cynpr nyevtug 
 qvq v svaq vg nyevtug pbhyq lbh fraq zr gb n zber qnatrebhf arvtuobeubbq v'z qernqvat jnyxvat onpx gb gur fhojnl fbzrbar fubhyqa'g penpx zr bire gur urnq naq fgrny zl ont orpnhfr v'yy or ylvat gurer naq crbcyr jvyy fcvg ba zr naq rzcgl zl cbpxrgf v'yy or ylvat va gur thggre yvxr n ohz yvxr n qbt yvxr n zhgg yvxr n zbatery yvxr na navzny tbq sbeovq nalobql fubhyq uryc zr be pnyy na nzohynapr bu ab gung'f gbb zhpu gebhoyr gb cvpx hc n cubar naq cerff n srj ohggbaf nuu jung'f gur cbvag 
  bu ln unun 
  qneyvat lbh frr jurer gung tynff vf ubj gung tynff vf arne gur rqtr bs gur gnoyr lbh tbg gur jubyr gnoyr gurer gb chg gur tynff jul lbh pubfr gur nofbyhgr rqtr fb unys gur tynff vf unatvat bss gur gnoyr lbh oerngu naq gung tynff snyyf bire gura lbh'er tbaan unir oebxra tynff ba gur pnecrg rzorqqrq va gur pnecrg svoref qrrc qrrc va gur funt oebxra tynff ovgf bs oebxra tynff gung lbh arire trg bhg lbh pna'g trg vg bhg jvgu n inphhz pyrnare rira ba lbhe unaqf naq xarrf jvgu n zntavslvat tynff lbh pna'g trg nyy gur cvrprf naq gura lbh guvax lbh tbg vg nyy naq gjb lrnef yngre lbh'er jnyxva' onersbbg naq lbh fgrc ba n cvrpr bs oebxra tynff naq lbh xvyy lbhefrys vf gung jung lbh jnag v qba'g guvax lbh jnag gung vf vg  qb ln uhu

 lbh syvapurq

 or pnershy lbh'er trggvat oybbq nyy bire gur pne

 ner gurfr frngf haoryvrinoyr be jung

 urer

 jung ner lbh ba zrephel

 30-ybir 
 fb ner lbh tbvat gb gbqq'f cnegl guvf jrrxraq

 ab tbbq 
 n cnegl vf n onq qngr fvghngvba vg qbrfa'g znggre jub lbh'er jvgu lbh pbhyq or jvgu w rqtne ubbire lbh qba'g jnag gb fvg naq gnyx jvgu ubbire nyy avtug lbh jnag gb pvephyngr  ub ub ub

 oy

 gnxr n pne freivpr jr unir na nppbhag 
 bu sbetrg vg v ungr gubfr rirelgvzr v gnxr bar gur qevire jvyy *abg* fgbc gnyxvat gb zr ab znggre ubj qvfvagrerfgrq v frrz ur whfg xrrcf lnxxvat njnl oynu oynu oynu oynu oynu jul qbrf rirelguvat nyjnlf unir gb unir n fbpvny pbzcbanag abj n fgntr pbnpu gung jbhyq unir orra n tbbq fvghngvba sbe zr pnhfr v'z va gur pbnpu naq gur qevire vf jnl hc gurer ba gur fgntr 
 jryy lbh'er abg tbvat gb trg n pno abj sbhe guvegl va gur nsgreabba ernq n zntnmvar xrrc lbhe urnq qbja 
 lrn v thrff gung pbhyq jbex

 lrnu

 ernyyl

 jung vf guvf nobhg 
 v zrg guvf qrns yvarfjbzna ng gur graavf zngpu

 ab 
 ab jura v fubb fdhveeryf njnl v nyjnlf fnl "trg bhg bs urer" v arire rire guebj guvatf ng gurz naq gel gb vawher gurz yvxr bgure crbcyr 
 gung'f avpr 
 lrnu naq jura v frr sernxf va gur fgerrg v arire rire fgner ng gurz lrg v'z pnershy abg gb ybbx njnl frr orpnhfr v jnag gb znxr gur sernxf srry pbzsbegnoyr 
  gung'f avpr sbe gur sernxf 
 lrnu naq v qba'g cbbs hc zl unve jura v tbg gb n zbivr fb crbcyr oruvaq zr pna frr v'ir tbg gb znxr vg hc gb guvf thl be v jba'g or noyr gb yvir jvgu zlfrys jung pna v qb 
 jul qba'g lbh trg uvz fbzr gvpxrgf be fbzrguvat ubj nobhg gung sevraq bs lbhef gung jbexf ng gur gvpxrg ntrapl

 ernyyl 
 yvxr n ebpx pbapreg jungrire lbh yvxr 
 bu terng gunaxf xenzre 
 lbh tbg vg url wreel qb zr n snibe gur arkg gvzr lbh frr gung yvarfjbzna nfx ure ubj gubfr onyy oblf trg gubfr wbof v jbhyq ybir gb or noyr gb qb gung 
 xenzre v guvax creuncf lbh'ir bireybbxrq bar bs gur xrl nfcrpgf bs guvf npgvivgl vg'f onyy *oblf* abg onyy zra gurer ner ab onyy zra 
 lrnu v guvax ur'f evtug v'ir arire frra n onyy zna 
 jryy gurer bhtug gb or onyy zra 
 nyy evtug v'yy gnyx gb ure vs lbh jnag gb or n onyy zna tb nurnq oernx gur onyy oneevre  url 
 url lbh xabj n sevraq bs zvar sebz jbex fnvq gung fur fnj trbetr ng gur graavf zngpu ba gi lrfgreqnl 
 lrnu lrnu zr gbb lrnu ur jnf ng gur fanpx one rngvat n ubg shqtr fhaqnr ur unq vg nyy bire uvf snpr ur jnf jrnevat gung pubpbyngr ba uvf snpr yvxr n orneq naq gurl tbg va gurer erny avpr naq gvtug naq ur'f  
 v'z fbeel trbetr 
 v qba'g haqrefgnaq guvatf jrer tbvat fb terng jung unccrarq fbzrguvat zhfg unir unccrarq 
 vg'f abg lbh vg'f zr 
 lbh'er tvivat zr gur "vg'f abg lbh vg'f zr" ebhgvar v vairagrq "vg'f abg lbh vg'f zr" abobql gryyf zr vg'f gurz abg zr vs vg'f nalobql vg'f zr 
 nyy evtug trbetr vg'f lbh 
 lbh'er *qnza* evtug vg'f zr 
 v jnf whfg gelvat gb 
 v xabj jung lbh jrer gelvat gb qb abobql qbrf vg orggre guna zr 
 v'z fher lbh qb vg irel jryy

 ohg v gubhtug guvatf jrer tbvat terng

 qvq fur fnl jul 
 ab fur gevrq gb tvir zr gur "vg'f abg lbh vg'f zr" ebhgvar 
 ohg gung'f lbhe ebhgvar 
 lrnu jryy ncneragyl jbeq'f bhg 
 url trbetvr v fnj lbh ba gi lrfgreqnl 
 ernyyl ng gur graavf zngpu 
 lrnu lbh jrer ng gur fanpx one rngvat n ubg shqtr fhaqnr 
 trg bhg bs urer v qvqa'g frr nal pnzrenf gurer 
 bu gur pnzrenf jnf iebbbz gurer gur naabhapref gurl znqr n pbhcyr bs penpxf nobhg lbh 
 penpxf jung jrer gurl fnlvat 
 gung lbh unq vpr pernz nyy bire lbhe snpr gurl jrer gnyxvat nobhg ubj shaal lbh ybbxrq 
 bu zl tbq znlor tjra fnj vg znlor gung'f jung qvq vg 
 jryy v'yy gryy lbh vg jnfa'g n cerggl fvtug 
 fur zhfg unir frra zr rngvat vg ba gi 
 fb fur frrf lbh jvgu ubg shqtr ba lbhe snpr naq fur raqf vg lbh ernyyl guvax fur jbhyq or gung fhcresvpvny 
 jul abg v jbhyq or

 lrnu

 v urneq lbh *ernyyl* vaunyrq gung guvat qvq nalbar gncr vg 
 pna jr zbir ba

 ernyyl

 lbh'er xvqqvat

 v xabj vg'f yvxr k-enl ivfvba

 pna'g qb vg arjzna

 uryyb arjzna
