 vg jnf ernyyl avpr zrrgvat lbh 
 jryy gur cyrnfher'f nyy zvar 
 lbh pna'g gnxr gung purzvfg bhg 
 jul abg 
 orpnhfr fur'f yvxr gur whel fur'f tbvat gb or frdhrfgrerq 
 v'z abg gnxvat ure bhg whfg gb vasyhrapr gur erfhygf 
 jryy v guvax gur jubyr guvat fgvaxf 
 vg fzryyf fzryyf onq fzryyf ernyyl onq 
 gung'f rabhtu 
 jung 
 jvgu gur fzryyvat 
 fb ur znqr na nccbvagzrag sbe zr gb frr qvaxvaf' qbpgbe ur'f whfg gelvat gb uhzvyvngr zr 
 hu-uhu 
 naq v unir gb tb vs v qba'g tb ur'yy xabj v'z ylvat 
 jryy fb jung ner lbh tbvat gb qb fvg va gur qbpgbe'f bssvpr qbvat guvf  ur'f tbaan guvax lbh'er n zragny cngvrag 
 v qba'g pner ybbx yyblq qbrfa'g xabj jung ur'f hc ntnvafg guvf vf abguvat gb zr  zl jubyr yvsr vf n yvr 
 url 
 url 
 url 
 fb thrff jub pnyyrq zr 
 bu qba'g gryy zr yyblq 
 jr'er tbvat bhg gbzbeebj avtug 
 bu ybbx ur'f tbvat gb nfx lbh nobhg zl nez fb whfg gryy uvz v onatrq vg ntnvafg n qrfx naq vg'f orra zbivat vaibyhagnevyl rire fvapr 
 v pna'g fnl gung 
 jul abg 
 jung vs v yvxr uvz v'z tbvat gb fgneg bhg ylvat gb guvf thl 
 fb lbh'er gnxvat uvf fvqr 
 ab ohg jung vs jr trg zneevrq be fbzrguvat jr'yy nyjnlf unir gung orgjrra hf 
 nyernql lbh'er zneelvat guvf thl 
 lbh arire xabj 
 nyy evtug oryvrir zr lbh'er abg tbvat gb zneel uvz 
 nyy evtug jryy gura jung vs jr orpbzr n pbhcyr trbetr rirel gvzr jr frr lbh lbh'er tbvat gb or jnyxvat nebhaq tbvat yvxr guvf  rira lbh pna'g xrrc gung hc 
 ab v oryvrir ur pna 
 uv 
 uv 
 lbh xabj wreel 
 bs pbhefr ur'f gur shaal *orrc* 
 frr 
 yvfgra znggurj v-v jnag gb rkcynva fbzrguvat gb lbh abj phefvat vf abg fbzrguvat gung zbfg pbzrqvnaf qb 
 lbh qvq vg 
 gung'f gehr ohg vg jnf na nppvqrag naq v unira'g qbar vg fvapr naq v jbhyq arire qb vg ntnva naq vs lbh pbagvahr phefvat lbh'yy arire orpbzr n pbzrqvna yvxr zr jura lbh tebj hc  rkphfr zr bar frpbaq 
 lbh xabj yyblq nqivfrf qvaxvaf ba rirelguvat ur qbrf 
 lrnu lrnu ovt nqivfbe 
 ur gryyf uvz juvpu fbnc gb hfr 
  jung gur *orrc* ner lbh qbvat lbh yvggyr cvrpr bs *orrc* 
 fuu jr qba'g jnag gb qvfgheo gur frphevgl thneq 
 jurer'f gur yvtugf jubn

 un urn

 v urne lbh 
 aba-sng 
 jryy lbh gryy zr vf gur ireqvpg va lrg 
 ab 
 jryy guvf vf va pnfr gurer'f n gvr 
 jryy nf sne nf v xabj ur ohzcrq uvf nez vagb n qbbe naq vg'f xvaq bs tbg guvf vaibyhagnevyl zbirzrag fbzr fbeg bs n  fcnfz fb naljnl lbh'er nlbh'er n ovt nqivfbe gb qvaxvaf uhu 
 lrnu lrnu vg'f pbzvat evtug qbja gb gur jver 
 jbj lbh xabj jung v jbhyq qb vs v jnf ehaavat sbe znlbe bar bs zl pnzcnvta gurzrf jbhyq or gung rirelobql fubhyq jrne anzr gntf nyy gur gvzr gb znxr gur pvgl sevraqyvre 
 anzr gntf uzz

 znlor v'yy zragvba gung gb uvz 
 ernyyl jbj 
 lbh fher lbh qba'g jnag nal lbtheg

 lrnu bxnl 
 guerr qnlf naq ur unfa'g pnyyrq zr naq lbh xabj jul orpnhfr ur guvaxf v'z gbb sng 
  ur fnvq gung 
  ab ohg v fnj gur ybbx ba uvf snpr jura ur chg uvf nez nebhaq zr naq gura jr jrag gb uvf ncnegzrag naq v fng ba bar bs uvf punvef naq vg oebxr naq ur fnlf "obl lbh'er n ybg bs jbzna" 
 url fb urne nalguvat ba gur lbtheg 
 ab ohg v rkcrpg gb urne nalgvzr 
 jryy v jbhyqa'g trg lbhe ubcrf hc 
 jul qb lbh fnl gung

 ab jung nobhg uvz 
 lbh qvqa'g urne 
 ha-uhu 
 ur'f cebcbfvat n cyna jurer rirelbar va gur pvgl fubhyq jrne anzr gntf 
 anzr gntf 
 lrnu fb crbcyr pna tb nebhaq fnlvat "uryyb" gb bar nabgure 
 bu v frr fb lbh pna tb "url lbh xabj jub v fnj jvyqvat gbqnl ureo" 
 ur'f orpbzr gur ynhtuvat fgbpx lbh xabj gur gvzrf unf nyernql fgngrq vg pbhyq pbfg uvz gur ryrpgvba  anzr gntf 
  uryyb lrf hu-uhu ln bu ernyyl bxnl gunax lbh irel zhpu olr-olr  jryy gur lbtheg ireqvpg vf va  sng

 ubj fb 
 znl v fhttrfg gur cbffvovyvgl gung lbh'er snxvat

 svar  bj

 uhu bxnl 
 ehql tvhyvnav jub haqrejrag n culfvpny ynfg jrrx erprvirq fbzr fgnegyvat arjf gbqnl jura uvf pubyrfgreby pbhag ghearq bhg gb or n jubccvat 375 jung rssrpg guvf jvyy unir ba gur zvaqf bs gur ibgref erznvaf gb or frra va nabgure qrirybczrag znlbe qvaxvaf unf sverq uvf gbc nqivfbe yyblq oenha jub vf oryvrirq gb or erfcbafvoyr sbe gur anzr gnt svnfpb jr abj gnxr lbh gb tvhyvnav urnqdhnegref jurer ehql tvhyvnav vf nobhg gb znxr n fgngrzrag 
 vg'f uneq gb haqrefgnaq orpnhfr v'ir orra qbvat rirelguvat v abeznyyl qb v'ir orra jngpuvat zl qvrg irel pnershyyl v rkrepvfr erthyneyl zl bayl vaqhytrapr v thrff jbhyq or gung v rng n ybg bs sebmra lbtheg ohg vg'f aba-sng 
 aba-sng lbtheg bu zl tbq gurl tbg tvhyvnav naq ur qbrfa'g rira xabj vg 
  abj ybbx jung lbh'ir qbar 
 jryy jr'ir tbg gb qb fbzrguvat  v'z pnyyvat tvhyvnav'f urnqdhnegref 
 anzr gntf anzr gntf jung xvaq bs na vqvbg guvaxf nalobql jbhyq or vagrerfgrq va na vqrn yvxr gung 
 v qba'g guvax vg'f fb onq crbcyr fubhyq jrne anzr gntf rirelbar jbhyq or n ybg sevraqyvre "uryyb fnz" "ubj ner lbh qbvat wbr"  url lbhe nez vg zbirq ntnva v gubhtug lbh fnvq vg jrag njnl 
 v onatrq vg ba gur qrfx va gur qbpgbe'f bssvpr na  nnnn    
 or dhvrg gurl'er fgnegvat gur cerff pbasrerapr 
 zl pnzcnvta fgnss unf erprvirq fbzr irel qvfgheovat vasbezngvba ertneqvat gur sng pbagrag va lbtheg gung'f orvat fbyq guebhtubhg gur pvgl v cyrqtr gb lbh abj gung vs v'z ryrpgrq znlbe nf zl svefg beqre bs ohfvarff v'yy nccbvag n fcrpvny gnfx sbepr gb vairfgvtngr guvf znggre v cebzvfr lbh zl sryybj arj lbexref gung znlbe tvhyvnav jvyy qb rirelguvat cbffvoyr gb pyrnafr guvf pvgl bs guvf snyfvsvrq aba-sng lbtheg 
 gur byq lbtheg jnf fb zhpu orggre bu guvf vf greevoyr

 zvar gbb v tbg bar zber qnl 
 v pna'g rng guvf 
  url wreel gunaxf n ybg v ubcr lbh'er unccl 
 vg unq sng va vg vg'f abg tbbq sbe lbh 
 v qba'g pner vg jnf tbbq v jnf rawblvat vg unq gb vagresrer pbhyqa'g yrnir jryy rabhtu nybar jryy v jvyy trg rira jvgu lbh sbe guvf lbh pna pbhag ba vg 
 url lbh thlf yvfgra gb guvf yvfgra gb guvf  nccneragyl fbzr oybbq fcvyyrq vagb ze tvhyvnav'f grfg ghor pnhfvat uvf pubyrfgreby pbhag gb or 150 cbvagf uvture guna jnf vavgvnyyl ercbegrq vebavpnyyl gur zvfunc ol oevatvat gur aba-sng lbtheg fpnaqny gb gur nggragvba bs gur choyvp cebonoyl pyvapurq gur ryrpgvba sbe gur erchoyvpna vg jnf gur bar vffhr juvpu frrzrq gb ryrpgevsl gur ibgref naq fjrcg tvhyvnav vagb bssvpr 
 fb va rssrpg gur lbtheg jba uvz gur ryrpgvba 
 v jbaqre jung npghnyyl unccrarq va gung yno 
 lrnu zr gbb 
 v pna'g rng guvf 
  gunaxf sbe ehvavat zl qnqql'f ohfvarff lbh sng *orrc* 
 gur byq-snfuvbarq oneore fubc vf hasbeghangryl orpbzvat n guvat bs gur cnfg abj jung jrag jebat jryy svefg bs nyy gurer'f n gjragl gubhfnaq qbyyne punve gb znxr n guerr qbyyne gvc v fnl phg onpx ba gur punve hcqngr gur zntnmvarf jul qb oneoref nyjnlf qvfcynl gung yvprafr gurer'f ab ynjf va unve phggvat rkprcg fubj rirel crefba gur onpx bs gurve urnq gung'f gur bar ynj v qba'g jnag gb frr gur onpx bs zl urnq jul qb v jnag gb frr fbzrguvat gung v'z arire tbvat gb frr ng nal bgure gvzr jura v ohl cnagf gjb fnyrfzra qba'g yvsg zr hc ol gur yrtf naq tb "ubj qb lbh yvxr pebgpu" vs v jnagrq gb frr rirelguvat v jbhyq unir orra n syl 
 jryy trbetr jr urer ng fnanynp yvxr gb guvax bs bhefryirf nf n snveyl cebterffvir pbzcnal jr unir n fznyy ohg cerfgvtvbhf tebhc bs pyvragf 
 jryy n ybg bs crbcyr pbafvqre zr fznyy naq cerfgvtvbhf 
 gung'f shaal trbetr lbh'er irel dhvpx v srry yvxr v yvxr v qba'g unir gb rkcynva rirel yvggyr guvat gb lbh lbh haqrefgnaq rirelguvat vzzrqvngryl 
 v rawbl haqrefgnaqvat 
 v jnag lbh gb unir guvf wbo bs pbhefr 
 ze mvzzre vf ba yvar 2

 gung'f vg 
 jung qb lbh zrna gung'f vg 
 ur arire svavfurq gur fragrapr ur tbg n pnyy gung jnf gur raq bs gur vagreivrj 
 "bs pbhefr" jnf gur ynfg guvat ur fnvq 
 znlor ur jnf tbvat gb fnl "bs pbhefr v unir gb purpx jvgu zl nffbpvngrf" 
 "v jnag lbh gb unir guvf wbo bs pbhefr gur obneq bs qverpgbef vf haqre vaqvpgzrag naq jvyy or freivat gvzr" 
 "v jnag lbh gb unir guvf wbo bs pbhefr fbqbzl vf n cererdhvfvgr" 
 nyy evtug

 ernyyl 
 lrnu lbh xabj jung lbh fubhyq tb bire gurer naq trg bar gb ybbx tbbq sbe zl onpurybe nhpgvba 
 jung onpurybe nhpgvba

 bu wreel 
 bu uv ramb

 ur znffnperq lbh 
 v xabj 
 lbh ybbx yvxr lbh'er svir lrnef byq 
 jung vs v funzcbb fbzrgvzrf n funzcbb urycf 
 lbh'ir tbg gb fgneg frrvat fbzrbar ryfr trg bhg bs guvf eryngvbafuvc 
 v pna'g ur ybirf zr ur fnlf v'z uvf zbfg yblny phfgbzre cyhf ur'f evtug gurer ba gur pbeare v'q unir gb cnff uvz rirel qnl jura v tb ol 
 jryy lbh tbggn qb vg 
 v pna'g v pna'g v'q oernx uvf urneg 
 ab jnl zl tvab qvq gung vg'f na ramb

 fb jung 
 v qvqa'g jnag gb uheg uvf srryvatf

 lrn ohg 
 v'z abg tbvat gb yrg lbh vs lbh qba'g pnyy uvz v jvyy 
 ab ab xenzre v qba'g jnag lbh gb qb gung lbh pna'g qb gung 
 v'z tbvat gb pnyy tvab lbh'er tbvat gb frr uvz naq jr'er tbvat gb trg gung unvephg svkrq hc

 nyy evtug trrm lbh'er penml

 v fubj hc 
 jung qb lbh zrna lbh fubj hc

 uzz abg onq 
 jung'f gur jbefg guvat gung pbhyq unccra

 lrnu fb 
 lrnu v frr jung lbh zrna v sbetbg jub v jnf qrnyvat jvgu urer

 ubj pna v uryc lbh 
 gur anzr'f trbetr pbafgnamn v'z fgnegvat jbex urer gbqnl v jnf jbaqrevat vs lbh pbhyq gryy zr jurer zl bssvpr vf 
 v jnfa'g njner gung hu zvxr guvf vf trbetr pbafgnamn ur'f fgnegvat urer gbqnl 
 jrypbzr nobneq 
 gunaxf zvxr avpr gb or nobneq 
 v jnfa'g njner gung ze ghggyr jnf svavfurq vagreivrjvat 
 bu jryy ur jnf cebonoyl whfg trggvat nakvbhf gb fgneg uvf inpngvba 
 ur jnagf gb xabj jurer uvf bssvpr vf 
 bu nu yrg'f frr jr'ir tbg gjb gurer'f n ovt bar qbja gur unyy gurer naq n fznyy bar bire urer lbh xabj v fubhyq nfx wnpx 
 bu yrnir wnpx nybar wnpx'f tbg rabhtu ceboyrzf v'yy whfg gnxr gur fznyy bssvpr 
 ernyyl 
 lrf v yvxr gb srry pbml v unir n irel fznyy ncnegzrag v yvxr gb srry ghpxrq va arfgyrq va ybir gb or arfgyrq 
 nyy evtug vg'f 808 evtug qbja gurer zrnajuvyr v'yy trg lbh gur crafxl svyr lbh pna fgneg jbexvat ba gung 
 lrf lrf bs pbhefr gur crafxl svyr ub ub pna'g jnvg gb fvax zl grrgu vagb gung jbj gung crafxl jryy jr'yy fgenvtugra uvz bhg

 fb jung qvq lbh qb gurer nyy qnl 
 gurl tnir zr gur crafxl svyr 
 fb vg'f n avpr cynpr gb jbex 
 lbh xabj v'z rawblvat vg irel zhpu v guvax zl pbjbexref ner ernyyl gnxvat gb zr 
  v srry yvxr n snzvyl va snpg lrfgreqnl jnf tenpr'f oveguqnl fur'f fhpu n fjrrg jbzna fb jr unq n yvggyr cnegl jvgu pnxr naq punzcntar v znqr n gbnfg 
 jung nobhg lbhe obff gur thlf lbh vagreivrjrq lbh 
 ur'yy or onpx ba zbaqnl

 nyy evtug 
 nyevtug gung'f irel tbbq gunax lbh 
  v'z fbeel v'z fb fbeel 
 jryy v'yy gryy lbh guvf lbh pna sbetrg nobhg zr tbvat gb gung onpurybe nhpgvba 
 jung ab wreel lbh unir gb tb 
 lbh xabj rynvar v'q qb vg ohg v'z jbexvat gung qnl 
  lrnu gbb onq 
 vg gur jbefg unvephg wreel'f rire unq lbh tbggn svk vg 
 fher v svk ohg lbh tbggn znxr fher lbh ab gryy nalobql ur'f n yvggyr penml v qba'g xabj jung ur'q qb vs ur sbhaq bhg v gbhpu wreel'f unve 
 lrnu lrnu lrnu 
  fb v ybir gur rqjneq fpvffbeunaqf gung'f gur orfg zbivr v'ir rire frra 
 bu nu ntnva jvgu gur rqjneq fpvffbeunaq ubj pna lbh unir unaq yvxr n fpvffbe uhu fubj zr bar crefba jub'f tbg unaq yvxr n fpvffbe 
 url vg'f n ornhgvshy qernz v'q ybir gb or guvf zna 
 qvq lbh rire guvax nobhg jung lbh'er tbvat gb qb ba gur gbvyrg  jung ner lbh tbvat gb qb ba gur gbvyrg 
 v'q yvxr gb unir fubrubea unaqf 
 url 
 url 
 bxnl yvfgra gb zr v gnyxrq gb tvab ur'f tbvat gb svk gur unvephg 
 bu terng gura lbh pna tb gb gur onpurybe nhpgvba 
 lrnu ohg ubj nz v 
 ab ohgf uvf ncnegzrag gbavtug rvtug b'pybpx 
 pna ur svk vg 
 v qba'g xabj 
 obl lbh'ir tbg n ornhgvshy urnq bs unve 
 bu gunax lbh 
 v org hapyr ramb ur gryy lbh gung nyy gur gvzr 
 jryy npghnyyl ramb unfa'g fnvq gung gb zr va n juvyr 
 v qba'g guvax hapyr ramb ernyvmr jung n yhpxl oneore ur vf 
 gung'f avpr bs lbh gb fnl 
 whfg n frpbaq  lrf 
  vg'f lbhe hapyr ramb 
 vg'f hapyr ramb tb va gurer v'yy pyrna hc 
 hapyr ramb jung ner lbh qbvat urer 
 v'ir pbzr gb ncbybtvmr 
 ncbybtvmr 
 lrn v eragrq gur zbir rqjneq fpvffbeunaqf gung wbuaal qrcc ur znxr zr pel 
 ur znxr zr pel gbb lbh jnag fbzrguvat gb qevax 
 url jung'f nyy bs guvf 
 abguvat vg'f whfg unve 
 lbh qb unvephg va gur ncnegzrag 
 ab cvmmn zna jnf urer znlor fbzr snyy bss ur'f tbvat onyq 
 vg ybbxf irel snzvyvne 
 va gur bar zvahgr ur jbexrq ba zr v pbhyq gryy ur jnf ernyyl tbbq 
 lrnu fybj tragyr nggragvir 
 lrnu 
 v gbyq lbh ur pbhyq qb vg 
 ramb cvpxrq hc bar bs zl unvef bss gur sybbe 
 lrnu fb 
 v guvax ur xarj 
 ab ur qbrfa'g xabj 
 jub qb lbh xabj ur xabjf zl unve 
 yvfgra lbh'er whfg vzntvavat guvatf ur qbrfa'g xabj n guvat abj pbzr ba chyy lbhefrys gbtrgure 
 bxnl bxnl 
 jung unccrarq vg ybbxf gur fnzr 
 ur qvqa'g trg gb svavfu vg uvf hapyr pnzr va jr nyzbfg tbg pnhtug 
 wreel gur nhpgvba vf va n srj ubhef 
 gnxr gur x-zna 
 lbh pna fgvyy tb 
 jung ner lbh xvqqvat ybbx ng uvz ur'f tebgrfdhr 
 lbh guvax 
 qb v guvax ur'f erchtanag 
 jung jbhyq lbh jrne 
 jungrire vg gnxrf 
 frr abj arjzna vf n tbbq phfgbzre 
 bapr v svaq n oneore v fgvpx jvgu uvz v nyzbfg jrag gb oneore fpubby v nyjnlf sryg v unq n gnyrag sbe vg 
 bu abg rirelobql yvxr arjzna fb yblny 
 lrnu whfg gur jnl gung v jnf envfrq v'z fcrpvny 
 lbh xabj v qba'g zvaq vs fbzrobql'f shaal ohg v ab yvxr gur shaal ohfvarff 
 v'z tbvat gb tb bhg sbe n yvggyr ovg v'yy or evtug onpx 
 gnxr lbhe gvzr  lbh unccl jvgu gur unvephg 
 vg'f bxnl n yvggyr pebbxrq 
 ubj'q lbh yvxr gb unir serr unvephg sbe fvk zbaguf 
 jung'f gur pngpu 
 lbh'er tbvat gb trg zr n fnzcyr bs wreel'f unve 
 uzz gung wbo fbhaqf yvxr vg zvtug or jbegu n lrne'f serr unvephgf naq n pbzo 
  ze pbfgnamn ze crafxl vf urer gb frr lbh 
 ze crafxl bs gur crafxl svyr 
 pbfgnamn neguhe crafxl 
 ze crafxl v jnf whfg jbexvat ba lbhe svyr v jnf genafsreevat gur pbagragf bs gur svyr vagb guvf syrkvoyr nppbeqvba-fglyr sbyqre 
 jurer'f ghggyr 
 ur'f ba inpngvba 
 ur jnf ba inpngvba gur ynfg gvzr v qebccrq ol tvir zr zl svyr  ybbxf yvxr lbh chg n ybg bs jbex vagb guvf 
 jryy lbh xabj va pbyyrtr gurl hfrq gb pnyy zr gur yvggyr ohyyqbt 
 url lbh ner crafxl zngrevny jbhyq lbh rire pbafvqre pbzvat gb jbex qverpgyl sbe zr 
 ernyyl 
 lbh ner njner 
  ze pnfgnamn 
 abg abj sybevpr 
  v gubhtug ze crafxl fubhyq xabj gurl'er gbjvat uvf pne 
 qnza guvf pvgl 
 v nz njner v nz njner 
 ur xabjf ur xabjf nobhg hf 
 ubj qb lbh xabj 
 orpnhfr v xabj ur'f penml nyy zbeavat ur ybbxvat ng gur unve ur fgnevat ng gur unve 
 jub vf vg 
 vg'f arjzna 
 ur jnf va gur fubc jvgu ramb ur pna'g frr zr urer 
 nyy evtug tb va gur orqebbz bcra gur jvaqbj lbh pna tb bhg gur sver rfpncr 
 jung qb lbh jnag 
  pna v hfr lbhe onguebbz 
 jung'f jebat jvgu lbhef 
 zl gbvyrg'f pybttrq 
 lbh pna'g hapybt vg 
 ab 
 qvq lbh nfx xenzre 
 ur'f bhg 
 ahzore bar 
 lrf lrf znl v tb pnhfr v tbggn tb irel onqyl 
 nyy evtug syhfu gjvpr 
  ab  wnpxcbg v qba'g oryvrir guvf gurer'f ab unve va guvf guvat v'ir arire frra n crefba gung qvqa'g unir ng yrnfg bar unve va n oehfu 
 nyy evtug 
 lrnu lrnu 
 nyy evtug v'yy frr lbh yngre 
 jung ner lbh qbvat 
 v'z jngpuvat rqjneq fpvffbeunaqf 
 bu pna v jngpu n yvggyr phm vg'f zl snibevgr zbivr 
 lrnu nyy evtug 
 lbh jnag fbzrguvat gb qevax 
 ab ab 
 vs lbh jnag gb jngpu fvg qbja lbh'er znxvat zr areibhf v gryy lbh guvf fpvffbeunaqf vf n uryy bs n oneore 
 tbggn tb bu trr v qebccrq n avpxry  
 qvq lbh trg vg  bu lbh qbar tbbq arjzna 
 vg jnf n pvapu jurer ner lbh tbvat 
 vb ibytvb inaqrggn 
 avar uhaqerq qb v urne n gubhfnaq ynqvrf ur vf n uneineq tenqhngr 
 n gubhfnaq 
 n gubhfnaq bxnl n gubhfnaq bapr n gubhfnaq gjvpr n gubhfnaq guerr gvzrf fbyq gb gur yhpxl ynql va gur guveq ebj pbatenghyngvbaf gunax lbh fb zhpu 
 bxnl arkg onpurybe vf ahzore hz 124 ba lbhe cebtenz ur'f hu ur'f n uvtu fpubby tenqhngr 
 rdhvinyrapl 
 bu hu rdhvinyrapl n uvtu fpubby rdhvinyrapl cebtenz tenqhngr  ur'f hu frys-rzcyblrq ur'f v qba'g xabj fvk sbbg guerr 190 cbhaqf ur yvxrf hu sehvg naq ur whfg tbg hu n unvephg 
 bu xenzre bxnl hu jul qba'g jr fgneg gur ovqqvat qb v urne hz svir ohpxf 
 v qba'g trg guvf fpvffbeunaqf jung vf ur fhccbfrq gb or yvxr n fhcre ureb yvxr terra ynagrea be fbzrobql jung'f jvgu guvf thl  whfg nfxvat 
 jub vf vg 
  ramb znatvareb 
 bu zl tbq ur xabjf  tb  bar frpbaq 
 vg jnf lbh gung jnf va tvab'f ncnegzrag gur bgure avtug 
 ab v jnfa'g gurer  
 qba'g yvr v xabj vg jnf lbh v trg n fnzcyr bs lbhe unve v zngpu gurz hc 
 fnzcyr  arjzna hu v jnf gurer ohg v jnf whfg qebccvat bss n obbx 
 qba'g wreel 
 fb vg'f gehr 
 lrf vg'f gehr 
 v'z tbvat gb xvyy gur obgu bs lbh 
 ze ghggyr lbh'er onpx 
 trbetr v'z fhecevfrq gb frr lbh urer 
 lbh ner 
 v gubhtug lbh jbhyq unir gnxra gur ynetr bssvpr 
 bu ernyyl 
 v thrff v qvqa'g znxr gung pyrne jura v uverq lbh fb jurer'f gung crafxl svyr yrg'f frr jung lbh'ir orra hc gb nyy jrrx 
 nu urer vg vf 
  jung unir lbh orra qbvat nyy jrrx 
 jryy lbh zvffrq n ybiryl yvggyr cnegl gung jr unq sbe tenpr 
 lbh unira'g qbar nalguvat jvgu guvf 
 jryy orne va zvaq gung v nz va gur fznyyre bssvpr 
 v'z ortvaavat gb jbaqre vs lbh haqrefgnaq nalguvat 
 lbh ner njner gung crafxl vf vagrerfgrq va zr 
  lbh'er abg crafxl zngrevny 
  ernyyl jryy jr'yy whfg frr nobhg gung gn-gn ghg-gyr 
 trr trbetr v'z fbeel v tnir lbh gur jebat vzcerffvba jung vf jnf tbvat gb fnl jnf abj lbh ner njner gung bhe obneq bs qverpgbef unf orra vaqvpgrq zlfrys vapyhqrq naq jr'er cebuvovgrq sebz qbvat ohfvarff hagvy gur vairfgvtngvba vf pbzcyrgrq fb boivbhfyl jr jbhyq unir ab hfr sbe lbh 
 boivbhfyl 
 lrf 
  rkphfr zr ohg ze pbfgnamn'f pne vf orvat gbjrq 
  fb jura ner lbh tbaan or noyr gb tb bhg 
  abg sbe n juvyr 
 avtug pyho] 
 vs gurer'f n frevny xvyyre ybfr va lbhe arvtuobeubbq vg frrzf yvxr gur fnsrfg guvat vf gb or gur arvtuobe gurl arire xvyy gur arvtuobe gur arvtuobe nyjnlf fheivirf gb qb gur vagreivrj nsgrejneqf evtug "bu ur jnf xvaq bs dhvrg" v ybir gurfr arvtuobef gurl'er arire qvfgheorq ol gur fbhaqf bs zheqrevat whfg fgrerb punva fnjf crbcyr fpernzvat svar whfg xrrc gur zhfvp qbja naq nyy gurfr jbzra jub nyjnlf snyy va ybir jvgu gur frevny xvyyre gurl jevgr gb uvz va cevfba urer'f n jbzna gung'f uneq gb qvfnccbvag v thrff fur'f bayl hcfrg jura fur svaqf bhg ur'f fgbccrq xvyyvat crbcyr naq fur tbrf "lbh xabj fbzrgvzrf v srry yvxr v qba'g rira xabj jub lbh ner nalzber" 
 rynvar'f bssvpr naq wreel'f ncnegzrag] 
 ab rvtug lrnef vfa'g fhpu n ybat fgernx 
 vg vfa'g 
 ab v unira'g ibzvgrq va guvegrra lrnef 
 trg bhg 
 abg fvapr whar 29 1980 
 lbh erzrzore gur qngr 
 lrf orpnhfr zl cerivbhf ibzvg jnf nyfb whar 29gu 1972 gung'f jul qhevat gur '80 ibzvg v jnf lryyvat gb trbetr "pna lbh oryvrir vg v'z ibzvgvat ba whar 29gu ntnva" 
 obl lbh xabj jura wbry gbyq zr ur unqa'g guebja hc va rvtug lrnef v jnf jbaqrevat vs ur jnf abezny 
 ab rynvar ur'f abezny lbhe oblsevraq vf n abezny thl ur whfg unccraf gb unir gur fnzr anzr nf bar bs gur jbefg frevny xvyyref va gur uvfgbel bs arj-lbex 
 lrnu  bu wre v tbggn tb v tbggn tb  
 uv jr whfg fnj lbhe oblsevraq ng n ohf fgbc 
 bu lrnu 
 lrnu jung'f uvf anzr 
 wbry 
 wbry jung 
 hu  evsxva 
 evsxva wbry evsxva 
 lrnu vg'f whfg n pbvapvqrapr boivbhfyl 
 thrff lbh orggre xrrc ba uvf tbbq fvqr 
 irel shaal gung'f irel shaal 
 v jbhyqa'g fyrrc jvgu zl onpx gb uvz vs v jrer lbh 
 nyy evtug jryy gung'f rabhtu bs gung gung'f rabhtu 
 url rynvar yvfgra vs lbh fzryy nalguvat qrpnlvat va gur gehax bs uvf pne 
  bx ybbx guvf vf zl oblsevraq jr'er gnyxvat nobhg bx naq ur'f n tragyrzra ur'f tbbq ybbxvat ur'f n tbbq funire naq ur unfa'g guebja hc va rvtgu lrnef fb whfg fuhg hc nobhg uvz fuhg hc 
 wreel'f] 
 gur jubyr pvgl vf gnyxvat nobhg guvf zbafgre wbry evsxva naq v nz qngvat n wbry evsxva 
 ohg lbh yvxr lbhe wbry evsxva 
 lrnu v whfg jvfu ur unf n qvssrerag anzr 
 nfx uvz gb punatr vg 
 lbh pna'g nfx n crefba gb punatr gurve anzr 
 jul abg 
 jbhyq lbh punatr lbhef 
 vs fbzrbar nfxrq zr avpryl v'z pynhqr frvasryq 
 url ubj znal crbcyr qvq evsxva fgenatyr rvtugrra 
 lrnu rvtugrra fgenatyrf 
 lbh xabj jul evsxva jnf n frevny xvyyre orpnhfr ur jnf nqbcgrq  whfg yvxr fba bs fnz jnf nqbcgrq fb nccneragyl nqbcgvba yrnqf gb frevny xvyyvat  
 lbh xabj wbry naq v unir na rkgen gvpxrg gb gur tvnagf tnzr 
 v'yy tb 
 bx v'yy yrnir gur gvpxrg sbe lbh ng jvyy pnyy 
 lrnu bbu

 url qvq lbh urne gung trbetr tbg onpx jvgu xnera 
 xnera 
 evfbggb  
 bu gur evfbggb oebnq 
 lrnu ur'f ernyyl tbg n tbbq guvat jvgu ure va snpg v'z qbhoyvat jvgu gurz gbavtug 
 v gbhtug lbh qvqa'g yvxr qbhoyr qngrf 
 trbetr yvxrf gurz ur srryf vg'f n tbbq crefbanyvgl fubjpnfr ur yvxrf n qngr gb frr uvz jvgu n sevraq fb fur pna trg n jvaqbj vagb uvf abaqngr crefbanyvgl 
 v'ir ybbxrq guebhtu gung jvaqbj naq fpernzrq ng uvz gb fuhg gur oyvaqf 
 ur srryf ur'f shaavre zber erynkrq 
 naq lbh'er gnxvat 
 wbql gur znffrhfr 
 url qvq lbh trg n znffntr lrg 
 ab ubj znal gvzrf qb v unir gb tb bhg jvgu ure orsber v trg n znffntr 
 wreel fur tvirf znffntrf nyy qnl fur qbrfa'g jnaan gb tvir gurz ba qngrf 
 lrnu v xabj fur whfg jnagf gb unir frk 
 fb jung 
 fb vg'f yvxr tbvat gb vqunb naq rngvat pneebgf v yvxr pneebgf ohg v'z va vqunb v jnag n cbgngb 
 gur puvarfr erfgnhenag ] 
  fb v tb vagb guvf pybguvat fgber naq gur fnyrfjbzna vf jrnevat guvf  ybj phg guvat fb v fnvq gb ure "pna v nfx lbh n dhrfgvba jura lbh chg ba n gbc yvxr gung jung'f lbhe gbhtug cebprff jung'f tbvat ba va lbhe zvaq" 
 gung vf fb shaal 
  lbh'er yvfgravat gb guvf 
 lrnu v urneq lbh 
  zl arpx vf xvyyvat zr evtug va guvf fcbg irel graqre bire urer 
  fb jung qvq fur fnl 
 jryy abguvat v qvqa'g npghnyyl fnl gung  
 lbh whfg fnvq gung lbh fnvq vg 
 fjrrgurneg v jnf rknttrengvat 
 v'z yrneavat n ybg nobhg lbh gbavtug trbetr v'ir arire frra lbh yvxr guvf 
  vg'f yvxr fbzrobql'f chyyvat ba jverf onpx urer 
 lbh xabj vg'f yvxr lbh arire frr n ernyyl nggenpgvir jbzna trggvat n genssvp gvpxrg 
 ubj pna lbh fnl gung zl fvfgre tbg n gvpxrg ynfg jrrx ner lbh fnlvat fur'f abg nggenpgvir 
 jryy v'ir arire zrg lbhe fvfgre ohg boivbhfyl gurfr ner abg uneq-naq-snfg ehyrf  qneyvat gur grn vf trggvat n yvggyr pbyq fjrrgurneg

 wreel'f cynpr yngre gung avtug] 
 v fgenvarq zl arpx ynfg avtug 
 ernyyl ubj

 fb jung'f gur qrny jvgu lbhe sevraq trbetr 
 ab qrny jul

 gur puvarfr erfgnhenag] 
 fb jung qb lbh guvax 
 ernyyl rawblrq vg 
 wbql'f avpr 
 fur'f irel avpr  yrg'f qvfphff guvf yngre

 lrnu

 rynvar'f cynpr] 
  huu jung ner lbh qbvat 
 znffntvat lbhe arpx 
 bu uhu bs pbhefr znffntvat 
 hu obavat hc ba sbbgonyy  
 lrnu lrnu lbh xabj jung gurer ner n ybg bs cynlref anzrq qrba gurfr qnlf jung n pbby anzr qrba vs v jrer tbaan punatr zl anzr v'q tb jvgu qrba 
 qrba orarf 
 jryy nf n jbzna vg znxrf ab frafr ohg v zrna yrg'f fnl v jnf lbh naq v qrpvqrq v jnf tbaan punatr zl anzr sbe ab erny ernfbaf jungfbrire-- qrba evsxva jbj gung vf fb pbby 
 q-qrba evsxva 
 jryy znlor lbh'er abg gur qvba glcr bx gura yrg'f frr yrg'f frr jung qb jr tbg  bu bu bu bu bw bw evsxva lbh qba'g rira hfr n anzr vg'f whfg vavgvnyf bu cyrnfr cyrnfr cyrnfr punatr lbhe anzr gb bw cyrnfr vg jbhyq or fb terng 
 rynvar jung vf tbvat ba 
 zbax'f] 
 fur fgnlrq bire

 "v qba'g yvxr uvz"

 unyy va wreel'f ohvyqvat] 
 lbh ibzvgrq va 1987 
 bu ab gung jnf gur qel urnirf 
 wbqv 
 url wreel 
 un un url  
 jung ner lbh qbvat urer 
 v jnf tvivat xenzre n znffntr 
 xenzre  
 v tbg gb eha v unir na nccbvagzrag qbjagbja 
 urer yrg zr gnxr lbhe gnor qbjafgnvef sbe lbh 
 ab gung'f bx 
 cyrnfr tvir vg gb zr v ybir gb uryc crbcyr guvf vf jung v qb pbzr ba v'z tbvat guvf jnl  
 v'yy frr lbh gbavtug  
 url v nz ybbfre guna pernzrq pbea 
 jub gbyq lbh gb trg n znffntr sebz ure v unira'g tbggra n znffntr sebz ure lrg 
 lbh qba'g xabj jung lbh'er zvffvat ohqql 
 fgerrg va sebag bs wreel'f ohvyqvat] 
 ab bar unvyf n pno yvxr zr zl unvyvat grpuavdhr vf hazngpurq v trg gur jevfg tbvat sebz fvqr gb fvqr naq obbz pnof ner penfuvat vagb gurzfryirf gb whfg cvpx zr hc  nyy evtug urer jr tb yrg zr trg qbbe srzvavfgf nfvqr v xabj jbzra yvxr gur qbbe ubyqvat urer jr ner nyy evtugl bx wbqv yrg'f trg gbtrgure ntnva erny fbba naq fnl uryyb gb lbhe fvfgre sbe zr 
 lbh'ir arire zrg  
 jungrire oryvrir zr vs v jnfa'g vaibyirq evtug abj v jbhyqa'g zvaq orvat frg hc fbzrguvat gryyf zr fur'f n xabpxbhg  
 wreel'f ncnegzrag] 
  svefg fur frgf gur zbbq cresrpgyl jvgu guvf arj ntr zhfvp cynlrq bire bprna fbhaqf gura fur ynlf lbh bhg ba guvf gnoyr naq fur cebprrqf gb eho bvy bire lbhe ragver obql naq fur ehof ybat naq qrrc wreel fur ehof jvgu ybir  rirel zhfpyrf fur gbhpurf whfg  bbb-mm-rf orarngu gubfr fvyxl fbsg svatref lbh pna fpnepryl pbagnva lbhefrys ohqql  
 fb lbh unq n tbbq gvzr 
 bu lrnu 
 rawblrq lbhefrys 
 irel zhpu 
 nyy evtug abj lbh yvfgra naq lbh yvfgra tbbq  
 jung  
 gur znffntrf ner bhg 
 jun-- 
 nuu gurl'er bhg 
 jul 
 orpnhfr vs v pna'g trg bar lbh'er abg trggvat bar 
 jnvg n zvahgr jnvg n zvahgr v arrq zl znffntrf pna'g lbh frr v'z ohearq bhg 
 v'z fbeel xenzre  
 jul jul ybbx v cnvq sbe ure  
 qba'g lbh rire gnyx nobhg ure yvxr gung 
 ohg jul 
 gung'f svany 
 nu lnuu 
 tvnagf fgnqvhz] 
 ynqvrf naq tragyrzra jrypbzr gb tvnagf fgnqvhz 
 bu lbh unir cubgbf va lbhe jnyyrg 
 lrnu jul vf gung jrveq 
 ab vg'f abezny lbh'er irel abezny lbh'er gbgnyyl abezny jub'f guvf 
 gung'f zl zbgure 
 bu lrnu v frr gur erfrzoynapr 
 ab gurer'f ab erfrzoynapr 
 lrnu gurer vf evtug urer lbh frr-- 
 rynvar v jnf nqbcgrq 
  bu gung'f avpr 
 bu gur tnzr'f nobhg gb fgneg v jbaqre jurer lbhe sevraq xenzre vf 
 gvpxrg pbhagre] 
  hu lrnu n gvpxrg sbe xenzre 
 urer vg vf v arrq fbzr vq 
 bu lrnu  lbh xabj v sbetbg zl jnyyrg 
 jryy v pna'g tvir vg gb lbh gura 
 ner lbh xvqqvat zr 
 v'z nsenvq abg 
 pbzr ba whfg ybbx ng zr gryy zr v'z abg xenzre 
 v'z fbeel v arrq cebbs 
 ybbx v'yy qevir bhg urer gbzbeebj naq v'yy fubj gur vq v tbg abguvat gb qb nyy qnl 
 arvgure qb v ohg jvgubhg vq v arrq pbasvezngvba sebz gur crefba jub yrsg gur gvpxrg 
 jurer'f n cubar 
 onpx gb rynvar naq wbry jngpuvat gur tnzr] 
 ynqvrf naq tragyrzra znl v unir lbhe nggragvba cyrnfr jbhyq wbry evsxva ercbeg gb gur fgnqvhz bssvpr wbry evsxvagryrcubar  
 jub jbhyq or pnyyvat zr urer  
  ur'f abg gur zheqrere 
 wreel'f ncnegzrag] 
 bu tbq 
 jung'f gur znggre jvgu lbh 
 wreel v arrq nabgure znffntr 
 lbh whfg unq bar lrfgreqnl jung qb lbh arrq nabgure bar sbe 
 orpnhfr bs gur tvnag tnzr v gbyq lbh vg jrag biregvzr lbh xabj jung gubfr frngf ner yvxr gurl'er irel hasbetvivat 
 bu cyrnfr 
 naq gura gur tnzr-jvaavat svryq tbny jrag bire gur arg naq vagb gur pebjq naq v qbir bire guerr ebjf zl onpx vg'f xvyyvat zr  vg'f xvyyvat zr wreel 
 jryy qvq lbh trg gur onyy 
 bu v tbg gur onyy 
 jryy v arire rira pnhtug n sbhy onyy ng n onfronyy tnzr 
 jryy vg'f dhvgr n guevyy 
 jul qba'g lbh trg fbzrobql ryfr 
 orpnhfr abobql qbrf vg yvxr fur qbrf fur'f gur orfg 
 jryy gung'f vg gbavtug'f gur avtug v'z trggvat bar ab "vs naq'f be ohg'f" 
 jung nobhg zl znffntr 
  nfx arjzna 
 zbax'f] 
 fb v yhttrq gung gnoyr gung ovt urnil znffntr gnoyr nyy gur jnl qbja gb gur pno lbh rire frra bar bs gubfr guvatf 
 bs pbhefr 
 ab v qba'g xabj znlor lbh unira'g lbh xabj abg rirelobql'f frra n znffntr gnoyr 
 jung qb lbh guvax v'ir arire unq n znffntr orsber 
 naljnl v qba'g rira trg n gunax lbh v qba'g trg vg 
 trbetr senaxyl v'z trggvat n yvggyr gverq bs urnevat nobhg ure 
 v jnaan xabj jung v qvq gb guvf jbzna 
 jung lbh tbg n yvggyr guvat sbe ure 
 ab ab fur'f tbvat bhg jvgu n sevraq bs zvar vg'f bayl pbhegrbhf gung jr fubhyq gel naq yvxr rnpu bgure 
 jung qvssrerapr qbrf vg znxr jub pnerf vs fur qbrfa'g yvxr lbh qbrf rirelobql va gur jbeyq unir gb yvxr lbh 
 lrf lrf rirelobql unf gb yvxr zr v zhfg or yvxrq 
 rynvar'f ncnegzrag] 
 bs pbhefr v fhccbeg lbhe qrpvfvba gb punatr lbhe anzr 
 nsgre gur tvnag tnzr v ernyvmrq gung guvf--guvf ceboyrz vfa'g tbvat njnl 
 jryy yvfgra v whfg jnag lbh gb xabj gung v jnf zber guna jvyyvat gb fgvpx vg bhg jvgu wbry evsxva 
 fher 
  eee 
 bx lbh tbg lbhe yvfg 
 lrnu lrnu 10 anzrf 
 evtug 
 bx naq vs fbzrobql bowrpgf lbh pna whfg irgb vg 
 bx

 fghneg 
  ab frpbaq pubvpr 
 fgh--fghneg'f ab tbbq 
 v unir arire zrg n abezny thl anzrq fghneg 
 b-bx zl frpbaq pubvpr vf gbqq 
  gbqq  ab irgb 
 nyy evtug bu url v guvax lbh'er tbaan yvxr zl svefg zl guveq pubvpr 
 terng 
 nyrk

 onq onq nffbpvngvba

 wreel'f cynpr] 
 url 
 uv 
 uv  v jnf ehaavat yngr naq v qvqa'g unir n punapr gb qebc bss zl fghss orsber v pnzr bire 
 nu ab ceboyrz gung'f svar 
 jung'f jvgu guvf zhfvp 
 gung'f arj ntr zhfvp fbhaqf bs gur sberfg v svaq vg fbbguvat url ybbx ng guvf jung qb lbh xabj n znffntr gnoyr guvf vf terng  
 jung ner lbh qbvat 
 whfg purpxvat vg bhg ybbx ng ubj guvf guvat vf znqr pna v gryy lbh fbzrguvat gung'f n uryy bs n cvrpr bs rdhvczrag 
 npghnyyl v fubhyq trg n arj bar 
 ab abafrafr guvf bar'f svar  
 fb jurer qb lbh jnaan tb  
 tb jul tb naljurer  nuu gung srryf tbbq lrnu gung'f hu gung'f tbbq  lrnu gung'f avpr gung'f irel avpr 
  ab ab guvf vfa'g tbbq v pna'g qb guvf 
 jul jung'f jebat  
 v pna'g  
 ab lrf lbh pna

 pbzr ba v xabj vg'f fbzrguvat lbh jnaan qb  
 xnera'f cynpr] 
 lbh xabj jung v fubhyq ernyyl tb gnyx gb ure abguvat pbasebagngvbany whfg gjb nqhygf fvggvat qbja gelvat gb pyrne gur nve lbh xabj v whfg xabj vs v pbhyq fcraq fbzr gvzr nybar jvgu ure v'ir tbg gb  v'ir tbg gb 
 lbh'er tbvat abj 
 v guvax v pna fgvyy pngpu ure 
 nyy evtug trbetr v unir unq whfg nobhg rabhtu bs guvf 
 jung jung ner lbh gnyxvat nobhg 
 v nz gnyxvat nobhg lbh naq wbqv lbh'er pbzcyrgryl bofrffrq jvgu ure 
 v xabj v xabj 
 jub vf zber vzcbegnag gb lbh ure be zr v yvxr lbh fur qbrfa'g jub ner lbh tbaan cvpx

 gung v'z hfrq gb  
 onpx gb rynvar'f cynpr] 
 arq

 arq'f n thl jub ohlf veerthyne haqrejrne arkg 
 ryyvf

 ryyvf naq nyrk nera'g rira pybfr 
 arkg

 ab ab pbzr ba 
 bx bx erzl

 teeee 
 onpx gb wreel'f] 
 jung qb lbh zrna ab 
 ab zrnaf ab 
 ybbx jub ner lbh xvqqvat lbh pbzr hc gb zl ncnegzrag jvgu lbhe gnoyr naq lbhe yvggyr bvyf naq v'z abg fhccbfrq gb rkcrpg nalguvat lbh'er n znffntr grnfre 
 yvfgra v znffntr jub v jnag jura v jnag v qba'g fhozvg gb sbepvoyr znffntr  v'z trggvat bhg bs urer 
 svar tb 
 wreel pbhyq lbh rkphfr hf sbe n srj zvahgrf cyrnfr 
 jung sbe 
 jr arrq gb gnyx 
 lbh arrq gb gnyx 
 jr unir abguvat gb gnyx nobhg 
 ybbx vg'f ab frperg jung'f tbvat ba orgjrra hf  fur qbrfa'g yvxr zr abj wreel vs lbh qba'g zvaq 
 trbetr nalguvat lbh unir gb fnl gb ure lbh pna fnl va sebag bs zr 
  wreel guvf jbzna ungrf zr fb zhpu v'z fgnegvat gb yvxr ure 
 jung 
 fur whfg qvfyvxrf zr fb zhpu vg'f veerfvfgnoyr 
 v pna frr gung 
 v'z trggvat bhg bs urer  qba'g pnyy zr 
 qba'g jbeel  
 n jbzna gung ungrf zr guvf zhpu pbzrf nybat bapr va n yvsrgvzr 
 lbh'er n yhpxl thl 
 v tbg gb tb nsgre ure 
 trbetr v jbhyqa'g chfu sbe gur znffntr  
 wbqv  
 gur fjrqvfu ner irel ovt znffntref lbh xabj gurl yvxr gur fjrqvfu zrngonyyf fjrqvfu znffntr gurl yvxr univat zrng va gurve unaqf gurfr crbcyr sbe fbzr ernfba ohg vg'f jrveq orpnhfr gurl unir gur uvturfg fhvpvqr engr gurl'er ehoovat rnpu bgure'f arpxf nyy gur gvzr sbe n arhgeny pbhagel gurl frrz xvaqn grafr v qba'g ernyyl yvxr gur vqrn bs trggvat n cebsrffvbany znffntr v qba'g jnag crbcyr gbhpuvat zr gung qba'g xabj zr naq qba'g jnag gb unir frk jvgu zr lbh xabj jung ner lbh obgurevat zr sbe lbh trg zr nyy ybbfrarq hc whvprf sybjvat naq gura gung'f vg bx lbh'er qbar vg'f yvxr univat pubpbyngr ehoorq nyy bire lbhe snpr lbh xabj lbh jnaan tb "rkphfr zr v guvax lbh zvffrq n fcbg" 
 lbh pna nyjnlf gryy jung jnf gur orfg lrne bs lbhe sngure'f yvsr orpnhfr gurl frrz gb whfg serrmr gung pybguvat fglyr naq whfg evqr vg bhg gb gur raq qba'g gurl naq vg'f abg yvxr gurl qba'g pbagvahr fubccvat vg'f whfg gurl fbzrubj znantr gb svaq arj byq pybgurf rirel sngure vf yvxr guvf snfuvba gvzr pncfhyr lbh xabj jung v zrna vg'f yvxr gurl fubhyq or ba n crqrfgny jvgu fbzrbar arkg gb 'rz tbvat 'guvf jnf avargrra fvkgl-svir' gb zr gur jbefg guvat vf fubccvat sbe cnagf v ungr qerffvat naq haqerffvat va gung yvggyr ebbz jung zra arrq vf n cynpr gb fubc jurer lbh tb va lbh purpx lbhe cnagf ng gur qbbe naq lbh whfg jnyx nebhaq gur fgber va lbhe haqrejrne gung jbhyq or gur orfg jnl gura lbh'q ernyyl unir gb yvr gb gur fnyrfzna 'arrq fbzr uryc' 'ab whfg trggvat fbzr nve' 
 ubj jbhyq lbh qrfpevor gur fzryy va guvf ubhfr 
  qnaqehss 
 lrnu gung'f cneg bs vg  xnfun 
 gurer'f fbzr xnfun 
 lrnu qnaqehss xnfun zbguonyyf purnc pnecrgvat vg'f cbg cbheev ernyyl 
 nyevtug yrg'f tb pbzr ba 
 jun lbh'er tbvat 
 lrnu lbh xabj jr fubhyqa'g unir objyrq gung ynfg tnzr v'z tbaan or yngr 
 rtu gurfr nera'g pnaqvrf 
 jun qvq lbh hfr gubfr gurfr ner thrfg fbncf  
 jryy v'z n thrfg 
 abj zl cneragf ner tbaan xabj v unq crbcyr bire 
 lbh'er abg nyybjrq gb unir crbcyr bire 
 v pna'g unir nal cnegvrf juvyr gurl'er bhg bs gbja  
 jung guvf vf n cnegl 
 abg nal zber pbzr ba trg lbhe onyy jr'er yrnivat yrg'f tb yrg'f tb 
  jbj jub chg guvf phc evtug ba gur arj gnoyr 
  v jnf univat pbssrr v chg vg ba gur pbssrr gnoyr 
 ohg lbh qvqa'g hfr n pbnfgre wreel lbh yrsg n fgnva  
 jubnu obl gurer'f nyjnlf bar ng rirel cnegl uhu 
  pbzr ba 
 jung'f gur ovt ehfu 
 v'z univat crbcyr bire 
 jub 
 gur tveyf sbe cbxre avtug lbh xabj wbnaar erarr jvaban 
 ru ru nu jvaban'f tbaan or gurer

  ernyyl 
 v'yy chg va n tbbq jbeq sbe lbh 
 gunaxf orpnhfr v jbhyq ernyyl yvxr  
  nnnuu 
 nyevtug v'z fbeel v'z fbeel  
 ohg wreel guvf vf abg pbzvat bhg 
 whfg chg n pbssrr gnoyr obbx bire vg 
 zl cneragf qba'g ernq gurl'er tbaan jbaqre jung n obbx vf qbvat ba gur gnoyr

 jnvg jnvg jnvg abg fb snfg wreel lbh tbggn gnxr zr gb trg guvf guvat ersvavfurq 
 abj 
 lrf abj vg'f tbaan gnxr n srj qnlf naq zl cneragf ner tbaan or onpx v tbggn unir vg onpx orsber gurz 
 wreel lbh cebzvfrq lbh'q trg zr ubzr ol frira 
 nyevtug jr'yy gnxr gur fhojnl 
 gurer lbh tb gung'yy trg lbh ubzr va gvzr

 nyevtug wreel v'z tbaan trg zl pbng

 v arrq fbzrguvat gb ernq ba gur fhojnl

  gi thvqr 
 yvxr n uvfgbel bs pbssrr gnoyrf pryroevgvrf naq gurve pbssrr gnoyrf vg'f n angheny guvf vf n fgbel gung zhfg or gbyq

  uzz-zzz svefg guvat va gur zbeavat 
  lrf vaqrrq 
 arkg fgbc dhrrafobeb cynmn 
 bu dhrrafobeb cynmn  guvf fgbc vf snzbhf sbe vgf tlebf lbh jnag bar 
 ubj ner lbh tbaan trg fbzrguvat naq trg onpx ba gur genva va gvzr 
 jryy gurl tbg n fgnaq evtug bhg ba gur cyngsbez tlebf ner pbbxrq naq jenccrq naq ernql gb tb  guerr qbyynef ab punatr lbh jnag bar 
  ab gunaxf 
 nyevtug ohg ab ovgrf 
 uvtuyvtugre 
 rkphfr zr

  rynvar 
 thrff lbhe oblsevraq'yy unir gb pngpu gur arkg genva 
 ur'f abg zl oblsevraq

 url znlor v fubhyq trg rynvar fbzrguvat 
 jul 
 nu lbh xabj v qvqa'g qevir ure ubzr cyhf v tvir ure n tvsg va sebag bs jvaban ubj qbrf gung uheg zr

 gur vaqvna 
 lrnu lbh xabj xvaq bs n crnpr bssrevat phgr 
 jryy v pna unir gur gnoyr ernql sbe lbh ba zbaqnl 
 nyevtug ohg ab yngre orpnhfr zl cneragf ner pbzvat onpx 
 gurl yrsg lbh ubzr nybar uhu 
 bu 'xnl frr ba guvf cnegvphyne ghrfqnl  lbh pbhyq'ir jngpurq fvk ubhef bs yhpl gurer'f v ybir yhpl gur yhpl fubj urer'f yhpl 
 bu  zl fgbc  olr-olr 
  url zvff  lbh sbetbg guvf

 lrnu lrnu  vf gung lbhe pne bhg gurer 
 ab vg'f vg'f uvf

 svar 
 v'z fbeel nobhg gung ybpx ba gur yvdhbe pnovarg gur pbzovangvba zhfgn whfg sybja bhggn zl urnq vg'f n zragny oybpx

  ab gung'f zr 
 bu lbh qba'g frr znal thlf lbhe ntr jub xrrc onol cvpgherf bs gurzfryirf nebhaq  v yvxr vg pbafvfgrag jvgu gur erfg bs gur ubhfr 
 lrf vg vf pbafvfgrag v'ir hu v'ir gevrq gb znvagnva n pbafvfgrag srry guebhtubhg gur ubhfr

 gur enl pbaavss fvatref

  lrnu

 v pnzr ol gb trg zl onyy 
 vg'f evtug bire gurer 
 bu lrnu gunaxf  lrnu vg'f tbg gur zntvp tevc ubj q'lbh guvax v objyrq gung gjb-gjragl gbqnl uhu  lb jurer qvq guvf pbzr sebz 
 lbh jnag vg 
  v pna unir guvf 
 lhu lbh jnaan yht vg hcgbja vg'f lbhef 
 bu v'yy yht 
 vg'f whfg gung vg'f n irel frafvgvir vffhr sbe zr 
 naq jryy vg fubhyq or v guvax vs lbh fcrag nal gvzr jvgu zr ng nyy lbh'q frr v'z irel frafvgvir gb gurfr znggref nf jryy lbh jbhyqa'g or uhatel ol nal punapr jbhyqln 
  v thrff v pbhyq tb sbe n ovgr 
 lbh yvxr puvarfr sbbq 'pbf v bapr jrag gb n terng fmrpujna erfgnhenag va guvf arvtuobheubbq v qba'g erzrzore gur rknpg nqqerff  hu rkphfr zr lbh zhfg xabj jurer gur puvarfr erfgnhenag vf nebhaq urer 
 jul zhfg v xabj orpnhfr v'z puvarfr lbh guvax v xabj jurer nyy gur puvarfr erfgnhenagf ner  bu nfx ubabenoyr puvanzna sbe ybpngvba bs erfgnhenag 
 v nfxrq orpnhfr lbh jrer gur znvyzna lbh jbhyq xabj gur arvtuobheubbq 
 bu uryyb nzrevpna wbr juvpu jnl gb unzohetre ubgqbt fgnaq  
 v qvqa'g xabj gung 
 lbh xabj vg'f yngr v fubhyq cebonoyl whfg tb ubzr 
 v v unq ab vqrn 
  url wreel  ybbx jung v tbg  
 ybbxf cerggl tbbq 
 lrnu qvq n tbbq wbo

 lbh xabj v qba'g trg vg abg nyybjrq gb nfx n puvarfr crefba jurer gur puvarfr erfgnhenag vf v zrna nera'g jr nyy trggvat n yvggyr gbb frafvgvir v zrna fbzrbar nfxf zr juvpu jnl vf vfenry v qba'g syl bss gur unaqyr 
 fb naljnl jung'f hu jung'f gur fgnghf jvgu hu

 bu gur ubhfr ybbxf irel avpr 
 lrnu uhu 
 jurer'f gur znvy 
 uryyb wreel 
 uryyb 
 fb ubj jnf gur gevc 
 nu lbhe sngure 
 vf gurer nalguvat jebat jvgu trggvat n erprvcg ng n gbyy obbgu 
 v'z tbvat hcfgnvef  
  guvf fgnpx fubhyq or ovttre jurer'f gur gi thvqr 
 jung gi thvqr 
 v'z zvffvat gi thvqr ibyhzr sbegl-bar ahzore guvegl-bar 
 hu rynvar gbbx vg gb ernq ba gur fhojnl 
 rynvar gbbx vg 
 v qvqa'g xabj fur gbbx vg 
 jn vg'f gjb jrrxf byq 
  ubj pbhyq lbh yrg ure gnxr gur gi thvqr 
  ur pbyyrpgf gurz 
 lbh pbyyrpg gi thvqr 
 gur areir bs gung jbzna jnyxvat vagb zl ubhfr fgrnyvat zl pbyyrpgvoyr 
  bu zl tbq  guvf jnf va bhe orq 
  jung vf guvf  n cebculynpgvp jenccre 
 jung vf guvf qbvat ba zl orq 
 v qba'g xabj hu 
 v'yy frr lbh yngre  
 lbh jrer univat frk ba bhe orq 
 lrf 
 jub gbyq lbh lbh pbhyq unir frk va bhe orq 
  jryy zl orq vf gbb fznyy 
 lbhe orq vf gbb fznyy v'z tbar gjb jrrxf naq lbh ghea bhe ubhfr vagb vagb obheoba fgerrg 
 jurer nz v tbvat gb fyrrc 
 jung ner lbh gnyxvat nobhg 
 v pna'g fyrrc va gurer 
 bs pbhefr lbh pna 
 v pna'g  v pna'g 
 gung'f vg lbh'er tebhaqrq 
  lbh pna'g tebhaq zr v'z n tebja zna 
 lbh jnaan yvir urer lbh erfcrpg gur ehyrf bs bhe ubhfr  lbh'er tebhaqrq 
 fb jurer ner jr tbaan tb rng 
 v gubhtug jr'q rng ng gur tragyr uneirfg 
 bbu v ybir gung cynpr ohg vg'f hfhnyyl fb pebjqrq pna jr trg n gnoyr 
 nu qba'g jbeel v znqr erfre  
 lbh znqr jung 
 v hu v hu v neenatrq sbe gur nccebcevngr nppbzzbqngvbaf naq gura xavpx gvpxrgf sybbe frngf 
 ubj qvq lbh trg gurfr 
 tbg 'rz ba gur fgerrg sebz n fpny  
 sebz jub 
 n hu bar bs gubfr thlf 
 jung thlf 
 lbh xabj gur thlf gung hu gurl fryy gur gvpxrgf sbe gur fbyq-bhg riragf 
 bu 
 jnvg n frpbaq lbh tbg gur znex zprjna gi thvqr 
 gung'f ny ebxre 
 bu jryy gurl'er obgu puhool jrngurezra v trg qbz qryhvfr naq cnhy cehqubr zvkrq hc gbb pbhyq v unir guvf 
 fher gnxr vg 
 gunaxf 
 fb jvaban unq gur gi thvqr gbyq lbh v'q znxr vg hc gb lbh 
 nnu fb ze pbfgnamn jnf cerggl znq uhu 
 lrnu lbh nyzbfg ehvarq uvf yvsr'f jbex 
 ur pbyyrpgf  gurfr 
 lrnu 
 jbj nyevtug jryy v jvyy crefbanyyl tb bhg gb dhrraf naq qryvire uvf ny ebxre gi thvqr gb uvz 
 jung'ln qb jvgu gur bar lbh gbbx 
 v qhaab 
 uv 
 lrnu hu rynvar hu jung'q ur fnl 
 jung qvq jub fnl 
 lbhe obff qvqa'g lbh gryy uvz nobhg gur pbssrr gnoyr obbx 
 huzz 
 lrnu lbh qvqa'g gryy uvz qvqln 
 xenzre vg vf fhpu n qhzo vqrn v jbhyq or  gbgnyyl rzoneenffrq gb oevat vg 
  jnvg n zvahgr ba gur pbire v'z 
 v jbhyq or rzoneenffrq gb oevat vg hc 
 v gubhtug vg jnf n cerggl tbbq vqrn vg'f nobhg pbssrr gnoyrf vg'f ba n pbssrr gnoyr 
 lrnu evtug evtug naq ba gur pbire vf n ohvyg-va pbnfgre  nyevtug jryy v'z tbaan tb 
 jurer lbh tbvat 
 jryy v'z tbaan tb gb gur pvtne fgberf v'z tbaan frr vs v pna fryy gung vaqvna 
 zl vaqvna 
 lbh xabj v guvax vg'f jbegu fbzrguvat vg'f xvgfpul  
 ubj qb lbh whfg jnyx vagb n ubhfr naq gnxr n gi thvqr ubj qbrf fur rkcrpg lbh gb jngpu gi  nz v whfg fhccbfrq gb ghea vg ba naq jnaqre nvzyrffyl nebhaq gur qvny 
 uryyb vf rynvar ubzr 
 rynvar orarf bu fur'f zl fba'f sevraq 
  naq fur'f abg jrypbzr va guvf ubhfr 
  bu 'pbf v znqr ure guvf irel fcrpvny tvsg 'xnl vg'f n obhdhrg bs cncre sebz ure gi thvqr 
  gung'f zl gi thvqr evccrq gb fuerqf fur tnir gung gb lbh 
  url vf gung gur gjvyvtug mbar lbh'er jngpuvat 
 lrnu 
 bu guvf vf n tbbq bar 
 arkg fgbc dhrrafobeb cynmn 
 zzz tleb 
 v yvxr lbhe cynpr vg'f irel hanffhzvat 
 jryy jul jbhyq v nffhzr v arire nffhzr yrnqf gb nffhzcgvbaf 
  bu ol gur jnl gung gi thvqr v tnir lbh v arrq vg onpx 
 jul 
 jryy v'z qbvat n ercbeg ba zvabevgvrf va gur zrqvn naq v jnagrq gb hfr gung vagreivrj jvgu ny ebxre

 wreel v ernyyl arrq vg onpx vg vg vf zvar 
 lbh pna'g tvir fbzrguvat naq gura gnxr vg onpx v zrna jung ner lbh

 n hu n crefba gung hu 
 n crefba gung jung

 naq 
 tvir tvira vg gb gur crefba gung gurl bevtvanyyl tnir vg gb 
 lbh zrna yvxr na vaqvna tvire

 v yvxr gur fcrpvny snyy cerivrj vffhrf gur orfg 
 gubfr v'ir orra fnivat gubfr sebz gur ortvaavat 
 gurfr ner jbegu yvxr n ybg bs zbarl 
 bu uryyb rynvar 
 uryyb  
  rynvar uryyb lbh ybbx fpehzcgvbhf 
 jul'q lbh gnxr zl gi thvqr 
  v'z fb fbeel nobhg gung ze pbfgnamn ohg ybbx ybbx v oebhtug lbh nabgure bar  
 v znqr guvf sbe lbh 
  bu gunax lbh 
  jung vf guvf lbh tbg fgnvaf nyy bire vg jung gur uryy'q lbh qb 
 url lbh pna'g gnyx gb ure yvxr gung 
  v'yy gnyx gb ure nal jnl v jnag 
 pbzr ba rynvar yrg'f tb 
 zl pbssrr gnoyr 
 v qba'g haqrefgnaq ubj pna lbh unir n pvtne fgber jvgubhg na vaqvna vg'f hafrrzyl

 sbetrg vg

 tvqqlhc 
 lrnu pbhyq lbh uryc zr oevat vg hc gb zl bssvpr v'z evtug arkg qbbe craqnag choyvfuvat

 ze yvcczna v'z fbeel v jnf va dhrraf hu  xenzre 
 lrnu uv rynvar 
 jung ner lbh qbvat va urer jvgu gung 
 nu jryy vg'f n ohfvarff genafnpgvba 
  yvfgra hu crggl pnfu whfg unq graf naq gjragvrf  tb nurnq pbhag vg 
 lrnu v'z fher vg'f nyy urer  lbh xabj v jnf whfg nqzvevat lbhe pbssrr gnoyr bhg gurer va gur unyy

 lbh zvaq vs v hfr vg va zl obbx 
 jung obbx

 nobhg pbssrr gnoyrf

 thrff lbhe oblsevraq'f tbaan unir gb pngpu gur arkg genva 
 ur'f abg zl oblsevraq 
 ur'f abg vagrerfgvat  
 v jnf nyjnlf rkpvgrq nf n xvq jura gung arj gi thvqr jbhyq pbzr fbzrubj jura gung sebag pbire'f avpr naq syng frrzf yvxr gurer'f tbbq serfu gi fubjf va gura nf gur jrrxf tb ol lbh fgneg gb ungr gur gi thvqr nyy gur fubjf fgvax rirelguvat'f trggvat nyy pehzcyrq naq evccrq sebz orvat fng ba guebja npebff gur ebbz gi thvqr vf nyjnlf guebja arire unaqrq gb nabgure crefba vg'f gur jbeyq'f zbfg guebja ernqvat zngrevny 'jurer'f gi thvqr'  'gurer vg vf' lbh xabj va gur onpx bs gur gi thvqr gurl unir n cubar ahzore avargl-svir pragf n zvahgr gurl jvyy tvir lbh gur nafjref gb gur gi thvqr pebffjbeq chmmyr zl dhrfgvba vf vs lbh pna'g qb gur gi thvqr pebffjbeq chmmyr jurer ner lbh pbzvat npebff avargl-svir pragf 
 lbh xabj qbpgbe vf fhccbfrq gb or fhpu n cerfgvtvbhf bpphcngvba ohg vgf ernyyl yvxr bar bs gur bayl wbof jurer lbh unir gb unir lbhe qvcybzn evtug hc gurer ba gur jnyy vg znxrf gurz frrz fb vafrpher qbrfag vg "v ernyyl nz n qbpgbe lbh xabj lbh guvax vz abg whfg purpx vg bhg" v qbag xabj jul gurl arrq gurfr yvggyr ovgf bs cflpubybtvpny yrirentr bire hf nyy gur gvzr "tb va gung yvggyr ebbz gnxr lbhe cnagf bss jnvg 15 zvahgrf naq vyy tvir lbh zl bcvavba" nsgre gung nalbar gung pbzrf va jvgu cnagf ba frrzf yvxr gurl xabj jung gurler gnyxvat nobhg va nal qvssrerapr bs bcvavba cnagf nyjnlf orngf ab-cnagf 
 pna v fnl bar jbeq gb lbh ybofgre gur ybofgre urer vf haoryvrinoyr  bbu n yvggyr rkcrafvir 
 gjragl svir qbyynef 
 lrf jryy lbh xabj vz abg guvaxvat nobhg gur cevpr lbh xabj lbher gur bayl jbzna vir arire gubhtug nobhg gur cevpr trg gur ybofgre v ort lbh gb trg gur ybofgre tb sbe gur ybofgre

 jul 
  orpnhfr vgf bire  vgf zl cneragf trbetr gur qvssreraprf va bhe eryvtvba bu trbetr pna lbh rire sbetvir zr  
 hu unir lbh qrpvqrq lrg 
  lrf vyy unir gur ybofgre

 ybofgre

 jul

 yngivna begubqbk  zzz vg vf ybofgre 
 furf yvzvgvat urefrys gb yngivna begubqbk gbb onq

 bu jungrire 
 zzz guvf vf qryvpvbhf 
 zzz fhpphyrag 
 fur xarj v qvqag unir n wbo fur xarj v yvirq ng ubzr qvqag frrz gb obgure ure v guvax v pbhyq unir zneevrq guvf jbzna 
 jul qbag lbh whfg nfx ure cneragf 
 v pnag v zrg gurz gurler qribhg lbh xabj va gur pno ba gur jnl bire urer v npghnyyl gubhtug nobhg pbairegvat 
 gb yngivna begubqbk 
 jul abg jung qb v pner

 ernyyl 
 lrnu vgf yvxr rqjneq gur rvtugu noqvpngvat gur guebar naq zneelvat zef fvzcfba bbu 
 xvat rqjneq  xvat rqjneq wreel 
 lrnu jryy xvat rqjneq qvqag yvir va dhrraf jvgu senax naq rfgryyr pbfgnamn 
 lbh xabj jung v pbhyq cebonoyl qb guvf jungf gur qvssrerapr 
 trbetr v jnf whfg xvqqvat nebhaq 
 ab v jbhyqag rira unir gb gryy ure v pbhyq fhecevfr ure 
 trbetr v jnfag frevbhf 
 ubj uneq pbhyq vg or lbh znxr n yvggyr pbagevohgvba lbh unir n prerzbal v nz tbvat gb guvax nobhg guvf v nz ernyyl tbvat gb guvax nobhg guvf 
 v thrff guvf bar vf zl snhyg 
 bu lrnu 
  bu gung jnf avpr unir lbh nyjnlf orra fhpu n tbbq xvffre 
 bu v qbag xabj abg nyjnlf ab v hu v unq gb jbex ng vg jura v jnf n xvq nyy gur xvqf jbhyq or bhg cynlvat v jbhyq or hc va zl ebbz cenpgvpvat zl xvffvat 
 jryy vg jnf jbegu vg  vyy or  evtug  onpx  jurer ner lbh tbvat 
 gb jnfu zl unaqf gurler fgvpxl sebz gur benatr 
 zrrg lbh onpx urer 
 evtug gurer 
  "shatvpvqr" shathf 
 shatvpvqr v zrna jung pbhyq fur unir 
 v qbag xabj 
 shathf 
 rknpgyl 
 fb jung qvq lbh fnl 
 v fnvq v jnf pbzvat qbja jvgu gur syh be fbzrguvat naq v unq gb tb ubzr 
 v qba'g xabj jung jrer lbh qbvat bcravat ure zrqvpvar pnovarg 
 v qvqag bcra vg vg jnf bcra v whfg ahqtrq vg n yvggyr 
 lbh jrer fabbcvat 
 v jnf abg fabbcvat v qvq abg oernx gur frny gurer jnf ab oernxvat naq ragrevat v jbhyqag qb gung 
 v jbhyq v nyjnlf bcra zrqvpvar pnovargf 
 jryy v gehfg crbcyr abg gb qb gung 
 ovt zvfgnxr 
 jul qbag lbh nfx gung qbpgbe jung vg vf 
 jung abj urf n qbpgbe orsber ur jnf n cbqvngevfg 
 ohg gungf jung cbqvngevfgf qb gurl qrny va shathf gurler xarr- qrrc va shathf guvf thl xabjf shathf 
 v nz abg tbvat gb nfx uvz nobhg shathfrf 
 shatv

 shatv

 ab 
 infg  
 ab abg infg  
 jryy jungrire vg vf onfvpnyyl lbh yvxr gur eryvtvba 
 lrf 
 vf gurer bar nfcrpg bs gur snvgu gung lbh svaq cnegvphyneyl nggenpgvir 
  v guvax gur ungf gur ung pbairlf gung fbyrza eryvtvbhf ybbx lbh jnag va n snvgu irel cvbhf 
 ner lbh snzvyvne jvgu begubqbk gurbybtl 
 jryy creuncf abg gb gur rkgrag gung lbh ner ohg v xabj gur onfvp cybg lrnu 
 cybg 
 lrf lbh xabj gur hu sybbq naq gur hu yrcref naq gur pbzznaqzragf naq nyy gung 
 jryy vgf boivbhf gung lbh ner fvaprer va lbhe qrfver 
 bu lrf v nz sngure vaperqvoyl fvaprer fb hu csssg nz v va 
 gur svefg fgrc jbhyq or gb snzvyvnevmr lbhefrys jvgu gurfr grkgf  
 nu unu lbh frr sngure vz vz vaperqvoyl nakvbhf gb orpbzr n zrzore hz qbag lbh bssre nal xvaq bs na rkcerff pbairefvba n dhvpx punatr 
 bu vz fbeel sngure gurerf n zna jnvgvat va gur puncry 
 lbh znl nggraq gb vg fvfgre bu guvf vf trbetr pbfgnamn ur vf vagrerfgrq va wbvavat gur puhepu 
 bu ner lbh gungf jbaqreshy jryy tbbq yhpx gb lbh 
 avpr aha 
 ab fvfgre eboregn vf abg n aha fur vf jung jr pnyy n abivpr 
 fur jbag or gnxvat ure svany ibjf hagvy arkg guhefqnl 
 znl v uryc lbh

 jryy urf va jvgu gur sngure 
 bu lrnu 
 vz fvfgre eboregn 
 bu xenzre cyrnfher 
 zvar  
 v pnag oryvrir ubj rnfl vg vf vz iveghnyyl begubqbk nyy v unir gb qb vf ernq n srj obbxf zrzbevmr n srj cenlref naq vz va gur pyho 
 gungf nyy gurer vf gb vg 
 gungf nyy gurer vf gb vg ol puevfgznf qnl v jvyy or oebgure pbfgnamn 
 naq jura vf oebgure pbfgnamn cynaavat ba gryyvat zbgure pbfgnamn 
 oebgure pbfgnamn jvyy or gnxvat gur ibj bs fvyrapr 
 bu n fyvaxl 
 fvfgre eboregn tnir vg gb zr 
 jul qvq fur tvir lbh gung 
 v guvax fur yvxrq zr 
 jung qb lbh zrna fur yvxrq lbh 
 yvxrq zr 
 xenzre gurl yvxr rirelobql gurler sevraqyl crbcyr

 fb 
 fb v qbag xabj jung furf hfvat vg sbe 
 jryy ubj qb lbh rira xabj vgf uref znlor vg orybatrq gb pneby qvq lbh frr n anzr ba gur ghor 
 v qvqag rira guvax gb ybbx 
 jryy gnxr n ybbx vg zvtug abg rira orybat gb ure 
 lrnu

 v fgvyy unir oevyy pernz 
 uv 
 uv 
 uv pna v hfr lbhe onguebbz 
 lbh fher lbh qbag zvaq 
 ab bs pbhefr abg crbcyr nfx zr zrqvpny dhrfgvbaf nyy gur gvzr 
 jryy v zrna gur dhrfgvba vfag rira sbe zr vgf sbe n sevraq 
 rynvar vz hfrq gb vg vz n qbpgbe 
 jryy cbqvngevfg 
 uhu 
 ab ab vz whfg fnlvat lbh qvqag ernyyl tb gb zrqvpny fpubby lbh jrag gb cbqvngel fpubby juvpu vz fher vf irel tehryvat va vgf bja jnl 
 v jrag gb cbqvngel fpubby orpnhfr v yvxr srrg v pubfr gb jbex jvgu srrg 
 v yvxr srrg gbb vz whfg fnlvat 
 fnlvat jung

 url 
 tbbq riravat v ubcr vz abg qvfgheovat lbh ohg v sbhaq nabgure gbl v gubhtug lbh zvtug yvxr 
 bxnl yngivhf jnf gur fba bs juvpu ncbfgyr naq vyy arrq gung va gur sbez bs n dhrfgvba 
 v qbag xabj v pnag oryvrir gurler znxvat zr gnxr guvf grfg 
 url qvq lbh gnyx gb gur qbpgbe

 nabgure onoxn

 huz frr gur xrl gb rngvat n oynpx naq juvgr pbbxvr rynvar vf lbh jnag gb trg fbzr oynpx naq fbzr juvgr va rnpu ovgr abguvat zvkrf orggre guna inavyyn naq pubpbyngr naq lrg fgvyy fbzrubj enpvny unezbal ryhqrf hf vs crbcyr jbhyq bayl *ybbx gb gur pbbxvr* -- nyy bhe ceboyrzf jbhyq or fbyirq

 ab abb ab jr whfg obhtug guvf    hz lbh fbyq hf n pnxr jvgu n  unve ba vg

 jr jnvgrq svsgrra zvahgrf sbe guvf gfg - lbh fryy zr n pnxr jvgu n unve ba vg gura lbh jnag zr gb jnvg    jung ner lbh qbvat  lbher tbaan jnvg abj

  jung vf jebat jvgu zl unve abobql gnxrf orggre pner bs gurve unve guna zr lbh pna freir qvaare ba zl urnq 
 jub arrqf gung zvfgl ureony enva jngre penc gurl fryy va gur urnygu sbbq fgber v hfr ceryy gur uneq fghss uhaqerq cebbs - gnxrf lbhe ebbgf bhg  
 bxnl svar jr'yy whfg jnvg hagvy fur pnyyf gur ahzore 
 jryy znlor jr fubhyq whfg sbetrg nobhg gur pnxr 
 ab v'z oevatvat pnxr  
 nyy evtug jr tbg gur jvar nera'g jr yhpxl jr tbg jvar jubbcrr jubn vzntvar vs jr qvqa'g oevat gur jvar jr'q or fuhaarq ol fbpvrgl bhgpnfgf jurer'f lbhe jvar trg bhg 
  "v xabj guvf vf tbvat gb fbhaq yvxr n penml snagnfl ohg rirel jbeq bs guvf fgbel vf gehr"  " n srj jrrxf ntb zl tveysevraq unccrarq gb zragvba gb zr ubj nggenpgvir fur gubhtug bhe arj arvtuobe yvaqn jnf" 
 y-ybbx ng guvf 
 nuu 
 fbzrobql qbhoyr cnexrq naq oybpxrq hf va q-qbrf nalobql xabj jubfr pne gung vf znlor gurer'f n abgr ba vg buu-bu oebgure ab ab abgr pna lbh oryvrir guvf 
 "jryy bs pbhefr v abgvprq vg gbb jvgu gubfr pnaavony oernfgf naq cbhgl yvcf v qba'g unir gb gryy lbh fur jnf n xabpx bhg"  
 v ernyyl pna abg pbzceruraq ubj fghcvq crbcyr pbhyq or fbzrgvzrf pna lbh pbzceruraq vg 
 ab ab v pna'g pbzceruraq vg 
 v zrna jr pna chg n zna ba gur zbba ohg jr'er fgvyy onfvpnyyl irel fghcvq gur thl jub'f pne guvf vf ur pbhyq or bar bs gur thlf gung ohvyg gur ebpxrg lbh frr jung v'z fnlvat 
 jryy lrnu lrnu ur pbhyq ohvyq gur ebpxrg ohg-ohg ur'f fgvyy fghcvq sbe qbhoyr-cnexvat naq oybpxvat fbzrobql va 
 fb lbh ernyyl haqrefgnaq zl cbvag nobhg ohvyqvat n ebpxrg naq qbhoyr-cnexvat 
 lrnu ba bar unaq ur'f fzneg jvgu ebpxrgf naq ba gur bgure unaq ur'f qhzo jvgu cnexvat    vg'f pbyq bhg urer uhu 
 znlor vg'f abg rira fghcvqvgl znlor vg'f whfg n oyngnag qvfertneq sbe onfvp uhzna qrprapl lrnu guvf ubj qvpgngbe'f fgneg qb lbh guvax zhffbyvav jbhyq pvepyr gur oybpx fvk gvzrf ybbxvat sbe n fcbg 
 ubj nobhg vqv nzva uhu 
 vyy gryy lbh vs v jnf ehaavat sbe bssvpr v jbhyq nfx sbe gur qrngu cranygl sbe qbhoyr-cnexref vs guvf vf nyybjrq gb tb ba guvf vf abg n fbpvrgl guvf vf nanepul 
 ner gubfr fubrf pbzsbegnoyr

 v fgvax v pna'g cynl gur onyy vf whfg fvggvat gurer wreel naq v pna'g uvg vg v bayl uvg bar ernyyl tbbq onyy gung jrag jnl bhg gurer 
 jryy jung unccrarq 
 v unir ab pbapragengvba 
 jung jung jung'f jebat jvgu lbh 
 fnaq v pna trg evq bs gur fnaq  ybbx gurerf fgvyy fbzr va urer vg jba'g tb njnl ybbx v rira tbg fnaq va gur cbpxrgf 
 url pbzr ba lbh'er trggvat vg nyy bire gur sybbe 
  uryyb lrnu lrf vg vf ernyyl nu nu pbhyq lbh ubyq ba n frpbaq  url yvfgra gb guvf fbzr jbzna sbhaq na ryrpgebavp betnavmre zl anzr jnf va vg fur jnagf zr gb uryc ure genpx qbja gur bjare 
 ubj'q fur svaq vg 
 furf jnxvat qbja gur fgerrg naq vg uvg ure va gur urnq 
 fb v nz jnyxva' nybat zvaqvat zl bja ohfvarff jura nyy bss gur fhqqra guvf guvat pbzrf sylvat bhg bs abjurer naq pybaxf zr evtug ba gur urnq 
 jbj 
 lrnu fb gurl gbbx zr gb gur ubfcvgny 
 lrnu 
 naq gurl chg zr va guvf guvat gung srryf yvxr n pbssva sbe sbegl-svir zvahgrf unir lbh rire orra va bar bs gubfr guvatf lbh pbhyq tb orefrex va gurer 
 jryy lbh unir vafhenapr 
 v jvfu 
 haoryvrinoyr 
 lrnu 
 jung vf jvgu guvf guvat 
  v qba'g xabj vg arire fuhgf hc fb naljnl lbh pbhyq frr jul v jbhyq or vagrerfgrq va svaqvat guvf crefba 
 nofbyhgryl lbh fubhyq abg unir gb cnl sbe gung 
  fgbc vg fgbc vg 
 yrg zr unir n ybbx ng guvf guvat 
 ln xabj vg jnf fbzrobql gbyq zr gurl gubhtug gurl fnj gung guvat pbzr bhg bs n yvzbhfvar 
 glcvpny evpu crbcyr hfvat gur jbeyq sbe gurve crefbany tneontr pna 
 obl nz v yhpxl lbhe anzr pnzr hc v whfg chfurq n ohggba 
 v jbhyq yvxr gb xabj jung zl anzrf qbva va guvf perrc'f betnavmre gb ortva jvgu 
 lrnu 
 jub qb v xabj jub jbhyq unir rira orra va n yvzbhfvar lrfgreqnl naljnl huu-b u-bjbj 
 jun-- bu url 
 url "terng" betnavmre lbh tnir zr 
 bu lbh yvxrq vg uhu 
 vg jbhyqa'g fgbc orrcvat va gur pne fb grfgvxbi guebhtu vg bhg gur jvaqbj 
 bu  
 v genafsreerq rirelguvat va gurer v guerj bhg zl byq obbx v'z ybfg abj xenzre 
 jung jung vf vg 
 gur fnaq vg'f rireljurer  
 bx v'yy frr lbh yngre 
 lrv- 
 bu gurer lbh ner 
 gurer lbh ner 
 fb 
 fb 
 fb jung qb lbh unir gb fnl sbe lbhefrys

 jul fubhyq v unir nalguvat sbe fnl sbe zlfrys 
 "jne-- jung vf vg tbbq sbe" 
 n-nununununu jub gbyq lbh 
 n-uh uh uh uh lhev grfgvxbi gur ehffvna jevgre uryybbb 
 lbh gbyq grfgvxbi  gung gbyfgbl jnagrq gb anzr uvf obbx "jne-- jung vf vg tbbq sbe" 
 hu-uh naq qb lbh xabj jung unccrarq 
 pna v gnxr n thrff 
 bu cyrnfr 
 bu v qba'g xabj ur guerj lbhe betnavmre bhg gur jvaqbj 
 jung ubj qvq lbh xabj gung 
 orpnhfr v xabj jub unf vg 
  ubj qvq lbh svaq vg 
 orpnhfr gur jbzna jub tbg uvg va gur urnq jvgu vg sbhaq zl anzr pnyyrq zr hc naq jr zrg 
  jurer vf vg tvir vg gb zr 
 v qba'g unir vg 
 jul abg 
 orpnhfr fur'f abg ergheavat vg hagvy fur trgf gur zbarl onpx sbe gur ubfcvgny ovyy 
 ohg v qvqa'g qb vg grfgvxbi qvq vg ur fubhyq cnl sbe vg 
 ubj zhpu vf grfgvxbi trggvat sebz craqnag sbe guvf obbx 
 bar zvyyvba 
 jryy gung'f n fgneg 
 gura bs pbhefr jvgu ribyhgvba gur bpgbchf ybfg gur abfgevyf naq gbbx ba gur zber snzvyvne ybbx gung jr xabj gbqnl 
 hu-ernyyl 
 lrnu ohg vs lbh fgvyy ybbx pybfryl lbh pna frr nu n yvggyr ohzc jurer gur abfr hfr gb or uhuhuhuh 
 jbj 
 ohg rabhtu nobhg svfu uhuhuh v pna qvfphff bgure guvatf lbh xabj nu nepuvgrpgher uhuh  
 lbh xabj jung ebbz grfgvxbi'f va 
 lrnu 308 bu v'z penml sbe qbvat guvf 
 jryy lbh jnag lbhe betnavmre onpx qba'g lbh 
 jul ner lbh fb vagrerfgrq -- lbh jnag gb gnxr ure bhg 
 url lbh xabj jura fhcrezna fnirf fbzrbar ab bar nfxf vs ur'f gelvat gb uvg ba ure 
 jryy lbh'er abg fhcrezna 
 jryy lbh'er abg ybvf ynar 
 bu yvfgra lbh tbg gur gncr-erpbeqre 
 lrnu v tbg vg lbh fher lbh jnag gb qb guvf  
 lrnu v tbggn trg grfgvxbi ba gncr vs guvf jbzna raqf hc va gur "arj ratynaq wbheany bs zrqvpvar" v'z abg tbaan cnl sbe vg 
 bu urer fur pbzrf 
 uv 
 uv 
 rynvar guvf vf pbevaar 
 uryyb 
 uv  lbh tbg gur betnavmre 
 nyy evtug yrgf tb jr'yy zrrg lbh onpx qbja urer va gra zvahgrf ubcrshyyl jvgu gur zbarl 
 lbhe cneragf zhfg or fb cebhq bs lbh trbetr 
 bu gurl'er ohfgvat 
 uzuz 
 jung ner gubfr crbcyr qbvat bire gurer 
  jung pbzr va - pbzr va - pbzr va zvff orarf gung vf vs lbh pna fcner n zvahgr sebz lbhe ohfl fpurqhyr naq lbh oevat thrfg sbe zl ragregnvazrag 
 hz lrf guvf vf zl sevraq wreel hz ur nppbzcnavrq zr ln xabj  fvatyr jbzra va n ovt pvgl pna or qnatrebhf fb 
 lrnu gu-gung'f jul v jurer gurfr farnxref va pnfr bs nal gebhoyr -- mvc v'z tbar  
 lrnu lrnu gur farnxref nyy gur nzrevpnaf jvgu gur farnxref nyjnlf ehaavat sebz fbzrguvat ln ln jryy fvg fgbc ehaavat ruu gjb zvahgrf v tvir lbh yngrfg znahfpevcg 
 bu evzfxl -- terng terng obbx vs v znl fnl fb fve v nyzbfg ernq gur jubyr guvat 
 uzz  
 jung 
 vs lbh pna'g guvat bss v'yy unir gb nfx lbh gb yrnir 
 v'z jnvgva sbe gjb crbcyr  
 jryy lbh pna jnvg sbe gurz bhgfvqr 
 lrnu  v thrff v'q orggre v jbhyqa'g jnag gb gnxr nal nggragvba njnl sebz gur ubbxref 
 nyy evtug nyy evtug bhg bhg 
 jungrire lbh fnl pebj-jryy 
 jung'f tbvat ba bire urer 
 gurer vf n ornpurq junyr fur'f qlvat 
 vf nalbar urer n znevar ovbybtvfg 
 urer vf yngrfg qensg v frr lbh arkg jrrx fnzr gvzr fnzr qnl  ba gvzr cyrnfr 
  bx 
 vg jnf avpr zrrgvat lbh 
 nnu 
 lbher n erny cyrnfher  
 ln ln  
 hu-bu-nu ol gur jnl ze grfgvxbi hz qb lbh erzrzore gur bgure qnl jura jr jrer va gur yvzb naq nu zl betnavmre fgnegrq znxvat abvfr naq lbh guerj vg bhg gur jvaqbj 
  lrf ubj pbhyq v sbetrg urrur 
  jryy hz jbhyq lbh oryvrir gung vg npghnyyl uvg fbzrobql va gur urnq 
 evtug va gur urnq  
 obvat urur urur  
  jung vf gung abvfr 
 bu gungf abguvat hz naq naljnl hz 
 jungf tbvat ba uhu  gung abvfr 
 ab ab gung'f zl chefr 
 gung abvfr 
 ab trg-trg bss zl chefr 
 ntu vgf erpbeqre 
 ab gung'f enqvb 
 un  lbh ner fclvat ba zr 
 pbzr ba fnir gur junyr lbh tbggn qb vg 
 fnir gur junyr trbetr sbe zr 
 fb v fgnegrq gb jnyx vagb gur jngre v jba'g yvr gb lbh oblf v jnf greevsvrq ohg v cerffrq ba -- naq nf v znqr zl jnl cnffrq gur oernxref n fgenatr pnyz pnzr bire zr v-v qba'g xabj vs vg jnf qvivar vagreiragvba be gur xvafuvc bs nyy yvivat guvatf ohg v gryy lbh wreel ng gung zbzrag  v jnf n znevar ovbybtvfg 
 trbetr vir whfg ernqvat guvf guvat va gur cncre vg'f haoryvrinoyr 
 v xabj v jnf whfg gryyvat gurz gur fgbel 
 jryy pbzr ba trbetr svavfu gur fgbel 
 gur frn jnf natel gung qnl zl sevraqf yvxr na byq zna gelvat gb fraq onpx fbhc va n qryv 
 v tbg nobhg svsgl-srrg bhg naq fhqqrayl gur terng ornfg nccrnerq orsber zr v gryy ln ur jnf gra fgbevrf uvtu vs ur jnf n sbbg nf vs frafvat zl cerfrapr ur yrg bhg n terng oryybj v fnvq "rnfl ovt sryyn" naq gura nf v jngpurq uvz fgehttyvat v ernyvmrq gung fbzrguvat jnf bofgehpgvat vgf oernguvat sebz jurer v jnf fgnaqvat v pbhyq frr qverpgyl vagb gur rlr bs gur terng svfu 
 znzzny 
 jungrire 
 jryy gura jung qvq lbh qb arkg 
 jryy gura sebz bhg bs abjurer n uhtr gvqny jnir yvsgrq zr gbffrq yvxr n pbex naq v sbhaq zlfrys evtug ba gbc bs uvz  snpr gb snpr jvgu gur oybj-ubyr v-v v pbhyq oneryl frr sebz gur jnirf penfuvat qbja hcba zr ohg v xarj fbzrguvat jnf gurer fb v ernpurq zl unaq va sryg nebhaq naq chyyrq bhg gur bofgehpgvba 
 jung vf gung n gvgyrvfg

  hz-uz 
 xvffrq zr jr obgu unq grnef fgernzvat qbja bhe snprf v arire fnj nalbar fb ornhgvshy vg jnf ng gung zbzrag gung v qrpvqrq gb gryy ure gung v jnf abg n znevar ovbybtvfg

 fnaq vg'f rireljurer 
 lrc 
 nera'g znaardhvaf na vafhyg gb lbhe vzntvangvba lbh pbhyqa'g cbffvoyl ivfhnyvmr n fjrngre fb jr'yy fubj lbh ba guvf yvsr fvmr fabggl chccrg v thrff jura gurl svavfu jvgu gurz gurl orpbzr penfu grfg qhzzvrf gung'f gur raq bs gur yvar sbe n znaardhva "jung rire unccrarq gb obo" "unir lbh frra gung arj ibyib pbzzrepvny ur'f tbg n ohyyf rlr evtug va uvf snpr" znaardhvaf ner bayl hfrq sbe pne nppvqragf naq snfuvba v thrff gurfr ner gur gjb fvghngvbaf gung vg'f vzcbffvoyr sbe hf gb vzntvar bhefryirf jryy qerffrq be trggvat xvyyrq v'z fher gurer vf fbzr ceb-znaardhva betnavmngvba gung qbrfa'g rira yvxr lbh gb hfr gur grez znaardhva "url gurl'er abg znaardhvaf gurl'er gur yvsr qrcevirq" 
 uhz gung jnf ernyyl tbbq 
 lrnu ner lbh shyy 
 bu ab v'ir unq whfg rabhtu

 ab

 qvq fur fnl jul

 znlor fur'f qvnorgvp 
 ab fur pneevrf ragrznaaf qbhtuahgf va ure chefr 
 znlor lbh fnvq fbzrguvat gung bssraqrq ure

 ab unez

 qhzc ure

 lbh qvq

 jung'f zr

 trg bhg 
 vg'f hapnaal vg'f yvxr gurl pubccrq bss lbhe nezf naq yrtf qvccrq lbh va cynfgvp naq fperjrq lbh onpx nyy gbtrgure ntnva naq fghpx lbh ba n crqrfgny vg'f ernyyl dhvgr rkdhvfvgr 
 xenzre jung'f gur anzr bs gur fgber jvgu gur znaardhva 
 evavgmr  bu lrnu

 erny obff 
 v'z tbvat qbja gurer 
 v'z tbaan tb jvgu lbh v tbggn trg n arj fhvg v tbg n frpbaq vagreivrj jvgu znpxramvr naq v guvax v'z ernyyl pybfr gurl'er nyy gnxvat zr bhg gb yhapu ba sevqnl

 xrrc vg

 vg'f yvxr fbzr cbq ynaqrq sebz nabgure cynarg naq gbbx lbhe obql qba'g snyy nfyrrc rynvar 
 jung'f tbvat ba urer ubj qb lbh guvax guvf unccrarq 
 jubn ybbx ng guvf guvf vf n ornhgvshy fhvg uhu

 lbh guvax fb 
  rkphfr zr jurer qvq guvf pbzr sebz 
 v qba'g xabj 
 lbh ernyyl guvax guvf ybbxf bx ba zr

 jul 
 vfa'g vg boivbhf guvf znaardhva ybbxf rknpgyl yvxr zr 
  qvq lbh whfg ebyy lbhe rlrf ng uvz orpnhfr yrg zr gryy lbh fbzrguvat vs nabobql fubhyq or ebyyvat gurve rlrf vg vf zr ng uvz nobhg lbh 
 v guvax znlor lbh'er synggrevat lbhefrys gung znaadhrva vf jrnevat n gjryir uhaqerq qbyyne tnhygvre qerff 
 jung ner lbh fnlvat gung v'z abg tbbq rabhtu sbe guvf uvqrbhf qerff  yvfgra angnfun v jbhyqa'g or pnhtug qrnq jrnevat lbhe pehzzl yvggyr rheb-genfu entf  v'yy zrrg lbh bhgfvqr 
 jung vf ure ceboyrz 
 nu cssg jung pna lbh qb  vf guvf gur cevpr gnt 
 lrf 
 lrf uryyb cnegl'f bire  
 v'yy gryy lbh n yvggyr frperg jr'er univat na hanqiregvfrq fnyr fgnegvat sevqnl gung fhvg jvyy or unys-cevpr 
 fb lbh guvax lbh pna chg gur fhvg nfvqr naq ubyq vg sbe zr 
 bu v'z nsenvq v pbhyq'g qb gung vg jbhyqa'g or snve gb gur bgure phfgbzref 
 bu lrf bs pbhefr naq jr unir gb or snve  
 fb v sbhaq bhg jub fhccyvrf gur znaardhvaf naq v pnyyrq 'rz hc

 evtug

 jnvg gvyy lbh gnfgr guvf  cbccvr guvf vf cresrpg 
  jryy 
 wreel unir fbzr  lbh'er abg tbaan gnfgr vg  wreel  
 fb fur gbhtug v qvq vg gb trg onpx ng ure 
 jul qvqa'g lbh whfg gryy ure 
 v qba'g guvax gung'f gur xvaq bs guvat lbh jnaan urne nobhg lbhe sngure ohg v'yy gryy lbh jura ur pnzr bhg bs gung onguebbz naq ur jnf xarnqvat gung qbhtu vg jnf n jvyq fprar 
 ubj pbhyq ur abg unir jnfurq 
 rira vs lbh'er abg tbaan fbnc hc ng yrnfg cergraq sbe zl orarsvg ghea gur jngre ba qb fbzrguvat 
 lrnu whfg yvxr v qb 
 lbh xabj n purs jub qbrfa'g jnfu vf yvxr n pbc jub fgrnyf vg'f n pel sbe uryc ur jnagf gb trg pnhtug 
 jryy v guvax cbccvr'f tbg fbzr ceboyrzf gurer'f n jubyr bgure guvat tbvat ba jvgu cbccvr fb ubj qvq lbh yrnir vg 
 jr unira'g fcbxra 
 jryy v'z abg tbaan arrq guvf nalzber v tbg byvir  
 byvir 
 lrnu zl ynql sevraq qbja ng zbaxf 
 bu 
 lbh thlf bhtug gb frr gur jnl fur jbexf ure anvyf npebff zl onpx buu fur'f n znrfgeb gur pevffpebff gur svther rvtug fgehzzva' gur by' onawb naq guvf jvyq fnintr serr-sbe-nyy jurer nalguvat pna unccra 
 v tbg gb trg qbjagbja naq ohl gung fhvg gur fgber bcraf va gjragl zvahgrf 
 vf gung rynvar znaardhva fgvyy gurer 
 lrnu 
 lrnu 
 gur ynfg gvzr v fnj ure fur jnf anxrq 
 lrnu naq cbccvr'f tbg ceboyrzf 
 jurer vf vg jurer vf vg 
  jryy ybbx ng guvf  guvf qbrfa'g orybat urer fbzrbar unf znqr n greevoyr zvfgnxr 
 lbh onfgneq lbh uvq gur fhvg 
 uvq v unir ab vqrn ubj guvf fhvg tbg zvfcynprq arireguryrff v qb oryvrir v funyy chepunfr vg 
 v ubcr lbh ebg va gung fhvg ybbx v'z tbaan trg lbh sbe guvf v qba'g xabj ubj ohg v'z tbaan trg lbh lbh ner tbvat gb cnl 
 bu v'yy cnl unys-cevpr neevirqrepv zl sryybj 40-fubeg 
 fb v znqr n yvggyr yvfg bs crbcyr jub zvtug'ir znqr gur znaardhva lbh xabj cbffvoyr fhfcrpgf 
 lrnu nyy evtug tb nurnq  
 gurer'f guvf oyvaq thl ng n cnegl v jnf ng naq ur sryg zl snpr sbe n ernyyl ybat gvzr lbh xabj gb frr jung v ybbxrq yvxr ur nyzbfg chg uvf svatre hc zl abfr 
  uhz bx jung ryfr lbh tbg 
 bx v'z abg tbaan gryy lbh gur erfg bs gur yvfg 
 bu orpnhfr v qvqa'g guvax gur oyvaq thl qvq vg 
 orpnhfr lbh unir na nggvghqr 
 bu 
 trbetvb avpr qhqf 
 lbh'er gryyvat zr  fb jung qb lbh guvax 
 qvq lbh urne fbzrguvat 
 lrnu yvxr n fjbbfu 
 lrnu 
  vg zhfg or gur snoevp vg'f ehoovat orgjrra lbh guvtuf jura lbh jnyx gung'f jung'f znxvat gung fjbbful fbhaq 
 v cebonoyl qvqa'g urne vg ba gur jnl bire orpnhfr bs gur fgerrg abvfr  guvf vf ab tbbq v tbg gb zrrg gurfr thlf sebz znpxramvr sbe yhapu va unys na ubhe 
 fb jung jung jbhyq gurl pner 
 guvf znpxramvr ur'f n ovg bs n ahg fbzrbar gbyq zr ur sverq gur ynfg thl orpnhfr uvf abfr juvfgyrq jura ur oerngurq 
 fb lbh guvax lbh'er abg tbaan trg gur wbo orpnhfr lbhe cnagf znxr n abvfr 
 yrg'f fnl vg pbzrf qbja gb zr naq bar bgure thl ur'f tbg n avpr dhvrg fhvg naq v'z jubbfuvat nyy bire gur cynpr jub qb lbh guvax ur'f tbaan uver 
 lbh xabj v guvax nyy gurfr vagreivrjf ner znxvat lbh ahgf 
 url wreel v fnj lbhe tveysevraq jnf va urer orsber 
 nhqerl 
 lrc fng qbja unq urefrys n cvrpr bs cvr 
 jnf vg nccyr 
 jung ryfr 
 guvf jbzna vf oraqvat zl zvaq vagb n cergmry 
 qb v xabj lbh 
 uzz ab lbh qba'g 
 lrnu lbh jrer jrnevat n t-fgevat naq bar bs gubfr oenf jvgu cbvagf 
 gur znaardhva 
 bu v tbg gb frr guvf guvat 
 obl gur erfrzoynapr vf hapnaal 
 lbh guvax lbh pna cbfr zr ubjrire lbh jnag gung'f zl nff va lbhe jvaqbj 
 vg'f bhe fgber naq bhe znaardhva jr pna qb jungrire jr jnag jvgu vg 
 ab lbh gnxr gung znaardhva qbja evtug abj be v'z cerffvat punetrf  lrf guvf vf zl nggbearl 
  lrnu jung ynj nz v oernxvat 
 jryy v oryvrir gurer'f fbzr yrtny cerprqrag - jvapuryy if znubarl 
 hu-uhu 
 gur puneyvr znpnegul urnevatf 
 hu-uhu ner lbh gnxvat guvf qbja 
 v'z trggvat gur znantre  
 wreel trg gur pne  
 jung ner lbh qbvat 
 whfg trg gur pne 
 rynvar nf lbhe yrtny pbhafry v zhfg nqivfr ntnvafg guvf 
 v qba'g xabj nobhg lbh ohg v'z trggvat n unaxrevat sbe fbzr qbhoyrzvag thz nyevtug v'z qebccvat lbh bss ng jbex evtug 
 jurer ner lbh tbvat 
 cbccvr'f 
 gunaxf sbe zrrgvat zr qbja urer trbetr zl bssvpr vf bhg bs pbageby  cubarf evatvat crbcyr ehaavat va naq bhg  qvq lbh urne fbzrguvat 
 ab v qvqa'g urne nalguvat 
 uhu gung'f fgenatr  vg'f dhvrgre urer jr pna pbapragengr jvgubhg crbcyr jbbfuvat nebhaq  gung fbhaq ntnva fher lbh qvqa'g urne nalguvat 
 ab pna'g fnl nf v qvq 
 xvaq bs yvxr n ehfgyvat 
 pbhyq or gur yrnirf 
 gung'f evtug cbccvr'f ba 77gu bx jr'yy frr lbh ng 800 olr-olr 
 uryyb 
 jung ner lbh qbvat urer 
 fb ubj jnf gur cvr 
 jung cvr 
 gur nccyr cvr lbh unq gbqnl ng zbaxf 
 v'z irel ohfl urer 
 cerggl tbbq jnfa'vg v gbyq lbh lbh fubhyq'ir gnfgrq vg 
 lbh orggre abg yrg cbccvr frr lbh urer 
 nyy evtug v'z ybbxvat sbe fbzrbar anzrq cbccvr 
 hu jub ner lbh 
 obneq bs urnygu jr'ir unq frireny pbzcynvagf 
 bu nobhg gur hu  
 ner lbh cbccvr 
 v'z cbccvr 
 v guvax lbh'q orggre pbzr jvgu zr 
 jung'f gur ceboyrz 
 jung qb gurl jnag sebz cbccvr 
 jryy cbccvr'f n yvggyr fybccl 
 lbh gnhtug v'q pner nobhg lbhe cnagf jbbfuvat 
 v urneq gur ynfg thl tbg sverq orpnhfr uvf abfr juvfygrq 
 ab ab ab ur tbg sverq orpnhfr ur jnfa'g n grnz cynlre gung'f fbzrguvat jr qba'g wbxr nobhg ng znpxramvr lbh'yy svaq jr'er grnz urer trbetr jr qba'g gbyrengr qvffrag vs lbh jnag gb tb lbhe bja jnl lbh'er va gur jebat cynpr 
 ab ceboyrz gurer pbasbezvgl vf na bofrffvba jvgu zr 
 pubpbyngr pernz cvr pbzcyvzragf bs gur ubhfr 
 bu ubcr lbh fnirq ebbz sbe qrffreg 
  gur purs fnvq gung ur znqr vg fcrpvny sbe lbh 
 bu  
 zzz orfg cvr v'ir rire gnfgrq gnxr n ovgr trbetr  jryy gnxr n ovgr vg'f qryvpvbhf  v vafvfg  
 vs lbh'er bar bs hf lbh'yy gnxr n ovgr 
 fb lbh qvqa'g trg gur wbo 
 ab ohg v jnf gur bayl bar ng gur gnoyr gung qvqa'g trg ivbyragyl vyy 
 xenzre lbh pna'g xrrc nibvqvat ure yvxr guvf lbh'er tbaan unir gb fnl fbzrguvat 
 jung nz v fhccbfrq gb fnl 
 gryy ure lbh ybfg lbhe vgpu 
 jung unccrarq gb lbhe vgpu 
 v ybfg vg gjb qnlf ntb v'ir orra snxvat vg fb v jbhyqa'g uheg ure srryvatf

 ure  
 ure 
 lrnu gurer fur vf gung'f zl tny 
 lbh'er n yvne v'ir frra ure va urer orsber fur'f abg lbhe tveysevraq 
 abj byvir ybbx v'z fbeel 
 jul vf fur jrnevat ure haqrejrne 
 jryy vg'f gur fglyr  wreel tvir zr gur xrlf  jryy v thrff jr'er tbaan tb sbe n qevir abj fur ernyyl ybirf gung 
 qvq lbh rire fbyir gur evqqyr bs gur cvr 
 ab gung'f bar sbe gur ntrf ohg v guvax gurl'er tbaan chg cbccvr njnl sbe n ybat ybat gvzr 
 lbh thlf ner abg tbaan oryvrir guvf v whfg tbg n yrggre sebz n sevraq bs zvar va puvpntb jub jnf fubccvat naq fur fnvq fur fnj n znaardhva gung ybbxrq whfg yvxr zr jung vs gurer'er zber jurer ner gurl pbzvat sebz 
 evpxl jr'ir orra trggvat n gerzraqbhf erfcbafr gb lbhe ge-6 znaardhva 
 ge-6 v cersre gb guvax bs ure nf rynvar 
 pbzrql pyho] 
 gur ohf vf gur fvatyr fghcvqrfg snggrfg fybjrfg zbfg qrfcvfrq iruvpyr ba gur ebnq vfa'g vg lbh rire abgvpr jura lbh trg oruvaq gur ohf crbcyr va lbhe pne tb 'jung ner lbh qbvat trg njnl pbzr ba' gur onpx bs gur ohf vf yvxr na rpyvcfr vfa'g vg crbcyr ner whfg yvxr 'gur fha jurer'f gur fha' vg'f yvxr guvf uhtr zrgny nff gnxvat hc gur jubyr jvaq fuvryq bs lbhe pne jura vg chyyf bhg vg rira fbhaqf yvxr n sng hapyr gelvat gb trg bhg bs n fbsn  
 wreel naq trbetr ba n ohf] 
 vg'f whfg abg tbbq vg'f abg tbbq 
 vg'f abg tbbq

 jryy ng oernxsnfg rirelobql ernqf 
 ab yhapu jr ernq qvaare jr ernq

 gurer'f abguvat gb gnyx nobhg 
 ln jung'f gurer gb gnyx nobhg

 fur xabjf gurer vf abguvat gb gnyx nobhg

 url ny

 wreel'f ncnegzrag] 
 v qvqa'g rira xabj shygba jnf va gur ubfcvgny

 bu fgbc vg

 cyrnfher 
 ubj'f jbex tbvat lbh thlf 
 yrgf abg rira gnyx nobhg vg 
  lbh tbg n wbo 
 ln zvpxrl ur ubbxrq zr hc jr'er fgnaq-vaf sbe gur npgbef ba 'nyy zl puvyqera' zvpxrl ur'f n fgnaq-va sbe na rvtug lrne byq xvq naq v fgnaq va sbe gur xvqf sngure 
  ohg v tbg n ovt ceboyrz gur xvq v fgnaq va sbe ur'f tebjvat ur jnf sbhe srrg ynfg zbagu abj ur'f yvxr sbhe-gjb naq n unys ur fubg hc gjb naq n unys vapurf v pna qb sbhe-gjb sbhe-guerr vf n fgergpu nal uvture guna gung naq v'z tbaan or bhg ba zl nff qbvat gung cnen-yrtny penc 
 ubj qb lbh fgbc n xvq sebz tebjvat 
  v gbyq lbh lbh fubhyq bssre uvz fbzr pvtnerggrf 
 v bssrerq uvz pvtnerggrf  ohg uvf fghcvq zbgure vf unatvat nebhaq fur jba'g yrg uvz unir nal

  bhg bs gur dhrfgvba

 lnc 
 nyevtug jr tbggn trg onpx gb gur fubj jung ner lbh thlf qbvat

 xenzre

 url jbnubu shygba vg'f zr 
 url wreel tbbq gb frr ln v pbhyq ernyyl hfr n tbbq ynhtu 
 jub pbhyqa'g 
 v unira'g penpxrq n fzvyr va zbaguf 
 bu qba'g jbeel lbh'yy penpx penpxvat'f varivgnoyr svefg lbh penpx gura lbh puhpxyr gung jnf gur zbggb jvgu gur ehffvnaf ng gur pnrfne yravatenq svefg lbh penpx gura lbh puhpxyr  lbh xabj orpnhfr yravatenq jura gur anmvf nggnpxrq vg jnfa'g n irel unccl gvzr orpnhfr bs gur jne snzvar cyhf vg jnf pbyq irel pbyq gurl jrer rngvat rnpu bgure  znlor guvf vfa'g n tbbq gvzr sbe n ivfvg 
 vg'f n svar gvzr 
 bu nyevtug nu jryy gurer'f n cevrfg n zvavfgre naq n enoov naq gurl'er nyy fgnevat ng uvz 
  fb ubj jrer gur rttf 
 rttf ner rttf 
  rttf ner rttf gung vf irel cebsbhaq  ol gur fnzr gbxra lbh pbhyq fnl svfu vf svfu un un un v qba'g guvax fb  yvfgra qbcuar 
  qncuar

 jung 
 ln ur fnvq lbh pbhyq arire znxr n pbzzvgzrag gb nal bar naq lbh'q whfg jvaq hc  uhegvat zr 
 ur fnvq gung  jung n areir ubj qner ur fnl fbzrguvat yvxr gung 
 vf vg gehr 
 bs pbhefr abg v zrna fher gurer znl unir orra bar be gjb bppnfvbaf va gur cnfg jura v znl unir ernpgrq va hu vzchyfvir be fbzrjung vzzngher znaare ohg gubfr qnlf ner jryy oruvaq zr 
 nop fghqvbf] 
 ubj ybat ner lbh tbvat gb or njnl sbe qnqql

 qba'g tb qnqql qba'g tb

 lb 
 nyevtug lbh thlf trg ba gurve fcbgf fb jr pna svk gur yvtugf

 fb hu fur'f whfg fvggvat gurer naq n hu cnpxlqrez lbh erzrzore gur qrez ur fnlf hu v'z tbaan tb hc gb ure fb jr hu ur hu cvpxf hc gur gjb cvrprf bs  cvmmn naq hu gur hu naq gura gurl'er fgrnzvat ubg naq gurl'er oheavat uvf unaqf frr fb ur ur'f whttyvat rz  ur'f whttyva rz whf guebjvat gurz hc va gur nve naq whfg nf ur trgf hc gb ure qbja gurl tb  jryy jr nyy whfg ybfg vg  vg jnf ernyyl ernyyl shaal 
 url wreel

 wreel'f ncnegzrag] 
 lbh fubhyq unir gbyq gung fgbel nobhg cnpxlqrez qebccvat gur cvmmn

  ln

 qb v xabj uvz 
 ab ohg v'yy gryy lbh fbzrguvat bs nyy gur thlf v xabj v pbhyq raivfvba lbh tbvat bhg jvgu uvz 
 vs lbh jrer n jbzna jbhyq lbh tb bhg jvgu uvz

 nyevtug

 wreel'f ncnegzrag] 
 shygba'f jvsr gbyq zr vg'f nyy zl snhyg fur fnvq fvapr zl ivfvg ur'f gnxra n ghea sbe gur jbefr 
 qvq lbh gryy uvz gur cnpxlqrez fgbel 
  lrf v gbyq uvz gur cnpxlqrez fgbel 
 znlor v bhggn tb bire gurer 
 gbjneqf jung raq 
 v'z irel tbbq jvgu fvpx crbcyr gurl ybir zr jura zl sevraq yra avpbqrzb unq gur tbhg v zbirq vagb uvf ubfcvgny ebbz sbe guerr qnlf gur qbpgbef jrer nznmrq ng uvf erpbirel 
 url 
 url zvpx 
  wbuaal ivtvnab jrag guebhtu zl ybpxre 
 lnbu 
  gung yvggyr onfgneq ur fnj gur yvsgf va zl fubrf ur xabjf v'z urvtugravat  guvf arire jbhyq unir unccrarq vs lbh unqa'g chfurq zr gb trg gubfr guvatf v gbyq lbh 
 url abobql chg n tha gb lbhe urnq 
 ln jryy whfg xrrc bhg bs zl ohfvarff lbh ovt ncr  
 jub lbh pnyyvat ovt ncr

 trbetr'f pne bhgfvqr qncuar'f cynpr]

 zbegl lbh'er gnyxvat gbb ybhq 
 v'z abg gnyxvat ybhq 
 lbh'er uhegvat zl rneqehz 
 jryy lbh zhfg unir qbar fbzrguvat jvgu vg 
 v'z ba gur cubar 
 vf fur gurer pna jr gnyx gb ure jung'f ure anzr 
 zbz v'z abg zneevrq 
 jung 
 v'z abg zneevrq 
 v xarj vg v gbyq lbh 
 hapyr yrb fnvq 
 v'z whfg cergraqvat v'z zneevrq gb trg n qvfpbhag ba qel-pyrnavat 
 n qvfpbhag ba qel-pyrnavat 
 pbhyq lbh znxr n yvggyr zber abvfr  yvfgra v'z tbaan unir gb pnyy lbh yngre 
 jryy v tvir hc 
 jryy jubbcvr jubbc  
 tbg nal pbssrr 
 lrnu  v'yy trg vg v'yy trg vg gnxr vg rnfl jul ner lbh fb gverq 
 zl dhvyg vf fgvyy ng gur pyrnaref wreel v pna'g fyrrc jvgubhg zl dhvyg yvxr gur bgure avtug v jnf pbyq fb ynfg avtug v ghea hc gur urng - vg'f gbb ubg v bcra hc n jvaqbj - vg'f gbb pbyq  v pna'g trg vagb n mbar 
 jung vf gung  
 uhu 
 gung 
 bu v sbetbg  
 url v'z fbeel nobhg nyy gung pna bcrare fghss 
 lrnu zr gbb v ybir lbh 
 v ybir lbh 
 jryy tbbqavtug 
 tbbqavtug  
 gurl pbhyq xvpx zr bhg bs gur urnygu pyho vs ur gryyf gurz 
 fb jung qb lbh jnag zr gb qb 
 gnyx gb uvz 
 ubj pna v qb gung 
 lbh fnvq gur thl tnir lbh na bcra-yvccrq xvff 
 lrf ohg gura ur jvcrq uvf unaq ba gur gbc bs gur obggyr jura v bssrerq uvz jngre 
 jryy gung qbrfa'g zrna nalguvat 
 ner lbh xvqqvat gung'f irel fvtavsvpnag vs ur jnf vagrerfgrq va zr ur'q jnag zl trezf ur'q whfg penir zl trezf 
 fur'f evtug trbetr obggyr-jvcr vf ovt 
 jryy jung nobhg gur bcra-yvccrq xvff 
  obggyr-jvcr fhcreprqrf vg 
 lrnu lbh'er evtug lbh'er evtug  nyevtug znlor ur'f abg vagrerfgrq ohg lbh fgvyy xabj uvz - pna'g lbh whfg nfx uvz 
 trbetrohg vs v nfx uvz abj v jvyy unir ab punapr bs tbvat bhg jvgu uvz 
 jul 
 vv qba'g xabj 
 nun nun pbhyq vg or orpnhfr lbh qba'g jnag uvz gb xabj gung lbh unir n sevraq jub crrf va gur fubjre vf gung vg 
 ab gung'f abg vg 
 bu v guvax vg vf v guvax gung'f rknpgyl jung vg vf 
 jul pbhyqa'g lbh whfg jnvg 
 v jnf gurer v fnj n qenva 
 fvapr jura vf n qenva n gbvyrg 
 vg'f nyy cvcrf jung'f gur qvssrerapr 
 qvssrerag cvcrf tb gb qvssrerag cynprf lbh'er tbaan zvk 'rz hc 
 v'yy pnyy n cyhzore evtug abj

 wreel v guvax gung dhvyg vf ernql 
 nyevtug

 uhu v qba'g 
 ab lbh ybbx cnyr 
 cnyr bu zl tbqv tbggn zrrg naan'f cneragf gbqnl  
 uryyb bu uv ubarl  lrf v gbyq uvz v'yy trg vg  jurarire bxnl v'z fbeel 
 v'z fbeel vg'f abg ernql lrg  
 abg ernql vg unf gb or ernql jung xvaq bs n ohfvarff ner lbh ehaavat urer 
 jub gur uryy ner lbh uhu vg'f abg lbhe dhvyg 
 ur'f n irel tbbq sevraq bs zvar ur'f xvaq'ir yvxr na byqre oebgure gb zrjura guvatf qba'g tb evtug ur xvaqn gnxrf vg crefbanyyl 
 jryy huznlor gbzbeebj 
 znlor

 nyevtug v'z tbaan frr lbh yngre 
 jurer lbh tbva'

 ln

 uv tert 
 url rynvar v'yy or bss va n frpbaq 
 bx  v tbg gur znpuvar arkg ohqql  
 bu jryy vg'f nyy lbhef  
 jung unccrarq qvq ur oevat vg hc 
 arire zvaq gung ybbx ng gur fvtany v whfg tbg 
 fvtany jung fvtany 
 ybbxvg ur xarj v jnf tbaan hfr gur znpuvar arkg ur qvqa'g jvcr uvf fjrng bss gung'f n trfgher bs vagvznpl 
 v'yy gryy lbh jung gung vf - gung'f n ivbyngvba bs pyho ehyrf abj v tbg uvz naq lbh'er zl jvgarff 
 yvfgra trbetr yvfgra ur xarj jung ur jnf qbvat guvf jnf n fvtany 
 n thl yrnirf n chqqyr bs fjrng gung'f n fvtany 
 lrnu vg'f n fbpvny guvat 
 jung vs ur yrsg lbh n hfrq xyrrark jung'f gung n inyragvar abj lbh tb hc gb uvz naq lbh gryy uvz gung vs ur'f guvaxvat bs gheavat zr va gung v tbg gur tbbqf ba uvz 
 ab v jba'g or n cnegl gb guvf 
 fb lbh'er tbaan yrg zr trg fhfcraqrq sbe fubjre hevangvba

 lbh qrpvqr

 ner lbh fher lbh jnag gb qb gung

 irel

 jul

 lrnu jryy ng yrnfg ur unq n qenva

 jr'yy nyjnlf unircnapnxrf 
 olr wreel  
 v gubhtug lbh fnvq lbh jnf oevatva' n juvgr obl ubzr v qba'g frr n juvgr obl v frr n qnza sbby 
 lbh xabj gurve gvzvat pbhyqa'g or jbefr 
 vf gurer rire n tbbq gvzr gb unir lbhe cneragf fgnl jvgu lbh 
 lbh qba'g haqrefgnaq v unira'g orra gbtrgure jvgu enpury sbe yvxr guerr jrrxf svefg v jnf ba gur ebnq gura zl cneragf fubj hc v'z trggvat n yvggyr hu onpxrq hc 
 jura ner gurl yrnivat sbe cnevf 
 abg sbe nabgure guerr qnlf 
 jung nobhg ure cynpr 
 fur yvirf jvgu ure cneragf 
 ernyyl  znlor guvf jvyy orpbzr yvxr n pbby guvat yvivat jvgu lbhe cneragf 
  ln gura znlor onyqarff jvyy pngpu ba guvf jvyy nyy or gheavat lbhe jnl 
 url oryvrir zr onyqarff jvyy pngpu ba jura gur nyvraf pbzr jub qb lbh guvax gurl'er tbaan eryngr gb jub qb lbh guvax vf tbvat gb or gur svefg barf trggvat n gbhe bs gur fuvc 
 gur onyqvrf 
 url ol gur jnl zl cneragf ernyyl jnag gb unir lbhe cneragf bire qvaare orsber gurl yrnir gbja 
 gung'f tbbq gura v trg gur ncnegzrag sbe ng yrnfg bar avtug lbh xabj v'z cnlvat sbe guvf jubyr cnevf gevc vg'f gurve naavirefnel cerfrag 
  url thlf 
 url nyrp 
 url nyrp 
 guvf vf wbrl 
 url wbrl ubj lbh qbva' 
  url yvfgra v jnf jbaqrevat vs rvgure bar bs lbh thlf jbhyq or vagrerfgrq va qbvat fbzr jbex sbe gur ovt oebgure cebtenz v'z xvaqn ehaavat gur ybpny puncgre jung qb lbh fnl trbetr 
 jryy hu 
  jbhyqa'g lbh yvxr gb or n ovt oebgure gb fbzrbar yvxr zr cyrnfr 
 jryy fher wbrl fher v jbhyq or guevyyrq 
 gung'f terng trbetr gunaxf n ybg v'yy trg va gbhpu jvgu lbh 
 jbhyqa'g lbh yvxr gb or n ovt oebgure 
  ln nyevtug wbrl gung'f rabhtu yrg'f tb  frr ln 
 jung unccrarq 
 jung pbhyq v qb qvq lbh frr gur zht ba gung xvq 
  jbhyqa'g lbh yvxr gb cnff gur xrgpuhc gb fbzrbar yvxr zr cyrnfr 
 url qvq lbh abgvpr gurl zbirq jurer gurl qb gur vagreivrj ba wrbcneql abj 
 ln vg hfrq gb or evtug va gur zvqqyr bs fvatyr wrbcneql naq abj gurl qb vg evtug nsgre fvatyr wrbcneql 
 ln vg'f zhpu orggre vfa'g vg 
 bu a-ab pbzcnevfba 
 url v tbggn fgbc bss ng gur obbxfgber gb cvpx hc zl cneragf bar bs gubfr serapu-ratyvfu qvpgvbanevrf 
  url url url url url url 
 jung 
 lbhe cneragf ner tbvat gb cnevf evtug 
 lrn 
 fb v gryy nyrp gung v unir gb tb gb cnevf sbe na haqrgrezvarq nzbhag bs gvzr gura nyy v unir gb qb vf ohl fbzr cbfg pneqf naq unir lbhe cneragf znvy gurz sebz cnevf 
 jung nobhg yvggyr wbrl 
 jub 
 nu v guvax ur'f cebonoyl orggre bss 
 v'z gelvat gb trg bhg bs guvf ovt oebgure cebtenz fb jura lbh trg gb cnevf  nyy lbh unir gb qb vf qebc 'rz va nal znvyobk 
 ohg gurer ner ab fgnzcf ba gurfr 
 jryy ab abg lrg lbh tbggn ohl serapu fgnzcf  v-v'yy ervzohefr lbh bs pbhefr 
 jul ner lbh qbvat guvf 
 ur jnagf guvf thl gb guvax ur'f va cnevf

 ln 
 fnl gubfr ner fbzr avpr cnagf v tbg n cnve whfg yvxr gurz ng ubzr

 jung unccraf vs gur uhfonaq qvrf nsgre gur jvsr jub oevatf va gur pybguvat va gura

 nu wreel lbh jbhyq abg oryvrir gur gvzr jr unq

 wreel unir lbh rire frra nal bs gubfr vzcerffvbavfg cnvagvatf 
 bu fher yvxr zbarg
