 jr unir ab cynaf 
  ybbx ng gung uryra qb lbh frr jung ur'f jrnevat gung'f gur rkrphgvir 
 abj jung vf rkrphgvir 
 gur oryg-yrff gerapu pbng zl sngure vairagrq vg 
 v fher qvq envapbngf jrer zl ohfvarff gur rkrphgvir jnf n pynffvp gurfr unira'g orra znqr va gjragl lrnef 
 jul jbhyq gurl xabj obql obhtug gurz gura 
 ur'f jrnevat bar 
 lrn gurfr ner n ubg vgrz bire ng ehql'f 
 lbh qba'g fnl lbh xabj v unir obkrf bs gubfr fvggvat va zl tnentr va sybevqn 
 trg 'rz hc urer lbh tvir zr gjragl-svir creprag v-v'yy gnxr pner bs rirelguvat 
 lbh tbggn qrny 
 lnnnn 
 guvf vf yvxr gur zrrgvat bs fzvgu naq jrffba 
 v'yy pnyy wnpx xybzchf ur'f tbg n xrl gb gur tnentr ur pna fraq gurz bireavtug qryvirel 
 lbh'er tbaan svefg fgneg fuvccvat obkrf jr'er yrnivat sbe cnevf va guerr qnlf 
 ur'yy fraq gurz rkcerff 
 lbh'er penml 
 v'yy gryy lbh ubj penml v nz v'z tbaan cnl sbe guvf jubyr gevc jvgu gurfr pbngf 
 a-an v'z cnlvat sbe gur gevc 
 fb zhpu gur orggre 
 naljnl vg'f xvaq bs n syhxr guvat ohg hu v'yy or yrnivat sbe cnevf va gjb qnlf v jvyy fraq lbh n cbfgpneq jura v trg gurer 
 cnevf uhu 
 lrn lnln xabj v srry greevoyr nobhg wbrl ohg vg'f whfvg'f n terng ohfvarff bccbeghavgl v-v qba'g rira xabj ubj ybat v'z tbaan or njnl sbe 
 jurer jvyy lbh fgnl 
 na ncnegzrag pbzcyrk gur hu gur rvssry gbjref hhzz yvxr v fnvq hu lbh'yy or trggvat n cbfgpneq hu va n srj qnlf naq ntnva v'z fbeel 
 trbetr lbh unir ab vqrn ubj snagnfgvp guvf vf 
 snagnfgvp 
 ln jr'ir orra gelvat gb erhavgr wbrl jvgu uvf sngure jub yvirf va cnevf ohg ur'f nsenvq gb syl nybar lbh xabj ur'f xvaqn jvguqenja ohg ur frrzf gb gnxr gb lbh  fb vg'f n cresrpg fbyhgvba 
 ubj trr jung n pbvapvqrapr 
 naq lbh'yy fraq zr n cbfgpneq 
 uryra ernyyl frrzrq gb erfcbaq gb erabve v guvax fur ernyyl pbaarpgrq gb gur jnl ur cnvagrq puvyqera 
 zz uzz 
 naq gung zbegl v'yy gryy ln gung thl vf shyy bs yvsr  ur jnf pbaivaprq zbarg jnf arne fvtugrq v xrcg gryyvat uvz 
 nneba 
 lrf 
 hu yrg zr nfx lbh n dhrfgvba ubj pbzr lbh nfxrq ze naq zef frvasryq gb tb gb gur zhfrhz jvgu lbh 
 jryy gurl jrer va sebz bhg bs gbja v gubhtug gurl jbhyq rawbl vg 
 huhu hz lbh qvqa'g srry hapbzsbegnoyr fcraqvat gur jubyr qnl ng gur zhfrhz jvgu gjb pbzcyrgr fgenatref jub jrer zber guna gjvpr lbhe ntr 
 ab vg jnf sha 
 lbh unq sha jvgu ze naq zef frvasryq 
 lrn gurl obhtug zr n pbxr 
 fb ubj'q lbh pbzr hc jvgu gur vqrn sbe gur oryg-yrff gerapu pbng 
 v pnzr ubzr bar avtug naq v gevccrq bire bar bs wreel'f gblf  fb v gbbx bhg zl oryg whfg gb guerngra uvz naq v tbg n tyvzcfr bs zlfrys va gur zveebe 
 ubj freraqvcvgbhf 
 fb gung avtug v phg bss gur ybbcf naq gur rkrphgvir jnf obea 
 zzz

 jub qvrq

 jung obkrf 
 v'z tbaan rkcynva jung obkrf 
 nyevtug ubj gur uryy qb v xabj 
 naljnl gurer ner gurfr guerr ovt obkrf lbh pna'g zvff gurz v jnag lbh gb fuvc gurz urer gb arj lbex sbe zr 
 v gubhtug lbh'er tbvat gb cnevf 
 v'z fgvyy tbvat gb cnevf v tbg n ovt qrny pbbxvat urer 
 jung'f va gur obkrf 
 envapbngf 
 envapbngf  lbh guvax lbh'er tbaan fryy gubfr byq penccl envapbngf gung'f tneontr 
 v thnenagrr lbh qbevf vf abg yrggvat uvz znvy gubfr obkrf 
 jura qb lbh jnag gurfr 
 fraq gurz gbzbeebj 
 lbh guvax gurl'er pbzvat gbavtug 
 v qhaab gurl fnvq znlor 
 bs pbhefr gurl'er pbzvat gurl'er yrnivat fbba vs gurl qba'g pbzr gbavtug gurl zvtug abg frr hf 
 jryy gurl orggre pbzr v tbg nyy guvf cnryyn 
 v nqzver zbegl naq uryra tbvat gb senapr jr fubhyq gnxr n gevc znlor n pehvfr 
 lrf n pehvfr n ybat pehvfr whfg gur gjb bs lbh 
 trbetvr jung jrer lbh qbvat cbxvat nebhaq gur nggvp ynfg avtug 
 v-v jnfa'g va gur nggvp 
 v urneq abvfr 
 znlor vg jnf n zbhfr 
  bx gung'f vg jr'er zbivat 
 jung 
 v jvyy abg gbyrengr vasrfgngvba 
 lbh unira'g rira frra bar 
 qba'g lbh haqrefgnaq gur irel gubhtug gur irel vqrn v'yy arire or pbzsbegnoyr ntnva 
 nyevtug senax gung'f rabhtu 
 v thrff v'ir orra unatvat ba gb gurz sbe fb ybat phm v pbhyqa'g npprcg gur snpg gung qnq jnf ernyyl tbar sberire  
 hu uhu 
 gurl jvyy trg n tbbq ubzr jba'g gurl 
 ybbx v tbggn or ubarfg jvgu lbh gurer'f abguvat urer gbb fcrpgnphyne 
 bu v ort gb qvssre zl sngure gbbx terng cevqr va uvf nccrnenapr ur jnf n irel unaqfbzr zna n pnfnabin ernyyl 
 v'yy tvir lbh hu gjb-uhaqerq qbyynef sbe gur guerr obkrf 
 pbhyq lbh znxr vg gjb-gjragl-svir gung jnf uvf uv-tnzr va objyvat 
 lrn v'z va n tbbq zbbq urer 
 gunax lbh

 bu v tbgpun  
  gung'yy qb

 qvaare

 bbbb obl v'ir arire frra gurfr orsber

 hu uhu 
 fb ner gurl pbzvat gbavtug be abg

 jung vf gung naljnl 
 vg'f n fcnavfu qvfu vg'f n zbhyntr bs svfu na zrng jvgu evpr irel gnfgl 
 v-v'yy gryy 'rz 
 url pbhyq lbh qb bar bgure guvat sbe zr 
 anzr vg 
 lbh guvax lbhe cneragf jbhyq unir nal bowrpgvbaf gb gnxvat n yvggyr xvq gb cnevf jvgu gurz  vg gheaf bhg gung gur xvq'f sngure yvirf va cnevf  vf gung n pbvapvqrapr  ru lbh xabj nyrp jnagf zr gb gnxr uvz bire gurer fb v svther nf ybat nf gurl'er tbvat  
 fb lbh gubhtug nf ybat nf gurl'er znvyvat cbfgpneqf vg jbhyqa'g or gbb zhpu gb nfx zl cneragf gb qent n puvyq jub gurl'ir arire frra guebhtu gur fgerrgf bs cnevf 
  nyevtug vs lbh guvax vg'f gbb zhpu gurl qba'g unir gb znvy gur cbfgpneqf 
 fb jurer'f ur gnxvat lbh 
 jryy svefg jr'er tbvat gb n zngvar v'z gnxvat gur nsgreabba bss jr'er tbaan tb frr "zl snve ynql" naq gurl jr ner tbaan tb gb qvaare ur xabjf nyy gurfr snagnfgvp cynprf

 lbh tbggn wvttyr vg n yvggyr ovg v wvttyrq vg v wvttyrq vg sbe svsgrra zvahgrf

 lbh'er zbgure naq v ner cynaavat ba gnxvat n pehvfr

 yvxr gung

  gur oynpx naq juvgr 
 gur jubyr zbivr jnf va oynpx naq juvgr 
 bu lrn v qvqa'g rira ernyvmr 
 lbh qba'g rira guvax nobhg vg gurer'f fb zhpu tbvat ba 
 ln ln v gryy ln v pbhyq frr vg ntnva 
 fb xybzchf unf gur xrl ohg gur wrex pbhyqa'g bcra vg hc nyy lbh tbggn qb vg wvttyr vg  whf trg vg va gurer  wvtt wvtt wvttyr ervttyr 
 ybbx v svaq guvf jubyr guvat irel havagrerfgvat jura lbh trg gur pbngf pbzr va 
 url jung ntnva 
 v'z gelvat gb ohl fbzr bs gur pybgurf onpx  url lbh jnaan pbzr bire sbe qvaare gbavtug zl zbgure znqr nyy guvf rkgen cnryyn 
 cnryyn ln v'yy or gurer 
 nccneragyl gur frvasryqf' ner gbb tbbq sbe hf v fubhyqa'g fnl nalguvat onq nobhg lbhe hu lbhe cnegare 
 ab ab lbh xabj jr'er abg cnegaref v bayl trg gjragl-svir creprag 
 gjragl-svir creprag vg jnf lbhe vqrn 
 lnc v xabj 
 lbh'er qbvat nyy gur yrt jbex 
 gung'f evtug 
 ur'f evccvat lbh bss 
 lbh'er evtug ur'f evccvat zr bss 
 vs nalobql fubhyq or trggvat zber vg'f lbh 
 ur'f evccvat zr bss 
 jryy qba'g yrg uvz gnxr nqinagntr bs lbh yvxr gung 
 lnu  
  bu vg'f lbh lbh'er gur bar jub fbyq zr gur zbgu evqqra pnonan penc 
 lbh xabj v'ir orra guvaxvat jul vf xenzre trggvat gjragl-svir creprag 
 jryy ur gbyq lbh nobhg gur cynpr 
 fb jung jul vf gung jbegu gjragl-svir creprag vg'f n svaqref srr lbh xabj jung n svaqref srr vf 
 lbh svaq fbzrguvat lbh trg n srr 
 svaqre'f srr vf gra creprag naq ab zber 
 jryy vg'f gbb yngr abj 
 gubfr ner zl pbngf v fnirq gurz v fgberq gurz v'ir orra jnvgvat lrnef sbe guvf cnl bss 
 jryy lbh'er abg tbaan fnl nalguvat 
 v'ir orra guvaxvat nobhg fbzrguvat 
 ln fb unir v 
 nuu v qba'g guvax gur qrny vf snve 
 lbh qba'g guvax vg'f snve 
 ab ab v sbhaq gur cynpr v frg gur jubyr guvat hc v'z qbvat nyy gur yrt jbex 
 jung yrt jbex 
 bu gurer'f yrt jbex 
 vs nalguvat lbh'er trggvat gbb zhpu 
 gbb zhpu 
 gung'f evtug gurl'er zl pbngf 
 ybbx v jnag guvegl-svir creprag 
 v'z guvaxvat zber yvxr svsgrra 
 ab jnl v'z gnxvat svsgrra 
 jryy lbh'er abg trggvat guvegl-svir 
 nyevtug yrg'f pbzcebzvfr gjragl-svir creprag 
 bx vg'f n qrny 
 zbguf ner n qvfpbhentr gb zl ohfvarff nyy vg gnxrf vf bar zbgu gb ynl rttf lbh xabj jung unccraf gb gur yneinr gurl ungpu naq gurl'er rireljurer 
 v'z fbeel hzz ur-urer'f lbhe zbarl onpx  v-v-v'yy unir gur pybgurf 
  vg'f nyernql chg n qrag va zl shzvtngvba ovyy 
 fb hu jurer ner gur pybgurf 
 v ohearq 'rz 
 bu gung'f tbbq 
 a-v xabj gurl'er lbhe cneragf wreel na' gurl'er irel avpr crbcyr ohg qba'g lbh guvax vg'f bqq gung n guvegl-svir lrne byq zna vf tbvat gb gurfr yratguf gb frr gung fbzrbar ryfr'f cneragf ner rawblvat gurzfryirf v zrna qba'g lbh svaq gung noabezny 
 vg vf n gnq nfxrj 
 v zrna gurl'er lbhe cneragf naq lbh qba'g qb nalguvat fb jul vf guvf fgenatre qbvat vg 
 v'ir uneqyl orra bhg gb qvaare jvgu gurz 
 frr frr v pna'g rira fnl nalguvat lbh xabj orpnhfr nyy ur'f ernyyl qbvat vf orvat avpr ohg ohg xabj obql vf guvf avpr guvf vf yvxr pregvsvnoyl avpr 
 lbh'er evtug ur'f vafnar 
 lrf ur'f vafnar gung'f jung v guvax 
 fb jung ner lbh tbvat gb qb 
 v qba'g xabj v qba'g xabj jung gb qb  bu tbq fb ubj jnf gur zbivr 
 hu sebz jung v fnj vg jnf cerggl tbbq 
 ln jung qb lbh zrna sebz jung lbh fnj 
 jryy v hz v qvqa'g nu npghnyyl trg gb frr gur jubyr zbivr 
 lrn jul abg 
 v jnf xvaq bs hz  znxvat bhg 
  lbh jrer znxvat bhg qhevat fpuvaqyre'f yvfg

 qhevat fpuvaqyre'f yvfg 
  jr'er obgu yvivat jvgu bhe cneragf

 jung

 uryyb 
 uryyb zbegl yvfgra gung xrl qbrfa'g jbex vg'f ab tbbq 
 lbh qvqa'g trg va 
 bu v tbg va v unq gb oernx gur jvaqbj jvgu n ebpx naq gura v tbg zl unaq nyy phg hc ernpuvat va

 ur oebxr gur jvaqbj 
 lbh jnagrq gubfr qnza obkrf qvqa'g lbh 
  ur fubhyq or ba uvf unaqf naq xarrf gunaxvat lbh 
 qvq lbh fraq gurz 
 lrn gurl'yy or gurer gbzbeebj nsgreabba gjb b'pybpx 
 gbzbeebj nsgreabba 
 gbzbeebj nsgreabba 
 gbzbeebj nsgreabba 
 v gbyq lbh gb fraq gurz rkcerff 
 j-jryy vg jnf gra qbyynef purncre va gur nsgreabba guna gur zbeavat v svtherq jung gur uryy'f gur qvssrerapr 
 fb jung qvq lbh qb nobhg gur jvaqbj 
 v tbggn svk lbhe jvaqbj abj 
 nyevtug nyevtug tbbqolr  v qba'g guvax jr ner tbaan znxr gung syvtug 
 j-jung qb lbh zrna lbh'er abg znxvat gur syvtug 
 jr unir gb znxr gur syvtug jr'er jvgu n punegre tebhc vs jr qba'g gur gevc vf bss 
 jryy jung'f gur qvssrerapr jr'yy tb fbzr cynpr ryfr 
 fbzr cynpr ryfr jung nobhg cnevf 
 lbh qba'g haqrefgnaq v'ir pbzr guvf sne v pna'g fgbc abj 
 v pna'g oryvrir gung lbh'er qbvat nyy guvf whfg gb fryy fbzr fghcvq envapbngf 
 lbh qba'g haqrefgnaq snfuvba vf plpyvpny guvf guvat pbhyq pbzr onpx 
 v guvax lbh'er bhg bs lbhe zvaq 
 v whfg qba'g haqrefgnaq ubj nyy gubfr pybgurf pna qvfnccrne 
 zbguf 
 zbguf ngr guerr obkrf 
 jryy lbh xabj jung unccraf jvgu yneinr ungpu gurl-gurl'er rireljurer 
 lbh xabj v jnf guvaxvat gbqnl v arire yvxrq gubfr frvasryqf naljnl ur'f na vqvbg nyy gbtrgure  nu gurer'f xenzre 
  uryyb 
 uryyb 
  urybjjjbjjbj  url  un un tbbq riravat  
 ubcr lbh'er uhatel  
 bbb cnryyn 
 url hu yrg zr gnxr lbh'er pbng 
  bu ln gunaxf ohqql 
 gung fuveg jurer'q lbh trg gung fuveg 
 jun 
 gung'f zl pnonan fuveg lbh fgbyr zl fuveg lbh fba bs n ovgpu  trbetr lbh yrg lbhe sevraqf tb hc va zl nggvp naq fgrny zl pybgurf  tvzzr gung onpx 
  jbnu 
 qnq 
  v obhtug vg sebz ehql 
 ehql gung fxhax v xarj ur qvqa'g ohea gubfr pybgurf 
 jub'f ehql jung pybgurf 
 v fbyq lbhe pybgurf lrfgreqnl 
 lbh fbyq zl pybgurf  jung qb lbh zrna lbh fbyq zl pybgurf 
 v qvqa'g guvax lbh jber gurz nalzber 
 vg'f pehvfr jrne 
 xenzre v ybir gung fuveg 
 lnln 
 gung'f orpnhfr vg'f zvar 
 lbh ybbx whfg yvxr senax ba bhe ubarlzbba 
 bu jryy gunax lbh 
 jub'f guvf ehql 
 jryy ehql'f gur thl ohlvat zbegl'f envapbngf 
 zbegl frvasryq ur'f n ohz 
 jryy gur jubyr qrny tbvat qbja gbzbeebj zbegl'f tbaan zvff uvf cynar sbe vg 
 zvffvat uvf cynar jnfa'g gung n punegre syvtug 
 lrn 
 jung unccraf gb punegre gvpxrgf jura lbh qba'g hfr rz 
 jryy v fhccbfr gurl ner jnfgrq 
 lrf v fhccbfr gurl ner 
 gbzbeebj v'z tbvat fgenvtug qbja gb guvf ehql naq trg zl pybgurf 
 n zbhfr 
 lbh jnag gur gvpxrgf 
 lrf 
 lbh'er tbaan gnxr guvf xvq gb cnevf 
 url v trg n serr gevc gb cnevf v tb va gur ovt oebgure'f unyy-bs-snzr v znvy zl bja cbfgpneqf 
 lbh xabj v'z cnlvat sbe gurfr gvpxrgf 
 vg'f nyevtug v tbg yhapu 
 bu lbh fubhyq unir tbar gb gur pbfgnamnf' sbe qvaare zzz gur cnryyn jnf zntavsvprag unir lbh rire unq ernyyl tbbq cnryyn 
 abg ernyyl 
 bu vg'f n betvnfgvp srnfg sbe gur frafrf gur jnag naq gur srfgviny gur fvgrf fbhaqf naq pbybef na zzzhzzhzz zhzz 
 url qnq ner lbh fher jr ner ng gur evtug pnebhfry 
 guvf vf vg 
 fb ubj zhpu ner jr tbaan znxr 
 gnxr vg rnfl v'ir orra guebhtu n zvyyvba bs gurfr artbgvngvbaf 
 jun gjb gubhfnaq guerr gubhfnaq 
 gung'f tvivat vg njnl guvf vf n bar bs n xvaq vgrz 
 zber zber guna guerr gubhfnaq 
 whfg jngpu zr qb zl guvat 
 fnl qnq  vfa'g gung bar bs lbhef 
 ybbx ng guvf ybbx ng ubj guvf vqvbg cnpxrq vg ur qvqa'g gncr vg ur whfg syvccrq gur syncf  xenzre lbh zvffrq n pbhcyr 
 oba-wbhe jrypbzr gb gur tngrjnl gb cnevf punegre syvtug 
  qnq vfa'g gung lbhe punegre tebhc 
 ubarfgl uneq-jbex gurfr ner gur inyhrf gung v jnf envfrq ba gur zbfg vzcbegnag guvat wbrl vf gb or noyr gb ybbx lbhefrys va gur zveebe orsber lbh tb gb fyrrc ng avtug 
 url v tbg arjf sbe lbh sbhe rlrf gurer'f ab jnl lbh'er fgnlvat jvgu hf va cnevf 
 lbh ohearq gurz gubfr pybgurf ner abg lbhef gb ohea 
 jub ner lbh naljnlf 
 v'z gur sngure 
 ur fnvq uvf sngure jnf qrnq 
 ur fnvq v jnf qrnq 
 gung'f evtug fdhrrmrq na rkgen gjragl-svir qbyynef bhg bs zr 
 gung'f jung zl yvsr vf jbegu gb uvz gjragl-svir qbyynef 
 url senax 
 bu v whfg jnag gb lbh xabj v'z ergenpgvat bhe qvaare vaivgngvba 
 jryy lbh qba'g unir gb ergenpg vg orpnhfr jr arire jrag 
 v'z ergenpgvat gung vg jnf rire bssrerq 
 v ergenpg lbhe ergenpgvba 
 bu lbh gelvat gb haybnq fbzr bs gung whax bs lbhef 
 jbhyq lbh rkphfr zr cyrnfr jr'er pbaqhpgvat ohfvarff urer 
 lbh pna xrrc lbhe envapbngf v'z abg vagrerfgrq 
 v gubhtug jr unq n qrny 
 gung'f nabgure bar bs zl fuvegf 
 v'z abg ohlvat nalzber pybgurf sebz nalbar bss gur fgerrg 
 jub'f bss gur fgerrg v'z va gur envapbng ohfvarff sbe guvegl-svir lrnef 
 ln ubj qb v xabj gurer nera'g zbguf yvxr uvf fghss 
 zl pybgurf qba'g unir zbguf 
 orpnhfr bs uvf zbguf lbh'er abg ohlvat zl envapbngf 
 gung'f evtug 
  v'z nyy gvpxyvfu  
 syvtug-433 abj obneqvat sbe zvnzv tngr 18n syvtug-433 abj obneqvat 
 bx yrg'f tb 
  vg jnf fb avpr bs lbh gb pbzr gb gur nvecbeg gb frr hf bss 
 ner lbh fher lbh pna'g fgnl n yvggyr ybatre

 bx 
 olr 
 olr 
 nneba nneba ner lbh bx 
 v pbhyq'ir qbar zber v pbhyq'ir qbar fb zhpu zber 
 lbh qvq rabhtu 
  ab v pbhyq'ir pnyyrq gur geniry ntrapl tbg gurz ba nabgure syvtug gb cnevf v pbhyqn tbg gurz bhg 
 lbh gevrq nneba vg jnf gbb rkcrafvir 
  guvf jngpu guvf jngpu pbhyq'ir cnvq sbe gurve jubyr gevc  guvf evat guvf evat vf bar zber qvaare v pbhyq'ir gnxra gurz bhg gb  jngre gurl arrq fbzr jngre  
 jul 
  gurl'yy trg qrulqengrq ba gur cynar trg gur frvasryqf fbzr jngre cyrnfr cyrnfr 
 uv ze tbyqfgrva vf enpury ubzr 
 v'z nsenvq enpury'f abg tbvat gb or noyr gb frr lbh gbavtug be nal bgure avtug sbe gung znggre 
 jul jung qvq v qb 
  lbh xabj irel jryy v urneq nobhg lbhe orunivbe ng gur zbivrf gur bgure avtug vg jnf qvftenprshy lbh fubhyq or nfunzrq bs lbhefrys v sbe bar jvyy abg nyybj zl qnhtugre gb or vaibyirq jvgu fbzrbar bs fhpu jrnx zbeny svore sbeghangryl zl cbfgzna unccrarq gb unir jvgarffrq gur ragver vapvqrag n urnil frg sryybj v oryvrir ur yvirf va lbhe ohvyqvat  abj vs lbh qba'g zvaq  
 enpury 
  tbbq avtug 
 enpury 
 fb zl cneragf trg ubzr gurl bcra gur qbbe zl sngure syvpxf gur yvtug ba gur jubyr cynpr vf pyrnarq bhg rirelguvat 
 nnuu  trg bhg ubj qvq vg unccra 
 gur oebxra jvaqbj xybzchf arire svkrq vg gurl whfg jnyxrq evtug va 
 bbuu obl gurl pbhyq hfr n inpngvba

  fb ubj nobhg gung nneba 
 jurj

  wreel wreel 
 jurer gur uryy vf lbhe sngure 
 guvf vf gur orfg guvat jr rire qvq 
 v whfg ubcr gubfr rkgrezvangbef xabj jung gurl'er qbvat 
 nu sbetrg nobhg gurz yrg'f whfg 
 gurfr ner terng whfg terng ernyyl terng ernyyl ernyyl terng qba'g lbh guvax fb rynvar 
 lrnu ernyyl terng 
 bu n pbssrr gnoyr obbx nobhg pbssrr gnoyrf  ubj qvq lbh pbzr hc jvgu guvf vqrn 
 vg jnf gurer 
 bu ybbx ng guvf bar vg'f fnlvat 'v'z n pbssrr gnoyr chg fbzr pbssrr ba zr bu gur ubggre gur orggre gung'f jung v'z urer sbe'  
 lbh xabj npghnyyl v'ir tbg fbzr jbex v tbggn qb fb 
 url ubj nobhg vs gur obbx pnzr jvgu gurfr yvggyr sbyq-bhg yrtffb gur obbx vgfrys orpbzrf n pbssrr gnoyr 
 buuu gung vf n terng vqrn ernyyl ernyyl terng 
 'bbbu naq gung pbssrr gnoyr vf fnlvat chg fbzr pbssrr ba zr' v'q yvxr gb chg fbzr pbssrr ba ure ubg fpnyqvat pbssrr - evtug va ure snpr v fjrne guvf vf yvxr jbexvat jvgu n pbagrfgnag sebz "gur cevpr vf evtug"  
 lrnu gung'f erny vagrerfgvat rynvar yvfgra gryy zr vs lbh guvax guvf vf shaal -  "zra qrsvavgryl uvg gur erzbgr zber guna jbzrazra qba'g pner jung'f ba gi zra bayl pner jung ryfr vf ba gi jbzra jnag gb frr jung gur fubj vf orsber gurl punatr gur punaary orpnhfr zra uhag naq jbzra arfg" 
 lrnu vg'f shaal v qhaab 
 lbh qba'g xabj pbzr ba gung'f tbyq 
 jryy v qba'g xabj nobhg "tbyq" 
 bu gung'f tbyq onol 
 'onol' jung ner lbh qbvat trbetr abj 
 v jnf fnlvat 'onol' jnl orsber trbetr 
 jryy v qba'g xabj qba'g nfx zr nal zber dhrfgvbaf nobhg wbxrf wreel vg whfg chgf gbb zhpu cerffher ba zr 
 jryy guvf thl yrbaneq puevfgvna'f tbaan or gurer gbzbeebj avtug 
 lrnu jub'f ur 
 ur'f n jevgre sebz ragregnvazrag jrrxyl  v jbhyq yvxr gb unir n tbbq fubj 
 qnaxr fpubra zl yvggyr qhzcyvatf 
 uv 
 url ubj nobhg gung gbol uhu 
 lrnu ubj nobhg ure 
 bbu fur'f n cnpxntr shyy bs raretl 
 lrnu fur'f n cnpxntr shyy bs fbzrguvat 
 lrnu naq gung fbzrguvat vf yvsr wreel lbh tbggn zrrg guvf tny - fur'f oevzzva' jvgu cbfvgvivgl 
 bu cyrrrrrnfr  
 url ner lbh cresbezvat gbzbeebj 
 lrnu 
 terng v'z tbaan oevat gbol 
 jryy lbh orggre ynhtu 'pnhfr v'z orvat erivrjrq yrbaneq puevfgvna'f tbaan or gurer 
 bu fur'f n terng ynhture - evtug rynvar 
 bu lrnu fur'f n terng ynhture wreel  ernyyl ernyyl terng 
 jryy lbh jnag gb fvg jvgu trbetr v guvax ur'f pbzvat jvgu ebova 
 vf gung gur jnvgerff sebz gur pbzrql pyho 
 lrnu 
 bu 
 jung nobhg ure xvq vf fur oevatvat uvz gbb 
 fur'f tbg n xvq 
 lrnu lbh fubhyq frr trbetr trg nybat jvgu guvf xvq 
 bj jung ner lbh qbvat haqre gurer url fgbc gung qba'g rng gung gung'f abg sbbq  ur'f fhpxva' qbja rdhny cnpxrgf 
 qb lbh guvax 25 xvqf vf gbb zhpu 
 25 xvqf sbe uvf oveguqnl cnegl  qba'g chg lbhe gbathr ba gur sybbe ur'f chggvat uvf gbathr ba gur sybbe urer urer unir fbzr zber fhtne cnpxrgf  
 fb jung nobhg ragregnvazrag  fubhyq v trg onearl 
 ab onearl 
 znlor n pybja 
 ubj nobhg obmb 
 jub'f obmb

 trbetr 
 jvgu gur benatr unve naq gur ovt pybja fuveg jvgu gur ehssyrf 
 trbetr 
 ur unq n gi fubj ur unq pnegbbaf 
 trbetr sbetrg obmb trbetr obmb'f bhg ur'f svavfurq vg'f bire sbe obmb 
 lbh xabj jura v jnf n xvq jr qvqa'g unir gurfr rynobengr oveguqnl cnegvrf j-jvgu pngrerq sbbq naq ragregnvazrag v erzrzore zl 7gu oveguqnl cnegl 
 oybj bhg gur pnaqyrf oybj bhg gur pnaqyrf v fnvq oybj bhg gur qnza pnaqyrf 
 fgbc vg senax lbh'er xvyyvat uvz

 anu v unir nfguzn

 ubj ner lbh qbvat gbqnl 
 svar  ubj ner lbh

 abcr 
 ur vf tbvat gb xabcc ur vf tbvat gb or n ivpr cerfvqrag 
 xabcc ernyyl obl gung zrnaf gurer'f na bcravat urer sbe fravbe rqvgbeunf yvcczna hu uverq nalbar 
 ab v urne ur jnagf gb cebzbgr fbzrbar va-ubhfr

 bujryy

 ab 
 ab ernyyl

 fher 
 obl jbhyqa'g gung or rkpvgvat 
 v zrna fgenatre guvatf unir unccrarq 
 jbj zr n fravbe rqvgbe  v'q yvxr gung 
 jryy lbh fubhyqa'g trg lbhe ubcrf hc gbol 
 jryy vg'f n cbffvovyvgl yvxr lbh fnvq fgenatre guvatf unir unccrarq gunax lbh rynvar gunax lbh  
 url ebaavr 
 url 
  pna v unir n pyho fbqn  tbva' ba gbavtug 
 lrnu lbh 
 lrnu 
 lbh xabj yrbaneq puevfgvna'f urer 
 lrnu v xabj 
 pna v nfx lbh fbzrguvat ner zl abfgevyf trggvat ovttre 
  v qba'gguvax fb 
 ner lbh fher gnxr n tbbq ybbx gurl frrz n yvggyr ovttre 
 v qba'gv qhaab 
 vf vg cbffvoyr sbe abfgevyf gb rkcnaq 
 bu vf guvf n ovg 
 url v qba'g qb "ovgf" v'z n cebc pbzvp qnzzvg v pna'g svaq zl jngre tha v pna'g tb ba jvgubhg zl jngre tha 
 url wreel 
  url 
 jryy urer'f gbol  wreel 
 guvf vf fb rkpvgvat ybbx v unir tbbfrohzcf  gbhpu gbhpu gurz  v'ir arire orra gb n pbzrql pyho orsber 
 ernyyl lbh xabj n ybg bs erfgnhenagf ner freivat oerjrq qrpns abj gbb 
 lbh ner fb shaal 
 bu lbh'yy unir n tbbq gvzr v fjrne 
 bu ur fjrnef yvxr ur guvaxf v qba'g oryvrir uvz v oryvrir lbh v oryvrir lbh bu ur'f fb shaal  
 jung nobhg zr 
 jung nobhg lbh  v'z bayl xvqqvat lbh'er shaal gbb v ybir gb ynhtu 
 tbbq tbbq 
 fb lbh hc arkg 
 lrnu jul qba'g lbh thlf trg n gnoyr fb lbh'yy unir tbbq frngf 
 bu lrnu jr qba'g jnag fbzr wrex fvggvat va sebag bs hf vg'yy or yvxr 'url ovt urnq pna lbh zbir bhg bs gur jnl v qvqa'g cnl n pbire punetr gb fgner ng lbhe onyq fcbg'  
 nyevtug fb lbh unir n tbbq fubj uhu ohqql 
 lrnu 
 bu unir n terng fubj url jr'yy znxr fher vg'f n terng fubj 
 bx tbbq v'yy frr lbh yngre  
 bu ur'f fb terng guvf vf fb terng v'z fb rkpvgrq 
 zra qrsvavgryl uvg gur erzbgr ohggba zber guna jbzra 
 bu ernyyl ernyyl gung vf fb gehr 
 lrf lrnufrr zra qba'g pner jung'f ba gi zra bayl pner jung ryfr vf ba gi

 url 
 url jung'f gur qrny jung jnf tbva' ba gurer v vaivgr lbh qbja urer v unir na vzcbegnag fubj naq fur urpxyrf zr 
 ybbx fur qvqa'g zrna nalguvat 
 jryy jung vf gur znggre jvgu ure vf fur penml 
 fur'f whfg orvat raguhfvnfgvp gung'f nyy 
 url jung vf jebat jvgu lbh 
 zr abguvat'f jebat jvgu zr 
 l-lbh obb zr lbh uvff lbh qvqa'g fgbc oyngurevat guebhtubhg gur jubyr frg 
 bu pbzr ba v gubhtug lbh'er n ceb gung'f cneg bs gur fubj 
 ab abg cneg bs gur fubj obbvat naq uvffvat ner abg cneg bs gur fubj lbh obb chccrgf lbh uvff ivyynvaf va fvyrag zbivrf 
 jryy gung'f gur jnl v rkcerff zlfrys ubj ner lbh tbaan znxr vg va guvf ohfvarff vs lbh pna'g gnxr vg 
 bu v pna gnxr vg 
 yrg'f tb  
 url zna tbbq frg 
 obmb 
 ab 
 o-b-m-b 
 fbeel v 
 lbh'ir arire urneq bs obmb gur pybja 
 ab 
 ubj pbhyq lbh abg xabj jub obmb gur pybja vf 
 v qba'g xabj v whfg qba'g 
 ubj pna lbh pnyy lbhefrys n pybja naq abg xabj jub obmb vf 
 url zna - jung ner lbh unffyvat zr sbe guvf vf whfg n tvt vg'f abg zl yvsr v qba'g xabj jub obmb vf jung - vf ur n pybja 
 vf ur n pybja jung ner lbh xvqqvat zr 
 jryy jung vf ur 
 lrf ur'f n pybja 
 nyevtug fb jung'f gur ovt qrny gurer'f zvyyvbaf bs pybjaf 
 nyevtug whfg sbetrg vg 
 zr sbetrg vg lbh fubhyq sbetrg vg lbh'er yviva' va gur cnfg zna lbh'er uhat hc ba fbzr pybja sebz gur fvkgvrf zna 
 nyevtug irel tbbq irel tbbqtb sbyq lbhe yvggyr onyybba navznyf revp revp  jung xvaq bs anzr vf gung sbe n pybja uhu 
 rkphfr zrlbh zhfg or trbetr v'z ebova'f zbgure bu lbh frrz yvxr fhpu n ybiryl lbhat zna 
 jryy v qb jung v pna  
 uv zbz ubj'f rirelguvat 
 bu guvf vf whfg n jbaqreshy cnegl 
 gur ohetref fubhyq or ernql va n zvahgr 
 nu terng terng  jung'f gung fzryy fzbxr  url rirelobql v guvax v fzryy fbzr fzbxr onpx urer sver sver trg bhg bs gur jnl 
 vg jnf na vasreab va gurer na vasreab  
 gurer ur vf gung'f uvz  
 gung'f gur pbjneq gung yrsg hf gb qvr 
 vjnf gelvat gb yrnq gur jnl jr arrqrq n yrnqre fbzrbar gb yrnq gur jnl gb fnsrgl 
 ohg lbh lryyrq "trg bhg bs zl jnl" 
 orpnhfr orpnhfr nf gur yrnqrevs v qvrgura nyy ubcr vf ybfg jub jbhyq yrnq gur pybja vafgrnq bs pnfgvtngvat zr lbh fubhyq nyy or gunaxvat zr jung xvaq bs n gbcfl-gheil jbeyq qb jr yvir va jurer-jurer urebrf ner pnfg nf ivyynvaf oenir zra nf pbjneqf 
 ohg v fnj lbh chfu gur jbzra naq puvyqera bhg bs gur jnl va n znq cnavp v fnj lbh xabpx gurz qbja naq jura lbh ena bhg lbh yrsg rirelbar oruvaq 
 frrzvatyl frrzvatyl gb gur hagenvarq rlr v pna shyyl haqrefgnaq ubj lbh tbg gung vzcerffvba jung ybbxrq yvxr chfuvatjung ybbxrq yvxr xabpxvat qbjajnf n fnsrgl cerpnhgvba va n sver lbh fgnl pybfr gb gur tebhaq nz v evtug naq jura v ena bhg gung qbbe v jnf abg yrnivat nalbar oruvaq bu dhvgr gur pbagenel v evfxrq zl yvsr znxvat fher gung rkvg jnf pyrne nal bgure dhrfgvbaf 
 ubj qb lbh yvir jvgu lbhefrys 
 vgf abg rnfl 
 fb fur qbrfa'g jnag gb frr zr nalzber 
 qvq lbh xabpx ure bire gbb be whfg gur xvqf 
 ab ure gbb naq ure zbgure 
 ernyyl ure zbgure 
 lrnu v znl unir fgrccrq ba ure nez gbb v qba'g xabj 
 lbh cebonoyl pbhyqa'g frr orpnhfr bs gur fzbxr 
 lrnu ohg vg jnf fbzrobql'f nez 
 uzz fb lbh srry "jbzra naq puvyqera svefg" va guvf qnl naq ntr vf fbzrjung bs na nagvdhngrq abgvba 
 gb fbzr qrterr 
 fb onfvpnyyl vg'f rirel zna jbzna puvyq naq vainyvq sbe gurzfryirf 
 va n znaare bs fcrnxvat 
 lrnu jryy vg'f ubarfg 
 lrnu fur fubhyq or pbzzraqvat zr sbe gerngvat rirelbar yvxr rdhnyf 
 jryy creuncf jura fur'f eryrnfrq sebz gur ohea pragre fur'yy frr guvatf qvssreragyl 
 creuncf 
 fb jung jnf gur sver whfg n pbhcyr bs ternfl unzohetref 
 lrnu revp gur pybja chg vg bhg jvgu uvf ovt fubr 
 ol gur jnl qvq lbh frr guvf  
 jung'f gung 
 vg'f gur yrbaneq puevfgvna negvpyr nobhg zl fubj cyhf zl tvt va zvnzv tbg pnapryyrq v orgpun vg'f orpnhfr bs gur negvpyr 
 jbj ur ernyyl qbrf n ahzore ba lbh  "frvasryq sebmr yvxr n qrre va gur urnqyvtugf va gur snpr bs vaprffnag urpxyvat" 
 v fubhyq unir yrg ure unir vg v uryq onpx orpnhfr bs xenzre 
 lbh xabj jung lbh bhtugn qb lbh fubhyq tb gb ure bssvpr naq urpxyr ure 
 lrnu evtug 
 lbh xabj yvxr nyy gur pbzrqvnaf nyjnlf fnl 'ubj jbhyq lbh yvxr vg vs v pnzr gb jurer lbh jbex naq urpxyrq lbh' 
 lrnu gung'q or fbzrguvat 
 v'z abg xvqqvat lbh fubhyq qb vg 
 ohg jbhyqa'g gung or gur hygvzngr pbzrqvna'f eriratr v'ir nyjnlf unq n snagnfl nobhg qbvat gung 
 jryy tb nurnq qb vg 
 jul pna'g v 
 ab ernfba 
 lbh xabj jung v guvax v'z tbaan qb gung fur pnzr qbja gb jurer v jbex v'yy tb qbja gb jurer fur jbexf 
 guvf vf hacerprqragrq 
 gurer'f ab cerprqrag onol 
 jungner lbh hfvat zl onovrf abj 
 url avpr fubrf jung lbh jrne fnaqnyf gb jbex vg'f nyjnlf avpr gb jnyx vagb n ebbz naq trg gur nebzn bs srrg gung'f erny pbaqhpvir gb gur jbex ngzbfcurer v'z fher lbhe pb-jbexref ernyyl nccerpvngr vg 'url yrg'f tb rng va gbol'f bssvpr terng vqrn jr pna purpx ba ure ohavbaf' 
 lbh xabj v unir jbex gb qb urer v'z irel ohfl 
 bu vf guvf qvfehcgvir lbh svaq vg uneq gb jbex jvgu fbzrbarvagreehcgvat 
 jryy ubj jbhyq lbh yvxr vg vs v pnyyrq frphevgl 
 frphevgl jryy v qba'g xabj ubj lbh'er tbaan znxr vg va guvf ohfvarff vs lbh pna'g gnxr vg ln tbggn or gbhtu obbb obbbb 
 ab  gung'f vg  trg bhg bs gur jnl 
 url jung'f tbvat ba 
 obb 
 jung'f unccrava' urer 
 uvff 
  gbol gbol 
  zl cvaxl gbr 
  gbol  bu bu 
 jung qvq lbh tb hc gurer gb urpxyr ure sbe 
 orpnhfr fur pnzr qbja gb gur pyho naq urpxyrq zr tvir ure n gnfgr bs ure bja zrqvpvar  
 bu lrnu lbh tnir ure n gnfgr bs zrqvpvar nyevtug 
 jryy v qvqa'g jnag ure gb unir na nppvqrag 
 jung nppvqrag 
 jryy nsgre ur urpxyrq gbol fur tbg fb hcfrg fur ena bhg bs gur ohvyqvat naq n fgerrg fjrrcre ena bire ure sbbg naq frirerq ure cvaxl gbr 
 gung'f haoryvrinoyr 
 lrnu gura nsgre gur nzohynapr yrsg v sbhaq gur gbr fb v chg vg va n penpxre wnpx obk svyyrq vg jvgu vpr naq gbbx bss sbe gur ubfcvgny 
 jun lbh ena 
 ab v whzcrq ba gur ohf v gbyq gur qevire "v tbg n gbr urer ohqql - fgrc ba vg" 
 ubyl pbj 
 lrnu lrnu gura nyy bs n fhqqra guvf thl chyyf bhg n tha jryy v xarj nal qrynl vf tbaan pbfg ure ure cvaxl gbr fb v tbg bhg bs gur frng naq v fgnegrq jnyxvat gbjneqf uvz ur fnlf "jurer qb lbh guvax lbh'er tbvat penpxre wnpx" v fnvq "jryy v tbg n yvggyr cevmr sbe ln ohqql - "  - xabpxrq uvz bhg pbyq 
 ubj pbhyq lbh qb gung 
 gura rirelobql vf fpernzva' orpnhfr gur qevire ur'f cnffrq bhg sebz nyy gur pbzzbgvbagur ohf vf bhg bs pbageby fb v teno uvz ol gur pbyyne v gnxr uvz bhg bs gur frng v trg oruvaq gur jurry naq abj v'z qeviva' gur ohf 
 lbh'er ongzna 
 lrnu lrnu v nz ongzna gura gur zhttre ur pbzrf gb naq ur fgnegf pubxva' zr fb v'z svtugva' uvz bss jvgu bar unaq naq v xrcg qeviva' gur ohf jvgu gur bgure l'xabj gura v znantrq gb bcra hc gur qbbe naq v xvpxrq uvz bhg gur qbbe lbh xabj jvgu zl sbbg lbh xabj - ng gur arkg fgbc 
 lbh xrcg znxva' nyy gur fgbcf 
 jryy crbcyr xrcg evatva' gur oryy 
 jryy jun-jung nobhg gur gbr jung unccrarq gb gur gbr 
 jryy v nz unccl gb fnl gung gur yvggyr thl vf onpx va cynpr ng gur raq bs gur yvar 
 lbh qvq nyy guvfsbe n cvaxl gbr 
 jryy vg'f n inyhnoyr nccraqntr 
 fb xenzre sbhaq gur gbr naq gurl er-nggnpurq vg 
 ernyyl 
 lrn cbbe xvq jung na beqrny 
 naq lbh xabj ubj rkgerzryl frafvgvir fur vf 
 v xabj 
 fur'f tbaan arrq bhe shyy fhccbeg 
 lrnu evtug 
 ybbx jub'f urer gbol  
 gbol jung pna v qb pna v trg lbh fbzrguvat 
 bu ab ab gunax lbh

 bu jryy v pbhyq hfr fbzr pbssrr 
 fur tbg gur cebzbgvba 
 lrc 
 jul 
 v'yy gryy ln jul orpnhfr bs ure cvaxl gbr gung'f jul orpnhfr yvcczna sryg fb fbeel sbe ure ur qvqa'g jnag gb uheg ure srryvatf 
 gbb onq 
 fher gur cvaxl gbr vf phgr ohg v zrna jung vf vg vg'f hfryrff vg qbrf abguvat vg'f tbg gung yvggyr anvy gung vf whfg vzcbffvoyr gb phg jung qb jr arrq vg sbe 
 orpnhfr rynvar gung'f gur bar gung tbrf 'jrr-jrr-jrr nyy gur ubzr' 
 jul qba'g lbh whfg fuhg gur s- 
 url rynvar qvq lbh urne gur tbbq arjf gbol tbg cebzbgrq 
 lrf v urneq xenzre - v jbex gurer erzrzore 
 lrnu naq lbh xabj jung fur gbyq zr fur fnvq ure svefg beqre bs ohfvarff vf gb chg zl pbssrr gnoyr obbx vagb gur obbxfgberf nf fbba nf cbffvoyr 
 bu jbaqreshy 
 lbh xabj guebhtubhg guvf jubyr guvat fur nyjnlf xrcg n fzvyr ba ure snpr 
 bu bs pbhefr fur'f qrenatrq 
 v jrag qbja gb gur zntnmvar v cyrnqrq jvgu uvz gb pbzr naq frr zr ntnva svanyyl ur nterrq gb pbzr qbja gbavtug naq ur'f tbvat gb jevgr nabgure negvpyr 
 v urneq lbh jrag qbja gb fbzrobql'f bssvpr naq urpxyrq gurz 
 qnza evtug jr'ir orra yncqbtf ybat rabhtu 
 ubj pbhyq lbh qb gung v zrna rirelobql'f gnyxvat nobhg vg 
 lrnu jryy vg'f nobhg gvzr bar bs hf qerj n yvar va gur fnaq 
 wreel lbh'er yvxr ebfn cnexf lbh bcrarq gur qbbe sbe nyy bs hf v pna'g jnvg gvyy gur arkg gvzr fbzrbar urpxyrf zr 
 lrnu jryy vg jba'g or ybat 
 ynqvrf naq tragyrzra cyrnfr jrypbzr wreel frvasryq 
 tbggn tb  
 ebova ebova 
 trbetr jung vf vg v'z jbexvat 
 ebova yvfgra gb zr gur zbfg nznmvat guvat unf unccrarq xenzre unf bcrarq zl rlrf v guvax v'ir punatrq 
 jung ner lbh gnyxvat nobhg 
 bx 
 v zrna obmb gur pybjav zrna qbrf ur ernyyl arrq "gur pybja" va uvf gvgyr nf pybja obmb "gur" pybja ner jr tbvat gb pbashfr uvz jvgu obmb gur qvfgevpg nggbearl obmb gur cbcr gurer'f ab bgure obmb 
 lbh'yy frr guvatf jvyy or qvssrerag abj - vs lbh whfg tvir zr bar zber punapr 
 y-yvfgra yvfgrav tbggn guvax nobhg guvf  
 nyevtug ohg v'z frevbhf nobhg guvf 
 nyevtug unaq vg bire zna 
 gung'f jul zra uhag naq jbzra arfg 
 ur'f tbg n tha ur'f tbg n tha trg bhg bs gur jnl  
 trbetr guvf vf ebaavr xnlr 
 gur cebc pbzvp  bu uvv qvqa'g erpbtavmr lbh jungqvq lbh trg n unvephg 
 abfgevyf 
 trbetr - pbhyq v unir n jbeq 
 nyy evtug trg bss ng gur arkg rkvg 
 xenzre v'ir qevira gb rnfg unzcgba znal gvzrf v xabj gur rkvg 
 vg'f n terng ubhfr cbby fha qrpx lrnu v'yy or gurer 
  lbh fher jr'er znxva' gur evtug zbir 
 jr tbggn frr gur arj onol naljnl ng yrnfg jr'yy trg n jrrxraq va gur unzcgbaf bhg bs vg 
 qvqa'g gurl whfg unir n onol 
 gung jnf gjb lrnef ntb erzrzore 'wru-err lbh tbggn frr gur onl-orr lbh tbggn frr gur onl-orr' 
 vf vg cbffvoyr gurl'er whfg univat onovrf gb trg crbcyr gb ivfvg gurz 
 url wreel lbh rire jrne fvyx haqrejrne 
 ab 
 chg gung ba gur gbc bs lbhe yvfg 
 ab abg sbe zr n yvggyr gbb qryvtugshy jryy trbetr naq wnar fubhyq or nyzbfg gurer ol abj 
 bu vfa'g gung jrveq gung trbetr naq wnar unira'g unq frk lrg ohg gurl'er fcraqvat n jrrxraq gbtrgure 
 v xabj trbetr vf cerggl cyrnfrq nobhg vg vg'f yvxr fur fvtarq n yrggre bs vagrag 
 jura'f enpury pbzva' bhg 
 fur'f znxva' gur guerr b'pybpx genva 
 ure sngure vf fb eryvtvbhf v'z whfg nznmrq gung ur'f yrggvat lbh frr ure ntnva nsgre gung fpuvaqyre'f yvfg znxr-bhg frffvba 
 v obhtug uvz fbzr xvfuxn 
 jung'f gung 
 vg'f xvaq bs n fghssrq zrng guvat vfenryv fbyqvref pneel vg va pnfr gurl'er pncgherq oruvaq rarzl yvarf gurl rng vg naq vg xvyyf gurz 
 v arire gnfgrq n pbhtu zrqvpvar v qvqa'g ybir 
 zr gbb v ybir pbhtu zrqvpvar 
 lbh frr jr jrer znqr sbe rnpu bgure  vg'f nznmvat vs v ernpu bhg naq gbhpu ure oernfg evtug abg fur'q fpernz naq guebj zr bhg bs gur pne ohg ng guvf gvzr gbzbeebj v pbhyq gbhpu vg nyy v jnag 
 jung'f lbhe snibevgr 
 cbghffna rire gel vg jvgu pyho fbqn 
 ab 
 bu irel erserfuvat  frk vf yvxr wbvavat n cevingr pyho v'yy or gur fnzr zr gbzbeebj ohg fhqqrayl gur ab gerfcnffvat fvta jvyy or tbar 
 ner jr nyzbfg gurer 
 lrnu nobhg gra svsgrra zvahgrf ohg v unir gb fgbc ng n irtrgnoyr fgnaq 
 jung sbe 
 zl zbgure ybirf unzcgba gbzngbrf fur'f ahgf sbe unzcgba gbzngbrf 
 pna lbh ohl 'rz yngre v ernyyl jnaan trg fbzr fha 
 url wreel eho fbzr ybgvba ba zl onpx 
 jub ner lbh zef ebovafba 
 pbzr ba v'yy eho fbzr ba lbhef 
 ab gung'f ab fjrrg'avat gur qrny ab 
  lbh xabj jura v jnf n xvq v bapr sbhaq n qbyyne naq svsgl pragf va punatr ba gur obggbz bs gur cbby 
  lbh zhfg'ir orra rkpvgrq 
 lrnu url lbh xabj v tbggn tb trg gurfr gbzngbrf lbh jnaan tb sbe n evqr 
 v qba'g guvax fb

 ab gunaxf 
 ab  
 v'z tbaan gnxr n qvc  
 naq gura gurer'f znhqr  
 ybbx ng zl snpr ybbx ng vg lbh frr nal yvarf 
 ab yvarf

 fb jura ner jr tbaan frr guvf onol jura vf gur zbzragbhf rirag

  bu guvf vf vagrerfgvat

 wnar'f gbcyrff

 avpr enpx

 ab gunaxf 
 v'z tbbq

 vfa'g ur tbetrbhf

 bu tbetrbhf lrf 
 fb irel tbetrbhf

 fur'f tbg terrgvat ceboyrzf

 guvax bs zr nf n qbpgbe

  v thrff gung'f gehr

 fgenatr zna 
 jnvg'yy lbh trg gb xabj uvz 
 fb jurer vf guvf onol naljnl 
 bu purpx vg bhg v thnenagrr lbh'ir arire frra nalguvat dhvgr fb bowrpgvbanoyr vg'f qbja gur unyy guveq qbbe ba lbhe yrsg

 ohg

 ubj qb lbh xabj 
 jbzra nera'g yvxr hf

 vg fuevaxf

 ab lbh qba'g jnaan qb gung lbh'yy or hapbzsbegnoyr 
 lrnu svavfu rngvat gur onol'f abg tbaan unir nal sha bire urer jr'er-jr'er abg sha sbe n onol 
 lrnu gur ybofgre'yy fpner uvz 
 v'z tbaan trg uvz 
 frr ybbx ng guvf  enpury zl g-fuveg fuehax vg hfrq gb or zhpu ovttre naq abj vg fuehax lbh frr gung'f jung jngre qbrf vg fuevaxf guvatf 
 ernyyl gryy hf zber ze fpvrapr  
 jung'er lbh qbvat jung'er lbh gryyvat frpergf jung'er lbh ynhtuvat ng 
 vg'f abguvat trbetr 
 lbh xabj vg'f irel vzcbyvgr gb gryy frpergf ner lbh gnyxvat nobhg zr 
 jung vf vg jvgu lbh 
  rnfl ovt sryyn 
 fb xenzre jurer'q lbh trg nyy gurfr ybofgre ng gur syrrfure'f znexrg 
 ab v tbg 'rz va gur bprna 
 gur bprna jung'q lbh zrna 
 jryy v sbhaq guvf ebcr naq v xrcg ghttvat ba vg naq nyy gurfr ybofgref pnzr hc 
 gubfr ner pbzzrepvny ybofgre gencf lbh pna'g gnxr gubfr ybofgref sebz gurer gung'f ntnvafg gur ynj 
 gnxr vg rnfl gurer'f cyragl bs ybofgref va gur bprna sbe rirelbar 
 zl sngure jnf n ybofgrezna ur tbg hc rirel zbeavat ng sbhe naq pnzr ubzr rirel avtug fgvaxvat bs oevar ur frag zr guebhtu ynj fpubby jvgu gur ybofgref ur pnhtug  
  urer ur vf 
 nuuu  
 fbzr avtug uhu 
 lrnu v jvfu v unq zl gryrfpbcr 
 fbzr qvaare uhu 
 abguvat yvxr serfu pnhtug ybofgre 
 fbzr ubhfr uhu 
 vg jnf ohvyg ol znex snetzna ur ohvyq n ybg bs gurfr ubzrf urer 
 fbzr htyl onol uhu 
 jung qvq lbh fnl 
  v fnvq hu fbzr fahttyl onol 
 ur vf fbzrguvat 
 jryy gb gryy lbh gur gehgu qe srssn v  v jnf fhecevfrq gb urne lbh hfr n jbeq yvxr oerngugnxvat gb qrfpevor n onol v zrna orpnhfr lbh nyfb hfrq vg ersreevat gb zr 
 jryy lbh xabj rynvar fbzrgvzrf lbh fnl guvatf whfg gb or avpr  
 lbh gbyq ure 
 lrnu jung'f gur ovt qrny 
 lbh qba'g haqrefgnaq guvf betna vg'f irel fpuvmbcueravp 
 wreel jung gur qvssrerapr lbh xabj lbh'er gur barf bofrffrq jvgu guvf fghss abg hf v'z fher vg jbhyqa'g znggre gb wnar 
 lbh'er tbvat onpx gb arj lbex abj 
 lrnu v unir fbzr guvatf gb qb 
 hu uhu hu uhu v guvax lbh fcbxr gb lbhe yvggyr sevraq enpury gung'f jung v guvax 
 fb jung vs v qvq 
 naq fur qvqa'g fnl fbzrguvat gb lbh nobhg n pregnva fbzrguvat 
 v qba'g xabj jung lbh'er gnyxvat nobhg 
 *v* guvax gung *lbh* guvax gung n pregnva *fbzrguvat* vf abg nyy gung vg pbhyq or jura va snpg vg vf vf nyy gung vg *fubhyq* or naq *zber* 
  v'z fher vg vf 
 ybbx lbh qba'g haqrefgnaq gurer jnf fuevaxntr 
 lbh ybbxvat sbe guvf  
 bu xenzre lbh fgnegyrq zr 
 jryy v gubhtug lbh zvtug jvaq hc nebhaq urer 
 lrnu jryy v pbhyqa'g fgbc guvaxvat nobhg ubj rirelbar jnf rawblvat gur ybofgre fb zhpu na' jryy v gubhtug v yvggyr gnfgr jbhyqa'g uheg uhu 
 ab v'z nsenvq v pbhyqa'g qb gung 
 jul abg 
 jryy gung jbhyqa'g or xbfure 
 p'zba xenzre v ernyyl jnag gb gel vg 
 anu v'z fbeel ubarl abg ba zl jngpu 
 pbzr ba xenzre 
 urlnuuu 
 v whfg urneq n pne qevir bhg jung jnf gung 
 bu gung'f whfg wnar qevivat ubzr gb arj lbex va gur zvqqyr bs gur avtug  
 trbetr gunaxf fb zhpu sbe znxvat oernxsnfg 
 trbetr gurfr ner gur orfg fpenzoyrq rttf v'ir rire gnfgrq 
 ln v qvqa'g xabj lbh pbhyq pbbx 
 jryy v'z whfg rkcerffvat zl tengvghqr gb bhe tenpvbhf ubfg 
 lrf trbetr gur jubyr oernxsnfg vf oerngugnxvat  
 tbbq zbeavat 
 url url zbeavat 
 xenzre v whfg jnag gb gunax lbh ntnva sbe ynfg avtug lbh ernyyl fnirq zr 
 jung unccrarq 
 jryy v nyzbfg gevrq gur ybofgre ohg xenzre fgbccrq zr 
 jryy v xarj lbh'q erterg vg sbe gur erfg bs lbhe yvsr 
 lbh'er evtug v jbhyq unir

 zz-uzz 
 hu tbbq lbh xabj lbh zvtug jnaan gel rngvat vg jvgu bar bs gurfr  
 gurer'f ybofgre va gurfr rttf 
 abg gung zhpu lbh xabj gurl graq gb fuevax va gur jngre 
 jryy v thrff v tbggn tb gbb 
 jryy guvf unf ghearq bhg gb or bar *uryyhin* jrrxraq  
 rkphfr zr 
 v'z fbeel gb obgure lbh ohg jr'er gelvat gb genpx qbja n ybofgre cbnpure gung hu pyrnarq bhg ba bs gur gencf

 nu v thrff v fubhyq tb hc naq ncbybtvmr 
 gurer ur vf bssvpre  
 nuu qba'g lbh rire xabpx 
 v qba'g xabj jul enpury unq gb qevir onpx jvgu zvpunry naq pneby 
 url vs lbh fnj zr anxrq v jbhyqa'g jnag gb evqr onpx va gur fnzr pne jvgu lbh rvgure 
 v fgvyy pna'g oryvrir zvpunry svaxrq ba xenzre 
 ubj vf ur tbaan cnl bss n gubhfnaq qbyyne svar 
 gurl tbg fbzr fbeg bs cebtenz 
 url gurer'f n gbzngb fgnaq yrg'f fgbc v pna trg fbzr zber

 gurer'f enpury 
 jurer  
 gb lbhe cebzbgvba 
 bu gunax lbh  zzz bu gunax lbh ze yvcczna v pna'g gryy lbh ubj zhpu v nccerpvngr guvf v zrna bs pbhefr v qrfreir vg 
 jryy lbh'er ernyyl ba lbhe jnl abj 
 lbh ernyyl bhtuggn qb fbzrguvat nobhg gung pbyq 
 lbh tbg n envfr 
 v qba'g sbby nebhaq  onol 
 v gubhtug lbh fnvq craqnag jnf va svanapvny gebhoyr 
 gurl jrer ohg gurl'er orvat nofbeorq ol zngfhfuvzv gung ovt wncnarfr pbatybzrengr 
 bu jura qvq gung unccra 
 gurl'er fvtavat gur cncref arkg jrrx 
 qbrf guvf zrna gurl'er tbaan or choyvfuvat xenzre'f pbssrr gnoyr obbx 
 lrnu gurl'yy qrsvavgryl qb vg abj 
 obl lbh'er ba dhvgr n fgernx wbo cebzbgvba cyhf lbh'er onpx jvgu wnxr wnezny 
 lrnu vg'f trggva' frevbhf jr'er gnyxvat nobhg zbivat va gbtrgure 
 obl lbh ernyyl tbg vg nyy v'z fher uryra "tveyvr" oebja jbhyq or irel cebhq bs lbh 
 fcrnxvat bs univat vg nyy  jurer jrer lbh 
 v jrag gb gur ornpu  
 bu gur ornpu 
 vg'f abg jbexvat wreel vg'f whfg abg jbexvat  
 jung vf vg gung vfa'g jbexvat 
 jul qvq vg nyy ghea bhg yvxr guvf sbe zr v unq fb zhpu cebzvfr v jnf crefbanoyr v jnf oevtug  bu znlor abg npnqrzvpnyyl fcrnxvat  v jnf creprcgvir v nyjnlf xabj jura fbzrbar'f hapbzsbegnoyr ng n cnegl 
  pbhyq v trg ancxva bire gurer 
 vg orpnzr irel pyrne gb zr fvggvat bhg gurer gbqnl gung rirel qrpvfvba v'ir rire znqr va zl ragver yvsr unf orra jebat zl yvsr vf gur pbzcyrgr bccbfvgr bs rirelguvat v jnag vg gb or rirel vafgvapg v unir va rirel bs nfcrpg bs yvsr or vg fbzrguvat gb jrne fbzrguvat gb rng  vg'f nyy orra jebat  rireljurer 
 ghan ba gbnfg pbyrfynj phc bs pbssrr 
 lrnu ab ab ab jnvg n zvahgr v nyjnlf unir ghan ba gbnfg abguvat'f rire jbexrq bhg sbe zr jvgu ghan ba gbnfg v jnag gur pbzcyrgr bccbfvgr bs ba gbnfg puvpxra fnynq ba elr ha-gbnfgrq jvgu n fvqr bs cbgngb fnynq  naq n phc bs grn  
 jryy gurer'f ab gryyvat jung pna unccra sebz guvf 
 lbh xabj puvpxra fnynq vf abg gur bccbfvgr bs ghan fnyzba vf gur bccbfvgr bs ghan 'phm fnyzba fjvz ntnvafg gur pheerag  naq gur ghan fjvz jvgu vg  
  tbbq sbe gur ghan 
 nu trbetr lbh xabj gung jbzna whfg ybbxrq ng lbh 
 fb jung jung nz v fhccbfrq gb qb 
 tb gnyx gb ure 
 rynvar onyq zra jvgu ab wbof naq ab zbarl jub yvir jvgu gurve cneragf qba'g nccebnpu fgenatr jbzra 
 jryy urer'f lbhe punapr gb gel gur bccbfvgr vafgrnq bs ghan fnynq naq orvat vagvzvqngrq ol jbzra puvpxra fnynq naq tbvat evtug hc gb gurz 
 lrnu v fubhyq qb gur bccbfvgr v fubhyq 
 vs rirel vafgvapg lbh unir vf jebat gura gur bccbfvgr jbhyq unir gb or evtug 
 lrf v jvyy qb gur bccbfvgr v hfrq gb fvg urer naq qb abguvat naq erterg vg sbe gur erfg bs gur qnl fb abj v jvyy qb gur bccbfvgr naq v jvyy qb fbzrguvat 
 rkphfr zr hu v pbhyqa'g uryc ohg abgvpr gung lbh jrer ybbxvat va zl qverpgvba 
 bu lrf v jnf lbh whfg beqrerq gur fnzr rknpg yhapu nf zr 
 zl anzr vf trbetr v'z harzcyblrq naq v yvir jvgu zl cneragf 
 v'z ivpgbevn uv 
  ner lbh xvqqvat gurl pna'g pnapry gung fubj ba zr abj vg'f gbb yngr sbe zr gb obbx nalguvat ryfr sbe gung jrrxraq nyevtug nyevtug  bxnl olr  
 url ohqql vg'f nyy unccravat 
 jung'f unccravat 
 gur pbssrr gnoyr obbx vg'f n tb-bb 
 bu lrnu v urneq nyy nobhg vg 
 lbh xabj jung guvf zrnaf v'z fgnegvat gur obbx gbhe svefg fgbc  ertvf naq xngul yrr 
 lbh'er tbvat ba ertvf naq xngul yrr 
 bu lbh orggre oryvrir vg 
 v'yy ybna lbh zl chssl fuveg 
 ab ab ab 
 jung'er lbh tbaan gnyx nobhg 
 jryy pbssrr gnoyrf 
 uryyb jung lrnu fher v'yy qb vg v whfg unq fbzrguvat pnapryyrq gur fnzr jrrxraq bx terng olr  lbh xabj yvsr vf nznmvat v whfg ybfg n wbo naq svir zvahgrf yngre trg nabgure fnzr jrrxraq fnzr zbarl 
 lbh xabj jub lbh ner rira fgrira 
 ner lbh tebjvat n orneq 
 jul funir rirel qnl vg whfg tebjf evtug onpx 
 v thrff  
 v'z nsenvq v'z whfg abg vagrerfgrq va ubj v cerfrag zlfrys vs gubfr xvaq bs fhcresvpvnyvgvrf ner vzcbegnag gb lbh guvf cebonoyl vfa'g tbaan jbex 
 url jngpu ur whfg phg lbh bss qvq lbh frr gung 
 gnxr vg rnfl gnxr vg rnfl vg'f abg gur raq bs gur jbeyq 
 url onol ubj nobhg n yvggyr gbathr npgvba uhu 
 lrnu fgvpx lbhe gbathr qbja uvf guebng 
 jung ner jr tbaan qb fubhyq jr whfg zbir 
 gung jba'g or arprffnel 
 fuhg lbhe gencf naq fgbc xvpxvat gur frngf jr'er gelvat gb jngpu gur zbivr naq vs v unir gb gryy lbh ntnva jr'er tbaan gnxr vg bhgfvqr naq v'z tbaan fubj lbh jung vg'f yvxr lbh haqrefgnaq zr abj fuhg lbhe zbhguf be v'yy fuhg 'rz sbe ln naq vs lbh guvax v'z xvqqvat whfg gel zr gel zr orpnhfr v jbhyq ybir vg 
 ner lbh fher lbh qba'g jnaan pbzr hc v zrna vg'f bayl avar guvegl 
 v qba'g guvax jr fubhyq jr ernyyl qba'g xabj rnpu bgure irel jryy 
 jub ner lbh trbetr pbfgnamn 
 v'z gur bccbfvgr bs rirel thl lbh'ir rire zrg 
 rkphfr zr vf lbhe anzr rynvar 
 lrf 
 jrer lbh fhcbfrq gb zrrg n wnxr wnezny urer 
 lrnu 
 jryy v'z nsenvq ur'f orra va na nppvqrag 
  na nppvqrag jung unccrarq 
 jryy-ur tbg fvqr-fjvcrq ol n pno ohg ur'f nyevtug ur'f va fgivaprag ubfcvgny ebbz 907 
 bu bx gunax lbh 
 pbhyq v unir n obk bs whwlsehvgf 
  gurer lbh tb 
 fb gura lbh xabj gur yvtug jnf pyrneyl terra v fgnegrq jnyxvat ur fxvqqrq naq ur jrag evtug vagb zl uvc 
  bu gung vf fb greevoyr gung vf fb greevoyr wnxr v zrna ubj pna crbcyr or fb fghcvq whfg fvpxravat 
 lbh jnag bar 
 ab gunaxf 
 fb jura qb lbh guvax lbh'er tbaan trg bhggn urer

 ng gur zbivrf

 lrnu ur qvq 
 gura jura qvq lbh trg gubfr 
 evtug nsgre  gung  
 fb lbh urneq gung v jnf va n pne nppvqrag naq gura qrpvqrq gb fgbc bss sbe fbzr whwlsehvg 
 jryy gur pbhagrejnf evtug gurer naq 
 v jbhyq guvax haqre gur pvephzfgnaprf vg jbhyq unir frag lbh ehaavat bhg gur ohvyqvat nccneragyl vg qvqa'g unir nal rssrpg ba lbh 
 ab ab vg qbrf

 pna v oevat bhg bhe arkg thrfg abj

 lbhat thl ur'f tbg n arj obbx pbzvat bhg naq vg'f nobhg naq guvf vf gur orfg cneg - 
 v ybir guvf 
 vg'f n pbssrr gnoyr obbx nobhg pbssrr gnoyrf  
 lrnu vf gung pyrire v guvax gung vf fb pyrire 
 v guvax fb gbb qvq lbh trg gb zrrg uvz onpx fgntr 
 v qvq 
 v zrna ur ybbxf yvxr n sha thl qbrfa'g ur 
 v ybir uvf unve 
 lrnu bu v qb gbb guvf thl pbhyq or n yvggyr obaxbf ernyyl naljnl vs lbh jvyy jbhyq lbh cyrnfr jrypbzr xenzre 
  uryyb xenzre vf urer 
 v qba'g xabj znlor vg'f gur unve be fbzrguvat 
 nu jryy lrf xenzre fb n pbssrr gnoyr obbx nobhg pbssrr gnoyrf jurer qvq lbh pbzr hc jvgu guvf vqrn 
 lrnu jryy nu v'yy gryy lbh hu ertvf npghnyyl guvf vf n gehr fgbel v hzz v jnf fxvvat ng gur gvzr 
 lbh xabj jura v'z fxvvat xenzre v'z gelvat abg gb xvyy zlfrys lbh'er jevgvat obbxf 
 lrnu jryy abj lbh xvqf qba'g tb bhg naq gel gung lbh fgnl va fpubby 
 unir lbh nyjnlf unq na vagrerfg va pbssrr gnoyrf orpnhfr ernyyl v-v ybir pbssrr gnoyrf naq v-v gubhtug v jnf gur bayl bar 
 lbh frr gur ornhgl bs zl obbx vf vs lbh qba'g unir n pbssrr gnoyr vg gheaf vagb n pbssrr gnoyr 
 vf gung snohybhf 
 ybbx ng guvf 
 vf gung snohybhf 
 snohybhf 
 v jnag bar bs gurfr 
 qvq v gryy lbh guvf thl jnf obaxbf 
 guvf pbssrr gnoyr  vf shyy bs cvpgherf bs pryroevgvrf' pbssrr gnoyrf 
 gung'f gehr gung'f evtug 
 lrnu jryy v'z abg va gurer jurer'f zvar 
 bu vg'f ba svyr evtug urer  
 v'z gryyva' ln guvf thl'f obaxbf ur ernyyl vf 
 ohg ur'f nqbenoyr 
 ln ur vf ur'f n avpr ybbxvat thl 
 vg'f nyy bire zl qerff 
 jr'yy or evtug onpx va n zbzrag 
 fb vg'f nyy bire 
 lrnu vg tbg cerggl anfgl 
 naq jung qvq lbh tb onpx sbe whwlsehvg 
 vg'f abg yvxr v jrag npebff gur fgerrg v obhtug gur whwlsehvg naq v tbg va n pno 
 jul qvqa'g lbh rng vg va gur pno 
 orpnhfr v tbg cbcpbea gbb naq v ngr gung svefg 
 jung'f nyy guvf 
 cynlrq pneqf ynfg avtug 
 bu lrnu ubj'q lbh qb 
 oebxr rira 
 lbh nyjnlf oernx rira 
 lrnu v xabj; yvxr lrfgreqnl v ybfg n wbo naq gura v tbg nabgure bar naq gura v zvffrq n gi fubj naq yngre ba gurl er-ena vg naq gura gbqnl v zvffrq n genva jrag bhgfvqr naq pnhtug n ohf vg arire snvyf v nyjnlf rira bhg 
 qb lbh unir gjragl ohpxf 
 jung sbe 
 whfg tvzzr gjragl ohpxf 
  jung gur uryy jnf gung 
 yrg'f frr vs lbh trg gur gjragl ohpxf onpx 
 lbh xabj lbh pbhyq'ir guebja n crapvy bhg gur jvaqbj naq frra vs gung pnzr onpx 
 lbh xabj guvatf jrer tbvat fb tbbq sbe zr lbh xabj v tbg gur wbo cebzbgvba jr jrer gnyxvat nobhg zbivat va gbtrgure - 
 jryy znlor arkg gvzr fbzrbar'f va n pne nppvqrag lbh jba'g fgbc bss sbe pnaql svefg 
 url v whfg sbhaq gjragl qbyynef v gryy lbh guvf fbzrguvat vf unccravat va zl yvsr v qvq guvf bccbfvgr guvat ynfg avtug hc jnf qbja oynpx jnf juvgr tbbq jnf - 
 onq 
 qnl jnf - 
 avtug 
 lrf 
 fb lbh whfg qvq gur bccbfvgr bs rirelguvat 
 lrf naq yvfgra gb guvf yvfgra gb guvf; ure hapyr jbexf sbe gur lnaxrrf naq ur'f tbaan trg zr n wbo vagreivrj n sebag bssvpr xvaq bs guvat nffvfgnag gb gur geniryvat frpergnel n wbo jvgu gur arj lbex lnaxrrf guvf unf orra gur qernz bs zl yvsr rire fvapr v jnf n puvyq naq vg'f nyy unccravat orpnhfr v'z pbzcyrgryl vtabevat rirel hetr gbjneqf pbzzba frafr naq tbbq whqtzrag v unir unq guvf vf ab ybatre whfg fbzr penml abgvba rynvar wreel guvf vf zl eryvtvba 
 fb v thrff lbhe zrffvnu jbhyq or gur nagv-puevfg 
 lrf shaal  yrg'f tb 
 rynvar  ybbx n gjragl 
  bu zl tbq 
 url obff 
 xenzre pbzr va 
 ubj'er lbh qbva' gurer ovt thl  
 hu ln unir n frng 
 ny-evtugl  unir lbh tbg lbhefrys n pbyq 
 jbnu gung'f dhvgr n ubax 
 ln gunax lbh 
 trg lbhefrys fbzr ivgnzva p jvgu ebfr uvcf naq ovbsynirabvqf 
 gur ernfba v nfxrq lbh va urer vf v-v pnhtug lbhe nccrnenapr ba hu "ertvf naq xngul yrr" gur bgure qnl naq - 
 ln gung jnf cerggl tbbq uhu 
 na-naljnl gur guvaxvat urer vf gung vg jbhyq or orfg v-vs lbh hu qvqa'g qb nal zber bs gurfr fubjf 
 orpnhfr bs gur pbssrr guvat 
 xenzre v'z fbeel 
 jung nobhg "fbavn yvir" abj lbh'er abg pnapryyvat "fbavn yvir" 
 vg'f bhg - 
 fur'f n qbpgbe v tbg n guvat sbe ure 
 xen-xenzre v - 
 jul qba'g lbh gryy zr nobhg fbzr bs lbhe cerivbhf jbex rkcrevrapr 
 nyevtugl nu  zl ynfg wbo jnf va choyvfuvat  v hu tbg sverq sbe univat frk va zl bssvpr jvgu gur pyrnavat jbzna 
 tb ba 
 nu nyevtug orsber gung v jnf va erny rfgngr v dhvg orpnhfr gur obff jbhyqa'g yrg zr hfr uvf cevingr onguebbz gung jnf vg 
 qb lbh gnyx gb rirelobql yvxr guvf 
 bs pbhefr 
 zl avrpr gbyq zr lbh jrer qvssrerag 
 v nz qvssrerag lrnu 
 v tbggn gryy ln lbh ner gur pbzcyrgr bccbfvgr bs rirel nccyvpnag jr'ir frra  nu ze fgrvaoeraare fve gurer'f fbzrbar urer v'q yvxr lbh gb zrrg  guvf vf ze pbfgnamn ur'f bar bs gur nccyvpnagf 
 avpr gb zrrg lbh 
 jryy v jvfu v pbhyq fnl gur fnzr ohg v zhfg fnl jvgu nyy qhr erfcrpg v svaq vg irel uneq gb frr gur ybtvp oruvaq fbzr bs gur zbirf lbh unir znqr jvgu guvf svar betnavmngvba va gur cnfg gjragl lrnef lbh unir pnhfrq zlfrys naq gur pvgl bs arj lbex n tbbq qrny bs qvfgerff nf jr unir jngpurq lbh gnxr bhe orybirq lnaxrrf naq erqhprq gurz gb n ynhtuvat fgbpx nyy sbe gur tybevsvpngvba bs lbhe znffvir rtb 
 uver guvf zna 
 gvan eboovaf vf urer gb frr lbh 
 jub'f gung 
 nu vg'f zl rk-ebbzzngr fur zbirq bhg sbhe lrnef ntb v-v'ir orra fho-yrggvat zl ncnegzrag sebz ure 
 nyevtug frr ln  url 
 cyrnfr 
 uv gvan 
 uv rynvar 
 fb v unira'g frra lbh va n juvyr 
 rynvar jr unir n ceboyrz 
 jryy jung vf vg 
 lbh'er trggvat xvpxrq bhg 
 xvpxrq bhg jul 
 jryy gurer'f orra n ahzore bs pbzcynvagf 
 lrnu yvxr jung 
 jryy yvxr ynfg gunaxftvivat lbh ohmmrq hc n wrjry guvrs 
 nu v qvqa'g xabj jub ur jnf 
 gung'f jul gurer'f n ohmmre 
 jung ryfr 
 jryy nccneragyl gur jrrx nsgre gung lbh ohmmrq hc fbzr wrubin'f jvgarffrf naq gurl pbhyqa'g trg gurz bhg bs gur ohvyqvat 
 jung ryfr unir lbh tbg 
 jryy yrg'f frr  
 v'yy gryy lbh jung gur ovt nqinagntr bs ubzbfrkhnyvgl vf vs lbh'er tbvat bhg jvgu fbzrbar lbhe fvmr evtug gurer lbh qbhoyr lbhe jneqebor 
 v fhccbfr 
 bu pbzr ba gung'f n uhtr srngher jura gurl nccebnpu n arj erpehvg v'z fher gung'f bar bs gur ovt fryyvat cbvagf 
  wreel  
 lrf 
 v'ir orra qbvat n ybg bs guvaxvat 
 hu uhu 
 jryy v qba'g guvax jr fubhyq frr rnpu bgure nal zber

  jung 
 anu gung'f svar ab ceboyrz v'yy zrrg fbzrobql ryfr 
 lbh jvyy 
 fher frr guvatf nyjnlf rira bhg sbe zr 
 uhu 
 vg'f svar naljnl vg'f orra ernyyl avpr qngvat lbh sbe n juvyr naq hu tbbq yhpx 
 lrnu lbh gbb 
  fur'yy or pbzvat nebhaq gur zbhagnva 
 gur arj lbex lnaxrrf 
 gur arj lbex lnaxrrf 
 ehgu truevt qvznttvb znagyr  pbfgnamn

 v pna'g oryvrir vg 
 ln 
 ln 
  vg'f zr 
  pbzr ba hc 
 naq v'z zbivat bhg bs zl cneragf' ubhfr v'z gnxvat gung ncnegzrag ba 86gu fgerrg erzrzore gur bar jr fnj 
 gung'f n terng cynpr 
 v'z onpx va ohfvarff onol 
 trbetr v jbhyqa'g trg gbb rkpvgrq nobhg guvf fghss lbh xabj guvatf unir n jnl bs riravat bhg 
 url  
 uv rynvar 
 uv 
 ubj'er guvatf tbvat 
 ubj'er guvatf tbvat lbh jnaan xabj ubj guvatf ner tbvat v'yy gryy lbh ubj guvatf ner tbvat v nz trggvat xvpxrq bhg bs zl ncnegzrag 
 jul jul ner gurl qbvat gung 
 v qba'g xabj gurl unir n yvfg bs tevrinaprf 
 gur wrjry guvrs 
 lrnu gur wrjry guvrs 
 jung ryfr 
 v chg pnanqvna dhnegref va gur jnfuvat znpuvar  v tbggn or bhg ol gur raq bs gur zbagu 
 jryy lbh pbhyq zbir va jvgu zl cneragf  
 jnf gung gur  bccbfvgr  bs jung lbh jrer tbvat gb fnl be jnf gung whfg lbhe angheny vafgvapg  
 vafgvapg 
 fgvpx  jvgu gur bccbfvgr  
 rynvar qba'g trg gbb qbja rirelguvat'yy rira bhg frr v unir gjb sevraqf lbh jrer hc  ur jnf qbja abj ur'f hc  lbh'er qbja lbh frr ubj vg nyy riraf bhg sbe zr 
 ze yvcczna gur crbcyr sebz zngfhfuvzv ner urer 
 bu ln nyevtug gryy gurz v'yy or evtug gurer  bu zna jryy guvf vf vg rynvar lbh xabj jvgubhg guvf zretre jr'q or bhg ba gur fgerrg obl gurl fher fnirq hf 
  bu ze yvcczna lbh sbetbg lbhe unaqxrepuvrs ze yvcczna lbh sbetbg lbhe unaqxrepuvrs vg'f ba zl qrfx 
  nu yvcczna fba  yvcczna fba  
 ze yvcczna vg vf jvgu terng cevqr gung jr haqregnxr guvf cnegarefuvc jvgu lbhe pbzcnal 
 v  v'z fbeel v pna'g funxr lbhe unaq evtug abj vg'f trezf 
 vf gung gur raq bs vg 
 lrnu vg'f gur ynfg bar 
 nyevtug 
 v pna'g oryvrir lbh'er zbivat bhg  xenzre vf guvf gehr vf vg ernyyl unccravat vg'f  vg'f yvxr n qernz 
 bu vg'f gehr 
 nyevtug yrg'f tb 
 qba'g trg va gebhoyr jvgu gur lnaxrrf lbh or avpr  
 v'z abg tbaan or avpr gung'f ubj v tbg gur wbo 
 wreel qvq lbh urne guvf 
 ur xabjf jung ur'f qbvat 
 v whfg jnag gur obgu bs lbh gb xabj ubj zhpu lbh zrna gb zr naq v ybir lbh obgu irel irel zhpu 
 bccbfvgr 
 v zhfg'ir unq ng yrnfg rvtug va zl zbhgu v pbhyqa'g gnyx v pbhyqa'g gnyx 
 jul'q lbh unir gb rng fb znal 
 orpnhfr gurl'er whwlsehvg v yvxr gurz v qvqa'g xabj vg jbhyq fgneg n punva ernpgvba gung jbhyq yrnq gb gur raq bs craqnag choyvfuvat 
 abg gb zragvba gur raq bs xenzre'f pbssrr gnoyr obbx 
 lrnu lbh xarj ur unq n pbyq ubj'q lbh rkcrpg uvz gb oybj uvf abfr lrn 
 qb lbh xabj jung'f tbvat ba urer pna'g lbh frr jung'f unccrarq v'ir orpbzr trbetr 
 qba'g fnl gung 
 vg'f gehr v'z trbetr v'z trbetr 
 terrgvatf crbcyr terrgvatf terrgvatf naq fnyhgngvbaf jung n ornhgvshy qnl sbe n onyy tnzr yrg'f cynl gjb  bu v'yy unir gur puvpxra fnynq ba elr zl hfhny lbh xabj jung v trg qneyva'  fb yrg'f frr v unq n yvggyr pbairefngvba gbqnl jvgu ze qba znggvatyl -  ur'f gur svefg onfr zna 
 hu uhu 
 jr gnyxrq nobhg uvf arj onggvat fgnapr lbh xabj v'z abg penml nobhg vg ohg v fnvq  'qbaal tb jvgu vg 'gvyy vg fgbcf jbexva'' qbaal onfronyy ur'f n uryyhin thl 
 jnvg jnvg jnvg gung'f gbb zhpu zvar jnf zber guna lbhef 
 nu  yrg'f pnyy vg rira 
 bx qnaal gnxr n fjvat  a-ab ab ab lbh'er bcravat hc lbhe fubhyqre 
 ernyyl 
 ab abg ernyyl v'z whfg fnlvat guvf gb lbh orpnhfr v yvxr gb urne zlfrys gnyx lrf ernyyl 
 nyevtug nyevtug 
 jung ner nyy fjrngva' sbe 
 vg'f ubg va guvf havsbez 
 ubg  jung vf guvf 
 jung vf jung 
 guvf havsbez jung'f vg znqr sebz 
 v qba'g xabj pbggba 
 ab guvf vf abg pbggba urer yrzzr frr  jvyy lbh fgbc vg  bu bs pbhefr cbylrfgre 
 fb 
 v pna'g oryvrir lbh'er abg cynlvat va pbggba 
 jryy guvf vf jung gurl tvir hf 
 lbh xabj gurl hfrq gb znxr yrvfher fhvgf bhg bs guvf snoevp 
 lbh ernyyl guvax pbggba'f orggre 
 bs pbhefr nyevtug znlor v'yy fnl fbzrguvat gb ohpx 
 lrnu tbbq vqrn pngpu ln yngre  
 url qba'g rzoneenff zr gbqnl v tbg fbzr sevraqf va gur fgnaqf  
 ubg qbtf urer lnaxrr senaxf 
 bu lbh jnag bar 
 lrnu 
 v'yy trg vg  
 gung'f nyevtug v tbg vg 
 wreel 
 rynvar fgbc vg 
 url whfg orpnhfr v'z abg jbexvat qbrfa'g zrna v unira'g tbg nal zbarl  lb qbtf gjb 
 v'z fbeel 
 lbhe nggragvba cyrnfrgur arj lbex lnaxrrf jbhyq yvxr gb jrypbzr zvff pbaarpgvphg zvff eubqr vfynaq naq zvff abegu qnxbgn nyy bs jubz jvyy or pbzcrgvat va gur zvff nzrevpn cntrnag guvf jrrxraq va ngynagvp pvgl  
 abj gurer'f n pnerre cngu lbh znl unir bireybbxrq 
 bbu v tbggn purpx zl znpuvar v'z jnvgvat gb urne nobhg na vagreivrj qbhoyrqnl vf ybbxvat sbe fbzrobql gb ercynpr wnpxvr banffvf 
 bu fur jbexrq ng qbhoyrqnl 
 lrnu fur jnf na rqvgbe 
 evtug whfg yvxr lbh 
 lrnu pna lbh ubyq zl frng  
 url qbja va sebag  
 ubg qbt 
 ab gunaxf v'z jngpuvat zl jrvtug 
 nu v'z jngpuvat zl urvtug zl qbpgbe qbrfa'g jnag zr gb trg nal gnyyre fb lbh'er zvff hu 
 eubqr vfynaq 
 v jnf nyzbfg ze pbssrr gurl sryg v jnf n yvggyr gbb erynkrq  
 zvff eubqr vfynaq jura ner lbh frrvat ure 
 gbavtug v unir gb pnyy ure fur'f fgnlvat va n ubgry 
 lbh'er vaperqvoyr 
 naq trg guvf - v'z jbexvat va ngynagvp pvgl guvf jrrxraq naq fur'f tbvat gb or qbja gurer sbe gur cntrnag 
 jung vs fur orpbzrf zvff nzrevpn lbh pbhyq or qngvat zvff nzrevpn wreel 
 gur bayl onq guvat vf jr unir gb tb bhg jvgu n puncrebar 
 puncrebar jung ner lbh xvqqvat 
 ab vg'f cneg bs gur pbagrfg ehyrf 
 jung qbrf gur puncrebar qb 
 v qba'g xabj fur whfg fvgf gurer 
 pna fur gnyx 
 v'z abg fher vs fur'f nyybjrq gb gnyx  
 lbh'er pnyyvat ure 
 lrnu  gurer fur vfzvff - lrf ebbz 417 cyrnfr xnera unafba 
 url qvq lbh xabj gung gur lnaxrrf qba'g jrne pbggba wrefrlf 
 bs pbhefr gurl'er cbylrfgre 
 jryy jung vf gung gung'f n pevzr qb lbh xabj ubj ubg gubfr guvatf trg gurl fubhyq or jrnevat pbggba 
 jul qb gurl jrne cbylrfgre 
 v qba'g xabj gung'f nyy tbaan punatr 
 lbh'er tbvat gb qb fbzrguvat nobhg vg 
 jul fubhyqa'g v 
 ab ernfba 
 bs pbhefr wnpxvr b jnf n terng ynql gubfr ner tbvat gb or fbzr gbhtu fubrf gb svyy rirelbar ybirq ure fur unq fhputenpr 
 lrf tenpr 
 abg znal crbcyr unir tenpr 
 jryy lbh xabj tenpr vf n gbhtu bar v yvxr gb guvax v unir n yvggyr tenprabg nf zhpu nf wnpxvr - 
 lbh pna'g unir "n yvggyr tenpr" lbh rvgure unir tenpr be lbhqba'g 
 bx svar v unirab tenpr 
 naq lbh pna'g npdhver tenpr 
 jryy v unir ab vagragvba bs "trggvat" tenpr 
 tenpr vfa'g fbzrguvat lbh pna cvpx hc ng gur znexrg 
 nyevtug nyevtug ybbx - v qba'g unir tenpr v qba'g jnag tenprv qba'g rira fnl tenpr bx 
 gunax lbh sbe pbzvat va 
 lrnu lrnu evtug 
 jr'yy znxr bhe pubvpr va n srj qnlf naq jr'yy yrg lbh xabj 
 v unir ab punapr qb v 
 ab  
 whfgva cvgg gb frr lbh 
 whfgva cvgg 
 ur jnf n irel pybfr sevraq bs zef banffvf'f 
 "zef banffvf'f" gung'f uneq gb cebabhapr 
 rkphfr zr 
 abguvat  
 zef ynaqvf gurer'f fbzrguvat jebat jvgu guvf pbclvat znpuvar vg'f nyy pbzvat bhg fynagrq abj v qba'g xabj vs guvf vf lbhe qrcnegzrag be abg 
 whfgva cvgg guvf vf rynvar orarf  
 punezrq 
 v jnf n terng nqzvere bs zef banff-fvf-fvf-fvf 
 uryyb xnera vg'f wreel frvasryq bu gung'f irel fjrrg bs lbh lbh xabj lbh orggre or pnershy lbh qba'g jnag gb trg gbb pbatravny gurl'yy fync gung "zvff pbatravnyvgl" ba lbh naq lbh'yy pbatrar lbhefrys evtug bhg bs gur pbagrfg fb jung gvzr qb lbh jnag gb trg gbtrgure yngre jung fb jung jr qba'g arrq gur puncrebar  gur puncrebar pna'g znxr vg  bu lbh'er abg tbaan trg qvfdhnyvsvrq fb jr'er abg tbvat  ubyq ba bar frpbaq  url jung ner lbh qbvat gbavtug 
 abguva' 
 v'z tbvat bhg jvgu bar bs gur zvff nzrevpn pbagrfgnagf lbh jnaan tb 
 jung fgngr 
 eubqr vfynaq 
 gurl'er arire va pbagragvba 
 ubj qb lbh xabj 
 orpnhfr v'ir frra rirel zvff nzrevpn cntrnag fvapr v jnf fvk 
 ybbx qb lbh jnag gb tb be abg v'yy ohl lbh qvaare 
 tvqql-hc 
 v guvax v tbg fbzrbar 
 gur erfrzoynapr vf hapnaal  rira gur oebja rlrf

 tenpr 
 tenpr lrf 
 lbh guvax vunir tenpr 
 fbzr tenpr lrf 
 whfg fbzr 
 jryy lbh qba'g jnag gbb zhpu tenpr be lbh jba'g or noyr gb fgnaq 
 bu ze cvgg 
 rynvar v jnag lbh gb pbzr naq jbex sbe zr nf zl crefbany nffvfgnag abj v'yy cnl lbh gur fnzr nf craqnag ohg v jbhyq arrq lbh gb fgneg evtug njnl 
 url ohpx gnyx gb lbh sbe n frpbaq 
 fher trbetr 
 ubj'f rirelguvat tbvat rirelguvat bx 
 jryy nyy bs n fhqqra gurer'f n ceboyrz jvgu gnegnohyy'f fjvat 
 yvfgra ohpx v huboivbhfyl v qba'g arrq gb gnyx gb lbh nobhg gur vzcbegnapr bs cynlre zbenyr ohg huv'ir orra gnyxvat gb fbzr bs gur thlf naq fbzr bs gurz - v qba'g jnag gb zragvba nal anzrf - ohg fbzr bs gurzgurl'er abg gbb unccl jvgu gur cbylrfgre havsbezf 
 ubj fb 
 jryy gurl trg irel ubg va gur cbylrfgre lbh xabj vg'f abg n angheny svoer v guvax gurl jbhyq cersre pbggba 
 pbggba uhu 
 lrnu pbggba oerngurf lbh frr vg'f zhpu fbsgre vzntvar cynlvat tnzrf naq lbhe grnz vf svir qrterrf pbbyre guna gur bgure grnz qba'g lbh guvax gung jbhyq or na nqinagntr gurl'er pbbyre gurl'er zber pbzsbegnoyrgurl'er unccvre - gurl'er tbaan cynl orggre 
 lbh znl unir fbzrguvat gurer trbetr 
 bu - v'ir tbg fbzrguvat 
 uzz pbggba havsbezf 
 pbatenghyngvbaf 
 lrnu naq gur orfg cneg vf v fgvyy trg gb ybbx sbe jbex va choyvfuvat 
 abj jung vf vg gung lbh qb rknpgyl 
 v nggraq gb uvf crefbany nssnvef 
 yvxr jung 
 jryy yvxr gbzbeebj sbe rknzcyr v unir gb huv unir gb ohl uvz fbzr fbpxf 
 ernyyl fbpxf 
 lrnu juvgr barf yvxr gur barf lbh jrne jvgu farnxref 
 url znlor lbh pna cvpx zr hc fbzr haqrejrne  
 fb jung qb lbh guvax qbrf guvf jbex 
 yvfgragbavtug nsgre jr svavfu rngvat lbh znxr yvxr lbh tbg fbzrguvat ryfr gb qb naq whfg "erprqr vagb gur avtug" vs lbh xabj jung v zrna 
 ab jnl 
 jung 
 ybbx vs lbh guvax v'z whfg tbvat gb fgrc nfvqr naq qb abguvat juvyr lbh qrsvyr guvf jbzna lbh'er penml 
 v'z abg tbvat gb "qrsvyr" ure 
 gung'f evtug orpnhfr v'z tbvat gb frr vg qbrfa'g unccra ybbx wreel gurfr tveyf ner zvff nzrevpn pbagrfgnagf vg'f rirel yvggyr tvey'f qernz naq v'z abg tbvat gb yrg lbh genzcyr gung qernz naq znxr n zbpxrel bs rirelguvat gur cntrnag fgnaqf sbe 
 ohg - 
 nnnu ab ohgf gubfr ner zl ehyrf 
 ohg jnvg n zvahgr 
 abj vs lbh jnag gb tb bhg naq unir fbzr tbbq jubyrfbzr sha jvgu n avpr tvey v'q or tynq gb uryc lbh bhgvs lbh'er ybbxvat sbe fbzrguvat zber guna gung lbh'ir tbg gur jebat thl ohqql  
 vs lbh jrer zvff nzrevpn jung jbhyq lbh qb gb znxr gur jbeyq n orggre cynpr 
 nf zvff nzrevpn v jbhyq gel naq oevat na raq gb jbeyq uhatre vs rirel crefba fnpevsvprq bar zrny n jrrx gurer jbhyq or rabhtu gb srrq gur jubyr jbeyq 
 gung'f n uryy bs n cyna  yvfgra - 
 jung nqivpr jbhyq lbh tvir lbhat crbcyr 
 nyevtug xenzre 
 guvf vf vzcbegnag fghss fur'f tbg gb or noyr gb nafjre gurfr dhrfgvbaf fur'f abg tbvat gb unir gvzr gb guvax bhg gurer jvgu zvyyvbaf bs crbcyr jngpuvat ure nal urfvgngvba pbhyq pbfg ure gur pebja lbh xabj cbvfr pbhagf 
 lbh ernyyl xabj n ybg nobhg guvf qba'g lbh 
 bu lrnu yvxr ynfg lrne zvff grknf abj fur fubhyq unir jba rnfvyl ohg fur ybfg cbvagf va gur fjvzfhvg pbzcrgvgvba

 fvk 
 ab svir ohg lbh jrer pybfr 
 naq gur lnaxrrf gnxr gur svryq

 gung znxrf frafr  
 jryy urer jr ner 
 xenzre jbhyq lbh pbafvqre orvat zl crefbany pbafhygnag sbe gur cntrnag

 url 
 jryy vs vg vfa'g ze oynpxjryy 
 bu pbzr ba 
 naq gung jnvfg pvapure gung jnf gur gbccre 
 bu lbh'er cbb-cbbvat 
 lrf v cbb-cbb 
 jryy yrg zr gryy lbh fbzrguvat v'z gnxvat guvf xvq gb gur gbc gb gur gbc wreel jr'er tbvat sbe gur pebja naq lbh pna'g fgbc ure 
 v qba'g jnag gb fgbc ure

 jryy qvq lbh frr vg 
 frr jung 
 gur havsbezf qvq lbh frr ubj gurl cynlrq yvfgra gb gurfr pbzzragf  "jnqr obttf 'jung n snoevp svanyyl jr pna oerngur' yhvf cnybavn 'pbggba vf xvat' cnhy b'arvyy 'v arire qernzrq nalguvat pbhyq or fb fbsg naq syhssl' " 
 obl gurl ernyyl qb fbhaq pbzsbegnoyr 
 url jurer ln tbva' 
 v'z jbexvat va ngynagvp pvgl 
 ernyyl 
 lrnu url lbh'er abg jbexvat guvf jrrxraq jul qba'g lbh pbzr qbja 
 ngynagvp pvgl  lrf lrf v jvyy tb gb ngynagvp pvgl v'z va v'z qbja 
 lbh xabj jung znlor rynvar jnagf gb tb gbb yrzzr pnyy ure  fur'f ng ze cvgg'f v guvax v tbg gur ahzore 
 fb jung qb lbh guvax 
 ab 
 lbh qba'g yvxr gurz 
 ab v qba'g yvxr gurz 
 jung'f jebat 
 gurl'er gbb gvtug 
 gbb gvtug 
 gurer'f ab rynfgvp lbh arrq gb chyy gbb zhpu  
 v guvax gurl ybbx tbbq

 nyevtug jryy v'yy whfg gnxr gurz onpx

 wreel

 ernyyl jura 
 gbqnl evtug abj ner lbh va 
 bar frpbaq unat ba  rkphfr zr ze cvgg jbhyq vg or nyevtug vs v tbg lbh gur fbpxf gbzbeebj 
 gbzbeebj 
 lrf 
 ohg v jnf ubcvat sbe zl arj fbpxf gbqnl 
 jryy vg'f whfg bar zber qnl 
 v'z fbeel v zhfg unir gurz gbqnl 
 v pna'g tb 
 jul abg 
 orpnhfr v unir gb erghea gur fbpxf naq trg qvssrerag barf 
 rynvar 
 v tbggn tb  
 ab nyevtug jngpu zr abj  ghea onpx urnq hc fubhyqref onpxcbfgher lbh frr cbfgher 
 lrf v frr bx 
 yrg'f gel n srj zber dhrfgvbaf nyevtug  vs lbh jrer zvff nzrevpn naq gur hf jnf ba gur oevax bs n ahpyrne jne naq gur bayl jnl gur pbasyvpg pbhyq or niregrq jnf vs lbh nterrq gb fyrrc jvgu gur rarzl'f yrnqre jung jbhyq lbh qb 
 xenzre ner gurfr dhrfgvbaf ernyyl gung vzcbegnag 
 lrf gurl'er vzcbegnag vs lbh fghzoyr vs lbh urfvgngr lbh pna xvff gur pebja tbbqolr abj vs v'ir gbyq lbh bapr v'ir gbyq lbh n gubhfnaq gvzrf - cbvfr pbhagf vg'f whfg nf vzcbegnag nf gur bguref fjvzfhvg riravat jrne gnyrag cbvfr 
 url

 ubj jnf gur fubj

 ohg jung

 zr rvgure vf gurer nalguvat lbh pna qb gb fuhg gurz hc

 tbbq avtug fgna 
 jung vf vg 
 zl qbirf gurl'er qrnq v genvarq gubfr oveqf sbe rvtug lrnef ubj nz v fhccbfrq gb qb zl zntvp npg abj 
 ubj qvq guvf unccra 
 gurl yvxr vg bhgfvqr fb v xrcg gurz va n pntr ba gur greenprgura v sbhaq gurz qrnq va n cbby bs jngre

 ure oveqf ner qrnq 
 oveqf 
 lrnu oveqf fur'f tbg gurfr genvarq qbirf fur qbrf guvf zntvp npg gung jnf ure gnyrag sbe gur cntrnag lbh xabj jung v guvax wreel v guvax fbzrobql zheqrerq gubfr qbirf fbzrobql jnagrq ure bhg bs gung pbagrfg onq fbzrobql jub jnf whfg rngra hc jvgu wrnybhfl fbzrobql jub whfg pbhyqa'g fgnaq gb unir gur fcbgyvtug gnxra bss bs gurz  
 jung ner lbh ybbxvat ng  bu gung jr unq gb yrnir gung bhgfvqr ynfg avtug orpnhfr gur jngre jnf znxvat gur ebbz gbb pbyq 
 lbh xvyyrq gurz qvqa'g lbh 
 ab lbh qba'g haqrefgnaq - vg'f abg jung lbh guvax vg jnf na nppvqrag

 jungrire

 rynvar

 wreel    
 jryy vg unf abguvat gb qb jvgu lbh 
 lrnu ohg znlor ur jnf fb znq sebz gur cranygl fgebxr gung ur zheqrerq gur qel pyrnare

 ab gunax lbh 
 qebc olr nalgvzr wreel unu un un

 jurer lbh tbvat 
 traqrefba'f 
 lbh'er tbvat gb frr traqrefba 
 vg'f jrvtuvat ba zl pbafpvrapr 
 lbh xabj v guvax v pbhyq unir cynlrq jvgu qbyyf vs gurve jrer qbyyf va gur ubhfr vg frrzf yvxr sha gb zr vg qbrfa'g frrz yvxr n traqre guvat v guvax v jbhyq yvxr gb cynl jvgu qbyyf jung'f fb greevoyr

 n un jr'er whfg sevraqf

 bu funer 
 jryy jura v pnzr bire gb gur gnoyr fur zragvbarq fbzrguvat nobhg ubj fur orggre uheel hc naq yrnir be lbh'q znxr ure ohl yhapu gb znxr hc sbe gur bar lbh obhtug lrfgreqnl 
 un un un hu v'z abg sbyybjvat gung 
 jryy zl dhrfgvba vf ubj pbhyq rynvar or haqre gur vzcerffvba gung lbh obhtug gur ovt fnynq jura v jnf gur bar jub unaqrq vg gb ure 
 jryy fur cebonoyl whfg nffhzrq 
 hz qvq fur 
   hu    jnvg n frpbaq ner lbh fhttrfgvat gung v jrag bhg bs zl jnl gb gryy rynvar gung rira gubhtu lbh unaqrq ure gur ovt fnynq gung vg pnzr sebz zr 
 gung'f jung v'z fhttrfgvat 
    jryy vg jnf n ovt fnynq naq jung v jbhyq yvxr gb xabj vf ubj qbrf n crefba jub unf abguvat gb qb jvgu gur ovt fnynq pynvz erfcbafvovyvgl sbe gung fnynq naq npprcg gur gunax lbh haqre snyfr cergrafrf - nu - nu 
 trbetr nyy v qvq jnf unaq fbzrbar n ont 
 vg'f whfg gung zl obff vf irel qrznaqvat naq ur arrqrq gur crapvy evtug njnl 
 jryy jul qvq lbh gryy zr gb beqre vg vs lbh xarj lbh jrer tbvat gb trg bar fbzrcynpr ryfr 
 ab ab ab v qvqa'g xabj v v'z fbeel
