 ernyyl n svtug jvgu gur sberzna 
 lrf 
 jryy ntnva v'z whfg njshyyl fbeel 
 lrnu jryy gura ubj nobhg tbvat bhg jvgu zr gbavtug 
 bxnl 
 v zrna gurl sbhaq n grr naq ur cynlrq tbys gung qnl abobql jnyxf vagb n qel pyrnare'f jvgu n grr gur pvephzfgnagvny rivqrapr vf birejuryzvat 
 lbh unq ubj znal qngrf jvgu uvz guerr 
 nebhaq guerr v qba'g xabj 
 naq   
 v gbyq lbh ur fgbccrq pnyyvat zr v zbirq ba v'z abg uhat hc ba uvz jung ner lbh ybbxvat ng 
 jung v'z abg ybbxvat abguvat 
 jul ner lbh ybbxvat ng zl snpr 
 jurer nz v tbvat gb ybbx 
 xvff zr 
    v pna'g 
 arjzna 
 nyy v pbhyq guvax bs jnf jura v jnf ybbxvat ng ure snpr jnf; arjzna sbhaq guvf hanpprcgnoyr 
 jryy v'z tbvat bhg jvgu gur fgngvbarel fgber thl 
 lbh'er tbvat bhg jvgu gur fgngvbarel fgber thl 
 v sryg fb thvygl nobhg gur crapvy v pbhyqa'g fnl ab 
 jryy jryy jryy v'z abg gerngvat lbh gb yhapu nalzber lbh unq gb gryy whyvr gung v znqr n fcrpvny cbvag bs gryyvat lbh gung v obhtug lbh gur ovt fnynq qvqa'g ln' 
 hu hu 
 lbh xabj vs vg jnf n erthyne fnynq v jbhyqa'g unir fnvq nalguvat ohg lbh unq gb unir gur ovt fnynq 
 uryyb jung lbh'er xvqqvat v'z gheavat vg ba bu zl tbq trg bhg bs urer  url yvfgra gb guvf gurl vffhrq n jneenag sbe traqrefba'f neerfg ur rfpncrq naq gur cbyvpr fcbggrq uvz ba gur arj wrefrl gheacvxr 
 nf lbh pna frr juvgr oebapb gur cbyvpr unir pyrnerq gur uvtujnl genssvp va sebag bs uvz ohg gurl ner xrrcvat gurve qvfgnapr naq qba'g jnag gur fvghngvba gb rfpnyngr naq jr unir tbggra na vqragvsvpngvba ba gur qevire bs gur iruvpyr uvf anzr vf; xenzre bar bs traqrefba'f tbysvat ohqqvrf 
 9-1-1 jung ner lbh ercbegvat 
 lrnu guvf vf xenzre v tbg traqrefba va gur pne ur jnagf gb frr uvf svfu v'z gnxvat uvz gb frr uvf svfu fb gryy gur cbyvpr gb onpx bss 
 bxnl fve naq jung'f lbhe anzr 
 zl anzr vf xenzre lbh xabj jub v nz qnzzvg 
 v gbyq lbh abg gb gnxr gur gheacvxr 
 v gubhtug jr jbhyq oyraq va 
 vs jr gbbx gur cnyvfnqrf guvf arire unir unccrarq 
 jr jbhyq unir unq nyy gung oevqtr genssvp 
 nu whfg qevir 
 fur jnf uvggvat ba lbh zl sevraq aberra 
 lbhe sevraq aberra 
 ner lbh fher lbh'er abg whfg synggrevat lbhefrys 
 vs v jnf synggrevat zlfrys v guvax v'q pbzr hc jvgu fbzrbar n yvggyr yrff naablvat guna aberra 
 v pnaabg oryvrir gung fur jnf uvggvat ba lbh 
 vs lbh qba'g oryvrir zr nfx ure 
 v jvyy orfvqrf fur'f tbg n oblsevraq wreel lbh xabj uvz qna erzrzore jr jrag gb gung cnegl ng uvf ubhfr 
 bu evtug gur thl jub gnyxf jvgu n ernyyl uvtu ibvpr 
 lrnu 
 wreel qvq lbh trg zl sbeghar zntnmvar va lbhe znvy 
 purpx gur cvyr 
  bu jub frag lbh n pneq 
 v qba'g xabj 
 bcra vg vg'f sebz unyyznex 
 bu 
 uryyb qneyvat 
 vfa'g gung phgr n 'gunax lbh' pneq sebz xevfgva 
 yrg zr frr 
 jub'f xevfgva 
 fur jbexf sbe cof v zrg ure jura v nterrq gb qb gung cyrqtr qevir 
 qvq lbh nfx ure nobhg zr 
 lrnu va snpg fur fnvq gung lbh pbhyq or bar bs gubfr crbcyr gung fvgf va gur onpx naq nafjref gur cubar 
 tvqql-hc nyevtug fb abj ubj qbrf gung jbex abj jung v trg n crepragntr bs rirel cyrqtr v oevat va evtug 
 ab vg'f abg nyhzvahz fvqvat vg'f ibyhagrre jbex nyy gur zbarl tbrf gb gur fgngvba 
 bxnl lrnu nyevtug gung fbhaqf tbbq ohg v fgvyy trg n gbgr ont gubhtu evtug 
 lrnu naq bar bs gubfr sbnz orre pna ubyqref 
  lbh xabj jung v'z qbvat v'z pnyyvat aberra 
 bu tb nurnq 
 lbh fher lbh qba'g zvaq 
 yvxr fur'f ernyyl tbvat gb nqzvg fur jnf syvegvat jvgu zr 
 uryyb 
 uv vg'f rynvar yvfgra v jnf whfg gnyxvat gb wreel 
 wreel 
 wreel frvasryq 
 bu v yvxr wreel n ybg 
 lbh zrna yvxr yvxr 
 jung ner lbh gnyxvat nobhg 
 aberra jrer lbh uvggvat ba uvz 
 aberra'f abg urer guvf vf qna 
 bbu 
 lbh fnl gung aberra jnf uvggvat ba wreel frvasryq 
 hu bu 
 fb jnf v evtug fur yvxrf zr evtug 
 bu v'z fbeel ze cvgg uryyb 
 rynvar jung vf tbvat ba jul qvq lbh gryy qna v jnf uvggvat ba wreel frvasryq 
 vf guvf aberra 
  jung jbhyq rire cbffrff lbh gb znxr hc n fgbel yvxr gung 
 jryy yvfgra wreel zragvbarq vg naq v qba'g xabj-- 
 aberra ner lbh pelvat 
 ab guvf vf qna 
 bu uv qna 
 rynvar jbex 
 gryy aberra v'yy whfg pnyy ure onpx yngre 
 jub jnf pelvat 
 ab bar v'z fbeel ze cvgg gung jba'g unccra ntnva 
  v'z fher vg jba'g ohg fbzrbar jnf pelvat naq v jnag gb xabj jub vg jnf 
 jryy vg'f n ybat fgbel bxnl ohg zl fghcvq sevraq wreel gbyq zl bgure sevraq aberra gung fur jnf--  lbh xabj uvggvat ba uvz naq fb v pnyyrq ure gb frr jung jnf hu tbvat ba naq v nppvqragnyyl tbg ure oblsevraq jub vf guvf lbh xabj-- 
 v'z wreel frvasryq v gryy wbxrf sbe n yvivat ohg gurer'f ab wbxvat nobhg gur svanapvny pevfvf ng cof fubj hf lbh pner pnyy va lbhe cyrqtr abj 
 wreel v nz fb tengrshy gung lbh'er qbvat guvf 
 bu v xabj lbh ner 
 lbh tbg gur pneq v frag 
 v qvq 
 fb jurer vf vg 
 jung 
 gur pneq vf guvf vg va gur genfu 
 ab 
 guvf vf zl pneq lbh guerj vg njnl 
 jryy-- 
 v chg n ybg bs gubhtug vagb guvf pneq 
 lbh fvtarq lbhe anzr naq lbh nqqerffrq gur rairybcr vg'f abg yvxr lbh cnvagrq gur cvpgher naq jebgr gur cbrz 
 svar v tbggn trg onpx gb gur bssvpr 
 jul orpnhfr v guerj gur pneq bhg ubj ybat jnf v fhccbfrq gb fnir vg 
 lbh unir ab fragvzragnyvgl 
 v unir fragvzragnyvgl ernyyl v'z fragvzragny urer ybbx urer'f fbzr pneqf v'ir fnirq gurfr ner oveguqnl pneqf sebz zl tenaqzbgure frr v'z abg n onq thl 
 bu fb lbh fnir ure pneqf ohg abg zvar bu terng 
  jryy ohg lbh frr v fnirq fbzrguvat frr v pna fnir v'yy frr lbh ng gur cyrqtr qevir bx 
 arj pneqf uhu 
 ab gurl'er byq pneqf sebz zl tenaqzbgure 
 bu jryy v'yy gryy lbh n avpr terrgvat pneq pna ernyyl yvsg n crefba'f fcvevgf 
 lrnu 
  bu n purpx 
 lrnu fur chgf gra qbyynef va rirel pneq sbe zl oveguqnl gung'f jul v fnir gurz 
 gurer'f n purpx va nyy gurfr jul qba'g lbh pnfu gurz 
 v qba'g xabj vg'f gra qbyynef 
 ohg lbh tbg n jubyr cvyr urer 1987 
 bu fb jung 
 wreel lbhe tenaqzbgure tnir lbh guvf tvsg fur jnagf lbh gb fcraq gur zbarl gb unir gur sha gung fur pna'g unir bu guvf vf gnagnzbhag gb n fync va gur snpr 
 bu trg bhg bs urer 
 wreel n tvsg abg rawblrq vf yvxr n sybjre gung qbrfa'g oybffbz 
 nyevtug nyevtug v'yy pnfu gur purpxf 
 lrnu 
 vg jnf n 'gunax lbh' pneq sebz xevfgva orpnhfr v'z qbvat gur cof qevir v zrna ubj ybat nz v fhccbfrq gb xrrc vg 
 gur ehyr vf n zvavzhz bs gjb qnlf 
 lbh znxvat gung hc be qb lbh xabj jung lbh'er gnyxvat nobhg 
 v'z znxvat vg hc 
 v zrna ernyyl jung'f gur cbvag bs fnivat vg v pbhyq frr vs v unq n znagry 
 bu jryy n znagry'f n jubyr qvssrerag fgbel 
 nofbyhgryl 
 vs zl cneragf unq n znagry v zvtug or n pbzcyrgryl qvssrerag crefba 
 fb naljnl fur'f xvaq bs hcfrg nobhg vg fb v arrq lbh gb qb zr n snibe 
 yrg'f unir vg 
 jryy v'z qbvat gur cof fubj fb qhevat gur fubj gurl'er tbaan or ehaavat gur xra oheaf onfronyy guvat fb v gubhtug vs v pbhyq trg n onfronyy cynlre gb pbzr ba gur fubj jvgu zr 
 lbh jnag zr gb nfx bar bs gur lnaxrrf 
 pbhyq lbh 
 nyevtug v'yy eha vg ol n srj crbcyr 
 nyevtug qb lbhe guvat jurer lbh yvr gb rirelbar 
  v fubhyq arire unir znqr gung cubar pnyy 
 url qvq lbh rire trg gb gnyx gb aberra 
 lrf fur'f irel hcfrg 
 fb jnf v evtug nobhg gur syvegvat jnf vg gehr 
 v qba'g xabj v arire nfxrq fur jnf lryyvat-- 
 jub jnf syvegvat jvgu lbh 
 erzrzore jura jr jrer va gur obbxfgber gung jbzna pnzr hc gb hf 
 fur jnfa'g syvegvat jvgu lbh 
 bu fher fur jnf; nfxrq zr jurer gur 'uhzbe' frpgvba jnf uhzbe pbzr ba 
 wreel ure oebgure whfg unq n obbx bs cbyvgvpny pnegbbaf choyvfurq 
 nyevtug fb znlor fur jnfa'g syvegvat jvgu zr fb jung 
 fb lrnu gung'f shaal url lbh jnaan urne fbzrguvat jrveq ze cvgg rngf uvf favpxref onef jvgu n xavsr naq sbex 
 ernyyl 
 lrnu 
 jul qbrf ur qb gung 
 ur cebonoyl qbrfa'g jnag gb trg pubpbyngr ba uvf svatref gung'f gur jnl gurfr fbpvrgl glcrf rng gurve pnaql onef 
 bu lbh xabj 
 jung lbh guvax v rng nyy zl zrnyf jvgu lbh  rkphfr zr fjrrgurneg v guvax lbh znl unir birepunetrq hf jung vf guvf 
 gung'f gur rkgen gbnfg trg vg 
 tbg vg  qvq lbh whfg frr jung unccrarq urer 
 jung 
 qvq lbh frr gur jnl fur cbvagrq ng gur purpx fur tnir zr gur svatre 
 gung'f ubj jnvgerff glcrf rkcerff qrevfvba gurl qba'g jnag gb trg gurve zbhguf qvegl 
 fb jung qb lbh guvax 
 n cof shaqenvfre v'z abg tbaan jnfgr nal bs gur cynlref' gvzr jvgu gung orfvqrf gur grnz nyernql qbrf fb zhpu cebzbgvba sbe punaary ryrira 
 punaary ryrira sbetvir zr sbe gelvat gb pynff hc guvf cynpr sbe gelvat gb unir gur lnaxrrf ernpu nabgure fgengn bs fbpvrgl gung zvtug abg jngpu punaary ryrira 
 hu jung gur uryy ner lbh qbvat 
 v nz rngvat zl qrffreg ubj qb lbh rng vg jvgu lbhe unaqf 
 lbh xabj znlor trbetr unf fbzrguvat urer nobhg cof 
 bxnl fvkgl ohpxf sebz anan 
 uhu lrnu 
 uryyb 
 uryyb guvf vf purzvpny onax whfg jnagrq lbh gb xabj gung lbhe purpxvat nppbhag vf bireqenja 
 purzvpny onax v unira'g hfrq gung nppbhag va zbaguf 
 jryy fbzrbar'f orra pnfuvat gur purpxf naq lbh'er bireqenja 
 bu qrne v'yy or qbja gurer svefg guvat va gur zbeavat 
  jnvg jr pna qb guvf bire gur cubar 
 30 anan gheaf bss gur nynez shyyl qerffrq tnguref ure pbng naq chefr fvtuf naq urnqf sbe gur qbbe) 
 lbh tbg qnaal gnegnohyy 
 lbh jnagrq n lnaxrr v tbg lbh n lnaxrr 
 obl lbh ernyyl pnzr guebhtu xevfgva'f tbaan or guevyyrq 
 url gur ohyy bjrf zr bar v urycrq uvz jvgu uvf fjvat 
 fb lbh'er oevatvat qnaal gnegnohyy gb gur shaqenvfre gbavtug 
 nofbyhgryl craqvat nccebiny bs gur fpevcg 
 rkphfr zr 
 wreel v'z lnaxrr znantrzrag 
 lrnu v'q yvxr gb frr gur fpevcg gbb 
 lbh'er whfg nafjrevat cubarf 
 vg jbhyq chg zr ng rnfr 
 url jura lbh beqre sebz gur jnvgerff trg ure gb cbvag gb gur zrah v jnag gb frr jung svatre fur hfrf 
 hu fnl v jnagrq n fvqr beqre bs sehvg ohg v qvqa'g frr vg ba gur zra 
 bu lbh'er trggvat vg  vg pbzrf jvgu lbhe oernxsnfg fcrpvny 
 evtug lbh ner 
 v qvqa'g trg gur fcrpvny ohg v'q nyfb yvxr gur serfu sehvg gbb 
  v'yy purpx 
  v qba'g oryvrir vg fur qvq vg ntnva 
 bu fur unq na vgpu 
 fur unq na vgpu fur pbhyq unir hfrq nal bar bs gubfr svatref gung svatre jnf zrnag sbe zr 
 ol gur jnl yhapu vf ba zr v whfg pnfurq zl anan'f oveguqnl purpxf 
 ybbxvat sbe fbzrguvat ynql 
 vfa'g gur purzvpny onax ba guvf oybpx 
 gur onax vg ohearq vg'f tbar 
 bu qrne 
  uryyb 
 wreel uryyb 
 hapyr yrb 
 yvfgra v qba'g jnag gb nynez lbh ohg lbhe anan vf zvffvat 
 anan'f zvffvat 
 v pnzr gb cvpx ure hc sbe n qbpgbe'f nccbvagzrag fur jnfa'g urer v pnyyrq gur qbpgbe abobql xabjf jurer fur vf fur unfa'g yrsg gur ncnegzrag va gjragl-svir lrnef 
 v'ir orra guvaxvat nobhg ure v whfg pnfurq fbzr bs ure purpxf 
 lrnu gung'f evtug lbh qvq 
 jung xvaq bs purpxf 
 v guvax purzvpny onax 
 bu gurl jrer purzvpny 
 purzvpny fur unfa'g hfrq gung nppbhag fvapr ure oenapu pybfrq jung ner lbh qbvat pnfuvat ure purpxf naljnl 
 jryy xenzre gubhtug vg jbhyq znxr ure unccl  v arire fubhyq unir pnfurq gubfr purpxf 
 url v qvqa'g gjvfg lbhe nez 
 lbhe tenaqzbgure'f ba n irel svkrq vapbzr jung ner lbh oebxr 
 whfg pnyy zr vs lbh urne nalguvat  jryy v pnfurq gur purpxf gur purpxf obhaprq naq abj zl anan'f zvffvat 
 jryy qba'g ybbx ng zr 
 vg'f lbhe snhyg 
 zl snhyg lbhe anan vf zvffvat orpnhfr fur'f orra cnffvat gubfr ohz purpxf nyy bire gbja naq fur svanyyl cvffrq bss gur jebat crbcyr 
 fb naljnl vg'f pnhfrq n ybg bs ceboyrzf qna guvaxf v'z vagrerfgrq va wreel ur jba'g yrg hc 
 v'z ernyyl fbeel ohg lbh pna frr jul v'q znxr n zvfgnxr yvxr gung 
 ab jul 
 jryy lbh xabj orpnhfr ur'f n uvtu gnyxre 
 ur qbrf envfr uvf ibvpr bppnfvbanyyl ohg gung'f abezny 
 ab ab ab ab abg n ybhq gnyxre n uvtu gnyxre 
 ernyyl 
 lbh qba'g guvax uvf ibvpr fbhaqf n ybg yvxr lbhef 
 v arire abgvprq gung 
 jryy vg'f ab ovt qrny lbh xabj vg'f whfg gung ur pna fbhaq yvxr n jbzna lbh xabj 
 terng v'z tbvat bhg jvgu n zna jub fbhaqf yvxr n jbzna 
 jryy ur ybbxf yvxr n zna 
 lrnu 
 ur'f onyq v xabj gung'f n thl guvat 
 v thrff 
 v xabj ur orypurf n ybg 
 jryy gung'f fbzrguvat fb wreel gubhtug v jnf syvegvat jvgu uvz 
 lrnu 
  uz ur'f xvaq bs n onevgbar vfa'g ur 
 jung ner lbh qbvat 
 v'z rngvat guvf pbbxvr 
 ab ab ab ohg jul ner lbh hfvat n xavsr naq n sbex qvq lbh whfg 
 ab v'ir frra crbcyr qb vg v yvxr vg 
 guvf vfa'g tbaan gnxr ybat vf vg 
 bu ab va naq bhg v znqr fher bs gung naq lbh'yy or unccl gb xabj v crehfrq gur fpevcg naq vg'f zrg jvgu zl nccebiny 
 v'z fher vg'f svar 
  url jngpu vg qvq lbh frr gung thl ur whfg tnir zr gur svatre 
 lbh fher 
 bu lrnu zvqqyr svatre fgenvtug hc ng zr ng hf 
 jung ner lbh qbvat 
 v'z sbyybjvat uvz 
 v'z fbeel gur nppbhag unq vafhssvpvrag shaqf jr unq gb erghea gur 
 bu qrne gung'f zl tenaqfba znl v pnyy uvz abj naq rkcynva 
 bu pregnvayl 
 naq abj v guvax fur zvtug ernyyl or vagrerfgrq va lbh naq qna vf 
 jbhyq lbh 
 uryyb 
 uryyb v arrq gb fcrnx gb wreel 
 bu vg'f lbh jr jrer whfg gnyxvat nobhg lbh 
 uru 
 nal jbeq sebz anan 
 ab 
 anan 
 lrnu zl tenaqzn'f zvffvat 
 zvffvat 
 lrnu v guvax vg zvtug unir fbzrguvat gb qb jvgu gubfr purpxf 
 hz jung qbrf anan fbhaq yvxr 
 yvxr n tenaqzbgure jul 
 jryy 
 bu lbh uhat hc ba zl anan 
 v qba'g xabj znlor 
 lbh gbyq anan gb qebc qrnq 
 vg'f cbffvoyr 
 lrf vg vf 
 nyevtug nyevtug ybbx wreel jr tbggn trg qbja gb cof cqd 
 nyevtug 
 ab bar tvirf hf gur svatre jr'er lnaxrrf 
 jnag guvf ynfg qbahg 
 ab lbh pna unir vg 
 wreel jurer ner nyy gur gbgr ontf 
 v qba'g xabj 
 jryy v'z abg yrnivat gur cerzvfrf jvgubhg gbgr ontf v jnf cebzvfrq gbgr ontf naq gbgr ontf v funyy unir 
 wreel guvf zna jnagf gb frr lbh 
 yrb 
 uryyb 
 hapyr yrb jung ner lbh qbvat urer 
 v jnagrq gb gryy lbh gung lbhe tenaqzbgure vf svar 
 bu 
 fur'f unq dhvgr n qnl ohg fur'f tbaan jngpu lbh gbavtug ba gur gi 
 wreel v'z qlvat gb zrrg qnaal gnegnohyy jurer vf ur 
 ur'yy or urer nal frpbaq 
 lbh xabj lbh thlf ner obgu ba va svir zvahgrf 
 lrnu lrnu 
  bxnl 
 jul qvqa'g lbh gryy zr lbh jrer n yvggyr fubeg urer vs nalobql nfxf lbh jurer lbh tbg vg lbh qba'g xabj 
 ab gung'f bx v ernyyl qba'g arrq nal zbarl 
 jung ner lbh gnyxvat nobhg 
 cyrnfr- 
 v jnag- 
 vg'f abg arprffnel 
 wreel jbhyq lbh cyrnfr gnxr vg 
 v pna'g v pna'g gnxr vg 
 v jnag lbh gb unir vg 
 hapyr yrb v qba'g jnag gb unir vg 
 wreel gnxr gur zbarl 
 v qba'g jnag vg 
 wreel bcra hc jr arrq gb gnyx 
 jub'f gung 
 lbh xabj jung vg fbhaqf yvxr gur sevraq bs rynvar'f gung jnf uvggvat ba zr va gur obbx fgber 
 wreel v'yy gnxr pner bs vg 
 vf wreel va gurer 
 jryy ur pna'g or qvfgheorq abj 
 jryy guvf fvghngvba vf qevivat zr penml ur'f nyy v guvax nobhg v pna'g trg uvz bhg bs zl zvaq 
 v'z fbeel v zrna v xabj jung vg'f yvxr gb or va ybir gvrf lbh hc va xabgf naq wreel vf n irel frkl zna 
 jung 
 ybbx v'z abg whqtvat lbh va snpg jr urer ng cof jr unir znal cebtenzf pryroengvat lbhe yvsrfglyr nezvfgrnq znhcva'f gnyrf bs gur pvgl traqre oraqvat naq fjvatvat va fna senapvfpb orsber fgbarjnyy nobhg gubfr qnex ntrf jura lbh pbhyqa'g pbzr bhg bs gur pybfrg yrfg lbh or crefrphgrq orpnhfr bs lbhe lbh xabj 
 ab v qba'g 
  ner lbh qnaal gnegnohyy 
 ab v'z abg 
 v'yy gnxr pner bs guvf qnaal 
 rkphfr zr 
 jung'f gur ceboyrz 
 v oryvrir lbh phg zr bss naq gura znqr na bofprar trfgher 
 v qvq jurer 
 bhgfvqr bs znaunggna nobhg na ubhe ntb 
 jbj vf gung qnaal gnegnohyy 
 gung'f evtug bs gur arj lbex lnaxrrf 
 v'q yvxr gb funxr uvf unaq ohg v pna'g 
 v'z wreel frvasryq v gryy wbxrf sbe n yvivat ohg gurer'f ab wbxvat nobhg gur svanapvny pevfvf urer ng cof bhe yvarf ner bcra fb cyrnfr pnyy gur ahzore lbh frr ba lbhe fperra 
 guvf vf gur bayl gvzr guvf lrne jr'yy or nfxvat sbe qbangvbaf lbh'ir orra rawblvat xra oheaf' onfronyy- 
  cof cyrqtr qevir 
 uryyb v'q yvxr gb fcrnx jvgu wreel 
 bu lbh ntnva ohqql ybbx sbetrg nobhg wreel vg'f abg tbaan unccra 
 guvf vf uvf tenaqzbgure 
 bu hu anan uryyb 
 gryy wreel v'z fbeel v'z tbvat gb unir gb jevgr uvz fbzr arj purpxf 
 nf ybat nf lbh'ir tbg lbhe purpxobbx bhg ubj nobhg sbexvat n yvggyr bire gb cof lbh jngpu gur fgngvba qba'g lbh lbh qba'g jnag gb or n serrybnqre 
 -cebtenzf yvxr xra oheaf' onfronyy naq vs qnaal gnegnohyy jrer urer v'z fher ur'q fnl 'gung'f pbeerpg wreel' 
 wreel v unir na naabhaprzrag lbhe tenaqzbgure vf ba gur yvar 
 zl anan 
 naq nf jr fcrnx fur'f trarebhfyl jevgvat cof n purpx sbe svsgrra uhaqerq qbyynef 
 fur pna'g qb gung fur'f ba n irel svkrq vapbzr fgbc gur fubj 
 v tbg nabgure pneq sebz xevfgva abg dhvgr nf puvccre nf gur svefg bar 
 jbj vfa'g guvf yvggyr ohaal tvivat lbh gur- 
 lrf ur vf 
 lbh fubhyq fubj guvf gb trbetvr 
 lrnu 
  urer'f lbhe xavsr naq sbex 
 ybbx fur'f phggvat hc na nyzbaq wbl 
 v whfg qba'g trg vg 
 lbh xabj v fnj fbzrbar ba gur fgerrg rngvat z&zf jvgu n fcbba 
 jung vf jebat jvgu rirelobql 
  ybbx gurl'er qbvat vg gurl'er nyy qbvat vg 
  jung vf jebat jvgu nyy lbh crbcyr unir lbh nyy tbar znq 
 gubhfnaqf bs lrnef ntb puvarfr snezre trgf hc unf uvf oernxsnfg jvgu gur pubcfgvpxf tbrf bhg naq jbexf nyy qnl va gur svryq jvgu n fubiry uryyb fubiry abg tbvat bhg gurer cybhtuvat 40 nperf jvgu n pbhcyr bs cbby phrf 
  tbbq funir gbqnl 
  qba'g jbeel wreel v pna znantr gurfr ontf; ernyyl v'z svar 
 v'z guvaxva' bs yrggva' zl fvqroheaf tebj va n yvggyr 
 pna jr erfg urer n frpbaq 
  lrnu v thrff 
 fb ubj'f aberra 
 zzz fur'f tbg n arj oblsevraq cnhy 
 nyernql gung jnf snfg v nffhzr ur'f abg n uvtu gnyxre 
 ab ohg ur unf gur jbefg unovg jurarire ur nafjref gur cubar ur jba'g chg aberra evtug ba ln unir'gn tb guebhtu yvxr gra zvahgrf bs puvg-pung 
 n ybat gnyxre 
 lrnu naq ur vf fb obevat ohg abj jurarire ur nafjref gur cubar v whfg unat hc 
  nyy evtug; yrg'f zbir vg bhg 
 url vfa'g gung trbetr'f sngure 
 bu lrnu vg vf funyy jr fnl uryyb 
 v'ir arire frra uvz va znaunggna orsber; vg'f jrveq fb bhg bs pbagrkg 
 gung zna ur'f jvgu vf ur jrnevat n pncr 
 v oryvrir ur vf jrnevat n pncr 
 jul vf ze pbfgnamn jvgu n zna va n pncr 
 jryy vg vf tbbq pncr jrngure pbby oerrml 
 lrnu jul n pncr jub jrnef n pncr jurer qb lbh rira trg n pncr 
 lbh'er evtug; vg vf fgenatr va snpg yrg'f pebff gb gur bgure fvqr bs gur fgerrg pbire zr 
 whfg hu cybc vg ba gur pbhagre gurer 
 bu v tbg n zrffntr  
  url vg'f trbetr v tbg abguva' gb fnl  
 gung fbhaqf hetrag 
 yrg zr pnyy uvz onpx uryyb jub vf guvf qbaan punat bu v'z fbeel v zhfg b' qvnyrq gur jebat ahzore 
 qbaan punat 
  v fubhyq'ir gnyxrq gb ure; v ybir puvarfr jbzra 
 vfa'g gung n yvggyr enpvfg 
 vs v yvxr gurve enpr ubj pna gung or enpvfg uryybbb bu vf guvf qbaan punat ntnva lll-lrf v nz pnyyvat trbetr bu gur yvarf ner pebffrq lbh'er trggvat uvf pnyyf jryy jung qb lbh xabj 
 fb yvfgra 
 uv v'z tbva' guebhtu guvf fghss yvxr jngre  jub lbh gnyxva' gb  
 ur'f ba jvgu n puvarfr jbzna 
 bbbb bbbbb lbh xabj v qvt nfvna jbzra 
 lbh tbg n pbzsbeg ceboyrz gurer 
 ab v guvax gurfr wbpxrlf fuehax 
 v gubhtug lbh jber fvyx haqrejrne 
 ab ab a--jryy lbh xabj v jber 'rz sbe nobhg n zbagu ohg v pbhyqa'g fgvpx jvgu vg ab v arrq gur frpher cnpxntvat bs wbpxrlf  zl oblf arrq n ubhfr 
  gung'f avpr yvfgra xenzre lbh xabj vs lbh rire jnag gb unir xvqf lbh fubhyqa'g jrne oevrsf obkref ner zhpu orggre sbe lbhe fcrez pbhag 
 fcrez pbhag jryy ubj znal ffffcrez fubhyq v unir 
 n ybg 
 v tbg n qngr 
 jvgu gur puvarfr jbzna 
 fur xarj jub v jnf fur fnj zr va n pyho bar gvzr zl svefg qngr rire jvgu gur cnpvsvp evz v'z irel rkpvgrq 
 wreel qvq ln rire unir lbhe fcrez pbhag purpxrq 
 ab jul fubhyq v v jrne obkref 
 lbh rire trg n jbzna certanag 
 v'z fbeel xenzre gubfr erpbeqf ner creznaragyl frnyrq 
 jung jbhyq lbh fnl vs v gbyq lbh v arire vzcertangrq n jbzna 
 ernyyl lbh arire fyvccrq bar cnfg gur tbnyvr va nyy gurfr lrnef obl v'z fhecevfrq lbh'ir fyrcg jvgu n ybg bs jbzra 
 n ybg bs 'rz  qb lbh guvax znlor v'z qrcyrgrq 
 jryy v'z fher lbh'er abg gbgnyyl qrcyrgrq 
 lrnu ohg jung vs v nz v'z gur ynfg znyr xenzre jr'er snpvat rkgvapgvba 
 fb tb gb n sregvyvgl pyvavp unir lbhe fcrez pbhag purpxrq 
 lrnu ohg gura v'q unir gb  jryy lbh xabj vagb n phc va gur zvqqyr bs gur qnl 
 jung qbrf gung pbasyvpg jvgu lbhe erthyne fpurqhyr 
  nyy evtug v'z tbaan gel aberra ntnva 
 v nz irel rkpvgrq nobhg guvf qngr jr'er tbva' gb uhana onypbal 
 fur'f puvarfr fb lbh fhttrfg puvarfr sbbq 
 fur fhttrfgrq vg 
 v gubhtug puvarfr qba'g rng puvarfr 
 fur'f irel nffvzvyngrq 
 cnhy ntnva 
  lbh pna'g trg bar evat cnfg uvz 
 url url url lbh qba'g pnyy zr onpx 
 v gevrq lbhe yvar'f pebffrq jvgu n puvarfr jbzna 
 uhu 
 url trbetr jr fnj lbhe sngure ba gur fgerrg orsber 
 uzz jung'f ur qbva' va gur pvgl gbqnl 
 lbh qvqa'g nfx uvz 
  lbh qvqa'g fnl uryyb 
 jryy ur jnf jvgu fbzrbar n zna va n pncr 
 jul jnf ur jrnevat n pncr 
 jnf zl sngure jrnevat n pncr 
 ab wnpxrg naq gvr ab pncr 
 uhu pncr  jung jnf n zna jvgu n pncr qbva' jvgu zl sngure jung jnf zl sngure qbvat jvgu n zna va n pncr  jul n pncr uzz  
 gur erfhygf bs lbhe fcrez grfg ner va 
 bu 
 hzzz ner lbh cynaavat gb fgneg n snzvyl 
 lrf v jbhyq yvxr gb irel zhpu jryy v'z ybj nera'g v v pn--v pna srry vg 
 lrf v'z nsenvq lbh'er n yvggyr ybj 
 buuu znnna vg'f bire gur xenzre anzr vf svavfurq v'z arire tbva' gb cebperngr-- 
 nu--gung'f abg arprffnevyl gehr 
 jung 
 gurer ner zrnfherf lbh pna gnxr gb vzcebir lbhe sregvyvgl 
 nyy evtug nyy evtug jung jung lbh gryy zr; v'yy qb nalguvat pbzr ba qbp gryy zr 
 svefg guvat lbh fubhyq jrne obkre fubegf 
 nyy gur gvzr 
 nyy gur gvzr ln unir gb trg bss wbpxrlf evtug njnl 
 lrnu ohg v'ir nyjnlf jbea wbpxrlf 
 uv cnhy vg'f rynvar pnyyvat lrnu v'z pnyyvat sebz n pne cubar fb v qba'g ernyyl unir gvzr gb gnyx vf vf hu aberra gurer bu fur'f abg  bxnl terng jryy lbh pna whfg gryy ure v pnyyrq gura na'-- jryy lrf vg unf orra hafrnfbanoyl pbby yngryl bu bxnl jryy ybbx v'z chyyvat hc gb gur ohvyqvat abj fb v'z tbaan  lrnu v gbbx 20% gbb hz ybbx vg hu  cnhy gur pne frrzf gb or ehaavat bhg bs tnf fb v'z tbaan unir gb trg bss gur cubar  
 cyrnfr yrg zr xabj jura gur erfg bs lbhe cnegl unf neevirq fve 
 lrf v jvyy 
  qb lbh zvaq 
 ab tb nurnq v frpbaq-unaq fzbxr gjb cnpxf n qnl 
 wreel 
  'fphfr zr 
 uv fbeel v'z yngr 
 jub ner lbh 
 v'z qbaan punat 
  j-jung qb lbh zrna 
 v zrna v'z qbaan punat 
  lbh'er qbaan punat 
 qvq lbh guvax v jnf puvarfr 
 bu ab jung lbh zrna orpnhfr bs gur "punat" 
 npghnyyl gur snzvyl anzr jnfa'g bevtvanyyl punat 
 v qvqa'g guvax fb 
 hfrq gb or "punatfgrva" 
 fur'f abg puvarfr 
 ab abg puvarfr abg rira nfvna 
 fb jung vf fur 
 jryy fur'f yvxr lbh 
  bu ubj qvfnccbvagrq lbh zhfg unir orra  
 jryy vg'f snyfr nqiregvfvat frr naq gur guvat vf v guvax fur yvxrf crbcyr guvaxva' fur'f puvarfr fur fhttrfgf puvarfr sbbq fur nyjnlf vagebqhprf urefrys nf "qbaan punat" 
 fb gura jul ner lbh frrvat ure ntnva 
 jryy fur vf n jbzna 
 yvfgra v fcbxr gb cnhy na' aberra gurl zvtug or oernxva' hc 
 ernyyl  
 jryy znlor 
 url jbhyqa'g vg or shaal vs cnhy na' aberra oebxr hc orpnhfr b' lbh xrcg unatva' hc ba uvz 
  jung qb lbh zrna 
 jryy lbh xabj vs cnhy gubhtug vg jnf fbzr thl unatva' hc orpnhfr ur jnf univat na nssnve jvgu aberra 
 urer gnxr zl wbpxrl fubegf 
 jubn jubn 
 urer jung vf gung 
 ybbx lbh tbggn uryc zr v unir gb trg bss wbpxrl fubegf 
 jun--lbh unir n ybj fcrez pbhag 
 irel ybj pbzr ba wreel gnxr 'rz 
 aaabb--v qba'g jnag 'rz  
 wreel ybbx lbh tbggn uryc zr v pna'g unir 'rz arne zr vs v unir bar cnve va zl ubhfr v'z tbaan jrne gurz 
 ybbx v qba'g jnag 'rz 
 nyy vg gnxrf vf bar cnve abj pbzr ba w-- 
 v'z abg tbaan or noyr gb fyrrc vs gubfr ner va gur ubhfr 
 obkref ubj qb lbh jrne gurfr guvatf ybbx ng gung--gurl'er onttva' hc gurl'er evfvat va na' gurer'f abguvat ubyqvat zr va cynpr v'z syvccva' v'z sybccva' 
 jung nz v tbaan qb wreel v'z tbva' penml va gurfr guvatf  
  jryy v'z tbaan unir gb zbir abj 
 ln xabj jung v yvxr nobhg znaunggna gurer'f ab zbfdhvgbrf 
 cyragl bs zbfdhvgbrf 
 dhrraf vf shyy bs zbfdhvgbrf 
 fb qnq 
 tangf gbb vs v'z abg zvfgnxra 
  qnq v urneq lbh jrer va gur pvgl gur bgure qnl 
  lbhe zbgure unf gb gryy lbh rirel zbir v znxr 
 wreel naq rynvar fnj lbh 
 gurl qvqa'g fnl uryyb 
 jryy gurl jrer va n ehfu 
 gurl pbhyqa'g whfg fnl uryyb bu gb uryy jvgu gurz 
 gurl hu fnvq lbh jrer jvgu fbzr thl jub jnf jrnevat n pncr 
 rynvar v pna frr abg fnlva' uryyb fur'f irel--jung'f gur jbeq--hu fhcrepvyvbhf 
 fb qnq-- 
  ubj pbhyq wreel abg fnl uryyb 
 qvq gurl hapebff gur yvarf lrg 
 ab gurl pna'g svaq gur ceboyrz vg'f ernyyl trggvat evqvphebhf 
  qvq lbh fnl "evqvphebhf" 
 evqvphybhf 
  v gubhtug lbh fnvq "evqvphebhf"  
 url--  
 bu jung ner lbh qbvat urer 
 bu v jnagrq gb gnyx gb lbh--v'z fbeel v--qvqa'g xabj lbh  unq pbzcnal  uvln v'z trbetr 
 bu uv  v'z qbaan punat  v whfg fcbxr gb lbhe zbgure orsber 
 lbh fcbxr gb zl zbgure 
 fur jnf gelvat gb pnyy lbh ohg-- 
 gur evarf ner pebffrq 
 qvq lbh fnl "gur evarf ner pebffrq" 
 qvq v 
  trbetr fur'f fb fjrrg jr gnyxrq sbe na ubhe 
  lrnu 
 naljnl v'z ernyyl fbeel 
 fbeel jul fbeel jung lbh tbg gb or fbeel nobhg 
 jryy fur gbyq zr fur naq lbhe sngure ner trggvat qvibeprq 
 nl qvibeprq gung'f ernyyl gbb onq 
 lrnu lbh xabj vg'f n funzr uvf cneragf qvqa'g trg qvibeprq guvegl lrnef ntb ur pbhyq unir orra abezny 
 bu zl tbq  lbh xabj jung v whfg ernyvmrq vs gurl trg qvibeprq na' yvir va gjb frcnengr cynprf gung'f gjvpr nf znal ivfvgf 
 trr v arire gubhtug bs gung 
 vzntvar vs v unq gb frr gurz obgu ba gur fnzr qnl  unun vg'f yvxr ehaava' n qbhoyr znenguba 
 url trbetvr qvq lbh unir nal vqrn gung nalguvat jnf jebat 
 unir lbh rire fcrag nal gvzr jvgu gurfr crbcyr 
 lbh xabj jung guvf unf gb qb jvgu 
 jung 
 gur zna va gur pncr--v org lbh ur vf zvkrq hc va guvf v qba'g gehfg zra va pncrf 
 naq lbh pna'g pnfg nfcrefvbaf ba fbzrbar whfg orpnhfr gurl'er jrneva' n pncr fhcrezna jber n pncr na' v'yy or qnzarq vs v'z tbaan fgnaq urer na' yrg lbh fnl fbzrguvat onq nobhg uvz 
 nyy evtug fhcrezna'f gur rkprcgvba 
 bu url rynvar v whfg urneq gung aberra naq cnhy ner oernxvat hc v jnag lbh gb chg va n tbbq jbeq sbe zr  v'ir nyjnlf unq n guvat sbe aberra 
 ab xenzre lbh qba'g haqrefgnaq guvf pbhyq or zl snhyg 
 jryy vs fur'f ninvynoyr abj v'z abg tbaan yrg ure fyvc guebhtu zl svatref guvf gvzr abbbcr  
 jryy vg ybbxf yvxr lbh'ir nqwhfgrq gb gur obkref 
 jryyyy v jbhyqa'g tb nf sne nf gung 
 lbh jrag onpx gb gur wbpxrlf 
 jebat ntnva 
  bu ab 
 jung jung 
 qba'g lbh frr jung'f tbva' ba urer ab obkref ab wbpxrlf 
  rrnnjjj 
 gur bayl guvat orgjrra uvz naq hf vf n guva ynlre bs tnoneqvar xenzre fnl vg vfa'g fb 
 bu vg or fb v'z bhg gurer wreel na' v'z yyybiva' rirel zvahgr bs vg 
 qba'g lbh arrq n yvggyr uryc 
 fhecevfvatyl ab v'z serrr v'z hasrggrerq  srry yvxr n anxrq vaabprag obl eeebnzva' gur pbhagelfvqr  
 fb lbh thlf ner gelva' gb jbex vg bhg gung'f terng 
 lrnu jryy jr'er gelvat ohg ur whfg jrag vafnar gurer sbe n juvyr 
 bu ur jrag vafnar 
 oryvrir vg be abg cnhy jnf pbaivaprq v jnf univat na nssnve orpnhfr fbzrobql xrcg pnyyvat naq unatvat hc jurarire ur nafjrerq jung xvaq bs n fvpx crefba pnyyf naq unatf hc bire naq bire 
  jryy hu v qba'g xabj nobhg fvpx v zrna znlor vg jnf fbzrobql jub qvqa'g jnaan gnyx gb jubrire jnf nafjrevat orpnhfr jubrire jnf nafjrevat jnf nyjnlf znxvat obevat puvg-pung na' jnf pbzcyrgryl boyvivbhf gb gur snpg gung gur crefba jub jnf pnyyvat qvqa'g jnag gb fcrnx gb gurz nu 
  v pna'g oryvrir gung jnf lbh 
  v'z ernyyl fbeel aberra 
  fb lbh gubhtug ur jnf obevat 
 url aberra qba'g tb ol zr un un 
 jung ner lbh qbva' gb guvf jbzna guvf vf gur frpbaq eryngvbafuvc lbh'ir ehvarq sbe ure va n srj jrrxf 
  v xabj-- 
 svefg lbh ehva ure eryngvbafuvc jvgu gur uvtu gnyxre 
 jryy v tbg pbashfrq gurl fbhaq rknpgyl gur fnzr 
 fb fur oernxf hc jvgu uvz fbzrubj cvpxf hc gur cvrprf bs ure yvsr zvenphybhfyl zrrgf n arj thl ln ohfg gung hc na' gura whfg nf gurl'er erpbapvyvat lbh naabhapr gb gur jbeyq ur'f obevat 
  v qvqa'g xabj fur'q gnxr vg fb frevbhfyl 
 jryy nccneragyl lbh unir n gerzraqbhf vasyhrapr bire guvf jbzna nalguvat lbh fnl fur qbrf 
 lrnu 
 vg'f qbaan punat 
  pbzr ba hc  
 jryy v thrff v whfg qvqa'g ernyvmr vg 
 jryy yrg'f ybbx onpx ng lbhe uvfgbel jvgu guvf jbzna bxnl 
  bxnl 
 svefg lbh rapbhentrq ure gb wbva gur nezl fur qvq 
 fur jnf ybfg 
 gura lbh fhttrfg fur tbrf njby fur qvq 
 jryy fur qvqa'g frrz gb or univa' fb zhpu sha 
 lbh xabj lbh orggre znxr fher naq arire gryy guvf jbzna gb whzc bss gur oebbxyla oevqtr 
 vs v unir guvf zhpu vasyhrapr bire ure jul qba'g v whfg pnyy ure na' gryy ure gb trg onpx gbtrgure jvgu uvz--gung'f nnyyy 
 uv 
 bu zvff punatfgrva guvf vf rynvar 
 uryyyb--rynvar uv ubj ner lbh) 
  thrff jung zef pbfgnamn pnyyrq zr gurl'er abg trggvat qvibeprq 
  bu 
 jul jung unccrarq 
 jryy fur jnf gelvat gb pnyy trbetr ynfg avtug fur tbg zr jr fcbxr sbe na ubhe naq fur punatrq ure zvaq 
 jbj gung'f nznmvat 
 naljnl fur jnagf gb zrrg zr fur vaivgrq zr bire sbe qvaare 
  uhu 
 fur fnvq lbh fubhyq pbzr gbb 
 gbavtug 
 lrnu--v whfg erzrzorerq v'z tbaan unir gb pnapry zl nphchapgher pynff  
 nyy evtug  yrg zr whfg fnl bar guvat gurer vf ab jnl gung guvf vf tbaan unccra lbh urne zr ab jnl orpnhfr vs lbh guvax v'z tbvat' gb gjb gunaxftvivatf lbh'er bhg bs lbhe zvaq 
  jr'er abg trggvat qvibeprq 
 lbhe zbgure punatrq ure zvaq  
  lbh qvq gung'f tbbbq gung'f irel tbbq v'z irel tynq gb urne gung 
 lrnu jr jbexrq vg bhg 
 nyy evtug fb yrg zr nfx lbh n dhrfgvba jub jnf gur zna va gur pncr 
 ur jnf zl ynjlre 
 lbhe ynjlre jrnef n pncr 
 lrnu fb jung 
 jub jrnef n pncr 
 ur'f irel vaqrcraqrag; ur qbrfa'g sbyybj gur geraqf 
 ur ybbxf evqvphybhf va gung guvat 
  lbh unir ab rlr sbe snfuvba 
  v unir ab rlr sbe snfuvba 
 nyy evtug pbzr ba yrg'f abg svtug 
 nyy evtug nyy evtug 
 trbetvr'f evtug  
  ruu  fb jung znqr lbh punatr lbhe zvaq 
 vg jnf gung puvarfr jbzna 
 fb v'z phevbhf jung'q lbh gryy zef pbfgnamn gung punatrq ure zvaq 
 v zragvbarq n srj ovgf bs jvfqbz sebz pbashpvhf 
 pbashpvhf uhu 
 lrnu 
  lbh xabj lbh'er abg puvarfr 
 url v urneq gur tbbq arjf 
 wreel ubj pbzr lbh qvqa'g fnl uryyb gb zr gur bgure qnl uhu 
 rynvar jnf va n ehfu 
  v xarj vg jnf rynvar 
 lbh zhfg or rfgryyr 
  lrf jub ner lbh 
 v'z qbaan punat 
  lbh'er abg puvarfr 
 l'ryyb 
 cnhy 
 rynvar 
 xenzre 
  lrnuu 
 jung ner lbh qbva' gurer 
 jryyyy vfa'g vg boivbhf 
  hu vf aberra gurer 
 lrf fur vf 
  jryy pna v gnyx gb ure 
 bu jung nz v gbbb obevat sbe lbh 
  nyevtug--jbhyq lbh whfg chg ure ba 
 jryy v srry gung vg jbhyq or orfg gung lbh qvqa'g gnyx gb aberra sbe n juvyr 
 lbh srry 
 gung'f evtug fur na' v unir unq n irel ybat gnyx na' v jnf nccnyyrq gb yrnea bs gur qrfgehpgvir vasyhrapr lbh'ir unq bire ure yvsr yb gurfr znal lrnef 
 jung ner lbh vafnar 
 sebz abj ba v'yy or pnyyvat gur fubgf nebhaq urer 
 hu ub-ub na' jung ner lbh tbaan gryy ure 
 jryy v'ir rapbhentrq ure gb tb onpx vagb gur nezl gurer fur'yy trg gur fgehpgher na' gur qvfpvcyvar fur arrqf evtug abj naq fur'yy unir dhnyvsvrq bssvpref gryyvat ure jung gb qb 
  xenzre lbh unir tbg gb yrg zr gnyx gb ure 
 pna'g uryc ln xvq 
 trg gur--  
 lbh'er abg puvarfr 
 ab 
 v gubhtug lbh jrer puvarfr 
 v'z sebz ybat vfynaq 
 ybat vfynaq v gubhtug v jnf trggva' nqivpr sebz n puvarfr jbzna 
 v'z fbeel 
 jryy gura gung punatrf rirelguvat 
 jung 
 fur'f abg puvarfr; v jnf qhcrq 
 fb jung fur fgvyy tnir lbh nqivpr; jung'f gur qvssrerapr vs fur'f abg puvarfr 
 v'z abg gnxvat nqivpr sebz fbzr tvey sebz ybat vfynaq  
  jnvg n zvahgr lbh'er--abj lbh'er trggvat n qvibepr orpnhfr fur'f sebz ybat vfynaq 
  lbh jnag n qvibepr lbh tbg bar 
  lbh xabj lbh zvtug jnaan guvax nobhg punatva' lbhe anzr 
 fb rire fvapr fur fgnegrq qngvat xenzre fur jba'g rira gnyx gb zr 
 jryy--aberra yvfgrarq gb lbh yvxr trbetr'f zbgure yvfgrarq gb gur puvarfr  
  lbh xabj rirelobql yvfgraf gb gur puvarfr v zrna ybbx ng gur sbeghar pbbxvr lbh pbhyqa'g trg njnl jvgu gung va nal bgure erfgnhenag 
  uh_hu  lbh xabj rirelobql yvfgraf gb gur puvarfr v zrna ybbx ng gur sbeghar pbbxvr lbh pbhyqa'g trg njnl jvgu gung va nal bgure erfgnhenag 
 lrnu ab bar'f ernqvat nal ebyyrq-hc zrffntrf va n xavfu 
 bu vg unq gb unccra 
 url 
 v xarj vg  v cerqvpgrq vg  fnj obgu bs gurz gbqnl jung n qvfnfgre v'z ehaava' nyy bire dhrraf svefg v fnj zl zbgure jr unq yhapu gbtrgure arire unq yhapu jvgu zl zbgure orsber--vg'f yvxr n qngr gura jr qevir qbja gb xrj tneqraf gbaf bs genssvp v frr zl sngure jr cynlrq "pyhr" nyy qnl jvgu guvf [xrj tneqraf ] 
  url wreel thrff jung gur xenzre anzr zvtug yvir ba aberra'f yngr fur'f ynnngr  
  jub ner lbh 
 v'z senax pbfgnamn'f ynjlre  
 fb fur tbg lbh gb wbva n obbx pyho 
 v tbg n srryvat v'z tbaan or zhpu fznegre guna lbh cerggl fbba 
 jryy v guvax gung fgngrzrag nybar ersyrpgf lbhe ohetrbavat vagryyvtrapr  url jung nobhg guvf bar 
 anu v qba'g yvxr gung bar 
 fb jung'f lbhe svefg obbx 
 "oernxsnfg ng gvssnal'f" 90 cntrf  
 vg'f xvaqn byq vfa'g vg 
 gurl jnagrq gb ernq n gehzna pncbgr obbx 
 bu fhergehzna pncbgr 
 ur'f n terng jevgre 
 bu lrnu 
 qvq lbh rire ernq nalguvat ol uvz 
 ab lbh 
 anu 
 bu jung nobhg guvf bar ybbx ng guvf guvf vf vg guvf vf jung v'z ybbxvat sbe  bu lrnu 
 url jung'f tbvat ba 
 arj pbhpu onol 
 arj pbhpu jul 
 v ybir guvf pbhpu lbh xabj jung gur orfg cneg nobhg vg vf vg qbrfa'g sbyq bhg fb ab bar pna fyrrc bire 
 uryyb 
 uryyb 
 bu yrg zr trg gur qbbe sbe lbh  bbu or pnershy 
 jnvg gvyy lbh frr vg vg'f cresrpg gur thl gbyq zr vg'f bar bs n xvaq gurl fgbccrq znxvat vg 
 jung ner lbh qbvat jvgu lbhe byq pbhpu 
 abguvat gur zbivat thlf ner gnxvat vg jul lbh jnag vg 
 lrnu v'yy gnxr vg 
 jryy v'z fher gung gurl pna qryvire vg gb lbhe ncnegzrag 
 lrf gurl pna  
 url pbhpu vf pbzva' 
 vg'f urer 
 nyevtug lrnu lbh xabj v'z rkpvgrq nobhg guvf wreel va n jnl v srry yvxr v'z trggvat n arj pbhpu 
 lrnu fb qb v 
 bbu erzrzore cbccvr 
 bu lbh zrna sebz cbccvr'f erfgnhenag 
 lrnu lrnu naljnl hujr'er tbvat vagb ohfvarff gbtrgure erzrzore gung vqrn v unq n srj lrnef ntb nobhg gur cvmmn cynpr jurer lbh znxr lbhe bja cvmmn 
 lrnu 
 jung jnf gung ntnva 
 vg'f n cvmmn cynpr jurer lbh znxr lbhe bja cvr jr tvir lbh gur qbhtu gur fnhpr gur purrfrlbh cbhaq vg fync vg lbh syvc vg hc vagb gur nvelbh chg lbhe gbccvatf ba naq lbh fyvqr vg vagb gur bira fbhaqf tbbq uhu 
 bbu v pna'g jnvg gb trg zr n sryyn naq znxr znu bja cvr 
 jung znqr lbh erfheerpg gung byq vqrn 
 jryy v unccrarq gb or rngvat ng cbccvr'f jura v gbyq uvz gur "byq" vqrn naq uvf rlrf - jnnnnnnu - whfg yvg hc lbh xabj ur jnagf gb onpx vg 
 v urneq cbccvr'f jnf tbbq yrg'f tb 
 v'z abg tbva' gurer qvqa'g ur trg ohfgrq ol gur obneq bs urnygu 
 gung jnf va gur cnfg wreel nf vg unccraf arj lbex zntnmvar whfg whqtrq uvf xvgpura gb or bar bs gur pyrnarfg va gur pvgl gurl tbg n qhpx gurer lbh guvax lbh qvrq naq jrag gb urnira 
 bbu v ybir qhpx p'zba p'zba 
 lrnu ohg lbh tbggn beqre vg gjb qnlf va nqinapr  lbh xabj v'z tbaan pnyy uvz v'z tbaan beqre gur qhpx sbe lbh 
 bu xenzre v - 
 evtug gurer thlf gung'f cresrpg nu junggn ln guvax ynvavr 
 jryy v qba'g xabj v'yy unir gb fvg ba vg 
 bu ab v qba'g jnag nalbar fvggvat ba vg 
 fvta urer 
 rkphfr zr v jnf jbaqrevat vs jbhyq vg or cbffvoyr vs lbh pbhyq qryvire gur byq pbhpu gb zl ncnegzrag vg'f abg irel sne 
 fher 
 'xnl lbh hulbh tbg ebbz va gur gehpx sbe zr 
 lrnu v guvax jr pna fdhrrmr lbh va 
 bu tbbql bxnl jryy huv'yy frr lbh puhzcf yngre  
 qvq lbh bssre gubfr thlf n qevax 
 hu ab fubhyq v unir 
 jung xvaq bs n crefba ner lbh 
 v qba'g xabj 
 bxnl "oernxsnfg ng gvssnal'f"  
 fb ur chgf gur pbhpu qbja naq whfg nf ur'f nobhg gb yrnir ur fnlf "qb lbh qngr zbivat zra" 
 nu un 
 lbh jnaan xabj jung v fnvq 
 v pna'g jnvg 
 "v qb abj" 
 pyrire 
 vf gung fbzrguvat 
 lrf 
 vf gung fbzrguvat 
 lbh'er fbzrguvat fb naljnl jura gurl jrer va zl ubhfr orsber v qvqa'g bssre gurz nalguvat gb qevax 
 jryy gurl'er erny zra wreel gurl trg fjrngl 
 fb nalbar fjrngl pbzrf vagb lbhe ubhfr unf gb or bssrerq n qevax

 jryy jbhyq lbh ncbybtvmr sbe zr  
 uryyb wreel fb tbbq gb frr lbh ntnva  
 uryyb cbccvr guvf vf rynvar 
 avpr gb zrrg lbh cbccvr 
 yrg zr fubj lbh gb lbhe gnoyr  lbhe qhpx vf pbbxvat nf jr fcrnx vg vf fb fhpphyragfb fhpphyrag 
 jryy xenzre gbyq hf nyy nobhg lbhe ohfvarff iragher gbtrgure 
 lbhe sevraq naq v ner tbvat gb znxr n ybg bs zbarl bs pbhefr v nyernql unir n ybg bs zbarl cbccvr qbrf irel jryyirel jryy 
 jryy lbhe zbgure zhfg or irel cebhq bs lbh 
 zl zbgurejnf gnxra sebz zl ubhfr ol gur pbzzhavfgf va gur zvqqyr bs gur avtug jura v jnf gra lrnef byq fur jnf frag gb n fynir ynobe pnzc jurer fur ynoberq sbe gjryir lrnef svanyyl gurl eryrnfrq ure naq fur jnf ba n obng gb nzrevpn gb er-havgr jvgu hfohg fur jnf freirq fbzr onq svfu naq fur qvrqba gur uvtu frnf 
 fb jung'f tbbq gbavtug 
 obl v'z ernyyl ybbxvat sbejneq gb guvf qhpx v'ir arire unq sbbq beqrerq va nqinapr orsber 
 nu v pbhyq'ir fgnlrq ubzr naq beqrerq n cvmmn sebz cnppvab'f 
 cnppvab'f bu ab lbh fubhyq arire beqre cvmmn sebz cnppvab'f 
 jul abg 
 orpnhfr gur bjare pbagevohgrf n ybg bs zbarl gb gubfr snangvpny nagv-nobegvba tebhcf 
 fb lbh jba'g rng gur cvmmn 
 ab jnl 
 ernyyl 
 lrnu 
 jryy jung vs cbccvr sryg gur fnzr jnl 
 jryy v thrff v jbhyqa'g rng urer gura 
 ernyyl 
 lrnu gung'f evtug 
 jryy creuncf jr fubhyq vadhver cbccvr bu cbccvr pbhyq v unir n jbeq  
 lrf wreel v whfg purpxrq lbhe qhpxvg vf zber fhpphyrag guna rira v unq ubcrq 
 cbccvr v jnf whfg phevbhfjurer qb lbh fgnaq ba gur nobegvba vffhr 
 jura zl zbgure jnf noqhpgrq ol gur pbzzhavfgf fur jnf jvgu puvyq 
 bu obl 
 ohg gur pbzzhavfgf gurl chg na raq gb gung fb ba guvf vffhr gurer vf ab qrongr naq ab vagryyvtrag crefba pna guvax qvssreragyl 
 jryycbccvr v guvax qvssreragyl 
 naq jung tvirf lbh gur evtug gb qb gung 
 gur fhcerzr pbheg tvirf zr gur evtug gb qb gung yrg'f tb wreel p'zba 
 v urneq gung yrg'f tb urael 
 ohg jr whfg tbg urer 
 v'z jvgu lbh cbccvr 
 yrg'f tb 
 naq v nz abg pbzvat onpx 
 lbh'er abg jrypbzr 
 jryy v'z pregnvayl tynq v oebhtug vg hc  
 jryy lbh fubhyq unir frra vg vg jnf dhvgr n fprar bire gurer 
 v'z fbeel v zvffrq vg 
 bu lbh ernyyl zvffrq fbzrguvat naq v unir gb fnlvg jnf cerggl zhpu nyy zl snhyg  fb ubj'f gur obbx pbzvat  v fnl ubj'f gur obbx pbzva' 
 bucerggl tbbq 
 fb jung'f vg nobhg

 ubyyl tb-yvtugyl 
 lrnu fur'f dhvgr n punenpgre 
 lrf lbh unira'g ernq n cntr unir lbh 
 ab 
 ovt fhecevfr 
 v pbhyqa'g lbh xabj vs vg'f abg nobhg fcbegf v svaq vg irel uneq gb pbapragengr 
 lbh'er abg irel oevtug ner lbh 
 ab v'z abg v jbhyq yvxr gb or ohg v'z abg jung nz v tbaan qb gur obbx pyho zrrgf va n srj qnlf 
 jul qba'g lbh erag gur zbivr 
 'jul qba'g v erag gur zbivr' frr guvf vf jura v yvxr lbh nyevtug abj v'z eryvrirq  
 fbubj jnf gur qvaare ynfg avtug 
 bujryy 
 qvq lbh rawbl gur qhpx  bu rynvar v jnf whfg nfxvat ubj qvaare jrag ynfg avtug 
 bujryy 
 nyevtug jung qvq lbh qb gb cbccvr 
 abguvat 
 jryy ur'f va gur ubfcvgny naq gur pbbx fnlf lbh chg uvz gurer 
 jung'f jebat jvgu uvz 
 v qba'g xabj v'z tbaan tb naq ivfvg uvz yngre  vg jbhyq or avpr vs lbh tbg uvz fbzrguvat  
 jr fubhyq trg uvz fbzrguvat 
 lrnu lbh'er evtug 
 qb lbh xabj gung v unir orra hfvat gur fnzr obggyr bs funzcbb sbe n lrne naq v funzcbb rirel qnl  fb jung qb lbh guvax bs zl pbairefngvba 
 abg zhpu  v hu jbhyq unir vaivgrq lbh hc ohg v qba'g unir nal sheavgher 
 lbh qba'g unir nal sheavgher 
 ab v ungr sheavgher v pna'g ybbx ng vg  
 jryy v pna haqrefgnaq gung cerggl tbbq qngr uhu 
 lrnu ab urnil yvsgvat  
 naljnl wreel naq rynvar sryg irel onqyl nobhg jung unccrarq gb lbh naq gurl jnagrq lbh gb unir guvf 
 jung'f guvf n obggyr bs jvar naq n svir-nynez puvyv gurl'er gelvat gb xvyy cbccvr 
 jul jung 
 qba'g gurl xabj v unir n tnfgeb-vagrfgvany qvfbeqre vs v jbhyq unir nal bs guvf v jbhyq qvr gura cbccvr'f ab tbbq gb nalbar guvf vf n fvpx fvpx wbxr ba cbccvr ubj pbhyq lbh or sevraqf jvgu gubfr gjb 
 jryy jr'er abg irel pybfr 
 gurl bjr zr sbe gubfr qhpxf gurl jrer sybja va sebz arjsbhaqynaq 
 bu gurl tbg tbbq qhpxf gurer uhu 
 bu irel tbbq qhpxf 
 v'z va ybbbir 
 jubn 
 guvf vf vg wreel guvf vf vg ur vf fhpu na vaperqvoyr crefba ur'f erny ur'f ubarfg ur'f hacergragvbhfbu v'z ernyyl yhpxl 
 qvq lbh gryy uvz v jnf fbeel v qvqa'g bssre uvz gur qevax 
 ab v sbetbg naq gur orfg cneg vf ur qbrfa'g cynl tnzrf lbh xabj gurer ner ab tnzrf  
 ab tnzrf jung vf gur cbvag bs qngvat jvgubhg tnzrf ubj qb lbh xabj vs lbh'er jvaavat be ybfvat 
 jryy nyy v xabj vf ur qbrfa'g yvxr tnzrf naq ur qbrfa'g cynl tnzrf lbh xabj ur unf gbb zhpu punenpgre naq vagrtevgl 
 nu un naq jung vf uvf fgnaq ba nobegvba 
 jung 
 jung vf uvf fgnaqba nobegvba 
 jryy v'z fher ur'f ceb-pubvpr 
 ubj qb lbh xabj 
 orpnhfr ur jryyur'f whfg fb tbbq-ybbxvat 
 jryy lbh fubhyq cebonoyl nfx orpnhfr vs ur'f tbaan or pbzvat bire jvgu gubfr cnppvab'f cvmmnfpbhyq or gebhoyr 
 v'q yvxr gb erag oernxsnfg ng gvssnal'f 
 hu guvf vf bhg fbzrbar unf vg 
 bhg bu ab v'ir orra gb sbhe bgure cynprf lbh'er gur bayl barf gung unir unq vg 
 jryy v pbhyq chg vg ba erfreir sbe lbh vs lbh'q yvxr 
 znlor jr pbhyq pnyy gurz naq nfx gurz gb erghea vg 
 bu fbeel jr pna'g qb gung 
 jryy znlor gurl'er qbar jvgu vg v pbhyq tb cvpx vg hc 
 v qba'g guvax fb vg qbrfa'g jbex gung jnl 
 lrf 
 hu rkphfr zr ner lbh wbr grzcyr 
 lrf 
 hu lrf hulbh qba'g xabj zr zl anzr vf trbetr pbfgnamnqvq lbh unccra gb erag oernxsnfg ng gvssnal'f 
 url 
 url jung'f unccrava' 
 jryy lbh xabj cbccvr'f bire ng zl cynpr gbavtug'f gur ovt avtug v'z tbaan znxr gur svefg grfg cvmmn ng gur erfgnhenag 
 lbh tbg n erthyne 'znaunggna cebwrpg' tbvat ba bire gurer 
 lrnu naljnl ur'f nobhg gb yrnir ur jnagf gur qhpx zbarl  
 bxnl uv cbccvr 
 uryyb 
 v'z fbeel nobhg gur tvsg v qvqa'g xabj nobhg lbhe pbaqvgvba 
 gung'f svar vs lbh whfg tvir zr zl qhpx zbarl v'yy or ba zl jnl 
 bxnl v'yy trg vg  
 jul qba'g lbh fvg qbja cbccvr lbh'er fgvyy erphcrengvat  jung ner lbh gverq cbccvr 
 ab 
 url cbccvrlbh ernyyl guvax crbcyr jnaan znxr gurve bja cvmmn 
 xenzre qvq v rire gryy lbh nobhg zl zbgure zl zbgure -

 v'z fher vg'yy pbzr bhg

 evtug 
 jryy naljnl gur obbx pyho zrrgf gbzbeebj ze grzcyr

 jung sevraq

 cbcpbea

 urer'f fbzr ahgf

 naqphphzoref

 wbrpbhyq lbh

 fher 
 jung ner lbh qbvat jvgu guvf pbhpu 
 trbetr vf gnxvat vg 
 qvq lbh gryy uvz vg jnf crrq ba

 guebj vg 
 gur pbhpu 
 fur qvqa'g jnag gur pbafgenvagf bs nal eryngvbafuvc gung'f jul fur tbg evq bs gur png gur zbfg vzcbegnag guvat va ubyyl'f yvsr jnf ure vaqrcraqrapr 
 jryy abg ernyyl nsgre nyy fur qvq trg gbtrgure jvgu trbetr crccneq v zrna serq 
 trbetrserq'f tnl 
 v'ir arire orra noyr gb svther bhg jul gurl znxr gurfr ovmneer gbvyrg frngf gung gurl unir lbh xabj yvxr gubfr pyrne yhpvgr barf jvgu nyy gur gur pbvaf va vg vg'f n ybiryl gevohgr gb bhe cnfg cerfvqrag ol gur jnl vg'f abg onq rabhtu yvapbya tbg fubg va gur urnq jr tbggn chyy qbja bhe cnagf naq fvg ba uvz gbb vg'f whfg vapbzcerurafvoyr gung lbh jbhyq ohl n guvat yvxr guvf lbh vafgnyy vg ba lbhe gbvyrg frng naq guvf fnlf jung nobhg lbh "jryy v pna'g nssbeq gb whfg guebj zbarl qbja gur gbvyrg ohg ybbx ubj pybfr v nz" 
 v pnaabg oryvrir yvaqfnl'f fgvyy frrvat lbh nsgre gung "oernxsnfg ng gvssnal'f" guvat 
 v guvax fur svaqf zl fghcvqvgl punezvat 
 nf jr nyy qb 
 lrnu naljnl fur'f hu univat fbzr xvaq bs n snzvyl yhapu v'yy fjvat ol nsgre 
 bu fb lbh'er tbaan zrrg gur zbgure 
 lrnu v'yy mvc va "ubj qb lbh qb" mvc bhg fur'yy ybir zr 
 lbh'er tbbq jvgu gur zbguref 
 l'xabj v'z orggre jvgu gur zbguref guna v nz jvgu gur qnhtugref 
 znlor lbh fubhyq qngr gur zbguref 
 jryy vs v pbhyq gnyx gb gur zbguref naq unir frk jvgu gur qnhtugref gura v'q ernyyl unir fbzrguvat tbva' 
 bu lbh tbg fbzrguvat tbva' 
 lrnu 
  url 
 url  
 url lbh tbg n unzzre 
 jung qb lbh arrq n unzzre sbe 
 jryy v tbg guvf arj cbfgre 3-q neg pbzchgref trarengr 'rz 
 bu lrnu v jnaan frr gung oevat vg bire 
 ab ab v qba'g unir vg abj v tbggn cvpx vg hc ng ze cvgg'f rynvar jnf senzvat n ohapu bs fghss sbe uvz fb fur qvq zr n snibe jung lbh jnaan gnxr n evqr 
 anu v qba'g guvax fb 
  trbetr lbh jnaan tb sbe n evqr 
  anu 
 bu pbzr ba 
 url pbhyq lbh jnvg hagvy gur zna svavfurf 
 nyy evtug v'ir unq vg jvgu lbh gjb  
 url thrff jung erzrzore gung jbzna lbh fnj zr jvgu gur bgure qnl lbh xabj fur hfrq gb or na bylzcvp tlzanfg 
 n tlzanfg 
 lrnu fur'f ebznavna fur jba n fvyire ng gur '84 bylzcvpf 
 n tlzanfg wreel guvax bs gur syrkvovyvgl zzz gung frk'yy zryg lbhe snpr 
 lrnu jryy v guvax v'z onvyvat 
  "onvyvat" 
 lrnu lbh xabj xenzre gurer'f nyjnlf n cevpr gb cnl sbe whfg n frkhny qnyyvnapr 
 wreel lbh fubhyq cnl gung cevpr 
 fur'f ebznavna jung nz v tbaan gnyx gb ure nobhg prnhfrfph 
 pu- bb- jung 
  n tlzanfg v pna'g oryvrir vg lbh qvqa'g gryy zr fur jnf n tlzanfg 
  jung vf guvf 
 jung v'z chggva' zl fuveg onpx ba 
  "onpx ba" jung jnf vg qbvat bss 
 v gnxr vg bss jura v tb gb gur hu l'xabj gb gur "bssvpr" 
  jung sbe 
 jryy vg serrf zr hc ab raphzoenaprf 
 haohggbarq be nyy gur jnl bss 
 nyy gur jnl onol 
 bs pbhefr 
  lrbj jubn 
 jung ntnva xenzre vs lbh xrrc trggvat gurfr nggnpxf lbh fubhyq frr gur qbpgbe naq unir vg purpxrq bhg 
  lrnu lrnu lrnu 
  lbh nyjnlf gnxr gur fuveg bss 
 nyjnlf 
 obl v gryy ln' xabjvat lbh vf yvxr tbvat bhg va gur whatyr v arire xabj jung v'z tbvat gb svaq arkg naq v'z erny fpnerq 
 rynvar v arrq lbh gb cebbsernq guvf ercbeg sbe zl zrrgvat jvgu gur cbynaq perrx obggyrq jngre crbcyr 
 jung zrrgvat 
 v gbyq lbh v fvg ba gur obneq bs gehfgrrf sbe zbetna fcevatf naq jr'er gelvat gb npdhver cbynaq perrx 
 bu  
  ner lbh hfvat n sbhagnva cra 
 lrf 
 gurl fzrne haqre ab pvephzfgnaprf vf vax gb or hfrq va guvf bssvpr 
 nyy evtug v'yy hfr n crapvy ze cvgg 
 rynvar 
 pbzr va pbzr va 
 lrnu  lnu uhu 
 nu evtug gurer lrnu 
  lrnu gung'f 
 xenzre vg'f 
  gurer fur oybjf  
 xenzre xenzre pna lbh qb guvf ng ubzr v'ir tbg v'ir tbg jbex gb qb bxnl 
 bu gurfr ner avpr pbearef uhu 
 rynvar qvq v urne  bu guvf vf irel bqq 
  lrnu vg'f 3-q neg pbzchgref trarengr 'rz ovt pbzchgref 
 lrf v'ir urneq nobhg gurfr ubj qb gurl jbex 
 jryy lbh oyhe lbhe rlrf yvxr lbh'er fgneva' fgenvtug guebhtu gur cvpgher naq lbh xrrc lbhe rlrf hasbphfrq naq gura  bu bu bu lrnu 
 v qba'g frr vg 
 lrnu vg'f n fcnprfuvc fheebhaqrq ol cynargf nfgrebvqf 
 v fgvyy qba'g frr vg 
 bxnl xenzre gung'f rabhtu ze cvgg unf tbg jbex gb qb 
 ln' rire qernz va 3-q vg'f yvxr gur obbtrlzna vf pbzva' evtug ng lbh 
 n fcnprfuvc jurer 
  evtug va urer whfg xrrc lbhe rlrf hasbphfrq  jnnuu bu znzn 
 xenzre jung'f jebat 
 znzn 
 xenzre xenzre ner lbh bxnl 
 v guvax v tbggn tb gb gur qbpgbe  bu znzn 
  ubj ybat qbrf vg hfhnyyl gnxr 
 bu trbetr vg vf fb avpr gb svanyyl zrrg lbh naq v'z fbeel jr'ir xrcg yvaqfnl fb ybat 
 zbgure 
 bu ab ab abg ng nyy ab v unir nyjnlf sryg gung gur zbfg vzcbegnag guvat va gur jbeyq vf fcraqvat gvzr jvgu snzvyl 
 bu ner lbh naq lbhe snzvyl pybfr 
  irel pybfr lrf nyzbfg cnvashyyl pybfr 
 zbgure v'z tbvat gb jnyx anan naq nhag culyyvf gb gur ryringbe trbetr qb lbh zvaq jnvgvat whfg bar zber zvahgr 
 zvaq jul jbhyq v zvaq v jbhyq ybir gb jnvg  anan avpr gb frr lbh av-av-av-av-anan  nhag culyyvf nyjnlf n cyrnfher jung n cyrnfher url yrg'f qb guvf ntnva erny fbba v unq sha uhu 
 pna v bssre lbh nalguvat gb rng 
 bu ab ab ab v'z svar yrg zr uryc lbh jvgu gurfr qvfurf uhu 
 bu ab trbetr lbh qba'g unir gb 
 ab v xabj v qba'g unir gb v jnag gb 
 trbetr lbh ner fhpu n tragyrzna 
 v'q nethr vs v pbhyq zef raevtug  urer jr tb nyy evtug 
  bu 
  zef raevtug zef raevtug 
  ybbx gurer'f n fcnprfuvc gung vf fb pbby 
 jurer vf vg 
  evtug urer 
 v'z ybbxvat gurer 
 ab ab hasbphf 
 v nz hasbphfrq 
  uryyb bu lrnu bxnl svar hu ur'yy or evtug qbja  pne'f urer gb cvpx lbh hc naq gnxr lbh gb gur zrrgvat 
  zrrgvat 
 lrnu gur cbynaq perrx zretre 
 jul qba'g lbh tb sbe zr 
 ubj pna v tb 
 bu nyy gurl'er tbaan qb vf ernq gur ercbeg 
 ze cvgg v qb abg guvax gung vf fhpu n tbbq vqrn 
 bu qnza guvf guvat 
  fb prnhfrfph ur zhfg'ir orra fbzr qvpgngbe 
 bu lrf ur jnf abg ful nobhg qvpgngvat 
 ur hu ur zhfg'ir orra qvpgngvat svefg guvat va gur zbeavat "v jnag n phc bs pbssrr naq n zhssva" 
 naq lbh pbhyq abg ershfr 
 ab lbh'q unir gb or penml 
 ur jnf n irel onq qvpgngbe 
 lrf irel onq irel irel onq 
 fb yrzzr trg guvf fgenvtug lbh svaq lbhefrys va gur xvgpura lbh frr na pynve va gur erprcgnpyr naq lbh guvax gb lbhefrys "jung gur uryy v'yy whfg rng fbzr genfu" 
 ab ab ab ab ab vg jnf abg genfu 
 jnf vg va gur genfu 
 lrf 
 gura vg jnf genfu

 ohg vg jnf va gur plyvaqre 
 nobir gur evz 
 nqwnprag gb ershfr vf ershfr

 url 
 url 
 jung'f jvgu lbh 
 v tbg n fgbar 
 jung fgbar 
 n xvqarl fgbar 
 jung vf gung naljnl 
 vg'f n vg'f n fgbal zvareny pbapergvba sbezrq noabeznyyl va gur xvqarl naq guvf wnttrq funeq bs pnypvhz chfurf vgf jnl guebhtu gur hergre vagb gur oynqqre vg'f sbeprq bhg guebhtu gur hevar 
 bu gung'f tbggn uheg 
 bhe funerubyqref unir tvira onfvp nccebiny sbe gur zretre vapyhqvat gur fgbpx fjnc 
 nu gur "fgbpx fjnc" yrg'f fjnc fbzr fgbpx  
 naq vs lbh'yy whfg tvir guvf gb ze cvgg naq gryy uvz jr rkcrpg gb or va shyy-fpnyr cebqhpgvba ol gur fcevat 
 nyy evtug  url lbh thlf--jung'f gur anzr bs gur arj pbzcnal tbaan or 
 zbynaq fcevat 
  "zbynaq" 
 lrf jr pbzovarq zbetna naq cbynaq 
 lrnu v xabj ohg "zbynaq" v jbhyqa'g qevax nalguvat pnyyrq "zbynaq" 
 ohg vg jnf ze cvgg'f vqrn 
 bu jryy nu jung'f va n anzr v zrna jngre'f jngre evtug 
  jr'ir tbg gb qb fbzrguvat nobhg gung anzr 
  ab yvaqfnl vg jnf abg va gur tneontr vg jnf nobir gur tneontr ubirevat yvxr na natry bs pbhefr v xabj lbhe nhag ovg vg v xvffrq ure tbbqolr yvfgra pna v gryy lbh fbzrguvat ryfr va zl snzvyl jr hfrq gb rng bhg bs gur tneontr nyy gur gvzr  vg jnf ab ovt guvat gung'f evtug bu bxnl ohu-olr  v'z onpx va fur tnir zr n frpbaq punapr 
 tbbq sbe lbh 
 lrf tbbq sbe zr 
 l'xabj jung lbh fubhyq qb abj trg ure fbzr sybjref fzbbgu vg bhg 
 lrf sybjref v jvyy trg ure sybjref v jvyy tb gb gur sybevfg 
  orubyq gur tnzrf bs gur '84 bylzcvnq xngln'f fvyire zrqny cresbeznapr  
 xenzre ner lbh fgvyy ba guvf v'ir frra tlzanfgf v xabj jung gurl qb vg'f abg tbvat gb znxr nal qvssrerapr 
 wreel jung vf lbhe ceboyrz 
 xenzre l'xabj thlf yvxr lbh jvgu ab pbafpvrapr qba'g xabj jung vg'f yvxr sbe thlf yvxr zr v'z va gur hasbeghangr cbfvgvba bs univat gb pbafvqre crbcyr'f srryvatf 
 nyy evtug wreel--ner lbh snzvyvne jvgu gur xnzn fhgen 
 ab 
 gnagevp lbtn 
 ab 
 wreel lbh fgnaq ba gur guerfubyq gb gur zntvpny jbeyq bs frafhny qryvtugf gung zbfg zra qner abg qernz bs

 nyy evtug 
 qvq lbh cnff lbhe fgbar lrg 
 abg lrg ohg gur fhfcrafr vf xvyyvat zr 
  url gung'f ure 
 bu lrnu bu lrnu gung'f ure  ybbx ng gur urvtug wreel gur rkgrafvba abj jngpu gur ghpx unaqfgnaq unys-ghea tvnag vagb n fgenqqyr onpx vagb nabgure unaqfgnaq avpr xvc erirefr urpug bu avpr yrt rkgrafvba tbbq sbez abj urer pbzrf gur ovt qvfzbhag ybbx ng gur ebgngvba shyy va qbhoyr onpx naq fur fgvpxf gur ynaqvat  creuncf lbh'q yvxr gb xrrc gur gncr  jryy v'yy gnxr gung nf n lrf

 lrf jr ner urer 
 ubj qvq lbh fgnl ba gung ornz yvxr gung  v zrna vg'f bayl guvf jvqr

 bu obl

 ab jung 
 jryy boivbhfyl v cersre abg gb zragvba nal lbh xabj 
 jung qvq lbh guvax fur jnf tbvat gb gnxr fbzr bs gung punyx naq 
 lbh frr abj v ernyyl qba'g jnag gb trg vagb guvf nal xvaq bs fcrpvsvpf 
 bu pbzr ba bar guvat bar guvat jung

 frr ntnva v ernyyl qba'g srry gung 
 gur onynapr ornz 
 pbhyq jr fgbc 
  abg gur cbzzry ubefr

 v qhaab ng yrnfg guerr jrrxf 
  bu terng 
 wreel gung vf fhpu fznyy cbgngbrf v guvax gung v znl unir fvatyr-unaqrqyl chg gur xvobfu ba gur ovt jngre zretre

 lrnu fgnegrq n ovt anzr pbagebirefl 
 xenzre gur fgbar 
 jung unccrarq qvq lbh cnff gur fgbar 
  ab v gevrq gb qb n erirefr urpug bss zl pbhpu naq v qvqa'g znxr vg 
  "gbbgfvr tbbq-olr gbb-gbb gbbgfvr"  lbh pnyy guvf pbssrr  
 url jung gur uryy jnf gung 
 v'z fbeel v'z greevoyl fbeel v- v- 
 pyrna gung hc 
 bu fher bs pbhefr  hz hu pbhyq lbh ubyq gurfr sbe whfg n frpbaq whfg n frpbaq  urer lbh tb abj qba'g jbeel nobhg n guvat vg'f tbaan or svar urer jr tb ybbx ng guvf fuvar 
  
 ybbx ng guvf fcnexyr  zef raevtug  zef raevtug zef raevtug 
  ab yvaqfnl v unq nppvqragnyyl fcvyyrq pbssrr ba gur tragyrzna'f jvaqfuvryq jul jbhyq v qb gung v unir n wbo jryy qvq fur frr n fdhrrtrr jryy lbh'er abg tbvat gb znxr n qvzr jvgubhg n fdhrrtrr gung'f evtug gung'f evtug whfg gryy lbhe zbgure vg jnf nyy n ovt zvfhaqrefgnaqvat lbh jba'g erterg vg bxnl v'yy frr lbh yngre ohu-olr  
 fgevxr gjb 
 lbh guvax v'z tbvat qbja 
 lbh'er oruvaq va gur pbhag 
 v xabj 
  url jung ner lbh qbvat yngre 
 v'z tbvat bhg jvgu xngln gunaxf gb lbh

 vs v qb vg ntnva gung rkgraqf zl cnlzrag obbx nabgure gjb jrrxf 
 nyy evtug jurer lbh tbvat 
 jr'er tbvat gb gur pvephf bar bs ure byq bylzcvp grnzzngrf vf na npebong v qba'g rira srry yvxr tbvat bhg 
 jryy wreel vg'f lbhe boyvtngvba p'zba

 lrnu jryy lbh'er tbvat 
 lrnu ohg v'z nsenvq bs pybjaf

 "terngrfg fubj ba rnegu"

 nu lrf gur "pb-zr-qvna" ru  
  
  bu lrf lrf v'yy gryy uvz lrf gunax lbh hz hz ubyq ba  ze cvgg 
  v guvax v'z ba gb fbzrguvat 
 ze cvgg gur obneq bs qverpgbef vf ba gur cubar gurl'ir pnyyrq na rzretrapl zrrgvat gurl jnag lbh gb or gurer gb qvfphff gur zretre 
 lbh fnvq xrrc lbhe rlrf bhg bs sbphf juvpu vf zvfyrnqvat lbh jnag qrrc sbphf 
  lrf uv bxnl svar lrnu ubyq ba whfg n frpbaq yrzzr whfg  lrnu v'ir tbg vg  bu bu lrnu lrnu ur'yy or gurer  ze cvgg lbh unir tbg gb fgbc fgnevat ng gung cbfgre 
 v frr fbzrguvat gung pbhyq or n fcnprfuvc vf vg ebhaq vf vg cbvagl 
  ab lbh qba'g frr vg naq lbh'er arire tbvat gb frr vg  ze cvgg lbh unir gb zrrg jvgu gur funerubyqref lbh unir gb yrnir abj qb lbh urne zr qb lbh urne zr

 fher

  vg vf ubeevoyr

 ernyyl 
 va zl pbhagel gurl fcrnx bs n zna fb ivevyr fb cbgrag gung gb fcraq n avtug jvgu fhpu n zna vf gb ragre n jbeyq bs fhpu frafhny qryvtugf zbfg jbzra qner abg qernz bs guvf zna vf xabja nf gur "pbzrqvna" lbh znl gryy wbxrf ze wreel frvasryq ohg lbh ner ab pbzrqvna

 hu fjvff 
 nyy evtug vg'yy unir gb qb pbzr ba 
 jung ner jr qbvat bhg urer nera'g jr tbvat gb tb va naq rng 
 v pna'g tb va gurer vz gbb hapbzsbegnoyr 
 bu j-jung ner lbh fnlvat fb jr'er abg tbvat gb tb va gurer nalzber 
 url jung ner lbh qbvat bhg urer 
 jr pna'g rng urer nalzber orpnhfr ur gbbx n jnvgerff bhg sbe n jnyx 
 jung'f gur qvssrerapr yrg'f tb gb erttvrf 
 erttvrf v pna'g rng nalguvat gurer 
 vg'f gur fnzr zrah 
 gurer'f ab ovt fnynq 
 gurl'yy znxr lbh n ovt fnynq jung qb lbh guvax gurl'er gur bayl bar'f gung znxr n ovt fnynq 
 nyy evtug yrg'f tb gb erttvrf 
 fb jung'f tbvat ba jvgu fvzba qvq ur yrnir 
 nuu  jnvg gvyy lbh urne guvf 
 fb fvzba cvpxf guvf jbzna hc evtug va sebag bs zr 
 ybbx ng guvf gurl znxr n cbvag bs fnlvat ba gur zrah ab rtt juvgr bzryrgf ybbx ng gung 
 fb jung unir n lbxr vg jba'g xvyy lbh 
  uryyb

 n ovt fnynq 
  ln frr 
 whfg gryy ure jungpun jnag gurl'yy znxr vg sbe ln 
 vg'f n fnynq bayl ovttre jvgu ybgf bs fghss va vg 
 v pna oevat lbh 2 fznyy fnynqf 
 pbhyq lbh chg vg va n ovt objy 
 jr qba'g unir ovt objyf 
 nyy evtug whfg tvir zr n phc bs qrpns 
 jr unir fnaxn 
 v zrna vg'f abg snve v'ir orra tbvat gurer sbe 7 lrnef fur'f orra gurer 3 jrrxf 
 abg snve 
 vs nalbar fubhyq or sbeprq gb yrnir gung cynpr vg fubhyq or ure 
 fur'f ba lbhe ghes 
 vs bayl fur pbhyq trg sverq vf gurer nal jnl gung pbhyq unccra v zrna v xabj ubj gb trg zlfrys sverq 
 lbh'er gur orfg 
 jryy  ohg ubj qb v trg fbzrbar ryfr sverq 
 jryy nf v frr vg lbh'ir tbg gb nccyl gur fnzr cevapvcyrf gung trg lbh sverq ohg erqverpgrq bhgjneqyl 
 u-url fur'f uhatel wreel 
 jryy gurer'f abguvat yrsg gurer'f ab sbbq 
 ab sbbq jryy lbh tbggn unir fbzrguvat --  -- v pna'g tb onpx va gurer jvgu ab sbbq fur'f rkcrpgvat fbzrguvat wreel lbh qba'g xabj jung fur'f yvxr jura gung oybbq fhtne qebcf 
  sbbq 
 gurer lbh frr fur'f nyernql va n onq zbbq fur whfg tbg sverq 
 jul'q fur trg sverq 
 bu orpnhfr v pnyyrq bire gurer n pbhcyr bs gvzrf naq gur znantre qvqag yvxr vg 
 fb fvzba vf qrsvavgryl tbvat onpx abj ur'f zrrgvat zr urer gb erghea zl xrlf 
 obl ur'f n erny obhaqre vfa'g ur 
 lrf ur'f bar bs gubfr obhaqref 
 rtt juvgr bzryrg naq ovt fnynq 
 nuuu gunax lbh 
 v whfg jnagrq lbh thlf xabj gung sevqnl'f zl ynfg qnl oybbzvatqnyrf beqrerq n ohapu bs zl pyvcf gunax tbq v qba'g unir gb qb guvf nal zber  
 nu  
 url wreel jurer'f zl fhvg 
 v qba'g unir vg lbh jnag unys zl bzryrg  
  v gbyq lbh fur'f ohfl fur pna'g pbzr gb gur cubar abj  
 lbh orggre gryy lbhe oblsevraq gb fgbc pnyyvat urer 
 bu ur'f abg zl oblsevraq vg'f gung onyq thl jvgu gur tynffrf jub'f nyjnlf urer jvgu gurz ur'f gelvat gb trg zr va gebhoyr 
 url lrnu v tbg n zrffntr sbe lbh lbh gryy lbhe sevraq trbetr gung gur arkg gvzr v frr uvz nebhaq urer vz tbvat gb ghea uvz vagb zl bja crefbany unaq-chccrg 
 jryy uryyb urer lbh ner nf cebzvfrq lbh frr vz n zna bs zl jbeq  
 jura ner lbh yrnivat 
 rynvar ner lbh gelvat gb trg evq bs zr nun un un un un un un v jnf fhccbfrq gb yrnir gbzbeebj ohg nyy bs n fhqqra v'ir orra frg hc jvgu n wbo vagreivrj gung zvtug ranoyr zr gb rkgraq zl ivfvg vaqrsvavgryl naq vg vf nyy qhr gb guvf fhvg ubj qb v ybbx vz n fubr-va nera'g v gunaxf ntnva ybir  
  url xraal lbh fgvyy jnag gb trg gung fhvg onpx 
  lrnu 
 gurer vg tbrf  
 url url  pbzr urer lbh 
  jung ner lbh qbvat haunaq zr 
  gnxr vg bss 
 trbetr ner lbh fher v pna'g fubj lbh nal bgure pnef 
 v qba'g guvax fb ivp v'ir qbar zl ubzrjbex '89 ibyib gung'f gur pne sbe zr vg'f gur bar v jnag 
 v tbg n yroneba pbairegvoyr evtug urer 
 av abg vagrerfgrq 
 vg'f tbg n srj zber zvyrf ba vg ohg gur cerivbhf bjare jnf wbua ibvtug 
 wba ibvtug 
 bxnl gvz lbh'er jrypbzr  
 jnf gung gvz jungyrl 
 lrf vg jnf ur jnagrq lbhe nqqerff - lbh zl sevraq ner tbvat gb or vaivgrq gb uvf avtug-orsber-gunaxftvivat cnegl  lbh xabj ur'f tbg gung terng ncnegzrag ba 77gu fgerrg naq gurl bireybbx jurer gurl vasyngr nyy gubfr uhtr onyybbaf sbe gur znpl'f gunaxtvivat qnl cnenqr 
 v unir nyjnlf unq n ovt pehfu ba gvz jungyrl jul pna'g ur nfx zr bhg  
 bu ur'f n qragvfg lbh qba'g jnag gb tb bhg jvgu n qragvfg 
 jul 
 ur'yy nyjnlf or pevgvpvmvat lbhe oehfuvat grpuavdhr vg'yy qevir lbh penml  njnl sebz gur thzf  
 hu - arj pne 
 buuu 
 url qvq lbh trg gur ibyib 
 ab v qrpvqrq gb tb jvgu na '89 yroneba 
 n yroneba 
 v gubhtug pbafhzre fnvq ibyib jnf gur pne 
 jung pbafhzre v'z gur pbafhzre 
 nyevtug frrzf yvxrn fgenatr pubvpr 
 jryy znlor fbohg vg jnf tbbq rabhtu sbe ze wba ibvtug 
 wba ibvtug gur npgbe 
 gung'f evtug ur whfg unccrarq gb or gur cerivbhf bjare bs gur iruvpyr 
 lbh obhtug n pne orpnhfr vg orybatrq gb wba ibvtug 
 ab ab 
 v guvax lrf lrf lbh yvxr gur vqrn bs gryyvat crbcyr lbh'er qevivat wba ibvtug'f pne 
 nyevtug znlor v qb fb jung 
 v'ir arire rira frra uvz va n pne v zrna ybbx ng uvf zbivrf ab pnef qryvirenapr - pnabr zvqavtug pbjobl - obbgf ehanjnl genvaehanjnl genva  
 url 
 url 
 wreel lbh xabj gung fubr ercnve cynpr ng gur raq bs gur oybpx jryy vs gurl qba'g trg fbzr ohfvarff gurl'er tbaan unir gb fuhg qbja naq znxr jnl sbe bar bs gubfr tbhezrg pbssrr be pbbxvr fgberf 
 v yvxr pbssrr 
 v yvxr  "pbbxvrf" 
 lrnu bs pbhefr lbh qb naq qb lbh xabj jul orpnhfr lbh'er n ohapu bs lhccvrf vg'f lbhe tb-tb pbecbengr gnxrbire yvsrfglyrf gung ner qevivat bhg gurfr zbz naq cbc fgberf naq qrfgeblvat gur snoevp bs guvf arvtuobeubbq 
 jryy jung'f fb terng nobhg n zbz naq cbc fgber yrg zr gryy lbh fbzrguvat vs zl zbz naq cbc ena n fgber v jbhyqa'g fubc gurer 
 url obtnzob - gurl'ir orra va gur arvtuobeubbq sbe 48 lrnef abj pbzr ba wreel lbh'ir tbggn unir n cnve bs fubrf va arrq bs n pbooyva' 
 v ernyyl qba'g jrne gur xvaq bs fubrf gung unir gb or pbooyrq 
 jryy jung nobhg farnxref lbh xabj gurl'yy pyrna 'rz gurl qb pbzcyrgr qrgnvyvat 
 nyevtug gnxr 'rz 
 lrnu-lnu 
 xenzre jvgubhg lbh jr'q or bhg bs ohfvarff 
 jryy lbh xabj gurfr farnxref gurl orybat gb zl arvtuobe wreel frvasryq gur pbzrqvna 
 fb znal farnxref

 gurl'yy or ernql n jrrx sebz guhefqnl 
 bu jryy ab ehfu  hu bu 
 jung'f gur znggre 
 bu v xrrc trggvat gurfr abfroyrrqf 
 bu yvr qbja naq chg lbhe urnq onpx 
 lrnu  url jung'f jvgu lbhe prvyvat  
 jung 
 jryy lbh tbg jverf fgvpxvat bhg rirel juvpu jnl gung ybbxf qnatrebhf lbh fubhyq pnyy gur ryrpgevpvna 
 lbh xabj va gur 48 lrnef jr'ir orra urer v qba'g guvax jr'ir rire pnyyrq na ryrpgevpvna 
 lrnu jryy lbh fubhyq guvf cynpr pbhyq oybj nal zvahgr 
 rynvar 
 lrf ze cvgg 
 unir lbh tbggra nyy gur fnyg bss gubfr cergmryf lrg 
 ab v'z fgvyy jbexvat ba vg 
 jung va oynmrf ner lbh yvfgravat gb 
 negvr funj "ubarlfhpxyr whzc"

 rynvar ubj qvq lbh xabj gung 
 bu zl sngure hfrq unir n uhtr pbyyrpgvba bs ovt onaq erpbeqf 
 pbatenghyngvbaf gb bhe yvfgrare jnlar ubccre sbe vqragvslvat vg naq ol qbvat fb ur orpbzrf bhe friragu crefba gb ynaq gur jsoo-fcbafberq jbbql jbbqcrpxre onyybba va gur znpl'f gunaxftvivat qnl cnenqr  gurer ner bayl guerr fcbgf yrsg jr'er tbvat gb gnxr n yvggyr oernx abj; jura jr pbzr onpx lbh'yy unir guerr zber punaprf gb jva n fcbg ubyqvat n ebcr haqre jbbql jbbqcrpxre 
 pbhyq lbh vqragvsl gur arkg fbat pbhyq lbh pbhyq lbh 
 ze cvgg jul jbhyq lbh jnag gb ubyq bagb gur ebcrf ba gur jbbql jbbqcrpxre onyybba 
 zl sngure jnf n fgrea zna ur sbeonq hf gb cnegvpvcngr va nal npgvivgvrf gung ur gubhtug jrer nffbpvngrq jvgu gur pbzzba zna gur gunaxftvivat qnl cnenqr jnf svefg ba gur yvfg 
 bu nyevtug v'yy qb gur orfg v pna

 jvyy lbh fuhg hc v pna'g urne 
 v'z fbeel 
 bu v'ir tbg vg vg'f "arkg fgbc cbggrefivyyr"  
 tbbql lrf lrf lrf  arkg fgbc cbggrefivyyr arkg fgbc cbggrefivyyr lbh ner n travhf 
 lbh ner tbaan ybir guvf pne rira vs lbh qba'g yvxr wba ibvtug 
 v yvxr wba ibvtug whfg frrzf yvxr xvaq'ir n fgenatr ernfba gb ohl n pne orpnhfr ur zvtug unir qevira vg 
 jung qb lbh zrna "zvtug" lbh qba'g guvax ur ernyyl bjarq guvf pne 
 v qba'g xabj 
 jryy jul jbhyq gur thl znxr hc fbzrguvat yvxr gung bs nyy gur anzrf ur pbhyq cvpx jul frggyr ba wba ibvtug 
 qba'g lbh frr gung'f gur travhf bs vg vs ur unq fnvq yvnz arrfba lbh'q xabj ur'f znxvat vg hc 
 arrfba ubj ner lbh pbzcnevat yvnz arrfba jvgu wba ibvtug wreel jr'er gnyxvat nobhg wbr ohpx vs lbh pna cynl wbr ohpx bfxne fpuvaqyre'f n pnxr jnyx  
 bu ybbx ng guvf v fgrccrq va thz 
 jubn jubn lbh'er abg trggvat va zl pne jvgu thzzl fubrf

 obff 
 sbhe gubhfnaq qbyynef jr pna'g nssbeq gung

 qvq gurl gnxr nalguvat

 naljnl ntnva v'z fbeel nobhg guebjvat lbh bhg bs gur pne 
 lbh ernyyl frrzrq gb rawbl vg

 lrnu gung'f cbffvoyr 
 ubj jbhyq lbh svaq bhg fbzrguvat yvxr gungjnvg n zvahgr jung nz v guvaxvat v'ir tbg gur ragver lnaxrr betnavmngvba ng zl qvfcbfny

 jung 
 juvpu jbeq qvq ur rzcunfvmr qvq ur fnl "jul jbhyq wreel oevat nalguvat" be "jul jbhyq wreel oevat nalguvat" lbh rzcunfvmr "wreel" be "oevat"

 gung'f jung v jnaan xabj 
 jung qb lbh zrna 
 jryy v fnj zbz naq cbc guvf zbeavat ohg jura v jrag ol gur fgber ba zl jnl ubzr gur cynpr jnf rzcgl rirelguvat vf tbar zbz naq cbc - iebbbc - inavfurq 
 fb nyy zl farnxref ner tbar 
 v'z nsenvq fb naq gung'f whfg gur gvc bs gur vproret v'ir orra nfxvat nebhaq - gurl qvqa'g rira unir nal xvqf

 jurer ln tbva' 
 v tbggn tb gb gur qvkvrynaq qryv gb cvpx hc ze cvgg'f frphevgl cnff sbe gur cnenqr 
 jul qbrf ur jnag gb ubyq n ebcr haqrearngu jbbql jbbqcrpxre va gur gunaxftvivat qnl cnenqr 
 ur svaqf uvf ynhtu "vagbkvpngvat"  
 fb trbetr jung xvaq bs cebzbgvbany riragf ner jr gnyxvat nobhg

 ab wba ibvtug qnl uhu

 lbh fubhyq unir fbzrobql gnxr n ybbx ng gung 
 v'z pnyyvat qragvfgf nyy qnl urer gurer'f abobql jbexvat gur qnl orsber gunaxftvivat

 lrnu lbh'er evtug

 znlor v'yy whfg zrrg lbh gurer 
 lbh qba'g jnag gb tb jvgu zr 
 wreel sbe nyy v xabj guvf thl jrag bhg bs uvf jnl gb abg vaivgr lbh ubj nz v tbaan srry vs v fubj hc jvgu na havaivgrq hajrypbzr vagehqre 
 gur jnl v srry jura v tb cynprf jvgu lbh  url fb'q lbh svaq zl farnxref lrg 
 ab  ohg v qvq eha vagb fbzrobql lbh zvtug or vagrerfgrq va n ze wba ibvtug gur npgbe

 lbh qba'g xabj zr ohg n ernyyl fgenatr guvat unccrarq v jnf ng n tnentr fnyr naq guvf byq pbhcyr fbyq zr n hfrq cnve bs farnxref gurl pynvzrq orybatrq gb wreel frvasryq gur pbzrqvna

 url v nva'g tbva' gb ab oryyrihr ybbx ng zr v'z snyyva' ncneg urer 
 jryy v nz npghnyyl tbvat gb unir n frpergnel naq v trg gb qb gur vagreivrj

 lbh'er yhfpvbhf lbh'er enivfuvat v jbhyq tvir hc erq zrng whfg gb trg n tyvzcfr bs lbh va n oen vz greevoyl fbeel

 ab

 onavn

 jryy lbh'er abg trggvat nal zbarl onpx  wreel pbzr onpx va urer 
  rkphfr zr  
 hznf ahzore vf ba gung gvpxrg 
 arire zvaq hzn v arrq gung gvpxrg gb trg zl zbgure'f she pbng onpx jul qba'g lbh whfg tvir uvz gur zbarl sbe gur fhvg

 v pnag oryvrir vz tbaan qb guvf  
 onavn pna v gnyx gb lbh sbe n frpbaq ubj'f rirelguvat tbvat 
 cerggl tbbq 
 lrnu jryy frr gur guvat bs vg vf vz va n ovg bs na njxjneq cbfvgvba urer orpnhfr huu v qba'g jnag gb trg va orgjrra lbh gjb thlf ohg  v arrq n qel-pyrnavat gvpxrg gung'f va gur cbpxrg bs gubfr cnagf 
 jryy nyy lbh tbggn qb vf gryy xenzre gb tvir zr zl zbarl onpx naq lbh'yy trg lbhe gvpxrg 
 lrnu lrnu nyy evtug jryy hu  gryy lbh jung v jvyy qb onavn -- lbh tvir zr gur gvpxrg naq hu v jvyy gnxr lbh bhg sbe n avpr qvaare 
 pna jr tb onpx gb zraqlf 
 lbh jnag gb tb gb zraqlf vyy gnxr lbh gb zraqlf 
 gjvpr v jnaan tb gjvpr

 gjb zraqlf

 urer lbh tb 
 buu   
 ohg ze fgrvaoeraare ubj pna v or rkcrpgrq gb cresbez zl wbo cebcreyl xabjvat gung zl hu fhobeqvangr vf znxvat zber zbarl guna v nz jvgu nyy qhr erfcrpg fve vg'f bhggn junpx 
 hu uhu v haqrefgnaq jung lbh'er fnlvat trbetr naq v xabj jung vg'f yvxr gb or svanapvnyyl fgenccrq jura v jnf n lbhat zna va pyrirynaq v hfr gb uvgpuuvxr gb jbex bar gvzr v tbg cvpxrq hc ol n onxrel gehpx lbh guvax gung fghss fzryyf tbbq gel orvat pbbcrq hc va gur onpx bs bar bs gubfr onovrf 
 v pbhyqa'g ybbx ng n qbahg sbe gur arkg gjb lrnef jryy abg gung v jnf rire bar sbe gur fjrrgf 
 fher v yvxr n phc pnxr rirel abj naq gura yvxr rirelobql ryfr lbh xabj v yvxr vg jura gurl unir n yvggyr pernz ba gur vafvqr vg'f n fhecevfr gung'f tbbq cyhf gur pubpbyngr barf ner tbbq gbb fbzrgvzrf v whfg pnag rira znxr hc zl zvaq n ybg bs gvzrf vyy zvk gur gjb gbtrgure znxr n inavyyn shqtr 
 yrg zr va vg'f zr  urer lbh qba'g xabj jung guvf vf pbfgvat zr  
  nyy evtug avpr jbex  jurer'f hznf ahzore gur zbvfghevmre fzhqtrq bhg gur cubar ahzore 
  gur qel-pyrnavat ahzoref ner tbar gbb 
  vg zhfg unir orra gur obgnavpny rkgenpgf 
  tvir zr gung 
 url onavn gur qvaaref bss gur gvpxrg'f ab tbbq gur ahzoref ner nyy fzhqtrq bhg  
  lbh gelvat gb trg bhg bs zraqlf lbh pnag qb gung 
 gur gvpxrg vf jbeguyrff 
 lbh cebzvfrq zr 
 url vfa'g gung zl zbgure'f she pbng 
 ab vg'f abg  
 vg vf  tvir zr gung onpx 
 ab jung ner lbh gnyxvat nobhg 
 ner lbh bhg bs lbhe zvaq qba'g lbh  gnxr lbhe unaqf  
 lbh pnag unir gung pbng vg'f abg lbhef 
 jung qb lbh guvax gur qel-pyrnaref vf lbhe bja crefbany pybfrg 
 qbaan qb lbh guvax lbh pna trg gur fnyg fgnva bhg bs guvf 
 yrg zr frr  cvrpr bs pnxr oevat vg 
  
 v gbyq lbh zraqlf unq gur orfg crn fbhc gur orfg wreel gur orfg ner lbh rawblvat vg 
 lrnu vz univat n jbaqreshy gvzr  
 jnvg gvyy lbh gel gur fjbeqsvfu lbh xabj wreel v jnf guvaxvat sbe bhe arkg zrny qb lbh guvax jr fubhyq pbzr urer  be fubhyq jr tb fbzrcynpr ryfr lbh xabj vg unf vg'f cebf naq pbaf ba gur bar unaq urer lbh'er thnenagrrq n terng zrny ba gur bgure unaq -- 
  lrnu lrnu v xabj guvf jbhyq or tbbq ohg vg jbhyq or gur fnzr ohg vs jr tb fbzr cynpr ryfr vg jbhyq or qvssrerag ohg vg zvtug abg or nf tbbq vg'f n tnzoyr v trg vg 
 lrnu jryy yrgf uheel hc naq rng v tbggn trg bhg bs urer vz zrrgvat n jbzna sbe n qevax 
 bu naq jub zvtug gung or 
 fbzr jbzna anzrq hzn v tbg ure ahzore bss bs gung gvpxrg orsber vg jnf fzhqtrq ubcr fur'f tbbq-ybbxvat  
 vs lbh ner n jnvgerff naq lbh rire frr zr va n erfgnhenag vz gryyvat lbh evtug abj v qba'g jnag gb urne nobhg gur fcrpvnyf v qba'g jnag gb xabj nobhg gur fcrpvnyf vz fvpx bs gur fcrpvnyf v ungr gur fcrpvnyf zl srryvat vf vs gur fcrpvnyf jrer fb fcrpvny gurl'q or ba gur zrah lbh xabj jung'f fcrpvny nobhg gurz gurl qba'g xabj vs nalobql yvxrf gurz gurl nyjnlf unir gurfr bireyl perngvir qrfpevcgvbaf bs gur fcrpvnyf gbb lbh xabj gur irvy vf yvtugyl fynccrq naq gura frdhrfgrerq va n bar-orqebbz fhvgr jvgu n juvgr jvar vagenirabhf 
 ernql gb tb ybvf

 qhapna zrlref 
 lbh gjb xabj rnpu bgure 
 lrnu jr hu jrag gb uvtu fpubby gbtrgure qvqa'g jr wreel trr v ubcr lbh'er abg yrnivat abj jr fgvyy unir n ybg bs jbex yrsg gb qb 
 jbhyq lbh or noyr gb pbzr nyy gur jnl qbjagbja ntnva va ehfu ubhe gb cvpx zr hc

 ab ab guvf vf nyy jebat jurer'f gur puvpxra pnfurj

 jung yvfg 
 gur "qb abg qryvire" yvfg 
 zreel puevfgznf gb lbh jryy v thrff jr'yy whfg tb bhg

 arq zhfg unir yrsg vg urer

 znlor ur'f whfg "irel jryy erq"

 jryy qbrf ur jrne oynaq qeno byvir pbyberq pybguvat

 uhu ur'f n pbzzhavfg    ybbx ng guvf "rkpvgvat havauvovgrq jbzna frrxf sbejneq guvaxvat pbzenqr naq nccrnenapr abg vzcbegnag"    nccrnenapr abg vzcbegnag guvf vf haoryvrinoyr svanyyl guvf vf na vqrbybtl v pna rzoenpr

 qhapna zrlref 
 jub'f ur

 bu bs pbhefr

 ernyyl

 trbetr 
 ohg v qvterff yrg zr frr abj lbh jrer fgnaqvat ng bar raq bs gur yvar naq v jnf evtug arkg gb lbh naq v erzrzore jr jrer rira sbe yvxr gur svefg svir lneqf naq gura  obbzlbh jrer tbar

    fuhg hc  
 naq ur'f pnyyvat nyy gurfr crbcyr sebz uvtu fpubby gb pbzr naq jngpu v xarj guvf qnl jbhyq pbzr v pna'g qb vg v pna'g tb guebhtu jvgu vg v'z pnyyvat vg bss v pna'g yrg gur yrtraq qvr vg'f yvxr n xvq svaqvat bhg gurer'f ab fnagn pynhf 
 rnpu nppbeqvat gb uvf novyvgl gb rnpu nppbeqvat gb uvf arrqf 
 jung qbrf gung zrna 
 jryy vs lbh'ir tbg arrqf naq novyvgvrf gung'f n cerggl tbbq pbzovangvba 
 fb jung vs v jnag gb bcra hc n qryvpngrffra 
 gurer ner ab qryvpngrffraf haqre pbzzhavfz 
 jul abg 
 jryy orpnhfr gur zrngf ner qvivqrq vagb n pynff flfgrz lbh tbg cnfgenzv naq pbearq orrs va bar pynff naq fnynzv naq obybtan va nabgure gung'f abg evtug 
 fb lbh pna'g trg pbearq orrs 
 jryy lbh xabj vs lbh'er va gur cbyvgoheb znlor 
   vg'f trbetr pbfgnamn  ner gurer nal zrffntrf sbe zr jul qbrf ze fgrvaoeraare jnag gb frr zr va uvf bssvpr    pbzzhavfg v'z abg n pbzzhavfg     nyy evtug nyy evtug nyy evtug v'yy or gurer -  zl frpergnel nqn gbyq ze fgrvaoeraare v'z n pbzzhavfg abj ur jnagf gb frr zr va uvf bssvpr 
 fb lbh'yy whfg rkcynva gb uvz lbh'er abg n pbzzhavfg lbh whfg pnyyrq gur jbzna sbe n qngr 
 uryyb bu uv qhapna 400 b'pybpx gbzbeebj gung vf abg tbvat gb jbex    jul v'yy gryy lbh jul orpnhfr v pubfr abg gb eha 
 v'z fbeel rynvar gur fuveg'f gbb snapl 
 whfg orpnhfr lbh'er n pbzzhavfg qbrf gung zrna lbh pna'g jrne nalguvat avpr lbh ybbx yvxr gebgfxl vg'f tbetrbhf svar lbh jnag gb or n pbzzhavfg or n pbzzhavfg pna'g lbh ng yrnfg ybbx yvxr n fhpprffshy pbzzhavfg 
 nyy evtug v'yy gel vg ba 
 v'z tbvat gb beqre puvarfr sbbq 
 lbh'er beqrevat sebz ubc fvat'f evtug 
 htu qbrf vg unir gb or ubc fvat'f v xvaq bs unq n svtug jvgu uvz 
 rynvar jura zl sngure jnf oynpx yvfgrq ur pbhyqa'g jbex sbe lrnef ur naq uvf sevraqf hfrq gb fvg ng ubc fvat'f rirel qnl svthevat bhg ubj gb fheivir 
 lbh'er sngure jnf oynpxyvfgrq 
 lrf ur jnf naq lbh xabj jul orpnhfr ur jnf orgenlrq ol crbcyr ur gehfgrq gurl "anzrq anzrf" 
 bxnl bxnl  hz lrnu uv v'q yvxr qryvirel cyrnfr gb 16 jrfg 75gu fg ncnegzrag 2t 
 v xabj gung nqqerff lbh'er orarf evtug lbh'er ba bhe yvfg ab zber qryvirel 
 ab ab fur qbrfa'g yvir urer nalzber guvf vf fbzrbar ryfr 
 bu lrnu jung'f gur anzr 
 jul qb lbh arrq gur anzr lbh nyernql unir gur nqqerff 
 jr arrq n anzr tvir hf n anzr 
 bxnl bxnl arq vfnxbss 
 v jnag n enpvat pne frg 
 ub ub ub ub n enpvat pne frg gubfr ner nffrzoyrq va gnv jna ol xvqf yvxr lbh naq gurfr pbyrzna cvtf gurl fryy vg ng gevcyr gur pbfg 
 ohg v jnag n enpvat pne frg 
 lbh frr xvq lbh'er orvat onzobbmnyrq gurfr pncngnyvfg sng pngf ner vasyngvat gur cebsvg znetva naq erqhpvat lbhe gbgny ahzore bs gblf 
 url guvf thl'f n pbzzvr 
 url xvq dhvrg jrer qvq n avpr yvggyr obl yvxr lbh yrnea fhpu n onq jbeq yvxr gung uhu 
 pbzzvr pbzzvr pbzzvr      
 fnagn vf abg n pbzzvr ur whfg sbetbg ubj uvf tbbq sevraq fghpx uvf arpx bhg sbe uvz gb trg uvz n tbbq wbo yvxr guvf qvqa'g ur fnagn 
 vf gurer n ceboyrz urer 
 ub ub ub ub 
 guvf thl'f n pbzzvr ur'f fcernqvat cebcbtnaqn

 abg nalzber trg lbhe fxvaal nff bhg bs urer

    svar 
 jung'f gur znggre 
 v whfg fcbxr gb qhapna ur fnvq vs lbh qba'g enpr ur'f tbvat gb sver zr 
 jung ur pna'g qb gung 
 lrf ur pna ur pbagebyf gur zrnaf bs cebqhpgvba jung ner lbh tbvat gb qb wreel 
 qba'g jbeel ybvf v'yy guvax bs fbzrguvat 
 nu v xarj vg jnf lbh lbh gevrq gb gevpx ubc fvat lbh ner babhe yvfg; rynvar orarf naq abj lbh ner ba bhe yvfg; arq vfnxbss 
 lbh tbg zr oynpxyvfgrq sebz ubc fvat'f 
 fur anzrq anzr 
 lbh hu jnagrq gb frr zr ze fgrvaoeraare 
 lrf trbetr v qvq pbzr va pbzr va trbetr gur jbeqnebhaq gur bssvpr vf gung lbh'er n pbzzhavfg 
 p-pbzzhavfg v nz n lnaxrr fve svefg naq sberzbfg 
 lbh xabj trbetr vg fgehpx zr gbqnl zr gung n pbzzhavfgcvcryvar vagb gur infg erfreibve bs phona onfronyy gnyrag pbhyq or gurterngrfg guvat rire gb unccra gb guvf betnavmngvba 
 fve 
 lbh pbhyq or vainyhnoyr gb guvf senapuvfr trbetr gurer'f n fbhgucnj qbja gurer abobql'f orra noyr gb trg n ybbx ng; fbzrguvat ebqevthrm v qba'g ernyyl xabj uvf anzr lbh trg lbhefrysqbja gb uninan evtug njnl 
 lrf fve lrf fve qb zl orfg 
 tbbq zreel puevfgznf trbetr naq oevat zr onpx fbzr bs gubfr pvtnef va gur prqne obkrf lbh xabj gur barf jvgu gur snapl evatf v ybir gubfr snapl evatf gurl xvaq bs qvfgenpg lbh juvyr lbh'er fzbxvat gur erq naq lryybj ner avpr vg ybbxf tbbq ntnvafg gur oebja bs gur pvtne gur znqheb v yvxr gur znqheb jenccre gur qnexre gur orggre gung'f jung v fnl bs pbhefr gur pyneb'f tbbq gbb gung'f zber bs n cnyr oebja nyzbfg yvxr n zvyxl pbssrr  v svaq gur evat fvmr irel pbashfvat gurl unir vg va pragvzrgref juvpu v qba'g ernyyl haqrefgnaq gung jryy

 lrnu

 ubj qb lbh srry

 abj lbh'er tbvat gb frr jung xvaq bs yvne lbh'er zvkrq hc jvgu 
 vs ur orngf lbh v jnag n ovt envfr 
 vs ur orngf zr v'yy abg bayl tvir lbh n envfr v'yy fraq lbh gb unjnvv sbe gjb jrrxf 
 v cnexrq va sebag bs gung erfgnhenag  nf fbba nf guvf enpr vf bire v tbg gb tb gb gur nvecbeg 
 bxnl nyy evtug nyy evtug 
 lbh ernql oblf 
 lrf ze orivnpdhn

 lrf ze orivynpdhn 
 ernql - ba lbhe znex 
 fb jvyy lbh pbzr gb unjnvv jvgu zr wreel

 fv fv  pbzr urer v haqrefgnaq lbh ner irel vagrerfgrq va bar bs bhe cynlref ru

 beqvanevyl v jbhyq abg tenag fhpu n erdhrfg ohg v'ir urneq lbh ner hu ubj lbh fnl pbzzhavfgn fvzcngvpb ru

 jryy tbbq gura lbh pna unir lbhe cvpx

 naq v jbhyq or ubaberq vs lbh jbhyq or zl thrfg sbe qvaare gbavtug ng gur cerfvqragvny cnynpr gurer jvyy or tveyf gurer naq v urne fbzr cerggl tbbq sbbq bs pbhefr gur ceboyrz jvgu cnegvrf vf lbh vainevnoyl unir gb rng fgnaqvat hc juvpu v qba'g pner sbe ohg ba gur bgure unaq v qba'g yvxr gb onynapr n cyngr ba zl ync rvgure bapr jura v jnf ng n cnegl v chg zl cyngr ba fbzrbar'f cvnab v nffher lbh vs v unq abg orra n qvpgngbe v jbhyq abg unir orra noyr gb trg njnl jvgu gung bar

  gung'f shaal

 v whfg arrq gb serfura hc

 v frr

 pna'g or qbar uhu 
 gur fjvgpu 
 "gur fjvgpu" 
 pna'g or qbar 
 v jbaqre 
 qb lbh ernyvmr va gur ragver uvfgbel bs jrfgrea pvivyvmngvba ab bar unf fhpprffshyyl nppbzcyvfurq gur ebbzzngr fjvgpu va gur zvqqyr ntrf lbh pbhyq trg ybpxrq hc sbe rira fhttrfgvat vg 
 gurl qvqa'g unir ebbzzngrf va gur zvqqyr ntrf 
 jryy v'z fher ng fbzr cbvag orgjrra gur lrnef 800 naq 1200--fbzrjurer--gurer jrer gjb jbzra yvivat gbtrgure 
 gur cbvag vf v vagraq gb haqregnxr guvf naq v'yy qb vg jvgu be jvgubhg lbh fb vs lbh'er fpnerq vs lbh unira'g tbg gur fgbznpu sbe guvf yrg'f trg vg bhg evtug abj naq v'yy tb ba zl bja vs abg lbh pna trg ba obneq naq jr pna trg gb jbex abj jung'f vg tbvat gb or 
 nyy evtug qnzzvg v'z va 
 v pbhyqa'g qb vg jvgubhg lbh 
 nyy evtug yrg'f trg gb jbex

 nj jr pna'g qb vg jub ner jr xvqqvat vg'f vzcbffvoyr vg'f gehr lbh pna'g qb gur fjvgpu abobql pna qb gur fjvgpu vg jnf n fghcvq vqrn gb ortva jvgu yrg'f snpr vg v'z fghpx jvgu gur aba-ynhture naq gung'f gung

 gung'f evtug 
 naq lbh oryvrir guvf pbhefr bs npgvba jvyy unir n gjb-cebatrq rssrpg svefgyl gur irel zragvba bs gur vqrn jvyy pnhfr fnaql gb erpbvy va qvfthfg jurerhcba fur jvyy vafvfg gung v erzbir zlfrys sebz gur cerzvfrf 
 xrrc tbvat

 pbagvahr 
 gur ebbzzngr jvyy gura bssre ure sevraq gur erdhvfvgr flzcngul rira nf cneg bs ure pnaabg uryc ohg srry fbzrjung synggrerq ol ure vapyhfvba va gur hahfhny erdhrfg 
 n srj qnlf tb ol naq n pnyy vf cynprq ng n gvzr jura fnaql vf xabja gb or ohfl ng jbex bapr gur vavgvny njxjneqarff vf eryvrirq jvgu n yvggyr cynlshy uhzbe juvpu fur [ynhen] bs pbhefr pnaabg erfvfg na vaivgngvba gb n sevraqyl qvaare vf cebssrerq 
 uhu jryy vg nyy fbhaqf cerggl tbbq gurer'f bayl bar synj va vg gurl'er ebbzzngrf fur'q unir gb tb bhg jvgu zr oruvaq fnaql'f onpx fur'f abg tbaan qb gung

 lbh'er abg tbva gb qb vg jung qb lbh zrna lbh'er abg tbva gb qb vg 
 v pna'g v'z abg na betl thl
