 v pna'g oryvrir v'z univat gebhoyr trggvat evq bs fhcre objy gvpxrgf 
 v'z gryyvat lbh fxvc gur qenxr'f jrqqvat tb gb gur tnzr 
 v pna'g gur qenxr chg zr va gur jrqqvat cnegl 
 jryy jub fpurqhyrf uvf jrqqvat ba fhcre objy fhaqnl 
 znlor ur qvqa'g xabj 
 yrzzr frr v pna'g oryvrir lbh tbg gurfr sbe serr  ebj s 
 ebj s va sebag bs gur tf uboaboovat jvgu gur qf naq rf 
 ubjobhg xenzre be rynvar gurl qba'g jnag gurz 
 v nfxrq rynvar ynhturq ng zr xenzre'f bayl vagrerfgrq va pnanqvna sbbgonyy 
 jvfu v pbhyq uryc lbh 
 pbzr ba gnxr gurz lbh pbhyq gnxr obaavr 
 lbh cnlvat zl ubgry naq nvesner gb zvnzv 
 jung qb lbh guvax 
 fb va beqre gb hfr gurfr v tbggn fcraq yvxr svsgrra-uhaqerq ohpxf guvf vf n ovyy sbe svsgrra-uhaqerq qbyynef cyhf fur'q nfx nobhg gur fyrrcvat neenatrzragf gung jubyr fyrrcvat neenatrzrag pbairefngvba vf qrcerffvat 
 lrnu fyrrcvat neenatrzragf fb lbh unira'g hu 
 bu ab ab ab v unira'g rira frra ure ncnegzrag lrg gbzbeebj avtug'f gur svefg avtug 
 nnu 
 url vf gung gvz jungyrl 
 gur qragvfg 
 lrnu vf ur fgvyy znq ng lbh sbe penfuvat uvf gunaxftvivat cnegl 
 bu ab v rkcynvarq gur jubyr guvat gb uvz ur jnf svar jvgu vg 
 bu tbbq 
 lrnu v oynzrq vg ba lbh uv gvz 
 url wreel trbetr jung ner lbh hc gb 
 nu whfg n pbhcyr bs tnyf bhg ba gur gbja fubccvat naq tnoovat 
 v'z trggvat n znxrbire 
 url ubj jbhyq lbh yvxr gb tb gb gur fhcre objy 
 jung ner lbh xvqqvat 
 urer gjb gvpxrgf unir n tbbq gvzr 
 ubj pna v guvax lbh v'yy gryy lbh jung v'yy gnxr lbh gb qvaare fbzrgvzr lbh rire orra gb zraqlf 
 ab ab ab ab qvaare 
 gvz lbh qvqa'g unir gb trg zr n gunax lbh tvsg v xabj vg'f n ynory znxre gur ynory onol whavbe lrnu v urne gurl'er tbbq jryy ynory zr gunaxshy bxnl jryy lbh rawbl gubfr gvpxrgf ohu-olr 
 pbzr va 
 jurer pna v chg guvf 
 jung vf vg 
 vg'f evfx wreel gur tnzr bs jbeyq pbadhrfg  nyevtug gung'f cresrpg 
 xenzre jul qb lbh unir gb  uryyb arjzna 
 uryyb wreel jvyy ur gnxr vg v tbggn tb gb jbex 
 gnxr jung 
 gur obneq wreel jr'ir orra cynlvat ng arjzna'f sbe fvk ubhef ohg ur'f tbggn tb 
 fb jul qba'g lbh yrnir vg ng arjzna'f 
 v jnagrq gb ur jba'g yrg zr 
 jr unir gb chg gur obneq va n arhgeny cynpr jurer ab bar jvyy gnzcre jvgu vg 
 fb gung'f urer 
 lrf lrf lbh'er yvxr fjvgmreynaq 
 v qba'g jnaan or fjvgmreynaq 
 wreel arjzna naq v ner ratntrq va n rcvp fgehttyr sbe jbeyq qbzvangvba vg'f jvaare gnxr nyy crbcyr pnaabg or gehfgrq 
 qba'g ybbx ng zr 
 bu v'z ybbxvat evtug ng lbh ovt qnqql 
 nyevtug fbyqvre oblf yrg'f snyy bhg 
 nyevtug fb lbh'er tbaan ybbx nsgre vg 
 lrnu lrnu 
 fgnl fgebat ohqql 
 lrnu 
 jngpu vg tbbq 
 bx 
 url 
 url 
 url bu vf gung n ynory znxre 
 lrf vg vf v tbg vg nf n tvsg vg'f n ynory onol whavbe 
 ybir gur ynory onol onol lbh xabj gubfr guvatf znxr terng tvsgf v whfg tbg bar bs gubfr sbe gvz jungyrl sbe puevfgznf 
 gvz jungyrl 
 lrnu jub frag lbh gung bar 
 bar gvz jungyrl 
 abg zl gvz jungyrl 
 gur fnzr ur frag vg nf n gunax lbh sbe zl fhcre objy gvpxrgf 
 v guvax guvf vf gur fnzr bar v tnir uvz ur erplpyrq guvf tvsg ur'f n ertvsgre 
 be znlor ur yvxrq lbhe tvsg fb zhpu ur qrpvqrq gb trg zr gur fnzr guvat creuncf vg'f na ubzntr 
 lrnu creuncf 
 jryy ubj qvq ur ernpg jura lbh tnir vg gb uvz 
 hz ur fnvq "bu n ynory znxre ubjobhg gung" 
 ur ercrngrq gur anzr bs gur tvsg 
 lrnu fb 
 bu jryy vs lbh ercrng gur anzr bs gur tvsg lbh pna'g cbffvoyl yvxr vg 
 jung qb lbh zrna 
 bu lbh xabj yvxr jura fbzrbar bcraf fbzrguvat hc naq gurl tb "bu ghor fbpxf" jung ner lbh tbaan qb nobhg vg 
 v qba'g xabj v thrff v'yy whfg trg vaivgrq hc gb uvf ncnegzrag naq frr vs ur'f tbg n ynory znxre 
 jul'q lbh trg uvz n tvsg naljnl 
 bu ur qvq fbzr qragny jbex sbe zr naq ur qvqa'g punetr zr fb v gubhtug v'q trg uvz n puevfgznf cerfrag 
 lrnu jryy vs lbh'er trggvat uvz nalguvat sbe uvf oveguqnl v'z nynetr 
 jryy urer jr ner guvf vf gur cynpr 
 jbj 
 qb lbh yvxr vg 
 v ybir vg guvf vf snagnfgvp ybbx ng guvf pbhpu vf guvf iryirg 
 ner lbh n iryirg sna 
 n sna v jbhyq qencr zlfrys va iryirg vs vg jrer fbpvnyyl npprcgnoyr naq ybbx ng guvf uneqjbbq sybbef 
 nera'g gurl terng  bu fpbgg uv guvf vf trbetr trbetr guvf vf fpbgg zl ebbzzngr 
  uru uru 
 urer purpx bhg guvf ivrj vs lbh yrna bhg guvf jvaqbj lbh pna frr gur evire 
 fb fpbgg'f lbhe ebbzzngr uhu 
 lrf bu v'z fher v'ir zragvbarq uvz 
 ab lbh qvqa'g zragvba vg 
 ur'f n terng thl lbh'yy ernyyl yvxr uvz 
 v'z fher v jvyy 
 znyr ebbzzngr uhu 
 lrf n znyr ebbzzngr 
 vf guvf n ceboyrz 
 vg'f n uhtr ceboyrz wreel gur uneqrfg cneg nobhg univat frk jvgu n jbzna vf trggvat ure gb pbzr onpx gb lbhe cynpr ur'f nyernql tbg gung 
 jryy znlor ur'f -- 
 ab oryvrir zr ur'f abg 
 fb ur'f na ryvtvoyr erprvire 
 fur'f pbasvqvat va uvz nobhg bhe qngrf lbh nyjnlf yvxr gur crefba lbh gnyx gb nobhg gur qngr zber guna gur qngr vg'f whfg n znggre bs gvzr gvyy gurl ernyvmr 'url jr pbhyq unir frk' 
 jung'f fgbccvat gurz 
 rknpgyl lbh xabj ubj gurl trg navznyf gb ercebqhpr va pncgvivgl gurl whfg chg gurz va gur fnzr pntr 
 jung qbrf ur ybbx yvxr 
 bu gung'f gur jbefg cneg bs vg ur ybbxf whfg yvxr zr 
 ur ybbxf yvxr lbh naq ur'f jbexvat sebz gur vafvqr 
 v ybbx yvxr zr naq v'z jbexvat sebz gur bhgfvqr jub qb lbh guvax vf va gur orggre cbfvgvba 
 abg lbh 
 ub ub guvf ovmneer uneebq rkcrevzrag zhfg raq 
 jr'yy gnxr n purpx cyrnfr 
 v tbggn svaq n jnl gb jbex guvf bhg v ybir gung ncnegzrag vg'f fb pbml v'z rafpbaprq va iryirg lbh xabj vs vg jrer fbpvnyyl npprcgnoyr-- 
 v xabj lbh jbhyq qencr lbhefrys va iryirg 
 v'ir fnvq gung orsber 
 znal gvzrf lbh ybir iryirg lbh jnag gb yvir va iryirg rirelguvat jvgu gur iryirg 
  url 
 url 
 url 
 thrff jung v fnj arjzna gnyxvat gb gur fhcre 
 fb jung 
 gur fhcre unf xrlf gb lbhe ncnegzrag qba'g lbh frr jung'f tbvat ba arjzna vf cynaavat n farnx nggnpx 
 bu znlor ur'f tbg ab ubg jngre 
 lrnu nyevtug svar lbh fvg gurer naq lbh jngpu juvyr arjzna gnxrf bire gur jbeyq ohg ur'q or n ubeevoyr yrnqre naq lbh xabj jub'f tbaan fhssre gur yvggyr crbcyr; lbh naq trbetr 
 ner lbh guebhtu 
 bu v gnyxrq gb neguhe wbonavna lrnu gur qenxr'f jrqqvat gung'f bss 
 gur jrqqvat vf bss jung unccrarq 
 gur qenxr ur sbhaq bhg gung gur jrqqvat vf ba gur fnzr qnl nf gur fhcre objy fb ur jnagrq gb cbfgcbar vg gurl tbg va n ovt nethzrag naq *cuys* vg'f bire 
 gur jrqqvat vf bss abj lbh pna tb gb gur fhcre objy 
 v pna'g pnyy gvz jungyrl naq nfx sbe gur gvpxrgf onpx 
 lbh whfg tnir gurz gb uvz gjb qnlf ntb ur'f tbggn tvir lbh n tenpr crevbq 
 ner lbh rira inthryl snzvyvne jvgu gur pbaprcg bs tvivat gurer'f ab tenpr crevbq 
 jryy qvqa'g ur ertvsg gur ynory znxre 
 cbffvoyl 
 jryy vs ur pna ertvsg jul pna'g lbh qrtvsg 
 lbh znl unir n cbvag 
 v unir n cbvag v unir n cbvag 
 nyevtug v'yy pnyy uvz 
 lrnu jung'f gung 
 bu vg'f evfx vg'f n tnzr bs jbeyq qbzvangvba orvat cynlrq ol gjb thlf jub pna oneryl eha gurve bja yvirf  uryyb gvz lrnu uv vg'f wreel frvasryq erzrzore gubfr gvpxrgf v tnir lbh jryy vg gheaf bhg v pna hfr gurz bu lbh qb v haqrefgnaq bxnl olr ur nyernql znqr cynaf ur pna'g punatr gurz 
  jryy gurl'er uvf gvpxrgf ur pna qb jung ur jnagf jvgu gurz 
 gunaxf 
 nyevtug v tbggn tb v'z urnqvat bire gb obaavr'f 
 jung ner lbh tbaan qb nobhg gur ebbzzngr 
 v tbggn gel naq svaq n jnl gb fjvgpu cynprf jvgu uvz vg'f yvxr n fvtsevrq naq ebl gevpx 
 jryy gur cvpxyr oerngu vf n tbbq fgneg 
 uryyb wreel znl v pbzr va 
 jung qb lbh jnag 
  abguvat whfg orvat arvtuobeyl qb lbh jnaan unat bhg fubbg gur oerrmr 
 v'z abg yrggvat lbh purng arjzna lbh'er abg trggvat naljurer arne gung obneq 
 wreel v'z n yvggyr vafhygrq 
 lbh'er abg n yvggyr nalguvat arjzna fb whfg cnpx vg hc naq zbir vg bhg bs urer 
  bu ol gur jnl jung ner lbh qbvat sbe gur fhcre objy 
 v qhaab jngpu vg ba gi v thrff jul 
 jryy vs lbh jngpu pybfryl rabhtu lbh whfg zvtug frr zr v'yy or gur bar jnivat gb gur pnzren sebz zl frng ba gur sbegl lneq yvar 
 lbh'er tbvat gb gur fhcre objy 
 lrf v nz n thl ba zl znvy ebhgr whfg tbg n pbhcyr bs gvpxrgf naq ur bssrerq bar gb zr 
 jung'f uvf anzr 
 gvz jungyrl 
 gung'f zl gvpxrg 
 vf vg buuu jryy vs bayl lbh'q xabja lbh pbhyq unir fnirq fbzr gvzr naq tvira vg qverpgyl gb zr un un un 
  arjzna 
 jung n zbivr tbbq pubvpr 
 gunax fpbgg ur erpbzzraqrq vg 
 bu fpbgg fpbgg ur'f ernyyl terng vfa'g ur 
 lrf ur vf 
 lrf ur vf yrg zr nfx lbh fbzrguvat jura lbh pbzr bhg bs gur fubjre naq lbh chg lbhe ebor ba qb lbh pvapu vg erny gvtug ner lbh pbaprearq nobhg gung 
 trbetr 
 qb lbh ubyq gur arpx gbtrgure jvgu bar unaq be ner lbh whfg yrggvat vg sync va gur oerrmr 
 trbetr lbh'er orvat evqvphybhf 
 jung'f gur znffntr fvghngvba 
 jung qb lbh zrna 
 vf gurer nal jbex orvat qbar vf gurer nal ehoovat gbhpuvat svatre znavchyngvba ba gur bgure crefba naq vs fb jub'f znxvat gur erdhrfg 
 trbetr jbhyq lbh whfg fgbc 
 fnl lbh tb gb gur onguebbz ng gjb b'pybpx va gur zbeavat jung'f gur bhgsvg v zrna lbh qerffvat hc be vf vg pbzr nf lbh ner 
 trbetr jung vf jebat jvgu lbh 
 v'yy gryy lbh jung'f jebat n tebja jbzna jvgu n znyr ebbzzngr vg'f haangheny vg'f na nobzvangvba 
 url 
 url 
 ubj ln tbvat 
 v'z tbbq 
  ner lbh tbaan arrq gur onguebbz 'pnhfr v'z tbaan whzc va gur fubjre 
 ab whfg guebj zl oenf bhg bs gur jnl 
 jryy guvf vf zl ohvyqvat 
 lrf vg vf 
 guvf jnf sha lbh xabj 
 lrnu 
 fb v'yy pnyy 
 nera'g lbh tbaan vaivgr zr hcfgnvef 
 hcfgnvef lbh jnaan tb hcfgnvef 
 v jbhyq ybir gb tb hcfgnvef 
 rynvar lbh ner fbzrguvat ryfr ab bar pna rire chg n ynory ba lbh uhu 
 jr'yy frr 
 arjzna ur'f tbvat jvgu arjzna 
 ubj qbrf gvz jungyrl rira xabj arjzna 
 arjzna'f uvf znvyzna 
 jub tbrf gb gur fhcre objy jvgu gurve znvyzna 
 jub tbrf *naljurer* jvgu arjzna 
 jryy ur'f zreel 
 ur vf zreel v'yy tvir uvz gung  jung'f guvf cynag sbe 
 v unq n yvggyr gvss jvgu obaavr nobhg gur ebbzzngr 
 bu jryy gur pnpghf jvyy fzbbgu guvatf bire 
 url thrff jung v'z tbvat gb gur fhcre objy jvgu gvz jungyrl 
 jung 
 jr jrag bhg sbe pbssrr ynfg avtug naq ur bssrerq zr n gvpxrg 
 jung nobhg gur ynory znxre 
 nu jryy 
 jnvg n zvahgr gung'f zl gvpxrg lbh qvqa'g rira jnag gb tb 
 vg jnf gbgnyyl bhg bs gur oyhr jr jrag hcfgnvef gb uvf ncnegzrag lbh xabj gb ybbx sbe gur ynory znxre 
 fb ubj qvq lbh trg hc gurer qvq lbh fnl lbh unq gb hfr gur onguebbz 
 ab 
 gura ubj'q lbh trg hc gurer 
 v fnvq "qb lbh jnaan tb hcfgnvef" 
 naq gurer'f lbh gvpxrg 
 jung 
 gung'f jul lbh'er tbvat gb gur fhcre objy 
 jul 
 lbh tb bhg jvgu n thl bar gvzr lbh nfx uvz gb tb hcfgnvef yvxr lbh'er znr jrfg bs pbhefr ur'f tbaan gel naq trg lbh nybar sbe gur jrrxraq 
 lbh zrna whfg orpnhfr v nfxrq uvz gb tb hcfgnvef ur guvaxf ur'f tbvat qbjagbja 
 boivbhfyl 
 lbh'er penml 
 jryy jung unccrarq jura lbh tbg hcfgnvef 
 nf fbba nf jr jnyxrq va ur tbg n pnyy sebz bar bs uvf cngvragf jvgu na vzcnpgrq zbyne be fbzrguvat fb ur unq gb yrnir v qvqa'g rira trg n punapr gb ybbx sbe gur ynory znxre 
 lrnu jryy v qba'g gehfg guvf thl v guvax ur ertvsgrq ur qrtvsgrq naq abj ur'f hfvat na hcfgnvef vaivgr nf n fcevatobneq gb n fhcre objy frk ebzc 
 url 
 url jung ner lbh qbvat 
 v'z jngpuvat lbhe qbbe 
 zl qbbe 
 lrnu sebz zl crrcubyr svfurlr frrf nyy 
  jung jnf gung 
 arjzna 
  qnza 
  gur orqebbz 
 v frr lbh arjzna v frr lbh 
 v'z gnxvat gur pbatb nf n cranygl 
 v'ir tbg n pbasrffvba gb znxr 
 bu jung'f gung 
 v'ir tbg fhcre objy srire 
 bu lrnu zr gbb 
 fb jurer ner jr fgnlvat 
 bu gur nzonffnqbe 
 bu ovt ebbz 
 vg'f n erthyne ebbz ohg vg'f evtug qbjagbja 
 qbjagbja 
 evtug qbjagbja 
 jung qb gurl unir gurer n pbhcyr bs orqf 
 jul lbh oevatvat fbzrbar ryfr 
 ab ohg qba'g lbh guvax gurer fubhyq or gjb orqf gurer'f gjb bs hf 
 bu n pnpghf 
 gurl qba'g arrq nal jngre fb lbh qba'g unir gb xrrc gnxvat gurz gb gur onguebbz 
 jryy ybbx jub'f urer 
 v nfxrq fpbgg gb zbir bhg 
 bu bu 
 fb fur xvpxrq uvz bhg bs gur ncnegzrag 
 gung'f evtug vg'f whfg zr naq ure 
 jbj fur erneenatrq ure jubyr yvsr sbe lbh 
 v thrff fur qvq ur'f tbar abj v'z gur zna 
 gung'f abg n tbbq ebyr sbe lbh 
 ab vg'f abg 
 lbh hajvggvatyl znqr n znwbe pbzzvgzrag gung'f n ybg bs cerffher 
 bu zl tbq 
 lbh jnagrq gb or rafpbaprq va iryirg lbh'er ohevrq 
 v unq gur cresrpg fvghngvba urer ur jnf fubhyqrevat unys gur ybnq 
 ur jnf fubhyqrevat 
  v pbhyqa'g yrnir jryy rabhtu nybar 
 jurer ner lbh tbvat 
 v tbggn tb uryc ure gncr hc nyy uvf obkrf naq trg gurz ernql sbe fuvccvat 
 bu jryy urer gnxr jungyrl'f ynory znxre v qba'g jnag gb frr vg ntnva 
 gunaxf 
  lrnu v nz gnxvat bire fbhgu nzrevpn naq gurer nva'g abguvat lbh pna qb nobhg vg 
 fb gbb onq nobhg gung fhcre objy gvpxrg ru arjzna 
 lrnu v whfg ubcr gvz jungyrl'f ryrpgevp ovyyf qba'g fhqqrayl trg ybfg va gur znvy be vg pbhyq or yvtugf bhg sbe uvz 
  gunaxf sbe univat zr bire thlf 
 nyevtug v'yy frr lbh yngre 
 url wreel 
 nu gvz jungyrl bhg fpnycvat 
 nu frr abj v'ir orra guvaxvat n ybg nobhg jung unccrarq naq v srry ubeevoyr yvfgra v jnag gb tvir lbh n gvpxrg onpx 
 ner lbh frevbhf jung nobhg rynvar 
 bu rynvar lrnu jryy guvatf whfg qvqa'g jbex bhg yvxr v gubhtug gurl jbhyq 
 bu  url vfa'g guvf xenzre'f pne  url pbfzb gurl'er gbjvat lbhe pne 
  jung abg zl pne url gurl'er gbjvat zl pne 
 jung ner lbh qbvat 
 v'z gnxvat gur obneq jvgu zr 
 fb v thrff v'yy frr lbh ng gur tnzr 
 lrnu frr lbh gurer 
 uv trbetr 
 jung jung unccrarq jurer'f jurer'f nyy gur fghss 
 vg'f tbar vg jnf nyy uvf vf guvf n ynory znxre 
 gur gnoyr gur fgrerb gur ipe gur iryirg pbhpu jurer'f gur iryirg 
 gurl jrer uvf orfvqrf jr qba'g arrq nal bs gubfr guvatf jr unir rnpu bgure 
 ner lbh fher lbh xabj jurer gur vzcbhaq lneq vf 
 bu fgbc fgnyyvat pbzr ba 
 v pna'g guvax gurer'f nyy guvf abvfr 
 be vf vg orpnhfr v'ir ohvyg n fgebatubyq nebhaq terraynaq v'ir qevira lbh bhg bs jrfgrea rhebcr naq v'ir yrsg lbh grrgrevat ba gur oevax bs pbzcyrgr naavuvyngvba 
 v'z abg orngra lrg v fgvyy unir nezvrf va gur hxenvar 
 un un gur hxenvar qb lbh xabj jung gur hxenvar vf vg'f n fvggvat qhpx n ebnq nccyr arjzna gur hxenvar vf jrnx vg'f srroyr v guvax vg'f gvzr gb chg gur uheg ba gur hxenvar 
 v pbzr sebz hxenvar lbh abg fnl hxenvar jrnx 
 lrnu jryy jr'er cynlvat n tnzr urer cny 
 hxenvar vf tnzr gb lbh ubjobhg v gnxr lbhe yvggyr obneq naq fznfu vg 
 uryyb gvz 
  rynvar uv 
 qba'g jbeel gvz v qvqa'g pbzr ol gb lryy ng lbh v qvqa'g pbzr ol sbe gung ng nyy v whfg pnzr ol gb cvpx hc zl ynory znxre v tnir lbh n ynory znxre naq abj v jbhyq yvxr gb unir vg onpx 
 ohg lbh tnir vg gb zr 
 ohg lbh tnir zr n gvpxrg gb gur fhcre objy unaq vg bire jungyrl 
 hu bx 
 lbh qba'g unir gur ynory znxre qb lbh 
 hu ab 
 v xarj vg lbh'er n ertvsgre 
 bu lrnu fbzr tvsg gung guvat qvqa'g jbex ng nyy 
 jung 
 lbh chg n ynory ba fbzrguvat gura gra zvahgrf yngre vg jbhyq crry evtug bss vg jnf gur jbefg tvsg v rire tbg 
  jryy v obhtug vg sbe lbh orpnhfr lbh jrer fb avpr gb zr sbe abg punetvat zr sbe gur qragny jbex gur jnl lbh jbexrq ba zl svyyvat lbh jrer fb fb tragyr naq fb pnevat naq fb frafvgvir 
 bu rynvar 
 u t s frng sbhe bar gjb guerr s-- uryyb arjzna 
 uryyb wreel gvz pbhyqa'g znxr vg ur'f va ybir vfa'g gung jbaqreshy 
 bu vg'f rapunagvat 
 uv 
 urer'f gur gi v xabj lbh jnagrq gb jngpu gur fhcre objy qb lbh ng yrnfg unir fbzr gbjryf jr pbhyq fvg ba vg'f yvxr n sbhe ubhe tnzr 
 trbetr fpbgg'f tbaan qebc ol ur fnvq ur arire tbg uvf obkrf v'yy trg gur gbjryf 
  ubj nz v tbaan trg bhg bs guvf guvax pbfgnamn guvax 
 urer jr ner 
 url qb lbh xabj obaavr v whfg unq n cerggl jvyq vqrn 
 jung vf vg 
 jryy v hu v'z abg fher ubj lbh cebabhapr vg be nalguvat ohg v hu v oryvrir vg'f zantr  gebvf 
 jung 
 uv 
 fpbgg erzrzore jung jr gnyxrq nobhg gur bgure qnl trbetr vf vagb vg 
 bu ernyyl 
 terng fgernx bs yhpx v'z univat svefg xenzre nyzbfg orng zr ng evfx ohg v aneebjyl rfpncrq naq gura gvz jungyrl tvirf zr uvf fhcre objy gvpxrg 
 pna lbh zbir bire ng nyy 
 naq gura whfg nf v'z nobhg gb tb gurfr obkrf fubj hc ng gur cbfg bssvpr jvgu ab ynoryf ab ynoryf wreel lbh xabj jung gung zrnaf serrovrf v tbg guvf terng zvav-gi naq n ipe bu vg'f haoryvrinoyr 
 na vapu pna lbh zbir bire na vapu 
 url trbetr 
 tnel jryy jryy jryy jryy jurer gur uryy'ir lbh orra v'ir orra yrnivat lbh cubar zrffntrf sbe zbaguf 
 v xabj v'ir orra cerggl ohfl 
 ohfl qba'g tvir zr ohfl jub'f abg ohfl v'z ohfl jr'er nyy ohfl rirelobql'f ohfl nyy evtug gryy zr jung'f xrcg lbh fb ohfl 
 zbfgyl purzbgurencl 'xnl v'yy frr lbh 
  url cvt 
  url url url 
 fb lbh pnyyrq gur pbc n cvt 
 v jnf lryyvat ng gur yvggreoht v zrna guvf vf zl gbja lbh qba'g guebj genfu ba gur fgerrgf bs zl gbja 
 qvqa'g lbh rkcynva gung gb gur pbc 
 ab v syrq gur fprar 
  url 
  url ohqql 
 url hu 
 jung 
 xenzre v v v hu v arrq gb gnyx gb wreel cevingryl 
 bu jung nobhg 
 xenzre 
 nj pbzr ba trbetr lbh pna funer vg jvgu zr uhu 
 url lbh'er uhegvat zr 
 lbh tbaan funer vg jvgu zr arkg gvzr uhu 
 v fjrne v fjrne 
 nj nyy evtug v'z ybbxvat sbejneq gb vg 
 evtug v tbg arjf lbh ernql  tnel sbtry unq pnapre 
 bu lrnu v xarj 
 lbh xarj ubj qvq lbh xabj 
 ur gbyq zr n srj zbaguf ntb 
 jul qvq ur gryy lbh naq abg zr 
 v qba'g xabj 
 ubj ner lbh pybfre gb uvz guna zr 
 fb vf ur bxnl 
 bu lrnu ur'f svar svar ur jnf va onq funcr sbe n juvyr gubhtu 
 uhu ernyyl ubj onq jnf ur ba uvf qrngu orq 
 ab ur jnf ba uvf erthyne orq 
 fb jul qvqa'g lbh gryy zr 
 ur fjber zr gb frperpl 
 fb 
 vg'f abg yvxr lbh'er zl jvsr 
 jryy v fgvyy guvax lbh fubhyqn gbyq zr 
 url oryvrir zr lbh jrer orggre bss abg xabjvat vg'f abg rnfl gb qrny jvgu fbzrbar va n fvghngvba yvxr guvf v jnf fb avpr gb uvz v nyzbfg znqr zlfrys fvpx 
 jryy v jnaan gnyx gb uvz nobhg guvf 
 gung'f evtug lbh yrg uvz unir vg 
 zzz-zz 
 jub vf ur abg gb gryy lbh nobhg uvf yvsr-guerngravat vyyarff 
 gung'f jung v'z fnlvat 
 uvf vyyarff vf lbhe ohfvarff 
 vs abg zvar jubfr 
 vs abg abj jura 
 jrer lbh whfg gnyxvat nobhg zr 
 ab na byq sevraq bs bhef tnel 
 bu gur thl jvgu pnapre 
  lbh gbyq ure fur'f abg lbhe jvsr 
 vs v gbyq lbh lbh jbhyqn tvira vg njnl 
 lbh qba'g guvax v pna xrrc n frperg 
 ab ohg ur jbhyq'ir ernq lbhe snpr 
 lbh qba'g gehfg zl cbxre snpr 
 qb lbh rire jva ng cbxre 
  ab 
 url  bu v whfg fnj lbhe byq oblsevraq ba gi 
 rtu wnxr wnezry 
 lrnu v ernyyl yvxrq gubfr tynffrf ur jnf jrnevat jurer'q ur trg gubfr 
 jul lbh qba'g jrne tynffrf 
 v xabj v xabj ohg v arrq n arj ybbx v'z fgntangvat 
 v unir gb fnl nf n tynffrf jrnere v gnxr rkprcgvba gb gung gung'f yvxr zr ohlvat n jurrypunve gb pehvfr nebhaq va 
 lrnu v'ir pbafvqrerq gung  ybbx ubj qb v trg va gbhpu jvgu guvf thl 
 jryy ur'f univat n gjb qnl obbx fvtavat ng jnyqraf 
 nu 
 lbh xabj jr unq n ernyyl onq oernx-hc 
 gur whwl sehvgf 
  lrnu gur whwl sehvgf 
 bxnl x-zna rawbl gur obbx 
 bxnl gunax lbh yvfgra wnxr hu jurer qvq lbh trg gubfr rlrtynff senzrf 
 v pna'g gryy lbh gung 
 fb lbh qba'g xabj jurer lbh tbg 'rz

 jryy gung'f crphyvne  
 ru gurer'f gung jbzna gung arire gnyxf gb nalobql 
 ernyyl 
 rirel qnl fur pbzrf va fur fvgf ng gung gnoyr naq ernqf arire gnyxf gb nalobql 
 bu v gnyxrq gb qrool ovoryb fur fnvq gb fnl uv 
  ernyyl  lbh xabj tnel v ernyyl unir gb fnl v'z n yvggyr ovg uheg gung lbh qvqa'g qrpvqr gb pbasvqr va zr 
 jryy senaxyl lbh pna'g xrrc n frperg lbh xabj lbh'q trg gjb cnve gur jubyr gnoyr xabjf 
 jryy v fgvyy guvax vg jnf jebat 
 evtug jryy v'z fbeel nyy evtug v thrff v jnf whfg guvaxvat bs zlfrys 
  lrf 
 fb v pnyyrq gur yvggreoht n cvt abg lbh v yvxr cbyvprzna v jnagrq gb or n cbyvprzna 
 lrnu fb jul qvqa'g lbh 
 fpnerq bs orvat fubg 
 ze xenzre yrg zr gryy lbh n fgbel va avargrra-friragl-avar v gvpxrgrq n oebja qbqtr qvcybzng sbe cnexvat va n puhepu mbar gung svar jnf arire cnvq naq fvapr gura gung fpbssynj unf cvyrq hc zber cnexvat gvpxrgf guna nalbar va arj lbex pvgl sbe fvkgrra lrnef v chefhrq uvz bayl gb frr uvz tvir zr gur fyvc gvzr naq gvzr ntnva v arire tbg n pyrna ybbx ng uvf snpr ohg ur'f orpbzr zl 'juvgr junyr' ze xenzre gung qnl jnf lrfgreqnl ohg gunaxf gb lbh v qba'g xabj vs v'yy rire trg gung punapr ntnva 
 v yvxr gung rlr cngpu 
  nyy evtug v'z tbaan zbir zl pne zl zrgre'f hc pna'g cnex va guvf pvgl 
  url trbetr yvfgra lbh xabj gung pbzcnal v jbex sbe gurl bja gung cnexvat ybg nebhaq gur pbeare 
 jun gung'f n xvaarl ybg 
 lrnu naq gurer'f n fcnpr bcravat hc naq v pbhyq trg vg sbe lbh lbh whfg unir gb cnl gur gnk ba vg vg'q or yvxr svsgl n zbagu 
 svsgl ohpxf n zbagu gung'f vaperqvoyr bxnl gunaxf 
 nyy evtug v tbg yhapu nyy evtug

 lrnu

 jung qb guvax v gryy wreel rirelguvat vg'f abg yvxr ur'f zl jvsr 
 bxnl jryy gur guvat vf v'ir orra yvivat n yvr 
 whfg bar v'z yvivat yvxr gjragl  jung'f lbhef

 fb ur ershfrq gb gryy lbh jurer ur tbg gur tynffrf 
  syng bhg ershfrq

 lbh qvq gung

 jnvg n zvahgr jnvg n zvahgr lbh pna'g fnl nalguvat  
 jul abg 
  orpnhfr ur'yy xabj v gbyq lbh orfvqrf ur'f tvivat zr n cnexvat fcbg nebhaq gur pbeare sbe cenpgvpnyyl abguvat

 lrnu

 vf gung sebz zl tvsg pregvsvpngr

  lrnu jryy v'z tynq lbh pbhyq gnxr nqinagntr 
 url lbh xabj jung v'z guvaxvat bs qbvat v'z trggvat evq bs nyy zl svyyvatf 'pbf gung zrephel'f gbkvp url yrg zr frr lbhe svyyvatf 
 v qba'g guvax fb

 ertneqf 
 lrnu ertneqf 
 naljnl v nqzvg v jnf qhzo gb tb gb gur obbxfgber gb gryy uvz v qvqa'g fnl uv ohg ur qvqa'g unir gb npg fb fzht bu v ungr fzhtarff qba'g lbh ungr fzhtarff 
  fzhtarff vf abg n tbbq dhnyvgl 
  bu zl tbq gung zna bire gurer v guvax ur'f jrnevat tynffrf gung ybbx whfg yvxr wnxr'f chyy bire fgbc gur pne  urer urer v guvax v tbg n jnl bs trggvat onpx ng zl rk-oblsevraq 
 tbbq eriratr vf irel tbbq

 p'zba 
 jryy gurfr jrer rkcrafvir 
 yrg'f fgneg gur ovqqvat 
 fb lbh qvqa'g guvax guvf jnf n qngr 
 a ab abg ernyyl jul vf vg n qngr 
 v gubhtug vg jnf n qngr 
 ab vg'f abg n qngr 
 jung nobhg gur ertneqf 
 ertneqf qba'g zrna nalguvat v zrna vg'f abg yvxr v fnvq uv url gur snpg vf  v fubhyqa'g fnl nalguvat 
 ab gryy zr 
 pna lbh xrrc n frperg 
 zr bu lrnu 
  v arire unq srryvatf sbe tnel hagvy ur tbg fvpx ohg u ur jnf fb oenir naq naq tnvarq fhpu n jbaqreshy crefcrpgvir ba yvsr v v sryy va ybir jvgu uvz 
 bu gur thl'f tbg fbzr crefcrpgvir gurer 
 url qb lbh xabj jung gur juvc qbrf 
 jung juvc 
 gur juvc va gur frangr va gur ubhfr 
 jryy lbh xabj va gur byq qnlf jura gur frangbef qvqa'g ibgr gur jnl gung gur cnegl yrnqref jnagrq 'rz gb gurl juvccrq gurz  lbh orggre ibgr gur jnl jr jnag lbh gb be gurer'f tbaan or ovt gebhoyr  
 fur jba'g gnyx gb nalbar uhu bu ab fur jba'g fnl n jbeq gb nalobql jryy fur'f gnyxvat n oyhr fgernx abj wnpx 
 jryy jryy gur 'juvgr junyr' 
  bu ybbx ng guvf gurer'f ab cynpr gb cnex nebhaq urer v qba'g rira xabj jul gurl fryy pnef va znaunggna 
 qba'g pbzcynva ng yrnfg lbh unir lbhe urnygu 
 trbetr ybbx bhg sbe gung zna 
  url url trg onpx urer 
  arjzna gur juvgr junyr 
 pna lbh oryvrir ur fbyq uvf tynffrf ba gur fgerrg 
 pna lbh oryvrir fbzrbar jbhyq yvr nobhg purzbgurencl gb trg n jvt jbhyq lbh qb gung 
 ab qrsvavgryl abg 
 lrnu 
 v'z cerggl fher v jbhyqa'g 
 naq lbh xabj jung ryfr ur cvpxrq hc gung jbzna va gur pbssrr fubc 
 gur bar jub nyjnlf fvgf ol urefrys 
 lrnu 
 ubj qvq ur qb gung 
 orpnhfr ur jnf oevzzvat jvgu pbasvqrapr sebz gur gbhcrr 
 ernyyl naq qrool gbyq zr gung fur sryy va ybir jvgu uvz orpnhfr ur unf nyy guvf crefcrpgvir

  ur cvpxrq ure hc

 znynlfvn v jnf va gur nern 
  xenzre 
 whfg qevir 
 nyy evtug abj lbh yvfgra naq lbh yvfgra tbbq v xabj jub lbh ner lbh'er gur fpbssynj 
  jung'er lbh gnyxvat nobhg 
  nu qba'g cynl qhzo vg'f zr pbfzb 
 nyy evtug fb vg'f zr fb jung 
 lbh qba'g guvax v xabj ubj lbh'er srryvat rirel frpbaq bs gur qnl ybbxvat bire lbhe fubhyqre gb frr vs fbzrbar'f pbzvat hc sebz oruvaq fvggvat nybar ng avtug xabjvat gurl pbhyq or pybfvat va 
 v pna'g fyrrc v gryy lbh v pna'g fyrrc 
 tn bs pbhefr lbh pna'g lbh cbbe fnc abj jul qvqa'g lbh gryy zr 
 v pbhyqa'g v pbhyqa'g gryy nalbar 
 fb lbh orra yvivat guvf frperg gur jubyr gvzr ol lbhefrys 
  lrf vg'f orra njshy v jnagrq gb gryy fbzrobql  uryc zr xenzre uryc zr 
 nyy evtug nyy evtug v'z tbaan uryc lbh 
 v'yy gel fbzr ba naq frr ubj gurl ybbx vg'f whfg unve 
 lbh rire frr jung gung guvat ybbxf yvxr va gur onpx lbh tbg lbhe angheny yvggyr pheyf ba gur obggbz naq gura gung ovt cubal zng pbzvat qbja ba gbc bs 'rz 
 jryy fbzr bs 'rz ybbx tbbq gur barf gung ybbx tbbq lbh qba'g rira xabj nobhg 
 jung vs lbh trg vaibyirq jvgu n jbzna ubj'er lbh tbaan gryy ure 
 gur jnl gurl znxr 'rz gurfr qnlf v'yy arire unir gb gryy ure 
 fb lbh xrrc vg n frperg lbhe jubyr yvsr gura ng lbhe shareny gur zbegvpvna pbzrf bhg  'urer zef pbfgnamn v gubhtug lbh zvtug jnag guvf'  nnuu 
 vg'f ab frperg gung vg'f zl qernz gb unir zl bja choyvfuvat ubhfr naq vs guvf wnxr wnezry obbx qbrf lbh xabj jung v guvax vg'f tbaan qb vs v pna trg guvf jubyr guvat bss gur tebhaq gura  lbh xabj v guvax v'yy unir fbzrguvat sbe lbh  
 bu ze yvcczna  gung vf fb rkpvgvat v zrna lbh unir ab vqrn ubj fvpx v nz bs ehaavat nebhaq gbja ybbxvat sbe fbpxf 
 lrnu ol gur jnl gubfr ner terng tynffrf 
 bu ernyyl lbh yvxr 'rz 
 hu uhu irel hahfhny 
 jryy lbh xabj jung  
 jung 
  lbh pna unir 'rz 
 bu ab ab ab  cyrnfr 
 ab ab ab ab tb gb gung cynpr ba gur pbeare gurl'yy punatr gur cerfpevcgvba va na ubhe gnxr 'rz 
 ernyyl 
 lrnu v'ir ab hfr sbe gurz nalzber ubarfgyl 
  v pbhyq hfr n arj cnve bs ernqvat tynffrf 
 gurl'er sebz znynlfvn 
  bu lrnu 
  snohybhf 
 jryy ze arjzna va nyy zl lrnef ba gur orapu v unir arire pbzr npebff nalguvat dhvgr yvxr guvf v unir tvira guvf znggre fbzr irel frevbhf pbafvqrengvba naq v'ir qrpvqrq gung jung'f orfg sbe gur pvgl naq cbffvoyl sbe lbhefrys vf sbe lbh gb xrrc lbhe pne va n tnentr 
 pbairavrag gb lbhe ubzr 
  v pna'g nssbeq gung 
 nssbeq vg lbh jvyy ze arjzna be guvf pbheg jvyy frr gung lbhe pne vf vzcbhaqrq 
 naq fbyq ng nhpgvba 
 jryy qba'g lbh jbeel lbhe ubabhe ur'f va zl phfgbql 
  jryy jung q'lbh guvax 
  v ernyyl pna'g fnl 
 ab fnl v jnag lbh gb fnl 
 vg'f abg tbbq bxnl vg'f abg tbbq lbh ybbx  fghcvq  v'z fbeel 
 lbh unir gb ernyvfr guvf unf abg orra phfgbz-svggrq gb uvf fpnyc 
  v ernyyl guvax guvf ybbxf cerggl tbbq 
 jul qba'g lbh trg n cnve bs juvgr fubrf zbir qbja gb zvnzv ornpu naq trg gur jubyr guvat bire jvgu 
  jryy znlor lbh pbhyq fubj zr fbzrguvat ryfr 
 nf v fnvq vg'yy or qvssrerag bapr jr qrfvta fbzrguvat fcrpvsvpnyyl sbe lbh ohg v qba'g guvax lbhe sevraq urer vf orvat irel urycshy 
 bu url v'z orvat urycshy v nz gur bayl bar orvat urycshy 
  ab v qba'g guvax lbh'er orvat urycshy v guvax lbh'er orvat qvfehcgvir naq lbh znxr vg irel qvssvphyg sbe lbhe sevraq urer gb vzcebir uvf yvsr 
 url v'z gelvat gb cerirag zl sevraq sebz orpbzvat bar bs gubfr thlf crbcyr favpxre ng oruvaq gurve onpx orpnhfr gurl ybbx evqvphybhf ab bssrapr gb lbh crefbanyyl 
  nyy lbh crbcyr jvgu unve guvax lbh'er fb qnza fhcrevbe lbh unir ab vqrn jung vg'f yvxr lbh rire ybbx qbja va gur obggbz bs lbhe gho naq frr n svfg shyyn unve ubj'q lbh yvxr gb fgneg lbhe qnl jvgu gung  
 nyy evtug gnxr vg rnfl gnxr vg rnfl 
  wreel 
 v'z fbeel 
 cyrnfr  
 url wreel gu  trbetr lbh qrpvqrq gb trg n eht tbbq sbe lbh wnpx 
 jryy v'z v'z whfg ybbxvat 
 bu  hu gbzzl v'z tbaan arrq n yvggyr nqwhfgzrag 
 v'yy or evtug jvgu lbh 
 yvfgra trbetr v tbg fbzr onq arjf v'z abg tbaan or noyr gb tvir lbh gung cnexvat fcnpr 
 jung 
 jung 
 guvf whqtr unf gb hfr vg sbe fbzr fpbssynj naq lbh xabj lbh pna'g svtug pvgl unyy 
 lbh xabj tnel  v unq n yvggyr pung jvgu trbetr gur bgure qnl 
  lbh qvqa'g 
  v qvq 
  naq ur gbyq zr gung gung  
  v'z abg n uhaqerq creprag erpbirerq lrg 
 tvzzr gung guvat 
 ubj'f lbhe yvsr nyy evtug 
 lrnu abg onq ng nyy 
  naq abj hu ynqvrf naq tragyrzra bs gur cerff vg vf zl cyrnfher gb vagebqhpr lbh gb ze wnxr wnezry  
 fb wnxr jung'f lbhe crepragntr ba guvf obbx

  nf fhpu vg

  jurer jung 
  vf guvf fhccbfrq gb or fbzr xvaq bs n wbxr ba zr orpnhfr vg'f abg irel shaal  tvir zr gubfr  v jnag gur tynffrf tvir zr gubfr 
  'fphfr zr unir gb tb  ybbx sbe fbzr fbpxf

 n orneq

 lrf

 ab v arire ernyvmrq jung na nggenpgvir zna ur vf 
 url crbcyr crbcyr crbcyr crbcyr crbcyr abg onq uhu rkphfr zr 
 lbh ybbx evqvphybhf va gung guvat 
 vf gung fb be pbhyq vg or gung lbh'er whfg n *yvggyr* ovg jbeevrq gung lbh znl unir zvffrq gur obng 
 jryy v guvax gurl zvtug unir fhgherq gung guvat gb lbhe oenva 
 un un un un bu nyy evtug tb nurnq qrevqr qrevqr vs lbh zhfg ohg yrg zr gryy lbh fbzrguvat jvgu zl crefbanyvgl naq guvf frg bs unve lbh xabj jung v nz abj v nz va gur tnzr v ab ybatre qrsre gb gur pbvsrq v'z n cynlre 
 lbh xabj v whfg gubhtug bs fbzrguvat v xabj guvf tbetrbhf jbzna fur pnyyrq zr hc guvf zbeavat fur'f zbivat vagb gur pvgl naq fur nfxrq zr vs v xabj bs nalbar fur pbhyq zrrg abj lbh pna tb bhg jvgu ure

 ernyyl

 ab ernfba

 gung vf *fb* fghcvq jul qba'g lbh whfg pbasrff

 ab

 rynvar 
 v jnf ubcvat lbh xabj gung lbh zvtug or vagrerfgrq va punatvat grnzf 
 punatvat grnzf 
 unir lbh rire gubhtug nobhg vg 
 ohg v'z n fgnegvat fubegfgbc 
 eboreg jr arrq n fubegfgbc *erny onq* 
 v gryy lbh jura fur guerj gung gbhcrr bhg gur jvaqbj vg jnf gur orfg guvat gung rire unccrarq gb zr v srry yvxr zl byq frys ntnva gbgnyyl vanqrdhngr pbzcyrgryl vafrpher cnenabvq arhebgvp vg'f n cyrnfher 
 tbbq gb unir lbh onpx 
 naq lbh xabj jung ryfr v'ir qrpvqrq gb qb v'z tbvat gb xrrc frrvat gur onyq jbzna 
 fur'f nf tbbq nf nalobql ryfr 
 ure fpnyc jnf pyrna fur unq n avpr fxhyy gurer whfg jnfa'g n ybg bs unve ba vg 
 lrnu lbh'ir unq yvxr n eryvtvbhf njnxravat lbh'er yvxr n onyq-ntnva 
 tbvat gb arrq n yvggyr zber pbssrr urer 
 fb trbetr ubj qb v orng guvf yvr qrgrpgbe 
 v'z fbeel wreel v pna'g uryc lbh 
 pbzr ba lbh'ir tbg gur tvsg lbh'er gur bayl bar gung pna uryc zr 
 wreel v pna'g vg'f yvxr fnlvat gb cnibebggv "grnpu zr gb fvat yvxr lbh" 
 nyy evtug jryy v'ir tbg gb tb gnxr guvf grfg v pna'g oryvrir v'z qbvat guvf 
 wreel whfg erzrzore vg'f abg n yvr vs lbh oryvrir vg

 jung 
 v ghearq uvz ur qrsrpgrq 
 trg bhg  ubj ubj qvq lbh qb gung 
 orpnhfr v'z n *jbzna*  on-on-on-obbz-puvpxn-obbz-puvpxn-obbz-obbz- obbz 
 rynvar qb lbh xabj jung lbh'ir qbar lbh'ir tvir ubcr gb rirel jbzna jub'f rire fnvq "gbb onq ur'f tnl" 
 jryy vg'f n yrffba sbe gur xvqf bhg gurer nalguvat'f cbffvoyr wrebzl v unir *uvg* gur wnpxcbg gur cresrpg zna abguvat ohg frk naq fubccvat

 wreel frvasryq 
 jung vf lbhe nqqerff 
 129 jrfg 81fg fgerrg 
 qvq xvzoreyl fgrny wb'f onol 
 v qba'g xabj 
 qvq ovyyl fyrrc jvgu nyyvfba'f orfg sevraq 
 v qba'g xabj

 v qba'g xabj 
 qvq wnar fyrrc jvgu zvpunry ntnva 
  lrf gung fghcvq vqvbg ur yrsg ure sbe xvzoreyl ur fyrcg jvgu ure fvfgre ur gevpxrq ure vagb tvivat uvz unys ure ohfvarff naq gura fur tbrf nurnq naq fyrrcf jvgu uvz ntnva v zrna fur'f penml ubj pbhyq fur qb fbzrguvat yvxr gung bu gung wnar fur znxrf zr fb znq 
 ur jrag onpx jung qb lbh zrna ur jrag onpx 
 ur jrag onpx 
 v qba'g haqrefgnaq vg lbh jrer univat fhpu n terng gvzr gur frk gur fubccvat 
 jryy urer'f gur guvat orvat n jbzna v bayl ernyyl unir npprff gb gur hu rdhvczrag jung guvegl sbegl-svir zvahgrf n jrrx naq gung'f ba n tbbq jrrx ubj pna v or rkcrpgrq gb unir gur fnzr rkcregvfr nf crbcyr jub *bja* guvf rdhvczrag naq unir npprff gb vg gjragl-sbhe ubhef n qnl gurve ragver yvirf 
 lbh pna'g gung'f jul gurl ybfr irel srj cynlref 
 lrnu v thrff v arire ernyyl fgbbq n punapr 
 jryy gurer'f nyjnlf n cynpr sbe lbh ba bhe grnz 
 lrnu  gunaxf vf zryebfr cynpr ba 
 lrnu vg'f pbzvat ba va n srj zvahgrf 
 bxnl 
 url qba'g jbeel vg unfa'g fgnegrq 
 url trbetr v nz *ernyyl* cebhq bs lbh v ernyyl qb nqzver jung lbh'ir qbar 
 qb lbh gung znxrf zr fb unccl rynvar'f cebhq bs zr wreel 
 jung vf gur znggre 
 v tbg erwrpgrq ol n onyq jbzna n onyq jbzna erwrpgrq zr uru lbh yvxr gung bar n jbzna jvgu ab cebfcrpgf naq ab *unve* gbyq zr gung v jnfa'g ure glcr nccneragyl *onyql* yvxrf n fyvzzre thl 
 jryy v'yy gryy lbh jung v guvax v guvax fur fnj lbh jvgu gung cvrpr bss naq jnf qrinfgngrq lbh oyrj vg obl lbh ernyyl oyrj vg naq lbh unq gb ehva vg sbe uvz qvqa'g lbh 
 v qvqa'g ehva nalguvat ur ybbxrq yvxr na vqvbg ur qvq naq vg znqr uvz npg yvxr n wrex 
 nyy evtug fuhg hc fuhg hc zryebfr cynpr vf pbzvat ba 
 bu gung zvpunry v ungr uvz ur'f whfg fb fzht 
 url ubj lbh qbvat fgh rqqvr zl zna lbh ntnva obl lbh'er n fyvccrel bar lbh'q orggre fgenvtugra hc naq syl evtug ohqql obl 
 v'ir tbg na rlrjvgarff gb gung wrjryel fgber oernx-va pbzr urer qb lbh erpbtavmr nalobql va gur yvarhc 
 gung'f gur thl bssvpre gur thl gurer va gur zvqqyr gur gnyy thl jvgu gur jvgu gur uvtu unve v'q erpbtavmr uvz naljurer 
 url lbh lbh jvgu gur uvtu unve fgrc sbejneq 
 zr 
 fnl vg'f fngheqnl avtug va fcnva gurl tb bhg qnapvat lbh guvax gurl qb gur synzrapb 
 v jbhyq guvax 
 fb lbh pbhyq pnyy n jbzna sbe n qngr nfx ure vs fur'f serr sbe qvaare naq n synzrapb 
  lbh qba'g synzrapb ba gur svefg qngr 
 obl v jvfu gur synzrapb jnf cbchyne urer 
 lrnu jbhyq lbh qb vg 
 lrf v guvax v jbhyq 
 jryy v xarj lbh'q unir na nssvavgl sbe vg orpnhfr vg'f gur qnapr bs n irel cebhq crbcyr 
 uryyb  bu uv anan  jung bu bu nyevtug bxnl qba'g jbeel nobhg vg  bxnl v'yy frr lbh yngre nyevtug olr 
 v unir gb tb bire gb zl tenaqzbgure'f 
 jung sbe 
 v unir gb bcra n obggyr bs xrgpuhc sbe ure 
 fb jung ab yhapu 
 ab jr unir gvzr 
 bu ubj'f fur qbvat 
 nu fur'f fgnegvat gb fyvc n yvggyr fbzrgvzrf fur unf qvssvphygl qvfgvathvfuvat orgjrra gur cnfg naq gur cerfrag 
 nu lbh xabj gurer'f tbggn or na rnfvre jnl gb bcra xrgpuhcf gurl fubhyq znxr vg va n ghor 
 yvxr gbbgucnfgr 
 ln-unu 
 gurer'f n fdhrrmr xrgpuhc 
 v'ir frra fdhrrmr zhfgneq v'ir arire frra fdhrrmr xrgpuhc 
 jryy vs gurl znxr fdhrrmr zhfgneq qbrfa'g vg fgnaq gb ernfba gung gurl znxr fdhrrmr xrgpuhc 
 abg arprffnevyl zhfgneq yraqf vgfrys gb gur fdhrrmr 
 v ernyyl qba'g frr gur qvssrerapr 
 bu gurer'f n qvssrerapr vg'f fhogyr 
 vg'f fhogyr 
 url hu vfa'g rynvar fhccbfrq gb zrrg hf 
  lrnu gurer fur vf hu-bu 
 jung 
 nu fur'f jvgu ure sevraq jraql 
 jraql vf gung gur hu culfvpny gurencvfg 
 lrnu v'z ba n xvff uryyb cebtenz jvgu ure 
 ernyyl 
 lrnu rirel gvzr v frr ure v tbggn xvff ure uryyb v whfg qvq vg bapr ba ure oveguqnl fbzrubj vg zhfuebbzrq abj v qernq frrvat ure orpnhfr bs vg 
  url 
 lbh xabj v'z qbja gb bar xvff uryyb zl nhag flyivn 
 nu gung'f sbeghangr v ernyyl nqzver gung 
  uhu v arire urneq lbh fnl lbh nqzver zr sbe nalguvat 
 ab v gbyq lbh v nqzver lbhe urnevat 
 ab qba'g fybhtu gung bss lbh unir terng urnevat 
 url/uv/uryyb

 lbh'er hu culfvpny gurencvfg evtug 
 lrf

  trbetr 
 unir lbh gevrq urng naq vpr ba vg 
  bu gung hu gung frrzf yvxr n ybggn gebhoyr 
 jryy lbh pbhyq pbzr ol zl bssvpr yngre v pbhyq jbex ba vg sbe lbh n yvggyr 
  bu bxnl 
 yrg zr tvir lbh zl pneq 
 bu gunax lbh 
 jryy v'yy frr lbh thlf yngre  avpr zrrgvat lbh olr rynvar 
 olr jraql v'z fbeel 
 olr wreel 
 olr 
  jung qvq lbh qb gung sbe 
 jung 
  nfx nobhg lbhe nez 
 v fgvyy qba'g frr jul v pna'g nfx ure nobhg zl nez 
 fur'f n culfvpny gurencvfg fur qbrfa'g jnag gb unir gb qrny jvgu gung bhgfvqr bs gur bssvpr 
 jul abg 
 orpnhfr vg vf jung fur qbrf 
 v ybir gurfr crbcyr lbh pna'g nfx 'rz dhrfgvbaf  gurl'er fb zragnyyl tvsgrq gung jr zhfga'g qvfgheo gur qryvpngr travhf hayrff vg'f va gur pbasvarf bs na bssvpr  jura uhtr fhzf bs zbarl ner vaibyirq gura gur qryvpngr travhf pna or qvfgheorq 
 trbetr lbh tbg n yvggyr fbzrguvat evtug urer 
  crbcyr guvax gurl'er fb vzcbegnag 
  jryy v'z tbvat ba erpbeq evtug abj gung gung jnf zl ynfg xvff uryyb v nz trggvat bss gur xvff cebtenz jvgu ure 
 jul 
 jryy lbh xabj senaxyl bhgfvqr bs n frkhny eryngvbafuvc v qba'g frr gur cbvag gb vg v'z abg guevyyrq jvgu nyy gur unaqfunxvat rvgure ohg bar fgrc ng n gvzr 
  jung'er lbh trggvat 
  naq jung'f jvgu gung unveqb ol gur jnl 
 uhu lrnu v xabj vg'f abg irel synggrevat 
 fur ybbxf yvxr fbzrguvat bhg bs na byq uvtu fpubby lrneobbx lbh fubhyq fnl fbzrguvat gb ure 
 bu v pbhyq arire fnl nalguvat gb ure nobhg gung 
 lrnu xenzre'f gur bayl crefba jub pbhyq fnl fbzrguvat yvxr gung 
 lrnu unu 
 jryy whfg gryy xenzre gb gryy ure 
 ab vs lbh gryy uvz gb qb vg ur'yy arire qb vg 
 jung lbh unir gb qb vf vagebqhpr uvz naq gura ur'yy whfg pbzr bhg jvgu vg 
  ubu lrf lrf lbh'er evtug gung'f evtug v'yy oevat ure bire gb zrrg 
  xenzre 
 uryyb oblf naq tveyf 
 fcrnx bs gur qrivy 
 lrnu url yvfgra v hu v arrq n cvpgher bs lbh ohqql 
 jung sbe 
 jryy v'z hu v'z chggvat rirelobql'f cvpgher hc va gur ybool bs bhe ohvyqvat 
 jul 
 fb rirelbar jvyy xabj rirelobql'f anzr frr crbcyr ner tbaan or n ybg sevraqyvre 
  v v qba'g jnag zl cvpgher cynfgrerq hc va gur ybool 
 vzntvar jnyxvat ol fbzrbar ba gur sybbe naq lbh fnl "url pney" naq ur fnlf "url wreel" lbh frr gung'f gur xvaq bs fbpvrgl v jnaan yvir va 
  xenzre v qba'g jnaan fgbc naq gnyx jvgu rirelbar rirel gvzr v tb va gur ohvyqvat v whfg jnaan abq naq or ba zl jnl 
  lbh xabj lbhe rlryvare'f fzhqtrq n yvggyr jul qb lbh jrne fb zhpu rlr znxrhc

 wreel jvyy lbh tvir zr gur obggyr

 ohqql ur yvirq arkg qbbe gb hf sbegl-svir lrnef ntb

 jung svsgl qbyynef 
 lbhe sngure jba n gubhfnaq qbyynef ng gur genpx ynfg jrrx naq ur tnir lbh n uhaqerq naq lbh jrer fhccbfrq gb tvir svsgl qbyynef gb lbhe fvfgre 
 zn qnq qvrq va avargrra-fvkgl-gjb 
  oryvrir zr v qba'g bjr lbhe zbgure svsgl qbyynef 
 v'z whfg abg trggvat nal ubg jngre

  lbh'er ybbxvat sbe n cvpgher bs zr nera'g lbh 
 lbh tbg gung fgenvtug 
 v gbyq lbh sbetrg vg 
 bu pbzr ba wreel vs rirelobql xarj rirelobql jr jbhyqa'g unir gur ceboyrzf jr unir va gur jbeyq gbqnl jryy lbh qba'g ebo fbzrobql vs lbh xabj gurve anzr 
 lbh'er eboovat zr

 jul 
 ab ernfba  whfg jnaan frr lbh ntnva 
  fb ner lbh fher jraql'f pbzvat 
 lrnu fur'yy or urer nal frpbaq 
 jryy guvf'yy or n irel vagrerfgvat rkcrevzrag gb frr vs xenzre fnlf fbzrguvat lbh fher lbh jnaan tb guebhtu jvgu guvf 
 yvfgra wreel fur arire qngrf naq v xabj vg'f orpnhfr bs ure unve 
 uryyb bu uv zbz lrnu v jnf ng anan'f lrfgreqnl v unq gb uryc ure bcra n xrgpuhc obggyr url zbz yrg zr nfx lbh n dhrfgvba qb lbh erzrzore jura lbh jrer n xvq lbhe sngure jvaavat yvxr n gubhfnaq qbyynef ng gur genpx  ernyyl qvq lbh xabj ur tnir hapyr yrb n uhaqerq qbyynef naq ur jnf fhccbfrq gb tvir lbh svsgl  ubj qb v xabj orpnhfr anan qbrfa'g xabj jung lrne vg vf naq fur guvaxf guvf whfg unccrarq  jryy v guvax lbh fubhyq bxnl olr 
 qb lbh xabj jung gur vagrerfg ba gung svsgl qbyynef pbzrf gb bire svsgl-guerr lrnef 
 bu zbegl cyrnfr 
 fvk uhaqerq naq fvkgl-guerr qbyynef naq sbegl-svir pragf naq gung'f svthevat pbafreingviryl ng svir creprag vagrerfg bire svsgl-guerr lrnef pbzcbhaqrq dhnegreyl be vs lbh chg vg vagb n gra-lrne g-ovyy 
 zbegl jvyy lbh fgbc vg 
  jryy ur'f abg trggvat njnl jvgu guvf

 pbzr ba hc

 ab ab ur'yy pbzr va jryy guvf vf tbaan or zl svefg bccbeghavgl gb abg xvff ure uryyb 
 jung vf gur ovt qrny nobhg chggvat lbhe yvcf ba fbzrobql'f snpr 
 vg'f gur boyvtngvba lbh xabj nf fbba nf guvf crefba pbzrf va lbh xabj lbh unir gb qb guvf v zrna vs lbh pbhyq fnl gbhpu n oernfg nf cneg bs gur xvff uryyb gura v guvax v pbhyq frr gur inyhr va vg n yvggyr orggre 
 ubj 'obhg na vagrepbhefr uryyb ubj jbhyq gung or

 rynvar 
 v'z whfg guvaxvat nobhg gur dhrfgvba

 jung sbe 
 jryy lbh pnapryyrq ba ghrfqnl naq bhe cbyvpl vf "gjragl-sbhe ubhef abgvpr sbe nyy pnapryyngvbaf"

 jung'f gur ceboyrz 
  ner lbh njner gung v'z orvat punetrq sbe ghrfqnl'f nccbvagzrag v unq gb gnxr zl zbgure gb gur puvebcbqvfg 
 jryy v'z fbeel gung'f bhe cbyvpl 
  bu lbh unir n cbyvpl  gur qryvpngr travhf unf n cbyvpl trbetr urnqf sbe gur qbbe 
 fb jvyy lbh or urer gbzbeebj

 sbe jung 
  sbe chggvat zl cvpgher hc ba gung jnyy v'z yvxr evpuneq qnjfba qbja gurer abj naq rirel crefba v frr ratntrf zr va guvf ybat obevat grqvbhf pbairefngvba v pna'g rira trg bhg bs gur ohvyqvat 
 lbh fubhyq or gunaxvat zr sbe yvorengvat lbh sebz lbhe jbeyq bs ybaryvarff naq vfbyngvba abj lbh'er cneg bs n snzvyl 
 snzvyl 
 lrnu 
 lbh guvax v jnag nabgure snzvyl zl sngure'f qrznaqvat zl hapyr cnl vagrerfg ba svsgl qbyynef ur jnf fhccbfrq gb tvir zl zbgure va avargrra-sbegl-bar naq zl hapyr chg zl anan va n ubzr gb gel naq fuhg ure hc naq v gryy lbh nabgure guvat pbfzb xenzre jungrire lbh jnaan or pnyyrq gur xvffvat guvat vf bire gurer'f ab zber xvffvat naq v qba'g pner jung gur pbafrdhraprf ner 
 bu uv zvfgre pbfgnamn jr jrer gelvat gb trg va gbhpu jvgu lbh jraql pna'g znxr ure nccbvagzrag 
 jung q'lbh zrna 
 fur unq fbzr crefbany nssnve fur unq gb nggraq gb v yrsg n zrffntr ba lbhe znpuvar lbh qvqa'g trg vg 
 jura qvq lbh yrnir gur zrffntr 
 srj ubhef ntb 
  bu v'z fbeel v erdhver gjragl-sbhe ubhef abgvpr sbe n pnapryyngvba abj nf v frr vg lbh bjr zr friragl-svir qbyynef 
 ybbx zvfgre pbfgnamn 
 jvyy gung or pnfu be purdhr 
 v nz ernyyl tynq v gbbx gur qnl bss 
 bu lrnu gurer'f abguvat orggre guna fxvvat 
 lrnu v ubcr zl pyvragf jrera'g gbb hcfrg 
 htu gur uryy jvgu 'rz 
 jung'er lbh fgbccvat urer sbe 
 v'z qebccvat lbh bss 
  bu ab v'z guerr zber oybpxf 
 lrnu ohg vs v gnxr lbh gb lbhe qbbe gura v unir gb tb nyy gur jnl nebhaq prageny cnex jrfg onpx gb pbyhzohf lbh xabj vg'f nyy bar jnl 
 lrnu ohg vg'f bayl guerr oybpxf 
 evtug vg'f bayl guerr oybpxf 
  nyevtug jryy 
 fur'q qevira zr n uhaqerq naq gjragl zvyrf naq nyy bs n fhqqra guerr oybpxf sebz zl qbbe fur qrpvqrf guvf gevc vf bire vfa'g gung fgenatr 
 lrf vg'f irel fgenatr irel fgenatr 
 v'ir arire urneq bs nalguvat yvxr guvf v zrna vg'f nyzbfg nf vs v jnf uvgpu-uvxvat naq fur fnlf "jryy guvf vf nf sne nf v pna gnxr lbh" 
 v gryy lbh vs lbh jrer uvgpu-uvxvat lbh'q arire trg vagb n pne jvgu fbzrbar jvgu n unveqb yvxr gung 
 v unq gb pneel zl fxvf naq zl obbgf naq zl cbyrf v guvax v cvapurq n areir va zl fubhyqre 
 lbh fubhyq unir ure jbex ba vg sbe lbh 
 lrnu nyevtug v tbggn tb 
 uv wreel 
 uv znel 
 hu yvfgra v qrpvqrq v pna'g xvff uryyb nalzber v'z fbeel vg'f abguvat crefbany

 uv wreel 
 uv ybhvfr 
 v jnf whfg gryyvat znel ubj v'z abg tbaan or qbvat gur xvff uryyb guvat nalzber  v'z fbeel v whfg pna'g qb vg vg'f abguvat crefbany vg'f whfg v'z abg ernyyl noyr gb qb vg naq hu v'z fbeel 
  gunax lbh sbe lbhe pbbcrengvba 
 uryyb 
 wreel 
 uv zbz fb jung'f unccravat jvgu hapyr yrb vf ur cnlvat lbh 
 jryy ur fnvq ab ur fnvq jr unq ab cebbs 
 ab cebbs jr'yy trg uvz ur'f n pebbx fbbare be yngre ur'yy fyvc hc 
 hu naljnl v jnag lbh gb tb purpx ba anan ng gur ubzr 
 bxnl v jvyy

 jung'f hc 
  bu v tbggn tb ivfvg zl anan va gur ahefvat ubzr

 ybbx ng zl cvpgher 
 v'ir orra qrsnprq 
 url qba'g lbh jbeel ohqql v znqr qbhoyr cevagf 
 url uv pbfzb 
 bu url wnpx ubj lbh qbvat 
 uv wnpx 
 url whyvb v jnf jbaqrevat pbhyq lbh trg gb gung fubjre gbqnl lbh guvax 
 bu v frr jura lbh arrq fbzrguvat qbar lbh'er irel sevraqyl gb crbcyr uhu 
  ab ab gung'f abg gehr 
  jryy v guvax vg vf vg'f n ovt ohvyqvat frvasryq znlor v'yy trg gb vg fbzrqnl nsgre v gnxr pner bs gur crbcyr jub'er pvivy gb rnpu bgure 
 lrnu fur'f hcfgnvef cynlvat pneqf 
 lbh xabj fur ernyyl qbrfa'g orybat urer zl hapyr chg ure urer orpnhfr ur'f gelvat gb cebir ur qbrfa'g bjr zl zbgure svsgl qbyynef 
 jryy fur frrzf irel unccl fur zrg na byq sevraq jub hfrq gb yvir arkg qbbe gb ure 
 ohqql 
 lrf gung'f uvf anzr ur'f evtug bire gurer 
  v'z fbeel v qba'g bjr lbh nalguvat v unq fbzr crefbany ohfvarff gung qnl 
  bu v frr fb lbhe gvzr vf zber inyhnoyr guna zvar vf gung vg lbh'er n qryvpngr travhf 
 n qryvpngr travhf 
 rynvar 
  trbetr 
  unu tbbq yhpx 
 jung'f tbvat ba 
  jraql v vawherq zl fubhyqre jrqarfqnl jura lbh qebccrq zr bss naq v unq gb pneel zl fxvf naq zl obbgf naq zl cbyrf naq rirelguvat nyy gur jnl ubzr v'z v'z univat gebhoyr yvsgvat zl nez qb lbh guvax lbh pbhyq tvir zr fbzr gerngzrag 
 bu fher lbh unir vafhenapr evtug 
  vafhenapr lbh'er punetvat zr 
 jrqarfqnl gung'f lbhe crefbany ohfvarff  fxvvat  fb yrg crbcyr fhssre juvyr lbh'er fuhfuvat nyy bire n zbhagnva 
 ubj qvq lbh urne gung 
 v urne rirelguvat 
 v zrna jul qba'g lbh gjb whfg gnxr lbhe ohfvarff ryfrjurer uzz 
 bu uhu uhu gung vf n tbbq vqrn p'zba trbetr 
 lrnu yrg'f tb 
  naq lbh xabj lbh zvtug jnaan qb fbzrguvat nobhg gung unve 
 jul jung'f jebat jvgu zl unve 
 uhu v guvax vg'f n yvggyr byq-snfuvbarq qba'g lbh  hu gryy ure 
 fur'f evtug 
 fb lbh jrer jvgu uvz gung qnl ng gur genpx 
 bu lrnu ur jba n gubhfnaq qbyynef uvf fba jnf gurer gbb 
 yrb 
 lrnu gung'f vg yrb bbu jung na boabkvbhf yvggyr xvq ur hfrq gb fgrny zl fbqn obggyrf naq pnfu 'rz va sbe gur qrcbfvgf hu 
 vf gung fb 
 naq nsgre lbhe tenaqsngure uvg gur qnvyl qbhoyr ur tnir uvz n uhaqerq qbyynef naq gbyq uvz gb tvir svsgl gb uvf fvfgre uvf fvfgre jul v gryy lbh ur fubhyqn tvir vg gb zr sbe nyy gur obggyrf ur gbbx 
 jryy gung'f irel vagrerfgvat 
  hapyr yrb v whfg zrg na byq npdhnvagnapr bs lbhef  lbh erzrzore ohqql ur whfg gbyq zr dhvgr n fgbel nobhg lbh naq tenaqcn ng gur genpx 
  bar frpbaq 
  lbh'er ohfgrq 
 url fgrir ubj lbh qbvat 
 url wrss jung'f unccravat 
 znel bu znel tvir hf n xvff 
 qba'g or yvxr gung znel p'zba v znqr n zvfgnxr 
  ybbx jul qba'g lbh qb rirelobql n snibhe naq whfg trg bhg bs guvf ohvyqvat  abobql jnagf lbh urer abobql 
 uv znel 
 uv wrss ubj ner lbh 
 uv crgr ubj lbh qbvat 
 url yrg'f tb trg fbzr pbssrr 
 terng vqrn 
 bu gung'q or terng 
 bu cnhy pbhyq lbh ubyq gung qbbe 
 uv 
 url pbhyq v hfr lbhe fubjre 
 jung ntnva lbh gbbx bar guvf zbeavat 
  v tbg n qngr p'zba cyrnfr 
 v xabj ohg v  yvggyr ceboyrz 
  jraql urer 
 ab ab ab fur punatrq ure unvefglyr  vg'f greevoyr ab jr'er qbar 
 v'yy tb trg fbzr zber orre 
 bu lrnu lrnu terng  naq trg fbzr bs gubfr oyhr pbea puvcf 
 url 
 uv pbfzb 
 uv 
  zzzjnu 
 bbu v yvxr gung 
  jub'f gung 
 fgrsnavr 2-t 
 bu zna ybbxf yvxr lbh tbg dhvgr n srj crbcyr urer 
 lrnu lrnu jryy hu lbh xabj v'q vaivgr lbh va ohg huz lbh xabj 
  bu lrnu v haqrefgnaq 
 jubnu jubnu jubnu  znl v uryc lbh 
  lrnu v'z whfg tbvat hc gb frr rynvar orarf 
  orarf  ab-bar urer ol gung anzr 
 bu fur'f hu fur'f ubhfr-fvggvat sbe ze cvgg 
 bu ubhfr-fvggvat zzz 
 lrnu 
 jung'er lbh gur oblsevraq urer sbe n dhvpxvr 
 pna v whfg tb hc 
 bu v trg vg jul jnfgr gvzr znxvat fznyy gnyx jvgu gur qbbezna v fubhyq whfg fuhg hc naq qb zl wbo bcravat gur qbbe sbe lbh 
 ubj 'obhg gubfr xavpxf 
 bu v frr ba gur fcbegf cntr 
 lrnu 
 jung znxrf lbh guvax v jnfa'g ernqvat gur jnyy fgerrg cntr bu v xabj orpnhfr v'z gur harqhpngrq qbbezna 
 fb lbh guvax lbhe cneragf'yy trg onpx gbtrgure 
 v ubcr fb v pna'g gnxr uvz yvivat jvgu zr zhpu ybatre ur znxrf guvf xnfun vg fgvaxf hc gur jubyr ubhfr 
 url trbetr fgvpx 'rz hc 
 jung 
 sbe gurfr trezna gbhevfgf cergraq gung v'z eboovat lbh 
 jul 
 fb gurfr crbcyr pna tb onpx ubzr naq gryy gurve sevraqf gurl fnj n erny arj lbex zhttvat vg'yy tvir gurz n guevyy 
 njevtug unaqf hc cbexl 
 gung'f vg abj tvzzr lbhe jnyyrg tbg vg va urer uhu sng obl 
  vf gung nyy lbh tbg unu vf gung nyy lbh tbg 
 nyevtug gung'f rabhtu 
 v'yy gryy lbh jura vg'f rabhtu  nyevtug abj lbh orggre abg fnl nalguvat be v'yy fgnyx lbh 
 jurer'ir lbh orra jr'er tbaan zvff gur zbivr yrg'f tb 
 v nz abg tbvat onpx qbja gurer v pna'g snpr gung thl ntnva 
 jung thl 
 gur qbbezna v qba'g jnaan cynl nalzber bs uvf zvaqtnzrf jung gvzr qbrf ur trg bss 
 fvk ohg gura gur avtug qbbezna pbzrf ba ur'f zhpu fpnevre  juhtu  un-un 
 jryy vg'f nyzbfg fvk abj pna'g jr whfg jnvg gvy ur tbrf ubzr 
  v 
 jr'yy fgvyy znxr gur zbivr 
  bxnl bxnl 
 jung'q lbh qb gbqnl qnq 
 gbqnl v jrag erpbeq fubccvat va terrajvpu ivyyntr v obhtug guvf erpbeq ohg v pna'g frrz gb svaq gur uv-sv 
 v qba'g unir n uv-sv 
 qvqa'g v tvir lbh zl byq erpbeq cynlre 
  v tnir vg gb pbfzb 
 pbfzb jub'f pbfzb 
 v'z pbfzb 
 jryy v jnag vg onpx v jnaan yvfgra gb gung pun-pun erpbeq 
  bar-gjb pun-pun-pun 
  nyevtug nyevtug pna jr tb bhg naq rng 
  yrzzr punatr zl fuveg 
 wreel vg'f fvk  yrg'f tb 
 hu gung qbbezna'f fgvyy zvyyvat nebhaq bhgfvqr ur'f irel crphyvne 
 ab qba'g 
  uryyb  bu uv ze cvgg 
  tvir gung gb zr 
  uryyb ze cvgg ubj'f fpbgynaq 
  rynvar ner lbh univat n cnegl 
 n cnegl bu ab gung jnf whfg zl fghcvq sevraq wreel 
 nyevtug ur whfg yrsg jr pna tb 
  orpnhfr gurer'f gb or ab ragregnvavat juvyr v'z tbar 
 oryvrir zr jr'er abg ragregnvarq jr jrer whfg yrnivat  bu pna lbh teno gubfr rzcgl obggyrf sbe zr 
 v arrq gb xabj jung'f va gur znvy 
 bu jryy ze cvgg gurer'f ernyyl abguvat gung pna'g jnvg jr'er gelvat gb pngpu n zbivr 
  jryy lbh orggre pngpu gur yngre fubj orpnhfr v arrq gb xabj jung'f va gur znvy 
 nyevtug  v pna'g tb 
 huz gur arj gvzr zntnmvar gur arj crbcyr 
  bu jub'f ba gur pbire 
 url ohqql 
  lbh jujung'er lbh qbvat urer lbh jbex ng guvf ohvyqvat gbb 
 nu fher cbbe qbbezna unf gb jbex gjb wbof gb chg sbbq ba gur gnoyr sbe zbgure naq onol  ab v yvir urer gung'f bxnl vfa'g vg 
 fb lbh jbex nyy qnl nf n qbbezna ng bar ohvyqvat gura lbh pbzr ubzr naq fgnaq bhgfvqr lbhe bja ohvyqvat 
 lbh tbg n ceboyrz jvgu gung 
 ybbx v'z abg tbvat va lbhe ohvyqvat v ernyyl qba'g unir gb gnyx gb lbh tbbqolr 
  lbh ernyyl guvax lbh'er orggre guna zr qba'g lbh 
 zl sngure bcrarq uvf fuveg 
 lrnu naq 
  gryy uvz xenzre 
  ur unq oernfgf 
 jung q'lbh zrna oernfgf 
  ovt oernfgf 
 fb jung n ybg bs byqre zra unir gung 
 ab abg gurfr gurfr jrer erny ubbgref 
 v jnf guebjvat hc nyy avtug vg jnf yvxr zl bja crefbany pelvat tnzr 
 jryy znlor lbh'er tbaan trg 'rz gbb trbetr 
  lrnu gung'f evtug jung vs vg'f n trargvp guvat yvxr sngure yvxr fba 
 ohg lbhe sngure'f abg onyq 
 ab ab ab gung fxvcf n trarengvba gur onyqarff trar pbzrf sebz lbhe tenaqsngure 
 gura v fhccbfr gur obfbz trar pbzrf sebz lbhe tenaqzbgure 
 lbh xabj senax pna'g or gbb pbzsbegnoyr jvgu gubfr guvatf pynatvat nebhaq ur fubhyq jrne fbzrguvat sbe fhccbeg 
 lbh zrna yvxr n oen 
 n oen vf sbe ynqvrf v'z gnyxvat nobhg n fhccbeg haqretnezrag fcrpvsvpnyyl qrfvtarq sbe zra 
 obl gung oenva arire fgbcf jbexvat qbrf vg 
 v gryy lbh v'z tbaan tb abbqyr jvgu guvf 
  url jr'er gjvaf 
  jung 
 bhe fuvegf gurl'er gur fnzr 
 bu uhu vzntvar gung 
  jung jung'q lbh fnl gb gur qbbezna 
 jung abguvat 
  ur pynvzf gung lbh sbyybjrq uvz ubzr naq fgnegrq unenffvat uvz 
 jung unf guvf thl tbg n crefbany iraqrggn jvgu zr jung'q v qb gb uvz 'pbf v nfxrq uvz nobhg gur xavpxf 
 url qvq lbh znxr gur zbivr 
 ab 
 lbh jnaan tb gbavtug lbh pna cvpx zr hc 
 nyevtug pna jr tb gb n yngre fubj fb ur'f bss uvf fuvsg jura v pbzr ol 
 htu fb abj jr unir gb erneenatr bhe yvirf gb nibvq gur qbbezna 
 lrf jr qb 
 jung vf jebat jvgu trbetr 
 ur'f gelvat gb trg fbzrguvat bss uvf purfg 
  nyevtug v tbggn gel naq gnyx zl zbgure vagb gnxvat uvz bss zl unaqf 
 uryc lbh 
  ubu jung'er lbh qbvat urer lbh'er fhccbfrq gb or tbar 
 v genqrq fuvsgf jvgu gur avtug qbbezna ur unq fbzr crefbany nssnvef gb nggraq gb lbh frr zl sryybj qbbezna naq v jngpu bhg sbe rnpu bgure jr qba'g fgno rnpu bgure va gur onpx yvxr crbcyr va lbhe jbeyq 
  ybbx v qba'g jnag nal gebhoyr v qba'g unir n qbbezna va zl ohvyqvat v thrff v'z whfg abg hfrq gb gnyxvat gb gurz v'q ernyyl whfg yvxr gb or sevraqf 
 lbh jnaan or sevraqf 
 v'q yvxr gb or 
 gura jngpu gur qbbe sbe n zvahgr jbhyq lbh 
 jung 
 lrnu v whfg jnaan eha naq trg n orre v'yy or onpx va n zvahgr 
 jun jnv jnvg n frpbaq jung qb v qb 
 vg'f abg oenva fhetrel lbh bcra gur qbbe sbe crbcyr jub yvir urer naq vs gurl qba'g yvir urer qba'g yrg gurz va  urer  jrne gung 
 bu 
  url url jnvg n frpbaq url uryyb 
 url url jnvg n frpbaq lbh yvir urer 
  bs pbhefr v yvir urer v'ir yvirq urer sbe gjragl lrnef abj vs lbh qba'g yrg zr va v'z tbvat gb pnyy gur cbyvpr naq unir lbh neerfgrq 
  lbh guvax lbh'er orggre guna zr 
  lbh unir gb fvta sbe vg 
 bu evtug 
  url ubj 'obhg gubfr xavpxf uhu 
  lrnu lrnu lrnu 
 url v hu oebhtug onpx lbhe erpbeq cynlre uhu 
 gunax lbh xenzre 
 lrnu 
  chg vg bire gurer 
 fb ubj lbh srryvat 
 gverq 
 hu uhu lbhe onpx uheg 
 ubj qvq lbh xabj 
 jryy vg'f boivbhf lbh xabj lbh'er pneelvat n ybg bs rkgen onttntr hc gurer 
  hc urer 
 bu lrnu gbc sybbe  yvfgra senax unir lbh rire pbafvqrerq jrnevat fbzrguvat sbe fhccbeg abj ybbx ng guvf  zvaq lbh guvf vf whfg n cebgbglcr 
 lbh jnag zr gb jrne n oen 
 ab ab n oen vf sbe ynqvrf 
 zrrg gur oeb 
 fb vf lbhe sngure rkpvgrq nobhg pbzvat ubzr 
 trbetr 
  url zbz jung xvaq bs jbzna jnf tenaqzn 
 nyy bs n fhqqra lbh'er vagrerfgrq va lbhe tenaqzbgure 
 jryy lbh xabj lbh trg gb n pregnva cbvag lbh jnaan xabj nobhg lbhe ebbgf 
 fur jnf n ybiryl jbzna 
 lhu jung nobhg culfvpnyyl 
 culfvpnyyl 
 lrnu lbh xabj jung'q fur hu ybbx yvxr 
 jryy lbh'ir frra cvpgherf 
  lbh pna'g gryy zhpu sebz gubfr cvpgherf 
 fb jung 
 jnf fur hu jnf fur n ovt hu jbzna 
 ovt ab whfg zl urvtug 
 obfbzl 
 obfbzl lbh jnaan xabj vs lbhe tenaqzbgure jnf obfbzl 
  ab v jnf whfg jbaqrevat gur vasbezngvba pbhyq or eryrinag 
 jurer qb lbh trg lbhe trarf sebz 
  gung'f jung v'q yvxr gb xabj 
 v pna'g oryvrir lbh yrsg lbhe cbfg 
 ur yrsg zr gurer lbh frr gur zvaq tnzrf 
  url jung'f hc jung'f tbvat ba urer 
 fbzrobql fgbyr gur pbhpu bhg bs gur ybool 
 jurer'f gur qbbezna ubj pbzr fbzrbar jnfa'g jngpuvat gur qbbe 
  wreel yrg'f trg bhg bs urer 
 lrnu 
  bu zl tbq 
 jung jrer lbh qbvat jngpuvat gur qbbe naljnl 
 ur nfxrq zr gb jr jrer trggvat nybat 
  lbh xabj zl svatrecevagf ner nyy bire guvf gung qbbezna xabjf lbh'er n sevraq bs zvar ur'yy gryy gung pb-bc ynql fur'yy gryy ze cvgg wreel v'z va guvf gbb qrrc 
 qba'g lbh svaq vg bqq gung nf fbba nf ur yrnirf gur pbhpu trgf fgbyra znlor ur'f frggvat zr hc 
  nyevtug fuhg hc fuhg hc whfg yrg zr guvax v tbggn guvax jr tbggn trg bhe fgbel fgenvtug 
 nyevtug jryy jung vs jr fnl 
 nyevtug  urer vg vf guvf vf jung jr'yy gryy 'rz lbh pnzr gb cvpx zr hc 
 v pnzr gb cvpx lbh hc 
 lrnu gung'f jung v whfg fnvq 
 v xabj v jnf whfg 
 lrnu v xabj jung lbh jrer whfg vg'f abg urycvat 
 nyevtug jryy whfg fgneg ntnva gura 
 bxnl lbh pnzr gb cvpx zr hc ng 
 evtug 
 lbh frr ntnva 
 jung v fnvq evtug 
 nyevtug lbh pnzr evtug hcfgnvef jvgubhg gnyxvat gb gur qbbezna 
 ohg gur qbbezna'f tbaan fnl gung v jnf gurer 
  fb jung ab-bar'f tbaan oryvrir n qbbezna 
 ohg v qba'g xabj vs guvf vf tbaan jbex 
  whfg fgvpx jvgu gur fgbel jr'yy or svar yrg zr qb gur gnyxvat 
 bxnl 
 tbbq abj svk zr n qevax 
 ubj'f gung srry 
 guvf srryf irel pbzsbegnoyr 
 lbh frr 
 v srry gra lrnef lbhatre 
 lrnu naq lbhe cbfgher'f n ybg orggre ybbx ng lbh 
 naq v pna oerngur rnfvre gbb 
 v gbyq lbh abj senax yvfgra urer'f jung v'z guvaxvat abj lbh unir n sevraq va gur oen ohfvarff evtug 
 bs pbhefr fvq snexhf ur'f gur orfg va gur ohfvarff 
  urer'f bhe punapr jung q'lbh fnl vg'yy or zr lbh naq gur oeb oeb 
 yrg'f qb vg 
 rkprcg jr tbggn qb fbzrguvat nobhg gur anzr 
 jul jung'f jebat jvgu oeb 
 ab oeb'f ab tbbq gbb rguavp 
 nyevtug lbh tbg fbzrguvat orggre 
 ubj 'obhg hu gur znafvrer 
 znafvrer 
 gung'f evtug n oenffvrer sbe n zna gur znafvrer trg vg 
  jryy lbh'ir fpnerq ure bss jr znl arire frr zbz ntnva 
 url trbetr jung q'lbh yvxr orggre gur oeb be gur znafvrer 
 qnq jr arrq gb gnyx 
 v unq gb hfr gur onguebbz fb v nfxrq guvf thl gb jngpu gur qbbe sbe n srj zvahgrf 
 jul fubhyq v oryvrir lbh 
  npghnyyl vg jnf ure sevraq 
 v jnf whfg fcrnxvat gb gur qbbezna urer nobhg gur pbhpu eboorel 
 bu ernyyl  gur qbbezna naq cenl gryy jung qvq gur qbbezna fnl 
 ur fnvq ur nfxrq n sevraq bs lbhef gb jngpu gur qbbe 
  bu zl jryy gur qbbezna pregnvayl unf n jvyq vzntvangvba qbrfa'g ur 
 jryy jung qb jr unir urer creuncf zvff orarf pbhyq rkcynva jul n wreel frvasryq fvtarq sbe guvf cnpxntr  ng gur rknpg fnzr gvzr gur pbhpu jnf fgbyra 
  ur arire jngpurq n qbbe orsber zef cnlgba ur qvqa'g xabj ubj gb qb vg  lbh xabj ur'f n pbzrqvna zef cnlgba gurl qba'g xabj ubj gb qb nalguvat 
  qba'g lbh frr jung'f tbvat ba urer ur frg hf hc ur'f cynlvat nyy gurfr zvaqtnzrf 
 lbh'er fnlvat v'z erfcbafvoyr sbe gur pbhpu 
  gurer jnf abguvat v pbhyq qb ur fnvq ur unq n srqreny rkcerff fyvc jvgu lbhe fvtangher ba vg 
  qvnobyvpny ur gubhtug bs rirelguvat ur jnf frggvat zr hc sebz qnl bar 
 vf vg cbffvoyr jr jrer ivpgvzf bs n fgvat 
 v'z fher ur'f univat n tbbq ynhtu bire guvf jvgu uvf qbbezna ohqqvrf 
 fb lbh qvqa'g rira  jngpu gur pbhpu 
 ab v jnf whfg zrffvat jvgu uvf urnq 
 naq gurl guvax gurl'er orggre guna hf 
 naljnl wreel wreel 
 jr unir gb ercynpr gur pbhpu 
 abj jr unir gb ohl n arj pbhpu 
  abg arprffnevyl jul qba'g lbh gnxr onpx gur pbhpu lbh tnir zr 
 gur bar jvgu gur cbccvr fgnva 
 lrnu fher  gura zl sngure jvyy unir ab cynpr gb fyrrc  ur'f tbggn zbir bhg 
 ohg vg'f tbg n crr-fgnva ba vg 
 ab gur phfuvba'f ghearq bire 
  v thrff 
  lrnu lbh trg n pbhpu v trg evq bs zl sngure vg pbhyqa'g or zber cresrpg 
 abj vg'f pnyyrq gur oeb 
 be gur znafvrer 
 lrnu ohg v cersre gur oeb 
 v yvxr znafvrer 
 jryy v unir gb gryy lbh vg'f n irel vagrerfgvat vqrn 
 lrnu 
 lbh xabj fryyvat oenf rkpyhfviryl gb jbzra jr'er ernyyl bayl hgvyvfvat svsgl creprag bs gur znexrg 
  gung'f jung jr svtherq uhu 
  v gbyq lbh 
 naq gb or cresrpgyl senax v'ir nyjnlf sryg v pbhyq hfr fbzr fhccbeg v xabj jura v'z jrnevat onayba gurer nccrnef gb or fbzr wvttyvat 
  v jbhyqa'g or pnhtug qrnq va onayba 
  fb hu jung q'lbh frr va gur onpx ubbxf irypeb jung 
 hu 
 qrsvavgryl irypeb 
 fnl lbh'er trggvat vagvzngr jvgu n jbzna hu lbh qba'g jnag ure shzoyvat naq fgehttyvat onpx gurer 
 v guvax jr'ir nyy rkcrevraprq gung 
 fhzzre avtugf 
  irel shaal 
 jryy v fgvyy unir gb gnyx nobhg guvf gb ze qrtehazbag 
 bs pbhefr lrf 
 ohg oneevat nal hasberfrra qrirybczragf tragyrzra v guvax jr'er fvggvat ba n jvaare 
  senax v jnaan gryy lbh ubj fbeel v nz gb urne nobhg lbh naq rfgryyr frcnengvat 
 bu gunax lbh fvq ohg gung'f nyy va gur cnfg v'z ernql gb zbir ba 
  v'ir nyjnlf orra irel sbaq bs rfgryyr ornhgvshy jbzna v hu v ubcr lbh qba'g guvax hu guvf vf bhg bs yvar ohg jbhyq vg or bxnl jvgu lbh vs v jrer gb nfx ure bhg 
  lbh jnaan tb bhg jvgu zl jvsr  jurer qb lbh trg gur areir gb nfx zr fbzrguvat yvxr gung 
 bu ab senax v jnf whfg fnlvat 
 v xabj jung lbh'er fnlvat naq v xabj jung lbh'er guvaxvat 
 ab senax 
 p'zba pbfzb v'z abg qbvat ohfvarff jvgu guvf thl 
 senax 
 wreel gbbx gur pbhpu onpx 
 ur gbbx vg onpx qvqa'g lbh gryy uvz v jnf hfvat vg 
 bu v cyrnqrq jvgu uvz 
 jurer nz v fhccbfrq gb fyrrc 
 jryy v gbbx gur yvoregl bs cnpxvat lbhe guvatf  zbz'f pbzvat gb trg lbh 
 v gubhtug wreel qvqa'g jnag gung pbhpu orpnhfr bs gur fgnva 
 jung fgnva 
 bu lbh qvqa'g abgvpr vg unf n crr-fgnva 
  lbh unq zr fyrrcvat ba n crr-fgnvarq pbhpu 
  ab ab ab ab gur phfuvba jnf ghearq bire 
  ohg gur irel vqrn lbh unq zr ylvat va hevar 
 nu gurer'f zbz gurer'f zbz 
 vf vg fnsr gb pbzr va 
 bu bs pbhefr  bs pbhefr 
 lbh'er abg univat nal bs lbhe genafirfgvgr cnegvrf 
 jvyy lbh fgbc vg 
  v yvirq jvgu uvz sbe sbegl lrnef v arire fnj uvz gelvat ba zl haqrejrne nf fbba nf ur yrnirf gur ubhfr ur gheaf vagb w rqtne ubbire 
 urer pbfzb 
 bu url 
 lbh pna unir gur uv-sv  v qba'g arrq vg abj 
 njevtug v tbg vg 
 v tbg bar ng ubzr 
 nyevtug yrg'f tb 
 jr'yy tb bhg sbe qvaare gbavtug 
 v pna'g gbavtug v'z ohfl 
 jung q'lbh zrna ohfl 
 v'z univat qvaare jvgu fbzrbar 
 jvgu jubz 
 fvq snexhf 
  fvq snexhf lbh'er abg univat qvaare jvgu n oen fnyrfzna 
 url ur bayl fryyf gurz ur qbrfa'g jrne 'rz 
 bxnl gung'f vg v'z abg pbzvat ubzr 
  ohg lbh pna'g fgnl urer gurer'f ab cynpr gb fyrrc 
 jr'yy jbex fbzrguvat bhg

 "lrf vg vf jryy yrgf frr jung v unir gbqnl qnea vg vg'f unz & purrfr ntnva naq fur sbetbg gur snapl zhfgneq v gbyq ure v yvxr gung snapl zhfgneq lbh pbhyq chg gung snapl zhfgneq ba n fubr naq vg jbhyq gnfgr cerggl tbbq gb zr bu fur znqr vg hc jvgu n phcpnxr gubhtu url ybbx ng guvf lbh xabj v tbg n arj flfgrz sbe rngvat gurfr guvatf `v hfrq gb crry bss gur pubpbyngr abj v ghea gurz hcfvqr qbja  v rng gur pnxr svefg naq fnir gur sebfgvat sbe gur raq  "jura lbh'er fzvyvat jura lbh'er fzvyvat gur jubyr jbeyq fzvyrf jvgu lbh jura lbh'er ynhtuva' jura lbh'er ynhtuva' gur fha pbzrf fuvavat guebhtu ohg jura lbh'er pelvat lbh oevat ba gur enva fb fgbc gung fvta or unccl ntnva xrrc ba fzvyvat  'pnhfr jura lbh'er fzvyvat gur jubyr jbeyq fzvyrf jvgu lbbbbbhhhhhhh gur jubyr jbeyq fzvyrf jvgu lbbbbbhhhhhhh 
 "url tbg gur arj cragubhfr"

 " nu urer urer yvfgraqrne cragubhfr v jnag gb gryy lbh nobhg na rkcrevrapr v erpragyl unq nf na nivq ernqre v'ir nyjnlf jbaqrerq vs gur yrggref  ner v'z n qragvfg naq bar nsgreabba zl ultvravfg naq v qrpvqrq gb unir n yvggyr sha jvgu bar bs bhe cngvragf bs pbhefr abar bs bhe cngvragf unq nal vqrn rknpgyl bs jung jr jrer hc gb v jnf fgvyy jbaqrevat jung vs

 wreel naq rynvar ner bhgfvqr urnqvat gbjneqf gur ncnegzrag ohvyqvat] 
 v urne lbh'er tbvat bhg jvgu qnivq chggl 
 lrnu jung vf vg n ceboyrz 
 jryy v guvax ur pbhyq'ir nfxrq zr fhccbfrq gb or n sevraq bs zvar 
 jryy v thrff ur svtherq lbh whfg jbhyqa'g pner vg *unf* orra n srj lrnef 
 rynvar lbh nyjnlf pner jub na rk-tveysevraq qngrf lbh qba'g jnag vg gb or fbzrbar lbh xabj naq lbh qba'g jnag vg gb or fbzrbar orggre guna lbh abj rira gubhtu gur ynggre vf *boivbhfyl* vzcbffvoyr 
 bu tbq 
 gur sbezre fgvyy nccyvrf v qba'g xabj jung vg vf ohg v whfg pna'g frr lbh jvgu n zrpunavp 
 bu lrnu evtug evtug jryy nyy gubfr zrpunavpf qb vf jbex nyy qnl jvgu gurve unaqf naq gurve *ovt* *zhfphyne* nezf ba znpuvarf naq gura gurl pbzr ubzr qevccvat jvgu navzny frkhnyvgl yvxr fgnayrl xbjnyfxv jung n uhtr ghea-bss gung vf 
 nyy evtug 
 ybbx ng gung gurl tbg ybofgre ba gur zrah jub jbhyq beqre n ybofgre urer v zrna qb gurl oevat n ybofgre va rirelqnl ubcvat *gbqnlf* gur qnl 
 fb jung vs gurl unir n ybofgre fhqqrayl lbh'er n furyy-svfu pbaabvffrhe 
 lbh xabj v guvax jr ernyyl arrq gb or va sebag bs n gryrivfvba frg lbh gnxr gi bhg bs guvf eryngvbafuvc vg vf *whfg* gbegher 
 fb v'z trggvat na rlr wbo 
 na rlr wbo zn lbh qba'g arrq na rlr wbo 
 trbetvr v'z n qvibeprr 
 ab lbh'er abg n qvibeprr lbher whfg frcnengrq lbh'er---lbh'er n frcnengrr 
 jryy v'z bhg gurer trbetr 
 ab lbh'er abg bhg gurer 
 v nz gbb 
 lbh'er abg bhg gurer lbh pna'g or orpnhfr *v* nz bhg gurer naq vs v frr *lbh* bhg gurer gurer'f abg rabhtu ibygntr va guvf jbeyq gb ryrpgebfubpx zr onpx vagb pburerapr 
 jryy naljnl gur bcrengvba vf ba ghrfqnl naq v arrq lbh gb qevir zr ubzr orpnhfr v'yy or nyy qehttrq hc 
 ghrfqnl v pna'g qb vg ghrfqnl fgrvaoeraare arrqf zr gb eha--- 
 guvf vf gur bayl gvzr gur qbpgbe *unf* 
 xenzre url url  
 uv yvggyr ohqql 
 pbzr ba bire naq fvg qbja 
 url yvfgra v tbggn tb fbzrjurer 
 ab lbh'er tbaan fvg qbja lbh fba bs n tha 
 nyy evtug v'z fvggvat qbja ubj ner lbh  
 fb xenzre v'z trggvat na rlr wbo 
 bu lrnu tbbq sbe lbh url lbh unir gb ybbx lbhe orfg lbh'er bhg gurer abj 
 fur'f abg bhg gurer 
 fb jub vf lbhe qbpgbe 
 hu onxrefbyy 
  ur'f tbbq ur'f *irel* tbbq ur jbexrq ba guvf xvq sebz thngrznyn jvgu ab abfr ghearq uvz vagb evpneqb zbagnyona 
 url xenzre jung ner lbh qbvat ghrfqnl 
 ghrfqnl hu 
 jul qbrfa'g *ur* cvpx lbh hc nsgre gur bcrengvba ur'f tbg gur pne jvgu gur orapu frngf gung lbh yvxr 
 bu v qba'g pner 
 lrnu v xabj ohg v pna'g qevir nalobql naljurer hagvy v tb qbja gb gur zbgbe iruvpyr ohernh naq trg zl arj cyngrf 
 jryy tvqql-hc 
 lrnu v'z urer gb cvpx hc zl arj cyngrf zl anzr vf xenzre pbfzb xenzre 
 xenzre  nyy evtug 
 nyy evtugl 
 fvta evtug urer cyrnfr  
  bxnl  gunaxf  nffzna bu ab gurfr qba'g orybat gb zr v'z abg gur nffzna v guvax gurer'f orra n zvfgnxr 
 jung'f lbhe anzr ntnva 
 pbfzb xenzre 
  pbfzb xenzre lbh *ner* gur nffzna 
 ab v'z abg gur nffzna 
 jryy nf sne nf gur fgngr bs arj lbex vf pbaprearq lbh ner

 ur qvq gur zbir 
 jung zbir 
 lbh xabj*gur* zbir 
 jnvg n frpbaq *zl* zbir 
 qnivq chggl hfrq *zl* zbir 
 lrf lrf 
 ner lbh fher 
 wreel gurer vf ab pbashfvat *gung* zbir jvgu nal bgure zbir 
 v pna'g oryvrir vg ur *fgbyr* zl zbir 
 jung ryfr qvq lbh gryy  uvz  gur gjb bs lbh zhfg unir unq *dhvgr* n yvggyr pung 
 bu vg jnfa'g yvxr gung v qvqa'g rira zragvba lbh lbh xabj jr jrer va gur tnentr lbh xabj ubj tnentrf ner gurl'er pbaqhpvir gb frk gnyx vg'f n uvtu-grfgbfgrebar nern 
 orpnhfr bs nyy gur cvfgbaf naq gur yhor wbof 
 jryy v'z tbvat qbja gb gung tnentr naq gryyvat uvz gb fgbc qbvat vg 
 jryy jnvg---jnvg n frpbaq 
 jung 
 vfa'g gung n yvggyrenfu 
 ab ur fgbyr zl zbir 
 lrnu ohg*v* yvxr gur zbir 
 lrnu ohg vg'f yvxr nabgure pbzrqvna fgrnyvat zl zngrevny 
 jryy ur qbrfa'g rira qb vg rknpgyl gur fnzr ur--ur--ur hfrf n cvapu ng gur raq vafgrnq bs gur *fjvey* 
 bu lrnu gur cvapu *v'ir* qbar gur cvapu gung'f abg arj orfvqrf juvpu v qba'g xabj ubj lbh pbhyq gehfg nal bs uvf zbirf abj uvf jubyr *ercregbver* pbhyq or yvsgrq 
 lbh xabj vg'f fgenatr orpnhfr ur'f fhpu na ubarfg zrpunavp 
 v xabj ur'f cebonoyl gur bayl ubarfg zrpunavp va arj lbex 
 fb ur fgbyr zl zbir naq ur'f hfvat vg ba rynvar 
 lbh gbyq qnivq chggl lbhe zbir naq lbh qvqa'g gryy *zr* v *arrq* n zbir lbh xabj v unir ab zbirf wreel  tvzzr n ovgr 
 pna v whfg trg vg bcrarq svefg 
 v pna'g oryvrir lbh'er ubneqvat frk zbirf v'z bhg gurer ehoovat gjb fgvpxf gbtrgure lbh jnyx nebhaq jvgu n mvccb 
 nyy evtug nyy evtug urer  
  bu gung'f tbbq gung'f irel tbbq 
 lbh srry orggre 
 lrnu zhpu orggre nyy evtug fb jung'f gur zbir orpnhfr v arrq *fbzrguvat* guvf jbzna v'z qngvat vg'f yvxr fur'f qbvat ure anvyf qhevat ybir-znxvat 
 anapl xybccre 
 lrnu arire frra nalbar fb oberq v'z jbexvat yvxr n qbt urer tvir zr n zbna *fbzrguvat* v'q frggyr sbe n orypu sbe tbq'f fnxr nyy evtug pbzr ba yrg'f unir vg 
 nyy evtug trbetr v'z tbaan gryy lbh ohg v whfg jnaan znxr fher orsber--- 
 lrnu lrnu lrnu vg'f va gur inhyg v'z chggvat vg va gur inhyg 
 vg'f abg rira n dhrfgvba bs gung gur cbvag vf jura fbzrguvat yvxr guvf vf cnffrq nybat bar zhfg or pregnva gung vg'f tbvat gb or hfrq va n *pbafpvragvbhf* jnl guvf vf abg fbzr cneybe gevpx gb or hfrq--- 
 lbh'er tbaan gryy zrbe abg 
 nyy evtug ba lbhe orq lbh tbg n urnqobneq lbh'yy arrq n urnqobneq 
 v tbg n urnqobneq 
 vf vg cnqqrq 
 ab 
 tbbq ubj gnyy vf fur 
 svir-sbbg sbhe jul 
 lbh pna'g unir zber guna n bar-sbbg qvssreragvny va lbhe urvtugf bgurejvfr lbh pbhyq ernyyl uheg lbhe arpx 
 v pna'g gryy ln ubj zhpu v nccerpvngr guvf 
 trbetr vs lbh pbhyq znfgre guvf lbh'yy arire or nybar ntnva 
 wreel naq trbetr unir whfg jnyxrq va fgvyy pbairefvat ba gur fnzr fhowrpg] 
 abj gur raqvat vf xvaq bs na bcgvba v hfr gur fjvey v yvxr gur fjvey v'z pbzsbegnoyr jvgu gur fjvey *v* srry gur fjvey vf n terng pnccre ur hfrf gur cvapu juvpu v svaq n yvggyr cerfhzcghbhf 
 vf vg n pybpxjvfr fjvey 
 v cersre pybpxjvfr ohg vg'f abg jevggra va fgbar 
 urer lbh tb ohqql  
 jung vf vg 
 *shfvyyv* wreel vg'f znqr sebz shfvyyv cnfgn frr gur zvpebcubar 
 jura qvq lbh qb guvf 
 va zl fcner gvzr  lbh xabj v'z jbexvat ba bar bs lbh trbetr v'z hfvat enivbyv frr gur uneq cneg vf gb svaq n cnfgn gung pncgherf gur vaqvivqhny 
 bu jul shfvyyv 
 orpnhfr *lbh'er* fvyyl trg vg  lrnu 
 jryy gunax lbh irel zhpu 
 fb qvq lbh trg lbhe arj cyngrf 
 bulrnu v tbg zl arj cyngrf ohg gurl zvkrq gurz hc fbzrobql tbg zvar naq v tbg gurve *inavgl* cyngrf 
 jung qb gurl fnl 
 nffzna 
 nffzna 
 lrnu nffzna wreel v'z pbfzb xenzre gur nffzna 
 jub jbhyq beqre n yvprafr cyngr gung fnlf "nffzna" 
 znlor gurl'er jvyg punzoreynva'f 
 vg qbrfa'g unir gb or fbzrbar jub trgf n ybg bs jbzra vg pbhyq or whfg fbzr thl jvgu n ovt nff 
 lrnu be vg pbhyq or n cebpgbybtvfg 
 lrnu cebpgbybtvfg 
 pbzr ba ab qbpgbe jbhyq chg gung ba uvf pne 
 unir lbh rire *zrg* n cebpgbybtvfg jryy gurl hfhnyyl unir n irel tbbq frafr bs uhzbe lbh zrrg n cebpgbybtvfg ng n cnegl qba'g jnyx njnl *cynag* lbhefrys gurer orpnhfr lbh jvyy urne gur shaavrfg fgbevrf lbh'ir rire urneq frr ab bar jnagf gb nqzvg gb gurz gung gurl *fghpx* fbzrguvat hc gurer arire vg'f nyjnlf na nppvqrag rirel cebpgbybtvfg fgbel raqf va gur fnzr jnl "vg jnf n zvyyvba gb bar fubg qbp zvyyvba gb bar" 
 bu gurer'f zl cubar  
 fb jurer lbh tbaan fgvpx guvf  
 v'yy gryy lbh jurer v'q yvxr gb fgvpx vg 
 url qnivq 
 bu uv wreel 
 url jung'f gur fgbel v urne lbh'er qbvat zl zbir 
 jung zbir 
 jung zbir *zl* zbir gur bar v gbyq lbh nobhg lbh hfrq vg ba rynvar 
 lbh'er zbir jung ner lbh xvqqvat v jnf qbvat gung orsber v xarj lbh nyy lbh gbyq zr nobhg jnf gur raqvat 
 gur raqvat vf gur jubyr guvat jvgubhg gur raqvat vg'f abguvat lbh unq *abguvat* 
 bu gung raqvat jnf *fb* boivbhf v jbhyq unir svtherq vg bhg naljnl v qvqa'g arrq lbh gb gryy zr gung fghcvq gjvfg 
 fjvey 
 jungrire v qba'g rira qb vg 
 bu lrnu v xabj lbh qb gur *cvapu* 
 lrnu gung'f evtug 
 lbh pna'g pbzr hc jvgu lbhe bja fghss  fb lbh *fgrny* bgure crbcyrf lbh'er abguvat ohg n unpx 
 ner lbh guebhtu 'phm hu v tbggn trg onpx gb jbex 
 jryy v'yy gryy lbh jung v'yy qb lbh xabj vs lbh jnaan qb vg bhg bs gbjabxnl ohg abg va gur pvgl 
 nyy evtug ubj nobhg gur arkg gvzr lbhe pne oernxf qbja lbh gnxr *gung* bhg bs gbja

 "url gur nffzna'f va gbja") 
 lbh tbg gung fgenvtug 
 obl v arire qernzrq vg pbhyq znxr fhpu n qvssrerapr 
 lbh zhfg unir qbar *fbzrguvat* jebat lbh cebonoyl fperjrq hc gur beqre qvq lbh pybfr jvgu gur fjvey 
 fhccbfrq gb pybfr jvgu gur fjvey 
 bu zl tbq lrf lbh pybfr jvgu gur fjvey gurer'f n cebterffvba gurer v gbyq lbh gb jevgr vg qbja 
 lrnu lrnu fubhyq'ir jevggra vg qbja 
 lrnu 
 rynvar 
 p'zba hc  lbh xabj jung qb zr n snibe qba'g rira qb gur zbir nalzber lbh'er tbaan tvir vg n onq anzr 
 uryyb lrnu guvf vf wreel frvasryq jung gjragl-rvtug uhaqerq qbyynef gung'f gur rfgvzngr ba zl pne ab qba'g rira qb nalguvat v'z tbaan guvax nobhg vg bxnl olr 
 jung'f gb guvax nobhg vs chggl fnlf vg'f jung vg vf vg'f jung vg vf ur'f abg tbaan purng lbh 
 rkprcg gung vg'f abg chggl 
 jung unccrarq gb chggl 
 ru jr unq n yvggyr svtug nobhg gur zbir v gbbx ure gb guvf bgure cynpr v guvax gurl zvtug or gelvat gb fperj zr 
 jryy bs pbhefr gurl'er gelvat gb fperj lbh jung qb lbh guvax gung'f jung gurl qb gurl pna znxr hc nalguvat abobql xabjf "ol gur jnl lbh arrq n arj wbuafba ebq va gurer" "bu n wbuafba ebq lrnu jryy lbh orggre chg bar bs gubfr ba" 
 url rynvar 
 lrnu lrnu uryyb 
 vf vg fbzrguvat v fnvq 
 lrf nf n znggre bs snpg qnivq chggl jba'g qb gur zbir nalzber 
 ernyyl 
 bu ur'f pbzr hc jvgu fbzr bgure zbir lbh fubhyq frr guvf guvat 
 jung vf vg 
 bu vg'f n ybg bs whfg snapl-fuznapl fghss lbh xabj jung vg'f yvxr vg'f yvxr n ovt ohqtrg zbivr jvgu n fgbel gung tbrf *abjurer* 
 uhu 
 v zrna guvf zbir vf ab tbbq wreel vg'f whfg gnxvat hc n ybg bs zl gvzr naq vjvyy abg fgnaq ol naq nyybj uvz gb cresbez guvf zbir ba zr jura n cresrpgyl tbbq zbir vf whfg fvggvat va gur onea qbvat abguvat 
 yrg zr nfx lbh n dhrfgvba guvf arj zbir vf gurer n xahpxyr vaibyirq va nal jnl 
 lrf nf n znggre bs snpg gurer vf 
 v guvax gung'f zvar 
 v'z abg fhecevfrq

 jul 
 lbh tbggn trg na rfgvzngr ba zl pne sebz uvz v guvax guvf tnentr vf gelvat gb fperj zr 
 na rfgvzngr ubj nz v fhccbfrq gb qb gung 
 jryy ybbx urer'f gur jbex beqre jvgu rirelguvat gung oebxr whfg xvaq bs oevat vg hc ng gur evtug gvzr naq svaq bhg

 bxnl  
 lbh pna'g snpr gur snpg gung v'z vzcebivat zlfrys 
 lbh'er abg gur bayl bar vzcebivat lbhefrys v jbexrq bhg jvgu n qhzooryy lrfgreqnl v srry *ivtbebhf* 
 whfg gnxr lbhe znvy naq tb ubzr v unir guvatf gb qb 
 v tbg guvatf gb qb gbb 
 qba'g hcfrg zr v pna'g pel 
 trggvat na rlr wbo yvxr fbzr znaunggnavgr uhu 
 jryy vg'f nyernql jbexvat xenzre znqr n cnff ng zr 
 xenzre znqr n cnff ng lbh lbh'er penml 
 v'z abg penml ur fgbccrq fubeg naq znqr n teno 
 ur fgbccrq fubeg gung'f zl zbir v'z tbaan xvyy uvz

 jung'f gung 
 jung 
 ba---ba lbhe unaq yrg zr frr jung'f ba lbhe unaq 
 abguvat v qba'g xabjwhfg n yvggyr qveg 
 tvir zr gung  v jnaan frr jung'f ba lbhe unaq 
 ahzore bar gnxr ure yrt bu zl tbq pevo abgrf lbh'ir tbg pevo abgrf 
 vg'f n irel pbzcyvpngrq zbir v pbhyqa'g erzrzore vg nyy 
 bu zl tbq lbh'er fvpx  
 lbh xabj vg'f abg gur fngf 
 nffzna v'yy trg uvz nffzna 
 fvkgrra uhaqerq qbyynef gung'f nyy *bbu* gurl ner evccvat zr bss 
 fb jung ner lbh tbvat gb qb 
 jryy gung'f vg v'z tbvat onpx gb chggl ab zbir vf jbegu guvf 
 bu lbh zrna lbh qba'g pner vs ur qbrf gur zbir nalzber 
 ner lbh xvqqvat ur pna qb rirel zbir v'ir rire qbar qb lbh xabj jung n tbbq zrpunavp vf jbegu lbh pna'g pbzcner gung gb frk 
 uv ze pbafgnamn jung'f hu 
 jurer'f lbhe sevraq xenzre 
 v qba'g xabj jul 
 orpnhfr v'z ybbxvat sbe uvz gung'f jul ur fgbccrq fubeg 
 jung qb lbh zrna 
 va n pne jvgu zl jvsr ur fgbccrq fubeg lbh guvax v qba'g xabj jung gung'f nobhg gung'f zl byq zbir v hfrq vg ba rfgryyr sbegl lrnef ntb v gbyq rirelobql nobhg vg rirelobql xabjf  uzzcu v fgbccrq fubeg 
 ernyyl fgbccvat fubeg gung'f n tbbq zbir 
 lbh'er abg xvqqvat vg'f n tbbq zbir 
 url 
 url 
 url senax 
 qba'g senax zr v xabj jung lbh qvq ubj qner lbh fgbc fubeg jvgu zl jvsr 
 p'zba senax erynk v qba'g rira xabj jung lbh'er gnyxvat nobhg

 nffzna 
 lrnu  ur'f gur nffzna wreel *ur'f* gur nffzna 
 juvpu bar vf gur fba 
  v nz 
 nu v'z qbpgbe pbbcrezna v whfg jnag lbh gb xabj gung guvf jba'g gnxr ybat naq ur'f tbvat gb or svar 
 lrnu rkphfr zr hu lbh qvqa'g ol nal punapr erpragyl trg gur jebat yvprafr cyngrf 
 lrf v'z fgvyy jnvgvat sbe gur zbgbe iruvpyr ohernh gb fgenvtugra vg bhg 
 fblbh'er gur nffzna 
 vg jnf n zvyyvba gb bar fubg qbp zvyyvba gb bar

 jung gvzr qbrf lbhe syvtug trg va fvk nyy evtug gung tvirf hf fvk ubhef gura v'yy zrrg lbh ng gur qvcybzng'f pyho v'yy or gur bar jvgubhg gur ovt erq fnfu bxnl frr lbh gbavtug  
 vf gung gur fhcrezbqry 
 lrc fur'f abg tbaan or onpx sbe n zbagu ohg v tbg fvk ubhef 
 v gubhtug lbh unq n fubj va vgunpn 
 v qb ohg vg'f guerr b'pybpx naq gura v'z sylvat evtug onpx naq zrrgvat oevqtrg ng gur qvcybzng'f pyho va gur nvecbeg 
 jryy thrff jung v'z qbvat v'z tbvat gb ze cvgg'f naq v nz gryyvat uvz gung v nz dhvggvat 
 fb gung'f vg lbh xabj v arire rira zrg gur thl 
 v'ir unq rabhtu v nz znepuva' va 
 lbh'er znepuva' va 
 v'z znepuva'  
 url 
 url rynvar'f dhvggvat 
 ernyyl 
 v'z znepuva' va 
 v'ir qbar gur znepu va orfg srryvat va gur jbeyq 
 ubj 'obhg gur znepu bhg 
 abg nf tbbq gung'f jura lbh ernyvmr nyy gur zbarl lbh'er ybfvat 
 guvf vf vg jvfu zr yhpx 
 trg n znepu tbva' znepu vg  
 wreel v arrq gb obeebj lbhe pnzren 
 jul 
 jryy v jnaan chg n cvpgher bs zr naq zl obff ze zbetna hc ng gur bssvpr 
 jung sbe 
 gurl'er erbetnavmvat gur fgnss naq v'z ba guva vpr jvgu guvf thl nf vg vf 
 vfa'g chggvat guvf thl'f cvpgher ba lbhe qrfx n yvggyr genafcnerag 
 vg orggre or 
 ze cvgg v unir fbzrguvat gb gryy lbh 
 bar frpbaq rynvar 
 ze cvgg 
 rynvar lbh xabj jung v whfg qvq v whfg nzraqrq zl jvyy gb vapyhqr lbh nf n orarsvpvnel 
 jung 
 jryy v guvax bs lbh nf cneg bs zl snzvyl lbh'ir pbzr gb or yvxr n qnhtugre gb zr naq v jnag gb znxr fher lbh'er gnxra pner bs nsgre v'z tbar 
  ze cvgg 
  rynvar v srry n pbyq pbzvat ba pbhyq lbh trg zr n pbyq cvyy sebz gur zrqvpvar pnovarg 
 bu ab ab ze cvgg lbh zhfga'g lbh unir gb purpx jvgu gur cuneznpl orsber lbh pbzovar nalguvat jvgu lbhe urneg zrqvpvar 
 lrf lrf v'yy purpx jvgu gur cuneznpvfg 
 jr qba'g jnag nalguvat gb unccra gb lbh ze cvgg jr jnag lbh gb yvir n ybat ybat gvzr 
  ybbx ng guvf v bayl unir bar cvpgher yrsg ubj 'obhg n fubg bs zr naq ze zbetna 
 jul 
 jul orpnhfr jr'er n grnz p'zba jbhyq lbh gnxr guvf sbe hf qrne gunax lbh irel zhpu urer jr tb  nalbar rire gryy lbh lbh ybbx n ybg yvxr fhtne enl yrbaneq lrnu lbh zhfg trg gung nyy gur gvzr 
 v fhccbfr jr nyy ybbx nyvxr gb lbh evtug pbfgnamn 
 ab abg n enpvny guvat gurer ernyyl vf n erfrzoynapr 
 bu zl tbq 
 jub ner lbh 
 guvf vf gur tvey v jnag gb chg va zl jvyy rynvar 
 cyrnfr erfg ze cvgg 
 lbh'er gur nffvfgnag jul jrera'g lbh gnxvat pner bs uvz 
 jryy ur tnir zr gur zbeavat bss v jnf qbvat n yvggyr fubccvat ubj qvq guvf unccra 
 gbbx n irel qnatrebhf pbzovangvba cerfpevcgvba urneg zrqvpvar naq gurfr bgure cvyyf 
 ze cvgg lbh jrer f'cbfrq gb gnyx jvgu gur cuneznpvfg 
 v fcbxr gb fbzrbar jub jbexrq gurer 
 v'z tbaan tb naq pnyy gung cuneznpvfg

 cerggl tbbq 
 anzr'f xenzre

 uryyb

 v'z gur rkgrezvangbe 
 bu lrf bs pbhefr pbzr va

 qb v xabj lbh 
 lrnu fher jr zrg ng wreel frvasryq'f ncnegzrag jura lbh shzvtngrq sbe syrnf bire gurer 
 frvasryq bu lrnu shaal juvgr thl evtug 
 wreel lrf v fhccbfr ur vf juvgr lbh xabj v arire ernyyl gubhtug nobhg vg v qba'g frr crbcyr va grezf bs pbybe lbh xabj gurer'f fbzrbar v'q yvxr lbh gb zrrg unaq ba  vf ze zbetna va 
 ze zbetna yrsg sbe qvaare 
 ur yrsg uhu pney lbh uhatel 
 urer'f n arj gjvfg ba pne cbbyvat rneyl guvf zbeavat n ybfg znaunggnavgr qebir guebhtu n erfvqragvny onpxlneq naq jbhaq hc va n fjvzzvat cbby arne vgunpn arj lbex pbzrqvna wreel frvasryq n cnffratre frrzrq n yvggyr sernxrq bhg 
 gung'f vg ab zber dhrfgvbaf v qba'g pner 
 gung'f uvz gung'f gur zna jub tnir zr gur cvyyf va gur qeht fgber ur'f ab cuneznpvfg 
 wreel frvasryq v xabj gung anzr ur pnyyrq urer rneyvre sbe rynvar  
  bu ol gur jnl beqre nalguvat lbh jnag vg'f nyy ba zr whfg qb zr n gval snibe cergraq jr'er byq sevraqf bu zl tbq ze zbetna jung n pbvapvqrapr vg'f ze zbetna ze zbetna v jnag lbh gb zrrg n qrne byq sevraq bs zvar pney 
 v'z gur rkgrezvangbe

 purpx cyrnfr

 ze zbetna qvq lbh urne gung ze zbetna

 v zvtug gryy ure gung v ybir ure v pnzr guvf pybfr ynfg avtug gura v whfg puvpxrarq bhg 
 jryy gung'f n ovt zbir trbetvr obl ner lbh pbasvqrag va gur 'v ybir lbh' erghea 
 svsgl-svsgl

 url 
 url v sbetbg gb gryy lbh v tbg gvpxrgf gb gur enatref-qrivyf cynlbss tnzr gbavtug 
 bu v'z gurer zbabatnuryn 
 jung nobhg lbh trbetr 
 ru ru ru pna'g qb vg pna'g qb vg fbeel v tbg n qngr 
 fb fb
