 jryy jung qb v qb jvgu gur rkgen gvpxrg 
 bu url pna v oevat qnivq chqql ur'f n ovt qrivyf' sna 
 fher svar jvgu zr 
 url ol gur jnl vs nalobql jnagf na vafvqr gbhe bs gur mbb fvran jbexf gurer nf n genvare 
 fb fur jbexf ng gur mbb 
 lrnu lrnu 
 lrnu yvxr qvnar sbffr lbh xabj fur'f gur bayl crefba gung'f rire orra npprcgrq vagb tbevyyn fbpvrgl naq lbh xabj bapr gubfr tbevyynf npprcg lbh lbh tbg vg znqr va gur funqr 
 fb ubj ybat unir lbh orra n qrivyf' sna 
  fvapr v jnf n xvq v'z sebz wrefrl 
 lrnu jryy jr'er tbaan xvpx lbhe ohggf gbavtug 
 url ab jnl zna 
 lrf 
 jr'er cevzrq 
 nyevtug lbh nyzbfg ernql pnhfr wreel naq xenzre ner tbaan or urer nal frpbaq 
 jung gur-- 
 fb jung qb lbh guvax 
 jung vf gung 
 v cnvagrq zl snpr 
  lbh cnvagrq lbhe snpr 
 lrnu 
 jul 
 lbh xabj fhccbeg gur grnz 
 jryy lbh pna'g jnyx nebhaq yvxr gung 
 jul abg 
 orpnhfr vg'f vafnar 
 url lbh tbggn yrg gurz xabj lbh'er bhg gurer guvf vf gur cynlbssf 
 url 
 url 
 qnir hz cnvagrq uvf snpr 
 lrnu gung'f pbby jryy lbh tbggn fhccbeg lbhe grnz 
 bx ernql gb tb 
 lrnu 
  yrg'f trg vg ba nyevtug tb qrivyf tb qrivyf yrg'f tb qrivyf 
 lbh'er qrnq zrffvre jr'er tbaan trg lbh zrffvre 
 jvyy lbh fvg qbja 
 url zna v'z whfg gelvat gb fhccbeg gur grnz 
 jvyy lbh fvg qbja lbh'er qvfgheovat rirelobql fvg qbja 
 bu lrnu orpnhfr lbh'er n enatre sna naq lbh xabj v'z zrffvat jvgu gurve urnqf 
 tb qrivyf 
 qrivyf tbny fgrcuna evpure fpberf sebz whfg vafvqr gur oyhr yvar naq gur qrivyf gnxr--  
 lbh xabj v pbhyq unir npghnyyl tbar gb gung 
 fb jul qvqa'g lbh 
 jryy v qvqa'g jnag gb oernx bhe qngr 
 bu jryy 
 orpnhfr v v ybir lbh 
 lbh xabj v'z uhatel yrg'f trg fbzrguvat gb rng 
 un un jr gbbx vg gb lbh lbh pbhyqa'g trg vg bhg bs lbhe mbar nyy avtug jr jrer ntterffvir jr qvqa'g yrg lbh crargengr 
 nyevtug gung'f rabhtu bhg bs lbh gurer'f fgvyy guerr zber tnzrf yrsg va guvf frevrf zl sevraq naq vg'f sne sebz orvat bire irel sne sebz orvat bire  jngpu bhg 
  url jung ner lbh qbvat jngpu jurer lbh'er qevivat zna  qba'g zrff jvgu gur qrivyf ohqql jr'er ahzore bar jr orng nalobql jr'er gur qrivyf gur qrivyf unnnn 
 ry qvnoyb qvbf zvb ry qvnoyb 
 "v'z uhatel yrg'f trg fbzrguvat gb rng" 
 lhc 
 ovt zngmbu onyy 
 uhtr zngmbu onyy 
 gubfr qnza 'v ybir lbh' ergheaf 
 jryy vg'f nyy bire v fyvccrq hc 
 bu lbh qba'g xabj 
 lbh unir nal vqrn ubj snfg gurfr guvatf qrgrevbengr jura gurer'f na 'v ybir lbh' bhg bs gur ont lbh pna'g unir n eryngvbafuvc jurer bar crefba fnlf "v ybir lbh" naq gur bgure fnlf "v'z uhatel yrg'f trg fbzrguvat gb rng" 
 hayrff lbh'er zneevrq 
 v zrna abj fur guvaxf gung v'z bar bs gurfr thlf gung ybir ure abobql jnagf gb or jvgu fbzrobql gung ybirf gurz 
 ab crbcyr ungr gung 
 lbh jnag gb or jvgu fbzrobql gung qbrfa'g yvxr lbh 
 vqrnyyl 
 v nz arire fnlvat 'v ybir lbh' ntnva hayrff gurl fnl vg svefg 
 zngmbu onyy fbhc 
 gung'q or zr 
 url wreel lbh'er n fzneg thl evtug 
 ab dhrfgvba nobhg vg 
 nyevtug lbh xabj v'z fhccbfrq gb tb ba guvf fcrpvny gbhe gbqnl jvgu trbetr'f tveysevraq 
 ng gur mbb 
 lrnu ohg orsber v zrg hc jvgu ure v fgbccrq gb ybbx ng gur zbaxrlf jura nyy bs n fhqqra v nz uvg va gur snpr jvgu n onanan crry v ghea naq ybbx naq gurer vf guvf zbaxrl ernyyl ynhtuvat vg hc gura fbzrbar gryyf zr gung ur qvq vg jryy v cvpx hc gur onanan crry naq v jnvg sbe gung zbaxrl gb ghea nebhaq naq gura v *junc* yrg uvz unir vg 
 xenzre lbh guerj n onanan crry ng n zbaxrl 
 jryy ur fgnegrq vg 
 vg'f n zbaxrl xenzre 
 jryy ur chfurq zl ohggbaf v pbhyqa'g uryc vg wreel 
 jryy v fgvyy guvax vg'f jebat 
 nyevtug nyevtug svar lbh gnxr gur zbaxrl'f fvqr nyevtug tb nurnq 
 v'z abg gnxvat nalbar'f fvqr 
  pnhfr v xabj jung unccrarq wreel  qvq lbh pnyy nyrp oret naq gunax uvz sbe gur ubpxrl gvpxrgf 
 ab 
 bu wreel jung ner lbh jnvgvat sbe 
 jung qb v tbggn pnyy uvz sbe v gunaxrq uvz svir gvzrf jura ur tnir gurz gb zr ubj znal gvzr v tbggn gunax uvz 
 bu ab ab ab lbh tbggn pnyy uvz gur arkg qnl vg'f pbzzba pbhegrfl 
 ab v qba'g oryvrir va vg v'z gnxvat n fgnaq ntnvafg nyy guvf bire gunaxvat 
 wreel tbbq znaaref ner gur tyhr bs fbpvrgl 
 url vs v xarj v unq gb tvir uvz rvtug zvyyvba 'gunax lbh'f v jbhyqa'g unir gnxra gur gvpxrgf va gur svefg cynpr 
 nyevtug lbh xabj jung guvf vf tbaan qb ur'f tbaan or hcfrg orpnhfr lbh qvqa'g pnyy uvz naq jr'er abg tbaan trg gubfr gvpxrgf sbe sevqnl avtug 
 nu lbh'er bhg bs lbhe zvaq 
 nyevtug jurer lbh tbvat 
 v tbggn trg n fhvg pyrnarq v unir n shareny ba sevqnl 
 jub qvrq 
 erzrzore gur thl jub cergraqrq ur unq pnapre fb b jbhyq ohl uvz gur gbhcrr 
 fb ur npghnyyl unq vg 
 ab pne nppvqrag ur jnf gelvat gb nqwhfg uvf gbhcrr juvyr ur jnf qevivat naq ur ybfg pbageby bs gur pne 
 gung cbbe cevrfg ur jnf whfg ivfvgvat sebz ry fnyinqbe abj ur'f tbar pbzcyrgryl ybpb 
 gur bar chqql fpernzrq ng va gur pne 
 lrnu ur guvaxf ur fnj gur qrivy ur jba'g yrnir uvf ebbz va gur puhepu onfrzrag 
 jryy gung'f jung lbh trg sbe trggvat zvkrq hc jvgu n snpr cnvagre 
 v zrna jung pbzcryf n frrzvatyl abezny uhzna orvat gb qb fbzrguvat yvxr gung 
 tbggn fhccbeg gur grnz 
 lbh xabj v ernyyl ungr zl pybgurf 
 uz 
 v bcra hc zl pybfrg gurer'f whfg abguvat 
 uz 
 abguvat v ungr rirelguvat v unir v ernyyl ungr vg  v zrna ng guvf cbvag vg'f yvxr v pna jrne fbzrguvat guerr be sbhe gvzrf naq gung'f vg 
 uz 
 vg'f trggvat gb or n greevoyr ceboyrz sbe zr 
  url nyrp 
 qvq lbh frr gung jung xvaq bs n 'uryyb' jnf gung 
 nu ze xenzre 
 lrf 
 gunaxf sbe pbzvat 
 fb hu jung qvq lbh jnag gb frr zr nobhg 
 jryy ze xenzre gb trg evtug gb vg jr'er univat n ovg bs n ceboyrz jvgu oneel 
 oneel 
 gur puvzcnamrr 
 bu jryy hu jung'f gur ceboyrz 
 jryy ur'f abg shapgvbavat gur jnl ur abeznyyl qbrf ur frrzf qrcerffrq ur'f ybfg uvf nccrgvgr ur'f rira phegnvyrq uvf nhgbrebgvp npgvivgvrf naq jr guvax guvf vf qverpgyl eryngrq gb gur nygrepngvba ur unq jvgu lbh gur bgure qnl 
 fb fb jung qb lbh jnag zr gb qb 
 jryy senaxyl jr'q yvxr lbh gb ncbybtvmr 
 lrnu jryy ur fgnegrq vg 
 ze xenzre ur vf na vaabprag cevzngr 
 fb nz v jung nobhg zl srryvatf qba'g zl srryvatf pbhag sbe nalguvat bu bayl gur cbbe zbaxrl'f vzcbegnag rirelguvat unf gb or qbar sbe gur zbaxrl ybbx v'z fbeel v-- 
 url gung'f bx jryy v'ir tbggn tb srrq gur znezbfrgf 
  lbh xabj trbetr ernyyl yvxrf lbh 
 fur qbrfa'g urne gbb jryy bhg bs ure yrsg rne 
 bu 
 v zrna qb lbh guvax vg'f cbffvoyr gung ur'f znq ng zr orpnhfr ur qvqa'g trg gur qnl-nsgre 'gunax lbh' 
 jnvg n zvahgr lbh jrer ng n shareny evtug 
 lrnu 
 jryy crbcyr arire tvir n tbbq 'uryyb' ng n shareny v zrna gurl tb yvxr guvf  gung'f gur ovttrfg 
 lrnu lrnu gung'f xvaqn jung ur tnir zr 
 url gurl pna'g tb "url lbh ybbx snohybhf" 
 url 
 url jryy v whfg fcbxr gb lbhe tveysevraq 
 tveysevraq lrnu evtug 
 naljnl fur nfxrq zr gb ncbybtvmr gb oneel 
 oneel 
 gur zbaxrl 
 jryy 
 abguvat qbvat wreel v qvqa'g qb nalguvat vg'f gur zbaxrl gung fubhyq or ncbybtvmvat gb zr 
 jryy v qba'g guvax gung'f tbaan unccra 
 jryy v'z fbeel jryy trbetr v gevrq gb chg gur tbbq jbeq va sbe lbh jvgu fvran ohg v qba'g guvax fur urneq zr lbh xabj yrsg rne 
 jung 
 lrnu ure obff gbyq zr gung fur pna'g urne irel jryy bhg bs ure yrsg rne jung lbh qvqa'g xabj gung 
 bu zl tbq 
 jung 
 fur cebonoyl arire urneq vg qba'g lbh frr jung guvf zrnaf vg'f yvxr gur jubyr guvat arire unccrarq vg'f yvxr jura fhcrezna erirefrq gur ebgngvba bs gur rnegu gb fnir ybvf ynar 
 ner lbh tbaan fnl vg ntnva 
 gung'f gur dhrfgvba wvzzl 
 v'z tbaan qb vg 
 jung nsgre jung lbh whfg jrag guebhtu v gubhtug lbh fnvq lbh'q arire fnl vg ntnva 
 v'q yvxr gb fnl vg bapr gb fbzrbar gung pna npghnyyl urne vg 
 jung'f tbvat ba 
 ur'f tbaan gnyx vagb ure bgure rne 
 bu jryy yvfgra v nyzbfg sbetbg gb nfx lbh jung unccrarq ng gur shareny abj qvq lbh gnyx gb nyrp oret 
 lrnu v fnj uvz 
 nyevtug fb ur'f tbaan tvir lbh gur ubpxrl gvpxrgf uhu 
 jryy abg rknpgyl 
 ur'f znq vfa'g ur frr v xarj vg 
 v qba'g xabj vs ur'f znq 
 nyevtug fb jung unccrarq jura lbh fnj uvz 
 jryy v qvqa'g ernyyl trg n tbbq 'uryyb' ohg frr v jnf ng n shareny 
 hu uhu 
 frr fb v qba'g xabj vs v tbg n shareny 'uryyb' be ur jnf znq orpnhfr ur qvqa'g trg uvf qnl-nsgre 'gunax lbh' 
 frr v gbyq lbh wreel v gbyq lbh 
 ybbx jung qb lbh jnag zr gb qb 
 v jnag lbh gb trg ba guvf cubar naq tvir uvz uvf 'gunax lbh' 
 ab ab v pna'g 
 wreel guvf vf gur jnl fbpvrgl shapgvbaf nera'g lbh n cneg bs fbpvrgl orpnhfr vs lbh qba'g jnag gb or n cneg bs fbpvrgl wreel jul qba'g lbh whfg trg va lbhe pne naq zbir gb gur rnfg fvqr 
 ybbx jr tbg svir ubhef orsber gur tnzr v nz orggvat vg jnf n shareny 'uryyb' ur xabjf jr'er urer ur xabjf gur ahzore ur xabjf jr jnag gb tb gurer'f cyragl bs gvzr sbe uvz gb pnyy naq tvir hf gur gvpxrgf 
 lbh fghoobea fghcvq fvyyl zna 
 url terng qvc lbh znqr guvf 
 ab vg'f sebz gur fgber 
 bu url ubj pbzr crbcyr qba'g unir qvc sbe qvaare jul vf vg bayl n fanpx jul pna'g vg or n zrny lbh xabj v qba'g haqrefgnaq fghss yvxr gung 
 qnivq qnivq v guvax jr nhtug gb gnyx 
 nyevtug gung'f pbby 
 qnivq v qba'g guvax jr fubhyq frr rnpu bgure nalzber 
 lbh tbggn or xvqqvat ubj pbzr 
 jryy lbh frr qnivq lbh'er n snpr cnvagre 
 lrnu gung'f evtug 
 jryy vg'f abg gung v qba'g yvxr lbh ohg jryy gb or cresrpgyl ubarfg v'z whfg univat fbzr gebhoyr trggvat cnfg gur snpr cnvagvat 
 jryy nyevtug fb lbh qba'g yvxr gur snpr cnvagvat v whfg jba'g cnvag vg nalzber 
 lrnu ohg lbh yvxr gur snpr cnvagvat 
 jryy v qba'g arrq gb qb vg vg'f abg yvxr n unovg be nalguvat 
 bu lbh zrna lbh'q fgbc vg sbe zr 
 lrnu gung'f evtug 
 gung'f fb gung'f fb fjrrg 
 nu p'zrer  nyevtug v tbggn tb ubzr naq trg punatrq orsber gur tnzr v'yy or onpx jr'yy znxr bhg 
 fvran v ybir lbh 
 lrnu v xabj v urneq lbh gur svefg gvzr 
 lrnu whfg pbasvezvat 
 uryyb bu uv zbz ab yvfgra v jnf rkcrpgvat fbzrobql ryfr v'z fbeel v pna'g gnyx abj v tbggn xrrc gur yvar pyrne v'yy pnyy lbh yngre lrf v xabj v unir pnyy jnvgvat ohg v qba'g gehfg vg va na rzretrapl tbbq olr 
 naljnl v hz v whfg jnag gb fnl gung v'z fbeel v ybfg zl grzcre naq v cebonoyl fubhyqa'g unir v gbbx vg bhg ba lbh naq ybbx vs v'ir pnhfrq lbh nal ceboyrzf nf n erfhyg bs zl orunivbe jryy gura v'z fbeel v ncbybtvmr rira gubhtu oneel orgjrra zr naq lbh jr obgu xabj gung lbh fgnegrq vg v zrna jub'f xvqqvat jub ohg gurl gryy zr gung lbh'er irel hcfrg naq tbq sbeovq v fubhyq qvfgheo gur irel vzcbegnag zbaxrl v'z whfg ubcvat jr pna chg guvf oruvaq hf yrg'f whfg zbir ba jvgu bhe yvirf bx fb ab uneq srryvatf 
 jung vf gung 
 gung'f gur yrggre 'q' 
 jul vf gur yrggre 'q' cnvagrq ba lbhe purfg 
 jryy v'z tbvat gb gur tnzr gbavtug naq zr naq gurfr svir bgure thlf ner tbaan gnxr bhe fuvegf bss naq fcryy bhg 'qrivyf' 
 ohg lbh fnvq ab zber cnvagvat 
 ab v fnvq ab zber snpr cnvagvat naq nf lbh pna frr guvf vf abg zl snpr 
 lrnu gung'f evtug 
 jryy qvq ur pnyy 
 ab 
 bu pbzr ba wreel pbzr ba guvf vf fghcvq vg'f fvk b'pybpx vg'f nyy bire whfg cvpx hc gur cubar naq gunax uvz 
 nyevtug  uryyb nyrp uv vg'f wreel frvasryq lbh xabj lbh tbg n terng 'wbua ubhfrzna' anzr nyrp oret qvq lbh unaq va lbhe nffvtazrag ze oret 
 jung pna v qb sbe lbh wreel 
 jryy nyrp gur ernfba v pnyyrq vf v whfg jnagrq gb gunax lbh sbe gur gvpxrgf sebz gur bgure avtug 
 v jvfu lbh'q pnyyrq zr rneyvre v pbhyq unir tvira lbh zl gvpxrgf sbe gbavtug 
 bu lbh nyernql tnir gurz njnl 
 lrnu ohg lbh xabj jung v unir n sevraq ur'f tbg n pbhcyr bs frngf vs lbh qba'g zvaq gur abfr oyrrq frpgvba gurl'er lbhef 
 ab jr qba'g pner jr whfg jnag gb tb 
 gurer vf bar yvggyr pngpu gubhtu 
 url terng tnzr uhu 
 sngure ureanaqrm 
 uhu 
 han fraben dhr gr ivab n ire ryyn qvpr dhr gvrar vasbeznpvba zhl vzcbegnagr l dhr gr chrqr nlhqne  
 ohrab 
 ny svav svanyzragr cne ry yybire  
 nun ohrab 
 uryyb sngure 
 bu yn znqbaan znqer qr puevfgb lb rfgbl yvfgn 
   
  abj jung nz v fhccbfrq gb qb urer funyy v tb bire gurer vg'f abg yvxr fbzrobql qvrq vg'f "ornpurf" sbe tbq'f fnxr vs fur jnf fvggvat arkg gb zr v'q chg zl nez nebhaq ure v pna'g or znxvat n ovt zbir yvxr tbvat nyy gur jnl bire gurer v pna'g v jba'g 
 fur pnyyf zr guvf zbeavat naq gryyf zr fur'f hcfrg v qvqa'g pbafbyr ure v zrna vg jnf "ornpurf" sbe tbq'f fnxr jung jung qb lbh qb va n fvghngvba yvxr gung 
 jurer jrer lbh 
 v jnf fvggvat ba gur punve fur jnf bire urer ba gur pbhpu 
 jryy lbh xabj vs lbh jrer fvggvat evtug arkg gb ure lbh'q unir gb pbafbyr ure ab znggre jung 
 bs pbhefr 
 jura lbh'er gnyxvat nobhg n zbivr yvxr "ornpurf" zbivat sebz gur punve gb gur pbhpu     gung'f dhvgr n iblntr 
 lrnu 
 url 
 url v tbggn tb 
 jurer lbh tbvat 
 gur vzcebi vf cynlvat "ebpuryyr ebpuryyr" gur zhfvpny 
 ernyyl jung vf orggr zvqyre cynlvat vf fur tbvat gb or gurer 
 fur zvtug or fur'f gur fgne bs gur fubj 
 orggr zvqyre vf tbvat gb or va gur cnex gbqnl lrrrr wreel qba'g grnfr zr 
 v qvqa'g xabj lbh jrer fhpu n orggr zvqyre sna 
 fb znlor v'yy tb qbja gurer naq jngpu hu fur'yy or gurer znlor 
 traavpr cnylvat gbqnl 
 lrnu znlor 
 jub'f traavpr 
 gung'f gur haqrefghql v'z qngvat ure 
 bu hu vf guvf hu orggr zvqyre'f haqrefghql 
 lrnu 
 bu haqrefghqvrf ner n irel fuvsgl ohapu gur fhofgvghgr grnpuref bs gur gurngre jbeyq 
 v'z tynq fur'f na haqrefghql v qba'g unir gb nibvq tbvat onpx fgntr naq univat gb guvax bs fbzrguvat gb fnl 
 tbvat onpxfgntr vf gur jbefg rfcrpvnyyl jura gurl fgvax lbh xabj gung'f n erny ceboyrz 
 whfg bapr v jbhyq yvxr gb gryy fbzrbar gurl fgvax lbh xabj jung v qbvqa'g yvxr gur fubj v qvqa'g yvxr lbh vg whfg ernyyl fghax gur jubyr guvaterny onq fgvaxnebb gunaxf sbe gur gvpxrgf gubhtu 
 lbh yngr 
 v xabj v xabj v qvqa'g unir punatr sbe gur ohf naq gurl qba'g tvir punatr va guvf pvgl fb gurl guerj zr bss gur ohf 
 "gung'f n funzr" lbh'yy unir gb jnvg sbe ybghf abj 
 ubj ybat qb lbh guvax guvf jvyy gnxr v unir n zvyyyyvbbbba guvatf gb qb 
 "zhfga'g xrrc gur cevaprff jnvgvat cevaprff va n ovt uheel" "ab punatr sbe ohf" "cbbe cevaprff" 
 jung hu 
 abguvat jba'g or ybat 
 "cevaprff jnagf n znavpher" 
 "bu yhpxl zr" 
 "bu lbh tbg gur cevaprff" 
 jung vf fb shaal 
 gryy xabpx-xabpx wbxr 
 gur xberna jbzra jrer gnyxvat nobhg zr v guvax gurl jrer pnyyvat zr n qbt 
 ubj jbhyq lbh xabj lbh qba'g fcrnx xberna 
 orpnhfr guvf jbzna pnzr va jvgu n qbt naq ehol pnyyrq gur qbt gur fnzr jbeq gurl hfrq jura gurl jrer cbvagvat ng zrtr tr tr 
 lbh xabj znlor va xberna "qbt" vfa'g na vafhyg pbhyq or yvxr gur jbeq "sbk" gb hf bu fur'f n qbt 
 jul qba'g lbh tb gb nabgure anvy fubc 
 orpnhfr gurl'er gur orfg wreel gur orfg ybbx znlor v'z whfg orvat cnenabvq 
 jung lbh arrq vf n genafyngbe gb tb va gur fubc jvgu lbh naq gryy lbh jung gurl'er fnlvat 
 lrnu jub fcrnxf xberna 
 lbh xabj jub fcrnxf xberna 
 ab jub 
 trbetr'f sngure 
 lbh tbggn' or xvqqvat zr ubj qbrf ur fcrnx xberna 
 ur hfrq gb tb gurer n ybg ba ohfvarff 
 jung qvq ur qb 
 ur fbyq eryvtvbhf negvpyrf gur fgnghrf bs wrfhf gur ivetva znel gung jrer znahsnpgherq va xbern 
 hu 
 trbetr qbrf lbhe sngure fcrnx xberna 
 lrnu ur bapr ohzcrq vagb erireraq lhat fha zbba 
 bu uv traavpr 
 uv wreel 
 guvf vf trbetr guvf vf xenzre 
 avpr gb zrrg lbh 
 cynlvat gbqnl 
 ab v'z ba gur orapu gbqnl 
 gurl ernyyl fgvpx gb gung haqrefghql ehyr 
 fb fur'f pbzvat 
 bu lrnu fur'yy or urer    bu ab zl senaxshegre zl senaxshegre sryy   vg jnf ernyyl tbbq v pna'g oryvrir gung v qebccrq vg  
 vg'f bxnlvg'f whfg n ubg qbt  rirelguvat vf tbvat gb or bxnl 
 ab vg  jnf ernyyl tbbq 
 ybbx vg'f orggr vg'f orggr nu nu nu    orggr cffg uv 
 uv 
 hu v whfg jnag gb fnl v guvax lbh'er jbaqreshy 
 hu gunax lbh 
 lrnu v'ir frra lbh va rirelguvat lbh'ir qbar 
 ernyyl 
 nalguvat v pna trg lbh jngre gurl tbg vpr bire urer 
 jung synibhef qb gurl unir 
 pubpbyngr yrzba naq hu pureel 
 ubj nobhg cvarnccyr 
 cvarnccyr fher nyevtug v'yy or evtug onpx 
 ab cvarnccyr whfg pureel yrzba naq ghggv-sehggv 
 bu hu hu  
 naljnl ze pbfgnamn jung v jnag lbh gb qb vf gb pbzr gb gur fubc jvgu zr naq gryy zr jung gurl ner fnlvat lbh qb fcrnx xberna 
 v bapr gnyxrq gb gur erireraq lhat fba zbba ur obhtug gjb wrfhf fgnghrf sebz zr ur'f n uryy bs n avpr thl 
 hu un 
 rire frr gung snpr ba uvz yvxr n ovvvt nccyr cvr 
 lrnu lrnu hu hu yvfgra ze pbfgnamn vs hu vs lbh qb guvf sbe zr v'yy trg lbh n znavpher v'yy cnl sbe vg be lbh pna trg n crqvpher vs lbh jnag 
 ab bar vf gbhpuvat zl srrg orgjrra lbh naq zr rynvar v guvax v'ir tbg n sbbg bqbhe ceboyrz 
 v jngpurq "ornpurf" ba pnoyr ynfg avtug   tvir zr n oernx 
 trg fbzr gnyrag gura lbh pna zbhgu bss 
 fgevxr guerr 
 jung ner lbh oyvaq 
 jung 
 abguvat abguvat 
 v unq na nssnve jvgu n xberna jbzna 
 hu ze pbfgnamn v 
 ab v srry v arrq gb haoheqra zlfrys v ybirq ure irel qrrcyl ohg gur pynfu bs phygherf jnf gbb zhpu ure snzvyl jbhyq abg npprcg zr 
 ze pbfgnamn v 
 znlor vg jnf orpnhfr v ershfrq gb gnxr bss zl fubrf ntnva gur sbbg bqbhe ceboyrz ure sngure jbhyq ybbx ng zr naq fnl " rab rabn whnat " juvpu zrnaf "guvf thl - guvf vf abg zl xvaq bs thl" 
 fher v tbg cvarnccyr 
 zbir vg va zbir va rirelobql trg lbhe fuevzc urer fuevzc ba fcrpvny gbqnl 
 pbzr ba trbetr whfg ybbfra hc 
 pbzr ba trbetr 
 v tbg gur cvarnccyr  v tbg gur cvarnccyr 
  xrrc tbvat 
 nnnnnnu 
 fnsr 
 pbzr ba vg'f whfg n tnzr 
  qba'g jbeel xenzre vf tbvat gb gnxr pner bs rirelguvat frr v tbg lbh cvarnccyr v fnj ornpurf ynfg avtug sbe gur sbhegu gvzr  "lbh ner gur jvaq" 
 gur fubj jvyy tb ba ohg abg orggr zvqyre juvyr cynlvat fbsgonyy va gur cnex zf zvqyre jnf vawherq jura nabgure cynlre gubhtugyrffyl enzzrq ure ng ubzr cyngr nyy pncgherq ba nzngrhe ivqrb gncr fur jvyy or bhg sbe gjb jrrxf sebz ure oebnqjnl fubj; ebpuryyr ebpuryyr - gur zhfvpny 
    gunax lbh  
 jryy jr 
 ab cyrnfr guvf vf gur svefg gvzr va zl yvsr  gung nalbar unf rire qbar nalguvat yvxr guvf sbe zr v'ir nyjnlf unq gb fgehttyr fb uneq sbe rirelguvat v rire tbg  naq v xabj guvf vf tbvat gb or zl ovt oernx  
  vg'f bxnl rirelguvat vf tbvat gb or nyy evtug 
 pbzr ba wreel bcra hc v xabj lbh'er va gurer 
 pbzr onpx nabgure gvzr 
 fblbh'er nyy va urer gbtrgure ubj pbairavrag v ubcr lbh'er nyy cebhq bs lbhefryirf 
 fb zl qrne lbh guvax lbh pna trg gb oebnqjnl jryy yrg zr gryy lbh fbzrguvat oebnqjnl unf ab ebbz sbe crbcyr yvxr lbh abg gur oebnqjnl v xabj zl oebnqjnl gnxrf crbcyr yvxr lbh naq rngf gurz hc naq fcvgf gurz bhg zl oebnqjnl vf gur oebnqjnl bs zrezna naq znegva naq sbagnvar naq vs lbh guvax lbh pna ohvyq lbhefrys hc ol xabpxvat bgure crbcyr qbja tbbq yhpx  
 uv rirelbar hz guvf vf zl sevraq senax 
 jung jbhyq lbh yvxr gbqnl znavpher crqvpher 
 v'yy gnxr n znavpher v qba'g gnxr zl fubrf bss sbe nalbar 
 "gung'f gur yrnfg bs uvf ceboyrzf" 
 jung jnf gung 
 jung'q gurl fnl jung'q gurl fnl 
 gurl znqr n qrebtngbel pbzzrag nobhg zr 
 "fur'f jvgu n zna gjvpr ure ntr" "ur qbrfa'g ybbx yvxr ur'f tbg zhpu zbarl rvgure" 
 "purpx bhg gung fjrngre"  
 "v guvax v fnj n zbgu syl bhg bs n cbpxrg" 
 "jung unccrarq gb uvf gnvy" 
 bxnl gung'f vg "bxv ba njn" jurer'f zl gnvy v urneq rirel jbeq lbh fnvq lbh tbg fbzr areir 
 gung ibvpr vg fbhaqf fb snzvyvne vg erzvaqf zr bs jura v jnf nlbhat tvey va xbern naq v zrg na nzrevpna ohfvarffzna ur jnf n irel hahfhny zna dhvpx grzcreq jvgu n fgenatr unygvat jnl bs fcrnxvat jr sryy va ybir ohg jura v oebhtug uvz ubzr gb zrrg zl sngure ur ershfrq gb gnxr uvf fubrf bss naq gurer jnf n greevoyr svtug 
 gung zna nyfb ershfrf gb gnxr uvf fubrf bss 
  v arire frra crbcyr gerngrq yvxr guvf

 senax 
 xvz

 juvgr zrng 
 lrnu juvgr zrng naq vs v frr bar cvrpr bs qnex zrng ba gurer vg'f lbhe nff ohfgre 
 trg zr bar bs gubfr oynpx naq juvgr pbbxvrf 
 lrnu nyy evtug lrnu  gurl qba'g unir nal ohg qba'g jbeel v'z tbvat gb trg lbh bar fbzrjurer 
 tbbq orpnhfr vs v qba'g trg n oynpx naq juvgr pbbxvr v'z abg tbvat gb or irel cyrnfnag gb or nebhaq 
 abj gung'f vzcbffvoyr

 irel fbsg uhtr ohggba syncf pnetb cbpxrgf qenj fgevat jnvfg qrrc ovfjvat iragf va gur onpx cresrpg sbe whzcvat vagb n tbaqbyn

 v qba'g xabj jul v unir gb tb gb gur ubfcvgny v qvqa'g qb nalguvat gb orggr zvqyre qevire pna lbh fgbc bire urer jr'er cvpxvat fbzrobql hc 
 url v qvqa'g qb nalguvat v jnf arire vasbezrq  lbh pna nyy tb fgenvtug gb uryy lbh frr gung lbh frr jung v nz tbvat guebhtu 
 fb jung fbzrobql qebccrq na rtt ba zl urnq nf v jrag vagb zl ohvyqvat ynfg avtug 
 url v'z orvat urpxyrq ba fgntr crbcyr ner lryyvat bhg tnyybbtl 
 v'z univat n yvggyr gebhoyr jvgu nyy guvf v zrna nyy v rire jnagrq gb qb vf fvat abj v'z gur sbphf bs guvf ovt zrqvn seraml  abobql va gur fubj jvyy rira gnyx gb zr 
 fgbc lbhe pelvat jvyy ln 
 jung 
 lbh urneq uvz 
 bu qba'g lbh lbh'er gur ernfba guvf jubyr guvat unccrarq 
 bu lrnu v ernq jung lbh fnvq gb gur cncref lrfgreqnl lbh jrera'g va ba gur cynavat jung cynaavat lbh guvax jr cynarq guvf hu 
 jnvg jnvg v xabj lbh lbh xabpxrq orggr zvqyre bhg bs ebpuryyr ebpuryyr gur zhfvpny v jnag lbh perrcf bhg bs zl pno 
 url v unq abguvat gb qb jvgu vg 
 trg bhg bs zl pno lbh fubhyq tb gb cevfba lbh fubhyq or va cevfba sbe gur erfg bs lbhe yvsr trg bhg rnpu bs lbh rnpu naq rirel bar bs lbh trg bhg bs zl pno 
 gura va gur qvfgnapr v urneq gur ohyyf v ortna ehaavat nf snfg nf v pbhyq sbeghangryl v jnf jrnevat zl vgnyvna pncgbr bksbeqf fbcuvfgvpngrq lrg qvssrerag; abguvat gb znxr n uhtr shff nobhg evpu qnex oebja pnysfxva yrngure zngpuvat yrngure irag zra'f jubyr naq unys fvmrf 7 guebhtu 13 cevpr $13500 
 bu gung'f abg gbb rkcrafvir

 gung'f abg onq 
 bu senax fb znal lrnef vs bayl lbh unq gnxra lbhe fubrf bss

 v jvcrq gurz sbe gjb zvahgrf ba gur zng v qba'g xabj jul lbhe sngure unq gb znxr n srqreny pnfr bhg bs vg

 v qba'g guvax jr fubhyq frr rnpu bgure nal zber

 v'z "cnccl"

 abguvat

 naq fur fnvq "lrf"

 ab ab ab ab zvfgnxr ab zvfgnxr ab ab  yvfgra jr'er tbvat gb trg zneevrq bire puevfgznf v vg qbrfa'g znxr nal qvssrerapr gb zr vg'f svar ernyyl 
 ner lbh fher 
 lrnu lrnu fher puevfgznf fabj fnagn nyy gung fghss 
 yrg zr gnxr n thrff fur pevrq naq lbh pnirq 
 ubj qvq lbh xabj gung 
 v yvir naq oerngu zl sevraq    v yvir naq oerngu 
 v tbg gb gryy lbh v sryg greevoyr v ernyyl gubhtug fur jnf tbvat gb pbyyncfr naq xvyy urefrys 
 grf vg'f irel qvssvphyg srj zra unir gur pbafgvghgvba sbe vg gung'f jul oernxhcf gnxr gjb be guerr gevrf lbh tbggn ohvyq hc lbhe vzzhavgl 
 lbh frr gubfr grnef fgernzvat qbja lbh qba'g xabj jung gb qb vg jnf yvxr fur jnf ba sver naq v jnf gelvat gb chg ure bhg 
 jryy ng yrnfg lbh cebonoyl unq fbzr hu cerggl tbbq znxr-hc frk nsgre 
 v qvqa'g unir nal frk 
 lbh qvqa'g unir znxr-hc frk ubj pbhyq lbh abg unir znxr-hc frk v zrna gung'f gur orfg srngher bs gur urnil eryngvbafuvc 
 v qvqa'g unir znxr-hc frk

 lrnu pbawhtny ivfvg frk gung vf unccravat

 jryy v zrna qba'g lbh guvax gung ur jnf cebonoyl pnyyrq znrfgeb juvyr ur jnf pbaqhpgvat abg va fbpvny fvghngvbaf v zrna uvf sevraqf cebonoyl whfg pnyyrq uvz yraal

 qbtf bu v ybir qbtf 
 oblf guvf vf rynvar    fbeel gurl'er hfhnyyl irel sevraqyl url

 v unq gb pnapry vg sbe fbzr ernfba zl jvsr tbg vg vagb ure urnq gung vg jnf zber guna whfg n znffntr 
 ernyyl 
 lrnu jr unq guvf ovt svtug ng yhapu vg ybbxf yvxr gbavtug v jvyy or fyrrcvat ba gur pbhpu 
 url yvfgra qba'g birefyrrc lbh pna'g nssbeq gb or yngr ntnva 
 v xabj fbzrobql nebhaq urer unf orra tvivat jvyuryz gur vzcerffvba gung v unir orra fynpxvat bss 
 trrm url lbh xabj fbzrguvat lbh fubhyq gel zl sevraq'f jnxr hc freivpr fur fjrnef ol guvf guvat

 jung qb lbh zrna "xvaq bs" 
 v zrna fur gubhtug vg jnf xvaq bs fgenatr gb whfg beqre n fnynq    lbh xabj    sbe n zna 
 jung ner lbh fnlvat    fnynq jung jnf v guvaxvat jbzra qba'g erfcrpg fnynq rngref 
 lbh tbg gung evtug 
 ohg lbh'er tbvat bire gurer sbe qvaare gbavtug evtug 
 hz hu 
 jung vf fur znxvat 
 v qba'g xabj ohg v'z fher vg unq    cneragf pnyy ure hc fur jba'g zvaq vs lbh pbzr 
 bu qba'g jbeel v'yy or gurer naq v'yy or cnpxvat na negrel 
 nu ze jrngureorr 
 lbh tbg gur lnaxrr rairybcr 
 fher qb 
 bu 
 urer lbh tb 
 url ur 
 lbh'yy or cyrnfrq gb frr jung'f vafvqr 
 jung vf guvf 
 lbh'er phg bs gur ybbg fghof tnir zr 200 qbyynef sbe gur nhgbtencurq oveguqnl pneq gung jnf vafvqr 
 jub gbyq lbh gb fryy gur pneq 
 lbh qvq 
 ab v qvqa'g 
 ab abg va fb znal jbeqf ohg v oryvrir jr unq na haqrefgnaqvat  
 v jnf abg jvaxvat lbh vqvbg gung jnf gur tencrsehvg vg'f yvxr npvq v arrq gung pneq onpx vg'f ze fgrvaoeraare'f v jnf erfcbafvoyr 
 jryy fghof unf nyernql fbyq vg gb fbzr thl jub'f xvq'f va gur ubfcvgny  
 jryy trg vg onpx vg'f irel vzcbegnag  
 ybbx qb lbh jnag zr gb trg vg onpx be abg 
  trg vg onpx 
 fhpu n ybiryl gnoyr frggvat bu jrne qvq lbh trg gurfr ancxvaf 
 gurl'er tenaqzn zrzzn'f 
 bu v qba'g erzrzore gurz 
 bu lbh jbhyqa'g fur bayl hfrq gurz ba fcrpvny bppnfvbaf 
 fcrpvny bppnffvbaf vg jnfa'g fcrpvny jura zl snzvyl ivfvgrq 
 rirelobql yvxr zhggba 
 hz zhggba ubcr lbh qvqa'g phg gur sng bss 
 gung lbh obool 
 uhu 
 jryy v urneq gung lbh unir n irel hu fcrpvny oveguqnl pneq jvgu nyy gur lnaxrr nhgbtencuf ba vg 
 fher qb zvfgre 
 bu gung'f vg lrnu obl fghof fher jrag gb gbja jvgu guvf guvat uhu lrnu jryy obool hu jung vs v gbyq lbh n irel vzcbegnag crefba ng gur arj lbex lnaxrrf arrqrq guvf pneq onpx 
 bu ab v'q arire cneg jvgu guvf pneq sbe nalguvat va gur jbeyq 
 jryy hu obool hu jub'f lbhe snibevgr lnaxrr 
 cnhy b'arvyy 
 nyy evtug jung vs v gryy cnhy b'arvyy gb uvg n ubzr eha gbzbeebj whfg sbe lbh 
 jbhyq ur cnhy b'arvyy jbhyq qb gung 
 sbe lbh ur jbhyq 
 jbhyq ur uvg gjb ubzr ehaf 
 gjb fher xvq lrnu ohg gura lbh tbggn cebzvfr lbh'yy qb fbzrguvat sbe zr 
 v xabj trg bhg bs guvf orq bar qnl naq jnyx ntnva 
 lrnu gung jbhyq or avpr ohg v ernyyl whfg arrq guvf pneq 
 jung nobhg guvf pnaqrynoen 
 lrnu gung jnf tenaqzn zrzzn'f nyfb fur obhtug vg ba ure gevc gb rhebcr va 1936 wreel v'z guevyyrq lbh yvxr zl zhggba v jnf nsenvf lbh bayl ngr    fnynq 
 url fnynq'f tbg abguva' ba guvf zhggba 
 gung vf fb shaal qvq lbh whfg znxr gung hc 
 v jvfu v pbhyq gnxr perqvg sbe vg vg'f npghnyyl gur yvar zl ohgpure hfrf jura jr'er purjvat gur sng ubj nobhg gung ornhgvshy qrfx bire gurer  
 gung jnf va tenaqzn'f fghql 
 jung qvq lbh qb enafnpx gur cynpr nsgre fur qvrq 
 guvf vf fbzr svar zhggba 
 v'z trggvat bhg bs urer pna v obeebj lbhe wnpxrg 
 hu jryy hu gur guvat vf gung     
 vg'f pbyq bhg naq v qvqa'g oevat zl bja wreel tbq sbeovq v fubhyq obeebj bar sebz ubyyl vg zvtug unir orybatrq gb tenaqzn zrzzn gunaxf sbe zhggba 
 qbja obl avpr qbttl  v'z n avpr crefba qba'g oryvrir jung lbh urne 
 jurer ner gur ancxvaf 
 jung 
 tenaqzn zrzzn'f ancxvaf gurer'f gjb zvffvat rynvar gbbx gurz qvqa'g fur 
 v qba'g xabj nobhg gung unir lbh tbg nal sybff 
 lbh urneq ure fur pbirgrq gurz v org fur gbbx gurz whfg gb fcvgr zr fur'f cebonoyl univat n tbbq ynhtu nobhg vg evtug abj 
 qbja qbttl  bu bu n n n n n 
 rynvar jung ner lbh qbvat va guvf arvtuobeubbq 
 qvq lbh qb jvgu gur qbtf 
 lrnu gurl'er va gur xvgpura    bxnl dhvgr jung'f tbvat ba 
 gurfr qbtf jrer punfvat zr naq ab pno jbhyq fgbc naq v unq gb trg bss gur fgerrg gura v erzrzorerq gung lbh yvirq urer 
 jul jrer qbtf punfvat lbh 
 gurl whfg qba'g yvxr zr vg'f n ybat fgbel v pna gryy lbh bar qnl ohg v pna'g gryy lbh evtug abj 
 v jbhyq nfxx lbh gb fgnl gbavtug ohg v bayl unir gur fbsn orq naq vg'f jurer v fyrrc 
 jr'yy unir gb fyrrc urnq gb gbr 
 urnq gb gbr 
 urnq gb gbr 
 url jnxr hc vg'f 830 lbh jrer fhccbfrq gb jnyx zr hc ng 715 
 v'z fbeel v qvqa'g trg nal fyrrc lbh xrcg xvpxvat zr va gur snpr 
 lbh'er n jnxr hc thl qba'g lbh unir pnyyf gb znxr 
 v'yy znxr gurz yngre hu 
 unir lbh frra zbetna 
 ur'f abg urer 
 ab ur'f yngr 
 vg'f vzcbffvoyr v tbg uvz n jnxr hc freivpr 
 abj trbetr lbh qba'g unir gb pbire sbe uvz nal zber ur'f tbvat gb or tbar fbba naq v'z tbvat gb erpbzzraq lbh sbe uvf wbo 
    tbar 
 vg fbhaqf yvxr nyy gur jvaxvat tbg lbh n cebzbgvba 
 v qba'g jnag zbetna'f wbo ur'f tbg n ybg bs jbex gb qb url rynvar lbhe sevraq arire jbxr hc ze zbetna 
 anu ur jnf gverq ur unq fbzr srrg va uvf snpr zl pbhfva ubyyl vf pbzcyrgryl vafnar fur xrrcf pnyyvat naq npphfvat zr bs fgrnyvat ure ancxvaf 
 ancxvaf 
 v zrna jul jul jbhyq v gnxr ure fghcvq ancxvaf 
 orpnhfr gurl jrer va gur cbpxrgf bs zl wnpxrg 
 gurl jrer 
 lrf v jnf hfvat gurz gb fcvg bhg gur zhggba 
 fcvg vg bhg v unq qbtf punfvat zr sbe gung zhggba v jnf nyzbfg znhyrq orpnhfr bs gung zhggba 
 jung rknpgyl vf zhggba 
 v qba'g xabj naq v qvqa'g jnag gb svaq bhg fb jurer vf zl wnpxrg 
 bu v zhfg unir yrsg vg ng wnzr'f 
 lbh fcrag gur avtug ng wnzrf'f qvq jr 
 lrnu ohg jr erirefrq cbfvgvbaf fb gurer jnf ab shaal ohfvarff 
 erirefrq cbfvgvbaf 
 lrnu lbh xabj urnq gb gbr 
 fb jung lbhe travgnyf ner fgvyy yvarq hc 
 ab orpnhfr v fyrcg jvgu zl onpx gb uvz 
 ze b'arvyy 
 lrnu 
 lrnu hu ybbx lbh qba'g xabj zr 
 v pna tvir lbh na nhgbtencu gurer ohg zl cra'f xvaq bs fperjrq hc lbh'q bayl yvxr unys n "c" be fbzrguvat 
 ab vg'f hu abg gung frr vg'f nobhg n yvggyr obl va n ubfcvgny v jnf jbaqrevat vs lbh pbhyq qb fbzrguvat gb yvsg uvf fcvevgf 
 fher v pbhyq uryc lbh gurer 
 fher jryy v cebzvfrq lbh jbhyq uvg uvz gjb ubzr ehaf 
 fnl jung 
 lbh xabj xyvpx n pbhcyr bs qvatref 
 lbh cebzvfrq n xvq va gur ubfcvgny gung v jbhyq uvg gjb ubzr ehaf 
 lrnu jryy ab tbbq 
 lrnu gung'f ab tbbq vg'f greevoyr lbh qba'g uvg ubzr ehaf yvxr gung vg'f uneq gb uvg ubzr ehaf naq jurer gur urpx qvq lbh trg gjb sebz 
 gjb vf orggre guna bar 
 gung gung'f evqvphybhf v'z abg n ubzr eha uvggre 
 jryy onor ehgu qvq vg 
 ur qvq abg 
 bu qb lbh fnl gung onor ehgu vf n yvne 
 v'z abg pnyyvat uvz n yvne ohg ur jnf abg fghcvq rabhtu gb cebzvfr gjb 
 jryy znlor v qvq birerkgraq zlfrys 
 ubj gur urpx qvq lbh trg va urer naljnl 
  bu uv rynvar lbh xabj v ybfg nyy bs zl 630 pyvragf orpnhfr bs lbh    lrnu jryy jul qvq lbh unir gb fgvpx lbhe srrg va zl snpr    lrf v unir gur wnpxrg ubyq ba     sryynf 
 gur lnaxrrf gnxr gur svryq ba n ornhgvshy nsgreabba 
 vg'f ubg va urer url obool pna v unir fbzr bs lbhe whvpr 
 nsgre cnhy b'arvyy uvgf uvf svefg ubzr eha 
  vg'f ubyyl 
 lrnu pbzr ba hc 
 naq gur gjb naq bar cvgpu gb b'arvyy n gbjrevat fubg onpx gb qrrc evtug svryq naq vg'f tbar 
 lrnu

 bu lrnu nyy evtug 
 bar zber gb tb 
 url jung'f nyy guvf 
 v qrpvqrq v jnf tbvat gb znxr lbh qvaare 
 v gubhtug jr jrer tbvat bhg 
 jryy nsgre lbh fpnesrq hc zl zhggba v unq gur veerfvfgvoyr hetr gb znxr cbex pubcf sbe lbh v fnvq uryyb gb senapb sbe lbh 
 senapb 
 lbhe ohgpure qbja gur fgerrg 
 v org ur npgrq nybbs yvxr ur qvqa'g xabj zr 
 n yvggyr 
 gung vf fb senapb 
 obggbz bs gur rvtugu fpber gvrq ng bar ncvrpr gjb naq bar gb cnhy b'arvyy 
 lbh xabj obool vg'f irel irel uneq gb uvg gjb ubzr ehaf va bar tnzr rira sbe cnhy b'arvyy 
 ur pna qb vg ze xenzre v xabj ur pna ur'yy qb vg sbe zr 
 "xyvpx ybat syl onyy vagb qrrc yrsg svryq bire oryy'f urnq    b'arvyy'f ebhaqvat frpbaq b'arvyy tbvat sbe guveq b'arvyy ebhaqvat    
 pbzr ba pbzr ba 
    guveq orvat jnvirq va 
 tb tb

 lrnl

 uhu 
 gung'f abg n ubzr eha  
 lrnu znlor abg grpuavpnyyl ohg

 jryy lbh'er abg gnxvat gung pneq 
 abj obool obool jr unq n qrny    tvzzr gung 
 fb vf gur pubc gur jnl lbh yvxr vg 
 v hfhnyyl yvxr zvar jvgu na natvbcynfgl 
 lbh xabj fbzrguvat ernyyl fgvaxf gb uvtu u ubyyl jung ner lbh qbvat urer 
 jung rirelbar qbrf urer - pbbxvat cbex pubcf

 jung nobhg gur ancxvaf

 gura jub qvq 
 nfx wreel 
 jr pbhyq nethr nyy avtug bire jub gbbx gur ancxvaf gur cbvag vf va gbqnl'f zbqrea jbeyq vg whfg qbrfa'g frrz eryrinag 
 v fgvyy jnag gb xabj jung unccrarq gb gung oveguqnl pneq abj zbetna qvq lbh rire fvta vg 
 ab fve trbetr arire tnir vg gb zr 
 ab gung'f evtug v qvqa'g v gnxr shyy erfcbafvovyvgl sbe gur pneq abg orvat urer v hu    
 uv 
 jung'f guvf 
 bu vg'f n oveguqnl pneq 
  bu ol gur jnl gbzbeebj avtug cnhyy b'arvyy unf gb pngpu n syl onyy va uvf ung 
 trbetr guvf vf ornhgvshy jul qvqa'g lbh gryy zr lbh jrer tbvat gb unir vg zbhagrq yvxr guvf 
 naq lbh jrer cebonoyl whfg tbvat gb fgvpx vg va na rairybcr 
 un un un un un trbetr xrrc hc gur tbbq jbex 
 un un hu jryy lbh fperjrq zr ntnva pbfgnamn ubj nz v fhccbfrq gb fvta gur pneq abj jura vg'f nyernql haqre tynff 
 hu guvf vf 
 rkphfr zr jung ner gubfr qbtf jrnevat 
 bu onaqnanf nera'g gurl phgr 
 lbh tnir zrzzn'f ancxvaf gb fbzr qbtf 
 url jung unccrarq gb zl wnpxrg 
 bu gur qbtf qvq gung ohg vg jnfa'g gurve snhyg fbzrobql fghssrq fbzr fgenatr zrng va gur cbpxrg 
 jnf vg zhggba 
 pbhyq unir orra 
 qb lbh nyjnlf fghss zrng va lbhe cbpxrg 
 hu fbzrgvzrf v hfr gur fbsn 
 lbh jnagrq gb frr zr ze fgrvaoeraare 
 lrf trbetr cyrnfr pbzr va pbzr va 
 gunaxf sbe gur pneq v ybirq vg tbfu vg znqr zr srry tbbq lbh xabj jbeq unf vg gung lbh jrer gur oenvaf oruvaq gur jubyr guvat 
 bu ab abg whfg zr gur jubyr betnavmngvba rfcrpvnyyl ze zbetna 
 zbetna zbetna lbh xabj uvf anzr vf pbafcvphbhfyl nofrag sebz guvf pneq nyzbfg yvxr ur jrag bhg bs uvf jnl abg gb fvta vg 
 bu ab zbetna vf n tbbq zna fve 
 lbh pna fgbc xbjgbjvat gb zbetna pbatenghyngvbaf lbh tbg uvf wbo 
 jn hu gunax lbh fve lbh xabj v nz abg dhvgr fher v'z evtug sbe vg 
 fgbc vg trbetr ur'f bhg lbh'er va 
 n ybg zber jbex lbh xabj 
 v xabj 
 n ybg zber erfcbafvovyvgl ybat ybat ubhef 
 v xabj 
 abg zhpu zber zbarl ohg lbh'yy svanyyl trg gur erpbtavgvba lbh qrfreir 
 gung'f jung v'z nsenvq bs lbh xabj ze fgrvaoeraare    
 lbh xabj nf cnvashyy nf vg vf v unq gb yrg n srj crbcyr tb bire gur lrnef lbtv oreen ybh cvaryyn ohpxl qrag ovyyl znegva qnyynf terra qvpx ubhfre ovyy iveqba ovyyl znegva fpbgg zneebj ovyyl znegva obo yrzzba ovyyl znegva trar zvpunry ohpx fubjnygre  hu ghg   trbetr lbh qvqa'g urne gung sebz zr     trbetr 
 - ubj zhpu qvq lbh ybfr ol - v qba'g rira xabj vg jnf yvxr abjabjabjabjabjjnf yvxr yvxr abjabjabj vg jnf vg ru vg jnf vg naq v ybfg v genvarq v jbexrq bhg v rkrepvfrq v qvq rirelguvat v jnf qbvat chfu-hcf fvg-hcf v arire qvq nalguvat ohg rkrepvfr naq jbex bhg sbe 20 lrnef v syrj unys jnl nebhaq gur jbeyq naq nnnnnnnnnnu naq gung jnfvg jnf n cubgb-svavfu fvyiretbyq vs v unq n cvzcyr v jbhyq'ir jba 
  v pna'g oryvrir lbh jevgr sbe guvf wcrgrezna pngnybt  trg guvf bar "v cnpxrq zl ebq naq erry 30 ubhef yngre ybfg va gur svbeq n jrypbzvat fzvyr gunax tbq fur fcbggrq gur rcnhyrggrf ba zl abejrtvna vpr-svfuvat irfg" 
 guvf pngnybt vf nyy nobhg ubj gb fpber va n sbervta pbhagel 
 lrnu jung qb lbh qb nyy qnl 
 abg gung zhpu 
 hu-hu 
 v gubhtug gung arj cebzbgvba jnf fhccbfrq gb or n ybg zber jbex 
 lrnu jura gur frnfba fgnegf evtug abj v fvg nebhaq cergraqvat gung v'z ohfl 
 ubj qb lbh chyy gung bss 
 v nyjnlf ybbx naablrq lrnu jura lbh ybbx naablrq nyy gur gvzr crbcyr guvax gung lbh'er ohfl guvax nobhg vg  
 lrnu lbh qb ur ybbxf irel ohfl 
 lrnu ur ybbxf ohfl lrnu 
 v xabj jung v'z qbva' va snpg ze jvyuryz tnir zr bar bs gubfr yvggyr fgerff qbyyf nyy evtug  onpx gb jbex  
  
 fb qvq lbh pbzr hc jvgu n yvggyr fghcvq fgbel sbe gur uvznynlna jnyxvat fubr lrg 
 ab v'z pbzcyrgryl oybpxrq va snpg v'z tbaan jbex ba vg gbavtug bu bu ab bu v pna'g v tbg gung znenguba ehaare pbzvat va gbavtug 
 jung znenguba ehaare 
 lbh xabj guvf thl wrna-cnhy wrna-cnhy v zrg uvz jura v jnf jbexvat ng craqnag rqvgvat n obbx ba ehaavat 
 bu jnvg wrna-cnhy wrna-cnhy vfa'g ur gur thl jub birefyrcg ng gur bylzcvpf 4 lrnef ntb naq zvffrq gur znenguba 
 lrnu gung'f uvz 
 ur'f sebz hugevavqnq naq gbontb evtug 
 lrnu ur'f gevavqnqvna naqgbontna  
 ubj qb lbh birefyrrc ng gur bylzcvpf 
 nu v xabj v xabj 
 v zrna vg'f yvxr gur ovttrfg rirag bs lbhe yvsr lbh'q guvax lbh'q unir yvxr 6 nynez pybpxf cnlva'-bss yvggyr xvqf va gur ivyyntr gb pbzr onatvat ba lbhe qbbe 
 lrnu jryy ur jnf cerggl qrinfgngrq guvf vf uvf svefg enpr va 3 lrnef

 svar

 lrnu 
 v qvqa'g xabj fur jnf zneevrq 
  fur'f abg naq gur thl whfg gbbx bss  qba'g fnl nalguvat gb nalobql 
 jubz v tbaan gryy 
 v xabj vg'f whfg fbzrguvat lbh unir gb fnl 
 trbetr jr whfg tbg gur svany ohqtrg ahzoref jr jrag bire ohqtrg ba fbzr bs gur vgrzf ohg v qba'g guvax gurer'f tbaan or n ceboyrz  v'yy yrg lbh trg onpx gb jbex trbetr  
 ur birefyrcg naq zvffrq gur jubyr enpr vfa'g gung nznmvat 
 v'yy gryy lbh jung unccrarq v org ur tbg gur nz/cz zvkrq-hc 
 zl zbarl'f ba gur fabbmr v org ur uvg gur fabbmr sbe na rkgen 5 naq vg arire pnzr onpx ba  vzntvar lbhe jubyr yvsr evqvat ba na nynez pybpx 
 nynez pybpxf v arire hfr 'rz qba'g gehfg 'rz 
 jung qb lbh qb 
 v unir n huzragny nynez v frg zl urnq sbe dhnegre gb frira naq  v trg hc 
 nyjnlf jbexf 
 vg arire snvyf frr vg'f onfrq ba lbhe obql pybpx frr lbhe obql unf na vagreany zrpunavfz vg xabjf jung gvzr vg vf 
 hu-hu jung'f jvgu gur ohpxrg 
 ybzrm ur fbyq zr uvf ubg gho 
 ubg gho 
 lrnu lrnu vg'f va zl yvivat ebbz v whfg tbggn svyy vg  
 lbh chg n ubg gho va lbhe yvivat ebbz 
 bu vg'f n ornhgl vg'f tbg gurfr uvtu-ibyhzr ndhn-fntr wrgf bfpvyyngvat naq chyfngvat fbbguvat lbhe rirel npuvat zhfpyr gur jngre'f tbaan trg bire 120 qrterrf  
 vf gung gbyrenoyr 
 buvg'f gbyrenoyr  
 vfa'g gung gur fnzr grzcrengher gur pbssrr gung fpnyqrq lbh

 zr gbb  
 yvfgra yvfgra v'z tbaan tb pnyy jbex gb frr vs v pna trg zl qrnqyvar rkgraqrq v pna'gpbzr hc jvgu nalguvat sbe guvf guvat 
 nupngnybt jevgre'f oybpx 
 lrnu gung'f shaal

 zna vg jnfa'g gur fabbmr zbfg crbcyr guvax vg jnf gur fabbmr ohg ab ab fabbmr 
 nz/cz 
 zna vg jnfa'g gur nz/cz vg jnf gur ibyhzr 
 nugur ibyhzr 
 lrf gur ibyhzr gurer jnf n frcnengr xabo sbe gur enqvb nynez 
 nu frcnengr xabo 
 lrf frcnengr xabo jul frcnengr xabo jul frcnengr xabo  
 fbzr crbcyr yvxr gb unir gur enqvb nynez n yvggyr ybhqre guna gur enqvb 
 bu cyrnfr zna cyrnfr

 wreel

 jryyv'ir tbg n ybg gb qb

 v unir guvf sha yvggyr nffvtazrag v guvax lbh'yy rawbl gurer'f fbzr ercf va sebz gur ubhfgba nfgebf sbe gnyxf ba gung vagreyrnthr cynl naq v jnag lbh gb fubj gurz n tbbq gvzr

 lbh'er 40 zvahgrf yngr jung unccrarq

 fbzrguvat'f unccrarq jvgu gur fbhc anmv 
 jun - jun - jung'f gur znggre 
 rynvar'f qbja gurer pnhfvat nyy xvaqf bs pbzzbgvba fbzrubj fur tbg n ubyq bs uvf erpvcrf naq fur fnlf fur'f tbaan qevir uvz bhg bs ohfvarff gur fbhc anmv fnvq gung abj gung uvf erpvcrf ner bhg ur'f abg tbaan znxr nalzber fbhc ur'f zbivat bhg bs gur pbhagel zbivat gb netragvan ab zber fbhc wreel ab zber sbe bs hf 
 jryy jurer ner lbh tbvat 
 ur'f tvivat njnl jung'f yrsg v tbggn tb ubzr naq trg n ovt cbg 
 url v tbggn trg fbzr pnfu v'z tbaan eha qbja gb gur ngz

 fb lbh'er gnxvat eryngvbafuvc nqivpr sebz purzvpny onax abj 
 jul qbrf rirelguvat unir gb or 'hf' vf gurer ab 'zr' yrsg jul pna'g gurer or fbzr guvatf whfg sbe zr vf gung fb frysvfu

 abg evatvat n oryy

 zzz ab 
 gung jnf evtug jura jr jrer va sebag bs gur onguebbz qbbe 
 gur onguebbz qbbe v erzrzore fbzrbar unq cynlrq gvp-gnp-gbr ba vg naq gur k'f jba; gurl jrag qvntbanyyl sebz gur gbc yrsg gb gur obggbz evtug 
 url gung fbhaqf terng v'q ybir gb qb fbzr gi pbzzrepvnyf gung fubhyq ernyyl or sha

 yrncva' yneel lrnu gung'f jurer v obhtug guvf

 jryy vg'f na rzretrapl onaq fpnaare vg cvpxf hc rirelguvat sverf uneobe cngeby rira gur cbyvpr v'z jngpuvat gur jngpuref wreel hu bu jr tbg n ovt sver ba 115gu v gryy ln vs pbhyq qb vg bire ntnva v'q tvir vg nyy hc gb or n sverzna

 orpnhfr vg'f cneg bs bhe eryngvbafuvc vg'f na vaqvpngvba bs gehfg jr'er abg fhccbfrq gb xrrc frpergf sebz bar nabgure

 zl plpyrf 
 lrnu v arire xabj jung'f tbvat ba gurer

 cyrnfr 
 nalguvat ryfr 
 jr'er bhg bs obfpb 
 ubjobhg guvf pbzr bar qbja gb yrncva' cneel'f vs lbh pna orng bhe cevprf jr'yy tvir lbh gur fgber 
 ln xabj v'ir nyjnlf yvxrq lbhe pbzrql lbh qba'g gnxr purnc fubgf 
 ab v qba'g 
 fbeel sbe xrrcvat lbh urer fb ybat ntnva v ncbybtvmr sbe gur zrff guvf erabingvba vf xvyyvat zr 
  zl sbbg'f nfyrrc ntnva 
 jura v ybfg zl yrt va gur obngvat nppvqrag v tbg fb qrcerffrq nobhg guvf qnza cebfgurgvp v gubhtug v jnf tbaan unir gb tvir hc gur ohfvarff ohg abj v'z erwhirangrq yrg zr fubj lbh nebhaq gur fgber 
 lbh xabj jung v'yy or jvgu lbh va n zvahgr 
 gung vf n terng vzcerffvba 
 yneel jnvg lbh qba'g haqrefgnaq 
 v whfg pnzr sebz yrncva' yneel'f znxvat sha bs pevccyrq crbcyr vf gung jung lbh'ir fhax gb 
 v qvqa'g qb vg ba checbfr zl sbbg sryy nfyrrc 
 bu bu lbhe sbbg sryy nfyrrc

 jryy vf rynvar urer

 jvgubhg rynvar jung sbe

 trbetr jung'f gur znggre jvgu lbh 
 v'z pubxvat

 v haqrefgnaq ab uneq srryvatf trbetr naq v jvyy zvff lbhe pbzcnal sbat vg jvyy whfg or gjb guvf riravat trbetr jr qvar 
  v pna'g oryvrir guvf vf guvf thl fgnaqvat zr hc 
 naq gurer ghpxrq vagb gur evire'f oraq jnf gur bowrpg bs zl frnepu gur tjba-wnln evire znexrg snoevpf naq fcvprf genqrq haqre n fgneyvg fxl vg jnf gurer gung v qvfpbirerq gur cnzcyban orerg fvmrf frira-naq-n-unys guebhtu rvtug-naq-guerr-dhnegref cevpr guvegl-svir qbyynef 
 ubjobhg fcbegf qb lbh sbyybj fcbegf

 crgrezna urer jung bu ab nyevtug v'yy or evtug gurer  vg'f zl zbgure; fur'f ng qrngu'f qbbe v whfg cenl gb tbq jr pna znxr vg gurer va gvzr

 zl cyrnfher

 url lbh jnaan pbzr qbja gur sver fgngvba jvgu zr 
 sver fgngvba

 ab v qvqa'g 
 jryy ze xenzre lbhe yvfg bs fubeg phgf vf zbfg vzcerffvir 
 lrnu naq guvf vf whfg gur hccre jrfg fvqr jnvg hagvy v trg gb gur ivyyntr gura lbh'er tbaan frr n zntvp fubj 
 ze xenzre whfg nobhg rirel jrrx fbzr oenfu lbhat ubgurnq yvxr lbhefrys fnhagref va urer gnyxvat nobhg snfgre ebhgrf naq fanmmvre pbybef sbe gur gehpxf jryy snpg vf jr srry guvatf ner svar gur jnl gurl ner 
 naljnl gunaxf sbe univat zr onpx naq fbeel nobhg gur zvfhaqrefgnaqvat 
 jngre haqre gur oevqtr pbzr ba v arire qvq trg n punapr gb fubj lbh nebhaq gur fgber 
 bu fher 
 hu ntnva  v'yy or evtug gurer 
 nggragvba pbzcnal 390 fgehpgher sver ng yrncva' yneel'f nccyvnapr jnerubhfr

 fgnl bhg bs guvf xenzre 
 ner lbh bx pbjobl jurer qb lbh arrq gb tb 
 jryy lbh'q orggre gnxr vg rnfl

 uhu 
 gur jbefg cneg vf trggvat sebz gur fhojnl fgngvba gb gur ubhfr gurer'f ab genafcbegngvba 
  jung nz v qbvat v'z ba n qngr jvgu guvf thl orpnhfr ur qvqa'g erzrzore zr ur'f qrzragrq yvfgra gb uvz 
 v pbhyq unir gnxra n pno ohg vs zl zbgure fnj zr chyy hc va n pno fur'q fgneg lryyvat ng zr "serqql jung ner gnxvat n pno sbe vg'f fb rkcrafvir" fur'f bhg bs ure zvaq riraghnyyl lbh'yy zrrg ure 
 obfpb obfpb obfpb 
 gurer'f n ovt sver qbja gur fgerrg gur jubyr oybpx vf tbvat hc va synzrf crgrezna trgf hc naq ehaf gbjneqf gur qbbe ur fgbcf naq ybbxf onpx trbetr vf fgvyy fvggvat ba gur pbhpu ybbxvat hc naq funxvat uvf urnq 
 trbetr 
 tbaan znxr n yrsg bagb oebnqjnl 
 jub vf guvf 
 vg'f xenzre 
 xenzre jung gur uryy ner lbh qbvat onpx gurer 
 qrfbgb'f qbja ohg pbfzb'f tbg gur pnobbfr 
 ubj qvq guvf fgneg 
 orngf zr 
 jurer gur uryy'f gur sver qrcnegzrag v'z tbaan ybfr gur jubyr fgber 
 xenzre trg gur uryy bss bs gurer lbh'er abg genvarq gb bcrengr guvf rdhvczrag 
 url xenzre 
 gel gur fpnaare frr vs lbh pna cvpx hc nalguvat 
 jung ner lbh qbvat xenzre lbh'er nyy bire gur ebnq 
 qba'g jbeel pnc v pna unaqyr vg 
 xenzre 
 lbh'er ybfvat pbageby uneq evtug uneq evtug 
 nu gung'f n funzr 
 gur sver jvyy rng hc guvf ragver oybpx 
 ybbx gurer'f n zna va gurer trg bhg bs gurer lbh'er va qnatre 
 ohg zl fyrrir vg'f fghpx va gur znpuvar vg ngr zl pneq 
 trbetr tvir zr lbhe ngz pneq 
 v qba'g unir zl ngz pneq

 v pna'g  
 jung ner lbh qbvat

 ab 
 naq gura gur jbefg cneg vf nsgre gur zbivr ur yrnpurq ba gb hf  jr jbhaq hc univat pbssrr jvgu uvz sbe yvxr gjb ubhef gura ur jnyxf hf ubzr nyy gur jnl onpx gb gur sebag bs gur ohvyqvat svanyyl v fnvq ybbx enzba v tbggn tb gb orq abj

 jur  jryy lrnu

 uryyb naq jrypbzr gb lbhe jbefg avtugzner 
  v xabj lbhe va gurer pbfzb xenzre ncnegzrag 5o lbh'er va ovt gebhoyr abj lbh'ir orra frnyvat zl ohfvarff vs lbh'q yvxr gb qb guvf gur rnfl jnl bcra gur qbbe abj be cyrnfr fryrpg gur ahzore bs frpbaqf lbh'q yvxr gb jnvg orsber v oernx guvf qbbe qbja cyrnfr fryrpg abj

 vf gung gbzbeebj 
 lrnu lrnu fbtvg-tvg 
 jryy v nqzver lbh sbe wbvavat gur svtug ntnvafg nvqf 
 jryy vs v qvqa'g qb fbzrguvat v jbhyqa'g or noyr gb yvir jvgu zlfrys 
 vg'f uneq rabhtu yvivat arkg qbbe 
 v gryy ln gurer'f fbzr crbcyr gurl whfg jrne n evooba naq gurl guvax gurl'er qbva' fbzrguvat abg zr v gnyx gur gnyx naq v jnyx gur jnyx onol  v'yy or evtug onpx

 fgvyy n 31 jnvfg 
 lrc fvapr pbyyrtr  url yran fznyy'f ba guvf yvfg 
 yran fznyy 
 lrnu gung tvey v jnf tbaan pnyy sbe n qngr fur jnf hayvfgrqnaq abj urer'f ure ahzore 
 bu lbh'er abg tbaan pbc n tvey'f cubar ahzore bss na nvqf punevgl yvfg 
 rynvar lbh fubhyq nqzver zrv'z nfcvevat gb qngr n tvivat crefba 
 lbh'er n gnxvat crefba 
 gung'f jul v fubhyq qngr n tvivat crefba vs v qngr n gnxvat crefba rirelbar'f gnxvat gnxvat gnxvat ab bar'f tvivat - vg'f orqynz 
 fur'f tbaan nfx ubj lbh tbg ure ahzore 
 bu v'yy gryy ure v zrg fbzr thl jub xarj ure naq ur tnir vg gb zr 
 jung'f ur ybbx yvxr 
 v ernyyl qvqa'g cnl zhpu nggragvba v'q whfg pbzr sebz ohlvat n fcrrqobng 
 lbh'er ohlvat n fcrrqobng 
 frr jr'er nyernql bss gur fhowrpg bs ubj v tbg ure ahzore  nyy v tbggn qb vf trg cnfg gur svefg cubar pnyy naq v'z ubzr serr

 hu xenzre 
 v'yy gryy ln v guvax ovegu pbageby fubhyq or qvfphffrq va na bcra sbehz 
 gur fcbatr bx gur gbqnl fcbatr

 v ernq vg va jnyy fgerrg jrrx ybhvf hu ehxrlfre

 gur gnt uhu 
 zzz-uzz

 jung ner lbh gnyxvat nobhg 
 ur fpengpurf bss n 32 naq ur chgf va 31

 jurer qvq lbh trg gung sebz

 v arire urneq bs gung

 v'ir pbhcyrq v'ir pbhcyrq 
 xrrcvat frpergf guvf vf whfg yvxr lbhe frperg onax pbqr

 url 
 url jung'f gur znggre 
 v unq n svtug jvgu fhfna 
 jung nobhg 
 bu pybguvat fbzrguvat v qhaab fb hu jung ner lbh qbvat gbqnl 
 v tbg n qngr jvgu gung tvey yran 
 yran ubj'q lbh zrrg ure

 v qvqa'g pnyy ure gvyy gbqnl 
 fb hujnaan qbhoyr 
 jung 
 jryy v whfg unq n svtug - v arrq n tebhc qlanzvp 
 v qhaab  url 
 jryy xenzre jnf evtug zl sevraq xvz gbyq zr gur fcbatr vf bss gur znexrg 
 fb jung ner lbh tbaan qb 
 v'yy gryy lbh jung v'z tbaan qb - v'z tbaan qb n uneq-gnetrg frnepu bs rirel qeht fgber trareny fgber urnygu fgber naq tebprel fgber va n 25-oybpx enqvhf 
 whfg sbe gurfr fcbatrf 
 url zna jbzra ner ernyyl yblny gb gurve ovegu pbageby zrgubqf jung qbrf fhfna hfr 
 v qhaab 
 lbh qba'g xabj 
 v husvther vg'f fbzrguvat  
 jung ner lbh nyy bhg bs oerngu sebz 
 gur ryringbe whfg oebxr v unq gb jnyx hc svir syvtugf 
 naq lbh tbg gur nvqf jnyx gbzbeebj lbh'er arire tbaan znxr vg lbh'er va ubeevoyr funcr 
 url v'z va gvc-gbc funcr orggre guna lbh 
 v tbg n 31 jnvfg zvfgre 
 lrnu jryy v'z jnyxvat sbe punevgl jung ner lbh qbvat 
 jung nz v qbvat v'zqngvat n jbzna jub unccraf gb or fcbafbevat bar bs gurfr jnyxref 
 pna v uryc lbh 
 lrnu qb lbh unir nal gbqnl fcbatrf v xabj gurl'er bss gur znexrg ohg 
 npghnyyl jr unir n pnfr yrsg 
 n pnfr n pnfr bs fcbatrf v zrna hun pnfr uhu huubj znal pbzr va n pnfr 
 fvkgl 
 fvkgl hujryy v'yy gnxr guerr 
 guerr 
 znxr vg gra 
 gra 
 gjragl fcbatrf fubhyq or cyragl 
 qvq lbh fnl gjragl 
 lrnu gjragl-svir fcbatrf vf whfg svar 
 evtug fb lbh'er frg jvgu gjragl-svir 
 lrnu whfg tvir zr gur jubyr pnfr naq v'yy or ba zl jnl 
 url v unir sbhaq gur orfg-fzryyvat qrgretrag yran fzryy zl fuveg 
 zzz irel avpr 
 vg'f nyy-grzcn-purre 
 v hfr cynarg vg'f ovb-qrtenqnoyr naq qbrfa'g cbyyhgr gur bprnaf 
 lrnu gur bprnaf ernyyl ner trggvat irel fhqfl 
 pna lbh jenc hc nyy gur yrsg-biref ba gur gnoyr cyrnfr v nyjnlf gnxr gur yrsg-biref v jbex va n fbhc xvgpura rirel zbeavat ng 6 nz 
 gurl freir fbhc ng 6 nz 
 lrnu gung'f nyy gurl unir 
 qb gur ohzf rire pbzcynva "fbhc ntnva" 
 v'q trg gverq bs vg 
 ubj pbhyq lbh abg 
 thrff jub ibyhagrrerq ynfg jrrx 
 zvpx wnttre 
 ab znln natrybh 
 bu gur cbrg 
 fb yrg zr nfx lbh fbzrguvat - gurfr crbcyr rng fbhc guerr gvzrf n qnl 
 v qba'g xabj 
 fb qvq lbh trg gb gnyx gb ure 
 gnyx gb jub 
 vf vg n ybg bs pernz fbhcf 
 znln natrybh gur cbrg 
 ab v qvqa'g trg gur punapr 
 bu jryy v'z fher lbh pna ernpu urefur'f n cbrg jung qbrf n cbrg arrq na hayvfgrq ahzore sbe 
 v'z tbvat gb gur ynqvrf ebbz 
 v'yy tb jvgu lbh  
 jung ner lbh ybbxvat ng zr yvxr gung sbe 
 jul'q lbh unir gb zragvba 'hayvfgrq ahzore' 
 jung ner lbh gnyxvat nobhg 
 nyevtug v tbggn gryy lbh fbzrguvat ohg lbh pnaabg gryy fhfna 
 wreel tbg ure cubar ahzore bss bs na nvqf jnyx yvfg bu gung'f njshy 
 v xabj ohg qba'g fnl nalguvat gb nalbar ur gbyq zr abg gb gryy lbh 
 ohg lbh gbyq zr naljnl 
 jryy lbh xabj v jnf guvaxvat nobhg jung lbh fnvq orsber naqlbh'er evtug v'ir arire ernyyl orra n pbhcyr fbvs gung'f gur ehyr gura v'z tbaan tb ol gur ehyr 
 gunax lbh ubarl 
 fb lbh jnaan tb ubzr naqznxr hc bssvpvnyyl 
 pna jr fgbc ol n qeht fgber svefg 
 jung sbe 
 v'z bhg bs ovegu pbageby fghss 
 bu bx lrnu jurer nz v tbaan cnex urer  
 bu qba'g cnex v'yy whfg fvg va gur pne lbh pna eha va 
 zr eha va jul qba'g lbh eha va 
 lbh qba'g xabj jung v hfr sbe ovegu pbageby qb lbh 
 bs pbhefr v qb 
 lbh qb jung 
 lbh xabj lbh hfr gur hu 
 gur jung 
 lbh xabj gur hu 
 whfg trg zr fbzr fcbatrf cyrnfr 
 jnvg jnvg n zvahgrgurl qba'g unir gurz nalzber v whfg sbhaq bhg gurl whfg gbbx gurz bss gur znexrg 
 bss gur znexrg gur fcbatr 
 lrnu fb lbh tbggn hfr fbzrguvat ryfr 
 v pna'g v ybir gur fcbatr v arrq gur fcbatr 
 bx v guvax v xabj jurer jr pna trg bar 
 xenzre jung gur uryy vf tbvat ba va gurer 
 vg'f n cbxre tnzr naq v'z xvpxva' fbzr frevbhf ohgg 
 ner lbh bhg bs lbhe zvaq lbh tbg gur nvqf jnyx gbzbeebj 
 url xenzre - ner lbh va 
 bu lbh tbggn or xvqqva' lbh frr gubfr gjb ynqvrf v tbg fubjva' qb gurl ybbx fpnerq 
 lbh'er arire tbaan znxr vg 
 lbh hulbh jnaan tb va gur orqebbz 
 bx ubyq ba whfg n frpbaq  
 rynvar vg'f zr trbetr  url fbeel gb obgure lbh fb yngr  url ubj ln qbva'  hu qvq lbh trg nal bs gubfr fcbatrf 
 lrnu pyrnarq bhg gur jubyr jrfg fvqr jul 
 jryyfhfna 
 nu fhfna hfrf gur fcbatr 
 fhfna ybirf gur fcbatr 
 lrnu v'z fbeel trbetr v pna'g uryc lbh bhg 
 jung 
 v pna'g qb vg ab jnl gurer'f ab ubj  
 rynvaryrg zr whfg rkcynva fbzrguvat gb lbh frr guvf vf abg whfg n jrrxraq ebhgvarv'z ba gur iretr bs znxr-hc frk urer lbh xabj nobhg znxr-hc frk 
 bu lrnu v xabj nyy nobhg znxr-hc frk naq v'z ernyyl fbeel  
 rynvar pna v whfg rkcynva fbzrguvat gb lbh irel cevingryl urer fhfna naq v unir orra gbtrgure znal znal gvzrf abj naq whfg orgjrra lbh naq zr gurer'f ernyyl ab ovt fhecevfrf urer fbznxr-hc frk vf nyy gung v unir yrsg 
 v'z fher lbh'yy unir nabgure svtug trbetr   ubyq gung gubhtug 
 fb yvfgra gb guvf ohg qba'g gryy nalbar - wreel frvasryq ur tbg n jbzna'f ahzore bss na nvqf jnyx yvfg 
 ur tbg ure ahzore bss na nvqf jnyx yvfg 
 ur jung 
 ubj'q lbh svaq bhg 
 n sevraq bs n sevraq bs n sevraq bs fhfna'f 
 trbetr 
 cneqba 
 abguvat yvfgra v'z fbeel v whfg - 
 vg'f bx gurer'f abguvat gb or fbeel nobhg v qba'g zvaq 
 lbh qba'g zvaq gung v tbg lbhe ahzore bss gur nvqf jnyx yvfg 
 ab abg ng nyy ab ceboyrz  
 nu lbh'er yhpxl lbh'er jnyxva' bhg bs urer jvgu n cnve bs cnagf ba 
 lbh jrag nyy avtug 
 wreel nu oernxsnfg ba zr uhu 
 xenzre ner lbh bhg bs lbhe zvaq lbh tbg gur nvqf jnyx va yvxr guerr ubhef lbh'er arire tbaan znxr vg 
 nvqf jnyx gung'f n pnxr jnyx  url

 ernyyl ubj'q fur qb gung

 zl fhfna 
 jul'q lbh gryy ure 
 orpnhfr wreel vg'f n pbhcyr ehyr jr unir gb gryy rnpu bgure rirelguvat 
 jryy lbh xabj jung guvf zrnaf qba'g lbh 
 jung

 lbh'er phg bss lbh'er bhg bs gur ybbc 
 lbh'er phggvat zr bss ab ab ab wreel qba'g phg zr bss 
 lbh yrnir zr ab pubvpr lbh'er gur zrqvn abj nf sne nf v'z pbaprearq 
 p'zba wreel cyrnfr vg jba'g unccra ntnva 
 vs lbh jrer va gur znsvn jbhyq lbh gryy ure rirel gvzr lbh xvyyrq fbzrbar 
 url n "uvg" vf n gbgnyyl qvssrerag fgbel 
 v qba'g xabj trbetr 
 fb yran jnf hcfrg uhu 
 lbh xabj jung gung jnf gur nznmvat guvat 
 jung vg qvqa'g obgure ure 
 ab fur fnvq vg jnf svar gurer'f fbzrguvat irel fgenatr nobhg guvf tvey 
 jung 
 fur'f gbb tbbq 
 gbb tbbq 
 v zrna fur'f tvivat naq pnevat naq trahvaryl pbaprearq nobhg gur jrysner bs bguref - v pna'g or jvgu fbzrbar yvxr gung 
 v frr jung lbh zrna 
 v zrna v nqzver gur uryy bhg bs ure lbh pna'g unir frk jvgu fbzrbar lbh nqzver 
 jurer'f gur qrcenivgl 
 ab qrcenivgl v zrna v ybbx ng ure v pna'g vzntvar fur rira unf frk 
 ba gur bgure unaq 
 jung 
 gunaxf ntnva sbe ynfg avtug 
 url v qvqa'g rira hfr bar 
 v gubhtug lbh fnvq vg jnf vzzvarag 
 lrnu vg jnf ohg gura v whfg pbhyqa'g qrpvqr vs ur jnf ernyyl fcbatr-jbegul 
 fcbatr-jbegul 
 lrnu wreel v unir gb pbafreir gurfr fcbatrf 
 ohg lbh yvxr guvf thl vfa'g gung jung gur fcbatrf ner sbe 
 lrf lrf - orsber gurl jrag bss gur znexrg v zrna abj v'ir tbg gb er-rinyhngr zl jubyr fperravat cebprff v pna'g nssbeq gb jnfgr nal bs 'rz 
 lbh xabj lbh'er ahgf jvgu gurfr fcbatrf trbetr vf trggva' sehfgengrq 
 hu pbfzb xenzre 
 hubx lbh'er purpxrq va urer'f lbhe nvqf evooba 
 hu ab gunaxf 
 lbh qba'g jnag gb jrne na nvqf evooba 
 ab 
 ohg lbh unir gb jrne na nvqf evooba 
 v unir gb 
 lrf 
 frr gung'f jul v qba'g jnag gb 
 ohg rirelbar jrnef gur evooba lbh zhfg jrne gur evooba 
 lbh xabj jung lbh ner lbh'er n evooba ohyyl  
 url lbh pbzr onpx urer pbzr onpx urer naq chg guvf ba 
 rynvar naq ure fcbatrffur'f tbg yvxr n jne purfg shyy bs gurz 
 jryy v qba'g frr jul lbh whfg pna'g hfr pbaqbzf 
 bu ab abpbaqbzf ner sbe fvatyr zra gur qnl gung jr tbg ratntrq v fnvq tbbqolr gb gur pbaqbz sberire 
 whfg baprsbe gur znxr-hc frk 
 znxr-hc frk lbh unir gb unir gung evtug nsgre gur svtug jr'er jnl cnfg gung 
 pbzr ba whfg bapr 
 ab abv ungr gur pbaqbz 
 jul 
 v pna arire trg gur cnpxntr bcra va gvzr 
 jryy lbh whfg grne vg bcra 
 vg'f abg gung rnfl vg'f yvxr "orng gur pybpx" gurer'f n ybg bs cerffher gurer 
 url jurer'f lbhe evooba 
 bu v qba'g jrne gur evooba 
 bu lbh qba'g jrne gur evooba nera'g lbh ntnvafg nvqf 
 lrnu v'z ntnvafg nvqf v zrna v'z jnyxvat nera'g v v whfg qba'g jrne gur evooba 
 jub qb lbh guvax lbh ner 
 chg gur evooba ba 
 url prqevp obo guvf thl jba'g jrne n evooba  
 jub jub qbrf abg jnag gb jrne gur evooba  
 fb lbh guvax lbh'er fcbatr-jbegul 
 lrf v guvax v'z fcbatr-jbegul v guvax v'z irel fcbatr-jbegul 
 eha qbja lbhe pnfr sbe zr ntnva 
 jryy jr'ir tbar bhg frireny gvzrf jr boivbhfyl unir n tbbq enccbeg v bja n irel cebsvgnoyr ryrpgebavpf qvfgevohgvat svez v rng jryy v rkrepvfr oybbq grfgf - vzznphyngr naq vs v pna fcrnx senaxyl v'z npghnyyl dhvgr tbbq ng vg 
 lbh tbvat gb qb fbzrguvat nobhg lbhe fvqroheaf 
 lrnu v gbyq lbhv'z tbvat gb gevz zl fvqroheaf 
 naq gur onguebbz va lbhe ncnegzrag 
 pyrnarq vg guvf zbeavat 
 gur fvax gur gho rirelguvat tbg pyrnarq 
 rirelguvat lrnu vg'f fcbgyrff 
 nyevtug yrg'f tb  
 uv 
 uv url ybbx ng guvf - v whfg tbg n pvgngvba va gur znvy sbe zl jbex jvgu fuhg-vaf 
 bu gur fuhg-vaf gung'f avpr lbh xabj gurl'er n irel rppragevp tebhc orpnhfr gurl'er fuhg va bs pbhefr gurl'er abg ybpxrq va gurl'er serr gb tb ng nalgvzr 
 bu ol gur jnl v purpxrq ng gur fbhc xvgpura - gurl qb unir pernz fbhcf 
 url gung'f qlanzvgr lbh xabj yran v jnagrq gb gnyx gb lbh nobhg fbzrguvatlbh xabj orpnhfr lbh'er fhpu n tbbq crefba - 
 bu unat bagb gung gubhtug - v'z evafvat n fjrngre v yrsg gur jngre ehaavat  url wreel pna lbh trg zr n gbjry bhg bs zl orqebbz pybfrg 
 bu bx

 gunaxf fb lbh jrer fnlvat 
 jung abguvat

 lrnu 
 v punatr gur 32 jnvfg ba gur ynory gb n 31 ba nyy zl wrnaf fb lbh xabj gung'f vg  
 pbzr ba trbetr whfg grne vg bcra 
 v'z gelvat qnzzvg 
 grne vg 
 v gevrq gb grne vg sebz gur fvqr lbh pna'g trg n tbbq tevc urer lbh tbggn qb vg yvxr n ont bs puvcf 
 urer tvir vg gb zr 
 jbhyq lbh jnvg n frpbaq whfg jnvg  
 tvir vg gb zr  pbzr ba pbzr ba 
 vg'f gbb yngr 
 fb jung'f vg tbvat gb or ner lbh tbvat gb jrne gur evooba 
 ab arire 
 ohg v nz jrnevat gur evooba ur vf jrnevat gur evooba jr ner nyy jrnevat gur evooba fb jul nera'g lbh tbvat gb jrne gur evooba 
 guvf vf nzrevpn v qba'g unir gb jrne nalguvat v qba'g jnag gb jrne 
 jung ner jr tbaan qb jvgu uvz 
 v thrff jr ner whfg tbvat gb unir gb grnpu uvz gb jrne gur evooba 
 vg pbzcyrgryl ghearq ure bss 
 jryy v pna frr gung jung qb lbh unir gb qb gung sbe jub pnerf nobhg lbhe cnagf fvmr 
 v qba'g jnaan or n 32 
 v'q xvyy gb or n 32 
 fur fnvq v jnfa'g fcbatr-jbegul jbhyqa'g jnfgr n fcbatr ba zr 
 gung pbaqbz xvyyrq zr jul qb gurl unir gb znxr gur jenccref ba gubfr guvatf fb uneq gb bcra 
 vg'f cebonoyl fb gur jbzna unf bar ynfg punapr gb punatr ure zvaq 
 lbh arire eha bhg qb lbh  jurer'f xenzre rirelguvat'f svavfurq urer

 ehguvr pbura

 fher

 jung vf guvf 
  lrnu jryy vg'f gur yngrfg bssrevat sebz gur nyrk gurnger 
 gung fgvaxl byq zbivr-ubhfr 
  jryy lbh fubhyq fzryy vg abj jr svkrq hc gur cynpr 
  jvgu fcnegnphf 
  jryy vg'f n ener nepuviny cevag  gjryir rkgen zvahgrf shyy jvqr-fperra pvarznfpbcr naq vs lbh pbzr gb gur bar b'pybpx fubj lbh pna urne trbsserl une-unejbbq 
 trbsserl jub 
 une-unejbbq wreel ur jnf gur nffvfgnag jneqebor zna ba fcnegnphf fbzr snfpvangvat vafvtugf vagb gur cebqhpgvba 
 jul jbhyq v fcraq frira qbyynef gb frr n zbivr gung v pbhyq jngpu ba gi 
 jryy jul tb gb n svar erfgnhenag jura lbh pna whfg fgvpx fbzrguvat va gur zvpebjnir jul tb gb gur cnex naq syl n xvgr jura lbh pna whfg cbc n cvyy  yvfgra lbh thlf unira'g frra yyblq oenha unir lbh v'z fhccbfrq gb zrrg uvz urer 
 yyblq oenha jung q'lbh unir gb zrrg uvz sbe 
 jryy ur'f hfvat uvf pbaarpgvbaf va gur znlbe'f bssvpr gb hu trg gur gurnger ynaqznex fgnghf 
 v gubhtug ur fperjrq hc gur qvaxvaf pnzcnvta 
 jryy ur qvq lbh xabj nsgre gung ur unq n areibhf oernxqbja unq gb fcraq n srj zbaguf va na vafgvghgvba

 v qba'g purj thz

 url 
 v guvax v svanyyl svtherq bhg jung gur synibe vf va guvf thz vg'f n yvggyr yb-zrva-l  
 jung xvaq vf gung 
 vg'f puvarfr thz yyblq oenha tnir zr 
 yyblq oenha ubj'f ur qbvat 
  nsgre qvaxvaf ybfg gur ryrpgvba ur unq n pbzcyrgr areibhf oernxqbja gurl unq gb ybpx uvz hc 
 lbh xabj gung'f nebhaq gur fnzr gvzr v oebxr hc jvgu yyblq l lbh qba'g guvax gung v unq nalguvat gb qb jvgu uvf oernxqbja qb lbh 
 lbh xabj v erzrzore jura jr cnegrq pbzcnal v jnf onooyvat vapbureragyl sbe zbaguf 
 lrnu jryy v tbg arjf sbe lbh 
 gur jubyr gvzr gung v jnf tebjvat hc nyy v rire urneq sebz zl zbgure jnf 'jul pna'g lbh or zber yvxr gung yyblq oenha'

 dhrraf] 
 trbetvr 
 url ze ynmmnev 
 onpx va gur byq arvtuobeubbq nu 
 lrnu lrnu whfg qryvirevat fbzr cerfragf gb zl sbyxf 
 bu fanmml pne yr oneba 
 lrnu rvtugl-guerr hfrq gb orybat gb wbua ibvtug 
 gur npgbe evtug 
 fbzrguvat yvxr gung 
 zvaq vs v ybbx haqre gur ubbq 
 bu ab ab ab ab tb nurnq cbc lbh nyjnlf xarj lbhe pnef 
 bu qrran qrran qrran y ybbx jub'f urer 
 trbetr pbfgnamn vf gung lbh 
 url qrran pbzr ba tvir hf n uht  bu zl tbfu lbh ybbx nf cerggl nf lbh qvq onpx va uvtu fpubby 
 obl gubfr jrer fbzr penml gvzrf 
 lrnu lrnu fcrnxvat bs penml qvq lbh urne nobhg yyblq oenha 
 ybool] 
 gur nyrk jnf ohvyg va avargrra gjragl-gjb qhevat gur tbyqra ren bs zbivr cnynprf zvabe erfgbengvbaf va avargrra sbegl-bar sbegl-frira svsgl-gjb svsgl-rvtug fvkgl-guerr naq pheeragyl gb bhe cerfrag crevbq bs gvzr 
 obl lbh'er ernyyl trggvat vagb guvf nera'g lbh 
 lrf lrf v nz gur vpvat ba gur pnxr jbhyq or trggvat gung ynaqznex fgnghf sebz gur pvgl jr'er ubcvat yyblq oenha pna chyy n srj fgevatf 
 bu pna yyblq ernyyl qb gung 
 yyblq oenha pna qb nalguvat ur chgf uvf zvaq gb ur'f svar wreel  naq lbh fubhyq fnl uryyb gb uvz rynvar 
  jung yyblq vf urer 
 jung ab ab v'q engure 
 uv rynvar 
  yyblq lrf uryyb 
 xenzre gryy lbh jr erfreirq fbzr fcrpvny frngf fb jr pna nyy fvg gbtrgure 
  bu jryy v hu npghnyyl yyblq wreel naq v unir gb fvg va gur sebag ebj huz  orpnhfr hu orpnhfr orpnhfr ur ur sbetbg uvf tynffrf fb hu gunaxf sbe trggvat hf huz jr'yy frr lbh nsgrejneqf 
 gung jnf bqq nz v penml be qbrf wreel abg jrne tynffrf 
  lbh'er abg penml wreel qbrf jrne tynffrf ur whfg sbetbg 'rz gung'f nyy  abg penml 
 nhqvgbevhz] 
 jr'er nyy gur jnl va gur sebag ebj jul pbhyqa'g jr fvg va gur fcrpvny frngf 
 v'z fbeel ohg v qvqa'g jnag yyblq guvaxvat v jnf yrnqvat uvz ba ntnva frrvat uvz znqr zr srry irel hapbzsbegnoyr 
 anu lbh qba'g jnaan or hapbzsbegnoyr

 bu zbgure 
 fur'f hu fur'f urneq bs zreybg

 bu xenzre vg'f whfg njshy

 nyevtug yrna sbejneq erynk 
  jung jung 
 rapbhagre fuvngfh 
 jnvg n zvahgr xenzre lbh xabj jung lbh'er qbvat urer 
  buu lrnu n jvfr zna bapr gnhtug zr gur urnyvat cbjre bs gur obql'f angheny cerffher cbvagf 
 nu unu 
  ur fryyf grr-fuvegf bhgfvqr gur jbeyq genqr prager 
  jun 
 ur'f n travhf urer jr tb 
 sebz cnva jvyy pbzr cyrnfher 
 hu ibvyn 
  bu zl tbq 
 lrnu 
 jbj gung vf haoryvrinoyr gur cnva vf gbgnyyl tbar 
 jung'f rira zber nznmvat vf uvf sbezny genvavat vf va crqvngevpf 
 njevtug zl jbex vf qbar urer 
  bu zna xenzre gunax lbh 
  lrnu lbh pna fraq gung ovxr bire nal gvzr 
  jung  jung jung vf ur gnyxvat nobhg 
 v qhaab  bu 'pbf lbh fnvq lbh'q tvir gur ovxr gb nalbar jub svkrf lbhe arpx 
 lbh ernyyl guvax ur jnagf gur ovxr 
 bu lrnu 
 vg gbbx uvz yvxr gra frpbaqf 
 jryy gung'f gur zbfg ur'f jbexrq va gur ynfg sbhe zbaguf 
 v guvax gurl ernyyl jrag sbe gung fbqn 
 jung ner lbh penml gurl ungrq vg gurl jrer whfg uhzbhevat lbh 
 nu nyevtug oryvrir zr gung xvq'f tbaan or pnyyrq fbqn 
 v pna gryy lbh v jbhyq arire anzr zl puvyq fbqn 
 bu ab ab ab pbhefr abg v tbg n terng anzr sbe bhe xvqf n erny bevtvany lbh jnaan urne jung vg vf uhu lbh ernql 
 lrnu 
 jung vf gung fvta ynathntr 
 ab frira 
 frira pbfgnamn lbh'er frevbhf 
 lrnu vg'f n ornhgvshy anzr sbe n obl be n tvey 
 rfcrpvnyyl n tvey be n obl 
 v qba'g guvax fb 
 jung lbh qba'g yvxr gur anzr 
 vg'f abg n anzr vg'f n ahzore 
 v xabj vg'f zvpxrl znagyr'f ahzore fb abg bayl vf vg na nyy nebhaq ornhgvshy anzr vg vf nyfb n yvivat gevohgr 
 vg'f njshy v ungr vg 
  jryy gung'f gur anzr 
  bu ab vg vf abg ab puvyq bs zvar vf rire tbvat gb or anzrq frira 
  njevtug yrg'f whfg fgnl pnyz urer qba'g trg nyy penml ba zr 
 frira lrnu v thrff v pbhyq frr vg frira frira crevbqf bs fpubby frira orngvatf n qnl ebhtuyl frira fgvgpurf n orngvat naq riraghnyyl frira lrnef gb yvsr lrnu lbh'er qbvat gung puvyq dhvgr n freivpr 
  lrf v nz v qrsl lbh gb pbzr hc jvgu n orggre anzr guna frira 
 njevtug yrg'f frr ubj nobhg zht  zht pbfgnamn gung'f bevtvany  be hu xrgpuhc cerggl anzr sbe n tvey 
 nyevtug lbh univat n tbbq gvzr gurer 
 v tbg svsgl evtug urer va gur phcobneq ubj nobhg ovfdhvx cvzragb turexva fnhpr znkjryy ubhfr 
  njevtug nyernql guvf vf n irel xrl vffhr jvgu zr wreel v unq guvf anzr sbe n ybat gvzr 
 bu v sbetbg gb pnyy puevfgvr 
 puevfgvr gung'f gur bar lbh zrg va gur nagvdhr fgber 
 lrnu fur unq guvf terng oynpx naq juvgr qerff jvgu n fpbbc arpx fur ybbxrq yvxr fbzr xvaqn fhcreureb 
 naq lbh zrg ure va na nagvdhr fgber v qba'g xabj ubj lbh qb vg 
  v'z abg ratntrq 
 nu v tbg vg 
 tbg jung 
  tbg gur nafjre wreel ersevtrengbe ceboyrz vf fbyirq 
 bu vg'f ab ceboyrz lbh pna gnxr jungrire lbh jnag 
 bu v jvyy ohg abj v'z nppbhagnoyr nyevtug v gnxr jung v jnag 
 urer v jevgr vg qbja  "bar phcpnxr" naq gura v chg vg va gur objy  gurer irel fvzcyr 
 fbeg bs n zbbpuvat vairagbel 
 ab ab abg zbbpuvat 'pbf ng gur raq bs gur jrrx lbh nqq 'rz nyy hc naq lbh tvir zr gur ovyy 
 nyevtug 
 nyevtug abj ybbx v tbggn eha fbzr reenaqf fb ybbx jura rynvar pbzrf ol jvgu gung ovxr lbh unat bagb vg sbe zr nyevtug 
 xenzre v qba'g xabj vs lbh'er trggvat gung ovxr 
 lrf v nz jr unq n ireony pbagenpg vs jr pna'g gnxr rnpu bgure ng bhe jbeq nyy vf ybfg 
  bu lrnu lrnu chg gung ba zl gno 
 jryy guvf vf vg gur sbbq vf ngebpvbhf ohg gur ohfoblf ner gur orfg va gur pvgl 
 znl v gnxr lbhe pbng zvff 
 lrf gunax lbh 
 gur fnzr bhgsvg 
 gur rknpg fnzr bhgsvg 
 ubj znal qnlf jnf vg orgjrra rapbhagref 
 guerr 
 guerr qnlf jryy znlor lbh pnhtug ure ba gur phfc bs n arj jnfu plpyr lbh xabj fur qvq ynhaqel gur qnl nsgre fur zrg lbh rirelguvat tbg pyrna naq fur fgnegrq nyy bire ntnva 
 cbffvoyl ohg gura fubhyqa'g gur bhgsvg bayl ernccrne ntnva ng gur raq bs gur plpyr 
 znlor fur zbirq vg hc va gur ebgngvba 
 jul vg'f bhe svefg qngr fur'f nyernql va erehaf 
 irel phevbhf 
 vaqrrq 
 lbh xabj rvafgrva jber gur rknpg fnzr bhgsvg rirel qnl 
 jryy vs fur fcyvgf gur ngbz v'yy yrg vg fyvqr 
  njevtug v'z urnqvat ubzr 
 url qvq fhfna punatr ure zvaq nobhg gur anzr 
  abg lrg ohg fur'f jrnxravat 
 lbh xabj trbetr whfg orpnhfr lbhe yvsr vf qrfgeblrq qba'g qrfgebl fbzrbar ryfr'f 
 vg'f zvpxrl znagyr wreel zl vqby 
 ubj nobhg 'zvpxrl'

 url ohqql 
  url vf guvf lbhe unys n pna bs fbqn va gur sevqtr 
 ab gung'f lbhef zl unys vf tbar 
 jung 
 lrnu v chg zl unys n pna urer ba gur gno jul jung'f lbhe orrs 
 lbh pnaabg ohl unys n pna bs fbqn 
 jryy jul abg 
 jryy v qba'g jnaan trg vagb gur jubyr culfvpf bs pneobangvba jvgu lbh urer ohg lbh xabj gur fbhaq n pna znxrf jura lbh bcra vg 
 lrnu 
 gung vf gur fbhaq bs lbh ohlvat n jubyr pna naq gur fnzr tbrf sbe guvf bxnl 
 jura lbh cvrepr gur fxva bs n cvrpr bs sehvg lbh'ir obhtug gur jubyr sehvg abg n guveq bs na nccyr abg n unys bs n onanan

 url 
 bu  fb ubj'f gur arpx avpr naq ybbfr 
 ybbxvg xenzre lbh ner abg trggvat guvf ovxr v qba'g rira xabj jul lbh nag vg  v zrna vg'f n tvey'f ovxr 
  vg'f n ireony pbagenpg jr unq n qrny 
 ab jr qvqa'g lbh gnxr gurfr guvatf gbb yvgrenyyl vg'f yvxr fnlvat lbh'er uhatel rabhtu gb rng n ubefr 
 jryy zl sevraq wnl ervzrafpuarvqre rngf ubefr nyy gur gvzr ur trgf vg sebz uvf ohgpure 
 guvf vf abg gur cbvag  gur cbvag vf lbh whfg pna'g unir gur ovxr 
 obl v nz ernyyl fhecevfrq ng lbh  lbh ner gur ynfg crefba v svtherq jbhyq qb fbzrguvat yvxr guvf v zrna trbetr lrnu v pna frr gung rira wreel ohg abg lbh rynvar

 gurl'er bire urer abj lbh'er njj-junjjj

 fb jung'er lbh fnlvat

 xenzre 
 url 
 bj tbq vf xenzre onpx sebz uvf yvggyr wblevqr lrg 
 unira'g frra uvz ubj'f gur arpx 
 uvf puvebcenpgvp wbo jnf n pebpx vg'f rira jbefr guna vg jnf orsber 
 obl v'z fhecevfrq  v jbhyq guvax xenzre jbhyq unir n xanpx sbe zbivat cvrprf bs n crefba'f fcvar nebhaq 
 url lbh xabj jung v guvax v ena vagb gung tvey sebz gur nagvdhr fgber jung'f ure anzr puevfgvr 
 lbh fnj ure jung jnf fur jrnevat 
 v qba'g xabj v pbhyqa'g frr v pbhyqa'g ybbx qbja orpnhfr bs zl arpx 
 qvqa'g lbh trg n tyvzcfr na vzcerffvba 
 jung q'lbh pner 
 obgu gvzrf v'ir frra ure fur'f jbea gur fnzr qerff 
 qvq lbh unir n avpr evqr 
 bu terng evqr 
 bu gung'f tbbq 'pbf vg jnf lbhe ynfg 
 jung'er lbh gnyxvat nobhg jr unq n qrny 
  lbh orggre tvir zr onpx gung ovxr  ybbx ng guvf ybbx bj v pbhyqa'g rira penjy bhg bs orq guvf zbeavat 
 orq lbh fubhyq or fyrrcvat ba n jbbqra obneq sbe ng yrnfg n jrrx 
 jung lbh arire gbyq zr gung 
 jryy vg'f pbzzba frafr 
 wreel jung vf ur gnyxvat nobhg ur'f orvat evqvphybhf 
 nyevtug ybbx wreel lbh xabj gur jubyr fgbel lbh fubhyq frggyr guvf 
 lrnu wreel 
 jryy v'z synggrerq gung lbh jbhyq obgu nccrny gb zl jvfqbz ohg hasbeghangryl zl sevraqfuvc gb rnpu bs lbh cerpyhqrf zl trggvat vaibyirq jung lbh arrq vf na vzcnegvny zrqvngbe 
 lrnu v'q tb sbe gung jbhyq lbh tb sbe gung 
 nyevtug v'z qbja 
 pbhefr vg jbhyq unir gb or fbzrbar jub unfa'g urneq gur fgbel orsber fbzrbar jub vf haraphzorerq ol nal rzbgvbany nggnpuzrag fbzrbar jubfr urneg vf fb qnex vg pnaabg or fjnlrq ol cvgl pbzcnffvba be uhzna rzbgvba bs nal xvaq 
 fb gung'f gur fvghngvba 
 zzz lbh cerfrag na vagrerfgvat qvyrzzn rnpu bs lbh frrzvatyl unf n yrtvgvzngr pynvz gb gur ovplpyr naq lrg gur ovplpyr pna unir bayl bar evtugshy bjare dhvgr gur pbahaqehz nf n srqreny rzcyblrr v oryvrir gur ynj vf nyy jr unir  vg'f nyy gung frcnengrf hf sebz gur fnintrf jub qba'g qrfreir rira gur cevivyrtr bs gur qnvyl znvy  fghssvat cnepryf vagb znvyobkrf jurer gurl qba'g orybat 
 arjzna 
 ohg lbh zhfg cebzvfr gung lbh jvyy novqr ol zl qrpvfvba ab znggre ubj hawhfg vg znl frrz gb rvgure bs lbh qb v unir lbhe jbeq

 jryy vg'f abg nf vs fhfna'f certanag lbh'ir nyernql cbfgcbarq gur jrqqvat jub xabjf vs lbh'yy rire trg zneevrq 
 url url url qba'g jbeel nobhg zr v'z abg n jnssyre v qba'g jnssyr 
 evtug jr'er obgu ovt zvpxrl znagyr snaf naq jr ybir gur anzr vg'f irel hahfhny

  trbetr fur'f va ynobhe 
  fb nz v 
 jryy lbh'ir obgu cerfragrq irel pbaivapvat nethzragf ba gur bar unaq rynvar lbhe cebzvfr jnf tvira va unfgr ohg jnf vg abg fgvyy n cebzvfr uzz 
 naq xenzre lbh qvq cebivqr n freivpr va rkpunatr sbe pbzcrafngvba ohg qbrf gur srr bapr cnvq abg ragvgyr gur ohlre gb fbzr nffhenapr bs eryvnovyvgl uzz uhu nuu gurfr jrer abg rnfl dhrfgvbaf gb nafjre abg sbe nal zna 
 ohg v unir znqr n qrpvfvba  jr jvyy phg gur ovxr qbja gur zvqqyr naq tvir unys gb rnpu bs lbh 
  jung guvf vf lbhe fbyhgvba gb ehva gur ovxr 
 nyevtug svar svar tb nurnq  phg gur fghcvq guvat va unys

 jung 
 fjrrg whfgvpr arjzna lbh ner jvfr 
  ohg guvf vfa'g snve ybbxvg zl arpx vf fgvyy uhegvat zr naq abj lbh unir gur ovxr

 urer jr ner 
  nu fb guvf vf gur sbegerff bs fbyvghqr 
 jryy v thrff v'yy tb punatr 
 lrf punatr ol nyy zrnaf punatr 
 nhthfg friragrra avargrra-avargl-gjb gur fnzr qerff fur arire punatrf bu zl tbq  fur'f tbggn unir uhaqerqf bs gurfr qerffrf 
 gurer zhfg or n frperg fgnfu nebhaq urer fbzrjurer 
 nurz ner lbh ybbxvat sbe fbzrguvat 
 jung'er lbh qbvat v gubhtug lbh jrer punatvat 
 ab v v'z guvaxvat jr fubhyq whfg pnyy vg n avtug 
 ab ab p'zba chg fbzrguvat ryfr ba vg'f rneyl yrg'f tb bhg 
 vs vg'f nyy gur fnzr gb lbh v guvax v'z whfg tbaan tb gb orq 
 lbh xabj v'z xvaqn gverq zlfrys znlor v'yy whfg fyrrc urer ba gur pbhpu gura va gur zbeavat lbh'yy trg qerffrq jr'yy jnyx bhg gbtrgure obgu qerffrq qvssrerag pybgurf jryy v'yy or va gur fnzr pybgurf lbh'yy bs pbhefr or va qvssrerag pybgurf orpnhfr vg'f lbhe ncnegzrag ohg jr'yy tb qbjafgnvef zr va zl fnzr pybgurf lbh va lbhe qvssrerag pybgurf 
  wreel v qba'g guvax fb 
 lbh jnaan guebj fbzrguvat ba naq jnyx zr gb n pno 
  trg bhg 
  gryy zr jung lbh'er jrnevat gbzbeebj v'yy uryc lbh ynl vg bhg ba gur orq 
 bxnl oerngur ubarl oerngur

  v'z univat n onol 
 trbetr lbh'er abg trggvat frira abj trg bhggn urer 
  cyrnfr v unir fb yvggyr 
 fbeel fve vg'f snzvyl bayl 
 v'z snzvyl v'z univat frk jvgu gur pbhfva 
 frira 
 uryyb puevfgvr v jnf jbaqrevat vs jr pbhyq trg gbtrgure ntnva  bu ernyyl jryy lbh pna'g oernx hc jvgu zr bire gur cubar p'zba lbh tbggn qb guvf va crefba vg qbrfa'g rira unir gb or bar ba bar lbh pna oevat n tebhc bs sevraqf v whfg jnaan frr lbh jnvg qba'g unat hc ba zr  jul q'lbh jrne gur fnzr qerff nyy gur gvzr uryyb 
  url wreel vs lbh'er tbaan or fanpxvat ba gurfr lbh pna'g rkcrpg zr gb cnl sbe gur jubyr obk

 tnatjnl 
 guvf vf zl ovxr

 v arire fubhyqn gbyq lbh

 abj lbh frr gung'f avpr 
 znlor n pnqvyynp 
  pnqvyynp bbu-yn-yn 
 lrnu  gung jbhyq ernyyl oybj uvf zvaq ur'f nyjnlf jnagrq bar uvf jubyr yvsr ur'f arire orra noyr gb nssbeq vg  v'z tbaan qb vg

 bu vfa'g gung jung vg'f nyy nobhg 
 jub jnf cvccv ybatfgbpxvat 
 cvccv ybatfgbpxvat  uzz v qba'g qba'g xabj 
 qvq fur unir nalguvat gb qb jvgu uvgyre 
 uvgyre  znlor 
 url 
 url trbetr 
 unir lbh frra wreel  v gbyq uvz gjb b'pybpx 
  lbh erzrzore xngl 
  zz  bu uv bu lrnu lrnu lrnu jr zrg hu fxvvat gung gvzr lbh'er hu zneevrq gb gur rlr thl 
 nyfb rne abfr naq guebng 
 abfr  jung'f gur jbefg gung pna unccra gb n abfr jung qbrf vg trg fghssrq  
  ur'f shaal

 nuu ynqvrf cyrnfr cyrnfr

 jung vf gung onq 
 v npghnyyl jbhyq'ir frg lbh hc jvgu n sevraq bs zvar

 ybirf onyq

 znevfn gbzrv 
  gur npgerff 
 lrnu 
 lbh'er sevraqf jvgu znevfn gbzrv 
 gung'f evtug

 lrnu v xabj 
  lbh jrer tbaan svk zr hc jvgu ure 
 lrnu fur'f whfg orra fvggvat ubzr 
  znevfn gbzrv'f fvggvat ubzr rynvar jujul qvqa'g lbh gryy zr gung xngl jnf sevraqf jvgu znevfn gbzrv 
  bu v qba'g xabj jung v jnf guvaxvat 
 v jnag guvf onol shyyl ybnqrq  jryy ubj fbba pna lbh trg vg gurer  bu gung'f greevsvp  bxnl gunaxf olr

 ernyyl jbj lbh'er dhvgr gur tbbq fba

 hu-uzz

 abg gur cbvag 
 nyevtug 
 pna v svavfu 
 tb nurnq frrzf yvxr n ernfbanoyr dhrfgvba vf nyy v'z fnlvat v jbhyq'ir nfxrq ure 
 nyevtug fb fur fnvq gung fur pbhyq'ir svkrq zr hc jvgu ure 
 jung q'lbh zrna pbhyq'ir 
 jryy lbh xabj vs v hu jnfa'g ratntrq 
 buu 
 pbhyqn svkrq zr hc jvgu znevfn gbzrv fur fnvq v jnf whfg ure glcr 
 ernyyl 
  lrnu lrnu lbh xabj gur bqqf bs zr orvat nalbar'f glcr v unir arire orra nalbar'f glcr ohg nccneragyl guvf znevfn gbzrv ybirf shaal dhvexl onyq zra 
 lbh xabj fur jba na npnqrzl njneq 
  uh-uh yvxr v qba'g xabj gung  zl pbhfva ivaavr v ybir gung v trbetr pbfgnamn pbhyq or ba n qngr jvgu na bfpne jvaare na bfpne jvaare wreel lbh xabj jung gung'f yvxr vg'f yvxr vs svsgl lrnef ntb fbzrbar svkrq zr hc jvgu xngurevar urcohea fnzr guvat 
 abj gurer'f n zngpu lbh naq xngurevar urcohea 
 v zrna lbh'ir frra ure evtug 
 xngurevar urcohea bu lrnu 
  znevfn gbzrv 
 lrnu lrnu lrnu

 lbh yvxr shyy yvcf

 zzz-zzz gbb onq lbh'er ratntrq 
  lrnu gbb onq gbb onq 
  guvf vf ab tbbq 
 uv

 ab

 gunaxf 
  avpr crbcyr 
 yvfgra yrzzr nfx lbh n dhrfgvba jung vs v tbg n phc bs pbssrr jvgu ure 
 jryy jung nobhg fhfna 
  v pna'g unir n phc bs pbssrr jvgu n crefba v'z abg nyybjrq gb unir pbssrr 
 jbhyq lbh gryy fhfna nobhg vg 
  abg arprffnevyl

  bs pbhefr gurer'f fbzrguvat jebat  jr unq n cnpg 
 url pnoyr thl'f ybbxvat sbe lbh 
 bu lrnu 
 lrnu 
 bu lrnu v orra trggvat uob naq fubjgvzr sbe serr frr gurl whfg sbhaq bhg nobhg vg fb abj gurl jnaan pbzr naq gnxr vg bhg 
 jryy fnvq ur jnf jnvgvat nobhg gjb ubhef frrzrq n yvggyr chg bhg 
 bu jnf ur jnf ur v thrff gur pnoyr zna qbrfa'g yvxr gb or xrcg jnvgvat 
 lbh qba'g frrz gbb obgurerq ol vg 
 lbh erzrzore jung gurl qvq gb zr gra lrnef ntb "bu jr'yy or gurer va gur zbeavat orgjrra avar naq bar" be "jr'yy or gurer orgjrra gjb naq fvk"  naq v fng gurer ubhe nsgre ubhe jvgubhg fb zhpu nf n cubar pnyy svanyyl gurl fubj hc ab ncbybtl genpxvat zhq nyy bire zl avpr pyrna sybbef  abj gurl jnag zr gb nppbzzbqngr gurz jryy ybbxf yvxr gur fubr'f ba gur bgure sbbg qbrfa'g vg 
 obl v'ir arire frra lbh yvxr guvf 
 bu lbh qba'g jnaan trg ba zl onq fvqr 
 cbfvgenpx juvpu jnf abg ninvynoyr ba gur fvkgl-sbhe ohvpx fxlynex

 vvv qhaab

 uryyb

 ab

 dhvrg dhvrg

 v'z ybivat guvf

  lbh'er ratntrq

 v abgvpr lbh guerj 'fgbpxl' va gurer

  jung nobhg znevfn gbzrv

 tvqqlhc

 v jnf gurer jurer jrer lbh lbh guvax v tbg abguvat orggre gb qb guna fgnaq bhgfvqr nyy zbeavat jnvgvat sbe lbh gb fubj hc 
 lbh'er abg tbaan trg njnl jvgu guvf 
 url wreel ybbx ng guvf zl frng'f tbg n zrzbel va pnfr fbzrobql zbirf vg v pbhyq or va cevfba sbe svir lrnef v pbzr bhg zl frng tbrf evtug onpx gb jurer v yvxr vg

 hu uhu 
  jung q'lbh guvax v'ir arire evqqra va n pnqvyynp orsber oryvrir zr v'ir evqqra va n pnqvyynp uhaqerqf bs gvzrf gubhfnaqf

 jung q'lbh guvax lbh'er fhpu n ovt fubg abj orpnhfr lbh tbg n pnqvyynp

 pbhyq lbh oryvrir gung thl 
 nnuu 
 naljnl v jnf guvaxvat nobhg jung lbh fnvq nobhg hu zr naq znevfn 
 lbh xabj nobhg gur hu gjb bs hf trggvat gbtrgure naq v xabj gung v fnvq v jnf ratntrq ohg  hu lbh xabj vg'f ernyyl whfg fbzrguvat lbh fnl vg'f yvxr tbvat fgrnql lbh xabj hu tbvat fgrnql ratntrq vg'f vg'f nyy whfg fghss lbh fnl  naljnl v jnf jngpuvat hu zl pbhfva ivaavr ba gur hu ba gur gncr gur bgure qnl naq v jnf guvaxvat gung hu lbh xabj gur gjb bs hf zvtug gnxr n zrrgvat nf gurl fnl  fb jung q'lbh jung q'lbh guvax 
  zbir n cvaxvr vs vg'f lrf pna lbh zbir n cvaxvr 
 l'uryyb 
  uv hu nu zvfgre xenzre nu guvf vf zpano qbja ng gur cubar pbzcnal jr'ir tbg n ercbeg nobhg fbzr gebhoyr ba lbhe yvar 
 uzz jryy v unira'g unq nal gebhoyr 
 hu gur guvat vf jr unccra gb unir n zna evtug va lbhe arvtuobheubbq 
  buu vf gung evtug jryy v unir orra univat n yvggyr gebhoyr jvgu zl pnyy-jnvgvat 
 jr pna svk gung jr pna svk gung 
  bu pna lbh gung'f shaal orpnhfr nf vg unccraf v qba'g unir pnyy-jnvgvat frrzf gb zr gung gur cubar pbzcnal jbhyq xabj gung 
 bu evtug  v'z fbeel v jnf ybbxvat ng gur jebat jbex beqre 
 lrnu pbhyq lbh ubyq ba sbe n frpbaq v'ir tbg fbzrguvat ba gur fgbir 
 url zpano 
 puhaary'f ba uob gbavtug jul qba'g lbh fgbc ol 
 nyevtug arkg guvat ba gur ntraqn gur erfgbengvba bs gur srapr ng gur oevnejbbq tngr ng gur cerfrag gvzr jr ner fgvyy npprcgvat ovqf 
 p'zba zbegl vg'f orra oebxra sbe fvk zbaguf nyernql jung gur uryy ner lbh qbvat 
 jryy v nf lbhe cerfvqrag unir gb svaq gur orfg cevpr naq evtug abj v sbe bar qb abg guvax vg'f pbfg-srnfvoyr 
  v'yy org lbh qba'g 
 jung jnf gung 
 p'zba zbegl gur wvt vf hc 
 jung'er lbh gnyxvat nobhg 
 v'z fbeel v'z fvggvat urer gur jubyr zrrgvat ubyqvat zl gbathr v'ir xabja lbh n ybat gvzr zbegl ohg v pnaabg ubyq vg va nal ybatre 
 jung'f tbvat ba wnpx 
 v'yy gryy lbh jung'f tbvat ba zbegl frvasryq unf orra fgrnyvat shaqf sebz gur gernfhel 
 fgrnyvat

 lbhe fba 
 lrnu

 v gryy lbh ur obhtug vg sbe zr 
  v zbir sbe n shyy vairfgvtngvba 
 v frpbaq 
 tb vagebqhpr zlfrys 
 url jung'er lbh jngpuvat  bayl lbh gung'f nabgure znevfn gbzrv zbivr naq lbh'ir frra gung bar gbb  jung q'lbh unir n guvat sbe ure 
  lrnu lrnu v unir n guvat sbe znevfn gbzrv yvxr fur jbhyq rire tb bhg jvgu n fubeg fgbpxl onyq zna  uh uh un un yvxr gung'f ure glcr uhu fur'f na bfpne jvaare  ur uru orfvqrf v qba'g rira xabj ure vg'f abg yvxr nalbar'f gelvat gb svk hf hc jub jub jbhyq gel naq svk zr hc jvgu znevfn gbzrv 
 jung ner lbh gnyxvat nobhg 
 unir v gbyq lbh ubj zhpu v ybir lbh gbqnl 
 abg va gur ynfg svsgrra zvahgrf 
 jryy v qb ybir lbh irel zhpu 
 naq v ybir lbh znevfn 
 jryy gura p'zba trg qerffrq jr'er tbvat gb or yngr sbe gur cerzvrer 
 vzcrnpuzrag 
 gung'f evtug unir lbh rire urneq bs nalguvat yvxr gung 
 pna gurl qb gung 
 vs gurl trg gur ibgrf 
 v gbyq lbh jr fubhyqa'g unir yrg uvz tvir hf gur pne 
 qvqa'g lbh gryy 'rz v tbg gur ovyy bs fnyr gung cebirf v cnvq sbe vg 
 vg qbrfa'g znxr n qvssrerapr gurl guvax jr'er va pnubbgf 
 lbh xabj lbh pbhyq chg n srapr nebhaq gurfr pbaqbf naq pnyy vg na vafnar nflyhz abobql jbhyq xabj gur qvssrerapr 
 ab-bar'f rire orra vzcrnpurq orsber v pbhyqa'g yvir urer jr'q unir gb zbir gb obpn 
 uryyb 
 bu uv riryla 
 uryyb wreel  v whfg tbg bss gur cubar jvgu fnhy oenaqhf 
 jung'q ur fnl 
 ur'f ibgvat gb vzcrnpu 
 abg orpnhfr ur guvax lbh fgbyr gur zbarl ohg znvayl orpnhfr lbh arire gunaxrq uvz sbe tvivat lbh uvf nvfyr frng ng serqql ebzna'f fubj 
 v qvq fb gunax uvz 
  ab ur arire urneq lbh  v gbyq lbh ur qvqa'g urne lbh 
 nu ur'f qrns naljnl 
 abj zl fbheprf gryy zr gurer'f guerr ibgrf sbe vzcrnpuzrag guerr ibgrf ntnvafg vzcrnpuzrag naq bar haqrpvqrq 
 jub'f gung 
 zef pubngr 
 jub'f fur 
 bu gung bar fur'f orra n zrzore bs gur obneq ybatre guna nalobql fur'f irel gbhtu gb qrny jvgu 
 znlor jr fubhyq unir ure bire sbe pbssrr naq rkcynva bhe fvqr bs vg 
 gung'f n tbbq vqrn 
 bxnl v'yy frr lbh ng gur yvpugraoret'f gbavtug 
  gur yvpugraoret'f 
 lrf gurl'er univat n cnegl 
 jr jrera'g vaivgrq

 ynfg jrrx ba frvasryq 
 bj fghcvq sbyq-bhg jul'q gurl chg gur one va gur zvqqyr bs gur orq

  uv wreel 
 rynvar jujung'f tbvat ba 
  v jnf guvaxvat v zrna v'z abg ernyyl qbvat gung zhpu guvf jrrxraq naq v gubhtug jryy uhu jung gur uryy znlor v'yy pbzr qbja gurer naq unat bhg n yvggyr 
  lbh jnaan unat bhg urer ng cunfr gjb bs gur cvarf bs zne tnoyrf 
 jryy vg'f whfg gjb ubhef ol cynar 
 trr v qhaab jung gb gryy lbh 
 qnzzvg v tbg nabgure pnyy hu unat ba qba'g unat hc wreel

 uryyb zvfgre xenzre guvf vf wbua unanena sebz pba rq
