 lrnu jr'ir unq fbzr ercbegf bs cbjre fhetrf va lbhe ohvyqvat vg frrzf fbzr wbxref jrer hc ba gur ebbs naq gurl zhfg'ir qnzntrq fbzr bs gur jverf 
 bu lbh qba'g fnl 
  lrnu rvgure jnl jr arrq gb trg vagb lbhe ncnegzrag naq qb n fnsrgl purpx 
  buu lbh'er tbbq lbh ner ernyyl tbbq 
  jung'er lbh gnyxvat nobhg 
 znevfn gbzrv v whfg fcbxr gb znevfn gbzrv  naq v jnfa'g rira gung areibhf 
 lbh xabj v pna'g erzrzore gur ynfg gvzr v pnyyrq n jbzna jvgubhg orvat areibhf v hfhnyyl v'z cnpvat nyy bire gur ebbz v'z 
  bxnl jryy gung'f nyy gur gvzr jr unir sbe gbqnl jul qba'g jr cvpx hc jvgu guvf arkg jrrx 
 url jurer lbh tbvat 
 v tbg fghss gb qb 
 jung lbh pna'g yrnir lrg 
 jul abg 
 jr unir gb qvfphff zl nyvov 
 nyvov jung qbrf gung unir gb qb jvgu zr 
 v hfhnyyl fcraq fngheqnl nsgreabbaf jvgu fhfna fur'f tbaan jnag gb xabj jung v'z qbvat v pna'g hfr wreel ur'f va sybevqn 
 bu fb lbh jnaan fnl lbh jrer jvgu zr 
 lrf 
  chu bxnl svar lbh jrer jvgu zr 
 jnvg n frpbaq jnvg jul ner jr gbtrgure 
 jung vf gur qvssrerapr 
 orpnhfr vs lbh rire frr ure naq vg pbzrf hc jr unir gb or va flap uzz 
 bxnl abj jul qb v unir gb frr  lbh 
 nu orpnhfr v'z tbvat gb gur qragvfg naq v'z nsenvq naq v jnag lbh gb tb jvgu zr 
  vg'f ab tbbq 
  bxnl svar 
 jung 
 v qba'g yvxr gur jnl lbh whfg erwrpgrq zl fhttrfgvba 
 url url yrg'f abg trg fb qrsrafvir urer guvf vf n tvir naq gnxr cebprff 
 v gubhtug gung zl fhttrfgvba jnf tbbq naq v guvax lbh pbhyq'ir orra n yvggyr zber gnpgshy 
  bxnl ybbx jr'ir arire jbexrq gbtrgure ba n yvr abj lbh qba'g haqrefgnaq ubj v jbex v unir n pregnva jnl bs jbexvat wreel naq v unir jbexrq gbtrgure n srj gvzrf ur xabjf ubj v jbex vg'f abg n crefbany guvat l'xabj jr'er whfg gelvat gb pbzr hc jvgu gur orfg cbffvoyr yvr gung'f jung guvf vf nyy nobhg

 nyevtug

 bxnl ubj nobhg guvf 
 jung 
  lbh ner univat ceboyrzf jvgu lbhe oblsevraq naq v nz zrrgvat lbh gb qvfphff gur fvghngvba 
 v qba'g unir n oblsevraq 
  fur qbrfa'g xabj gung jr fnl gung lbh qb 
  rpu 
 vg'f tbbq oryvrir zr 
 v gubhtug zl vqrn jnf whfg nf tbbq 
 gur qragvfg guvat 
  lrnu evtug gur qragvfg guvat 
 nyevtug gur qragvfg guvat jnf abg tbbq 
 bxnl nyevtug jung'f uvf anzr jub vf ur 
  neg inaqrynl 
  neg inaqrynl guvf vf zl oblsevraq 
 gung'f lbhe oblsevraq 
 jung qbrf ur qb 
 ur'f na vzcbegre 
 whfg vzcbegf ab rkcbegf 
  ur'f na vzcbegre-rkcbegre bxnl 
 bxnl fb v'z qngvat neg inaqrynl jung vf gur ceboyrz jr'er qvfphffvat 
  lrf lrf 
  lv-lv-lv 
 nu  ubj 'obhg guvf ubj nobhg ur'f guvaxvat bs dhvggvat gur rkcbegvat naq whfg sbphffvat va ba gur vzcbegvat naq guvf vf pnhfvat n ceboyrz orpnhfr jul abg qb obgu 
  bu jung lbh qba'g yvxr gung fhttrfgvba rvgure 
 vg'f irel pbzcyvpngrq 
  lbh xabj vg frrzf gb zr gung vg'f nyy lbh naq abar bs zl vqrnf ner trggvat va lbh xabj v zrna lbh whfg xabj vg nyy naq v nz zvff fghcvq evtug 
 jung'er lbh qbvat ner lbh znxvat pbssrr 
 lrnu 
 jryy znlor lbh orggre znxr n cbg bs grn gbb 
 zbegl lbh'er qevivat zr penml 
 ybbx v qba'g jnag nalguvat gb tb jebat vs guvf jbzna ibgrf gb vzcrnpu zr v'yy or n ynhtuvat fgbpx 
 lbh jnaan qevir n pnqvyynp rkcrpg gb cnl gur pbafrdhraprf 
 gurer fur vf 
 uryyb uryyb zef pubngr 
 bu pbzr va pbzr va znl v gnxr lbhe pbng 
 ab ab v cersre gb jrne vg abobql'f gnxvat zl pbng 
 nu ubj 'obhg n phc bs pbssrr be fbzrguvat 
 pbssrr npu v'yy gnxr ubg jngre jvgu yrzba vs lbh unir vg 
 v'yy frr  unir n frng gung'f n ybiryl fpnes lbh'er jrnevat jurer qvq lbh trg vg 
 nuu gurl'er n qvzr n qbmra 
 bu uv wreel zef pubngr  guvf vf zl fba wreel 
 tvzzr gung elr) 
 fgbc vg yrg tb uryc fbzrbar uryc 
 fuhg hc lbh byq ont 
  guvrs fgbc uvz fgbc uvz ur'f tbg zl elr 
 avpr gb zrrg lbh 
 uryyb 
  wreel yvirf va arj lbex lbh whfg pnzr sebz arj lbex qvqa'g lbh 
 lrnu v jnf ivfvgvat zl qnhtugre naq v'yy arire tb onpx gur pevzr gurer vf whfg greevoyr qb lbh xabj v tbg zhttrq sbe n zneoyr elr evtug ba gur fgerrg 
  bu gung'f greevoyr gurl fgbyr n elr jul jbhyq gurl fgrny n elr 
 gung'f jung gur pvgl'f gheavat vagb gurl'yy fgrny nalguvat 
 gurl'er yvxr fnintrf 
 lrnu gurer'f fbzr fvpxbf bhg gurer 
  lbh ybbx irel snzvyvne unir jr rire zrg 
 lbh rire tb gb pnzc gvlbtn 
 znlor lbh'ir frra uvz ba gryrivfvba 
 wreel'f n pbzrqvna 
 anj v qba'g jngpu gi 
  jryy vg jnf avpr zrrgvat lbh 
 wreel qba'g tb 
 nu v guvax v'yy tb 
 fb zbegl jung'f guvf nyy nobhg jung q'lbh jnag 
 url jurer'er lbh tbvat 
 jun v qvqa'g gryy lbh v tbggn tb zrrg rynvar 
 rynvar jung sbe 
 v qba'g xabj furfur'f univat fbzr ceboyrzf jvgu guvf thl fur'f frrvat 
 v qvqa'g rira xabj fur jnf qngvat nalbar 
 lrnu lrnu fur'f frrvat guvf thl neg inaqrynl 
 fb jung qbrf ur qb 
 ur'f na vzcbegre-rkcbegre 
 jung xvaq bs ceboyrzf ner gurl univat 
  jryy ur hu ur jnagf gb hu dhvg gur rkcbegvat naq hu sbphf whfg ba gur vzcbegvat naq vg'f n ceboyrz orpnhfr fur guvaxf gur rkcbegvat vf nf vzcbegnag nf gur vzcbegvat 
 ner lbh univat na nssnve jvgu rynvar 
  evtug p'zba v'z univat na nssnve jvgu rynvar vs v jnf univat na nssnve jvgu rynvar v jbhyqa'g gryy lbh v'z tbvat gb frr rynvar v jbhyq znxr hc fbzr bgure crefba gb gryy lbh v jnf tbaan tb frr naq gura v jbhyq tb frr rynrynvar 
 uhu 
  v'yy trg lbh v'yy trg lbh xenzre lbh jba'g trg njnl jvgu guvf 
 nyevtug ner lbh ernql gb rng 
  bu evtug yrg'f tb wreel yrg'f tb vg'f gvzr gb rng jr'er tbvat gb qvaare 
  qvaare jjung gvzr vf vg 
  vg'f sbhe-guvegl 
  sbhe-guvegl jub rngf qvaare ng sbhe-guvegl 
 ol gur gvzr jr fvg qbja vg'yy or dhnegre gb svir 
 v qba'g haqrefgnaq jul jr unir gb rng abj 
 jr tbggn pngpu gur rneyl-oveq vg'f bayl orgjrra sbhe-guvegl naq fvk 
 lrnu gurl tvir lbh n graqreybva n fnynq naq n onxrq cbgngb sbe sbhe-avargl-svir lbh xabj jung gung pbfg lbh nsgre fvk 
 pna'g jr rng ng n qrprag ubhe v'yy gerng bxnl 
 lbh'er abg ohlvat hf qvaare 
  v'z abg sbepr-srrqvat zlfrys n fgrnx ng sbhe-guvegl gb fnir n pbhcyn ohpxf v'yy gryy lbh gung 
 nyevtug  jr'yy jnvg  ohg vg'f haurneq bs 
 fb naljnl vs lbh guvax nobhg vg znaher vf abg ernyyl gung onq n jbeq v zrna vg'f 'arjre' juvpu vf tbbq naq n 'zn' va sebag bs vg juvpu vf nyfb tbbq zn-arjre  evtug 
  lbh'er fb evtug v arire gubhtug bs vg yvxr gung znaher 'zn' naq gur 'arjre' 
 qvq lbh whfg znxr gung hc 
 jung lbh guvax v'z qbvat zngrevny urer 
  ab ab vg'f uneq gb oryvrir nalbar pbhyq or fb fcbagnarbhfyl shaal 
  naq v'z n yvggyr gverq 
 fb gryy zr ubj vf vg gung n zna yvxr lbh fb onyq naq fb dhvexl naq shaal ubj vf vg lbh'er abg gnxra 
 jryy znevfn frr gur guvat vf v'z fbeg bs ratntrq 
 jung 
 v'z lbh xabj ratntrq 
 url ybbx gurer'f n fcbg evtug va sebag 
 nyjnlf wreel nyjnlf 
 jnf gung qryvpvbhf be jung

 qbevf

 wnpx 
 uryyb wreel 
 uv qbevf 
 uryyb zbegl  jryy zvffrq gur rneyl oveq 
 lrnu fb 
  zhfg or avpr gb unir gung xvaq bs zbarl 
 oreavr ybbx jub'f rngvat ng fvk b'pybpx  lbhe fhqqrayl jryy-gb-qb cerfvqrag ohg lbh rawbl lbhe ynfg zrny va bssvpr gbzbeebj gurl xvpx lbh bhg lbh'yy unir cyragl bs gvzr gb qevir nebhaq va lbhe pnqvyynp 
 gurl'er abg xvpxvat zr bhg lbh qba'g unir gur ibgrf 
 gung'f jung lbh guvax 
 jr'yy frr 
 lrf jr jvyy 
 njevtug yrg'f rng nyernql 
 uv fhfna 
 uv 
 uv pbzr va pbzr va unir n frng 
  hu rynvar v unir gb nfx lbh n dhrfgvba 
 bu fher 
  ner lbh univat na nssnve jvgu trbetr 
  jun  un un un un ab 
  qba'g or evqvphybhf  v zrna jul jbhyq nalbar jnaan fyrrc 
 jryy boivbhfyl lbh xabj  ncnc puh jul jbhyq lbh guvax v jnf univat na nssnve jvgu trbetr 
 buu orpnhfr ur fnvq gung ur unq gb gnyx jvgu lbh rneyvre nobhg fbzr ceboyrz gung lbh jrer univat 
  lrnu lrnu v qvq unir gb gnyx jvgu uvz v qrsvavgryl unq gb gnyx jvgu uvz univat n ceboyrz jvgu zl oblsevraq 
 neg inaqrynl 
 lrnu neg inaqrynl 
 v'z fbeel  v srry yvxr na vqvbg 
  ab ab  uhu-uh-uh vg'f bxnl 
 bu whfg sbetrg gung jr rire gnyxrq bxnl 
 vg vf fb sbetbggra 
 nyevtug 
 bxnl  bxnl ab ceboyrz 
 fb jnf trbetr urycshy ng nyy 
  lrnu bu lrf lrf ur jnf irel urycshy  huz orpnhfr lbh xabj neg naq v jrer trggvat vagb guvf jubyr guvat nobhg uvf ohfvarff huz lbh xabj ur'f na vzcbegre-rkcbegre 
  lrnu 
  huz trbetr sryg gung v jnf gbb nqnznag va zl fgnaq gung neg fubhyq sbphf ba gur rkcbegvat naq sbetrg nobhg gur vzcbegvat 
  jnvg n zvahgr v gubhtug gung neg jnagrq gb tvir hc gur rkcbegvat 
 jung'q v fnl 
 gur vzcbegvat 
  v qvq hu 
 fb jung qbrf ur hu vzcbeg 
  hu puvcf 
 bu jung xvaqn puvcf 
 cbgngb 
 nu 
  fbzr pbea 
 naq jung qbrf ur rkcbeg 
 qvncref 
  v'z fbeel sbe obgurevat lbh 
 bu ab vg'f bxnl 
 bxnl 
  p'zba trbetr cvpx hc bu cvpx hc bu cvpx hc 
 uv 
 uv  fb trbetr jung qbrf neg inaqrynl vzcbeg 
 zngpurf ybat zngpurf 
 gurer fur vf bxnl vs v pna unir lbhe nggragvba sbe n zvahgr urer jr'er pnyyvat guvf rzretrapl zrrgvat bs gur obneq bs cunfr gjb gb pbafvqre n zbgvba bs vzcrnpuzrag bs bhe cerfvqrag  zbegl frvasryq 
 areibhf wnpx 
 jung sbe 
 orpnhfr v unir gur ibgrf 
 avpr gb frr lbh zef pubngr 
 uryyb zbegl 
 ohvyqvat n ner lbh sbe be ntnvafg gur zbgvba gb vzcrnpu 
 jung qbrf gung zrna 
 vg zrnaf vs lbh'er sbe gur zbgvba lbh'er ntnvafg zbegl 
 fb jul qba'g lbh fnl gung 
 url v'z ehaavat gur zrrgvat 
 vs lbh guvax fb 
 ohvyqvat n 
 sbe vzcrnpuzrag 
 ohvyqvat o

 ohvyqvat p

 ohvyqvat q 
 ntnvafg vzcrnpuzrag 
  v pna'g oryvrir lbh tbg gung byq ont 
 uryc fbzrbar uryc 
 fuhg hc lbh byq ont 
  bu guvrs guvrs 
 vg'f uvz  vg'f lbhe fba abj v xabj jurer v fnj uvz ur fgbyr zl zneoyr elr 
 zl fba arire fgbyr nalguvat ur'f n tbbq obl 
 gurl fubhyq ybpx uvz hc 
  yvxr sngure yvxr fba  v punatr zl ibgr v ibgr gb vzcrnpu 
 zr gbb v punatr zl ibgr 
 nyy gubfr va snibhe fnl nlr 
 nlr 
 nyy bccbfrq 
 gur nlrf unir vg gur zbgvba cnffrf 
 zbegl frvasryq lbh ner bssvpvnyyl qvfzvffrq nf pbaqb cerfvqrag nf ivpr-cerfvqrag wnpx xybzchf va nppbeqnapr jvgu gur cunfr gjb pbafgvghgvba vf urerol vafgnyyrq nf cerfvqrag 
 urne urne wnpx 
  nyevtug v xabj lbh'er va gurer v xabj lbh pna urne zr lbh jva bxnl lbh jva v pna'g qb vg nal zber jung q'lbh jnag sebz zr ncbybtl nyevtug v'z fbeel gurer v fnvq vg v'z fbeel v'z fbeel v frr abj ubj jr znqr lbh srry jura jr znqr lbh fvg ubzr jnvgvat v qhaab jul jr qb vg  v thrff znlor jr whfg xvaq bs rawbl gnxvat nqinagntr bs crbcyr  jryy gung'f tbaan punatr sebz abj ba ab zber 'avar gb gjryir' ab zber 'bar gb svir' jr'er tbaan unir nccbvagzragf ryrira b'pybpx vf tbaan zrna ryrira b'pybpx naq vs jr pna'g znxr vg jr'er tbaan pnyy lbh gryy lbh jul  sbe tbq'f fnxrf vs n qbpgbe pna qb vg jul pna'g jr  naljnl gung'f vg 
 gur ontf ner va gur pne v thrff jr orggre tb 
 ze crgrezna frag zr bire urer sbe n culfvpny orpnhfr nf lbh znl be znl abg xabj ur naq v ner tbvat ba n gevc gb xraln nsevpn zl svefg fhpu zvffvba sbe gur pbzcnal gur znffnv ohfuzra jrne gurfr terng fnaqnyf naq jr'er tbaan xabpx gurz bss abg gur znffnv gur fnaqnyf 
 v'yy arrq n hevar fnzcyr 
 evtug 
 lbh xabj ubj ubg vg trgf gurer yvxr 150 qrterrf lbhe fxva vf tbaan or fvzzrevat jvgu obvyf 
 bu pbzr ba 
 url trbetr lbh pbzvat gb gur gbavtug fubj ba guhefqnl 
 url lrnu zl cneragf jnag gb pbzr gbb vf gung bx 
 lrnu fher zl cneragf jvyy or gurer 
 gur gbavtug fubj 
 lrnu gurl'er va gbja guvf jrrx lbh jnaan tb 
 ner lbh qbvat arj zngrevny 
 ab 
 v qba'g guvax fb 
 url fhcre'f va zl onguebbz punatvat zl fubjre urnq unir gurl punatrq lbhe fubjre urnq 
 ab ur'f qbvat zvar arkg gurl'er ybj sybj lbh xabj 
 ybj sybj jryy v qba'g yvxr gur fbhaq bs gung 
 fb jung ner lbhe cneragf qbvat urer va arj lbex 
 jryy gurl jrer uhzvyvngrq v zrna nsgre gur vzcrnpuzrag zl sngure yrsg bssvpr va qvftenpr 
 fb jung ner gurve cynaf 
 jryy guvf vf gur ceboyrz gurl'er zbivat vagb guvf arj qrirybczrag urer'f gur cnzcuyrg qry obpn ivfgn ohg gurl'er abg dhvgr ernql gb tb onpx fb gurl'er va frpyhfvba urer sbe n juvyr ng hapyr yrb'f 
 lbh zrna gur guerr bs gurz va gung gval ncnegzrag 
 ab yrb'f abg gurer ur'f tbg n tveysevraq ylqvn va snpg ur zbirq va jvgu ure 
 hapyr yrb'f univat erthyne frk 
 lrnu v xabj vg qrinyhrf gur jubyr guvat 
  uryyb 
 wreel jung gvzr qb jr unir gb or ng gur gur gbavtug fubj ba guhefqnl 
 lbh tbggn or gurer ng 430 
 ohg vg pbzrf ba 1130 
 lrnu jryy gurl gncr vg va gur nsgreabba naq gura gurl nve vg ng 1130 
 ubj ybat gurl orra qbvat guvf 
 30 lrnef 
 uryra qvq lbh xabj gung gurl gncr guvf guvat va gur nsgreabba 
 nyy evtug v'yy frr lbh yngre 
 trbetvr ubj pbzr lbhe cneragf arire zbirq gb sybevqn 
 lrnu gung vf bqq vfa'g vg 
 lrnu vg vf 
 v zrna gurl'er ergverq 
 ab rpbabzvp ernfba sbe gurz gb or urer 
 gurl unir ab sevraqf 
 ab fbpvny ernfba sbe gurz gb or urer 
 lbh'er nyy tebja hc 
 lrnu gurl'er nyy guebhtu ehvavat zl yvsr jung gur uryy ner gurl fgvyy qbvat urer yrzzr frr guvf cnzcuyrg uz nyy evtug fb v'yy hu trg onpx gb lbh 
 jurer pna v ohl fbzr vpr lbhe sngure yvxrf n ybg bs vpr 
 v qba'g xabj znlor trg na vpr genl 
 v pna qb gung 
 lbh xabj qnq whfg pnyyrq zr 
 lrnu v xabj uvf cuyrovgvf vf npgvat hc 
 lrnu nyy evtug jryy v tbg fbzr crbcyr urer 
 bx 
 nyy evtug olr  lbh frr guvf nal gubhtug cbcf vagb gurve urnq gurl'er pnyyvat zr orpnhfr vg'f n ybpny pnyy abj 
 nuu 
 v'z hfrq gb n 1200 zvyr ohssre mbar v pna'g unaqyr guvf cyhf v tbg gur qvaaref v tbg gur cbc vaf gurl cbc va vg'f oehgny 
 gurl unir ab vqrn jura gurl'er tbvat onpx gb sybevqn 
 gur bayl jnl bhg bs guvf vf vs yrb oernxf hc jvgu uvf tveysevraq naq unf gb zbir onpx vagb gur ncnegzrag naq gura gurl jbhyq unir gb tb onpx gb sybevqn 
 ubj'f gung tbaan unccra 
 vg'f nobhg gvzr lbh pnyyrq lbhe hapyr jr'ir tbg gb qb guvf bapr n jrrx 
  bapr n jrrx  fb ubj'f ylqvn 
 nu fur'f n erny gvtre 
 v qba'g xabj ubj lbh qb vg 
 jung 
 n zna yvxr lbh yvzvgvat lbhefrys gb bar jbzna v qba'g xabj ohg vg'f abar bs zl ohfvarff 
 jung ner lbh gnyxvat nobhg 
 jryy 
 ybbx ng guvf v gbyq gurz zrqvhz ener vg'f zrqvhz 
 url vg unccraf 
 v org gung pbbx vf na nagv-frzvgr 
 ur unf ab vqrn jub lbh ner 
 gurl qba'g whfg birepbbx n unzohetre wreel 
 nyy evtug naljnl gur cbvag v jnf znxvat orsber tbreooyrf znqr lbhe unzohetre vf n zna yvxr lbh pbhyq or qngvat jbzra gjragl lrnef lbhatre p'zba hapyr yrb v'ir frra gur jnl jbzra ybbx ng lbh jura'f gur ynfg gvzr lbh ybbxrq va n zveebe lbh'er na nqbavf lbh'ir tbg ornhgvshy srngherf ybiryl fxva lbh'er va gur cevzr bs lbhe yvsr urer lbh fubhyq or fjvatvat vs v jrer lbh v'q gryy guvf ylqvn punenpgre "vg'f orra erny" zbir onpx vagb gung onpurybe cnq naq chg bhg n fvta; bcra sbe ohfvarff 
 oryvrir zr v gubhtug nobhg vg ohg fur vf fb cresrpg va rirel jnl v pna'g frr n synj 
 jryy xrrc ybbxvat 
 v'z nsenvq v unir fbzr onq arjf rynvar vg nccrnef lbh jvyy abg or nppbzcnalvat zr gb nsevpn 
 jung jul abg 
 v'z nsenvq vg'f lbhe hevar rynvar lbh grfgrq cbfvgvir sbe bcvhz 
 bcvhz 
 gung'f evtug rynvar juvgr ybghf lnz-lnz funatunv fnyyl 
 vung'f vzcbffvoyr v'ir arire qbar n qeht va zl yvsr qe fgehtngm zhfg unir znqr n zvfgnxr 
 abg n punapr v'z nsenvq v'yy whfg unir gb svaq fbzrbar ryfr gb nppbzcnal zr ba zl wbhearl gur qnex pbagvarag vf ab cynpr sbe na nqqvpg rynvar 
 boivbhfyl ze crgrezna gurer'f fbzrguvat jebat jvgu guvf grfg v qba'g gnxr bcvhz yrg zr gnxr nabgure bar cyrnfr v'yy pnyy gur qbpgbe evtug abj v'yy gnxr n cbc hevar grfg 
 nyy evtug rynvar 
 bu gunax lbh ze crgrezna  v'yy or ernql va guerr zvahgrf 
 jurj obl vg'f pbyq bhgfvqr uhu bu gurfr arj lbex jvagref uhu ovggre pbyq ovggre 
 v jnf bhg sbe svir zvahgrf orsber v pbhyqa'g srry zl rkgerzvgvrf 
 jung rkgerzvgvrf 
 lbh xabj jung gur grzcrengher va sybevqn vf gbqnl ru friragl-avar gung'f nyzbfg rvtugl lrnu v ernq fbzrcynpr gur yvsr rkcrpgnapl va sybevqn vf rvtugl-bar naq va dhrraf friragl-guerr 
 fb trbetr jul ner lbh urer 
 jung v pna'g fgbc ol naq ivfvg zl cneragf  
 jung'f guvf 
 gung'f jurer gur frvasryq'f ner zbivat gurl tbg n terng qrny lrc lbh xabj jung gurl tbg va sybevqn wnv-nynv lbh org ba gur tnzrf lbh pyrna hc 
 v qba'g org 
 jung nobhg gur qbycuvaf lbh pbhyq fjvz jvgu gur qbycuvaf qbja gurer 
 v qba'g fjvz 
 lbh pbhyq crg gurz gurl pbzr evtug bhg bs gur jngre bagb gur fvqrjnyxf 
 ner lbh gelvat gb trg evq bs hf 
 evq anu p'zba gur jbeq vf 'pner' pner v pner nobhg lbhe pbzsbeg or vg urer va dhrraf be gjryir-uhaqerq zvyrf njnl

 wreel wreel 
 jun lbh gbb 
 lrnu 
 gurfr fubjref ner ubeevoyr gurer'f ab cerffher v pna'g trg gur funzcbb bhg bs zl unve 
 zr rvgure 
 vs v qba'g unir n tbbq fubjre v nz abg zlfrys v srry jrnx naq varssrpghny v'z abg xenzre 
 lbh jung nobhg zr v tbg gur gbavtug fubj gbavtug v'z tbaan unir gb fubjre va gur qerffvat ebbz 
  nj 
 jurer ner lbh tbvat 
 v tbggn svaq nabgure fubjre 
 gurl tbg lbh gbb 
 guvf fghss vf njshy v'z abg arjzna 
 bu rynvar lrnu 
 xenzre lbh ybbx greevoyr 
 ybbx v arrq gur xrlf gb lbhe ncnegzrag v tbggn gnxr n fubjre 
 jung'f jebat jvgu lbhe fubjre 
 gurer'f ab jngre cerffher 
 jul qba'g lbh whfg tb frr wreel 
 wreel'f tbg abguvat arjzna'f tbg abguvat lbh'er gur bayl bar v xabj jub'f tbg gur tbbq fghss naq v arrq vg onq onol pnhfr v srry yvxr v tbg ohtf penjyvat hc zl fxva abj lbh tbggn uryc zr bhg 
  abg ba zl jngpu  v jba'g unir lbh gheavat zl bssvpr vagb n qra bs vavdhvgl trg lbhe svk fbzrjurer ryfr 
 ze crgrezna jung ner lbh qbvat 
 rynvar lbh'er bhg bs pbageby lbh arrq uryc 
 uhu 
 v xabj jung lbh'er tbvat guebhtu v gbb bapr sryy haqre gur fcryy bs bcvhz vg jnf 1979 v jnf geniryyvat gur lnatgmrr va frnepu bs n zbatbyvna ubefrunve irfg v unq tbg gb gur znexrg nsgre fhaqbja nyy bs gur pybguvat genqref unq tbar ohg n qvssrerag fbeg bs genqre fgvyy yhexrq nobhg "whfg n gnfgr" ur fnvq gung jnf nyy vg gbbx 
 ze crgrezna v qba'g xabj jung'f tbvat ba urer v nz abg nqqvpgrq gb nalguvat 
 bu rynvar gur gbyy ebnq bs qravny vf n ybat naq qnatrebhf bar gur cevpr lbhe fbhy bu naq ol gur jnl lbh unir gvy' 500 gb pyrne bhg lbhe qrfx lbh'er sverq 
 nyy gurl freir vf puvpxra

 uv

 jung 
 jul lbh guvaxvat bs zbivat 
 abg ernyyl 
 orpnhfr vs lbh ner lbh fubhyqa'g gurer'f abguvat ninvynoyr va gung qrirybczrag 
 ner lbh gryyvat zr gurer'f abg bar pbaqb ninvynoyr va nyy bs qry obpn ivfgn 
 gung'f evtug gurl jrag yvxr ubgpnxrf 
 ubj'q lbh trg lbhef 
 tbg yhpxl 
 ner lbh gelvat gb xrrc hf bhg bs qry obpn ivfgn 
 v xabj guvf qbrfa'g frrz yvxr jbex gb nal bs lbh vs lbh pbhyq creuncf pbaqhpg lbhe cflpubcngu pbairagvba qbja gur unyy v pbhyq whfg trg n yvggyr crefbany fcnpr 
 ubj pbhyq v unir grfgrq cbfvgvir gjvpr bapr v pbhyq haqrefgnaq gung'f n zvfgnxr ohg gjvpr 
 lrnu vg'f uneq gb svther 
 v zrna v ybfg zl wbo v pna'g tb gb nsevpn v jnf tbaan zrrg gur ohfu-zra bs gur xnynunev 
 nu gur ohfu-zra 
 naq gur ohfu-jbzra 
  rkphfr zr v pbhyqa'g uryc bireurnevat v abgvpr lbh'er rngvat n cbccl frrq zhssva 
 lrnu v rng gurfr zhssvaf nyy gur gvzr 
 jryy lbh xabj jung bcvhz vf znqr sebz 
  cbccvrf 
 jrypbzr onpx gnyxvat jvgu wreel frvasryq wreel yrzzr nfx lbh v fnj fbzr crbcyr onpx gurer gurl ybbx yvxr snzvyl vf gung snzvyl 
 lrnu v tbg fbzr snzvyl onpxfgntr pbhefr zl snzvyl'f ahgf; gurl'er penml lrc zl hapyr yrb  v unq yhapu jvgu uvz gur bgure qnl ur'f bar bs gurfr thlf gung nalguvat tbrf jebat va yvsr ur oynzrf vg ba nagv-frzvgvfz lbh xabj jung v zrna gur fcnturggv'f abg ny qragr pbbx'f na nagv-frzvgr ybfrf n org ba n ubefr frpergnevng nagv-frzvgvp qbrfa'g trg n tbbq frng ng gur grzcyr enoov nagv-frzvgr 
 url yvfgra gb guvf hapyr yrb oebxr hc jvgu uvf tveysevraq orpnhfr bs gur ovg v qvq fur gubhtug vg jnf shaal fb ur npphfrq *ure* bs orvat na nagv-frzvgr gurl unq n uhtr svtug naq abj ur'f zbivat onpx vagb uvf ncnegzrag lbh xabj jung guvf zrnaf zl cneragf ner tbaan tb onpx gb sybevqn jung jung ahzore vf guvf bu v'z greevoyl fbeel

  lrnu jryy v'z ernyyl unccl sbe ln

 ab tbbq 
 vg'f qvfthfgvat v'z fvggvat gurer va n grcvq cbby bs zl bja svygu nyy xvaqf bs zvpebfpbcvp cnenfvgrf naq betnavfzf univat frk nyy nebhaq zr

 cbccl frrqf 
 jryy gung znxrf frafr  jnag fbzr puvpxra 
 lrnu gunaxf fb v'z tbaan trg grfgrq ntnva yngre ubcrshyyl v'yy trg zl wbo onpx naq v jvyy or ba zl jnl gb nsevpn 
 uryyb arjzna

 v unir n cevingr znggre gb qvfphff jvgu zl sryybj granagf  vs lbh qba'g zvaq 
 wreel 
 ybbx fvfgre tb trg lbhefrys n phc bs pbssrr nyy evtug orng vg  nyy evtug abj urer'f gur ybjqbja sebz n pregnva pbaarpgvba v'ir orra noyr gb ybpngr fbzr oynpx znexrg fubjre urnqf gurl'er nyy znqr va gur sbezre lhtbfynivn naq sebz jung v urne gur freof ner snangvp nobhg gurve fubjref 
 abg sebz gur sbbgntr v'ir frra 
 arireguryrff fbzrgvzr guvf nsgreabba oruvaq gur znexrg qvare na haznexrq ina jvyy or jnvgvat v'z rkcrpgvat gur pnyy ng nal gvzr ner lbh va 
 v'z qbja

 ovt arjf 
 jr'er zbivat gb sybevqn

 guvf vf senax pbfgnamn 
 jung qb lbh jnag

 v'z fbeel jr pna'g tb onpx gb sybevqn 
 v pna'g oryvrir v qvqa'g chfu sbe guvf fbbare

 bu uv qnq

 jung jnf gung

 jung 
 gurl'er abg tbvat onpx gb sybevqn gurl'er zbivat urer 
 jung jul 
 orpnhfr lbhe cneragf ner tbvat qbja gurer zl ohssre mbar whfg jrag sebz gjryir uhaqerq zvyrf qbja gb gjb srrg lbh tbggn qb fbzrguvat 
 url v'z fbeel lbh unq lbhe ohssre mbar sbe znal lrnef vg'f zl ghea gb yvir onol 
 lbh xabj jung lbh'er qbvat qba'g lbh lbh'er xvyyvat vaqrcraqrag wreel v tbggn tb frr zl hapyr yrb v guvax ur znl unir znqr n ovt zvfgnxr 
 zbir onpx jvgu ylqvn 
 p'zba lbh'er yhpxl gb unir nalobql 
 ynfg jrrx lbh gbyq zr v jnf va zl cevzr v fubhyq or fjvatvat 
 fjvatvat jung ner lbh bhg bs lbhe zvaq ybbx ng lbh lbh'er qvfthfgvat lbh'er onyq lbh'er cnhapul nyy xvaqf bs fbhaqf ner rznangvat sebz lbhe obql gjragl-sbhe ubhef n qnl vs gurer'f n jbzna gung pna gnxr lbhe cerfrapr sbe zber guna gra pbafrphgvir frpbaqf lbh fubhyq unat ba gb ure yvxr tevz qrngu juvpu vf abg sne bss ol gur jnl

  abj jung vf guvf 
 gung'f gur pbzznaqb 450 v qba'g fryy gung bar jung nobhg guv- 
 jryy gung'f jung jr jnag gur pbzznaqb 450 
 anu oryvrir zr vg'f bayl hfrq va gur pvephf sbe ryrcunagf 
 jr'yy cnl nalguvat jr'ir tbg gur  jung nobhg wreel

 vg'f avpr orvat onpx ng yrb'f wreel'f cynpr jnf gbb fznyy 
 svefg yrb oernxf hc gura ur tbrf onpx jung gur uryy'f tbvat ba 
 jub vf vg

 jung jul abg

 gur pbssrr fubc]

  v nz njner

 erthyngvba gnoyr gur uv-sv znlor rira n one tvir vg erny nhguragvpvgl 
 jryy gung'f rynvar 
 bu uv senax 
  fvg qbja wbva hf cyrnfr 
  npghnyyl v tbggn trg gb gur hu guvat 
  bu gur guvat'f pnapryyrq fvg qbja 
  bxnl  fb  senax qvq trbetr rire fubj lbh gung cubgb 
  jung cubgb 
 lbh xabj gur cubgb v gbbx va ghfpnal bs gur yvggyr zna va sebag bs gur fvta gung fnvq "pbfgnamn" 
  gurer'f n pbfgnamn va ghfpnal  qvq ur ybbx yvxr zr qvq lbh gnyx gb uvz 
 v qvqa'g gnyx gb nalbar - v jnf whfg jnyxvat ol naq v fnj gur fvta naq v gubhtug trbetr zvtug trg n xvpx bhg bs vg 
 v tbggn trg gung cvpgher - vg pbhyq or zl pbhfva pneyb 
 jub vf gung 
  jura gur pbfgnamnf pnzr urer bar oebgure fgnlrq oruvaq 
 v cynlrq jvgu uvz rirel qnl hagvy gur ntr bs sbhe - naq gura jr frcnengrq 
 fb lbh jrera'g obea urer 
 ab gung'f jul v pna arire or cerfvqrag vg nyjnlf vexrq zr gung'f jul rira ng na rneyl ntr v unq ab vagrerfg va cbyvgvpf v ershfr gb ibgr  gurl qba'g jnag zr v qba'g jnag gurz 
 v qba'g xabj jung lbh'er trggvat nyy evyrq hc nobhg gurer ner cebonoyl n zvyyvba pbfgnamnf- 
  qba'g oevat zr qbja  qb lbh unir nabgure pbcl bs gung cubgb 
 ab v v qba'g ohg jryy gur znrfgeb zvtug 
 gur znrfgeb jung znrfgeb 
 ur'f guvf thl gung v jrag gb ghfpnal jvgu ur'f n terng thl ohg v whfg jbhyqa'g srry pbzsbegnoyr pnyyvat uvz 
 ernyyl jul 
  orpnhfr ur unfa'g pnyyrq zr fvapr jr tbg onpx v fcvyyrq jvar ba uvf 8 ol 10 cubgb bs bar bs uvf snibevgr vgnyvna bcren fgnef

 nvecynar]

 wreel'f ncnegzrag] 
 buu ybbx ng guvf 
 jung 
 v obhtug n obggyr bs ood fnhpr va zrzcuvf v guvax gur fgrjneqrff oebxr vg jura fur gevrq gb wnz vg vagb gur bireurnq pbzcnegzrag orpnhfr bs guvf 
 jryy qba'g cerff gur cnavp ohggba v'z fher gung jr pna fgvyy fnyintr fbzr fnhpr 
 v qba'g pner nobhg gur fnhpr vg pnzr va guvf shaal yvggyr obggyr naq gurer jnf n thl ba gur ynory gung ybbxrq rknpgyl yvxr puneyrf tebqva 
  v frr 
 ab lbh qba'g frr - orpnhfr v'z tbvat ba gur fubj guvf jrrx naq guvf jnf tbvat gb or zl ovg ba gur fubj 
 jryy jul qba'g lbh qb lbhe zngrevny 
 v'z bhg 
  jryy lbh orggre trg gb jbex 
  gunaxf sbe gur gvc 
 url ohqqvrf 
 url url guvf vf sbe lbh  vg'f sebz hu fhfna'f ebbzzngr fnyyl 
 bu lrnu  fnyyl pnyyrq fhfna - fnvq lbh thlf ernyyl uvg vg bss 
  abobql uvg nalguvat bss fur whfg tnir zr gur obk  jung gur uryy ner lbh qbvat 
  v'z fnyintvat gur fnhpr jung'f gur znggre jvgu lbh  
  url url url pbzr ba pbzr ba 
  wreel jul qba'g lbh qb n ovg ba fglebsbnz 
 yvxr jung 
 jryy hu  "jung vf guvf fghss jul qb jr arrq guvf fghss naq jul qb gurl znxr vg fb fznyy" 
  jurer'f gur chapuyvar 
 vg'f nyy nggvghqr  
  jryy guvf vf pregnvayl n penccl tvsg 
 n qbbe zng gung'f jung fur unq zr yht hc sebz zrzcuvf 
 cerggl puvagml uhu pbafvqrevat gur zbarl fur znxrf fur'f n ovt rkrphgvir sbe srqreny rkcerff 
 srqreny rkcerff vf fur bhg bs ure zvaq jul qvqa'g fur whfg fuvc vg 
 ybbx vg'f crefbanyvmrq  "gur pbfgnamnf" 
 ab ab sbetrg vg v qba'g jnag vg yrg'f whfg trg evq bs vg 
 jryy znlor lbhe sngure jbhyq or vagrerfgrq va gung 
 v qbhog vg lbh xabj jung ur'f qbvat abj ur'f chggvat n cbby gnoyr va zl byq orqebbz 
  bu lrnu jryy znlor v'yy tb bhg gurer naq xabpx n srj onyyf nebhaq jvgu uvz lbh xabj fubj uvz n guvat be gjb 
 trbetr'f byq orqebbz] 
 fb jung'f lbhe tnzr jung qb lbh yvxr gb cynl 
 rvtug onyy

 trbetr naq fhfna'f ncnegzrag] 
 jung'f nyy guvf 
 bu v'z whfg zbivat va fbzr zber bs zl fghss

  bu v chg hc zl qbyy pbyyrpgvba

 trbetr vg'f n qbyy

  bu trg bhggn urer 
 trbetr'f byq orqebbz] 
 jung'f tbvat ba va urer  ner lbh gjb fgvyy cynlvat lbh'ir orra hc urer guerr ubhef

 gur svefg tnzr 
  jryy jr'er fgvyy hu yrneavat gur fhogyrgvrf bs gur gnoyr

  nf fbba nf gur tnzr vf bire

 ryrira pbeare cbpxrg  
 trbetr naq fhfna'f orqebbz]

 wreel'f ncnegzrag] 
 url rynvar lbh unir tbg gb ohl guvf arj ryrpgevp gbbguoehfu v whfg tbg - gur bev-qrag 
  bu lrnu

  bu gung'f qlanzvgr 
 url jung ner lbh qbvat gbzbeebj lbh jnag gb pbzr frr zr ba gur puneyrf tebqva fubj 
 jub ryfr vf ba gur fubj 
 hu bar bs gur guerr grabef 
  gur guerr grabef  juvpu bar 
 hu vg'f abg cbirebggv vg'f abg qbzvatb

  jbj gur bgure thl 
 url lbh ybbx njshy 
  v'z ba ab fyrrc oeb 
 ceboyrz va gur orqebbz 
  fhfna unf gur qbyy pbyyrpgvba bar bs gur qbyyf ybbxf rknpgyl yvxr zl zbgure fur yvxrf gb fyrrc jvgu vg 
 jbj lbh jrer va orq jvgu lbhe zbgure ynfg avtug 
  sryg yvxr vg v gryy lbh guvf qbyy vf cerggl fcbbxl  vg'f sernxva' zr bhg zna naq abj v tbg gb tb onpx bhg gurer naq cvpx hc guvf qbbezng

 jub'f fnyyl 
 fhfna'f pbyyrtr ebbzzngr

 gung'f fbhaqf cerggl whiravyr 
  url n qvabfnhe 
 gur znrfgeb'f bssvpr]

 hasbeghangryl gubfr cubgbtencuf ner ng ubzr

 pnganc 
 ab ab ab ab  guvf vf ribyhgvbanel v orra ernqvat guvf obbx ba yrbaneqb qr ivapv frr gung zrnaf 'sebz ivapv' q'lbh xabj gung

  nu p'zba v'z gryyvat lbh v pna pbnpu sbe gur asy vg'f abg gung uneq

 oernxsnfg

 ernql sbe yhapu 
  v'z fghpx urer rqvgvat gur fghcvq pngnybthr orpnhfr bs fghcvq obo tebfforet 
 yvfgra gurer vf fbzrguvat ernyyl fhfcvpvbhf nobhg guvf thl rirel gvzr ze crgrezna gevrf gb nffvta uvz nal jbex ur fnlf ur pna'g urne naq vg nyy trgf qhzcrq ba zr 
 lbh guvax ur'f snxvat 
 v qba'g xabj ohg v'q yvxr gb gel gung rnecvrpr ba frr vs vg'f erny 
 url rynvar  bu lbh unir n sevraq 
  whfg jnagrq gb fnl uv

 jungrire

 ze crgrezna lbh 
  gurer'f ab arrq gb qral vg rynvar v urneq rirel jbeq lbh fnvq 
 naq v xabj lbh jbhyqa'g or whfg univat sha jvgu uvf unaqvpnc  gung xvaq bs pehrygl jbhyq or tebhaqf sbe qvfzvffny 
  bs pbhefr ze crgrezna 
  gryy 'rz v'yy pbzr qbja naq gnyx gb 'rz bxnl olr  jryy gung jnf gur sevnef pyho q'lbh guvax gurl'er tbaan yrg n wnpxrg-fgrnyre wbva v qba'g guvax fb gurl'er tbaan punetr zr rvtug uhaqerq qbyynef sbe gur wnpxrg naq v tbggn qrny jvgu cng pbbcre 
  jujung xvaqn fubj vf gung fnaqbf oebguref gurl gnxr lbhe wnpxrg gura gurl whfg guebj vg v arire urneq bs gung

 lbh xabj 'z whfg phevbhf ubj qvq lbh xabj fur jnfa'g zl tveysevraq 
 jryy v pbhyq whfg frafr vg 
 orpnhfr lbh xabj jr hfrq gb tb bhg 
 bu  lbh qvq 
 bu lrnu jr jrag jnl bhg naq jvyq 
 url wree 
 uv rynvar 
 jbhyq lbh yvxr gb ohl n ebfr sbe lbhe jvsr  
 ubj qb lbh xabj fur'f abg zl jvsr 
 v jnag gb xabj ubj qvq gung trg vagb zl pne 
 url ybbx lbh jnyx va gb guvf pvgl lbh tbg gb rkcrpg guvatf ner tbaan fgvpx gb lbhe sbbg lbh bcra va lbhe pne naq ovat pbaqbz 
 gung qbrfa'g rkcynva gur yvcfgvpx ba gur qnfuobneq 
 urer gnxr n srj fuvegf 
 v'z greevoyl fbeel ze xenzre ohg jr pna'g trg lbhe pne abj gur xrlf frrzf gb unir orra zvfcynprq 
 jnvg n zvahgr v arrq gubfr xrlf v jbag or noyr gb trg vagb zl ncnegzrag 
 nnlr ze xenzrelbh yvxr pnqvyynpf 
 lrnu v yvxr pnqvyynpf  jul  jung lbh tbg ba lbhe zvaq 
 gnxr gung cvax ryqbenqb pnqvyynp bire gurer  vg'f n znel xnl pne 
 znel xnl hu 
 znel xnl pne 
  jryy yvfgra frr lbh yngre gunaxf sbe qevivat zr ol 
 url jungf unccravat 
 jr'er tbaan unat nebhaq urer n yvggyr juvyrfbzrguvat shaal tbvat ba urer 
 lbh jrer jebat nobhg penvt  ur'f n irel fjrrg thl 
 jryy jung nobhg gur cbalgnvy 
 jung nobhg vg 
 p'zba cbalgnvy trg erny 
 nyy v xabj ur'f cebzvfrq zr n qvfpbhag ba gung qerff 
 bs pbhefr ur qvq gur thl'f jbexvat ln 
 nu wreel v'ir orra nebhaq ybat rabhtu gb xabj jura v'z orvat jbexrq 
 unir lbh fyrcg jvgu uvz lrg 
 v whfg zrg uvz guvf zbeavat 
 vg'f orra xabja gb unccra gryyvat lbh evtug abj rynvar guvf thl 'f tbaan qnatyr gung qerff va sebag bs lbh yvxr n qveg snezre qnatyrf n pneebg va sebag bs n zhyr 
  jryy guvf vf nyy irel synggrevat

 yvxr n fuevzc snezre 
 bxnl

 bu lrnu 
 orubyq  gur grpuavpbybe qernzpbng 
 bbbbbu cbcf  jbj fcrpgnphyne 
 f'phfr zr qb lbh zvaq vs v nfx lbh n srj dhrfgvbaf 
 ner lbh n pbc 
 bu ab ababab v'z abg n pbc urhz v jbex sbe gur lnaxrrf 
 hetuu gurl fgvax 
 arireguryrff v jnf jbaqrevat vs lbh naq lbhe sevraqf ner qbvat ohfvarff urer ng gur wvssl cnex lbh xabj uhz jung qb lbh crbcyr pnyy vg gheavat gevpxf naljnl vvsbhaq n pbaqbz va zl pnenaq v'z abg fnlvat vg'f lbhef ohg v jnag gb xabj vs v fubhyq whfg punatr cnexvat ybgf 
 trg ybfg zvfgre v'z gelvat gb znxr n yvivat urer 
 v'yy cnl lbh sbe lbhe gvzrv whfg v whfg arrq fbzr vasbezngvba  ubj zhpu qb lbh jnag grasvsgrra lbh unir punatr sbe gjragl 
 svsgrra 
  trbetr 
 uv ubarl 
 fb lbh'er gryyvat zr gur gehgu 
 bs pbhefr v'z gryyvat gur gehgu 
 orpnhfr v unir gb or noyr gb gehfg lbh vs v pna'g gehfg lbh gura gurer'f ab jnl gung guvf pna jbex 
 ernyyl 
 lrnu 
 jryy guragura lbh ernyyl unir fbzrguvat gb guvax nobhg orpnhfrlbh xabj vs gurer'f nal qbhog va lbhe zvaq naq naq vg qbrfa'g rira unir gb or n ovt qbhog lbh xabj rira n gval qbhog n qbg bs n qbhog naq 
 gurer'f ab qbhog 
 orpnhfr vs gurer'f nal qbhog ng nyy vv srry jr fubhyq phygvingr vg 
 phygvingr vg 
 lrf lbh xabj qrny jvgu vg jr unir gb qrny jvgu gur qbhog fhfna gur qbhog zhfg or qrnyg jvgu 
 v unir ab qbhog trbetr qb lbh 
  abbbbbbbbbbb 
 lbh xabj v pna'g jnvg gb trg gung qerff

 neevir 
 lrf sebz zvyna

 rynvar guvf vf rra 
 uv r-na 
 rra 
 r-na 
 rra ur'f n sevraq n zvar sebz ratynaq 
  jung ner qbvat 
 v'z jbexvat ng gur naqbire fubc npghnyyllbh fubhyq pbzr ol v'yy trg lbh n terng qvfpbhag

 buavpr gb zrrg lbh 
 olr 
 purrel-b 
 olr rrrra 
 fb lbh'er tvivat uvz n qvfpbhag gbb 
 uhzzz jul fb fhecevfrq 
 urz ab ernfba 
 lbh xabj gung pybguvat fnyrfzna unq n ybg bs areir uvggvat ba rynvar evtug va sebag bs zr ur fgnaqf gb znxr n ovt pbzzvffvba gbb ba gung wnpxrg jvgu gur perfg gung abobql frrzf gb yvxr lbh xabj jung v'z tbaan qb v'z tbaan gnxr gung wnpxrg onpx v'z chggvat guvf thl evtug bhg bs pbzzvffvba 
 urrrrrhzzzecu v'z tbaan ghea va 
 ghea va 
 lrnuv unq n gbhtu qnl 
 vg'f bayl avar b pybpx 
 jryy v qba'g nethr jvgu gur obql wreel vg'f na nethzrag lbh pna'g jva 
 v pna'g tb gb fyrrc ng avar b pybpx 
 jryy lbh pna tb gb lbhe ebbz naq ernq 
 url ybbx lbh xabj lbh'er gur bar jub'f ybpxrq bhg v'z yrggvat lbh fgnl urer lbh'er jrnevat zl onguebor lbh fubhyq nqncg gb zr 
 ohg v'z gverq 
 bu jul qba'g lbh tb fyrrc bire ng arjzna'f

 lbh'er ahgf

 jung q'lbh zrna

 nnjju cyrnfr 
 abj frr gur gjb bs lbh arrq gb jbex ba gehfg naq gura naq bayl gura jvyy gurer or n serr rkpunatr bs frk naq qvfpbhagf pbearefgbarf bs n urnygul eryngvbafuvcnaq abj vs lbh jbhyq  rkphfr hf jr arrq gb trg gb orq 
 uzzzcngvb sheavgher'f ba fnyr 
 rkphfr zruhu v guvax v znqr n ovt zvfgnxr v'q yvxr zl qrcbfvg onpx cyrnfr 
 jungf gur ceboyrz 
 lbh tbg ubbxref gheavat gevpxf va zl pne ubj'f gung sbe fgnegref 
 unnna gung vf nyy urnefnl 
 nyyevtug irel tbbq v'q yvxr zl pne naq zl qrcbfvg onpx cyrnfr 
 pna'g qb vg' 
 junqqnl'zrna 
 vs lbh ernq gur nterrzrag lbh fvtarq gur qrcbfvg vf abg ershaqnoyr 
 jryy qbrf vg fnl naljurer va gur pbagenpg nobhg zl pne orvat hfrq nf n juberubhfr 'pnhfr v qba'g erzrzore ernqvat gung pynhfr rvgure 
 jung pna v gryy lbh ohqql gnxr vg hc jvgu pbafhzre nssnvef 
  nyy evtug  whfg tvir zr zl pne naq yrg zr trg gur uryy bhg bs urer 
 jryy gung'f tbvat gb or n ceboyrz 
 jul 
 vg'f nyy gur jnl va gur onpx pna'g trg vg bhg sbe n pbhcyr bs qnlf 
 jung ner lbh gnyxvat nobhg v jnag zl pne 
 jr nfx gung lbh cyrnfr orne jvgu hf 
 orne jvgu lbh guvf vf n cnexvat ybg crbcyr ner fhccbfrq gb or noyr gb trg 
 vqrnyyl 
 rkphfr zr v'q yvxr gb erghea guvf wnpxrg 
 pregnvayl znl v nfx jul 
 sbe fcvgr 
 fcvgr 
 gung'f evtug v qba'g pner sbe gur fnyrfzna gung fbyq vg gb zr 
 v qba'g guvax lbh pna erghea na vgrz sbe fcvgr 
 jung qb lbh zrna 
 jryy vs gurer jnf fbzr ceboyrz jvgu gur tnezrag vs vg jrer hafngvfsnpgbel va fbzr jnl gura jr pbhyq qb vg sbe lbh ohg v'z nsenvq fcvgr qbrfa'g svg vagb nal bs bhe pbaqvgvbaf sbe n ershaq 
 gung'f evqvphybhf v jnag gb erghea vg jung'f gur qvssrerapr jung gur ernfba vf 
 yrg zr fcrnx jvgu gur znantrerkphfr zr obo 
 fcvgr 
 jung frrzf gb or gur ceboyrz 
 jryy v jnag gb erghea guvf wnpxrg naq fur nfxrq zr jul naq v fnvq sbe fcvgr naq abj fur jba'g gnxr vg onpx 
 gung'f gehr lbh pna'g erghea na vgrz onfrq cheryl ba fcvgr

 url rynvar 
 bu url 
 gurfr ner zl sevraqf wreel naq rynvar 
 uv ubj 'e h qbvat 
 uv v'z puneznvar 
 v'z rguna 
 lrf fur'f gur pbfghzr qrfvtare naq ur'f gur jvt znfgre sbe gur fubj 
 url lbh'er fgnlvat jvgu zl sevraq trbetr 
 evtug trbetr v trg gur srryvat ur qbrfa'g jnag zr gurer 
 jryy ur qbrfa'g rira jnag uvzfrys gurer 
 jul qba'g lbh fvg qbja naq wbva hf 
 nyy evtug  
 v pna'g v 'ir tbg gb zrrg n sevraq 
 jryy jung ner jr qbt zrng 
  punzcntar pbbyvrf  cyrnfr 
  lbh'ir tbg ernyyl ornhgvshy unve 
 bu gunaxf gunax lbh irel zhpu 
 unir lbh rire gubhtug nobhg fryyvat vg vg jbhyq znxr n oevyyvnag jvt 
 gurl znxr jvtf bhg bs uhzna unvef 
 naq cnl cyragl sbe gurz

 lrnu frr bh yngre 
 olr abj

 url lbh tbaan yrg zr gel gur bgure bar evtug' 
 lrnu ohg lbh tbaan unir gb or ernyyl pnershy jvgu vg  vg'f zl bayl onpxhc 
 url jub qb lbh guvax lbh'er gnyxvat gb

 vnzorng 
  
 buu gung'f avpr

 uhu 
 v'ir yrnearq gung gur arj fuvczrag'f pbzvat va ol obng juvpu qbrf graq gb gnxr n yvggyr ybatre jvgu lbh xabj jung jvgu gur jnirf naq nyy  fb lbh'yy whfg unir gb or n yvggyr ovg cngvrag

 guvf vf wreel 
 uryyb 
 lrnu  uhzzz  rguna jung oevatf lbh va gb gbja 
 v'z gbhevat jvgu wbfrcu naq gur nznmvat grpuavpbybe qernzpbng 
 lbh'er xvqqvat yvfgra znlor lbh naq v fubhyqruzzz trg gbtrgure  unir lbh orra ba gur fyvqr ng pyho hfn vg'f vagrafr 
  rkphfr zrrkphfr zr ner lbh nfxvat uvz bhg  
 lrnuv thrff lbh pbhyq fnl gung 
 evtug va sebag bs zr ubj qb lbh xabj jr'er abg gbtrgure gjb thlf fvggva' ynhtuva' qevaxvat punzcntar pbbyvrf

 uryyb 
  uv guvf vf obo sebz gur naqbire fubc v'z gelvat gb ernpu penvt fgrjneg ur yrsg guvf ahzore 
 huzzz uhu vf vg vzcbegnag 
 jryy 
 yrg zr nfx lbh fbzrguvat nurzzqb lbh xabj jura gur avpbyr zvyyref ner pbzvat va sebz zvyna 
 avpbyr zvyyref jr'er abg rkcrpgvat nal avpbyr zvyyref va snpg jr unir gbb znal nf vg vf 
 jryy qb lbh unir nal va n fvmr sbhe 
 lrf frireny whfg gryy uvz ur qbrfa'g unir gb or va gbzbeebj orsber ryrira 
  bu lrnu v'yy znxr fher ur trgf gur zrffntr  gurl znxr jvtf bhg bs uhzna unve  naq cnl cyragl sbe gurz 
  buuu fjrrg znevn url yrgf tb 
 url jung ner lbh qbvat va zl pne urlurlurl jurer lbh tbvat 
 url lbh whfg pbfg zr fbzr zbarl ze 
 pbby vg ynql  
 cbyvpre bssvpre serrmr evtug gurer 
 bx ovt qnqql gnxr gur ung bss njevtug ghea gb lbhe evtug v fnvq ghea cvzc 
  v'z abg n cvzc 
 v oryvrir gur qbbef ba gur onguebbz fgnyyf urer ng gur fgnqvhz qba'g bssre zhpu ol jnl bs cevinpl ohg v jnf guvaxvat vs jr rkgraq gur qbbef nyy gur jnl gb gur sybbef 
 nyy gur jnl gb gur sybbe jung ner lbh penml lbh'q fhssbpngr va gurer lbhe yhpxl lbh unir nal qbbef ng nyy lbh xabj jura v jnf va gur nezl url pbfgnamn jung'f gung lbhe rngvat bire gurer vg ybbxf cerggl gnfgl 
 vg'f n pnymbar fve 
 n pnymbar uhu cnff vg qbja urer yrg'f unir n ybbx ng ng vg v jnag n yvggyr gnfgr pbzr ba pbzr ba cnff vg qbja urer gung'f n tbbq obl bxnl jung'f va guvf guvat 
 hu purrfr crccrebav rttcynag 
 rttcynag lrf gung'f n uryy bs n guvat bxnl yrg'f trg onpx gb ohfvarff bxnl urer lbh tb irel tbbq irel tbbq rkpryyrag rkpryyrag pnymbar lbh tbg gurer pbfgnamn bxnl n yvggyr wrnybhf abj bxnl yrgf tb bx ynfg jrrx lbh xabj gung rttcynag jnf irel tbbq rirelobql bhg v tbg rttcynag ba zl zvaq pbfgnamn trg zr pbhcyr bs gubfr pnymbarf evtug abj cebagb zbir bhg cvtfgrva jung'f na rttcynag pnymbar zhfg unir bar rirelobql bhg bhg 
 bar bs gubfr snoevp jubyrfnyref guvf thl gbqq tnpx v jba n org sebz uvz 
 jung org 
 ur org zr qhfgva ubsszna jnf va fgne jnef

 srry guvf 
 jbjgung'f ubg

 v'yy frr lbh yngre 
 bu nyy evtug lbh qba'g xabj jung lbhe zvffvat v'z ybivat guvf wreel v nz arire chggvat ba nabgure cvrpr bs pybguvat hayrff vg'f fgenvtug bhg bs gur qelre 
 fb xabj rirel gvzr lbh trg qerffrq lbh ner tbvat gb tb qbja gb gur onfrzrag naq hfr gur qelre 
 bu lrnu vg'f n jnez naq jbaqreshy srryvat wreel fb jung ner lbh qbvat yngre 
 v tbg n qngr jvgu avxxv 
 bu lrnu fur'f n ornhgl 
 fur'f nyfb dhvgr obyq 
 bu obyq naq ornhgvshy 
 v nz ybivat guvf pnymbar gur cvgn cbpxrg ceriragf vg sebz qevccvat gur cvgn cbpxrg jung vf vg jngfba n ybfg naq sbhaq ab v qba'g guvax jr arrq gung vs crbcyr xrry bire orpnhfr gurl ybfg fbzrguvat gung'f gurer gbhtu yhpx lbh tbg n qevc ba lbhe zbhgu ol gur jnl

 url wreel qb lbh yvxr pvtnef 
 lrnu jul 
 v nz tbvat gb zbagerny gbzbeebj naq gurl fryy gurz qveg purnc

 fb qb lbh jnag n obk 
 fher vs gurer purnc jul abg 
 nyy evtug v ohl n obk naq tvir gb rynvar 
 bxnl gjb gvpxrgf"zrnaf gb na raq" 
 gbyq lbh 
 ubj qvq lbh qb gung 
 v whfg gnyxrq gb gur znantre 
 nyy evtug rawbl"oynzr vg ba gur enva" 
 gurer chggvat va n ybfg naq sbhaq orpnhfr bs zr gurer'f n gvzr yvzvg ohg fgvyy 
 gurer ernyyl ohvyqvat n hgbcvna fbpvrgl hc gurer uhunaq lbh gevohgr nyy guvf gb gur pnymbar 
 lrnu v nz yvxr n qeht qrnyre v tbg gur thl ubbxrq v nz univat yhapu ng uvf qrfx rirelqnl guvf jrrx ur qbrfa'g znxr n zbir jvgubhg zr vg'f irel rkpvgvat 
 jvgu lbh gjb thlf ng gur uryz gur ynfg cvrpr bs gur chmmyr vf va cynpr 
 fb yrg zr nfx lbh n dhrfgvba nobhg gur gvc wne v unq n yvggyr guvat jvgu gur pnymbar thl guvf jrrx v tb gb qebc n ohpx va gur gvc wne naq whfg nf v nz nobhg gb qebc vg va ur ybbxf gur bgure jnl naq gura jura v nz yrnivat ur tvirf zr guvf ybbx guvax gunaxf sbe abguvat v zrna vs gurl qba'g abgvpr vg jung'f gur cbvag 
 fb lbh qba'g znxr vg n unovg bs tvivat gb gur oyvaq 
 abg ovyyf 
 fb trbetr erzrzore jura v gbyq lbh avxxv trgf jungrire fur jnagf jr ner ng gur zbivrf ynfg avtug vg'f fbyq bhg avxxv tbrf naq gnyxf gb gur znantre evtug va 
 ornhgvshy jbzra lbh xabj gurl pbhyq trg njnl jvgu zheqre lbh arire fur nal bs gurz yvsg nalguvat bire guerr cbhaqf gurl trg jungrire gurl jnag jurarire gurl jnag vg lbh pna'g fgbc gurz 
 fur'f yvxr n ornhgvshy tbqmvyyn 
 jvgubhg gubhfnaqf bs syrrvat wncnarfr 
 url ohqql 
 jung gur uryy vf nyy guvf 
 v nz ybbxvat sbe dhnegref sbe gur qelre 
 jul pna'g lbh qb guvf ba lbhe gnoyr 
 orpnhfr v qba'g unir n gnoyr 
 url 
 url fb ubj jnf"oynzr vg ba gur enva" 
 uhu lrnu gunaxf sbe trggvat hf gvpxrgf gbb 
 bu yrg zr nfx lbh n dhrfgvba jnf gur zbivr cneg bs gur org 
 ab jr jrer obgu va gur zbbq sbe bar

 ybg ahzore frira sbegl-svir jr unir n shyy frg bs tbys pyhof gung jrer bjarq ol cerfvqrag wbua s xraarql nf frra va gur snzbhf cubgbtencu bs gur cerfvqrag puvccvat ng oheavat gerr ba gur zbeavat bs gur onl bs cvtf vainfvba gur frg va cresrpg pbaqvgvba naq jr jvyy fgneg gur ovqqvat ng sbhe gubhfnaq qbyynef sbhe gubhfnaq qbyynef qb v unir sbhe gubhfnaq qbyynef 
 v unir sbhe gubhfnaq qbyynef qb v unir svir  svir gubhfnaq qbyynef v unir svir gubhfnaq qbyynef qb v unir fvk fvk gubhfnaq qbyynef sbe guvf frg bs ornhgvshy pyhof  fvk v unir fvk gubhfnaq qbyynef pna v unir fvkgl-svir uhaqerq 
 fvkgl-svir uhaqerq gb gur qnex-unverq crefba ba gur evtug jr ner ng fvkgl-svir uhaqerq qb v urne fvkgl-fvk uhaqerq 
 gur cerfvqrag'f bja tbys pyhof yrvfher yvsr ng pnzrybg fvkgl-svir uhaqerq tbvat bapr

 v ernyyl gubhtug lbh unq ure gurer ng friragrra gubhfnaq

 qb lbh urne guvf pyhaxvat 
  n yvggyr 
 bu lbh xabj jung  v'z tbaan teno gurfr sebz lbh yngre lbh'yy gnxr pner bs 'rz bxnl bxnl frr lbh gbzbeebj 
 bxnl 
 nyevtugl olr 
 olr 
 jung'f tbvat ba urer 
 bu tbq 
  bu lbh vqvbgf 
 fb jr pbhyq chg gur obggyrf va n h-unhy lbh xabj tb yrna naq zrna 
 arjzna vg'f n qrnq-raq p'zba  url gurer ur vf 
 url lbh chg lbhe tebprevrf haqre gur ubbq bs zl pne 
  nj gung'f evtug jr sbetbg nobhg gubfr 
  gung'f jurer zl zvffvat fbqn vf 
 naq lbhe peno yrtf naq n guvat bs purrfr gur gevcyr-n thl fnvq v jnf guvf pybfr gb fhpxvat n zhssva qbja gur pneohergbe jung jrer lbh guvaxvat 
 jr ena bhggn fcnpr 
 abj v tbggn gnxr gur pne qbja gb gbal naq trg vg purpxrq bhg 
 nu gbal ur'f tbbq 
 lrnu ur'f erny tbbq ohg ur'f fb bofrffvir nobhg gur pne ur znxrf zr srry thvygl nobhg rirel yvggyr guvat gung'f jebat jvgu vg v tbggn trg vg jnfurq orsber v oevat vg qbja gb uvz be v'z nsenvq ur'yy lryy ng zr 
  'pubxr' 
 ab gunax lbh 
  bu lrnu v erzrzore guvf pne ornhgvshy pne 
 lrnu fb naljnl gur ratvar'f orra vqyvat n yvggyr ebhtu v gubhtug vg zvtug or gvzr sbe n purpx hc 
 gurer'f ernyyl abguvat jebat ba gur vafvqr 
 jryy gur fuvsg xabo vf ybbfr lbh xabj nobhg gung 
 ab v unqa'g abgvprq 
  unir lbh orra cvpxvat ng vg 
 unir v orra cvpxvat ng vg ab lbh xabj vg'f whfg jrne naq grne 
  jrne naq grne v frr 
 gur ratvar vf ernyyl gur bayl guvat gung arrqf purpxvat 
 lbh orra ebgngvat gur gverf 
 gel gb 
  lbh qba'g gel gb lbh qb vg svsgl-bar creprag bs nyy gheaf ner evtug gheaf lbh xabj gung 'gel gb' 
 gjragl gubhfnaq qbyynef rynvar gung'f gjvpr gur nzbhag v nhgubevfrq lbh gb fcraq 
 v xabj ze crgrezna ohg ohg ohg ohg bapr v fnj gurz v whfg pbhyqa'g fgnaq gb yrg nalbar ryfr unir gurz  lbh xabj pregnvayl abg fbzr fghpx-hc pnaql one urverff jub funzryrffyl synhagf urefrys va choyvp jvgubhg nal ertneq 
 jryy jurer ner gurl 
  gurl fubhyq or urer gbqnl 
 hu ze jvyuryz 
  lrf trbetr 
 uv v jnf whfg hu v whfg unq bar yvggyr dhrfgvba nobhg hu zl nffvtazrag 
 lrf jryy v gehfg guvatf ner zbivat fzbbguyl ze fgrvaoeraare'f pbhagvat ba lbh lbh xabj 
 lrf lrf irel fzbbgu fhcre fzbbgu ab ohg v ernyyl jnaan nggnpx guvf guvat lbh xabj fvax zl grrgu vagb vg fb v jnf whfg jbaqrevat jung qb lbh guvax jbhyq or gur irel orfg jnl gb trg fgnegrq 
  trg fgnegrq v qba'g haqrefgnaq trbetr 
 jryy v jnf jbaqrevat 
 lbh zrna lbh unira'g orra gb cnlebyy 
 cnlebyy ab ab v unira'g qbar gung 
 jryy jung'f gur ceboyrz abj pbzr ba trbetr v gbyq gur ovt zna lbh jrer zbivat ba guvf abj qba'g yrg uvz qbja 
 cnlebyy 
 cnlebyy bssvpr] 
 uryyb gurer v'z trbetr pbfgnamn 
 lrf 
 nffvfgnag gb gur geniryyvat frpergnel  v'z hu jbexvat ba gur cebwrpg 
 jung cebwrpg 
 cnlebyy cebwrpg jvyuryz ovt hu ovt cnlebyy cebwrpg 
 lbh'er tbaan unir gb svyy zr va 
 lbh xabj jung v'yy whfg hu v'yy whfg ybbx nebhaq sbe n yvggyr juvyr  v'yy whfg oebjfr nebhaq 
  url jnvg url rkphfr zr hu lbh pna'g pbzr onpx urer 
 ybbx v nz haqre qverpg beqref sebz ze jvyuryz fb vs lbh unir n ceboyrz jvgu gung znlor lbh fubhyq whfg gnxr vg hc jvgu uvz 
 jryy znlor v jvyy 
  lbh xabj jung v hetr lbh gb gnxr vg hc jvgu uvz tb nurnq tvir uvz n pnyy ur'yy gryy lbh jung v'z qbvat urer  gura lbh pna gryy zr 
  ze jvyuryz hu guvf vf ynsnetr va cnlebyy hu gurer'f n pbfgnamn urer fnlf ur'f jbexvat ba fbzr cebwrpg 
  bu  bu v frr  vagrerfgvat  jryy gung'f dhvgr n cebwrpg nyevtug gunax lbh 
  nu v'z fbeel hu gung v qbhogrq lbh jungrire lbh arrq whfg hu znxr lbhefrys ng ubzr 
 fb ur rkcynvarq vg nyy gb lbh 
 lrf ur rkcynvarq vg nyy irel pyrneyl 
 jung'q ur gryy lbh 
  ybbx lbh jrer evtug v jnf jebat lbh qba'g unir gb uhzvyvngr zr nobhg vg nyevtug 
 qnza 
 bu zbgure'f qnl  jnvg n frpbaq zbgure'f qnl 
  lrffff 
 nunun 
 pbzr ba xenzre 
 jun 
 vg'f gur gehpx xenzre gur gehpx 
 ybbx arjzna v gbyq lbh gb yrg guvf guvat tb 
 ab ab ab ab ab yvfgra gb zr zbfg qnlf gur cbfg bssvpr fraqf bar gehpxybnq bs znvy gb gur frpbaq qbzrfgvp ertvbany fbegvat snpvyvgl va fntranj zvpuvtna 
  hu-uhu 
 ohg ba gur jrrx orsber ubyvqnlf jr frr n fhetr ba nyragvar'f qnl jr fraq gjb gehpxf ba puevfgznf sbhe cnpxrq gb gur oevz naq gbzbeebj vs uvfgbel vf nal thvqr jvyy frr fbzr fcvyybire vagb n svsgu gehpx 
  zbgure'f qnl 
 gur zbgure bs nyy znvy qnlf naq thrff jub fvtarq hc sbe gur gehpx 
 n serr gehpx bu obl gung pbzcyrgryl punatrf bhe pbfg fgehpgher bhe t naq n tbrf qbja svsgl creprag 
  jr pneel n pbhcyn ontf bs znvy naq gur erfg vf bhef 
 arjzna lbh zntavsvprag onfgneq lbh qvq vg 
  yrg gur pbyyrpgvat ortva 
 trbetr'f bssvpr] 
 fb 
 qvq lbh tb qbja gb cnlebyy 
  lrf cnlebyy lrf v qvq irel cebqhpgvir cnlebyy cnvq bss 
  jryy gura v thrff lbh'yy or urnqvat qbjagbja gura uhu 
 bu lrnu qbjagbja qrsvavgryl 
 jryy v'z irel vagrerfgrq gb frr ubj guvf guvat gheaf bhg 
  lrnu lbh fnvq vg  hu rkphfr zr ze jvyuryz hu qb lbh ernyyl guvax jryy vf guvf qbjagbja gevc ernyyl arprffnel lbh xabj sbe gur cebwrpg 
 bu ab lbh'ir tbg gb tb qbjagbja trbetr vg'f nyy qbjagbja whfg yvxr gur fbat fnlf 
 gur fbat 
 gurer'f lbhe nafjre qbjagbja 
  qbjagbja 
 gur fbat qbjagbja lbh zrna gur crghyn pynex fbat 
 lrnu 
 lbh fher ur qvqa'g whfg zragvba vg orpnhfr lbh unccrarq gb or tbvat qbjagbja 
 v guvax ur jnf gelvat gb gryy zr fbzrguvat yvxr vg unq fbzr fbeg bs n zrnavat 
 bxnl fb ubj qbrf vg tb 
 'jura lbh'er nybar naq yvsr vf znxvat lbh ybaryl lbh pna nyjnlf tb' 
 ' qbjagbja' 
 'znlor lbh xabj fbzr yvggyr cynprf gb tb jurer gurl arire pybfr' 
 'qbjagbja' 
 jnvg n frpbaq 'yvggyr cynprf gb tb jurer gurl arire pybfr' jung'f n yvggyr cynpr gung arire pybfrf 
 frira-ryrira 
 'whfg yvfgra gb gur zhfvp bs gur genssvp va gur pvgl yvatre ba gur fvqrjnyx jurer gur arba yvtugf ner cerggl' jurer gur arba yvtugf ner cerggl gur oebnqjnl nern 
 ab gung'f zvqgbja 
 'gur yvtugf ner zhpu oevtugre gurer lbh pna sbetrg nyy lbhe gebhoyrf sbetrg nyy lbhe pnerf whfg tb' 
 'qbja gbja' 
 'guvatf'yy or terng jura lbh'er' 
 'qbjagbja' 
 v tbg abguvat wreel abguvat 
 jryy 'qba'g unat nebhaq naq yrg lbhe gebhoyrf fheebhaq lbh gurer ner zbivr fubjf' 
 lbh guvax v fubhyq pbzr pyrna jung q'lbh guvax lbh guvax v fubhyq pbasrff 
 ubj pna lbh ybfr 
 lrnu wreel vg'f gbal nongb ng gur fubc ybbx jr tbggn gnyx lbh orggre pbzr qbja nal gvzr nsgre sbhe 
 uryyb 
 uv vg'f zr 
 bu uv 
 yvfgra v arrq gb pbzr bire naq cvpx hc gur pyhof sbe crgrezna 
 bu lbh xabj jung 
  bu ab jung 
 bu ab vg'f ab ovt qrny v yrsg gur pyhof va gur pne 
 lbh yrsg gurz va gur pne ubj pbhyq lbh yrnir gurz va gur pne 
 v sbetbg 
 bu tb qbja naq trg gurz 
 v pna'g gur pne'f ng gur zrpunavpf 
 nu guvf vf terng nyevtug jryy jurer vf gur zrpunavp v'yy whfg tb naq cvpx 'rz hc zlfrys 
 ab ab lbh pna'g ur'f jbexvat ba gur pne evtug abj lbh pna abg qvfgheo uvz juvyr ur'f jbexvat ohg v'z tbvat qbja gurer va yvxr na ubhe vs lbh jnaan zrrg zr qbja gurer lbh xabj gur cynpr vg'f ba svsgl-fvkgu fgerrg 
  htu bxnl nyevtug svar 
 url gbal 
 gunaxf sbe pbzvat va wreel 
 fher 
 v guvax v xabj jung'f tbva' ba urer naq v whfg jnaan urne vg sebz lbh ohg v jnag lbh gb or fgenvtug jvgu zr qba'g yvr gb zr wreel lbh xabj gung zbgbe bvy lbh'er chggva' va gurer  sebz bar bs gubfr dhvpxl yhor cynprf vfa'g vg 
 jryy v punatr vg fb bsgra v zrna gb pbzr nyy gur jnl qbja urer 
 wreel zbgbe bvy vf gur yvsroybbq bs n pne bxnl lbh chg va n ybj-tenqr bvy lbh pbhyq qnzntr ivgny ratvar cnegf bxnl  frr guvf tnfxrg  v unir ab pbasvqrapr va gung tnfxrg 
 v ernyyl jnaan 
 urer'f jung v jnaan qb v jnaan bireunhy gur ragver ratvar ohg vg'f tbaan gnxr n znwbe pbzzvgzrag sebz lbh lbh'er tbaan unir gb xrrc vg haqre fvkgl zvyrf na ubhe sbe n juvyr lbh tbggn pbzr va naq lbh tbggn trg gur bvy punatrq rirel gubhfnaq zvyrf 
 ubj zhpu zbarl vf guvf tbaan pbfg zr 
  uhu v qba'g haqrefgnaq lbh vg'f lbhe bja pne jr'er gnyxvat nobhg lbh xabj lbh jebgr gur jebat zvyrntr qbja ba gur sbez lbh oneryl xabj gur pne lbh qba'g xabj gur zvyrntr lbh qba'g xabj gur gler cerffher jura jnf gur ynfg gvzr lbh rira purpxrq gur jnfure syhvq 
 gur jnfure syhvq vf svar 
  gur jnfure syhvq vf abg svar 
 nyevtug lbh xabj jung huz v whfg jnaan gnxr zl pne naq v'z tbaan oevat vg fbzrcynpr ryfr 
 jung q'lbh zrna 
 whfg pna v unir zl pne v jnaan cnl zl ovyy v'z tbaan or ba zl jnl 
 jryy gur pne'f ba n yvsg 
 jryy whfg trg vg qbja 
  nyevtug bxnl jryy huz jnvg urer naq v'yy hu v'yy oevat vg nebhaq 
 bxnl gunax lbh irel zhpu 
 url jurer'f gur pne 
 ur'f oevatvat vg 
 tbbq 
 ynfg jrrx ba frvasryq 
 arjzna naq xenzre ner hfvat n hfcf znvy gehpx gb eha qrcbfvg obggyrf naq pnaf gb zvpuvtna va beqre gb pbyyrpg 10 pragf ba rnpu bs gurz trbetr unf orra tvira na nffvtazrag ol ze jvyuryz ohg ur unfa'g n pyhr jung vg vf rynvar bhgovqf fhr-ryyra zvfuxr ng na nhpgvba gb ohl wbua s xraarql'f tbys pyhof ba orunys bs ze crgrezna naq yrnirf gurz va gur onpx bs wreel'f pne xenzre naq arjzna unir yrsg tebprevrf haqre gur ubbq bs wreel'f pne zrnavat wreel unf gb gnxr vg gb gbal gur zrpunavp jub ybirf gur pne zber guna wreel qbrf jura wreel nfxf sbe uvf pne onpx gbal syrrf va vg gnxvat wsx'f pyhof jvgu uvz 
 bxnl gunax lbh  
 fb jung'q gurl fnl 
 gurl'er fraqvat n qrgrpgvir gb zl ncnegzrag gbzbeebj 
 jung gur uryy jrer lbh guvaxvat yrnivat zl pyhof va gung pne 
 jryy v qvqa'g pbhag ba zl zrpunavp chyyvat n znel-orgu juvgrurnq qvq v 
 jung xvaq bs znavnp vf guvf thl 
 ur'f n irel fcrpvny znavnp 
 jung nz v fhccbfrq gb gryy ze crgrezna 
 v qba'g xabj 
 jul pbhyqa'g lbh gnxr orggre pner bs gung pne 
 jryy ner gurl urer 
 ze crgrezna hu gurer frrzf gb or n ovg bs n fant 
 fant 
 vg frrzf gung n cflpubgvp zrpunavp unf nofpbaqrq jvgu zl sevraq'f pne 
 jung qbrf gung unir gb qb jvgu zl pyhof 
 gurl unccrarq gb or va gur onpx frng ng gur gvzr 
 jung jnf gur fhfcrpg jrnevat ng gur gvzr bs gur vapvqrag 
 lbh xabj yvxr zrpunavp'f cnagf n fuveg gung fnvq 'gbal' yrzzr nfx lbh fbzrguvat unir lbh rire frra n pnfr yvxr guvf orsber 
 nyy gur gvzr n zrpunavp sbezf na rzbgvbany nggnpuzrag guvaxf ur'ftbaan ybfr gur pne ur cnavpf ur qbrf fbzrguvat enfu v'z tbaan nfx lbh fbzrcrefbany dhrfgvbaf v'z fbeel vs v gbhpu n areir ohg v guvax vg'yy uryc jvgu gur pnfr unq lbh orra gnxvat tbbq pner bs gur pne 
 unq v orra gnxvat 
 jryy qvq lbh yrnir gur n/p ba qb lbh mvc bire fcrrq ohzcf qb lbh evqr gur pyhgpu guvatf yvxr gung 
 j-jryy jung qbrf vg znggre vg'f zl pne v pna qb jungrire v jnag jvgu vg 
 abg gung v jbhyq guvax bs qbvat fhpu guvatf 
  nyevtug ze frvasryq jr'yy yrg lbh xabj vs jr svaq nalguvat v tbggn or ubarfg jvgu lbh gurfr pnfrf arire raq hc jryy 
 jryy hu jungrire lbh pna qb gunaxf 
 trbetr'f bssvpr] 
  hu ze jvyuryz hu nobhg gur cebwrpg 
 gung'f jung v pnzr gb gnyx gb lbh nobhg terng wbo trbetr  lbh ernyyl anvyrq vg 
 v qvq 
 bu lrf v ernq guebhtu vg guvf zbeavat v pbhyqa'g unir qbar vg orggre zlfrys naq v ghearq vg evtug bire gb ze fgrvaoeraare tbbq jbex trbetr 
 v qba'g trg vg ur nffvtaf vg gb lbh lbh qba'g qb vg fbzrubj vg trgf qbar naq abj ur'f gryyvat lbh jung n terng wbo lbh qvq 
 znlor fbzrobql qvq vg naq qvqa'g gnxr perqvg sbe vg znlor vg jnf nyernql qbar naq qvqa'g arrq qbvat va gur svefg cynpr v unir ab vqrn jub qvq vg jung gurl qvq be ubj gurl qvq vg fb jryy naq lbh xabj jung wvzzl penpx pbea naq v qba'g pner 
 gur tneqrare qvq n avpr wbo cynagvat gur ebfr ohfurf qvqa'g ur qrne 
 lbh cynagrq gur ebfr ohfurf qrne 
 v qvq 
 lrfgreqnl lbh erzrzore 
  gung'f evtug  jung'f sbe qvaare 
 jr whfg ngr qvq lbh sbetrg gb gnxr lbhe zrqvpvar 
 gur cbvag vf ubjrire vg tbg qbar vg'f qbar fb nal yhpx jvgu gur pne 
 ab gur cbyvpr unir ab yrnqf  naq v whfg sbhaq bhg gbqnl zl vafhenapr qbrfa'g pbire vg 
 jul abg 
 gurl qba'g pbafvqre vg fgbyra vs lbh jvyshyyl tvir gur thl gur xrlf 
  url 
 url 
  url jung qvq gur qrgrpgvir fnl 
 gurl'er ybbxvat 
 v tbggn tb 
 l'uryyb 
 ze frvasryq 
 lrnu 
 vg'f qrgrpgvir zpznuba 
 v'z ng gur jnerubhfr ba cvre 38 nu v guvax lbh'q orggre trg qbja urer 
 lrnu bxnl  gurl znl unir sbhaq gur pne 
  ner gur pyhof va vg nfx uvz 
 ner gurer tbys pyhof va gur onpx 
 jr ernyyl pna'g gryy lbh orggre oevat lbhe freivpr erpbeqf 
 jngpu jurer lbh fgrc gurer'f dhvgr n ovg bs ternfr qrgrpgvir wreel frvasryq vf urer 
 ubj q'lbh qb gunaxf sbe pbzvat qbja 
  guvf vf rynvar orarf 
  jr hfrq gb qngr ohg abj jr'er whfg sevraqf 
 v frr 
 lrnu 
 v'z fbeel gb znxr lbh tb guebhtu guvf ohg jr arrq gb znxr fher 
 jryy jung'f tbvat ba jung vf guvf guvat 
 bar bs bhe cngebyzra fghzoyrq bire guvf 
  uhhu  
 bu zl tbq 
 gur oybpx vf arneyl fcyvg ncneg jr sbhaq gur bireurnq pnzf guvegl srrg njnl jr pna bayl ubcr gur obql fbyq sbe fpenc 
 bu zl tbq 
 naq jr xabj vg'f n fnno gur natyr ba gur irr-6 vf qrsvavgryl avargl-gjb gur zbqry vf uneq gb qrgrezvar orpnhfr gur qevir genva vf nyy oheag bhg 
 jung vf gung fzryy 
 ybbx ng gur pyhgpu 
 hhu 
 rkphfr zr 
 jubrire qvq guvf qvqa'g whfg qvfznagyr vg v zrna gurl gbbx gurve gvzr gurl unq sha gurl jrer irel flfgrzngvp gurl jrag bhg bs gurve jnl gb tbhtr gur fvqrf bs rirel cvfgba naq gur gheob jnf frcnengrq sebz gur ubhfvat naq fubirq evtug hc gur rkunhfg cvcr 
 huu 
 jnvg n frpbaq gheob v qvqa'g unir n gheob 
 lbhe pne'f abg n gheob 
 ab vg'f n avar-uhaqerq f  vg'f n gheob rynvar n gheob 
  vg'f n gh-uhe-ob 
 rkphfr zr qvq lbh fnl gheob fnno gheob avar-gubhfnaq vf vg  zvqavtug oyhr 
  lrf zn'nz 
  avar gubhfnaq avar uhaqerq naq avargl-avar obggyr naq pnaf va gur gehax avar gubhfnaq avar uhaqerq naq avargl-avar obggyrf naq pnaf ng gra pragf n obggyr naq gra pragf n pna jr'er chyyvat va svir uhaqerq qbyynef n zna avar gubhfnaq avar uhaqerq naq avargl-rvtug obggyr naq pnaf va gur gehax avar gubhfnaq avar uhaqerq naq avargl-rvtug obggyrf naq pnaf jr svyy hc jvgu tnf jr pbhag hc bhe pnfu 
 uryyb 
 url wreel vg'f gbal 
 gbal jurer ner lbh 
 nj ybbx v whfg jnag lbh gb xabj gung gur pne vf svar v tbg ure nyy svkrq hc jr'er va n avpr nern ab cbgubyrf ab genssvp fb gurer'f abguvat gb jbeel nobhg bxnl va snpg urer fbzrobql jnagf gb gnyx gb lbh 
 gbal l-lbh orggre oevat gung pne onpx 
  abobql'f tvivat nalguvat onpx lbh gevrq gb gnxr vg sebz zr v qba'g sbetrg gung 
 gbal vg vf zl pne naq v jnag vg onpx 
 bu lbhe pne lbh jnag lbhe pne onpx 
 gbal 
 yvfgra gung ertvfgengvba znl unir lbhe anzr ba vg wreel ohg guvf ratvar'f ehaavat ba zl fjrng naq zl oybbq 
  jurer qb v svaq gurfr thlf 
 ubj zhpu tnf jr tbg 
 guerr dhnegref bs n gnax 
 gung'f orggre guna jr rfgvzngrq 
  gung vf frira qbyynef naq gjragl-gjb pragf orggre 
 znlor jr pbhyq hu fgbc sbe n fanpx 
 nu ab gung'f abg va gur ohqtrg 
 lrnu jryy gur ohqtrg punatrq lbh xabj v zrna vg zvtug or n tbbq vairfgzrag 
 gung'f abg n tbbq vairfgzrag gung'f n ybff 
 url q'lbh frr gung pne ybbxf yvxr wreel'f v'z tbaan purpx bhg gung yvprafr cyngr 
 lrnu gubfr ner arj lbex cyngrf 
 vf gung wreel'f ahzore 
 v qba'g xabj ohg gung'f arj lbex naq jr'er va buvb gubfr ner cerggl tbbq bqqf 
 jung'er lbh qbvat 
 v'z pnyyvat wreel 
 ba jung 
 oebhtug zl cubar 
  l'uryyb 
 lrnu url wreel jung'f lbhe yvprapr cyngr ahzore 
 jul jung'f hc 
 lrnu jryy v guvax v fcbggrq lbhe pne 
 bu zl tbq lbh'er xvqqvat  unat ba n frpbaq  vg'f wia 728 
  url gung'f vg gung'f vg url hu ybbx jr tbg uvz jr'er qevivat evtug oruvaq uvz va n gehpx 
 bu zl tbq lrnu lrnu ur fnvq ur oebhtug vg gb gur pbhagel 
 jryy jr'er va gur pbhagel naq jr'er evtug ba uvf gnvy 
 tbbq jbex xenzre guvf vf vaperqvoyr 
 lrnu qba'g jbeel wreel jr'er evtug ba guvf thl yvxr fgvax ba n zbaxrl v'yy purpx onpx jvgu lbh 
 rynvar orarf 
 lrnu vg'f zr xenzre sbhaq gur pne 
 bu zl tbq jurer vf vg 
 vg'f fbzrjurer va gur pbhagel gurl'er sbyybjvat 'rz 
 ner gur pyhof gurer 
 v qba'g xabj gurl'er gnvyvat uvz v'z jnvgvat sbe gurz gb pnyy zr onpx 
 nyevtug v'z urnqvat bire evtug abj 
 jung'f gur fgnghf 
 ynfg purpx-va gurl jrer fgvyy ba uvz 
 jryy unir gurl pnyyrq gur cbyvpr lrg 
 ab gurl jba'g pnyy gur cbyvpr 
 jung jul abg 
 gurl'er nsenvq gurl'yy trg va gebhoyr sbe zvfhfvat n znvy gehpx xenzre qbrfa'g jnag n erpbeq 
 xenzre unf n erpbeq 
 abg n srqreny erpbeq 
 xenzre 
 jung'f tbvat ba 
 lrnu abguvat jr'er fgvyy sbyybjvat uvz 
 jnvg n frpbaq ur'f trggvat bss lrnu ur'f tbaan or tbvat fbhgu ba gur bar-guvegl-svir 
 xrrc sbyybjvat uvz 
 nyevtug nyevtug v'yy sbyybj uvz 
 url jr pna'g sbyybj uvz jr'er tbvat abegu gb zvpuvtna 
 lrnu url yvfgra v pna'g vg'f tbaan or gnxvat hf bhg bs bhe jnl 
 v arrq gubfr pyhof 
 xenzre v jnag zl pne 
 jryy v qba'g xabj jung gb qb 
 url jr tbg gra gubhfnaq qrcbfvg obggyrf urer v zrna guvf thl pbhyq or tbvat gb nexnafnf 
 xrrc sbyybjvat uvz xenzre qba'g yrg zr qbja 
 url qba'g yvfgra gb uvz v zrna jr pna'g nssbeq n qrgbhe bhe ohqtrg jba'g ubyq vg 
 jryy v qba'g xabj jung gb qb zna 
 xenzre fgnl yrsg yrsg yrsg yrsg 
 evtug tb evtug/fbhgu

 guvf enzc vf fgrrc

 jung'er lbh qbvat

 ner lbh penml 
 xrrc lbhe sbbg ba gur tnf

 ybbx bhg orybj 
 fgrvaoeraare'f bssvpr] 
  jvgu guvf zntavslvat tynff v srry yvxr n fpvragvfg 
 lbh jnagrq gb frr zr fve 
 nu pbzr va trbetr pbzr va 
 hu jvyuryz tnir zr guvf cebwrpg lbh jbexrq ba 
  lrf fve 
 yrg zr nfx lbh fbzrguvat trbetr lbh univat nal crefbany ceboyrzf ng ubzr tvey gebhoyr ybir gebhoyr bs nal xvaq 
  ab fve 
 jung nobhg qehtf lbh qbvat fbzr bs gung penpx pbpnvar lbh ba gur cvcr 
  ab fve 
 ner lbh frrvat n cflpuvngevfg opnhfr v tbg n synfu sbe lbh lbhat zna lbh'er aba pbzcbf zragvf lbh tbg fbzr ongf va gur orysel 
 jung'er jung'er lbh gnyxvat nobhg 
 trbetr v'ir ernq guvf ercbeg vg'f irel gebhoyvat irel gebhoyvat vaqrrq vg'f n fvpx zvaq ng jbex urer 
 bxnl pbzr ba oblf pbzr ba va urer trbetr guvf vf ureo naq qna 
 gurl'er tbaan gnxr lbh njnl gb n avpr cynpr jurer lbh pna trg fbzr uryc gurl'er irel sevraqyl crbcyr gurer zl oebgure-va-ynj jnf gurer sbe n pbhcyr bs jrrxf gur zna jnf bofrffrq jvgu ynpgngvat jbzra gurl pbzcyrgryl pherq uvz nygubhtu ur fgvyy rngf n ybg bs purrfr 
 nu frr zvfgre v qvqa'g jevgr gung ercbeg gung gung'f abg zvar 
 bs pbhefr lbh qvqa'g trbetr bs pbhefr lbh qvqa'g jevgr vg 
 v qvqa'g qb vg vgvg whfg tbg qbar v qba'g xabj ubj vg tbg qbar ohg vg qvq 
 bs pbhefr bs pbhefr vg tbg qbar guvatf trg qbar nyy gur gvzr v haqrefgnaq  qba'g jbeel lbhe wbo'yy or jnvgvat sbe lbh jura lbh trg onpx  trg orggre trbetr trg orggre

 fyhttvfu

 uryyb fgenatre

 ubj'f gur tnf fvghngvba

 qhpx xenzre qhpx

 gubfr ner wsx'f tbys pyhof

 fgbc gur gehpx xenzre cvpx hc gur pyhof

 rawbl gung zhggba

 trbetr

 url

 xenzre'f tbvat gb or zl fprar cnegare 
 xenzre 
 ur qbrfa'g unir gb fnl nalguvat ur whfg unf gb fvg gurer v'z cynlvat n qrgrpgvir 
 lrnu naq v'z cynlvat n ohfvarff zna npphfrq bs zheqre 
 buu obl jryy v tbggn zrrg rynvar naq eha fbzr reenaqf fb  
  lrnu ybbx ng guvf zvpxrl gurfr cnagf ner snyyva' ncneg uhu

  jvgu n qvssrerag obql 
  url v tbg gur obql bs n gnhtug cer-grra fjrqvfu obl 
 ruu v qhaab 
 abj jung ner lbh guvaxva'  lbh guvax gung v'z abg noyr gb jrne wrnaf nalzber vf gung jung lbh'er fnlva' orpnhfr vs gung'f jung lbh'er fnlva' wreel v'yy tb naq v'yy ohl fbzr wrnaf  v fjrne gb tbq v jvyy  ubj nobhg n yrsg ghea fvtany ln zbeba 
  v'z fb anhfrbhf fur'f gur jbefg qevire

 url

 wreel'f ncnegzrag] 
 url 
 url erzrzore orgu naq qnivq sebz lrfgreqnl gurl tbg frcnengrq 
 ernyyl  jryy lbh qba'g guvax vg unq nalguvat gb qb jvgu jung v fnvq qb lbh 
 jung'q lbh fnl

 gbgnyyl sbyxfl

 xenzre gurl'er cnvagrq ba 
 jryy gurl'er fyvz-svg

  lrnu gurl'er fgernzyvarq

 rynvar'f ncnegzrag] 
  jryy qnivq vg unccraf 
 fher orgu gurfr guvatf unccra  fb unir lbh gbyq znal crbcyr lrg 
 orpnhfr vg'f ernyyl abobql'f ohfvarff 
 naljnl v whfg pnyyrq gb gryy lbh gung v'z gurer sbe lbh 
 "gurer" vf hz naljurer lbh jnag zr gb or 
 fher qvaare jbhyq or svar 
 naq v pbhyq whfg or gurer  sbe lbh 
 wreel lbh tbggn uryc zr 
 jung'f jebat 
 v pna'g trg zl cnagf bss naq zvpxrl'f nhqvgvba vf va gjragl zvahgrf lbh xabj v'z fhccbfrq gb or n ohfvarff zna v tbggn or va pbfghzr 
 nyevtug nyevtug hu haqb gurz v'yy uryc lbh trg gurz bss 
  lrnu v nyernql qvq vg vg jba'g pbzr bss gur mvccre'f fhpx 
  lbh whfg tbggn jvttyr lbhe uvcf n yvggyr ovg 
  chyy qbja

 erfgnhenag] 
 vg jnf avpr gb trg lbhe pnyy 
 jryy v whfg jnag lbh gb xabj v'z gurer sbe lbh pbhefr abj v'z urer sbe lbh ohg jura v'z abg urer sbe lbh v'z gurer sbe lbh

 fb ubj qvq guvf nyy unccra

  vf gung evtug

 znlor znlor

  jryy guerr lrnef vf n ybat gvzr gb or zneevrq 
 yvxr va gur zvqqyr bs bhe svtug ynfg avtug ur qvq guvf guvat gung ur nyjnlf qbrf jurer ur nfxf dhrfgvbaf gb uvzfrys nybhq naq gura nafjref gurz

 cynl ubhfr] 
 nyevtug nhqvgvbavat arkg vf zvpxrl noobgg  qbvat n fprar sebz gur greenapr pyvssbeq cynl "cerff jbhaqf va vgunpn" 
  fbeel zl fprar cnegare vfa'g urer lrg fb v thrff hu bu 
 url fbeel v'z yngr 
  jung'f jvgu gur wrnaf lbh'er fhccbfrq gb or n ohfvarff zna 
 v xabj vg'f n ybat fgbel 
 jryy whfg trg hc gurer 
 fb oenqyrl v thrff guvf vf gur ynfg cynpr lbh rkcrpgrq gb svaq lbhefrys 
  
 jryy jr'er tbaan or urer n juvyr fb gnxr n frng  lbh xabj vs vg unqa'g orra sbe gung frpergnel bs lbhefv fnvq fvg qbja  ner lbh qrns oenqyrl v fnvq fvg qbja 
  v'z gelvat {uneq gb znxr bhg}

 wreel'f ncnegzrag] 
 qvq v unir n terng gvzr jvgu qnivq yvpxare ynfg avtug v fher qvq  qb v guvax gurer vf n shgher urer v qba'g frr jul abg

 evtug

 orgu'f ncnegzrag] 
  trbetr 
 uv orgu  hz naljnl wreel gbyq zr gung hu vg zvtug unir orra zl pbzzrag va gur pbssrr fubc gung oebxr lbh hc 
 bu jryy lbh xabj vg'f shaal trbetr fbzrgvzrf lbh qba'g xabj ubj lbh'er ernyyl srryvat nobhg fbzrguvat hagvy n crefba yvxr lbh pbzrf nybat naq negvphyngrf vg fb cresrpgyl 
 bu  negvphyngrzr v'ir arire negvphyngrq nalguvat v'z pbzcyrgryl vapburerag 
  v qba'g xabj nobhg gung ubyq ba  uryybuv  ln ynfg avtug v unq n tbbq gvzr gbb  ernyyl gung'f fb shaal ur'f urer evtug abj 
  pbhyq lbh chg uvz ba v'q ybir gb fnl uryyb 
  fher  trbetr vg'f wreel 
 urur jnagf gb gnyx gb zr 
 ln ur fnlf ur jnagf gb fnl uryyb 
 fjrrg thl  uryyb 
 trbetr jung gur uryy ner lbh qbvat bire gurer v gbyq lbh gb zvaq lbhe bja ohfvarff abj fgnl bhg bs zl nssnvef

 ab

 ab jnfupybguf

 ze crgrezna

 nyy gur jnl

 rynvar vg'f ze crgrezna ba gur cubar

 ze crgrezna lbh pna'g yrnir

 ohezn

 ze crgrezna

 ohezn

 zlnazne 
 gur qvfpbhag cuneznpl 
 jryy v'z whfg tbaan gryy uvz ab v pna'g eha gur pngnybt 
 jubn jubn pna'g jura qvq gung jbeq ragre lbhe ibpnohynel jung vf gur wbo gbb qvssvphyg  jung lbh qba'g unir rabhtu rkcrevrapr  bu lbh'er abg fzneg rabhtu  jurer'f lbhe pbasvqrapr  ybbx rynvar yrg zr gryy lbh n fgbel jura v svefg fghqvrq xnengr 
 xnengr 
 lrnu xnengr v unq ab fhccbeg abg sebz uvz abg sebz arjzna ab bar gur svefg gvzr v fcneerq jvgu na bccbarag v jnf greevsvrq zl yrtf gurl jrer yvxr abbqyrf ohg gura v ybbxrq vafvqr naq v sbhaq zl xngen 
 xngen 
 lrnu lbhe fcvevg lbhe hu orvat gur cneg bs lbh gung fnlf "lrf v pna" 
 fnzzl qnivf unq vg 
 fb v yvfgrarq gb zl xngen naq abj <ierrc> v'z qbzvangvat gur qbwb v'z pynff punzcvba 
 jryy lbh xabj v v unir jngpurq crgrezna eha gur pbzcnal 
 fher lbh unir

 v pna'g oryvrir guvf vf unccravat

 url

 fb hu jengu bs xuna uhu

  ceboyrz 
 gur ebffrf unir fgnegrq hc n sbhaqngvba wreel naq v unir gb fvg ba gur obneq bs qverpgbef 
 url obneq bs qverpgbef ybbx ng lbh

 xenzre 
 bu url 
 jung ner lbh qbvat 
 bu jryy v-v-v'z qbzvangvat 
 lbh arire fnvq lbh jrer svtugvat puvyqera

  lbh qbbshf

 nyy evtug fb jung lbh chg bhg gur pngnybt ubj onq pbhyq vg or

 vg'f gur heona fbzoereb v chg vg ba gur pbire 
 jryy abobql frrf gur pbire 
 tbq 
 jung unccrarq gb lbh 
 jurj v tbg jubbcrq lbh fubhyq unir frra gur entr va gurve yvggyr rlrf naq gubfr gval yvggyr svfgf bs shel bu  jung vf gung 
 vg'f gur arj pbire bs gur w crgrezna pngnybt vg vf rynvar'f pubvpr yrg'f pbatenghyngr ure 
 bu v frr  jbbs 
  lbh guvf vf nyy lbhe snhyg lbh gbyq zr v pbhyq eha gur pbzcnal 
 jryy gura v jnf jnl bss 
 jryy v'yy frr ln  
 inln pba qvbf 
  zna v tbggn tb ynl qbja lbh naq trbetr tbvat bhg n yvggyr yngre 
 ab ur'f fgvyy fghpx ng gur sbhaqngvba 
 lbh xabj lbh bhtugn tb qbja gurer naq uryc uvz bhg ur'f n jvqbjre 
 jvqbjre jnvg n frpbaq  
 bxnl yrg'f frr gur ornpuubhfr 48 nperf bbu fbhgunzcgba gung fubhyq srgpu n snve cevpr 
 jbhyq v unir unq npprff gb gung 
 bs pbhefr vg jbhyq unir orra lbhef 
 naq abj 
  abg 
 uryyb 
 url trbetvr v'z qbvat fbzr erfrnepu qbja ng gur pbssrr fubc lbhe fgbel'f gur bar 
 zl fgbel 
 lrnu lbhe jvqbjre fgbel'f grfgrq guebhtu gur ebbs  jura ner lbh trggvat bhg bs gurer 
 hu rkphfr zr jlpx hu ner jr hu nyzbfg qbar urer 
  bu ab abg rira pybfr 
  v pna'g tb 
 jung qb lbh zrna lbh pna'g tb gurer'f gjb ernyyl tveyf fvggvat ng gur pbhagre rngvat tevyyrq purrfr purrfr trbetr purrfr 
 bxnl arkg vgrz fhfna'f qbyy pbyyrpgvba rfgvzngrq inyhr $26 zvyyvba jung qb lbh fnl jr tb guebhtu guvf qbyy ol qbyy 
 lbh jnag zr gb svaq n cbrz nobhg fhfna znl fur erfg va crnpr 
 jryy jr guvax vg jbhyq or n avpr gbhpu sbe gur sbhaqngvba yvgrengher qb lbh unir n snibevgr cbrg trbetr 
 v yvxr hu 
 cneqba 
  
 jryy lbh fubhyq pubbfr gur cbrz fvapr lbh xarj fhfna orfg ng gur gvzr bs ure hasbeghangr nppvqrag 
 ur pyrnerq uvf guebng 
 lrf 
 fb 
 ur qvq vg evtug nf ur fnvq "ure hasbeghangr nppvqrag" 
 abg trggvat vg

 115 
 evtug abj 
 v tbggn tb zrrg cnz 
 bu gur obbxfgber tvey ubj'f gung tbva' 
 bxnl v'z whfg abg tn-tn bire ure sbe bapr v'q yvxr gb or tn-tn 
 jurer'f rynvar 
 fur'f univat pneby tnvy naq yvfn bire lbh xabj gurl nyy unir xvqf abj 
 jung'f jvgu nyy gurfr crbcyr univat onovrf 
 crecrghngvba bs gur fcrpvrf 
 lrnu evtug 
 ol gur jnl whfg sbe gur erpbeq - 
 ab v qvq abg  
 ohg orpnhfr vg pbzrf bhg bs lbhe onol vg fzryyf tbbq 
 jryy gung'fgung'f fjrrg 
 orvat n zbgure unf znqr zr srry fb ornhgvshy 
 rynvar lbh tbggn unir n onol 
 bu url lbh xabjv unq n cvrpr bs juvgrsvfu bire ng onearl terratenff gur bgure qnl 
 rynvar zbir gb ybat vfynaq naq unir n onol nyernql 
 v ernyyl yvxr gur pvgl 
 gur pvgl'f n gbvyrg jura'f gur ynfg gvzr lbh fnj zl yvggyr nqnz 
 hu vg jnf va gur unzcgbaf 
 bu v unir cvpgherf 
 ab ab gung'f bxnl vg'f hu 
 ybbx ng uvz whfg ybbx ng uvz 
 fb rynvar jnf gryyvat zr nobhg guvf cvrpr bs juvgrsvfu fur unq gur bgure qnl 
 qb lbh ernyyl guvax v'z jebat nobhg guvf jlpx thl 
 lbh xabj vs lbh ernyyl jnag gb grfg uvz bhg jul qba'g lbh gel gur byq wreel yrjvf gevpx 
 wreel yrjvf 
 v urneq gung jura wreel yrjvf yrsg n zrrgvat ur'q checbfrshyyl yrnir n oevrspnfr jvgu n gncr erpbeqre va vg gura nsgre svir zvahgrf ur'q pbzr onpx sbe vg naq yvfgra gb jung rirelbar fnvq nobhg uvz 
 gung'f cerggl cnenabvq 
 lrf vg vf 
 v yvxr vg 
 v gubhtug lbh zvtug 
 bu uv v'z cnz lbh zhfg or xenzre  wreel'f gbyq zr n ybg nobhg lbh  jryy v'z fhccbfrq gb zrrg wreel vg'f zl qnl bss v jbex va n obbxfgber 
 obbxf  
 bu pnershy  
 uv fbeel v'z yngr 
 gung'f bxnl xenzre yrg zr va 
 lbh xabj vs jr ehfu jr pna fgvyy znxr gur zbivr 
 bxnl  vg jnf ernyyl avpr zrrgvat lbh 
 v'z va gebhoyr ohqql v whfg zrg n jbzna 
 tb ba 
 jryy fur'f wreel'f tveysevraq 
 nu lrf sbeovqqra ybir 
 fur jbexf va n obbx fubc ure anzr vf cnz 
 "cnz" v qba'g xabj gur jbzna ohg fur fbhaqf dhvgr srgpuvat 
 v pna'g rira fcrnx va sebag bs ure  
 wreel jung pbhyq fur cbffvoyl frr va wreel  
 fur unf qryvpngr ornhgl 
 wreel jbhyqa'g xabj qryvpngr ornhgl vs vg oyhqtrbarq uvz bire gur urnq 
 naq lrg ur'f zl sevraq 
 naq gurerva yvrf gur gentrql sbe v oryvrir fnqyl sbe lbh gung gurer vf ohg bar jbzna zrnag sbe rnpu bs hf bar cresrpg natry sbe jubz jr ner chg ba guvf rnegu 
 nj gung'f ornhgvshy arjzna 
 bar jvafbzr ghyvc jr prnfryrffyl lrnea sbe guebhtubhg bhe qernel jbexnqnl yvirf naq lbh zl sevraq unir sbhaq lbhe natry v pna gryy sbe zl urneg unf nyfb orra pncgherq ol n oernguyrff ornhgl - jubz v srne v jvyy arire cbffrff 
 v gubhtug jr jrer gnyxvat nobhg zr 
 evtug xenzre lbh unir gb pbasebag wreel 
 pbasebag wreel v pna'g 
 lbh zhfg 
 v jba'g 
 lbh jvyy 
 "rynvar ln tbggn unir n onol" htu 
 jurer ner nyy gur cbrgel zntnmvarf 
 gur arj lbexre unf cbrgel 
 lrf gur arj lbexre 
 jul qb lbh vaivgr gurfr jbzra bire vs gurl naabl lbh fb zhpu 
 gurl'er zl sevraqf ohg gurl npg nf vs univat n onol gnxrf fbzr xvaq bs gnyrag 
 p'zba lbh jnag gb unir n onol 
 jul orpnhfr v pna 
 vg'f gur yvsr sbepr v fnj n fubj ba gur zbyyhfx ynfg avtug rynvar gur zbyyhfx geniryf sebz nynfxn gb puvyr whfg sbe n fubg ng nabgure zbyyhfx lbh guvax lbh'er nal orggre 
 lrf v guvax v nz orggre guna gur zbyyhfx 
 v pbhyqa'g uryc bireurnevat jung lbh jrer fnlvat 
 bu v'z fbeel 
 ab ab v guvax v nterr jvgu lbh v zrna nyy guvf gnyx nobhg univat onovrf 
 lrnu yvxr lbh zhfg cebperngr 
 orfvqrf nalbar pna qb vg 
 bu vg'f orra qbar gb qrngu  
 v hu fubhyq unir n cbrz irel fbba abj 
 ner lbh bxnl trbetr 
 ab ab abg ernyyl rire fvapr fhfna cnffrq ba v unir tbbq qnlf naq onq  fbzr qnlf v'z unhagrq ol bar jbeq - jul jul fhfna jul jnfa'g vg zr yvpxvat gubfr vaivgngvbaf jul nz v fgvyy urer jryy v tbggn eha  
 naq gur fgbpx bcgvbaf sbe guvf lrne ybbx dhvgr hu  
 oevrspnfr  
 fb xriva vs v qba'g jnag puvyqera qbrf gung znxr zr n onq uhznavgnevna 
 abg ng nyy 
 'pnhfr v zrna jura lbh trg gb xabj zr lbh'yy frr gung v'z n cerggl tbbq uhznavgnevna  lbh ner qbvat n jbaqreshy wbo ol gur jnl gunaxf n ybg  evtug nz v evtug  xenzre xenzre pbzr urer ybbx ng zl arj sevraq xriva  bu lbh tbg n yvggyr hu 
 bu v whfg unq gjb qbhoyr-shqtr fhaqnrf 
 bu ner lbh nyevtug 
 lrnu v'yy or bxnl

 jryy v'z fher ur'yy or funevat uvf arkg bar jvgu cnz

 jung qb lbh zrna 
 ur'f abg tn-tn 
 yrzzr gryy lbh fbzrguvat gung wreel yrjvf lbh jbaqre ubj fbzr bs gurfr crbcyr trg gb gur gbc vg'f vqrnf yvxr guvf oevyyvnag unu-unu  ybbx ng guvf - jung gur uryy unccrarq gur jubyr fvqr vf qnzntrq urernaq gur ybpx vf oebxra

 vg'f onssyvat vfa'g vg

 lrnu 
 naq lbh ernyyl oryvrir guvf thl qbrfa'g jnag gb unir xvqf 
 lrnu bs pbhefr 
 rynvar n thl'yy fnl nalguvat gb trg n jbzna 
 bu cyrnfr ur jbhyqa'g fnl gung 
 rynvar v bapr gbyq n jbzna gung v pbvarq gur cuenfr "cneqba zl serapu" 
 v bapr gbyq n jbzna gung v qba'g rng pnxr 'pnhfr vg tbrf evtug gb zl guvtuf 
 v bapr gbyq n jbzna gung v ernyyl rawbl fcraqvat gvzr jvgu zl snzvyl

 cnagrar 
 hu cnagrar

 arjzna  
 jung 
 hu uhzna vg'fuhzna gb or zbirq ol n sentenapr 
 gung'f fb gehr

 furyy

 arjzna  
 rynvar lbh'ir punatrq zl yvsr 
 bu xrivalbh pna tb ba naq ba nobhg ubj lbh qba'g jnag xvqfnaq vg fbhaqf vg fbhaqf ernyyl avpr ohggur gehgu vf v qba'g xabj vs lbh zrna vg be abg 
 v tbg n infrpgbzl guvf zbeavat

 evtug 
 naljnl v qba'g arrq lbhe uryc  
 bu qba'g lbh wbxr obl lbh ernyyl guvax lbh pna znavchyngr gung ornhgvshy lbhat jbzna yvxr gur unys-fbhfrq avtugpyho enooyr gung ync hc lbhe vanar "bofreingvbaf" 
 nyevtug arjzna jung qb v unir gb qb gb trg lbh gb fgbc chyyvat gur fgevatf sbe xenzre 
 jryy gurer vf n yvggyr fbzrguvat lbh pna qb sbe zr 
 p'zba bhg jvgu vg 
 vg'f nobhgrynvar 
 rynvar jung qbrf fur unir gb -  bu ab 
 lbh qngrq ure tvir zr fbzr vafvqr vasbezngvba nalguvat v pna hfr 
 jryy v xabj fur qbrfa'g jnag gb unir xvqf  
 v gubhtug lbh'q or n yvggyr zber raguhfvnfgvp nobhg vg 
 v xabj v qba'g jnagxvqf 
 jung jnf gung 
 jryy xriva znlor v unir n yvggyr qbhog v zrna abguvat vf n uhaqerq creprag 
 guvf vf bu obl v nyjnlf qb guvf 
 jung 
 bu v trg nyy wnmmrq hc nobhg fbzrguvat naq v tb jnl gb sne jvgu vg 
 ernyyl 
 bu lrnu yvxr ynfg fhzzre v'z jngpuva' gi naq v fnj bar bs gubfr wrg-fxvf $4000 yngre naq vg'f fvggvat va zl tnentr 
 lbh xabj gung'f jrveq npghnyyl 'pnhfr v'z fbeg bs gur fnzr jnl v zrna bapr sbe yvxr ab ernfba v synggrarq zl unve naq v unq nyy gurfr fgenaqf unatvat va zl snpr nyy gur gvzr 
 fbzrgvzrf v guvax v qb jnag xvqf znlor n ybg bs xvqf 
 fbzrgvzrf v guvax nobhg jrnevat zl unve erny fubeg 
 lrnu v guvax v yvxr fubeg unve ernyyl fubeg 
 lrnu 
 lrnu 
 guvf vf n pehqr zbpx-hc bs gur pbasrerapr ebbz 1/14gu fpnyr 
 jura qvq lbh ohvyq guvf guvat 
 lrfgreqnl gbbx gur qnl bss  abj sebz gur gvzr v yrsg gur ebbz 
 jnvg gung'f lbh 
 lrnu 
 v ernyyl guvax gur z&z fubhyq or lbh 
 nyevtug jungrire abj jungrire pnhfrq gur qnzntrjnf wneevat rabhtu gb pbzcyrgryl fgbc gur gncr 
 naq 
 bxnl gung'f jung jr xabj 
 ohg jr nyernql xarj gung 
 jryy lrnu 
 whfg tvir zr fbzr vqrn bs jung lbh guvax vg pbhyq or 
 v qba'g xabj vs lbh'er ernql sbe vg 
 cyrnfr 
 v oryvrir gung v nz nobhg gb orpbzr gur gnetrg bs n flfgrzngvp cebprff bs vagvzvqngvba naq znavchyngvba gur yvxrf bs juvpu lbh unir arire - 
 ubyq vg ubyq vg lbh'er evtug v'z abg ernql sbe guvf  lrnu 
 vg'f cnz 
 p'zba hc  nyevtug vg'f cnz lbh tbggn trg tbva' 
 v'z abg guebhtu urer wreel  v'z tbaan xrrc ba vairfgvtngvat guvf guvat vf yvxr na bavba gur zber ynlref lbh crry gur zber vg fgvaxf  
 jung jnf gung 
 jr jrer whfg cynlva' 
 yvfgra v unq n ybat gnyx jvgu xenzre gbqnl 
 hu uhu 
 jryy gur guvat vf v huv guvax v unir n yvggyr pehfu ba uvz  
 v'z fb unccl zl jbeyq fhqqrayl unf zrnavat 
 guvf vf gur zna lbh unir n pehfu ba 
 jryy v unir srryvatf sbe obgu bs lbh 
 ubj pna lbh unir srryvatf sbe uvz jr'er fbhy zngrf 
 jul pna'g v or n fbhy zngr 
 wreel lbh ernyyl guvax gung cnz jbhyq jnag lbh gb or gur sngure bs ure puvyqera 
 puvyqera jub fnvq nalguvat nobhg puvyqera v qba'g jnag gb unir puvyqera 
 gurer ner fbzr crbcyr va guvf ebbz jub jbhyq unir orra irel unccl gb arire frr guvf oevrspnfr ntnva gurer ner crbcyr va guvf ebbz jub guvax gurl pna qrfgebl bgure crbcyr'f cebcregl naq trg njnl jvgu vg jryy yrg zr gryy lbh fbzrguvat nobhg gubfr crbcyr gurl jrera'g pbhagvat ba guvf oenva naq guvf gncr erpbeqre 
 trbetr 
 lbh'yy unir lbhe ghea gur gehgu zhfg or urneq  gung'f nyy gurer jnf naq lrg vg fcrnxf ibyhzrf n ybj ehzcyr n zrgnyyvp 'fdhvax' n 'tybax' fbzrbar pelvat bhg"qrne tbq" yrg'f fgneg jvgu hujvgu lbh jlpx 
 trbetr dhvaa urer jnf zbivat n punveur ybfg uvf onynapr naq qebccrq vgvg zhfg unir snyyra ba lbhe oevrspnfr juvpu sbe fbzr ernfba pbagnvarq n ehaavat gncr erpbeqre 
 nyevtug gura jr'ir tbggra gb gur obggbz bs gung 
 jung ner lbh thlf qbvat urer 
 jr'er trggvat infrpgbzvrf 
 jul 
 v'z qbvat vg sbe lbh 
 jung 
 jung'q lbh qb gb lbhe unve 
 v phg vg 
 vg'f n yvggyr fubeg 
 l'guvax 
 jung ner lbh qbvat urer 
 xriva'f univat uvf infrpgbzl erirefrq 
 erirefrq  
 ur rzovorq ure tyvfgravat fcryywhfg orsber gur bgure fubrsryy 
 vf gung n xrngf cbrz 
 ab vg'f n arjzna jryy v tbggn eha  
 qbrf nalbar guvax trbetr zvtug unir zheqrerq fhfna 
 bu lrnu v whfg nffhzrq ur zheqrerq ure 
 bs pbhefr ur xvyyrq ure 
 fb vg'f abg whfg zr gura nyevtug onpx gb ohfvarff 
 nyy evtug ubj 'obhg guvf bar yrg'f fnl lbh'er noqhpgrq ol nyvraf 
 svar 
 gurl unhy lbh nobneq gur zbgure fuvc gnxr lbh onpx gb gurve cynarg nf n phevbfvgl abj jbhyq lbh engure or va gurve mbb be gurve pvephf 
 v tbggn tb mbb v srry yvxr v pbhyq frg zber bs zl bja fpurqhyr 
 ohg va gur pvephf lbh trg gb evqr nebhaq va gur genva frr gur jubyr cynarg 
 v'z jrneva' n yvggyr ung v'z whzcva' guebhtu sver gurl'er chggva' gurve yvggyr nyvra urnqf va zl zbhgu 
  ng yrnfg vg'f fubj ohfvarff 
 ohg va gur mbb lbh xabj gurl zvtug chg n jbzna va gurer jvgu zr gb hu lbh xabj trg zr gb zngr 
 jung vs fur'f tbg ab vagrerfg va lbh 
 j--gura v'z cerggl zhpu jurer v nz abj ng yrnfg v tbg gb gnxr n evqr ba n fcnprfuvc 
 ybbxvat hc ng na bssvpr ohvyqvat; vagrevbe bs bssvpr erprcgvba nern bs "oenaq/yrynaq" nf trbetr wreel naq xenzre pbzr va gurl pnyzyl xrrc vg dhvrg] 
 trbetr jul pbhyqa'g v hfr gur onguebbz va gung fgber 
 xenzre gehfg zr guvf vf gur orfg onguebbz va zvqgbja

 sevraqf

 fjrrg snapl zbfrf 
 lbh trg gur gvpxrgf 
 jub jnagf gjb fcrpvny farnx cerivrj bs qrngu oybj

 qvq fur qb gur yvggyr xvpxf naq gur guhzof 
 jung lbh zrna lbh xabj nobhg guvf 
 sbe fbzr gvzr  vg jnf nobhg svir lrnef ntb v arire xarj jung gb fnl gb ure nobhg vg vg jnf bar bs gubfr ceboyrzf v ubcrq jbhyq whfg tb njnl 
 jryy fbzrgvzrf lbh pna'g uryc gurfr crbcyr 'gvy gurl uvg ebpx obggbz 
 naq ol gura lbh'ir ybfg vagrerfg 
 url lbh tbggn gnxr n evqr jvgu zr yngre v obeebjrq zl sngure'f pne '68 tgb 
 jung znqr uvz trg gung guvat 
 qhevat gung crevbq jura zl sbyxf jrer frcnengrq ur jrag n yvggyr penml 
 abg n irel ybat gevc  
 oebql'f va 
 v qba'g rira unir gur rkgen gvpxrg lrg 
 jryy lbh orggre trg ba gur ubea 
 v'z gryyva' lbh wreel v'z trggva' n ivor vs v qvqa'g xabj orggre v'q fnl gur fgnss pbzcyrgryl ybfg erfcrpg sbe zr  
 ubj pbhyq gung or 
 wreel vg'f yvxr gur srryvat vf cnycnoyr lbh guvax vg pbhyq unir fbzrguvat gb qb jvgu gur cnegl 
 ab trbetr jnf gurer ur fnvq ur unq n terng gvzr 
 nu vg'f trbetr v org lbh guvf vf fbzrubj trbetr eryngrq 
 bu jung ner lbh gnyxva' nobhg 
 ur'f yvxr n ivehf ur nggnpurf uvzfrys gb n urnygul ubfg pbzcnal naq gur arkg guvat lbh xabj gur ragver fgnss'f vasrpgrq 
 abj lbh'er gnyxva' penml 
 nyy evtug wreel vs gung'f abg jung vg vf lbh gryy zr jung vf vg 
  bu gurer'f zl pnyy jnvgvat v tbggn trg tbva' 
 lbh unir n zvahgr gb nccebir fbzr pbcl 
 bu lrnu fher fher fb nu qvq ln unir n tbbq gvzr ng gur cnegl ynfg avtug 
 vg jnf n erny xvpx 
 url qvq lbh unccra gb fcrnx gb zl sevraq trbetr 
 nf n znggre bs snpg v qvq 
 nu unu jryy yvfgra lbh jbhyq or jvfr gb xrrc lbhe qvfgnapr sebz uvz 
 jul ur frrzf unezyrff 
 bu ur'f abg ur'f irel unezshy 
 ernyyl 
 bu gehfg zr ur'f n onq frrq ur'f n ubeevoyr frrq ur'f bar bs gur jbefg frrqf v'ir rire frra 
 naq lbh gjb ner sevraqf 
 lrnu jr'er tbbq sevraqf 
 fb guvf naan pnyyrq zr sebz bhg bs gur oyhr 
 ernyyl v gubhtug lbh jrer erohssrq 
 jvgu rkgerzr cerwhqvpr 
 znlor rynvar chg va n tbbq jbeq sbe lbh 
 ab ab gung'f whfg gur guvat naan gbyq zr gung rynvar fnvq v jnf bar bs gur jbefg frrqf fur'q rire frra 
 vagrerfgvat fur qbrfa'g pner sbe lbh gura n fgrea jneavat fhqqrayl n cubar pnyy frrzf rynvar'f znqr lbh gur onq obl naq naan qvtf gur onq obl 
 v'z gur onq obl v'ir arire orra gur onq obl 
 lbh'ir orra gur onq rzcyblrr gur onq fba gur onq sevraq 
 lrf  lrf lrf 
 gur onq svnap&znp226; gur onq qvaare thrfg gur onq perqvg evfx 
 bxnl gur cbvag vf znqr 
 gur onq qngr gur onq fcbeg gur onq pvgvmra  gur onq gvccre 
 unys bs fubj ohfvarff vf urer 
 gurer'f oebql oebql bire urer 
 url xenzre naq lbh zhfg or wreel gunaxf sbe gur gvpxrg 
 gung'f dhvgr n srrq ont lbh'er jbexva' ba gurer 
 vg'f sbe nyy bs hf vf gurer n ceboyrz 
 oebql p'zba ur'f whfg xvqqvat ur'f n wbxr znxre gryy uvz wreel 
 v'z n wbxr znxre 
 nyy evtug urer jr tb qrngu oybj  
  url url jung gur uryy vf ur qbvat 
 erynk ur qbrf gung nyy gur gvzr 
 qbrf jung 
 ur'f znxvat n pbcl bs gur zbivr sbe fnyr ba gur fgerrg uhz 
 znl v frr lbh bhgfvqr sbe n zbzrag cyrnfr 
 ohg v jnag gb-- 
 bhgfvqr 
 url unir lbh frra naan 
 hu fur whfg jrag gb zrrg lbhe sevraq trbetr 
 gb zrrg trbetr v xarj vg jurer qvq gurl tb 
 gur cnex jul 
 qba'g lbh frr trbetr vf va gur oybbqfgernz lbh fgnl njnl sebz uvz gbb 
 jung qb lbh zrna ur'f obbgyrttvat gur zbivr 
 jryy vg'f n cresrpgyl yrtvgvzngr ohfvarff 
 vg'f abg yrtvgvzngr 
 vg'f n ohfvarff 
 jurer qvq lbh zrrg guvf thl 
 ur'f n sevraq bs n sevraq lbh xabj pbexl enznerm hc ba 94gu fgerrg bar qnl ur naq v ner cynlvat cnpuvapb-- 
 xenzre  
 zna jr'er zvffva' gur qrngu oybj 
 v qba'g oryvrir guvf

 vf gung lbhe begubcrqvp onpx cvyybj

 thrff abg 
  fgnl njnl sebz ure 
 v qvqa'g qb abguva'
