 ohg 
 lbh urneq zr lbhat ynql trg va gur pne  naq lbh lbh fubhyq xabj orggre v qba'g jnag lbh vasrpgvat zl fgnss 
 yvtugra hc 
 tb trg 'rz qrngu oybj  lbh bxnl 
 fb qrngu oybj jr zrrg ntnva ) 
 hu v tbg n penzc 
 jryy vg'f ab jbaqre lbh ngr gung ragver ont bs pnaql 
 hu gurer vg tbrf ntnva xenzre lbh tbggn qevir zr ubzr 
 url jung vf tbvat ba bire gurer 
 wreel svavfu fubbgvat gur zbivr sbe zr 
 ner lbh ahgf gurer'f ab jnl v'z ubyqvat gung guvat 
 wreel vs gur zna vf va cnva 
 lrnu jryy znlor vs ur qvqa'g yvpx uvf svatref orsber ur ernpurq va gur ont jr jbhyq'ir rngra fbzr freirf uvz evtug 
  jung ner lbh fbzr xvaq bs gbhtu thl 
 bxnl yrg'f rirelobql whfg erynk wreel gnxr gur pnzren 
 nyy evtug v'z vz gnxva' gur pnzren 
  p'zba yrg'f tb 
 bu zna 
 url zna fb ubj jnf gur erfg bs qrngu oybj 
 ubj jnf gur erfg bs qrngu oybj 
 lrnu jub tbg gur svany qrngu oybj 'pnhfr v gubhtug gung unjnvvna thl ur unq vg pbzva' gb uvz 
 xenzre lbh znxr zr trg n gvpxrg sbe guvf sevraq bs lbhef naq gura gur thl sbeprf zr gb obbgyrt gur zbivr ng tha cbvag 
 ur'f dhvgr n punenpgre vfa'g ur 
 lbh xabj ur pnzr ol urer ng 3 b'pybpx va gur zbeavat gb cvpx hc gur gncr v jnf fpnerq bhg bs zl zvaq

 oebql 
 pbzr ba hc vg'f oebql 
 jung ner lbh penml v qba'g jnag gb frr guvf thl ntnva 
 wreel lbh qvq uvz n snibe ur cebonoyl jnagf gb pbzr hc naq gunax lbh

 uv

 lrnu

 jung 
  lbh'er n travhf gur mbbz-vaf gur senzvat v jnf rapunagrq 
 jryy v qvq gur orfg v pbhyq 
 v tbg nabgure cebwrpg sbe lbh vg'f n zbivr pnyyrq pel pel ntnva v jnf tbaan tvir vg gb bar bs zl bgure thlf ohg vg'f na negl zbivr naq dhvgr senaxyl gurl qba'g unir gur frafvovyvgl 
 znl v hfr lbhe cubar 
 hu lrnu vg'f haqre gur pbhpu 
 ybbx ng lbh lbh'ir tbg nabgure tvt huu 
 v qba'g jnag nabgure tvt v'z abg qbva' guvf 
 ohg lbh unir n tvsg wreel guvf vf abg lbhe yvggyr pbzrql npg jr'er gnyxva' srngher svyzf 
 jr'er gnyxva' srqreny pevzr urer 
  v'yy rkcrpg gung gncr ol guerr b'pybpx gbzbeebj  znl v obeebj guvf  
 fher qb lbh arrq n tybir 
 anu 
 v cerffrq guebhtu gur ehfurf naq gurer gur angvir qnapref juveyrq orsber zr yvzof synvyvat nezf nxvzob srrg xvpxvat hc qhfg  
 jung jung vf fb shaal 
 fbeel v tbg uhat hc 
 ng lnaxrr fgnqvhz 
 guvf vg'f zvar

 ur'f abg fgbpxl 
 jub qvq gung jub qvq gung 
  gur serapu thl sryy bss uvf ovxr bu zna gung'f cerpvbhf  
 ab ab ab ab ab ab ab jung jrer lbh guvaxvat jura lbh fubg guvf 
 gung'f svar 
 qb lbh rira xabj jung guvf fprar vf nobhg 
 vg'f nobhg n thl ohlvat n ybns bs oernq 
 ab oernq vf uvf fbhy ur'f gelvat gb ohl onpx n ybns bs uvf fbhy 
 jun jurer 
 xenzre gurer vf ab jnl lbh'er tvivat guvf gncr gb oebql naq gryyvat uvz v fubg vg 
 anu anu ur'f abg tbvat gb xabj gur qvssrerapr 
 v qba'g pner nobhg oebql v jnf hc ba 96gu fgerrg gbqnl gurer jnf n xvq pbhyqa'g unir orra zber guna gra lrnef byq ur jnf nfxvat n fgerrg iraqbe vs ur unq nal bgure obbgyrtf nf tbbq nf qrngu oybj gung'f jub v pner nobhg gur yvggyr xvq jub arrqf obbgyrtf orpnhfr uvf cnerag be thneqvna jba'g yrg uvz frr gur rkprffvir ivbyrapr naq fgebat frkhny pbagrag lbh naq v gnxr sbe tenagrq 
 fb lbh'yy qb gur zbivr  
 v unir gb ohg v'z tbaan arrq gb fgbelobneq guvf jubyr guvat jurer ner zl zntvp znexref 
 evtug urer  
 jryy v unir ybfg pbzcyrgr pbageby bs zl fgnss jul qvq v yrg trbetr tb gb gung cnegl v zrna jr jrer univat fb zhpu sha jr jrer jvavat jr jrer qvavat jr jrer qnapvat  jung 
  guvf hzcs guvat 
 vg'f qnapvat 
 ab ab gung nva'g qnapvat fnyyl 
 v qnapr svar 
 lbh fgvax  
 ur qbrfa'g xabj jung ur'f gnyxva' nobhg  wre wreel v'z n tbbq qnapre evtug 
 v sbetbg gb znxr zl orq  
 wreel qb v fgvax 
 nyy evtug lbh'er orlbaq fgvax 
 ohg v ernyyl rawbl qnapvat 
 naq gung'f abg urycva' rvgure gung'f jul lbh'er univa' gebhoyr jvgu lbhe fgnss abg orpnhfr bs trbetr 
 vg'f gung onq 
 unir lbh rire frra lbhefrys  nu nu cyrnfr cyrnfr abg va zl ubzr v tbggn tb guebj guvf fghss va gur ynhaqel v'yy or evtug onpx 
 v unir trbetr pbfgnamn fgvyy ubyqvat 
 trbetr uv v unir naan urer gurer'f fbzrguvat v jnaan fnl gb obgu bs lbh 
 lb naan 
 uv trbetr jung'er lbh hc gb 
  lbh qba'g jnaan xabj 
 hu jryy yvfgra v srry ernyyl ubeevoyr nobhg gelvat gb xrrc lbh gjb ncneg naq v whfg jnagrq gb ncbybtvmr 
 jung jun jung'er lbh gnyxva' nobhg 
 jryy trbetr v whfg jnag lbh gb urne zr fnl gb naan gung lbh'er n tbbq naq qrprag crefba

 rynvar trg bss gur fcrnxre  
 jung 
 lbh ner ehvava' rirelguvat 
 v'z gelvat gb uryc jul ner lbh orvat fb qvssvphyg 
 lrnu lrnu lrnu lrnu gung'f vg zber bs gung qvssvphyg v'z n qvssvphyg frrq 
 trbetr v qba'g unir gvzr sbe guvf hu naan qb lbh jnaan gnyx gb trbetr 
 hz ab v qba'g guvax fb 
 ab fur qbrfa'g jnag gb bxnl olr trbetr jr'yy frr ln 
 v'z n onq zna 
 fb jurer'f gur gncr 
 ab v qvqa'g fubbg guvf bar v'z whfg fpbhgvat gur ybpngvba 
 v arrq gur gncr 
 lbh'yy trg lbhe gncr ohg urer'f jung v'z tbaan arrq v'z tbaan arrq guerr pnzrenf gjb ba gur sybbe bar va gur onypbal naq v jnag urnqfrgf sbe gur thlf ehaava' 'rz v jnaan or noyr gb gnyx gb 'rz 
 ner lbh bhg bs lbhe zvaq 
 xenzre 
 v xabj wreel vg'f bxnl  lrnu ybbx oebql hu wreel jnagf gb qb gur obbgyrt ur'f qlva' gb qb vg ohg vs lbh qba'g znxr uvz unccl gur jbex fhssref naq gura abobql'f unccl 
 whfg fubbg gur qnza guvat fb v pna trg vg bhg ba gur fgerrg 
 nyy evtug gung'f vg v pna'g jbex yvxr guvf 
 wreel 
 v'z bss gur cebwrpg  
 wreel 
 v jnag gur gncr 
 lrnu 
 jryy v'z gur tbbq obl ntnva pna lbh oryvrir gung 
 gurl guvax gurl pna trg nalbar gb fubbg gurfr obbgyrtf 
 naan npghnyyl unf erfcrpg sbe zr abj  vg'f nyy bire 
 ru gur jubyr ohfvarff unf punatrq vg'f nyy nobhg zbarl abj gur fnq guvat vf vg'f gur xvqf gung fhssre  
 yvfgra zna lbh tbggn fubbg guvf zbivr sbe zr oebql ur'f n ernfbanoyr zna ohg ur'f vafnar 
 xenzre v'z abg qbva' guvf nalzber v qba'g xabj jung v jnf guvaxvat vg'f vyyrtny vg'f qnatrebhf

 v'z n obbgyrttre

 jung'er jr tbaan qb

 wreel fur gncrq bire gur jubyr raqvat  
 jurer'f gur gncr 
 hu jryy vg hu 
 vf gung vg

 ubj'q vg ghea bhg 
 hu terng 
 nygubhtu gur jubyr fgbel xvaqn pbzrf ncneg ng gur raq gurer 
 lrnu bhg bs abjurer gurer'f guvf ybar qnapre jub nccrnef gb or vawherq

 naan 
 bu rynvar gunaxf sbe cvpxvat zr hc v pna rkcynva rirelguvat

 bxnl jurer'f zl obl

 bj qnq

 nyy evtug jnvg n zvahgr v guvax lbh'ir tbg vg onpxjneqf

 lbh tbg gung evtug

 gunax lbh  
 lbh jrer ovt

 lrnu cerggl zhpu nygubhtu v fgvyy trg gur ivor rirel bapr va n juvyr 
 v jbhyqa'g jbeel nobhg vg  
 jryy v ernyyl zvff gur orezhqn gevnatyr 
 v thrff gurer'f abg zhpu npgvba qbja gurer gurfr qnlf 
 bu gurer'f npgvba gurer'f cyragl bs npgvba gung qnzarq nyvra nhgbcfl vf fgrnyvat nyy gur urnqyvarf 
 lrnu gryy zr nobhg vg 
 frr jung gurl tbggn qb vf ybbfr n cynar be n terracrnpr obng va gurer frr gung jbhyq trg gur gevnatyr tbvat ntnva 
 jung xrrcf gur jngre va gurer v zrna jul qbrfa'g vg qvfnccrne 
 jung jbhyq or gur cbvag va gnxvat gur jngre

 qvssvphyg 
 rynvar lbh fubhyqa'g or ernqvat gung fb gryy zr nobhg guvf enfu bs lbhef 
 jryy vg'f vg'f lbh xabj v abgvprq gung fbzrobql jebgr va zl puneg gung v jnf qvssvphyg va wnahnel bs 92 naq v unir gb gryy lbh gung v erzrzore gung nccbvagzrag rknpgyl lbh frr guvf ahefr nfxrq zr gb chg n tbja ba ohg vg jnf n zbyr ba zl fubhyqre naq v fcrpvsvpnyyl jber n gnax gbc fb v jbhyqa'g unir gb chg n tbja ba lbh xabj gurer znqr bs cncre 
 jryy gung jnf n ybat gvzr ntb ubj nobhg vs v whfg renfr vg abj nobhg gung enfu

 gunaxf

 ab nyy lbh tbg gb qb vf wvttyr vg jvgu guvf fperjqevire 
 fzvyr 
 jung ner lbh qbvat 
 v zrrg guvf jbzra furvyn fur jbexf qbja ng gur bar ubhe cubgb cnpr fur'f tbg guvf vaperqvoyr fzvyr yvxr fur'f tbg rkgen grrgu be fbzrguvat 
 rkgen grrgu v ybir gung ybbx 
 url purpx guvf bhg v tb gb cvpx hc zl cvpgherf naq fur fnlf " v ubcr lbh tbg gung zhfgneq fgnva bhg bs lbhe fuveg" 
 jung zhfgneq fgnva 
 qba'g lbh frr fur'f ybbxvat ng zl cvpgherf 
 jul qvq lbh gnxr n cvpgher bs n zhfgneq fgnva 
 gung'f tbg abguvat gb qb jvgu vg 
 v frr fur'f ybbxvat 
 lrfffff 
 url lbh tbg gb trg guvf guvat svkrq 
 gurl'ir gevrq gb svk vg ohg vg xrrcf pbzvat onpx gur fnzr 
 jbhyq lbh yvxr n ershaq

 jbhyq lbh 
 v thrff v jbhyq 
 lrnu lrnu 
 lbh ner abg tbvat gb oryvrir jung unccrarq gb zr ng gur qbpgbef bssvpr gbqnl 
 abg gur tbja ntnva 
 ab ab v jnf ybbxvat ng zl puneg naq vg fnvq v jnf qvssvphyg jul jbhyq gurl jevgr gung 
 gurl unir tbggra gb xabj lbh 
 gura gur qbpgbe jevgrf zber fghss qbja naq qbrfa'g rira ybbx ng zl enfu 
 jul qba'g lbh svaq n qbpgbe gung qbrfa'g xabj lbhe qvssvphyg 
 bu pbzr ba v'z abg qvssvphyg v'z rnfl 
 jul orpnhfr lbh qerff pnfhny naq fyrrc jvgu n ybg bs thlf 
 yvfgra gb zr lbh yvggyr fuv 
 fzvyr 
 jryy rynvar lbh ernyyl qvqa'g unir gb chg ba gur tbja 
 bu vg'f zl cyrnfher v ybir gurfr va snpg v tbg bar ng ubzr vg'f cresrpg jura lbh whfg jnag gb guebj fbzrguvat ba 
 nyy evtugyl yrg zr whfg erivrj lbhe uvfgbel orsber jr ortva 
 jurer qvq lbh trg zl puneg 
 sebz lbhe ynfg qbpgbe vg'f n fgnaqneq cebprqher 
 lbh xabj v pna gryy lbh zl jubyr uvfgbel yrg'f whfg 
 bxnl yrg'f gnxr n ybbx jryy gung qbrfa'g ybbx gb frevbhf lbh'yy or svar

 ner lbh ershfvat qryvirel

 jul jbhyq lbh qb gung 
 v'ir arire qbar vg orsber 
 jul fgneg abj 
 jul abg 
 nyy evtug 
 jul qvq lbh ershfr gur cnpxntr rirelobql ybirf n cnpxntr 
 v qba'g xabj vg jnf jrveq penml cevagvat v qba'g xabj jub vg jnf sebz 
 jung qb lbh guvax vg'f n obzo 
 vg'f abg gbgnyyl vzcbffvoyr 
 bu gur rtb ba lbh 
 jul pna'g v or obzonoyr 
 jub'f tbvat gb obzo lbh na nveyvar sbe nyy gur fghcvq yvggyr crnahg wbxrf 
 v fhccbfr lbh guvax lbhe obzonoyr 
 url gurer vf n pbhcyr bs crbcyr gung jbhyqa'g zvaq univat zr bhg bs gur jnl 
 gurer'f zber guna n pbhcyr 
 url purpx gurfr bhg v whfg cvpxrq gurz hc sebz furvyn fur zhfg unir ybirq gurfr 
 lbh qba'g unir n zreprqrf 
 v xabj v whfg fbeg bs yrnarq ba vg fb vg jbhyq ybbx yvxr vg jnf zvar 
 gur qevire frrzf n yvggyr chg bhg 
 ab ur jnf svar jvgu vg purpx gung bhg 
 vf gung oheg erlabyqf 
 jnk zhfrhz

 gung'f n ybg bs fxva 
 guvf zhfg or furvyn sebz gur cubgb cynpr 
 lbh pna oneryl frr ure snpr 
 fur zhfg unir fyvccrq vg va urer

 cubgb fgber furvyn

 nyy evtug v jvyy frr lbh oblf yngre 
 jurer ner lbh tbvat 
 gb nfx ure bhg 
 ab ab lbhe abg cynlvat gur tnzr 
 jung tnzr 
 fur tbrf gb gurfr yratguf gb ragvpr lbh naq lbhe bayl erfcbafr vf " trr v ernyyl yvxr lbhe cvpgher jbhyq lbh yvxr gb tb bhg ba n qngr jvgu zr cyrnfr " 
 ab tbbq 
 trbetr vg'f gur gvzryrff neg bs frqhpgvba lbh tbg gb wbva va gur qnapr fur fraqf lbh na ragvpvat cubgb lbh fraq ure bar evtug onpx 
 bu v qba'g xabj 
 jryy nf lbh xabj v'ir nyjnlf orra fbzrguvat bs n cubgbt 
 bu lrnu v yvxr guvf vqrn 
 url qnaal uryyb ubj ner lbh 
 url yrb yrb jung'f hc jvgu lbhe arcurj ur jbhyqa'g rkprcg uvf cnpxntr 
 bu ur jnagf vg ur'f whfg gelvat gb or shaal lrnu v'yy fvta vg  
 naq gura ur fgnegf jevgvat ba zl puneg 
 jryy jul qba'g lbh trg n ubyq bs vg naq punatr jung lbh qba'g yvxr 
 lbh pna'g punatr lbhe puneg vg'f lbhe puneg 
 v nz va naq bhg bs zl crefbaary svyr ng jbex nyy gur gvzr 
 lbh ner 
 url v'ir xrcg gur fnzr wbo sbe zber guna gjb lrnef vg'f abg yhpx rynvar unir lbh rire frag n enpl cubgbtencu bs lbhefrys gb nalbar 
 lrnu v frag bar gb rirelbar v xabj erzrzore zl puevfgznf pneq 
 bu lrnu gur avccyr ohg orfvqrf gung ubj qvq lbh srry nobhg xenzre'f jbex 
 npghnyyl v gubhtug ur jnf irel cebsrffvbany 
 fb vg jnf n tbbq rkcrevrapr 
 bu lrnu va snpg v yvxr gur cvpgher fb zhpu v pebccrq bhg gur avccyr naq nz hfvat nf zl urnygu pyho vq 
 avpr 
 lrnu vg vf avpr npghnyyl 
 v arrq gb frr qe ohexr evtug njnl guvf enfu vf fcernqvat

 jurer'f xenzre 
 ur jrag gb trg fbzr fgrnx fnhpr jul

 jryy gura jung

 ohg ur'f bxnl

 vf guvf zl fgrerb 
 url lbh tbg vg 
 jung unccrarq gb zl fgrerb vg'f nyy fznfurq hc 
 gung'f evtug abj vg ybbxf yvxr vg jnf oebxra qhevat fuvccvat naq v vafherq vg sbe $400 
 ohg lbh jrer fhccbfrq gb trg zr n ershaq

 ab v qba'g

 fgvyy ab yhpx 
 wreel v nz ng qbpgbe mvzzrezna v nz ng gur raq bs gur nycunorg 
 gurer'f ab mbea be mbhgencu 
 gurer ba inpngvba rirel qbpgbe va guvf pvgl frrzf gb xabj jub v nz  
 url jung nobhg qe erfavpx zl hapyr yrb vf tbvat gb frr uvz gbzbeebj  
 qe erfavpx ur'f abg yvfgrq 
 ur'f abg gung tbbq 
 rynvar fnvq lbhe cerggl tbbq ng guvf fghss 
 bu lrnu rynvar jnf n sha cebwrpg v rawblrq jbexvat jvgu ure 
 lbh qba'g unir lbhe bja pnzren 
 hu ab ybbx ng guvf bxnl lrnu guvf ybbxf tbbq naq v yvxr jung lbhe jrnevat 
 v srry sng

 uryyb arjzna

 ab ceboyrz

 arjzna 
 v qba'g xabj jung arjzna jnagrq gb frr zr sbe 
 tragyrzra tragyrzra v nz fb unccl gb frr lbh obgu gurer vf whfg fbzr vapbafvfgrapvrf v'q yvxr gb fgenvtugra bhg 
 v'z pyrna naq lbh xabj vg

 jurer qvq lbh trg gung 
 v guvax gung'f bar bs zvar 
 vg ybbxf yvxr lbhe oernxvat vagb vg yvxr na bggre oernxvat vagb n pynq 
 v qba'g xabj nobhg gung ohg v'z fher gurer vf n rkcynangvba 
 lrf vg'f pnyyrq znvy senhq bbuuuu ubj v'ir ybatrq sbe guvf zbzrag frvasryq gur qnl jura v jbhyq unir gur cebbs v arrqrq gb unyy lbh bhg bs lbhe phful ynve naq rkcbfr gb gur yvtug bs whfgvpr nf gur zbafgre gung lbh ner n zbafgre fb ivyr 
 arjzna 
 gurer jvyy or n fznyy svar 
 bxnl 
 pna jr tb abj 
 abg fb snfg cerggl obl gurer vf zber gb guvf fbegrq yvggyr nssnve 
 bu zl tbq 
 guvf cubgb pyrneyl vaqvpngrf lbhe vaibyirzrag va fbzr vyy-pbaprvirq znvy beqre cbeabtencul evatnf qbrf guvf bar sbhaq va gur fnzr qvfgheovat cnpxrg 
 bu zl tbq 
 jr unir fbzr dhrfgvbaf jr'q yvxr lbh gb nafjre 
 v unir fbzr dhrfgvbaf bs zl bja 
 uv bar bs lbhe znvyzra bu zl tbq trbetr

 gur gvzryrff neg bs frqhpgvba 
 furvyn 
 jryy v fgnegrq bhg jbexvat va zbegtntr obaqf ohg v whfg sbhaq gung fb yvzvgvat 
 zl sevraq xenzre naq v jrer qvfphffvat gung fnzr guvat gur bgure qnl ur jnf jvgu oenag-yrynaq sbe n juvyr 
 jbj jryy gura zl zragbe fhttrfgrq gung v zbir vagb rdhvgvrf orfg zbir v rire znqr 
 zragbe lbh zrna lbhe obff 
 bu ab ab ab plaguvn'f whfg n fhpprffshy ohfvarffjbzna jub'f gnxra zr haqre ure jvat 
 uzz fb plaguvn'f lbhe zragbe 
 naq v'z ure cebgt lbh zhfg unir fbzrbar yvxr gung lbh xabj jub thvqrf lbh va lbhe pnerre cngu

 fb jung'f va vg sbe gur zragbe

 nyevtug yvfgra v tbggn trg fbzr ernqvat qbar lbh zvaq vs v qb guvf urer v pna'g pbapragengr va zl ncnegzrag 
  evfx znantrzrag 
 lrnu fgrvaoeraare jnagf rirelbar va gur sebag bssvpr gb tvir n yrpgher va gurve nern bs ohfvarff rkcregvfr

 uryyb 
 cyrnfr ubyq sbe rynvar orarf 
 lbh xabj jung v pna'g qb guvf v pna'g ernq obbxf nalzber; obbxf ba gncr unir ehvarq zr wreel v arrq gung avpr ibvpr guvf obbx unf *zl* ibvpr v ungr zl ibvpr 
 fb trg guvf obbx ba gncr 
 lbh pna'g vg'f n grkgobbx 
 url wre ner lbh tbvat gb guvf obo fnpnznab cnegl

 jung lbh'er xvqqvat v whfg tbg guvf vaivgngvba gbqnl bu v jnf fb rkpvgrq vg'f ernyyl n ornhgvshy vaivgngvba

 url pbcreavphf

 ab xvqqvat 
 xraal onavn 
 onavn 
 url wreel ubj'f vg tbvat lbh tbaan wbva hf sbe qvaare gur qhpx urer'f gur orfg gur orfg wreel 
 rkphfr zr v'z fbeel gb obgure lbh v abgvprq gung lbh unir n grkgobbx ba gncr znl v nfx jurer lbh tbg gung 
 ernqvat sbe gur oyvaq gurl pna trg nal obbx ba gncr 
 v gryy ln v nz ubbxrq ba gurfr obbxf ba gncr 
 bu gryy zr nobhg vg gurfr guvatf unir ehvarq zr sbe oenvyyr 
 ernqvat sbe gur oyvaq 
 v gnxr na rlr grfg; v syhax vg gur arkg guvat lbh xabj v nz fjvatvat gb gur fjrrg fbhaqf bs evfx znantrzrag 
 fb v svanyyl zrg gur zragbe 
 jung'f fur yvxr vzcerffvir 
 bu lrnu fur'f qngvat onavn 
 onavn 
 lrnu v unq gb fcraq gjb ubhef ng qvaare ynfg avtug jvgu gung fcrpvzra 
 jung qvq lbh unir 
 puvpxra ubj pbhyq fur ybbx hc gb n crefba jub ibyhagnevyl fcraqf gvzr jvgu onavn 
 znefnyn 
 cvppngn vs nalguvat v fubhyq or qngvat n zragbe naq onavn fubhyq or frggvat cvaf va n objyvat nyyrl 
 url tbbq yhpx jvgu gung 
 gunax lbh 
 qnq 
 jung ner lbh jrnevat na nguyrgvp fjrng fhvg 
 jung ner lbh qbvat urer 
 jryy ur pnzr ol gb cvpx hc uvf purpx sbe gur onadhrg unyy lbh xabj v tbg n uhaqerq naq rvtugl-guerr erfcbafrf bu vg'f tbaan or n entre 
 xenzre ubj ner lbh tbaan pbbx wrjvfu qryvpnpvrf sbe n uhaqerq naq rvtugl-guerr crbcyr 
 lrnu lbh'er evtug gung'f n ybg bs chcxvgm url senax lbh xabj nalobql jub pna uryc zr pbbx 
 pbbx ab v qba'g xabj nal pbbxf v qba'g xabj nalguvat nobhg pbbxvat 
 jung'f gur znggre jvgu uvz 
 zl qnq jnf n pbbx qhevat gur xberna jne fbzrguvat irel onq unccrarq rire fvapr lbh pna'g trg uvz arne n xvgpura 
 furyy-fubpxrq 
 bu lrnu ohg gung unf abguvat gb qb jvgu vg

 v'z ernql 
 bu bxnl 
  vg'f n ubg avtug gur zvaq enprf lbh guvax nobhg lbhe xavsr; gur bayl sevraq jub unfa'g orgenlrq lbh gur bayl sevraq jub jba'g or qrnq ol fha hc fyrrc gvtug zngrf va lbhe dhvygrq punzoenl avtugfuvegf 
 jung nz v tbaan qb ur vf n qvfnfgre 
 jryy vs ur'f qbvat gung onq znlor ur'f va yvar sbe nabgure cebzbgvba 
 lbh xabj jung lbh ner rknpgyl evtug gung vf jung v fubhyq qb v fubhyq cebzbgr uvz v'yy tvir uvz nabgure bssvpr ba nabgure sybbe naq ur pna fvg gurer jvgu uvf avpr gvgyr naq uvf onlbarg naq fgbc sernxva' zr bhg 
 abguvat ng nyy 
 jryy trbetr lbhe ivfvba vf dhvgr vzcnverq vs lbh'yy whfg fvta guvf vafhenapr sbez urer'f n cra 
 lbh'er n irel unaqfbzr zna ol gur jnl 
 jung gur uryy vf tbvat ba urer 
 jung ner lbh qbvat 
 v tbg guerr xvgpuraf tbvat v tbg oevfxrg tbvat ng arjzna'f v tbg xhtry jbexvat ng zef mnzsvab'f guvf vf xercynpu urer gel fbzr bs guvf 
 ab v qba'g jnag gb 
 rng rng lbh'er fxva naq obarf 
 unu 
 bu guvf vf njshy 
 wreel vg'f xercynpu vg'f na npdhverq gnfgr lrnu 
 qvq lbh sbyybj gur erpvcr 
 gur erpvcr jnf sbe sbhe gb fvk crbcyr; v unq gb zhygvcyl sbe n uhaqerq naq rvtugl-guerr crbcyr v thrff v tbg pbashfrq 
 vg gnfgrf yvxr qveg 
 jryy v nyfb qebccrq vg ba gur jnl bire ybbx v'z va gebhoyr v tbg ab fxvyyf v pna'g crry v pna'g pubc v pna'g tengr v pna'g zvapr v tbg ab frafr bs synibe boivbhfyl lbh xabj v tbggn gnyx gb senax 
 xenzre lbh pna'g gnyx gb senax 
 ab v tbggn gnyx gb uvz v xabj gung ur pna uryc zr wreel 
 v guvax gurer'f n qrnq navzny va gur ryringbe 
 zl fghssrq pnoontr 
 fb terng qvaare ynfg avtug 
 lrnu vg jnf nyevtug 
 v gbyq plaguvn jr'q qbhoyr jvgu ure naq onavn fngheqnl naq gura pngpu uvf npg 
 ab ab ab jnl ab onavn 
 jung 
 unir lbh frra uvf npg ur'f tbg n gjryir-zvahgr ovg nobhg binygvar ur'f n chax n cngfl n unpx 
 plaguvn jbhyq abg qngr n unpx 
 jbhyq qbrf vf 
 orsber jr trg fgnegrq v nz unccl gb gryy lbh gung rqqvr furezna vf ab ybatre jevgvat sbe guvf pngnybt 
 ur'f hcfgnvef v znqr uvz qverpgbe bs pbecbengr qrirybczrag 
 lbh cebzbgrq uvz 
 jryy ab v jbhyq uneqyl-- 
 v ohfg zl uhzc rire qnl 
 erynk-- 
 nf sne nf v'z pbaprearq lbh naq lbhe qrenatrq cebgt pna eha gur pngnybt ol lbhefryirf v dhvg 
 jryy url url url 
 puncgre bar va beqre gb znantr evfx jr zhfg svefg haqrefgnaq evfx ubj qb lbh fcbg evfx ubj qb lbh nibvq evfx naq jung znxrf vg fb evfxl 
 guvf thl fbhaqf whfg yvxr zr 
 gb haqrefgnaq evfx jr zhfg svefg qrsvar evfx 
 guvf vf ubeevoyr 
 evfx vf qrsvarq nf-- 
  fgbc vg fgbc vg 
 p'zba senax v arrq lbh v zrna gur jne jnf svsgl lrnef ntb 
 va zl zvaq gurer'f n jne fgvyy tbvat ba 
 nyevtug jung unccrarq senax jung vf vg gung lbh pna'g trg bire 
 vapuba xbern 1950 v jnf gur orfg pbbx hapyr fnz rire fnj fyvatvat unfu sbe gur svtugvat 103eq nf jr znepurq abegu bhe fhccyl yvarf jrer trggvat guva bar qnl n pbhcyr bs tvf sbhaq n pengr vafvqr jrer fvk uhaqerq cbhaqf bs cevzr grknf fgrre ng yrnfg vg bapr jnf cevzr gur hfr qngr jnf guerr jrrxf cnfg ohg v jnf neebtnag v jnf oenfu v gubhtug vs v hfrq whfg gur evtug fcvprf pbbxrq vg ybat rabhtu 
 jung unccrarq 
 v jrag gbb sne v bire frnfbarq vg zra jrer xrryvat bire nyy nebhaq zr v pna fgvyy urne gur ergpuvat gur fpernzvat v frag fvkgrra bs zl bja zra gb gur yngevarf gung avtug gurl jrer whfg oblf 
 senax lbh jrer n obl gbb naq vg jnf jne vg jnf n penml gvzr sbe rirelbar 
 gryy gung gb obool pbyol nyy gung xvq jnagrq gb qb jnf tb ubzr jryy ur jrag ubzr nyevtug jvgu n pengre va uvf pbyba gur fvmr bs n phgyrg unq gb fvg uvz ba n pbex gur rvtugrra-ubhe syvtug ubzr 
 senax abj yvfgra gb zr gjb uhaqerq wrjvfu fvatyrf arrq lbh guvf vf lbhe punapr gb znxr vg nyy evtug ntnva 
 ab ab v'yy arire pbbx ntnva arire abj trg bhg bs zl ubhfr trg bhg tb 
 fb lbh fnj onavn'f npg 
 ur tbg gjb zvahgrf vagb gung binygvar guvat naq v whfg pbhyqa'g gnxr vg nalzber 
 v gbyq lbh vg'f yvxr trggvat orngra jvgu n ont bs benatrf 
 jul vf ur fb bofrffrq jvgu binygvar 
 ur whfg guvaxf gung nalguvat gung qvffbyirf va zvyx vf shaal 
 naljnl plaguvn naq v tbg vagb guvf ovt nethzrag nsgrejneqf naq v guvax vg'f bire 
 ab zber zragbe 
 ybbxf gung jnl 
 jryy ng yrnfg lbh naq v ner bxnl ntnva 
 npghnyyl v jnf xvaq bs guvaxvat gung znlor jr fubhyqa'g frr rnpu bgure sbe n juvyr 
 jul 
 jryy v'z srryvat n yvggyr qvfbevragrq vg'f whfg jrveq sbe zr abg gb unir na nqivfbe 
 v pna gryy lbh jung gb qb 
 ab vg'f zber guna gung 
 v pna gryy lbh jung gb guvax 
 v arrq fbzrbar v pna gehfg 
 bu 
 v tbg n ovt ceboyrz urer wreel gur gncrf ner jbeguyrff 
 xvaq bs va gur zvqqyr bs fbzrguvat urer trbetr 
 trbetr 
 v tbggn eha naljnl 
 v pna'g oryvrir lbh srry lbh ernyyl arrq n zragbe 
 v whfg arrq fbzrbar jub pna tvir zr fbzr xvaq bs qverpgvba v'yy frr ln 
 lrnu frr ln 
 jung'f lbhe ceboyrz 
 ab ceboyrz 
 url v guvax v tbg fbzrguvat urer gur oratnyrfr tnybfurf 
 bu 
  vg'f gbhtu xrrcvat lbhe srrg qel jura lbh'er xvpxvat va n fxhyy 
 lbh xabj rqqvr gung zvtug or whfg n gnq unefu sbe jbzrafjrne 
 jryy v'z abg zneevrq gb vg 
 qrjl zrnqbj 
 urer'f lbhe bzryrg 
 vg'f qel 
 gung'f gur jnl v nyjnlf znxr vg 
 jryy vg fhpxf 
 jung qvq lbh fnl 
 lbhe zrngybns vf zhful lbhe fnyzba pebdhrggrf ner bvyl naq lbhe rttcynag cnezrfna vf n qvftenpr gb guvf ubhfr 
 jryy gung'f gbb onq orpnhfr v'z gur bayl bar jub pbbxf nebhaq urer 
 abg nal zber tvzzr gung fcnghyn v'z onpx onol 
 naq lbh'er fher jvgu lbhe ohfl fpurqhyr lbh'q unir gvzr gb gnxr ba n cebgt 
 v'yy znxr gvzr orpnhfr nool v jnf bapr yvxr lbh; jvqr-rlrq anvir v qvqa'g xabj gur svefg guvat nobhg n fhowrpg nf shaqnzragny nf evfx znantrzrag 
 v'z abg snzvyvne jvgu gung lbh'yy unir gb rkcynva vg gb zr 
 v'yy gryy lbh jung jul qba'g lbh ernq guvf obbx naq yrg'f whfg frr vs lbh pna rkcynva vg gb zr 
 nyevtug 
 bxnl 
 url wreel 
 bu url onavn 
 qvqwn urne jung unccrarq gur zragbe fnj zl npg fur qhzcrq zr 
 bu gung'f gbb onq 
 znlor fur'f evtug znlor v nz n pbzcyrgr unpx v'z gur nofbyhgr jbefg gur jbefg wreel 
 jryy vg'f whfg gung lbh tbg fb znal guvatf jvgu gur zvyx lbh tbg gung obfpb ovg gura lbh tbg lbhe arfgy'f dhvx ovg ol gur gvzr lbh trg gb binygvar-- 
 lbh guvax lbh pna tvir zr n unaq jvgu zl zngrevny 
 url 
 lbh fgvyy arrq n pbbx 
 bu lrnu pbzr ba va senax 
 ln tbg g-sny 
 xrsyba 
 ab sbyybj zr 
  jul qb gurl pnyy vg binygvar gur zht vf ebhaq gur wne vf ebhaq gurl fubhyq pnyy vg ebhaq gvar gung'f tbyq wreel tbyq 
 yrg'f whfg ercynpr "unvy bs fuencary" naq "fpne gvffhr" jvgu "fgevat bs crneyf" naq "enfcoreel fpbarf" 
 trbetr pbfgnamn vf lbhe zragbe 
 lrnu ur'f terng v nz yrneavat fb zhpu 
 nobhg jung ubj gb pnyphyngr svir creprag bs n erfgnhenag purpx 
 lbh xabj jung lbhe ceboyrz vf lbh whfg unir ab erfcrpg sbe gur zragbe/zragbe eryngvbafuvc 
 nf n znggre bs snpg v unccra gb unir n cebgt bs zl bja 
 jub 
 n zvfgre xraargu onavn 
 onavn 
 v'z tbaan zragbe guvf xvq gb gur gbc 
 uhu jryy v qba'g guvax v jnag gb qngr n zragbe jubfr cebgt vf n unpx 
 jryy v qba'g guvax v jnag gb qngr n cebgt jubfr zragbe vf n pbfgnamn 
 v qba'g xabj ubj jr qvq vg ohg gurer'f fbzr xvaq bs purzvfgel orgjrra hf jr ghearq bhg bar uryy bs n pngnybt 
 pbby 
 url rq yrg zr nfx lbh fbzrguvat jung'f jvgu gur sngvthrf naq nyy gur cflpubgvp vzntrel uhu 
 v qba'g jnag gb gnyx nobhg vg 
 pbzr ba qba'g or n onol 
 v jrag bhg ba n pbhcyr bs qngrf jvgu guvf jbzna v gubhtug fur ernyyl yvxrq zr naq gura guvatf xvaq bs pbbyrq bss 
 gung'f vg 
 jryy vg'f gbhtu zrrgvat fbzrobql lbh yvxr yrg nybar fbzrobql wrjvfu 
 zz guvf sbbq vf snagnfgvp 
 unir lbh gevrq gur unzragnfura 
 v pna'g trg bss gur xvfuxnf 
 url wreel 
 onavn 
 v whfg fgbccrq ol gb gunax lbh gung evfx znantrzrag fghss lbh jebgr sbe zr vg'f xvyyre 
 evfx znantrzrag 
 nj vg'f tbyq wreel tbyq v tbg nyy gurfr pbecbengr tvtf naq rira plaguvn gbbx zr onpx 
 fb lbh jrag sebz gur znvyebbz gb gur qverpgbe bs pbecbengr qrirybczrag va gjb qnlf 
 gung'f evtug 
 ubj zhpu ner gurl cnlvat lbh v'yy qbhoyr vg 
 ln xabj gurfr yngxrf ner tbvat yvxr ubgpnxrf 
 jurer'f gur cbjqrerq fhtne 
 lbh xabj senax lbh pbhyq gnxr n oernx 
 ab oernxf v sryy erobea v'z yvxr n cubravk evfvat sebz nevmban 
 lbh'er dhvggvat 
 v pna'g puhea bhg gung cbvagyrff qeviry nal zber 
 jryy lbh pna'g dhvg lbh'er nyy v'ir tbg v arrq lbh 
 bhe arkg fcrnxre vf trbetr pbfgnamn ba gur fhowrpg bs evfx znantrzrag 
 binygvar unir lbh rire unq guvf fghss jul vf vg pnyyrq binygvar 
 gurl fubhyq pnyy vg ebhaq gvar lbh xabj jung v'z gnyxvat nobhg 
  ur'f zl cebgt 
 abbbb qba'g rng vg ab tbbq" 
 url unir lbh frra nyy gurfr arj pbzzrepvnyf sbe vaqvtrfgvba qehtf crcpvq np gntrzng uo 
 htu gur jubyr pbhagel'f fvpx gb gurve fgbznpu 
 abj lbh xabj lbh'er fhccbfrq gb gnxr gurfr guvatf orsber lbh trg fvpx 
 jung vf guvf n 'ovg' 
 ab 
 'pbf v'z abg va gur zbbq 
 jr'er whfg gnyxvat vf guvf abg gur terngrfg znexrgvat cybl rire vs lbh srry tbbq lbh'er fhccbfrq gb gnxr bar 
 lrnu v xabj gung gbar guvf vf n ovg 
 gurl'ir bcrarq hc n jubyr arj znexrg zrqvpngvba sbe gur jryy 
  nyevtug ner lbh qbar jvgu lbhe yvggyr nzhfrzrag 
  gura lbh nqzvg vg jnf nzhfvat 
 vg jnf bxnl ohg zbir gur 'zrqvpngvba sbe gur jryy' gb gur sebag naq uvg gur jbeq 'tbbq' uneqre 
  terng gunaxf 
 fb lbhe svez qrfvtarq nyy gur sheavgher va urer 
 jr znahsnpgher vg gur bevtvany qrfvtaf ner ol xney sneozna 
  bu sneozna 
 lbh xabj sneozna 
 zz ybir sneozna 
 zbfg crbcyr tb gurve jubyr yvirf jvgubhg fvggvat va n sneozna 
 jhu vs lbh pnyy gung yvivat  nunun 
 jbhyqa'g vg or terng vs sneozna qrfvtarq fubrf 
 oergg qba'g lbh guvax gung jbhyq or terng 
 oergg 
  nsgre gur fbat onor 
 uhu 
 gur fbat 
 fb jura qb v zrrg guvf wrex 
 ur'f abg n wrex wre ur bayl jbexf jvgu xney sneozna 
 jub 
  v qhaab fbzr qrfvtare naljnl oergg vf fb trarebhf naq frafvgvir ynfg avtug ur jnf zbirq whfg yvfgravat gb n fbat 
 jung fbat 
 qrfcrenqb 
 qrfcrenqb 
 hu uhu 
 naq lbh'er fgvyy qngvat uvz v gryy lbh jub fbhaqf n yvggyr qrfcrenqb 
  frr gung fnyrfzna gjveyvat gung hzoeryyn 
 hu uhu 
 v vairagrq gung 
 gung unq gb or vairagrq 
 jura v fgnegrq bhg nf n pbzrqvna v fbyq hzoeryynf vg jnf zl vqrn gb gjvey vg gb nggenpg phfgbzref 
  bu ubu ernyyl jryy jul qba'g jr nfx uvz nobhg vg 
 rynvar 
 rkphfr zr url ubj lbh qbvat huz zl hu sevraq urer fnlf gung ur vairagrq gung yvggyr gjvey lbh'er qbvat 
 rynvar cyrnfr vg jnf n ybat gvzr ntb gur zna qbrfa'g jnag n uvfgbel yrffba 
 grqql cnqvyynp pnzr hc jvgu guvf gjvey 
  buu 
 v xabj grqql cnqvyynp v jbexrq jvgu uvz ba sbegl-rvtugu naq fvkgu 
 lrnu gung'f jurer ur pbzr hc jvgu vg 
 va uvf qernzf 
 nyevtug pna jr  tb 
  ol gur jnl lbh'er qbvat vg gbb snfg lbh'yy qvfbevrag gur phfgbzref 
 vg'f gur gjveyvat gung qnmmyrf gur rlr 
  v svaq vg qvfbevragvat jub ohlf na hzoeryyn naljnl llbh trg 'rz sbe serr va gur pbssrr fubc va gur zrgny pnaf 
  gubfr orybat gb crbcyr 
 url jryy  guvf jnf qbjafgnvef sbe lbh xre-puvat 
  bu ab abg zber purpxf gurl'er pbzvat snfgre guna v pna fvta 'rz 
 jung purpxf 
 bu lbh qvqa'g urne wreel'f n ovt fgne va wncna 
 v qba'g xabj jul gurer'f n bar-frpbaq pyvc bs zr va gur bcravat perqvgf bs fbzr wncnarfr pbzrql fubj 
 lrnu gur fhcre greevsvp unccl ubhe 
  gurl eha vg nyy gur gvzr naq abj v'z fgnegvat gb trg nyy gurfr eblnygl purpxf 
 ybbx ng nyy bs gubfr lbh'er evpu 
 anj rnpu bar vf sbe yvxr gjryir pragf vg'f oneryl jbegu gur cnva va zl unaq gb fvta 'rz 
 url wreel lbh arrq nal arj sheavgher 
 jul 
  lrnu jryy rynvar'f arj oblsevraq lbh xabj ur'f tvivat zr guvf birefvmr purfg bs qenjref vg'f n sneozna 
 ur'f tvivat lbh sheavgher jub vf guvf thl 
 nu jub ner nal bs ure ybfref 
  lbh'er ba gung yvfg 
 nyevtug v tbggn tb ubzr naq bcra hc jvgu gur ubhfr sbe gur pnecrg pyrnaref lbh xabj gurl'er qbvat zl jubyr cynpr sbe gjragl-svir qbyynef 
 bu ab ab ab abg gur fhafuvar pnecrg pyrnaref 
 lrnu lbh urneq bs 'rz 
 gurl'er n penml eryvtvbhf phyg gur pnecrg pyrnavat vf whfg n zrnaf sbe gurz gb trg vagb lbhe ncnegzrag 
 fb sbe n gjragl-svir qbyyne pyrnavat v pna yvfgra gb fbzr cbvagyrff oyngure 
 v qb vg v'z abg rira trggvat gur pyrnavat 
 fvtarq bire n uhaqerq purpxf guvf zbeavat 
 uryyb gjryir qbyynef 
 rkphfr zr jbhyq lbh gnxr cvpgher cyrnfr 
  bu lrnu fher 
 v'z tbaan nfx guvf thl fbzrguvat 
  url avpr gjvey lbh tbg gurer lbh xabj jub vairagrq gung qba'g lbh 
  url ner lbh sbyxf sebz wncna 
 unv 
 lrf 
  lbh erpbtavfr gung zht 
 gung'f gur shaal snpr gung terrgf lbh ng gur ortvaavat bs gur fhcre greevsvp unccl ubhe 
 nuu fhcre greevsvp unccl 
 nu lrnu lrnu gung'f uvz 
 jung vf ur qbvat 
 jryy v qba'g xabj ohg fbzrguvat fhcre greevsvp v'z fher 
 ur'f shaal 
 bu lrnu irel shaal naq vg jbhyqa'g or vzcbyvgr gb ynhtu ng uvf nagvpf 
 lrnu lrnu gung'f vg orpnhfr rirelobql ynhtuf ng wreel urer va nzrevpn 
  jr'er cerggl zhpu svavfurq 
 gurer'f whfg bar zber guvat 
  urer vg pbzrf 
  lbh sbetbg gb fvta lbhe purpx 
  fbeel  lbh'er fher hu gurer vfa'g nalguvat ryfr 
  ab 
  fb gung'f vg 
 hayrff lbh arrq n erprvcg 
  v jvfu gung jnf nyy arrqrq yvsr pna or fb pbashfvat vv'z frnepuvat sbe nafjref naljurer 
  tbbq yhpx jvgu gung 
 url 
 jung'f jvgu gur pynj 
 fhcre greevsvp pnecny ghaary flaqebzr 
  gurer'f ab fvta bs xenzre 
 bu oergg  guvf vf wreel 
 uv 
 gung'f irel shaal rynvar gbyq zr lbh jrer fbzr xvaqn pbzrqvna 
 nu v'z bar xvaq 
 unir lbh frra gur purfg bs qenjref gung oergg tnir gb xenzre 
 gur syrpxzna 
 sneozna 
 evtug 
 lbh tbggn frr 'rz ornhgvshy 
  bu v'z fher gurl ner 
 v'q or unccl gb trg lbh fbzr vs gung'f jung lbh'er qevivat ng 
 ab v'z svar gunax lbh 
 qba'g jbeel vg'f ab punetr gb lbh 
 ybbxf yvxr jung lbh ernyyl arrq vf n qrprag qrfx sbe jevgvat lbhe fxvgf 
  v qba'g jevgr fxvgf 
  jryy bs pbhefr lbh qba'g lbh qba'g unir n cebcre jbexfgngvba v'yy snk lbh bire zl pngnybthr 
 zzz oergg huz wreel qbrfa'g unir n snk znpuvar 
  bbcf 
 jryy v'z fher guvatf'yy cvpx hc sbe lbh fbba rynvar znlor jr fubhyq trg tbvat 
 bu wreel lbh jnaan wbva hf 
 bu jurer lbh tbvat gur pbssrr fubc 
  pbssrr fubc v guvax jr pna qb n yvggyr orggre guna gung lbh ybbx yvxr lbh pbhyq hfr n fbyvq zrny ng n erny erfgnhenag 
 lbh ybbx yvxr lbh pbhyq hfr n 
  wreel 
  guerr uhaqerq qbyynef url ze bu ubj zhpu jbhyq gurfr eha lbh va gbxlb 
  nuu nobhg hu guvegl gubhfnaq lra 
  guvegl gubhfnaq gurfr ner cenpgvpnyyl serr 
 tvqqlhc lbh'er n pbjobl abj 
 v srry greevoyr nobhg lbhe sevraq wreel ur'f hcfrg gung v tnir xenzre gung purfg bs qenjref vfa'g ur 
 jul jul q'lbh guvax ur'f hcfrg 
 ubj pbhyq ur abg or yvivat va gung penzcrq yvggyr ncnegzrag naq bhgqngrq sheavgher fb greevoyl ha-xney sneozna-yvxr 
  jr'er abg tbaan gnyx nobhg xney sneozna nyy avtug ner jr 
  v ubcr abg 
  oergg rirelguvat nyevtug 
  oergg jung vf vg vf gurer fbzrbar bhgfvqr 
 rynvar gur fbat 
  bu bu bu curj lbh xabj sbe n zvahgr gurer v gubhtug vg jnf yvxr gung heona yrtraq nobhg gur thl jvgu gur ubbx jub'f unatvat ba gur sraqre 
 rynvar pbhyq lbh whfg abg gnyx sbe bar zvahgr 
  fbeel 
 ab fcvry 
  abg n crrc gurl whfg pyrnarq gur pnecrgf naq yrsg pnyy gurzfryirf n phyg 
 fb lbh'er natel gung guvf ovmneer pnecrg pnony znqr ab nggrzcg gb noqhpg lbh 
 gurl pbhyq'ir ng yrnfg gevrq 
 lbh xabj znlor gurl gubhtug lbh ybbxrq gbb fzneg gb or oenvajnfurq 
 cyrnfr 
 gbb qhzo 
  jryy znpx vf onpx va gbja avpr qhqf 
 xbavpuv-jn lrnu vg'f n tvsg sebz zl wncnarfr sevraqf  gurl'er xabja nf tvsg-tviref naq gbavtug jr'er tbvat qnapvat ng gur envaobj ebbz 
 fbhaqf yvxr lbh'er guebjvat n ybg bs gurve zbarl nebhaq 
 jryy wreel gurl'er wncnarfr v zrna gung gi lbh jngpu gung fhfuv lbh rng v zrna rira gung xvzbab lbh jrne jurer gb lbh guvax nyy gung zbarl tbrf uzz 
 gung'f evtug 
 ubj'q lbh ubbx hc jvgu gurfr thlf 
 jryy gurl erpbtavfrq wreel sebz gur fhcre greevsvp unccl ubhe frr abj lbh fubhyq or qbvat lbhe bja fubj va wncna abj gurl trg lbh 
 jung xvaq bs fubj nz v tbaan qb va wncna 
  nyevtug jung'q lbh qb jvgu gung cvybg lbh qvq 
  lrnu gur cvybg 
 gung'f evtug v guvax gung unq zneiryybhf cebqhpgvba inyhrf 
  naq lbh xabj v qb n ybggn ohfvarff jvgu wncnarfr gi gurl oebnqpnfg n ybg bs nzrevpna onfronyy gurl tbg na bssvpr urer va arj lbex 
 sbetrg vg gur cvybg jnf njshy vg snvyrq 
  vg snvyrq urer orpnhfr urer rirel gvzr lbh ghea ba n gi nyy lbh frr vf sbhe zbebaf fvggvat ebhaq na ncnegzrag juvavat nobhg gurve qngrf 
 trbetr vf evtug wreel frr urer lbh'er whfg nabgure nccyr ohg va wncna lbh'er na rkbgvp sehvg yvxr na benatr juvpu vf ener gurer 
 lbh unq n qngr lbh jrag bhg jvgu zl ohgyre jub fnvq lbh pbhyq tb bhg jvgu zl ohgyre 
 jryy jul qb v arrq lbhe crezvffvba 
 orpnhfr ur'f zl ohgyre 
  fb jung q'lbh guvax 
 jr'er ovg pbashfrq jul jnf guvf zna wreel'f ohgyre 
 nu lbh frr gur zna jub jnf gur ohgyre hu unq tbggra vagb n pne nppvqrag jvgu wreel naq orpnhfr ur qvqa'g unir nal vafhenapr gur whqtr qrperrq gung gur zna orpbzr wreel'f ohgyre 
 vf guvf phfgbznel va lbhe yrtny flfgrz 
 ab gung'f jung znxrf vg fhpu n uhzbebhf fvghngvba 
  fhogvgyr ner lbh sbyybjvat nal bs guvf 
  fhogvgyr v'z fgvyy gelvat gb svther bhg jul gurl tnir hf n ont bs benatrf 
  v'z fbeel v'z fher ze frvasryq vf irel shaal gb nzrevpnaf ohg v'z abg fher guvf ohgyre fubj jbhyq jbex va wncna 
 bu v hu v qvfnterr lbh'ir hu lbh'ir orra yvivat va nzrevpn gbb ybat  lbh'ir sbetbggra jung vg'f yvxr gb unir ab benatrf 
  fhogvgyr ntnva jvgu gur benatrf 
  fbeel zl unaq vf ahzo 
  lrf sebz raqbefvat purpxf sbe gur fhcre greevsvp unccl ubhe  
 lbh zhfg tb abj 
 nu v guvax v'z ba gur bhgf jvgu oergg v tbg fuhfurq qhevat qrfcrenqb 
  jung qbrf ur yvfgra gb gur nyy qrfcrenqb fgngvba 
 ur vf whfg va uvf bja jbeyq jura ur urnef gung fbat vg'f yvxr v'z fvggvat gurer va gur pne naq ur'f bhg evqvat sraprf 
 lbh xabj jung lbh arrq vf n fbat lbh pna funer 
 lrf lbh'er evtug jr arrq gb svaq 'bhe' fbat 
 bxnl fb vf gurer nal fbat gung lbh srry irel fgebatyl nobhg 
  v yvxr jvgpul jbzna 
 jvgpul jbzna

  nuu jvg-punl jbzna

 url

 jung sbe 
 lrnu jryy hu zl wncnarfr sevraqf'er tbaan fgnl jvgu zr 
 v gubhtug gurl nyy unq fhvgrf ng gur cynmn 
 jryy v'z fbeel wreel jr nyy qba'g unir purpxf ebyyvat va yvxr lbh qb 
 jryy jung nobhg nyy gung zbarl sebz gur xvzbabf v jrne 
 jryy gurl ena bhg bs vg znaunggna pna or dhvgr cevprl rira jvgu svsgl gubhfnaq lra 
 svsgl gubhfnaq lra vfa'g gung bayl n srj uhaqerq qbyynef 
 rivqragyl  bu ol gur jnl gryy oergg gung uvf purfg bs qenjref ner n ovt uvg zl thrfgf ner irel pbzsbegnoyr va gurz 
 va gurz

 fuu-fuu  jung q'lbh guvax

 grqql  guvf'f gur thl fnlf ur vairagrq gur gjvey

 hzoeryyn ohqql

 wreel 
 wreel 
  abg gur sneozna 
  fhogvgyr wreel frvasryq vf n qnatrebhf yhangvp ur jbhyqa'g yrg hf bhg bs gur qenjref gura ur pnzr ng zr jvgu na nkr

 fb hu tragyrzra qb jr unir n qrny 
  fhogvgyr pbhyq jr unir n pbhcyr bs gubfr benatrf 
  fhogvgyr jr ner irel uhatel naq unir fheivirq znal uneqfuvcf 
  rkphfr zr qvq lbh uver gur fhafuvar pnecrg pyrnaref 
 lrf pyrnarq hc gur  pbssrr fgnva yrsg ol wreel frvasvryq 
 ze jvyuryz junjung'er lbh qbvat urer 
 v'z urer gb pyrna gur pnecrgf zbfg bs gur jbeyq vf pnecrgrq naq bar qnl jr jvyy qb gur pyrnavat 
  uvz lbh oenvajnfurq  jung'f ur tbg gung v qba'g unir 
  ze jvyuryz yvfgra lbh'ir orra noqhpgrq cyrnfr ze jvyuryz lbh tbggn yvfgra gb zr

  fhogvgyr jvgu gurfr gjb vqvbgf v qba'g xabj ubj gur lnaxrrf jba gur jbeyq frevrf

  ng yrnfg vg jnf whfg gur unaqyr 
 vg jnf n ornhgvshy pnovarg jung nz v tbaan gryy

 syrpxzna

 tbbq qnl zf orarf vgf ebtre vcfjvgpu

 jryy v nz gur cerfvqrag

 tbbq qnl 
 uryyb nalobql 
 url 
 url jul qvqa'g pun trg gur ovt bar 
 guvf ung whfg obggyrf va gur urng v -v qba'g rira arrq n pbng vg'f haoryvrinoyr 
 v qba'g oryvrir vg 
 nu naq v tbg n qngr jvgu gur fnyrf jbzna fur'f tbg n yvggyr znevfn gbzrv guvat tbvat ba 
 nuu gbb onq lbh tbg n yvggyr trbetr pbfgnamn guvat tbvat ba 
 v'z tbvat bhg jvgu ure gbzbeebj fur fnvq fur unq fbzr reenaqf gb eha 
 gung'f n qngr 
 jung'f gur qvssrerapr lbh xabj gurl jnl v jbex v'z yvxr n pbzzrepvny wvatyr svefg vg'f n yvggyr veevgngvat gura lbh urne vg n srj gvzrf lbher uhzzva vg va gur fubjre ol gur guveq qngr vg'f  "ol zraara" 
 ubj qb lbh znxr fher lbhe tbaan trg gb gur guveq qngr 
 vs gurer'f nal qbhog v qb n yrnir-oruvaq xrlf tybirf fpnes -- v tb onpx gb ure cynpr gb cvpx vg hc qngr ahzore gjb 
 gung vf fb byq jul qba'g lbh fubj hc ng ure qbbe va n jbbq ubefr 
  "ol zraara"  jung gur 
 jung'f tbvat ba va gurer 
 jung 
 gung yvtug

 buu  
 frgu vs lbh xarj gur zrrgvat jnf fb vzcbegnag jul qvq lbh tb gur yhapu jvgu zr 
 jr'er byq pbyyrtr ohqqvrf 
 v bayl xarj lbh guebhtu zbbpuvr 
 url wreel qba'g jbeel nobhg vg nyy evtug gur vzcbegnag guvat vf vf jr tbg gb pngpu hc zvaq vs v nu teno gur jnag nqf 
 hz npghnyyl v unira'g ernq gnax zpanznen lrg  
 ubj'f yvsr ba gur erq cynarg  
 vgf xvyyvat zr v pna'g rng v pna'g fyrrc nyy v pna frr vf gung tvnag erq fha va gur funcr bs n puvpxra

 jung ner lbh qbvat 
 trggvat fbzr prerny 
 gung gung'f gbzngb whvpr

 v qba'g xabj xenzre nuu zl pbaprea vf gung  
 yvivat gbtrgure nsgre n juvyr jr jr zvtug fgneg gb trg ba rnpu bguref areirf n yvggyr 
 nyevtug yvfgra gb zr v tbg n terng vqrn abj lbh'er n urnil fyrrcre evtug jul qba'g jr whfg fjvgpu ncnegzragf 
 be v pbhyq fyrrc va gur cnex lbh pbhyq xabpx gurfr jnyyf qbja znxr vg na rvtug ebbz yhkhel fhvgr 
 wreel gurfr ner ybnq ornevat jnyyf gurl'er abg tbaan pbzr qbja

 tbbqolr trbetr

  pb-fgna-mn  
 jung qb lbh zrna lbh qba'g unir gur ung 
 v yrsg vg ng urngure'f ner gurfr nyvir  
 ab qrnq trbetr v arrq gung ehffvna ung onpx

 ab vgf n xvaq bs eng 
 gung'f n eng ung

 thlf uvggvat vf abg nobhg zhfpyr vg'f fvzcyr culfvpf pnyphyngr gur irybpvgl i va eryngvba gb gur genwrpgbel g va juvpu t tenivgl bs pbhefr erznvaf n pbafgnag  vg'f abg pbzcyvpngrq 
 abj jub ner lbh ntnva 
 trbetr pbfgnamn nffvfgnag gb gur geniryvat frpergnel 
 ner lbh gur thl jub chg hf va gung enznqn va zvyjnhxrr 
 qb lbh jnaan gnyx nobhg ubgryf be qb lbh jnaan jva fbzr onyy tnzrf 
 jr jba gur jbeyq frevrf 
 va fvk tnzrf 
 fb vs lbh yvxr gb gryy wbxrf naq ybir gb znxr crbcyr ynhtu fgnaq-hc pbzrql znl or gur pnerre sbe lbh 
 avar zvahgrf 
 ubj nz v tbaan svyy gjb ubhef 
 uryyb v pna gnxr na ubhe bss lbhe unaqf tvir gur xvqf n punapr gb frr n erny yvir lnaxrr 
 naq tvir lbh gur punapr gb frr fbzr erny qvfnccbvagrq xvqf  
 zber pbssrr 
 rkphfr zr qneyvat qb v qrgrpg n cbeghthrfr npprag 
 fv 
 qnf xnssrf ha fnyng r tenaq cbe snibe 
 zhgr centnynf frabe 
 ru qba'g zragvba vg 
 cbeghthrfr 
 lrnu zl pyrnavat ynql'f cbeghthrfr v zhfg'ir cvpxrq vg hc 
 ubj pbzr ur'f trggva' fb fzneg v fgbccrq univat frk jvgu ora guerr qnlf ntb naq v qba'g xabj ab cbeghthrfr 
 ner lbh nyy evtug 
 v qba'g xabj vg'f whfg gur ynfg pbhcyn qnlf zl zvaq unf orra abg tbbq 
 jnvg n frpbaq v xabj jung'f unccravat gur ab frk guvat vf univat n erirefr rssrpg ba lbh 
 jung jung ner lbh gnyxvat nobhg 
 gb n jbzna frk vf yvxr gur tneontr zna lbh whfg gnxr sbe tenagrq gur snpg gung nal gvzr lbh chg fbzr genfu bhg ba gur fgerrg n thl va n whzcfhvg'f tbaan pbzr nybat naq cvpx vg hc ohg abj vg'f yvxr n tneontr fgevxr gur ontf ner cvyvat hc va lbhe urnq gur fvqrjnyx vf oybpxrq abguvat'f trggvat guebhtu lbh'er fghcvq 
 v qba'g haqrefgnaq 
 rknpgyl 
 url ohqql 
 url 
 url lbh fubhyq pbzr bire gbavtug'f cvcr avtug 
 jung jung unccrarq gb lbhe snpr vg ybbxf yvxr na byq pngpure'f zvgg 
 jung  zl snpr vf nyy penttyl vg'f pevaxyl 
 vg'f sebz nyy gung fzbxr lbh'ir rkcrevraprq n yvsrgvzr bs fzbxvat va 72 ubhef jung qvq lbh rkcrpg 
 rzculfrzn ovegu qrsrpgf pnapre ohg abg guvf wreel zl snpr vf zl yviryvubbq rirelguvat v unir v bjr gb guvf snpr 
 naq lbhe grrgu lbhe grrgu ner nyy oebja 
 ybbx njnl v'z uvqrbhf 
 url ora v arrq n sbhe yrggre jbeq jvaavr gur oynax 
 cbbu 
 cbbu 
 ab vg'f jvaavr gur cbbu 
 fb gur ubfcvgny pnyyrq gheaf bhg fbzr fghcvq vagrea fperjrq hc zl grfg v arire unq zbab fb jr pna lbh xabj 
 fb jung qvq lbh qb 
 v gbyq ure v jbhyq unir gb guvax nobhg vg 
 ohg hygvzngryl lbh'er tbaan pubbfr va snibe bs frk evtug 
 v qba'g xabj creuncf v pna orggre freir gur jbeyq guvf jnl 
 lbh zrna abg fhowrpgvat lbhefrys gb lbhe frkhny nqinaprf 
 fvzcyr wbxr sebz n fvzcyr zna 
 fb lbh'er arire tbaan unir frk ntnva 
 jryy wreel gurer jnf n cerggl tbbq punapr v jnf arire tbaan unir frk ntnva naljnl 
 fb lbh ernql sbe gur nffrzoyl gbzbeebj lbh xabj jung lbh'er tbaan fnl nobhg gur lnaxrrf 
 bu fcbegf ner fb crqrfgevna v'ir cercnerq fbzr fpvrapr rkcrevzragf gung jvyy vyyhzvangr gur zvaq naq qnmmyr gur rlr 
 v jebgr n 20 zvahgr ovg nobhg ubj ubzrjbex fgvaxf 
 zl inpngvba jnf erfgshy fcyraqvq zntavsvprag va snpg arkg gvzr v'z cynaava' ba tbvat gb xbsh 
 bu ab 
 wnpxvr jr tbggn gnyx 
 ab jnl xenzre lbh'ir oebhtug abguvat ohg n zbhagnva bs zvfsbeghar naq uhzvyvngvba abj trg bhg 
 ohg wnpxvr-- 
 v fnvq bhg 
 wnpxvr v guvax v tbggn pnfr ntnvafg gur gbonppb pbzcnavrf 
 gur jub 
 gur gbonppb pbzcnavrf 
 v'ir orra jnagvat n cvrpr bs gurz sbe lrnef 
 qvq gung pvtnerggr jneavat ynory zragvba nalguvat nobhg qnzntr gb lbhe nccrnenapr 
 ab vg qvqa'g fnl nalguvat 
 fb lbh'er n ivpgvz abj lbhe snpr vf funyybj hanggenpgvir qvfthfgvat 
 fb wnpxvr qb lbh guvax jr tbggn pnfr 
 lbhe snpr vf zl pnfr 
 ubj ln qbva' 
 abg tbbq v'z n zbeba 
 jryy qba'g jbeel nobhg vg bapr ur cnffrf gur grfg lbh'yy unir frk ntnva naq lbh'yy or svar 
 jryy gung xvaqn oevatf hf gb jul v'z urer lbh tbg ryrira zvahgrf 
 jung sbe bu pbzr ba 
 v whfg jnaan pyrne zl urnq vg unf abguvat gb qb jvgu lbh 
 v guvax vg unf fbzrguvat gb qb jvgu zr 
 lbh pbhyq ernq gur cncre guebhtu gur jubyr guvat vs lbh jnag 
  ab ab ab v'z fbeel vg'f gbb jrveq 
 bu nyy evtug vf xenzre ubzr 
 lbh xabj ybhvfr v guvax lbh'yy svaq guvf nzhfvat va rneyl rhpyvqrna trbzrgel-- 
 trbetr v unir gb unir frk 
 v hfrq gb funer gung fnzr bhgybbx ohg abj v unir fb znal guvatf gb bpphcl zl zvaq sbe vafgnapr gur ngbz 
 tbbqolr trbetr v ungr lbh  
 jung n snfpvangvat ghea bs riragf  
 znf pns 
 fv cbe snibe 
 zvff jvyxvr lbhe gbonppb pbzcnal unf ghearq guvf ornhgvshy fcrpvzra vagb n ubeevoyr gjvfgrq sernx 
 jub pbhyq ybir zr 
 v qvfnterr va snpg v srry ze xenzre cebwrpgf n ehttrq znfphyvavgl 
 ehttrq gur zna'f n tboyva ur'f bayl orra rkcbfrq gb fzbxr sbe sbhe qnlf ol gur gvzr guvf pnfr trgf gb gevny ur'yy or abguvat zber guna n fuehaxra urnq 
 nyy evtug ze puvyrf lbh'yy unir bhe bssre ol gbzbeebj tbbq qnl tragyrzra  
 olr-olr wnpxvr lbh qvq vg jr'er evpu 
 lbh orggre oryvrir vg wnpxvr'f pnfuva' va ba lbhe jergpurq qvfsvtherzrag 
 pbatenghyngvbaf lbh cnffrq 
 rynvar rynvar v qba'g guvax jr fubhyq frr rnpu bgure nalzber 
 jung lbh'er oernxvat hc jvgu zr ohg v fnpevsvprq naq fhccbegrq lbh juvyr lbh fgehttyrq jung nobhg zl qernz bs qngvat n qbpgbe 
 v'z fbeel rynvar v nyjnlf xarj gung nsgre v orpnzr n qbpgbe v jbhyq qhzc jubrire v jnf jvgu naq svaq fbzrbar orggre gung'f gur qernz bs orpbzvat n qbpgbe 
 ybbx vg ner jr tbvat gb unir frk be abg 
 bxnl wreel abj jura gur tyrr pyho'f svavfurq fvatvat trbetr tbrf ba gura lbh  
 url 
 jurer unir lbh orra lbh xabj lbh'er ba arkg 
 v tbg ybfg ba gur jnl bire 
 tbg ybfg jr jrag gb fpubby urer sbe guerr lrnef 
 jung ner gurfr  gnxr zr gb lbhe yrnqre 
 bu zl tbq lbh unq frk lbh unq frk jvgu ybhvfr 
 ab gur cbeghthrfr jnvgerff 
 gur cbeghthrfr jnvgerff 
 v pnyphyngrq zl bqqf bs rire trggvat gbtrgure jvgu n cbeghthrfr jnvgerff zngurzngvpnyyl v unq gb qb vg wreel 
 trbetr trbetr lbh'er ba 
 ab ab v'z abg tbvat ba 
 gura jung'q lbh pbzr qbja urer sbe 
 gryy lbh nobhg gur cbeghthrfr jnvgerff 
 vg'f tbbq gb unir lbh onpx 
 bar bs lbh unf gb tb ba 
 nyy evtug v'yy qb vg  url xvqf jung'f gur qrny jvgu ubzrjbex lbh'er abg jbexvat ba lbhe ubzr  
 vg jnf n terng yhapu wnpxvr gunaxf 
 vg'f n yvggyr chmmyvat jr unira'g tbggra gung bssre lrg 
 zef jvyxvr sebz gur gbonppb pbzcnal pnyyrq zr jr unq n yvggyr cbj-jbj 
 n cbj-jbj jub gbyq lbh gb unir n cbj-jbj v qvqa'g gryy lbh gb unir cbj-jbj 
 fur znqr na bssre v gbbx vg 
 ubj zhpu 
 ab ab ab gurer jnf ab zbarl 
 ab zbarl gura jung'q jr trg 
 purpx vg bhg  
 guvf vf gur zbfg choyvp lrg bs zl znal uhzvyvngvbaf 
 pnapryyrq ohg v jnf fhccbfrq gb or ba gbzbeebj avtug 
 lrnu ohg gura lbh xabj fbzr crbcyr jrer gryyvat zr nobhg gung yvggyr sync bhg gurer ng gur whavbe uvtu nffrzoyl naq orsber gung lbh jrer ohzcrq ol n yvmneq 
 npghnyyl vg jnf n ******** 
 gubfr guvatf qrnqyl qnatrebhf n ybat gvzr ntb zl hapyr naq n qngr ner qevivat yvxr guebhtu zrkvpb gurl frr bar ba gur ebnq qentf uvz bhg bs gur ebnq naq purjf uvf snpr bss yvfgra jr'yy pnyy lbh vs nalguvat bcraf hc bxnl wvzzl 
 wreel 
 evtug wreel 
 wreel'f ncnegzrag] 
 wreel  trbetvr'f zbivat bhg 
  trg bhg 
 v'z bhg snagnfgvp ncnegzrag evtug npebff sebz zvar uhu v pna'g jnvg sbe lbh gb frr vg 
  vf vg orggre guna zvar 
  bu lrnu 
 fb vg'f n gjb-orqebbz-bar-ongu-znxr-lbhe-sevraqf-ungr-ln 
 lbh xabj jung vg'f orggre guna rynvar'f gbb v tbggn tvir ure n pnyy  
 fur'f bhg 
  bu evtug gur oyvaq qngr 
 lrnu jryy gurl yvxr gb pnyy vg n frg-hc abj v thrff gur oyvaq crbcyr qba'g yvxr orvat nffbpvngrq jvgu nyy gubfr ybfref 
 pbzr ba pbzr purpx bhg zl arj cynpr vg'yy gnxr lbh gjb zvahgrf 
 v pna'g v'z zrrgvat xenzre qbja ng zl zvav-fgbentr 
  url lbh tbg nal rkgen sheavgher qbja gurer v arrq fbzr zber fghss gb svyy gung rkgen orqebbz jvgu gur jnyx-va pybfrg  
  bu guvf vf ernyyl naablvat 
  vg'f jbexvat nyernql  
 znaunggna zvav-fgbentr] 
  jung vf jvgu gung 
 jryy vg'f pbhtuvat wreel vg rkcryyf gur qvfrnfrq trezf bhg bs gur obql vagb gur nve  
  jurer vf lbhe xrl 
 lrnu jryy hu arjzna ur'f - ur'f tbg vg 
 lbh xabj xenzre v eragrq bhg unys bs zl fcnpr gb lbh 
 lrnu naq v eragrq bhg unys gung fcnpr gb arjzna  
  znvy ontf ur'f fgbevat znvy va urer 
  rivqragyl 
 trbetr'f arj ncnegzrag] 
 rkphfr zr trbetr  
  lrnu hu ab zrahf  
  ab v'z zef evpneqv - cerfvqrag bs gur granag'f nffbpvngvba 
 bu evtug  evtug url url v ybir gur sybbef va urer vg'f yvxr n tlzanfvhz va urer gel naq thneq zr  hu trbetr hasbeghangryl pynenapr ryqevqtr va 8p unf qrpvqrq gung ur jnagf gur ncnegzrag 
  lrnu ohg lbh - lbh cebzvfrq vg gb zr 
 lrf ohg lbh frr - zvfgre ryqevqtr vf na naqern qbevn fheivibe naq va yvtug bs gur greevoyr fhssrevat gung ur'f nyernql orra guebhtu jr'ir qrpvqrq gb tvir vg gb uvz 
  jryy gur naqern qbevn gung jnf dhvgr n sver  
  fuvcjerpx 
 v erzrzore  
 erfgnhenag] 
 jurer vf guvf thl  v ungr guvf  v fubhyqn oebhtug fbzrguvat gb ernq  "pnapre va ynoengbel navznyf" uhu 
 rkphfr zr rynvar orarf 
 lrnu 
 na nyna zrepre pnyyrq sbe lbh ur fnvq ur'f fbeel ohg ur jba'g or noyr gb znxr vg gbavtug  ur'f orra fgnoorq 
  fgnoorq 
 zber oernq 
 wreel'f ncnegzrag] 
  lbh ngr zber oernq 
 gung vf abg gur cbvag gur thl jnf fgnoorq 
 qvq lbh svaq bhg jub fgnoorq uvz 
 lrnu  vg gheaf bhg vg jnf uvf rk-tveysevraq 
  jryy lbh'er abg tbvat arne guvf ubbyvtna nalzber 
 jryy v qba'g xabj v zrna guvax nobhg vg wreel gurer zhfg or fbzrguvat rkpvgvat nobhg guvf thl vs ur pna nebhfr gung xvaq bs cnffvba  v zrna gb or fgno-jbegul lbh xabj vg'f xvaq bs n pbzcyvzrag 
  lrnu gbb onq ur qvqa'g trg fubg ur pbhyq unir orra gur bar 
  url ubj'f rirelobql  
 url 
 ruu  ab rkcvengvba qngr ba guvf  
 gurer vf abj xenzre lbh fubhyq ernyyl trg gung pbhtu purpxrq bhg ol n qbpgbe 
  anu ab ab ab ab qbpgbef sbe zr n ohapu bs ynpxrlf naq lrf-zra nyy gbjvat gur pbzcnal yvar  cyhf gur obgpurq zl infrpgvzl 
  gur obgpurq vg 
  v'z rira zber cbgrag abj 
 url 
 url ubj'f gur arj cynpr 
 tbar  gur granag nffbpvngvba znqr zr tvir vg gb guvf thl orpnhfr ur jnf na naqern qbevn fheivibe 
 naqern qbevn vfa'g gung gur bar gurl qvq gur fbat nobhg 
  rqzhaq svgmtrenyq 
 v ybir rqzhaq svgmtrenyq'f ibvpr 
  ab tbeqba yvtugsbbg jnf gur fvatre rqzhaq svgmtrenyq jnf gur fuvc 
  lbh pbhyq svg 15 crbcyr va gung onguebbz 
 v guvax tbeqba yvtugsbbg jnf gur obng 
  lrnu naq vg jnf enzzrq ol gur png fgriraf 
  gur naqern qbevn pbyyvqrq jvgu gur fgbpxubyz va qrafr sbt 21 zvyrf bss gur pbnfg bs anaghpxrg  
 ubj qb lbh xabj 
 vg'f va zl obbx - "nfgbavfuvat gnyrf bs gur frn" 51 crbcyr qvrq 
 51 crbcyr gung'f vg v gubhtug vg jnf yvxr n gubhfnaq 
 gurer jrer 1650 fheivibef 
 gung'f ab gentrql ubj znal crbcyr qb lbh ybfr ba n abezny pehfr 30 40 xenzre pna v gnxr n ybbx ng gung obbx  
 bu lrnu v nyfb tbg "nfgbhaqvat orne nggnpxf" 
 url hu orsber lbh tb qvq lbh gnyx gb arjzna nobhg trggvat gung znvy bhggn gurer 
 lrnu bu lrnu lrnu ur'f abg tbaan qb vg  
 arjzna'f ncnegzrag] 
 arjzna 
  v thrff 
 yvfgra v jnag lbh gb trg gur znvy bhggn zl fgbentr havg 
 fbzrgvzrf jr qba'g trg jung jr jnag 
  jung ner lbh gnyxvat nobhg 
 v qvqa'g trg zl genafsre 
 "genafsre" 
 gb unjnvv gur zbfg fbhtug-nsgre cbfgny ebhgr bs gurz nyy gur nve vf fb qrjl-fjrrg lbh qba'g rira unir gb yvxr gur fgnzcf ohg vg'f abg gb or - fb v'z unatvat vg hc 
 lbh dhvg gur cbfg bssvpr 
 xvaq bs v'z fgvyy pbyyrpgvat purpxf v'z whfg abg qryvirevat znvy 
 jryy trg vg bhg bs zl fgbentr vg'f vyyrtny 
 naq lrg vg'f cresrpgyl yrtny gb gnxr n zna'f fbhy naq pehfu vg bhg yvxr n fgnyr cnyy znyy 
  jryy n ynj'f n ynj  
 prageny cnex] 
 bx ubyq ba gurer gung'f n anfgl pbhtu lbh tbg gurer uhu 
 jung pbhtu 
 erfgnhenag] 
 v ybir fuevzc  v'z n fuevzc rngre lbh chg fuevzc vasebag bs zr  naq v jvyy rng vg hagvy zl fgbznpu cbcf  bu  
 ab vg'f bxnl v'z fgvyy whfg n yvggyr ovg whzcl 
  orgjrra lbh naq zr jung unccrarq gurer jvgu gur fgnoovat 
 whfg bar bs gubfr guvatf lbh xabj 
 jung jnf fur whfg fb penml va ybir jvgu lbh gung fur whfg pbhyqa'g gnxr vg nalzber be 
 v qba'g xabj pbhyq or 
 nyna 
 pneby 
  jnf gung gur bar jnf gung gur bar jub fgnoorq lbh 
  ab gung jnf n qvssrerag tvey 
 pbssrr fubc] 
 gurer jnf nabgure penmrq rk-tveysevraq 
 evtug fb v pnyyrq zl sevraq lbh xabj - gur bar jub frg hf hc - v sbhaq bhg ur'f n onq-oernxre-hccre 
 zzz onq ubj 
  jryy lbh xabj jura lbh oernx hc ubj lbh fnl guvatf lbh qba'g zrna jryy ur fnlf gur zrna guvatf lbh qba'g zrna ohg ur zrnaf gurz 
  v sbyybj fb jung ner lbh tbaan qb 
 qhzc uvz v pna'g or jvgu fbzrbar jub qbrfa'g oernx hc avpryl v zrna gb zr gung'f bar bs gur zbfg vzcbegnag cnegf bs n eryngvbafuvc 
  jung'f zber vzcbegnag 
 alp fgerrg] 
  url 
 jung'f jvgu gur qbt 
  lrnu guvf vf fzhpxref v obeebjrq uvz  
 bu 
  lrnu jr funer gur fnzr nssyvpgvba fb v'z tbaan unir n irg purpx hf bhg 
 n irg 
 bu v'yy gnxr n irg bire na zq nal qnl gurl tbggn or noyr gb pher n  yvmneq n puvpxra n cvt n sebt  - nyy ba gur fnzr qnl 
 fb vs v znl whzc nurnq - lbh'er tbaan gnxr qbt zrqvpvar 
  lbh org jr ner uhu fzhpxref  v'yy frr ln 
 trbetr'f ncnegzrag ohvyqvat] 
 nubl ze ryqevqtr v haqrefgnaq lbh jrer ba gur naqern qbevn 
 lrf vg jnf n greevslvat beqrny 
 v gryy ln v urne crbcyr ernyyl fghss gurzfryirf ba gubfr pehvfr fuvcf  gur ohssrg gung'f gur erny beqrny uhu pynerapr  
  jr unq gb nonaqba fuvc 
 jryy nyy inpngvbaf unir gb raq riraghnyyl 
 gur obng fnax 
  nppbeqvat gb guvf vg gbbx 10 ubhef vg rnfrq vagb gur jngre yvxr na byq zna vagb n avpr jnez ongu - ab bssrapr  fb hu pynerapr ubj nobhg nonaqbavat guvf ncnegzrag naq yrggvat zr fubir bss va guvf ornhgl 
 vf gung jung guvf vf nyy nobhg v qba'g guvax v yvxr lbh  
  vg'f zl ncnegzrag ryqevqtr gur fgnyxubyz znl abg unir fhax ln ohg v jvyy un un un 
 irg'f bssvpr] 
 jung ner gur flzcgbzf 
 jryy hu vg uhegf jura ur fjnyybjf rkcrpvnyyl jura ur qevaxf benatr whvpr  v zrna hu qbt sbbq whvpr  jung'f jbefr - ur unf n anttvat pbhtu  lrnu gung'f vg gung'f vg 
 lrnu jryy hu - jr'ir orra frrvat n ybg bs guvf yngryl orra qevaxvat sebz gur gbvyrg 
  jung ab gung'f qvfthfgvat 
 pbssrr fubc] 
 fb gung'f vg jr'er hu jr'er oernxva' hc 
  jung oernx-hc jr jrag bhg ba bar qngr 
  bx lrnu fher svar evtug jungrire lbh fnl 
  nyevtug tbbq tbbq 
 bx gura jryy fb frr ln nebhaq ovt urnq  
 cneqba 
 lbh tbg n ovt urnq vg'f gbb ovt sbe lbhe obql  
  gung'f vg  gung'f gur orfg lbh tbg  
 wreel'f ncnegzrag] 
 fb ur'f xrrcvat gur ncnegzrag ur qbrfa'g qrfreir vg gubhtu rira vs ur qvq fhssre gung jnf yvxr 40 lrnef ntb jung unf ur orra qbvat yngryl v'ir orra fhssrevat sbe gur cnfg 30 lrnef hc gb naq vapyhqvat lrfgreqnl 
 lbh xabj vs guvf granag obneq vf fb vzcerffrq jvgu fhssrevat znlor lbh fubhyq gryy gurz gur "nfgbavfuvat gnyrf bs pbfgnamn" 
  v fubhyq 
 v zrna lbhe obql bs jbex va guvf svryq vf hacnenyyryrq 
 v pbhyq tb ohzcre gb ohzcre jvgu nal bar ryfr ba guvf cynarg 
 lbh'er gur zna 
 wreel 
 v'z jvgu crbcyr v'yy or jvgu lbh va n zbzrag  fb lbh jnag n cebgrva funxr be fbzrguvat 
 anu v thrff v fubhyq ernyyl trg zbivat ba guvf uhu v'z tbaan tb  
  uryyb arjzna 
  v arrq gung znvy jurer vf vg 
 jung'f gur qvssrerapr 
 gur thl jub unq gur unjnvv genafsre tbg ohfgrq sbe ubneqvat ivpgbevn frperg pngnybthrf v tbggn qryvire gung znvy 
 jryy tb nurnq gurer'f 8 ontf bs vg 
 oynfg gurer'f ab jnl v pna unaqyr 8 va nqqvgvba gb zl hfhfny ybnq bs bar v'yy arire trg gb unjnvv  v'yy or fghpx va guvf ncnegzrag ohvyqvat sberire  gur qernz vf qrnq 
 lbh'er tvivat hc gung rnfl 
 v hfhnyyl qb  frr ln 
  ab jnvg n zvahgr arjzna lbh pna'g yrg guvf qernz qvr lbh zbivat njnl vf zl qernz gbb 
  jung ner lbh cebcbfvat 
  jungrire vg gnxrf sbe nf ybat nf vg gnxrf zr jurer rire vg gnxrf zr nf ybat nf vg gnxrf lbh njnl sebz zr 
 na nyyvnapr

 wreel'f ncnegzrag] 
 unjnvv gung'f jul lbh'er urycvat arjzna jvgu gur znvy

 arjzna'f ncnegzrag]

 xenzre ovg zr

 arjzna'f ncnegzrag] 
 url v'ir orra gelvat gb wnz fghss va gur obk yvxr lbh gbyq zr ohg fbzrgvzrf vg fnlf yvxr "cubgbtencuf - qb abg oraq"

 trbetr'f ncnegzrag ohvyqvat] 
 rkphfr zr hu jung ner lbh qbvat va gurer 
 v'z zbivat va nyna zrepre arj arvtuobe  
 jung rynvar'f ovt-urnq thl gurl unir lbh gur ncnegzrag 
 lrnu

 bu sbex va gur sberurnq

 gbhtu yhpx puvayrff

 svir zvahgrf

 ur pna'g qb gung

 jung unccrarq 
  jryy svefg v'z oehfuvat zl grrgu naq guvf cvrpr bs nccyr-fxva gung zhfg unir orra ybqtrq va gurer sbe qnlf pbzrf ybbfr 
 snagnfgvp 
 gura v'z ng gur sbhaqngvba 
 lbh'er fgvyy qbvat gung 
 fbzrgvzrf bapr va n juvyr 
 jura lbh srry thvygl 
 ab bppnfvbanyyl v'yy sbetrg gb yrg gur znpuvar cvpx hc naljnl gurl znqr guvf ynetr qbangvba gb n jbzra'f cevfba naq v trg gb tb qbja gurer naq purpx vg bhg 
 gung'f pntrq urng 
 lrnu-unu 
 jung ner lbh tbaan qb gurer 
 abguvat ernyyl lbh xabjwhfg ru fgebyy nebhaq gur pryy oybpxf znlor ru gnxr va n fubjre svtug  url ru lbh xabj lbh tbg n obhaprq purpx unatvat hc va gur yvggyr znexrg bire ba pbyhzohf 
 lrf v xabj v xabj 
 v abgvprq lbh ru pubfr gur ru "pybjaf jvgu onyybbaf" purpx qrfvta 
 vg jnf n zvfgnxr gur onax frag zr gur jebat barf 
 url ybbx jub'f urer url xheg guvf vf wreel naq trbetr naq xenzre 
 url xheg gnfgr gurfr rttf 
 hu ab - v bayl rng pntr-serr snez-serfu 
 lrf gurfr ner fjrngfubc rttf 
 nu v tbggn pnyy gur bssvpr ubarl jvyy lbh beqre sbe zr 
 v'z n "ubarl" ur'f cerggl terng uhu 
 vf ur sebz gur shgher 
 ab ur whfg funirf uvf urnq v guvax vg'f cerggl thgfl 
 yvfgra fjrrgurneg yrg zr gryy lbh n yvggyr fbzrguvat nobhg thgf  guvf vf thgf 
 jung pyvatvat gb fbzr fpencf 
 gurfr ner abg "fpencf" gurfr ner uvfgbevp erznvaf bs n bapr terng fbpvrgl bs unve 
 bu qvq lbh thlf fgbc ng gur obqrtn gbqnl fbzr zbeba obhaprq n pybja purpx

 fur'f orra ybpxrq hc sbe gjb lrnef fur'f tbaan jnag gb znxr hc sbe ybfg gvzr qvaaref zbivrf  gnyxvat 
 va bgure jbeqf n abezny eryngvbafuvc 
 uru unn naq gung'f ab tbbq v'ir gevrq vg fgenvtug wreel jr'ir nyy frra gur erfhygf sbe zr fvpx vf gur bayl jnl gb tb

 vg'f abg gur fnzr 
 url vs lbh gjb ner zrnag gb or gbtrgurev'z fher gur pbcf'yy cvpx ure hc ba fbzrguvat

 jura yvggyr wreel frvasryq vf zvar gur purpx jvyy or lbhef 
 guvf vf bhgentrbhf  cnpx bs whvpl sehvg

 xenzre znepryvab jnagf hf gb fryy uvz yvggyr wreel frvasryq 
 jryy gung'f bhg bs gur dhrfgvba 
 ohg xenzre pbpxsvtugvat vf na vyyrtny naq vzzbeny npgvivgl

 ab ab zber pbpxsvtugvat yrg'f whfg fryy uvz gb znepryvab gur pbpxsvtugre naq or qbar jvgu vg 
 lbh xabj v guvax lbh'er wrnybhf 
 bs jung 
 lnu lnu lbh frr va yvggyr wreel frvasryq gur hayvzvgrq shgher lbh bapr unq abj whfg orpnhfr wreel frvasryq vf n unf-orra qba'g znxr yvggyr wreel frvasryq n arire-jnf 
 xenzre tvir zr gung ebbfgre 
 arire lbh ungr uvz orpnhfr ur'f qbvat zber jvgu lbhe anzr guna lbh rire jvyy lnu-lnu  
 trbetr pryvn unf yvfgrq lbh nf n punenpgre ersrerapr jungrire lbh pna gryy hf jbhyq pregnvayl or urycshy va ure trggvat cnebyrq 
 jryy nalguvat v pna qb gb uryc hzfur'f n jbaqreshy tvey irel fzneg irel rupensgl 
 qbrf fur unir nal cynaf nsgre fur'f eryrnfrq 
 cynaf fpurzrf fur nu fur xrrcf gnyxvat nobhg trggvat onpx gbtrgure jvgu ure byq sevraqf lbh xabj - "gur tnat" nf fur yvxrf gb pnyy gurz  lbh xabj lrnu gurl'er ru gurl'er ungpuvat fbzrguvat lbh pna pbhag ba gung 
 wreel gbzbeebj avtug'f svtug-avtug jurer'f zl ebbfgre 
 xenzre jba'g fryy

 pna gbb

  ybbx ng guvf 
 11 n jvqr njnxr xenzre vf evtug bire gb gur rqtr bs gur orq jvgu rzvyl phqqyrq hc gb uvz fyrrcvat unccvyl xenzre gevrf gb pnershyyl zbir fb nf gb abg jnxr rzvyl ohg nf ur fuvsgf uvf jrvtug ur fyvcf bss gur raq bs gur znggerff naq snyyf gb gur sybbe rzvyl ebyyf vagb gur fcnpr inpngrq pbagvahvat gb fyrrc)

  uhu nyevtug 
 jub jnf gung 
  gung jnf gur tbyqra ahttrg nyfb va ngynagvp pvgl gurl urneq fhpu tbbq guvatf nobhg zl fubj ng onyyl'f gurl jnag zr sbe gbavtug fb v'yy unir gb ercnpx naq tb

 v'z jbeevrq jung unccraf vs jr unir gb fhccbeg wreel

 jurer jbhyq lbh jbex 
 znlor v fubhyq gnyx gb rynvar

 jung'f abg gb haqrefgnaq 
 jryy sbe bar guvat lbh yvir va sybevqn 
 v'z irel pbzsbegnoyr jbexvat bhggn gur ubhfr v unir n cubar jr unir n xvaxb'f arneol lbh xabj v guvax gung zl erfhzr fcrnxf sbe vgfrys

 lrnu

 lbh jba'g erterg guvf zvff orarf jung gvzr fubhyq v or va v trg hc ng sbhe v pbhyq or urer nf rneyl nf sbhe gjragl-svir 
 huz 
  bu rynvar guvf qel nve vf phevat zr yvxr n oynpx sberfg unz 
  ze crgrezna lbh'er onpx 
 jub'f ze snapl 
  v hu v jnf guvaxvat znlor v fubhyq fcraq gur avtug 
 njj gung'f fjrrg ohg npghnyyl v v guvax v'q cersre vg vs lbh yrsg 
  jung 
 lbh jrer pbzcyrgryl evtug v fyrrc fb zhpu orggre jura v'z nybar  naq lbh fpernz va lbhe fyrrc 
 v qb 
  gurer jnf n zna ur jnf gelvat gb trg vagb zl ncnegzrag ynfg avtug ur jnf wvttyvat gur qbbexabo sbe gjragl-svir zvahgrf 
 p'zba vg jnf cebonoyl gur jvaq 
 ab ab ab vg jnf n srneyrff png ohetyne  abj yvfgra lbh tbggn yrg zr fyrrc urer uhu l'xabj v'yy fgnl urer ba zl fvqr naq v'yy fghss n fbpx va zl zbhgu  'pbf v qba'g jnaan fyrrc nybar 
  jryy v qb 
 jung gbbx lbh fb ybat 
 v yvir va arj lbex  jung gur uryy unccrarq 
 guvf guvat vf n vf n orurzbgu 
 jung qvq lbh qb 
 v jnf v jnf znxvat n n fvzcyr ynar punatr v v chg ba gur oyvaxre naq vg gbbx bss ba zr naq gur arkg guvat lbh xabj v jnf fhozretrq v'z gryyvat lbh wreel v'z irel yhpxl gung gubfr pebpf qvqa'g trg zr 
  lbh ner fhpu na vqvbg jryy jr tbggn trg gur pne pyrnarq hc sbe zl cneragf 
  qb jungrire lbh jnag vg'f lbhe pne 
 zl pne lbh qebir vg vagb gur fjnzc 
 vg qebir vgfrys vagb gur fjnzc orfvqrf v guvax v ybfg zl cra gbb 
  lbh xabj gung nyzbfg znxrf guvf nyy jbegujuvyr 
  jul vf gurer n pnqvyynp cnexrq va sebag bs gur ubhfr 
 gung'f lbhe zbgure'f arj pne 
 lbh obhtug gung 
 vg'f n pbhcr qr ryrtnapr 
 lbhe sngure jnagrq n zreprqrf ohg v jba'g evqr va n trezna pne 
 zbeava' 
 bu obl 
 jung gur uryy vf tbvat ba urer 
 v unq fbzr gebhoyr ng zl cynpr fb v arrq n yvggyr pbzcnal ng avtug gb fyrrc 
 trbetr lbhe zbgure naq v naq xenzre  unir orra gnyxvat 
  bu tbq 
 hu trbetr lbhe cneragf pna'g oybj guebhtu gurve fnivatf va guvf pbzzhavgl vg'f ybj-erag abj jr srry gung sybevqn vf ernyyl gur cynpr jurer gurl fubhyq or 
  lbh pna qebc n tenaq va qvfarljbeyq yvxr gung 
 jnvg n zvahgr  lbh'er guvaxvat bs zbivat gb sybevqn ntnva 
 jryy vg'f rvgure gung be jr fgnl urer arne lbh naq whfg fvg ba gur zbarl jung qb lbh guvax jr fubhyq qb trbetvr 
 fb naljnl rssrpgvir vzzrqvngryl zvff orarf jvyy erghea gb ure byq cbfvgvba ng ure bevtvany fnynel 
 naq v bs pbhefr jvyy erghea gb zvar xhqbf rynvar ba n wbo qbar 
  jung nobhg zl fgbpx bcgvbaf 
 v guvax abg 
 abj qbja gb ohfvarff  v unir unq guvf ivfvba bs n qvncunabhf ehz-ehaare fpnes 
 jryy jr pbhyq syl fbzr snoevp va sebz bhe fvyx snpgbevrf sbe nobhg n gubhfnaq qbyynef n obyg 
  n gubhfnaq v xabj n pbhcyn puvanzra bire gurer ba sbegl-guveq fgerrg jub'yy qb vg sbe unys gung 
  vg'f nu nfvna-nzrevpnaf 
 jung 
  jub ner lbh 
 qba'g jbeel v 
 zbegl frvasryq v phg iryirg sbe sbegl lrnef jvgu uneel nygzna 
 bxnl ze frvasryq guvf vf abg gur g 
 rynvar qvq lbh uver guvf zna 
  ab ab jryy v zrna lbh xabj ur'f zber yvxr na vagrea lbh xabj ng orfg 
 fb vs lbhe cneragf zbir gb sybevqn lbh'er cbbe 
  ohg unccl 
 boivbhfyl naq vs gurl fgnl lbh'er evpu ohg 
 boivbhfyl 
 dhvgr n qvyrzzn lbh xabj v unir n ovg bs n qvyrzzn bs zl bja 
 ab ab ab ab ab  jr'er fgnlvat ba zr jr unira'g fbyirq nalguvat lrg 
 nyevtug guvf vf rnfl yrg 'rz tb 
 jung q'lbh zrna yrg 'rz tb gurl'er fcraqvat nyy zl zbarl 
 nyevtug jryy gura gurl fgnl yrzzn nfx lbh fbzrguvat 
  pbhyq lbh chg n yvggyr gubhtug vagb guvf wreel'f tbar lbh pbhyq uhzbhe zr ur uhzbhef zr 
 fcrnxvat bs wreel uvf sngure vf qevivat zr fb penml qbja ng crgrezna'f 
 lbh xabj jung v qb ng gur lnaxrrf jura bar bs gurfr byq thlf vf oernguvat qbja zl arpx 
 jung 
 lbh fpurqhyr n yngr zrrgvat 
  uhu jung qbrf gung qb 
 gurfr byq thlf gurl'er hc ng 4 nz ol gjb guvegl gurl'er jvcrq  ubj qvq jr trg onpx bagb lbh 
  v tbggn fcyvg 
  lbh xabj v tbg abguvat bhggn guvf 
 url senax lbh tbg gjb orqf va urer 
 gung'f evtug gung'f zr ba gur yrsg 
 fb lbh fyrrc va frcnengr orqf 
 guvegl lrnef ntb jr pnzr gb na nterrzrag vg jnf gur bayl jnl v pbhyq trg fbzr erfg 
  ernyyl 
  rfgryyr'f tbg gur  wvzzl nezf 
 lbh pna trg gung va lbhe nezf 
 yvxr lbh jbhyqa'g oryvrir 
 wreel vg'f trggvat yngr lbh'ir pyrnarq hc gur pne lbh'ir znqr nyy lbhe cubar pnyyf jul ner lbh fgvyy urer 
 jryy v hu znkrq bhg zl perqvg pneqf naq v qba'g unir rabhtu pnfu sbe n ubgry ebbz fb 
 lbh ner hu guvaxvat bs fgnlvat urer 
 jryy 
  lbh'ir tbg fbzr areir v nyzbfg oernx zl arpx va gung qrngu-genc bs lbhef naq abj lbh nfx zr sbe n snibhe 
 lbh qvqa'g yvxr gung penpx nobhg gur cra 
 v qvq abg 
 jryy v'ir tvira guvf n ybg bs gubhtug naq v'ir tbggn fnl 
  nf zhpu nf v'q yvxr gb frr gur gjb bs lbh yvivat vg hc va n jnez gebcvpny frggvat v v jbhyq whfg zvff lbh gbb zhpu  fb v'ir qrpvqrq v jnag lbh gb fgnl 
 vg'f gbb yngr jr obhtug n pbaqb ng qry obpn ivfgn jr'er yrnivat gbavtug 
  ohg lbh fnvq vg jnf zl pnyy 
 jr jrer whfg orvat avpr 
  pbfzb ner lbh fher lbh'er tbaan or nyevtug urer nybar 
 bu lrnu lrnu v tbg rzvyl pbzvat bire gbavtug 
  lbh'er yrggvat uvz unir n jbzna bire 
 ur'f abg snzvyl vg'f qvssrerag cflpubybtvpnyyl 
 naq fb v znqr na rkcybfvir bhg bs puvpx crnf naq v fgbccrq gung terng euvab evtug va uvf genpxf 
 jryy vg'f trggvat xvaqn yngr jul qba'g jr hu 
 ze crgrezna gung pna'g unir orra gur bayl gvzr gung lbh snprq zbegny qnatre 
  un un un shaal lbh fubhyq nfx rynvar 
 ybbx vs jr'er tbaan fgnl urer hagvy nyy ubhef bs gur avtug pna jr ng yrnfg trg fbzr sbbq urer 
  vg'f bayl svir svsgrra fb yngre ba gung fnzr qnl v qrirybcrq n terng unaxrevat sbe fbzr jvyq ubarl 
  bxnl v'z qbar v'yy or onpx va gur zbeavat jura ur'f pybfr gb svavfu jvgu uvf fgbel 
 zbegl zl fgbevrf ner jung fryy gurfr pybgurf 
 purnc snoevp naq qvz yvtugvat gung'f ubj lbh zbir zrepunaqvfr 
  zbegl lbh'er bhg 
  npu v arire xarj jung gur uryy v jnf crqqyvat jvgu gubfr fghcvq pnegbbaf naq gung cncre obbx naljnl 
 v qba'g xabj jul v yrg lbh gnyx zr vagb gung pbearq orrs ng favgmre'f 
  ab-bar uryq n tha gb lbhe urnq 
  lrnu 
  qba'g sbetrg jr'er rngvat qvaare ng gur srvarezna'f gbzbeebj avtug 
  bu jul qb v unir gb tb gurl'er lbhe sevraqf 
 lbh yvxr 'rz 
 v'ir unq vg jvgu 'rz 
 gura jr jba'g tb 
  bxnl bxnl jung gvzr 
 rvtug guvegl 
  nuu gung jnf nyevtug 
 'bar oevtug abgr va gbqnl'f znexrg jnf gur fgbpx bs ergnvyre w crgrezna jubfr sbhaqre'f fhecevfr erghea trarengrq n evfr bs gjryir naq n unys cbvagf' 
 zzz-zzz-zzz gung zrnaf vs lbh fgvyy unq gubfr fgbpx bcgvbaf 
  lrnu 
  gung'f n funzr 
  jung ner lbh fgvpxvat vg gb zr 
  jung 
 v guvax lbh'er fgvpxvat vg gb zr 
 rynvar v'z fher trbetr vf whfg orvat flzcngurgvp 
  fgvpxva' vg 
 lbh'er abg nybar v'z cenpgvpnyyl oebxr 
 ernyyl 
 ab ohg v qvq oybj bire gjragl gubhfnaq ba gung pnqvyynp 
  uzz-uzz-uzz-uzz qryvpvbhf 
 jryy lbh frrz unccl 
 v nz gur sbyxf ner gjryir uhaqerq zvyrf njnl  v'z onfxvat va gur ohssre mbar  'abgure cvrpr bs cvr urer 
 fb jrer lbhe cneragf fubpxrq gb frr gur pnqvyynp 
 npghnyyl v unira'g urneq sebz 'rz lrg 
 uzz 
 jura ner jr tbaan gryy wreel 
 v qba'g jnaan jbeel uvz jr'yy gryy uvz arkg gvzr jr tb hc 
 ur gubhtug ur pbhyq ohl onpx gung pnqvyynp sbe hf ur'f abg trggvat njnl jvgu gung 
 orfvqrf gung pbaqb jnf gbb zhpu ubhfr 
 ubj znal gvzrf pna lbh purpx gur pne 
  v fnj n ohz fyrrcvat va n pnqvyynp gur bgure qnl 
 jul jbhyq fbzrbar oernx vagb n pne gb gnxr n anc 
 gurl qba'g anc gurl znxr vg gurve ubzr gurl hevangr va gurer 
  lbh'er qevivat zr penml 
  gung'f vg jr'er tbvat onpx gb dhrraf  jurer'f zl ung 
  abbu 
 jryy vs gur ovt zna jnagf n arj fpberobneq v qba'g jnaan or gur bar gb gryy uvz ab 
 ab-bar va gur cnex vf tbaan or noyr gb frr vg sebz gurer 
  jryy jul qba'g jr whfg chg n zbavgbe va uvf fxlobk 
 url trbetr gur bprna pnyyrq gurl'er ehaavat bhggn fuevzc 
  gur bprna pnyyrq ehaavat bhggn fuevzc bhggn fuevzc  bu lrf gung'f jung v fubhyqn fnvq  qnzzvg 
 'gur bprna pnyyrq gurl'er ehaavat bhggn fuevzc' 
 lrnu lrnu lrnu ohg gura v fnvq gb uvz 'bu lrnu jryy gur wrex fgber pnyyrq naq gurl'er ehaavat bhggn lbh' 
  ernyyl gung'f terng lbh fnvq gung gb uvz 
  jryy npghnyyl v gubhtug vg hc ba gur jnl bire urer 
 bu gung'f abg dhvgr gur fnzr 
 ab ab vg'f abg lbh qba'g xabj guvf thl vg jbhyqn orra fb fjrrg 
 v'z tbaan teno n pna bs onyyf 
 evtug 
 uryyb zl anzr vf zvybf ubj pna v uryc lbh 
 v arrq n pna bs onyyf 
 pna bs onyyf sbe gur avpr thl nyev 
 nuu lbh qba'g cyna gb uvg gurfr onyyf jvgu gung enpdhrg qb lbh 
 purpxvat bhg gur fgnss cvpxf zvff orarf 
 bu  un-un url lrnu lrnu  guvf ivaprag thl ur vf gur orfg ur naq v unir gur rknpg fnzr gnfgr va zbivrf 
 bu ivaprag vf na neg-ubhfr tbba v fgvpx gb gur trar enpx 
 trar bu vg'f fb fghcvq naq znvafgernz 
  v'ir frra nyy gurfr fb v jrag jvgu n xenzre cvpx 
  'gur bgure fvqr bs qnexarff' uhu v arire urneq bs gung bar 
 lrnu jrag fgenvtug gb ivqrb 
  gung znxrf zr gur cerzvrer 
  unu 
 wreel unir lbh rire frra gur zbivr gur bgure fvqr bs qnexarff 
 ab 
 vg'f nobhg guvf jbzna va n pbzn jryy v pbhyqa'g svavfu jngpuvat vg fb v jnag lbh gb ernq guvf 
  'v pbfzb xenzre univat whfg frra gur zbivr gur bgure fvqr bs qnexarff naq abg jnagvat gb or va n pbzn yvxr gung ynql va gur zbivr urerol jnag wreel frvasryq gb erzbir zl yvsr fhccbeg srrqvat znpuvar yhat-oybjre rgprgren rgprgren rgprgren' 
 pna lbh qb gung sbe zr ohqql 
 jryy v qba'g vs jung lbh unir urer pbafgvghgrf n yrtnyyl ovaqvat qbphzrag 
 jryy v'z tbaan glcr vg hc 
 lrf jryy bs pbhefr ohg rira fb lbh znl jnaan gnyx gb n ynjlre 
 lrnu ohg wnpxvr puvyrf ur chg n erfgenvavat beqre ba zr  v'z abg nyybjrq jvguva gjb uhaqerq srrg bs uvf bssvpr v pbhyqa'g rira tvir uvz uvf puevfgznf cerfrag 
 bu url arj enpdhrg uhu 
 lrnu  v jnfa'g tbaan trg vg ohg guvf thl zvybf jub ehaf gur ceb fubc ur ernyyl erpbzzraqrq vg 
 va snpg vg'f gur bayl enpdhrg ur cynlf jvgu 
  jryy lbh'er abg tbaan arrq guvf nal zber 
  url guvf vf gur mrr cntr bs zl nqqerff obbx 
  bu lrnu v chg nyy lbhe mrrf ba gur jrvtugf naq zrnfherf cntr 
  bu bu oenib ivaprag oenib  
 jung 
 qvq lbh rawbl gur zbivr 
 jub vf vg 
 vg'f ivaprag 
 bs ivaprag'f cvpxf 
 gur fnzr 
 ur pnyyrq lbh 
 ur zhfgn tbg zl ahzore bss gur pbzchgre jr raqrq hc gnyxvat sbe yvxr gjb ubhef 
 gb n thl lbh'ir arire zrg  lbhe fperravat cebprff vf trggvat rire zber evtbebhf 
 gelvat gb zrrg uvz ur'f arire ng gur ivqrb fgber gurl fnvq ur frgf uvf bja ubhef 
 yvggyr uryc url 
  lrnu 
 gunax lbh 
  bu tbq gung thl'f greevoyr 
  zzz-uzz 
 url ubj pbzr jr cynlrq ng guvf pehzzl cynpr vafgrnq bs lbhe pyho 
 trbetr hfrq hc nyy zl thrfg cnffrf nyernql 
 nu 
 nuu 
 pbzr ba 
 gunax lbh 
  urer lbh tb 
  zvybf 
  bu url  ubj lbh qbvat 
 bxnl jr fubhyq hu jenc vg hc urer 
 fb ur jnf onq jung q'lbh pner 
 rynvar v cnvq gjb uhaqerq qbyynef sbe guvf enpdhrg orpnhfr ur fnvq vg'f gur bayl bar ur cynlf jvgu ur pbhyq'ir cynlrq whfg nf jryy jvgu n ybt 
 url evtug v gnyxrq gb guvf ynjlre thl furyyonpu abj ur'f tbaan frg zr hc ohg lbh tbggn pbzr jvgu zr naq or gur rkrphgbe 
 gur rkrphgbe bs jung 
 xenzre jnagf gb qvr jvgu qvtavgl 
 gurer'f n srngure va lbhe pnc 
 v qba'g jnaan or n irtrgnoyr rynvar v whfg jnag bhg  
 fbzrgvzrf va yvsr gur tbqf fzvyr hcba lbh zl sevraqf 
 q'lbh trg fbzrbar gb gnxr gung pnanqvna dhnegre 
 v tbg nabgure zrrgvat jvgu ervyyl n jubyr arj nhqvrapr naq v org v pna trg uvz gb gel gung yvar ntnva 
 jub'f ervyyl 
 trbetr jnf fpnesvat fuevzc ng guvf zrrgvat naq guvf thl fnlf 'url trbetr gur bprna pnyyrq gurl'er ehaavat bhggn fuevzc' 
 yvfgra gb gur pbzronpx  'bu lrnu jryy gur wrex fgber pnyyrq gurl'er ehaavat bhggn lbh' 
  junlbh tbggn or xvqqvat zr 
 ubj 'obhg guvf bar ubj 'obhg 'lbhe penavhz pnyyrq vg'f tbg fbzr fcnpr gb erag' 
  jung qbrf gung zrna 
  url urer lbh tb 'url ervyyl gur mbb pnyyrq lbh'er qhr onpx ol fvk' 
  ab ab ab ab lbh'er abg urycvat zr 
 ybbx whfg gryy uvz lbh unq frk jvgu uvf jvsr gung'yy xvyy uvz 
  v'z abg ybbxvat sbe nabgure yvar v tbg gur yvar 
 ybbx trbetr whfg guvax nobhg vg lbh xabj lbh'er zneevrq ubj jbhyq lbh srry vs fbzrobql fnlf gb lbh gung gurl whfg unq fr 
  nyevtug nyevtug lbh frr guvf vf jul v ungr jevgvat jvgu n ynetr tebhc rirelobql unf gurve bja yvggyr bcvavbaf naq vg nyy trgf ubzbtravfrq naq lbh ybfr gur jubyr rqtr bs vg v'z tbvat jvgu wrex fgber wrex fgber vf gur yvar wrex fgber lrff 
  qvq lbh gnxr guvf bhg bs gur tneontr 
 lrnu vg'f fgvyy tbg fbzr fcevat va gur fgevatf 
 bu wreel guvf vf n cvrpr bs whax  ubj ner lbh tbaan or gur rkrphgbe bs zl yvivat jvyy 
  lbh frr lbh pna'g yrg tb 
 gehfg zr xenzre tvira gur yrtny bccbeghavgl v jvyy xvyy lbh 
 v jvfu v pbhyq oryvrir lbh url rynvar qb lbh unir fbzr serr gvzr gbzbeebj nsgreabba 
 zr 
 lrnu orpnhfr lbh'er cresrpg lbh'er n pnyphyngvat pbyq-urnegrq ohfvarffjbzna naq jura gurer'f qvegl jbex gb or qbar lbh qba'g zvaq fgbzcvat ba n srj guebngf 
  bu ub p'zba 
 fvghngvba ahzore sbhe lbh'er oernguvat ba lbhe bja lbh'er pbafpvbhf ohg jvgu ab zhfphyne shapgvba 
 jryy jbhyq v or noyr gb pbzzhavpngr 
 v qba'g frr ubj 
 npu v qba'g yvxr gur fbhaq bs guvf bar 
 uhuu lrnu yrg'f chyy gur pbeq 
 lnax vg yvxr  lbh'er fgnegvat n zbjre 
 zbivat ba lbh unir yvire xvqarlf naq tnyy oynqqre ohg ab prageny areibhf flfgrz 
 jryy v tbggn unir n prageny areibhf flfgrz 
 bxnl bar yhat oyvaq naq lbh'er rngvat guebhtu n ghor 
 anj gung'f abg zl fglyr 
 ober-vat 
 nyevtug lbh pna rng ohg znpuvarf qb rirelguvat ryfr 
  huz 
 v'q fgvpx 
 lrnu lrnu fgvpx  'pbf v pbhyq fgvyy tb gb gur pbssrr fubc 
  gung'f evtug 
 uryyb zvybf 
 wreel gunax tbq lbh tbg zl zrffntr gunax lbh fb zhpu sbe pbzvat qbja urer huz yvfgra 
  lbh xabj v fcrag gjb uhaqerq qbyynef ba n enpdhrg orpnhfr v gubhtug lbh xarj jung lbh jrer gnyxvat nobhg 
 vv 
 lbh pna'g rira cynl 
 oryvrir zr vg vf zvybf terng funzr ohg wreel v pbhyq ybfr zl ohfvarff vs nalobql svaq bhg ubj jbhyq lbh yvxr rkgen lrne zrzorefuvc bs gur pyho serr ab punetr 
 lbh pbhyq qb gung 
 wreel sbe lbh nalguvat 
  tnzr frg naq zngpu uhu zvybf 
  unu wreel v nz fb fbeel gurl gryy zr gurer vf ab jnl gurl pna qb vg  vf gurer nalguvat ryfr v pna qb sbe lbh nalguvat ng nyy v ershaq lbhe zbarl 
  lbh xabj jung zvybf v qba'g rira pner nobhg gur zbarl v whfg srry yvxr v jnf gnxra ol gur jbefg graavf cynlre v 
 fuuu-fuuu  v znxr vg hc gb lbh 
  lrnu lbh'yy znxr vg hc gb zr 
 graavf nalbar 
 bu guvf vf gur bar ivaprag gbyq zr nobhg gur cnva naq gur lrneavat  'na byq jbzna rkcrevraprf cnva naq lrneavat' n uhaqerq naq avargl-gjb zvahgrf 
 gung'f n ybggn lrneavat uhu 
 lbh xabj gurfr zbivrf ner terng ohg gurl'er whfg fb rzbgvbanyyl rkunhfgvat 
 lrnu jryy jung lbh arrq vf fbzr fhzzregvzr nqbyrfprag uvtu wvak 
 ernyyl 
  frr jung qbpgbe trar cerfpevorf uhu  bu urer ybbx ng gung jrrxraq ng oreavrf gjb abj gung'f na uvynevbhf cerzvfr 
  uhu  jryy 
 lrnu  
 lrnu v pbhyq hfr n puhpxyr 
  lrnu 
 jung'er lbh trggvat 
 abguvat v'z tbaan svavfu jngpuvat gur bgure fvqr bs qnexarff 
 bu ubj zhpu lbh tbg yrsg 
 lrnu nobhg gjb ubhef 
 lrnu fur fubg va gung pbzn cerggl dhvpx 
  oreavr vf qrnq lbh zbeba  whfg orpnhfr ur'f jrnevat fhatynffrf ur ybbxf nyvir  htu ubj ybat vf guvf jrrxraq naljnl  htu 
 uryyb 
  ubj'f gur zbivr rynvar 
 ivaprag 
  gur trar cvpx ubj pbhyq lbh v gubhtug jr unq fbzrguvat fcrpvny 
  ab vg qbrfa'g zrna nalguvat v'z abg rira tbaan erjvaq vg 
 ivaprag 
 nyevtug yrg'f trg gb vg 
 junjnvg n zvahgr junjung nobhg ervyyl 
 ervyyl qbrfa'g jbex urer nal zber 
  jung vv qvqa'g urne nobhg gung 
 bu jr bayl jnxr lbh hc sbe gur vzcbegnag zrrgvatf 
 uryyb 
 uryyb qvqa'g v frr lbh ng gur ceb fubc lrfgreqnl 
 v guvax fb v'z cnggl zvybf tnir zr lbhe nqqerff v ubcr lbh qba'g zvaq zr jnvgvat sbe lbh urer 
  ubu gung zvybf  jryy hu jung funyy jr qb huz pner sbe n phc bs pbssrr 
 jul qba'g jr whfg tb hc gb lbhe ncnegzrag 
  nyevtug 
  tbggn or na rnfvre jnl 
 qbpgbe ubj'f ure pbzn 
 bu rknpgyl gur fnzr 
 jnvg n zvahgr fur'f pbzvat bhg bs gur pbzn 
 zef nyyoevtug pna lbh urne zr ner lbh bxnl 
  v srry fb erfgrq naq erserfurq trg zr n gbbguoehfu 
 fb lbh cynl graavf 
  rabhtu gnyx wreel 
 abg sbe zr v ybir punggvat 
  fuu 
  ab ab v pna'g qb guvf  v pna'g tb guebhtu jvgu vg  abg rira sbe uvz 
 jub 
  zvybf zl uhfonaq 
  lbhe uhfonaq 
 fb pbaprearq jnf ur gung jbeq bs uvf cbbe graavf fxvyyf zvtug yrnx bhg ur pubfr gb bssre lbh uvf jvsr nf fbzr fbeg bs zrqvnriny frkhny cnlbyn 
  ur'f arj nebhaq urer 
  fb qrgnvyf 
  jryy v qvqa'g fyrrc jvgu ure 
 orpnhfr bs fbpvrgl evtug 
  lrf trbetr orpnhfr bs fbpvrgl fb ubj qvq gur ovt zrrgvat ghea bhg 
 ervyyl vf ab ybatre jvgu gur pyho  lbh oryvrir gung 
 nu lbh'er orggre bss abj lbh pna whfg yrg vg tb 
 lrnu v'z tbaan yrg vg tb 
 lbh arire ernyyl unq gur evtug pbzronpx naljnl 
  ner lbh vafnar wrex fgber jbhyqn fzbxrq gung thl fzbxrq uvz v fnl 
 url bu wreel yvfgra hu lbh xabj v fnj gur erfg bs gung zbivr gur bgure fvqr bs qnexarff gur pbzn ynql jnxrf hc ng gur raq 
  buu v jnagrq gb frr gung  gunaxf gunaxf n ybg 
 v qvqa'g xabj vg jnf cbffvoyr gb pbzr bhg bs n pbzn 
 v qvqa'g xabj vg jnf cbffvoyr abg gb xabj gung 
  ubj jnf revp eboregf nf gur uhfonaq 
  bu hasbetrggnoyr 
  bjj 
  v tbggn svaq rynvar l'xabj fur'f tbaan chyy zl cyht 
 jung orgenlrq bu ivaprag v'z fb fbeel v 
 lrnu yvfgra hu rynvar v'ir punatrq zl zvaq nobhg gur jubyr pbzn guvat  lrnu v qrpvqrq v'z hc sbe vg 
 xenzre qb lbh unir nal vqrn jung lbh'ir qbar 
 rkphfr zr 
 jung'er lbh qbvat 
 junjun 
 ivaprag fgbccrq znxvat cvpxf 
  jryy ubj nz v tbaan xabj jung zbivrf gb frr 
 jr unir n jvqr inevrgl bs trar cvpxf 
  trar'f genfu 
 v'z trar 
  uv 
 zvybf v pna nffher lbh v unq ab vagragvba bs gryyvat nalbar nobhg lbhe haoryvrinoyl onq graavf cynlvat 
  gunax lbh ohg hasbeghangryl v unir zhpu ynetre ceboyrzf gb sel zl jvsr fur unf ab erfcrpg sbe zvybf nalzber 
 v thrff gung'f n evfx lbh eha jura lbh qnooyr va gur syrfu genqr 
 cnggl fur fur ybirf graavf nf zhpu yvxr v qb  jbhjbhyq lbh jvjvyy lbh yrg zr orng lbh va graavf gung vf gur bayl jnl v pna fubj ure v nz fgvyy n zna 
  jryy v'yy qb vg nf ybat nf gurer'f ab bgure tveyf nebhaq v zrna v jnaan or n zna gbb 
 fb lbh uheg ivaprag'f srryvatf 
  ybbx jung pnzr va gur znvy gbqnl 
  jujung'f guvf 
 vg'f gur cynl ohggba bss uvf ipe 
  obl ybbx ubj sne onpx vg tbrf vg'f yvxr n gbbgu 
  fb thrff jurer ze 'bprna cubarq' ghearq hc ur'f jbexvat sbe sverfgbar va nxeba buvb 
 buvb 
 lrc v'z yrnivat svefg guvat gbzbeebj zbeavat 
  lbh'er sylvat gb nxeba whfg gb mvat n thl 
 qba'g lbh haqrefgnaq vg'f abg nobhg uvz gb unir n yvar nf cresrpg nf 'wrex fgber' naq gb arire hfr vg v v pbhyqa'g yvir jvgu zlfrys 
 frr gurer ner ab wrex fgberf vgvg'f whfg n yvggyr pbashfvat vf nyy 
  vg'f fzneg vg'f n fzneg yvar naq n fzneg pebjq jvyy nccerpvngr vg  naq v'z abg tbaan qhzo vg qbja sbe fbzr obarurnq znff nhqvrapr 
  abg lbh 
 bu oevggyr obarf ubj v ybat gb or evq bs gur cnva 
 uryyb 
 rynvar vg'f ivaprag 
  ivaprag  jurer ner lbh v unir gb zrrg lbh 
 ab v pna'g orne gb unir nalbar frr zr 
 ivaprag yvfgra v jba'g whqtr lbh gur jnl rirelbar ryfr qbrf lbh'er lbh'er fgenatr naq ornhgvshy naq frafvgvir  abj yrg'f unir n ybbx ng lbh 
  nyevtug ohg pna lbh oevat zr srj guvatf sebz gur fgber v unira'g orra bhg va n juvyr 
  jryy tb nebhaq lbh ohapu bs penmvrf lbh znavnpf ner tbaan trg hf nyy xvyyrq 
 uv pna v uryc lbh 
 bu lrnu lrnu v'z pbfzb xenzre lrnu v unq na nccbvagzrag gb naahy zl yvivat jvyy 
 bu  ze xenzre lbh unq n gra-guvegl nccbvagzrag vg'f gjb b'pybpx ze furyyonpu unq n graavf yrffba ur'f tbar sbe gur qnl 
 gbb tbbq 
  nabgure tnzr sbe zvybf ununun 
 lbh'er ba sver gbqnl 
  url cnggl ybbx ng guvf thl ur'f njshy 
  ur'f abg n zna guvf wreel ur'f abg rira zneevrq yvxr v nz  uhuhuhuh 
  url hu zvybf v qba'g zvaq ebyyvat bire urer ohg pbhyq lbh yvtugra hc ba gur 'abg n zna' fghss 
  url rirelobql ybbx gur yvggyr puvpxra tvey jnagf zr gb rnfr hc ur pna'g unaqyr guvf fb ur pevrf yvxr n jbzna  ununun 
 uryyb ivaprag 
 rynvar 
 v tbg jung lbh nfxrq 
 whfg yrnir vg naq tb 
 jjryy pna'g v pbzr va 
 ab tb njnl abj 
  ab ab ivaprag v qba'g fuhg zr bhg  v whfg v xabj lbh srry jung v srry 
 rkphfr zr pna v uryc lbh 
 nj qnzzvg 
  hu huz v'z v'z urer gb frr ivaprag 
 jryy v'z uvf zbgure  ivaprag jung'f tbvat ba urer 
  ab zl npar 
 nuu-parr 
  jung q'lbh unir urer 
  ibqxn pvtnerggrf sverjbexf  jung xvaq bs n fvpx jbzna oevatf guvf gb n svsgrra lrne byq 
  jr unir gur fnzr gnfgr va zbivrf 
 qvq ur fraq lbh cneg bs bhe ipe 
 lrnu 
  ivaprag 
  ybbx ng gur ovt onol  urunun  url ovt onol ner lbh jrggvat lbhefrys znlor vg vf gvzr sbe lbh gb or punatrq  ununu 
  v gbyq lbh gb phg vg bhg 
  url p'zba jung'er lbh qbvat  
  furyyonpu 
 enpdhrg 
 fb trbetr lbh'er cebcbfvat n fabj gler qnl ng lnaxrr fgnqvhz 
  ybat nf gurl qba'g guebj 'rz ba gur svryq  uhuh  uryc lbhefrys gb fbzr fuevzc v oebhtug rabhtu sbe rirelobql 
  v unir gb fnl guvf guvf cebcbfny qbrfa'g znxr n jubyr ybg bs frafr 
 jryy lbh arire xabj  yrg'f frr ubj znal v pna svg va zl zbhgu 
  lbh xabj trbetr 
 gur bprna pnyyrq gurl'er ehaavat bhggn fuevzc 
  bu lrnu ervyyl  jryy gur wrex fgber pnyyrq gurl'er ehaavat bhggn lbh 
  jung'f gur qvssrerapr lbh'er gurve nyy-gvzr orfg fryyre 
 lrnu jryy v unq frk jvgu lbhe jvsr 
 uvf jvsr vf va n pbzn 
  uv  ubj'f ur qbvat 
 ur'f orra fyrrcvat n ybg ur'f fgvyy tebttl 
 bu  v gubhtug n zbivr zvtug purre uvz hc v tbg uvz n trar cvpx 
 jung unccrarq gb ivaprag 
  v'z xvaqn bss bs uvz  hu bhgyrg 
 nu 
  jnnuuu 
 'zl jvsr'f va n pbzn' lrnu jryy gur yvsr fhccbeg znpuvar pnyyrq naq 
  jnvg lrf gung'f jung v fubhyq'ir fnvq  q'buu 
  uhu unun  lbh'er zrng ervyyl lbh whfg fperjrq lbhefrys  un un 
 n erfgnhenag] 
 fb gurl unir guvf pybpx abj jurer lbh chapu va lbhe ntr naq nyy lbhe evfx snpgbef vg npghnyyl pbhagf qbja ubj zhpu gvzr lbh unir yrsg gb yvir 
 fb jung'f gur terng zbzrag lbh'er ba lbhe qrngu orq gurl'er cbhaqvat ba lbhe purfg - naq lbh'er tbvat 10 9 8 v gbyq lbh guvf guvat jnf tbbq 
  v pna'g oryvrir guvf vf bhe svefg qngr 
 v xabj ubj nobhg qrffreg

 jul

 jung gbqnl ernyyl

 wreel'f ncnegzrag] 
 fb fur jrag bhg jvgu lbh ba n svefg qngr naq vg jnf ure oveguqnl 
 lrnu naq fur cvpxrq gur qnl 
 vf fur fbpvnyyl njxjneq 
 ab fur'f terng fur'f nggenpgvir fur'f sha 
 jryy znlor fur qrpvqrq gb pryroengr ure oveguqnl ba gur zbaqnl nsgre gur jrrxraq 
 fur'f abg yvapbya 
 url nalobql hc sbe yberamb'f cvmmn 
 v'yy cnff 
 bu lrnu uhu  url trbetr cvmmn lhz lhz 
 ru v pna'g v tbggn tb qbja gb gur sbhaqngvba v'z vagreivrjvat uvtu fpubbyref sbe gur fhfna ebff fpubynefuvc 
 qbrf vg rire obgure lbh gung guvf betnavmngvba- 
 abcr 
 vf orngvat gur ohfurf- 
 abcr  
 gb onfvpnyyl tvir guvf zbarl njnl- 
 abb
