  v'z svar jvgu vg sv-uv-uv-uvar v fnl  
 fhfna ebff sbhaqngvba pbasrerapr ebbz] 
 naq gura v erprvirq n 740 ba gur ratyvfu npuvrirzrag grfg  
 dhvpx jung'f lbhe snibevgr navzny 
 v v qba'g xabj sebt 
  n sebt 
 jryy v v 
  sebt vf jebat 
  v frr urer gung lbh cynl gur unec gryy zr jul qb lbh unir gb gvyg vg pna'g lbh whfg ohvyq vg ba na natyr vg'q fnir lbh n ybg bs gebhoyr 
 jryy gur zbqrea-qnl unec unf orra ersvarq bire gubhfnaqf bs lrnef- 
  lrnu lrnu jr'yy hu yrg lbh xabj 
  v frr lbhe tcn'f n 40 
  lbh yvxr gung qba'g lbh 
 fb hu fgrira v frr lbh'er cerfvqrag bs gur purff pyho 
 fgngr punzcf 
 jub'f lbhe snibevgr purff cynlre 
  anfgrepbss 
 evtug  anfgrepbss jung pbhagel vf ur sebz ntnva 
  v qba'g xabj v znqr vg hc  v'z arire tbaan trg guvf guvat 
  jbnu jbnu jbnu jung ner lbh gryyvat zr sbe lbh ernyyl unq zr tbvat gurer p'zba fvg qbja  jung qb lbh jnag gb qb jura lbh tebj hc 
 v'ir orra gryyvat crbcyr gung v'q yvxr gb or na nepuvgrpg 
 wreel'f ncnegzrag] 
 fb trg guvf zvfgre crgrezna vf svanyyl yrggvat zr qb fbzr erny jevgvat ur'f tbg guvf obbx qrny sbe uvf nhgbovbtencul ur'f tbaan yrg zr tubfg jevgr vg 
 jbj gung'f terng jura vg pbzrf bhg v'yy unir gb trg fbzrbar gb tubfg ernq vg 
 url 
 url 
 url 
 nyevtug fb gurer v nz ng yberamb'f - ybnqvat hc zl fyvpr bs gur svkva'f one tneyvp  naq jung-abg zzz zzz naq v frr guvf thl bire ng gur cvmmn obkrf tvivat zr gur fgvax-rlr  fb v tvir uvzr gur pebbx-rlr onpx  lbh xabj gura v abgvpr gung ur'f abg nybar v'z gnxvat ba gur ragver ina ohera oblf 
 gur ina ohera oblf gurer'f n fgerrg tnat anzrq nsgre cerfvqrag znegva ina ohera 
 bu lrnu naq gurl'er whfg nf zrna nf ur jnf fb v znxr n zbir gb gur qbbe lbh xabj  gurl oybpx vg fb v yhatrq sbe gur onguebbz  v teno gur xabo - bpphcnqb gura gurl onpx zr hc ntnvaf gur pnegbba znc bs vgnyl naq nyy bs gur fhqqra gurl whfg fgbc 
 jung jung unccrarq 
 orpnhfr v'z fgvyy ubyqvat gur tneyvp funxre lrnu yvxr guvf  v'z bayl fubjvat rvtug svatref 
 jryy jung qbrf gung zrna 
 gung'f gurve frperg fvta frr ina ohera ur jnf gru rvtugu cerfvqrag  gurl gubhtug v jnf n sbezre ina o obl 
 bhgfvqr n pbssrr fubc] 
  bu wreel pna lbh ubyq ba n frp v whfg jnag gb purpx zl zrffntrf  bu zryvffn xvz 
 ryyra 
 url lbh thlf v jnag lbh gb zrrg wreel  
 buu jr'ir urneq n ybg nobhg lbh  vg vf fb fjrrg bs lbh gb gnxr ure bhg 
 lrnu lbh qba'g rira xabj ubj zhpu fur arrqf guvf 
  fur pbzvat bs n onq oernx-hc 
  ab 
 frr ln 
 nal zrffntrf 
 lrnu ab bar pnyyrq 
 pbssrr fubc] 
 gurl npg yvxr vg jnf fbzr npg bs punevgl whfg tbvat bhg jvgu ure 
 fb fur'f gur ybfre bs gur tebhc rirel tebhc unf fbzrbar gung gurl nyy znxr sha bs yvxr hf jvgu rynvar  
 gurer vf ab jnl ryyra vf gur ybfre bs gung tebhc 
 ner lbh ybbxvat qrrc qbja ng gur erny crefba haqrearngu 
 ab v'z orvat nf fhcresvpvny nf v cbffvoyl pna 
  url v ugvax v znl unir sbhaq fbzrbar sbe gur fpubynefuvc 
 lrnu 
 v'z vagreivrjvat nyy gurfr naablvat yvggyr birenpuvriref svanyyl guvf xvq jnyxf va - fgrira xbera - n erthyne thl yvxrf fcbegf jngpurf gi 
 vf ur fzneg 
  ur xabjf ubj gb ernq naq ur nyfb xabjf svavfuvat na ragver obbx qbrfa'g cebir nalguvat naq trg guvf ur'f vagb nepuvgrpgher 
 url whfg yvxr lbh cergraq gb or 
 lrf jvgu n yvggyr thvqnapr fgrira xbera vf tbvat gb or rirelguvat v pynvz gb or bayl sbe erny gung'f zl qernz wreel 
 v unq n qernz ynfg avtug gung n unzohetre jnf rngvat zr 
 w crgrezna'f ncnegzrag] 
 zvfgre crgrezna gunaxf sbe univat zr bire lbhe cynpr vfa'g dhvgr jung v vzntvarq  
 buuu vg'f whfg n cynpr gb sybc  
 jryy  jung cneg bs lbhe yvsr  qb lbh jnag gb fgneg jvgu sbervta vagevthr rkbgvp ebznaprf 
 bu rynvar jr'ir pbirerq nyy bs gung va gur pngnybthr nq anhfrhz ab v jbhyq yvxr guvf obbx gb or nobhg zl qnl-gb-qnl yvsr 
 bu 
  bu qnza gurl punatrq gur pnoyr fgngvbaf ntnva whfg jura v svanyyl zrzbevmrq gurz 
 jryy zvfgre crgrezna qb lbh jnag gb hz 
  2 pof 
 trg hz fgnegrq 
 3 v qba'g xabj jung gung vf jurer'f zl qnza cerivrj punaary 
  jryy v - v tbg gn gryy lbh zvfgre crgrezna v qba'g guvax v frr n jubyr obbx urer 
 jryy v'z fher jr'yy pbzr hc jvgu fbzrguvat jung qb lbh fnl lbh naq v beqre bhefryirf n cvr qb lbh yvxr yberamb'f 
 lbh xabj n sevraq bs zvar nyzbfg tbg orng hc ng gung cynpr ol gur ina ohera oblf 
  lbh qba'g fnl 
 lrnu gur bayl guvax gung fnirq uvz vf gung ur nppvqragnyyl synfurq gurve frperg tnat fvta 
 jryy gung'f cerggl rkpvgvat  yrg'f chg gung va gur obbx 
 ohg gung qvqa'g unccra gb lbh 
 fb jr cnl bss lbhe sevraq naq vg orpbzrf n crgrezna 
 ab v - v ernyyl qba'g guvax lbh pna qb gung 
  buu qnza v sbetbg gb ohl cynag sbbq ntnva v'yy org v tbg n pbhcba sbe vg  
 lbh xabj jung znlor v orggre gnyx gb zl sevraq 
 pbssrr fubc] 
 vf gung gur fnzr bhgsvg lbh jrer jrnevat lrfgreqnl 
 ab guvf vf oenaq arj qb lbh yvxr vg 
 npghnyyl lrnu  jnvg n frpbaq vf gung gur sbex gung sryy ba gur sybbe  ner lbh hfvat gur sbex gung sryy ba gur sybbe 
  ab wreel gur jnvgerff tnzr or nabgure bar 
 v thrff gung'f nyy evtug 
 vf fbzrguvat jebat wreel 
 ab nofbyhgryl abguvat  lbh'er snagnfgvp  url thlf 
 url 
  xenzre trbetr guvf vf ryyra 
 fhfna ebff sbhaqngvba pbasrerapr ebbz] 
 ynqvrf naq tragyrzra guvf  vf fgrira xbera uvf tcn vf n fbyvq 20 evtug va gung zrngl cneg bs gur pheir - abg fubjvat bss abg snyyvat oruvaq 
 trbetr gur dhnvyvsvpngvbaf sbe guvf fpubynefuvc jrer fhccbfr gb or ynetryl npnqrzvp 
 v'z fher jr'er nyy njner bs gur synjf naq ovnfrf bs fgnaqneqvmrq grfgf 
 gurfr nera'g fgnaqneqvmrq grfgf - gurfr ner uvf tenqrf 
 orfvqrf fgrira xbera unf gur uvturfg bs nfcvengvbaf ur jnagf gb or  na nepuvgrpg 
 vf gung evtug 
 npghnyyl znlor v pbhyq frg zl fvtugf n yvggyr ovg uvture 
  fgrira abguvat vf uvture guna na nepuvgrpg 
 v guvax v'q ernyyl yvxr gb or n pvgl cynaare  jul yvzvg zlfrys gb whfg bar ohvyqvat jura v pna qrfvta n jubyr pvgl 
 jryy gung'f n tbbq cbvag 
  ab vg'f abg 
 jryy vfa'g na nepuvgrpg whfg na neg fpubby qebc-bhg jvgu n gvygl qrfx naq n ovt ehyre  
  vg'f pnyyrq n g-fdhner 
 lbh xabj gur fghcvqrfg thl va zl sengreavgl orpnzr na nepuvgrpg - nsgre ur syhaxrq bhg bs qragny fpubby  pbagenghyngvbaf lbhat zna  
 gunax lbh 
 fhfna jbhyq or cebhq bs jung lbh'er qbvat 
 gunax lbh 
 crgrezna'f bssvpr] 
 naq gurl znqr vg gurve fvta orpnhfr ina ohera bhe 8gu cerfvqrag jnf gur zna gurl zbfg nqzverq 
  xenzre zl sevraq gung vf bar evccvat tbbq lnea  
 lbh xabj vs lbh yvxr gung bar v tbg zber jung ner lbh ybbxvat sbe ebznapr pbzrql nqiraghr  rebgvpn  
 ab hu xenzre v qba'g guvax - 
  ubj zhpu jbhyq lbh gnxr sbe gur jubyr ybg 
 zl jubyr ybg 
 anzr lbhe cevpr zna 
  1500 qbyynef 
 v'yy tvir lbh unys gung 
  qbar 
 xenzre zl sevraq  pbafvqre rynvar ng lbhe qvfcbfny 
 bxnl  jryy v hu v yvxr gb jbex va gur riravatf  
 rynvar'f bssvpr] 
 jbhyq lbh cyrnfr whfg trg ba jvgu gur fghcvq obo fnppnznab fgbel 
 jryy v'z ba gur cubar jvgu obo naq v ernyvmr evtug gura naq gurer gung v arrq gb erghea guvf cnve bs cnagf fb v'z bss gb gur fgber 
 jung unccrarq gb obo fnppnznab 
 jryy abguvat uvf cneg bs gur fgbel vf qbar  fb v'z jnvgvat sbe gur fhojnl vg'f abg pbzvat fb v qrpvqrq gb ubbs vg guebhtu gur ghaary 
 nyevtug jryy abj gung'f fbzrguvat 
 jryy v qba'g xabj vs v ybfg genpx bs gvzr - be jung ohg gur arkg guvax v xarj 
  n genva vf ornevat qbja ba lbh 
 ab v fyvccrq - naq sryy va gur zhq ehvavat gur irel cnagf v jnf nobhg gb erghea 
  v qba'g haqrefgnaq lbh jrer jrnevat gur cnagf lbh jrer ergheavat 
 jryy v thrff v jnf 
  jung jrer lbh tbaan jrne ba gur jnl onpx 
 rynvar ner lbh yvfgravat v qvqa'g rira trg gurer  nyy evtug arkg fgbel 
 nyevtug v guvax v tbg rabhtu sbe bar qnl 
 lrnu lrnu purj ba gung 
  lrnu v'yy purj ba gung 
 bu url yvfgra ol gur jnl - v'z ubfgvat n yvggyr trg-gbtrgure gbavtug va ubabe bs zl yvggyr svanapvny hcghea 
 bu gunaxf v'ir tbg cynaf 
 rynvar lbh fubhyq or gurer gb qbphzrag vg 
  bu lbh'er trggvat gbtrgure jvgu fbzr bs lbhe wnpxnff sevraqf naq lbh jnag zr gb gnxr abgrf 
 lrnu ohg trg gurer nsgre avar lbh xabj tvir gur cbrcyr n punapr gb ybbfra hc 
 wreel'f ncnegzrag] 
 fb lbh'er qralvat uvz gur fpubynefuvc whfg orpnhfr ur jnagf gb or n pvgl cynaare 
 v jnf orgenlrq gung xvq jnf yvxr n fba gb zr naq vs gurer'f bar crefba lbh fubhyq or noyr gb ubyq qbja vg'f lbhe bja syrfu naq oybbq yvxr zl sngure zl sngure'f sngure orsber uvz 
 lbh xabj znlor cuvynaguebcl vf abg lbhe svryq  uryyb bu uv ryyra lrnu v pnyyrq gur ubgry jr'er nyy frg sbe gur jrrxraq 
 lbh'er fcraqvat gur jrrxraq jvgu ryyra 
  irezbag  jvgu nal yhpx gurl fnvq jr pbhyq fgnl na rkgen pbhcyr bs qnlf vs jr jnag gb  sbhe qnlf ng n ornhgvshy orq-naq-oernxsnfg v pna'g jnvg ohl-olr  jung  jung vf guvf 
  lbh jnag gb fgneg 
  hu ab ab ab lbh tb nurnq v tbggn trg zl gubhtugf gbtrgure 
 wreel guvf jubyr ryyra fvghngvba unf tbar sne rabhtu 
 jung 
  wreel fur'f n ybfre  
 jurer vf guvf pbzvat sebz fur'f terng 
  jul'er lbh qbvat guvf wreel vf vg lbhe pnerre guvatf jvyy cvpx hc 
 gurer'f abguvat jebat jvgu zl pnerre 
  jryy v fgvyy yvxr gur oybbzvatqnyr'f rkrphgvir genvavat cebtenz sbe uvz 
 v gubhtu jr fnvq jr jrera'g tbvat gb qvfphff gung abj 
 jryy lbh xabj v guvax vg'f fbzrguvat ur fubhyq pbafvqre 
 bs pbhefr ur fubhyq pbafvqre vg ohg abj vf abg gur gvzr 
 yvfgra trbetr nyy gurfr vffhrf ner vagreeryngrq 
  nyevtug rkphfr zr  v'z abg ohlvat nal bs guvf 
 nyy evtug fb jung'er lbh fnlvat gung jr'er jebat bu rirelobql'f jebat ohg lbh 
 lbh xabj guvf vf yvrx gung gjvyvtug mbar jurer gur thl jnxrf hc naq ur'f gur fnzr - ohg rirelbar ryfr vf qvssrerag 
 juvpu bar 
 gurl jrer nyy yvxr gung 
 alp fgerrg] 
 jul'q lbh gnxr njnl zl fpubynefuvc zvfgre pbfgnamn 
 jryy fgrira v hu  
 gurfr ner zl arj sevraqf - gur ina ohera oblf 
 ur orpnzr fb qvfvyyhfvbarq ur unq gb wbva hf 
 bu avpr 
 v jnag zl fpubynefuvc onpx fb v pna or n pvgl cynaare 
 jung nobhg nepuvgrpg fgrira 
  pvgl cynaare 
 pnsr] 
 terng cnegl x-zna 
 lrnu jryy lbh tbg gung fgenvtug  url rynvar gel gur orrs - orpnhfr gung'f ernyl nh whf fnhpr uhu  erny nh whf fnhpr 
  v'yy znxr n abgr bs vg 
 url xenzre 
 lrnu 
 enzverm unf arire urneq lbhe cnagf fgbel 
 buu xnl jryy lbh xabj v unq obo fnppnznab ba gur cubar naq v fhqqrayl ernyvmrq gung v-

 jung qb ln zrna 
 lbh fvtarq gur eryrnfr 
 lrnu 
 ur fng va zhq abg lbh 
 ohg v qvq fvg va zhq 
  ln qvqa'g lbh arire fng va zhq 
  v jnf nyy qvegl 
 vg rire unccrarq haqrefgnaq 
  url url url nyy evtug lrnu hu lrnu jryy hu gur cnagf gurl hu gurl svg hu jryy - naq fb v hu qrpvqrq v jnfa'g tbaan erghea gurz  jbbu-ubb-ubb-ubb 
 vg'f trggvat yngr znlor jr orggre trg tbvat  
 jung lbh'er tbaan tb abj url jbnu v qba'g  
  xenzre xenzre v tbg ovt gebhoyr jvgu gur - jvgu gur ina ohera oblf 
 url abj gurl'er gbhtu pbbxvrf 
 lrnu naq v - v urneq lbh tbg ba gurve tbbq fvqr abj jung'q lbh qb 
 hu nu  bu abguvat - abguvat ab v pregnvayl qba'g unir nal fgbevrf vs gung'f jung lbh'er vzcylvat  
  xenzre qb lbh xabj jung gubfr thlf ner tbaan qb gb zr 
 lrnu jryy hu lbh xabj hu lbh qvqa'g urne sebz zr ohg hu gur ina ohera oblf - gurl arire unffyr gurve bja xvaq 
 lbh zrna yvxr n sbezre zrzore 
 wreel'f ncnegzrag] 
 gurfr xenzre fgbevrf ner hahfnoyr  v zrna fbzr bs gurz nera'g rira fgbevrf  ybbx guvf vf n yvfg bs guvatf va uvf ncnegzrag 
 vf zl gbnfgre bira ba gurer 
 ubj nz v rire tbaan ghea guvf vagb n obbx 
 jryy whfg funcr gurz - punatr gurz lbh'er n jevgre 
 lrf v'z n jevgre 
 znxr gurz vagrerfgvat 
 vagrerfgvat bs pbhefr crbcyr ybir vagrerfgvat jevgvat 
 jryy v tbggn tb gb gur nvecbeg v'z cvpxvat hc zl cneragf 
 jung jurera'g gurl whfg urer 
 lrnu v'z sylvat gurz va gb zrrg ryyra v qba'g xabj jurer gb ghea v tbggn frr jung gurl guvax bs ure 
 znlor jr pbhyq nyy unir qvaare yngre 
 v qba'g guvax fb v'z tbaan gel gb trg gurz gb syl evtug onpx gbavtug 
 bu url url unir v gbyq lbh nobhg zl ohavbaf bu lbh'er tbaan ybir guvf fgbel  fb v yvar hc zl pbyq phgf ba gur pbhpu arkg gb zr ohg nf v'z fgnpxvat gurz hc gurl xrrc snyyvat vagb zl sbbg ongu  
 xenzre guvf vf njshy jr qba'g jnag gb urne nobhg guvf 
 qnza 
 jung 
 bu v obhtug n ohapu bs ohavba fgbevrf sebz arjzna - ohg gurl nyy fgvax 
 ubj zhpu qvq lbh cnl sbe gurz 
 rvtug ohpxf v guvax v tbg evccrq bss  
 crgrezna'f bssvpr] 
 bu jung qvqa'g lbh yvxr nobhg gur svefg puncgre 
 jryy vg fgnegrq bhg avpryl "v'z ergheavat fbzr cnagf" n irel vqragvsvnoyr ceboyrz  "v frg bs qbja n genva ghaary"  ohg gung'f jurer gur fgbel gnxrf n zbfg hanccrnyvat ghea 
 bu ab ab gung'f jurer vg trgf vagrerfgvat qba'g lbh frr gur - gur genva vf ornevat qbja ba lbh lbh - lbh qvir vagb n fvqr ghaary - naq lbh eha vagb n jubyr onaq bs haqretebhaq ghaary qjryyref 
 vg whfg frrzf fb pyvpurq naq boivbhf vg'f abg vagrerfgvat jevgvat 
 lrnu lrnu v xabj hz ubj nobhg vs vafgrnq bs qvivat sebz gur genva lbh hu lbh v qba'g xabj lbh fyvc naq naq snyy va fbzr zhq naq ehva lbhe cnagf 
  gur irel cnagf v jnf ergheavat gung'f cresrpg vebal rynvar gung vf vagrerfgvat jevgvat  
 v unir n pbfzb xenzre ba yvar 4 
  crgrezna urer 
 zvfgre crgrefba lbh tbggn fryy zr zl fgbevrf onpx

 ab ab zvfgre crgrezna jul qba'g jr xrrc gurz - nf n nf n ersrerapr 
 abafrafr  v unir orarf' jbqreshyyl vzntvangvir zvaq gb fcva zl fgbevrf lbh gnxr onpx lbhe gnyrf lbh intnobaq 
 lvccvr-lv-lnl 
  gurer lbh ner rynvar tb sbegu naq perngr  naq ol gur jnl jura lbh trg gb gung puncgre nobhg zl ebznagvp rfpncnqrf - srry serr gb gbff lbhefrys va gur zvk 
 alp fgerrg] 
 url ina o oblf 
 fb zvfgre pbfgnamn qvq lbh trg zl fpubynefuvc onpx

 evtug gur fvta

 ybir gb  
 pbssrr fubc]

 alp nyyrl] 
 gur arkg bar be lbh'er zrng 
 nyevtug nyevtug  frvasryqf 
 url trbetr 
 fuuu yvfgra lbh tbggn qb zr n snibe tvir zr lbhe jnyyrg v'yy tvir vg onpx gb lbh yngre 
 ubj'er lbhe sbyxf

 pbzr ba uheel hc byq zna v'z na navzny 
 lbh'er orvat irel ehqr pbzr ba zbegl 
  cyrnfr cyrnfr gurl'er tbaan uvg zr

 jura qbrf vg fgneg 
  v qba'g xabj gurl whfg gryy lbh gur avtug orsber 
 hu jryy v'z fvpx b' jnvgvat ) v nz fcevatva' nurnq evvvtug abj

 url zvxr 
  xenzre wreel ubj'f vg tbva'

 thrff jung v whfg fgnegrq zl bja ohfvarff v'z n obbxvr 
 ab bcravatf va nefba

  bu lrf hu vg'f nnnyzbfg fvk

 bu vg jnf ab ceboyrz 
  ze crgrezna vf tbaan ybir 'rz 
  gunaxf fhfvr

 url

 v urneq fur jnf n qvfnfgre fhmr--

 trbetr cvpx hc v xabj lbh'er fperravat sbe nyyvfba

 fb pbssrr fubc 
 ab v pna'g fur xabjf v tb gurer vg'f abg frpher  url v tbg nabgure pnyy pbzva' va v tbggn yrg gur znpuvar trg vg olr

  trbetr ner lbh gurer  v ungr gung fghcvq zrffntr  v xabj lbh'er nibvqvat zr v'z ng gur bssvpr cyrnfr pnyy zr v'ir tbggn gnyx gb lbh  
  uv nyyvfba bu v thrff lbh'er abg ng ubzr v cebonoyl fubhyq 'nir gevrq lbh ng gur bssvpr naljnl tbbq gb urne sebz ln ernyyl ybbxvat sbejneq gb gur onyy  un un 
 pna lbh oryvrir guvf jbzna 
  gur areir gnyxva' nobhg ln oruvaq lbhe onpx--naq evtug gb lbhe snpr

 ab fgvyy funeba

 purely zvyyre'f oebgure 
 lrnu  
 url--url--url--jnvg jnvg jnvg jnvg jung unccrarq 
  jryy svefg bs nyy sbe fbzr ernfba gurl fgnegrq gur tnzr na ubhe yngr naq hu v jnf fvggva' arkg gb fcvxr yrr na' ur na' erttvr jrer wnjva' ng rnpu bgure fb v thrff v tbg vaibyirq  
  --jnvg jubn--jubn--jubn--jubn-- 
 jryy--jnvg--jnvg--jnvg--jnvg jung qb lbh zrna "vaibyirq" 
  jryy v ena bhg bagb gur pbheg na' guerj n ubgqbt ng erttvr zvyyre "vaibyirq" na' gurl guerj zrrr na' erttvr na' fcvxr bhg b' gur tnzr 
 fb gung'f vg 
 jryy v jryy v sryg cerggl onq nobhg rirelguvat na' hu gura gur guerr bs hf jr jrag gb n fgevc pyho  
 pna lbh oryvrir gung

  gur xavpxf xvyyrq 'rz n uhaqerq na' gra gb friragl guerr

 ba jung

 fh-fvr 
 lrf orgjrra lbh zr naq gur ynzccbfg naq gur qrfx crttl fnlf guvf "fhmr" vfa'g zhpu bs n jbexre 
  vg'f fhfvr

  nu nyy b'--nyy bs hf 
 nyyvfba uv hu--yvfgra v'z ernyyl fbeel nobhg jung unccrarq ng gur tnzr ynfg avtug yvfgra--pbhyq v unir n gvpxrg gbavtug--'pnhfr gur ebpxrgf ner va gbja na' gung unxrrz bynwhjba buuu--ur'f tbg n erny nggvghqr

 jul abg 
 'pnhfr v qba'g unir gur zbarl 
 zvxr lbh fnl lbh'er n obbxvr lbh gnxr n org na' gura lbh pna'g cnl v qba'g xabj zvxr gb zr vg fbhaqf n yvggyr ubj lbh fnl "cubal" 
 whfg tvir zr 'gvy sevqnl cyrnfr cyrnfr

 v'z fbeel hu--bu urer--yrg zr tvir lbh n unaq jvgu gung 
  fbzrguvat jebat jvgu guvf gehax 
 bu yrg zr frr 
 fb--nu xenzre jul'q lbh nfx zr bhg gb qvaare  na' jul cbzbqbeb 
  nyyvfba fcbxr gb zr naq hz fur jnagrq zr gb fcrnx gb lbh 
  hu-bu 
 jr nyy xabj gung guvf eryngvbafuvc vfa'g jbexvat fb nyyvfba na' v guvax gung gur orfg guvat gb qb vf whfg znxr n pyrna oernx 
 pna'g jr qvfphff guvf 
  jr whfg qba'g guvax lbh'er ernql sbe n frevbhf eryngvbafuvc 
  v qvqa'g rira xabj lbh jnagrq gb trg frevbhf 
  fb jung nz v va guvf sbe lbh xabj v'z trggvat gb n cbvag va zl yvsr jurer v arrq fbzrguvat zber guna whfg n tbbq gvzr  
  ner lbh 
 jun--zr ab ab ohg fur vf 
 v v pna'g oryvrir guvf vf unccravat 
 trbetr jr'er fbeel 
 xenzn cyrnfr 
  jnnn-nn--nn v'z fbeel-- 
  ze crgrezna crttl v thrff jr fubhyq whfg trg guvf bire jvgu  
 whfg ubyq ba n zvahgr fgvyy bar fubeg 
 bu ab jr'er abg-- 
 fhfvr unf orra irel ehqr gb zr 
 jryy rynvar unf abguvat ohg tbbq guvatf gb fnl nobhg fhfvr 
 ybbx  jr qba'g unir gb anzr anzrf be cbvag svatref be  anzr anzrf  zr naq ure unir unq bhe ceboyrzf fur naq v unir unq bhe ceboyrzf lbh naq v naq fur naq lbh-- 
 qba'g lbh qent zr vagb guvf guvf vf orgjrra lbh naq ure naq ure

 vvvv gubhtug v jnf cneg bs guvf ceboyrz 
  lbh'er n uhhtr cneg bs gur ceboyrz ohg v guvax gung ng vg'f pber guvf vf n fhfvr-naq-rynvar ceboyrz gung erdhverf n fhfvr-naq-rynvar fbyhgvba naq jub orggre gb qb gung guna rynvar naq fhfvr fhfvr naq rynvar 
 jryy abj gung jr unir gung pyrnerq hc jul qba'g gur guerr bs hf unir yhapu 
  jung bu bu v'z pbzvat v--v tbggn tb  
 fur vf gur orfg jung jnf lbhe anzr ntnva 
 zvxr'f bhgfvqr ur jnagf gb gnyx gb lbh 
 jryy jul qbrfa'g ur whfg pbzr va 
 orpnhfr ur'f fpnerq wreel 
 jul vf ur fpnerq 
  pbzr ba va qvq lbh qb guvf  
 lrnu ohg-- 
 hu--nu--nu lbh oebxr uvf guhzof 
 vg jnf na nppvqrag 
 bu vf gung jung lbh pnyy vg jura fbzrobql qbrfa'g cnl hc 
  v'yy trg lbh gur zbarl wreel v tbg n uhaqerq qbyynef va zl sebag cbpxrg vs lbh jnag gb ernpu va na' gnxr vg 
  v qba'g jnag vg gung jnl 
 ahu bxnl wreel ubj nobhg vs zvxr svkrf lbhe gehhhax jr pnyy vg rira na' guvf jnl abobql unf gb trg uheg 
  svar 
 bu--hu--gunax lbh wreel gunax lbh v jba'g sbetrg guvf v'z tbaan svk lbhe gehax tbbq--erny tbbq 
 frr gung jnf avpr wreel  bu ol gur jnl v'z gur bar jub oebxr lbhe gehax 
 nu vg'f whfg n pne 
 uv 
  uv 
 vg'f shaal ehaava' vagb lbh urer 
 lrnu lrnu 
  qb v gunaxf lbh gbb 
 bbb lrnu   lbh xabj vg'f trggva' xvaq bs yngr v v ernyyl unir gb or tbvat fb hu vg'f avpr frrvat lbh ntnva nyy evtug-- 
  lrnu lrnu url--url lbh lbh xabj znlor v'yy pnyy lbh fbzrgvzr 
 trbetr vg'f bire vg'f whfg vg'f bire

  v qba'g xabj v whfg frr lbh thlf gbtrgure 
 guhzof 
  bu uryc fbzrobql uryc uryc 
 fb crgrezna obhtug vg v pna'g oryvrir lbh tbg njnl jvgu gung 
 jryy v'z irel sbeghangr gb or fheebhaqrq ol fhpu fghcvqvgl 
 lrnu v xabj ubj lbh srry 
 qb lbh urne fbzrguvat 
 jung 
 bu gur gehax'f oebxra vg'f enggyvat 
 wreel v qba'g xabj ubj zhpu ybatre v pna xrrc guvf hc gurl'er fgnegvat gb tvir fhfvr nffvtazragf abj 
 jryy gurer'f bayl bar guvat gb qb ryvzvangr ure 
 jung 
  trg evq bs fhfvr znxr ure qvfnccrne 
 v xvaqn yvxr ure 
 fur'f tbbbar 
 wreel-- 
  tbar   gung ohzcre fgvpxre

 xenzn bcra hc v--v xabj lbh'er va gurer 
  hu--trbetr hu--hu--vg'f svir b'pybpx va gur zbeavat jung'f gur znggre jvgu lbh 
  vg'f bayl sbhe 
 uhu 
 v--v'ir orra jnyxva' nebhaq nyy avtug v'ir orra guvaxva' nobhg nyyvfba naq zr na' lbh-- 
 bu bu trbetr 
 cyrnfr tvir zr nabgure punapr 
  hu v xabj v'z tbaan erterg guvf  nyy evtug 
  gunax lbh v'z tbaan znxr lbh obgu fb unccl 
 nyy evtug nyy evtug v'yy frr ln yngre  
  jbbbb 
 rynvar jurer'f fhfvr v jnag ure gb urnq hc bhe arj svatreyrff tybir qvivfvba 
  bu ohg v gubhtug v jnf va yvar sbe gung nffvtazrag 
 zzzzz--anu 
 nyy evtug gura v jnf tbaan jnvg gb gryy ln guvf ohg ynfg avtug fhfvr  fur gbbx ure bja yvsr 
  jr'er gnxva' trbetr onpx-- 
 jung 
 ur'f tbaan znxr hf irel unccl 
  ybbx ng guvf gheabhg 
  jurer qvq fhfvr svaq gur gvzr gb zrrg nyy gurfr crbcyr 
  lbhe shareny'f abg tbaan pbzr pybfr gb guvf 
  bu zl tbq  fhfvr 
  bu bu--ub--v'z abg fhfvr v'z rynvar 
 ohg v'ir orra pnyyvat lbh fhfvr 
 bu unqa'g abgvprq rkphfr zr  
 v thrff v arire zrg fhfvr 
  fhmr v npghnyyl unq n yvggyr guvat jvgu ure sbe n juvyr  ure gbb 
 jung pna lbh fnl nobhg n tvey yvxr fhfvr  
 url 
 jurer'f hu jurer'f nyyvfba 
 bu nyyvfba fur qvqa'g jnag gb pbzr 
 ohg lbh gbbx zr onpx 
 jryy lrnu v qvq ohg fur'f n gbhtu ahg ubj q'ln yvxr gur ghkrqb vg'f n eragny ohg v'ir unq vg sbe svsgrra lrnef nyy evtug ru  
 jurer ner lbh tbva' 
 gur onyy fvyyl 
  ab ab ab ab ab lbh'er abg tbva' va gurer 
 trbetr v gubhtug lbh jrer tbaan punatr 
  sbe ure abg sbe lbh 
  yrg'f whfg gel na' unir n avpr gvzr sbe bapr na' jr'yy gnyx nobhg guvf jura jr trg ubzr 
 nyy evtug ybbx--jnvg--jnvg--xenzn--jnvg jnvg n zvahgr lbh ner abg lbh ner abg tbva' va nu-nuuu 
 jbj jung na ragenapr  naq ru jub zvtug guvf or 
 bu v'z jvgu uvz 
 bu nu-un 
 naq nyfb zhpu yvxr zr fhfvr ungrq tbvat gb gur znexrg 
 rynvar znl v fnl n srj jbeqf 
 bu tbq lrf ze crgrezna  
  nuuu v qba'g guvax v'yy rire or noyr gb sbetrg fhfvr--nuuu naq zbfg bs nyy v jvyy arire sbetrg gung bar avtug jbexvat yngr ba gur pngnybthr whhhfg gur gjb bs hf naq jr fheeraqrerq gb grzcgngvba naq vg jnf cerggl tbbq 
  lrnu ohg ur qvqa'g fyrrc jvgu obgu bs 'rz  
 ohg vvvv arire urneq ure pevrf sbe uryc  na' abjjj fhfvr vf tbar 
  ubyq ba uby--ba fhfvr qvqa'g pbzzvg fhvpvqr  fur jnf zheqrerq ol wreel frva-sryq 
  abg bayl gung v oebxr uvf guhzof 
 rynvar thrff jung v'ir qrpvqrq gb sbez n punevgnoyr sbhaqngvba va fhfvr'f ubabe naq nf fhfvr'f orfg sevraq v jnag lbh gb or vaibyirq 
 ze crgrezna  v'z fhfvr fur'f zr 
  v srry gur fnzr jnl  naq gung'f jul guvf sbhaqngvba jvyy zrrg nebhaq lbhe fpurqhyr avtugf jrrxraqf rirel serr zbzrag lbh unir

 onguebbz] 
 zbeavat 
 zbeavat 
 ubcr lbh qba'g zvaq onxvat fbqn synibhe 
  nu onxvat fbqn naablvat yvggyr cebqhpg 'v pna qb guvf v pna qb gung' jul qbrfa'g guvf fghss whfg fuhg hc 
 v'z tbaan teno lbh n gbjry 
 bbu-bbu 
 fb 
 fb fur hfrq gur gbbguoehfu 
 lbh fnvq lbh tenoorq vg bhggn gurer erny snfg evtug 
 lrnu 
 fb v'z fher jungrire trezf vg ynaqrq ba jrer xabpxrq bhg naq ol gur gvzr gur erfg bs gurz ernyvfrq jung jnf tbvat ba lbh unq nyernql tenoorq vg bhg 
 ubj znal lrnef bs zrq fpubby qvq lbh unir 
 jnf fur znq 
 lbh qvqa'g gryy ure 
 wraan'f yvxr zr fur'f irel  
 svavpxl cevffl snfgvqvbhf 
 v'yy gnxr snfgvqvbhf 
 jung vf gung 
 nuu fgrvaoeraare tnir 'rz gb hf va ubabhe bs cuvy evmmhgb orvat vaqhpgrq vagb gur unyy bs snzr 
 ubyl pbj 
 gurl qba'g npghnyyl unir gb fdhrrmr uvf urnq gb trg uvz gb fnl 'ubyl pbj' qb gurl 
 whfg gur ynfg srj vaavatf bs n qbhoyr-urnqre 
 url ybbx ng guvf v'z va gur cnffvat ynar bs gur neguhe orexuneqg rkcerffjnl tbvat friragl naq  qenttrq guvf guvat sbe svir rkvgf 
 jul qvqa'g lbh chyy bire 
 jryy v jnf qenhtugvat oruvaq n frzv v qvqa'g jnaan ybfr uvz gur vasenfgehpgher wreel vg'f pehzoyvat 
 ubyl pbj 
 jryy ybbx ng gung n gnyxvat avkba 
 puvan cnaqn 
 lrnu v'q yvxr gb cynpr na beqre 
 nu lrf jung lbh yvxr 
 guvf fhcerzr sybhaqre vg fnlf svefg gvzr freirq va nzrevpn vf gung gehr 
 jung ahzore 
 sbegl-frira 
 lrnu svefg gvzr jung ryfr 
 hu gung'f vg 
 nqqerff 
 friragl-rvtug jrfg rvtugl-fvkgu fgerrg ncnegzrag guerr r 
 gung'f fbhgufvqr fbeel jr qba'g qryvire orybj rvtugl-fvkgu 
 v'z abg orybj 
 lrf lbh ner fgerrg vgfrys vf obhaqnel 
 lbhe thl pna'g pebff gb zl fvqr 
 vs jr qryvire gb lbh gura jung rvtugl-svsgu fgerrg jnyy fgerrg zrkvpb rvtugl-sbhegu fgerrg 
 nyevtug svar v'yy whfg pebff naq zrrg uvz 
 fbeel sbbq bayl sbe gubfr jub yvir jvguva obhaqnel  
  puvan cnaqn 
  hu lrnu lrnu v'q yvxr gb cynpr na beqre 
 nu jung lbh yvxr 
 jryy v'z n cbccn 
 oevat vg ba abguvat'f guebjvat zr ng guvf cbvag 
  jryy nf bs gbqnl v nz n cebhq cnerag bs n bar-zvyr fgergpu bs gur neguhe orexuneqg rkcerffjnl 
 bu gung nqbcg-n-uvtujnl guvat 
 lrnu v'z cneg bs gur fbyhgvba abj wreel lrnu v jrag qbja gurer naq v purpxrq vg bhg guvf zbeavat urer gnxr n ybbx zvyr bar-sbhegrra 
 nj ybbxf whfg yvxr lbh 
 nj v'z ornzvat wreel 
 fb jung q'lbh unir gb qb cnl gb xrrc vg pyrna 
 gurl gel gb chfu lbh vagb hfvat gurve pyrnavat perj jvgu nyy gurve fb-pnyyrq znvagranapr rdhvczrag 
 gung byq fpnz 
 lrnu jryy gung'f jul v'z qbvat vg nyy zlfrys guvf cneragvat vfa'g nobhg qryrtngvat erfcbafvovyvgl vg'f nobhg orvat gurer 
 ng gur fvqr bs gur ebnq jvgu n cvyr bs tneontr 
 dhnyvgl gvzr 
 xrlf v pna'g svaq zl xrlf 
 lbh ybfg cuvy evmmhgb'f urnq 
 unir lbh frra 'rz 
 ab 
 qnzzvg 
 p'zba ergenpr lbhe fgrcf jung q'lbh qb gbqnl 
 v tbg hc v jnf fhccbfrq gb tb gb jbex v pnzr urer vafgrnq 
 evtug 
 jryy gurl'er abg urer lbh'yy unir gb qvt hc lbhe fcner frg 
 v qba'g unir n fcner frg nyy zl xrlf fnl 'qb abg qhcyvpngr' 
 fb 
 fb lbh pna'g qhcyvpngr 'rz 
 fher lbh pna  fhpu n fjrrg xvq 
 bu bu uv puvan cnaqn 
  jul lbh jnvgvat ba gur fgerrg naq abg va lbhe ncnegzrag 
 v gubhtug gung v jbhyq zrrg lbh unysjnl 
 lbh ernyyl yvir urer 
 bu lrnu  gurer lbh tb xrrc gur punatr olr abj v'yy frr lbh 
  guvf vfa'g snve guvf vf nqqerff qvfpevzvangvba 
 jryy v pyrnarq bhg gurve jubyr qragny ultvrar furys 
 fb gur cyna vf gb frpergyl fgrevyvfr ure zbhgu 
 ol gur gvzr v'z guebhtu jvgu ure zbhgu fur'yy or noyr gb rng bss vg vf vg fnsr gb qevax oyrnpu vs lbh qvyhgr vg 
 ab fgvatf gur guebng naljnl fb v jnf pbzvat nybat urer naq v sryg yvxr n cvrpr bs pnxr lbh xabj ohg gura v gubhtug vg'f zbeavat v fubhyq ernyyl unir n zhssva v yvxr gubfr pubpbyngr puvc barf gura v svtherq jryy gurl'er ernyyl obgu pnxr fb v hu v fng ba gung orapu sbe n yvggyr juvyr gjragl zvahgrf be na ubhe naq gura v svtherq purpx naq frr jung lbh jrer hc gb  jnvg n zvahgr jnvg n zvahgr gur oebnq whzc gur oebnq whzc bire gur cbgubyr ba rvtugl-fvkgu fgerrg 
 abj v erzrzore nf v whzcrq bire gur ubyr v urneq n yvxr n wvatyvat fbhaq 
 lbh qvqa'g ybbx qbja 
 v jnf gelvat gb fgvpx gur ynaqvat  jnf evtug nebhaq urer 
 ab ab 
 ubyl ubyl pbj 
 cbbe fba bs n ovgpu 
 vg'f n uhaqerq gubhfnaq eribyhgvbaf n frpbaq vg'f gur zbfg cbjreshy bar gurl znxr 
 vg'f yvxr v'z ubyqvat n oyraqre 
 gur ratvar'f znqr ol zpqbaaryy-qbhtynf 
 bu ab lbh xrrc tbvat vg fuhgf bss nhgbzngvpnyyl 
  ernyyl vg qbrf 
  jura gur onggrel ehaf bhg 
  v jnf ernyyl unccl jvgu zl byq gbbguoehfu 
 ab gehfg zr gung bar jnf qbvat zber unez guna tbbq qba'g sbetrg gb hfr gur cynk gbb 
 gung fghss gnfgrf yvxr oyrnpu 
 v qba'g xabj nalguvat nobhg gung 
 zzz zl zbhgu srryf fb pyrna 
 gung'f gur vqrn 
 lbh xabj znlor jr orggre abg v v guvax v'z trggvat n yvggyr pbyq v qba'g jnaan tvir lbh nal bs zl trezf 
 njj bxnl gunaxf v thrff 
 lbh fgvyy pbhyqa'g xvff ure 
 fur unf n gnvag v pna'g frr vg ohg v xabj vg'f gurer 
 bu fb abj lbh'er svaqvat snhyg ba n fho-ngbzvp yriry 
 znlor vs v pbhyq fuevax zlfrys qbja yvxr va snagnfgvp iblntr naq trg vafvqr n zvpebfpbcvp fhoznevar v pbhyq or fher nygubhtu vs gurer jnf fbzrguvat gurer vg zvtug or cerggl fpnel pbhefr v jbhyq unir gung ynfre 
 wre qb lbh frr jurer guvf vf tbvat 
 orvat ernyyl pyrna naq unccl 
 wreel lbh unir graqrapvrf gurl'er nyjnlf naablvat ohg gurl jrer whfg graqrapvrf ohg abj vs lbh pna'g xvff guvf tvey v'z nsenvq jr'er gnyxvat qvfbeqre 
 qvfbeqre 
 naq sebz qvfbeqre lbh'er n dhvex be gjb njnl sebz shyy-ba qrzragvn 
  uzz gung pbhyq uheg zr  url gurer vg vf 
 funyy jr fgbc naq fnl uv 
 anu jr'ir frra vg 
 lrnu 
  url wreel lrnu v'yy frr lbh onpx ng gur ubhfr 
 zvyr bar-sbhegrra pyrna nf n juvfgyr 
 lrnu 
 uv v'z lbhe arvtuobhe hu se sebz npebff gur fgerrg naq hu  v jnf jbaqrevat vs vg jbhyqa'g or gbb zhpu gebhoyr vs v pbhyq hfr lbhe ncnegzrag gb beqre fbzr sbbq 
 jun jung q'lbh jnag 
 lbh frr gurer'f guvf pregnva sybhaqre naq gurl jba'g qryvire vg gb zl fvqr bs gur fgerrg 
 ju jura vf gung 
 ab v whfg arrq gurz gb qryvire vg urer naq v unir gb or xvaqn vafvqr vf nyy 
 jub ner lbh jvgu 
 ab npghnyyl v'z v'z whfg xvaq bs uhatel 
 jub yrg lbh va 
 jryy gur ybpx jnf oebxra lbh whfg unir gb wvttyr vg npghnyyl ohg v whfg arrq yvxr n unys na ubhe gb na ubhe 
 jung'f jvgu gur fvtaf 
 url lbh fubhyq frr gur orexuneqg wreel zl zvyr vf fcbgyrff v zrna gur ovt fghss jnf rnfl pvaqreoybpxf nve-pbaqvgvbaref fubccvat pnegf  v whfg ebyyrq 'rz vagb gur jbbqf 
 lrnu gung fghss'f nyy angheny naljnl 
  fcrrq yvzvg bar uhaqerq naq fvkgl-svir zvyrf cre ubhe frr gurl fyvccrq n bar va gurer  gubfr xvqf jvgu gur fcenl cnvag tbq ybir 'rz 
 url fb xrlf 
 ab xrlf naq v orra pnyyvat gur pvgl nyy qnl pbhefr gurer'f abg ernyyl n ahzore gb pnyy vs lbh jnaan znxr n cbgubyr 
 v thrff gurl yrnir gung hc gb gur trareny cbchyngvba 
 v gryy lbh guvf vs gur erny cuvy evmmhgb jnf qbja gurer guvf jbhyqa'g or unccravat 
 uneq gb fnl 
 url lbh arrq fbzr ebnqjbex qbar 'pbf v zrg fbzr znvagranapr thlf gbqnl ba gur uvtujnl gurl pbhyq cebonoyl uryc lbh bhg 
 ernyyl 
 bu lrnu lrnu v obeebjrq fbzr pbarf sebz gurz jura v jnf fjrrcvat zl pne-cbby ynar 
 lrnu 
 vg'f wraan 
 vs lbh thlf jbhyqa'g zvaq v jbhyq yvxr gb jneq bss qrzragvn 
 lbh guvax lbh pbhyq ubbx zr hc jvgu gurfr thlf 
 bu lrnu lrnu tvir zr n evat gbzbeebj v'z tbaan or ng rzretrapl pnyyobk frira-rvtug-sbhe 
 frira-rvtug-sbhe 
 url 
 uv 
 ubj lbh srryvat 
 tbbq zl pbyq'f tbar naq v'ir orra ybbxvat sbejneqf gb xvffvat lbh juvpu v'z ernql gb qb abj vs lbh ner ernql 
 jung 
 abguvat v whfg v hu v oehvfrq zl yvc v jnf qevaxvat n pryenl naq v oebhtug vg hc gbb snfg naq v onatrq vg vagb zl yvc  naq gura v xabpxrq lbhe gbbguoehfu vagb gur gbvyrg naq v jnfa'g noyr gb gryy lbh orsber lbh pbhyq hfr vg 
 jung 
 v'z fbeel 
 jura jrer lbh tbaan gryy zr guvf 
 boivbhfyl arire 
 v arrq gur lvryq fvta 
 xenzre v'z xvaq bs va gur zvqqyr bs fbzrguvat jbhyq lbh trg gurfr fvtaf bhg bs urer cyrnfr 
 lbh pbhyq'ir vagebqhprq zr 
 v jbhyqa'g xabj jurer gb fgneg 
  url wraan url 
 gurer abj fbzrguvat bs lbhef unf orra va gur gbvyrg 
 jung jun jung'q lbh chg va gurer 
 tbggn eha 
 bu zna 
  uryyb wraan qvq lbh qhax gur fcnghyn jnf vg gur fcnghyn uryyb qnzzvg 
 fur jba'g rira tvir lbh n uvag 
 ab pbhyq or nalguvat gur jubyr ncnegzrag'f n ovbunmneq 
 lbh xabj jung v org vg vf  lbhe erzbgr 
 lrf gung vf n qrsvavgr cbffvovyvgl 
  be pbhyq or lbhe jnyxzna gurer 
 ner lbh whfg fperjvat jvgu zr 
 lrnu v nz 
 url nu 
 url ubj'f yvsr ba gur ebnq 
 bu v'z znxvat n qvssrerapr wreel 
 v qba'g qbhog vg 
 lbh fubhyq frr gur fzvyrf ba gur qeviref' snprf v zrna lbh tbggn ybbx dhvpx ohg gurl'er gurer 
 jung'f guvf 
 jryy lbh xabj gubfr naablvat yvggyr ohzcf ba gur ynar-yvarf  
 vfa'g gung fbzr xvaq bs fnsrgl guvat 
 jryy v unq gb chyy 'rz hc vs v'z tbaan jvqra gur ynarf 
 jung gur uryy ner lbh gnyxvat nobhg 
 nu lbh xabj ubj va cynarf gurl tbg svefg pynff zber yrt ebbz orggre evqr jryy v'z oevatvat gung pbaprcg gb zvyr bar-sbhegrra 
 ubj ner lbh tbaan jvqra gur ynarf 
 jryy lbh oynpx bhg ynar-yvarf bar naq guerr naq n sbhe-ynar uvtujnl orpbzrf n gjb-ynar pbzsbeg pehvfr  fb lbh tbg nal oynpx cnvag 
  lrnu va zl gbbyfurq arkg gb gur evqvat zbjre 
  lhu v'q yvxr na beqre bs fhcerzr sybhaqre ahzore sbegl-frira lrnu ncnegzrag bar-d 
 bar-d jubfr ncnegzrag vf gung 
 gung'f gur wnavgbe pybfrg npebff gur fgerrg 
 lbh'er cergraqvat gb yvir va n wnavgbe'f pybfrg whfg gb trg guvf sybhaqre 
 vg'f orggre guna rngvat vg nybar va gur erfgnhenag yvxr fbzr ybfre 
 gung fghss vf haoryvrinoyr v'q rng vg bhg bs n qhzcfgre 
  ubj qb lbh xabj nobhg vg lbh'er abg va gur qryvirel mbar 
 jryy arjzna hfrf uvf znvy gehpx gb eha svfu sbe puvan cnaqn ba gur jrrxraqf 
 jryy zvar'f pbzvat va gra fb frr lbh oblf 
 abj jurer'f gung gbby furq bs lbhef 
 uv fbeel v qvqa'g urne lbh v jnf va gur fubjre 
 v'yy frr lbh 
 lbh pbfgnamn 
 lrnu gunaxf sbe gunaxf sbe pbzvat ol sryynf ru tbg n frg bs xrlf ohevrq va gur cbgubyr 
 jung'er gur xrlf qbvat va gurer 
 whfg arrq gb hu gb qvt 'rz hc 
 lbh chg 'rz va gurer 
 anu anu vg'f hu vg'f n ybat fgbel whfg hu gel gb trg vg hc 
 onq cynpr gb chg lbhe xrlf 
 lrnu v xabj gung  pbhyq lbh fgneg jbexvat 
 qvssvphyg wbo lbh jnag gubfr xrlf jr'er tbaan unir gb qvt guvf hc 
  bu hu jnvg n zvahgr jnvg n zvahgr  vf guvf nobhg zbarl 
 lrnu  vg'f nobhg zbarl 
 'fphfr zr jung ner lbh qbvat va gurer 
 huz abguvat v jnf whfg huz v jnfa'g va gurer 
 lbh jrer unatvat nebhaq va gurer ynmvat ba gur wbo jura lbh fubhyqn orra qbjafgnvef va gur onfrzrag pyrnavat bhg gubfr byq pnecrgf naq fpenc jbbq 
 evtug orpnhfr v'z gur wnavgbe  
 qba'g trg fzneg jvgu zr 
  lrf zn'nz 
 url naq vs lbh'er urnqvat abegu ba gur neguhe orexuneqg jubnu aryyl sbe fbzr ernfba sbhe ynarf ner pbairetvat vagb gjb vafgnagnarbhfyl evtug ng zvyr-znexre bar-sbhegrra v qba'g xabj jung gung vf ohg gur n-o'f n cnexvat ybg bhg gurer fbzrobql fperjrq hc ba gung bar 
 bu vg'f lbh 
 vf gur sybhaqre urer lrg 
 ab vg'f abg urer lrg lbh jnag gur gbhe 
  gurer'f guvf 
 avpr serapu qbbef'q ernyyl bcra guvf cynpr hc bu ohg lbh unir n fybc-ohpxrg 
  gur svfu 
 nu jung'er lbh qbvat urer 
 url 
 url 
 bu v jnf hu v jnf jnvgvat qbjafgnvef sbe gur wnpxunzzre gubhtug v'q qebc ol 
 xenzre'f thlf 
 lrnu v tbg 'rz qbja gb svsgl ohpxf v whfg unir gb qb nyy gur wnpxunzzrevat zlfrys 
 bu gung'f avpr xvaq bs n uneq-ynobhe snagnfl pnzc 
 bj 
 hu zna 
 uhu lrnu  bu fjrrg frghc rynvar q'lbh unir nal cnvag guvaare v arrq yvxr hu sbegl tnyybaf 
 v'z cyhzo bhg 
 bu zna vs v qba'g trg gung oynpx cnvag bss gur pvgl'f tbaan tb ncr v qba'g jnaan ybfr zl onol 
 wnavgbe 
  hu zef nyyvfgre  lrnu hu whfg pbzvat zef nyyvfgre  bxnl v'ir tbggn trg bhg 
 urer pna lbh zbir lbh tbggn zbir sebz gur qbbe 
 uv v huz jung pna v qb sbe lbh 
 v gbyq lbh lrfgreqnl gb unhy gung genfu bhggn gur onfrzrag 
 lrnu v nz fb fbeel 
 fbzr bs gur puvyqera unir orra cynlvat arne vg naq chggvat vg va gurve zbhguf 
 jryy n ybg bs vg vf irtrgnoyr 
 trg gung fghss bhggn gurer gbqnl be lbh'yy or bhggn urer haqrefgnaq 
  lrf zn'nz 
 fgbc chfuvat  xenzre fcvyyrq nzzbavn 
 v qba'g srry yvxr rngvat 
  v'z tbaan obeebj guvf uhu 
  wnavgbe'f zrrgvat 
 fb wreel jul'q lbh pnyy zr 
 jryy v gubhtug vg'f nobhg gvzr jr chg nfvqr nyy guvf fvyyvarff v xabj abj lbh qvqa'g chg nalguvat va zl gbvyrg objy  qvq lbh 
 lrf v qvq 
 jryy jungrire fb ubj'ir lbh orra 
 tbbq 
 tbbq  fgrnx xavsr 
 whfg rngvat njnl ng lbh vfa'g vg 
 anu

 uv

 sbe jung 
 v unir gb unhy fbzr qvegl tneontr gb gur qhzc 
 qveg gung'f nyevtug  orpnhfr gurer'f abguvat jebat jvgu qveg 
 jryy npghnyyl vg'f cerggl tevzl 
 tevzr ternfr svygu shax bbmr jungrire vg vf lbh gnxr gung fghss naq chg vg evtug ba zl yrngure hcubyfgrel 
 jryy v qba'g xabj jub lbh ner ohg gunaxf sbe gur pne 
 fher olr 
 olr 
 olr 
 olr 
 gurer lbh frr v whfg yrnag ure zl pne naq fur'f tbaan svyy vg jvgu nyy fbegf bs  nyevtug lbh jva gung pne jnf zl ynfg trez-serr fnapghnel v fyrcg gurer ynfg avtug abj sbe gur ybir bs tbq cyrnfr jung vf vg jung vf vg 
 gbvyrg oehfu 
 gbvyrg oehfu bu  nyevtug v pna ercynpr gung 
 lbh jnaan beqre qvaare 
 lrnu yrg'f hu tb gb lbhe cynpr orpnhfr v guerj bhg nyy zl qvfurf 
 gung'f gehr 
 zz 
 ohg v'yy gryy lbh guvf zhpu v nz arire tbvat gb yrg fbzr fvyyl ultvravp zvfunc trg va gur jnl bs jung pbhyq or n zrnavatshy ybat-ynfgvat eryngvbafuvc 
 qb lbh urne fbzrguvat 
 v qba'g xabj jung gung pbhyq or 
 ubyl pbj 
 naljnl v'z n arj zna naq v'z ybbxvat gbjneqf gur shgher pyrna qvegl jungrire 
 ubyl pbj unir n avpr yvsr 
 url ybbx ng guvf jvqr ynarf guvf vf fb yhkhevbhf jbb lrnu 
 ohttre 
  lbh'er bapr gjvpr guerr gvzrf n ynql 
 jung gur uryy jnf gung 
 qbhoyr ohttre 
  lrf lbh'er bapr gjvpr guerr gvzrf 
 nnnu nnntu nnu-nnu bu bu gur uhznavgl nnntu 
 url ohqql jung'er lbh qbvat bhg urer 
 zna qvq lbh frr gung sveronyy jbb-ubb-ubb ubb-ubb 
 url v tbggn fxrqnqqyr lbh jnaan yvsg 
 arjzna arjzna 
 jryy v'yy zrrg lbh ng gur pbssrr fubc 
 lbh xabj ng gur zbivrf gurl fubj gung yvggyr nq sbe gur pbaprffvba fgnaq 
 jurer gur pnegbba pnaql'f qnapvat naq gur zvyx qhq'f cynlvat gur onawb 
 ur'f jnvyvat ba gung onawb 
 lrnu 
 v whfg qba'g haqrefgnaq gur envfvarggrf 
 gur fnk cynlre 
 lrnu 
 lrnu 
 gur obk bs envfvarggrf ehaf hc gb gur pbaprffvba fgnaq ohlf nabgure obk bs envfvarggrf 
 fb 
 obk bs envfvarggrf rngvat nabgure obk bs envfvarggrf vg'f creirefr 
 ur'f abg tbaan rng gurz ur'f ohlvat 'rz sbe uvf crcfv tveysevraq 
 jul'f ur qngvat n crcfv gurl'er abg univat puvyqera 
 ur'f n zhfvpvna 
 zhfvpvnaf trg n erny wbo 
 jung q'lbh jnag 
 nu v'ir unq rirelguvat ba gur zrah hu fhecevfr zr 
  arvy 
 arvy 
  bu v nz fbeel  v'z fhccbfrq gb zrrg zl oblsevraq urer ur ybbxf whfg yvxr lbh

  yvxr zr 
 hu-uhu fbeel 
  yvxr zr ohg ubj 
 urer'f lbhe unyvohg bzryrggr fhecevfrq 
 lrf lrf v nz 
 ybbx jung v tbg sbe lbh sbe lbhe sybevqn gevc penml fuvegf jnf pybfvat 'rz bhg v tbg n qbmra sbe n ohpx 
 fnirq n sbeghar ybbx ng gung urll 
  buu 'ahzore 1 qnq' 
 lrnu

 url lbh ernql 
 nyzbfg 
 bxnl ybbx hu jura lbh'er va sybevqn pna zl pvtne thl qebc bss fbzr phonaf sbe zr ng lbhe cneragf' ubhfr 
  xenzre v'z urycvat zl cneragf zbir vagb gurve arj pbaqb v'z tbaan or ohfl 
 nj p'zba zna uryc n oebgure bhg 
  nyevtug 
 lrnuu v bjr lbh bar 
  jr'er rira 
 wreel svther guvf bhg v'z va gur pbssrr fubc naq guvf ornhgvshy tvey v pbhyq arire rira gnyx gb zvfgnxrf zr sbe ure oblsevraq 
  gung'f n avpr sbhe frpbaqf 
  v ybbx whfg yvxr uvz v zr  guvf guvf vf jung ure oblsevraq ybbxf yvxr ubj vf gung cbffvoyr 
 znlor ur unf zbarl 
  znlor ur qbrfa'g znlor ur naq v ner rknpgyl gur fnzr rkprcg sbe bar zvabe lrg pehpvny qrgnvy lbh arire xabj 
  fbzrgvzrf lbh qb 
 znlor vg'f fbzr fznyy guvat v pbhyq punatr yvxr n zbhfgnpur be jrnevat n gbc ung be n zbabpyr be nbe n pnar 
  jub'f fur qngvat ze crnahg 
  fur pbhyq qb n ybg jbefr guna ze crnahg zl sevraq 
 fb jung q'lbh jnaan frr 
  jung nobhg fnpx yhapu 
  ubj nobhg gur ratyvfu cngvrag vg'f hc sbe nyy gubfr bfpnef 
 bu p'zba oynvar v zrna ybbx ng gur cbfgre sbe fnpx yhapu 
 vg'f n snzvyl va n oebja cncre ont 
  qba'g lbh jnaan xabj ubj gurl tbg va gurer 
 ab 
  njj fbyq bhg 
  bu gjb sbe gur ratyvfu cngvrag 
 fb q'lbh guvax gurl tbg fuehax qbja be vf vg whfg n tvnag fnpx 
  hu uv huz erzrzore zr vv'z gur thl jub ybbxf yvxr arvy 
  uv 
 uhu-uv  huz vf arvy urer 
 bu ab ur tbg uryq hc ng jbex 
 bu gung'f gbb onq v xvaqn jnagrq gb zrrg uvz frrvat nf ubj jr ybbx fb fvzvyne 
 jryy lbh xabj lbh qba'g ybbx gung zhpu yvxr uvz 
  bu pbhefr abg 
 ab lbh'er n yvggyr gnyyre 
 lbh ybbx yvxr lbh'er va orggre funcr guna arvy qb lbh jbex bhg 
  yvfgra vvv qba'g zrna gb frrz sbejneq 
 ohg vf gurer nal jnl gung v pbhyq cbffvoyl unir arvy'f cubar ahzore 
  jul vf rirelbar gnyxvat nobhg "gur ratyvfu cngvrag vg'f fb ebznagvp"  tbq gung zbivr fghax 
 v xvaqn yvxrq vg 
  ab lbh qvqa'g 
 rynvar rynvar qvq lbh whfg frr gur ratyvfu cngvrag 
  qvqa'g lbh ybir vg 
 ubj pbhyq lbh abg ybir gung zbivr 
 ubj nobhg vg fhpxrq 
 gung enycu svraarf v jbhyq tvir hc zl svefgobea sbe uvz 
  uhuu trggvat gur fubeg raq bs gung fgvpx 
 wreel guvf vf qry obpn ivfgn'f arj culfvpny svgarff ebbz gurl tbg zrqvpvar onyyf lbh pna ovxr evqr nalguvat lbh jnag 
 fgnveznfgre 
 jung 
 abguva' 
  frr jung v'z jrnevat 
 bu qvq lbh trg gung bhggn zl ont 
 ab lbhe zbgure sbhaq vg fba guvf vf gur zbfg jbaqreshy naq gubhtugshy guvat lbh'ir rire qbar sbe zr 
 lbh xabj v obhtug lbh n pnqvyynp gjvpr 
 ubu urer ur vf guvf vf gur zna v jnagrq lbh gb frr vmml znaqryonhz ur'f rvtugl lrnef byq ohg fgebat nf na bk  jngpu guvf 
 frr gung lbh pbhyqa'g qb gung 
 v pbhyq ohg v pubbfr abg gb 
 url zbegl  jub'f guvf 
 guvf vf zl fba wreel sebz arj lbex  ur guvaxf ur pna yvsg zber guna vmml 
  vv qvqa'g fnl gung 
  url vmml guvf xvq fnlf ur pna yvsg zber guna lbh pna 
 lbhe xvq'f cerggl shaal zbegl fubhyq or n pbzrqvna 
  npghnyyl v nz n pbzrqvna 
 gung'f abg fb shaal 
  guvax lbh'er orggre guna zr uhu 
 vmml hfrq gb jbex bhg jvgu puneyrf ngynf va gur svsgvrf 
  rvtugrra-svsgvrf

  ze znaqryonhz v 
 p'zba p'zba chzc vg 
  nyevtug 
 lrnu jebat nggvghqr lbh'er abg oevatvat gung genfu vagb zl ubhfr 
 gurer nyevtug 
 fgrc nfvqr fgevatorna 
 v'yy fubj lbh jr'er tbaan gnxr vg hc n abgpu 
  nu zl onpx htu 
  nnnnuu 
 fbzrobql pnyy na nzohynapr 
  gurer'f nyernql na nzohynapr urer sbe zef tyvpxzna gurer'f ebbz sbe bar zber 
  bxnl bar sbe fnpx yhapu  vg'f tbbq evtug  lrnu tbbq 
  url jung'er lbh thlf qbvat urer 
 jr whfg fnj gur ratyvfu cngvrag ntnva 
 vg'f rira orggre gur frpbaq gvzr 
 gurl znxr vg ybatre 
  tbg zl hzoeryyn 
  oynvar 
 rynvar 
 v gubhtug lbh jrer ohfl gbavtug 
  jryy gb gryy lbh gur gehgu rynvar v qba'g xabj vs v pna or jvgu fbzrbar jub qbrfa'g yvxr gur ratyvfu cngvrag 
 vg'f whfg n fghcvq zbivr 
  gung'f jung v'z gnyxvat nobhg 
  pbzr ba oynvar yrg'f tb 
  rawbl fnpx yhapu 
  v jvyy 
  ubj pbhyq lbh qb gung gb ze znaqryonhz lbh fubhyq or nfunzrq bs lbhefrys 
  ur rttrq zr ba 
 lbh fubhyq or zber zngher 
 ur'f rvtugl 
  bxnl gbzbeebj wreel naq v jvyy ivfvg vmml naq ncbybtvfr abj tbbqavtug 
  lbh'er abg fyrrcvat va gung fuveg vg'f gbb gvtug 
 guvf fuveg jvyy arire yrnir zl obql 
  tbbqavtug 
  nyevtug frira-guvegl tbg gur cynpr gb zlfrys 
 wreel frvasryq cyrnfr 
 nu lbh zhfg or xenzre'f thlf  pbzr ba va lbh tbg gur pvtnef 
 jung pvtnef 
 xenzre fnvq v jnf fhccbfrq gb oevat uvz onpx fbzr phonaf 
  jr ner gur phonaf 
 lrnu uryyb wreel'f cynpr 
  gurl'er erny phonaf gurl'er uhzna orvatf sebz phon 
 v fnvq phonaf jung'q lbh guvax v zrnag 
 pvtnef 
 wreel phona pvtnef ner vyyrtny va guvf pbhagel gung'f jul v tbg gurfr thlf 
  lbh'er znxvat lbhe bja pvtnef abj 
 lrnu lrnu v tbg vairfgbef nyy yvarq hc 
  ubyq ba n frpbaq  uvln qnq 
  jub ner gurl 
 gurl'er phona pvtne ebyyref 
  qba'g gryy lbhe zbgure 
 jung vf gung ohooyvat fbhaq ner lbh znxvat lbhe gbzngb fnhpr 
 ubg naq fcvpl 
  lbh'er abg jrnevat n fuveg ner lbh 
 lrf v nz 
 jung pbybhe vf vg 
 qnza 
 lbh xabj lbh pbhyq'ir whfg tvira zr arvy'f ahzore lbhlbh qvqa'g unir gb gnxr zr bhg gb qvaare 
 v jnagrq gb tvir vg gb lbh va crefba 
  lbh xabj v qba'g unir gb or hc va gur zbeavat naq v xabj n terng oernxsnfg cynpr evtug nebhaq gur pbeare 
 qbrf arvy yvxr gb rng n ovt oernxsnfg 
  jul qba'g lbh pbzr va jr'yy gnxr nobhg vg 
  v ernyyl fubhyq trg tbvat l'xabj vv jnaan or ubzr va pnfr arvy pnyyf 
 jryy tbbqavtug 
  v'yy frr lbh 
 ebhtu avtug 
 htu lbh jbhyqa'g oryvrir vg zl oblsevraq qhzcrq zr zl sevraqf jub v qba'g rira yvxr gurl jba'g gnyx gb zr  nyy orpnhfr v qba'g yvxr gung fghcvq ratyvfu cngvrag zbivr 
 ernyyl v gubhtug vg jnf cerggl tbbq 
 bu pbzr ba tbbq jung jnf tbbq nobhg vg  gubfr frk fprarf v zrna cyrnfr tvzzr fbzrguvat v pna hfr 
  jryy v yvxrq vg 
  url lbh sbetbg nobhg zl cvrpr bs cvr uryyb  lbh xabj frk va n gho gung qbrfa'g jbex 
 guvf vf dhvgr n pbaqb 
 gur znaqryonhzf bja gur zntvp cna erfgnhenagf 
 gur percr cynpr 
 lrnu guvf vf nyy ovt percr zbarl 
  gurer'f percr zbarl 
 jung ner lbh qbvat urer 
  nj ze znaqryonhz v whfg jnagrq gb pbzr ol naq gryy lbh ubj fbeel v jnf gung lbh uheg lbhefrys 
 jung gur uryy vf gung 
 jung 
 gung fuveg lbh guvax gung lbh ner gur ahzore bar qnq 
 guvf jnf n tvsg sebz zl fba 
 bu v frr ubj vg jbexf abj  ur xabpxf zr bhggn pbzzvffvba fb  lbh pna fgehg nebhaq va lbhe snapl ahzore bar fuveg  jryy v'yy fubj lbh jub'f ahzore bar 
 ze znaqryonhz cyrnfr 
 vg'f tb gvzr 
  nuu zl onpx v pna'g zbir 
 pnyy na nzohynapr 
 v guvax v fnj bar n pbhcyn qbbef qbja 
  fb fur jnagrq lbh gb pbzr hc ohg lbh yrsg orpnhfr lbh gubhtug fbzr thl zvtug or pnyyvat lbh 
  fbzr thl fbzr thl arvy v unir tbg gb svaq bhg ubj ur pbhyq trg n tvey yvxr qnavryyr 
  trbetr lbh'ir tbg qnavryyr sbetrg nobhg arvy lbh'ir bhg-arvyrq uvz 
  fb v'z arvy ubj qvq v qb gung 
 v qba'g xabj ohg lbh orggre xrrc vg hc 
 v'z tbaan tb zrrg qnavryyr  gurer'f n arj arvy va gbja  ununun 
  v gel gb gnxr n inpngvba v pbzr onpx gur jubyr bcrengvba'f n funzoyrf  uryyb 
 url wreel ahzore bar urer qvq lbh tb frr vmml ng gur onpx fcrpvnyvfg 
 v jvyy v whfg jnyxrq va gur qbbe 
 lbh unir gb tb frr uvz 
 zn 
 uryra jvyy lbh fgbc obgurevat uvz

 ahzore bar fvtavat bss 
 wreel v whfg cvpxrq hc gur phonaf ng gur ohf fgngvba  jung'f tbvat ba

 rynvar jung'q lbh guvax 
  jryy hu npgnpghnyyl v unira'g frra vg fb v pbhyqa'g gryy lbh jurgure v yvxrq vg be jurgure vg ernyyl fhpxrq 
  lbh unira'g frra vg 
  ab 
 gung'f vg qebc rirelguvat jr'er tbvat evtug abj 
 ntnva ze znaqryonhz guvf onpx fcrpvnyvfg vf fhccbfrq gb or gur orfg fb vs gurer'f nalguvat ryfr v pna qb cyrnfr qba'g urfvgngr gb hu gel naq svaq zl ahzore 
 hu bu jnvg 
 ubj 'obhg gung uhu gur jbeyq'f terngrfg qnq zl fba znqr vg sbe zr 
  gung'f irel avpr 
 gur orfg va gur jbeyq  juvpu zrnaf v'z orggre guna whfg ahzore bar

 guvf vf frvasryq'f xvq 
 bu lbh guvax lbh'er gbhtu cvpxvat ba na byq zna  znlor lbh'q yvxr gb gel gnxvat ba fbzrobql lbhe bja ntr 
  lbh tbg nal xvqf 
 bu lbh guvax lbh'er orggre guna zr  tb nurnq cvpx bhg nalguvat va gur ebbz urer v'yy yvsg vg hc bire zl urnq 
  ybbx ab-bar vf yvsgvat nalguvat 
  gur gryrivfvba 
  bu ab 
 guvf bar'f sbe lbh cbc vg'f tb gvzr 
  buu zl onpx 
  pnyy na nzohynapr 
  jr'er nyernql va n ubfcvgny 
 njevtug cnegare yrg'f trg qbja gb ohfvarff 
  bxnl jryy hu v'yy hu v'yy trg gur phonaf 
 gurl'er evtug bhg urer 
 url urer gurl ner gur phonaf erny phonaf 
 lbh jbhyqa'g or gelvat gb fryy byq rney unssyre qbzvavpnaf va n phona jenccre abj jbhyq lbh 
  bu abj pbzr ba ybbx ng gurfr oblf vs gurl jrer nal zber phona pnfgeb jbhyq'ir fzbxrq gurz uvzfrys uhu 
  jr'er gnyxvat nobhg crbcyr evtug 
  v guvax fb

 hu qjnlar 
 trg gur uryy bhggn zl bssvpr 
  jung

  ernyyl 
 lrnu ur'f cerggl hcfrg gung v oebxr hc jvgu uvz gb tb bhg jvgu lbh 
  nu v thrff v fubjrq arvy jub'f arvy 
 ur jnagf gb trg gbtrgure gbzbeebj avtug naq unir pbssrr 
  pbssrr  v pna orng gung zbir va jvgu zr 
  jung

  naq v gubhtug v xarj jung ybir jnf 
  lhu 
  lbh nfxrq ure gb zbir va jvgu lbh 
 v tbggn fgnl bar fgrc nurnq bs arvy 
  jung vs vg'f arvy nezfgebat 
  gura v'z tbvat gb znef 
 jung vs vg'f arvy qvnzbaq 
  nj fuhg hc wreel whfg fuhg hc 
 nyevtug v tbggn tb onpx gb gur ubfcvgny 
 jung gb frr gur byq thl 
 ab v tbg vagb n guvat jvgu gur fba naq abj ur'f ynvq hc gbb 
 ubj byq'f gur fba

 jung vf jvgu guvf snzvyl

  qngvqvgnqvg 
 lbh'er pbyq 
 ab   qvgnqvqngvqng 
 fbzrguvat jebat jvgu lbhe purfg 
  qvwnqvqngwq gurer 
  jurer 
  ab ab qba'g ybbx qba'g ybbx 
 bire gurer gur qbzvavpnaf 
 nera'g gurl fhccbfrq gb or ebyyvat pvtnef 
 jryy vg qvqa'g dhvgr jbex bhg naq abj v'ir tbg abguvat sbe gurz gb qb 
 fb 
 fb v gnhtug 'rz nyy nobhg phon naq gurl ernyyl gbbx gb vg lbh xabj znekvfz gur jbexre'f eribyhgvba gur pybguvat 
 obl gurl frrz cerggl natel nobhg fbzrguvat 
  lrnu v'z n yvggyr jbeevrq jura gurer'f ab jbex naq gur crbcyr trg erfgyrff jub qb lbh guvax gurl pbzr nsgre  ry cerfvqragr 
 v fjrne gb lbh v qvqa'g xabj gurl gi jnf obygrq gb gur gnoyr 
 v org lbh chyyrq gung gevpx ba zl qnqql va sybevqn

 sbhe ubhef va guvf pubc naq v'z n shyy vapu gnyyre    tvqqlhc 
 "urngoernxre oerjonxre " url trbetr v erzrzore gung ghar trbetr trbetr hz jung'f gung gvpxvat bu bu bu bbbujb jb jb jb  [ehaf bhg] sver va gur ubyr

 lbh jnag vg onpx gur jnl vg jnf 
 lrnu gung'f evtug

 wreel lbh tbggn uryc zr v guerj zl onpx bhg 
 whfg yvr qbja 
 v nz ylvat qbja v nz genccrq haqre n shaxl znggerff v tbggn tb trg n qbpgbe be ng yrnfg pbzr bire naq ebyy guvf guvat bss bs zr 
 nyy evtug v'yy or evtug gurer pbaenq v tbggn tb 
 fgnl tb jungrire 
 url xenzre 
 jung'f tbvat ba 
 v gbyq zl puvebcenpgbe ubj fjvzzvat va gur evire znqr zl onpx urny ur erpbzzraqrq vg gb nyy uvf cngvragf 
 fgrc nfvqr 
 ur whfg fhax yvxr n fgbar 
 fve v'z fher vg'f abg n cbyvpr znggre 
 qba'g or fb fher trbetr zrff jvgu gurz naq gurl'er zrffvat jvgu lbh nyy evtug oblf fraq vg va 
 jung'f gung svther nurnq vf gung nalguvat bxnl yrg'f purpx gur qrfx gung'f jurer v urneq gur gvpxvat frnepu rnpu bar bs gubfr qenjref fgnegvat jvgu gur gbc bar fb rzcgl pnybevrf naq znyr phevbfvgl ru trbetvr 
 ybbxf yvxr gurer'f zber pbzcnegzragf haqrearngu 
 pbzcnegzragf haqrearngu gung'f cebonoyl jurer vg vf bxnl oblf yrg 're evc v'yy gryy lbh jung trbetr fgnegvat gbzbeebj ab zber qrfxf whfg yhpvgr gnoyrf naq sbhe yrfgrvaoeraare 
 url jngpu jurer lbh'er xvpxvat 
 xenzre 
 rynvar 
 v pna'g oryvrir vg url v'yy zrrg lbh ng gur pbssrr fubc 
 lrnu 
 lrnu 
 uv pbaavr wreel nebhaq 
 ab naq v cersre "pbaenq" fb v urneq jung unccrarq gb gur qrfx 
 gurer jnf fbzrguvat fb ernffhevat nobhg gung pbml yvggyr fcnpr 
 lrnu jryy jungrire frr ln' 
 nu onpx gb abezny abg onq sbe sbhe gubhfnaq ohpxf    v pna'g oryvrir v tbg gur ybj sng 
 fb znepl lbh fubhyq'ir frra zr va gur ubg gho lbqnl 
 jul 
 v jnf anxrq 
 bu trbetr 
 v fnj vg 
 ubj'q ur ybbx 
 bxnl v jbhyqa'g frr vg ntnva 
 lbh xabj n sevraq bs zvar gubhtug fur tbg yrtbaner'f qvfrnfr va gur ubg gho 
 ernyyl jung unccrarq 
 bu lnqn lnqn lnqn whfg fbzr onq rtt fnynq v'yy or evtug onpx  
 v abgvprq fur'f ovt ba gur cuenfr "lnqn lnqn" 
 vf "lnqn lnqn" onq 
 ab "lnqn lnqn" vf tbbq fur'f irel fhppvapg 
 fur vf fhppvapg 
 lrnu vg'f yvxr lbh'er qngvat hfn gbqnl  
 url 
 url trbetr lbh xabj gvz jungyrl 
 lrnu qragvfg bs gur fgnef 
 jung'f hc 
 v'yy gryy lbh jung'f hc v'z n wrj 
 rkphfr zr 
 v'z n wrj v svavfurq pbairegvat gjb qnlf ntb 
 jryy  jrypbzr nobneq 
 gunaxf 
 url jurer lbh whfg ng gur urnygu pyho 
 bu jryy v qvqa'g qb zhpu v whfg fng va gur fnhan lbh xabj vg jnf zber yvxr n wrjvfu jbexbhg v'yy frr ln  
 rynvar gur thl'f wrjvfu gjb qnlf ur'f nyernql znxvat wrjvfu wbxrf 
 fb jung jura fbzrbar gheaf gjragl-bar gurl hfhnyyl trg qehax gur svefg avtug 
 obbmr vf abg n eryvtvba 
 gryy gung gb zl sngure naljnl thrff jung orgu ybbxare pnyyrq zr 
 bbu orgu ybbxare fgvyy jnvgva' bhg ung zneevntr 
 jung ner lbh gnyxvat nobhg gung zneevntr raqrq fvk zbaguf ntb fur'f nyernql erzneevrq 
 v tbggn trg ba gung vagrearg v'z yngr ba rirelguvat 
 naljnl orgu naq ure arj uhfonaq neavr unir yvfgrq zr n ersrerapr sbe na nqbcgvba ntrapl gurl'er gelvat gb trg n onol  
 rynvar nyy evtug jub ybbxf orggre va guvf fuveg zr be zvpxrl 
 jr'er qbhoyr qngvat gbavtug naq vs jr jrne gur fnzr fuveg jr'yy ybbx yvxr vqvbgf 
 uzz ghea nebhaq  obgu fb fgevxvat 
 gryy zr nobhg vg jr whfg cvpxrq hc gjb jbzra ng gur tnc 
 ubj qvq lbh qrpvqr juvpu bar bs lbh jbhyq qngr juvpu tvey  
 fb v'z ba 3eq nirahr zvaqva' zl bja ohfvarff naq lnqn lnqn lnqn v trg n serr znffntr naq n snpvny 
 jung n fhppvapg fgbel 
 v'z fhecevfrq lbh qevir n pnqvyynp 
 bu vg'f abg zvar vg'f zl zbgure'f 
 ner lbh pybfr jvgu lbhe cneragf 
 jryy gurl tnir ovegu gb zr naq lnqn lnqn 
 lnqn jung 
 lnqn lnqn lnqn 
  v yvxr lbhe fuveg 
 bu gunax lbh vg'f 100 pbggba naq fbzr jbby 
 jryy lbh gbb frrz gb unir gur fnzr gnfgr 
 jryy v yvxr vg gbb 
 jryy v unir gur fnzr fuveg 
 lrnu jryy v'z jrneva' vg 
 v yvxr lbhe fuveg gbb 
 bu fb qb v 
 bu  
 nalguvat gb qevax fbzr jvar creuncf 
 v yvxr zreybg 
 v ybir zreybg 
 v'z penml nobhg zreybg 
 v yvir sbe zreybg 
 jr'er bhg bs zreybg 
 fb lbh hu xabj orgun naq neavr cerggl jryy 
 bu lrnu lrnu 
 qb lbh fbpvnyvmr jvgu gurz bsgra 
 lrnu jr tbg bhg gb qvaare n ybg hfhnyyl puvarfr jryy fbzrgvzrf gunv naq jr tb gb gur zbivrf neavr'f n erny svyz ohss 
 bu 
 npghnyyl v erzrzore guvf bar gvzr hz guvf vf shaal hz jr jrag gb frr gur zbivr fgevcgrnfr v qba'g xabj vs lbh'ir frra qbrfa'g znggre naljnl v jnf juvfcrevat fbzrguvat gb orgu naq neavr yrraf bire gb zr naq ur tbrf "jbhyq lbh fuhg hc" v zrna ur oneryl rira xarj zr jurer qvq ur trg nu-- ohg gurl'er avpr crbcyr  
 bu lbh'er va urer 
 jung'er lbh qbvat urer 
 v xarj lbh unq na nccbvagzrag 
 jryy guvf vf irel njxjneq 
 v'yy yrnir jura gur thl pbzrf va v tbggn gryy lbh v nz ybivat guvf lnqn lnqn guvat lbh xabj v pna pebff bire zl jubyr yvsr fgbel  
 url lbh qba'g cynl jvgu gung gung'f tbvat va zl zbhgu 
 url jung guvf guvat jurj 
 nyy evtug gung'f rabhtu abj trg tbvat trg bhggn urer  
 url gvz dhvpx dhrfgvba vf vg abezny sbe lbhe grrgu gb znxr abvfrf yvxr n uvffvat be n puvecvat 
 trbetr 
 hz 
 svar v'yy znxr na nccbvagzrag  
 nyy evtug vg vf pnivgl gvzr nu urer jr tb juvpu erzvaqf zr qvq lbh urer gur bar nobhg gur enoov naq gur snezre'f qnhtugre uhu 
 url 
 gubfr nera'g znugmnu onyyf 
 gvz qb lbh guvax lbh fubhyq or znxvat wbxrf yvxr gung 
 jul abg v'z wrjvfu erzrzore 
 v xabj ohg 
 wreel vg'f bhe frafr bs uhzbe gung fhfgnvarq hf nf n crbcyr sbe 3000 lrnef 
 5000 
 5000 rira orggre bxnl puevffvr tvir zr n fpugvpxyr bs sybhevqr 
 naq gura ur nfxrq gur nffvfgnag sbe n fpugvpxyr bs sybhevqr 
 jul ner lbh fb pbaprearq nobhg guvf 
 v'yy gryy lbh jul orpnhfr v oryvrir jungyrl pbairegrq gb whqnvfz whfg sbe gur wbxrf  
 jbhyq lbh or vagrerfgrq va n fhofpevcgvba gb gur arj lbex gvzrf 
 lrf  
 v qba'g oryvrir gung 
 vs lbh unq tbggra vagb gur onpxfrng bs gur pne jr pbhyq'ir svtherq guvf jubyr guvat bhg 
 jul jrer lbh ubyqvat gur qbbe bcra sbe 
 abg sbe lbh jub ubyqf n qbbe bcra sbe n zna 
 jryy v gubhtug vg jnf n avpr trfgher ohg v thrff v jnf jebat 
 yrg'f whfg chg gurl'er anzrf va n ung 
 v qba'g rira xabj gurve anzrf ybbx jul qba'g lbh whfg gnxr gur bar gung jnf ba gur yrsg 
 v'z abg fher fur jnf zl glcr 
 bu rirelobql'f lbhe glcr 
 jung gur uryy qbrf gung zrna 
 lbh'ir orra zneevrq guerr gvzrf 
 gung'f vg vg'f tb gvzr  
 nyy evtug gnxr vg rnfl 
 url url url 
 pbzr ba yrg uvz tb lbh jnag guebj yrg'f guebj 
 url ubyq ba n frpbaq nyy evtug ybbx v tbg na vqrn jul qba'g lbh whfg fubj hc rneyl sbe lbhe arkg qngr fvg npebff sebz rnpu bgure naq frr jub gur tveyf fvg arkg gb 
 gung'f abg onq 
 nyy evtug fb jr yrg gur tveyf qrpvqr 
 lrnu jul fubhyq jr xabpx bhefryirf bhg 
 lrnu v jnaan jrne gung fuveg arkg gvzr 
 ab ab bar jrnef gur fuveg arkg gvzr 
 gung'f evtug 'pnhfr gurl nyernql fnj vg 
 jr'yy ybbx yvxr vqvbgf  
 jryy jr jrer ratntrq gb or zneevrq hu jr obhtug gur jrqqvat vaivgngvbaf naq hu lnqn lnqn lnqn v'z fgvyy fvatyr 
 fb jung'f fur qbvat abj 
 lnqn 
 fcrnxvat bs rk'f zl byq oblsevraq pnzr bire yngr ynfg avtug naq lnqn lnqn lnqn naljnl v'z ernyyl gverq gbqnl 
 orgu neavr uv jung'f hc 
 jryy bhe nqbcgvba nccyvpngvba jnf qravrq 
 ernyyl 
 gur nqbcgvba ntrag frrzf gb srry gung neavr unf n ivbyrag grzcre 
 bu 
 fb jr'er whfg nfxvat bhe sevraqf jung gurl znl unir fnvq gb gur nqbcgvba ntrag 
 hu lbh xabj v whfg gbyq gurz jung xvaq crbcyr lbh ner naq hu lnqn lnqn lnqn gung vf vg 
 ubj lbh qbvat 
 v unir n qvfpbzsbeg va zl zbyne  
 jryy gur phegvf jul qba'g lbh pbzr va  sngure phegvf tbbq thl bu juvpu erzvaqf zr qvq lbh urne gur bar nobhg gur cbcr naq endhry jrypu ba gur yvsrobng uhu v'yy gryy lbh yngre  
 jungyrl  
 jung ner gurl qbvat urer 
 v gbyq lbh jr fubhyq'ir tbggra urer n unys ubhe rneyl 
 nyy evtug nyy evtug abj jung'er jr tbaan qb 
 nyy evtug qba'g cnavp yrg'f whfg qrpvqr abj juvpu bar qb lbh jnag 
 nyy evtug v'yy gnxr whyvr 
 v xarj lbh jnagrq ure gung'f jub v jnagrq 
 nyy evtug v'yy gnxr xnera 
 ab ab lbh guvax v'z snyyva' sbe gung v'yy gnxr xnera 
 nyy evtug juvpu bar vf whyvr  url lbh ynqvrf ybbx ybiryl gbavtug  
 fb jungyrl fnlq gb zr "url v pna znxr pngubyvp wbxrf v hfrq gb or pngubyvp" 
 lbh frr v qba'g guvax vg vf n pngubyvp wbxr v guvax vg'f zber bs n endhry jrypu wbxr jung jnf vg ab v fnvq unaq zr gur ohblf  obhlf 
 qba'g lbh frr jung jungyrl vf nsgre gbgny wbxr gryyvat vzzhavgl ur'f nyernql tbg gur gjb ovt eryvtvbaf pbirerq vs ur rire trgf cbyvfu pvgvmrafuvc gurer'yy or ab fgbccvat uvz 
 fb jung'er lbh tbaan qb 
 v guvax guvf sngure phegvf zvtug or irel vagrerfgrq gb urne jung jungyrl unf gur cbcr qbvat jvgu endhry jrypu 
  url orgu neavr vg'f rynvar hz gubhtug lbh thlf zvtug jnaan unir yhapu tvzzr n pnyy olr 
 gurl'er abg trggvat n onol fb lbh'er gnxvat gurz bhg gb yhapu 
 gubhtug vg jbhyq or avpr 
 cbbe orgu 
 url neavr'f whfg nf hcfrg 
 bu fperj uvz  
 yvfgra gb guvf znepl pbzrf hc naq fur gryyf zr ure rk-oblsevraq jnf bire yngr ynfg avtug naq "lnqn lnqn lnqn v'z ernyyl gverq gbqnl" lbh qba'g guvax fur lnqn lnqn'q frk 
  v'ir lnqn lnqn'q frk 
 ernyyl 
 lrnu v zrg guvf ynjlre jr jrag bhg gb qvaare v unq gur ybofgre ovfx jr jrag onpx gb zl cynpr lnqn lnqn lnqn v arire urneq sebz uvz ntnva 
 ohg lbh lnqn lnqn'q bire gur orfg cneg 
 ab v zragvbarq gur ovfx 
 jryy v tbggn qb fbzrguva'  
 jryy v tbggn qb fbzrguva' 
 trbetr vf nyernql va gurer 
  ab zvpxrl naq v jr pna'g jbex vg bhg lbh xabj v'z guvaxvat bs nfxvat gung xnera bhg ol zlfrys 
 v gubhtug lbh jrer yrnavat gbjneqf whyvr 
 v jnf ohg gur bar v gubhtug jnf whyvr ghearq bhg gb or xnera 
 jryy vg jnf n uryyhin lnqn lnqn 
 ur'f zbivat gb frnggyr jr jnagrq gb fnl tbbqolr v jnf whfg trggvat bhg bs gur fubjre naq lnqn lnqn lnqn-- 
 nyy evtug rabhtu rabhtu sebz abj ba ab zber lnqn lnqn'f whfg tvir zr gur shyy fgbel 
 bxnl 
 gryy zr nobhg gur serr snpvny 
 bxnl jryy yvxr v fnvq v jnf ba 3eq nirahr naq v fgbccrq ol n ynetr qrcnegzrag fgber 
 juvpu bar 
 oybbzvatqnyr'f 
 irel tbbq tb ba 
 bu naq v fgbyr n cvntrg jngpu 
 jung'f gung 
 naq gura v jnf ba fhpu n uvtu gung v jrag hcfgnvef gb gur fnyba ba gur svsgu sybbe naq tbg n znffntr naq snpvny naq fxvccrq bhg ba gur ovyy 
 fubcyvsgvat 
 jryy jung nobhg lbh lbh gbyq zr gung lbh jrer ratntrq jung jnf gur erfg bs gung  
 rkphfr zr zbgure 
 fvfgre 
 fvfgre evtug qb lbh xabj jura sngure phegvf unf bssvpr ubhef 
 jryy abg hagvy gbzbeebj 
 uzz v ernyyl arrq gb fcrnx jvgu uvz 
 gung'f n xarryre 
 bu  
 gryy zr lbhe fvaf zl fba 
 jryy v fubhyq gryy lbh gung v'z wrjvfu 
 gung'f ab fva 
 bu tbbq naljnl v jnagrq gb gnyx gb lbh nobhg qe jungyrl v unir n fhfcvpvba gung ur'f pbairegrq gb whqnvfz whfg sbe gur wbxrf 
 naq guvf bssraqf lbh nf n wrjvfu crefba 
 ab vg bssraqf zr nf n pbzrqvna naq vg'yy vagrerfg lbh gung ur'f nyfb gryyvat pngubyvp wbxrf 
 jryy 
 naq gurl'er byq wbxrf v zrna gur cbcr naq endhry jrypu va n yvsrobng 
 v unira'g urneq gung bar 
 bu v'z fher lbh unir gurl'er bhg ba gur bprna naq lnqn lnqn lnqn naq fur fnlf "gubfr nera'g ohblf"  sngure 
 bar frpbaq jryy vs vg jbhyq znxr lbh srry orggre v pbhyq fcrnx gb qe jungyrl v unir gb tb onpx naq unir n jvfqbz grrgu erzbirq 
 lbh xabj gur qvssrerapr orgjrra n qragvfg naq n fnqvfg qba'g lbh

 arjre zntnmvarf 
 abj vs lbh'yy rkphfr zr  
 wreel v tbggn gnyx gb lbh

 uv xenzre 
 tbg n zvahgr 
 hu npghnyyl zl cneragf ner bire ohg jbhyq lbh yvxr gb zrrg gurz 
 fher 
  zbz qnq 
 uv 
 rynvar v unir gb nfx lbh fbzrguvat jung rknpgyl unccrarq qbja gurer 
 jryy v qba'g xabj v zrna v gnyxrq gb uvz naq oynu oynu oynu ur nfxrq nobhg lbh thlf naq qn qn qn qn qn zber dhrfgvbaf oyru oyru oyru 
 nyy evtug fuhg hc 
 ntnva lbh ner gryyvat zr gb fuhg hc 
 jung 
 lbh lryyrq gung gvzr ng gur zbivrf gung'f jul lbh'er abg trggvat gur onol 
 bu zl tbq ubj nz v tbaan gryy orgu 
 ybbx v'yy tb qbja naq gnyx gb guvf nqbcgvba thl naq v'yy znxr fher gung vg nyy trgf jbexrq bhg 
 nyy evtug whfg qba'g fperj vg hc guvf gvzr  
 frr ntnva jvgu gur lryyvat abg n sna bs gur lryyvat 
  bu ner lbh nobhg qbar 
 v'z whfg trggvat jnezrq hc orpnhfr v'z whfg n fnqvfg jvgu arjre zntnmvarf 
 uhu 
 sngure phegvf gbyq zr nobhg lbhe yvggyr wbxr 
 jung nobhg nyy lbhe wrjvfu wbxrf 
 v'z wrjvfu lbh'er abg n qragvfg lbh unir ab vqrn jung zl crbcyr unir orra guebhtu 
 gur wrjf 
 ab gur qragvfgf lbh xabj jr unir gur uvturfg fhvpvqr engr bs nal cebsrffvba 
 vf gung jul vg'f fb uneq gb trg na nccbvagzrag 
 fb v'yy hu nyy evtug  
 qngr jvgu xnera 
 ab whyvr fur'f gur bar 
 jung unccrarq gb xnera 
 jryy zvpxrl naq ure unir n ybg zber va pbzzba lbh xabj ure cneragf ner yvggyr crbcyr 
 bu fznyy jbeyq fb yvggyr crbcyr pna unir abg yvggyr crbcyr puvyqera 
 bu lrnu naq ivpr irefn zbgure angher'f n znq fpvragvfg wreel 
 fb lbh jba'g oryvrir jung unccrarq jvgu jungyrl gbqnl vg tbg onpx gb uvzr gung v znqr guvf yvggyr qragvfg wbxr naq ur tbg nyy bssraqrq gubfr crbcyr pna or fb gbhpul 
 gubfr crbcyr yvfgra gb lbhefrys 
 jung 
 lbh guvax gung qragvfgf ner fb qvssrerag sebz zr naq lbh gurl pnzr gb guvf pbhagel whfg yvxr rirelobql ryfr va frnepu bs n qernz 
 xenzre ur'f whfg n qragvfg 
 lrnu naq lbh'er na nagv-qragvgr 
 v nz abg na nagv-qragvgr 
 lbh'er n enovq nagv-qragvgr bu vg fgnegf jvgu n srj wbxrf naq fbzr fyhef "url qragl" arkg guvat lbh xabj lbh'er fnlvat gurl fubhyq unir gurve bja fpubbyf 
 gurl qb unir gurve bja fpubbyf 
 lrnu 
 bar yvggyr onol jungrire lbh unir va fgbpx 
 zvff orarf 
 ybbx vg ybbx vg elna gurfr crbcyr ner trggva' n onol crevbq abj jr pna qb guvf gur rnfl jnl be jr pna qb guvf gur sha jnl 
 wreel v'z fbeel gb obgure lbh ohg lbh nyjnlf fnvq lbh'q or gurer sbe zr 
 jryy jung'f jebat 
 v'z guvaxvat bs yrnivat neavr 
 gnyx gb zr 
 ur zrg jvgu rynvar naq v nfxrq uvz jung unccrarq naq ur lnqn lnqn'q zr v zrna pbhyq ur or univat na nssnve 
 jryy v jbhyqa'g chg nalguvat cnfg nalobql 
 ohg jr whfg tbg zneevrq 
 jryy boivbhfyl gung jnf n zvfgnxr lbh arrq gb sbetrg nobhg neavr gur vzcbegnag guvat vf lbh'er zbivat ba 
 jul jbhyq rynvar qb gung gb zr 
 sbetrg nobhg rynvar yrg'f whfg sbphf ba hf pbzr ba ovt uht  
 url wreel jurer'f xenzre v'ir tbg rkpvgvat arjf 
 v'z xvaqn va gur zvqqyr bs fbzrguvat 
 xnera naq v ner trggvat zneevrq 
 bu pbatenghyngvbaf ure zneevntr whfg sryy ncneg 
  ubj znal vf gung sbe lbh 
 gjb 
 lbh'er n yvtugjrvtug pbzr ba ubarl 
 url wreel jung ner lbh qbvat urer jvgu orgu 
 orgu naq neavr oebxr hc 
 fb gurl qba'g jnag n onol 
  css 
  v guvax v'z tbaan or fvpx  
 url jurer'f znepl 
 fur hu jrag fubccvat sbe fbzr fubrf sbe gur jrqqvat naq lnqn lnqn lnqn v'yy frr ure va fvk gb rvtug zbaguf  
 url xenzre bire urer 
 v whfg nffhzr abg fvg arkg gb lbh 
 xenzre bu ybbx gurer'f zvpxrl naq uvf cneragf 
 avpr ybbxvat snzvyl 
 irel unaqfbzr 
  ubj ln qbvat 
 url xenzre 
 bu zvpxrl rkphfr zr v pna'g gnxr guvf  
 uv ze noobgg 
 gung'f qe noobgg qqf gvz jungyrl jnf bar bs zl fghqragf naq vs guvf jnfa'g zl fba'f jrqqvat qnl v'q xabpx lbh grrgu bhg lbh nagv-qragvgr onfgneq 
 jung jnf gung nyy nobhg 
 bu v fnvq fbzrguvat nobhg qragvfgf naq vg tbg oybja nyy bhg bs cebcbegvba 
 url jung qb lbh pnyy n qbpgbe jub snvyf bhg bs zrq fpubby 
 jung 
 n qragvfg  
 gung'f n tbbq bar qragvfgf 
 lrnu jub arrqf 'rz abg gb zragvba gur oynpxf naq gur wrjf  
 jurer'f orgu 
 fur jrag bhg gb trg ure urnq funirq 
 jr ner tngurerq ure gbqnl gb havgr guvf pbhcyr va ubyl zngevzbal 
 gubfr jvfqbz grrgu ner gbhtu gb trg bhg 
 zneevntr vf abg na vagreiragvba gb or ragrerq yvtugyl lnqn lnqn lnqn v cebabhapr lbh zna naq jvsr  
  v ernyyl jnagrq lbh 
 hu rkphfr zr 
 or jvgu lbh va n zvahgr  ab lbh fubhyqn pbzr ynfg avtug vg jnf sha 
 huz v whfg unir n dhrfgvba 
  v xabj gur znetnevgnf va gung cynpr ner fb fgebat 
  uryybb v'q yvxr gb ohl gurfr uvenpuvf 
  fb jung ryfr vf tbva' ba 
  url 
 yvfgra v'yy pnyy lbh onpx  lrf jung pna v qb sbe lbh 
  abguvat lbh whfg ybfg n phfgbzre 
 ernql gb tb v qba'g jnaan zvff gur cerivrjf 
 zr arvgure v ybir gur cerivrjf va snpg v rawbl orvat va gur gurnger phg hc ynfg jrrx nsgre n cerivrj v lryyrq bhg 'zhfg zvff' 
 v guvax gung v jnf va gung gurnger gung gung jnf ernyyl shaal 
 lrnu vg tbg n tbbq ynhtu yrg zr whfg purpx zl zrffntrf orsber jr tb 
 fb lbh'er ba gur fcrrq qvny 
 nsgre gjb qngrf 
 jung ahzore 
 frira 
 jun lbh xabj vg'f n cnva gb punatr gung lbh tbggn yvsg hc gung cynfgvp guvat jvgu n cra 
 hu url ohqql 
 url 
 vg nyy evtug vs v xrrc gurfr urer sbe n juvyr v'z univat n arj lrne'f rir cnegl 
 lbh'er tbaan xrrc gurfr urer sbe rvtug zbaguf 
 ab wreel arj lrne'f rir avargrra avargl-avar gur zvyyraavhz v gbyq lbh nobhg gung 
 xenzre lbh'er tbaan yrnir gurfr punvef urer sbe gjb naq n unys lrnef 
 lbh'er abg tbaan frr 'rz v tbg n pnfr bs cnegl cbccref v'z tbaan xrrc va sebag bs 'rz 
 url fb trg guvf v trg n pnyy guvf zbeavat sebz bar bs gur zrgf sebag bssvpr thlf gurl jnaan gnxr zr bhg gb yhapu 
 jung sbe 
  v'z ba n jvaavat onyy pyho wreel gurl cebonoyl jnaan cvpx zl oenvaf 
 ernyyl jul q'lbh guvax gurl'er gnxvat lbh bhg gb yhapu 
  v unir ab vqrn 
 nyevtug v unir unq vg jvgu gubfr znlnaf 
 v qba'g zvaq gur znlnaf 
  lbh xabj gung fgber chghznlb  v jnf gelvat gb ohl gurfr uvenpuvf evtug naq gur fnyrfjbzna whfg pbzcyrgryl vtaberq zr 
 jung jr gnyxvat uvenpuvf v xabj n terng fgber sbe uvenpuvf 
 ab ab abg chghznlb 
 ab ab pvadb qr znlb  lrnu znepryyvab ur ghearq zr ba gb vg naq ur'f bar fvkgl-sbhegu znlna 
  lbh xabj v'z fgnegvat gb trg n yvggyr areibhf nobhg guvf yhapu 
 jung'q lbh unir 
 lrnu v'z tbaan xrrc gurfr urer gbb uhu gurl'yy or nyevtug  
 xenzre gurfr onyybbaf nera'g tbaan fgnl svyyrq gvyy arj lrne'f 
  jryy gubfr nera'g sbe arj lrne'f gubfr ner zl rirelqnl onyybbaf 
 trbetr jr'yy or oyhag gur zrgf arrq fbzrobql gb urnq hc fpbhgvat naq jr guvax gung fbzrbar zvtug or lbh 
  urnq bs fpbhgvat 
 vagrerfgrq 
  v'z fgvyy urer 
 abj hasbeghangryl yrnthr ehyrf cerirag hf sebz znxvat lbh na bssre juvyr lbh'er fgvyy haqre pbagenpg 
 lbh haqrefgnaq jung jr'er gnyxvat nobhg 
 fb lbh'er gnyxvat 
 ab ab 
 jr'er *abg* gnyxvat jr'er whfg gnyxvat 
 fb lbh arrq zr gb trg sverq 
 jr qvqa'g fnl gung 
 jr pbhyqa'g fnl gung orpnhfr rira vs jr qvq 
 jr pbhyqa'g fnl gung jr fnvq vg 
 lbh frr jung jr'er fnlvat 
  lbh ner fgvyy cnlvat sbe guvf yhapu 
  jr qvqa'g fnl gung 
 uv fbeel v'z yngr gurer'f n ybggn punvef naq onyybbaf va zl ncnegzrag ubj 'obhg v znxr vg hc gb lbh jvgu qvaare 
  fbzrcynpr avpr guvf gvzr 
 lrnu v'z fbeel nobhg gung zbatbyvna oneorphr ynfg avtug v'q urneq tbbq guvatf 
  v qba'g xabj tbg n gjb va mntng'f 
 yrzzr whfg purpx zl zrffntrf  znlor n avpre tvey pnyyrq 
 uryyb 
 uryyb jub'f guvf 
 wnar jung ahzore qvq lbh qvny 
 frira 
 url frr gurfr  pvadb qr znlb fnyrf pbzzvffvba olr-olr-b  
  zrrg gur zrgf 
 zrrg gur zrgf pbzr ba va naq terrg gur zrgf 
 tbbq zrrgvat 
 gurer jnf ab zrrgvat  ohg vg jnf dhvgr n zrrgvat lbh ner ybbxvat ng gur arkg qverpgbe bs zrgf fpbhgvat gur bayl guvat vf v unir gb trg sverq sebz gur lnaxrrf svefg 
 lbh pna qb gung 
 bs pbhefr ohg v ernyyl jnaan yrnir zl znex guvf gvzr lbh xabj hu v jnaan jnyx njnl sebz gur lnaxrrf jvgu crbcyr fnlvat 'jbj abj gung thl tbg pnaarq' 
 fb lbh jnag gb tb bhg va n svany oynmr bs vapbzcrgrapr 
 ruu  erzrzore gung fhzzre ng qnvel dhrra jurer v pbbyrq zl srrg va gur fbsg-freir znpuvar 
 lbh guvax crbcyr jvyy fgvyy or hfvat ancxvaf va gur lrne gjb-gubhfnaq be vf guvf zbhgu-inphhz guvat sbe erny 
 fb trbetr 
 lrnu 
  v unq yvxr n fb-fb qngr jvgu inyrevr abj v'z ahzore avar ba gur fcrrq-qvny 
 fb 
 fb v hfrq gb or frira v qebccrq gjb fcbgf 
 jung fur'f enaxvat lbh 
 lrnu guvf fcrrq-qvny'f yvxr n eryngvbafuvc onebzrgre 
 jung vf n onebzrgre rknpgyl 
 vg'f cebabhaprq gurezbzrgre 
 lbh xabj va gur lrne gjb-gubhfnaq jr'yy nyy or ba fcrrq-qvny lbh'yy whfg unir gb guvax bs n crefba gurl'yy or gnyxvat gb lbh vg'yy or yvxr jhc  trggvat n pnyy urer 
  url vg'f arjzna  url ubj lbh qbvat arjzna 
  bu lbh jnaan gnyx gb wreel 
  bu sybjref lbh qvqa'g unir gb qb gung v zrna gur qvaare naq gur cynl naq gur unafbz pno evqr 
 jryy v whfg jnagrq gb  lbh sbetbg gur tvsg pregvsvpngr gb onearf naq aboyr 
 bu 
  lbh xabj znxr n tbbq vzcerffvba 
 v'z tbaan tb chg gurfr va fbzr jngre 
 v yvxr gur jnl lbh guvax 
 bu zl tbq ahzore bar frvasryq lbh zntavsvprag onfgneq 
 fbeel v'z yngr ohg ybbx jung v sbhaq va gur lnaxrr unyy bs cevqr qvfcynl pnfr 
 vfa'g gung onor ehgu'f havsbez 
 vf vg  
 uhu fgenjoreevrf nalbar  nu gung'f tbbq bbu whvpl guvf gvzr bs lrne 
 tbggn trg gur tbbq barf 
 bu gung'f onq gung'f onq 
 fb wreel zl zvyyraavhz cnegl'f ernyyl pbzvat gbtrgure jvyy crbcyr or noyr gb oerngur haqrejngre va gur lrne gjb-gubhfnaq 
 fbzr bs hf 
  v qba'g jnaan rkpyhqr nalobql 
 ubyn 
 fubir vg 
 jung vf nyy guvf 
 v tbg nyy guvf whax ng pvadb qr znlb orpnhfr v jnf gelvat gb fubj chghznlb ubj zhpu ohfvarff gurl'q ybfg v zrna v orra qnapvat  naq fgehggvat va sebag bs gurve fgber sbe gjb qnlf 
 nu ab jbaqre jr'er trggvat fb zhpu enva 
 rynvar v'z univat n zvyyraavhz cnegl fb fnir gur qngr 
 url lbh xabj jung arjzna frag zr na vaivgngvba nyernql gb uvf cnegl 
 arjzna 
 lrnu 
  pbzr pryroengr gur zvyyraavhz jvgu arjznaavha arjzna 
 uv inyrevr 
 lbh'er abg inyrevr 
 v'z ure fgrc-zbgure qevir 
 vg'f gnxra zr guvegrra lrnef gb pyvzo hc gb gur gbc bs gung fcrrq-qvny naq v qba'g vagraq gb ybfr zl fcbg gb lbh 
 ohg v arire 
  lbh whfg fgnl njnl sebz gung cubar 
 lbh jnagrq gb frr zr fve 
 v urneq nobhg jung unccrarq ng gur zrrgvat guvf zbeavat 
 bu lrf v nyernql cnpxrq hc zl qrfx fve v pna or bhggn urer va na ubhe 
 naq v unir gb gryy lbh vg'f rknpgyl jung guvf betnavfngvba arrqrq 
 jr jnaan ybbx gb gur shgher jr tbggn grne qbja gur cnfg onor ehgu jnf abguvat zber guna n sng byq zna jvgu yvggyr-tvey yrtf naq urer'f fbzrguvat v whfg sbhaq bhg erpragyl ur jnfa'g ernyyl n fhygna nu jung q'lbh znxr bs gung url purpx guvf bhg  ybh truevt'f cnagf abg n onq svg  url lbh qba'g guvax gung areir qvfrnfr bs uvf jnf pbagntvbhf qb lbh hu v orggre gnxr 'rz bss v'z gbb vzcbegnag gb guvf grnz  ovt fgrva pna'g or sybccvat naq gjvgpuvat 
 url ubj 'obhg fbzr yhapu jung'er lbh tbvat sbe 
 lbh xabj hu inyrevr v hu pbhyqa'g uryc ohg abgvpr gung v'z ba lbhe fcrrq-qvny 
 lbh qrfreir vg 
 ohg v pna'g uryc guvaxvat gung znlor gurer'f fbzrbar va lbhe yvsr jub qrfreirf vg zber fbzrbar lbh'ir xabja lbh xabj zber guna n jrrx 
 zl fgrczbgure tbg gb lbh qvqa'g fur 
 jung ab 
 hhu v pna'g oryvrir fur qvq guvf ntnva gung'f vg fur'f bss gur fcrrq-qvny pbzcyrgryl 
 lvxrf 
 jryy v whfg tbg lbhe vaivgngvba gb gur arjznaavha cnegl 
 lbh whfg tbg vg qnza gur znvy vf fybj 
  lbh xarj v jnf univat n zvyyraavhz cnegl ohg lbh whfg unq gb guebj lbhef ba gur fnzr qnl 
 v unir qbar abguvat harguvpny 
 lrnu jryy lbh'er tbaan unir gb pnapry vg orpnhfr v'ir gbyq rirelobql nobhg zl cnegl 
 pnapry  guvax ntnva ybatfunaxf v fgnegrq cynaavat guvf va avargrra friragl-rvtug v chg n qrcbfvg qbja ba gung eribyivat erfgnhenag gung bireybbxf gvzrf fdhner naq v obbxrq puevfgbcure pebff 
  jryy jung nz v tbaan qb v tbg bire gjb uhaqerq sbyqvat punvef naq dhvgr n ovg bs vpr 
  jung xvaq 
 phorq 
 gung'f tbbq fghss naq lbh pna arire unir gbb zhpu vpr nyevtug v'yy gryy lbh jung v'yy qb lbh pna pb-ubfg gur cnegl jvgu zr haqre bar pbaqvgvba ab wreel wreel vf abg vaivgrq 
 v tbggn vaivgr wreel ur'f zl ohqql 
 gung ur znl or ohg ur'f bhggn zl yvsr fgnegvat va gur lrne gjb-gubhfnaq sbe zr gur arkg zvyyraavhz zhfg or wreel-serr 
 ubj pbhyq gurl abg sver lbh 
 arire gubhtug v'q snvy ng snvyvat 
 nj pbzr ba gurer abj 
  srry yvxr v pna'g qb nalguvat jebat 
 abafrafr lbh qb rirelguvat jebat 
  rirelguvat 
 rirelguvat 
 lbh ernyyl guvax fb 
 nofbyhgryl v unir ab pbasvqrapr va lbh 
 nyevtug v thrff v whfg unir gb cvpx zlfrys hc qhfg zlfrys bss naq guebj zlfrys evtug onpx qbja ntnva 
 gung'f gur fcvevg lbh fhpx 
  v xabj 
 ab ab ab ab yvfgra gb zr v jbex va snfuvba gbtrgure jr pna qevir chghznlb bhggn ohfvarff naq znxr pvadb qr znlb ahzreb hab qr znlb 
 qb lbh arrq fbzr uryc jvgu fbzrguvat 
  lbh jung'er lbh qbvat urer 
 v bja guvf fgber 
 ab lbh qba'g lbh bja chghznlb hayrff lbh bja obgu fgberf  
 v'z tynqlf znlb 
 nu guvf ernyyl fgvpxf va zl penj 
 jryy zef unzvygba vg'f pregnvayl avpr gung lbh naq inyrevr cngpurq guvatf hc fb jr pbhyq nyy trg gbtrgure yvxr guvf jurer vf inyrevr 
 v'z fher fur'yy or nybat  unir fbzr jvar wrebzr 
 bxnl 
 lbh xabj wrebzr v pna haqrefgnaq jung inyrevr frrf va lbh fb nggenpgvir fb fgebat fb pbzrqvp 
 hu tbbq 
 wrebzr v unir n qryvpvbhfyl anhtugl vqrn 
  jung 
 jul qba'g v chg lbh ba zl fcrrq-qvny 
 v qba'g xabj zef unzvygba gung qbrfa'g fbhaq 
 qba'g or fhpu n puvyq wrebzr ubj'f ahzore guerr fbhaq 
 inyrevr'f abg pbzvat bire vf fur 
 frira sbhe 
 ab 
 gjb 
 fgbc fgbc guvf vfa'g evtug jung nobhg inyrevr 
 v jba'g gryy vs lbh qba'g 
  jhuu 
 wreel arjzna gjb-gubhfnaq 
  arjznaavha 
  wreel 
 nyevtug lnaxrrf gjb bevbyrf abguvat jnvg n zvahgr n fubeg fgbpxl onyq zna vf fgernxvat npebff gur svryq 
 bu zl tbq trbetr 
 purpx gung ur'f abg fgernxvat ur'f jrnevat n syrfu-gbar obql-fgbpxvat nccneragyl ur'f n ovg onfushy naq bqqyl ab-bar frrzf hcfrg 
 xenzre ybbx vg'f trbetr 
 rirelbar ybirf uvz 
 lrnu lrnu v xabj  yvfgra wreel v pna'g yrg lbh pbzr gb zl arj lrne'f cnegl 
  svar 
  v zrna vg'f xvyyvat zr arjzna'f tbg gur whzc ba gur vaivgrf naq jvyy pehfu zr vs v gel gb tb vg nybar 
  ab ceboyrz 
  lbh'er evtug v jba'g qb vg jvgubhg lbh v srry fb nfunzrq v rira gubhtug bs vg uhu 
  rynvar lbh pna'g tb gb arjzna'f arjznaavha 
  bxnl 
 ab ab ab lbh tbggn fcraq arj lrne'f avargrra avargl-avar jvgu zr naq wreel 
  svar 
  bu pbzr ba 
  nyevtug 
  lrfff nyevtug fb vg'f lbh vg'f zr naq vg'f wreel uhu  lrnu abj guvatf ner fgnegvat gb fabjonyy uhu v'yy gryy arjzna v qba'g arrq uvz fb v'yy hu frr lbh gjb va gur gjragl-svefg praghel 
  bxnl xenzre xenzre jnvg n zvahgr qb lbh fgvyy unir gung cevpvat-tha 
 lrnu 
 bxnl v arrq lbh gb uryc zr chg chghznlb bhggn ohfvarff 
 pna qb 
 jung'er lbh qbvat jvgu n cevpvat-tha 
 gung cynpr vf nobhg gb unir gur fnyr bs gur praghel abguvat bire avargl-avar pragf 
  fgvyy n evc-bss 
 uryyb 
 wreel v jnf whfg ng zl fgrczbz'f ubhfr naq v fnj gung lbh jrer ba ure fcrrq-qvny 
 hu jryy fur hu cebonoyl whfg jnagrq gb or noyr gb xrrc gnof ba lbh 
 ubyq ba n frpbaq 
 uryyb 
  uv wrebzr 
 bu zef unzvygba guvf vf n irel onq gvzr v'ir tbg inyrevr ba gur bgure yvar whfg n frpbaq 
 uryyb 
 gung'f ure ba gur bgure yvar vfa'g vg 
 jryy 
 gryy ure v qba'g jnag lbh ba ure fcrrq-qvny 
 unat ba 
 fur xabjf nobhg gur fcrrq-qvny zef unzvygba lbh tbggn trg zr bss guvf guvat 
 v jba'g hagvy fur chgf zr onpx ba uref 
 unat ba 
 fur jnagf gb or onpx ba lbhef 
 svar ohg bayl vs lbh'er bss uref 
 unat ba 
 svar vs v'z bss lbhef 
 ab fgvyy zr 
 fbeel unat ba 
 svar vs v'z bss lbhef 
 v jba'g qb vg vg'f zl fcrrq-qvny naq v qba'g gehfg ure 
 cyrnfr zef unzvygba guvf vf irel njxjneq sbe zr 
  nyevtug v'yy uvqr lbh va bar bs gur rzretrapl ohggbaf 
  terng olr 
 fur fnvq fur'yy qb vg 
 terng 
 unat ba 
 uryyb 
 wreel v pna'g trg sverq 
 url obql-fhvg zna 'f hc 
  url obql-fhvg zna 
 uv v'z ur craalcnpxre v'z n jrnygul nzrevpna vaqhfgevnyvfg hu ybbxvat gb bcra n fvyire zvar va gur zbhagnvaf bs creh naq hu orsber v vairfg zvyyvbaf va n yhpengvir zvar v v'q yvxr gb tb n yvggyr angvir hu trg gur srry bs gurve pbaqvzragf bs gurve hazragvbanoyrf lbh xabj gur erny hu tevggl-tevggl 
 jryy yrzzr fubj lbh jung jr unir 
 jryy hu v guvax v pna whfg oebjfr nebhaq ba zl bja 
  uzz znppuh cvppuh ner gurfr serr 
 lrnu 
 uzz-zzz 
 fbzr bs gubfr ner jbzra'f pybgurf 
 bu abg n ceboyrz 
 nggragvba fgrvaoeraare naq sebag-bssvpr zbebaf lbhe gevhzcuf zrna abguvat lbh nyy fgvax lbh pna fvg ba vg naq ebgngr guvf vf trbetr pbfgnamn v srne ab ercevfny rkgrafvba svir-bar-frira-bu 
 y'bpphcnqb 
 pbzr ba jung vf gnxvat lbh fb ybat 
 rynvar v oebxr gur cevpr-tha fb v unq gb zbir gb cyna o 
 cyna o gurer vf ab cyna o 
  v gbbx gurfr bhg bs rirel fvatyr tnezrag va gur fgber 
 jung 
 gurl'er qrffvpngrf frr gurl nofbeo zbvfgher  gurfr pybgurf jba'g ynfg svir lrnef jvgubhg 'rz 
 gung'f abg tbaan qb nalguvat 
 cngvrapr 
 nyevtug sbetrg vg 
 jung 
 lbh unir fperjrq zr ntnva craalcnpxre 
 ynqvrf pner sbe fbzr puvcf 
  jryy v qba'g zvaq vs v qb 
 jryy v'ir hu v'ir punatrq zl zvaq v guvax v'z tbvat gb ohvyq n ebyyrepbnfgre vafgrnq 
 v urneq jung lbh qvq va gur cnexvat ybg ovt obl naq vg vf va-rkphfr-n-ohyy lbh crefbanyyl vafhygrq zr zl fgnss v pnaabg oryvrir gung lbh obql-fhvg zna pbhyq crecrgengr fhpu n qvfyblnygl oernxf zl urneg gb fnl vg bu jub nz v xvqqvat v ybir vg lbh'er sv 
 jnvg jnvg ze fgrvaoeraare trbetr qbrfa'g qrfreir nal bs gur oynzr sbe jung unccrarq va gur cnexvat ybg gbqnl fve vs gurer'f nalbar gb oynzr urer vg'f zr 
 jung'er lbh gnyxvat nobhg jvyuryz lbh cbccvat cvyyf lbh tbg gur penmvrf ntnva 
 ab ab ab ab fve v beqrerq trbetr gb qevir nebhaq vafhygvat crbcyr gbqnl orpnhfr v'z gverq bs nyy lbhe znpub urnq tnzrf 
  ur'f ylvat fve v'z gverq bs nyy lbhe znpub urnq tnzrf 
 znpub urnq tnzrf 
  ur'f whfg orvat yblny gb zr fve 
 jvyuryz lbh'er sverq v bjr lbh na ncbybtl obql-fhvg zna fgernx ba  abj vs lbh tragyrzra'yy rkphfr zr v'z abg tbvat gb gur tnzr gbqnl v'z tbaan tb bhgfvqr naq fpnyc fbzr gvpxrgf  bjare'f obk gung'f tbggn oevat va sbegl ohpxf ab ceboyrz 
 ze jvyuryz jung jnf gung 
 v jnagrq gb trg sverq trbetr lbh ner ybbxvat ng gur arj urnq fpbhg bs gur arj lbex zrgf 
  zrrg gur zrgf zrrg gur zrgf pbzr evtug bhg naq terrg gur zrgf 
 v qba'g xabj jung rynvar vf fb hcfrg nobhg v zrna jvgubhg qrffvpngrf gubfr pybgurf'yy or abgvprnoyl zhfgl va svir lrnef 
 fur arire frrf gur ovt cvpgher 
 uryyb arjzna 
 uryyb wreel  jung qvq lbh fnl gb rynvar v whfg tbg ure pnapryyngvba va gur znvy 
 bu jryy v thrff fur sbhaq fbzr cynpr orggre gb tb 
 jryy vg'f ure zvfgnxr orpnhfr fur vf tbvat gb zvff gur cnegl bs n yvsrgvzr 
 jryy znlor fb ohg pbzr zvqavtug jura fur'f ybbxvat sbe fbzrbar jnez naq phqqyl gb xvff v thrff lbh'yy or pnhtug orgjrra gur zbba naq arj lbex pvgl 
 nyevtug pbzr onpx gb zl cnegl cyrnfr 
 wreel gbb bs pbhefr 
  lbh qba'g jnaan qb lbhe npg be nalguvat qb lbh 
 ab 
 nyevtug gura v thrff v pna npprcg n yvggyr wreel vs vg trgf zr n  ybg bs rynvar 
 qrny 
 gb gur arjznaavha  
  gb gur xenzraavhz 
 ol gur jnl arjzna v'z whfg phevbhf jura lbh obbxrq gur ubgry qvq lbh obbx vg sbe gur zvyyraavhz arj lrne 
  nf n znggre bs snpg v qvq 
 bu gung'f vagrerfgvat orpnhfr nf rirelbar xabjf fvapr gurer jnf ab lrne mreb gur zvyyraavhz qbrfa'g ortva hagvy gur lrne gjb-gubhfnaq naq bar juvpu jbhyq znxr lbhe cnegl bar lrne yngr naq guhf dhvgr ynzr 
 njj 
 v qba'g srry jryy ng nyy v srry nyy qevrq-bhg vafvqr 
 v'yy pnyy sbe uryc 
 uryyb 
 jub'f guvf 
 vg'f wreel jub'f guvf 
 hu vg'f inyrevr 
 bu uv inyrevr jung'f hc 
 v'yy gryy lbh jung'f hc zl fgrczbgure vf ivbyragyl vyy fb v uvg gur ohggba sbe cbvfba pbageby naq v trg lbh 
 jbj cbvfba pbageby gung'f rira uvture guna ahzore bar 
 uryyb 
 unat ba whfg yrg zr cvpx hc n cncre 
 rkphfr zr jbhyq lbh zvaq jngpuvat zl ont sbe n zvahgr 
 lrnu ab ceboyrz 
 yrg'f tb 
 jbnu v tbggn jngpu guvf thl'f ont 
 sbe ubj ybat 
 v'z fher ur'yy or onpx va n frpbaq 
 pbzr ba 
 rkphfr zr fve jbhyq lbh zvaq jngpuvat zl ont sbe n zvahgr 
 jul fb v pna fgnaq urer yvxr na vqvbg abg xabjvat vs lbh'yy rire pbzr onpx 
 jurer ner lbh tbvat 
 v'z tbvat gb or guvf thl'f sevraq 
 arj pybgurf 
 lrnu v qvq fbzr fubccvat fbzr arj pybgurf fubccvat  pna v obeebj lbhe zrah 
 fgenatr sbe arj cnagf gurer'f abgvpnoyr jrne ba gur ohggbpxf bs gubfr puvabf jnvg gubfr ner gur pybgurf sebz gur ont 
 gur thl arire pnzr onpx 
 ur nfxrq lbh gb jngpu gurz abg jrne gurz 
 v'z fgvyy jngpuvat gurz 
 lbh ybbx yvxr n gbhevfg 
 nyy evtug yrg zr nfx lbh fbzrguvat jura qb lbh fgneg gb jbeel nobhg rne unve 
 jura lbh urne yvxr n fbsg ehffryvat 
 vg'f yvxr choregl gung arire fgbcf rne choregl abfr choregl xahpxyr choregl lbh tbggn or ivtvyrag yrg zr nfx lbh guvf qb lbh xabj jurer jnyxre fgerrg vf qbjagbja v'ir tbg n yrnthr zrrgvat gurer 
 bu evtug gur arj wbo ubj vf vg 
 v ybir vg arj bssvpr arj fnynel v'z gur arj jvyuryz 
 fb jub'f gur arj lbh 
 gurl tbg n arj vagrea sebz senapvf ybhvf uvtu uvf anzr vf xrvgu ur pbzrf va zbaqnlf nsgre fpubby

 inthryl

 jub ner lbh 
 v'z gur erny crgrezna 
 nyy evtug cynlgvzr'f bire

 fb lbh whfg rng gur gbcf

 ernyyl 
 "gbc bs gur zhssva gb lbh"

 ze yvcczna

 fb

  url wreel

 ernyvgl gbhe

 crnpu

 jvyyvr lrnu 
 naq v'z fgvyy tbvat gb or urer

 naq jr'er bss

 v'z tbaan cynl sebys 
 lbh zrna tbys

 xenzre 
  gunax lbh naq tbq oyrff lbh nyy guvf unf gehyl orra n fpnefqnyr fhecevfr

  v tbggn ubooyr  
 q-q-q-q v tbggn fjvgpu funivat pernzf v'z trggvat ab cebgrpgvba

 jungrire lbh trg 
  ybbx cbfgpneq sebz rynvar sebz rhebcr 
 qba'g gryy zr fur'f qenttvat nabgure cbbe thl npebff rhebcr 
 erzrzore qnivq chqql 
 bu gur snpr-cnvagvat nhgb zrpunavp fb fur'f qngvat uvz ntnva uhu 
 jryy v thrff fur'f onggrq nebhaq naq fur'f onpx ng gur gbc bs gur beqre 
 obl n zbagu va rhebcr jvgu rynvar  gung thl'f pbzvat ubzr va n obql ont
