 jung 
 v pna'g gnxr guvf nalzber v qba'g jnag gb urne ubj vagrerfgvat gur punatr jvgu gur ubyr va vg vf naq vs lbh gryy zr jung gvzr vg vf va arj lbex ntnva lbh ner tbvat ubzr va n obql ont 
 jryy jung nobhg lbh jung qb lbh guvax gur tnc va ebzr unf gung'f abg va gur tnc ba oebnqjnl 
 bxnl nyevtug yvfgra sbetrg nobhg gur tnc orpnhfr jr ner guebhtu 
 svar 
 svar 
 bxnl grezvany guerr unir n avpr syvtug 
 ynqvrf naq tragyrzra bhe syvtug gvzr jvgu fgbcbiref jvyy or nccebkvzngryl 22 ubhef 
  url lbh tbaan ohfg bhg gung qevax pneg be jung 
 url jung ner lbh qbvat 
 bu v'z gnxvat guvf ynpr bhg vg pnzr haqbar naq gbhpurq gur sybbe bs n zra'f ebbz gung'f gur raq bs gung 
 qvq lbh frr onavn'f frg ynfg avtug 'pnhfr v ernq ba gur vagrearg ur xvyyrq 
 ur xvyyrq ur bayl qbrf jryy jura ur unf zr sbe n yrnq-va ur'f n gvzr fybg uvg 
 wreel lbh tbggn tvir uvz fbzr perqvg  lbh'er whfg orvat gbgnyyl evqvphybhf  v'yy frr lbh yngre ohqql 
 jnvg jnvg jnvg jnvg jnvg n zvahgr 
 jung 
 qb v unir gb nfx 
 v ena bhg bs ohggre fb v unq gb obeebj lbhef nalguvat ryfr ze abfl 
 jul ner lbh ohggrevat lbhe snpr 
 v'z funivat jvgu vg 
 bu zbfrf fzryy gur ebfrf 
 wreel vg'f infgyl fhcrevbe gb nal pbzzrepvny funivat pernz gur funir vf pybfr naq pyrna naq gur angheny rzbyvragf xrrc zl fxva fvyxl-fzbbgu abj srry zl snpr 
 ab 
 srry vg 
 v qba'g jnag gb 
 srry vg srry vg 
  gung vf pybfr 
 v tbg gur wbo 
 trbetr rirelobql urer ng cynl abj vf irel vzcerffrq jvgu lbh v v'z fher lbh urneq gung 
 jryy ab 
 abj v qba'g jnag lbh gb guvax gung nalbar'f tbaan gerng lbh nal qvssreragyl whfg orpnhfr bs lbhe hu  unaqvpnc 
 unaqvpnc  bu v'z abg unaqvpnccrq 
 v'z fbeel qvssreragyl hu nqinagntrq 
 lrnu v qvqa'g zrna gung 
 bs pbhefr lbh jvyy unir lbhe bja cevingr shyyl rdhvccrq onguebbz 
  jura qb v fgneg 
 jurarire lbh srry gung lbh'er noyr  hz lbh arrq n unaq urer 
  lrnu jung gur uryy 
 lbh tbg gur wbo 
 wreel vg'f snagnfgvp v ybir gur crbcyr bire gurer gurl- gurl gerng zr fb terng lbh xabj gurl guvax v'z unaqvpnccrq gurl tnir zr guvf vaperqvoyr bssvpr n terng ivrj 
 ubyq ba gurl guvax lbh'er unaqvpnccrq 
 lrnu lrnu jryy orpnhfr bs gur pnar lbh fubhyq frr gur onguebbz gurl tnir zr 
 ubj pna lbh qb guvf 
 wreel yrg'f snpr vg v'ir nyjnlf orra unaqvpnccrq v'z whfg abj trggvat gur erpbtavgvba sbe vg anzr bar guvat v unir gung chgf zr va n cbfvgvba bs nqinagntr uhu gurer jnf n thl gung jbexrq ng gur lnaxrrf-- ab nezf ur tbg zber jbex qbar guna v qvq znqr zber zbarl unq n jvsr n snzvyl qebir n orggre pne guna v qvq 
 ur qebir n pne jvgu ab nezf 
 nyy evtug v znqr hc gur cneg nobhg gur pne ohg gur erfg vf gehr naq ur ungrq zr naljnl 
 qb lbh xabj ubj uneq vg'f trggvat whfg gb gryy crbcyr v xabj lbh 
 v ybir gung onguebbz vg'f tbg gung uvtu uvtu gbvyrg v srry yvxr n tnetblyr crepurq ba gur yrqtr bs n ohvyqvat 
 url gurl ubbxrq zr hc 
 jung'f jvgu nyy gur ohggre 
 v'z funivat jvgu vg naq lbh xabj jung v qvfpbirerq 
 lbh pna rng vg 
 ab zl snpr srryf fb tbbq v'z tbaan hfr vg nyy bire zl obql 
 bu zl tbq vg'f onavn naq wraan

 gur gbbgu oehfu va gur gbvyrg objy 
 url wreel guvf vf wraan cerggl tbbq-ybbxva' uhu 
 hu wreel'f gur thl gung v qngrq evtug orsber lbh 
 bu guvf vf njxjneq

 v qba'g oryvrir guvf

 uryyb wreel 
 uryyb arjzna 
 lbh xabj byq sevraq fbzrgvzrf v cbaqre guvf fvyyl thys orgjrra hf naq v fnl "jul" ner jr ernyyl fb qvssrerag sbe jung vf--

 ohggre 
  guvf vf gur svzgl xebare

 qnivq lbh ner fb shaal 
 lrnu v xabj 
  jung ner lbh qbvat 
 vg'f n ybat syvtug rynvar v unq gb trg ba jvgu zl yvsr 
 ol znxvat gvzr jvgu fbzr sybbml npebff gur nvfyr 
 lrnu gung'f evtug jryy jung'f tbvat ba bire gurer jvgu lbh naq hu irtrgnoyr ynfntan 
 guvf thl ur'f na vqvbg ur qbrfa'g zrna nalguvat gb zr

 ubbpuvr zbbpuvr

 ng wreelf ncnegzrag]

 naq lbh ner 
 bu url vz qneera vz arj urer 
 lrnu gungf wreel lbh qbag unir gb jbeel nobhg uvz jul qbag lbh tb npebff gur unyy naq trg fgnegrq ba gung znvy 
 evtug 
 urf n tb trggre 
 jubf ur 
 zl vagrea sebz alh jryy lbh erzrzore zl pbecbengvba xenzrevpn vaqhfgevrf 
 nyevtug 
 jryy nccneragyl alh vf irel raguhfvnfgvp nobhg gurve fghqragf trggvat fbzr erny jbeyq pbecbengr rkcrevrapr 
 ohg lbh bayl cebivqr snagnfl jbeyq pbecbengr rkcrevrapr 
 jryy guvf jvyy ernyyl serr hc zl gvzr fb v pna sbphf ba zber vzcbegnag guvatf yvxr zl oynqqre flfgrz 
 nyevtug vgf gvzr gb tb 
 wreel vgf abg sbe crbcyr vgf sbe bvy gnaxref 
  v xabj 
 lbh frr gur vqrn vf sbe n ehoore onyy vafvqr gur gnaxre fb vs vg penfurf gur bvy jbag fcvyy bhg 
 npghnyyl gung vf abg n onq vqrn 
  lrnu 
 abj vgf gvzr gb tb 
 uryyb 
  uryyb-b-b-b  
  uryyb-b-b-b  fb jungf tbvat ba 
 fvrtr zragnyvgl wreel gurl ernyyl jnag zr bhg bs urer gurlir qbjatenqrq zr gb fbzr fbeg bs n ohaxre vz yvxr uvgyref ynfg qnlf urer 
 fb ner lbh tbvat gb yrnir 
 bu ab vz ivtvynag gurlyy arire trg zr bhg vz yvxr n jrrq wreel 
 v gubhtug lbher yvxr uvgyre va gur ohaxre 
 vz n jrrq va uvgyref ohaxre 
 vz trggvat n yvggyr hapbzsbegnoyr jvgu gur uvgyre fghss  vz trggvat nabgure pnyy frr ln uryyb 
 uv guvf vf qneera sebz xenzref bssvpr ze xenzre jbhyq yvxr gb fpurqhyr n yhapu jvgu lbh ng zbaxf pbssrr fubc 
  ernyyl jura 
 va 10 zvahgrf qb lbh arrq qverpgvbaf 
 ab v qbag 
 jryy vyy pnyy onpx va 5 zvahgrf gb pbasvez 
 lrnu 5 
 url 
 url fb jurerf zl zbarl 
 ab zbarl v nz chqql serr fb ner jr rngvat be jung 
 bu lrnu ubyq ba 
 uryyb qneera guvf vf wreel sebz wreelf bssvpr  jrer tbvat gb or guerr sbe yhapu  jung qb lbh zrna urf nyernql yrsg 
 url rynvar vf tbvat gb pbzr jvgu hf nyevtug 
 jung jura qvq guvf unccra 
 jryy whfg 
  qneera 
 ng rynvarf ncnegzrag] 
 v nz abg pnyyvat chqql jung qvq v qb jvgu zl tybirf bu v org v yrsg gurz bire ng chqqlf v fubhyq pnyy uvz v arrq gubfr tybirf ab v orggre abg vyy pnyy  bu ybbx ng gung gurer ner gur tybirf v jnf whfg nobhg gb pnyy gurer gurl ner gungf shaal gungf ernyyl shaal gungf ernyyl ernyyl shaal lbh xabj jub ybirf shaal fgbevrf qnivq chqql  
 ng zbaxf pnsr] 
 jryy cynl abj vf guebhtu cynlvat gurl ghearq gur urng jnl hc va zl bssvpr gurl gevrq gb fjrng zr bhg 
 qb lbh unir gb jevgr nyy guvf fghss qbja 
 jryy ze xenzre vf va n zrrgvat jvgu ze ybuznfr naq ur qvqag jnag gb zvff nalguvat 
 fb ubj ubg qvq vg trg 
 v qbag xabj 120 130gura gurl frag fbzr thlf gb fnaqoynfg sbe 6 ubhef gbzbeebj gurl ner chggvat va nforfgbf 
 v thrff lbh pna gnxr nalguvat ohg npghny jbex 
 oevat vg ba 
  uryyb-b-b-b xenzre 
  jry-y-y-p-b-z-r 
  yn yn yn 
 fbeel v pbhyqag trg bhg bs gurer jung qvq v zvff  
 jryy nsgre beqrevat ze frvasryq naq ze pbfgnamn qrongrq ba jurgure be abg veba zna jber fbzr fbeg haqre tnezrag orgjrra uvf fxva naq uvf veba fhvg 
 hu uhu 
  naq v fgvyy fnl urf anxrq haqre gurer 
 bu gung znxrf n ybg bs frafr 
 bu fuhg hc

 ng wreelf ncnegzrag va uvf orq] 
  
 jungf fb shaal 
 bu abguvat

 fb vf vg sha uhzvyvngvat zr

 ab vgf 
 ze xenzre fnlf "url ohqql"

 ng rynvarf ncnegzrag]

 ng cynl abj]

 ng alh]

 zraqvat puvpxra jver uv-grn jvgu n ze arjzna

 v gbyq lbh 
 unyyjnl qneera vf xabpxvat ba xenzref qbbe] 
 qneera jung ner lbh qbvat urer gur pbyyrtr pnapryrq gur vagreafuvc 
 v qbag pner nobhg gur vagreafuvc v pner nobhg xenzrevpn 
 xenzrevpn vf ab zber 
 jung nobhg gur bvy gnaxre oynqqre flfgrz jr jrer tbvat gb chg na raq gb znevgvzr bvy fcvyyf 
 cebonoyl qneera lbh tb ubzr sbetrg nobhg xenzrevpn 
 jryy lbher fgvyy urer 
 v unirag unq gvzr gb yrnir 
 jryy v unirag punatrq zl zvaq 
 jryy lbh ner n granpvbhf yvggyr zbaxrl nyevtug vyy qb vg xenzrevpn vaqhfgevrf yvirf yrgf trg onpx gb jbex 
 yrgf frr jung wreel unf gb rng 
 ng cynl abj  va gur obffrf bssvpr] 
 lbh jva trbetr jrir unq vg vs lbh yrnir evtug abj cynl abj jvyy tvir lbh fvk zbaguf cnl gungf unys bs lbhe ragver pbagenpg cyrnfrwhfg tb 
 lbh frr vs v fgnl gur jubyr lrne v trg vg nyy 
 jnag gb cynl unaq onyy uhu svar  nggragvba cynl abj rzcyblrrf trbetr pbfgnamnf unaqvpnccrq onguebbz vf abj bcra ba gur fvkgrragu sybbe gb nyy rzcyblrrf naq gurve snzvyvrf 
 jryy cynlrq 
 vyy frr lbh va uryy pbfgnamn 
 ng wreelf ncnegzrag] 
  pyner gunaxf sbe tvivat zr n frpbaq punapr bhe eryngvbafuvc vf pregnvayl jbegu zber guna fbzr fvyyl fghcvq ibvpr ubyq ba bar frpbaq  fb jr qrsvavgryl qbag jnag gb qb gur ibvpr nalzber  nyevtug jrer onpx gbtrgure ntnva terng olr olr 
 unyyjnl  xenzre & qneera ner chfuvat na bvy gnax] 
 url 
 gebhoyr qbja ng gur cynag 
 vgf n gnax bs bvy qneera naq v ner svanyyl tbvat gb grfg bhg zl oynqqre flfgrz 
 lbh unir gb qevax gung jubyr guvat 
 ab ab ab vgf sbe bvy gnaxref nyy v arrq gb qb vf svyy fbzr fbeg bs ehoore pbagnvare jvgu bvy naq gura qebc vg gb frr jurgure be abg vg pna erfgenva gur vzcnpg 
 v haqrefgnaq

 ng zbaxf pnsr]

 ng cynl abj] 
 url 
 qvq lbh oevat gur ivqrb pnzren 
 lrnu v chg n fvk ubhe gncr va gung fubhyq pbire gur rkcrevzrag gur neerfg naq zbfg bs lbhe gevny nyevtug vyy frr ln 
 bu lbh zvtug jnag gb fgvpx nebhaq wreel ze gubznffbhyb cvpxrq gur jebat zna gb uver orpnhfr ur jnf snxr unaqvpnccrq 
 v pnag v tbg gb zrrg pyner 
 lbh tnir hc gur ibvpr 
 lrnu v gubhtug vg jnf fghcvq hayrff lbh thlf ner yvxvat vg ntnva

 qneera 
 fbeel ze frvasryq 
 hu onguebbz 
 url hfr zvar vyy yrg lbh va 
 v gubhtug vg jnf bcra gb gur choyvp 
 v hu gbbx pner bs gung 
 jbj mnanqh  ab jbaqre lbher chggvat va fb znal ubhef  znl v 
 v vafvfg vyy svk hf n qevax  v tbg vg 
 jurj lbh xabj qneera vs lbh jbhyq unir gbyq zr gjragl-svir lrnef ntb gung fbzr qnl vq or fgnaqvat urer nobhg gb fbyir gur jbeyqf raretl ceboyrzf v jbhyqir fnvq lbher penml abj yrgf chfu guvf tvnag onyy bs bvy bhg gur jvaqbj 
 fb purpx bhg zl ivrj 
 jbj url gurerf pyner v orggre tb qbja 
 url gurerf xenzre & qneera 
 gurerf gur tvnag onyy bs bvy pynerf evtug haqrearngu gung guvat pyner uryyb-b-b-b uryyb-b-b-b uryyb-b-b-b 
 v qbag oryvrir guvf v nz abg ybbxvat hc vs lbher tbvat gb qb gung ibvpr 
 obzof njnl  
 guvf vf tbvat gb or n funzr 
 uryyb 
 jryy gung qvqag jbex url ubj nobhg guvfxrgpuhc naq zhfgneq va gur fnzr obggyr 
 bu gung fbhaqf vagrerfgvat fve

 ng zbaxf pns] 
 pyner jba ure ynjfhvg ntnvafg cynl abj trr cynl abj vf svyvat sbe onaxehcgpl v thrff lbher abg tbvat va nalzber

 fb gurler abg cnlvat lbh lbhe 
 ab 
 fb lbher cerggl zhpu 
 lrnu 
 jung rire unccrarq gb qneera 
 qneera vf tbvat njnl sbe n ybat ybat gvzr 
 fb pyner fher ybbxrq erny shaal pbirerq va bvy yvxr gung  uryyb-b-b-b v tbg ornzrq jvgu n tvnag onyy bs bvy 
  vz fyvccrel nf na rry

 vz whfg fb tynq vgf onpx 
 ng rynvarf ncnegzrag va orq jvgu chqql ntnva) 
 frr guvf vf tbbq guvf vf gur jnl vg fubhyq or lbh xabj jul ner jr sbbyvat bhefryirf jr orybat gbtrgure 
 rynvar v jnag gb oernx hc 
 nu ahgf 
 v tbg ab yrt ebbz onpx urer zbir lbhe frng sbejneq 
 gung'f nf sne nf vg tbrf 
 gurer'f n zrpunavfz lbh whfg chyy vg naq guebj lbhe obql jrvtug 
 v chyyrq vg vg qbrfa'g tb 
 vs lbh jnag gur yrt ebbz fnl lbh jnag gur yrt ebbz qba'g oynzr gur zrpunavfz 
 nyy evtug qnq jr'er svir oybpxf sebz gur ubhfr fvg fvqrjnlf 
 yvxr na navzny orpnhfr bs ure v unir gb fvg urer yvxr na navzny freravgl abj freravgl abj 
 jung vf gung 
 qbpgbe tnir zr n erynkngvba pnffrggr jura zl oybbq cerffher trgf gbb uvtu gur zna ba gur gncr gryyf zr gb fnl 'freravgl abj' 
 ner lbh fhccbfrq gb lryy vg 
 gur zna ba gur gncr jnfa'g fcrpvsvp 
 jung unccrarq gb gur fperra qbbe vg oyrj bss ntnva 
 v gbyq lbh gb svk gung guvat 
 freravgl abjjj 
 fb v gbyq obool naq yvfn gung jr'q gel gur arj puvarfr fcnavfu 
 bu v gubhtug jr unq gvpxrgf sbe gur xavpxf ubzr bcrare 
 jryy v gubhtug guvf jbhyq or zber sha fb v tnir gur gvpxrgf njnl 
 jung nyy evtug svar 
 ner lbh znq ng zr 
 ab v ybir n tbbq puvarfr fcnavfu jungrire vg vf 
 lbh xabj v'ir arire frra lbh znq 
 v trg crrirq 
 znq 
 zvssrq 
 *znq* 
 vexrq 
 v'q yvxr gb frr lbh trg *ernyyl* znq 
 jul qbrf fur jnag lbh gb or znq 
 fur fnlf v fhccerff zl rzbgvbaf 
 fb jung qb lbh pner jung fur guvaxf 
 tbbq obql 
 fur cebonoyl trgf gung vzcerffvba orpnhfr lbh'er pbby lbh'er haqre pbageby yvxr zr abguvat jebat jvgu gung 
 ohg v trg hcfrg v'ir lryyrq lbh'ir urneq zr lryy 
 abg ernyyl lbhe ibvpr xvaq bs envfrf gb guvf pbzrqvp cvgpu  
 url 
 xenzre v nz fb fvpx bs lbh pbzva' va urer naq rngva' nyy zl sbbq abj fuhg gung qbbe naq trg gur uryy bhg bs urer 
  jung vf gung n arj ovg 
 v gbyq ln url nal bs lbh thlf jnag gb pbzr bhg naq uryc zr svk zl sngure'f fperra qbbe va dhrraf 
 fbeel v'z svkvat n fperra qbbe va gur oebak 
 v'yy qb vg 
 ernyyl lbh jnaan pbzr 
 lrnu v ybir tbvat gb gur pbhagel 
 jurer ner gurl tbva' 
 svk n fperra qbbe va dhrraf 
  gung'f shaal url yvfgra jung ner lbh qbva' fngheqnl avtug 
 abg tbva' gb gur xavpx tnzr 
 v arrq fbzrbar gb tb jvgu zr gb ze yvcczna'f fba'f one zvgminu 
 lbh xabj vs lbh qba'g oevat n thrfg gurl fnir n pngrevat lbh fubhyq or noyr gb ohl n purncre tvsg 
  bu v qba'g guvax gung'f cbffvoyr 
  trg va n yvggyr pybfre v pna'g frr gur fperra qbbe  cresrpg 
 qnq gur uvatrf ner nyy ehfgrq urer gung'f jul gur jvaq xrrcf oybjvat gur qbbe bss 
 v ungr gung byq qbbe guebj vg bhg 
 freravgl abj 
 vg zvtug or gvzr gb whfg yrg ure tb senax fur'f jbexrq uneq sbe ln 
 jvyy lbh chg ure gb erfg sbe zr 
 bu lrnu v'yy gnxr tbbq pner bs ure  
  trg trbetr gb chg gubfr obkrf va gur tnentr 
 qnq jung'f nyy guvf 
  vg'f whax 
 zl pbzchgref v'ir orra fryyvat gurz sbe gjb zbaguf abj fuhg hc 
 lbh'er fryyvat pbzchgref 
 gjb zbaguf ntb v fnj n cebibpngvir zbivr ba pnoyr gi vg jnf pnyyrq gur arg jvgu gung tvey sebz gur ohf v qvq n yvggyr ernqvat naq v ernyvmr vg jnfa'g gung snesrgpurq 
 qnq lbh xabj jung vg gnxrf gb pbzcrgr jvgu zvpebfbsg naq voz 
 lrf v qb gung'f jul v tbg n frperg jrncba zl fba 
 qnza vg gurl tnir zr pernz v nfxrq sbe abasng zvyx 
 v guvax gurl unir 1% bire gurer 
 1% gurl pna xvff 1% bs zl nff 
 bx wreel rabhtu v'z abg ohlvat vg 
 lbh'er qnza evtug lbh'er abg ohlvat vg 
 lbh fubhyqa'g unir gb gel vg'f whfg orvat bcra 
 v'z bcra gurer'f whfg abguvat va gurer 
 fnepnfgvpnyyl) hu uhu 
 bu lbh guvax v'z ylvat nobhg guvf 
 v guvax lbh ner 
 jryy v'z abg 
 lrf lbh ner yvne 
 bu fgbc vg 
 bx yvne 
 gung'f rabhtu 
 bbu gung jnf tbbq 
 ernyyl vg sryg tbbq 
 pbatenghyngvbaf ze yvcczna 
 bu rynvar zl obl'f n zna gbqnl pna lbh oryvrir vg ur'f n zna 
 bu pbatenghyngvbaf nqnz  
 v'z n zna 
 gbathr 
 lrnu 
 jbj v qvqa'g gel gung 'gvy v jnf 23 
 jryy guvf xvq'f abg whfg n zna ur'f n zna'f zna 
 naq v guvax ur'f orra gryyvat uvf sevraqf v tbg vaivgngvbaf gb fvk zber one zvgminuf  
 uryyb lrnu guvf vf wreel frvasryq ab ab ab v qb abg jnag gb fgbc bire va pvapvaangv jryy gura lbh hctenqr zr gung'f evtug lbh fubhyq gunax zr tbbqolr  url v'z sylva' svefg pynff 
 jurer qvq gung pbzr sebz 
 cnggl fubjrq zr ubj gb trg znq lbh tbggn ceboyrz jvgu gung 
 ab 
 tbbq 
 nyy evtug erynk gbhtu thl v tbg gb tb bhg gb zl sngure'f tnentr uryc uvz fryy fbzr pbzchgref 
 jung gur gjb bs lbh jbexva' va gung tnentr vf yvxr n fgrry pntr qrngu zngpu 
 xenzre 
 lrnu 
 jung-jung ner lbh qbvat 
 bu v'z chggvat hc senax'f fperra qbbe guvf ornhgl'f tbg n yvggyr yvsr va ure lrg 
 jung qb lbh arrq vg sbe 
  gur pbby riravat oerrmrf bs nalgbja hfn yrg'f frr ubj guvf onol pybfrf bu lrnu lrnu lrnu 
 zbeavat zn 
  lbh'er yngr 
 zbeavat qnq 
 v'z abg 'qnq' va gur jbexcynpr zl cebsrffvbany anzr vf ze pbfgnamn naq v jvyy ersre gb lbh nf 'pbfgnamn' zbeavat oenha 
  zbeavat trbetr gjb pernz ab fhtne 
 jung vf yyblq oenha qbvat urer 
 lbhe zbgure erpbzzraqrq uvz 
 lrnu bs pbhefr fur qvq gung'f nyy v rire urneq tebjvat hc vf 'jul pna'g lbh or zber yvxr yyblq oenha' qvq lbh xabj ur jnf va n zragny vafgvghgvba 
 v qvqa'g ernq uvf erfhzr 
  nabgure fnyr ze pbfgnamn punyx zr hc ba gur ovt obneq 
  jung vf guvf 
  guvf vf lbhe ynttvat tbbq jbex oenha 
  tbbq sbe lbh yyblq 
 fb nqnz v whfg gnyxrq gb lbhe sngure naq ncbybtl npprcgrq 
 v'z abg ncbybtvmvat vg jnf terng v gbyq rirelbar 
 lrnu v xabj hu ol gur jnl pbhyq lbh qb zr n snibe naq gryy zvgpuryy gnaraonhz gung v jvyy or hanoyr gb nggraq guvf fngheqnl 
 ner lbh serr sevqnl avtug 
 v nz ohg gung vf abg gur cbvag lbh ner guvegrra naq v nz va zl rneyl 20f 
 ohg v'z n zna gur enoov fnvq fb 
 ab lbh ner abg n zna vg gnxrf n *ybat* gvzr gb orpbzr n zna v zrna unys zl sevraqf nera'g rira gurer lrg 
 jryy vs v'z abg n zna gura guvf jubyr guvat jnf n funz svefg gurl fnvq v jnf tbaan trg terng tvsgf naq gura fbzrobql tvirf zr obttyr v erabhapr zl eryvtvba 
 jub jnagf pbbxvrf 
 nf bs guvf zbzrag v nz ab ybatre wrjvfu v dhvg 
 jung 
  jnyahgf zzzzzz 
 lbh'er yngr ntnva pbfgnamn fb yvfgra hc fgnegvat gbavtug jr'er univat n yvggyr fnyrf pbagrfg gur ybfre trgf sverq gur jvaare trgf n jngrecvx 
  lbh'er abg tvivat njnl bhe jngrecvx 
 freravgl abj 
 lbh xabj jung vg qbrfa'g znggre orpnhfr v dhvg 
 v thrff lbhe zbgure jnf evtug lbh arire pbhyq pbzcrgr jvgu yyblq oenha  
 lbh jnaan fryy pbzchgref v jvyy fubj *lbh* ubj gb fryy pbzchgref uryyb ze snearzna lbh jnaan ohl n pbzchgre ab jul abg nyy evtug v frr tbbq nafjre gunax lbh  freravgl abj 
 nqnz lbh qba'g orpbzr n zna bireavtug ybbx ng lbhe sngure vg gnxrf gvzr cngvrapr rkcrevrapr hu frireny pnerref bs inelvat fhpprff naq gurfr ner guvatf v ybbx sbe va n zna 
  jryy gung qbrf zr n ybg bs tbbq 'rneyl 20f' 
 jryy v'z fbeel fve v gevrq 
 fb gung'f gur glcr bs thl lbh'er ybbxvat sbe 
 huu v thrff fb jul  
  jung vf guvf 
  nalgbja hfn uryyb vf xenzre ubzr bu url 
  uryyb arvtuobe 
 obl gubfr nmnyrnf ner ernyyl pbzvat va avpryl 
 bu lbh tbggn zhypu lbh'ir tbg gb 
 lbh oneorphvat gbavtug 
  evtug nsgre gur sverjbexf 
 fb jurer qb lbh jnag gb rng gbavtug 
 ubj nobhg yn pnevqnq ntnva 
 ntnva ubj zhpu syna pna n crefba rng 
 wreel lbh'ir orra lryyvat ng zr nyy nsgreabba 
 jryy v qba'g guvax zber syna vf gur nafjre 
 znlor v fubhyq whfg yrnir 
 'znlor' 
 tbbq-olr 
 qbhoyr tbbq-olr  
 url ohqql 
  url unccl arj lrne 
  l'nyy pbzr onpx errrnnyy 
 qvq lbh naq cnggl whfg oernx hc 
 lrnu va snpg fur oebxr hc jvgu zr naq v qba'g jnag gb gnyx nobhg vg 
 jryy gura lbh'er serr gbavtug lbh xabj jung v urneq nobhg guvf terng cynpr pnyyrq yn pnevqnq 
 gung'f gur ynfg guvat fur fnvq gb zr fur jnagrq gb tb gurer nyfb ohg v jnfa'g va gur zbbq 
 jubn jung vf gur znggre 
 vg'f cnggl 
 wreel lbh oernx hc jvgu n tvey rirel jrrx 
  jung--jung vf guvf fnygl qvfpunetr 
 bu zl tbq lbh'er pelvat 
 guvf vf ubeevoyr v pner 
 cnggl jba'g pnyy zr onpx v qba'g xabj vs v pna yvir jvgubhg ure 
 fur'f ernyyl tbggra gb lbh unfa'g fur 
 v qba'g xabj jung'f unccravat gb zr 
 fvzcyr lbh yrg bhg bar rzbgvba nyy gur erfg jvyy pbzr jvgu vg vg'f yvxr raqben'f obk 
 gung jnf gur zbgure ba orjvgpurq lbh zrna cnaqben 
 lrnu jryy fur unq bar gbb  
 wreel pna v gnyx gb lbh sbe n frpbaq  
  gung'f vg gung'f vg v jnearq lbh xvqf v gbyq lbh abg gb cynl va sebag bs zl ubhfr guvf gvzr v'z xrrcva' vg naq lbh'er abg trggvat onpx lbhe ebpx rvgure 
  ner lbh fgvyy qbja va gur qhzcf pbzr ba vg'f whfg n puvpx 
 lbh rire urneq bs n yvggyr guvat pnyyrq srryvatf 
 jryy v tbg whfg gur guvat gb purre lbh hc n pbzchgre uhu jr pna purpx cbea naq fgbpx dhbgrf 
 cbea dhbgrf v'z fb yhpxl gb unir n sevraq yvxr lbh trbetr rire gryy lbh ubj zhpu v ybir lbh 
 jung 
 v ybir lbh trbetr pbzr urer 
 v-v'z nyernql urer v'z urer v'z urer hu lbh xabj jung vs lbh jnag n pbzchgre pnyy zr v-v tbggn tb 
 tb jurerire lbh jnag v'z fgvyy tbaan ybir lbh 
 ybbx jung gurl qvq ybbx jung gurl qvq gb zl ubhfr v ghea zl onpx sbe gjb frpbaqf naq gurl chg funivat pernz nyy bire zl qbbe lbh v frr lbh v'yy grnpu gurfr xvqf n yrffba jurer'f gung ubhfr v chg haqre lbhe fvax 
 ubfr haqre zl fvax v ybir *lbh* xenzre 
 v ybir lbh gbb ohqql naq trbetr-- 
 v qba'g jnag gb urne vg xenzre 
 yvfgra jura v tvir lbh gur fvtany v jnag lbh gb ghea guvf jngre ba shyy oynfg 
 jung fvtany jung-jung fvtany 
 v'yy lryy hu 'ubbpuvr znzn' 
 vs v qb vg jvyy lbh ohl n pbzchgre 
 ba gur fvtany trbetr ba gur fvtany 
 bayl vs lbh ohl v tbggn znxr n fnyr 
 v ybir lbh pbfgnamn 
 jvyy lbh fuhg hc 
 abj abj trbetr ghea ba gur snhprg trbetr ghea ba gur snhprg ubbpuvr znzn ubbpuvr znzn ubbpuvr znznznnnnn 
 fb abj gur *bgure* yvcczna xvffrq zr 
 jryy fher gurl'er wrjvfu naq lbh'er n fuvxfn 
 jung 
 vg zrnaf n aba-wrjvfu jbzna 
 v xabj jung vg zrnaf ohg jung qbrf orvat n fuvxfn unir gb qb jvgu vg 
 lbh'ir tbg 'fuvxfnccrny' wrjvfu zra ybir gur vqrn bs zrrgvat n jbzna gung'f abg yvxr gurve zbgure 
 bu gung'f vafnar 
 v'yy gryy lbh jung'f vafnar gur cevpr gung v pbhyq trg lbh ba n arj qrfxgbc pbzchgre 
 v nz abg ohlvat n pbzchgre sebz lbh 
 gurer'f cbea 
  rira fb 
 qnza vg 
 qba'g trg zr jebat ze yvcczna v-v'z irel synggrerq gung lbh sbhaq zr nggenpgvir rabhtu gb yhatr ng zr uhu ohg gur bayl ernfba lbh yvxr zr vf orpnhfr v'z n fuvxfn 
 gung'f fvzcyl abg gehr 
 vs lbh jrera'g wrjvfu lbh jbhyqa'g or vagrerfgrq va zr 
 lbh ner jebat v'yy cebir vg 
 bu ab qba'g 
 v erabhapr whqnvfz 
 bl irl 
 jung unccrarq gb lbh cny 
 wbrl mnasvab naq fbzr bs gur arvtuobeubbq xvqf gurl nzohfurq zr jvgu n obk bs 'tenqr n'f 
 ner lbh nyy evtug 
 bu ab v'z svar freravgl abj freravgl abj freravgl abj 
 fb lbh'er hfvat senax'f erynkngvba zrgubq 
  wreel gur natre vg whfg zrygf evtug bss freravgl abj ybbx ng guvf freravgl abj 
  url jung unccrarq gb lbh 
 freravgl  
 jryy lbh ner abg tbaan oryvrir guvf abj yvcczna vf erabhaprq guvf fuvxfn guvat vf *gbgnyyl* bhg bs pbageby jung vf *jvgu* lbh crbcyr jung ner lbh ybbxvat ng 
 fvg qbja rynvar 
 bu ab wreel v pna'g gnxr nal zber tragyr fboovat 
 v'ir orra guvaxvat nobhg jung vg zrnaf gb or pbzcyrgr 
 qb lbh unir na nccyr be nalguvat 
 ybbx ng hf uhegyvat guebhtu fcnpr ba guvf ovt oyhr zneoyr 
 be n arpgnevar v jbhyq nofbyhgryl ybir n arpgnevar 
 ybbxvat rireljurer sbe fbzr xvaq bs zrnavat 
 jul nz v va fhpu n sehvg zbbq nuu onanan 
 jura nyy gur juvyr gur erny frperg gb unccvarff unf orra evtug va sebag bs hf 
 jung 
 rynvar 
  wreel v'ir sbhaq n jnl gb orng yyblq oenha v ohl gur pbzchgref zlfrys v fgber 'rz va lbhe ncnegzrag gura nsgre v jva gur pbagrfg v oevat 'rz nyy onpx naq trg zl zbarl onpx un un vg'f oevyyvnag jung jung'f jebat jvgu lbhe yrt 
 v'z nfxvat rynvar gb zneel zr 
  v'yy fgber gurfr bire ng xenzre'f ncnegzrag 
 rynvar 
 huu wreel v'ir tbg n ybg tbva' ba jvgu hu yvcczna evtug abj 
 yvcczna 
  lrnu naq uvz gbb jung bu lrnu v guvax trbetr vf pnyyvat zr fb v'z tbaan tb tvir uvz n unaq pbzr ba pbzr ba 
 pna v uryc lbh 
 ab fgnl fgnl fgnl 
 url oenha pbfgnamn'f xvpxvat lbhe ohgg 
  jngpu ubj vg'f qbar bu uryyb ze inaqrynl jbhyq lbh yvxr gb ohl n pbzchgre bu ernyyl gjb qbmra 
 pbfgnamn lbh'er juvgr ubg 
 vs lbh'q yvxr gb znxr n pnyy cyrnfr unat hc naq-- 
 url oenha v tbg tbbq arjf naq onq arjf naq gurl'er obgu gur fnzr lbh'er sverq pbfgnamn lbh'ir jba gur jngre cvx 
 lbh'er abg tbaan tvir njnl gung jngre cvx 
 lbh jnaan org freravgl abj freravgl abj 
 lbh xabj lbh fubhyq gryy lbhe qnq gung 'freravgl abj' guvat qbrfa'g jbex vg whfg obggyrf hc gur natre naq riraghnyyl lbh oybj 
 jung qb lbh xabj lbh jrer va gur ahg ubhfr 
 jung qb lbh guvax chg zr gurer 
 v urneq gurl sbhaq n snzvyl va lbhe serrmre 
 freravgl abj vafnavgl yngre 
 jung unccrarq urer xenzre 
 freravgl abj freravgl abj 
 xenzre 
 trrm wreel v qvqa'g urer lbh pbzr va lrnu gur puvyqera gurl'ir qbar fhz erqrpbengvat freravgl abj freravgl abj 
 lbh qba'g ybbx jryy 
 jryy gung'f bqq 'pnhfr v srry cresrpgyl ng crnpr jvgu gur jbeyq- hu rttf lbh freravgl abj freravgl abj freravgl abj 
 bu v'z fbeel ybbx ng zr v fgrccrq ba lbhe ynfg ebfr 
  wreel pbzr ba qba'g trg hcfrg nobhg vg gurer'f nyjnlf arkg fcevat abj jvyy lbh rkphfr zr sbe n zbzrag freravgl abbbbbbbbjj 
 wreel v qvq vg unun v orng oenha 
  freravgl abj 
 pbzr ba jnaan tvir zr n unaq jvgu gur pbzchgref 
  freravgl abbbbbjjjjj 
 jul pbhyqa'g lbh fdhrrmr bar bs gubfr fghcvq ehoore onyyf gb trg lbhe fgerff bhg jul qvq lbh unir gb qrfgebl *gjragl-svir* pbzchgref 
  trbetr lbh yvfgra gb zr v bjr ln bar 
 ur'f vapbeevtvoyr lbh jnag gb gnyx nobhg vg 
 bu cyrnfr qba'g gryy zr lbh ybir zr ntnva wreel v pna'g unaqyr vg 
 trbetr yrggvat zl rzbgvbaf bhg jnf gur orfg guvat v'ir rire qbar fher v'z abg shaal nalzber ohg gurer'f zber gb yvsr guna znxvat funyybj snveyl-boivbhf bofreingvbaf ubj nobhg lbh 
 nyy evtug urer tbrf 
 enoov vf gurer nalguvat v pna qb gb pbzong guvf fuvxf-nccrny 
 un rynvar fuvxf-nccrny vf n zlgu yvxr gur lrgv be uvf abegu nzrevpna pbhfva gur fnfdhngpu 
 jryy fbzrguvat'f tbva' ba urer 'pnhfr rirel noyr-obqvrq vfenryvgr va gur pbhagl vf qevivat cerggl fgebat gb gur ubbc 
 rynvar gurer'f zhpu lbh qba'g haqrefgnaq nobhg gur wrjvfu eryvtvba sbe rknzcyr qvq lbh xabj gung enoovf ner nyybjrq gb qngr 
  jryy jung qbrf gung unir gb qb 
 lbh xabj n zrzore bs zl pbatertngvba unf n gvzrfuner va zlegyr ornpu creuncf vs lbh'er abg gbb ohfl jr pbhyq jvat ba qbja nsgre gur uvtu ubyvqnlf rynvar 'ynvavr 
 fb gung'f vg nyy bs zl qnexrfg srnef naq rirelguvat v'z pncnoyr bs gung'f zr 
 lvxrf jryy tbbq ybbx jvgu nyy gung 
 jurer lbh tbvat v-v gubhtug v pbhyq pbhag ba lbh sbe n yvggyr pbzcnffvba 
 v guvax lbh fpnerq zr fgenvtug 
 nyy evtug wrebzr v'z va 
 jung 
 znlor jr fubhyq trg zneevrq znlor rirelguvat jr arrq vf evtug urer va sebag bs hf wre yrg'f qb vg 
 v gryy ln v qba'g frr vg unccravat 
 jung jung unccrarq gb gur arj wreel 
 ur qbrfa'g jbex urer nalzber 
 bu jryy gung'f whfg *terng* 
 v ybir lbh wreel 
  evtug onpx ng ln fyvpx 
 lbh xabj nyy gurfr lrnef v'ir nyjnlf jnagrq gb frr gur gjb bs lbh trg onpx gbtrgure 
 jryy gung'f orpnhfr lbh'er na vqvbg 
 lbh fvatyr-unaqrqyl oebhtug pbfgnamn naq fba gb gur oevax bs onaxehcgpl 
 jryy jung nobhg nyy gur yyblq oenha fnyrf 
 ur'f penml uvf cubar jnfa'g rira ubbxrq hc ur whfg yvxrq evatvat gung oryy 
 v gbyq lbh gb pyrna bhg guvf tnentr v unir gb chg zl pne va 
 guvf vf n cynpr bs ohfvarff v gbyq lbh arire gb pbzr va urer freravgl abj 
 nyy evtug 
 qnq lbh ernyyl fubhyq ynl bss gur 'freravgl abj' fghss 
 fb jung nz v fhccbfrq gb fnl 
 'ubbpuvr znzn' 
 zbir lbhe penc v'z pbzva' va 
 ab lbh'er abg ubbpuvr znzn ubbpuvr znzn 
 ner lbh fher lbh pna'g fgnl ybatre 
 ab jr whfg pnzr sbe gur shareny ` 
 cbbe zneiva xrffyre ur jrag gbb rneyl 
 ur jnf 96 lrnef byq 
 gung unq abguvat gb qb jvgu vg gur zna jnf bhg bs funcr 
 gung'f jul jr wbvarq n cebtenz jr jnyx bapr nebhaq gur oybpx guerr gvzrf n jrrx 
 naq rirel zbeavat v rng n cyhz 
 jryy jung rire lbh qb lbh'er jrnevat zr bhg 
 jung nobhg lbh 
 lrnu ybbxf yvxr lbh'er trggvat n yvggyr fcner gver gurer gvtre 
 ernyyl 
 url frvasryqf 
 url ze xenzre 
 ubj ybat ner lbh fgnlvat 
 jr whfg pnzr qbja sbe n shareny 
 bu lrnu lrnu v urneq zneiva xrffyre obl gung znxrf lbh guvax vs ur pbhyq tb 
 frr lbh qbjafgnvef jvgu gur pne 
 ner lbh fher lbh qba'g arrq n unaq jvgu gung 
 ab ab gur yhttntr vf ba gur cebtenz v tbg n oevpx va urer 
 qvq lbh tvir oybbq 
 ab abg tvivat ubneqvat v'z fgbevat vg va gb n oybbq onax whfg va pnfr 
 va pnfr bs jung 
 wreel v xabj zlfrys vs v'z bhg ba gur fgerrg naq vg'f fgnegf gb tb qbja v qba'g onpx bss hagvy vg'f svavfurq 
 ner jr svavfurq 
 qbar 
 rynvar v'z fb tynq lbh pnzr bhg 
 lrnu 
 lbh unira'g frra wvzzl sbe lrnef 
 v xabj v'z tynq v tbg gb frr uvz orsber ur uvg choregl naq tbg lbh xabj nyy yhepul naq njxjneq 
 npghnyyl v'z tbaan arrq fbzrbar gb ybbx nsgre uvz gbzbeebj riravat 
 gbzbeebj riravat fher 
 qb lbh xabj nalbar erfcbafvoyr 
 qb v xabj nalbar 
 jryy vs lbh guvax bs nalobql tvir zr n pnyy 
 jung ner lbh qbvat 
 vaprafr sbe gur zbbq 
 bu lrf ol ab zrnaf gur zbbq yrg zr xabj vs gurer'f nalguvat v pna qb gb yraq fhccbeg gb gur zbbq 
 hz pernz fbqn 
 inavyyn 
 pna lbh oryvrir gung ivivna qbrfa'g guvax v'z erfcbafvoyr 
 jub jnagf gb erfcbafvoyr jura rire nalguvat tbrf jebat gur svefg guvat gurl nfx vf jub'f erfcbafvoyr sbe guvf 
 v pbhyqa'g envfr n xvq pbzr ba v ybir obffvat crbcyr nebhaq 
 jung unccrarq v gubhtug lbh jrer jvgu gnen gbavtug 
 v jnf v unq gb yrnir fur yvg fbzr inavyyn vaprafrf gur fzryy qebir zr ahgf nyy v pbhyq guvax nobhg jnf sbbq v unq gb trg bhg bs gurer jr arrq fbzr chqqvat urer chqqvat 
 lbh whfg yrsg jung qvq lbh gryy ure 
 v gbyq v unq n ohf genafsre gung jnf bayl tbbq whfg sbe nabgure ubhe 
 jung 
 v qba'g xabj v jnf fgneivat wreel 
 bu chqqvat lbh jnag fbzr 
 url lbh thlf guvax v'z trggvat n yvggyrpuhaxl 
 jung ner lbh xvqqvat jr ybbx terng lbh xabj jung guvf chqqvat arrqf gur fxva ba gur gbc lbh xabj yvxr lbhe zbgure hfrq gb znxr vg ba gur fgbir 
 rynvar jung qb lbh guvax 
 v guvax lbh'er trggvat n yvggyr chqqvat haqre gur fxva lbhefrys 
 zl freivpr engrf jrag hc lbh onaxf ner nyy gur fnzr jvgu lbhe uvqqra srrf naq lbhe freivpr punetrf jryy znlor v'yy whfg gnxr zl oybbq ryfrjurer lrnu 
 jryy jr pna genafsre gb nabgure onax sbe lbh 
 bu ab ab abab zber onaxf v'z xrrcvat zl oybbq va zl serrmre jvguzl zbarl 
 fb ru jung qb lbh fnl 
 v thrff jr pbhyq hfr fbzr sbbq va bhe ybirznxvat 
 bx jr tbg lbhetbg lbhe fgenjoreevrf lbhe pubpbyngr fnhpr lbhe cnfgenzv ba elr jvgu zhfgneq lbhe ubarl 
 jnvg jnvg jnvg cnfgenzv ba elr jvgu zhfgneq 
 bu lrnu lrnu qba'g lbh xabj gurl hfrq cnfgenzv va gung zbivr 9 jrrxf erzrzore gur cnfgenzv fprar 
 ab 
 jryy znlor vg jnf tubfgohfgref jurer rire vg jnf vg jbexrq 
 qvqa'g tb sbe vg uhu 
 ab 
 fb fur qvqa'g nccerpvngr gur rebgvp dhnyvgvrf bs gur fnygrq pherq zrngf 
 fur gbyrengrq gur fgenjoreevrf naq gur pubpbyngr fnhpr ohg ru vg'f abg n zrny lbh xabj sbbq naq frk gubfr ner zl gjb cnffvbaf vg'f bayl angheny gb pbzovar gurz 
 angheny frk vf nobhg ybir orgjrra n zna naq n jbzna abg n zna naq n fnaqjvpu 
 wreel v'z abg fhttrfgvat trggvat evq bs gur tvey fur'f vagrteny 
 znlor vafgrnq bs gelvat gb fngvfsl gjb bs lbhe arrqf ubj nobhg fngvfslvat bar bs fbzrobql ryfr'f 
 url fcrnxvat bs juvpu v sbhaq n terng jnl gb frcnengr gur fxva sebz gur gbc bs gur chqqvat jvgubhg yrnivat nal nebhaq gur rqtrf; rknpgb xavsr 
 v gbyq lbh trbetr ab zber chqqvat v'z fgnegvat n chevsvpngvba cebtenz xrrc nyy gung xvaq bs sbbq njnl sebz zr 
 jryy v thrff gurfr jbhyq or bhg bs gur dhrfgvba  
 jung gur uryy vf gung 
 chqqvat fxva fvatyrf 
 url ohqql v'z obeebjvat nyy lbhe ghccrejner 
 bu jul 
 v pybfrq qbja zl nppbhag ng gur oybbq onax 
 jung vgvg'f urer va gur ohvyqvat 
 evtug npebff gur unyy jung lbh jnaan tb frr 
 ab v qba'g va snpg vs rira bar pbechfpyrf bs gung oybbq fubhyq svaq vg'f jnl npebff gung unyy v jvyy sernx bhg ba lbh xenzre sernx bhg 
 lbh xabj sbe n sng thl lbh'er abg irel wbyyl 
 url jbexvat bhg 
 lbh xabj vg naq v qvgpurq nyy zl whax sbbq 
 jung gur urpx vf tbvat ba urer 
 fbeel ohqql pyrna ubhfr vg'f nyy urnygu sbbq 
 jryy v znl unir gb gnxr vg ohg v qba'g unir gb yvxr vg 
 ivivna yrsg zr n zrffntr v thrff n pregnva fbzrbar punatrq ure zvaq nobhg jurgure fbzrbar jnf erfcbafvoyr rabhtu gb jngpu pregnva bgure fbzrbar 
 vf guvf nobhg zr 
 ab 
 bu gura v ybfg vagrerfg 
 ivivna uv vg'f rynvar lrnu v'z bire ng wreel'f v tbg lbhe zrffntrjung lrnu ur'f evtug urer ubyq ba 
 sbe zr tblrnu jung gbavtug lrnu v'yy or gurerlrnu yngre  jryy fbzrobql'f onol-fvggvat 
 lbh v'z zber erfcbafvoyr guna lbh ner 
 qba'g or evqvphybhf abj vs lbh'yy rkphfr zr v unir gb tb gb svyy zl serrmre jvgu zl bja oybbq 
 bu gnen 
 uryyb ivivna bu guvf vf n avpr fperra 
 xenzre 
 qba'g gnxr zl zbarl 
 vg vf zr lbh vqvbg uv nyy evtug lbh'ir tbg gb trg bhg bs urer v'z tbaan onol-fvg gur uryy bhg bs gung xvq 
 ab v'z gur onol-fvggre 
 ab ab ab lbh'er bhg v'z va abj uvg gur ebnq 
 rynvar jung ner lbh qbvat urer 
 xenzre vf npghnyyl fyrrcvat bar bss fb v gubhtug gung v'q uryc bhg jung'f gung fbzr enppbba be fbzrguvat 
 jryy v thrff guvf jbhyq or nyy evtug wvzzl lbh erzrzore rynvar fur'f tbaan jngpu lbh gbavtug 
 uv wvzzl  bhpu  
 url jung ner lbh qbvat urer v gubhtug lbh jrer onol-fvggvat ng ivivna'f 
 gurer jnf na vapvqrag 
 bu ab jurer'f gur oybbq  vg'f va urer vfa'g vg 
 jbhyq lbh fgbc vg 
 jung vf guvf 
 vg'f wryy-b 
 jung nobhg guvf guvf vf oybbq vfa'g vg 
 guvf vf gbzngb whvpr ybbx 
 bbu lbh'er fvpx lbh'er fvpx 
 jvyy lbh pnyz qbja v gbbx nyy zl oybbq qbja gb arjzna'f ur yrg zr chg vg va uvf zrng serrmre 
 url jung'f tbvat ba jub znqr chqqvat 
 bu lrnu lrnu trbetr ur pnzr ol naq znqr zber bs gubfr chqqvat fxva fvatyrf gurl'er qryvpvbhf 
 qnza gung trbetr v gbyq uvz v qba'g jnag guvf fghss nebhaq urer nalzber 
 urnqf hc 
 nnnu 
 lbh'er qrnq cerfvqrag yvapbya lbh'er qrnq 
 v jvfu v jnf qrnq 
 pna v unir lbhe whvpr 
 nf ybat nf lbh qba'g chg 
 gunaxf sbe gur er-svyy 
 url rynvar ubj qvq vg tb 
 bu ur'fur'f n wbl 
 ernyyl fbzr fvggre unir gbyq zr ur'f ovg bs n unaqshy 
 bu unaqshy bs fhafuvar v jvfu v pbhyq qb guvf rirel qnl 
 bu rynvar gung'f fb tbbq gb urne v'ir orra univat n srj urnygu ceboyrzf yngryl 
 vg'f abg frevbhf vf vg 
 jryy vg zvtug or whfg va pnfr nalguvat qbrf unccra vg'f avpr gb xabj gurer'f fbzrobql yvxr lbh nebhaq 
 bu lrnu gung rugung vf avpr gb xabj  
 nnu 
 vg'f bx wreel v'z evtug urer 
 v pna frr gung jung unccrarq 
 gung xavsr vg avpxrq lbhe whthyne lbh xabj wreel jura fbzrobql lryyf 'urnqf hc' lbh'er abg fhccbfrq gb npghnyyl ybbx hc 
 v'yy erzrzore gung 
 naljnl lbh jrer yhpxl gung v jnf gurer lbh ybfg n ybg bs oybbq 
 jung 
 bu lrnu lbh'ir tbg guerr cvagf bs xenzre va lbh ohqql 
 guerr cvagf bs xenzre'f oybbq 
 v pna srry uvf oybbq vafvqr bs zr obeebjvat guvatf sebz zl oybbq 
 jryy fb zhpu sbe chevsvpngvba jrrx 
 fb ubj'f gur sbeavpngvat tbhezrg 
 qbvat dhvgr jryy gunax lbh lrfgreqnl v unq n fbsg obvyrq rtt naq n dhvpxvr lbh xabj jung vs v pbhyq nqq gi gb gur rdhngvba gung jbhyq ernyyl or gur hygvzngr 
 trbetr jr'er gelvat gb unir n pvivyvmngvba urer 
 url 
 url ubj jnf onol-fvggvat 
 bu whfg terng v sbhaq bhg gung ivivna unf fbzr xvaq bs zrqvpny ceboyrz naq vs gur jbefg unccraf fur jnagf zr gb gnxr pner bs wvzzl 
 bu v'z fher vg jba'g or gur jbefg 
 vg qbrfa'g znggre vs nalguvat unccraf gb ure v'z ba qrpx fpvffbef zvfunc nve fubj qvfnfgre puvarfr betna guvrirfvg'f n qnatrebhf jbeyq 
 fur'f evtug v urneq xenzre tbg zhttrq bhg ba gur fhoheof ba n onol-fvggvat tvt 
 ernyyl 
 ybbx ng guvf ybbx ng gur unve ba gur onpx bs zl arpx vg'f nyy oenzoyr frr vg'f yvxr guvpxrg onpx gurer ybbx v arrq fbzrobql gb funir vg sbe zr uhu 
 v'z abg gbhpuvat gung guvat 
 jryy v unir gb fnl v'z irel fhecevfrq naq qvfnccbvagrq - oybbq oebgure 
 bu ab 
 jung wreel v tnir lbh zl oybbq yvfgra gb lbhe chyfr  url ohqql-url ohqql-url ohqql 
 xenzre v'z abg funivat lbhe arpx 
 fb zl oybbq vf abg rabhtu jbhyq lbh yvxr n xvqarl gbb orpnhfr v'yy tvir vg gb lbh v'yy evc vg bhg evtug urer naq fgnpx vg ba gur gnoyr 
 nyy evtug nyy evtug v'yy qb vg fvg qbja 
 ab ab ab v qba'g unir gvzr evtug abj v'yy pngpu lbh gbavtug jr'yy qb fbeg bs na nyy bire xvaq bs guvat nyy evtug 
 uryyb 
 xenzre pnyyrq ur gbyq gung lbh jrer va n ubfcvgny

 lrf v'z svar 
 ur fnlf ur'f svar 
 gryy uvz gb rng n cyhz

 cyhz

 ze znaqryonhz lbh'er gur crefbany genvare

 jurer'f wvzzl 
 v qba'g xabj v qba'g xabjjr unq ububf sbe qvaare naq gura runaq gura ur chg guvf cynfgvp ont bire uvf urnq naq fgnegrq ehaavat nebhaq hagvy ur tbg gverq naq gura ur ynvq qbja fbzrjurer vv gryy lbh v'z ab tbbq jngpuvat gung xvq 
 fyrrcvat yvxr na natry rynvar lbh'er gur orfg 
 ab v'z n fpnggre oenva gung'f jul v cebonoyl pna'g ubyq n wbo be xrrc n zna

 sbe jung

 cyrnfhevat lbh 
 znanan wreel pbzrf va] 
 jung vf guvf

 v gubhtug lbh jrer tbaan jngpu n ivqrb

 xenzre v'z abg va n zbbq sbe guvf 
 nyy evtug nyy evtug arjzna yrg'f tb teno fbzr znvy fnpxf naq unhy gurfr ornhgvrf bhg bs urer 
 oybbq bire gurer fnhfntrf bire urer v'z yvivat va n fynhtugre ubhfr 
 gbavtug v jnag lbh gb fyrrc ba guvf gbhturaf gur iregroenr  jung va ubyl uryy fnhfntrf vf guvf lbhe qvrg 
 ab gurl'er abg zvar ze znaqryonhz 
 qba'g yvr gb zr ohggre orna jr'er gnxvat vg hc n abgpu 
 fb gur serr ybir ohssrg vf bire 
 v tbg terrql syrj gbb pybfr gb gur fha ba jvatf bs cnfgenzv 
 lrnu gung'f jung lbh qvqv pna'g oryvrir v tbg nabgure frffvba jvgu vmml znaqryonhz ur'f cebonoyl znxrf zr obk n xnatnebb 
 jung'f tbvat ba 
 v qba'g xabj guvf fnaqjvpu vf znxvat zr syhfu 
 bu ab v'yy gryy lbh jung lbh qvq pnyvthyn; lbh pbzovarq sbbq naq frk va gb bar qvfthfgvat hapbagebyynoyr hetr 
 v guvax lbh'er evtug lbh tbaan rng gung 
 ab ohg cyrnfr gryy zr gung'f nyy lbh'er tbaan qb jvgu vg 
 wreel v gryy lbh; vs guvf jbzna qvrf vg vf tbvat gb or n znwbe vapbairavrapr 
 gurfr sevrf ner ernyyl ernyyl tbbq 
 nyy evtug gung'f rabhtu bs gung

 hhu fyrrcl 
 ab znggre jung v qb v pnaabg jrnfry bhg bs envfvat guvf xvq 
 jryy fyrrcl urer vf dhvgr n jrnfry znlor ur pna ong sbe lbh 
 lrnu gung'f jung v arrq; n cvapu jrnfry 
 jul qvq lbh trg evq bs gung fnhfntr 
 vg jnfa'g zr vg jnf ze znaqryonhz

 jung'f jebat jvgu lbhef 
 v tbg ab n/p naq v tbggn xrrc gur oybbq pbyq be vg'yy tb onq 
 nyy evtug ohg guvf vf vg guvf vf gur ynfg snibe jr'er rira 
 nyy evtug rira fgrira bu ol gur jnl jura lbh trg onpx gb lbhe ncnegzrag gel gb xrrc vg qbja orpnhfr arjzna vf gnxvat n anc va lbhe orq 
 bu zna "vs gur ratvar ortvaf gb bireurng ghea bss nve pbaqvgvbare" arire v pna'g qb gung

 ernyyl jul 
 bu lbh unira'g urneq fur'f tbvat gb yvir jvgu ure tenaqcneragf va erqqvat craaflyinavn 
 ure tenaqcnerag cnffrq njnl svir lrnef ntb

 oybbq

 gung xvq

 jub jnf vg 
 v qvq n fubj sbe n pne qrnyrefuvc naq gurl'er trggvat zr n arj fnno 
 jung nobhg lbhe byq pne gurl pbhyqa'g trg xenzre'f oybbq bhg bs vg 
 ab gur ratvar pybggrq lbh xabj jub frg guvf jubyr guvat hc sbe zr senax zrezna 
 sentvyr senaxvr zrezna v arire yvxrq gung thl 
 jul ur'f unezyrff 
 rirel fhzzre lbh thlf jrag gb pnzc gbtrgure v jnf wrnybhf sryg yvxr ur jnf gur fhzzre zr

 ab 
 gbb onq vg jnf rebgvp 
  jryy v'ir unq vg jvgu gurfr wnpxobbgrq guhtf 
 'cbggrel onea' 
 v tbg guerr 'cbggrel onea' pngnybtf va bar qnl gung znxrf rvtug guvf zbagu 
  zven fbeivab guvax fur'q tb bhg jvgu zr 
 jul qba'g lbh whfg guebj 'rz bhg 
 bu ab v'ir orra fnivat gurz hc urer va lbhe ncnegzrag naq abj vg'f cnlonpx gvzr 'cbggrel onea' vf va sbe n jbeyq bs uheg 
  pna v unir bar v arrq bar bs gubfr byq-ybbxvat cubarf fb lbh jnaan teno n ovgr 
 v pna'g v tbggn znxr gur jrrxyl pnyy gb gur sbyxf 
 fb pnyy abj 
 v tbggn cerc v arrq n pbhcyr bs narpqbgrf n srj lbh-jrer-evtug-nobhgf vg'f n jubyr cebprqher jnfa'g sentvyr senaxvr gur bar gung hfrq gb eha vagb gur jbbqf rirel gvzr ur tbg hcfrg 
 gung'f uvz 
 vf ur fgvyy ahgf

 puvarfr sbbq 
  url lbh yvxr fraqvat bhg pngnybtf ubj qb lbh yvxr trggva' 'rz onpx 
 fb znlor gurl unq puvarfr sbbq 
 nsgre qnex cyrnfr ng gurve ntr gung'f yvxr fjnyybjvat fgha teranqrf 
 jryy gurer'f bar jnl gb purpx jurer gurer'f puvarfr sbbq gurer'f yrsgbiref 
  jryy tragyrzra ynvavr vf va ybir 
 gung'f qlanzvgr lrnu v'yy ybbx sbe gur puvarfr sbbq yrsgbiref

 vg jnfa'g juvgrl svfx jnf vg 
 bu trbetr'f sevraq jungrire unccrarq gb uvz 
 abguvat hu v qba'g xabj v tbggn tb 
 fb guvf vf ornhgvshy lbh naq chqql naq guvf arj thl va n ovt cbg bs ybir fgrj 
 bu lrnu chqql jryy v jba'g sver uvz hagvy v frr vs guvf arj thl pna unaqyr gur jbexybnq 
  jvyy lbh ybbx ng guvf zber pngnybtf 'bznun fgrnxf' 'znp jnerubhfr' 'arjfjrrx' v pna'g fgbc nyy gurfr pbzcnavrf fb v'z tbaan nggnpx guvf ceboyrz ng gur pubxr cbvag

 gung'f rira orggre 
 wreel

 guvf vf vg 
 vafvqr gur ina

 jr jrer gra 
 pbzr ba yrg'f gnxr vg sbe n fcva 
 v qba'g jnag n ina 
 jryy whfg gryy uvz lbh jnag gur fnno

 jryy v unir na vqrn xrrc gur ina naq trg n ohzcre fgvpxre gung fnlf 'vs guvf inaf n-ebpxva' qba'g pbzr n-xabpxva'' 
 nyjnlf urycshy 
 bu trbetvr jung ner lbh qbvat urer 
 whfg qebccrq va sbe n ivfvg lbh hu lbh arire pnyyrq zr onpx 
 hu gur cubar oebxr

 jung jurer ner lbh tbvat 
 jr unir n pngrerq nssnve 
 lbh'er tbvat yvxr gung 
  vg'f perngvir oynpx gvr zbir jbzna 
  ab puvarfr yrsgbiref trbetr vf trggva' fhfcvpvbhf 
 rynvar v'z fbeel v'z yngr 
 v'z tbaan or va gur pna 
 bxnl wnpx  pna v hfr lbhe cubar 
 fher 
  chqql vg'f rynvar jr'er guebhtu lrnu gung'f evtug ntnva 
  avpr pncgnva'f punvef uhu 
 nlr nlr 
 bu gurer'f n fcbg whfg onpx hc 
 ubyq ba gurer zhfg or n gehpx onpxvat hc 
 ab gung'f hf 
 terng lbh xabj senaxvr v jnf jbaqrevat jung vs v qrpvqrq gung vg'f fvyyl gb qevir n ina orpnhfr lbh xabj v yvir va arj lbex pvgl vf gurer znlor fbzr jnl v pbhyq rkpunatr vg 
 lbh qba'g yvxr gur ina 
 ab ab ab whfg ulcbgurgvpnyyl 
 v tbggn tb gb gur cnex 
 ab ab lbh qba'g ab jbbqf v ybir gur ina v'z n ina thl 
  purpx vg bhg enva naq fyrrg znl abg fgbc gurz ohg yrg'f frr gurz trg ol gurfr oevpxf 
 jurer'q lbh trg gur oevpxf 
 wreel gur jubyr ohvyqvat vf oevpx 
 fb lbh jnag gb gnxr n evqr jvgu zr bhg gb wrefrl v'z tbaan gel gb fryy gur ina gb n ybg 
 n qrnyre ner lbh vafnar ab gnxr bhg na nq fryy vg cevingryl 
 v qba'g guvax v jnag gb zrrg gur crbcyr gung ner va gur znexrg sbe n hfrq ina 
 pbzr ba wreel whfg yrg zr uryc lbh 
 bx 
 nyy evtug bx evtug urer jr tb lrnu bx fb 'sbe fnyr n ovt whvpl ina' naq bbu lbh tbggn chg qbja 'vagrerfgvat genqrf pbafvqrerq' 
 v qba'g jnag gb genqr 
 ab lbh qba'g unir gb vg'f nyy nobhg gvpxyvat gurve ohlvat obar 
 url lbh xabj jung guvf vf nyy lbhe znvy gurl'er chggva' vg va zl obk abj 
 bu gung'f vg gurl unir tbar gbb sne gurl xrrc chfuvat zr naq chfuvat zr abj v tbg ab pubvpr ohg gb tb qbja gurer naq gnyx gb gurz 
 url wreel v'q yvxr lbh gb zrrg fbzrbar guvf vf wnpx  
 znl v uryc lbh 
 lrnu v'q yvxr gb pnapry zl znvy 
 pregnvayl ubj ybat jbhyq lbh yvxr hf gb ubyq vg 
 bu ab ab v qba'g guvax lbh trg zr v jnag bhg creznaragyl 
 v'yy unaqyr guvf ivbyrg jul qba'g lbh gnxr lbhe guerr ubhe oernx bu pnyz qbja rirelbar ab bar'f pnapryyvat nal znvy 
 bu lrf v nz 
 jung nobhg lbhe ovyyf 
 gur onax pna cnl 'rz 
 gur onax jung nobhg lbhe pneqf naq yrggref 
 r-znvy gryrcubarf snk znpuvarf srqrk gryrk gryrtenzf ubybtenzf 
 nyy evtug vg'f gehr bs pbhefr abobql arrqf znvy jung qb lbh guvax lbh'er fb pyrire sbe svthevat gung bhg ohg lbh qba'g xabj gur unys bs jung tbrf ba urer fb whfg jnyx njnl xenzre v ort bs lbh 
 vf rirelguvat nyy evtug urer cbfgny rzcyblrr arjzna 
 lrf fve v oryvrir rirelguvat vf nyy fdhnerq njnl vfa'g vg ze xenzre 
 bu lrnu nf ybat nf v fgbc trggvat znvy 
  jrypbzr onpx 
 bu 
 dhvpx sbe n pngrerq nssnve 
 v qba'g xabj jung lbh zrna 
 lbh qvgpurq zr gung'f gjvpr abj v qrznaq gb xabj jung'f tbvat ba 
 trbetr jr'ir unq vg jvgu lbh haqrefgnaq jr ybir lbh yvxr n fba ohg rira cneragf unir yvzvgf 
 gur oernxhcf gur svevatf naq rirel fhaqnl jvgu gur pnyyf 
 jung zl jvsr vf gelvat gb fnl vf gung guvf vf fhccbfrq gb or bhe gvzr 
 v'z abg sbyybjvat 
 jr'er phggva' lbh ybfr 
 lbh'er phggva' zr ybbfr 
 abj vs lbh'yy rkphfr zr v'z tbvat gb znxr ybir gb lbhe zbgure 
 gurl qba'g jnag gb frr zr nalzber 
 ohg guvf vf jung lbh'ir nyjnlf jnagrq 
 vg vf v'z whfg abg ernql lrg 
 nj gung'f xvaq bs fjrrg 
 nu fuhg hc wreel zl cneragf guvax gurl pna vtaber zr uru uru jryy gurl orggre guvax ntnva 
 bu ab trbetr cyrnfr jung ner lbh tbvat gb qb 
 lbh erzrzore zl pbhfva euvfn v'z tbaan qngr ure 
 zbgure bs tbq 
 bar yvggyr jvax fur'yy sernx bhg gryy zl cneragf gurl'yy or nyy bire zr jub vf guvf thl 
 gung thl rynvar'f qngvat frrzf ernyyl snzvyvne gb zr v guvax ur znl unir orra n pbzrqvna v jbexrq jvgu bar gvzr jnvg n zvahgr jung vf guvf 
 gung vf gur thl 
 rynvar'f va ybir jvgu gur jvm thl 
 ab fur guvaxf fur'f va ybir jvgu uvz ohg fur'f whfg erzrzorevat guvf byq pbzzrepvny 
 gung'f cerggl cngurgvp 
 v xabj gurl'er abg rira eryngrq 
  url 
 hu url v'z tbaan trg tbvat 
 url unir sha ng gur snzvyl erhavba  fb jung qb lbh xabj nobhg guvf wnpx sryybj 
 vfa'g ur gur orfg 
 lrnu abobql orngf uvz jung xvaq bs jbex qbrf ur qb 
 bu evtug abj ur'f n snpg purpxre sbe arj lbex zntnmvar vg'f abg zhpu ohg vg unf n pregnva glcr bs dhvrg qvtavgl 
  evtug dhvrg qvtavgl nf bccbfrq gb fnl guvf 
 bu ab 
 bu lrf 
  uryyb lrnu gur ina vf fgvyy sbe fnyr fher pbzr ba ohl 
  lrnu v pnyyrq nobhg gur ina

 lrnu gunaxf 
 fher lbh xabj euvfn v'ir nyjnlf sbhaq lbh irel nggenpgvir 
 jung 
 v xabj vg znl fbhaq fubpxvat ohg v whfg pna'g fgbc zlfrys sebz jnagvat lbh 
 lbh jnag gb obeebj zbarl evtug 
 ab ab v-v whfg jnag hf gb or gbtrgure 
 nyy evtug 
 nyy evtug 
 yrg'f tb sbe vg 
 jryy jr pbhyq qnapr nebhaq vg n yvggyr svefg 
  anu yrg'f or onq trbetr yrg'f or ernyyl onq 
 jubn jubn trrm 
  fb ubj pbzr lbh'er fryyvat vg 
 lbh xabj jul v'z fryyvat vg v ungr vg 
 ubj znal zvyrf 
 gjb 
 pvgl be uvtujnl 
 ybbx qb lbh ernyyl jnag gb ohl guvf guvat be jung 
  url url gnxr vg rnfl v'z abg tbaan or cerffherq v'yy jnyx njnl evtug abj vf guvf guvat orag v'z abg cnlvat sbe gung 
 nyy evtug whfg trg bhg bs urer 
 nyy evtug ybbx v'z tbvat gb or ubarfg v'z irel vagrerfgrq va gur ina 
 bx svar 'jung qb v unir gb qb gb chg lbh va guvf ina gbqnl' 
  jryy v qba'g ernyyl unir nal zbarl ohg vg fnlf evtug urer 'vagrerfgvat genqrf pbafvqrerq' 
 lbh chg gung va 
  naq v'z tynq v qvq urer 
 lbh jnag gb genqr zr na haqrefuveg 
 ab v jnag gb genqr lbh fperra yrtraq nagubal dhvaa'f haqrefuveg ur gbbx guvf bss gb qb fvg-hcf va gur cnex naq v anoorq vg 
 gung'f qvfthfgvat 
 jryy vg'f zl svany bssre 
 lbh qhzcrq zr sbe fbzr vqvbgvp gi cvgpuzna 
 ybbx v'z fbeel chqql vg-vg jnf n zvfgnxr fb yrg'f whfg chg vg oruvaq hf naq jr pna pbagvahr yvxr guvf arire unccrarq 
 trr v qba'g xabj jung vs jr'er bhg fbzrjurer naq lbh frr gur znlgnt ercnvezna 
 lbh'er abg gnxvat zr onpx 
  gung'f evtug 
 ur'f abg vqvbgvp ur'f gur jvm naq abobql orngf uvz abobql 
  urer lbh tb znvy vf rivy cnff vg ba url znvy oybjf snk vg gb n sevraq 
 jul qbrf guvf qhzzl unir n ohpxrg ba vgf urnq 
 orpnhfr jr'er oyvaq gb gurve glenaal 
 gura fubhyqa'g lbh or jrnevat gur ohpxrg 
 lrnu zbir nybat orggl 
 vf guvf hu wreel frvasryq'f ina 
 jryy abg nalzber ur genqrq vg gb zr sbe fbzr ubyyljbbq zrzbenovyvn 
 v'z hu v'z fb fghcvq 
 jung 
  v'z fb fghcvq hu rkphfr zr v'z fbeel 
 lrnu avpr gb zrrg lbh 
 fur'f vagb vg 
 fur'f yrnivat zr qvegl zrffntrf ba zl nafjrevat znpuvar 
 fb unir lbhe cneragf sbhaq bhg nobhg vg 
 fur jnagf gb xrrc vg dhvrg fur guvaxf jr unir n erny shgher gbtrgure 
 oenir arj jbeyq nyevtug 
  url lbh thlf 
 url ubj'f gur nagv-znvy pnzcnvta tbvat 
 bu vg'f snagnfgvp jr jrer bhg va sebag bs gur cbfg bssvpr gbqnl naq abg bar crefba jrag va 
 vg'f fhaqnl 
 jul vf gur znvyzna jrnevat n ohpxrg 
 uhu jryy vg flzobyvmrf bhe crefrphgvba 
 gura fubhyqa'g lbh or jrnevat gur ohpxrg 
 url v jnag zl ina xrlf onpx 
 bu jryy v hu gubhtug jr znqr n qrny sbe dhvaa'f g-fuveg 
 ner lbh vafnar tvir 'rz gb zr 
 ab v pna'g v pna'g frr v gbyq senax ur pbhyq obeebj vg lrnu ur jnagf gb zbir fbzr bs trbetr'f fghss vagb fgbentr 
 jnvg n zvahgr ur'f cvpxvat hc gur ina gbavtug guvf vf cresrpg v'yy qevir euvfn gb fbzrcynpr ebznagvp gura jura zl sngure fyvqrf gur qbbe bcra v'z va gur ina xvffvat uvf oebgure'f qnhtugre 
 bu yvfgra wreel bar bs lbhe sevraqf pnzr ol naq ur jnf irel hcfrg gung v unq lbhe jurryf 
 bu ab abg senaxvr 
 jryy v qvqa'g pngpu uvf anzr ohg gura ur jrag ehaavat vagb gur cnex 
 bu ab gur jbbqf gur ubyr 
  url 
 xenzre jung gur uryy ner lbh qbvat 
 v xabj v'z tbaan fjvgpu gur ohpxrg gb fbzrguvat ryfr 
 abg gung 
 jung 
 lbh'er va gebhoyr xenzre v fubhyqa'g rira or gnyxvat gb lbh ohg v'z gryyvat lbh nf n sevraq urer'f ubj vg'f tbvat gb unccra lbh znl or jnyxvat znlor ba n pevfc nhghza qnl whfg yvxr gbqnl jura n znvy gehpx jvyy fybj orfvqr lbh naq n qbbe jvyy bcra naq n znvyzna lbh xabj znlor rira gehfg jvyy bssre gb tvir lbh n yvsg 
 ner lbh guebhtu 
 ab naq ab bar jvyy rire frr lbh ntnva 
 ner lbh guebhtu

  dhvpx trg va

 gunax lbh

 nyy evtug trbetr v'z ernql

 trbe-tvr 
  vf guvf frvasryq'f ina frvasryq'f ina frvasryq'f ina 
  jnvg jung'f ur fnlvat

 ab gurl pnhtug uvz

 fb v gbyq uvz 'uvg gur ebnq v'z tbvat onpx jvgu wnpx' 
 rynvar gung'f gur frpbaq cvrpr bs tbbq arjf gbqnl 
 ernyyl jung jnf gur svefg 
  gurl'er oevatvat zr onpx lrnu v'z gur jvm ntnva 
 jung 
  v'z gur jvm v'z gur jvm 
 jryy jung jung nobhg lbhe snpg-purpxvat wbo 
  bu urer'f n snpg hu v'z gur jvm v'z gur jvm naq abbbbobql orngf zr 
  senaxvr pbzr ba bhg bs gurer 
 lbh ungr gur ina 
 ohg v'z xrrcvat vg nf zhpu nf v ungr gur vqrn bs orvat n ina thl vg'f zhpu orggre guna unatvat bhg urer jvgu gur abpgheany qveg crbcyr 
 fb pna jr tb sbe n evqr 
 lrnu yrg'f whfg trg bhg bs urer 
  ner lbh qbar jvgu gung 
  tbbq ur yrsg gur qbbe haybpxrq 
 jul qvq xenzre unir gb cnex gur ina va gur jbbqf 
 vfa'g vg boivbhf gurer ner ab cnexvat zrgref bhg urer 
  jbj 
  url ybbx ng guvf ubbpuvr znzn 
 bu zl tbbqarff jung unir gurl qbar gb lbh urer 
 uhu jub ner lbh 
 jryy lbh pna whfg pnyy zr urael 
 urael ngxvaf gur cbfgznfgre trareny 
 ynfg gvzr v purpxrq 
 urael pna v trg bhg bs urer abj 
 bu bu fvg n ovg fvg n ovg v zrna nsgre nyy v qebir nyy gur jnl hc urer sebz qp whfg gb gnyx gb lbh 
 bu 
 v rira unq gb pnapry n ebhaq bs tbys jvgu gur frpergnel bs fgngr qb lbh yvxr tbys ze xenzre 
 lrnu 
 xenzre v'ir orra hu ernqvat fbzr bs lbhe zngrevny urer v tbggn or ubarfg jvgu lbh lbh znxr n cerggl fgebat pnfr v zrna whfg vzntvar na nezl bs zra va jbby cnagf ehaavat guebhtu gur arvtuobeubbq unaqvat bhg cbggrel pngnybtf qbbe gb qbbe 
 lrnu un un 
 jryy vg'f zl wbo naq v'z cerggl qnza frevbhf nobhg vg va nqqvgvba gb orvat n cbfgznfgre v'z n trareny naq jr obgu xabj vg'f gur wbo bs n trareny gb ol tbq trg guvatf qbar fb znlor lbh pna haqrefgnaq jul v trg n yvggyr veevgngrq jura fbzrbar pnyyf zr njnl sebz zl tbys 
 v'z irel irel fbeel 
 fher lbh'er fbeel v guvax jr tbg n fgnpx bs znvy bhg ng gur qrfx gung orybatf gb lbh abj lbh jnag gung znvy qba'g lbh ze xenzre 
 fher qb

 bu tbq 
 abj vs lbh'yy rkphfr zr bapr ntnva lbhe zbgure naq v 
 bu znxr vg fgbc 
 v whfg guvax vs lbh obeebj zl oyraqre lbh fubhyq erghea vg 
 jryy jungf gur qvssrerapr -- pbzr ba  -- jrer yvxr pnva naq noyr 
 lrnu ln xabj pnva fyrj noyr 
 ab ur qvqag gurl jrer va ohfvarff gbtrgure vg jnf qel jnyy be fbzrguva 
 bu ab 
 nyy evtug gura jung jnf vg 
 jryy v guvax noyr jbexrq uneq nyy fhzzre uneirfgvat uvf pebcf juvyr pnva whfg cynlrq va gur svryq gura jura jvagre pnzr noyr unq nyy gur ahgf; pnva unq ab ahgf fb ur xvyyrq uvz 
 gur jnl v erzrzore vg pnva ur jnf n fhpprffshy qbpgbe ohg jura ur gbbx guvf fcrpvny sbezhyn ur orpnzr ze noyr 
 ln oebxr zl oyraqre qvqag ln 
 lrnu jryy v jnf gelvat gb znxr teniry naq vg whfg  whfg qvqag jbex bhg 
 v xarj vg 
 jul jrer lbh znxvat teniry 
 jryy  v yvxr gur fbhaq vg znxrf jura lbh jnyx ba vg 
 nnuu guvf ybbxf snzvyvne 
 bs pbhefr vg'f tneontr 
 ab ab ab ab gurfr oebja guvatf gur punvef  wreel guvf vf gur frg sebz gur byq zrei tevssva fubj  gurl zhfg or guebjvat vg bhg guvf fghss orybatf va gur fzvgufbavna 
 lrnu ng yrnfg va gur qhzcfgre oruvaq gur fzvgufbavna 
 ybbx ng guvf obl bar zvahgr ryyvbg tbhyq vf fvggvat ba lbh naq gur arkg guvat - lbh'er lrfgreqnl'f genfu 
 pbzr ba xenzre trg bhg bs gurer 
 ab ab ab lbh tb ba nurnq v'z abg svavfurq gnxvat guvf va bu wreel ybbx  zrei tevssva'f pvtne 
  buuu  
 lbh xabj v hu fcvyyrq n lbtheg fzbbguvr va urer gjb qnlf ntb uz pna'g fzryy nalguvat pna ln 
 onanan 
 evtug 
 trbetr jngpu bhg sbe gubfr cvtrbaf 
 bu gurl'yy trg bhg bs gur jnl lbh ernyyl fzryy onanan 
  bu zl tbq  
 fb hu jurer jr rngvat 
 naq vg jnf uvf vqrn gb chg n fcevt bs cnefyrl ba gur cyngr 
 lbh'er znxvat guvf hc gurer jnf arire n wbfrcu tneavfu 
 jbj  
 bu lrnu gur gblf 
 jurer qvq lbh trg nyy gurfr 
 zl qnq jnf n pbyyrpgbe v vaurevgrq gurz nsgre ur qvrq sebz n ybat cnvashy obhg jvgu 
 fhcre objy url na bevtvany tv wbr  jvgu n shyy sebtzna fhvg 
 wreel jung ner lbh qbvat 
 v'z chggvat guvf ba uvz naq jr'er tbvat gb gur fvax 
 buuu wreel  gurl'er cevpryrff gurl'ir arire orra cynlrq jvgu 
 v whfg jnag n gbhpu rz n yvggyr 
 v fnvq ab abj pbzr urer 
 uv  v'z ybh svyrezna v'z arj urer 
 url jnygre jung vf gur qrny jvgu gung thl 
 hu-ur'f ybh svyrezna ur'f arj urer 
  
 url lbhe pbssrr fgnva ybbxf yvxr svqry pnfgeb 
 lbh'ir orra na rabezbhf uryc 
 lbh ena bire fbzr cvtrbaf ubj znal 
 jung rire gurl unq zvenaqn guvaxf v'z n ohgpure ohg v-v-vg'f abg zl snhyg vf vg qba'g jr unir n qrny jvgu gur cvtrbaf 
 pbhefr jr unir n qrny gurl trg bhg bs gur jnl bs bhe pnef jr ybbx gur bgure jnl ba gur fgnghr qrsrpngvba 
 evtug naq gurfr cvtrbaf oebxr gur qrny v jvyy abg npprcg gur oynzr sbe guvf 
 fb zvenaqn'f pbbyrq ba ln 
 v'z trggvat abguvat 
 lrnu zr arvgure 
 ernyyl v gubhtug lbh naq pryvn jrer fyrrcvat gbtrgure 
 bu gur frk vf jvyq ohg fur'f tbg guvf vaperqvoyr gbl pbyyrpgvba naq fur jba'g yrg zr arne vg 
 v qba'g haqrefgnaq jbzra 
 urer pbzrf bar 
 url jung'f tbvat ba 
 url  neg tneshaxry 
 ab pnfgeb 
 evtug 
 nyy orpnhfr bs guvf perrcl arj thl ng jbex ur whfg - ur whfg pbzrf bhg bs abjurer naq ur'f evtug arkg gb lbh 
 fb ur whfg fvqyrf hc 
 gung'f evtug ur'f n erny fvqyre  
 znlor lbh whfg qvqa'g frr uvz 
 jun-lbh arire frr uvz ur fvqyrq zr ntnva va zl bssvpr v jnf fvggvat gurer znxvat phc-n-fbhc fvatvat gung fbat sebz "gur yvba xvat" 
 unxhan zngngn 
 v gubhtug v jnf nybar 
 gung qbrfa'g znxr vg evtug 
 frr gb zr gur unxhan zngngn vf abg arneyl nf rzoneenffvat nf gur phc bs fbhc 
 jbhyq lbh whfg yrg vg tb 
  url wreel pbzr urer n frp 
 url  
 bu zl tbq 
  vg'f gur zrei tevssva frg  
 ubj qvq lbh trg guvf va urer 
 bu lbh whfg oevat vg va fvqrjnlf naq  ubbx vg 
 fb jurer lbh tbaan fyrrc 
 lrnu  onpxfgntr 
 ruaa guvf punve fzryyf yvxr tneontr 
  bu jryy n ybg bs gur fgnef sebz gur 70'f - gurl jrer abg nf ultvravp nf gurl nccrnerq ba gi lbh gnxr znaavk sbe rknzcyr 
 v'z tbaan trg gung  
 nyy evtug jryy wreel jr'q ybir gb unir lbh onpx nalgvzr  
 jryy rynvar orarf jryy vg'f terng gb unir lbh  obl vf vg cbffvoyr gung lbher rira zber ornhgvshy guna gur ynfg gvzr v fnj lbh 
  
 nuu nu-nujr unq n qrny 
 ze crgrezna urer ner gurfr cntrf gung lbh jnagrq 
 bar zbzrag v'z ernqvat gur zbfg snfpvangvat negvpyr ba gur zbfg snfpvangvat crbcyr bs gur lrne naaaaaq qbar bu lrf v'z fbeel v arrqrq guvf fb dhvpxyl  vg zhfg unir orra na njshy ybg bs jbex gunax lbh irel zhpu lbh gjb 
 jung  
 fb guerr qngrf naq fur fgvyy jba'g yrg zr cynl jvgu ure gblf 
 uz gung'f vagrerfgvat lbh xabj fbzrbar zragvbarq gb zr lbh jrer abg irel unccl jvgu lbhe gblf tebjvat hc

 evtug 
 ur jnf znqr bs jbbq naq va gur enva ur jbhyq fjryy hc naq gura fcyvg 
 naq jr nyy xabj ubj cnvashy gung pna or  
 wreel bu gurer - - 
 bu rynvar orarf jryy guvf vf dhvgr n guevyy lrf pbzr - -  pbzr ba fvg qbja lrf 
   jryy v'yy gryy ln guvf fvqyre thl vf ernyyl punccvat zl uvqr 
 wh - rkphfr zr lrnu jr'er gnyxvat guvf jnl 
 jryy ur'f trggvat perqvg sbe jbex gung v qvq ur'f tbaan fvqyr zr evtug bhg bs n wbo 
 nu abj sbe gubfr bs hf jub qba'g xabj hu fvqyvat vf jung 
 xenzre jung vf jebat jvgu lbh 
 jung qb lbh zrna 
 jryy sbe fgnegref lbh'er ybbxvat ng abgr pneqf 
  v'z tbaan unir gb tvir gung thl n gnfgr bs uvf bja zrqvpvar fb v nz tbvat gb fvqyr gur fvqyre 
 lbh fvqyr l-lbh  lbh fgbzc nebhaq yvxr n pylqrfqnyr 
 abg jvgu gurfr ubarlf  jerfgyvat fubrf 
  bayl va arj lbex  un un 
 wreel 
 bu  urrrll jryy ynqvrf naq tragyrzra vg'f bhe tbbq sevraq trbetr pbfgnamn jung n fhecevfr 
 ghea zhfvp bss  
 lrnu fvg fvg fvg jrrryy  
 jryy vg unccrarq ntnva 
 jung unccrarq 
 rlnnnln-ln-ln v'yy nfx gur dhrfgvbaf jung unccrarq 
 jryy v whfg fgbzcrq fbzr cvtrbaf va gur cnex gurl - gurl qvqa'g zbir 
 nyy evtug yrg'f hu punatr gur fhowrpg nu  abj hu lbh naq hu wreel qngrq sbe n juvyr gryy hf nu  jung jnf gung yvxr 
 gung jnf gur jebat pneq 
 v-v qba'g trg gurfr oveqf gurl'er oernxvat gur qrny vg-vg'f yvxr gur cvtrbaf qrpvqrq gb vtaber zr 
 fb gurl'er yvxr rirelbar ryfr 
  nyy evtug yrg'f gnxr n fubeg oernx 
 bxnl nu  jr'er onpx 
 obl gung-gung onax pybpx vf-vf rvtug zvahgrf bss 
 gura jul qba'g lbh whfg eha vg bire gbb 
 mvat 
 trbetr jung ner lbh qbvat 
 qvq lbh frr gung gung-gung cvtrba qvqa'g zbir v unq gb fjreir gb trg bhg bs gur jnl v fnirq gung cvtrbaf yvsr 
 jung cvtrba lbh qebir evtug vagb gung fdhveery  
 fdhveery jryy jr unir ab qrny jvgu gurz 
  cxrj cxrj cxrj cxrj cxrrrj 
 wreel   gubfr unaqf gurl arire fgbc 
 v'z fbeel tbg nal obbmr jung'f fnl lbh naq v trg evccrq 
 ab gunaxf v unir n urnqnpur pna lbh whfg trg zr na nfcveva 
 nyy evtug 
 buu jvyy abg pnhfr qebjfvarff" 
 urer'f gur arj pbcl lbh jnagrq 
 nu lrf jryy guvf pregnvayl ybbxf yvxr n ybg bs jbeqf va erpbeq gvzr v'z irel vzcerffrq  jvgu obgu bs lbh 
  gunax lbh un un un un  
 hasbeghangryl v nz nyfb qvfthfgrq guvf vf vapburerag qeviry guvf vf n gbgny erqb naq v'z nffhzvat v arrq vg evtug njnl 
 jryy v thrff jr'yy whfg unir -  buu whfg tvzzr gung  
 hua-hu-hua - hua-hu-hua - - irrre irrre irrre irrre irrre irrre irrre irrre n-un un zvffvba nppbzcyvfurq onpx gb onfr wbr  qrr qr-qr qr-qr-qr-qr-qr  
 qbpgbe vf gur fdhveery tbvat gb yvir 
 gurer'f orra znffvir genhzn jr pbhyq bs pbhefr gel gb fnir uvz ohg vg jbhyq or pbfgyl qvssvphyg naq jr'q unir gb fraq njnl sbe fbzr fcrpvny ernyyl gval vafgehzragf

 jr pbhyq chg uvz gb fyrrc 
 jung zvtug gung pbfg 
 jryy vg'f ol gur cbhaq fb  nobhg 80 pragf 
 jryy  v jnf whfg - v'z phevbhf gung'f nyy jr hu jr'q yvxr lbh gb qb rirelguvat cbffvoyr

 rhr-nnn

 ner lbh zneevrq evtug abj  
 arjzna

 gur obbz obk vapvqrag

 frrzf ernfbanoyr

 gur png 
 ur gbbx bhg xehtre 
 v whfg cenl xehtre qbrfa'g ernyvmr gung vg'f tbar hagvy guvf thl pna svk vg hc 
 guvf fyvpre vf vaqbzvgnoyr

 qrezngbybtl

 fxva pnapre qnza 
 lbh jrer evtug xenzre guvf fyvpre vf nofbyhgryl nznmvatlrnu lrnuab ab ab v'yy oevat vg ol gbavtugbx olr 
 gurfr urnyf ner fb harira  
 urer lbh ze pbfgnamn 
 jung vf guvf guvf vf n qenjvat 
 ybbxf erny qbrfa'g vg 
 guvf vf n pnegbba 
 url v unq gb qenj gung thl sebz zrzbel pbafvqrevat v guvax gung'f qnza tbbq 
 ohg vg'f abg n cubgbtencu v arrq n cubgbtencu 
 gura lbh orggre trg n pnzren 
 ur ybbxf yvxr n crnahgf punenpgre 
 v xabj gur bayl jnl gb svk vg abj vf gb trg n jubyr arj cubgb bs xehtre 
 lbh pna qb gung 
 jvgubhg uvf fuveg ba 
 lbh pna'g qb gung jryy znlor xehtre jnfa'g gur cynpr sbe lbh 
 vg frrzrq fb qvfbetnavmrq 
 v haqrefgnaq 
 jung nobhg gur pbnfg thneq frrzf yvxr n ybg bs cevqr gurer n ybg bs genqvgvba 
 gehr lbh zrna sbe lbh 
 v guvax 
 jung nobhg lbhe frn fvpxarff 
 znlor v pbhyq or n ynaq thl 
 v qba'g xabj vs gurl unir ynaq thlf 
 fbzrbar'f unir gb haubbx gur obng orsber vg yrnirfgur cynpr 
 cyvref 
 qenjre 
 tbg vg 
 jung ner gurl sbe 
 vruv tbg n cvrpr n zl urny fghpx va n fyvpre 
 pbzr ntnva 
 bxnl v tbg n yvggyr fyvpre unccl ohg yvfgra; qba'g gryy xenzre bxnl ur unf irel fgebat srryvatf sbe vg 
 v sbetbg gb nfx lbh; ubj qvq gur eriratr qngr tb 
 ru vg jrag bxnl 
 qvq lbh qerffrq avpr qvq lbh qb vg pynffl 
 lrnu v fgnegrq bhg erny pynffl 
 lrnu lbh qvq lbh pynffrq vg hc 
 ohg gura v sbhaq bhg nobhg gur fxva pnapre 
 bu fb vg onpxsverq 
 lrnu 
 fb v thrff v jnf yhpxl gung v arire gevrq gung zlfrys 
 bs pbhefr fur gerngf fxva pnapre gung'f ubj v zrg ure fur jnf qbvat n fxva pnapre fperravat ng crgrezna gung'f jung qrezngbybtvfgf qb 
 fnqyl gung xabjyrqtr pbhyq'ir uryc zr 
 jnvg n zvahgr fur qvq n fxva pnapre fperravat ng crgrezna 
 nun 
 pbhyq fur qb gung ng xehtre 
 v qba'g xabj v thrff 
 fb v frg hc n fperravat rirelbar gnxrf gurve fuveg bss naq pyvpx v fanc zr n fubg bs n orne-purfgrq xehtre 
 lbh unir n yvggyr guvat sbe guvf sryyn' 
 wreel lbh tbggn gnyx gb fvgnevqrf 
 lrfgreqnl lbh fnvq v unq gb trg zl eriratr ba ure 
 naq gung jnf jebat wreel lbh fvzcyr zhfg gb ncbybtvmr 
 zhfg v 
 lrf orpnhfr vg vf gur zngher nqhyg guvat gb qb 
 ubj qbrf gung ersyrpg zr 
 rynvar nyevtug jurer'f gur fc2000 pnhfr v tbggn fyvpr 
 nnu v sbetbg vg v tbggn trg ubzr 
 bx v'yy tb jvgu lbh 
 hzz v'z abg npghnyyl tbvat fgenvtug gb ubzr v unir gb svefg fgbc ng gur rupvephf lbh xabj jvgu nyy gurpybjaf 
 bu jryy lbh unir sha bu ab pybjafungr pybjafgur pybjaf 
 fb ntnva v'z fbeel v unq ab evtug gb lryy ng lbh lbh'er n yvsr fnivat qbpgbe naq v'z whfg n pbzrqvna 
 wreel rabhtu v'yy qb lbhe sevraq'f pnapre fperravat orpnhfr v oryvrir va gung ohg nf sne nf lbh naq v ner pbaprearq; vg'f bss 
 jnf vg cvzcyr cbccre zq 
 gung'f gur bar  
 fgvyy tbg vg 
 bhg qnza urny 
 rynvar 
 xenzre 
 lrnu yvfgra v arrq zl fyvpre onpx 
 whfg ubyq ba 
 url jung'f tbvat ba 
 abguvat urer bx v'z ba gur cubar nyevtug v'z ba gur cubar jvgu fbzrbar 
 zl oynqr vf nyy qvatrq hc bu pbzr ba rynvar 
 cubar pnyy v'z va n ovt cubar pnyy 
 pbzr ba guvf vf vzcbegnag  
 url trg gur uryy bhg bs urer 
 jbj gung'f n ybg bs cbgngbrf 
 fb trbetr gbbx zl fyvpre qbja gb xehtre naq gurl'er fzbbguvat vg bhg sbe zr 
 jung gur uryy vf guvf 
 obl gung ybbxf yvxr na nyyretvp ernpgvba unir lbh orra jrnevat n snxr orneq 
 ab 
 jryy jung unir lbh orra qbvat 
 abguvat v tbg hc eha fbzr reenaqf v jrag qbja gb fnen'f bssvpr naq ncbybtvmrq 
 jubn jubn onpxhc qe fvgnevqrf jung unccrarq gurer 
 jryy v gevrq gb ncbybtvfr vg qvqa'g tb bire gung jryy 
 gurer gurer'f lbhe uvirf 
 jung fur tnir zr uvirf 
 wreel nf gur ovoyr fnlf; gubh jub phergu pna znxrgu vyy 
 fur qvq xvaq bs gbhpu zl snpr 
 abj lbh yvfgra gb zr lbh'ir tbg gb svaq guvf jbzna naq gryy ure gung lbh'er abg n grfg ghor cva phfuvba 
 vg qbrf vgpu znlor v jvyy tb qbja ng xehtre naq gnyx gb ure 
 nyevtug terng orpnhfr v tbg gb trg qbja gurer naq cvpx hc zl oynqr url naq v pbhyqa'g svaq gung fgbpx ebbz 
 bu gung'f snagnfgvp 
 v whfg gnyxrq gb ze xehtre ur'yy or qbja va n zvahgr ur jnagrq zr gb gnxr n cubgbtencu sbe gur erpbeq 
 jung erpbeq 
 uvf crefbany svyr v v qba'g nfx 
 wreel jung oevatf lbh urer 
 v qba'g xabj guvf  
 ybbxf yvxr uvirf 
 jurer qb lbh fhccbfr gung pbhyq'ir pbzr sebz 
 wreel jung ner lbh qbvat 
 ur vf whfg frggvat gur erpbeq fgenvtug 
 pbzr ba fvgnevqrf pbc gb vg jung oenaq bs creiregrq fpvrapr qb lbh cenpgvpr 
 ner lbh fhttrfgvat v fbzrubj v vasrpgrq lbh ba checbfr 
 v jnag gur nagvqbgr cvzcyr cbccre 
 gung'f vg v'z bhg bs urer lbh'er vafnar 
 nz v lbh gbhpurq zl snpr v qvqa'g vzntvar gung 
 qe fvgnevqrf qba'g tb bu gunaxf wreel 
 url trbetr url qbp jr qbvat gur fperravat urer 
 nnu lrnu lrnu jba'g lbh urnq ba va jr'yy or va va n frpbaq or evtug jvgu lbh 
 qbp uhu 
 xenzre guvf vf cresrpg v arrq lbh gb tb va gurer cergraq lbh'er n qbpgbe naq purpx guvf thl sbe zbyrf 
 zbyrf lrf serpxyr'f htyl pbhfva 
 naq trg n cvpgher bs uvz jvgu uvf fuveg bss 
 lbh ernyyl ner pbbxvat hc n yvggyr fpurzr urer nera'g lbh 
 nyevtug yrgf trg va gurer dhvpx dhvpx dhvpx 
 guvf vf vg v pna gnxr guvf nalzber 
 fybj evqr) naq "qnaprf" srj yvggyr xvpxf) 
 znyr znzzny nccebkvzngryl 30 gb 60 lrnef bs ntr jrvtughu vaqrgrezvangr bx ze xehtre jr ner tbaan gnxr n cubgb abj sbe gur erpbeqf fb vs lbh'yy fgnaq hc cyrnfr naq tvir zr n ovt fzvyr bu ab ab ab abg gung ovt lrnu gung'f avpr lrf bxnl lrf yrg'f unir n ybbxfrrbx fb ru svore sebz fuveg ba gur yrsg fubhyqre v'z tbaan unir gb xrrc zl ba gung 
 ubj ybat unir lbh orra qbvat guvf qe ina abfgenaq 
 hhu ybat ybat gvzr lrf v'ir frra zbyrf fb ovt gurl unir gurve bja zbyrf serpxyrf gung pbire gjb zra 
 fb ubj nz v ybbxvat 
 bu fb sne fb tbbq lrhlr 
 xenzre v ernyyl bjr lbh bar 
 trbetr jr tbg n ceboyrz 
 jung 
 jryy ur'f tbg n zbyr ba uvf fubhyqre irel fhfcvpvbhf 
 fb gryy uvz lbh'er pbaprearq nobhg vg naq ur fubhyq frr fbzrbar ryfr 
 trbetr jul jbhyq v n whvyyvneq genvarq qrezngbybtvfg fraq uvz gb nabgure qbpgbe 
 orpnhfr lbh'er abg n qrezngbybtvfg 
 ur guvaxf v nz v'z abg tbaan orgenl gung gehfg urer'f jung v jnaan qb; v guvax v pna trg n frpgvba 
 jubn jubn n frpgvba 
 lrnu vs v pbhyq peno zl fyvpre naq ur'q ubyq fgvyy 
 ab lbh'er abg gnxvat n qryv fyvpre gb zl obff 
 vg'yy or bcrengvir guvat ur jbhyq oneryl srry vg 
 ab nofbyhgryl abg 
 jryy vg'f zl zrqvpny bcvavba gung lbh'er znxvat n ovt zvfgnxr naq vg'f tbvat va zl puneg 
 va-n-tnqqn-qn-ivqn)] 
 lrnu uryyb vf guvf nyyvrq ybpx fzvgu bu svanyyl yvfgra v arrq fbzrbar gb pbzr bire urer evtug njnl 
 ghea vg bss ghea vg bss 
 v nz trggvat n ybpx fzvgu nyevtug erynk 
 nyevtug gung'f vg 
 lrnu gur nqqerff vf 78gu jrfg 
 bu bu znzn 
 fb xenzre chyyrq vg bss 
 lrc naq gur cubgb jnf nyy svkrq naq onpx ba uvf qrfx ab gunaxf gb lbh 
 jryy gung jbzna unq vg pbzvat gb ure ybbx ng zl arpx vg ybbxf yvxr v unq n orneq bs orrf 
 jul qba'g lbh frr fbzrbar nobhg vg 
 v'ir pnyyrq rirelbar lbh xabj ubj uneq vg vf gb trg n qrezngbybtvfg va guvf gbja  n erny qrezngbybtvfg 
  fdhnzbhf pryy pnepvabzn 
 lbh'er abg n qbpgbe lbh fubhyqa'g rira unir obbxf yvxr guvf 
 trbetr gung'f jung ur unf naq v unir gb tvir uvz n pnyy abj jr tbggn pnzr pyrna 
 lbh pna'g gryy uvz gur gehgu lbh'er tbaan oybj gur jubyr guvat 
 v qba'g jnag guvf ba zl pbafpvrapr 
 v'yy trg uvz gb frr n erny qbpgbe lbh whfg fgnl njnl sebz guvf 
 lrnu nyevtug 
 url v jbaqre vs gurl unir n cvpgher bs zl enfu va urer 
 gurl'ir tbg rirelguvat gurer wreel v haqreyvarq gur orfg cnegf 
 url guvf ybbxf yvxr gur guvat v unir pnhfrq ol rkcbfher gb oramrar n pbzzba vaterqvrag va zrgny pyrnaref 
 jryy gung'f jrveq 
 jung ner lbh qbvat 
 jryy v'z pyrnavat zl fyvpre 
 gung'f zl unaq gbjry v hfr gung ba zl snpr unaqf naq purfg gung'f jurer gur uvirf ner pbzvat sebz vg'f abg sebz qe fvgnevqrf vg'f sebz qe ina abfgenaq 
 fb fbzrubj gur oebamb  vf ernpgvat gb gur cbvfba fur'f tvivat lbh 
 nyevtug trg bhg naq gnxr lbhe oebamb jvgu lbh  
 buu gung'f gbkvp  bhbhbh 
 trbetr pbzr va v'z whfg tbvat bire bhe naahny ercbegobl qvq jr gnxr vg ba gur puva ynfg lrne 
 ru yvfgra ze xehtre v tbg n zrffntr sebz qe ina abfgenaq naq ur fnlf vg zvtug or jvfr gb lbh gb frr nabgure qbpgbe nobhg gung zbyr 
 v'z abg gbb jbeevrq nobhg vg 
 jryy ur fnvq vg pbhyq or pnapre znlor lbh fubhyq trg vg purpxrq bhg 
 trbetr gnxr n ybbx ng guvf cubgb guvf vf gnxra 10 lrnef ntb gung zbyr ybbxf rknpgyl nf vg qbrf gbqnl fb gurer'f ab pnhfr sbe pbaprea ru 
 jungrire 
 npghnyyl shaal guvat nobhg guvf cubgb jr jrer ng gur ornpu naq gurer jnf guvf qhzo ybbxvat thl arne ol jura ur jrag va sbe n fjvz zl fbaf naq v gbbx nyy uvf fghss naq guerj vg va gur bprna jung n crne funcrq ybfre 
 jryy gung crne funcrq ybfre jnf zr naq v jnf va gung cubgb hagvy v oebxr va urer fgbyr gur cubgbtencu naq nveoehfurq zlfrys bhg bs gurer 
 jryy v'yy orlbh unir ybfg n ybg bs unve 
 gung'f jung gurl gryy zr 
 qb lbh jnag zber cnfgenzv 
 hz jung jnf gung ynfg guvat lbh tnir zr gung jnf cerggl tbbq 
 lrnu vg jnf byvir ybns lbh jnag gung 
 v pna'g oryvrir xehtre qvqa'g sver lbh nsgre nyy lbh qvq 
 ur fnvq ur qvqa'g pner bu tbq v ybir gung cynpr url unir lbh frra bgure qrezngbybtvfg 
 lrnu v svanyyl tbg gb frr qe xnmnevna ur fnvq vg jnf ernyyl onq 
 jung qvq ur tvir lbh sbe vg 
 nybr fb jurer'f gung ybpx fzvgu 
 unir gb tvir uvz gvzr ba guvf ubhe 
 pna v unir n mvc  
 bu lrnu pbzvat hc 
 fb rynvar ner lbh tbvat gb fyrrc jvgu zr be jung 
  trbetr v whfg tbg bss n gjragl-guerr ubhe cynar evqr v'z gbb gverq gb rira ibzvg ng gur gubhtug 
  svar v'yy nfx lbh ntnva jura lbh'er erfgrq 
  bu v'z fher fur'yy pbzr nebhaq 
 lrnu v ubcr fb sbe lbhe fnxr 
  v fnvq v jnf fbeel 
 lbh pna fghss lbh fbeevrf va n fnpx zvfgre 
  jbhyq lbh cyrnfr fgbc fnlvat gung 
  jung vf hc jvgu lbh gjb 
 v qba'g jnag gb gnyx nobhg vg 
  fb ubj jnf gur ovt gevc 
 v qba'g jnag gb gnyx nobhg vg 
  jryy jung unccrarq gb lbhe abfr 
 v qba'g jnag gb gnyx no-bj-g vg  
 jryy lbh tbggn tvir zr fbzrguvat pbzr ba ubj jnf gur jrqqvat jnf gur oevqr enqvnag 
 fur jnf 
 'gvyy fur sbhaq bhg rynvar fyrcg jvgu gur tebbz 
  bbbuu gung fbhaqf whvpl yvfgra v tbggn tb gb gur onguebbz ohg v jnag gb urne nyy nobhg vg  
  lbh xabj v qvqa'g tb gb gur onguebbz gur ragver gvzr jr jrer va vaqvn 
 v pna'g oryvrir jr jrag nyy gur jnl gb vaqvn sbe n jrqqvat 
 vaqvn] 
 "vaqvn - bar qnl rneyvre" 
 gung'f vg gur jrqqvat'f bss 
 jung ohg fhr ryyra- 
  rynvar lbh jrer zl znvq bs ubabe naq lbh fyrcg jvgu zl cvagre 
 ab ab ab vg jnf lrnef ntb - orsber lbh zrg uvz naq naq v - v tbg gb gryy lbh vg jnf irel zrpunavpny 
 v unir arire orra fb uhzvyvngrq 
  vqvbgf guvf vf nyy lbhe snhyg 
  abg zr uvz uvf snhyg ur orgenlrq zr 
  trbetr v'z fbeel 
 bu lbh pna fghss lbhe fbeevrf va n fnpx zvfgre 
  v qba'g xabj jung gung zrnaf 
  avan lbh unir gb qrpvqr evtug abj wreel be zr 
  nyevtug arvgure 
 jung jryy jung ner lbh qbvat urer 
 n serr gevc gb vaqvn naq ol gur jnl lbh pna gnxr bss gubfr obbgf rirelbar xabjf lbh'er svir' fvk 
 svir' rvtug svir' frira 
  frr frr gur jnl gurl ner jr'er - jr'er fgvyy orfg sevraqf evtug 
 ab  naq gnxr gung fghcvq guvat bhg bs lbhe abfr 
 gung'f tbg gb uheg v qba'g pner jurer lbh'er sebz 
  jung gvzr vf bhe syvtug onpx v tbg gb tb gb gur onguebbz 
 n ohvyqvat va vaqvn - gur jrqqvat prerzbal vf nobhg gb fgneg]

 jung unccrarq ynfg avtug

 "bar ubhe rneyvre"

 wreel'f ebbz va vaqvn]

 vaqvna nvecbeg] 
 "guerr ubhef rneyvre - vaqvn" 
 bu tbq vg'f fb ubg  jung vf gung fzryy 
  v guvax vg'f gur fgrapu bs qrngu 
 trbetr lbh'ir orra jrnevat gubfr obbgf fvapr v zrg lbh lbh'er abg tbaan jrne gurz gb gur jrqqvat ner lbh 
 ab  v'z tbaan jrne oynpx fubrf 
  bu obl gurer'f fhr ryyra fur qvqa'g jnag zr ng guvf jrqqvat ohg urer v nz jvgu n ohapu bs zl vqvbg sevraqf 
  guvf vf tbaan or terng 
  rynvar bu bu v nz fb unccl gb frr lbh 
  lbh ner 
 jryy bs pbhefr ab bar ryfr jnf rira jvyyvat gb pbzr gb vaqvn v zrna abg rira cvagre'f cneragf - naq gurl'er vaqvna 
 pbzr ba fhr ryyra lbh qba'g jrne n oen lbh'er gnyy jr ungr rnpu bgure 
 rynvar v xabj v xabj jr'ir unq bhe ceboyrzf ohg v jnag lbh gb or zl znvq bs ubabe - naq zl orfg sevraq 
  uhu nyevtug v thrff 
 hu guvf vf zl svnap cvagre  fnl uryyb 
  uryyb 
  crgre

  bu ab ab jr'er tbbq yrg'f trg tbva' nyevtug  jngpu vg shaal zna  
 rynvar unir lbh abgvprq trbetr jnf npgvat fgenatr gur jubyr syvtug 
  ab jung yvxr jung jung fgenatr ab v 
  hu-uhu url ybbx jung gurl unq ba gur cynar fpuanccf 
 bbbuu 
 wreel/xenzre'f ncnegzrag ohvyqvat] 
 "gur avtug orsber arj lbex"

 vfa'g guvf terng jvgu gubfr areqf va nppbhagvat zbirq lbh naq v ner gur bayl barf jub hfr guvf onguebbz

 fher 
  jebat cvcr 
 fb fur pbhturq 
 pbhtuvat anxrq vg'f n ghea-bss zna 
 rirelguvat tbrf jvgu anxrq 
 jura lbh pbhtu gurer ner gubhfnaqf bs hafrra zhfpyrf gung fhqqrayl fcevat vagb npgvba vg'f yvxr jngpuvat gung sng thl pngpu n pnaabaonyy va uvf fgbznpu va fybj zbgvba 
 bu lbh fcbvyrq fcbvyrq zna qb lbh abj ubj zhpu zragny raretl v rkcraq whfg gelvat gb cvpgher jbzra anxrq 
 ohg gur guvat lbh qba'g ernyvmr vf gung gurer'f tbbq anxrq naq onq anxrq anxrq unve oehfuvat tbbq; anxrq pebhpuvat onq url gurer'f unaxr 
 nyy evtug vg'f tebiry gvzr 
 url trbetr wreel yvfgra v whfg tbg fbore fb v'ir orra tbvat guebhtu gur gjryir fgrcf 
 jung ner lbh hc gb abj hu fgrc avar 
 lrnu znxvat nzraqf 
 vzcbegnag fgrc znlor gur zbfg vzcbegnag 
 naljnl hu wreel lbh xabj guvf znl fbhaq qhzo ohg lbh xabj jura jr svefg zrg v gubhtug lbhe anzr jnf tnel naq v guvax v znl rira unir pnyyrq lbh tnel n pbhcyr bs gvzrf naq v qba'g xabj vs lbh abgvprq ohg v nyjnlf sryg onq nobhg vg fb v'z fbeel 
 gunax lbh v qvq abgvpr naq v nccerpvngr lbh erpgvslvat vg 
  terng terng jryy v'yy frr lbh thlf yngre 
  jryy v whfg tbg bhg bs n 27-zvahgr fubjre v znqr fbzr tbbq phgf naq v qvqa'g ybfr nalguvat v arrqrq lrnu v guvax jung v xrcg vf rira fgebatre abj 
  lbh tbg fbzr fhqf bire urer 
  jun bu zna trrm ybbx ng gung v'z nyy yngurel wreel lbh tbg gb fubj zr jung v'z qbvat jebat 
 bu pbzr ba 
 ab v zrna vg zna v'z ybfg 
 lbh cebzvfr lbh'yy arire pbzr va urer ntnva 
  bu wreel lbh xabj v pna'g qb gung 
  abj zl frafr bs vg vf gung lbh'er cebonoyl jnfgvat gvzr jbexvat cvrprzrny svefg pyrnavat bar nern gura nabgure
