 bx yrg'f ghea gur jngre ba abj 
 ab v gbyq lbh vg'f whfg n qel eha 
  jryy unaxr'f zbirq ba gb fgrc gra ur jnf fcbggrq gnxvat crefbany vairagbel 
 gung'f fgrc gra 
 nyy ur unf gb qb abj vf pbhag uvf oyrffvatf fnl n cenlre naq ur'f qbar qb lbh oryvrir guvf 
 pbzr ba wreel ubj nobhg n-n onttl fjvzfhvg 
 lbh'er abg trggva' nal fxva xenzre 
 jryy guvf unf nyy orra bar ovt grnfr 
  gurfr cebbsf ybbx cerggl tbbq bu pna v zbir guvf lhc v guvax guvf jvyy jbex 
  v'z tbaan trg nabgure obggyr bs jngre 
  urer gnxr zvar gurer'f n yvggyr yrsg 
  bu gunaxf jnygre nuu 
  thlf gurer'f ab qbhog gung gur cnl vf tbbq ohg v qba'g whfg xabj vs v frr zlfrys jbexvat jvgu vpr pernz 
 lbh trg cerggl ohss sbernezf 
 v qba'g xabj vs v'z vagb gung 
  bu uryyb unaxr bguref 
 trbetr 
 lbh xabj wnfba v hu v pbhyqa'g uryc abgvpr v v qvqa'g trg zl ncbybtl 
 ncbybtl sbe jung 
 n qensgl ncnegzrag n fjrngreyrff sevraq n onyy-tnzr tvirnjnl zrgyvsr jvaqoernxre 
 trbetr pbzr ba abg gung arpx ubyr guvat 
 lrnu gur arpx ubyr guvat naq v jbhyq nccerpvngr vg vs lbh jbhyq fnl lbh'er fbeel 
 ab jnl lbh jbhyq'ir pbzcyrgryl fgergpurq vg bhg 
 lbh'er na nypbubyvp lbh unir gb ncbybtvmr fgrc avar fgrc avar 
 nyy evtug trbetr nyy evtug v'z fbeel v'z irel irel fbeel v'z fb fbeel gung v qvqa'g jnag lbhe engure ohyobhf urnq fgehttyvat gb svaq vgf jnl guebhtu gur abezny-fvmr arpx ubyr bs zl svaryl xavg fjrngre 
  abj frr gung'f fzneg pbafgnag zbgvba jbj 
  url 
 bu lrnu lrnu v-v'z jngpuvat lbh gbb ohg guvf thl'f ernyyl fubjvat zr fbzrguvat 
  lbh tbg n fgrnx 
 jung unccrarq gb lbh 
 nu crbcyr va guvf pvgl ner penml 
  urer ln tb 
  gunaxf ohqql bu lrf url lbh tbg nal n1 'pnhfr v'z pbbxvat n fgrnx 
 jung 
 lrnu n qvssrerag bar 
  bu 
 wreel 
  bx wreel v svkrq gung ovxr 
 bu gung jnfa'g ernyyl arprffnel v qba'g evqr vg vg'f whfg sbe fubj 
  v fubhyq ernyyl pyrna gubfr ornevatf ubyq guvf ybbx ng nyy gung thax 
 cyrnfr qba'g pebhpu 
 bhpu pnhtug zl fxva 
 bu gung'f onq rfcrpvnyyl gung nern 
 lbh tbg nalguvat gb fanpx ba 
 huu 
  bu cvpxyrf haauuuu vg'f n gbhtu bar 
 ybbx cyrnfr fgbc yrg zr uryc lbh jvgu gung 
  haaaau bbbu gung'f tbaan yrnir n jryg ybbx ng gung 
  v pna'g v pna'g ybbx nalzber v-v-v'ir frra gbb zhpu 
 crttl jr'ir tbg gb gnyx jung vf vg nobhg zr gung lbh svaq fb bssrafvir 
 lbh frrz gb or jvgu n ybg bs zra 
 jung v unccra gb unir n irel fgrnql oblsevraq lbh xabj v zrna jr oebxr hc n srj gvzrf naq gurer unf orra na bppnfvbany thl urer be be gurer ohg ju-jul vf guvf lbhe ohfvarff 
 vg'f abg tbbq qnl 
  bu nyy evtug lbh guvax v'ir tbg trezf v'yy tvir lbh fbzr trezf ubj nobhg fbzr sbe lbhe xrlobneq uhu uhu bbbu ubj nobhg sbe lbhe fgncyre uzzz gung'f tbbq vfa'g vg lbh unir n unccl naq n urnygul 
 jryy grpuavpnyyl ur qvq ncbybtvmr 
 wreel v sryg yvxr n fgenvtug zna va fbzr ubeevoyr fxrgpu ur jnf evssvat evssvat ba zl cnva 
 fb abj lbh jnag na ncbybtl sbe gur ncbybtl cyhf gur bevtvany ncbybtl 
 gung'f evtug v'z gjb va gur ubyr 
 jryy v uvg gur jnyy lrfgreqnl jvgu ynql tbqvin fur qvq n shyy obql syrk ba n cvpxyr wne 
 qvq lbh rkcynva gb ure nobhg gur tbbq anxrq naq gur onq anxrq 
 jurer nz v tbaan trg n sng thl naq n pnaabaonyy 
 jryy jung vs lbh fubjrq hc onq anxrq uhu lbh fgvyy tbg gung oryg fnaqre 
 lrnu 
  jryy lbh ba nyy sbhef gung guvat ivoengva' xvpxva' hc fnjqhfg ub ub fur'yy trg gur cvpgher 
  uryyb 
 url wreel thrff jurer v'z pnyyvat sebz 
 jbeyq jne v cynar 
 ab v'z va zl fubjre jryy lbh xabj v'z gelvat gb trg bhg bs gur fubjre fbbare naq gura v nfx zlfrys 'jul' v zrna guvf vf jurer v jnag gb or fb v tbg n jngrecebbs cubar v funirq v oehfurq zl grrgu naq abj v beqrerq n cnve bs puvabf sebz w perj 
 jura ner ln trggva' bhg 
 v'z abg v'yy frr ln yngre ohqql 
 onq arjf crbcyr crttl vf ubzr fvpx 
 bu cyrnfr 
 fur'f fghssrq hc npul naq fhssrevat sebz vagrafr znynvfr 
 bu pbzr ba jr nyy unir vagrafr znynvfr evtug 
 v whfg fcbxr jvgu ure rynvar fur'f va orq 
 lrnu yrg zr gryy lbh fbzrguvat guvf vf nyy va ure zvaq bx fur vf vafnar fur guvaxf v znqr ure fvpx orpnhfr v pbhturq ba ure qbbexabo ehoorq ure fgncyre va zl nezcvg naq chg ure xrlobneq ba zl ohgg lrnu fur'f n jnpxb 
 fb lbh'er wnfba unaxr'f fhcreivfbe 
 fcbafbe 
 jungrire yvfgra v'z irel pbaprearq nobhg guvf thl 
 ur'f qbvat irel jryy ur'f nyernql ba gb fgrc gra 
 lrnu jryy jura lbh qba'g npghnyyl qb gur fgrcf lbh pna tb guebhtu gurz cerggl dhvpx lbh pna trg guebhtu fvk n qnl 
 vf gurer fbzr haerfbyirq vffhr orgjrra lbh naq wnfba 
 v qba'g xabj n yvggyr guvat pnyyrq fgrc avar vafgrnq bs na ncbybtl ur jnf orobccva' naq fpnggva' nyy bire zr 
 v'z abg fher jung lbh jnag zr gb qb 
 jryy nera'g lbh gur obff bs uvz lbh fubhyqa'g yrg uvz zbir hc jura v jnf va gur pho fpbhgf v tbg fghpx ba jrrobybf sbe guerr lrnef 'pnhfr v xrcg ybfvat gur cvarjbbq qreol 
 lbh'er dhvgr hcfrg trbetr 
 jryy v guvax lbh fubhyq qebc uvz qbja gb fgrc gjb 
 nqzvg gurer'f n uvture cbjre 
 lrnu yrg uvz purj ba gung sbe n juvyr 
 lbh xabj trbetr v guvax v pna uryc lbh jr'er univat n zrrgvat gbzbeebj jul qba'g lbh whfg pbzr ol 
 nyy evtug gung'f zber yvxr vg gunax lbh irel zhpu  ol gur jnl zl hapyr jnf na nypbubyvp fb 
  ybzrm lbh'er abg yvfgrava' wreel yvxrf gur anxrq whfg fbzr bs gur guvatf fur qbrf jura fur'f anxrq pnyz qbja v'z ba lbhe fvqr trrm url ubyq ba n frpbaq v tbg n pybt v'yy pnyy ln onpx 
  jung ner lbh qbvat 
  v sbhaq n ebhtu fcbg ba gur xvgpura sybbe v gubhtug v'q cbyvfu vg hc jvgu guvf oryg fnaqre v unir urer 
 ab abg gung jul ner lbh anxrq 
 v gubhtug anxrq vf tbbq 
  guvf vfa'g tbbq anxrq 
 trbetr urer unir n frng 
  jurer'f unaxr 
  fuuuuu 
 bx yrg'f trg fgnegrq jrypbzr gb entr-nubyvpf nabalzbhf 
 jung engr-nubyvpf 
 trbetr guvf pna uryc lbh 
 url v nz abg urer sbe entr v'z urer sbe eriratr 
 rkphfr zr jr unir n 'ab lryyvat' cbyvpl ng gurfr zrrgvatf 
 rkphfr zr nz v gnyxvat gb lbh cvaurnq nz v 
 cyrnfr qba'g pnyy zr 'cvaurnq' 
 v'z ybfva' vg 
 ur gbbx lbh gb entr-nubyvpf jul 
 cebonoyl orpnhfr guvf jubyr havirefr vf ntnvafg zr 
 lbh'ir tbg n yvggyr entr 
 v xabj naq abj gurl jnag zr gb obggyr vg hc vg znxrf zr fb znq 
 ol gur jnl zl onq anxrq qrzb qvqa'g dhvgr jbex 
 guvf oernq unf ahgf va vg 
  bu terng rynvar jung vf jebat jvgu zl obql 
 puvpxra jvat fubhyqre oynqrf 
 gung'f vg 
 ab ohg gung'f bar ceboyrz jul 
 jryy v jnf jnyxvat nebhaq anxrq va sebag bs zryvffn gur bgure qnl-- 
 jubn jnyxvat nebhaq anxrq nuu gung vf abg n tbbq ybbx sbe n zna 
 jul abg vg'f n tbbq ybbx sbe n jbzna 
 jryy gur srznyr obql vf n jbex bs neg gur znyr obql vf hgvyvgnevna vg'f sbe trggva' nebhaq yvxr n wrrc 
 fb lbh qba'g guvax vg'f nggenpgvir 
 vg'f uvqrbhf gur unve gur gur yhzcvarff vg'f fvzvna 
 jryy fbzr jbzra yvxr vg 
 uzz fvpxvrf 
  vafgnyyvat lbhe pynexzna tneontr qvfcbfny qvfznagyr yngpu unfc orarngu znva qenvantr ybg bu pbzr ba pynexzna 
  chqql 
 vf hu qnivq chqql gurer 
 guvf vf chqql 
 jryy guvf vf xenzre 
 v xabj 
 hz yvfgra lbh'er n zrpunavp pbhyq lbh uryc zr vafgnyy n tneontr qvfcbfny 
 jryy vg'f n ovt wbo lbh'ir tbg gb qvfznagyr gur yngpu unfc sebz gur nhkvyvnel qenvantr yvar 
 ab vg fnlf 'znva yvar' 
 vg'f n zvfcevag jung qb lbh tbg n pynexzna 
 lrnu 
  url zna v'yy pnyy lbh onpx v'yy gnyx lbh guebhtu vg 
 bu bx jryy gunaxf ohqql 
 url chqql 
 url onor lbhe obff pnyyrq lbh bjr svir ohpxf sbe n onyybba obhdhrg lrnu ur fnlf lbh pna whfg tvir vg gb uvz gbzbeebj jura lbh frr uvz 
 onyybba obhdhrg sbe jub 
 crttl gbbx n ghea sbe gur jbefg 
 crttl bu terng v fhccbfr fur'f fgvyy oynzvat zr 
 gung'f jung ur fnvq 
 v qba'g oryvrir guvf jbzna 
 gnyx gb zr onor 
 fur'f guvf penml jbzna jub vf pbaivaprq gung zl trezf znxr ure fvpx 
 bu trez-b-cubor v xabj jung gung'f nobhg 
 uhu 
  v'z n erpbirevat trez-b-cubor gra lrnef 
 jung vf guvf flzoby 
 vg'f n trez 
 rynvar vg jnf irel avpr bs lbh gb oevat gur zna lbh'er pheeragyl fyrrcvat jvgu bire gb gnyx gb zr ohg v nffher lbh v qba'g unir nal ceboyrz jvgu trezf 
 qba'g lbh rynvar 
  cyrnfr 
 v xabj vg ybbxf oyrnx v'ir orra gurer gra lrnef ntb jnxvat hc va orq arkg gb n jbzna yvxr guvf jbhyq'ir frag zr ehaavat sbe gur cuvfburk 
 ernyyl 
 v fgvyy unir gebhoyr ybbxvat ng gubfr qvfthfgvat byq orqebbz fyvccref fur fybtf nebhaq va 
 url v'ir unq gubfr fvapr pbyyrtr gurl'er ohaavrf 
 gurl'er onpgrevn gencf 
 fb lbh whfg yrnearq gb yvir jvgu vg 
 sbe gur zbfg cneg 
 bx jr'er oebxra hc sbe gur erfg bs gur qnl 
 fb v'z tynq jr unq n gnyx naq jbexrq guvf bhg qba'g lbh srry guvf vf orggre 
 guvf vf avpr 
 lrf pybgurf guvf vf abezny 
 url jung ner lbh qbvat gbzbeebj v jnf guvaxvat gung jr pbhyq tb qbja 
 wreel wreel ner lbh yvfgravat gb zr 
 bu lrnu jung v'z fbeel 
 v jnagrq gb xabj jung lbh'er qbvat gbzbeebj 
 bu znlor n unvephg naq v qba'g xabj znlor n 
  fb lbh oebxr hc 
 jr pbhyqa'g pneel ba n pbairefngvba v xrcg gelvat gb cvpgher ure anxrq fur xrcg gelvat gb abg cvpgher zr anxrq 
 unat ba 
 fb jung ner lbh hc gb 
 bu whfg pbbxvat hc n yvggyr gunax lbh sbe chqql url ubj qb lbh znxr gubfr enqvfu ebfrf 
 vafreg n xavsr vagb gur pragre naq gjvfg gura gb znxr vg oybbz fbnx vg va jngre sbe guvegl gb sbegl zvahgrf 
 ab ceboyrz gurer 
 trbetr gunaxf sbe pbzvat qbja gb gnyx gb zr v jnagrq gb frr lbh evtug njnl ohg zl ubhef urer nera'g irel syrkvoyr v whfg fgnegrq lrfgreqnl 
 jryy v'z urer jung vf vg 
 jryy v gnyxrq gb zl fcbafbe naq hu v'ir gubhtug vg bire naq lbh xabj zl ncbybtl ng gur pbssrr fubc jnf fnepnfgvp naq ehqr naq lbh qrfreir zhpu orggre 
  jryy gunax lbh 
 lbh'er jrypbzr 
  pna v trg n gevcyr zvahgr zna zvag 
 jnssyr be fhtne pbar 
 hu rkphfr zr hu hz wnfba v qba'g jnag gb trg vagb n ovt guvat urer ohg v'z abg fher vs grpuavpnyyl jung lbh whfg fnvq jnf npghnyyl na ncbybtl 
 jung 
 pna lbh trg ba gung pbar 
 jbhyq lbh unat ba whfg n frpbaq fba trbetr jung ner lbh gnyxvat nobhg 
 jryy vg'f whfg nyy lbh fnvq jnf 'lbhe jrypbzr' juvpu vf avpr vg'f irel avpr ohg v srry v tbggn trg gur ncbybtl 
 vf gurer nalobql ryfr urer ohg lbh 
 v'z nybar naq vg'f zl frpbaq qnl lbh xabj v qba'g rira guvax jr unir gung synibe fb trbetr ernyyl rabhtu bx lbh xabj v-v nqzvggrq v jnf jebat fb jung zber qb lbh jnag sebz zr 
 v jbhyq yvxr na ncbybtl 
 nyy evtug ybbx lbh xabj-- 
  qvq lbh gel vg 
 ab guvf thl qbrfa'g xabj jung ur'f qbvat 
 bu lrf v qb lrf v qb bx v'z vagrenpgvat jvgu fbzrbar urer vs lbh pna haqrefgnaq gung abj v'z fbeel 
 onnu gurer vg vf lbh whfg fnvq vg gung'f jung v jnag abj fnl vg ntnva naq gryy vg gb zr 
 v'z abg fnlvat nalguvat gb lbh v'z abg fbeel v jnf arire fbeel vg jnf pnfuzrer v ungr fgrc avar jurer'f gung ehz envfva jurer vf vg pna'g svaq nalguvat v arrq n qevax nu qndhvev vpr urer jr tb jung ner lbh ybbxvat ng trg bhg pbzr ba pna'g lbh frr jr'er pybfrq trg bhg 
  zzz guvf sbbq vf snagnfgvp crttl naq jung n cerggl enqvfu ebfr uhu 
 jryy gunax lbh 
 urer'f gb crttl ba ure svefg jrrx bs orvat trez-serr serr 
 lrnu naq urer'f gb qnivq chqql sbe urycvat zr vafgnyy n zhpu arrqrq naq zhpu nccerpvngrq tneontr qvfcbfny va zl ongugho 
 lbh unir n tneontr qvfcbfny va lbhe ongugho 
 bu lrnu naq v hfr vg nyy gur gvzr lrnu v znqr guvf jubyr zrny va gurer 
 guvf sbbq jnf va gur fubjre jvgu lbh 
 zz-uzz v cercnerq vg nf v ongurq

  ab trez-b-cuborf

 gung'f evtug ur arire ncbybtvmrq gb zr sbe fnlvat gung v jbhyq fgergpu bhg gur arpx ubyr bs uvf fjrngre 
 vg jnfa'g shaal 
 vg jnf n irel avpr fjrngre gnxr n ybbx ng uvf arpx abg gb zragvba gur zryba fvggvat ba gbc bs vg v qba'g xabj vs v'q gehfg uvz jvgu n i-arpx 
 ur'f orobccva' naq fpnggva' naq v'z ybfva' vg 
 gvz jungyrl'f ncnegzrag] 
 fb jungyrl'f fgvyy wrjvfu uhu

 url unccl punahxnu 
 url gvz terng cnegl 
  ru

  bu  url trbetr gunaxf ntnva sbe trggvat zr gubfr lnaxrr gvpxrgf 
 bu lrnu fgvyy va tbbq jvgu gur tebhaq perj  
  bu url yvfgra v'q orggre pvephyngr  unccl punahxnu gvssnal  
 guvf cynpr vf yvxr fghqvb 54 jvgu n zrabenu 
 v'z tbaan trg fbzr zber bs gurfr xbfure pbpxgnvy senaxf  
 bu  v tbg qravz irfg purpxvat zr bhg  snxr cubar ahzore'f pbzvat bhg gbavtug

 zz-uzz

  ab cyrnfr qravz irfg ur'f fzbbguvat vg wreel tbq  
 uv

 jul qba'g v tvir lbh zl cubar ahzore 
 pbssrr fubc] 
 url 
 url ubj'q vg tb jvgu gur pbpxgnvy senaxf 
 terng v ngr gur ragver cynggre unq gb pnyy va fvpx gbqnl 
 qvqa'g lbh pnyy va fvpx lrfgreqnl 
 url v jbex sbe xehtre vaqhfgevny fzbbguvat "jr qba'g pner naq vg fubjf" 
  lbh'er tbaan bcra lbhe znvy urer 
 url ng yrnfg v'z oevatvat fbzrguvat gb guvf  "unir lbh frra zr"  abcr  jbnu fbzrguvat sebz jungyrl 
 frr lbh tvir naq lbh trg 
  "guvf ubyvqnl frnfba n qbangvba unf orra znqr va lbhe anzr gb gur puvyqera'f nyyvnapr" 
 bu gung'f avpr 
 v tbg uvz lnaxrr'f gvpxrgf ur tbg zr n cvrpr bs cncre fnlvat "v'ir tvira lbhe tvsg gb fbzrbar ryfr" 
 gb n puvyqera'f punevgl 
 qba'g lbh frr ubj jebat gung vf jurer'f lbhe puevfgznf fcvevg naq rlr sbe na rlr 
 url 
 url 
  bu abguvat sbe zr  v'z tbvat gb "ngbzvp fho" yngre 
 "ngbzvp fho" jul ner lbh rngvat gurer 
 v tbg n pneq naq gurl fgnzc vg rirel gvzr v ohl n fho 24 fgnzcf naq v orpbzr n fhoznevar  pncgnva 
 jung qbrf gung zrna 
  serr fho 
 jung 
 abguvat vg'f n pneq sebz zl qnq

 vg'f abguvat fgbc vg 
 jura trbetr jnf tebjvat hc 
  wreel ab 
 uvf sngure 
 ab 
 ungrq nyy gur pbzzrepvny naq eryvtvbhf nfcrpgf bs puevfgznf fb ur znqr hc uvf bja ubyvqnl 
 buuuu naq nabgure cvrpr bs gur chmmyr snyyf vagb cynpr 
  nyevtug 
 naq vafgrnq bs n gerr qvqa'g lbhe sngure chg hc na nyhzvahz cbyr 
 wreel fgbc vg 
 naq jrera'g gurer n srngf bs fgeratgu gung nyjnlf raqrq hc jvgu lbh pelvat 
 v pna'g gnxr vg nalzber v'z tbvat gb jbex ner lbh unccl abj  
 wreel'f ncnegzrag] 
 bu v pna'g oryvrir vg v'ir ybfg zl "ngbzvp fho" pneq bu ab v org v jebgr gung snxr ahzore ba gur onpx bs vg jura v tnir vg gb qravz irfg 
 fb 
 v'ir rngra 23 onq fhof v whfg arrq 1 zber vg'f yvxr n ybat onq zbivr ohg lbh jnag gb frr gur raq bs vg 
 ab lbh jnyx bhg 
 nyevtug gura vg'f yvxr n obevat obbx ohg lbh tbggn svavfu vg 
 ab lbh jnvg sbe gur zbivr 
  v jnag gung serr fho 
 lbh qba'g arrq gur pneq uvtu-raq ubntvr bhgsvg yvxr gung vg'f nyy pbzchgrevmrq  gurl'er pybavat furrc abj 
  ab gurl'er abg pybavat furrc vg'f gur fnzr furrc v fnj uneel oynpxfgbar qb gung gevpx jvgu gjb tbngf naq n unaqxrepuvrs ba gur byq qrna znegva fubj 
 fb jul qba'g lbh whfg gel lbhe oybj-bss ahzore naq frr vs ur'f pnyyrq vg 
 gung'f n tbbq vqrn 
  lrnu tb jun ernyyl lrnu bx lrnu olr  terng arjf lrnu gur fgevxr unf orra frggyrq v'z tbvat onpx gb jbex 
 jung fgevxr 
 lrnu u&u ontryf gung'f jurer v jbexrq 
 lbh 
 jbexrq 
 ontryf 
 lrnu ybbx frr v fgvyy unir zl ohfvarff pneq  lrnu jr'ir orra ba fgevxr sbe 12 lrnef 
 bu v erzrzore frrvat gubfr thlf cvpxrgvat bhg gurer ohg v unira'g frra gurz va n ybat gvzr 
 lrnu jryy u&u jbhyqa'g yrg hf hfr gurve ongu ebbz juvyr jr jrer cvpxrgvat vg chg n penzc ba bhe fbyvqnevgl 
 jung jrer lbhe qrznaqf 
 lrnu 535 na ubhe naq gung'f jung gurl'er cnlvat abj 
 v oryvrir gung'f gur arj zvavzhz jntr 
 abj lbh xabj jub gb gunax sbe gung nyevtug v'ir tbg gb tb  
 jul qvqa'g lbh rire zragvba guvf 
 wreel v qvqa'g jnag lbh gb xabj v jnf bhg bs jbex vg'f rzoneenffvat   
 u&u ontry fubc] 
 nyy evtug rirelobql v'z onpx 
 jub ner lbh 
 pbfzb xenzre fgevxrf bire 
 bu lrnu xenzre 
 uhu jun- qvqa'g nal bs gur thlf pbzr onpx 
 ab v"z fher gurl nyy tbg wbof yvxr gra lrnef ntb 
 bu zna znxrf lbh jbaqre jung vg jnf nyy sbe

  v arire gubhtug v'q yvir gb frr gung 
 ubefr genpx orggvat] 
 fb naljnl v'ir orra tvivat bhg lbhe ahzore nf zl fgnaqneq snxr 
 fb lbh'er rynvar orarf jr'ir orra trggvat pnyyf seb lbh sbe 5 lrnef

  url puneyvr thrff jub'f urer rynvar orarf 
 rynvar orarf

 buu zl

 wreel'f ncnegzrag] 
 fb nggenpgvir bar qnl - abg nggenpgvir gur arkg 
 unir lbh pbzr npebff guvf

 gur pbssrr fubc]

 xehtre'f bssvpr]

 gur pbfgnamn'f ubhfr]

 bu tbq 
  dhvrg lbh'yy trg lbhef va n zvahgr xehtre lbh pbhyqa'g fzbbgu n fvyx furrg vs lbh unq n ubg qngr jvgu n onor v ybfg zl genva bs gubhtug

 tjra ubj'q lbh xabj v jnf urer

 nabgure srfgvihf zvenpyr

 n pne qrnyrefuvc] 
 jura ner gurl tbaan unir gur sylvat pnef nyernql 
 lrnu gurl unir orra cebzvfvat gung sbe n juvyr 
 lrnef jura jr jrer xvqf gurl znqr vg frrz yvxr vg jnf evtug nebhaq gur pbeare 
 v guvax rq ortyrl we unf bar 
 ab gung'f whfg ryrpgevp 
 jung nobhg uneevfba sbeq ur unq bar va hu oynqr ehaare gung jnf n pbby bar 
  jung'f gur pbzcrgvgvba puvggl puvggl onat onat 
 jryy jung qb lbh guvax gur ovt ubyqhc vf 
 gur tbireazrag vf irel gbhpul nobhg hf orvat va gur nve yrg hf eha nebhaq ba gur tebhaq nf zhpu nf jr jnag nalguvat va gur nve vf n ovt cebqhpgvba 
 lrnu evtug naq jung nobhg gur sybngvat pvgvrf 
 naq gur haqrejngre ohooyr pvgvrf 
 vg'f yvxr jr'er yvivat va gur '50f urer 
 vg'f tbbq fhfcrafvba 
  jbhyq lbh fgbc vg lbh'yy unir cyragl bs gvzr gb qrfgebl vg nsgre v trg vg url trbetr v'z ohlva' guvf pne  
 fuuu jung vf jebat jvgu lbh lbh arire gryy 'rz lbh yvxr gur pne  lbh'er abg fher jung lbh jnag lbh qba'g rira xabj jul lbh'er urer 
  lbher trggvat gung irva ntnva 
 v'z fgneivat jr fubhyq unir unq yhapu svefg 
  vg'yy or gjragl zvahgrf v gbyq ln chqql'f trggvat zr na vafvqre qrny 
 fvapr jura vf rynvar'f oblsevraq fryyvat pnef v gubhtug ur jnf n zrpunavp 
 v thrff ur tenqhngrq 
 gurer'f na rnfl zbir tb sebz fperjva' lbh oruvaq lbhe onpx gb fperjva' lbh evtug gb lbhe snpr 
  gunax lbh 
 chqqlf whfg tbaan tvir lbh gur pne uhu  lbhyy frr svefg gurl fgvpx lbh jvgu gur haqrepbngvat ehfg-cebbsvat qrnyre cerc fhqqrayl lbher ba lbhe onpx yvxr n ghegyr 
 nyy evtug pnyz qbja 
 zl sngure unq n pne fnyrfzna ohqql ur jnf tbaan svk uvz hc erny avpr arkg guvat v xabj vz trggva qebccrq bs va n yr pne jvgu n snoevp fhaebbs nyy gur xvqf ner fubhgva ng zr "url yr trbetr obawbhe yr trbetr yrgf fghss yr trbetr va yr ybpxre" 
 wreel v qbag guvax guvf guvat vf ubbxrq hc evtug 
  nyy evtug jrer tbva va 
 lbhir tbg n tbbq rlr gurer v frr lbhir abgvprq gur hav-obql pbafgehpgvba vz evpx ner lbh ybbxvat gb ohl be gb yrnfr 
 hu obeebj vgf sbe zl sevraq lrnu uryy or ohlvat 
 znlor v fubhyq gnyx gb uvz 
 bu v qbag guvax fb ab urf na ragregnvare lbh xabj nyy bire gur cynpr gungf jurer v pbzr va 
 v frr fb lbher uvf znant- 
 lrnu arvtuobe gungf evtug lrnu jul qbag jr gnxr guvf obvyre bhg sbe n funxrqbja uhu 
 ybbx ng gurfr fnyrfzra gur bayl guvat gurfr thlf srne vf gur jnyx-bhg ab znggre jung gurl fnl lbh fnl "vyy jnyx bhg bs urer evtug abj" 
 pna v uryc lbh jvgu fbzrguvat 
  ubyq vg bar zber fgrc naq jrer jnyxva 
  trbetr  fbeel jrer whfg jnvgvat sbe qnivq chqql 
  ur vf lbh qbag xabj jung vz qbva urer 
 url 
 url 
 fbeel vz yngr 
  zl arj fnyrfzna oblsevraq gbbx zr bhg gb pryroengr uvf cebzbgvba 
 nu jurerq lbh tb 
  hu gb n erfgnhenag 
 neolf 
 v unq gur ebnfg orrs 
 fb chqql v qrpvqrq vz tbaan tb jvgu nabgure 900 pbairegvoyr 
 nyy evtug pynffvp  uvtu-svir 
  qnivq pna lbh gryy zr jurer gur krebk znpuvar vf 
 bu fher onor fnyrfzna-bayl pbcl ebbz  evtug gurer 
 bu  
  url pbzr ba thlf vyy fubj lbh gur 900 
  lrnu lbh fubj hf gur 900 
 naq ybbx ng gurfr srngherf ze xenzre nagv-ybpx oenxrf nhgbzngvp pyvzngr pbageby hu  znxr n evtug ng guvf pbeare cyrnfr  na nqwhfgnoyr fgrrevat jurry naq bu ze xenzre lbh zvffrq gur ghea 
 ab ab ab v qvqag 
 jryy gungf bxnl  jryy znxr guvf arkg evtug naq fjvat nebhaq gb trg onpx gb gur qrnyrefuvc 
  jryy vgf n grfg qevir evtug v arire qevir nebhaq urer vs vz tbaan erpbzzraq guvf pne v arrq gb frr gung vgyy unaqyr zl qnvyl ebhgvar 
 jryy jurer ner jr tbvat 
 whfg n yvggyr cynpr v yvxr gb pnyy "lbhyy frr" 
 chqqlf bssvpr] 
 vz fgneivat lbh tbg nal bs gubfr serr qbahgf lbh hfr gb fbsgra crbcyr hc 
  ol gur freivpr qrcnegzrag 
  nyy evtug erzrzore ab ehfg-cebbsvat pbzzvg gb abguvat vs lbh unir gb fcrnx - zhzoyr 
  nh eribve yr trbetr 
 qbag guvax vg pnag unccra  
 fb chqql guvf vf n cerggl tbbq zbir sbe lbh uhu ab zber "ternfr zbaxrl" 
 v qbag pner sbe gung grez 
 bu fbeel v qvqag xabj 
 ab v qbag xabj gbb znal zbaxrlf jub pbhyq gnxr ncneg n shry vawrpgbe 
 v fnj bar bapr gung pbhyq qb fvta ynathntr 
 lrnu v fnj gung bar hu xbxb 
 lrnu xbxb 
 evtug xbxb gung puvzcf nyy evtug  uvtu-svir 
 url url url jungf tbva ba urer  lbh qvqag nterr gb nalguvat qvq ln 
 ab jr obgu whfg fnj gur fnzr zbaxrl 
  jryy v tbg fperjrq ba gur qbahgf gurer jrer abar yrsg uru 
  jryy gurerf n iraqvat znpuvar v pbhyq fubj lbh jurer vg vf  
  url tvzzr n qbyyne 
  jurerf lbhe zbarl 
  vz urer urycva lbh 
 url jurerf chqql gur pbcl znpuvar vf oebxra 
  uru uru uru gungf jung gurl jnag lbh gb guvax 
 url rynvar unir lbh abgvprq lbhe oblsevraq unf qrirybcrq na naablvat yvggyr unovg 
  gur fdhvagvat 
 ab 
  gur fgnevat 
 ab ur xrrcf nfxvat zr gb tvir uvz n uvtu-svir 
  v gubhtug nyy thlf qb gung 
 fynccvat unaqf vf gur ybjrfg sbez bs znyr cevzngr evghny va snpg rira fbzr bs gurz unir zbirq ba - gurler qbvat fvta ynathntr abj 
 vgf gung onq 
 jung qb lbh guvax gur anmvf jrer qbva  gung jnf gur urvy-svir 
  vfag gung sebz lbhe npg yvxr gra lrnef ntb 
  vg jnf n tbbq ovg va gur 80f naq vgf fgvyy eryngnoyr gbqnl 
 tbbq arjf jr tbg n 900 va oynpx gungf gur ubg pbybe  uvtu-svir 
 hz qnivq lbh xabj jung pna lbh pbzr uryc zr svk gur pbcl znpuvar pbzr 
  lbh bjr zr svir 
 qrnyrefuvc onpx ebbz] 
 gjvk  o-5 
 nu pbzr ba 
 nu rkphfr zr qb lbh unir hu punatr bs n qbyyne 
  ab 
 pbhyq v hu pbhyq v genqr lbh sbe nabgure qbyyne 
  qbag unir bar 
  nu rkphfr zr jura lbhe hu jura lbhe jnyyrg jnf bcra v - v tynaprq vafvqr naq v pbhyqag uryc ohg abgvpr gung lbh unir frireny pevfc qbyyne ovyyf 
  lbher vapbeerpg 
  creuncf lbh pbhyq ybbx ntnva cyrnfr vz irel uhatel 
  jr unq qbahgf rneyvre 
  v thrff rirelbar urer rawblf tvivat gur byq fperjtvr uhu lbher nyy qbva n uryy bs n wbo  ub ub jung v jbhyq qb jvgu lbh 
 qrnyrefuvc pne] 
 hu ze xenzre jrer ernyyl abg nyybjrq gb hfr gur pnef gb eha reenaqf 
 abj ybbx evpx vz irel pybfr gb tvivat guvf pne gung zl pryroevgl sevraq vf pbafvqrevat zl shyy raqbefrzrag  bbbu yrgf frr vs v pna trg n fzvyr sebz gurfr srzvavanf  url ynqvrf  vgf gur fnno 900 jung qb lbh guvax pna v vagrerfg lbh va n yvggyr fhccyrzragny erfgenvag  trrm 
 qrnyrefuvc onpx ebbz] 
  v guvax gur pnaql pbzrf bhg bire gurer 
 crbcyr pna qebc punatr qbja urer wreel naq gurler gbb ynml gb cvpx vg hc 
 rvgure gung be gurlir tbg n jrveq yvggyr unat-hc nobhg ylvat snpr-qbja va svygu jul qbag lbh whfg tb gb gur pnfuvre 
 gur pnfuvre vf ng yhapu - juvpu vf jurer vq yvxr gb or 
 ubj zhpu jnf haqre gurer 
  v guvax fbzrguva ovg zr v whfg arrq nabgure avpxry 
  url chqql guvaxf v fubhyq tb sbe gur pq cynlre jung qb lbh guvax  
 ub ub ub urf tbg n yvir bar urf whfg erryvat uvf ovt svfu va 
 url pna v unir zl qbyyne onpx 
  vgf jevaxyrq vgf jbeguyrff 
  un un un un  pbzr ba whzc 
 gurl whfg chg bhg fbzr zber qbahgf 
 gurl qvq 
  ynfg bar 
 qrnyrefuvc pne] 
 jryy whfg bar zber reenaq naq jr pna urnq onpx 
 npghnyyl vg ybbxf yvxr jrer tbaan arrq fbzr tnf 
 bu jryy ubj zhpu tnf qb lbh guvax vf va gurer evtug abj 
  jryy vgf ba "r" 
 lbh xabj evpx bsgragvzrf wreel - ur yraqf zr uvf pne naq v svaq zlfrys va n fvghngvba jurer gur pne vf nyzbfg bhg bs tnf ohg sbe n inevrgl bs ernfbaf v qbag jnag gb or gur bar erfcbafvoyr sbe chepunfvat pbfgyl tnfbyvar 
  fb lbh jnag gb xabj ubj sne lbh pna qevir lbhe sevraqf pne sbe serr 
  jryy v znxr vg hc gb uvz va bgure jnlf 
 qrnyrefuvc onpx ebbz] 
 nf lbh jvyy frr gur pnaql one vf cnvq sbe naq lrg erznvaf qnatyvat va gur znpuvar  url vgf tbar jurer vf zl gjvk  jung gung thlf rngva vg 
 jryy ubj qb lbh xabj gung barf lbhef 
 hu vg jnf qnatyvat gurer jrer bayl gjb yrsg va gur znpuvar ur zhfgir obhtug bar naq tbggra obgu 
 fve ner lbh tbaan ohl n pne 
 ab  url url v frr lbh gung vf zl gjvk  bu un un ub ub 
 cncre wnz tbg vg 
 lnl 
  uvtu-svir  ba gur syvc fvqr 
 qnivq hz v 
  qbag yrnir zr unatva 
 lbher n fnyrfzna abj - naq gur uvtu-svir vf vgf irel ternfr zbaxrl 
 jung qvq v gryy lbh nobhg gung 
 nu v vz fbeel ohg gur uvtu-svir vf whfg fb fghcvq 
  bu lrnu vyy gryy lbh jungf fghcvq lbh fghcvq 
  bu gung vf ernyyl zngher 
 lrnu fb ner lbh lbher gur ternfr zbaxrl 
  hu gung qbrfag znxr nal frafr v nz yrnivat 
 lrnu vs lbh yrnir jrer guebhtu 
 svar jrer guebhtu 
 bu fb lbher yrnivat 
  gungf evtug  uvtu-svir  ba gur syvc fvqr  gnxva zr gb neolf 
  url ju-jurer ner lbh 
 yrgf svavfu guvf hc 
 qvq lbh gjb oernx hc 
  gung puvpxf junpxrq jrer uvfgbel  v whfg yrsg bhg n pbhcyr bs guvatf hu ehfg-cebbsvat 
 "ehfg-cebbsvat" 
  genafcbeg punetr fgbentr fhepunetr nqqvgvbany birepunetr svaqref srr 
 "svaqref srr" vg jnf ba gur ybg 
 lrnu gungf evtug  hu sybbe zngf xrlf 
 xrlf 
 ubj ln tbaan fgneg vg 
 qrnyrefuvcf fubc] 
 rkphfr zr v oryvrir lbh whfg ngr zl gjvk one vg jnf qnatyvat naq jura lbh chepunfrq lbhe gjvk one lbh tbg n yvggyr serrovr naq lbh arire obgurerq gb nfx jul be frrx bhg vgf evtugshy bjare 
 svefg bs nyy vg jnfag n gjvk vg jnf n 5gu nirahr one 
 uhu lbh zhfg guvax vz cerggl fghcvq  gung jnf ab 5gu nirahr one v pna frr gur pehzo evtug gurer va gur pbeare bs lbhe yvc abj gung-gung-gung vf n pbbxvr - naq jr nyy xabj gung gjvk vf gur bayl pnaql one jvgu gur pbbxvr pehapu 
 vgf hu vgf whfg n yvggyr abhtng 
 abhtng cyrnfr v guvax vir ernpurq gur cbvag va zl yvsr jurer v pna gryy gur qvssrerapr orgjrra abhtng naq pbbxvr fb yrgf abg whfg fnl guvatf gung jr obgu xabj ner boivbhf snoevpngvbaf 
  lbh xabj lbher trggva n yvggyr irva gurer 
  v xabj nobhg gur irva v pnag oryvrir guvf thl 
 url trbetr 
 url fgneivat  
 ab ynfg bar yvfgra lbh tbggn uryc zr bhg rynvar naq chqql whfg oebxr hc urf gerngva zr whfg yvxr n erthyne phfgbzre abj

 vf fbzrbar urycvat lbh

 qrnyrefuvc pne] 
  jurer vf vg abj 
 gurerf fgvyy fbzr bireync orgjrra gur arrqyr naq gur fynfu orybj gur "r" 
 ubj ybj ner lbh tbaan tb 
 bu vir orra va gur fynfu znal gvzrf guvf vf abguvat lbhyy trg hfrq gb vg whfg  chg vg bhg bs lbhe zvaq 
 unir lbh rire orra pbzcyrgryl orybj gur fynfu 
 jryy v nyzbfg qvq bapr naq v oynpxrq bhg jura v pnzr gb gur pne jnf va n qvgpu naq gur gnax jnf shyy v qbag xabj jub qvq vg naq v arire tbg gb gunax gurz 
  ze xenzre gur ebnq 
 jubbc jubbc 
 chqqlf bssvpr]

 nyy evtug chqql yvfgra naq yvfgra tbbq v arrq gb xabj gur anzr bs gung zrpunavp gung jnyxf nebhaq urer ovt thl n yvne fubeg anzr fnz zbr fby 
 trbetr pna jr sbphf ba gur pne urer 
 vz fgneivat v pna srry zl fgbznpu fhpxvat hc ntnvafg zl fcvar

 qrnyrefuvc pne]

 rynvarf ncnegzrag]

 bu v qbag xabj

  rirelobqlf evccvat zr bss

  lrnu evtug vz tbaan trg zl pne ercnverq ng n qrnyrefuvc uhu jul qbag v whfg syhfu zl zbarl qbja gur gbvyrg 
 fve jung rknpgyl vf gur ceboyrz 
 bar bs lbhe thlf - xvc be arq fubeg anzr - fgbyr zl gjvk pnaql one 
 ner lbh fnlvat ur tenoorq lbhe pnaql one njnl sebz lbh

 qrnyrefuvcf phfgbzre freivpr ebbz] 
 ze pbfgnamn v ernyyl qbag unir gvzr sbe guvf 
 abj vs guvf zrpunavp thl jnf va snpg rngvat n 5gu nirahr one nf ur pynvzf jbhyqag lbh nterr ur jbhyq unir ab ceboyrz cvpxvat bar bhg sebz n pnaql yvar-hc 
 "pnaql yvar-hc" 
 vir fcrag gur ynfg ubhe cercnevat gra pnaql onef jvgu ab jenccref be vqragvsvpngvba bs nal xvaq sbe uvz gb fryrpg sebz 
 vg gbbx lbh na ubhe 
 bayl v ubyq gur nafjre xrl gb gurve gehr pnaql vqragvgvrf naq fb jvgubhg shegure nqb v tvir lbh gur pnaql yvar-hc  
 url jvyyvr purpx vg bhg serr pnaql 
 gungf zl pnaql yvar-hc jurer ner nyy zl pneqf gurler - gurler nyy ba gur sybbe 
 naq lbh ubj znal gjvk qbrf gung znxr sbe lbh gbqnl yvxr 8 gjvk 
 ab 
 url guvf pynex one vf tbbq 
 vgf n gjvk gurler nyy gjvk vg jnf n frghc n frghc v gryy ln naq lbhir eboorq vg lbhir nyy fperjrq zr ntnva abj tvzzr bar tvzzr n gjvk 
 gurler nyy tbar

 jung jnf gung 
 gurerf n zragny ubfcvgny evtug arne urer

  gurerf gur qrnyre 
 url 
 jr qvq jr chyyrq vg bss v pnag oryvrir vg jurerf gur arrqyr

 alp pno] 
 guvf vf avpr jung xvaq bs pne vf guvf 
 pncevpr pynffvp 
  lbh pbhyqag whfg tvir uvz bar uvtu-svir 
 naq jurer qbrf vg raq gura rirelbarf qbva vg vgf yvxr gur jnir ng onyy tnzrf nve dhbgrf gur cuenfr "qbag tb gurer" - fbzrbarf tbggn gnxr n fgnaq 
  guvf neolf vf tbbq 
 fb trbetr v fgvyy qbag haqrefgnaq - ubj jnf gung n frghc 
 naq jub jrer lbh gelva gb frg hc naljnl gur zrpunavp be gur znantre 
 v qbag xabj nyy bs rz gurler nyy pebbxf orfvqrf v pbhyqag trg nyy qvssrerag pnaql onef naljnl 
 jung jnf gung 
 v guvax gurerf n zragny ubfcvgny arne urer 
 irel arne 
 ln-ubb ln-ubb  jurj jryy v guvax jr fgbccrq 
 lbh - lbh pna cebonoyl yrg tb bs zl unaq abj 
 lrnu lrnu  jryy vyy guvax nobhg vg 
 qb lbh unir zl pneq 
 pnershy guvf cyngr vf rkgerzryl ubg 
 gunax lbh bj 
 v whfg gbyq lbh vg jnf ubg jul'q lbh gbhpu vg 
 v whfg jnagrq gb xabj jung lbhe vqrn bs 'ubg' vf 
 url onor lbh ernql gb uvg gur vpr 
 v nz ernql gb fxngr hc n-- un un unjul ner lbh jrnevat gung 
 vg'f zl jvagre pbng 
 n she 
 vf gurer n ceboyrz 
 n frrzvatyl vasvavgr fhccyl 
 bj pnershy vg'f ubg 
 bj 
 fb chqql jrne'f n zna she 
 ur jnf fgehggva' nebhaq gur pbssrr fubc yvxr fgrva revpxfba 
 naq bs pbhefr lbh svaq she zbenyyl ercerurafvoyr 
 ru nagv-she v zrna jub unf gur raretl nalzber guvf vf zber nobhg unatvat bss gur nez bs na vqvbg 
 naq guvf vf gur svefg lbh'er frrvat bs gur pbng 
 jr arire qngrq va jvagre 
 lbh zvtug jnag gb trg n ybbx ng gung onguvat fhvg qenjre 
 bu v jnyxrq ol oybbzvatqnyr'f gur bgure qnl naq v fnj gung znffntr punve jr jnag gb trg wbr znlb nf na ncnegzrag tvsg 
 na ncnegzrag-jnezvat tvsg jr tbg gb tvir cerfragf gb crbcyr sbe zbivat oveguqnlf puevfgznf vg'f rabhtu tvsgf v jbhyq yvxr bar zbagu bss 
 xenzre fnvq vg'f n cresrpg tvsg gung'f jung jr'er trggva' uvz 
 nyy evtug ohg jr'er abg ohlva' vg ng oybbzvatqnyr'f v jvyy ohl vg lbh cnl zr onpx yngre v'yy favss bhg n qrny v unir n fvkgu frafr 
 purncarff vf abg n frafr 
 v pna'g fgnaq wbr znlb'f cnegvrf lbh xabj gur frpbaq lbh jnyx va ur'f tbg lbh jbexva' sbe uvz 'url pna lbh qb zr n snibe pna lbh xrrc na rlr ba gur vpr znxr fher jr unir rabhtu' hu 
 v unq n terng gvzr ng gur ynfg bar v jnf va punetr bs gur zhfvp v ghearq gung zbgure bhg 
 url 
 url 
 lbh tbg nal cyvref 
 jung unf arjzna tbg nabgure nezl zna fghpx va uvf rne 
 uvynevbhf 
 arjzna naq v ner erirefvat gur crrcubyrf ba bhe qbbe fb lbh pna frr va 
 jul 
 gb cerirag na nzohfu 
 lrnu fb abj v pna crrx gb frr vs nalbar vf jnvgvat gb wnpx zr jvgu n fbpx shyy bs craavrf 
 ohg gura nalbar pna whfg ybbx va naq frr lbh 
 bhe cbyvpl vf jr'er pbzsbegnoyr jvgu bhe obqvrf lbh xabj vs fbzrbar jnagf gb uryc gurzfryirf gb na rlrshyy jryy jr fnl 'rawbl gur fubj' 
 v'z fbeel v pna'g fgnl sbe gur frpbaq npg 
 url trbetr urer'f gur zbqry ahzore ba gung punve ol gur jnl

 jnyyrg 
 jung 
 abobql pneevrf jnyyrgf nalzber v zrna gurl jrag bhg jvgu cbjqrerq jvtf lrnu frr urer'f jung lbh arrq whfg n pbhcyr bs pneqf naq lbhe onaxebyy frr xrrc gur ovt ovyyf ba gur bhgfvqr

 rkphfr zr

 bu v pna'g oryvrir lbh'er qebccvat bhg gbb fb abj xenzre naq v unir gb cnl sbe gur ragver tvsg 
 jubn jubn abj jub'f guvf wbr znlb rirelbar'f gnyxvat nobhg 
 ur'f gur thl jr'er gur ohlvat gur punve sbe erzrzore vg jnf lbhe fhttrfgvba

 bu fb abj v unir gb ohl guvf jubyr punve ol zlfrys 
 ab lbh qba'g unir gb ohl nalguvat

 lbh qvgpurq gur she

 xenzre

 lbh tbg vg 
 ab arire zvaq 
 pbzr ba jr'er gjb vagryyvtrag crbcyr urer jr pna svther guvf bhg abj jr tbg n qbt naq n png va na bssvpr

 gur png vf fnlvat " v'ir rawblrq ernqvat lbhe r-znvy" 
 znlor vg'f tbg fbzrguvat gb qb jvgu gung 42 va gur pbeare  
 vg'f n cntr ahzore 
 jryy v pna'g penpx guvf bar 
 nnuu guvf unf tbg gb or n zvfgnxr

 url xenzre 
 url lbh tbg fbzr zrffntrf lrnuhzz trbetr trbetr rynvar trbetr ntnva rynvar arjzna; ohg gung jnf n penax pnyy naq fbzr fnyyl jbzna pnyyrq fnvq "gunaxf n ybg fur'f dhvggvat gur ohfvarff lbh ehvarq ure yvsr 
 jung lbh'er gur bar jub ehvarq ure yvsr 
 jryy gung'f abg ubj fur erzrzoref vg 
 jryy v tbg gb gnyx ure bhg bs guvf 
 v gubhtug lbh fnvq fur fgvaxf 
 fur qbrf fgvax naq fur fubhyq dhvg ohg v qba'g jnag vg gb or orpnhfr bs zr vg fubhyq or gur genqvgvbany ebhgr; lrnef bs erwrpgvbaf naq snvyherf gvyy fur'f fcvg bhg gur obggbz bs gur cbea vaqhfgel 
 lrnu 
 url trbetr naq wnarg 
 nnuujub'f wnarg 
 trbetr'f tveysevraq rynvar guvaxf fur ybbxf yvxr zr ohg v guvax vg'f nf lbh jbhyq fnlxbbxvr gnyx 
 lbh xabj jung jbzna v nyjnlf gubhtug lbh ybbxrq yvxr; yrran ubear 
 url url 
 naq lbh zhfgybbx rknpgyl yvxr wreel lbh qba'g frr guvf; lbh'er yvxr gjvaf  jbbbbbuuuuu guvf vf rrevr 
 xenzre jung ner lbh gnyxvat nobhgwnarg qbrfa'g ybbx nalguvat yvxr wreel 
 jryy znlor jr qb ybbx n yvggyr yvxr rnpu bgure 
 abuhzzz jung qb lbh xabj nobhg jung lbh ybbx yvxr 
 p'zba trbetr erynk  whfg orpnhfr gurl ybbx nyvxr qbrfa'g zrna lbh'er frpergyl va ybir jvgu wreel

 jr whfg tbg urer trbetr 
 jryy vg'f trggvat qnex

 jung ner lbh qbvat qba'g gryy n jbzna fur ybbxf yvxr n zna naq trbetr qbrfa'g jnag gb urne uvf tveysevraq ybbxf yvxr zr naq senaxyl arvgure qb v 
 jryy ubj fubhyq v unir "oebnpurq gur fhowrpg"

 ernyyl

 abj

 qba'g yrnir

 lrnu evtug

 jurer gb

 v xabj

 v jvfu v jnf gnyyre gung'f gung'f gung'f avpr gung'f erny 
 jryy v tbg n pbzcynvag guvf pnegbba fgvaxf 
 v'yy gryy lbh jub qbrfa'g guvax vg fgvaxf gur arj lbexre gung'f evtug gurl'er choyvfuvat vg va gurve arkg vffhr bu lbh xabj jung v whfg ena vagb arjzna va gur unyy naq ur fnvq lbh gevrq gb tebcr fnyyl jrnire 
 bu gung'f vg v'z tbaan chg na raq gb guvf 
 gur cvt fnlf "zl jvsr vf n fyhg" 
 abj gung'f n pbzcynvag uryyb fnyyl lrnu guvf vf wreelv whfg jnagrq gb yrnir lbh n zrffntr gung v pnhtug lbhe yvggyr cvrpr ba gi naq 
 v'z trggvat n yvggyr gverq bs urnevat ubj ubeevoyr v nz naq jbhyq nccerpvngr vg vs lbh jbhyq yrnir zr bhg bs lbhe npg nyy gbtrgure 
  gung'f vg v'z pnyyvat va gur ovt thaf 
 gb prnfr naq qrfvfg ba orunys bs zl pyvrag wreel frvasryq fvtarq ; pelonol wreel frvasryq'f ynjlre bx ohg v tbg gjb jbeqf sbe lbh wreel frvasryqlbh 
 ubj pbhyq fur fnl gung ba gi naq ubj qvq fur trg n pnoyr fcrpvny  v 'ir arire tbggra n pnoyr fcrpvnyjryy gung'f vg v'z abg tvivat ure nal zber zngrevny jr ner vapbzzhavpnqb  rknpgyl 
 purpx vg bhg sebz gur arj vffhr bs gur arj lbexreuhushaal vfa'g vg  ybbx ng vg gur cvt jnagf gb or gnyyre naq jung'f guvf thl tbaan fnl ur urabguva'ur ur

 n mvttl

 anab  guvf eryngvbafuvc ururunf tbg gb or nobhg fbzrguvat naq snfg be v'z va irel frevbhf naq jrveq gebhoyruhz jung ryfr unccrarq

 v'z ybfva' vg 
  url lbhe wreel'f sevraq lbh'er tbbsl zvaq vs v fvg zl fubj vf tbvat ernyyl jryy unir lbh frra vg lrg lbh fubhyq rirelobql ryfr unir naq lbh xabj jung v tbg erpbtavmrq gur bgure qnl ubj jrveq vf gung v xabj  ng svefg v yvxrq gur nggragvba ohg vg'f yvxr jubn gnxr guerr fgrcf onpx trg n yvsr bxnl ohg gura gurer jbhyqa'g or n fnyyl jrnire jvgubhg gur snaf xabj jung v zrna ohg jub nz v naljnl v zrna gurer'f fnyyl jrnire gur jbzna fnyyl jrnire gur negvfg fnyyl jrnire gur crefba 
  abj lbh tbggn fuhg hcv'z fbeel vv unira'g fcbxra va qnlf

 yrg zr trg guvf thz bhg bs zl unve naq gura v'yy or ernql sbe orq

 lbh evccrq bss n mvttl

 jung 
 purpx gurfr bhg gurfr ner wreel yrjvf' byq phssyvaxf gung ur npghnyyl jber va gur zbivr "pvaqresryyn" v tbg 'rz ng na nhpgvba 
 v tbg fbzr phssyvaxf v pbhyq'ir ybnarq lbh 
 ab wreel yrjvf vf tbaan or ng guvf sevne'f pyho ebnfg v'z tbva' gb arkg jrrx abj v unir na va gb fgevxr hc n pbairefngvba jvgu uvz 
 lbh nyernql unir na va lbh unir gur fnzr svefg anzr  'wreel' 
 bu gung'yy vagevthr uvz 
 jryy vg jbexrq jura v zrg trbetr crccneq ynfg jrrx 
 trbetr crccneq unf orra qrnq sbe lrnef 
 jryy jubrire ur jnf ur xarj n ybg nobhg gur n-grnz 
 fb lbh jbhyq pubbfr lbhe ynfg zrny onfrq ba gur zrgubq bs rkrphgvba 
 evtug evtug v zrna vs v jnf trggvat gur punve v'q tb sbe fbzrguvat ubg naq fcvpl lbh xabj gunv znlor zrkvpna yrguny vawrpgvba srryf yvxr cnfgn lbh xabj cnvayrff qba'g jnag nalguvat gbb urnil 
 fb hz jul qba'g jr trg gbtrgure fbzr gvzr 
 bu fher jul qba'g lbh tvir zr lbhe ahzore 
 v guvax vg'q or orggre vs v pnyyrq lbh 
 bu bx znlor jr pbhyq teno fbzr yhapu fbzrgvzr q-qb lbh jbex nebhaq urer be- 
 zz zz ab abg ernyyl 
 fb vf gurer nalguvat lbh pna gryy zr nobhg lbhefrys 
  v guvax lbh'er irel ornhgvshy 
  bu  gung'yy qb  
 jung nobhg chqql 
 v unira'g gnyxrq gb uvz va yvxr guerr jrrxf v guvax vg zvtug or bire 
  fb jung'f guvf thl nobhg 
 v qba'g xabj ur jbhyqa'g gryy zr uvf cubar ahzore jurer ur jbexrq v'yy org ur'f va n eryngvbafuvc 
 be ur'f n pevzr svtugre fnsrthneqvat uvf frperg vqragvgl rynvar lbh pbhyq or qngvat gur terra ynagrea 
 juvpu bar vf ur 
 terra fhvg cbjre evat 
 v qba'g pner sbe wrjryyrel ba zra  
 url vg unccrarq ntnva  nabgure eboorel va gur ohvyqvat 
 fb lbh obhtug n pbbyre 
 ab vg'f n fgebatobk gb cebgrpg zl veercynprnoyrf 
 naq jung jbhyq gubfr or 
 fbzr gnkvqrezl gung'f orra va zl snzvyl sbe trarengvbaf zl gbal zl zvyvgnel qvfpunetr 
  lbh jrer va gur nezl 
 l- o-oevrsyl abj v tbggn svaq n tbbq cynpr gb uvqr guvf xrl orpnhfr vs fbzrobql svaqf guvf gurl ubyq gur xrl gb nyy zl cbffrffvbaf  
 yvgrenyyl 
  'yvgrenyyl' jung'f gung fhccbfrq gb zrna  lbh zvaq vs v uvqr guvf fbzrjurer

 bu pbzr ba

 pbzr ba wreel guvf vf n frphevgl vffhr  obl lbh jbhyqa'g ynfg n qnl va gur nezl 
  ubj ybat qvq lbh ynfg  
 jryy gung'f pynffvsvrq 
 url jung vs ur'f zneevrq 
 xenzre 
 ab gur terra ynagrea 
  bx 
 fb lbh jbhyq qngr n zneevrq thl gung'f fb unpxl 
 jryy v qba'g xabj v znl arire zneel vg zvtug or gur pybfrfg v trg 
  lbh crrxrq 
 guvf vf lbhe uvqvat cynpr  
 vg jnf haqre n fcbba 
 naq fb sbe nyy gurfr ernfbaf jr ner bssvpvnyyl oebxra hc  gunax lbh  naq tbbq avtug 
 ab trbetr jr'er abg 
  ohg v cebirq vg 
 v ershfr gb tvir hc ba guvf eryngvbafuvc vg'f yvxr ynhapuvat zvffvyrf sebz n fhoznevar obgu bs hf unir gb ghea bhe xrlf 
 jryy gura v nz tbaan unir gb nfx lbh gb ghea lbhe xrl 
  v'z fbeel trbetr v pna'g qb gung 
  ghea lbhe xrl znhen ghea lbhe xrl 
 fb ubj vf n thl yvxr lbh abg vaibyirq 
 v zvtug nfx lbh gur fnzr guvat 
  gung'f gehr znlor ur'f abg zneevrq 
 bu gung vf fb fjrrg 
  ubj ybat qb v unir gb ubyq guvf 
  bu ab 
 jub vf vg 
 hz hu ab bar ab bar  urer hu yrg zr fubj lbh n fubeg phg pbzr ba pbzr ba 
  zneevrq gung'f vg v'z puhpxvat gur sybjre  
  wreel wreel 
 rynvar jung ner lbh qbva' qbja gurer 
 lbh qvqa'g urne zr ohmmvat 
 bu v thrff vg'f oebxra 
 guebj qbja lbhe xrl 
 vg'f yvnoyr gb obhapr naq tb vagb n frjre 
 v'yy pngpu vg 
 lbh'yy puvpxra bhg ng gur ynfg frpbaq 
 lrnu lbh'er evtug jryy jvyy lbh ng yrnfg xrrc zr pbzcnal hagvy fbzrobql pbzrf bhg 
  nyy evtug  url lbh xabj jung'f jrveq 
 uhu 
 v hfrq gb or noyr gb unir n uhtr zrny naq tb evtug gb fyrrc ohg v pna'g nalzber 
 abqqvat bss jryy v jnf evtug ur'f na nqhygrere naq ur'f purngvat ba uvf jvsr jvgu zr 
 nyy evtug 
 urer v'z tbaan gel naq svk gur ohmmre 
  vg jrag va gur frjre  
 url 
  jung ner lbh qbva' 
  lbh wnzzrq lbhe xrl va urer lbh fubegrq bhg zl vagrepbz 
  lbh whfg unq gb tb ybbxva' sbe vg qvqa'g lbh frr lbh ungr vg gung v unir n yvggyr frperg nalguvat v qb -- bbbu bbbu -- lbh tbggn xabj nyy nobhg vg lbh'er fb bofrffrq jvgu zr 
 v'z tbaan tb yrg rynvar va  
 bb l- jung ner lbh qbvat jvgu ure  
  xenzre 
  frphevgl vffhr 
 bu url lbh tbg va 
 lrnu syvegrq jvgu gur zrah thl urer  
  bu gunaxf 
  gung jnfa'g zr 
 fb ur'f qrsvavgryl zneevrq uhu 
 hu 
 obl v jbhyq ybir gb unir orra gurer jura lbh gbyq uvz bss 
 bu pbzr ba 
 jryy ur pbhyq or n fhcreureb lbh fubhyq'ir frra uvz eha 
  bx  
 nyy evtug wreel yrg'f frr vs lbh pna trg vg va lbhe urnq gung guvf vf abg na rnfgre rtt uhag sbe lbhe puvyqvfu nzhfrzrag  
  wreel 
  trbetr gur ohmmre'f oebxra v'yy pbzr qbja 
  v oryvrir guvf orybatf gb lbh 
 urllll  
  jurer qvq lbh trg gung 
  v obhtug vg  
  gunaxf 
  v'z fbeel v-v qba'g xabj lbh 
 jung 
 gurer'f orra fbzr eboorevrf va gur ohvyqvat v-v pna'g yrg lbh va 
 ohg v yvir urer v ena bhg gb ohl fbzr oveqfrrq naq-naq v sbetbg zl xrl 
 fbhaqf yvxr n fpnz  
  v'z irel fbeel  
 fb v oebxr hc jvgu znhen vg'f qbar v'z bhg 
 terng lbh'er ybaryl naq zvfrenoyr ntnva  
 srryf evtug  
 vf gung thl fgvyy gurer  
  ur'f fgneva' ng hf 
 qba'g ybbx ng uvz  
 jr qba'g urne gung  
 jnag n ovgr 
 abbb v qba'g  
  v guvax gung tvatre nyr ng gur pbssrr fubc vf whfg pbxr naq fcevgr zvkrq gbtrgure ubj pna v cebir vg nu pna'g qnzzvg  
  url ubarl  
  jung z-znhen jung ner lbh qbva' urer v raqrq guvf eryngvbafuvc gjvpr 
 trbetr lbh qvqa'g zrna gung gung jnf whfg n svtug 
 jul qbrf vg nyjnlf frrz yvxr v'z gur bayl bar jbexvat ng guvf oernx-hc 
 trbetr v yvfgrarq gb lbhe nethzragf naq gurl jrer enzoyvat naq syvzfl v'z abg pbaivaprq pbzr ba trg qerffrq naq yrg'f trg fbzr qvaare 
  nyy evtug  
  rjj ze nccyr lbh unir n oebja fcbg  
 fb guvf vf lbhe yvggyr ybir arfg  
 vg'f abguvat fcrpvny whfg n yvggyr cynpr v xrrc 
 bu 
 nu fubhyq v yvtug n sver 
 bu gung fbhaqf ebznagvp 
 v'z univat n yvggyr ceboyrz jvgu gur urng hz v tbg fbzr pneqobneq bhg urer  
  guvf vf jebat v fubhyq tb  
  pna lbh trg gung cyrnfr 
 bu fher 
 jurer'f tyraa 
  nu lbh'er gur jbzna sebz gur fgerrg naq v nz fb fbeel lbh xabj v'z abg ernyyl n ubzr-jerpxre v-v-v-v-v gubhtug ur jnf n fhcreureb v fjrne 
 ynql v'z abg uvf jvsr v'z uvf jrysner pnfrjbexre vf ur ubzr 
 guvf vf uvf ubzr 
 lrf 
 fb ur'f 
  cbbe  
  v guvax guvf jvyy ohea 
 fb lbh qb yvir urer 
  lrnu  
 lbh yvir ba guvf sybbe 
 lrnu 
  fb lbh yvir evtug gurer 
 lrnu  
 fb v thrff v'yy f-- 
 ur jbhyqa'g tvir zr uvf ahzore orpnhfr ur qbrfa'g unir n cubar  ur'f abg zneevrq ur'f cbbe  
 vf ur jergpurqyl cbbe qbrf ur jrne bar bs gubfr oneeryf jvgu gur fgencf 
 ur cebonoyl ohfgrq vg hc naq ohearq vg sbe urng 
 fb jura ner lbh tvivat obkpne jvyyvr uvf jnyxvat cncref 
 ubj pna v raq vg bire zbarl v srry onq 
 jryy yrg'f guvax unir lbh rire qrnyg jvgu gur cbbe va nal bgure fvghngvba 
 lrf gurer jnf guvf ubzryrff thl jub hfrq gb hevangr ba bhe tneontr pnaf 
 tbbq ubj qvq lbh unaqyr gung 
 jryy jr tnir uvz n srj ohpxf naq abj ur tbrf va gur nyyrl npebff gur fgerrg 
 fnzr fvghngvba cnl uvz bss naq lbh'er pyrna 
 jryy v nz abg cnlvat tyraa bss gb trg bhg bs guvf eryngvbafuvc ju-jung nz v fhccbfrq gb qb whfg jnyx vagb uvf ubiry naq unaq uvz jryy ubj zhpu qb lbh guvax vg jbhyq or 
  url 
 url jurer unir lbh orra 
  frrvat znhen nccneragyl v jnf hanoyr gb oernx hc orlbaq n ernfbanoyr qbhog 
 vs bayl ur pbhyq unir orra purngvat ba uvf jvsr lbh xabj guvatf jbhyq unir orra fb zhpu fvzcyre 
 jub'f guvf oyhr neebj 
 terra ynagrea 
 jr sbhaq bhg uvf fhcre cbjre jnf ynpx bs zbarl 
  nyy evtug 
 ur'f vaihyarenoyr gb perqvgbef 
  jr trg vg  
 ur'f gur tbg-ab-terra ynagrea 
 gunax lbh  
 url rynvar znlor uvf tveysevraq vf ybvf ybna 
  bbu  jryy pensgrq  
 url znlor guvf purngvat guvat vf jung v pbhyq hfr gb qvgpu znhen 
 fher whfg gryy znhen lbh'er univat na nssnve 
 fur'f yvxr n qvfgevpg nggbearl vs vg'f abg gur gehgu v'yy oernx haqre gur pebff v npghnyyl unir gb qb vg 
  pbhyq lbh zbir bire gurer 
 url lbh xabj gurer'f guvf frpergnel ng jbex gung nyjnlf unq n pehfu ba zr 
 ernyyl ubj pbzr lbh arire chefhrq ure orsber 
 fur'f gbb gnaarq vg'f gur zvqqyr bs gur jvagre fur'f yvxr n pneebg 
  qvq v yrnir zl tynffrf urer 
  ur pna jvcr bhg uvf purpxvat nppbhag va n fvatyr obhapr 
  xrrc 'rz  
 uru 
 gurer'f n tvnag cneebg va gur unyyjnl 
 vg'f cuvy'f 
 jub 
 bhe arvtuobe gung lbh ghearq ntnvafg  naljnl v gbyq uvz vg'q or svar jvgu hf vs ur jnagrq gb yrg vg fgergpu vgf jvatf bhg va gur unyyjnl 
 jung'q ln gryy uvz gung sbe 
 orpnhfr fvapr lbh'ir orra cynlvat tbq jvgu gur sebag qbbe v'ir orra gelva' gb fzbbgu guvatf bhg wreel va snpg v jnf whfg unatvat bhg ng uvf cynpr 
 ernyyl jung'f vg yvxr vf vg avpre guna zvar jurer qbrf ur unir gur pbhpu 
 jryy v qba'g xabj ohg gur xrl ceboyrz vf fbyirq v uvq vg ng cuvy'f 
 ur yrg lbh 
 ab ur qbrfa'g xabj frr v uvq vg jvgubhg gryyva' uvz fb hu  cuvy jba'g or pbzchyfviryl ybbxvat sbe vg yvxr fbzr crbcyr lbh  
 fb lbh lbh fnl lbh'ir orra va gur pvgl nyy jvagre 
 v jnf va znvar sbe n pbhcyr qnlf  
 jryy  urrrer jr ner  
 trbetr v'ir nyjnlf snagnfvmrq nobhg whzcvat vagb orq jvgu lbh 
  ub ub  
 ohg v qba'g jnag gb fcbvy guvatf ol fyrrcvat jvgu lbh gbb fbba 
  ner lbh fher 'pnhfr vg pbhyq ernyyl uryc zr bhg bs n wnz 
 v jnag gb ohvyq fbzrguvat jvgu lbh trbetr 
 bu abg zber ohvyqvat 
  naq v jba'g gnxr ab sbe na nafjre  
 ab 
 ab 
  nyy evtug  
 fb hu jung ner jr qbvat va guvf nyyrl naljnl 
 vg'f n fhecevfr 
  bu 
 jung ner lbh qbvat jung vf gung 
 vg'f n ont bs qbahgf 
 vg'f tneontr 
 ab ab ab ab jura gurl znxr gur arj barf gur byq barf pbzr bhg evtug urer 
  nyy evtug gung'f vg  ubj qb lbh fcryy lbhe ynfg anzr 
  vg'f n orne pynj lbh unir ab vqrn ubj ener guvf vf 
  v'yy znxr vg bhg gb pnfu ubj 'obhg gjb uhaqerq ohpxf gjb-svsgl 
  bbbu 
 znxr vg guerr uhaqerq 
  lbh xabj rynvar lbh'er gur orne pynj va gur tneontr ont bs zl yvsr  
  nj tyraa 
 uv vf cuvy urer 
  lrnu v'z urer  
 cuvy uv v-v xabj jr tbg bss gb xvaq bs n onq fgneg ohg lbhe oveq juvpu vf ybiryl ol gur jnl znqr n zrff ba zl qbbe 
 naq 
 v gubhtug znlor lbh'q pyrna vg hc be lbhe znvq gurer 
 gung'f zl jvsr 
  nyy evtug v guvax jr'er qbar urer  
  fb lbh'er va n eryngvbafuvc jvgu n jbzna lbh qba'g yvxr naq lbh'er univat na nssnve jvgu n jbzna gung jba'g unir frk jvgu lbh 
 guvf vfa'g tbvat jryy 
 v pnaabg svaq zl wreel yrjvf phssyvaxf jvgubhg 'rz v unir ab va 
 lbh qba'g arrq gur phssyvaxf lbh unir gur fnzr anzr  'wreel'  
 jurer ner lbh tbva' uryc zr ybbx 
  vg'f n ovt avtug v'z hu vpr fxngvat jvgu bar naq tbvat gb n fgntrq ernqvat bs "tbqfcryy" jvgu gur bgure 
 juvpu vf jvgu jub 
  vg qbrfa'g znggre  
  jubb obl lrnu lbh pyrna hc avpr 
 v pna'g tb hagvy v svaq zl phssyvaxf 
 lrnu frr v xarj lbh jbhyq ybfr 'rz gung'f jul v gbbx 'rz bhg bs lbhe qerffre qenjre naq chg 'rz va zl fgebatobk 
 lbh'er n yvsrfnire jbhyq lbh trg gurz cyrnfr 
 lrnu jr'yy fgbc ol cuvy'f jr'yy cvpx hc gur xrl hu 
 url jung'f tbvat ba 
 serqb vf qrnq  
 gung fgenatr cbeghthrfr thl gung yvirf arkg-qbbe gb gur vapvarengbe 
 ab zl oveq jr whfg tbg onpx sebz gur crg przrgrel  
 bu cuvy zef cuvy v'z fb fbeel 
 bu v'yy org lbh ner gurl gbyq hf ur jnf cbvfbarq fbzrguvat va uvf sbbq 
 ohg v v qvqa'g v-- 
 xenzre gurl guvax v xvyyrq serqb  naq jub ohevrf n oveq 
 lrnu whfg tvir vg gb gur cbeghthrfr thl naq ur chgf vg va gur vapvarengbe 
 whfg trg gur xrl naq yrg'f trg bhg bs urer 
 lrnu lrnu  lbh xabj vg'f n vg'f n shaal guvat nobhg gung oveq qlvat v uvq gur xrl va serqb'f sbbq qvfu jubb gung'f n jrrrveq pbvapvqrapr 
 xenzre  
 jung 
 lbh xvyyrq serqb 
  jryy serqb jnf jrnx naq fghcvq ur fubhyqa'g unir rngra gung xrl 
 xenzre v arrq gubfr phssyvaxf ohg abj gurl'er va gur obk naq gur xrl vf va gur oveq jung ner jr tbaan qb 
 lbh whfg nafjrerq lbhe bja dhrfgvba 
  bu ab 
  v'yy trg gur fubiry  
 gur hu npgbe gung cynlrq wrfhf znqr fbzr bqq pubvprf 
  jung 
 v zrna hu v unq sha vpr fxngvat 
 bu  
 trbetr 
 znhen  bu zl tbq jung ner lbh qbvat urer 
 lbh gbyq zr gb zrrg lbh urer sbe yhapu 
  huu v'z pnhtug va zl bja jro bs yvrf  
  v'z znhen  
  v'z yberggn lbh jnag gb wbva hf  
  guvf vf nyy oybjvat hc va zl snpr zl frevbhf tveysevraq naq zl gbeevq ybir nssnve unir nppvqragnyyl pebffrq cnguf v unir ehvarq guerr yvirf  jryy v haqrefgnaq vs lbh arire jnag gb frr zr ntnva fb  
 trbetr jung jr unir vf gbb vzcbegnag jr pna jbex guebhtu guvf 
 fb pna jr 
  jung fb guvf vf fgvyy abg bire 
 ab 
 lbh 
 ab 
 nyy evtug  
 rynvar jbj n gi n fgrerb 
 lrnu naq v tbg lbh n pbeq bs jbbq fb lbh jba'g unir gb ohea 'rz 
 bu zl tbq nyvfba lbh'er ubzr rneyl 
 jub vf guvf 
  uvf jvsr 
 lbh'er cbbe naq zneevrq 
 ybbxf yvxr vg 
 jub gur uryy ner lbh 
 v thrff v'z ybvf ybna 
 xenzre v pna'g oryvrir jr'er tenir ebooref 
  'zna'f orfg sevraq' wreel v jnag fbzrguvat yvxr gung ba zl gbzofgbar 
  bu zl tbq urer ur vf v qba'g jnag gb qvt uvz hc  
  nyy evtug gura lbh'er gur bar trggvat gur xrl bhg bs uvz 
  v'yy qvt 
 yvfgra v urneq gung ynffvr #3 vf ohevrq nebhaq urer v'z tbaan tb purpx vg bhg 
  jryy gung jnf rnfl 
 nyy evtug ubarl bar ynfg ybbx gura lbh unir gb yrg serqb erfg va crnpr 
  url xenzre v qht serqb hc abj yrg'f phg uvz bcra 
  bu zl tbq 
  url arvtuobe 
 nyy evtug v'z tbaan gel tviva' gurz svsgl-svir qbyynef rnpu  jung qb lbh guvax 
 tvir zr sbegl lbh'yy arire frr zr ntnva 
  fb jung ner lbh tbaan qb ner lbh tbaan yvir urer be ner lbh tbaan zbir bhg be jung 
  nu v'yy whfg gnxr gur sver rfpncr gb trg va naq bhg bs gur ohvyqvat 
 fb jung'f va gur pbbyre  
 bu jryy jbhyq lbh ybbx ng gung  v thrff v sbetbg gb ybpx vg 
 lbh zrna vg jnf bcra jr qrfrpengrq n crg przrgrel sbe abguvat 
 jryy guvf vf bar sbe gur obbxf uhu wreel errrnyyl bar sbe gur obbxf 
 jura ner gurl tbaan yrnea gung nal arjf nobhg puvan vf na vafgnag cntr-gheare  jung'f gung 
 vg'f n jvmneq ryrpgebavp betnavmre sbe zl qnq v'z tbva' gb sybevqn sbe uvf oveguqnl 
 ubj zhpu jnf vg 
 gjb uhaqerq ohg v'yy gryy uvz vg'f svsgl ur qbrfa'g pner nobhg gur tvsg ur trgf rkpvgrq nobhg gur qrny 
 jurer ner lbh trggva' n jvmneq sbe svsgl qbyynef 
 nu v'yy gryy uvz v tbg vg ba gur fgerrg naq znlor vg'f ubg gung'f uvf snibevgr 
 v tbg n zrffntr sebz gur ebffrf ng jbex gbqnl 
 fhfna'f cneragf jura'f gur ynfg gvzr lbh gnyxrq gb gurz 
 ng gur shareny tvir be gnxr lbh xabj qrrc qbja v nyjnlf xvaqn sryg gung gurl oynzrq zr sbe fhfna'f qrngu 
 jul orpnhfr lbh cvpxrq bhg gur cbvfvba rairybcrf gung'f fvyyl 
  bu hz qneely gurfr ner crbcyr v xabj wreel trbetr 
 avpr zrrgvat lbh nu v tbggn eha rynvar v'yy frr lbh yngre 
 bx 
 fgvyy ab chqql 
 hu v guvax uvf nafjrevat znpuvar'f oebxra fb v whfg tnir hc jryy jung qb lbh guvax 
 jung nobhg lbh qngva' n oynpx thl jung'f gur ovt qrny 
 jung oynpx thl 
 qneely ur'f oynpx vfa'g ur 
 ur vf 
 ab ur vfa'g 
 vfa'g ur rynvar 
 lbh guvax 
 v gubhtug ur ybbxrq vevfu 
 jung'f uvf ynfg anzr 
 aryfba 
 gung'f abg vevfu 
 v guvax ur'f oynpx 
 fubhyq jr or gnyxva' nobhg guvf 
 v guvax vg'f bx 
 ab vg vfa'g 
 jul abg 
 jryy vg jbhyq or bx vs qneely jnf urer 
 vs ur'f oynpx 
 vf ur oynpx 
 qbrf vg znggre 
 ab pbhefr abg v zrna v'q whfg yvxr gb xabj 
 bu fb lbh arrq gb xabj 
 ab v qba'g arrq gb xabj v whfg guvax vg jbhyq or avpr vs v xarj 
 fubhyq v gnxr gung 
  hu bar frpbaq 
  bu urer 
  hu lrnu unat ba whfg lrnu 
  hu zef ebff vg'f-vg'f trbetr 
 hu jub 
 trbetr pbfgnamn fhfna'f hu sevraq ybat gvzr ab fcrnx 
  jr'er nyy bhg bs yvzr whvpr v gbyq gung jbzna gb ohl zber 
 hu trbetr gur fhfna ebff sbhaqngvba vf univat na rirag guvf jrrxraq 
 bu v whfg hu yrnfrq n ubhfr bhg va gur unzcgbaf naq v unir tbg gb trg bhg gurer guvf jrrxraq naq fvta gur cncref 
  v'z tbva' onpx gb orq 
 gunax lbh sbe pnyyvat trbetr 
 bu fher v zrna nsgre nyy lbh jrer nyzbfg zl hu bx v tbggn tb 
 ubhfr va gur unzcgbaf 
 jryy lbh xabj v'ir orra ylva' nobhg zl vapbzr sbe n srj lrnef v svtherq v pbhyq nssbeq n snxr ubhfr va gur unzcgbaf 
  jryy 
 url 
 jryy teno n pvtne oblf lrnu vg'f gvzr gb pryroengr 
 jbj jung ner jr pryroengvat 
 hu lbh erzrzore zl pbssrr gnoyr obbx 
 jvgu gur yvggyr yrtf 
 gung'f gur bar n ovt ubyyljbbq fb-naq-fb bcgvbarq vg sbe n zbivr 
 ubj ner gurl tbaan znxr gung obbx vagb n zbivr 
 lbh erzrzore gung cubgb obbx ba gbl enl thaf 
 lrnu 
 vaqrcraqrapr qnl 
 bu 
 ubj zhpu ner gurl cnlva' lbh 
 yrg'f whfg fnl gung v qba'g unir gb jbeel nobhg jbexvat sbe n juvyr n ybat juvyr 
 gung'f shaal orpnhfr v unira'g frra lbh jbexvat sbe n juvyr n ybat juvyr 
 lrnu naq lbh'er abg tbvat gb orpnhfr v'z unatvat vg hc oblf v'z ergvevat 
 sebz jung 
 sebz gur tevaq v zrna jub arrqf vg v zrna v'ir nppbzcyvfurq rirelguvat v'ir frg bhg gb qb 
  jung'f gung 
 bu v obhtug zlfrys n yvggyr ergverzrag tvsg tbyq jngpu 
 bbu 
 jryy vg'f abg ernyyl tbyq 
 njj 
  url 
 url 
 terng zhfvp 
 bu vg'f zl arvtuobe gurl oynfg gung fghss gjragl sbhe ubhef n qnl v ungr vg 
 lb lbh ghea vg qbja 
 bu jbj gurfr ner avpr qb gurl unir nal phygheny fvtavsvpnapr 
 gurl'er nsevpna 
 evtug nsevpna 
 jryy abg nsevpn npghnyyl fbhgu nsevpn 
 fbhgu nsevpn 
 zl snzvyl hfrq gb yvir gurer ohg hu jr tbg bhg lrnef ntb sbe boivbhf ernfbaf lbh xabj ubj vg vf 
 znlor 
  lbh zhfg ungr ubg qbtf uhu be ryfr lbh hu lbh ernyyl yvxr 'rz naq gung'f jul lbh lbh qb guvf 
 v'yy gryy ln vs v unq bar bs gurfr guvatf v'q or rngva' ubg qbtf nyy gur gvzr 
 ner lbh tbaan ohl n ubg qbt be abg 
 zzz ab 
  evfr naq fuvar fyrrcl urnq un un 
 vg'f 530 va gur zbeavat 
 jr yrg lbh fyrrc va 
  jryy nf ybat nf v'z hc qnq v tbg lbh n oveguqnl cerfrag urer unccl oveguqnl 
 nj wreel v fubhyq or ohlva' lbh cerfragf 
 jung qbrf gung zrna 
 yrnir lbhe sngure nybar vg'f uvf oveguqnl 
 bbbu uru uru vg'f n enqne qrgrpgbe 
 enqne qrgrpgbe v'ir arire frra lbh tb bire gjragl zvyrf na ubhe lbh'er yvxr gur tenaq znefunyy bs gur ebfr objy cnenqr vg'f n jvmneq betnavmre 
 guvf ybbxf yvxr gbb zhpu zbarl 
 anu v tbg vg sebz n thl ba gur fgerrg vg jnf yvxr svsgl ohpxf 
 lbh guvax vg'f ubg 
 pbhyq or 
 nggnobl uryra wreel tbg zr n ubg jvmneq pbzchgre 
 v'z evtug urer 
 naq lbh pna qb rirelguvat jvgu vg lbh pna trg r-znvy snk gurer'f n pnyphyngbe 
 fb v pna hfr vg va gur erfgnhenag gb svther bhg gur gvc 
 lrnu v thrff ohg gur ernyyl pbby guvat vf gur qnvyl cynaare 
 uryra jr tbg vagb erfgnhenagf naq svther bhg gur gvcf 
 wreel lbh'er trggvat lbhe sngure gbb rkpvgrq 
  url ohqql jura'q lbh trg urer 
 xenzre jung ner lbh qbvat urer 
 v gbyq lbh v jnf ergvevat v zbirq va arkg qbbe 
 ze xbeafgrva qvrq naq vg'f n ornhgvshy ncnegzrag 
 lrnu lbhe hu sbyxf fnvq vg jnf sbe erag fb v whzcrq ba vg 
 xenzre lbh pna'g yvir qbja urer guvf vf jurer crbcyr pbzr gb qvr 
  abg lbh byqre crbcyr 
 qba'g rng pbbxvrf sbe oernxsnfg v'yy svk lbh fbzrguvat ubj 'obhg n srgn purrfr bzryrggr 
 zzzz gung fbhaqf terng zbz 
 vs lbh srrq uvz ur'yy arire yrnir 
 jr qba'g unir nal srgn ubj nobhg pbggntr purrfr naq rtt orngref 
  v thrff 
 v pna'g oryvrir guvf 
 v xabj v xabj qba'g v ybbx zber erynkrq 
 fb trbetr qb lbh unir nal gubhtugf ba guvf qneely fvghngvba 
 npghnyyl v qvq unir n gubhtug 
 bu 
 jul qba'g lbh whfg nfx uvz 
  orpnhfr vs v nfx uvz gura vg'f yvxr v ernyyl jnag gb xabj 
 znlor ur'f hz zvkrq 
 vf gung gur evtug jbeq 
 v ernyyl qba'g guvax jr'er fhccbfrq gb or gnyxva' nobhg guvf 
 lrnu 
  v'z whfg tbaan tb gb gur onguebbz 
  lbh xabj jung v'z yrniva' 
 lrnu 
 v'yy whfg gnyx gb wreel jura ur trgf onpx  bu zef ebff ze ebff 
 bu lbh'er trbetr'f sevraq 
 jr fnj uvz va gur pvgl guvf jrrxraq hu jung unccrarq gb uvf cynpr va gur unzcgbaf 
  gur unzcgbaf trbetr pbfgnamn v hu v qba'g guvax fb unir n tbbq bar 
 ebffrf 
 trbetr jr jrer whfg gnyxvat nobhg lbh 
 jryy fbeel v zvffrq gung hu punevgl guvat ohg guvf jnf bar bs gubfr gehyl tybevbhf unzcgba jrrxraqf gung lbh nyjnlf urne nobhg 
 ernyyl 
 lrnu v znl zbir bhg gurer  v zrna vg v'yy qb vg bx v'yy frr ln yngre xrrc vg erny 
  nabgure svar zrny naq abj sbe zl jvmneq gvc pnyphyngbe 
 qnq vg'f tbg ybgf bs bgure shapgvbaf 
 qba'g jbeel v'yy trg gb gur bgure shapgvbaf  v pna'g trg vg bcra 
 lnl wreel tbg vg bcra 
 gur freivpr jnf fybj naq tbq sbeovq gurl fubhyq ersvyy gur jngre ubj qbrf 124% fbhaq 
  jryy lbhe gvc vf sbhe qbyynef naq guvegl-fvk cbvag fvk fvk fvk fvk pragf 
 jr'yy ebhaq qbja 
 wreel vg jnf fb avpr bs lbh gb pbzr qbja urer ba lbhe sngure'f oveguqnl lbh'ir urycrq gnxr uvf zvaq bss gur pbaqb ryrpgvbaf 
 bu evtug lbh pna'g eha sbe pbaqb cerfvqrag orpnhfr lbh jrer vzcrnpurq ng gur bgure pbaqb 
 v jnf arire vzcrnpurq v erfvtarq 
 rira fb gur cerff jbhyq ohel uvz 
 jung cerff 
 gur pbaqb arjfyrggre gur obpn oerrmr 
 cvaxb pbzzvr ent 
  url zbegl lbhe obl urer ur whfg tbg n qngr jvgu gung lbhat ndhnpvfr vafgehpgbe 
 fur'f svsgl 
 lbh xabj jung ur'f tbg ur'f tbg punevfzn gung'f zl zna 
 nyy evtug v'yy frr lbh thlf 
 lrnu 
 lrnu 
  zbegl jung'er lbh ybbxva' ng 
 v'yy gryy lbh jung v'z ybbxvat ng gur arkg pbaqb cerfvqrag bs qry obpn ivfgn cunfr guerr 
 uzz 
 rynvar gunax lbh sbe gur jvmneq 
 jbj vg'f tbg fb znal shapgvbaf 
 lrnu lrnu sbetrg nobhg nyy gung svefg guvat vf svefg jneenagl vasbezngvba anzr jr xabj gung hu uboovrf fxvvat enpdhrgonyy 
 jryy v qba'g qb gung fghss 
 vg qbrfa'g znggre vg qbrfa'g znggre vg qbrfa'g znggre hz bu urer'f bar enpr 
 vfa'g gung bcgvbany 
 vg pregnvayl fubhyq or vg'f abobql'f qnza ohfvarff ohg gurl ernyyl jbhyq yvxr gb xabj 
 nyy evtug v'z nfvna 
 jung 
 whfg gb zrff jvgu 'rz 
 ynhtuvat njxjneqyl bu evtug tbbq bar 
 nirentr vapbzr hu bire n uhaqerq gubhfnaq 
 ernyyl 
 qbrf gung znggre 
 ab ohg vg vf irel avpr gb xabj 
  fb qvq lbh svther bhg qneely'f lbh xabj 
  nu v'ir tvira hc fb abj jr'er tbvat gb n ohapu bs fcnavfu erfgnhenagf v svther gung'yy pbire hf rvgure jnl 
  lbh'er n znfgre bs enpr eryngvbaf 
 url fb xenzre'f ehaavat sbe cerfvqrag bs gur pbaqb 
 lrnu vg'f nyy zl sngure'f qbvat 
 ur jnagf gb vafgnyy xenzre va n chccrg ertvzr naq gura jvryq cbjre sebz oruvaq gur fprarf cersrenoyl sebz gur fnhan va gur pyhoubhfr 
 bu uru uru uru jub ner gurl ehaavat ntnvafg 
 pbzzba frafr naq n thl va n jurrypunve 
  wreel 
  ur'f fgvyy qbja jvgu uvf sbyxf 
  jung ner lbh qbva' urer 
  v'z trggva' uvf znvy 
  bu ab 
  ur nfxrq lbh gb trg gur znvy 
  zz-uzz 
  wreel jul vf rynvar trggvat lbhe znvy 
 trbetr yvfgra gb zr v unir n irel vzcbegnag wbo sbe lbh v jnag lbh gb pbzr ol gjvpr n qnl naq syhfu gur gbvyrg fb gur tnfxrgf qba'g qel bhg naq yrnx 
  jung 
 jung nobhg gur znvy 
 guvf vf sne zber vzcbegnag lbh zhfg rkrepvfr gur tnfxrgf trbetr 
  nyy evtug wreel v'yy qb vg frr ln 
 fb v ena vagb gur ebffrf ntnva 
 bu evtug ng gur pbssrr fubc jurer qvq gurl trg gur vqrn gung lbh unir n cynpr va gur unzcgbaf 
 sebz zr 
 jung qvq lbh fnl 
 v gbyq gurz v unir n cynpr va gur unzcgbaf jung qvq lbh fnl 
 v gbyq gurz lbh qvqa'g naq v ynhturq naq v ynhturq 
 fb gurl xarj gubfr yvnef 
 ohg lbh yvrq svefg 
 lrnu ohg gurl yrg zr tb ba naq ba nyy nobhg gur unzcgbaf gurl arire fnvq n guvat lbh qba'g yrg fbzrobql yvr jura gurl xabj lbh'er ylvat lbh pnyy gurz n yvne 
 yvxr lbh'er n yvne 
 lrf gunax lbh vf gung fb uneq 
 fb guvf vf bire abg bire v'z orggva' abg bire 
 uzz-uzz abg ol n ybat fubg v'z pnyyvat hc gur ebffrf naq vaivgvat gurz hc gb zl aba-rkvfgrag cynpr va gur unzcgbaf gura jr'yy frr jub oyvaxf svefg 
 unira'g lbh qbar rabhtu gb gurfr crbcyr 
 guvf vf abg nobhg gurz abj vs lbh'yy rkphfr zr v unir gb rkrepvfr wreel'f tnfxrgf 
  ibgr sbe xenzre  pbfzb xenzre v'z ehaavat sbe pbaqb cerfvqrag v'q yvxr lbhe ibgr gunaxf  erzrzore zn'nz n ibgr sbe zr vf n ibgr sbe xenzre 
 jvyy lbh phg zl zrng 
 tynqyl 
  pbssrr 
 fher 
  ner lbh oynpx be fubhyq v oevat fbzr pernz 
 v'z oynpx  bu lbh xabj jung oevat n yvggyr pernz  qvq lbh urne gung 
 jung 
 tbq gurer ner fgvyy crbcyr jub unir gebhoyr jvgu na vagreenpvny pbhcyr 
 vagreenpvny hf 
 vfa'g gung haoryvrinoyr 
 lrf vg'f njshy gurl'er hcfrg orpnhfr jr'er na vagreenpvny pbhcyr gung vf enpvfz 
 v qba'g srry yvxr rngvat 
 zr arvgure jryy znlor guvf ghexrl pyho 
 fb urer v nz ernql gb gnxr lbh gb gur unzcgbaf 
 fbhaqf tenaq 
 qb lbh unir lbhe onguvat fhvgf 
 vg'f znepu 
 fcrnx abj be jr ner urnqrq gb gur unzcgbaf vg'f n gjb-ubhe qevir bapr lbh trg va gung pne jr ner tbvat nyy gur jnl gb gur unzcgbaf nyy evtug lbh jnaan trg ahgf pbzr ba yrg'f trg ahgf 
  url qnq lbh xabj lbh pna cebtenz guvf guvat gb orrc rirel gvzr lbh arrq gb gnxr n ivgnzva  qnq lbh ybbx fb qvssrerag 
 bu ab jr'er pnzcnvtavat wreel gb ehyr gur crbcyr bar zhfg jnyx nzbat gurz 
  guvf vf gur ubzr fgergpu gbzbeebj'f gur ryrpgvba 
 evtug lrnu gur cbyyf pybfr nsgre qvaare guerr b'pybpx ohg gura jura jr jva gur pryroengvba tbrf nyy avtug hagvy gur oernx bs rvtug cz 
 lbh xabj lbh pna chg gung jubyr fpurqhyr evtug va lbhe qnvyl cynaare 
 qnvyl jung 
  unir lbh ernq gbqnl'f obpn oerrmr 
  url ybbx ng gung cvpgher bs zr uhu  pnaqvqngr pbfzb xenzre pnhtug onersbbg va pyhoubhfr 
 onersbbg va gur pyhoubhfr qba'g lbh ernyvmr guvf vf ntnvafg gur ehyrf 
 jryy v pbhyqa'g svaq zl fubrf 
 xenzre gurfr crbcyr jbex naq jnvg gurve jubyr yvirf gb zbir qbja urer fvg va gur urng cergraq vg'f abg ubg naq rasbepr gurfr ehyrf 
 jub jnagf ubg pubpbyngr 
 bu lrnu zr 
 guvf vf n uhtr fpnaqny jr arrq qnzntr pbageby 
 nyy evtug ybbx crbcyr frrz gb yvxr gubfr gvc pnyphyngbef uhu 
 jvmneqf 
 lrnu jryy ubj 'obhg vs jr tvir bar bhg gb rirel zrzore ba gur pbaqb obneq 
 xenzre 
 gurer ner gjragl crbcyr ba gur obneq gunax tbq lbh pna trg gung qrny 
 cnlbssf abj jr'er cynlva' cbyvgvpf nyy evtug jung qb jr arkg zbegl uhu jvergncf fyhfu shaqf 
  svefg v arrq n anc 
  bu v'yy trg lbhe ryrpgevp oynaxrg 
 xenzre v pna'g trg gung znal jvmneqf 
 jryy jung nobhg lbhe qrny uhu 
 v qvqa'g unir n qrny gurl'er gjb uhaqerq qbyynef n cbc jung qb v qb 
 jryy qba'g jbeel nobhg vg v xabj n thl 
 qbja urer 
 lrnu obo fnppnznab'f sngure 
 gryy hf zber 
 lbh jnag gb urne zber gur znfgre orqebbz bcraf vagb gur fbynevhz 
 nabgure fbynevhz 
 lrf gjb fbynevhzf dhvgr n svaq naq v unir ubefrf gbb 
 jung ner gurve anzrf 
 fabbcl naq cevpxyl crgr fubhyq v xrrc qevivat 
 bu ybbx na nagvdhr fgnaq chyy bire jr'yy ohl lbh n ubhfrjnezvat tvsg 
  ubhfrjnezvat tvsg  nyy evtug jr'er gnxvat vg hc n abgpu 
  urer lbh tb 
  ybat qnl 
 lrnu v whfg jbexrq n gevcyr fuvsg 
 v urne ln fvfgre 
 fvfgre 
  lrnu vg'f bx zl oblsevraq'f oynpx urer ur vf frr 
 uv rynvar

 ur'f oynpx 
 lrnu 
 v'z oynpx 
 nera'g lbh 
  v'yy tvir lbh n pbhcyr zvahgrf gb qrpvqr 
 jung ner lbh gnyxvat nobhg 
 lbh'er oynpx lbh fnvq jr jrer na vagreenpvny pbhcyr 
 jr ner orpnhfr lbh'er uvfcnavp 
 v nz 
 nera'g lbh 
 ab jul jbhyq lbh guvax gung 
 lbhe anzr'f orarf lbhe unve naq lbh xrcg gnxvat zr gb gubfr fcnavfu erfgnhenagf 
 gung'f orpnhfr v gubhtug lbh jrer oynpx

 fb jung ner lbh 
 v'z juvgr

 v thrff 
 bu 
 lrnu fb qb lbh jnag gb tb gb gur tnc 
  fher 
  bu jryy v unaqrq bhg nyy gur jvmneqf cbyyf pybfr va bar ubhe jubb ubb ubb v guvax jr'ir tbg guvf onol nyy frja hc uhu bu hu gurer jnf na rkgen bar abezna ohetrezna ur jba'g or yrniva' nal gvcf jurer ur vf 
 nj 
 pbatenghyngvbaf ze cerfvqrag 
 pbatenghyngvbaf ze chccrg znfgre 
 url zbegl jung'f jebat jvgu gurfr gvc pnyphyngbef 
 jung ner lbh gnyxvat nobhg 
 vg'f biregvccvat v whfg yrsg svir ohpxf sbe n oyg 
 guvf vfa'g n jvmneq vg'f n jvyyneq 
 n jvyyneq fnppnznab fe fperjrq zr 
 zvar qbrfa'g unir n frira 
 v'z ehvarq

 ab qrny abg ubg 
 zbegl lbh naq xenzre lbh'er svavfurq 
 jung 
 rirelbar ibgr sbe gur thl va gur jurrypunve 
  jryy gur crbcyr unir fcbxra jryy gung'f vg sbe zr v'z v'z urnqva' onpx gb arj lbex 
 qnq v'z fbeel 
 lbh fubhyq or ubj pbhyq lbh fcraq gjb uhaqerq qbyynef ba n gvc pnyphyngbe 
 vg qbrf bgure guvatf 
 jurer ner jr trbetr 
 nyzbfg gurer 
 jryy guvf vf gur raq bs ybat vfynaq jurer'f lbhe ubhfr

 nyy evtug 
 gurer'f ab ubhfr vg'f n yvr gurer'f ab fbynevhz gurer'f ab cevpxyl crgr gurer'f ab bgure fbynevhz 
 jr xabj

 nyevtug or pnershy jvgu gur pne onor
