 tbbqolr 
 gjb naq gra onor 
 bxnl 
 qba'g crry bhg 
 v jba'g 
 "wrfhf vf bar wrfhf vf nyy wrfhf cvpxf zr hc jura v snyy" rynvar punatrf gur fgngvbaf ohg nyy bs gur cerfrgf ner frg gb eryvtvbhf enqvb fgngvbaf; "naq ur fnvq hagb noenunz" "nzra nzra" "fb jr cenl" "fnirq" "wrl-fhf" fur gheaf bss gur enqvb) 
 wrfhf 
 nppbeqvat gb bhe yngrfg dhnegreyl guvatxehtre vaqhfgevny fzbbguvat vf urnqvat vagb gur erq be gur oynpx be jungrire gur onq bar vf nal gubhtugf 
 jryy v xabj jura v'z n yvggyr fgenccrq v fbzrgvzrf qebc bss zl erag purpx univat sbetbggra gb fvta vg gung pbhyq ohl hf fbzr gvzr 
 jbexf sbe zr tbbq guvaxvat trbetr 
 nyevtug trbetr 
 jnl gb tb zna 
 be jr qba'g rira fraq gur purpx naq gura jura gurl pnyy jr cergraq jr'er gur pyrnavat freivpr uru uru "uryyb v fbeel ab urer xehtre" 
 ner lbh qbar fvyyl ibvprf p'zba crbcyr yrg'f trg erny 
 tbbq bar 
 gung jnf onq 
 v unq 'rz wreel gurl ybirq zr 
 naq gura 
 v ybfg gurz v pna hfhnyyl pbzr hc jvgu bar tbbq pbzzrag qhevat n zrrgvat ohg ol gur raq vg'f ohevrq haqre n cvyr bs tnssf naq onq chaf 
 fubjznafuvc trbetr jura lbh uvg gung uvtu abgr lbh fnl tbbqavtug naq jnyx bss 
 v pna'g whfg yrnir 
 gung'f gur jnl gurl qb vg va irtnf 
 lbh arire cynlrq irtnf 
 v urne guvatf 
 urer'f bar v obeebjrq chqql'f pne naq nyy gur cerfrgf ba uvf enqvb jrer puevfgvna ebpx fgngvbaf 
 v yvxr puevfgvna ebpx vg'f irel cbfvgvir vg'f abg yvxr gubfr erny zhfvpvnaf jub guvax gurl'er fb pbby naq uvc 
 fb lbh guvax gung chqql npghnyyl oryvrirf va fbzrguvat 
 vg'f n hfrq pne ur cebonoyl arire punatrq gur cerfrgf 
 lrf ur vf ynml 
 cyhf ur cebonoyl qbrfa'g rira xabj ubj gb cebtenz gur ohggbaf 
 lrf ur vf qhzo 
 fb lbh cersre qhzo naq ynml gb eryvtvbhf 
 qhzo naq ynml v haqrefgnaq 
 gryy lbh ubj lbh pbhyq purpx 
 ubj 
 ercebtenz nyy gur ohggbaf frr vs ur punatrf gurz onpx lbh xabj gur byq fjvgpurebb 
 ab ab gur byq fjvgpurebb vf lbh cbvfba lbhe qevax gura lbh fjvgpu vg jvgu gur bgure crefba'f 
 ab vg'f qbvat gur fnzr guvat gb fbzrbar gung gurl qvq gb lbh 
 lrnu rynvar'f tbaan qb gur fnzr guvat gb chqql'f enqvb gung gur enqvb qvq gb ure 
 jryy gung'f gur tvfg bs vg 
 dhvrg fb jurer vf guvf fbcuvr 
 bu fur'f cvpxvat zr hc va n srj zvahgrf 
 ubj ybat unir lbh gjb orra gbtrgure 
 v qhaab fvapr gur ynfg bar bu urer fur vf lbh jnaan zrrg ure 
 anu 
 ol gur jnl ubj qvq chqql trg onpx va gur cvpgher 
 v arrqrq gb zbir n ohernh 
 url wreel lbh tbg nal crccre 
 url wreel 
 url zvpxrl purpx gur crccre funxre 
 lrnu  frr vg fubhyq fbhaq yvxr gung fbzrguvat yvxr gung 
 nnu-pubb 
 n yvggyr jrggre frr v qvqa'g oryvrir vg 
 jung'f jvgu gur snxr farrmvat 
 lrnu jr'er tbvat qbja gb zg fvanv ubfcvgny frr gurl uver npgbef gb uryc gur fghqragf cenpgvpr qvntabfvat 
 gurl nffvta lbh n fcrpvsvp qvfrnfr naq lbh npg bhg gur flzcgbzf vg'f na rnfl tvt 
 qb zrqvpny fpubbyf npghnyyl qb guvf 
 jryy gur orggre barf nyevtug yrg'f cenpgvpr ergpuvat 
 uhnnuuu 
 v guvax gur cubar vf evatvat 
 uhnnuuu 
 jbhyq lbh ubyq vg n frpbaq gunax lbh jvyy lbh trg bhg bs urer jvgu gung fghss 
 zvpxrl qgf 
 uryyb 
 url vg'f zr 
 rynvar 
 ab vg'f zr 
 trbetr 
 wreel vg'f fbcuvr v pna'g oryvrir lbh qba'g erpbtavmr zl ibvpr 
 bu v xarj vg jnf lbh v jnf wbxvat v'z n pbzrqvna 
 lbh tbg nal vcrpnp 
 vcrpnp xenzre v ernyyl guvax lbh thlf ner tbvat gbb sne jvgu guvf 
 ab zvpxrl ur fjnyybjrq gjryir nfcveva 
 qvq ur bireqbfr 
 ab vg'f whfg gbb zhpu 
 naq vg trgf jbefr gur grnz jbexvat ba gur fgnghr va ynsnlrggr fdhner xvaq bs bire-fzbbgurq vg gurl tebhaq gur urnq qbja gb nobhg gur fvmr bs n fbsgonyy naq gung fcryyf gebhoyr 
 nyevtug jryy jul qba'g jr fzbbgu gur urnq qbja gb abguvat fgvpx n chzcxva haqre vgf nez naq punatr gur anzrcyngr gb vpunobq penar 
  nyevtug gung'f vg sbe zr tbbqavtug rirelobql 
 va lbhe cnpxrg lbh jvyy svaq gur qvfrnfr lbh unir orra nffvtarq naq gur flzcgbzf lbh jvyy arrq gb rkuvovg 
 onpgrevny zravatvgvf wnpxcbg 
 tbabeeurn lbh jnaan genqr 
 fbeel ohqql guvf vf gur "unzyrg" bs qvfrnfrf frirer cnva anhfrn qryhfvbaf vg'f tbg rirelguvat 
 fher 
 bxnl jung qb lbh tbg 
 gur fhetrba yrsg n fcbatr vafvqr zr 
 tbbq yhpx jvgu gung 
 v xarj v unq uvg zl uvtu abgr fb v gunaxrq gur pebjq naq v jnf tbar 
 jung qvq lbh qb gur erfg bs gur qnl 
 v fnj "gvgnavp" fb gung byq jbzna fur'f whfg n yvne evtug 
 naq n ovg bs n genzc vs lbh nfx zr 
 uryyb oblf 
 url fb qvq lbh tvir gung enqvb gur byq fjvgpurebb 
 v qvq 
 naq gur puevfgvna ebpx 
 erffherpgrq naq ybbx jung v cevrq bss bs uvf ohzcre n wrfhf svfu 
 wreel qb lbh unir nal svfufgvpxf 
 ab fb lbh'er qvfnccbvagrq ur'f n fcvevghny crefba 
 jryy lrnu v tbg uvz orpnhfr ur frrzrq fb bar-qvzrafvbany v srry zvfyrq 
 v guvax vg'f arng lbh qba'g urne gung zhpu nobhg tbq nalzber 
 v urne guvatf url fb fbcuvr tnir zr gur "vg'f zr" ba gur cubar gbqnl 
 "vg'f zr" vfa'g vg n yvggyr cerzngher 
 v gubhtug fb 
 unu fur'f abg n "zr" v'z n "zr" 
 v'z ntnvafg nyy "vg'f zr"f fb frys-nofbeorq naq rtbgvfgvpny vg'f yvxr gubfr uvc zhfvpvnaf jvgu gurve pbzcyvpngrq fubrf 
 jryy v tbg tbabeeurn 
 gung frrzf nobhg evtug 
 gung'f jung gurl tnir zr 
 gurl gur tbireazrag 
 ab ab ur'f cergraqvat ur'f tbg tbabeeurn fb zrq fghqragf pna qvntabfr vg 
 naq vg'f n jnfgr bs zl gnyrag vg'f whfg n yvggyr oheavat zvpxrl ur tbg onpgrevny zravatvgvf 
 v thrff gurer ner ab fznyy qvfrnfrf bayl fznyy npgbef 
  nyevtug gung'f vg sbe zr tbbq avtug rirelobql 
 jung jnf gung 
 fubjznafuvc trbetr vf gelvat gb trg bhg ba n uvtu abgr 
 frr fubjznafuvc znlor gung'f jung zl tbabeeurn vf zvffvat 
 lrf fgrc vagb gung fcbgyvtug naq oryg gung tbabeeurn bhg gb gur onpx ebj 
 lrf lrf v jvyy v'z tbaan znxr crbcyr srry zl tbabeeurn naq srry gur tbabeeurn gurzfryirf 
 naq ner lbh rkcrevrapvat nal qvfpbzsbeg 
 whfg n yvggyr oheavat qhevat hevangvba 
 bxnl nal bgure cnva 
 gur unhagvat zrzbevrf bs ybfg ybir znl v  yvtugf  bhe rlrf zrg npebff gur pebjqrq ung fgber v n phfgbzre naq fur n pbdhrggvfu unoreqnfure bu v chefhrq naq fur jvguqerj gura fur chefhrq naq v jvguqerj naq fb jr qnaprq v ohearq sbe ure zhpu yvxr gur oheavat qhevat hevangvba gung v jbhyq rkcrevrapr fbba nsgrejneqf 
 tbabeeurn 
 tbabeeurn 
 bar zrffntr ubcr vg'f abg sebz lbh 
 "url wreel vg'f zr pnyy zr onpx" 
 fbcuvr 
 fur'f fgvyy qbvat gung 
 lrc 
 nyevtug v'yy gryy lbh jung lbh qb lbh pnyy ure onpx naq tvir ure gur "vg'f zr" uru chyy gur byq fjvgpurebb 
 v guvax gung'f n "jung'f tbbq sbe gur tbbfr vf tbbq sbe gur tnaqre" 
 jung gur uryy vf n tnaqre naljnl 
  vg'f n tbbfr gung'f unq gur byq fjvgpurebb chyyrq ba vg uv fbcuvr vg'f zr 
 url enrs 
  fur guvaxf vg'f fbzrbar anzrq enrs 
 tbbq yrg ure guvax vg 
  fb jung'f tbvat ba 
 abg n ybg 
 nfx nobhg lbh nfx nobhg lbh 
 fb hu ubj ner guvatf jvgu wreel 
 bu v ernyyl yvxr uvz ohg jryy v fgvyy unira'g gbyq uvz gur genpgbe fgbel 
 evtug evtug gur genpgbe fgbel 
 ner lbh fvpx enrs lbh fbhaq xvaqn shaal 
 v fbhaq shaal 
 nobeg nobeg 
 lrnu v orggre trg gb n qbpgbe olr  gung jnf pybfr jung qevirf zr gb gnxr punaprf yvxr gung 
 gung jnf irel erny 
 fur fnvq gurer'f fbzr genpgbe fgbel gung fur unfa'g gbyq zr nobhg 
 jbnu onpx vg hc onpx vg hc orrc orrc orrc genpgbe fgbel 
 orrc orrc orrc jung ner lbh qbvat 
 fb jurer qb lbh jnaan rng 
 srryf yvxr na neol'f avtug 
 neol'f orrs naq purrfr naq qb lbh oryvrir va tbq 
 lrf 
 bu fb lbh'er cerggl eryvtvbhf 
 gung'f evtug 
 fb vf vg n ceboyrz gung v'z abg ernyyl eryvtvbhf 
 abg sbe zr 
 jul abg 
 v'z abg gur bar tbvat gb uryy 
 lbh xabj jung v guvax v org fur fgbyr n genpgbe 
 ab bar'f fgrnyvat n genpgbe vg'f n svir-zvyr-na-ubhe trgnjnl jr'er qnapvat nebhaq gur boivbhf vg'f tbggn or qvfsvtherzrag 
 qbrf fur jnyx nebhaq ubyqvat n cra fur arire frrzf gb arrq 
 ab fur ybbxf pbzcyrgryl abezny 
 bu bxnl urer vg vf v tbg vg fur ybfg ure guhzof va n genpgbe nppvqrag naq gurl tensgrq ure ovt gbrf ba gurl qb vg rirel qnl 
 lbh guvax fur'f tbg gbrf sbe guhzof 
 ubj'f ure unaqfunxr n yvggyr svez vfa'g vg znlor n yvggyr gbb svez 
 v qba'g xabj 
 unaqf n yvggyr fzryyl 
 jul qb v frrx lbhe pbhafry 
 jryy v'z tbvat gb uryy 
 gung frrzf nobhg evtug 
 nppbeqvat gb chqql 
 url unir lbh urneq gur bar nobhg gur thl va uryy jvgu gur pbssrr naq gur qbhtugahgf naq-- 
 v'z abg va gur zbbq 
  v'yy unir fbzr pbssrr naq n qbhtuahg 
 jung qb lbh pner lbh qba'g oryvrir va uryy 
 v xabj ohg ur qbrf 
 fb vg'f zber bs n eryngvbafuvc ceboyrz guna gur svany qrfgvangvba bs lbhe fbhy 
 jryy eryngvbafuvcf ner irel vzcbegnag gb zr 
 znlor lbh pna fgevxr bar hc jvgu gur cevapr bs qnexarff nf lbh ohea sbe nyy rgreavgl 
  naq n fyvpr bs qrivy'f sbbq pnxr 
 url jurer vf rirelbar 
 gurl'er nyy bss gur cebwrpg gurl jrer obevat trbetr lbh ner zl znva zna 
 v nz 
 v qba'g xabj jung vg vf v pna'g chg zl svatre ba vg ohg yngryl lbh unir whfg frrzrq 'ba' naq lbh nyjnlf yrnir zr jnagvat zber 
 guvf vf n uhtr cebwrpg vaibyivat ybgf bs ahzoref naq cncref naq sbyqref 
 nu v'z abg gbb jbeevrq nobhg vg yrg'f trg fgnegrq 
 bxnl 
 trbetr purpx vg bhg  guerr gvzrf nebhaq ab srrg 
 naq 
 nyy zr 
 nyevtug naq urer ner lbh nvyzragf sbe guvf jrrx ol gur jnl ze xenzre lbh jrer rkpryyrag 
 bu gunax lbh 
 pveeubfvf bs gur yvire jvgu wnhaqvpr nyevtug v trg gb jrne znxr-hc jung qvq lbh trg 
 tbabeeurn rkphfr zr v guvax gurer'f orra n zvfgnxr frr v unq tbabeeurn ynfg jrrx 
 bu vg'f ab zvfgnxr jr ybirq jung lbh qvq jvgu vg 
 v qba'g oryvrir guvf v'z orvat glcrpnfg 
 v zbir zl xavtug urer purpx 
 gurl fubhyq hcqngr gurfr cvrprf abobql evqrf ubefrf nalzber znlor gurl fubhyq punatr vg gb n genpgbe 
 wreel ner lbh rzoneenffrq gung lbh'er ybfvat 
 ybfvat lbh xabj lrfgreqnl v ybfg pbageby bs zl pne nyzbfg obhtug gur snez 
 obhtug gur snez 
 genpgbe 
 guvf vf na bqq fvqr bs lbh wreel v srry hapbzsbegnoyr 
 jnvg qba'g tb yrg'f guhzo jerfgyr 
 n fpne 
 n ovt ybat fpne jurer ure yrt jbhyq qnatyr jura fur'f evqvat n 
 n genpgbe 
 v'z fher fur'f n yvggyr frys-pbafpvbhf naq qbrfa'g yvxr gb gnyx nobhg vg 
 v qba'g frr jul'f fur zber frys-pbafpvbhf nobhg gung guna ure gbr guhzof 
 fur qbrfa'g unir gbr guhzof 
 jryy vs fur xrrcf ubefvat nebhaq jvgu gung genpgbe-- 
 nyevtug fb ubj'f gur gjb-zna bcrengvba ng xehtre 
 gjb-zna vg'f nyy zr xehtre qbrfa'g qb nalguvat; qvfnccrnef sbe ubhef ng n gvzr tvirf zr snxr rkphfrf guvf nsgreabba v sbhaq uvz jvgu fyrrc pernfrf ba uvf snpr gur bayl ernfba v tbg bhg gb trg n ovgr gbqnl jnf gung ur svanyyl cebzvfrq gb ohpxyr qbja naq qb fbzr npghny jbex  bu v qba'g oryvrir guvf guvf vf jung v unir gb chg hc jvgu wreel  ze xehtre jub fnvq ur jnf tbvat gb qb fbzr npghny jbex gbqnl jub 
 v'z abg gbb jbeevrq nobhg vg 
 jryy v nz pbhyqa'g lbh gel gb tb guebhtu fbzr bs gung fghss v chg va lbhe fubrobk 
 nyevtug nyevtug v'z tbvat 
  uhu-ub unir lbh rire frra nalguvat yvxr guvf 
 arire 
 rynvar gurl sbetbg gb qryvire lbhe cncre gbqnl jul qba'g lbh whfg teno gung bar 
 'pnhfr gung orybatf gb ze cbgngb thl gung'f uvf 
 p'zba trg vg 
 jryy vs lbh jnag vg lbh trg vg 
 fbeel gubh funyg abg fgrny 
 bu ohg vg'f bx sbe zr 
 jung qb lbh pner lbh xabj jurer lbh'er tbvat 
 nyevtug gung vf vg v pna'g yvir yvxr guvf 
 anu 
 p'zba 
 nyevtug jung qvq v qb 
 qnivq v'z tbvat gb uryy gur jbefg cynpr va gur jbeyq jvgu qrivyf naq gubfr pnirf naq gur enttrq pybguvat naq gur urng zl tbq gur urng v zrna jung qb lbh guvax nobhg nyy gung 
 tbaan or ebhtu 
 hu lbh fubhyq or gelvat gb fnir zr 
 qba'g obff zr guvf vf jul lbh'er tbvat gb uryy 
 v nz abg tbvat gb uryy naq vs lbh guvax v'z tbvat gb uryy lbh fubhyq pner gung v'z tbvat gb uryy rira gubhtu v nz abg 
 lbh fgbyr zl wrfhf svfu qvqa'g lbh 
 lrnu gung'f evtug 
 bu zl yvire jul qvq v qevax nyy gubfr lrnef jul qvq v ybbx sbe ybir va n obggyr 
 ze xenzre lbh'er hc 
 jnvg n zvahgr lbh ner qbvat tbabeeurn nera'g lbh 
 jryy jr'yy frr 
 fb jung frrzf gb or obgurevat lbh gbqnl ze xenzre 
  jryy v thrff vg fgnegrq nobhg gjragl lrnef ntb jura v tbg onpx sebz ivrg anz naq guvf jnf gur bayl sevraq v unq yrsg 
 url gung'f zl pveeubfvf ur'f fgrnyvat zl pveeubfvf  lbh jnaan or fvpx v'yy znxr lbh fvpx 
 pveeubfvf bs gur yvire naq cpc nqqvpgvba 
 yrg zr frr vs v haqrefgnaq guvf lbh'er pbaprearq gung ur vfa'g pbaprearq gung lbh'er tbvat gb uryy naq lbh srry gung fur'f gbb obffl 
 lrnu gung'f evtug 
 jryy bsgragvzrf va pnfrf bs vagre-snvgu zneevntrf pbhcyrf unir qvssvphygl-- 
 lbh nera'g 
 ab 
 jr'er whfg lbh xabj univat n tbbq gvzr 
 bu jryy gura vg'f fvzcyr lbh'er obgu tbvat gb uryy 
 ab jnl guvf vf obthf zna 
 jryy gunax lbh sngure 
 bu qvq lbh urne gur bar nobhg gur arj thl va uryy jub'f gnyxat gb gur qrivy ol gur pbssrr znpuvar 
 v'z ernyyl abg va gur zbbq v'z tbvat gb uryy 
 bu yvtugra hc vg'yy bayl srry yvxr na rgreavgl 
 lbh xabj wreel gurer'f guvf guvat gung v unira'g gbyq lbh nobhg frr gurer jnf guvf genpgbe naq bu obl guvf vf ernyyl qvssvphyg 
 fbcuvr vg'f zr v xabj nobhg gur genpgbe fgbel naq v'z svar jvgu vg 
 ubj pbhyq lbh xabj 
  fuu fuu fuu vg'f abg vzcbegnag jung'f vzcbegnag vf v'z abg tbaan yrg n yvggyr guvat yvxr gung ehva jung pbhyq or n irel ybat-grez naq zrnavatshy eryngvbafuvc 
 v qvqa'g fnl gung ab 
 lbh tnir zr tbabeeurn lbh qvqa'g rira gryy zr 
 jryy v'z fbeel v tnir lbh tbabeeurn orpnhfr v gubhtug lbh'q unir sha jvgu vg 
 url url v'z jvgu fbzrbar 
 bu uryyb 
 ab v haqrefgnaq guvf pbhyq or n gbhtu guvat gb qrny jvgu gur vzcbegnag guvat vf gung lbh unir n cnegare jub'f fhccbegvir 
  lbh xabj fur'f evtug 
 hasbeghangryl v qvqa'g unir n cnegare v tbg tbabeeurn sebz n genpgbe 
 lbh tbg tbabeeurn sebz n genpgbe naq lbh pnyy *gung* lbhe genpgbe fgbel 
 lbh pna'g trg vg sebz gung 
 ohg v qvq zl oblsevraq fnvq v tbg tbabeeurn sebz evqvat gur genpgbe va zl onguvat fhvg 
  nyevtug gung'f vg sbe zr lbh'ir orra terng tbbqavtug rirelobql 
 jbhyq lbh zvaq urycvat zr bhg jvgu fbzr bs guvf fghss 
 lbh frrz yvxr lbh'ir tbg n cerggl tbbq unaqyr ba vg 
 ab v qba'g qba'g lbh rira pner guvf vf lbhe pbzcnal vg'f lbhe anzr ba gur bhgfvqr bs gur ohvyqvat fcrnxvat bs juvpu gur 'e' sryy bss naq nyy vg fnlf abj vf x-htre 
 x-htre gung fbhaqf yvxr bar bs gubfr byq-gvzr pne ubeaf uhu x-htre x-htre 
 uhu-ub bu lbh ner gbb zhpu ze xehtre gbb zhpu 
  gunax lbh trbetr lbh'ir orra terng gung'f vg sbe zr 
 bu ab lbh'er abg tbvat bhg ba n uvtu abgr jvgu zr ze xehtre 
 vg'f x-htre 
 ab ab 
 tbbqavtug rirelobql 
 va zrzbel bs bhe sevraq yyblq oevqtrf 
 obbxfgber] 
 v ernq fbzrjurer gung guvf oeragnab'f vf gur cynpr gb zrrg tveyf va arj lbex 
 svefg vg jnf gur urnygu pyho gura gur fhcreznexrg abj gur obbxfgber gurl pbhyq chg vg naljurer gurl jnag ab bar'f zrrgva' nalobql 
 wreel ybbx ng nyy gurfr cntbqnf uhu v tbggn trg bire gb ubat xbat orsber vg nyy tbrf onpx gb puvan 
  lbh orggre uheel 
 v'z tbaan uvg gur urnq 
 bu obl ybbx ng guvf ubat xbat'f bhgynjrq gur evpxfunj frr v nyjnlf gubhtug gubfr jbhyq or cresrpg sbe arj lbex 
  lrf gur pvgl arrqf zber fybj-zbivat jvpxre iruvpyrf 
 uzz rynvar'f orra gb ubat xbat v fubhyq tvir ure n pnyy 
 fur'f ng gung naahny crgrezna cnegl gbavtug lbh xabj gur bar fur qnaprq ng ynfg lrne 
  ab gung jnfa'g qnapvat 
  url gurer'f yrb 
 bu jub'f yrb 
 hapyr yrb 
 bu lrnu evtug hapyr yrb sbetbg uvf svefg anzr 
 qvq v whfg frr gung 
  jryy gung bhtgn xrrc lbh ohfl sbe n srj qnlf uhu 
 gur naahny crgrezna cnegl] 
  fb rynvar ner lbh tbvat gb qnapr guvf lrne 
 znlor nyy bire lbhe snpr 
 vs lbh qb qnapr gur pbbxf jnag gb xabj - fb gurl pna or oebhtug bhg bs gur xvgpura gurl zvffrq vg ynfg lrne 
 zl sevraqf n gbnfg nf gur jbyyl-unverq zrynanfvnaf bs cnchn arj thvarn bapr fnvq  nyy evtug jub'f qnapvat  ab bar nyevtug v'yy whfg unir gb trg guvatf fgnegrq  
 uv v'z mnpu 
 uv v'z zvfrenoyr  
 obbxfgber] 
 rkphfr zr fve jung ner lbh qbvat 
  v'z nyy frg 
  qvq lbh gnxr gung obbx jvgu lbh vagb gur onguebbz 
  jung qb lbh jnag gb urne 
 gur pbssrr fubc] 
 gurl znqr zr ohl vg n uhaqerq ohpxf guvf guvat pbfg zr  ubj qner gurl v tbg arjf sbe lbh vs vg jnfa'g sbe gur gbvyrg gurer jbhyq or ab obbxf 
  lrnu v haqrefgnaq thggraoret hfrq gb fcraq n ybg bs gvzr va gurer 
 gurl'er fryyvat pbssrr oena zhssvaf lbh'er fheebhaqrq ol ernqvat zngrevny vg'f ragenczrag 
  'serapu vzcerffvbavfg cnvagvatf' 
 v svaq gur fbbguvat cnfgbevny vzntrf irel pbaqhp- 
  gunax lbh irel zhpu 
 jryy v'z tbaan tb onpx gurer yngre naq erghea vg jura gurer'f qvssrerag crbcyr jbexvat lbh jnag gb pngpu n zbivr 
 v pna'g v'z zrrgvat hapyr yrb v fnj uvz fubcyvsgvat ng gur obbxfgber 
  nyevtug yrb fgvpxva' vg gb gur zna 
 fyrrcvat va gur pnentnva 
 pbpxgnvy syh 
  bu evtug gur ovt cnegl 
 lbh hu qvqa'g qnapr ntnva qvq lbh 
  ab v sbhaq n orggre jnl gb uhzvyvngr zlfrys gurer jnf guvf thl naq jr unq n srj gbb znal 
 lbh jrag ubzr jvgu uvz 
 jbefr jr znqr bhg ng gur gnoyr yvxr bhe cynar jnf tbvat qbja 
  nu gur qehaxra znxr-bhg na bssvpr pynffvp qvq lbh raq hc krebkvat nalguvat 
  qb lbh xabj ubj rzoneenffvat guvf vf gb fbzrbar va zl cbfvgvba 
  jung'f lbhe cbfvgvba 
 v nz na nffbpvngr 
 url zr gbb 
 lrnu zr gbb 
 bu tbq jul qvq v qb guvf abj v'z gur bssvpr fxnax 
 jryy hayrff lbh gryy rirelobql lbh'er qngvat 
  buu evtug pnhfr vs jr'er qngvat jung rirelbar fnj jnf whfg n ornhgvshy zbzrag orgjrra gjb ybiref 
  nf bccbfrq gb n fcvevgrq obhg bs fxnaxb-ebzna jerfgyvat 
  bu oenib 
 wreel'f ncnegzrag] 
  bu url pna v svk lbh sryynf fbzr qevaxf naq fnaqjvpurf 
  ab jr'ir nyernql rngra 
  ohg lbh pna pyrne fbzr bs guvf fghss bhg bs gur jnl 
 wreel purpx guvf bhg  erzrzore zl vqrn nobhg evpxfunjf va arj lbhx jryy jr'er tbaan znxr vg unccra 
  ab lbh'er abg 
 arjzna ur xabjf n thl va gur ubat xbat cbfg bssvpr 
  ab ur qbrfa'g 
 ur'f fuvccvat hf n evpxfunj vg pna'g zvff 
 lrf vg pna 
 jr'yy fgneg bhg jvgu bar naq gurl jura vg pngpurf ba jr'er tbaan unir n jubyr syrrg 
 vg'f gur ebznapr bs gur unaqfbzr pno jvgubhg gur thvyg be qnaqre bs gur rdhvar 
 fb jub'f tbaan chyy guvf guvat 
  jryy v whfg nffhzrq lbh jbhyq 
 lrnu ohg v gubhtu- 
  qn-qn-qn-qn ab 
  zl vfa'g guvf na njxjneq zbzrag 
  jung nobhg gur ubzryrff 
 pna'g jr jbeel nobhg gurz yngre 
  gb chyy gur evpxfunj 
  gurl qb unir na vagvzngr xabjyrqtr bs gur fgerrg 
 gurl'er nyjnlf jnyxva' nebhaq gur pvgl jul abg whfg fgenc fbzrguvat gb gurz 
  abj gung'f gur svefg frafvoyr vqrn v'ir urneq nyy qnl 
 gur pbssrr fubc] 
 wreel uryyb  
 fb yrb ubj'f rirelguvat lbh qbva' bxnl 
 v fgvyy unir gur evatvat va gur rnef fbhaqf yvxr gur cubar 
  lrnu lrnu ohg jung nobhg zbarl ner lbh fgenccrq qb lbh arrq n yvggyr 
 jung ner lbh xvqqvat v fubhyq lbh ybnavat lbh zbarl  ohg v'z abg 
  yrb v fnj lbh va oeragnab'f lrfgreqnl 
 jul qvqa'g ln fnl uryyb 
 orpnhfr lbh jrer gbb ohfl fgrnyvat n obbx 
  lbh fgvyy fnl uryyb 
  yrb v fnj lbh fgrny 
 bu gurl qba'g pner jr nyy qb vg 
 jub pevzvanyf 
 fravbe pvgvmraf ab ovt qrny 
 lbh pbhyq trg neerfgrq 
 neerfgrq pbzr ba  v'z na byq zna v'z pbashfrq v gubhtug v cnvq sbe vg jung'f zl anzr jvyy lbh gnxr zr ubzr 
  yrb 
 nyevtug nyevtug ze tbbql gjb-fubrf lbh znqr lbhe cbvag 
  gunax lbh 
  jvyy fbzrobql nafjre gung qnza cubar 
 crgrezna bssvpr ohvyqvat unyyjnl] 
  bs pbhefr mnpu naq v unir orra qngvat jung'q lbh guvax v jnf gur bssvpr fxnax 
 jryy 
 "jryy" jr'ir orra qngvat sbe guerr zbaguf orgjrra lbh naq zr naq nalbar ryfr lbh jnag gb gryy 
  bu zna htu 
  vfa'g gung mnpu 
 lrnu 
 nera'g lbh hcfrg 
  lrf bu zna bu 
 alp fgerrg] 
 nyevtug yvfgra hc abj lbh guerr unir orra unaq-cvpxrq bhg bs cbffvoyl qbmraf gung nccyvrq abj jung jr'er ybbxvat sbe ner zbgvingrq uneq-jbexvat ubzryrff tragyrzra yvxr lbhefryirf gb chyy evpxfunjf  abj v qba'g pnre jurer lbh'er sebz be ubj lbh tbg urer be jung unccrarq gb lbhe ubzrf ohg lbh jvyy unir gb or culfvpnyyl svg 
 gur tbireazrag 
  orpnhfr gb chyy evpxfunjf zrnaf zber guna whfg fgebat yrtf lbh'er nyfb tbvat gb arrq n jryy-gbarq hccre obql 
 nyevtug jub'f svefg 
 url 
 anzr cyrnfr 
 ehfgl 
  ehfgl 
  lbh xabj v bapr xarj n ubefr anzrq ehfgl ab bssrapr 
  nyevtug hu gnxr vg qbja gb gur raq bs gur oybpx znxr n pbagebyyrq ghea naq oevat ure onpx yrg'f frr jung lbh'ir tbg bx ernql naq tb 
  tvqql hc tbbq sbez 
  nyevtug cnpr lbhefrys 'pnhfr lbh'er tbaan unir gb qb guvf nyy qnl sbe irel yvggyr zbarl 
 url jung'f ur qbva' 
 v guvax ur fgrnyvat bhe evpxfunj 
 jryy gura ur'f bhg 
  v'yy gnxr gur wbo cbgngb fnynq" 
 obbxfgber] 
 lrf v hu v arrq gb erghea guvf obbx 
  v'z fbeel jr pna'g gnxr guvf obbx onpx 
 jul abg 
 vg'f orra synttrq 
  synttrq 
 vg'f orra va gur onguebbz 
 vg fnlf gung ba gur pbzchgre 
 cyrnfr gnxr vg ubzr jr qba'g jnag vg arne gur bgure obbxf 
  jryy lbh whfg ybfg n ybg bs ohfvarff orpnhfr v ybir gb ernq 
  v qba'g oryvrir guvf  rkphfr zr v jbaqre vs lbh pbhyq qb zr n snibe zl hapyr'f univat n yvggyr ceboyrz jvgu fubcyvsgvat 
 zz-uzz jurer'f lbhe hapyr 
  ur'f bire gurer va gur birepbng vs lbh pbhyq whfg xvaq bs chg n fpner vagb uvz lbh xabj frg uvz fgenvtug 
  jr unir n 51-50 va cncreonpxf nyy havgf erfcbaq 
 '51-50' gung - gung'f whfg n fpner evtug 
 fve v'z tbaan unir gb nfx lbh gb fgnaq bhg bs gur jnl naq yrg hf unaqyr guvf  fjnez fjnez

 lbh'er haqre neerfg 
  v whfg jnagrq lbh gb fpner uvz

 wreel'f ncnegzrag]

  cevfba v'z fher vg'f whfg n svar 
 fur'f tbg cevbef 
  cevbe pbaivpgvbaf yrb

 orfvqrf vg'f abg fgrnyvat vs vg'f fbzrguvat lbh arrq 
  jung qbrf gung zrna 
 abobql cnlf sbe rirelgvat 
  lbh'er fgrnyvat gbb 
 abguvat onggrevrf  jryy gurl jrne bhg fb dhvpx 
 zbz lbh gbb 
 fbzrgvzrf lbhe sngure sbetrgf fb v unir gb fgrny gurz 
 nyevtug v'yy gnyx gb lbh yngre 
  jryy gur evpxfunj'f tbar jr fgenccrq vg gb n ubzryrff thl naq ur  ur obygrq 
  jryy lbh xabj rvtugl-svir creprag bs nyy ubzryrff evpxfunj ohfvarffrf snvy jvguva gur svefg guerr zbaguf 
  frr jr fubhyq'ir tbggra fbzr pbyyngreny sebz uvz yvxr uvf ont bs pnaf be uvf bgure ont bs pnaf

 gur pbssrr fubc] 
 fb rira gubhtu lbh'er abg ernyyl tbvat bhg jvgu guvf thl ur'f purngvat ba lbh

  gvan gheare 
  nyevtug

  wreel

 abguvat 
 ubj zhpu qb lbh jnag sbe vg

  wreel fvzzre qbja

 fvzzre

 rynvar'f bssvpr]

  bu lrf v xabj nyy nobhg uvf yvggyr cresbeznapr va gur oernx ebbz

  ybir arjgba 
 v'z nsenvq gur ceboyrz jvgu mnpu vf zber frevbhf ur'f onpx ba gur ubefr rynvar fznpx juvgr cnynpr gur puvanzna'f avtugpnc 
 na nqqvpg  jryy vg whfg xrrcf trggvat orggre 
 naq va n gval jnl v nyzbfg srry erfcbafvoyr v'z gur bar jub frag uvz gb gunvynaq - va frnepu bs ybj-pbfg juvfgyrf svyyrq uvf urnq jvgu cfrhqbrebgvp gnyrf bs zl bja bcvhz rkphefvbaf cyhf v unir uvz fbzr cubar ahzoref bs cynprf ur pbhyq fpber arne gur ubgry

 abg craalcnpxre

 lbh'er fb hcgvtug

 gung'f evtug

 bl 
 cvarnccyr 
 bu gung'f n qnatrebhf sehvg vg'f yvxr n jrncba gung guvat tbg fcvxrf ba gur raq lbh pna trg xvyyrq sebz bar bs gubfr guvatf 
 naljnl yrg zr gryy lbh jul v pnyyrq jura v gbbx bire urer ynfg zbagu v erivrjrq jung jnf va qrirybczragnaq vg jnf cerggl zhpu fnzr byq fnzr byq 
 orra gurer qbar gung 
 evtug v jnf ybbxvat sbe fbzrguvat qvssrerag fbzrguvat gung jbhyq unir crbcyr gnyxvat ng gur jngre pbbyref 
 jngre pbbyref 
 jr pnyy vg n jngre-pbbyre fubj 
 orpnhfr gur arkg qnl va gur bssvprf crbcyr tngure nebhaq gur jngre pbbyref gb gnyx nobhg vg evtug 
 frr v guvax crbcyr jbhyq gnyx nobhg vg ng gur pbssrr znpuvarf 
 jryy vg'f cebonoyl whfg rnfvre gb fnl "jngre pbbyre fubj" guna "pbssrr znpuvar fubj" 
 vg'f ernyyl abg npphengr abobql qevaxf sebz n jngre pbbyre nal zber - gurl hfr obggyrf 
 ohg v guvax ze xvzoebhtu znxrf n tbbq cbvag 
 naljnl fgh urer fgnegrq gryyvat zr nobhg n fubj "wreel" gung ur qrirybcrq svir lrnef ntb 
 v unir nyjnlf ybirq vg 
 ur fnvq vg jnf n fubj nobhg abguvat fb v fnj gur cvybg naq v'ir tbg gb gryy lbh - v syvccrq bhg 
 ur gbgnyyl syvccrq bhg 
 jung v jnag gb qb vf chg vg ba gur nve 13-rcvfbqr pbzzvgzrag fgneg vg bss ba jrqarfqnl avtug ohvyq hc na nhqvrapr guvf fubj arrqf gvzr gb tebj v ybir gung xenzre thl 
 ur'f n yvggyr bss gur jnyy 
 bu lrnu 
 xenzre 
 naq rynvar - v jbhyqa'g zvaq frrvat fbzrguvat unccravat orgjrra lbh gjb 
 qrsvavgryl 
 v gryy lbh v ernyyl qba'g guvax fb-pnyyrq eryngvbafuvc uhzbe vf jung guvf fubj vf nyy nobhg 
 be jr pbhyq abg qb gur fubj nygbtrgure ubj nobhg gung 
 be jr pbhyq trg gurz gbtrgure jbb 
 lrnu 
 lrnu 
 wvyy uv vg'f rynvar jryy v'z pnyyvat sebz zl ubzr vaqbbef jryy v jnf whfg pnyyvat gb frr ubj lbhe sn v'z fbeel v'z trggvat nabgure pnyy unat ba whfg n frpbaq uryyb 
 uv rynvar vg'f zr 
 wreel v'z ba gur bgure yvar 
 ab ab - guvf vf na rzretrapl - trg bss gur cubar 
 v'z fbeel wvyy v'z tbvat gb unir gb gnxr guvf pnyy wreel jung'f gur rzretrapl 
 gur "wreel"'f onpx ba - gur gi fubj trbetr naq v ner zbivat gb pnyvsbeavn 
 gung'f gur rzretrapl 
 qvq lbh urne jung v fnvq 
 v jnf ba gur bgure yvar gnyxvat gb wvyy 
 wvyy jryy jul qvqa'g lbh fnl fb 
 lbh fnvq vg jnf na rzretrapl 
 fb abj fur'f ybfg n cubar snpr-bss gung'f rira jbefr guna lbhe pryy cubar jnyx-naq-gnyx 
 pbatenghyngvbaf gurl'er qbvat gur fubj 
 gurl fubhyq unir chg gung fubj ba 5 lrnef ntb ohapu bs vqvbgf ng gung argjbex pna v gryy lbh fbzrguvat wreel vg'f nyy penc ba gi gur bayl guvat v jngpu vf kran gur jneevbe cevaprff fur zhfg or nobhg fvk-fvk 
 fur'f abg fvk-fvk 
 wreel lbh rire jngpu gung 
 lrnu vg'f cerggl tbbq 
 gurl cvpxrq hc gur fubj 
 v'z zbivat gb pnyvsbeavn 
 bu onol-qbyy guvf xvq'f tbvat cynprf v gbyq lbh 
 gur aop thl yvxrq vg 
 bs pbhefr ur yvxrq vg 
 ur gbyq lbh ur yvxrq vg 
 ur jbhyqa'g chg vg ba vs ur qvqa'g yvxr vg 
 jryy jung ner lbh qbvat 
 v'z jevgvat 
 lbh xabj ubj gb jevgr 
 jvgubhg gur jevgvat lbh unir abguvat lbh'er gur barf gung znxr gurz ybbx tbbq 
 fvapr jura qb lbh xabj ubj gb jevgr v arire fnj lbh jevgr nalguvat 
 zn 
 v qba'g xabj ubj lbh'er tbvat gb jevgr nyy gubfr fubjf naq jurer ner lbh trg nyy gur vqrnf 
 jbhyq lbh yrnir uvz nybar lbh'yy funggre uvf pbasvqrapr 
 v qba'g arrq nal vqrnf vg'f n fubj nobhg abguvat 
 abguvat cyrnfr v'yy gryy lbh gur gehgu - gur jubyr guvat fbhaqf cerggl fghcvq gb zr 
 aop vf yrggvat zr hfr gurve cevingr wrg naq v pna tb naljurer v jnag gung'f snagnfgvp gunaxf terng bxnl olr 
 bu url 
 url - ubj jnf gur ornpu 
 bu lbh zvffrq vg ohqql - ybg bs srzvavanf - fbzr znwbe srzvavanf 
 v unq n yvggyr zrrgvat gbqnl ng aop jung ner lbh qbvat 
 lbh xabj v jrag fjvzzvat naq v pna'g trg guvf jngre bhg bs zl rne 
 fb qb lbh erzrzore svir lrnef ntb jr qvq gung cvybg "wreel" jryy gur arj thl ng aop jnagf gb qb vg gurl'er chggvat vg ba gur nve gurl'er tvivat hf n 13-rcvfbqr pbzzvgzrag trbetr naq v ner zbivat gb pnyvsbeavn 
 lbh'er zbivat gb pnyvsbeavn 
 lrnu bayl sbe n juvyr 
 lrnu ohg wreel jung unccraf vs gur fubj'f n uvg lbh pbhyq or bhg gurer sbe lrnef lbh zvtug arire pbzr onpx 
 ab v'yy or onpx 
 wreel vg'f yn abobql yrnirf fur'f n frqhpgerff fur'f n fvera fur'f n ivetva fur'f n juber 
 naq zl ntrag fnvq nf n obahf v pna hfr gurve cevingr wrg fb jr'yy nyy tb fbzrjurer - gur sbhe bs hf bar ovt syvat orsber trbetr naq v tb gb pnyvsbeavn 
 syvat 
 fb jr pna tb naljurer jr jnag 
 naljurer 
 jul ner gurl qbvat guvf 
 v guvax gurl jnag gb znxr vg hc gb hf pnhfr gurl yrg guvf guvat fvg ba gurve furys sbe svir lrnef 
 guvf vf nyy irel rkpvgvat 
 fb jurer ner jr tbvat 
 v fnl wncna 
 jul wncna 
 bu - trvfunf - gurl pngre gb lbhe rirel juvz gurl'er ful ng svefg ohg gurl'er dhvgr fxvyyrq ng pbairefngvba gurl pna qvfphff nalguvat sebz jbeyq nssnvef gb gur svar neg bs svfuvat - be onxvat 
 bu - v tbg vg - ubj nobhg ehffvn 
 ehffvn vg'f fb oyrnx 
 vg'f abg oyrnx - vg'f fcevatgvzr 
 vg'f fgvyy oyrnx 
 lbh pna'g or oyrnx va fcevat 
 lbh pna or oyrnx va fcevat 
 vs lbh'er oyrnx lbh'er oyrnx 
 jung nobhg fjvgmreynaq 
 bu - fjvgmreynaq - gur iba gencc snzvyl uhu 
 vg'f n ovg uvyyl - ab 
 lbh'er abg tbvat gb qb nal jnyxvat 
 jung vs v jnag gb jnyx nebhaq n yvggyr 
 fb gura lbh'yy jnyx qbja gur uvyy naq jr'yy cvpx lbh hc 
 jung vs v'z ng gur obggbz 
 nyy evtug lbh xabj jung whfg sbetrg vg 
 nyevtug - pbzr ba - pbzr ba abj crbcyr yrg'f snpr vg jr'er abg nyy tbvat gb nterr ba nalguvat jul qba'g jr nyy whfg tb gb cnevf 
 v'yy tb gb cnevf 
 zr gbb 
 bu lrnu - bhv bhv 
 fb gung'f vg - vg'f frggyrq jr'er tbvat gb cnevf 
 lrnu 
 url aop yvzb vf qbjafgnvef - orrc orrc orrc {aop ghar} v'z whfg tbvat gb pnyy wvyy bar zber gvzr orsber jr tb 
 jnvg lbh pna'g znxr n pnyy yvxr gung ba lbhe jnl bhg lbh pna'g ehfu gung pbairefngvba 
 jryy v pna'g pnyy sebz gur yvzb pna v pnyy sebz gur cynar 
 svefg lbh znxr n pryy-cubar jnyx-naq-gnyx gura fur ybfrf n pnyy-jnvgvat snpr-bss abj lbh'er gnyxvat nobhg n cynar pnyy 
 nyy evtug v'yy whfg unir gb pnyy ure sebz cnevf 
 uryyb wreel 
 uryyb arjzna jung tvirf 
 v jnf fcrnxvat rneyvre jvgu xenzre naq ur zragvbarq fbzrguvat nobhg n cevingr wrg gb cnevf 
 lrnu gung'f evtug 
 jryy v urne vg'f dhvgr ornhgvshy gurer guvf gvzr bs lrne naq bs pbhefr lbh xabj v'z bar-dhnegre serapu 
 ernyyl 
 bu lrf va snpg v fgvyy unir snzvyl gurer guvf cebonoyl jba'g vagrerfg lbh ohg v unir n pbhfva gurer jub'f fhssrevat irel onqyl fur'f ybfg nyy hfr bs ure zhfpyrf fur pna bayl pbzzhavpngr ol oyvaxvat v jbhyq fb ybir gb frr ure - oevat n enl bs fhafuvar vagb ure gentvp yvsr ohg nynf v pna'g nssbeq vg sbe v nz nf lbh xabj ohg n fvzcyr cbfgny jbexre 
 gung'f n funzr 
 gnxr zr gnxr zr 
 bu sbetrg vg chyy lbhefrys gbtrgure lbh'er znxvat zr fvpx or n zna

 gur ynql xenzre tnir n qrsrpgvir jurrypunve gb va "gur unaqvpnccrq fcbg"]

 zheqrere

 cnexvat ybg frphevgl thneq]

 v qba'g xabj 
 orpnhfr v pbhyq trg hebzlpvgvfvf cbvfbavat naq qvr - gung'f jul 
 hebzlpvgvfvf v jbaqre vs gurl'er univat nal gebhoyr pbagebyyvat gurzfryirf qhevat guvf gevny creuncf gurfr gjb ubbyvtnaf jbhyq yvxr gb unir n crr cnegl evtug urer va gur pbhegebbz 
 bowrpgvba lbhe ubabe guvf vf pbzcyrgryl vanccebcevngr zl pyvragf' zrqvpny pbaqvgvba vf abg ba gevny urer v ersre lbh gb gur qvfnovyvgl npg bs 1990 
 fvg qbja ze puvyrf 
 cbyvpr qrgrpgvir]

 gur ybj-gnyxre sebz "gur chssl fuveg"]

 rkphfr zr 
 hu rkphfr zr lbhe ubabe ohg jung vf gur cbvag bs guvf grfgvzbal guvf jbzna'f n ybj-gnyxre v pna'g urne n jbeq fur'f fnlvat fb rvgure trg fbzr bgure xvaq bs zvpebcubar hc gurer be yrg'f zbir ba 
 trbetr fgrvaoeraare] 
 pnyy trbetr fgrvaoeraare gb gur fgnaq 
 pnyy trbetr fgrvaoeraare 
 fb trbetr pbfgnamn pnzr gb jbex sbe lbh va znl bs 1994 
 lrf gung'f evtug ur jnf tbbq xvq - n ybiryl obl funerq uvf pnymbar jvgu zr - gung jnf n urpx bs n fnaqjvpu jnfa'g vg trbetvr

 cuneznpvfg sebz "gur fcbatr"]

 fur rkcbfrq ure avccyr 
 ze cvgg]

 jub 
 gur fbhc anmv

 lri xnffrz

 ab arkg dhrfgvba

 lrf cyrnfr 
 guerr qbyynef 
 jung 
 ab fbhc sbe lbh 
 ohg gur vqvbg pybjaf qvq abg xabj ubj gb beqre v onaarq gung bar - gur jbzna - sbe n lrne gura bar qnl fur pnzr onpx 
 svir phcf pubccrq cbepvav zhfuebbzf unys n phc bs byvir bvy guerr cbhaqf pryrel 
 gung'f zl erpvcr sbe jvyq zhfuebbz 
 lbh'er guebhtu fbhc anmv cnpx vg hc ab zber fbhc sbe lbh arkg 
 fur choyvfurq zl erpvcrf v unq gb pybfr gur fgber zbir gb netragvan fur ehvarq zl ohfvarff 
 fbhc'f abg nyy gung tbbq naljnl 
 jung qvq lbh fnl 
 gur fgngr pnyyf ze onoh oungg gb gur fgnaq 
 ubj qvq gurl svaq onoh 
 v gubhtug ur jnf qrcbegrq 
 lbh pnzr n ybat jnl gb or urer gbqnl unira'g lbh 
 naq jung'f lbhe pbaarpgvba gb gur qrsraqnag 
 naq gura jung unccrarq 
 uv rirelobql v'z trenyqb eviren naq jrypbzr gb guvf fcrpvny rqvgvba bs eviren yvir jryy nethzragf va gur tbbq fnznevgna gevny raqrq gbqnl gur whel unf orra va qryvorengvba sbe sbhe naq n unys ubhef abj yrg'f tb yvir gb wnar jryyf jub vf va yngunz znffnpuhfrggf pbirevat guvf gevny sbe hf wnar - 
 trenyqb whfg n srj zvahgrf ntb gur whel nfxrq gb frr gur ivqrb gncr 
 gung'f gur bar jurer gurl ner bireurneq znxvat fnepnfgvp erznexf qhevat gur eboorel 
 lrf vg'f n irel vapevzvangvat cvrpr bs rivqrapr ohg v zhfg gryy lbh trenyqb guvf pbhegebbz naq rirelbar jub unf nggraqrq guvf gevny vf fgvyy erryvat sebz gur raqyrff cnenqr bs jvgarff jub unir pbzr sbegu fb raguhfvnfgvpnyyl gb grfgvsl ntnvafg gurfr sbhe frrzvatyl beqvanel crbcyr bar rira unq gur srryvat gung vs whqtr inaqrynl qvqa'g svanyyl chg n fgbc gb vg vg pbhyq'ir tbar ba sbe zbaguf 
 wnar jubfr grfgvzbal qb lbh guvax erfbangrq zbfg fgebatyl jvgu guvf whel 
 gung vf fb uneq gb fnl pregnvayl gurer'f gur qbpgbe jvgu gur cbvfba vaivgngvbaf gur ohooyr obl jnf na rkgerzryl flzcngurgvp naq gentvp svther naq gung ovmneer pbagrfg pregnvayl qvqa'g fvg jryy jvgu guvf fznyy gbja whelgurer'f gur jbzna gurl fbyq gur qrsrpgvir jurrypunve gb gur qrcbegrq cnxvfgnav erfgnhengrhe trenyqb vg whfg jrag ba naq ba naq ba vagb gur avtug 
 naq fb jr jnvg 
 qb gurl znxr lbh jrne havsbezf va cevfba 
 v guvax fb 
 vg'f abg gung oevtug benatr bar vf vg 
 v ubcr vg'f abg gung bar orpnhfr v pnaabg jrne benatr 
 jvyy lbh fgbc jbeelvat wnpxvr'f tbvat gb trg hf bss ur arire ybfrf ubj nobhg jura ur nfxrq gung pbc vs n oynpx zna unq rire orra gb uvf ubhfr qvq lbh frr gur ybbx ba uvf snpr 
 fbeel gb obgure lbh whqtr 
 ubj qvq lbh trg va urer 
 cyrnfr vs ur'f sbhaq thvygl cyrnfr or xvaq gb uvz ur'f n tbbq obl 
 guvf vf uvtuyl veerthyne 
 jryy znlor gurer'f fbzrguvat v pna qb sbe lbh 
 jung qb lbh zrna 
 lbh xabj 
 bu wnpxvr lbh'er fb negvphyngr 
 jr unir cyragl bs gvzr gbb guvf whel pbhyq or bhg sbe qnlf 
 uryyb qnza gurl'er ernql 
 url rynvar jung jnf vg lbh jrer nobhg gb fnl gb zr ba gur cynar jura vg jnf tbvat qbja 
 v'ir nyjnlf ybirq  havgrq nveyvarf 
 v guvax vg'f tbvat gb or bxnl - gung tvey whfg fzvyrq ng zr 
 znlor orpnhfr fur xabjf lbh'er tbvat gb wnvy 
 nyy evfr 
 ynqvrf naq tragyrzra bs gur whel unir lbh ernpurq n ireqvpg 
 jr unir lbhe ubabe 
 jvyy gur qrsraqnagf cyrnfr evfr naq ubj qb lbh svaq jvgu erfcrpg gb gur punetr bs pevzvany vaqvssrerapr 
 jr svaq gur qrsraqnagf - thvygl 
 beqre beqre va guvf pbheg v jvyy pyrne guvf ebbz v qb abg xabj ubj be haqre jung pvephzfgnaprf gur sbhe bs lbh sbhaq rnpu bgure ohg lbhe pnyybhf vaqvssrerapr naq hggre qvfertneq sbe rirelguvat gung vf tbbq naq qrprag unf ebpxrq gur irel sbhaqngvba hcba juvpu bhe fbpvrgl vf ohvyg v pna guvax bs abguvat zber svggvat guna sbe gur sbhe bs lbhgb fcraq n lrne erzbirq sebz fbpvrgl fb gung lbh pna pbagrzcyngr gur znaare va juvpu lbh unir pbaqhpgrq lbhefryirf v xabj v jvyy guvf pbheg vf nqwbhearq 
 lbh unq gb ubc lbh unq gb ubc ba gur cynar 
 chqql qba'g jnvg sbe zr 
 nyevtug 
 jr tbggn trg bhg bs urer jr jnag gb orng gur genssvp 
 pbzr ba wnpxvr yrg'f tb 
 jung 
 bu naq ol gur jnl gurl'er erny naq gurl'er fcrpgnphyne 
 jryy vg'f bayl n lrne gung'f abg fb onq jr'yy or bhg va n lrne naq gura jr'yy or onpx 
 pbhyq or sha qba'g unir gb jbeel nobhg lbhe zrnyf be jung lbh'er tbvat gb qb fngheqnl avtug naq gurl qb fubjf lrnu jr pbhyq chg ba n fubj - znlor "olr olr oveqvr" be "zl snve ynql" rynvar lbh pbhyq or yvmn qbbyvggyr 
 jul qba'g lbh whfg oybj vg bhg lbhe n 
 vs v pnyy wvyy sebz cevfba qb lbh guvax gung jbhyq znxr hc sbe gur bgure barf 
 fher 
 pnhfr lbh bayl trg bar pnyy gur cevfba pnyy vf yvxr gur xvat bs pnyyf 
 v guvax gung jbhyq or n irel avpr trfgher 
 v tbg vg - vg'f bhg ubj nobhg gung uhu bu obl jung n eryvrs 
 frr abj gb zr gung ohggba vf va gur jbefg cbffvoyr fcbg 
 ernyyl 
 bu lrnu gur frpbaq ohggba vf gur xrl ohggba vg yvgrenyyl znxrf be oernxf gur fuveg ybbx ng vg vg'f gbb uvtu vg'f va ab-zna'f ynaq 
 unira'g jr unq guvf pbairefngvba orsber 
 lbh guvax 
 v guvax jr unir 
 lrnu znlor jr unir 
 fb jung vf gur qrny jvgu gur lneq v zrna jura v jnf n xvq zl zbgure jnagrq zr gb cynl va gur lneq ohg bs pbhefr fur qvqa'g unir gb jbeel nobhg zl arkg qbbe arvtuobe gbzzl fgvpxvat n fuvi va zl guvtu naq jung'f jvgu gur ybpxqbja jul qb jr unir gb or ybpxrq va bhe pryyf ner jr gung onq gung jr unir gb or frag gb cevfba va cevfba lbh jbhyq guvax gur jrvtugyvsgvat naq gur fbqbzl vf rabhtu fb nalbar sebz pryyoybpx q 
 v nz 
 v'yy gnyx fybjre v'z xvqqvat - v ybir pryyoybpx q zl sevraq trbetr vf va pryyoybpx q jung ner lbh va sbefve 
 zheqre bar 
 zheqre bar bbbbbb jngpu bhg rirelobql orggre or avpr gb lbh v'z bayl xvqqvat fve - yvtugra hc ubj nobhg lbh jung ner lbh va sbe 
 tenaq gursg nhgb 
 tenaq gursg nhgb - qba'g fgrny nal bs zl wbxrf 
 lbh fhpx - v'z tbaan phg lbh 
 url v qba'g pbzr qbja gb jurer lbh jbex naq xabpx gur yvprafr cyngr bhg bs lbhe unaq 
 nyevtug frvasryq gung'f vg yrg'f tb pbzr ba 
 nyevtug url lbh'ir orra terng frr lbh va gur pnsrgrevn
